verse_text: Wambota atamba bafapana akupana Jisas Kraisi amamba. Jisas nataga wambota Deviti, Devit nataga wambota atamba Abrahami.
Bafas ihas wambota atamba Abrahami isimba. Nogama Abrahami Aisak. Nogama Aisaki Jekop. Ea' Jekop ahama Judai naloma sahopana owapana ananimi.
Juda ahama Peres naloma Sira. Ma'mam amamu'wi Tamar. Ea' Peres ahama Hesroni, ea' Hesron ahama Rami.
Ram nogamana agilinama Aminadap. Ea' nogamana Aminadapi Nason. Ea' nogama Nasoni Salmon.
Ea' Salmon nogamana agilinama Boas. Boas ma'mana Rehap. Boas nogamana agilinama Obet. Obet ma'mana Rut, ea' Obet nogamana agilinama Jesi.
Ea' Jesi anen ahama dembinai king Deviti. Devit naso' ano'w nemata'w fowa' Uria nagaso'akwi nola king Solomon.
Ea' Solomon nogamana agilinama Rehoboam, ea' Rehoboam nola Abiyah. Ea' nogamana Abiyah agilinama Aser.
Aser anen ahama Jehosafati, nola Joram. Ea' Joram ahama Usia.
Ea' Usia nola Jotam, Jotam nola Ehas ahama Hesekaiai.
Hesekaia nogamana agilinama Manase, ea' Manase nola Amos. Amos ahama Josaiai.
Ea' Josaia nola Jekonia naloma owapana ananimi maloma ahamam ma'mam safe' sanda' kalabus sapani wambel Babilon lauguni.
Esis sofa'as sawasi'as sisihis sapani Babilon, Jekonia nogamana ananinai agilinama Sealtiel, ea' Sealtiel nola Jerubal.
Jerubal anen ahama Abiuti ea' Abiut nola Eliakim. Nogamana ananinai agilinama Asor.
Asor nogamana agilinama Sadok, ea' Sadok ahama Akimi. Akim nola Eliut.
Ea' Eliut nogamana agilinama Eleasar, ea' Eleasar ahama Matanii. Ea' Matani nola Jekop ahama Josepi.
Josep anamba nagaso' Mariai. Ea' Maria dei' kola Jisas, dei' esis saga'i anen Krais Dembinai God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.

Amom bafapana akupana Jisasi fowa'imi siambam magataga na'amba. Amom amamba Abraham nolam magi' magatagai mafi'i matagama Devit, amamba siambam mataga 14-pelaim. Ea' amom amamba Devit nolam magi' magatagai mafi'i matagama nemaf afamba bousi sofa' esis Israel safe' sanda' kalabus sagape wambel Babiloni, amamba wapani 14-pelaim. Ea' amom amamba esis Israel sanda' kalabus Babilon solam magi' magatagai mafi'i a' matagama nogota Krais nagataga, amamba wapani 14-pelaim. Siambam sagakolasom a' mataga hiami 42-pelaim.

Fowa' Maria kogola Jisas Krais basef fagape na'amba. Ma'mana Maria esis sa'i ako'w koso' Josep, ea' esis bias ina dei' sandaso'ama, ata' owa'atin. Ea' sati Maria akofa' opafa Ambal bu'unai Godi nafi'mai ako'w ea' dei' a' opafu'w.
Waulunama'w akwo'unai Josep anen aman bu'unai. Anen nandaiwa'ma nonda'akw ambal aol. Na'amba okom ma'i nondambaho' nili'amona'w kope dowaf.

Anen nape ata' okom mandanda'ma isimba atis, ea' na'oh nandondo'ah owa', anona ensel Dembinaii natagama anen na'ipana na'i, “Josep, ina' akunama Deviti, ina ombal mehenama negao'wa waulu'mina ine'ikwi Maria, owa'i. Dei' main, awani inimba nagapau'wi, Ambal bu'unai Godi nafi'mai ako'w.

Ea' atiasi a' kola awani aman, awani inimba anen nogatopalopa amam nematawa hiasi ma nogakwaha waf awafi asasifi nofa'as sogotanimaii. Na'amba dei' ina' nihapomana agol ananigili Jisas. Basef kofagefa ma agol agalemba ifimba fa'i, anen aman nogofa' epes ananisii ma sogape andeande'i.
Hiahaom amamba hiami mataga na'amba si'i anif basef Dembinai nagaso'anaef malogol anona aman profet fowa'inai, dei' afataga endilisi. Fowa' gani profet anamba naga'ias na'amba na'i,
‘Owagama ano'w nemata'w sa'ukwi owa' ota' kogaso' amania a' opafu'w. Ea' kola anin awani aman agol ananigili Emanuel. Agol agalemba kofagogola ga'ias na'amba ga'i, God nape naloma apa'.

Ea' Josep na'oh nandambema a' nanda'as si'i ensel naga'ipana. Ea' naila basef ifimba nao'wakw apa' esis ina sandaso'ama atogon atin, owa'. Ata' sape daindai safe' ma ako'w a' kogola awani aman. Ea' nahapomana agol Jisas.

Maria kola Jisas Betlehem, itap lu'upa agilipa Judia. Nogota atamba Maria kogola Jisas, anona aman dembinai king Herot nape nugumafi walemb hielimbi esis Judai. Ako'w kolana ea', anom amam dembami gawaimi owa' mogogawa Godia mafi'i lauguni gani awin nagatafima a' mafi'i mafi'i mataga lu'wambili Jerusalem ea' ma'i,
“Dei' awani Dambaini nagataga king dembinai esis Judai nape ani? Afa' wati ondo'w anani'wi kwatafi kwape gani awin nagatafima, ea' dei' waila'w wafi'i wa'i onda' lotumana ofela agol ananigili.”

Afamba Dembinai King Herot name' basef ifimba, okom iwanim malamafe'ma atiasi awani inimba netaga damben a' nili'amona anen. Ea' esis hiasi sagape Jerusalami wapani a' ombal mahas sa'i atiasi nemaf awafi a' fetaga.

Ea' king Herot nakolasai amom pris hiami dembami maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ea' nahali'am na'i, “Aman anamba Krais God nandandepana nosapa'ana nogafi'ii, atiasi anen notaga wambel anima?”
Ea' amom magwamana basef ma'i, “Ma'mana kolana Betlehem, itap lu'upa Judia. Dei' main, anona profet fowa'inai naga'i basef na'i,

‘Ipa' Betlehem itap lu'upa Judia, ipa' ina epes falafipai, owa'atin. Ipa' ina pape pagi' ma amom gavman dembami mugumafi ipa' Judiai, owa'. Dei' main, anona Dembinai anaf a' notaga wambel ipe'imbili sa'umbili Betlehem. Anen anaf a' nogape dembinai ma ipa' amam nematawa ae'ipai Israel ea' numafi ipa' hipai ma pegape andeande'.’”
Ea' king Herot nandambaho' atin nofalai amom gawaimi amamba magafi'i awin nagatafimai mandambaho' mandakolas nahali'am na'i, “Nemaf maif ipa' pati ondo'w akwamba kwataga?”

Ea' amom ma'ipana ma ea', nasapa'am a' mafe' Betlehem na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fo'o pelapelaoma awani inimba. Ama pitilin, pitanima pefa'ai basef pifi'i pi'ipa ae' wapani. Ae' a'i efe' itilin enda' lotuman efela agol ananigili wapani.”

Amom mame' basef ananifi ea', mosafel makwaha anen a' mafe', mati ondo'w akwamba sa'ukwi fowa' mali' magatolo'w gani awin nagatafimai, a' kwafe' kwali'a amom. Ea' kwape atapi'w ipat atamba ilif awani inimba Jisas nagapautai.
Amom mati ondo'w akwamba kwape ipat atamba ea' sonaham a'owa'.

Ea' mawis ipat atamba awani inimba naloma ma'man Maria sagapautai. Amom mati awani inimba mindiwa nembawa motawa manda' lotuman mafela agol ananigili. Ama main, mupalia paus amamisi magiai hiahawes amom magatalis otamba lu'umbaisi alogw fasifasigwi gwagasi maso'anas. Ea' maso'ana gol naloma anin paura sa'i frankinsens, alogw fasigwi gwagani saloma anin sanda bu'wani sofalan saga'i meri, maso'anas awani inimba Jisas.

Maso'anas ea', God na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina ata' pitanima pefe'ma King Herot, owa'i. Ea' pila ano'w ufia'w pitanima pefe' wambel ipe'imbili.” Ea' maila ano'w ufia'w daia'w motanima mafe' wambel amamimbili lauguni.

Amom amamba gawaimi mafe', Josep na'oh owa', nandondo'ah anona ensel Dembinaii nafi'mai anen na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel a' ne'wa awani inimba neloma ma'mana anani'wi pefe' anambel wambel lauguni itap lu'upa Isip. Ea' pipani Isip ama anaf peme' ae' i'ipipa wapani dao', pifi'i. Dei' main, dembinai King Herot atiasi ni'ipa soldia ananimi mola' molaoma awani inimba ma mohan negaga'.”
Ea' Josep nosafel owamb ambamba atomb nao'wa awani naloma ma'mana Maria asafe' Isip lauguni.

Josep napani Isip ama King Herot naga' ea' nao'was sotanimai si'i anif basef Dembinai God naga'if malogol anona aman profeti ifimba dei' a' fataga fandawalap fa'i, God na'i, “Nogame ae'anai napani Isip ea' ae' efalana a' notanima nafi'i.”

King Herot a' nogawa amom amamba gawaimi ina mutanimai ma'ipana, owa'. Mambaso'mana mafe' ano'w ufia'w daia'w. Ea' nembel ananinai a' wandafuna kwapete' na'i noha Jisas noga'. Dei' anen okom mandanda'ma basef ifimba amom gawaimi mali' maga'ipanaefi ma nemaf afamba ondo'w kwagatagaefi. Na'amba dei' nasapa' anom soldia mafe' Betlehema walemb ambalemba bagape felefele'i maha awasi amam hiami dei' sogalam dambaimi mafe' motaga afagof biagof fagalo'ami maga' hi'alam.
Ea' dei' anif basef fowa' God naga'ipanaef profet Jeremaiai afataga endilisi fandawalap.

Anen na'i, “Esis sagape anambel wambel Ramai same' analemb amalemb. Esis salef sindiwagef mehipa saga'i uwahipigama awasi sagaga'i. Ano'w nemata'w Resel kwalopa batawisa'w akwa'usi, ina atiasi anis amam nematawa la'ifisa sonda' nembel akwo'umbili begape awanembel, owa'atin. Dei' main, awasi akwa'usi asaga' hi'alas.”
Josep ata' napani Isip ama King Herot naga', ensel Dembinai Godi nafe' na'ipana ma koh dondo'ah ananini
na'i, “Ina' safel a ne'wa awani neloma ma'mana anani'wi a pitanima pefe' itap lu'upa Israel. Amom ma'i mogaha awani nogaga'i a' maga' ea'.”
Ea' Josep nosafel nao'wa awani naloma ma'mana anani'wi asafe' itap lu'upa Israel.

Apa' Josep name' basefa anona aman Arkelaus king Herot nogamana nataga nofa' wambel naha'ofana nape dembinai king esis Judai. Ea' Josep ombal mahana ma nogafe' Judia. Owa' na'oh nandondo'ah wapani, God na'ipana ma nogafe' anamba itap lu'upa Galili.
Ea' nafe' nape anin taun sa'uni sofalagon Nasaret si'i anif basef amom profet fowa' maga'iefi ma'i, “Owagama esis sofalana si'i Nasaretinai.” Basef ifimba dei' fataga fandawalap endilisi.
Nimaguf hiafi ma nogota atamba anona aman Jon nagapisi'as embeli nafi'i nape anep itap lu'upa Judia wafigima fataupigima ea' nawalapa basef fasifi.

Anen na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Nemaf afamba bu'wafi ea' felefele' fegataga ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Na'amba dei' ipa' pendewa' alafugaha waf awafi pembema nelelemb pefe'ma God.”

Ea' Jon nafe' na'ipasa basef ifimba God naga'ipanafi si'i malogol anona amani profet Aisaia fowa' naga'iefi na'i, “Anaf malogol anona amani noga ni'i anep itap wafigima fataupigima ni'i basef na'amba ni'i, ‘Pendomba ufia'w Dembinai. Pisindi'amona ufiawa ananiwai.’”
Klos Jon nagalami sanda' auf anom mafis lu'wami kameli sanda'am, ea' nowaho' anota let sanda' agwahup mafisina sanda'anai. Gwa'aisi ananisi na' gwamu'wis saloma aupimbel alupumi.
Nogota atamba amam nematawa sagape Jerusalami saloma hiasi sagape itap lu'wipai Judia ea' walemb ambalemba felefele'ma walemb Jordani, hiasi safi'mai Jona nogapisi'as embel.
Ea' esis sawalapa waf awafi esis sanda'afi ea' Jon napisi'as walemb Jordan.

Afamba Jon nati anom amam dembami esis Judai Farisi maloma anom dembami Sadyusi mafi'i ma mogofa' baptais, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' panda' waf awafii si'i batawis ul aunaii. Ami na'ipipa ma pa'i pefa' pefe' okom wandafunai Godi anaf nogatagama ipe'i?”
Anen na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' pembema nelelemb pewa' alafugaha waf awafi ipe'ifi, ea' penda' waf fasifi ma pigihimba'mas ipa' a' pambema opalef endilisi paila waf bu'wafi.
Ipa' ina a' ukup pendanda' pi'i, ‘Abraham anen ahamapa ape'inai’, owa'i. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God anen la'ifinai ma nonda' otamba atemba begataga epes si'i awasi Abrahami.
Tamia'w ea' kwape lawah kofagogaha. Lawah mamahogaha owa' hil hogola sa'utip bu'wapia, atiasi solagah sotopa'agah hefe'ma nif.”

Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf awafi dei' ae' apisi'ipa embela pigihimba'mas ipa' a' pambema nelelemb pakwaha waf awafi a pefe'ma God. Apa' anona aman atiasi nigi' nugafi'ii, anen banagonai nikila' ae'. Anef nemaf anen nese'epa Ambal bu'unai Godi nogape opalef ipe'ilifi nomon ea' nese'epa nif wapani. Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma egatagwaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'.

Anen nahapila anol savol lagof ananigufi ma nigasimba' wit si'i rais amamba andeande'. Ama nofa' bu'unai nuwis nembe'ana ipat ananitai. Apa' du'wa'wanimi awasimi nembeham nofam nif amamba lu'wami fandom atapim magapani.”
Nogota atamba Jisas anakwaha itap lu'upa Galili a' nafi'i walemb Jordan, ea' nafi'mai Jon ama nogapisi'ana.
Owa' Jon na'i nosopama Jisas nai'pana na'i, “Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma igapisi'ina, owa'. Ina' nipisi' ae' dao', andeande'. Dei' ina' nafi'mai ae' ma main?”
Owa' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' nenda'meas si'i ae' aga'ipina. Afa' biafa onda'as na'amba ma ondahama waf hiafi usi'ifi, si'i God naga'iefi.” Ea' Jon na'i aho' napisi'ana.
Jisas nofa' baptais nakwaha embel nandagiai atin, owa', heven a' nandawisi' ma anen, ea' nati Ambal bu'unai Godi nafi'mai anen, si'i amil alamba apa' maga'i ma'unai nufia' nisila'mai anen.
Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i anif basef ga'i, “Aman anamba Nogame ae'anai endilisi. Ae' okom mohafel maimailana a'owa'. Okom ae'ami bo'oma anen.”
Ambal bu'unai Godi nofa' Jisas nafe' anep itap wafigima fataupigima ma aman aunai Satan nogwambana nonda' waf awafi.
Jisas nape awin si'ini du'wanini, ina na' gwa'aisi, owa'. Nolomahana nape dowaf.
Ea' aman anamba Satan nagagwambanai nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' Nogamana Godi, dei' kipa otamba ambamba baga'oh itapi betaga si'i bret.”
Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'ipa Satan, na'i, “Baibel na'i, apa' ina ukup pepoma gwa'aisi atis sonda'apa banagepa, owa'. Apa' ukup pendapoma basef Godi atif fenda'apa mogape banagipai.”
Ea' Satan nao'wana nafe' Jerusalem nahaponana nalutu ipat Godi lu'unai ilif.

Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' God Nogamana, dei' nindipa' newa itap. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘God atiasi a' ni'ipa ensel ananimi mifi'i muhapilina mumafina ma otamba ina beha bo'wagah ine'igahi, owa'.’”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Anif basef Godi wapani fagape fa'i, ‘Ipa' ina a' pegwamba Dembinai God ipe'inai nonda' waf awafi, owa'.’”
Ea' Satan nao'wana mafe' wapani malota anona halafuta launai a' nihimba'mana hiahaom hiami bu'wami magape itap hiagomai maloma amam nematawa hiasi.
Ea' na'ipa Jisas na'i, “I'i ina' nindiwa nembawa netawa ni'i ae' dembiwai ine'iwai, atiasi a' ese'ena hiahaom amamba bu'wami mefe'ma ina' hi'ilam ea' ine'imi si'im.”
Owa' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Satan ina' kwaho ae', a fo'o. Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Ipa' penda' lotuma Dembinai God atona ipe'inai ea' penda' maola anen atona.’”
Ea' Satan nakwahona nafe', dei' ensel Godi mafi'i matopalopa Jisas mumafiana.
Jisas name' basefa Jon nanda' kalabus, ea' nosafel nakwaha Nasaret nafe' itap lu'upa Galili.
Ea' nakwaha wambel ananimbili nafe' Kaperneam, bagape felefele'ma dumb lu'wambi Galili, anep itap agilipa Sebulun naloma Naptali.
Ea' nafe' nape itap apamba si'i basef fowa' anona profet Aisaia naga'iefi, a fataga fandawalap endilisi. Anen nanda' basef ifimba na'i, God na'i,

“Itap apamba Sebuluni Naptalii felefele'ma Itap apamba ufia'w kwafe' kwagataga naohi. Itap apamba walemb Jordan fisanamb, walemb hielimbi agol lu'wagili Galili. Esis walemb hielimbi ambalemba ina sogawa basef ae'afi, owa'.
Ea' sape si'i epes isimba sagape akot atonai, si'i sagaga'i. Owagama gani sigati owaf lu'wafi figaluwi sotologon andeande'.”

Ea' dei' Jisas nasefela maola naga'ipasa basef atapif. Nawalipasa basef ifimba na'i, “Nemaf afamba bu'wafi felefele' fegataga ma ipa' pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa. Na'amba dei' ipa' pembema nelelemb pefe'ma God pewa' alafugaha waf awafi.”
Jisas naila akata nafe' atin dumb lu'wambi Galili, nati amam biam Saimon agol wa'agol Pita naloma owamana Andru. Amom mala anembeh mowafa agof manda' bisnis.
Anen nati amom biam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pifi'i pihapifa ae' pili pefe'. Fowa' ipa' pewafa agof, apa' dei' ihimba'mepa pefe' pi'ipai anis epes sufi'i sila ae'.”
Ea' amam mame'ana mosafel kwafalis makwaha anembeh ha'oh mailana mafe'.

Ea' Jisas na'i nindiki'ah nafo'o kwasakwasala owa' nati anom amam biam wapani Jems naloma owamana Jon maloma ahamam amamunai Sebedi. Amom matoma bot mape mosambala anembeh amamimbihi. Ea' Jisas nofala amom biam Jemsi Jon.
Ea' mosafel kwafalis makwaha bot mafi'i maila Jisas mafe'. Ahamam amamunai Sebedi makwahona nape bot.

Jisas nafe' itap lu'upa Galili, nafe' na'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi amam nematawa hiasi nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi. Basef bu'wafi anen naga'ipasafi ifimba fa'i, “Nemaf afamba bu'wafi afafi'i fafi'mai apa'. Ama ipa' hipai pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa.” Ea' natopalopa epes hiasi aowas naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes wapani. Aowas maina naninani nanda'asi, Jisas la'ifina nanda'as sataga bo'wes.

Basef Jisasi fesafel fafe'agon walemb anamba hiagoma agol Siria ma nagatopalopa aowas nanda'asi hiasi sagataga bo'wes. Ea' esis Siria wapani sofa'ai hiasi aowas naninani nanda'asi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Anis ambagof awami manda'as a sahaga sagagauli, anis ambagof awami mahas maofas nif, anis same' alop akep pagahasapi, esis asofa'as safi'mai Jisas nanda'as sataga bo'wes hi'alas.

Na'amba amam nematawa hiasi sagi'mana safe'. Anis sape itap apamba Galili saloma anis sagape walemb ambalemba ilifunamailimb Dekapolis saloma anis sagape Jerusalami, anis sagape itap lu'upa Judiai, saloma anis epes sagape walemb Jordan fisanambi esis hiasi sagi'mana safe'.
Jisas nati esis amam nematawa hiasi ea' nandowasa' halafuta a' nape. Ea' alipumi ananimi mafi'i mandakolas malomana.
Ea' anen a' nosafela basef ifimba laufi nawalipamef.
Anen na'i, “Ipa' mamahipama pegawa ea' ipa' atipa owa' la'ifipama penda' maol bu'wani Godia, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, ipa' pawis ea' nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa.
“Ea' ipa' mamahipama kilef pagapani, ipa' dei' dao' apandagala. Dei' main, God atiasi nonda' nelelemb ipe'ilimbi ambepe bo'walemb.
“Ea' ipa' mamahipama pagape sa'ombel lafela anisi, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, ipa' atiasi a' pefa' hiahaom bu'wami God na'i endilisi ma nogasi'ipami.

“Ea' ipa' mamahipama ukup pehafel pagapaga'i waf usi'ifii, si'i nolomagahasa gwa'aisi iap pagaso'asa embeli, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main? Atiasi God nese'epa waf afamba ukup pagapagailafi dondo'ma ipa' si'ipamef.
“Ea' ipa' mamahipama pagati anis daias uwahipisi, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, atiasi God a' niti ipa' uwahipipa.
“Ea' ipa' mamahipama ukup pagape be'ep hilili'i ma waf awafi akipai, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, ipa' atiasi a' piti God.
“Ea' ipa' mamahipama panda' maola pigindiwa'wasa wandaf patalogasa sonda' waf bu'wafi, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, God atiasi a' nofalepa ni'i ipa' awasi ananipai.

“Ea' ipa' mamahipama pagi'ma waf usi'ifi ma anis epes sanda'mepa waf awafi sagase'epa nimanimi akafimi, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, dei' ipa' pawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa.

“Ipa' mamahipama pagagi'ma ae'i pagape na'amba. Anis sandaiwa'ma pagagi'ma ae'i asonda' basef fafifafi awafi baso'aifi ma ipa'. Ea' sanda'epa tofalaepama basef awafi ma sagase'epa akafimi nimanimi. Esis sonda'epa na'ambai dei' ipa' pandagala.

Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bendape andeande' sonondehepa endilisi. Dei' main? Hiahaom hiami fasimi ipe'imi ma'oh heven. Esis isimba sanda' waf awafi ma ipa' na'amba atin si'i fowa' anis sanda' waf awafi ma profet amamba mape magali'ma ipe'i.

“Ipa' si'i sol ama pegatopalopa epes hiasi sagape itapi. Apa' i'i sol alamba a' lumbula usihila a' akal, owa'atin. Atiasi ipa' penda'al pi'imama usihil wapani? Owa'atin. Sol alambai ku'umbili maol akala sonda'al, esis a sokwahol lefe' itap atep a sonda'al fi'ifa'asol atin.
“Ipa' si'i lam epes hiasi sagape itapi pigihimba'mas. Anagon taun lu'wagoma wamon nagatoma halafuta ilifi ina nape nandambaho', owa'atin.
Epes ina sakata lambeh sopalo'ambeh ha'oh belitagw lafelagwa, owa'atin. Esis sawamonambeh hatoma belitagw ilifa hogogala'ma epes hiasi sagape ipat nomoni.

Ea' na'amba atin, ipa' penda' waf usi'ifi si'i lambeh ipe'imbihi hagape alihimbiha ma hogogala'ma naep esis amam nematawai, sogati waf fasifi ipa' panda'afi ma sogasa'ma agol ahamepa nagape ilifi lu'wagol.

“Ipa' ina a' ukup pendanda' pi'i ae' afi'i ma igali'amona mu'uli Godi neloma basef amom profet fowa' gani magawalipasafi, owa'atin. Ae' ina afi'i ma igali'amonam, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma esapafef iwatanifa fegataga endilisi.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Basef ifimba fepe fefe'ma hiahaom magape ilif itapi moloma otagai itap higililam hi'ilam. Apa' anif basef du'wanif amef sa'usa'ufi feloma anif basef bandafi fagail nomona buk mu'uli Godi, ifimba fepe atapif na'amba atin fefe'ma maol hiani Godi netaga nendawalap hi'igalan.

Na'amba i'i anin epen negali'amona anif basef kwasala'ufa basef ifimba fagape mu'uli Godi ma anin nihimba'ma anis epes daiasa sonda'as na'amba atin, atiasi agol aman anambai a' gofe' sa'osa'ogol ama anamba God nagala'ambemagoma. Apa' epen ami nila mu'uli Godi andeande'ma nihimba'ma anisa sigagi'mana, atiasi anin a' nefa' agol lu'wagili ma anamba God nagala'ambemagoma.

Na'amba dei' ae' a'ipipa a'i, Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi moloma amom dembami Farisi. I'i waf ipe'ifi usi'ifi owa' fikila' waf amamifia, atiasi ipa' ina pefe' piwis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa ma owagama pigawis anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin.
“Ipa' a' pame' basef ifimba amom akupipa mogofa'afi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Ipa' owa'i peha anin epen nega'a. I'i anin neha anin epen negaga', epen inimba atiasi a' netagama basefa kot.’

Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa a'i, Epen ami okom a' wandafuma anin sahin owan ananisi, anin atiasi a' netagama basefa kot. Ea' epen ami ni'ipa anin sahin owan ananini ni'i, ‘Ina' epen falafini’, anis sonda' kotimana amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti. Apa' i'i anin epen ni'ipa anin daian ni'i, ‘Ina' okom nagahena endilisii’, epen inimba nefe' wambel awambili nif fandif fagapomani.
“I'i ipa' pi'i pindalali ma God penda' ofa felefele' ma belita atamba sondolalima Godatai ma i'i ipa' ukup pegapoma anef waf awafi ipa' panda'afa anis ukup numbutipa ipe'i, penda'as na'amba.

Ata' pekwaha mafis gwa'aisi pa'i pindalalima Godasi sonda'oh felefele'ma belita atamba, ipa' ata' pitanima pefe' penandona basef peloma epes isimba panda'mas waf awafii. Ama ea', dao' pifi'i pefa' ofa pefe' pindalali pese'anas God.

“I'i anin epen ni'i nenda' kotimipai, nelomepa pefe' ma ata' pegalo ufia'wa, ipa' kwafalis pese'ana nembel pewalapa isimba pi'ias peloman, ama a' owa'atin. Na'amba epen inimba a' nenda'epa penda' basefa isimba ma amom jas monda'epa pefe'ma polisman, ea' monda'epa penda' kalabus.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipa' ina atiasi pekwaha ipat atamba sanda' kalabusatai ulal, owa'. Ama pegwa hiahaom lu'wami sa'umi ma wiaf ipe'ifi hi'ilaf, dao', a' pefe'.”
Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' pame'ef ea' basef ifimba fowa' fagatagai. Ipa' ina penda' waf awafi ma so'a waola anis amam nematawa daindaias, owa'i.
Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa na'amba a'i, i'i anona aman a' niti ano'w nemata'w, ama nembel ananimbili behafema ako'w, aman anamba ea' nanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi ma nembel ananimbili.”

Jisas na'ipam na'amba ea' na'ipam anif basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i naep ipe'ipi pagape lagof kwahisigufi penda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, pigip pikwahip. I'i alop du'wanip ipe'ipi pogofa' akafimi, amamba aom kwasakwasala. Apa' ina andeande'ma esis sogakwaha alop si'ip ipe'ipi hi'igalap pogafe' wambel awambili hel nif fagapoma, owa'. Amambai atiasi a' pefa' akafimi awami lu'wami a'owa'.

“Apa' i'i lagof kwahisigufi fonda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, petopa'agof pekwahogof. I'i alop du'wanip ipe'ipi pogofa' akafimi, amamba aom kwasakwasala. Apa' ina andeande'ma esis sogakwaha alop si'ip ipe'ipi hi'ilap pogafe' wambel awambili hel nif fagapoma, owa'. Amambai akafimi lu'wami endilisi a'owa'.
“Basef ifimba fowa' fagatagai fa'i, i'i anona aman ni'i nili'amona waulu'mana anani'wi, anen ata' ni'i anif basef nonda'ef fil anop okwatip noso'akw ma nogatopa' daso'ama.

Apa' ae' a'ipipa a'i, i'i nemata'w akwamba owa' konda' waf awafi so'a waulafia, ma waulunama'w nogakwaho'w dowaf, anen nanda' ako'w kwanda' waf awafi so'a waola anom amam daindaiam. Ea' aman ami nagaso' nemata'w fowa' anona aman nagali'amona'wi, aman anamba nagi' nagaso'akwi wapani nanda' so'a waola nemata'w akwamba.

“Anif basef fowa' pagame'afi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Basef ifimba banagafi paga'i endilisi atisafi, ipa' ina a' pesambalif, owa'i. Basef ifimba piga'i endilisi atisafi, pigi'ma basef ifimba dondo'afi a penda'as si'i ipa' paga'iasa naep Dembinaii.

Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina a pi'i basef banagafi endilisi gani ilif, owa'i. Ea' ina pi'i ilif hevena pegewa' banaga anif basef baso'afi, owa'i. Dei' main, gani ilif heven sia bu'wani dembinai Godi nagapoma.

Ea' na'amba atin ina pi'i itap apa'e dowaf pegewa' banaga anif basef, owa'i. Itap apa'e pandahama si'i anin tebol sa'wini God nagahapona bo'wagahani. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' ina pi'i Jerusalema pegewa' banaga anif basef ipe'ifi, owa'i. Jerusalem anamba taun wambel lu'wagoma dembinai kingi.
Ipa' ina pewa' banaga basef ipe'ifi pi'i balagah ipe'igahi, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' ina la'ifipama penda' anif auf ama balaga ipe'igai fegataga afitiga a'a alialiga, owa'atin.
Ipa' pi'ias pinda'i aho' a'a owa'. Pinda'i ifimba atif. Apa' basef wataniaifi, ifimba fataga Satan atona.
“Ipa' pame'ef ea' basef ifimba fowa' fagatagai fa'i, ‘I'i ipa' pepa' pegaloma anisa sogahepa naep a'a sogatamepa nalelef, ipa' pegwamas pehas wapani penda'as sondagwama atin.’
Apa' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina pegwama epes sonda' ipa' aupai, owa'i. I'i anin epen mamahina negahepa aomb ine'imbi wa'ol, pendambema nehepa wa'ol wapani.
Ea' i'i anona aman nonda' kotimipa ni'i nogofa' siaogw ipe'igwi, ipa' pese'ana sagegw ipe'igwi wapani.
I'i anona aman dindinapina ma pefe' pegalomana anagon fele' si'i nogota atotota, dao' ipa' andeande'ma ata' pefe' pelomanago nohotagw biagw laogw wapani.
Apa' i'i epen mamahina nefalepa ma anis maefah, dao' pese'asas. Apa' i'i anin epen ni'i negewaolamepa wiafi, dao' ipa' ina pindaiwa'man pesambala basef ananifi, owa'i.
“Ipa' pame'ef ea' basef ifimba fowa' fagatagai fa'i, ‘Ipa' pese'asa nelelemb epes isimba sagape felefele'ma ipe'i, apa' ipa' ukup wandafipa bousi ipe'isi.’
Apa' ae' dei' a'ipipa anif basef daif a'i, ipa' ukup pipila bousi ipe'isi pese'as nelelemb, pendabetena God nogatopalopas isimba sanda'mepa waf awafi.

Ipa' penda'as na'amba ma pegape awasi Godi ahamapa nagape heven ilifi. Anen nanda' awin alipini nataga nape heven ilifa nagatopalopa epes bu'wasi saloma epes sanda' waf awafii wapani. Anen nanda' asaf falai ma epes isimba sagape hilili'i saloma isimba owa' sogape hilili'ia wapani.

I'i ipa' ukup pigaila epes isimba ukup pagapagaila ipe'i atis, atiasi pefa' hiahawes fasisi maisa waf afamba? Owa'atin. Amom amamba manda' waf awafii mogofa' takisi manda' waf afambai atef. Ea' anom daiam manda' waf awafii, amom wapani manda' waf afambai atef. Amom matopalopa esis isimba nomonas sagapoma esis atisii.
I'i ipa' piganifela isimba alipisi atis ipe'isi, atiasi ipa' petaga pikila' anisa waf mamahefa fasifi? Owa'atin. Esis sogololama Godi sanda'as na'amba atin.
Ea' ipa' pendape hilili' endilisi si'i ahamepa ipe'inai God nagape heven ilifi.

“Ipa' solawaipa. Owa'i penda' waf bu'wafi ipe'ifi ma naep esis epesi ma sogatilipaea, ma soga'i ipa' epes bu'upai ma sogasa'ma agof ipe'igufia, owa'i. I'i ipa' penda'as na'amba, ipa' ina atiasi pefa' anis hiahawes fasisi ma ahamepa God nagape heveni, owa'atin.

I'i ipa' pi'i pegatopalopa anis epes isimba kwahusi, ipa' ina' api'ipa anis daias, owa'i. Ipa' ina penda'as si'i waf afamba amom mambaso'as maga'i malogof biagufi mofapula alelefi batagw ma'ipas sagali', owa'i. Amom manda'am ifagw sanda' lotuwagwi a anamba ufiawa dawalegefa naep epesi sogati amom sogasa'ma agof amamugufi lu'wagof. Owa' hapaimi. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, atiasi God owa'atina nogaso'ama hiahawes fasisi amam amambaea, owa'atin. Hiahawes isimba amamisi na'amba. Epes isimba sagasa'ma agof amamugufi ea' ma'wis isimba atis.

Apa' i'i ipa' pegatopalopa epes isimba na'ambaisi kwahusi, ipa' pembaho'as penda'as na'amba. Lagol mamahogola gonda'asi, lagol wa'agol ina a' gogawas, owa'atin. Ea' na'amba atin, waf afambai ipa' penda'afa pegatopalopa anisi, ipa' ina pi'ias mehip anis daias some'epa ma penda'as, owa'i.
Ipa' pembaho'as penda'as. Ama Ahamepa ipe'inai nagati hiahawes isimba sape sandambahi'i ea' anen atona atiasi nogwamepas ipa'.

Nemaf mamahefa ipa' pendabeten, ipa' ina penda'am si'i waf afamba amam amamba magambaso'asi maga'i malogof biagufi manda'afi, ma mulutu atin nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi a ufiawa lu'uwai dawalegef, ama epes sogatolom, owa'i. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipa', amom anaf God ina a' nogwamama hiahawes fasisi ma waf afambai, owa'atin. Epes isimba asagatolomi ea' ma'wis isimba atis.

Apa' ipa' nogota atamba pi'i pendabeten, piwis ifagw nomon pewalo utagw ea' pendabetena God ahamepa ipe'inai, anen nape anamba dambahi'igima. Anen nagati hiahawes sape sandambahi'i ma bola nogagwamipai beten.
Apa' afamba ipa' pendabeten, ipa' ina pendabeten dowaf si'i epes isimba sogololama Godi sanda'am, owa'i. Esis sa'i sondabeten launi ma atiasi God nogame'as. Owa' owa'atin, God ina name'as.
Apa' ipa' ina pigi'ma waf asasifi, hapaifi. Ahamepa God nagape ilifi nogawa ea' ma hiahawes akipai. Nogota atamba ipa' ata' owa' pihali'anamasa, anen a' nagawas ea'.
Ipa' pendabeten na'amba pi'i, Ahamapa ape'inai nagape heveni, apa' ma'i agol ine'igili gondape hilili' ma hiasi sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol.
Apa' ma'i nemaf afamba bu'wafi fetaga ma epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol ine'ini nope Dembinai nugumafias. Waf bu'wafi esis ine'isi sagailaf heveni, apa' ma'i milaf itap apa'e wapani na'amba atin.
Dei' ina' nese'apa gwa'aisi sondahama apa' ma nemaf afa'e.
Ina' nekwahomasa waf awafi ape'ifi okom mose'enaf si'i apa' magakwahomasa waf awafi anis daias sanda'mapafi ukup pagaso'apaf.

Ina' owa'i nili'apa mefe'ma hiahaom ahifimi mogogwamba ape'ia. Owa' hapaimi. Netagwahepa ma aman aunai. [Anamba ina' nagala'ambemagoma noloma banagami ine'imi moloma hiahaom mogogala'i ine'imi, amamba ine'imi atom dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.]
Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “I'i ipa' pekwahomasa waf awafi anis daias sanda'mepafi ukup pese'epafa, andeande'ma Ahamepa nagape heveni okom mogaso'anafa ipa' wapani.
Apa' i'i ipa' owa' ukup pese'epa waf awafi anis daias sanda'mepafia, Ahamepa nagape heveni ina atiasi okom moso'anafa ipa', owa'atin.

Nimaguf mamahifa ipa' pegakwaha gwa'aisi, ina penda'am si'i amam amamba mambaso'mas maga'i malogof biagufi manda'ami ma manda' amagah amamumi awasim, owa'i. Amom manda' amagah aom na'amba ma amam nematawa sogatulumi sogawa soga'i amom mogakwaha gwa'aisii. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi amom mofa'am ea' hiahaom amamba ma dagala amamini. Epes isimba sagati waf afambai, ea' ma'wis isimba atis.
Apa' nemaf mamahefa ipa' pegakwaha gwa'aisi ma pendabetena God, ipa' pesa'of penda' wel pindisa balagah pihi'agah.
Ama anis epes daias ina sogawa ipa' pagakwaha gwa'aisi, owa'. Penda'as na'amba ma Ahamepa nape nandambahi'i anen atona nogawepa. Anen nagati hiahawes sape sandambahi'i, ma bola nogagwamipai beten.
Ipa' ina a' petama hiahaom bu'wami atom ipe'imi bimbilam itap ana'e, owa'i. Anis sanda' wali sapisila ifagw sawis sagakwalopami, bamagof fomamam magahambombagama waimba nagasagihami.

Apa' ae' a'ipipa petama hiahaom fasimi ipe'imi mo'omepa gani heven. Anamba bambagufi totoloh ina mototopa'am a waimba ina nasagiham, owa'atin endilisi. Ea' sanda' wali ina a' suwis sakwalopam, owa'atin.
Wambel mamahembela hiahawes fasisi ipe'isi saga'oma, ea' wambel ambalemba atembel anaf ukup ipe'ipi wapani pegapoma.
Naep nomon ukup ipe'ipi si'i lama alop si'ip ipe'ipi. I'i ukup ipe'ipi be'ep pepe, ea' alop si'ip ipe'ipi pogala' hi'ilap.
Apa' i'i ukup ipe'ipi awasip, atiasi alop ipe'ipi hi'ilap ea' akutina. Ea' na'amba atin, i'i lam amamba magape ukup ipe'ipi nomoni si'i akot atona, atiasi akot anamba ea' lu'una a'owa'.

Ina anin epen nanda' maoli la'ifin nihapila maol biafina amam dembami biam, owa'atin. Na'amba okom mila anona, anona a' nesambalona. Ea' na'amba atin, ipa' ina a' la'ifipa pepe lafela God noloma ugai moni, owa'atin.

Ea' ae' a'ipipa a'i ipa' ina a' nomonas solasefe' hiahiasa ambagof ipe'igufi pi'i, Apa' ata' mea' main? A mea' embel maimbel? Owa'i. Ipa' ina a' nomonas solasefe' ma alop ipe'ipi pi'i, Atiasi apa' monda' main mombaho' alop ape'ipi? A'i ambagufi alop asikila' gwa'aisii luwaguf?

Ipa' ata' ukup pepoma amiguf. Afof owa' fonda' aofah fowa gwa'aisi maisa, owa' fotoma gwa'aisi fimbilasa. Afof ifagw owa'atina fotama gwa'aisi soga'oh, ea' satamam sofa'am ma'oh ifagw gwa'aisiagwi, owa'atin. Apa' Ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni, anen naso'agof gwa'aisi. Apa' ipa' epes pikila' amiguf agwafomba.
Ipa' atiasi ami la'ifin nomonas solasefe' lawisa nigiwatania anef nemaf wapani ma ambal ananili logape nogota laota wapani? Owa'atin.

Dei' maina nomonas ipe'isi salasagafe' a'owa' ma luwaguf mais? Ipa' ata' ukup pepoma afis main sagalo ando'i. Esis sataga salo lu'wis sa'imama? Esis ina sanda' maol, ina sanda' luwaguf mais, owa'atin.
Apa' ae' a'ipipa fowa' anona aman hiahaom hiamunai Solomon nanda' sosaf hianai ma luwaguf ananimi owa', sosaf ananifi ina fasif si'i afis isimba, owa'atin.

Aho', otalef afalemba dei' ata' fetawa aof ama naman atef sotopa'alef sokwahelef fefe' nif. Otalef afalemba falafilifi God nofalo'malef. Apa' ipa' amam nematawa pikila' otalef afalemba. Ea' dei' ipa' pagahapifa basef Godi kwasakwasalai, pendegawa endilisi anen nugumafipa wapanii.
Ea' ipa' ina ukup pelapefe' hihip a'owa' pi'i, ‘Atiasi apa' mea' main? A mea' embel ani? A monda' luwaguf ani? Na'ambai owa'i.
Epes sagape itapi sogolalama Godi ukup malamondafe' a'owa' ma sogolaoma hiahaom amambai hiami. Apa' Ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni anen nogawa ea' hiahawes mamahisa akipai.
Apa' ipa' ata' ukup pili' pelapelaoma waf usi'ifi bu'wafi feloma pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa pili', dao' a' nese'epa hiahawes isimba ipa' wapani.

Ea' ipa' ina nomonas sopoma hiahawes sogataga namani, owa'. Nemaf namanifi fendapoma naman atef, ama hiahawes mamahisa sogataga namani. Hiahaom nimanimi akafimi magatagama nimaguf daindai mandahama nimaguf ifimba atif dondo. Ipa' ina' a' nomonas iwanis solasefe', owa'.
Ipa' ina a' pewaloga anis epes si'i anona jas dembinai nagawaloga basef kot lu'unai, owa'i. Ama anaf God ina nowalogepa, owa'.
Waf ipa' panda'afa pagawawaloga anis epesafi, anaf waf afamba atef God a' nonda'mepaf ipa' wapani. Ikwaf afamba atef ipa' panda'af pagawalogasafi nogwaf nowaloga ipa'.
Dei' maina ipa' pagati usan sa'usa'uni nagape naep sahin owan ipe'isii, apa' ipa' owa' pegawa hapataf lu'unai nagape naep ipe'ipia?
Dei' maina ipa' ata' pali' pa'ipa alipisi paga'i, ‘Owame, ae' a'i igimina usan sa'uni nagape naep ine'ipii.’ Apa' hapataf lu'unai nape naep ine'ipi. Na'ambai owa'i.
Ipa' malogof biagufipai pagambaso'ami. Ipa' ata' pili' pigi usan hapataf lu'unai nagape naep ipe'ipii ama piti andeande' dao', a' pigimana usas sa'usi sagape naep alipisi ipe'isii.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam anif basef waminif atini wapani na'i, “Hiahawes bu'wasi hilili'i, isimba ipa' ina peso' nombagw, owa'i. Ea' ipa' ina pekwaha aolep amamba fasifasimi ipe'imi mefe'ma bogof, owa'i. Na'amba fofa'asa aolep amamba fasifasimi bo'walef afafilifi, ea' nomabagw gwehepa gwea'epa.
Ipa' pihali' God atiasi nogase'epa hiahawes. Isimba ipa' pala pigalaomasi atiasi a' pitilis. Ipa' peha uta, atiasi God nuwisi'mipata ipa'.
Dei' main, epes ami sogahali' Godi, atiasi sofa' maefah. Epen ami nela' negelaoma hiahawasi, atiasi nigatilisi. Ea' epen ami negaha utai, atiasi God nuwisi'manata anin.
I'i anin awani negahali' ahamanama anis gwa'aisi, atiasi ahaman nosa'ma anom otam noso'anam? Owa'atin.
I'i anin awani negahali' ahamana nogaso'an anol aol, anen atiasi ina noso'an anol ul awali, owa'atin.
Ea' ipa' amam nematawa aupai pagaso'asa hiahawes fasisi atisa awasi ipe'isii, Ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni anen wapani atiasi noso'asa hiahawes fasifasisi isimba sagahali' anini.
Waf maif ipa' pa'i esis sonda'mepaf ipe'i, ipa' penda'masaf na'amba atin. Basef ifimba kofagefa ma mu'uli Godi naga'ipa Mosesani naloma basef God fowa' naga'ipa amom profet manda'afi.
Ipa' pefe' piwis uta sa'utai bu'utai. Dei' main, ano'w ufia'w kwafe' kwagawis wambel awambili heli alihi'w a'owa'i uta wapani alihitai. Ea' hiasi amam nematawa safe' saila ufia'w akwamba.

Apa' uta ma ufia'w kwafe' kwagawis wambel sagape namisagoma ina alihita a'owa', owa'atin. Wapa'mota. Wambel ambalemba sagape be'es andeande' lifilafima. Ufia'w akwamba ahifi'w a'owa' ma sogafe'. Amam nematawa atona atin esis ea' isimba atis sati ufia'w akwamba saila'w.

Ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma amom profet mambaso'am ma'i mogowalipasa basef Godi. Amom manda' uhuf mafi'i mambaso'mepa mataga patolom ando' atogon mape bo'om sa'umbilim si'i sipsip. Apa' ukup amamipi nomon awep endilisi ma ipa' ma'i mohambombagepa mehepa si'i nombagw wandafugwi. Ea' ipa' ina peme'am, owa'i.

Ipa' piti waf amamifi fetaga fendawalap si'i sa'utip pagail lawahi, apegawa waf amamifi be'ef a'a awef. Epes ina sola sa'utip wainip mandelef afalemba higatagulifi, owa'atin. A ina sola sa'utip fikip mandelef awalifi, isimba wapani, owa'. Ea' waf awafi amamifi fataga fandawalap awef si'i sa'utip awapi.
Ea' na'amba atin lawah hiagahi anogah bu'ugahi hogola sa'utip bu'wapi gwa'aipi, apa' lawah augahi hail hola sa'utip awapi numbutipi.
Lawah bu'ugahi ina a hail hola sa'utip gwa'aipi, a lawah aogahi ina a hil hola sa'utip bu'wapi, owa'atin.
Lawah hiagahi owa' higail hogola sa'utip gwa'aipia, agahemba esis salagah saofagah nif lu'wafi.
Ipa' pati waf amamifi fetaga fendawalap si'i sa'utip pagail lawahi, waf amom profeti be'ef a'a awef.

Ipa' ina pi'i amam nematawa hiasi sofala ae' saga'i Dembiwai, pi'i atiasi sofe' sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias, owa'atin. Epen ami nagi'ma okom Ahamai nagape heveni ma nigailami, anin atin atiasi nuwis heven. Anis daias owa'atin.

Nemaf afamba atiasi amam nematawa hiasi sifi'i sofala ae' si'i, ‘Apa' magawalipasa basef Godi si'i profet amamba magawalipas ea' ma'i agol ine'igili matofa amom ambagof awami! Apa' ma'i agol ine'igili manda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami!’
“Ama nemaf afamba owa', ae' iwalipas i'ipas alihis na'amba i'i, ae' ina egawa ipa' kwasakwasala, owa'. Ipa' epes panda' waf awafii delefata pekwaha ae', ea' fo'o.
“Epes ami some' basef ae'afi ma sigi'mif silif, esis si'i epen gawaini nala' ipat ananitai togotawa banagota itap apamba otambaipa banagapi.
A'i owa' asaf lu'unai nalai, embel bataga, fufin banagonai naluwi, amamba makoto'ma ipat atamba apa' ina tato, owa'atin. Epen inimba a' nala otamba lu'wami mowala itap mosahopata banagota totawa.
Apa' epen ami name' basef ae'afi ma anin owa' nigi'mifa, anen si'i anona aman okom magahanai. Anen nala' ipat ananitai tatoma ilifa ko'onaga atoga.
Ama a'i owa', asaf lu'unai nalai, embel mataga, ea' fufin naluwi banagona. Amamba a'i owa' maola ipat atamba a' tondokwaef towa. Ipat atamba tato ta'oh kwapete' endilisi aota.”
Nogota atamba Jisas na'i basef ifimba laufi ma hi'alef, esis same' basef ananifi ea' gogolalasis kwapete' endilisi.

Anen ina nawalipas si'i amam falafumi maga'ipas, owa'. Anen nawalipas dindinip naloma banagami na'amba atin si'i amom agufumi. Anen banagona a'owa' nikila'. Amam dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ina mawalipas na'amba si'i anen, owa'.
Ea' Jisas nakwaha halaf afamba nilianai, amam nematawa hiasi sagi'mana safe'.
Owa', anona aman aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi pagambu'wi nafi'i felefele'ma Jisas nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele' ma anen na'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' ni'i aho', netopalope ma egataga bo'owe.”
Ea' Jisas nando lagol nasagol alop aman anambai na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i aho'ma ina' negataga bo'wena.” Ea' dei' atef aowas anamba aunai nanda' alop pagambu'wi nakwahona ea' bo'ona.

Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina a' nefe' ni'ipa anin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena ambo'wena, owa'i. Ina' fo'o nihimba'mana alop ine'ipi ma aman anamba pris. Ea' nese'ana hiahaom amamba anen nondolalima God ea' ina' ninifelona ma nagataga bo'wena si'i mu'uli ananini fowa' Moses naga'ipasani naga'i. Ama amam nematawa hiasi sitilina sogogawa aowas ine'ini ahi'alan.”
Jisas nafe' wambel Kaperneam ea' anona soldia dembinai nape. Anen dembinai ma nugumafi amom soldia hiami 100-pelaim. Ea' nafi'i nahali' Jisas dindinip na'i,
“Dembinai, anona aman nanda'me maoli aowas nanda'ana na'oh ipat ananitai. Bo'wagahi lagof saga' sailana. Alop ananipi akep mahana kwapete'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i. “Ae' atiasi efo'o enda'ana bo'ona.”

Ea' dembinai anamba soldia na'ipana na'i, “Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma ina' nefo'o negawis ipat ae'atai, owa'. Ina' ninda'i basef atif, bola anen bo'ona. Dei' main, ae' ape lafela anom soldia dembami mumafi mase'e maol. Ea' ape ilifa anom soldia ae'ami imafiam. Iga'ipa anona iga'i, ‘Ina' fo'o’, name'e nafe'. A iga'ipa anona iga'i, ‘Ina' fi'i’, name'e nafi'i. Ea' iga'ipa anamba agol akanai nanda'me maoli iga'i, ‘Ina' da'a maol inimba’, anan name'e nanda'an. Ina' dembinai. Ea' aowas inimba atiasi neme' basef ine'ifi a' nefe'. Dei' ina' ninda'i atin, bola anen bo'ona.”

Ea' Jisas name' basef ananifi okom malamafe' na'ipa amam nematawa hiasi sagagi'ma anini na'i, “Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa! Soldia dembinai anamba anen ina ipa' Israelinai. Owa' dei' anen nahapifa ae'. Owa' anona aman Israelinai nohapifi na'ambaea, owa'atin. Anen nikila' ipa' Israela nagahapifi banagambel.

Endilisi ae' a'ipa ipa' Juda hipai, ipa' ina a' ukup pi'i ipa' atipa pefe' piwis anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'. Amam nematawa hiasi daias sifi'i gani awin nagatafima nowala nagaso'ma, isimba sofe' sogawis anambai. A sofe' suwis soloma dembami bafapepa ipe'imi Juda, Abrahami Aisak a Jekop, sope atifigin sea' gwa'aisi solomam.

Apa' ipa' Juda hipai owa'atin. God nandondomba anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma ma ipa' pigawis, apa' owa'atin. Anaf anen nogalo'ma ipa' ni'ipipa ni'i pefe' wambel awambili owamb atona nagapoma. Ea' peme' akafimi lu'wami penda' nalelef ipe'imi tilili talala' pepe.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa soldia anamba dembinai na'i, “Ina' a' fo'o. Ina' na'i ae' la'ifiwai ma egatopalopa aman anamba nanda'mena maol ine'i nogataga bo'ona. Ae' anda'ana bo'ona si'i ina' nagahapifa ae'.” Ea' dei' atef aman anamba ambo'ona wapani.

Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat Pitai nati Pita nandagi'mo'wi awasi'w kwa'oh, alop akwa'upi nifip. Ea' natolo'w nahapila lagol akwa'ugili aowas inimba nakwaho'w nafe' ambo'okw. Ea' kosafel kwape kwanda'mana gwa'aisi anen.

Wambomota felefele' ma owamb esis sofa'ai amam nematawa hiasi ambagof awami magapaisi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Ea' na'ipa ambagof awami mehip natofam mafa' mafe'. Anen nanda' esis hiasi aowas nanda'asi bo'wes.
Anen nanda'as bo'wes wapani si'i fowa' gani anona profet Aisaia naga'iefi basef na'i, “Anen atona nofa' aowas ape'inai natopalopapa ma mogape be'epa.”
Jisas nati epes hiasi salutu sala'ambemana, ea' na'ipa alipumi ananimi mondandombola mofa' bot mogafe' dumb ambamba fisanamb.
Ea' anona aman dembinai nagawalipasa mu'uli Godi a' nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ae' a'i efe' elomena. Ea' ofe' atin anamba hiagoma ina na'i negafe'ma.”

Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Nombagw alupugwi gwa'oh bologwalef itap apa'e wambel agwagumbili. Amiguf wapani fufia' fagafe' ilifi fala' owah fapaoh gani ilif, apa' ae' owa'atin. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, wambel ake ma e'eh egalo balaga ae'agai.”
Ea' anona aman alipunai Jisasi nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i ata' epe imafi ahame, ata' etopalopana ma noga' iwana nogapani ifi'i ilina.”
Apa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Hapaimi, esis sagaga'i sondawago esis atis isimba sagaga'i. Apa' ina' owa', ina' fi'i nila ae'.”
Jisas nalota anota bot naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana mafe' anemb dumb lu'wambi.
Ea' kwafalis atis fufin lu'wani naluwi, embel mohafel mawis bot nomon felefele'ma bot ta'i togowala embel. Apa' Jisas na'oh nalola bot.
Ea' alipumi ananimi mafe' minimbalona ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai! Ina' safel netopalopafa. Afa' wa'i ahigililafa owala embel!”

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' ombal magahepa? Ipa' ina pahapifi pa'i ae' banagewe, owa'atin. Ea' nosafel na'ipa fufin naloma embel na'i, “Ipa' ea' be' tol a betah.” Ea' fufin nowala, embel ina ata' lasiali' a'owa', betah hilili'.
Ea' amom alipumi ananimi gogolalasom ombal maham kwapete'am ma'i, “Anen epen ami? Na'ipa fufini embel same'ana sagahapifana?”

Jisas nafe' nataga anagon wa'ol dumb ambamba anep itap esis Gadara sagapoma. Ea' anom amam biam ambagof awami magapaumi mafi'mai anen. Amom mape wandelef sagawa sagaga'ima mafi'i. Amom amamba epes awami magahasi. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi ombal mahasa sogafe' ufia'w akwamba amom magapoma. Ea' mofala Jisas mehip ma'i,
“Ina' God Nogamana. Ina' na'i nenda' maina afa'? Ina' na'i neha afa'? Nemaf afamba ina' na'i negahafafi ina dei' afataga, ata' owa'atin.”
Ea' anagof bogof hiagufi falutu fa' gwa'aisi anota damota felefele'.
Ea' amom ambagof awami mahali' Jisas ma'i, “I'i ina' negatofafama nesapa'afa ofe' uwisa bogof gwagwafumba.”
Ea' na'ipagof na'i, “Ipa' fo'o!” Ea' makwaha aman anamba mawisi mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof agwafomba hiagufi fasagih mafa' mafe' mehip mowala awagoma tata a' mowala mala embel dumb afum hi'alam.
Ea' amom mugumafiagufi mafa' mafe' wambel lu'wagoma ma'ipasa basef ifimba amam nematawa hiasi ma'ipasa hiahaom amamba magatagama amam amamba biami ea' ma'ipasa bogof wapani afum hi'alam.
Ea' epes hiasi wambel ambalembaisi safi'i sati Jisas sahali'ana sa'ipana dindinip sa'i anen nokwaha itap apamba asasima a' nefe' anagon.
Esis sandaiwa'ma Jisas ea' nalota anota bot nafe' dumb lu'wambi fisanamb ea' nataga wambel ananimbili kofagama.

Ea' anom amam mofa'ai anona aman mafi'i. Lagufi bo'wagah saga' sagailanai ea' tol na'oh alahis. Nogota atamba Jisas natolom nogawa amom mahapifana ma'i anen banagonai ma nogatopalopa aman anamba aowas nanda'anai bo'ona. Ea' na'ipa aman anamba na'i, “Ina' epen ae'inai! Opaf ine'ifi fondape awanef. Waf awafi ina' nanda'afi ae' akwahomenaf hi'alaf okom mase'eaf.”
Ea' anom amam dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ukup pandanda' na'amba manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anamba Jisas nanda' God findiwana na'ipana awagon.”
Jisas nogawa nomonas isimbai amamisi. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' ukup pandanda' awepa paga'i na'amba?

Dei' hiahaom maim ipa' pa'i ahifima ae'? Ae' banagiwai ma i'ipa aowas nanda'anai iga'i, ‘Ae' ekwahomana waf awafi anen nanda'afi okom mogase'eaf’ a'a i'ipana iga'i, ‘Nosafel nogafe'.’ Basef ifimba ma nosafel nogafe' ipa' pa'i amamba ahifima ae'.

Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, a'i ipa' pegawa ae' la'ifiwai ma ekwahomasa waf awafi hiafi amam nematawa sagape itapi sanda'afi okom mogase'eaf. Ae' a'i ihimba'mepa ae' la'ifiwai ma enda' hiahaom amamba.” Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel sa'ma alahis ine'isi fo'o ipat ine'itai.”
Ea' anen nosafel nafe' ipat ananitai.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi satolona sosafel gogolalasis ombal mahas kwapete' sogawa God natopalopa aman anamba naso'ana banagami lu'wami. Na'amba esis sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
Ea' Jisas nosafel nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafo'o nati ae' Matyu, anda' basefa buk akwa'ii. Ae' ape ipat ata'e mogofa' takisa. Ea' Jisas na'ipi na'i, “Ina' fi'i nila ae'.” Ea' ae' asafel ailana afe'.
Ea' Jisas naloma alipufai ananifai wape ipat ae'atai wa' gwa'aisi atin, owa' amam hiami manda' waf awafii maloma anom hiami mogofa' takisi mafi'i malomafa ma' gwa'aisi.

Ea' amom Farisi dembami mati Jisas nape nalomafa wa' gwa'aisi, mahali' alipumi ananimi ma'i, “Dei' maina anen dembinai tisa ipe'inai nape naloma amom mogofa' takisi maloma amam amamba manda' waf awafii maga' gwa'aisi atogon?”
Owa' Jisas name'am na'ipam na'i, “Isimba aowas akasi ina a safe'ma dokta, owa'. Esis bu'wasi. Apa' isimba aowas nanda'asi atis dao', safe'ma dokta.

Anif basef fagape buk Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, God na'i, ‘Ipa' ina peha mafis peso' ae', owa'i. Apa' ipa' pindati anis amam nematawa uwahipis a petopalopas dao', a' andeande'.’ Apa' ipa' ina pegawa basef ifimba kofagefa, owa'. Dei' pefe' pitalifif pendegawef. Dei' main, ae' ina afi'i ma egefala epes sanda' waf bu'wafii, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma egefala epes isimba sanda' waf awafii atis.”

Jon aman anamba nagapisi'as embeli, alipisi ananisi same' basef ananifi safi'i anamba Jisas nagapoma sahali'ana na'amba sa'i, “Anif nimaguf afa' waloma amom Farisi afa' ukup pandanda'ma anif basef fowa'ifi dei' wakwaha gwa'aisi wape dowaf. Dei' maina amom alipumi ine'imi owa' mokwaha gwa'aisi si'i afa'a?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'i basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anis sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma anis aman nemata'w bias sondaso'amai, ipa' pa'i esis alipisi atiasi a' sondaiwa'ma gwa'aisi afamba anen nagaso' nemata'wi nape nagalomas? Owa'atin endilisi. Apa' nemaf afamba anen nokwaha esis nogafe' anagon lauguni dao', esis sololama gwa'aisi.”

Ea' na'ipasa anif basef waminif atina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma pegatopa' lowaf namifi pesambalef fegaloma anef lowaf apifi, owa'. Na'amba atiasi lowaf afamba namifi fendatagwah, fehape' apifi bolotaf a' notaga lu'una.” Ea' na'i anif basef waminif atin wapani na'i,

“Embel wainimbel dambaimbeli apa' ina mowalambel agwahup apinai memeina si'i botol, owa'atin. I'i anin nenda'am na'amba, embel wain netef hian, nohape' agwahup anamba pepe'etana ea' wain kolo'olam awasim hi'ilam. Apa' wain dambaini mowalan agwahup dambaina, na'ambai andeande'. Ma embel beloma agwahup sogape andeande'.”

Jisas ata' nape na'ipas atin, owa' anona aman dembinai esis Judai nafi'i nindiwa nembawa notawa na'ipana na'i, “Nogame ae'akwi a' afu'w. Ae' a'i ina' nefe' newamona lagol ine'igili ako'wa ambal lopao'w kogape namo'w.”
Ea' Jisas nosafel naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana.
Owa' ano'w nemata'w kwafi'i alafuga Jisasi kwahapila lowaf ananifi da'malififa. Aowas awasini nanda'akwa kwape gamba atapi'w afagof 12-pelaiguf.
Ea' ako'w okom mandanda' ma'i, “I'i ae' egasa lagola lowaf ananifi, atiasi ambo'owe.”
Ea' Jisas nandambema natolo'w na'ipa'w na'i, “Nogame ae'inai! Opaf ine'ifi fope awanef. Ina' ea' nahapifa ae' banagiwai. Isimba atis dei' anda'ena bo'wena.”
Ea' Jisas nafe' ipat aman anamba dembinai esis Judai nati anis amam nematawa sofapula batagwa nemata'w akwamba aiawai'wi afu'wi. Ea' epes hiasi sa'i gugul sapoma'w.
Ea' anen na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' si'amae! Ako'w ina kwaga' dogw, owa'. Kwa'oh atin.” Owa' esis sanda'iafana.
A sohafel sawis ando' ea', Jisas nikila'as nawis nomon nahapila lagol akwa'ugili nafela'w kosafel ambo'okw wapani.
Ea' basef nemata'w akwambai a' fafe'agon hi'alagon.
Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' atin, nati amam biam naep pagaso'ami magi'mana mofalana mehip na'amba ma'i, “Ina' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa.”
Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis anota ipat nomon owa', amom amamba mafi'mai anen nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pihapifa ae' banagiwai ma enda'epa bo'wepa?” Ea' amom ma'i, “Aho', Dembinai afa'inai.”
Ea' nasa lagofa naep amamipi na'i, “Ae' egawepa, ipa' pa'i ae' la'ifiwai. Na'amba ae' enda' naep ipe'ipi ambo'wep wapani pendahama pagahapifa ae'.”
Ea' dei' naep amamipi ambo'wep matologon andeande'. Na'amba Jisas na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' ina pefe' pi'ipa anis amam nematawa daiasa anda'epa bo'wepa, owa'i.”
Owa' amom mafe' mawalapa basef ma'ipa amam nematawa hiasi ma'i Jisas nanda' naep amamupi bo'wep. Ea' basef ifimba fafe'agon hi'alagon.
Amom amamba naep pagaso'ami mafe' ea', esis sofa'i anona aman malogol gagaso'anai. Anen ambal aunai nanda'ana, na'amba ina noga na'i basef, owa'. Ea' sofa'ana nafi'mai Jisas.

Jisas natofa ambal anamba aunai. Na'amba dei' aman anamba a' na'i andeande'. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sohafel gogolalasis sa'i na'amba sa'i, “Fowa' apa' Israel ina mati anom hiahaom amambai, owa'atin.”
Apa' anom Farisi dembami esis Judai mambaso'mas ma'i, “Anen natofa ambagof awami ma banagami ambal mamana aunai.”

Maol Jisas nanda'ani nagape na'amba. Anen nosafel nafe' walemb hiagoma na'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi. Nafe' nawis ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi na'ipasa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Anen natopalopa amam nematawa hiasi aowas hiana haona nanda'asi sataga bo'wes wapani.
Ea' nati amam nematawa hiasi uwahipis. Esis dola sape ombal mahas kwapete'. Ina anona aman nape numafias, owa'atin. Esis sape si'i sipsip owa' anin epen nugumafiapia. Ea' nati esis uwahipis.
Ea' na'ipa alipisi ananisi anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Ipa' piti aofah hiagahi gwa'aimi hiami a' maof ea'. Apa' epes sanda' maoli owa' hiasa, kwasala'wis.
Ea' ipa' pihali' dembinai kofagonama aofahi. Pihali'ana ma nogasapa'i epes hiasi sofe' sonda' maola sola gwa'aimi ananimi sogambe'am atifigin.”
Jisas nofalai alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim mafi'mai anen naso'am agol lu'wagili nowa' banagama mogatofa ambagof awami monda' hiasi aowas hiana haona nanda'asi bo'wes.
Amom amamba aposel 12-pelaim Jisasi, agufuma amamba. Nagali'i Saimon agol wa'agol Pita, owamana ananinai Andru. Ea' Jems nogama Sebedi naloma owamana Jon,
Filip naloma Bartolomyu, Tomas naloma ae' Matyu anda' basef ifi'i egefa'asa takisi. A Jems Alfius nogamana, a Tadius,
ea' Saimon anen mini'ap Seloti. Ea' aman anamba Judas nogawalapa Jisasa amom boumi ananimii.
Jisas nasapa' amam amamba 12-pelaim mafe', naso'ama basef amom na'i, “Ipa' ina pefe'ma epes isimba owa' sogogawa Godia, owa'. Ea' ina pefe' piwis anembel wambel itap esis Samariaipi, owa'i.
Ipa' pefe' ma esis mini'ap Israel sagape si'i sipsip higilagalapi.
Pefe' pewalapa basef na'amba pi'i, ‘Nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa' pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa a fafi'i felefele' ea'.’

Ipa' penda' awasisi bo'wes pesa'ma sagaga'i sope namis wapani, a penda' isimba aowas aunai nanda' alop asasipi pagambu'wi sotaga bo'wes. Ea' petofa ambagof awami magapaisi. Banagami Godi ipa' pegefa'ami, amamba ipa' pefa'am dowaf ina patalom otamba, owa'atin. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' pese'asam dowaf esis ina sotaloma ipa', owa'atin.
“Ipa' ina pelo' otamba goli silva moloma kapa poket isalef ipe'isi, owa'i.
Ipa' ina pefa' roksaki siaogw biagw atogw, a su, moloma galahitagw pandahi'amonam pagafi'i, owa'. Epes sanda' maoli, andeande'ma sogofa' gwa'aisi asasisi.

“I'i ipa' pefe' pigawis anambel wambel, ata' petologon pegawagon andeande'. Aman wambel ambalembainai mamahonama fasinai noga'i awima ipe'i, a' pepe atapipa peloma anen atona a pefe' ma afamba pekwaha wambel ambalemba pegafe'.
Afamba ipa' pefe' pigawis anota ipat, pi'ipa esis amam nematawa sagape ipat atambai pi'i, ‘Ipa' pepe opalef awanelef.’
I'i anis ipat atambaisi fasisi sonda'mepa waf soga'i aho'ma ipe'ma, atiasi basef ipe'ifi opalef awanelefafi fepomas. Apa' i'i owa', hapaimi, basef ifimba bu'wafi fitanimamai fepemepa atapif.

I'i anin epen nindaiwa'ma negase'epa nembela nefa'epa pefe' pigawis ipat ananitai ma nindaiwa' ma negame' basef ipe'ifia, dao' pesafel pekwaha ipat taun inimba pindila'ma usas itap pagail bo'wagah ipe'igahi, ma esis sitilipa sogogawa waf awafi asasifi kofagema asasimi atom.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemaf afamba lu'wafi anaf God nogawaloga epesafi, niti esis fowa' sagape Sodomi Gomora uwahipis kwasakwasala. Apa' epes isimba wambel ambalembaisi ina niti uwahipis, owa'. Akafimi lu'wami awami endilisii anaf a' motagamas.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' peme', ae' esapa'epa pefe' si'i anom sipsip pefe' la'afena nombagw wandafugwi alupugwi. Na'amba ipa' ukup pendanda' andeande' pefe' pila gawa si'i uguf fagafe'. Ea' pigi'ma waf bu'wafi si'i anal amil ma'unai, ipa' ina ukup pepe awepa penda' waf awafi, owa'.
Ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma anom amam. Amom atiasi a' monda'mepa kota amom dembami Juda ea' mehepa nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi.

Amom mogawa ipa' ukup pagapoma basef ae'afi ea' mi'i mondaiwa'mepa, ea' mofa'epa pefe' pilutu nogohnaep kingi gavman dembami ma pegawalapa basef ae'afi bu'wafi ma amom moloma esis amam nematawa sogolalama Godi piga'ipasef.
Esis atiasi sowalapepa ma kot, ipa' ina a' ombal mehepa a'owa' pi'i, ‘Apa' atiasi mogwa basef mi'if mi'imama?’ Owa'i. Atiasi nogota atamba atota God nihimba'mepa basef maif ipa' pewalapef piga'iefi.
Ifimba ina ipa' atipa pi'if, owa'atin. Spirit Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nowalapa basefa malogof ipe'igufi.
“Nemaf afamba atiasi esis atis sahin owan sondanda'ma kot sohas soga'. Ea' ahapas sonda'am na'amba atina esis nogaopas asasisi. Ea' batawisas wapani sonda' kotima mamasas asasisi anis sohas soga'.

Atiasi epes hiasi walemb hiagoma nelelemb numbutima ipa' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipa' pagaila basef ae'afii, na'amba dei' sahepa. Apa' epen ami nihapifi banagen nilutuma negatagama nemaf akutaifii, inimba atiasi God nuwambilan nokwahoman waf awafi ananifi nitanimai nepe andeande'.

I'i esis sagape anin tauni sonda' waf awafima ipa' ma, pefa' pefe' anambel wambel daiambel. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Ipa' ina atiasi penda' maol ae'ani hi'ilana walemb ambalemba Israeli hiagoma, ata' owa', ipa' a piti ae' igafi'i.
“Epes sanda' skul atini ina sape dambes sikila' tisa asasinai, owa'. Ea' epen inimba agol akani nanda' maol dowafi anin ina nape ilifa dembinai ananinai, owa'.

Apa' i'i esis sanda' skuli sogape na'amba atin si'i ae' tisa asasiwai, esis a' ukup pendegawa andeande' pi'i, ‘Andeande'ma afa' ogame' akafimi si'i tisa afa'inai.’ Apa' i'i anin epen agol akani nanda' maol dowafi negape si'i dembinai ananinai, isimba wapani dao' a' andeande'ma negame' akafimi si'i dembinai ananinai. Ae' dembiwai ahamepa ma wambota ae'atai esis sa'i basef awafi ma agol ae'agili sa'i ae' Belsebul. Anaf esis si'ipipa sonda'mepa agof awogufi endilisi fikila' agol Belsebul sanda'meagol ae'i.
“Ea' ipa' ina ombal mehepa ma amom, owa'i. Hiahaom mape mandambahi'i anaf motaga alihigima hiasi sotolom sogawam. Hiahaom hiami ata' sambaho'wam maga'ihi, anaf a' motaga mondawalap, hiasi sogawam.

Basef ifimba ae' ambahe'ef akot aga'ipa ipa' atipafi, ifimba pewalapef pi'if alip. Ea' basef pagame'ef sa'ombel hikihika' aligah atogahi, ifimba pelota petoma ifagw ilif pewalapef pi'ifa amam nematawa sogame'ef.

Ipa' owa'i ombal mehepama esis sogahepa alop atop pogaga'ia, apa' esis ina atiasi la'ifis sogaha nomonasi ambagof ipe'isi, owa'atin. Apa' ipa' ombal mondahepama aman anamba la'ifinai ma nogaha ipa' alop si'ip pogaloma nomonasi ambagof ipe'isi ma wambel awambili hel.
“Ipa' pegawa epes satala amiguf bias sa'usi ma moni otam wa'ani atitin. Apa' ahamepa ipe'inai ina natiti anin amil atitin niwai dowaf, owa'atin. Numafiagof andeande'.
Ea' anen a' niamba awif fagalo balagah ipe'igahi dondo' hi'alef.
Ea' ipa' owa'i ombal mehepaea. Anen okom mapoma ipa' apikila' amiguf hiagufi agwafomba sa'ugufi.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Epen ami newalapa agol ae'agili ma amam nematawa hiasi, anaf ae' wapani ewalapa agol epen inimbai ma naep ahame Godi gani heven.
Apa' epen ami newa'e alafuga nindaiwa'me ma owa' newalape ni'ipas naep epesia, na'amba atin anaf ae' wapani ese'ana alafuga epen inimba ma naep ahame Godi gani heven.”

Jisas na'i anif basef waminif atina wandaf na'i, “Ipa' ina pi'i ae' afi'i itap apa'e ma egakolasa ipa' pegape opalef awanelefa atiasi wandaf lopa' gugul owa'atin, owa'. Ae' ifa'i bainat hikalinai a' ifi'i ma atiasi anis epes sosafel sopa' sogaloma anis.

Ae' afi'i ma enda' waf afamba lopa' gugulifi fegataga, si'i basef fa'ias faga'i, ‘Anaf anona aman noloma ahamana ananinai mondatopa' biafim, ea' ano'w nemata'w koloma ma'ma'w ondatopa' biafiwa, ea' mefi'ma'w akwo'ukwi koloma ma'ma'w kwandagi'mo'wi ondatopa' biafiwa.
Ea' esis sagape ipat atotai esis wambota aman anambai atiasi sondawal sotaga bousi.’

“Epen ami okom magamagaila ahamani ma'man ananisi atisi ma owa' okom mimila ae'a, epen inimba ina a' netaga alipini ae'ani endilisi, owa'atin. Ea' epes amam nematawa ami nomonas asasisi asohafel sisila awasi asasisi a'owa', ma owa' nomonas sisila ae'a, isimba ina asotaga alipisi ae'asi endilisi, owa'atin.
Ae' efa' akafimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Epen ami owa' nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae'a ma nigailima, epen inimba ina la'ifin netaga alipini ae'ani, owa'atin.

Epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol ni'i nihapilal tatala'il nenda' maol nela'ambema ambal ananili, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' epen okom mopoma ae' ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf God nowambilai ambal ananili nitanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.”
“Epen ami nese'epa nembela niga'i ipa' ae'ipai, anin a' nase'e nembel ae' wapani. Ea' epen inimba nagase'e nembela ae'i, anin naso'ana nembel God nasapa'e agafi'ii.

Epen ami niti anona aman profeta niga'i, ‘Aman anamba profet nanda' maol Godii. Ae' ese'ana opaf endatopalopana.’ Epen inimba anaf a' nefa' hiahaom bu'wami si'i profet anamba nogofa'ami. Ea' epen ami niti anona aman fasinai nifi'i ma anin ni'i, ‘Ae' a'i anen aman fasinai. Ea' etopalopana ese'ana opaf.’ Epen inimba bola nefa' hiahaom fasimi si'i aman anamba fasinai nogofa'ami.

I'i epen ami niti anis epes falafisi wafisi a'a agufisi ma anin nitilis okom mimila epes isimba Jisasi, netopalopas nese'asa embel mais. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anaf epen inimba nefa' hiahaom ananimi fasimi ina higililam, owa'atin.”
Jisas na'ipama basef ifimba alipumi ananimi ma hi'alef, nosafel nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' taun walemb hielimbi itap lu'upa Galili nawalipa amam nematawa hiasi na'ipasa basef Godi.
Jon nagapisi'as embeli nape nanda' kalabus, ea' name' basefa maol hiani Krais nanda'ani. Ea' dei' Jon nasapa' anom alipumi ananimi mafe'ma Krais.
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' aman ma'wina a' nafi'i, ea' a'a ata' mope mohafa anona daiana?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' pitanima pefe' pi'ipa Jona hiahawes isimba dei' patilis pagame'asi.

Isimba naep pagaso'asi asati wapani, bo'wagah awamisi asafe' andeande', aowas aunai nanda' alop asasipi pagambu'wi ambo'wes, aligah hagaso'asi ea' same' basef andeande', sagaga'i sotanima sosafel wapani, a kwahusi same' basef bu'wafi Godi.
Epes mamahisa ukup atifip sagahapifai, isimba asonahas andeande'.”

Ea' alipumi amamba Joni mafe' atin, Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa ma Jon na'i, “Fowa' ipa' pafe' anep itap fataupigima wafigima, pafe' pati main? Pafe'ma pagati anona aman pupulinai si'i anota elifita fufin naolata tagalimbi? Owa'atin.
A'a pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman nagala klos fasimi atumii? Owa'atin. Epes isimba sanda' luwaguf maim fasimi atumi esis sape ifagw king dembamii atogw.
Apa' ipa' dei' pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman profet? Ae' a'ipipa, anen profet dembinai nikila' profet hiami hi'alam.

Aman anamba ea' ma'una anen atona si'i basef fagape Baibeli na'iasa God fowa' na'ipa Jisas naga'i, ‘Peme', anaf ae' esapa' anona aman nogawalipasa basef ae'afii nili' nofe'ma ina'. Ea' nondondomba ufia'w ine'ikwi.’

“Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli a' nikila' amam hiami hi'alam magataga itap apa'i. Apa' epen ami dei' nigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafian, inimba dembeni nikila' Jon. I'i epen inimba sa'usa'uni ma wambota Godi, anin wapani dei' nape damben nikila'ana.

Nogota atamba fowa' Jon nagapisi'as embeli ea' tafi'i togotambel dei', anom amam banagami ma'i mohambombaga waf epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Apa' anom amam dindinapimi dei' mawis mape nomona maol inimba atapim mahapilan tatala'ina anen nogape Dembinai ma amom.
Amom magawalipasa basefa mu'uli Godi faloma basef amom profeti mawalipasef mape mafi'i metambel nogota Jon nagatagatai.
Apa' i'i ipa' pi'i aho'ma pigahapifa basef amamifima, dei' pegawa Jon anen si'i Elaija, aman anamba fowa' amom profet ma'i nogafi'ii.
Ipa' epes ami aligah hagagalipai, peme' basef ifimba andeande'.
“Atiasi ae' indila'waifa ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itapi ataipai i'imama? Ipa' pape si'i awasi sandakolas sagapoma sofala anis awasi daias saga'i,

‘Apa' mandagala mufapula batagwa ipa', apa' ipa' ina palemb. Apa' manda' awalef si'i sagatala fawiagof malef mindiwagef, apa' ipa' owa' pelefa.’ Ipa' epes dei' pagape itapi panda' du'wanigai si'i awasi isimba owa' sealemb selef sigindiwagefia.
Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli nafi'i ina na' gwa'aisii embel wainimbel, owa'atin. Ea' pa'i ambal aunai napaona.

Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi afi'i a' gwa'aisi saloma embel wain, ea' patolowe pa'i, ‘Piti aman anamba naga' wali'ita hiatai naga' embel wain hiani endilisii. Anen alipunai ma amom mogofa' takisi magambaso'masi maloma amam manda' waf awafii.’ Apa' epes ami sigaila gawa fasini Godi sonda' waf bu'wafi, isimba atis dei' hiasi sa'i, ‘Gawa inimba bu'wani.’”
Analemb walemb lu'walimbi taun fowa' Jisas nanda' hiahaom banagami esis satolom sogawam apa' esis ina sambema nelelemba God, owa'atin. Ea' dei' Jisas nanda' megahahas.

Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ati ipa' Korasinipai paloma Betsaida uwahipipa a'owa'. Nimanimi akafimi lu'wami atiasi a' motagamepa. Epes isimba fowa' gani sanda' waf awafii sagape walemb ambalemba bialemb Tairi Saidon ina sati anom hiahaom maol banagami si'i dei' anda'am walemb ipe'ilimbi, owa'. I'i sotolumai, sowaho' begah pepe'agatami si'i luwaguf tol sope nif agambeh. Ama sigihimba'ma anis epes esis ea' sambema nelelemb endilisi safe'ma God. Owa', owa'atin.

Endilisi ae' a'ipipa. Anaf God nogawaloga esis amom nematawa hiasi, afamba nimanimi Tairi soloma Saidoni amamba ina lu'um a'owa' si'i nimanimi amamba anaf mogatagama ipe'i, owa'atin. Anaf anen niti uwahipis, apa' ipa' owa'.

Ea' ipa' Kaperneam, anaf esis sosa'ma agof ipe'igufi folota ilif? Owa'atin. Anaf God nokwahipa pefe' wambel awambili hel. I'i fowa' gani anona aman nonda' anom banagami wambel ambalemba Sodom si'i anda'am wambel ipe'imbiliai, epes isimba Sodom ina soga' ma nif lu'wami, owa'atin. Dei' bafasas akusas asasisi sope namis. Owa', owa'atin.
Dei' ae' a'ipipa, nemaf afamba lu'wafi God nogawaloga epesafi, niti fowa' sagape Sodomi uwahipis kwasakwasala. Apa' anen ina niti uwahipipa, owa'. Anaf pefa' akafimi lu'wami awami endilisi.”

Nemaf afamba Jisas na'ias na'amba na'i, “O ahame, ina' dembinai ma ilifi itapi. Ina' nambaho' hiahaom amamba ma esis epes gawaisi sogofa' gawa lu'wanii, ea' nambemam nihimba'masam epes isimba gawa akasi falafisi.
Aho' ahame okom ine'imi maga'i ea' amamba atom.

Ahame ae'anai nanda' hiahaom hiami hi'alam mape lagol ae'agili. Ina anin epen negawa ae' Nogamana Godi, owa'atin. Anen atona nogawe. Ea' owa' anin epen negawa ahamea, owa'atin. Ae' Nogamana ananiwai atowe egawana. Epes isimba mamahisa igihimba'masa ahamai, isimba wapani esis atis sogawana.
“Ipa' epes panda' maol numa'winii noma'w kwagahipai ma pegelaoma ufia'w bu'wakwi kwagafe'ma Godi, ipa' hipai pifi'mai ae', enda'epa pegapoma noma'w.

Peme' basef ae'afi pigi'mif panda' waf ae'afi. Waf afamba si'i anoga lawag ae' ase'epaga pegewandefaga ikaguf ipe'ifii. Ipa' pendefa' gawa ae'ani ma pegegawa ae'. Dei' main? Ae' anda' waf sa'umbilifi ma epesi, ae' ina agasa'ma agol ae'agili atogila okom ae'ami, owa'. Ipa' pifi'mai ae' ma atiasi pegapoma noma'wa ambagof ipe'igufi.
Dei' main? Maol ae' ese'epan pegefa'ani, inimba ina hiahaom nimanimi, owa'atin. Maol inimba fasini endilisi ma negatopalopa ipa' epes hipai.”
A'i owa' anef nemaf Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, Jisas nafe' anagon owa', nataga anof aof sagawa witafi a' nawis. Ea' alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana nolomaham mosaga anom wit magaufi ma'am.

Owa' amom Farisi mati waf afambai alipumi Jisasi manda'afi ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' niti waf afamba alipumi ine'imi manda'afi. Amom ina monda'am na'amba ma nemaf afa'e sabat magapoma noma'wafi, owa'i. Dei' maina amom manda'am na'amba?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pegawa basef ifimba ea' ma waf fowa' dembinai king Devit nanda'afi. Afamba Devit naloma alipumi ananimi nolomagaham

anen nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon na' bret atamba amom pris mondolali magaso' Godatai. Ea' anen na'ata naso' alipumi ananimi wapani ma'ata atin. Apa' mu'uli ape'ini na'i amom ea' pris atom mea'ata. Owa' anen ina naila mu'uli inimba, owa'.

Ipa' patalifa basef ifimba fagape buk mu'uli'wi Godi ea' ma amom pris manda' maol ipat lu'unai Godi nomon. Basef ifimba ma nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi amom ina magi'mif, owa'. Mumbisila'ef. Apa' amom ina manda' waf awafi, owa'atin.
Ae' dei' a'ipipa, anin epen dei' nagape na'ai anin a' nikila' ipat lu'unai Godi.

Basef fagail buk Baibel fowa' amom manda'afi fa'ias na'amba fa'i, God na'i, ‘Ae' ina okom ma'i bulmakau mafis pindalalima ae'asi, owa'. Ae' okom ma'i ipa' piti sahin owan ipe'isi uwahipis.’ I'i ipa' pegawa basef ifimba Godi kofagefa ai, ipa' ina apewaloga epes isimba owa' sonda' anef waf awafia, pi'i awasi. Owa' owa'atin. Ipa' owa' pegawefa.
Dei' main, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' atowe ape dembiwai ma nemaf afamba sabata iga'ipipa maol main andeande'ma pigaila basef penda'an nemaf afamba.”
Jisas nosafel nakwaha aof afamba nafe' nawis anota ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai.

Ea' nati anona aman lagol awagilinai nape ipat atamba. Aowas nanda'ana lagol ananigili gaga' dindigigil gailana. Anom amam ma'i mowando'mana ufia'wa mogasapaga Jisasa anif basef baso'afi ma monda' kotimana. Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Afa' andeande'ma ogatopalopa anis epes aowas nanda'asi ma nemaf afa'e sagapoma noma'wafi, a'a owa'?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “I'i anona aman ipe'inai sipsip ananipi pofe' powala pogape anoga nowaga lougai nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi, ipa' pafe' pagiapi.
Waf afambai bu'wafi. Apa' epes sikila' sipsip a'owa'. Ea' na'amba atin apa' monda' waf fasifi mondotopalopa epes nemaf afamba magapoma noma'wafi.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa aman anamba lagol awagilinai na'i, “Dowa lagol ine'igili usi'igil.” Ea' aman nando lagol ananigili agataga bo'wagol wapani, si'i wa'agol.
Owa' amom Farisi mosafel mawis ando' munduwa'anima ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Jisas nogaga'.
Owa' Jisas nogawa basef ifimba ma amom ma'i mohana nogaga'. Ea' nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' ea' hiasi sagi'mana safe', nanda' isimba aowas nanda'asi hiasi ambo'wes hi'alas.
Ea' na'ipas dindinip na'i esis ina sowalapa anen si'iana alihina, owa'.
Anen na'ipas na'amba atin si'i anif basef God fowa' naga'ipa profet Aisaiefi. Basef ifimba fataga endilisi faga'ias na'amba fa'i,

“Piti aman anamba nanda' maola ae'i, ae' andandepana ea'. Nomonas ae'asi pelele' saisailana a'owa', okom ae'ami ea' bo'oma anen. Ae' atiasi ese'ana Ambal bu'unai Ae'anai nuwalipasa basef ae'afi ma nogawaloga epes hiasi owa' sogogawa ae'ia.
Aman anamba ina nonda' megahohas ninifalis ni'ipas diga lu'ugai, owa'atin. Esis ina some' malagol ananigili noga niga'i ufiawa lu'uwama, owa'.

Anota elifita sa'utai tondola'i atamba anen ina nowalota, owa'atin. Ea' anom lam fagandom nimanisi, amamba anen ina nehefam moga', owa'atin. Anen nope nonda' maol atapina nefe' nefe' notagama nemaf afamba nonda' waf bu'wafi fikila' endilisi waf awafi ma fegenalo.
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi owa' sogogawa ae'ia sila basef ananifi sope sohafana.”
Nemaf afamba esis sofa'ai anona aman ambal aunai nagawisanai safi'mai Jisas. Naep paloma malagol ananisi soso'ana, ea' Jisas nanda'ana bo'ona, na'i andeande' naep pati natologon nafe' andeande'.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi gogolalasis kwapete' sa'i, “Aman anamba anen Devit akunamana a'a owa'?”
Owa' amom Farisi mame' isimba ma'i, “Anen natofa ambagof awami ma banagami anona ambal mamana aunai agilinama Bielsebul.”

Owa' Jisas nogawa ukup amamipi na'ipam na'i, “I'i anis epes hiasi sagape itap lu'upa anin kantri sondatopa' biafis sogapa', ina atiasi banages, owa'. I'i anis epes wambota atota sondatopa' biafisa sogapa', esis ina atiasi banages sopa', owa'.
I'i wambota Satani sondawal biafis sogapa', atiasi wambota ananitai banages si'imama? Owa'atin.
I'i endilisi ae' atofa ambagof awami ma banagami Bielsebulai, dei' ami natopalopa epes ipe'isi natofam? Owa'atin. Dei' epes isimba ipe'isi sihimba'mepa basef ipe'ifi owa' endilisifia.
Endilisi, Ambal bu'unai Godi natopalopa ae' atofa ambagof amamba awami. Ea' dei' ipa' pendegawa nemaf afamba pigawisa maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa ea' fatagamepa.

Anona aman ina banagona nefe' nuwis ipat anona aman banagonai nagapautai nonda' wala hiahaom ananimi, owa'. Anen ata' nili' nombalo'ana nowa'ana sisihina dao', atiasi banagona ma nefe' nuwis nonda' wal nogofa'i hiahaom maga'oh ipat aman anambai.
Epen ami owa' alipini ae'ani ma owa' negape atapin negaloma ae'ia, anin bouni ae'ani. Epen ami owa' nekolasa sipsip pogaloma ae'apia, anin nagatofa sipsip pafa' pagafe' atona bianai.

Ea' ae' dei' a'ipipa, God atiasi a' nokwaha waf fafifafi hiafi feloma basef findiwaifi hiafi amam nematawa sanda'afi hi'ilif okom moso'anaf. Apa' epen ami nenda' basef findiwaefa Ambal bu'unai Godi, God ina atiasi nokwahomanaf okom moso'anaf, owa'atin.

Epen ami nenda' anif basef awafi findiwaefa ae', ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, bola God a' nokwahomana awami amamba ananimi okom moso'anam. Apa' epen ami nenda' basef findiwaefa Ambal bu'unai Godi, God anaf owa'atin endilisi ma nogakwaha findiwa anamba aunai okom mogaso'anana epen inimbaia, owa'atin. Findiwa aunai atapina nopain, dei' nogota ata'e nefe' anaf nogota tigi' togatagai wapani nope atapina.
“Lawah bu'ugahi hail hola gwa'aisi bu'wasi. Apa' lawah augahi hail hola gwa'aisi awasi. Apa' mati gwa'aisi sagailagahi, mogawa lawah bu'ugahi augahi.
Ipa' epes aupai si'i uguf fagahasi, ipa' atiasi la'ifipa pi'i basef fasifi? Owa'atin. Basef mamahifa fagape si'ifa opalef epesi, ifimba atif esis sawalapefa malogof asasigufi.
Epes bu'wasi, esis nomonas fasisi sapais ea' sawalapa waf bu'wafi. Apa' epes awasi waf hiafi awafi fapais ea' sawalapa waf awafi atef.”
“Apa' ae' a'ipipa. Basef hiafi amam nematawa saga'iefi, anaf God nohali'asa basef ifimba ea' nowalogas nemaf afamba nogawaloga epes hiesiefi.
Basef ipe'ifi atif anaf God neme'epamef nowaloga ipa' ni'i ipa' epes bu'upai. Apa' i'i owa'atin, ea' basef ifimba ipe'ifi atif anaf God nilif wapani nowaloga ipa' ni'i ipa' epes aupai.”
Ea' nemaf afamba anom amam dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma anom Farisi mahali'ana ma'i, “Tisa dembinai, afa' wa'i ina' nenda' anom banagami si'i God nanda'ami ma afa' ata' otolom.”

Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i panda' waf awafii pegewa' alafugaha Godi. Dei' maina ipa' pa'i pigati ae' enda' hiahaom amamba igihimba'mepa banagami Godi? Ae' ina ihimba'mepa banagami amamba ipa', owa'atin. Ametal inimba banagani fowa' God nigihimba'manan profet Jonai atin atiasi ihimba'mepan ipa'.

Fowa' aman anamba Jona aol lu'unai nowalo'ana nape nembel nomon nimaguf wanif, owambeh wanembeh. Ea' na'amba atina ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi atiasi egape nimaguf wanif owambeh wanembeh itap nomon.

Afamba God nogawaloga esis amam nematawafi esis epes Ninivaisi sosafel sola' basef fitanima filipa ma waf awafi ipa' panda'afi. Dei' main, esis Ninive same' basef Godi Jona naga'ipasafi ea' sambema nelelemb sakwaha waf awafi safe'ma God. Apa' ae' ikila' Jona.

Anaf God nogawaloga epesafi, nemaf afamba ano'w nemata'w kwin dembe'wi kwagapani gani wa'ol awin negemba'mai kosafel koloma ipa' pagape na'ai kola' basef fitanima filipa kwi'i ipa' aupai. Dei' main, kwin akwamba kwapani gani itap pafe' pegetambela ea' kwafi'i kwame' basefa gawa lu'wani dembinai king Solomon nagawalipasani. Apa' dei' anona nigikila' Solomoni nape na'a'e.
“Nemaf afamba anona ambal aunai nakwaha anin epen nawisi nagafi'i, anen nafe' anamba fatauguma nolaoma anagon na'i nogapoma noma'wa. Owa' owa'atin. Ina nati anagona nogape, owa'.
Ea' na'i, ‘Ae' itanima efe' ipat fowa' agapautai.’ Ea' nafi'i nati ipat atamba asambehata andeande' sofalo'mata tape wafita.

Ea' notanima nafe' nao'wai anogof ambagof daiagof awagufi 7-pelaiguf wapani mafi'i mawis mape ipat atamba. Ambagof amamba awami a'owa' manda' waf awafii fikila' waf awafi fowa' nali' nanda'afi. Fowa' epen inimba nape awen kwasakwasala, apa' dei' nape awen a'owa' nikila' endilisi poe fowa' nali' nagapaini. Ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i panda' waf awafii, anaf pepe awepa na'amba atin si'i epen inimba.”
Jisas ata' na'ipasa basef atin esis amam nematawa owa', ma'mana kwafi'i kwaloma owapana ananimi safi'i salutu ando' sa'i si'ipana anif basef.
Ea' anona aman na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ina' neme', ma'mena ine'ikwi kwaloma anom owapena ine'imi salutu ando' sa'i solomena si'i.”
Owa' anen nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Ma'mai owape ae'asi ami?”
Ea' nanda' lagol nondola'waifa amom alipumi ananimi na'ipas na'i, “Piti ma'me kwaloma owape ae'asi isimba.
Epes mamahisa sigaila okom Ahamai nagape heveni, ma sonda' waf ananifii, isimba atis si'i ma'me owape hanitiame ae'asi.”
Nemaf afamba atef Jisas nakwaha ipat nawisi ando' nafe' nape felefele'ma akata dumb lu'wambi.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'i salipana sape. Ea' nalota natoma anota bot sa'utai, apa' esis salutu akata.
Ea' naso'asa basef hiafi waminif atin na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Anona aman nafe' nowaha olemb witimb si'i raisi anof aof.
Anen nowahemb nafe', anemb bewa ufia'w sagafe'ma ea' amiguf fufia' fafi'i fa'amb.
Apa' anemb bewa otambaipa itap owa' lu'upa kwasala'up, patoma ilif atogon, owa' pewala awina. Ea' batagai kwafalis.
A'i awin natafi ma owaf faluwi fahamb alimb masilimb ina bewafa bewala itap atep, owa'. Ea' owaf fahamb a' alimb.
Apa' anemb bewala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofana wit, ea' amom ina mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
Apa' anemb bewa bagafe' itap fasipai ea' bataga balo bail bela gwa'aisi. Anemb bela 100-pelaimb, anemb bail bela 60-pelaimb, apa' anemb bail bela 30-pelaimb atom.
Ipa' aligah hagapaipai ma pagame' basef ifimbai, pendame'ef andeande' ukup pendapomef.”
Ea' amom alipumi ananimi mafi'mai Jisas ma'ipana ma'i, Dei' maina ina' naga'ipasa basef esis waminif atin?”

Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God ea' nihimba'mepa basef kofagefa fape fandambahi'i ma ipa' piwis nomona maol ananini nope Dembinai nugumafipa. Apa' epes isimba, owa'atin. Anen ina nihimba'masa basef ifimba kofagefa, owa'.
Epes ami sogahapila basef Godii, atiasi God a' nowatanimasef wapani. Apa' isimba owa' sogahapilifia, atiasi basef kwawia'wif ifimba esis sagahapilafi, God a' nondalombasef esis ea' sope dowaf.
Basef kofagefa ma ae' dei' aga'i basef waminif atinafi ma esis, ifimba. Esis satologon, apa' esis ina atiasi siti anis maefah. Ea' esis sogahembe' seme' basef, apa' ina sogawa kofagefa, owa'atin.

Esis sanda'am na'amba ma anif basef fowa'ifi fandawalap endilisi. Basef ifimba anona profet Aisaia fowa' God na'ipanaef nanda'afi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Ipa' anaf pegehembe' peme' basef, apa' ina pegawa kofagefa. Ipa' petologon atapigin, apa' ina piti anis maefah, owa'atin endilisi.

Dei' main, ukup amam nematawa isimbai maso'as a'owa', aligah asasigahi haso'as ukup iwanipa sogame' basef. Ea' sasopama naep asasipi ma sogati hiahawes. Ea' aligah asasigahi haso'asa sogame' basef. Ukup asasipi paso' ma sogogawa basef kofagefa. Ama esis sombema opalef sigagi'ma ae' ma enda'as bo'wes wapani. Apa' owa', owa'atin.’
“Apa' ipa' sonahepa. Dei' main, naep ipe'ipi ea' pati hiahawes, aligah ipe'igahi hame' basef.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, fowa' amom profet hiami maloma anom amam manda' waf usi'ifi hilili'i ma'i miti hiahaom amamba dei' ipa' pagatulumi, apa' ina matolom, owa'atin. Ukup amamipi pa'ipa'i a'owa' ma mogame' basef ifimba ipa' pagame'afi, apa' owa', owa'atin. Amom ina mame'ef.”
“Ipa' peme' basef kofagefa ifimba waminif atini ma aman anamba nogowaha olemb gwa'aimbi aofi.

Basef ifimba ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias fagape na'amba. Olemb begewa ufia'wi ambamba si'i epes isimba sagame' basef ifimbai, apa' esis owa' ukup pepemefa. Ea' Satan nafi'i nelefata basef ifimba God nagawef nomon ukup asasipii.
Apa' anemb bewa bafe' anagon otambaigimai, ambamba si'i anis epes same' basef Godi sofa'ef kwafalis sandagalamef.

Apa' isimba si'i masilimb owa' bendala itap awinia. Esis sahapilif nogota bandata ma a'i owa', anis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma sagahapifa basef Godi sanda'as findiwas, sahas, sanda'masa waf awafi ea' kwafalis atis sandahagas sakwaha sagahapifa Godi.

Anemb begewala mandelef wandafumi la'afini, ambamba si'i anis same' basef sailif safe', owa' nomonas salasafe' ma hiahaom magape itapi ma ukup pagapagaila moni maim hiami ea' amambai mataga maofana basef Godi. Ea' ina sahapifif sanda' waf bu'wafi banages, owa'atin. A sowa si'i gwa'aisi owa' sogalo andeande'ia.

Apa' anemb begewa itap fasipai si'i epes isimba same' basef bu'wafi ma ukup asasipi pagapomef sahapilif sogawefa sanda' waf fasifii. Anis sanda' waf bu'wafi si'i begela 100-pelaisi, apa' anis si'i begela 60-pelaisi. Apa' anis si'i begela 30-pelaim dowafi.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anif basef waminif atini wapani esis amam nematawa hiasi na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona aman nafe' nogowaha olemb fasimbi gwa'aimbi aof ananifi.
A'i owa' owamb esis hiasi saga'ihi, anin epen bouni ananini nafi'i, nowaha otalef awalifi wapani aof afamba anen doko' nogowaha olemb bu'wambia ea' nafe'.
Ama main, olemb ambamba bu'wambi bataga ma benafa bela gwa'aisi, amom manda' maola aman kofagonama aofi ea' mati otalef awalifi fataga fape faloma olemb fasimbi.
Ea' mati na'amba, mafi'i ma'ipa anen ma'i, ‘Dembinai, afa' wa'i owa' ina' newaha olemb gwa'aimbi aof ine'ifi. Apa' otalef amamba awasimi magaluwi. Ami newahom mataga?’
Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Anona aman bounai nanda'am.’ Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, ‘Ina' na'i afa' ofe' ugi otalef amamba awami owa'aniam mo'oh atogon?’
