Owa' aman anamba na'ipam na'i, ‘Ahae' owa'. Na'amba pelelama wit a pigiam moloma otalef awalifi.

Ipa' kwahowam mondape atifima la'isitai dao', ea' winifa'am. Nogota atamba sogofa' gwa'aisiatai, ae' i'ipa amom manda' maol inimbai i'ipam i'i, ‘Ipa' piwa'ania otalef afalemba awalifi piwasi'alef ondogw fe'eha pegaofalef. Ea' petama wit pefa'am pekolasom mofe' muwis mo'oh ipat ae'atai.’”
Ea' Jisas naso'asa anif basef waminif atin wapani na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i nalelef sa'utipilif sa'ulifi. Anona aman nofa'alef nawalef aof ananifi.

Anelef nalelef mastetilif sa'usa'ulifi. Ina lu'walef si'i sa'utip gwa'aipi lawah hiagahi, owa'. Afalemba sa'usa'ulef a'owa'. Apa' natagai ma nagalo, lu'una nikila' gwa'aisi hiasi sagape aufahi. Anen nataga lawag lu'unai ea' amiguf fafi'i fala owah fatoma agufugama.”

Ea' nawalapa anif basef waminif atini wapani ma esis na'i, “Epes isimba sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i yis ano'w nemata'w kofa'as kwambemas saloma plaua hiami magala dram lu'wamii. A'i owa' main, a' matef lu'um.”
Basef ifimba hiafi Jisas na'ipasef waminif atina amam nematawa isimba hiasi. Anen ina na'ipasef alihif, owa'atin. Na'if waminif atin.

Dei' anif basef anona aman profet fowa' nanda'afi dei' ea' fataga fandawalap. Profet anamba naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Anaf ae' iga'i malogol i'i basef waminif atin. Ae' i'i basef fape fandambahi'i dambadamba God nanda' ilifi itap fafi'i fafi'i fataga dei'.”

Ea' Jisas nosafel nakwaha esis amam nematawa hiasi nafe' ipat, ea' alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Basef ifimba waminif atina otalef awalifi fagataga aofi, ina' a' newalapa kofagefa ma afa'.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'ipam na'i, “Aman nogowaha olemb bu'wambii anamba ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.

Apa' aof afamba si'i walemb itap apa'e hiagoma hi'alagon. Ea' olemb ambamba bu'wambi si'i epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Apa' otalef awalifi, afalemba si'i epes awasisi Satani.

Ea' aman anamba bounai nogowaha otalef awalifii, anen Satan. Ea' nogota atamba sogola gwa'aisiatai, atamba si'i nemaf akutaifi ma itap apa'e hiagoma. Apa' amam amamba mogola gwa'aimi witi, amamba si'i amom ensel.
Nemaf afamba amom motama otalef awalifi mofalef nif hi'igalalef na'amba atin si'i nemaf akutaifi.

Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi anaf ae' esapa'i amom ensel ae'ami ea' motofa hiahaom amamba hiami manda' epes sanda' waf awafii, moloma amam nematawa isimba hiasi hi'ilas sanda' waf awafii muli'amonas sogakwaha anamba ae' agala'ambemagoma.
Ea' amom ensel a' mokwaha epes isimba sofe' nif lu'wafi, sope nif amamba selef kwapete'as nalelef tilili talala' sope awes.
Nemaf afamba amam nematawa bu'wasi sogala' a'owa' si'i awin alipini anamba Ahamas nagala'ambemagoma. Epes aligah hagapaipai, ipa' pendame' basef ifimba andeande'.

“Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anin moni sambaho'wan nagape anof aof itapi. Ea' anona aman nafi'i natilin nambaho'wan wapani. Anen sonahana endilisi nafe' nofala anis epes safi'i saso'ana moni ma satala hiahawes ananisi hi'agalas. Ea' nofa' moni inimba nafe' natala aof afamba.
“Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona aman nanda' bisnisi nala' nogolaoma anis bahigis fasifasisi atis.

Ea' nati anis fasisi endilisi sagatalis otamba hiambaii nofala anis epes safi'i ma sogaso'ana otamba sogatala hiahaom ananimi hi'igalam. Ea' nofa' otamba ma isimba nafe' natala bahigis isimba sowasuwaisi atis.
“Anif wapani. Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona anemb anom amam mafe' malana nowala dumb awina migili'amai agof mamimami.
Ea' anemb anamba asi'ina ma agof mahondo'ana nafi'i akata wata'ita. Ea' mape manifa' agof fasigufi atogof malo'agof folalef. Apa' agof amamba awasimi makwahom.

Ama anef nemaf akutaifi itap apa'e ea' na'amba atin si'i amom maganifa' agof fasigufi dei awasigufi dei. Amom ensel anaf mufi'i munifa' epes sanda' waf awafii sagape la'afena amam nematawa isimba fasisii mofa'as mefe'
mokwahis sofe' nif lu'wami. Ama sogape nif amamba lu'wami sowa selef kwapete'as nalelef tilili talala' sogape.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' ea' pegawa basef ifimba hiafi a'a owa'?” Ea' magwamana ma'i, “Aho'.”

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Amom hiami dembami magawalipas mu'uli Godi molafa basef ananifi ma mugawis nomona maol ananini nope Dembinai nugumafiam amom mandahama na'amba. Amom si'i anona aman kofagonama ipati. Anen nafe' nawis ipat nomon nofa'ai hiahawes fasisi, namisi saloma apisi ea' nofa'as nafi'i.”
Jisas nawalipam basef ifimba waminif atini ma ea', nakwaha wambel ambalemba

nafe' wambel ananimbili kofagama. Ea' nawis ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai nasefela basef Godi na'ipasef. Anen na'ias na'amba esis agogolalasis kwapete' sa'i, “Gawa inimba naloma banagami amamba ma nanda' hiahaom si'i God nanda'ami, anen nofa'ami ani?
A'i aman anamba nogama aman nagala' ifagwi Maria kogolanai a'a? Apa' mogawa owapana ananimi Jems Josep Saimoni Judas mape na'a.
Hanitiamana ananiwai wape walomapa na'a. Apa' hiahaom amamba gawa banagani anen nofa'ani ani?”

Ea' sowa' alafugaha anen. Owa' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Anona profet agol gatomana analemb walemb hielimbi daialemb, sa'i anen dembinai sahapifana. Apa' ina anagol agol gatoma gandawalapana alihigila wambel kofagama ananima, a ipat ananitai nagapoma, owa'atin.”
Esis owa' sogahapifa aninia. Na'amba dei' anen ina nanda' anom hiahaom banagami hiami wambel ambalemba, owa'atin.
Nemaf afamba anona aman agilinama Herot nape dembinai gavmana itap lu'upa Galili. Anen name' basefa maol bu'wani Jisas nanda'ani, ea' name' sasa'ma agol Jisasi gafe' lu'wagol.
Ea' Herot na'ipa isimba sanda'mana maol na'i, “Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli, a' nosafel wapani dei' nape banagona nanda' maol si'i God nanda'ani.”

Fowa' basef ifimba fagape na'amba. Herot owamana Filip waulu'mana anani'wi agili'wa Herodias. Ea' sahomana Herot nandalombana'w. Ea' Jon na'ipa Herot na'i, “Ina' naso' nemata'w sahomenai, ea' nawala mu'uli Godi. Na'ambai ina andeande', owa'.” Apa' Herod nandaiwa'ma nogali'amona'w ea' na'ipa amom soldia mofa' Jon mafe' manda'ana nanda' kalabus.
Herot na'i nohana noga' apa' owa' owa'atin. Dei' main, anen ombal mahanama amam nematawa hiasi sa'i Jon anen profet. Na'amba Herot ina nahana, owa'.

Nafe' ma anef nemaf Herot nofala epes hiasi safi'i sanda' kolasa nandagalama nemaf ma'mana kogolanafi. Nemaf afamba Herodias nogama'w kwafi'i kwawisi nomon kwalutu kwalemb. Esis hiasi satolo'w ea' Herot nandagalama'w na'i basef endilifi atif naga'if banagafi na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipina, i'i ina' ni'ipa ae' ma egase'ena anom maefah, ae' igasi'enami.”
Ea' ako'w kwafe'ma ma'makw kwa'ipa'w kwafe' kwa'ipa Herot kwa'i, “Dei' atef ae' a'i ina' neha aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli noga' netopa' balaga gola anota plet nefa'agai nese'e.”

Ako'w kwa'ias na'amba, opaf Heroti a' nemanif a'owa'. Apa' anen okom mandanda' ma na'i basef endilifi atif naga'if banagafi, ea' amam nematawa hiasi isimba same'ana. Ea' nasapa' anona aman soldia nafe' ipat kalabusitai natopa' bamato'w Joni nala balaga gala plet nafi'i naso' Herodias nogama'w kofa'aga kwafe' kwaso' ma'makw.
Ea' amom alipumi Joni mafi'i mofa' alop ananipi mafe' mawana matmat. Ea' mafe' ma'ipa Jisasa hiahaom amamba.

Jisas name' basef ifimba, anen atona nafe' nakwaha wambel ambalemba nofa' bot nafe' anagon wafigima epes akagoma. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi same' basefa Jisas nafe' sakwaha wambel hiagoma asasima sailana safe' ufia'w sa'i sotolona.
Jisas nafe' nataga akata nati esis hiasi nati uwahipis. Ea' nati epes asasisi aowas nanda'asi, nanda'as bo'wes wapani.

A'i owa' main wambomota felefele'ma owamb alipumi ananimi mafi'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wape na'a wafigima ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb. Ina' nesapa'as sofo'o analemb walemb sogotala gwa'aisi sonda'as soga'as.”
Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ina esapa'as sefe', owa'. Ipa' atipa pese'as gwa'aisi.”
Ea' amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' gwa'aisi owa' hiasa. Bret wa'agolita taloma agof biagof ea' ma'wis sa'omafa.”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fa'as fi'i pese'eas ae'.”

Ea' na'ipa amam nematawa hiasi sape otalef bo'walifi itap. Ea' nasa'ma bret atamba wa'agolita taloma agof naniga nati heven ilif na'i nanifela God. Ama ea', nindiwata naso' alipumi ananimi mafe' maso'as sa'as dondo' a' alihis andeande'. Ea' alipumi ananimi matatama du'wa'wanis sagasaga'ihi malo'was folalef lu'walifi 12-pelailif asi'ilif kwaef.
Epes saga' gwa'aisi isimbai hiasi. Esis siamba amam atom mataga 5000-pelaim. Apa' ina siamba awasi nematawa, owa'.
Jisas nasapa' alipumi ananimi mofa' bot mali' mafe' dumb ambamba mambo fisana. Ea' nasapa' amam nematawa hiasi safe'.
Safe'ma ea', anen atona nalota anota halafuta nape nandabeten nahali' God. Wambomota felefele'ma owamb, anen atona ata' napani halafuta ilif.
Apa' alipumi ananimi mape bot mali' mafe' mandasapa' dumb la'afimba, owa' fufin lu'wani nalo nafi'i. Ea' embel lasiali' mafi'i mahagasai bot. Ea' fufin wapani nakoto'ma bot, tanda'am bimi bema tala.
Akot ata' tail atin, felefele'ma logola, owa' Jisas nagi'mam natoma nafe' embel ilif nafe'ma amom.
Amom mati anen nalutu nafi'i embel ilif, ombal maham kwapete' ma'i owa', anona gamba nailam nafe'. Ea' manda'am wiwa ma'oh kwapete'.
Owa' Jisas nalomam na'i kwafalis na'i, “Ipa' banagepa, ombel mogahepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i.”
Ea' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai! I'i ina' ma'wina, ni'ipa ae' ilutu efe'mago ina' embel ilif.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fi'i.” Ea' Pita nakwaha bot natoma nafe' embel ilifam nafe'ma Jisas.
Apa' owa', anen nati embel mohafel lu'um, ombal mahana na'i a' nowala embel. Ea' nofala Jisas na'i, “Dembinai! Ina' topalopae.”
Ea' kwafalis atis Jisas nowasa' lagol nahapilana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' owa' nihapilif banagena ni'i ae' la'ifiwaia, owa'. Dei' maina ina' nomonas sagape biafis?”
Ea' amom biam malota bot, fufin naloma embel mandahagas.
Ea' amom magape boti mati hiahaom amamba manda' lotuma Jisas mafela agol Godi lu'wagol ma'i, “Endilisi atis, ina' Nogamana Godi.”
Ea' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mowala mambo dumb ambamba mafe' mataga anagon itap lu'upa Genesaret.
Ea' anis epes sagape itap apambai sogawana sa'i anamba Jisas. Ea' sasapa' anis safe' sa'ipa anis sagape felefele'i sofa'ai anis aowas nanda'asi safi'mai anen.
Ea' sofa'ai isimba aowas nanda'asi sa'ipana saisailana sa'i anen ni'i aho'ma isimba sogahapila lowaf ananifi da'malififa atef. Ea' epes mamahisa sagahapilaf lowaf ananifii sataga bo'wes wapani.
Nemaf afamba anom Farisi dembami esis Judai maloma anom amam dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, makwaha Jerusalem mafi'mai Jisas. Ea' mahali'ana ma'i,
“Dei' maina alipumi ine'imi mugumbisila' waf ape'ifi akupapa magaso'apafi? Ama amom owa' mosa'opa lagofa moga' gwa'aisia.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' pagawala mu'uli Godi ma pagaila waf ipe'ifi atef?
Ipa' pawala basef God na'if naga'i, ‘Ipa' pinifela mamasepa ipe'isi pihapifas petopalopas. Epen ami niga'i basef awafi ma ahaman ma'man ananisii, inimba anis daias sohan nega'.’
Owa' ipa' pambaso'am pa'i anif daif na'amba pa'i, Epen mamahina nindaiwa'ma negatopalopa mamasan ni'ipas ni'i, ‘Otamba mais ae'asi andaiwa'ma egase'epas. Ae' a' andandepasa egaso'anas God.’

Apa' ipa' Farisi paloma ipa' anipa pagawalipasa mu'uli Godi, ipa' pa'i aho'ma epen inimba negambaso'ma mamasan, ea' owa' netopalopasa.” Ipa' panda' waf afambai pesambala basef ifimba Godi na'i mogatopalopa mamasapa. Ea' panda' waf ipe'ifi atef lu'uf.
Fowa' profet Aisaia nondola'waifa ipa' endilisi, ipa' paga'i basefa malogof biagufi. Anen nanda'ef andeande' dondo'ma ipa', na'ias na'amba na'i,
‘Amam nematawa isimba sasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagola malogof asasigufi atogof ando', apa' opalef asasilifi fape laogona ae'. Ukup asasipi ina sahapifi, owa' atin.
Esis ina sawalipasa basef ae'afi. Esis sawalapa mu'uli epes sagape itapi atin sambaso'mas sa'i, “Mu'uli inimba basef Godi.” Ea' sanda' lotu sasa'ma agol ae'agili dowadowaf.’”
Ea' Jisas nofala esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' peme' basef ifimba andeande'ma pegegawef.
Hiahawes gwa'aisi mais ando'asi ipa' paga'asi sagawis nomoni, isimbai ina sanda'epa awepa, owa'. Apa' hiahaom magape ukup ipe'ipi nomoni mawisi ando', amambai atom manda'epa awepa.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' negawa amom Farisi mame' basef ifimba ine'ifi mandaiwa'mef nelelemb aoma ina'?”
Ea' nagwa basef waminif atina amom na'ipam na'i, “Ahame ae'anai nagape heveni nawa hiahaom anof aof. Ea' hiahaom hiami anen owa' nogowamia amamba anaf a' nigiam moloma nombalef masilimb.

Ipa' kwahowa amom amamba Farisi ata' mondape. Amom si'i amam naep pagaso'ami ma'i migihimba'ma ufia'wa anis daias. I'i esis naep pagaso'asi si'i sigihimba'masa ufia'w anis epes isimba naep pagaso'asii, atiasi esis hiasi dogwas sefe' sowa asondakolef atin sowasowala sope kwambiwag.”
Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ina' ni'i basef ifimba kofagefa waminif atina hiahaom awami ma afa' ata' ome'ef.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' wapani nomonas ata' akepa a'a?
A'i ipa' owa' ata' pegawaea! Hiahaom ando'ami mawis malogofa mogowala nelelembi, amamba ea' motanima mawisi ando' mafe' mowala dowah.
Apa' hiahaom magape ipa' nomoni, ukup nomonas awami maim mataga ando', amambai atom manda'epa awepa.

Hiahaom awami magape ukup nomoni magawisii amamba. Ukup awami, waf soha anis sogaga'i, sonda' so'a waola anis amam nematawa daindaiasi, ea' sonda' anef waf awafi si'i waf afamba so'a waulafi, wal, baso'am, findiwa.
Waf afambai atef fawisi ando' fanda' epes awasis. Apa' epes owa' sosa'opa lagof andeande'ma soga' gwa'aisia si'i amom Farisi maga'i, amambai ina manda'as awes, owa'atin.”
Ea' Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' gani wa'ol itap felefele'ma walemb ambalemba bialemb Tairi Saidon.
Owa' ano'w nemata'w Kenani'wi kwape na'amba. Ako'w kwafi'i kofalana na'amba kwa'i, “O, Dembinai, ina' akunamana Deviti, ina' niti ae' uwahipiwi. Ambal aunai nahambombaga nogame ae'akwi endilisi.”
Owa' Jisas ina nagwama'wa anif basef ako'w, owa'. Ea' amom alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Nemata'w akwamba kwanda'am falafala kwagi'mafai. Ina' sapa'akw kotanima kofo'o!”
Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'ipa'w na'i, “God nasapa' ae' afi'i ma epes sagape si'i sipsip higilagalapi isimba esis Israeli atis.”
Owa' ako'w kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kwotawa felefele'ma anen kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' natopalopa ae'.”
Ea' nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Apa' ina mofa' gwa'aisi awasi ape'isii mokwahis sofe'ma nombagw, owa'.”
Owa' ako'w kwagwamana basef anen kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i endilisi. Nombagw agogw gwafe' lafela tebol gwatatama gwa'aisi mamasagw agwagwisii sogowa itapi gwa'as.”

Ako'w kwa'ias na'amba, Jisas nagwama'wa basef na'i, “O, nemata'w, hapif ine'ini lu'wani. Dei' hiahawes ina okom maga'iasi atiasi sotagamena si'i ina' naga'ias.” Ea' nogota atamba atota nogama'w akwa'ukwi ambo'okw wapani.
Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' felefele'ma dumb Galili. Ea' nondowasa' halafuta tol nape.

Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i salagamana sofa'i aowas naninani nanda'asi safi'mai anen. Anis bo'wagah awamisi, anis naep pagaso'asi, bihitagof mondola'asi, anis malogof fagaso'asi, aowas anamba hianai. Esis sofa'as safi'i sambe'as sa'oh felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi ea' nanda'as bo'wes.

Ea' esis gogolalasisa sagati epes isimba naep pagaso'asi satologon, malogof fagaso'asi sa'i, bihitagof mondola'asi ea' usi'im, bo'wagah awasimisi ea' bo'om safe'. Ea' dei' esis hiasi sasa'ma agol God Israeli lu'wagol.

Ea' Jisas nofalai alipumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ae' ati esis amam nematawa isimba uwahipis. Esis sape salome nimaguf wanif gwa'aisi akas a' nolomahas a'owa'. I'i ae' esapa'as sogafe' dowaf uta baop asasima, sitilif atona atona sowa so'oh sofe' ufiawa.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi ma'ipana na'amba ma'i, “Na'a wafigima epes akagoma. Atiasi afa' ofa'ai bret atamba ani ma ogaso' amam nematawa isimba hiasi?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Dei' ipa' bret ma'ufita ta'oh?” Owa' amom ma'i, “Afa' bret 7-pelaita taloma agof sa'ugufi kwasala'uguf.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa ma sogape itap,
nasa'ma bret 7-pelaita taloma agof agwafomba nanifela God nawalis naso' alipumi ananimi ma mogaso'asas esis amam nematawa hiasi. Amom maso'as hi'alas dondo'.
Ea' sa'as dondo' a' alihis andeande'. Ea' alipumi ananimi matatama du'wa'wanisi sagasaga'ihi makolasis malo'was folalef lu'walifi 7-pelailif asi'ilif kwaef.
Esis amam nematawa saga' gwa'aisi isimbai, siamba amam atom mataga 4,000-pelaim. Apa' esis ina siamba awasi nematawa wapani, owa'.
Ama Jisas nasapa'as sagafi'i, anen nalota bot nafe' gani wa'ol dumb lu'wambi anep itap lu'upa Magadan.
Ea' anom dembami Farisi maloma anom dembami daiam Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas ma'i mogwambana ma anen ata' nonda' anom banagami si'i God nagape ilifi nanda'ami ma ata' motolom.
Owa' anen nagwamam anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Ipa' pagati otaga wambomota felefele'ma owamb a' pa'i, ‘Otaga nasa'of akwahina. Na'amba atiasi nogota bo'otama owaf figalowatai.’

Apa' kuhumbita pa'i, ‘Otaga ilagw ea' alialim. Manda'am na'amba ma atiasi fufini asaf mogataga.’ Aho', ipa' pati ametal hiani ilifani itapani andeande' apa' dei' ipa' owa' pegawa ametal nogota ata'ili andeande'a.

Ipa' mini'ap amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i panda' waf awafii pegewa' alafugaha Godi. Dei' pefalagama pa'i pigati anin ametal banagani. Apa' ae' owa'atina enda'an pigatilina, owa'atin. Ametal inimba banagani fowa' God nigihimba'manan profet Jonai atin atiasi ihimba'mepan ipa'.” Jisas na'ipam ea', nakwahom nafe'.
Ea' Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mofa' bot mowala mambo dumb ambamba mataga fisana, apa' amom ukup paso'ama mofa' anota bret togalomam.
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pindimafuma andeande', solawaipama yis amamba amom Farisii maloma amom Sadyusii!”
Ea' amom mame' anen na'ias na'amba, amom manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' okom maso'afa bret ta'ihi, dei' na'ipafa.”
Owa' Jisas nogawa ukup amamipi na'ipam na'i, “Hapif ipe'ini ina banagen. Dei' maina ipa' panda'ipama paga'i, ‘Afa' bret akafa?’
Ipa' ukup pandanda' ma bret atamba wanifita biafita esis hiasi 5,000-pelais sa'ata ma du'wanita taga'ihi, a'a owa'? Pakolasata palo'wata folalef ma'ulif? Ipa' ata' owa' pegawefa?
Ea' ipa' owa' ukup pepoma bret atamba 7-pelaita afamba hiasi 4,000-pelais saga'atama du'wanita taga'ihi pakolasata palo'wata folalef ma'ulif?
Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegegawaea? Ae' ina a'ipipa bret endilisitai, owa'. Ae' a'i ipa' solawaipama yis amamba amom Farisii maloma amom Sadyusii.”
Ea' dei' amom mogawa, anen ina na'ipama yis isimba endilisisi, owa'. Anen na'i amom solawaima basef amom Farisi maloma amom Sadyusi magawalipasafi.
Jisas nafe' naloma alipumi ananimi mataga felefele'ma anambel wambel Sisaria Filipai. Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Amam nematawa esis sogawa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi sogawa agol maigil sanda'meagol?
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Anis sa'i ina' Jon aman nagapisi'as embeli. Anis sa'i ina' Elaija. Apa' anis sa'i ina' Jeremaia a'a anina profet.”
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ami?”
Saimon Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' Krais, aman anamba God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii. Ina' Nogamana God ambal namili lagapaunai.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef Pita na'i, “Saimon, ina' nogama Jonai, ina' sonahena. Ina anona aman itapanai nihimba'mena basef ifimba na'if, owa'atin. Ahame atona nagape heveni nihimba'menaef na'if.

Dei' a'ipina endilisi, agol ine'igili Pita, agol agalemba ga'i otam. Atiasi ae' enda' ma'ol banaganima sios ae'asi sotoma otam amamba ilif. Ama banagami amamba ga'i ina banagema migikila' esis, owa'atin.

Ae' atiasi ese'ena ki utaini ina' ma anamba God nagala'ambemagoma heven. Hiahaom ina' negewa'am na'a itapi, amamba anaf God nowa'am gani heven wapani. Apa' hiahaom mamahoma ina' negatagwahom na'a itapi, amamba anaf God notagwahom gani heven wapani.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam basef banagafi na'i amom owa'i mi'ipa anis epesa anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'iia, owa'i. Mombaho'ana.

Nogota atamba Jisas nali' nandasafel nihimba'ma alipumi ananimi ma atiasi nofe' nogawis Jerusalem ama agufumi Judai mogaso'ana akafimi. Amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi moloma amom pris dembami atiasi moso'ana akafimi lu'wami anona mohana nogaga'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilifa anef fegafe'ma wanifi a' notanima nosafel wapani.
Ea' Pita nofa' Jisas nendelefata nasa gemba ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, owa'atin, ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma hiahaom amamba mogatagama ina', owa'i, hapaimi!”

Ea' Jisas nandambema na'ipa Pita na'i, “Ina' si'i Satan. Dei' main, ina' owa' okom mopoma okom Godia, owa'. Okom mandapoma nomonas epes sagape itapi atis. Owa'i nehefa ufia'w ae'akwia. Delefata nefe' alafuga ae'agai.”

Dei' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' efa' akafimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. I'i anin epen ni'i nila ae', anin nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae' ma nigaili. Ea' nitalogofa okom ananimi ma maol main anin na'i nenda'ani.

Epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol, ni'i nihapilal tatala'il, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' ami okom mopoma ae' ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf ambal ananili God a' nofa'al lotanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.

I'i epen ami nenda' maol naninani ma negefa' gwa'aimi uga hiahaom hiami itapami atom higiligalami, anin wapani awen higililan nelomam. Dei' bola hiahaom amamba anaf motopalopan mi'imama? Owa'atin endilisi. Inimba atiasi nefa' hiahaom maima negatal ambal ananili ma netanima negewambilali wapani? Owa'atin.

Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, anaf ae' ifi'i elomai hiahaom fasimi banagami mogogala'i ahamai moloma amom ensel ae'ami. Ama nemaf afamba, ae' egwamasa hiahaom hiami esis amam nematawa hiasi mondahama waf esis sanda'afi hi'ilaf.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Anis epes dei' sagalutu na'ai, esis ina atiasi soga' ulal, ata' owa'atin, asiti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi egape si'i dembiwai king igafi'i.”
A'i owa' main, nimaguf wanif fafe'ma hi'alef, Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jemsi owamana Jon nao'wam mondowasa' anota halafuta lautai. Nao'wa amom atom tol mape.
Owa' mati alop ananipi apandati na'a pogala' a'owa'. Ea' nogohnaep ananisi sogala' si'i owaf, ea' luwaguf ananimi mataga afitim si'i lambeh magahihil.
Ea' amom wanom mape owa' mati amam biam fowa'imi Mosesi Elaija mataga malutu ma'i maloma Jisas.
Amom mati isimba, Pita na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'a'e a' fafas. Ina' niga'i awima, dao' ae' ela' aolah wanoh na'a'e, anop ine'ipi anop Mosesi anop Elaijai.”

Anen ata' na'i nagail atini, anom ilagw afitimi mogogala' a'owa'i maluwi maofana amom. Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai ilagw amamba ga'i basef ga'i, “Anen nogame ae'ani, ae' okom mohafel maimailana a'owa' ea' ae' okom mohafel maila waf ananifi. Ipa' pendame' basef ananifi.”
Amom alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba, ombal maham a'owa' ea' mowafa motawa mando' amagah itap.
Owa' Jisas nafi'i felefele'ma amom nasa lagola amom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' safel. Ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i.”
Ea' amom masa'ma naep matologon owa', ina ata' mati anin epen, owa'atin. Mati Jisas atona nalutu nalomam.

Ea' amom ata' makwaha halafuta milianai atin, owa' Jisas na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' ina pewalapa hiahaom amamba dei' pagatulumi, pi'ipa anin epenam, owa'i. A pefe' dondo'ma nemaf afamba ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ekwaha wandofa itanima egasafel wapani, dao' pi'ipas.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' maina amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maga'i Elaija fowa'inai ata' nili' nogafi'i?”
Ea' anen nagwa basef na'i, “Aho' endilisi, Elaija anen nifi'i ma nondondomba hiahaom hiami hi'igalam wapani.

Apa' owa' dei' ae' a'ipipa, anona Elaija a' nafi'i ea', apa' esis amam nematawa ina sogawa anen, owa' sa'i anona daiana. Esis sandaila ukup asasimi atom sandanda' waf aunai naninani ma anen. Ea' atiasi sonda'am na'amba atina sogase'e akafimi ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.”
Jisas na'ias na'amba, ea' alipumi ananimi mogawa anen na'ipama Elaija anen waminif atina Jon nagapisi'as embeli.
Amom mafe' mataga ma esis amam nematawa hiasi, anona aman nafi'i natagama Jisas nindiwa nembawa notaoma anen

na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' ni'i uwahipigai ma awani aman ae'ani. Anin ambal aunai nanda'an name' akafimi lu'wami a'owa' ma alop ananipi. Aho', lifilafi ambal amamba nanda'an newala nasef nif fagandifi nafe' newala nala embel dondol.
Ae' ao'wan wafe'ma alipumi ine'imi owa', amom ina la'ifima monda'an bo'wen, owa'.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'amba na'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i owa' pigahapifaia. Ea' nelelemb ipe'imi owa' bepe andeande'a. Nimaguf ata' epe elomepa? Nimaguf ma'uf wapani ma egefa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipa' okwan nifi'mai ae'.”
Jisas nagagaola ambal anamba aunai ea' nakwaha aman anamba sa'unai, ea' dei' atef aowas ananini hi'alan.
Ama main, alipumi Jisasi atom malomana mape, mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' maina afa' owa' banagefama ogatofa ambal anamba aunaia?”

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Hapif ipe'ini ata' sa'win, Isimba atis dei' ipa' ina la'ifipa, ata' owa'. Aho', ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i hapif ipe'ini nendahama si'i nalelef sa'wisa'wisi mastetilif lawag, dao' atiasi ipa' pi'ipa halafuta tati pi'i, ina' dagia nefe' newala gani wa'ol, atiasi anen nondagia nogafi'i. Ipa' pihapifi banagambel na'amba, dei' banagepa ma penda' maol hiani hi'igalan.
[Apa' owa' ano'w ufia'w daia'wa pegatofa ambagof amambai awamia, owa'atin. Pelelama gwa'aisi ma pendabeten, dao' ea' isimba atis.]”

Nemaf afamba Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafi'i atef anamba itap lu'upa Galili, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi felefele' anona aman noso'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amom boumi ae'ami.
Ea' amam amamba mohe ega'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilifa ea', i'i owa' anef fegafe'ma wanifi, itanima esafel wapani.” Ea' nelelemb amom alipumi ananimi nimanilimb a'owa'.

Ama main Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mataga anambel wambel Kaperneam. Ea' amom mogofa' takisa ipat lu'unai Godi mafi'mai Pita mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa ipe'inai anen natala takisa ipat anamba?”

Ea' Pita na'i “Aho'.” Ama Pita notanima nafe' nawis anota ipat nomon, ea' Jisas nali' nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' okom mandanda' ma'imama? Amom king dembami itapami mofa' otamba ma takisa uga maima ami? Amom mofa'asa mini'ap esis amam nematawa amamisi atis a'a anis daiasa anin kantri?”
Ea' Pita na'i, “Ama anis amam nematawa daias.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Na'amba esis mini'ap kingi ina satala takis, owa'. Sape dowaf.

Afa' a' solawaifa. Na'amba amom muti afa' owa' onda' takisa amom ukup numbutipa afa' mi'i afa' aofai. Ea' dei' ina' fo'o la huk dumb ambamba ma nigagiai aol alamba lagali'i ina' newala malogol aoli niti anin moni atitin, moni inimba dondo' ma takisa afa' biafa. Ea' ina' nefa' moni inimba nese'aman amom, ama negatala takis isimba afa' biafai.”
Nemaf afamba amom alipumi Jisasi mafi'mai anen mahali'ana ma'i, “Ami nikila' anis daias nataga damben a'owa' ma anamba ina' nagala'ambemagoma?”
Ea' Jisas nofala anin awani nafi'mai anen nahaponan nalutu la'afena amom.

Ea' na'ipam, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Epen ami ni'i aho'ma God nope dembinai ma anin, ama naso'ana nembel God i'i awasi isimba saga'i aho'mana, isimba sanda'as na'ambai atiasi sogawis anamba God nagala'ambemagomai. I'i owa', owa'atin.
Epen ami negape sa'umbilini owa' negasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagilia netaga si'i awani inimbai dao' epen inimbai ea' nikila' anis daiasa negape dambeni anamba ae' agala'ambemagoma.
Epen ami neso' opafa negatopalopa anin awani si'i ini'i ma okom ananimi mopoma ae', anin nase'e opaf ae' wapani natopalope.

“I'i anin epen nenda' anin epen sa'wini nagahapifa ae'i, nefe' nenda' waf awafi, epen inimba negape na'amba. I'i anis epes sofa' epen inimba sondola otam lu'unai nila bini'w anani'wi sofa'an sofe' solan negewala naoh mami lu'wamiai, anin ata' nepe andeande' kwasakwasala. Apa' owa' owa'atin. I'i epen inimba nenda' anin sa'wini negakwaha nagahapifa ae'a, epen inimba atiasi nepe awen a'owa' nikila' negewala naoh afini.

Ipa' epes itapipai, ae' ati ipa' uwahipipa ma hiahaom amamba mogogwambipai monda'epa penda' waf awafii. Endilisi hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagai, apa' epes ami sonda'am mogatagai, ae' ati esis uwahipis endilisi. Dei' main, anaf seme' akafimi lu'wami.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam anif basef wapani waminif atin na'i, “I'i lagof a'a bo'wagah ipe'isi sonda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, petopa'as pikwahis sofo'o. Andeande' kwasakwasala ma lagufi bo'wagah atona atin sope, ma pefa' ambal namili pegape andeande'. Apa' sofa'epa sokwahepa nif lu'wami fandom atapim magapaini, anamba ina atiasi pepe andeande', owa'. Pepe awepa.

Apa' i'i naep ipe'ipi penda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, dao' pigip pikwahip. Atom atin mope ma pefa' ambal namili pegape andeande'. Na'amba naep bip pepomepa sakwahepa pefe' pewala nif lu'wafi fandif atapif fagapani wambel awambili hel. Na'amba ina atiasi pepe andeande', owa'. Pepe awepa.

“Ipa' solawaipa! Na'amba pi'i anin epen atitin sa'wini pi'i inimba anin falafini, owa'i. Dei' main, amom ensel magape heveni mumafi epes isimbai sa'wisi andeande'. Ensel amamba dondol magape felefele'ma ahame God nagape heveni.
[Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' afi'i ma elaoma epes higilagalasi iwambilas sokwaha waf awafi sogotanimai.]

“Ipa' ukup pa'imama? I'i anona aman nugumafi anop sipsip 100-pelaip ama anop atotop higililap, aman anamba ata' nokwaha sipsip apamba 99-pelaip pulutu anagon dohogw, anen ata' nefe' nola' nolaoma anona higiligalanai.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i nogofa'i sipsip apamba ea', atiasi sonohana a'owa' ma sipsip apamba. Dagala ananimi a' mikila' nandagala ma sipsip amamba magalutuwi.
Ea' na'amba atin ahamepa ipe'inai nagape gani heveni nandaiwa' ma anin epen sa'wini higiligalan, owa'.

“I'i sahin owan sonda' waf awafima ina', ina' nefe' nitilin ipa' atipa pepe ea' nihimba'man waf awafi ananifi. I'i anin negame' basef ine'ifima dao', andeande', si'i ina' niwambilai anin a' nigitanimai wapani.
Apa' i'i anin owa' neme' basef ine'ifia, ina' nihali' anin epen o epes bias wapani ea' pefe' atin. Ama ipa' bipa o wanipa pefe'ma pegame' basef epen inimbai ma pegawalegef.

Ama i'i anin nindaiwa'ma negame' basef ipe'ifi ma dao' ina' a' ni'ipa esis Kristen hiasi sondakolas atogini a' ni'ipasan. Ama anin ni'i nindaiwa'ma negame' basefa esis Kristen hiasi wapani dao', ina' nekwahin nepe si'i isimba owa' sogogawa Godia, si'i amam amamba awami mogofa' takisi.
“Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Hiahaom ipa' pegewa'am na'a itapi, amamba anaf God nowa'am gani heven wapani. Apa' hiahaom mamahoma ipa' pegatagwahom na'a itapi, amamba anaf God notagwahom gani heven wapani.

“Ea' ae' a'ias endilisi ma ipa' wapani. I'i epes bias sagape itapi ukup pefe' atogona anis maefaha esis bias si'i sondabeten sohali' Goda nogaso'asa hiahawes isimba, ea' andeande' ahame ae'anai nagapani heveni atiasi a' noso'asam esis.
Aho', i'i epes bias a'a wanis ukup pepoma agol ae'agili ma sunduwa'anima anamba atogon, ae' ape alomas.”
Nemaf afamba Pita nafi'i nahali' Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, nimaguf ma'uma'uf sahin owan ae'asi sonda'me waf awafi ae', ma okom mose'e waf awafi asasifi egakwahef? Nimaguf 7-pelaif a'a ma'uf?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'amba na'i, “Ae' ina a'ipina nimaguf ifimba atif 7-pelaif, owa'atin. Ae' a'i ina' nekwaha waf awafi asasifi nimaguf hiafi 490-pelaif.
“Dei' main, esis sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona dembinai king na'i nogawa wialef fagapoma amom manda' maol ananinii ma'ulif.
Ea' anen nasefelas nanda'as nogawas andeande'ma nonda' amom mogogwamana wiaf, ea' sofa' anona aman safe'ma anen. Ea' aman anamba nogowaola wiafa moni inimba 10 milian kinai.

Apa' anen moni akana ma nogagwan dondo'ma nigambi wiaf afamba anen nanda'afi. Ea' dembinai king na'ipas na'i esis a' sotala aman anamba noloma waulu'mana awasi ananisi ma sope agof akas sonda' maol sogape lafela anis epes atapis ea' sotala hiahaom asasimi wapani, sofa' moni ma sogagwa wiaf afamba.
“Ea' aman anamba nowafa notawa itapa naep king anamba dembinai na'ipana na'amba na'i, ‘Ina' niti ae' uwahipiwi nepe nehafa ae'. Anaf ae' egwamena wiaf afamba hi'ilafa ina'.’
Ea' dembinai anamba nati owahipina a' okom maso'ana wiaf ananifi nakwahona nafe' wahifina.

“Owa' aman anamba nawisi ando' nati anona amom atom manda' maol atini, anen nowaola wiafa moni kwaia'win si'i 10 kina. Ea' nombalo' aman anamba nowa'ana sisihina bini'w anani'wi na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' negwame wiaf ine'ifi hi'indalaf!’
“Ea' aman anamba nowafa notawa itap ea' nahali'ana dindinip na'i, ‘Ina' niti ae' owahipiwi ea' nepe nehafa ae'! Bola egwamena wiaf ine'ifi hi'ilaf.’
“Owa' anen nandaiwa'. Ea' nofa'ana nafe' nanda'ana nanda' kalabus, ama nope nogagwa wiaf afamba.
Amom mandao'oma manda' maoli mati isimba, a' nelelemb nimanilimb endilisi mafe' mawalapa hiahawes isimba ma dembinai amamunai.
“Ea' dembinai nofalai aman anamba nanda' maoli ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' aman nanda' maol awasinii. Doko' ina' naloma ae' nalef, ea' akwaha wiaf afamba lu'wafi ine'ifi hi'alaf.
Ae' ati ina' owahipina, apa' dei' maina ina' owa' niga'i owahipigama alipini ine'ini panda' maol atinia?’
Ea' dembinai okom numbutina naso'amana amam amamba mugumafi kalabusi ma mogaso'ana akafimi lu'wami nope nope nogwa wiaf ananifi hi'igalaf.

“I'i ukup ipa' hipaii owa' pekwaha waf awafi endilisima sahin owan ipe'isi ukup pese'epafa, bola na'amba atina Ahame ae'anai nagape heveni wapani nonda'mepas ipa' na'amba atin si'i dembinai nanda'ama aman anamba.”
Jisas na'i basef ifimba hiafi ma hi'alef, a' nakwaha itap apamba Galili nafe' anep itap Judia gani wa'ol walemb Jordan fisanamb.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sagi'mana safe' ea' nanda' epes hiasi aowas nanda'asi ambo'wes.
Ea' anom dembami Farisi mafi'mai anen mahali'ana anif basef magwambana ma'i, “Mu'uli ape'ini andeande'ma anona aman nondaiwa'ma waulu'mana anani'wi nogali'amona'wa okom ananimi atom a'a owa'?”

Ea' anen nagwamama basef amom na'i, “Ipa' patalifa basef ifimba Godi pagawef ea'. Basef ifimba faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' hiahaom hiami nanda' epes sataga suwafisi numa'isi.’
God na'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Na'amba esis bias ina ata' sope si'i sagape daindai, owa'. Aman a' nokwaha mamasana ananisi ea' nefe' noloma waulu'mana anani'wi, asotaga sope alop atotop.’
Ea' esis bias sondaso'ama asotaga si'i alop atifip. Esis ina ata' si'i sagape biasa sagape daindai, owa'. Ea' hiahawes mais God nagapete'as sisihisi, isimba anin epen ina nehape'as, owa'i.”
Ea' Farisi amamba ma'ipana wapani ma'i, “Moses na'ipapa mu'uli inimba naga'i, aman nonda' anif basef fil okwatip noso'akwef ea' nili'amona'w kofe'.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom na'i, “Ipa' panda' du'waniga. Dei' Moses na'i aho'ma ufia'w akwamba dei' paila'w pali'amona wauhiamepa patopa' waf daso'amaifi. Apa' fowa' gani dambadamba ina anif basef ifimbai ma pagatopa' waf daso'amaifi, owa'atin.

Ae' a'ipipa a'i, I'i ano'w nemata'w anona amani owa' konda' waf awafi so'a waulafia, ma anen nogakwaho'w dowafa nogaso' ano'w daia'w wapani, anen nanda' waf awafi so'a waola nemata'w akwamba nali' nagaso'akwi.”
Ea' amom alipumi ananimi a' ma'ipana ma'i, “I'i waf afambai endilisifi ma owa' nope atapina noloma ako'wa, dao' daso'ama hapaini. Ea' andeande'ma nemata'w akana nogape dowaf.”
Ea' anen na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ina atiasi amam nematawa hiasi la'ifis sofa' basef ifimba ma sogahapilif, owa'atin. Epes atis isimba God nagaso'as pepel ea'i, esis atis sofa'ef.

“Dei' main, amam na'ambaimi mape amom owa' la'ifima mogaso' nematawaia. Anom mamamam amamuwai olam ea' atapim mape na'amba. Ea' anom, amam matopa'mam alop amamipi. Ea' amom ina la'ifima mogaso' nematawa, owa'. Ea' anom, ukup papoma mugawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiam. Ea' mandaiwa'ma mogaso' nematawa. Aman ami la'ifina nigaila basef ifimbai, anen a' nindailif andeande'.”

Nemaf afamba esis sao'wamanai anis awasi sa'wisi sofa'as safi'mai anen, sa'i anen nowamona lagof ananigufi ma awasi isimba nondabetenas. Owa' alipumi ananimi mandaiwa'ma awasi isimba ea' masopama esis sofa'as sagafi'mai anen.

Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipa' kwahowa awasi isimba sifi'mai ae'. Ipa' pindaiwa'mas owa'. Esis amam nematawa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiasi, esis same' basef ananifi sagailif si'i awasi isimba.”
Ea' nawamona lagof ananigufi balagah asasigahi, nakwaha esis a' nafe'.
Ea' anona aman nagwama Jisas na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ae' atiasi enda' waf maif bu'wafi ma egefa' ambal namili egape andeande' lifilafi?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ina' nagahali' ae' ma hiahawes isimbai? Anona aman atotona nagape ilifi anen bu'unai. I'i ina' ni'i nefa' ambal namiliai, dao' andeande'ma nigaila basefa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosasani hiani.”

Ea' aman anamba nahali' Jisas na'i, “Mu'uli mamahina?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' owa'i nenda' waf awafi so'a waulafia, neha anis epes soga' nenda' wal, owa'i, ina' owa'i nembaso'ma anis epes daiasa,
ina' neme' basef mamasinai nihapilif nilif ea' nindimafias andeande'. Ina' a' okom mimila anis sagape felefele'ma ine'i, si'i ina' okom magamagaila ina' atinama nigimafi ina'.”
Ea' aman anamba ata' sa'unai awaminai na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Mu'uli inimba hiani ae' ahapilan ailan afi'i ea'. Dei' waf mamahefa ata' fape?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “I'i ina' ni'i negataga bo'wena dondo'ma negefa' ambal namili ma, dao' ina' fo'o nese'asa hiahaom ine'imi ma anis daias sotalinama nefa' moni inimba nenda'an neso' isimba kwahusi. Nenda'as na'amba ma anaf negefa' hiahawes fasisi gani heven. Ea' ina' nifi'i nihapifi nila ae'.”
Ea' aman anamba sa'unai name' basef ifimba owa', nomonas ananisi a' iwanis ea' nandambema megahaihailana nafe'. Dei' main, anen hiahaom hiamunai.

Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'amba na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, epes isimba ugai moni hianaisi, sanda'am danda' ahifim a'owa' ma sofe' sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Atona atin sefe' suwis.

Ae' a'i i'ipipa wapani, Anin mafin lu'unai kamel nogawis bolotaf nil sogosambala luwagufeli, anamba ila ma nogawis. Apa' amam nematawa hiahaom hiamisi sofe' sogawis nomona maol Godi, sonda'am danda' ahifim a'owa' ma sofe' sogawis. Maol inimba ahifim a'owa' nikila' maol kamel nogawis bolotaf nili.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba owa', amom agogolalasom kwapete' endilisi. Ea' ma'i, “I'i na'ambaiai, anaf God nuwambilai epes mamahisa sotanimai sope andeande' lifilafi? Owa'atin.”
Ea' Jisas nosaniga natiti amom na'ipam na'i, “Hiahaom epes owa' la'ifisa sonda'amia, amamba God atona banagonai ma nonda'am. Anen banagonai ma nonda' hiahaom hiami hi'igalam.”
Anen na'ias na'amba, ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' ea' wakwaha hiahaom afa'imi hiami, ea' dei' wafi'i wahapifa basef ine'ifi wailina. Afa' atiasi ofa' hiahawes mais?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ipa'. Owagama nemaf afamba fegataga ma hiahaom hiami mogataga dambaim wapani, afamba ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, efa' banagami mogogala'i etoma sia king ae'ani. Nemaf afamba ipa' amam ae'ipai ea' pagail ae'i atiasi ipa' 12-pelaipa petoma siaifah fasimi amom dembami kingi 12-pelaim, ea' pewawaloga misi'ah 12-pelaih amam nematawa ape'isi Israel.

Ea' epes ami ukup pegapoma ae' ma sokwaha ifagw gwoloma sahin owan ahasas mamasas a batawisas soloma aofah mais asasisii, anaf asofa' hiahaom timbi tambel hiami a'owa', mikila' mogwa fowa'imi atapim. Ea' anaf asofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafi.
Apa' epes hiasi dei' sataga sagali'i agof fagatomasi, anaf agof akas asotaga sigi'. Apa' epes isimba sataga sagagi'i anaf a' agof fotomas sotaga sili'.”

“Aho', epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona aman nagagoma itap lu'wapi ananipi. A'i owa' ma lala kuhimbita atota owa'a, anen nafe'ma nugufa'i anom amam monda' maol aof afamba ananifi nagawa sa'utip mandelef wainilifip.
Anen nafe' na'i naloma anom manda' maoli ea' nalomam nembel atembela otamba atiasi mogofa'ambai, mofa' wan kina atona atina nemaf afamba. Ea' nasapa'am mafe' manda' maol aof ananifi.
“Ea' anen nape ma awin nandagiai nape si'i 9 klok, anen a nafe' owa' nati anom amam ata' tol malutu dowaf anamba mondowa'anima magapoma.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' wapani fo'o penda' maol aof ae'afi ma egase'epa otamba bendendaepa bendahama waf bu'wafi.’
Ea' amom a' mafe'. “Ama a'i owa' awin nandasapa' 12 klok anen nafe' wapani ea' nanda'as na'amba atin si'i doko' nanda'as. “Ama awin nendemba'a 3 klok, nafe' nanda'as wapani si'i doko' nanda'as.
“Ea' ma wambomota 5 klok main, a' nafe' nati anom ata' malutu dowaf. Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Dei' maina ipa' ata' tol pagalutu dowaf na'a'e nemaf afa'e laof?’
“Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, ‘Ina anona aman naso'afa maol afa', owa'atin.’ Anen na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' wapani fo'o penda' maol aof afamba.’

“Ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb aman anamba nugumafi aofi nafi'i na'ipa aman nugumafi amom manda' maoli na'i, ‘Ina' fala manda' maoli amamba hiami ea' nese'ama moni amom. Ina' nili' neso' amom amamba magi' magatagai, nese'aman nefe' nefe' netagama amam amamba mali' mataga manda' maoli.’
“Ea' amam amamba mataga manda' maol wambomota 5 kloki, mataga mofa' wan kina atona atin.
Ea' amam amamba mali' mosafel kuhimbita manda' maoli, mafi'i ukup pandanda' pa'i atiasi amom a' mofa' moni lu'wani mikila' anom. Owa', owa'atin. Amom wapani mofa' wan kina na'amba atin.
Ea' manda' megahaha aman anamba nugumafi aof afambai.

“Ea' ma'ias na'amba ma'i, ‘Amom amamba magi' magatagai, amom mafi'i manda' maol nogota bandata si'i awa atitin, owa' ina' a' naso'ama moni inimba na'amba atin si'i afa' ogofa'ani. Apa' afa' wali' wanda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma nemaf laufi, ea' owaf nahanahafa.’

“Amom ma'ias na'amba ma ea', anen nagwamana basef anona aman amamunai na'ipana na'amba na'i, ‘Alipunai, ae' ina anda'ena awena, owa'. Afa' biafa wali' wa'ias ea' nomonas atifisa pegefa' wan kina atin.
Ina' fa'a moni ine'ini ea' fo'o. Otamba ae' agase'enamba ine'i, ea' ikwaf afamba atef ae' a' ese'anamba aman anamba nagi' nafi'i nanda' maoli, pefa'amba dondo' atin.

Ae' anda' maol si'i okom ae'ami maga'iana moni ae'ani. Na'amba andeande', waf usi'ifi. Ae' anda' waf bu'wafi ma igimafi amom magi' magafi'i wambomotai. Na'amba dei' ina' kowalena ma otamba amamimbai?’
“Anaf na'amba atin, epes isimba dei' sataga sagagi'i agof akasi a' agof fotomas sotaga sili', apa' epes isimba sataga sagali'i agof fagatomasi, anaf agof akas asotaga sigi'.”
Ea' Jisas na'i nondowasa' Jerusalem. Anen nao'wa alipumi ananimi atom mafe'. Amom ata' mafe' atin ufia'w owa', na'ipam na'i,

“Peme'. Dei' afa' ea' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi anona aman nonda'e efe'ma amom pris dembami moloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, ea' monda' kotimi a' mi'i basef mondame'maefa mohe egaga'.

Ea' monda'e efe'ma esis sogolalama Godi ma sonda' salamala ae' sonda'e findiwae ma basef awafi sehe egaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilif anef fegafe'ma wanifi, God a' nosa'me itanima esafel wapani.”
Nemaf afamba Sebedi waulu'mana ma'ma Jamesi Joni kwao'wai nogaopa'w akwa'umi biam safi'mai Jisas. Ea' kwindiwa nembawa kotawa itapa kuga'ipana anif basef.

Ea' Jisas nahali'akw na'i, “Ina' na'i ae' enda'mena main?” Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ina' ni'i anaf owagama negataga dembinai, anamba ina' nagala'ambemagoma, nemaf afamba ae' a'i nogaope amamba ae'ami biam mope dembem felefele'ma ina', anona nil wa'ol egawama, a' anona nil wa'ol da'asaigilima.”

Ako'w kwa'ias na'ambama, ea' Jisas nagwama'w na'ipa amom na'i, “Ipa' ina pagawa andeande'ma hiahawes ipa' pagahali'imasi, owa'! Ipa' banagepama paga' embela kap apamba dei' ae' ega' embelapi, a'a owa'?” Ea' magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' ila la'ififai.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi, ipa' bipa atiasi pea' embela kap apamba ae' ega' embelapi. Apa' pegape lagol kwahisigili o gagaili ae'agufi, isimba ina maol ae'ani, owa'. Ahame atona ni'i esis isimba nandandepas ea'i dao' esis atis sope lagof kwahisigili gagaili ae'agufi.”
Ea' alipumi du'wanim ilifunamaim mame' amom biam ma'ias na'amba, manda' megahaha amom sahomana owamana.

Owa' Jisas nofalai amom mafi'mai anen, a' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pagawa, anom king magape dembami ma isimba sogolalama Godi, amom mape ilifa esis a'owa' manda'mas dondog manda'as kwapete'as. Ea' amom dembami mape banagem a'owa' ma manda' esis amam nematawa sagaila malogof amamugufi.
Apa' waf afambai ina a' fepoma ipa', hapaifi. Aman ami a' nogape dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nili' nope si'i nanda' maola ipa' hipaii.
Ea' aman ami ni'i nogataga dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nili' nope si'i agol akani nanda' maol nagape lafela hiasii.”

Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' wapani na'amba atin. Ina afi'i ma esis sonda'me maola sogatopalope, owa'. Ae' afi'i enda' maol egatapalopa ipa' hipai ma waf awafi fagawasi'ipai. Afi'i ma sehe ega' etala ipa' peloma epes hiasi igatagwahipama waf awafi ipe'ifi.”
Ea' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi makwaha wambel ambalemba Jeriko ma'i mefe' atin owa', amam nematawa hiasi sagi'ma anen safe'.
Ea' amam biam naep pagaso'ami tol mape felefele'ma ufia'w. Ea' mame' basef sa'i Jisas nafi'i ea' mofalana mehip ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa!”
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sinifalom sa'i mosopama malogof. Owa' owa'atin, amom mofalana mehip a'owa' ma'i, “Dembinai ina' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa!”
Ea' Jisas nalutu nofala amom biam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pa'i ae' enda'mepa main?”
Ea' amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i ina' newalamafa naep afa'ipi ma ugati andeande'.”
Ea' Jisas nati amom owahipim nasa lagof ananigufi naep amamipi, ea' dei' atef amom biam mati andeande' wapani, a' magi'ma Jisas mafe'.
Ea' amom mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, mataga Betfagai felefele'ma halafuta Oliv. Ea' Jisas nasapa' alipumi ananimi biam na'ipam na'i.

“Ipa' bipa pefe' piwis wambel bambalimba bagape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ai. Ea' apiti anona mafin donki sa'unai esis sandolona nail naloma nogani ananinai malutu. Ipa' petagwahom ea' pefa'am pifi'mai ae'.
I'i anin epen ni'i nigahali'ipa ma anif basefa, pi'ipan pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maolanam, ama bola nosapa'am mutanimipai kwafalis.’”
Hiahawes isimba amom mogofa'ai donki a' sataga dindi'i dondo' sagi'ma si'i basef ifimba fowa' anona aman profet Aisaia naga'iefi, anen naga'i na'amba na'i,
“Ipa' pi'ipa epes sagape Saioni pi'i, ‘Ipa' piti, dei' king dembinai ipe'inai anaf nifi'mai ipa'. Anen nanda' waf sa'umbilifii, ea' notoma donki nogani nofa'ana nifi'i.’”
Ea' alipumi amamba biam ananimi mafe' ea' manda'as si'i doko' naga'ipamas.
Amom mofa' donki anamba nalomai nogani mafi'mai Jisas, mawamona sagegw amamugwi gwatoma ilifa donki amamba biam. Ea' Jisas nandagia natoma donki amamba.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sandombamana sagegw ufia'w, sasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Anis satopa'i apulita lawah hogotawa felefele'i saso'wiam ufia'w sofalo'ma'w.

Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sali' sagi' safela ao'aligil na'amba sa'i, “Hosana. Apa' mandanifal endilisi ma ina'. Ina' akunamana Deviti! Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma ina' nagafi'i agol ananigilii nese'ena banagami ma nenda' maol ananini. Apa' mandanifal endilisi ma dembinai God nagape ilifi.”
Nemaf afamba Jisas nafe' nawis wambel ambalemba Jerusalem, ea' amam nematawa hiasi sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' ea' soga sa'i mehip sandahali'ma sa'i, “Aman anamba anen mamahonama?”
Ea' esis amam nematawa safe' sagalomanai sandagalamana sa'i, “Aman anamba anen Dembinai profet Jisas, aman nagape anambel wambel Nasareti bagape anep itap Galili.”

Ea' Jisas nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nali'amona esis hiasi sanda' bisnisi saloma isimba sagatalom ipat anamba nomoni. Anom mati otamba anisi ea' mindisila'mamba. Ea' Jisas nambema tebolifah amamisi nakolo'was. Anis sanda' bisnisa sogatala amiguf ma'unamb. Ea' nambema siaifah asasisi nakolo'was wapani.
Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Basef fagape Baibeli God na'i, ‘Ipat ae'anai nondapoma epes hiasi sifi'i sopaona sondabeten sogahali' ae'. Apa' owa', panda'ana nataga si'i sandambaho' sanda' wala.”
Jisas ata' napani ipat anamba lu'unai nomon owa' sofa'mani epes isimba naep pagaso'asi a bo'wagah maim mogokwasi safi'manai, ea' nanda'as bo'wes.

Owa' amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mati anen nanda' maol banagani fasini, ea' mame' esis awasi sondagalama anen gani ipat lu'unai nomon sa'i, “Apa' ma'i God a' nondatopalopa Dembinai ape'inai akunamana Deviti!” Ea' amom dei' ukup awep kwapete'a anen.

Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' a' negawa basef kofagefa?” Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Aho', ae' egawef.” Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pitalif ea' basef ifimba fagail Baibeli pagawef. Basef ifimba fowa'ifi faga'i na'amba fa'i, God, ‘Ina' anaf niwalipa awasi sa'wisi soloma isimba ata' agunifisi saga' nomambeh atembihi, ea' sosa'ma agol ine'igili.’”
Ea' anen nakwaha taun inimba, nawisi ando' nafe' nape anembel wambel Betani owamb ambamba.
Ama wafilu kuhimbita atota Jisas nosafel notanima nafe' taun inimba, ea' nolomahana.

Ea' nati anoga lawag fik gotawa ufia'w ea' nafe' natologa. Apa' ina nati anip sa'utip pailaga, owa'atin. Apul atom. Ea' na'ipaga na'i, “Ina' ina ata' anip sa'utip pilina wapani. Ea' owa'atin endilisi.” Ea' kwafalis atis lawag agamba bowaga ea' aliga hi'alaga.
Ea' amom alipumi ananimi mati lawag agamba aliga, gogolalasom kwapete'. Ea' ma'i, “Dei' maina lawag agamba fik bowaga ea' aliga kwafalis atis?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amom na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. I'i ipa' pihapifi endilisi, ma ipa' ina bimbiafip pipaipa, dao' atiasi ea' penda'as si'i ae' anda'asa lawag agamba fik. Ea' ipa' ina penda' isimba atis, owa'atin. I'i ipa' pi'ipa halafuta tatumba pi'i, ‘Ina' dagia nefe' newala naoh,’ atiasi ateme'ef tilif si'i ipa' paga'ias.
I'i ipa' pihapilif endilisi ma pendabetena, hiahawes isimba ipa' pandabetena pa'i pegefa'asi atiasi ipa' a' pefa'as.”

Ea' Jisas notanima nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nape nawalipasa basef esis amam nematawa si'i dondol nagawalipas. Ea' amom pris dembami maloma agufumi Judai mafi'mai anen mahali'ana ma'i, “Ami na'ipina dei' nape dembinai nanda' maol inimba?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Ae' wapani a'i ihali'ipa ma anif basefa ipa' ata' pili' pi'ipif ae' ma bola iga'ipipa ami na'ipi ape dembinai anda' maol inimba.

Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli, ami na'ipana ma nanda' maol inimba? God nagape heveni na'ipana nanda'an a'a anin epen itapani na'ipana?” Ea' mame' basef ifimba manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' i'i uga'i, ‘God nagape heveni naga'ipana,’ atiasi anen a' ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipa' owa' pagahapifanaea?’
Apa' afa' i'i uga'i, ‘Anin epen itapani na'ipana,’ na'amba esis amam nematawa a' sohafa. Afa' ombal mahafama esis. Dei' main, esis hiasi sa'i Jon anona profet dembinai.”
Ea' magwamana basef Jisas ma'i, “Afa' owa' ogawama.” Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ea' na'amba atin ae' ina i'ipipa ma ami nase'e banagami na'ipi anda' maol inimba ae'ani, owa'.”
“Apa' ipa' ukup pape pa'imama? Anona aman nogaopana biam. Anen nafe'ma anona na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogame ae'inai, dei' ina' fo'o nenda' maola aof ae'afi egawa mandelef wainilifa.’
Owa' nogamana nagwamana na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'.’ A'i owa' main owa', nambema nembel a' nafe'.
Ea' nafe' na'ipa anona wapani na'ipana na'amba atin si'i doko' nali' naga'i. Owa' nagwamana basef na'i, ‘Aho', ahame.’ Apa' anen ina nagi'ma basef ananifi nafe', owa'atin.

“Ea' dei' nogaopana amamba biam ananimi mamahonama nagi'ma basef ahamanai?” “Amom ma'i, “Nagali'i.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam amamba mogofa' takisi manda' waf awafii maloma nematawa wanda' waf awafi wanda' so'a wauli esis ea' sefe' suwis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias sili'a ipa'.

Ipa' pagawa aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli. Anen nali' nafi'mai ipa' ea' nihimba'mepa wafa ufia'w usi'i'wi, apa' ipa' owa' pihapifanaea. Apa' epes isimba awasisi anom mogofa'asa takisi maloma anowa nematawa wanda' waf awafi so'a wauli esis ea' sahapifana. Ipa' pati esis sagahapifana na'ambai, apa' ipa' ina pambema opalef pakwaha waf awafi pahapifana, owa'atin.

“Ipa' peme' anif basef waminif atini. Anona aman dembinai nanda' anof aof nagawa waina nahefagomaf. Aof afamba nomon anen nanda' anona tang notawa ma sogafa'asa sa'utip ipimba wainip, ea' nala' anota ipat lautai totawa ma sope sugumafiagon. Ea' nakwahomam aof afamba anom amam ma'i monda' maolafa bisnisi. Ea' nafe' napani anambel wambel lauguni.
Ama nogota sa'utip pagailatai, nasapa' anom manda' maola anini mafe' ma amom manda' maol aof ananifii. Anen na'i amom moso'ana anip sa'utip gwa'aipi aof afamba.

Ea' amom amamba manda' maol aofi mofa' amam amamba kofagonama aofi naspa'am magafi'ii mombalo'am maham, anona mahana afuna endilisi, anona makwaha otamba mahana, apa' anona mahana dowaf a' nafa' nafe'.
Ea' anen kofagonama aofi nasapa' anom hiami daiam mafe' wapani. Apa' amom amamba manda' maol manda'as na'amba atina amom si'i mali' magafi'ii.
A'i owa' nagi' nasapa' nogamana ananinai nafe'ma amom manda' maol aofi. Ea' anen na'ias na'i, ‘Atiasi ila, amom a' meme' malogol nogame ae'anai.’
“Owa' owa'atin, amom mati nogamana ananinai nafi'i, manda'ipama atin ma'i, ‘Aman nanumba owagama nogofa' hiahaom hiami ahamanai. Awi, a' ohana ma afuna ma afa' atofa ogofa' aof afa'e.’
Ea' mombalo'ana mofa'ana mawisi aof ando'efa mahana afuna.
“Nemaf afamba aman kofagonama aof afambai nogafi'i nonda' maina amom?”

Ea' amom magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Namanani anen nonda'mam waf awafi endilisi ma amam amamba awasimi noham moga'. Ea' noso'asa aof afamba fefe'ma anis epes daias sumafiaf, ama nogota gwa'aisi sogail owa' esis a soso'ana anis gwa'aisi anen.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' patalifa basef Godi pagawef ea'. Basef Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Otam amamba magala' ifagwi mogelefatami dei' mataga mape otam banagami mape magali'i mogombalo' ipati. Dembinai God nanda' amamba mataga, apa' matolom fasifasim a'owa'.’
“Ea' ae' dei' a'ipipa. God atiasi a' nelefata basefa waf bu'wafi anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma ma ipa', a noso'asam anis epes atiasi sombale'ef sonda' waf bu'wafi.
[Ea' epes mamahisa kwahogalas sogowa otam anambai, atiasi esis pepe'etas. Apa' i'i otam anamba nowa nogosali'as, a' loloweas si'i sopof atof.]”
Ea' amom pris dembami maloma dembami amom Judai Farisi mame' basef ifimba waminif atini Jisas naga'iefi ma'i owa', anen nondola'waifa amom na'i basef ifimba.
Ea' ma'i mombalo'ana owa' ombal bahama esis amam nematawa. Esis hiasi sogawana sa'i Jisas anona profet.
Ea' Jisas nanda' anif basef waminif atin wapani na'i,
“Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona king dembinai itapnai. Nogamana ananinai na'i nogao'wa ako'w, ea' king anamba nanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi.
Ama nemaf afamba soga'asafi anen nasapa' amam amamba manda' maola anini mafe' mofalai epes isimba fowa' nogofalasi ma sogafi'mai gwa'aisi isimba. Owa' sandaiwa'ma sogafi'i.

“Ea' anen nasapa' anom wapani manda' maola anini motambel mafe', ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' fo'mago epes isimba ae' ea' andandepas sagapani ea' pi'ipas na'amba pi'i, “Peme', ae' andandomba gwa'aimi ae'ami ea'. Mafis bulmakau suwafumi a mafis amamba lu'wami ae'ami, apa' maham. Ea' hiahaom hiami mandandombol ma'oh ea'. Ipa' pifi'mai gwa'aisi isimba enda'asa nogame nogaso' ako'wi.”’
“Owa' amom ukup iwanipa mome'efa mogafe' ea' mandambema mandafe' daindai ma maol amamini. Anona nafe' aof, anona nafe'ma bisnis ananisi.
Apa' amom magapani mombalo' amamba manda' maola kingi manda'am kwapete'am maham afum.
Ea' king anamba nembel wandafuna nasapa' soldia ananimi mafe' maha amom manda' maola anini afum hi'alam. Ea' makata maofa wambel amamimbili wapani.
Ea' king na'ipa amom manda' maoli na'i, ‘Gwa'aisi enda'asa nogame noso' ako'wa soga'asi ea' sandandombol sa'oh, apa' epes isimba ae' igifalasi, ina sanda' waf andeande'ma sogafi'i, owa'.
Na'amba dei' ipa' pefe' ufiawa awamba hiawai dawalegefa pigati isimba epes hiasi pi'ipas pefalas sifi'mai gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi daso'amaisi.’

Anen na'ias na'amba ma main, amom manda' maoli mafe'agon gani gani ufiawa dawalegef matamai epes isimba magatilisi, epes bu'wasi saloma awasisi. Ea' safi'i sape ipat atamba sondaso'ama ma a' si'ita kwaef endilisi.
“Esis sape ea' dembinai king nawis nomona nigatilis. Ea' nati anin epen atitin, ina nala klos sagalasa nemaf afamba daso'amaifii, owa'.
Ea' king na'ipana na'i, ‘Alipunai, dei' maina ina' owa' nila klos isimba sandaso'amaisi nifi'i niwisi na'aea?’ Owa', anen ina na'i anif basef, owa'atin.
“Ea' king na'ipa amom manda' maoli na'i, ‘Ipa' piwasi' lagof bo'wagaha epen inimba pikwahin nefe' niwis nepe akot ando'. Akot atamba atiasi anin nelef nenda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' nepe.’”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Aho', God nogofala epes hiasi na'amba atin si'i king anamba nanda'as. Anen nofala hiasi, apa' owa' nandandepa atona atin sufi'i suwis sope sogalomana.”
Ea' amom dembami Farisi mafe' manda' basef ma'if mandame'maefa mogowa' Jisas. Amom ma'i meme' anif basef ananifi owa' andeande'ia ma monda'mana basef mogowa'ana si'i sogapalo' agof anembeh.

Ea' masapa' alipumi magaila amomi maloma amam amamba anep mini'ap Heroti amom mafe'ma Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' ogawena, ina' aman naga'i endilisii. Ina ombel magahinai, owa'. Owa' niga'ipasa anif basef isimba anis agof lu'wagufisia a anif basef daifa isimba agof akasi falafisia, owa'atin. Ina' naga'ipas basef atifif endilisifi atif Godi amam nematawa hiasi dondo' atin hi'agalasi.
Ea' dao' ina' ni'ipafa. Dei' ina' okom mandanda' ma'imama? Mu'uli ape'ini na'i andeande'ma apa' mogaso'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi a'a owa'?”
Owa' Jisas nogawa ea' ma waf awafi amamifi ea' na'i, “Ipa' amam paga'i malogof biagufi, dei' maina ipa' pagagwamba ae'?
Ipa' himba'me anin moni takisini ma ata' itilin.” Ea' mofa'manai anin moni ma natilin
nahali'am na'i, “Ambal laloma agol isimba sagaili amisi?”
Ea' ma'i, “Isimba Sisari gavman dembinai.” Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Dao' hiahawes dembinai Sisari, isimba pese'anas Sisar. Apa' hiahawes Godi, pese'anas God.”
Amom mame'anama basef ifimba ea' gogolalasom kwapete'am makwahana a' mafe'.
Nemaf afamba atef anom amam anep mini'ap Sadyusi, mafi'mai Jisas. Amom mini'ap apamba magahapifa sagaga'i ina atiasi sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'atin. Ea' amom mafe' mahali' Jisas
ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, Moses na'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anen awasi akana, ea' owamana noso' waulu'mana anani'wi nola anis awasi ma sogaha'ofana.’
Ea' fowa' anom amam ape'imi ambep atetep mape la'afena apa', amom 7-pelaim. Nagali'i sahomam naso'akw awani aka'w naga', nakwaho'w kwape. Ea' owamana naso'akw naga' nakwaho'w kwapani awani aka'w.
“Ea' owamana nandatu'unai wapani nanda'as na'amba atin, ea' anona nandatu'umi naso'akw manda'as na'amba atin mafe' mafe'ma matagama owagufunai akutainai.
Amom amamba ambipim ea' mandaga' atin hi'andalam. Ama main, nemata'w waulu'mam kwagi'mam kwagi' kwaga'.
Anaf esis sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, nemata'w akwamba kwagaso' amom 7-pelaimi anaf mamahonama noso'akw? Amom 7-pelaim a' maso'akw atin hi'alam.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef amom na'i, “Ipa' owa' pegawa basef Baibel naga'iefia, ea' owa' pagawa banagami Godia. Ea' ipa' dei' ina pa'i basef andeande', owa'atin.
Nemaf afamba sagaga'i sokwaha wandelef sotanima sogosafel wapani, amam nematawa ina ata' sondaso'ama wapani, a' owa'atin. Sope dowaf si'i ensel magape heveni.
Apa' basef ifimba esis amam nematawa sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, ipa' patalifa basef ifimba God na'if fagape Baibeli ea'. Anen naga'ipipa na'amba na'i,
‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki a Jekopi.’ Basef ifimba fa'i God ina Dembinai ma epes isimba sagaga'ii, owa'atin. Anen God epes isimba ambal lapais sagape namisii.”
Esis amam nematawa same' na'amba sosafel gogolalasisa basef ananifi.
Jisas a' nasopama malogofa amam amamba dembami Sadyusi ma basef ifimba. Na'amba anom amam dembami Farisi mame' basef ifimba a mandakolasi mafi'i felefele'ma anen.
Ea' anona nagaloma amomi nogogawa mu'uli Godi na'i nogwamba Jisasa niga'i anif basef owa' andeande'a ma nonda'mana basef sogowa'ana si'i sogapalo' agof anembeh. Ea' nahali'ana na'i,
“Dembinai Tisa, mu'uli Godi mamahina lu'win nikila' mu'uli daian hiani nape nagali'i?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Nomonas ipe'isi sehafel Dembinai God ipe'inai sisilana na'amba. Ukup ipe'ipi pipilana hi'indalep, pese'ana ambagufi nelelemb ipe'isi pendaso'anas hi'indalasa Dembinai God atona.
Mu'uli inimba lu'wani, nagali' endilisii. Ea' mu'uli nagagi'i inimba, ‘Ipa' ukup pipila anis epes sagape felefele'ma ipe'i, si'i ukup pagapagaila ipa' atipa.’
Basef kofagefa ma mu'uli hiani Godi faloma basef amom profet manda'afi hiafi hi'alef fape nomona mu'uli inimba biafin.”
Amom Farisi ata' munduwa'anima malutu atin, Jisas nahali'am
na'i, “Ipa' ukup pandanda' pa'imama ma Krais anen God nandandepana ea' ma nosapa'ana nogafi'ii? Anen nogama amii?” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Devit nogamana.”
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' maina Ambal bu'unai Godi nagasa'ma nomonas Deviti ma naga'i Krais anen Dembinai? Devit fowa' na'i,
‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'ani na'i, “Ina' nepe lagol kwahisigili ae'agili atapina nefe' netagama anaf ae' enda' bousi ine'isi sogafe' lafela bo'wagah ine'igahi.”’
Devit fowa' nofala Krais na'i Dembinai. Isimba atis dei' Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anen Dembinai.”

Ea' ina anona aman la'ifina ma nogagwamana basef Jisas, owa'atin. A'i owa' nemaf afamba owa', amom hiami ombel mahama mogahali'anama anif basef wapani. Owa'atin nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' wapani nafe' atin.
A'i owa' main, Jisas naso'asa basef esis amam nematawa saloma amom alipumi 12-pelaim ananimi.
Na'ias na'amba na'i, “Amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma dembami amamba Farisi amom maha'ofa Mosasa magawalipasa mu'uli Godi banagambel.
Andeande'ma pigaila basef hiafi amom maga'ipipafi, apa' ipa' ina penda' waf amom manda'afi, owa' hapaifi. Dei' main, amom ma'ipasa basef hiafi, apa' amom ina mailif, owa'atin.

Amom mogowatania basef amamifi magawalipasefa sigailif si'i basef wafifi analef aolef wafilifi lu'walifi mawamonalef fagatoma ikaguf asasifi, apa' amom ina matopalopepa mofa'alef kwasala ma lagof amamugufi, owa'atin.
Hiahaom hiami manda'ami manda'am dowafa epes sotolom siganifelom. Aho', amom mala latif lu'unai nail lagufi balagah amamisi ma manda' beten, ea' manda' sosaf launai nail sagegw amamugwi da'malifigwa.
Amom ukup pa'i siaifah isimba sotawa sagali'i atis dembami atom magapoma, ma afamba sanda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi a'a anamba ifagw lu'wagwi esis Juda dondol sandakolasugwi.
Amom ma'i hiasi sotoloma sondalalamam sogasa'ma agof amamugufi anamba sandakolas sagapoma ma ma'i sofalam sonda'i amom, ‘Dembami Tisa’.
“Apa' anis epes ina sofala ipa' si'i ipa' Dembipai, owa'. Dei' main, ipa' tisa dembinai ipe'inai atotona, ea' ipa' hipai pepe si'i sahin owan wambota atota.
Ipa' ina pefala anin epen nagape itap apa'e pi'i ahamepa ipe'inai, owa'atin. Dei' main, aman anamba atotona anen ahamepa ipe'inai, nagape heveni.
Ea' esis ina sofalepa si'i dembipai tisa, owa'. Dei' main, Dembinai tisa ipe'inai Krais atona, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
Apa' aman ami atiasi nogataga dembinai ipe'inai, dei' ata' nili' nope nonda' maol nope lafela ipa'.
Ea' na'amba atin, epen ami negasa'ma agol ananigili atogili, epen inimba anaf agol akan. Apa' epen ami nenda' agol ananigili gogafe' lafili, anaf anin nefa' agol lu'wagili.”

“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' amam malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pewalo uta ma nogohnaep esis amam nematawai ma ina atiasi suwis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai numafias, owa'atin. Dei' main, ipa' ina pafe' pawis nomon, ea' esis amam nematawa sa'i sofe' sogawisi, isimba ipa' pasopamas ufia'wa sofe' sogawis nomon.

[Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami atiasi mogatagamepa! Ipa' malogof biagufipai. Ipa' pawis ifagw agwamba nematawa alifiwaii, pawis panda' wala hiahawes awousi. Ea' pasafel palutu pandabeten launai atona ma pagambaho' waf awafi ipe'ifi. Panda'am na'amba pandabeten launai dowadowafa esis siga'i ipa' bu'upai. Anaf God nowaloga epes hiasi. Anis epes daias owa' sonda' waf awafi na'ambaia anaf sofa' akafimi kwasakwasala, apa' ipa' a' pefa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi a'owa'.]

“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pafe'agon hi'agalagini naoh a itap walemb hiagoma, pigifa'i anin epena negataga alipini ipe'ini nigaila basef ipe'ifii. Anin ea' nataga alipini ipe'ini, ea' ipa' panda' anin awen a'owa' nikila' ipa' na'amba. Ipa' aupai ma pagafe' wambel awambili hel nif fagandifi fagapoma. Apa' ipa' panda' anin nanda' waf awafi a'owa' fandahama atiasi negafe' wambel ambalemba awambili.

“Ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' naep pagasi'ipai pa'i pihimba'masa ufia'w anis epes. Ipa' pagawalipas na'amba pa'i, ‘I'i epen niga'i agola ipat anamba lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwani ma niga'i endilisi gani ilifi, isimba falafisi. Apa' anin niga'i agola gol amamba fasimi sogofalo'ma ipat anamba ma niga'i endilisi ilifi, dao' a' nenda'as nindaila basef si'i naga'i.’

“Ipa' ukup magahipai ea' naep pagasi'ipai! Maim da'im mape lu'um mikila'? Gol amamba sogofalo'ma ipat anamba amom lu'um a'a, ipat anamba bu'unai nanda' gol amamba mataga bo'oma naep Godi? Ea' dei' ipat anamba atona nikila' gol.

Ea' ipa' pagawalipas wapani paga'i, ‘I'i epen ami niga'i belita sofa' mafis sagaso' Godani endilisi ilifi, amamba falafumi. Apa' epen ami niga'i ofa mafis sagatoma belita ilifi ma niga'i ilifi, dao' anin a' nindagi'mas si'i naga'ias.’
“Ipa' naep pagasi'ipai! Hiahawes mais sape lu'wasi? Ofa mafis sape lu'wis a'a belita tanda' ofa inimbai nataga bo'wena naep Godi, dei' nataga lu'win? Ea' dei' belita tikila' ofa.
Isimba atis dei' epen ami niga'i agol belitai ma niga'i endilisi ilifi, anin newa' banaga basef ifimba ma hiahawes sagatoma belita ilifi saloma belita wapani.
Ea' epen ami niga'i agol ipat lu'unai Godi ma niga'i endilisi ilifi, anin newa' banaga basef ananifi ma ipat anamba naloma anen nagape ipat anambai.
Ea' epen ami niga'i heven ilifa negewa' banaga basef ananifi, anin na'i newa' banaga basef ananifi ma sia bu'wani Godi naloma aman anamba nagatoma sia inimbai.

“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' amam malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pandawaloga nambawai lombo maloma akwal lalilali hiali paso'ana du'wanil ilifunamail God. Panda'as na'amba ma akwal alamba hiali agofula alamba min, dil, kumin. Apa' ipa' a' pindihi'ama basef amamba hiami lu'uma basef mu'uli God naga'iefi ma waf usi'ifi ma pegatopalopa epes, pigati esis uwahipis, penda' hiahaom andeande' datima ma waf endilisifi. Waf afamba hiafi feloma waf pindilali pegaso'ana hiahawes mais Godafi, afamba pekolefaf pihapilaf atin pilaf.
Ipa' naep pagasi'ipai, pa'i pihimba'masa ufia'w anis epes! Ipa' panda' maola pigisia'ma afi'awa isimba sa'wisi sagail malepi nemba'wi, apa' mafin anamba lu'unai kamel ea' pewalo'ana nalomam.

“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' amam malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pandombasa kapi plet ando'esa atis hilili'. Apa' nomon owa'. Ipa' opalef si'ipama waf walifi faloma waf afamba alop atopafi awafi.
Ipa' Farisi, naep pagasi'ipai! Ipa' ata' pili' pendombasa kap nomonepa puli', ma atiasi ande'epa wapani pogataga bo'op.

“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' epes malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pandahama si'i ifagw sa'ugwi sagawa belatagwa sanda' pen afitinai saofam. Ea' ande'etama bo'ota ma sagatolota, apa' nomonetama si'igina bihitagof epes sagaga'ii maloma hiahaom awasimi alogw magami si'imagon.
Ipa' pape na'amba atin. Epes esis sati alop ipe'ipi ando' sa'i ipa' panda' waf usi'ifii. Apa' nomon waf aunai baso'amunai ma malogof biagufi panda' simbisambala mu'uli Godi amambai mape si'ima ipa'.

“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' amam paga'i malogof biagufi! Ipa' pefalo'ma matmat amom profet magaga'i taloma wandelefa epes isimba sape hilili' sagaga'i.
Ea' ipa' pa'i, ‘I'i afa' fowa' ope si'i akusafa afa'isiai, afa' ina otopalopa esis oha amom profet afum, owa'.’
Ama basef ifimba atif ipa' pagawalapafi kofagefa ipe'ifi atif, pa'i ipa' epes mini'ap apamba pagi' pagatagai saha profet magaga'i.
Ea' ipa' a' piwatani waf afamba awafi esis akusipai hi'indalaf!
“Ipa' si'i uguf, awasi pagataga uguf awagufi fagahasi! Kota basef lu'wami Godi nowa'epa nili'amepa pepe wambel awambili hel. Dei' penda'as pi'imama ma anaf pegefa'ma kot atamba? Owa'atin endilisi.

Apa' dei' ipa' peme'. Ae' asapa'o anom profet molomago anom amam nomonas fasisimi moloma anom gawaimi ma Baibeli amom mofo'o motagamepa. Atiasi ipa' peha anom moga', ea' pendola anom lawah hindisila'mai, anom pepe pegahom nomon ifagw pandakolasugwi. Ea' ipa' penda'am tofalam anembel wambel taun lu'wina ea' petofam mofa' mefe' anin taun daian ea' petofam pelam atin pefe'. Ipa' atiasi penda' waf awafi afamba.

Ea' dei' epes isimba sagape hilili'i ma anis sahas sagaga'i, kofagema amamba hiami atiasi a' mopoma ipa'. Aho', nagali'i Abel anen aman nagape hilili'i a' nafi'i nafi'i natagama aman akutainai profet Sakaraia, Berekia nogamana, anamba akusipa sahana afuna la'afena ipat lu'unai Godi naloma belita saofa mafis sagaso' Goda. Amamba kofagema atiasi a' mila ipa' atipa.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ipa'. Hiahaom awami akafimi kofagema atiasi a' motagama mini'ap amam nematawa isimba dei' pagapani.

“O ipa' Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ipa' pagaha amom profet afumi, pakwaha otamba pagaha amom God nasapa'am magafe'ma ipe'i, lifilafi ae' a'i ekolasa ipa' epes hipai si'i awata numa'itai towa'ani nogagwi takolasagw gopasol gwagail bihinagof atatigufi. Owa' owa'atin, ipa' pandaiwa'.
Ipa' peme'! Dei' ipat bu'utai a wambel ipe'imbili atiasi wafita totawa dowaf.
Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' atiasi ina petolowe wapani ma anaf piga'i, ‘Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma aman anamba nagafi'i agol Dembinaii ma nonda'ana sonogahana.’”
Jisas nakwaha ipat lu'unai Godi nafe' atin, amom alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen. Amom ma'i mihimba'mana ifagw lu'wagwi lotugwi.

Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pati ifagw amamba lu'wami a'a? Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anaf ina atiasi anemba otamba bendatomama atin banagemba bepe, owa'atin. Asugulatam sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona atin.”

Jisas tol nape halafuta atamba Oliv, ea' alipumi ananimi atom mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' ni'ipafa hiahaom amamba nambai' motaga. Ametal mail lili' lotaga ma afa' ogogawa ina' na'i netanima nigafi'i ma itap ana'e higiligalana?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama anif basef laufi na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba anin epen a' nembaso'mepa.

Dei' main, amam hiami anef nemaf mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'i agol ae'agili mi'i, ‘Ae' ma'uwi ae' Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e agafi'ii.’ Ea' mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiasi some' basef amamifi si'i endilisifi silif.
Anef nemaf peme' amalemba sonda' wandaf a anis sondaha basefa wandaf si'ipipaf, ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagai, apa' nemaf akutaifi ata' ota'.

Anis epes sagape anamba itap lu'wagoma sofela wandaf sopa' soloma esis sagape anep itap daiapi. Anona dembinai king nosafel no'wa anis walemb hielimbi ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king daiana no'wa ananisi analemb walembi. Analemb walemb nolom mohas sope, ea' analemb walemb hiagoma atona atin itap bolatin nope.
Hiahaom amamba hiami amom ata' muli' motaga si'i akafimi mali' magatagama nemata'w kwa'i kogola awani.

“Nemaf afamba esis sofa'epa ma sogase'epa akafimi nimanimi, ea' sehepa pega'. Epes hiasi walemb hiagoma nelelemb numbutima ipa' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipa' pagaila basef ae'afii, na'amba dei' sahepa.
Nemaf afamba amam nematawa hiasi sokwaha hapif asasini, ea' sondawawalapa atin soso'asas sefe'ma bousi sohas, ea' epes isimba ukup awepisi wapani.
Ea' amam amamba hiami mombaso'am muga'i amom profeti mosafel mufi'i mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiasi.
Waf awafi atiasi a' nosafel lu'una, na'amba amam nematawa hiasi asokwaha waf afamba ukup pigapigaila anis daidaias piga'i uwahipis.
Apa' epen ami nihapifi banagen nilutu negatagama nemaf akutaifii, inimba atiasi God nuwambilan nokwahoman waf awafi ananifi nitanimai nepe andeande'.

Ea' atiasi esis si'ipasa basef ifimba bu'wafi Godima epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol ananini nope Dembinai nugumafias. Esis si'ipas ganimba itap hiagoma hi'ilagon ama amam nematawa hiasi ganimba walemb hielimbi ata' sili' some'ef. Ama main owa', nemaf akutaifi a' fetaga.

“Anef nemaf ipa' piti hiahaom awami mogahambombaga hiahaom bu'wamii motaga si'i fowa' gani profet Daniel naga'i basef fagail Baibeli faga'i. Hiahaom amamba motaga mope anamba bo'wagoma ipat lu'unai Godi nomon. (Epen ami nigatalifa basef ifimbai anin a' okom mondapomef andeande'.)
Nemaf afamba amam nematawa sagape itap lu'wapi Judiai sofa' sefe' sondowasa'o halafutagw.
A epen ami nagape ipat ando'i felefele'i ina ata' netanima nefe' niwis nefa'i hiahawes ananisi ipat nomon, owa'i.
Epen ami nigaili aofi, ina ata' netanima nefe' wambel nefa' saket main ananisi, owa'i.
Nematawa opafuwai waloma awamba awasi ata' saga' nomagof atogufi, ae' a'i awo uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota atamba ogame' akafimi lu'wami.
Ipa' pendabetena ipa' ina apefa' pefe' nogota atamba fufini asaf sogatagama a'a nemaf afamba sabat sagapoma noma'wafi, owa'.

Nogota atamba akafimi mugatagai lu'wami endilisi. Fowa' dambadamba itap pagataga nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' nimanimi awami amambai fowa' ina anom na'ambaimi mataga, owa'atin. Ea' anaf wapani owa' anom nimanimi amambai motagaia, owa'atin.
I'i God owa' nonda' nimaguf fefe' bandefa, atiasi amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas higiligalasi. Owa' owa'atin. God okom mapoma epes isimba anen nogosaho'as ea'i dei' nahagasa nogota atamba bandata.
“Nemaf afamba fegataga ma i'i anis epes si'ipipa siga'i, ‘Ipa' piti Krais God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii anen nape na'a, o nani nape gani,’ ipa' ina pihapifas, owa'.

Nemaf afamba anom amam mombaso'am muga'i amom Kraisi a amom profeti, a' motaga monda' ametal banagani naninani monda' banagami hiami si'i God nanda'ami. Endilisi i'i amom banagema, a' mombaso'ma amam nematawa God nogosaho'as ea'i mohambombagas. Apa' owa' owa'atin.
Peme', ae' ea' a'ipipa hiahawes isimba dei' ata' owa' sogatagaia.

“Ama epes ami si'ipipa siga'i, ‘Ipa' piti, anen nani nape gani epes akagoma wafigima, ipa' ina peme'as pefe'agon, owa'. Apa' i'i epes ami siga'i, ‘Ipa' piti nani nape ipat tati nomon’, ipa' ina pihapifas, owa'i.

Ipa' pegawa otaga holagala, holala natagai gani awin nagatafima ea' nogala' nafe' anamba hiagoma awin negewalama. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, afamba ae' itanima igafi'ii, enda'am na'amba atin hiasi sotolowe.
Mamahagoma alop sagaga'i poga'oma, ea' na'amba atogon anaf komemb mefe' munduwa'animama.

“Akafimi nimanimi hiami ma nogota atamba hi'ilam ea', kwafalis atis awin alipini a' netaga owamb, ea' owambini ina ata' negala', a'owa'. Ea' ondowa mowai otaga ilif, hiahaom hiami banagami magape otagai ea' bol atin mope.

“Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Nemaf afamba ametal ae'ani netaga gani otaga ilif, amam nematawa hiasi sagape itap hiagomai a' selef. Ea' siti ae' eloma ilagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma hiahaom mogogala'i fasimi Godi moloma banagami ananimi.

Ea' alof lu'unai nogal mehip, esapa' amom ensel ae'ami mefe' itap hiagoma awin natafima negewalama wa'owa'ol anamba biafigin biafigin mefe'agon hi'ilagon ganimba itapi otaga safe' sogotambela. Atiasi ensel amamba mofe' mofa'ai esis amam nematawa God nogasaho'as ea' ananisii sondakolas atogon.
“Ipa' nomonas sondanda'ma anif basef waminif atina ilaof. Ipa' piti ilaof nogonafa ma basowa, pegawa nogota atamba nelemb ea' felefele'ma sogaof.
Ea' na'amba atin anaf piti hiahaom amamba ali' aga'ipipami a' motaga hi'igalam, ipa' pegawa ae' afi'i alutu felefele'ma uta. Ina ata' nogota laota, owa'.
“Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' ata' pagapani ina atiasi pega' ulal, ata' owa', ipa' piti hiahaom amamba hiami motaga hi'igalam.
Otaga noloma itap hiagoma anaf a' higililam, apa' basef ae'afi ina higililif, owa'atin endilisi. Fegape atapif lifilafii.

“Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi a'ipipa. Owa' anin epen negawa nemaf a'a nogota atamba ae' igafi'atai. Amom ensel magape ilifi wapani ina mogawa. Ae' nogamana Godi wapani ina egawa, owa'. Ahame atona nagape ilifi anen atotona negawa nemaf afamba. Waf fowa' sanda'af nogota atamba Noa nagapautai, ea' na'amba atin si'i anaf esis sonda'af nemaf afambai felefele'ma ifi'i egataga itap apa'e.
Fowa' embel lu'wami ata' owa' motagaia, nogota atamba esis sape sa' gwa'aisi sa' embel amam nematawa sindikikila'ma sandaso'ama atin safe' safe' sataga nemaf afamba Noa nafe' nagawis galaho'w.

Amam nematawa isimba ina sogawa nemaf afamba, owa'atin. Esis ukup maso'as sandape na'amba atin safe' satagama afamba embel lu'wami mataga magaha esis amam nematawa hiasi mambaho'was hi'agalas. Ea' anaf na'amba atina nemaf afamba ae' itanima igafi'i.
Afamba amam biam mondao'oma monda' maol mogail aofi, God a' nofa' anona, anona nokwahona nil.
Ea' anowa nematawa biawa onda' maola plaua onda' breti, atiasi God nofa' ano'w kofe' nokwaha ano'w kope.
“Ea' ipa' a' solawaipa andeande'. Ipa' ina pegawa nambai' dembinai ipe'inai nogafi'i, owa'atin.

Ipa' ukup pepoma anif basef waminif atini. I'i ahama ipati nili' nogawa owamb nogota mamahotama nanda' wali nogafi'atai, ama silisilawi numafiata nogape, nanda' wali ina atiasi nifi'i nupisila ipat ananitai nuwis nomon, owa'atin.
Ea' ipa' wapani silisilawi pendape. Dei' main? Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ifi'i anef nemaf ipa' ina atiasi pegawa pi'i ifi'i ulal nemaf afamba, owa'.”

“Ipa' hipai penda' waf bu'wafi si'i anamba nugumafi amom manda' maoli okom bu'wami mapaona nanda' maol andeande' datimai. Aman anamba dembinai ananinai nandandepana ma nugumafi ananimi manda' maoli ma nogaso'ama gwa'aisi amom nogota dondo'atai.
Anafa dembinai ananinai notanima nogafi'i, ma niti aman anamba nanda' maol andeande', dao' aman anamba sonohana.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Dembinai ananinai anaf nonda'ana nope dambena nugumafi hiahaom hiami ananimi hi'igalam.
Apa' i'i aman anamba nonda' waf awafi okom magapoma opaf ananifi atofi a' ni'i, ‘Dembinai ae'anai ina atiasi nifi'i ulal, owa'atin.’
Ama anen noha amom manda' maol atini nea' gwa'aisi embel noloma amam amamba manda' spaki.
Ea' Dembinai ananinai atiasi notanima nifi'i anef nemaf, apa' aman anamba ina atiasi ni'i Dembinai nifi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Dembinai nogafi'i nifi'i nogota atamba anen okom mogaso'anatama.
Ea' a' nohana nili'amonana nefe' nope noloma epes isimba sagambaso'ami malogof biagufisi. Wambel anamba awagoma selef sonda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' sope.

“Anef nogota atamba epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anif basef waminif atina nematawa ilufunamaiwa. Anona aman na'i nogaso' ano'w nemata'wi, nafe' napani ma notanima nogafi'i. Ea' nematawa awamba aiawaiwai osafel ofa' lambeh handandawa wafe' wa'i olaoma aman anamba ufia'w ofa'ana nifi'i.
Wanowa biawa gawa akawai apa' wanowa biawa ogogawai.
Awamba gawa akawai ofa' lambeh halomawa wafi'i, apa' awo ina ofa'ai kerosin atifin nalomawa, owa'.
Apa' awamba gawaiwai owala kerosin batowagof ofa'an atifin naloma lambeh awoumbihi ofa'as atifis wafi'i.
Aman anamba ina dei' nafi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Ea' awo hiawai naep nimanip ambeh hahawa a' wa'oh.
“Wa'oh wafe' wafe' ma a'i owa' amanota la'afitama a' wame' anef maf fataga fa'i, ‘Dei' aman nagaso' ako'wi nafi'i. Ipa' pefe' petolona ufia'w pefa'ana pifi'i.’
Ea' nematawa awamba osafel, wandondomba lambeh awoumbihi ma ogafe'.
Apa' nematawa awamba gawa akawai wandaila awamba gawaiwai wa'ipawa wa'i, ‘Ipa' ata' pese'apa kerosin du'wanin. Lambeh ape'imbihi ha'i a feganda'ambeh.’
Owa' awo wa'ipawa wa'i, ‘Ahae' owa'atin. Kerosin owa' hiana dondo'ma apa'a, owa'. Ipa' fo'o petala anin ipe'ini.’

“Ea' awo ata' wafe' watala kerosin wagailii, aman anamba nogaso' nemata'wi a' nafi'i. Ea' nematawa awamba wanda'as dumbili dombol wagapani, a' wawis ipat nomon walomana sa' gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma aman nagaso' ako'wi, ea' uta a' taso'.
“Ea' awamba wafe' wagatala kerosini otanima wafi'i wagi' wataga, ea' walutu ofalana wa'i, ‘Dembinai, dembinai, ina' usi'mapai uta.’
