“Owa' anen nagwamawai basef na'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' owa' egawepaia.’
Ea' Jisas na'i anif basef wapani na'i, “Dei' ea' na'amba atin, ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Dei' main, ipa' ina pegawa nambai' ae' igafi'i.”

“Nemaf afamba ae' itanima igafi'afii epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias sope na'amba atin si'i anif basef waminif atina anona aman na'i nogafe' anagoni. Anen nofalai amom amamba manda' maola anini mafi'i, a' naso'ama hiahawes lagof amamugufi.

Anen okom mapoma waf amamifi faloma gawa amamini atona atin, ea' nawalogamam moni amom. Anona naso'ana hiani a'owa' 5,000 kina, anona naso'ana hiani kwasakwasala 2,000 kina, anona naso'ana kwasala'in 1,000 kina. Anen nanda'mamas na'amba ma main, a' nafe'.
Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 5,000 kinai nanda' maola nogombamai inimba dembinai nagaso'anani, ma nogofa' 5,000 kina wamani wapani.
Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 2,000 kinai wapani nanda' maol nombaman a' nofa' anin 2,000 kina wamani wapani naloma fowa'ini.
Apa' aman anamba nogofa' 1,000 kinai owa' nofa'an nafe' nala'agon nawa moni inimba dembinai ananinai nambaho'wan nape itap.
“Ama nogota laota tafe'ma main, dembinai amamunai notanima nafi'i. Ea' na'i ata' ni'i basef andeande' noloma amom nogawa moni inimba anen nagaso'amani.

Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 5,000 kinai nafi'i ea' nofa'ai 5,000 kina inimba anen nanda' maol nogofa'ani wapani a na'ipa dembinai ananinai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ina' nase'e 5,000 kina atin, apa' dei' ina' niti ae' anda' maola moni inimba dei' efa' 5,000 kina wamani wapani.’

“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' aman bu'unai nanda' maol andeande' datima. Dei' fowa' ina' nimafi hiahawes sa'wisi andeande' datima. Dei' enda'ena nimafi hiahawes lu'wasi. Ina' nifi'i nendagala neloma dembinai ine'inai.’
“Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 2,000 kinai nafi'i a' na'i, ‘Dembinai, ina' niti. Ina' nase'e 2,000 kina atin, owa', dei' anda' maola moni inimba, dei' ifa'ai 2,000 kina wamani wapani.’

“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' aman bu'unai nanda' maol andeande' datimai. Fowa' ina' nimafi hiahawes sa'wisi andeande' datima. Dei' enda'ena nimafi hiahawes lu'wasi. Ina' fi'i nendagala neloma Dembinai ine'inai.’

Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 1,000 kinai anen wapani nafi'i na'ipa dembinai ananinai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' egawa ina' aman dindinapinai nagala'ambema hiahawes naga'i ine'isi atisi. Aof anona aman nagawasafi afamba ina' nafe' nala'asaf. Ea' anep itap anona aman nogowaha olembepi, ina' nafi'i nalas.
Ae' nomonas sapoma ina'. Ea' ae' ombal bahe ma ina', dei' afe' ala'agon ambaho' 1,000 kina ine'ini nape itap. Isimba hiahawes ine'isi ea' ina' tanima dofa'aso.’

“Ea' dembinai ananinai nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nanda' maoli, ina' aman awinai endilisi. Ina' ala'uta nagahinai. Endilisi ina' a' negawa ae' ala' gwa'aisi anona aman nagawas aof ananifii, a afe' agatopa' wit anep itap anona amani.
I'i na'ambaiai, dei' nefa'an negambe'an benga ae' itanima ifi'i efa'an negaloma anin wamani wapani.
“Ea' ipa' dalombana 1,000 kina aman anamba pese'anan nefe'ma aman nanumba nogofa' moni 10,000 kinai.

Dei' main? Epes ami sagahapila hiahawesi isimba atiasi sofa' anis wamasi wapani ma hiahawes asasisi sogataga hias. Apa' epen ami owa' nigahapila hiahawesia ea' hiahawes anin nagahapilasi, isimba atiasi endalombanas anin.
Aman anamba wafinai ipa' pekwahona nefe' nuwis ando' akotigima endilisi. Wambel anamba awagoma selef sonda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' sope.”
“Anaf ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ifi'i ilumai glori mogogala'i ae'ami, ea' amom ensel hiami molome mifi'i. Ama nemaf afamba ae' epe etoma sia lu'unai ae'ani ma mogogala'i magafi'i heveni.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sifi'i hi'ilas sope nogohnaep ae'asi. Ea' ae' inifa'as enda'as sope misi'ah biah, si'i aman nugumafi sipsipi nanifa' sipsip pagafe' anagon, meme magafe' anagon.
Ea' enda' epes a' sefe' sulutu wa'ol lagol kwahisigili ae'agili si'i sipsip, apa' epes isimba God nondaiwa'masi sulutu wa'ol lagol egawama si'i meme.

“Ea' ae' dembiwai king i'ipa esis isimba sagape lagol kwahisigilii i'i, ‘Ipa' ahame ae'anai nofalo'mepa ma sonogahipai, ipa' piwis anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma pefa' hiahaom amamba ipe'imi fowa' itap owa' ata' petagaia nandondombam magapomipai.
Dei' main, ipa' fowa' pati ae' nolomahe ape ipa' pase'e gwa'aisi. A pati iap pase'e, pase'e embel a' embel. Ae' agafi'i anambel wambili ipa' pefa'e pafe' ifagw ipe'igwi.
Ea' ae' luwaguf mais ake, ipa' pase'eas anda'as ea' awasiwi ipa' pimafi andeande'. Ae' ape anda' kalabus, ipa' pafo'o patolowe.’
“Ea' esis isimba sagape hilili'i atiasi sogwa basef ananifi si'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' nemaf mamahefa apa' mati ina' nolomahena mase'ena gwa'aisi ina'? A' anef nemaf ina' iap pase'ena apa' mase'ena embel?
Ea' nogota mamahotama apa' matilina si'i anambel wambelinai apa' mofa'ena mafi'i ifagw ape'igwi? Ea' nemaf mamahefa apa' matilina lowaf akena, mase'ena lowaf?
Ea' nemaf mamahefa mati awasina nape kalabus mafe' magatilina?’

“Ea' ae' dembiwai king egwamasa basef i'i, Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Maol bu'wani mamahina ipa' panda'ana pagatopalopa esis sahin owan ae'asi falafisi agof akasi, inimbai ipa' ina panda'masan esis atis, owa'. Panda'mean ae' wapani.

“Ea' ae' i'ipa esis sagalutu wa'ol lagol igawamai wapani i'i, Ipa' delefata pekwaha ae' fo'o. God nandaiwa'mepa na'i ipa' epes awipai. Ipa' fo'o wambel awambili nif lu'wafi fagapoma. Nif ifimba ahame nanda'ef fandandombol fapoma aman aunai Satan naloma ensel ananimi.
Dei' main, ipa' fowa' ina panda' waf bu'wafi, owa'atin. Ae' nolomahe agape, ipa' ina pase'e gwa'aisi, owa'. Ea' ae' iap pagase'ema embel, ipa' ina pase'e embel a' embel, owa'.
Ea' ae' si'i epen anagon lauguniwai, apa' ipa' owa' pefa'e pefe' ifagw ipe'igwia, owa'. Ea' lowaf ake ipa' ina pase'e lowaf, ae' awasiwi, ape anda' kalabus apa' ipa' ina pafo'o patolowe, owa'atin.

“Ea' esis wapani a' sogwa basef sohali'ana si'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' nemaf mamahefa apa' mati ina' gwa'aisi embel akana nolomahena, a ina' epen anagon lauguninai, a ina' lowaf akana awasina a nape nanda' kalabus, ea' apa' owa' mofo'o motopalopenaea?’
“Ea' ae' a' egwamasa basef esis i'i, Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, waf maif owa' penda'afa anin epen inimba falafuna agol akania, isimba ea' na'amba atin ina panda'meaf ae' wapani, owa'atin.
Ea' amam nematawa isimba sofe' sofa' hiahaom awami akafimi magape atapim lifilafii. Apa' epes isimba bu'wasi anaf sofa' ambal namili a' sofe' sope anamba sogape bo'wes lifilafima.”
Jisas nawalipasa basef ifimba laufi ma hi'alef, ama nogota atamba anen na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i,

“Ipa' pegawa, nimaguf bif dowaf ata' fapoma nemaf afamba ma soga' gwa'aisi lu'wasi sa'i Pasova afegataga. Atiasi nemaf afamba anona aman nowalapa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ma anom amam boumi mogandele lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai mohe egaga'.”
Nemaf afamba amom pris dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai munduwa'anima mape ipat Kaiafasi, anen pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii.
Ea' ma'i basef mandame'maefa monda' uhuf mefe'ma mombalo' Jisas mohana nogaga'.
Owa' amom mandaiwa'ma mogombalo'ana nemaf afamba sanda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasiafi. Na'amba epes hiasi ukup awep ea' sohafel sonda' wandaf.
Nemaf afamba Jisas nafe' Betani nape ipat anona aman Saimoni, fowa' aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi pagambu'wi, apa' dei' ambo'ona.

Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwafi'mai anen kwahapila anol botol sanda'al si'i otami, embel sanda alogw fasigwi gwaga'ani sagatalin otamba lu'umbai nala botol alamba. Ea' kwakolo'w sanda inimba newala balaga Jisasi ma tebol anen nagatomama.
Amom alipumi ananimi mati na'amba, ukup amamipi awep a'owa'. Ea' ma'i, “Dei' maina ako'w kwagahambombaga sanda inimba nagafe' dowaf?
I'i afa' ofa'ana anis epes sotalin moni hiani ma afa' ofa'an ogaso' epes isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi mainai, dao' andeande'. Apa' owa', owa'atin.”
Ea' Jisas nogawa ukup amamipi, na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' ukup awasip pagapoma nemata'w akwamba? Owa'i. Ako'w kwanda' waf afamba fasifima ae'.
Isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi maini sape salomepa nimaguf hiafi. Apa' ae' ina ata' elomepa egape nimaguf hiafi, owa'atin.
Nemata'w akwamba kwakolo'wa sanda inimba ma alop ae'api, kwanda' isimba kwindila'waifa felefele'ma esis sogawe matmat.
Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, ganimba itap walemb hiagoma anaf siga'ipasa basef bu'wafi ae'afi, si'ipasa basef ako'ufi wapani ma ukup pegapoma waf bu'wafi ako'w kwanda'meafi.”
Nogota atamba anona amom alipumi Jisasi 12-pelaim, aman anamba Judas Keriotinai a' nafe'ma amom pris hiami dembami.
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pa'i pese'e main petalowe ma igihimba'mepana?” Ea' amom matalifa moni silva 30-pelain a' maso'ana.
A'i owa' nogota atamba atota nanda'as atapina nala' nolaoma ano'w ufia'wa nigihimba'mama Jisas amoma mogombalo'ana.

Nemaf afamba sali' saga' anis gwa'aisi saga'i Pasovai esis sa' bret atamba owa' togatef lu'utaia ea' amom alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat anima ma ina' nega' gwa'aisi isimba?”

Ea' na'i, “Ipa' pefe' taun, pefe'ma anona aman pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dembinai Tisa na'i, “Nemaf dondo'afi God nandandepamiefi ea' felefele'. Ae' a'i ea' Pasova inimba eloma alipumi ae'ami ope ipat ine'itai.’”
Ea' amom alipumi ananimi manda'as na'amba atin si'i anen naga'ipam ea' manda' gwa'aisi Pasovai dumbili dombol.
A'i owa' owamb anen nape na' gwa'aisi tebol naloma alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim.
Ea' amom mape ma' gwa'aisi atin owa', Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai atiasi a' nefe' nihimba'ma amom boumi ma ae' egapoma.”
Ea' ukup amamipi nimanip a'owa', mosafel mahali'ana atona atin ma'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'a ami?”
Owa' anen nagwamama basef na'i, “Aman anamba dei'aol nalome wahapila bret wagalata disi, anen ea' ma'una, anamba atiasi nogawalapa ae'i.

Aho', ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi anis epes sehe egaga' si'i Buk Baibel naga'iasa ae'. Apa' aman anamba nogawalapa ae' ma boumii, anen uwahipina endilisi. Atiasi hiahaom awami endilisi a' motagamana. Fowa' ma'mana owa' ata' kolanai, dao' a' andeande'. Ama anen ina a' notagama hiahaom akafimi amamba awami. Owa', a' owa'atin.”
Ea' aman anamba Judas nogawalapa Jisasa bousii anen anagwa basefa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ae' a'ias a'a owa'atin?” Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' atina na'iam.”
Jisas nalomam ata' mape ma' gwa'aisi atin, ama main, nasa'ma anota bret, nandabeten nanifela God, nawalota naso'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' sa'mata pea'ata. Bret atamba alop ae'api.”
Ea' nasa'mai anop kap embel wain bagalapi nanifela God, naso'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' hipai gwa'embel atin.
Embel ambalemba esimbel ae'ambeli bewa' banaga basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi dambaifi. Esimbel ambalemba ae' ekolo'wambela God nokwahomasa waf awafi epes hiasii okom mogaso'anaf.
Ae' a'ipipa, ina ata' itanima ia' wainimbel wapani, owa'. Ae' efe' etaga anamba ahame nagala'ambemagoma, dao' a' ia' anin wain dambaini elomepa anamba.
Amom manda' anof awaf ea', mawisi a' mafe' mondowasa' halafuta Oliv.

Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Atiasi owamb amba'e pindaiwa'ma pagahapifi a pekwahowe. Dei' main, fowa' gani Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, God na'i, ‘Anaf owagama gani, ae' eha aman anamba nugumafi sipsipi noga'. Ea' sipsip amamba atiasi a' mofa' mefe' atona biana.’
“Apa' owa' owa'atin, atiasi ae' itanima asafel wapani a' ili'ipa efe' itap lu'upa Galili.”
Ea' Pita nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “I'i anom owa' mohapifina banagema ma mi'i mokwahena, hapaimi, ihapifina banagewe ina atiasi ikwahina, owa'atin.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, atiasi owamb amba'e awata ata' owa' totaea, ina' a' nendehali'mi ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisasa.’”
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Owa'atin. Esis soha afa' biafa oga' atin. Ae' ina a' indahali'mina, owa'atin endilisi.” Ea' alipumi hiami Jisasi ma'ias na'amba atin hi'alam.
Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafe' atin anagon Getsemani lawah oliv hogotawama. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pepe na'a, ae' efe' gani wa'ol endabeten.”
Ea' anen nao'wa Pita naloma Sebedi nogaopana Jemsi Jon a' mafe'. Ea' name' opaf ananifi a' nimanif kwapete' endilisi.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Nembel ae'ambili nimanimbil a'owa', ma ae' egaga'. Ipa' pepe na'a silisilawi pepe pesase ma igitanimai.”

Ea' anen nandambema nafe' kwasakwasala, a' nowa nambe' opaf notawa nandabeten na'i, “O ahame ae'inai, i'i ina' niga'i awima, dao' nekwahome kap apamba. Apa' owa', ina' nindaila okom ine'imi atom, ae' owa'.”

Nahali'ana ea', nosafel notanima nafe'ma alipumi ananimi magapoma, owa' nati amom a' ma'oh maga' mafe'. Ea' nofala Pita na'i, “Ipa' banagepa pepe pesasa ae' a'a owa'? Nogota a'ipipa a'i pepe pegasasa ae' ina laota, owa'. Nogota bandata si'i aua atitin.
Ipa' solawaipa pepe pendabeten. Na'amba hiahaom mogogwambipai a' motagama ipa'. Endilisi ambagof ipe'igufi fa'i awima pendabeten, apa' alop owa' banagepa, ala'uta tahepa.”
Ea' anen notanima nafe'ma bif nandabeten na'i, “Ahame ae'inai, i'i kap apamba owa' ano'w ufia'wa ae' indihi'amapa, ea' hapaimi, ae' ea' endefa'ap. Ina nindaila okom ine'imi atom.”
Anen nahali'ana ea' nandambemef notanima nafi'i bif magapoma nati amom ata' ma'oh atin, naep amamipi nimanip.
Ea' nakwahom notanima nafe' nandabeten wapanima a' wanif. Beten inimba atin doko' nali' nanda'ani, atin notanima nanda'an wapani.

Ama main, notanima nafi'mai amom magapoma na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ata' papoma noma'w pa'oh atin a'a? Peme'! Nogota ae'atai atataga. Dei' nemaf afa'e anona aman aunai a' nifi'i nulumai anom amam awami mufi'i mowa ae', ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.
Safel! A' ofe' uti aman anamba nigihimba'mama ae'i dei' a' nafi'i.”

Jisas ata' nalutu na'ipam atin, owa' anona aman nafi'i. Aman anamba Judas, anona amom 12-pelaim Jisasi. Anen nafi'i nalomai amam hiami mahapila bainagwi belep. Amom pris dembami malumai amom agufumi dembami esis Judai masapa'am mafi'i.

Ea' aman anamba nogawalapa Jisasi, a' nali' na'ipam nanda' ametal nihimba'maman na'i, “Atiasi ipa' piti ae' igasisi'a dalogwanai, aman anamba ea' ma'una Jisas. Ipa' pihapilana pembalo'ana tatala'ina.”
Ea' anen nafe'ma Jisas kwafalis na'i, “Owamb bu'wambi, Dembinai.” Ea' nasisi' dalogwana.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “O alipunai, hiahawes ina' nafi'i ma na'i nenda'asi, awi ina' da'as kwafalis.” Ea' amom mafi'i felefele'ma anen mowasa' lagof mahapilana sisihina.
Ea' anona aman nape nagaloma Jisasi, nala lagol nagiai bainat ananitai naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii, ea' natopa' aliga ananigai pele'ataga gowa.
Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Sapa' bainat tofe' tope tagapoma. Amom hiami mogapa' bainagwi, atiasi bainagw goham moga'.
Ina' negawa banagami Ahamai a'a owa'? I'i ae' ihali'ana ai, anen naso'ai ensel ananimi hiami a'owa' kwafalis atis, mikila' misi'ah ahamba soldia 12-pelaih. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
Ae' i'i enda' waf afamba ai, atiasi basef ifimba fowa' God na'if fagape buk Baibeli ina atiasi fetaga alihif dondo'ma esis sifi'i sogombale'e, owa'atin.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa hiasi na'i, “Ipa' pefa'i bainagwi belep pafi'i si'i pafi'i pa'i pegewa' anona aman aunai napa' nagaloma gavmani a'a? Nimaguf hiafi ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wafi esis amam nematawa hiasi, apa' ipa' owa' pembale'ea.
Apa' dei' hiahaom amamba ipa' panda'ami mataga dondo'ma basef ifimba fowa' God na'ipa amom profet manda'ef fagail buki a' fataga endilisi.” Ea' alipumi ananimi hiami makwahona mafa' mafe' hi'alam.
Amom amamba mogombalo' Jisasi mofa'ana mafe' ipat anona pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii Kaiafas. Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma agufumi esis Judai mundowa'anima mape.
Apa' Pita ina nalomam nafe' atef owa'. Anen nagigi'mam nafe' nataga indalelemb nawis ipat dembinai prisi nafe' nape naloma amom polisman mapoma nif. Anen na'i nope niti atiasi main netaga.
Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami Juda mugumafi koti, amom hiami ma'i molaoma anis epesa sombaso'ma Jisas sosapagana ma anif basefa mohana nogaga'.
Ea' epes hiasi sataga sa'i basef baso'afi fafe'ma anen. Apa' esis ina satagama anif basef endilisifi kofagefa ma mohana nogaga', owa'. A'i owa' main, anom amam biam mataga
ma'i, “Aman anamba na'i anif basef na'i, ‘Ae' la'ifiwai ma igugulata ipat lu'unai Godi ma itanima egala'ana wapani nimaguf wanif dowaf.’”
Ea' pris anamba dembinai nalutu nahali' Jisas na'amba na'i, “Ina' negwa basef ifimba a'a owa'? Dei' maina amom maga'ipina basef na'amba?”

Owa' Jisas ina na'i anif basef, owa'atin. Ea' pris anamba na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi ma agol Dembinai Godi nagape lifilafii, ina' kipa apa'. Ina' Krais Nogama Godi nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii, a'a owa'?”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipa' pa'ias ea' ma'wis. Apa' ae' a'ipipa, anaf owagama ipa' piti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, epe lagol kwahisigili Godi banagewe. Epe otaga ilif itanima ifi'i petolowe.”

Jisas na'ias na'amba owa' pris anamba a' okom wandafuna ea' nahape' klos amamba anen nagalami na'ias na'i, “Anen a' nanda' dembinai God findiwana ma basef awafi! Apa' ina ata' mofalai anis wapani sifi'i si'i anif basefa anen, owa'atin. Anen na'ipana basef awafi God, ea' ifimba dei' pame'anamef ea'.
Ipa' ukup pape pa'imama?” Amom hiami magwamana ma'i, “Anen nanda' waf awafi ea' andeande'ma a' noga'o.”
Ea' amom misi'wafa amaga Jisasi mahana. Anom mopagamana aomb masopamana naep ananipi ma'i, “Ina' Krais God nasapa'ena nagafi'ii,
ina' a' ni'i basef si'i anona profet naga'iefi newalapa ami nagahinai.”
Pita tol nape indalelemb nomon nape ipat ande'etama. Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwanda' maoli kwafi'i felefele' ma anen ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ina' wapani nape nagaloma Jisas ganimba itap lu'upa Galilii.”
Owa' Pita nandahali' na'i owa' ma naep isimba hiasii na'i, “Ae' ina egawa basef ifimba ina' naga'iefi, owa'atin.”
Ea' nafe' nalutu indalelemb nomon felefele'ma uta, ano'w nemata'w kwatolona wapani kwa'ipa esis amam nematawa sagape felefele'i kwa'i, “Aman anamba anen nape nagaloma Jisas Nasaretinaii.”
Owa' Pita nandahali'ma basef wapani ea' na'i, “Endilisi ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anamba.”
A'i owa' main, owa' anom amam malutu mafi'i ma'ipa Pita ma'i, “Endilisi atis, ina' aman mini'ap amamipi. Diga ine'igai gawalapena alihina.”
“Ea' dei' Pita nosafel na'i basef naga'if banagafi na'i “Endilisi gani ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anamba ipa' dei' paga'inai, owa' atin endilisi.” Anen na'ias ea', owa', awata atata.

Ea' Pita a' okom mandanda' ma basef nambati' Jisas na'ipanaef, naga'i, “Awata owa' ata' totaea, ina' atiasi ina' a' nembaso'mas ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ina' owa' negawea.’” Ea' Pita nawisi nafe' ando' nalef mehip a'owa'.
A'i owa' lala kuhimbita amom pris hiami dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Jisas nogaga'.
Amom mowa'ana mofa'ana mafe' maso' gavman dembinai Pailat.

Dei' aman anamba Judas nagawalapa Jisasa amom boumi nati amom manda' basef mapa'aga Jisasa nogaga'. Ea' nati amom mapa'agana manda' hiahawes isimba, ea' nofa' nimanimi lu'wami a'owa'. Ea' dei' anen notanima nowambela moni silva inimba 30-pelain nafe'ma amom pris amamba dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai.
Ea' na'i, “Ae' anda' waf awafi awalapa aman anamba bu'unai, owa' nonda' waf awafia atiasi a' noga'.” Owa' amom ma'i, “Amamba ina kofagema afa'imi, owa'. Amamba ea' kofagema ine'imi atom.”
Ea' Judas nakwaha moni silva inimba ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, nafe' anagon nandaha nail mandof ea' a' afuna.
Amom pris amamba dembami mofa' moni inimba ma'i, “Moni inimba anin nagatala aman anamba afa' wahana nogaga'i. Ea' afa' ina ombe' moni inimba neloma moni naga'oh ipat lu'unai Godi, owa'i.”

Ea' amom ma'i anif basef mandame'maef, ama moni inimba manda'an matala anep itapa anona aman nagala' malihi. Ea' mofa' itap apamba ma monda' matmata sogawa epes isimba lauginisi safi'i salomas sape sagaga'i.
Ea' dei' sofala agilipa sa'i, “Itap esimbel bagatalipi.” Dei' agol agalemba ma itap apamba ata' gape atapigil.

Ea' anif basef fowa' gani God nigihimba'manaef anona aman profet Jeremaia nanda'afi ifimba dei' a' fataga alihif fandawalap. Basef ifimba faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Amom mofa' otamba silva 30-pelaimba, esis Juda asandandepamba ma aman anambai.
Ea' moni inimba satala anep itapa anona aman nagala' malihi, si'i Dembinai naga'ipa ae' dindinip.”

Amom mofa' Jisas mafe' nalutu nogohnaep dembinai gavman Pailati, ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' king dembinai Judai a'a owa'?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef ifimba ina' naga'iefi endilisifi.”
Ea' amom pris amamba dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai masapagana ma basef hiafi, apa' anen ina nagwamam anif basef, owa'.
Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' name' basef ifimba hiafi esis sanda'mena kotefi, a'a owa'?”
Owa' Jisas ina nagwamana basef Pailat, owa'atin. Ea' dembinai gavman gogolalasona kwapete'.

Nogota atamba gavman anamba dembinai waf ananifi na'amba. Afagof danda ma nemaf afamba bu'wafi esis sanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasiafi, anen a nakwahowa anin epen nanda' kalabusi nafe' wahifin. Epen mamahina esis amam nematawa hiasi sandandepani, dembinai gavman na'i aho' nakwahin nafe'ma esis wahifin.
Nemaf afamba anona aman aunai nape nanda' kalabus, agilinama Barabas. Aman anamba nanda' waf awafi endilisi.

Ea' esis amam nematawa sunduwa'anima salutu. Pailat nogawa amom dembami esis Judai kowalama epes hiasi sagaila basef Jisasi ukup aom atom mapomana dei' manda' kotimana. Isimba atis dei' nahali'as na'i, “Ipa' pa'i ae' ekwaha ami nekwaha kalabus nefe'mago ipa'? Ekwaha Barabas a'a Jisas, esis saga'i Krais dembinai?”

Ea' Pailat nape ipat atamba sandakolas sanda' kota, ea' waulu'mana anani'wi kwasapa' basef fafi'mai anen kwa'i, “Ina' owa'i a' nenda' anin mae awanima aman anamba fasinaia, owa'i. Ae' doko' a'oh owamb andondo'ah atolona ea' efa' akafimi ma anen.”
Apa' amom pris amamba dembami maloma anom agufumi esis Judai masa'ma nomonas esis amam nematawai ma sohali' Pailata nogakwahowa Barabas, a soha Jisas nogaga'.
Ea' dembinai Pailat na'ipas wapani na'i, “Amam amamba biam, ipa' pa'i ae' ekwaha ami nefe'mago ipa'?” Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Barabas.”
Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' enda'mana main aman anamba Jisas paga'i Kraisi?” Esis hiasi nahali'as sa'i “Dolana nil lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai!”
Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' main? Anen nanda' waf maif awafi?” Owa' esis gigal sa'oh sa'i mehip sa'i, “Dolana lawag hana afuna!”

Ea' Pailat a' nogawa basef ananifi ina banagefa nogapa'agas, owa'. Na'amba asonda' wandaf lu'wafi. Ea' Pailat nolai anambel embel nasa'opa lagof ananigufi ma naep esis amam nematawai nindihimba' na'ias na'i, “Ae' kofagema owa'atina egaha aman anamba nogaga'. Maol ipe'ini atin,”
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sagwa basef sa'i, “Ea' kofagema amamba a' mondafi'mai apa' moloma awasi ape'isi.”
Ea' Pailat nakwahowa Barabas nafe'ma esis. Ea' na'ipa amom soldia ma mogopagaha Jisas mofa'ana mefe' mogandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
Ea' amom soldia mofa' Jisas mawisi ipat amom gavmani lu'utai. Ea' mofala anom soldia hiami mafi'i munduwa'anima ma anen.
Ea' mowalia luwaguf maim ananimi malamana anota saket akwahitai.

Ea' mowalo'mana anof mandof higatagufi, mala'watefaf si'i hat mowalo'manana balaga ananigai. Ea' maso'ana anota alifita nahapilata lagol ananigili. Amom mindiwa nembawa motawa felefele'ma anen, manda' salamal lahana ma'i basef findiwaifi ma anen ma'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, ina' king dembinai esis Judai!”
Ea' misi'wafana mandalombana alifita atamba mopagahona balaga ananigai.
Manda'ana findiwana ma ea', mowalimana saket atamba, malamana klos mais ananisi a mofa'ana mafe'ma mogandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
Amom mosafel mafe' owa' mati anona aman Saimon Sairiniinai. Ea' amom soldia masasapa'ana ma notopalopa Jisas nogofa' lawag ananigai.
Ea' mafe' mataga anagon agiligima Golgota. Apa' dei' mambemefagol ma'i, Pipitagol Balagaigil.
Ea' maso'ana anambel embel wainimbel manda' marasin numbutinai nalomambela nea' embel begahagofa akep lu'wami. Anen ata' name' embel atin, owa', nandaiwa'mambel.
Amom mandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea', manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma ami nigikila'i mofa'ef mondondamef atona atin.
Amom tol mape anamba mumafiana.
Ea' manda' anif basef fail lawag ilifugama felefele'ma balaga ananigai. Basef ifimba kotefi Pailat nanda'afi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “AMAN ANAMBA ANEN JISAS, DEMBINAI ESIS JUDAI.”
Felefele'ma Jisas nagaima amom soldia mandola anom biam manda' waf awafii manda' wali. Amom mandola Jisas nail la'afen, ea' mandola amom biam mail wa'owa'ol.
Ea' anis amam nematawa safi'i kilikila' sagaili esis sanda' salamala anen, sapapati balagah sa'ias na'amba
sa'i, “Awi, ina' aman nigugulata ipat anamba Godi, ma netanima negasa'mana nimaguf wanifi, dei' netopalopa ina'. I'i ina' nogama Godiai, nendatagwah nisila'i.”
Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom agufumi esis Judai wapani, hiami malomam manda'ana findiwana ma'i,
“Anen nandatopalopa anis daindaias apa' dei' ina natopalopa anen, owa'atin. Anen dembinai king esis Israeli. Ea' dao' dei' nondatagwah lawag ilif nisila'i ma apa' motolona mogahapifana.
Anen nahapifa God na'ias na'i, ‘Ae' Nogama Godi.’ Ea' dao', i'i God okom mimila anen ai, anen nondatopalopana.”
Ea' amom amamba biam manda' wali sandolam magalumanai manda'ana findiwana si'i amom agufumi mali' manda'manam.
Awin a'i owa' nandasapa' akot lu'unai a' nataga dogw naofana itap hiagoma esis Judai akotigin nape nafe' nafe' nataga awin nandambema nagape gani 3 klok wambomota. Ea' nataga negala' wapani.
Felefele'ma awin nandambema 3 klok, Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabaktani?” Apa' mambemef ma'ias na'amba ma'i, “God ae'inai, God ae'inai, dei' maina ina' nagakwahowe?”
Ea' anis epes salutu felefele' same' anen na'ias na'amba sa'i, “Anen nofala anona profet Elaija.”
Ea' anona aman nasagih nafe' kwafalis nofa' anom mosong magape naohi nalam mowala embel wainimbel numbutimbeli nagiam nasapa'am anagol bagol nandowam mafe'ma Jisas noga' embel.
Owa' anis salutu sa'i, “Ata' ota' kwahowana, ma ata' muti atiasi Elaija nifi'i notagwahona, a'a owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nanda'as go'ala mehip a'owa' wapani ea' ambal ananili a' landahi' lafe'ana.
Owa' anef lowaf lu'wafi si'i utai fegetaol ipat Godi lu'unai nomoni, palalaf gani ilif fewala itap fataga biafif. Ea' itap bol atin nape otamba lu'wami pepe'am.
Ea' anamba sagawa epes sagaga'ima matmat mandawisi' ea' amam nematawa hiasi Godi fowa' sagaga'i sosafel wapani.
Esis sokwaha matmat afamba Jisas nogosafel wapani, sofe' sogawis Jerusalem, wambel sandandepambela sonda' maol Godima. Ea' epes hiasi asatilis.

Kepten anamba dembinai nugumafi soldia hiamii naloma amom soldia mape mugumafi Jisasi mati hiahaom amamba. Nogota atamba mati hiahaom mataga itap bol atin nape, ombal maham a'owa' ma'i, “Endilisi atis, aman anamba Nogamana Godi.”
Nematawa hiawai wagagi'ma Jisasi wakwaha itap apamba lu'upa Galili wafi'i wagatopalopanai awo walutuwi laogon watologon.
Ano'w Maria Makdalai'wi. Ano'w agol atogol Maria, kogola Jemsi Josepi. Ea' ano'w kogola amam biam Sebedi nogaopana.
A'i owa' wambomota anona aman Arimateainai hiahaom hiamunai agilinama Josep anen alipunai nagaila Jisasi a' nafi'i.
Nafe'ma Pailat nahali'ana ma nofa'i alop Jisasi nogawana. Ea' Pailat na'ipa amoma mogaso'ana.
Josep nofa'ap ea' nanda' lowaf namifi afitifi.
Ea' naola'ana nawis matmat ananitai dambaitai, fowa' nagwasana nagawis anom otam lu'unai. Ea' dei' nambema anona otam lu'unai nafe' nowalo uta matmat atamba. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma main, a' nafe'.
Ea' Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w awo agol atogol, awo biawa wape wa'ol felefele' watologon.
Ama a'i owa' wafilu nemaf sagandomba hiahawes gwa'aisi maisafi afamba fafe'ma ea', amom pris dembami maloma amom Farisi dembami mafe' malagama Pailat.

Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' a' ukup papoma anif basef aman anamba nagambaso'ami naga'iefi fowa' anen ata' nagape. Anen naga'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Nimaguf wanif a' fefe'ma hi'ilif owa', ae' a' itanima esafel wapani.’

Isimba atis dei' ina' a' ni'ipam mumafi matmat atamba andeande'ma nimaguf wanif ata' ahi'ilif. Na'amba amom alipumi ananimi a' mifi'i mokwalopana a' mofa'ana mefe' mi'ipa esis amam nematawa mi'i, ‘Anen notanima nosafel matmat wapani.’ Ea' baso'am anamba dei'inai a' lu'una nikila' nagali'i.”
Ea' Pailat na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pe'wa anom soldia pefe' pewalo uta matmat atamba sisihita, si'i ukup ipe'ipi paga'ias dondo'ma gawa ipe'ini.”
Ea' amom mafe' mowalowa matmat sisihita ea' manda'ima uta masaho'mata manda' anin ametal banagani ma epes ina a suwalin suwis. Ea' ma'ipa anom soldia mape mumafiagon.

Nemaf afamba esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sabat fafe'ma hi'alaf, ea' sande nemaf fagali'ma wiki, kuhumbita atota felefele'ma awin nigatafi, nematawa awamba biawa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w agol atogol wafi'i ma ugati matmat.
Ea' kwafalis atis imauna lu'unai nasol mehip. Ea' anona ensel Dembinaii nisila'i gani heven, a' nafe' nelefata owap apamba pegewalo utai nafe' na'oh wa'ol a tol natomana.
Amaga ananigai a gogala' a'owa' si'i otaga pele'alama nogogala' lu'waguf maim ananimi afitim a'owa' si'i ais mandati.
Ea' amam amamba soldia mugumafi matmati a' ombal maham kwapete' a'owa' ambombol atin ma'oh itap si'i sagaga'i.
Owa' ensel anamba na'ipa awo biawa na'i, “Ipa' bipa ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Ae' egawa ipa' pafi'i pa'i pelaoma Jisas, aman anamba esis sagandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
Anen ina ata' nape na'a, owa'. Anen a' notanima nosafel ea' si'i fowa' naga'ipipa! Ipa' fi'i ma ata' piti na'a naga'oma. Dei' a' wafigin nape.
Dei' ipa' fo'o kwafalis pi'ipa alipumi ananimi pi'i, ‘Anen nosafel wapani ea'. Peme'. Anen a' nali'ipa nafe' itap apamba Galili. Ipa' fo'o petolonago ganimba.’ Basef ae'afi ea' ifimba.”
Ea' awo ombal magahawai dei' ea' sonahawa wapani, kwafalis atis wakwaha matmat wasagih wafe'ma uga'ipa amom alipumi ananimi.
Owa' Jisas nati awo ufia'w nanda'mawa gude na'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi endilisi.” Ea' awo wafe' felefele'ma anen wahapila bo'wagah ananigahi ma onda' lotuma anen.
Owa' Jisas na'ipawa na'i, “Ipa' ina a' ombal mehepa, owa'i. Ipa' bipa pefe' pi'ipa amom owape ae'ami mofo'o Galili. Bola motolowe ganimba.”
Nematawa awamba biawa ata' wafe' atin, anom soldia mugumafi matmati a' mafe' mawis taun ma'ipa amom pris dembami ma hiahaom amamba magatagai.
Ea' pris amamba maloma agufumi esis Judai ma'i anif basef mandame'maef ea' maso'ama anin moni hiani nafe'ma soldia anamba
ma'ipam ma'i, “Ipa' piga'ias na'amba pi'i, ‘Owamb afa' waga'ihi, amom alipumi ananimi mafi'i makwalopana mofa'ana.’
Ama gavman dembinai neme' basefana, dao' afa' a' onda' okom ananimi awanema ipa' basef akepa.”

Ea' amom soldia mofa' moni inimba mame' basef amamifi a' magi'mif. Ea' basef ifimba ma hiahawes isimba ea' fafe'agon hi'alagon walemb esis Judai, ea' ata' sa'iif atin fafi'i fatagama dei' sa'if atapif.
Ea' amom alipumi 11-pelaim mafe' Galili mataga halafuta atamba Jisas nali' na'ipam mogafe'ma.
Ea' mati Jisas masa'ma agol ananigili manifelona. Apa' anom a' nomonas bimbiafis sapaom.
Ea' Jisas nafi'i felefele'ma amom na'ipam na'i, “God a' nase'epam ea' banagami ilifami itapami.

Na'amba dei' ipa' pefe' piwalipa amam nematawa ma basef fasifi ae'afi, penda'as sotaga alipisi ma sigaila basef ae'afi datima ea' pipisi'as embela agol Ahamai goloma ae'agili foloma Ambal bu'unai Ananili.

Ea' piwalipasa sogagi'ma basef bu'wafi hiafi ae'afi agawalipipaef dindinipi. Endilisi atis, ae' ape alomepa ma nimaguf hiafi danda, a pefe' pefe' ma nemaf akutaifi nogota hi'igalata.” Basef ea' ma'uf.

Basef ifimba bu'wafima Jisas Krais, Nogamana Godi. Basef ifimba fandasefel fataga si'i anona profet fowa'inai Aisaia nanda'ef fagail buki. Aisaia na'i basef ifimba na'amba, God na'i, “Ina' neme'. Owagama ae' esapa' anona aman nogofa'o basef ae'afii nili' nofe'ma ina' nondondomba ufia'w ine'ikwi.
Anep itap wafigima fataupigima malogol anona amani, anaf ni'i basef na'amba ni'i, ‘Ipa' pendondomba ufia'w Dembinaii kondafe' usi'i'w. Ufiawa ananiwai kondafe' hilili'i.’”

Jon nagapisi'as embeli nafe' anagon wafigima fataupigima nawalapa basefa amam nematawa hiasi na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf awafi pembema nelelemba God pefa' baptaisa God nogakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi okom mogaso'anaf.
Ea' esis hiasi sagape anep itap lu'upa Judiai saloma amam nematawa hiasi sagape Jerusalami safi'mai Jon sa'i seme' basef ananifi. Ea' sawalapa waf awafi esis sanda'afi, Jon napisi'as walemb Jordan.
Anen nala anom klos sanda' auf anom mafis lu'wami kameli sanda'am, ea' nowaho' let sanda' agwahup mafisina sanda'anai, nagundisam. Gwa'aisi naga'asi na' gwamu'wis saloma aupimbel alupumi.
Anen nawalapa basef na'i, “Anona aman atiasi nigi' nugafi'ii, anan banagonai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma egatagwaha mandalefa su ananimi, owa'.
Ae' ipisi'ipa embel atembal, apa' anen owa'. Anen atiasi nese'epa Ambal bu'unai Godi nogape opalef ipe'ilifi nomon.”
Afamba Jisas nakwaha Nasaret anep itap lu'upa Galili a' nafi'i. Jon napisi'ana walemb Jordan.
Jisas nakwaha embel walemb nandagiai atin, owa' nati heven nandawisi' alihina, ma anen, nati Ambal bu'unai Godi nafi'mai anen si'i amil alamba apa' maga'i ma'unai nufia' nisila'mai anen.
Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i anif basef ga'i, “Ina' Nogame ae'inai. Ae' okom mohafel maimailina a'owa'. Ea' okom ae'ami bo'oma ina'.”

Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nofa' Jisas nafe' anagon fataupigima mafis atom alupumi magalutuma nimaguf 40-pelaif, awin si'ini du'wanini. Owa' Satan nafi'i nagwambana. Ma ea', amom ensel mafi'i mumafi Jisas matopalopana.
Afamba amom manda' Jon nanda' kalabus, Jisas a' nafe' itap lu'upa Galili nanda' maol nawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi na'ipasef
na'i, “Nemaf afamba felefele' afetaga ma epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Na'amba ipa' dei' pendewa' alafugaha waf awafi pembema nelelemb pihapifa basef ifimba bu'wafi.”
Jisas naila akata nafe' atin dumb lu'wambi Galili, nati amam biam Saimon naloma owamana Andru. Amom mala anembeh mowafa agof manda' bisnis.
Ea' Jisas natolom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pifi'i pihapila basef ae'afi pila ae'. Fowa' ipa' pewafa agof, apa' dei' ihimba'mepa pefe' piga'ipa anis epes pefa'asi sogaila ae'.”
Ea' mame'ana makwaha anembeh ha'oh, amom mailana a' mafe'.
Ea' nindiki'ah nafo'o felefele' akata nati Jems naloma owamana Jon, Sebedi nogaopana. Amom biam matoma bot mape mosambala anembeh amamimbihi.
Owa' Jisas natolom nofalam kwafalis mame'ana. Ea' mohafel kwafalis makwaha ahamam naloma anom manda' maola anini mape bot, amom biam maila Jisas mafe'.

Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi Jemsi Jon, Saimoni Andru mafe' Kaperneam mape. Nemaf afamba esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, Jisas nao'wam mafe' mawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai ea' na'ipasa basef amam nematawa.

Esis same' basef ananifi ea' gogolalasis kwapete' endilisi. Anen ina nawalipas si'i amam falafumi maga'ipas, owa'. Anen na'ipas dindinip si'i anona agilinai naga'ipas. Amom magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ina mawalipas na'amba si'i anen, owa'.
Afamba anona aman nape nalomas ipat atamba, ambal aunai napaona ea' kwafalis atin ambal anamba noga na'i mehip na'i,
“O Jisas ina' Nasaretinai, ina' nafi'i na'i nenda' maina apa'? Nafi'i ma negahambombagapa? Ae' egawena ina' aman bu'unai hilili'i Godi.”
Ea' Jisas ninifalom na'i, “Ina' ambalip awinai, sopama malogol kwahowa aman anamba fo'o.”
Ea' ambal anamba aunai nakoto' anen kwapete' nanda'am go'ala mehip nakwahona nawisi nafe'.

Ea' amam nematawa hiasi gogolalasis sandakoto'ma ea' sanda'ipama sa'i, “Amamba main da'im? Ifimba anif basef dambaifi? Anen natofa ambagof awami na'ipam si'i anona aman banagonai. Hiahaom amamba hiami maloma ambagof awami wapani mame' basefana makwaha epes mafa' mafe'.”
Ea' basef ifimba ma maol Jisas nanda'ani fafe'agon hi'alagon walemb hiagoma bagape nomona itap apamba lu'upa Galili.
Jisas naloma alipumi biamibiam ananimi mosafel makwaha ipat Juda sandakolasatai ea' usi'im mafe' wambel Saimoni Andrui ea' mawis ipat amamutai. Jemsi Jon wapani mafe' malomam.
Ea' esis sa'ipa Jisasa Saimon nandagi'mo'wi awasi'w kwa'oh, alop akwa'upi nifip.
Ea' nafe'ma ako'w nahapila lagol akwa'ugili nasa'ma'w. Ea' aowas inimba nakwaho'w nafe' ambo'okw, kwanda'masas gwa'aisi esis.
A'i owa' wambomota awin newala naso', esis sofa'ai isimba aowas nanda'asi saloma anis ambagof awami magapaisi safi'mai Jisas.
Ea' esis hiasi sagape taun inimbai safi'i salutu felefele'ma uta ipat sili'ak.

Ea' Jisas nanda' amam nematawa hiasi aowas naninani nanda'asi bo'wes, natofamasa anom ambagof awami magapaisi ea' sataga bo'wes. Ambagof awami mogawa Jisas anen nogamana Godi. Na'amba nasopama malogof ambagof amambai afasopam be' mape.
Wafilu kuhimbita atota akot ata' tail, Jisas nosafel nakwaha ipat atamba nagapoma. Anen atona nosafel nafe' anamba wafigima ea' nape nanda' betena God.
Saimon naloma anom alipumi ananimi mosafel matimana owa', ea' molaomana magi'mana mafe'.
Molaomana mafe'ma matolona ma'ipana ma'i, “Epes hiasi solaomena.”
Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ata' diamaso, afa' ata' ofe' analemb walemb daialemb hiagoma bagape felefele'i. Ae' ata' i'ipasa basef bu'wafi esis. Maol inimba atin ae' dei' afi'i.”
Ea' naso'asa basef nafe'agon hi'alagon walemb hiagoma agol lu'wagoma Galili, naso'asa basef bu'wafi nomon ifagw Juda sandakolasugwi natofamas ambagof awami magape anis epesi mandahi' mawisi mafe'.
Owa' anona aman aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi pagambu'wi, nafi'i felefele'ma Jisas nindiwa nembawa notawa na'ipana dindinip na'i, “I'i ina' ni'i aho' netopalope ma egataga bo'owe.”
Ea' Jisas nati anen uwahipina nando lagola nasagol anen na'i, “Ae' a'i aho'ma ina' negataga bo'wena.”
Ea' dei' atef aowas anamba nanda' alop pagambu'wi nakwahona ea' bo'ona.
Jisas nasapa'ana kwafalis na'ipana dindinip

na'i, “Ina' a' nefe' ni'ipa anin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena bo'wena, owa'i. Ina' fo'o nihimba'ma alop ine'ipi ma aman anamba pris. Ea' nese'ana hiahaom amamba anen nondolalima God ea' ina' ninifelona ma nagataga bo'wena si'i mu'uli anan nagaso' Mosesani naga'i. Ama amam nematawa hiasi sitilina sogogawa aowas ine'ini ahi'alan.”

Owa' owa'atin. Aman anamba na'ipasam mafe'agon hi'alagon amam nematawa hiasi sogawa amamba ma anen nagataga bo'ona. Ea' Jisas ina nafe' nawis anambel wambel ma naep hiasii, owa'. Na'amba hiasi sifi'i sososopamana. Ea' ina nawis anambel wambel lu'wambili, owa'. Atapina nape anamba wafigima atogon. Bola esis amam nematawa sagape ganiganii safi'mai anen.
Anif nimaguf fafe'ma main, Jisas notanima nafe' Kaperneam. Ea' esis same' basefa anen a nafi'i nape ipat.
Amam nematawa hiasi sandakolas ipat atamba nagapautai asi'ita dogw. Na'amba uta owa' anagon nogal kwasakwasala ma sofe' sogawisa. Ea' nawalipasa basef ifimba bu'wafi.
Owa' anom amam biamibiam manda' belita malai aman anamba lagufi bo'wagah sandahapimanai mofa'ana ma'i mofe'ma Jisas.

Owa' ipat asi'itama amam nematawa hiasi salutu sili'ak, ea' ina anagona mofa'ana muwis mogafe' felefele'ma Jisas, owa'atin. Ea' malota ipat ilif ande'etama mapisila bogwan ilif mapa belita mala'ana nowalai nomon Jisas nagalutuma.

Nogota atamba Jisas nati amom a' nogawa amom mahapifana ma'i anen banagonai ma nogatopalopa aman anamba aowas nanda'anai. Ea' na'ipa aman anamba na'i, “Ina' epen ae'inai. Waf awafi ina' nanda'afi ae' akwahomenaf hi'alaf.”
Ea' anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mape mame'ana. Nelelemb amamilimbi awalemba basef ananifi. Na'amba amom nomonas salasafe' ma'i,
“Dei' maina Jisas naga'ias na'amba? Anen nanda' God findiwana. Owa' atina anona aman la'ifinaima nogakwaha waf awafia. Maol inimba God atona nanda'ani.”
Jisas nogawa nomonas isimbai amamisi ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina nomonas ipe'isi sagape na'amba?”

Dei' hiahaom maim ipa' pa'i ahifima ae'? Ae' banagiwai ma i'ipa aowas nanda'anai iga'i, ‘Ae' ekwahomana waf awafi anen nanda'afi, a'a i'ipana iga'i nosa'ma alahis ananisi nosafel nogafe'. Basef ifimba ma nogasa'ma alahis ananisi pa'i amamba ahifima ae'.
Ae' a'i ipa' pegawa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, la'ifiwai ma egakwaha waf awafi hiafi amam nematawa sagape itapi sanda'afi. Ae' a'i ihimba'mepa ae' la'ifiwai ma enda' hiahaom amamba.”
Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina, ina' safel sa'ma alahis ine'isi fo'o ipat ine'itai.”

Ea' esis salutu satolona sati anen kwafalis nosafel nasa'ma alahis naga'ihisi a' nafe'. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi gogolalasis kwapete'as, safela agol Godi lu'wagol sa'i, “Fowa' apa' ina mati anom si'i na'amba, owa'atin.”
Jisas notanima naila akata nafe' dumb lu'wambi agilimba Galilii. Amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen na'ipasa basef bu'wafi.

Jisas nosafel nafe' owa', nati anona aman Livai, Alfius nogamana nape ipat sogofa' takisa. Aman anamba nogofa'asa takisa amam nematawa hiasii. Jisas nofalana na'i, “Ina' fi'i nila ae'.’ Ea' nosafel nafe' nailana.

Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi ma' gwa'aisi ipat Livaii maloma amam hiami awami. Anom mogofa' takisi, anom manda' waf awafii maloma Jisas ma' gwa'aisi. Amam amambai ina mahapifa Jisas, owa'. Mailana dowaf.

Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi amom Farisi mati Jisas na' gwa'aisi naloma amam awami maloma amam amamba mogofa' takisi. Ea' mahali' alipumi ananimi ma'i, “Dei' maina dembinai tisa nape naloma amom mogofa' takisi maloma amam amamba manda' waf awafii maga' gwa'aisi atogon?”

Ea' Jisas name'am na'amba na'ipam na'i, “Isimba aowas akasi ina sofe'ma dokta, owa'. Esis bu'wasi. Apa' isimba aowas nanda'asi atis dao', safe'ma dokta. Ae' ina afi'i ma egefala epes isimba bu'wasi sagape hilili'i, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma egefala isimba sanda' waf awafii.”

Anef nemaf amam amamba alipumi Joni maloma anom dembami Farisi mololama gwa'aisi ma mondabeten bu'wani. Ea' anom amam daiam mafi'i ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Dei' maina amom alipumi Joni maloma amom Farisi mololama gwa'aisi ma mandabeten, apa' ine'imi owa' mololama gwa'aisia?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'i basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anis sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma anis aman nemata'w bias sondaso'amai, ipa' pa'i esis alipisi atiasi sololama gwa'aisi isimba? Owa'atin endilisi. Nemaf afamba esis bias sondaso'ama, alipisi asasisi sonohas sea' gwa'aisi solomas.
Apa' anafa anis daias sofa' aman anamba nagaso' nemata'wi nogafe' laogon dao', esis sololama gwa'aisi, apa' dei' ata' owa'atin.”

Ea' Jisas nanda' anif basef waminif atina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma pegatopa' lowaf namifi pesambalef fegaloma anef lowaf apifi, owa'. I'i penda'as na'amba, atiasi lowaf afamba namifi fendatagwah fehape' apifi bolotaf a' notaga lu'una.”

Ea' na'i anif wapani na'i, “Apa' ina anin epen nakolo'wa embel wain dambaini bewala agwahup apinai memeina si'i botol, owa'atin. I'i anin nenda'am na'amba, embel wain netef hian, nohape' agwahup anamba pepe'etana wain kolo'olam awasim hi'ilam. Na'ambai owa'. Anin nakolo'an agwahup dambainai atona.”
Anef nemaf Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat, Jisas nafe' nawis anof aof sagawa witafi si'i raisi. Ea' alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana mosaga anom wit magaufi ma'am.
Ea' anom dembami Farisi ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Neme'. Alipumi ine'imi manda'as na'amba ma main? Amom mosambala mu'uli ma nemaf afamba magapoma noma'wafi sabat.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom Farisi na'i, “Ipa' pegawa basef fagape Baibeli ma waf fowa' dembinai king Devit nanda'afi. Afamba Devit naloma alipumi ananimi gwa'aisi akam nolom magaham. Ipa' pegawa basef ifimba ea'.

Nemaf afamba Abiatar nape dembinai pris nagali'ma amom prisi, Devit nolom mahana nawis ipat Godi na' bret atamba mondolalima Godatai. Mu'uli ape'ini lu'wani na'i amom pris atom mea'ata. Anis daias owa'i. Apa' Devit ina nagi'ma mu'uli inimba, owa'. Anen na'ata nanda'ata naso' alipumi ananimi ma'ata atin.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “God nali' nanda' epes ea' nagi' na'ipasa nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sabata nogatopalopas. Ina nanda' epesa sogaila basefa sabat, owa'. Na'amba alipumi ae'ami mogosaga witi ina manda' waf awafi, owa'.
Ae' atowe ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ape dembiwai ma hiahaom hiami. Ea' ape dembiwai ma nemaf afamba sabata iga'ipipa maol main andeande'ma pigaila basef penda'an nemaf afamba.”
Anef nemaf Jisas nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai, nati anona aman lagol awagilinai nape.
Ea' anis sala' solaoma basef kwamaifi ma sosapagana sonda'mana kot. Ea' satolona naep paipailana ma siti nonda' aman anamba bo'ona nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi a'a owa'?
Ea' anen na'ipa aman anamba lagol awagilinai na'i, “Ina' lutu la'afena naep hiasii.”

Ea' Jisas nahali'as na'i “Mu'uli lu'wani ape'ini na'ias na'imama? Apa' monda' waf fasifi nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi a'a monda' waf awafi? Apa' monda'asa motopalopa esis sogape andeande' a'a mohambombagas sogaga'?” Owa' esis ina sa'i anif basef, owa'.

Jisas nasa'ma naep natilis tulif owa', nogawa esis opalef maso' sandaiwa'ma sogame' basef. Na'amba okom ananimi wandafuma esis. Ea' nati esis uwahipis, na'ipa aman anamba lagol awagilinai na'i, “Dowa lagol ine'igili.” Ea' nandowagol gataga bo'wagol wapani.
Ea' amom dembami Farisi mosafel mafe' maloma anom amam mini'ap Heroti, ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Jisas nogaga'.
Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi makwaha wambel ambalemba mafe' dumb lu'wambi Galili. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'i walemb hiagoma Galili safe' sagi'mana.

Esis safi'i hiagoma. Anis safi'i walemb hiagoma Judia, anis safi'i Jerusalem, anis safi'i itap lu'upa Idumea, ea' anis sagape walemb Jordan gani wa'ili saloma anis sagafi'i walemb bielimbi Tairi Saidoni, esis hiasi safi'mai anen. Same' basefa hiahaom Jisas nanda'ami, na'amba safi'mai anen.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Amam nematawa hiasi sape. Na'amba a' sofafa'asowe. Anota bot tola tosasae ma ilita egatoma.”
Ea' sogawa anen nali' nanda' epes hiasi aowas nanda'asi sagataga bu'wasi. Ea' isimba aowas nanda'asi sanda' bambasi'ma atin safe'ma anen sahapilana ma sogataga bo'wes.

Ambagof awami magape epesi mati anen mogawana, ea' mowa ma'oh felefele'ma anen opafunama, ea' mofalana ma'i, “Ina' nogamana Godi.” Nogota mamahotama ma nemaf afamba atef magatolona manda'manam na'amba atin.
Ea' na'ipa ambagof awami dindinipa amom ina mowalapa anen mi'ipasana mi'i anen nogamana Godi, owa'i.
Jisas nafe' nondowasa' halafuta, nofala amam amamba anen okom maga'iami mafi'mai anen.
Ea' nandandepa amom 12-pelaima mope mogalomana atapima, nosapa'am mefe' mogowalapa basef.
Na'ipam naso'ama banagami ma mogatofa ambagof awami magape epesi.
Amom 12-pelaim nandandepami, agofuma amamba. Saimon agol wa'agol Pita,
ea' Jems nogama Sebedi, naloma owamana Jon, naso'ama agof wa'agof Boanesis. Agol agalemba kofagogola na'amba, nogaopa otaga diwagalai.
Ea' Andru, Filip, Bartolomyu, Matyu, Tomas, a Jems nogama Alfiusi, a Tadiusi Saimon. Aman anamba Saimon anen mini'ap Seloti.
Ea' Judas Keriotinai aman anamba nafe' nagawalapa Jisasa bousii.
Jisas nafe' ipat ea' esis hiasi safi'i wapani. Ea' naloma alipumi ananimi ina ata' ma' gwa'aisi, owa'.
Esis wambota Jisasi same' basef ifimba ma anen naloma alipumi ina ma' gwa'aisi, safi'i sa'i so'wana. Ea' sa'i, “Anen ambagof awami manda'ana dei' nahaga nagaol.”
Anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mapani Jerusalem mulianai mambaso'am ma'i, Jisas natofa ambagof awami ma banagami anona ambal aunai mamana agilinama Bielsebul.
Ea' Jisas nofalai amom mafi'i malutu felefele'ma anen na'i anif basef waminif atina amom na'i, “Satan ina notofa anen atona, owa'atin.
I'i anis analemb walemb hiagoma esis atis sondatopa' biafisa sogapa', ina atiasi banages, owa'atin. Esis sandawal biafis a' owa' banagesa.
I'i anis anota wambota sagape ipat atototai sondawal mini'ap biafipa sogapa', esis ea' sandatopa' biafis, ina atiasi sope banages, a' owa'atin. Ea' sandawal biafis.
I'i wambota Satani sondawal biafis sogapa' atiasi wambota ananitai banages si'imama? Owa'atin. Satan wapani ina banagona, a' owa'atin.”

“Anona aman ina banagona nefe' nuwis ipat anona aman banagonai nagapautai dowaf nonda' wala hiahaom ananimi, owa'. Anen ata' nili' nombalo'ana ma nowa'ana sisihina dao', anen banagona nuwis nonda' wal nogofa'i hiahaom maga'oh ipat aman anambai.”

Amom magawalipasa mu'uli Godii mambaso'am manda' findiwama Ambal bu'unai Godi ma'i, “Anona ambal aunai natopalopa Jisas nanda' maol ananini.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa, atiasi God nokwaha waf awafi fafifafi hiafi feloma basef findiwaifi hiafi amam nematawa sanda'afi hi'ilaf. Apa' epen ami nenda' basef findiwaefa Ambal bu'unai Godi, God atiasi owa'atin endilisi ma nogakwaha findiwa anamba aunai ma epen inimbaia, owa'atin. Findiwa aunai atapina nopain dei' nefe' anaf wapani, atapina nope.”

Afamba Jisas naloma hiasi sape salomana ipat nomon. Ea' ma'mana kwaloma owapana ananimi safi'i sataga salutu ipat ando'. Nomon asi'igina epes. Ea' salutu ando' sa'ipa anis sawis sa'ipana sa'i Jisas nuwisi ando' nefe'ma esis.
Ea' isimba hiasi sape sagalomanai sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' neme', ma'mena ine'ikwi kwaloma owapena ine'imi salutu ando' sa'i solomena si'i.”
Ea' nagwamasa basef na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Ma'mai owape ae'asi ami?”
Anen nati esis amam nematawa sape sagalipana na'ipas na'i, “Piti ma'mai kwaloma owape ae'asi isimba.
Epes mamahisa sigaila okom Godii ma sonda' waf ananifii, isimba ma'me owape hanitiame ae'asi.”

Anef Jisas nasefela maol wapani nanda'an nawalipa amam nematawa hiasi felefele'ma dumb lu'wambi Galili. Ea' esis safi'i salipana sape. Ea' nalota natoma anota bot tagala embel dumb ambambai, apa' esis sape akata felefele'ma embel. Ea' naso'asa basef hiafi waminif atin na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Ipa' peme'! Anona aman nafe' nowaha olemb witimb si'i raisi anof aof.
Anen nowahemb nafe', anemb bewa ufia'w sagafe'ma ea' amiguf fufia' fafi'i fa'amb.

Anemb bewa itap otambaipa, itap ina lu'up, owa'. Kwasala'up patoma ilif atogon owa' pewala awina, ea' batagai kwafalis apa' masilimb ina bewafa bewala itap atep, owa'. A'i owa' awin natafi ma owaf faluwi fahamb, otamba bega'efamb alimb.
Anemb bewala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofana wit, ea' ina malo andeande' mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
Ea' anemb bewa itap bu'wapi, ea' bataga lu'umb, bail bela gwa'aisi. Anona nola 30-pelaimb, anona 60 apa' anona nola 100-pelaimb.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' aligah hagagalipai ma pagame' basef ifimbai, peme'ef andeande' ukup pendapomef.”
A'i owa' maina Jisas atona nape, alipumi 12-pelaim ananimi maloma anis sape sagalomanai safi'i sahali'ana ma basef ifimba waminif atini.

Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God ea' nihimba'mepa basef kofagefa fape fandambahi'i ma epes sogawis nomona maol bu'wani ananini nope Dembinai nugumafias. Dei' God ea' nihimba'mepa basef ifimba kofagefa alihif. Ipa' pame'ef pegawef ea'. Apa' esis isimba sogolalama Godi, owa'atin. Esis same' basef waminif atini atif.

Ama anif basef fagape Baibeli fandawalap fa'ias faga'i, ‘Esis anaf sotologon, apa' ina siti anin mae, owa'. Ea' esis sogahembe' seme' basef, apa' ina sogawa kofagefa, owa'atin. Ama esis ina sogawa basef kofagefa sombema nelelemba egakwaha waf awafi asasifi, owa'atin.’”
Jisas nahali' esis na'i, “Ipa' owa' pegawa basef ifimba waminif atin doko' aga'ipipafia? Atiasi ipa' pelafa basef waminif atini hi'ilif pi'imama?
Dei' aman anamba nogowaha olemb gwa'aimbii, anen si'i anona naga'ipasa basef Godii.
Ea' olemb ambamba begewa ufia'wi si'i anis sagame' basefi, owa', Satan nafi'i nelefata basef ifimba God nagaso'asef nelelemb asasilimbi.
Apa' anemb bewa bafe' anagon otambaigimai, ambamba si'i anis epes same' basef Godi sofa'ef kwafalis sandagalamef.

Apa' isimba si'i masilimb owa' bewafa begewala itap awinia. Esis sahapilif nogota bandata ma a'i owa', anis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma sagahapifa basef Godi sanda'as findiwas sahas sanda'masa waf awafi ea' kwafalis atis sandahagas sakwaha sagahapifa Godi.
Anemb begewala mandelef wandafumi la'afini, ambamba si'i anis same' basef sailif safe',

a'i owa' hiahaom nimanimi maloma hiahaom esis satolom kowagalasami baso'ami maloma moni uga maina esis sa'i sogofa'ami hiami magape itapanai, amambai mataga maofana basef Godi. Ea' ina sahapifif sanda' waf bu'wafi banages, owa'atin. A sowa si'i gwa'aisi owa' sogalo andeande'ia.

Apa' anemb begawa itap fasipai si'i epes isimba same' basef bu'wafi sofa'ef sahapilif sanda' waf fasifii. Anis si'i begela 30-pelaisi, apa' anis si'i begela 60-pelaisi, apa' anis si'i begela 100-pelais hiasi.
Jisas na'ipas nanda' basef waminif atin na'i, “A'i epes sakata lambeh sopalo'ambeh ha'oh belitagw lafelagwa a'a sopalo'ambeh handambaho' baket? Owa'atin. Esis sawamonambeh belitagw ilif.
Hiahaom mape mandambahi'i, anaf motaga alihigima hiasi sotolom sogawam. Apa' hiahaom hiami ata' sambaho'wam maga'ihi, anaf motaga mondawalap, hiasi sogawam.
Ipa' aligah hagagalipai pagame' basefi, ipa' pendame'ef andeande'.”

Ea' na'ipam wapani na'i, “Basef ipa' pagame'afi, ifimba a' pendegawef andeande'. Basef mamahifa faloma waf maif ipa' panda'masaf anis daiasi, ikwaf afamba atef anaf God nogwamepaf ipa', ea' nowatanimipa anom wapani.
Epes ami sagahapila basef Godii, atiasi God nowatanimasef wapani. Apa' isimba owa' sogahapilifia, atiasi basef kwawia'wif ifimba esis sogahapilafi, God a' nondalombasef esis ea' sope dowaf.”

Jisas na'ipas basef waminif atin na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias, amamba si'i anif basef waminif atin dei' ae' iga'ipipafi. Anona aman nowaha olemb gwa'aimbi aof ananifi.
Ea' nafi'i nape baop na'oh owambeh hiembihi, nape nimaguf hiafi safe' apa' olemb ambamba nagawambi bataga balo lu'wimb ba'imama? Anen ina nogawa bagataga bataga ba'imama, owa'atin.
Itap atep panda' olemb ambamba bataga balo bela gwa'aisi sailamb. Doko' ata' soh atoh hali', a'i owa' main, afis sataga ea' gwa'aisi sandanda' lu'wis sail.
Ea' satagama a'i owa' lu'wis, afis andeande' asaof. Nemaf afamba sagala' gwa'aisiefi fataga, aman anamba nanda' maol naloma nagwatop.”
Jisas na'ias wapani na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias na'amba atin si'i main? Ae' indila'waifam i'i basef maif waminif atini?
Analef nalelef mastetilif sa'usa'ulifi si'i nalelef waminipilif. Ina lu'walef a'owa' si'i sa'utip gwa'aipi lawah hiagahi magawagah itapi, owa'. Afalemba sa'osa'olef a'owa'. Anen nagawaf itap.

Nawafa main, natagai ma nagalo lu'una a' nikila' lawah hiagahi hogotawa aofahi. Nataga lawag lu'unai, agof fandalona fafe'agon ganigani. Ea' amiguf fafi'i fala owah fandambaho'ma owaf fatoma agufugama.”
Jisas na'ipas basef waminif atin si'i nali' naga'ipasafi. Na'ipas nondola'waifa hiahawes hiasi fagi'ma gawa asasini nafe' negetambel.
Anen ina na'i anif basef alihifa esis, owa'. Anen na'if waminif atin. Apa' a'i owa', alipumi ananimi atom malomana mape, dao' na'ipamef alihif kofagefa waminif atini.
Nemaf afamba atef, wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Afa' a' ofe' dumb ambamba fisanamb.”
Ea' amom makwaha esis amam nematawa hiasi mafe' bot atamba Jisas nagatumatai mofa'ata mafe'. Anis daias sofa' anogw botagw daiagw waloma bot atamba safe'.
Ea' anona fufin lu'unai naluwi, naoh manda'am lasiali' mafe' mawis bot nomon ea' ta'i si'itama embel.
Jisas na'oh nolola bot tagagi'ma nola pilo' na'oh. Ea' amom mafe' minimbalona ma'ipana ma'i, “Tisa dembinai, afa' wa'i ahigililafa, ina' negawafa, a'a owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nosafel ninifala fufin na'ipa embel naoh na'i, “Ipa' ea'. Fufin neloma embel ipa' be' pepe.” Ea' fufin nowala, embel ina ata' lasiali' a' owa'atin betah hilili'.
Ea' na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' ombel mahepama main? Ipa' pihapifa basef Godi pa'i ae' banagiwai, a'a owa'?”
Ea' amom mati na'amba, ombel maham kwapete' endilisi ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Anen epen ami? Na'ipa fufini embel same'ana sagahapifana?”
Jisas nao'wa alipumi nafe' nataga anagon wa'ol dumb ambamba itap esis Gerasai sagapoma.
Anen nakwaha bot nisila'i, kwafalis atin anona aman ambagof awami magapaunai nafi'mai anen. Aman anamba nape na'oh dondol wandelef sagawa epes sagaga'ima nafi'i. Ea' sen wapani ina sisihina, owa'.

Esis sali' sombalo'ana sumafiana dondol, sanda' seni hankap banagami sowa'ana lagof bo'wagahana lifilafi. Owa' owa'atin. Anen nahape'am atin. Owa' anin epen banagena nembalo'ana sisihina nogapea, owa'atin.
Dondol owamb alip nape nafe' wandelef halafutagw, nagafe' nanda'am wiwa nafe'. Nasa'ma otamba hikalimi natotopa' alop ananipi.
Anen ata' nati Jisas nafi'i laogon, nasagih nafi'i nindiwa nembawa notaomana.

Ea' Jisas nogawa aman anamba ambagof awami magapaunai. Ea' na'ipam na'i “Ipa' ambagof aupai, ipa' kwahowa aman anamba.” Ea' anen hoga'ala mehip na'i “Jisas, ina' Nogamana dembinai God nagape ilif endilisii, ina' na'i nenda' maina ae'? Ae' a'ipina endilisi gani ilifa agol Godi, ina' owa'i nese'e akafimia.”
Owa' Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Agol ine'igili ami?” Anen na'i, “Apa' ambagof aupai hiapai. Dei' agol ape'igili mini'ap laupi.”
Ea' nahali' Jisas dindinip na'i, “Ina' netofafa ofa' ofe' anep itap lauguni, owa'i.”
Anagof bogof hiagufi falutu fa' gwa'aisi anota damota felefele'.
Ea' ambagof amamba mofala Jisas ma'ipana dindinip ma'i, “Ina' netofafa ofe' uwis ope oloma bogof gwagwafumba.”

Ea' Jisas na'i aho'mam, makwaha aman anamba mawisi a' mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof agwafomba hiagufi 2000-pelaiguf fafa' fafe' mehip kwapete'agof filiana anagon awagoma tata. Ea' bogof agwafomba hiagufi fafa' fafe' mehip fowala ta'alogol awagoma tata fola embel dumb afum hi'alam.
Ea' amom mugumafiagufi mafa' mafe' ma'ipasa basef ifimba wambel lu'wagoma amam nematawa hiasi. Ea' ma'ipas anagon daiagon wapani ma hiahaom amamba amom magatulumi.
Ea' safi'mai Jisas sati aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai, dei' ambo'ona nomonas fasisi sapaona andeande' nowaho' lowaf nape. Amam nematawa hiasi satalona ombel mahas.
Ea' esis sagati hiahaom amambai, sa'ipa esis wambelisi ma hiahaom magataga aman anamba ambagof awami magapaunai. Ea' sa'ipas hiahaom magatagama bogufi wapani.
Ea' esis hiasi sa'ipa Jisas dindinip sa'i nokwaha itap apamba asasima nofo'o anagon.
Ea' Jisas nalota bot owa', aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai nahali' Jisas dindinip na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena.”
Apa' Jisas ina na'i aho'mana, owa'. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nefe'ma esis wambota atota ine'isi ni'ipasa amamba dembinai nanda'menam ine'i nati uwahipina ma nanda'ena bo'wena.”
Ea' aman anamba nafe' nawalapa basef ifimba na'ipasef walemb ilifunamailimb Dekapolisa hiahaom Jisas nanda'manami. Ea' esis amam nematawa gogolalasis kwapete ukup malamafe'.
Jisas nofa' bot notanima nambo dumb ambamba nafe' fisana gani wa'ol, ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'i sape salagamana felefele'ma dumb akata
ea' anona aman Jairus nugumafi ipat Juda sandakolasatai nafi'i. Anen nati Jisas, nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi.
Ea' na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Sa'ukwi nogame ae'akwi afagof 12-pelaiguf fagalo'akwi felefele' kwa'i akoga'. Ae' a'i ina' nefe' newamona lagol ine'igili ako'wa ambal lopao'w kogape namo'w.”
Jisas nalomana mafe', hiasi amam nematawa safe' sagi'mam sandalili'amona atin salutu dogw.
Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape kwalomas, aowas aowasini nanda'a'w kwape gamba atapi'w afagof 12-pelaiguf.
Ako'w kwafe'ma dokta hiasi saso'akwa akafimi, ea' kwalamona moni ako'wini hi'alana kwagatala dokta isimba hiasi ma sonda'akw bo'okw, owa' owa'atin. Aowas inimba nataga lu'win atapin napao'w.
Ea' kwame' basefa Jisas nafela anis aowas nanda'asi ambo'wes. Ea' kwaloma amam nematawa hiasi kwafi'i alafuga Jisasi kwahapila lowaf ananifi.
Ako'w okom mandanda' ma'i, “Ae' egasa lagola lowaf ananifi, atiasi ambo'owe.”
Ea' kwafalis atin esimbel pele'atam ea' kwame' alop akwa'upi pataga bo'op, aowas dei' a' nafe' ea'.
Ea' Jisas name' alop ananipi powafa, name' anom banagami ananimi makwahona mafe'ma manda' anin epen bo'wen. Na'amba nandambema la'afena esis hiasi na'i, “Ami nasa lagola lowaf ae'afi?”
Ea' alipumi ananimi ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' natilis a'a owa' amam nematawa isimba hiasi salutu sandalili'amona atin sagalomafa? Dei' maina ina' ata' naga'i, ‘Ami nasa lagola ae'?’”
Ea' Jisas nandambema natologon na'i niti inimba nagahapilanai.
Ea' nemata'w akwamba kogawa hiahawes isimba sagatagama'wi, ombal maha'w ambombol atin. Ea' kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kotawa felefele'ma anen, kwawalapa hiahaom kwa'iam alihim.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Nemata'w, ina' ea' nahapifa ae' banagiwai. Isimba atis dei' anda'ena bo'wena. Ina' fo'o, opaf ine'ifi fope awanef. Esimbel ine'imi a' fataom, dei' aowas ine'ini ahi'alan.”

Jisas ata' na'ipa'w atin, nati anom amam makwaha ipat Jairusi a' mafi'i ma'ipa Jairus ma'i, “Nogamena ine'ikwi akwaga' ea'. Isimba atis dei' ina nenda' Dembinai Tisa nofo'o noma'w kohana, owa', hapaimi.”
Owa' Jisas ina nowa' aligah name'ama basef ifimba amamifi, owa'. Ea' na'ipa Jairus na'i, “Ina' ombel mogahena owa'i. Hapifa ae' banagiwai.”
Ea' anen ina na'i aho'ma amam nematawa hiasi sogalomana, sogawis ipat atamba, owa'. Anen nao'wa Pitai Jems maloma Jon amom atom mawis malomana.
Mafe' mataga ipat Jairusi, Jisas nati esis salef mehip sawa salopa'w kwapete'as.
Ea' nawis na'ipas nomon na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' palef panda' kwala'ap lu'unai? Awani inimba ina naga' dogw, owa'. Anin na'oh atin.”

Ea' esis sanda' iafana kwapete'as ama naga'ias na'amba. Ea' nagalo'ma esis sawisi ando'. Anen nao'wa ahama'wi ma'makw saloma alipumi ananimi wanom, esis atis safe' sawis nomon awani inimba naga' naga'oma.
Ea' nahapila lagol akwa'ugili na'ipa'w na'i, “Talita kumi.” Apa' mambema basef ifimba ma'i, “Nemata'w sa'ukwi, ae' a'ipina, ina' dei' safel.”
Ea' kwafalis atin nemata'w akwamba afagof 12-pelaiguf fagalo'akwi kosafel kwafe' esis satolo'w, sosafel gogolalasis kwapete'.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas dindinipa sigaila basef ananifi na'i, “Ipa' ina pi'ipa anin epena hiahawes isimba, owa'i.” Ea' na'ipa esisa sogaso'akw anis gwa'aisi kogwa'as.
Jisas nosafel nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' wambel ananimbili kofagama Nasaret naloma alipumi ananimi.

A'i owa' nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat, nafe' nawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai naso'asa basef Godi amam nematawa, same'anamef sosafel gogolalasis sa'i, “Aman anamba nofa' basef ifimba ani? Gawa inimba nagape anini gawa mamahina? Ami natopalopana ma dei' nanda' banagami amamba si'i God nanda'ami?

Apa' magawa aman anamba fowa' nanda' kamda nagala' ifagwi. Anen Maria nogama'w, nagape wambel atimbili. Anen sahoma Jemsi Joses, a Judasi Saimon. Hanitiamana ananiwai wape walomapa na'a.” Esis sa'ias na'amba opalef a' awelefa anen, sowa' alafugahana.

Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Anona profet agol gatomana analemb walemb daialemb, sa'i anen dembinai sahapifana. Apa' ina anagol agol gatoma gandawalapana alihigila wambel ananimbili kofagama, wambota ananisi owa'.

Na'amba anen ina nanda' anom banagami si'i God nanda'ami wambel ambalemba, owa'atin. Anen nasa lagofa anis aowas nanda'asi atona atin nanda'as bo'wes. Ina nanda' hiasi na'amba atin, owa'. Nanda' isimba atis kwaia'wis.
Amam nematawa Nasaretisi owa' sohapifa Goda. Na'amba anen nomonas salasafe'mas. Jisas nakwaha wambel ananimbili Nasaret nafe' na'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa walemb hiagoma.
Ea' nofala alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim mafi'mai anen a' naso'ama banagami ananimi ma mogatofa ambagof awami, ea' nasapa'am mafe' biam atom.
Na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina pefa' gwa'aisi isalef moni solomepa, owa'i. Ipa' pela su pihapila galahitagw atogw pefe'. Apa' ina pefa' siogw biagw atogw, owa'i. Pefa' atona atin gondondaepa.”
Ea' na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' pefe' pegataga anambel wambela, i'i anis si'i aho'ma pefe' pigawis ipat asasitai, ipa' pendape ipat atamba atota. Ama main pekwahota pesafel pefe'.

I'i analemb walemb owa' sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasigwi seme' basef ipe'ifia, ipa' penda'as na'amba. Pekwaha wambel ambalemba pindila'ma usas itap pagail bo'wagah ipe'igahi ma sitilipa sogogawa waf awafi kofagema ea' asasimi atom.”
Ea' nasapa'am mafe' biam atom makwaha basef ma'i, “Ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf awafi, pembema nelelemb pendafe'ma God.”
Ea' mafe' matofa ambagof awami magape esisi. Ea' mofa' wel fasili makolo'wala esis aowas nanda'asi hiasi sataga bo'wes.

Dei' anona gavman king dembinai Herot name' basefa maol inimba Jisas nali' nanda'ani. Ea' agol Jisasi gataga lu'wagol gafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' anis amam nematawa sa'i, “Jon nagapisi'as embeli dei' nosafel wapani nape banagona nanda' maol si'i God nanda'ani.”
Owa' anis daias sa'i, “Anen profet Elija fowa'inai.” Apa' anis sa'i, “Anen anona profet si'i profet amamba fowa'imi.”
Gavman anamba king Herot name' na'amba ea' na'i, “Jon fowa' ae' atopa' bamafugana, apa' owa' a' notanima nosafel wapani nanda' maol Jisasi.”

Fowa' Herot naso' nemata'w owamana Filipi agili'wa Herodias. Ea' sahomana Herot nolaepana'w naso'akw. Ea' Jon nati waf afamba na'ipana na'i, “Ina' naso' nemata'w sahomenai, ea' nawala mu'uli Godi. Na'ambai ina andeande, owa'.” Ea' Herot nasapa' anom amam mafe' mombalo' Jon mofa'ana mafe' nanda' kalabus.

Ea' Herodias kwame' basef ifimba, okom aom endilisi ma Jon, kwa'i kohana afuna, apa' owa', owa'atin. Herot anen ombal mahanama Jon ea' numafiana andeande'. Isimba atis ako'w ina banage'wa kohana nogaga', owa'. Herot nogawa Jon aman bu'unai Godi. Afamba anen nagame' basef Jon naga'ipanaefi, anen nomonas hiahawes, ea' ombal mahana. Anen okom ma'ima'i a'owa' ma nogame' basef ananifi.

A'i owa' main, Herodias kolaoma ano'w ufia'w ma kohana nogaga'. Ea' basef fagape na'amba. Herot nanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma okom mogapoma nemaf afamba ma'mana kogolanafi. Anen nanda' gwa'aisi isimba ma anom dembami magatopalopana ma maol gavmani a anom dembami daiam mugumafi amom soldiai maloma anom dembami magape walemb anamba hiagoma Galilii.

Ea' amom dembami maloma Herot mape ma' gwa'aisi, owa' ano'w nemata'w sa'ukwi aiawai'wi kwawisi kwalemb nomon. Ako'w Herodias nogama'w. Ea' Herot naloma amom dembami nomonas sa'i sa'i ako'w a'owa'. Ea' na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' na'i ae' ese'ena hiahawes mais? Ina' ni'ipias ae' ma egase'enas.”

Herot na'ias endilisi gani ilif na'i, “I'i ina' nihali' ae' ma egase'ena anin maemae ine'ma, ae' egasi'inai. Apa' ina' ni'i ae' egawala hiahaom ae'ami hiami maga'oh anamba agala'ambemagoma egase'ena du'wanima, ae' a'i aho'. Ina' du'wanim, ae' du'wanim, donda'am atin.”
Ea' ako'w kwawisi ando' kwafe' kwahali' ma'makw akwa'u'wi kwa'i, “Ae' atiasi i'ipa Herot efa' hiahawes mais?” Ea' ma'makw kwa'ipa'w kwa'i, “Ina' ni'ipana ni'i nefa'ai balaga Jon nagapisi'as embeli.”
Ea' kwandambemef kwawis nomon kwafalisa Herot kwa'i, “Dei' atef ae' a'i ina' neha Jon nagapisi'as embeli noga' netopa' balaga gola anota plet nefa'agai nese'e.”

Ako'w kwa'ias na'amba, opaf Heroti a' nimanif a'owa'. Apa' anen okom mandanda' ma na'i basef endilisifi atif naga'if banagafi ea' amam nematawa isimba sape salomana saga' gwa'aisii same'ana. Ea' ina ata' nosambala basef akwa'ufi, owa'.
Kwafalis Herot nasapa' anona soldia nafe'ma noha Jon nofa' balaga nogafi'i. Soldia anamba nafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa natopa' bamato'w Joni nofa' balaga
nalaga gala anota plet nofa'aga nafi'i naso' Herodias nogama'w kofa'aga kwafe' kwaso' ma'ma'w.
Ea' alipumi Joni magaila basef ananifii mame' basef ifimba ma anen, mafi'i mofa' si'ina mafe' mawana matmat. Ea' ma'uf.
Amom aposel Jisasi dei' motanima mafi'i mandakolas malomana. Ea' mape manifa maol mafe' manda'ani ma'ipana basef hiafi amom maga'ipasafi hi'alef.

Ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi fi'i fe' sail sanda' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi ina ata' anota nogota ma amom moga' gwa'aisi, owa'. Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Wale, afa' atofa ofe' anagon wafigima ma ata' tol opoma noma'w.”
Ea' mofa' bot mafe' anamba wafigima epes akagoma, amom atom mafe'.
Owa' owa'atin. Esis amam nematawa hiasi sogawa amom magafe'ma. Ea' esis hiasi sakwaha walemb hiagoma lu'wagoma kolo'walas sasagih safe' anamba ea' sali' sataga anamba amom ma'i mogafe'ma.

Jisas nafe'ma nisila' akata, nati esis hiasi. Natilis nati ina anona aman nape numafias, owa'atin. Esis sape si'i sipsip owa' anin epen nigimafiapia, ea' nati esis uwahipis nawalipasa basef bu'wafi hiafi.
Ama awin a'i newala naso', alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Ana'e wafigima epes akagoma, awin na'i a' newala.
Sapa'as sofo'o walemb aofah asasisi daindai sagape felefele'i ma sogatala gwa'aisi mais soga'as.”
Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam, na'i, “Ipa' atipa pese'as gwa'aisi.” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' na'i afa' ofe' utalai bret 200 kina oso'osas? 200 kina otamba hiambai.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' bret ma'ufita ta'oh? Ata' fo'o petolota.” Ea' mafe' matolota ma'i, “Bret wa'agolita taloma agof biagof sa'oh.”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pi'ipa esis amam nematawa sope sofe' oto otowa otalef fasilifi.”
Ea' sape safe' si'i amom maga'ipas, anis sataga 100-pelais, anis 50-pelais, na'amba atin.

Ea' Jisas nasa'ma bret atamba wa'agolita taloma agof biagof naniga nati heven nanifela God. Ama ea', nindiwata naso' alipumi ananimi mafe' maso' esis hiasi amam nematawa hi'agalas. Ea' nasa'ma agof wapani nawalogof naso'am maso'asagof.
Esis sa'as alihis andondo',
alipumi ananimi matatama du'wa'wanisi saga'ihi, malo'was folalef lu'walifi 12-pelailif si'ilif kwaef.
Esis amam nematawa saga' gwa'aisi isimbai hiasi, siamba amam atom mataga 5,000-pelaim. Apa' esis ina siamba awasi nematawa wapani, owa'.
Jisas nasapa' alipumi ananimi mofa' bot mali' mafe' dumb ambamba mambo fisanamb Betsaida. Ea' nasapa' amam nematawa hiasi safe'.
Nasapa'as sagafi'i, anen nandowasa' halafuta nape na'i nonda' beten.
Wambomota alipumi ananimi mape bot ata' atapim mala dumb lu'wambi la'afimba. Apa' Jisas atona nalutu akata.

Ea' nati fufin lu'wani nalo nafi'i anamba amom ma'i mogafe'ma, ea' nakoto'ma amom manda' pul masasapa' bot a' numa'una endilisi. Akot ata' tail atin felefele'ma logola owa', Jisas nagi'mam natoma nafi'i embel ilifa nafe'ma amom. Ea' na'i nikila'am nefe'.
Owa' mati anen natoma nafi'i embel ilif. Ma'i owa' anona gamba, ea' manda'as wiwa ma'oh kwapete'am.
Amom matolona gogolalasom. Owa' Jisas nalomam na'i kwafalis na'i, “Ipa' banagepa, ombel mogahepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i.”
Ea' nalota bot nape nalomam, dei' fufin a' newala opalef amamilifi gogolalasom kwapete'am endilisi, ea' nomonas salasafe' hiahias.
Amom ina ata' nomonas sape andeande'ma bret atamba Jisas naso'asata esis hiasi saga'atai, owa'. Na'amba amom ma'i anen ina banagonai. Ukup amamipi paso'am.
Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mowala mambo dumb ambamba mafe' mataga anep itap lu'upa Genesaret. Ea' mowa' bot tail,
misila' mafe' owa', esis kwafalis sati Jisas asagawana.
Ea' sasagih safe' anamba hiagoma ganigani. Esis same' basefa Jisas nagapoma, ea' sala aowas nanda'asi belitagw sofa'as safi'mai anen.

Walemb hiagoma lu'wagon sa'ogon, naloma anamba hiagoma Jisas nagafe'ma, esis sambe' isimba aowas nanda'asi sa'oh baop la'afen. Ea' sofala Jisas banagembela niga'i aho'ma isimba sogahapila lowaf ananifi da'malififa atef. Ea' esis mamahisa sagahahapilafi sataga bo'wes wapani.
Amam dembami Farisi maloma anom dembami daiam magawalipasa mu'uli Godi amom mapani Jerusalem mafi'i mandakolas maloma Jisas.
Ea' mati anom alipumi Jisasi ma' gwa'aisi owa' mosa'opa lagof bo'wagof mea'as si'i amom Farisi maga'ias, owa'. Ea' amom Farisi ma'i amom alipumi Jisasi lagof amamugufi aloguguf.
Dei' main, amom Farisi maloma esis hiasi Juda hi'alas, sagi'ma mu'uli inimba esis akupasi. I'i esis owa' sosa'opa lagof andeande'a, ina sea' gwa'aisi, owa'.

Esis sogafe' maketa sotanima sogafi'i, ma owa' sosa'opa lagofa, ina sea' gwa'aisi, owa'. Esis sagi'ma mu'uli hiani naninani sogofa'ana akupas asasisii. Sasa'opa kahi sospaes, a disi belegw atis, ama sagagi'ma mu'uli akupasi.
Na'amba amom Farisi maloma dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dei' si'i maina alipumi ine'imi owa' migi'ma mu'uli amom akupamia? Lagof amamugufi aloguguf ma' gwa'aisi.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Fowa' profet Aisaia, nindila'waifa ipa' endilisi, ipa' paga'i basefa malogof biagufii. Anen nanda'ef andeande' dondo'ma ipa' na'ias na'amba na'i, God na'i, ‘Amam nematawa isimba sasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagola malogof asasigufi atogof, apa' opalef asasilifi fape laogona ae'. Ukup asasipi ina sahapifi, owa'atin.
Esis ina sawalipasa basef ae'afi, owa'. Sawalapa mu'uli epes sagape itapi atin, sambaso'mas sa'i, “Mu'uli inimba basef Godi.” Ea' sanda' lotu sasa'ma agol ae'agili dowadowaf.”
Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' apakwaha mu'uli Godi ea', dei' pahapila waf epes sagape itapi atef tetele'if.”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pegegawa andeande'i pa'i penda' waf fasifi atifi, owa' dei' apesambala mu'uli Godi ma pagagi'ma waf ipe'ifi atef.

Fowa' gani Moses nagawalipasa mu'uli inimba na'ipas naga'i, ‘Ipa' pinifela mamasepa ipe'isi pihapifas petopalopas.’ Anif wapani na'if na'i, ‘Epen ami niga'i basef awafima ahaman ma'man ananisii, inimba anis daias sohan nega'.’
Owa' ipa' pambaso'am pa'i anif daif na'amba pa'i, Epen mamahina nindaiwa'ma negatopalopa mamasan ni'ipas niga'i, ‘Otamba mais ae'asi andaiwa'ma egase'epas, ae' a' andandepasa egaso'anas God.’
Apa' ipa' Farisi paloma ipa' anipa pagawalipasa mu'uli Godi, ipa' pa'i aho'ma epen inimba negambaso'ma mamasan, ea' owa' netopalopasa.

Ipa' paila mu'uli fowa' gani pegefa'ana akupipa ipe'imii, panda' waf afambai pesambala basef ifimba Godi na'i mogatopalopa mamasapa. Ea' panda' waf ipe'ifi atef lu'ufi panda' waf awafi lifilafi na'amba ina andeande', owa'.”
Jisas nofalai amam nematawa hiasi wapani na'ipas anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Ipa' hipai peme' basef ae'afi okokomef pendegawef.
Hiahawes gwa'aisi mais ando'asi ipa' pa'as sagawis nomoni, isimbai ina sanda'epa awepa, owa'. Apa' hiahaom magape ukup ipe'ipi nomoni mawisi ando', amambai atom manda'epa awepa.
[Ipa' aligah hagagalipai, a pendame' basef ifimba.]” Jisas naga'ipas na'amba,
ea' nakwaha amam nematawa isimba hiasi a' nafe' nawis ipat. Ea' alipumi ananimi atom mahali'ana ma basef ifimba kofagefa waminif atini doko' naga'ipasafi.

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “A'i ipa' owa' ata' pegawaea! Hiahawes gwa'aisi main sagape ando'i owa' anis ipa' paga'asia sonda'epa awepaia, owa'atin. Gwa'aisi isimba sa'as sogowala opalef nomoni a safe' sakas safe' sowala dowah. Ea' ukup ipe'ipi ina awep, owa'atin. Waf afambai maga' gwa'aisi hiasi ina awafi, owa'.” Jisas na'ipasa basefa gwa'aisi sasisasi hiasi hi'alas bu'wasi atis muga'asi.
Ea' na'ipam wapani na'i, “Hiahaom magape ipa' epesi nomoni, ukup nomonas awami maim mataga ando', amambai atom manda'epa awepa.
Hiahaom awami magape ukup nomoni magawisii amamba. Waf naninani aunai, nomonas awami, waf sanda' so'a waulafi, wal, soha anis sogaga'i,
sogahambombaga waf daso'amaifi, waf kowagalasafi, waf baso'amunai naninani aunai, du'waniga, simbisambal, findiwa, sagafela agof asasigufi atogof lu'wagof, waf gawa akanai.
Waf anamba naninani hianahaona aunai, anamba nape nomon ukup ipe'ipi nawisi ando' nanda'epa awepa.”
Jisas nosafel nakwaha wambel ambalemba, nafe' Tair nafe' nawis anota ipat. Anen nandaiwa'ma anin epen negegawa anen nagape na'amba. Owa', owa'atin. Anen ina nandambaho'.

Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwame' basefa anen nape na'amba. Nemata'w akwamba nogama'w akwa'u'wi ambal aunai napao'w. Ea' ma'ma'w kwafalis kwafi'mai Jisas kwindiwa nembawa kotowa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi.
Ako'w Finisiai'wi anep itap lu'upa Siria. Ako'w ina Judai'wi, owa'. Kwa'i diga Griki. Ea' kwahali' Jisas dindinipa nogatofama'wa ambal aunai nagape nogama'w akwa'u'wii.
Ea' na'ipa'w anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Apa' ata' moso'asa gwa'aisi awasi ape'isi sili'. Apa' ina mofa' gwa'aisi awasi ape'isii mokwahis sofe'ma nombagw, owa'.”
Owa' ako'w akwagwamana basef anen kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i endilisi. Nombagw agogw gwafe' lafela tebol gwatatama gwa'aisi awasii sogowa itapi gwa'as.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' na'ias na'amba andeande'. Ea' tanima fo'o. Ambal aunai nakwaha nogamena ine'ikwi a' nawisi nafe' ea'.”
Ea' ako'w kotanima kwafe' ipat akwa'utai, kwati nogama'w akwo'ukwi tol kwa'oh alahis, ambal aunai nakwaho'w a' nawisi nafe' ea' ambo'okw kwa'oh andeande'.
Dei' Jisas nosafel nakwaha anambel wambel Tair, a' nafe' nawis la'afena wambel Saidon. Ea' nakwaha Saidon nafe' atin ganimba walemb ilifunamailimb Dekapolis, nataga dumb lu'wambi Galili.
Ea' esis sao'wai anona aman nafi'mai Jisas, aligah haso'ana haloma afega ananigai dindigiga. Ea' ina na'i andeande', owa'. Na'amba esis sofala Jisas ma nosa lagofa anen nonda'ana bo'ona.
Ea' Jisas nao'wana amom biam mafe' makwaha esis amom atom mape. Ea' nasapa' faguf bif ananifi fawis aligah aman anambai, wa'owa'ol. Ea' nisi'waf nasa faf afega aman anambai,
Jisas nosaniga nati heven, nahi okom nowafam mehip, na'ias na'amba na'i, “Efata.” Basef kofagefa ifimba fa'i, “Ina' aligah hogal neme' ni'i andeande'.”
Ea' aligah a hagal, hiahaom manda' afega dindiginai ahigilalam kwafalis. Dei' a' na'i andeande'.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas nombomba'asa esis ina si'ipasa hiahawes isimba ma anin epen. Nape na'ipas dindinip timbi tambel. Owa', owa'atin. Esis sawalapam sa'ipasam timbi tambel seme'am.
Ea' esis bolalas endilisi sa'i, “Hiahaom hiami anen nanda'ami nanda'am bo'om atin. Anen nanda' esis aligah hagaso'asi same' andeande', esis malagof fagaso'asii a soga sa'i andeande'.
Afamba amam nematawa hiasi sandakolas wapani sa'i seme' basef Jisasi. Ea' esis gwa'aisi akas. Na'amba Jisas nofala alipumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'i,

“Ae' ati esis amam nematawa isimba uwahipis. Esis a sape salome nimaguf wanif gwa'aisi akas nolom mahas a'owa'. I'i ae' esapa'as sogafe' dowaf uta baop asasima, sitilif atona sowa so'oh sofe' iaiaf. Anis safi'i laogoma.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi magwamana basef ma'i, “Ana'e wafigima epes akagoma. Atiasi afa' ofa'ai bret anima oso' amam nematawa isimba sea'as? Afa' bret ina hiata, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipa' bret ma'uta ta'oh?” Amom ma'i, “7-pelaita.”
Ea' na'ipa esis amam nematawa sape itap, anen nafela bret atamba 7-pelaita, nanifela God nawalota naso' alipumi ananimi ma maso'asata esis amam nematawa hiasi. Amom maso'as dondo' hi'alas.
Ea' amom anagof agof sa'ugufi biagof wapani fa'oh. Ea' anen nasa'magof nanifela God, naso' amoma mogaso'asagof wapani.
Ea' esis sa'as, dondo' alihis. Ea' alipumi ananimi matatamai du'wa'wanisi sagasaga'ihi makolasis malo'was folalef lu'walifi 7-pelailif asi'ilif kwaef.
Amam nematawa saga gwa'aisi isimbai sataga hiasi, 4,000-pelais. Ea' Jisas nasapa'as safe'.
Ea' kwafalis atin anen nalota bot naloma alipumi ananimi, mafe' anep itap lu'upa Dalmanuta.

Ea' amom Farisi mafi'i ma'i basef mandahihianamaef maloma Jisas. Amom ma'i mogwambana ma mugati anen banagona a'a owa'. Na'amba mofalana ma'i anen nonda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami. Amom ma'i anen nihimba'mama anen nagape banagami Godi ma dei' nanda' hiahaom amamba.
Jisas name' ambal ananili nemanil ea' na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i pa'i pefalagama pa'i pigati anin ametal banagani? Apa' ae' owa'atina enda'an pigatilina, owa'atin.”
Ea' nakwaha esis a' notanima nalota bot nafe' dumb ambamba fisanamb.
Amom alipumi Jisasi ukup paso'ama mogofa' bret hiata togalomam. Amom mofa' atotota tala bot
Ea' Jisas naumbalom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pindimafuma andeande', solawaipama yis amamba Farisii maloma yis Herotii.”
Ea' mame' anen na'ias na'amba, a manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ukup paso'afa bret ta'ihi dei' na'ipafa na'amba.”
Jisas nogawa basef amamifi, na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' paga'i, ‘Ipa' bret akepa?’ A'i ipa' ukup pase'epa, owa' ata' pegawaea?
Ipa' naep papaipa, apa' ipa' owa' ata' piti anin maemaea. Ea' aligah hapaipa, apa' ipa' ina' peme' basef, owa'. Ukup a' pase'epa.
Afamba ae' agawala bret 5-pelaita ma epes isimba 5000-pelais, ama du'wa'wanita taga'ihi patatamata palo'wata folalef ma'ulif si'lif?” Ea' amom ma'i, “12-pelailif.”
“Apa' anef nemaf agawala bret 7-pelaita ma du'wa'wanita taga'ihi patatamata palo'wata folalef ma'ulif si'ilif?” Ea' amom ma'i, “7-pelailif.”
Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Owa'atin. Ipa' ina dei' apegawa, ata' owa'.”
Amom mafe' mataga Betsaida, sao'wamanai anona aman naep pagaso'anai nafi'mai Jisas, sa'ipana dindinipa nogasa lagol ananigili nonda'ana bo'ona.
Ea' nahapila lagol anen naep pagaso'anai, nofa'ana nakwaha wambel nawis ando' nisi'wafa naep ananipi, nasa lagola anen nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' nati ambambasif a'a ata' owa'?”
Ea' aman anamba natologon, na'i,
“Ae' ati anis epes apa' agatilis si'i lawah hagafe'.” Ea' Jisas nasa lagol wapani, naep ananipi dei' a' natologon mehip naep ananipi apataga be'ep, andeande', nati hiahawes pelele'.
Ea' Jisas nasapa'ana nafe' ipat ananitai na'ipana na'i, “Ina' owa'i nefe' niwis wambel ni'ipasa ae' anda'ena ambo'wenaia, owa'i. Ina' nefe' usi'ina ipat ine'itai.”
Jisas nosafel naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' felefele'ma anambel wambel Sisaria Filipai. Amom mafe'ma ufia'w, nahali'am na'i, “Esis amam nematawa sa'i ae' aman mamahowema?”
