Ea' amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Anis sa'i ina' Jon, aman nagapisi'as embeli. Ea' anis sa'i ina' Elaija. Apa' anis sa'i ina' anina profet, fowa'inai.
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ami?” Ea' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'i.”
Ea' na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' ina a' pewalapa ae' pi'ipa anis pi'i ae' Krais, owa'i.”

Ea' Jisas nasefela basef ananifi nawalipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi agufumi Judai mose'e akafimi lu'wami. Amom moloma amom pris dembami moloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godii. Atiasi mondaiwa'me mose'e alafugah mohe ega' ma nimaguf bif ea', fegafe'ma wanifi a' esafel wapani.”
Anen nawalapa basef ifimba alihifa amom. Ea' Pita nofa'ana nendelefata nasa gemba ea' nagagaolana ma basef ifimba naga'ipasafi.

Owa' Jisas nandambema natiti alipumi ananimi, nanda' megahaha Pita na'i, “Ina' si'i Satan. Dei' main, ina' owa' okom mopoma okom Godia. Okom mandapoma nomonas epes sagape itapi atis. Delefata nefe' alafuga ae'agai.”

Ea' Jisas nofalai esis amam nematawa safi'mai anen saloma alipumi ananimi na'ipas na'i, “I'i anin epen ni'i nila ae', anin ata' netalogofa okom amambai ananimi atom, nefe' lafel ea' ina ombel mohana anis sohan negaga', owa'. Ae' efa' akafimi ma anda' maol Godi, atiasi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Epen inimba a' nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae' ma nigagi'ma ae'. Apa' i'i owa', owa'atin.

Epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol, ni'i nihapilal tatala'il, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' epen ami okom mopoma ae' eloma basef bu'wafi Godi ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf God a' nofa' ambal ananili lotanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.
I'i epen ami nenda' maol naninani negefa' gwa'aimi uga hiahaom hiami itapami atom higiligalami, anin wapani awen higililan nelomam. Dei' hiahaom amamba atiasi motopalopan mi'imama? Owa'atin endilisi.
Epen inimba atiasi nefa' hiahaom maima negatal ambal ananili ma nitanima negewambilali wapani? Owa'atin.

Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Amam nematawa dei'isi sanda' waf aunai sakwaha sagahapifa Godi. Epes isimba mamahisa ambal aola ae' sondafa'me eloma basef ae'afi, anaf ae' wapani ambal aola epes isimba endafa'mas nemaf afamba ae' ifi'i egaloma hiahaom fasimi banagami mogogala'i ahamai elomai amom ensel bu'wami Godi wapani.
Jisas na'ipa esis na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ipa', anipa pagalutu na'aii atiasi ina pega' ulal, ata' owa'. Anipa apiti banagami Godi moloma anen nogape dembinai kinga epes ananisi.”

A'i owa' main, nimaguf wanif wanif fafe'ma hi'alef, Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jemsi Jon nao'wam mondowasa' anota halafuta lautai. Nao'wa amom atom tol mape, owa' mati alop ananipi apandati na'a pogala' a'owa'.
Luwaguf maim ananimi mataga mogala' afitim a'owa'. Ina anona aman itapanai la'ifina nanda' luwaguf maim mataga afitim na'amba, owa'atin.
Ea' mati amam biam fowa'imi, Elaija naloma Moses mataga malutu ma'i maloma Jisas.

Pita naloma Jemsi Jon ombel maham endilisi, ea' Pita na'i ni'i anif basef, owa', owa'atin, anen ina ata' okom mapoma basef na'i niga'iefi, a' owa'atin. Ea' na'ias na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'a'e a' fafas, ata' ola' anoh aolah wanoh hondandamepa. Ina' anop, Moses anop, Elaija anop.”
Owa' anom ilagw maofana amom. Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai ilagw amamba ga'i basef ga'i, “Anen Nogame ae'anai, ae' okom mohafel maimailana a'owa'. Ipa' pendame' basef ananifi.”
Alipumi Jisasi wanom matologon kwafalis ganigani, apa' ina mati anin epen, owa'atin. Mati Jisas atona nalutu nalomam.

Ea' amom ata' makwaha halafuta mafi'i atin, Jisas na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' ina pewalapa hiahaom amamba dei' pagatulumi pi'ipa anin epenam, owa'i. Apefe' dondo'ma nemaf afamba ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ma sehe ega' egesafel matmat wapani, dao' pi'ipas.”
Ea' amom mahapila basef ifimba mape, manda'ipama ma'i, “Basef ifimba Jisasi notanima nogosafel matmat, kofagefa fafe' fa'imama?”
Ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dei' maina amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maga'i Elaija fowa'inai ata' nili' nogafi'i?”

Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Aho' endilisi. Elaija nifi'i nondondomba hiahaom hiami hi'igalam wapani. Apa' basef fagape buk Baibeli fa'i dembinai anaf notaga epen nogofa' alop epesi nope ni'imama? Ifimba fa'i anen neme' akafimi lu'wami ma esis sogowa' alafugahanai.
Dei' a'ipipa, anona Elaija a' nafi'i ea', apa' esis sagi'ma nomonas asasimi atom, sanda'mana waf awafi endilisi si'i anif basef fagape buk Baibeli faga'ias.”

Jisas naloma alipumi wanom mafi'i mati anom alipumi du'wanim 9-pelaim magapanii, ea' mati amam nematawa hiasi salutu felefele'ma amom. Ea' mati anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ma'i basef mandahihianamaef maloma alipumi Jisasi 9-pelaim.
Amam nematawa isimba hiasi sati Jisas nafi'i, sosafel gogolalasis kwapete'as, sasagih safe'ma anen sanifelona.
Ea' Jisas nahali' amom alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' palomam pa'i main pandahihianaman?”
Ea' anona aman nagape la'afena amam nematawai nagwamana basef Jisas na'i, “Dembinai tisa, awani aman ae'ani anona ambal aunai napain, malogol gaso'an. Na'amba efa'an afi'mai ina'.

Nimaguf ifimba hiafi ambal anamba aunai nahapilan sisihin nakwahin newa itap. Ea' ofap pataga malogolan, nalelef fendetapa' imun dogw, a alop ananipi dindigisip a'owa'. Ae' a'ipa alipumi ine'imi a'i motofa ambal anamba aunai nofa' nofo'o, apa' amom owa' banagema.”
Ea' Jisas name' basef ifimba, na'ipas na'i, “O, ipa' amam nematawa owa' pegahapifaea. Nimaguf ma'uf ae' ata' epe elomepa? Nimaguf ma'uf wapani ma egefa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipa' okwan nifi'mai ae'.”
Ea' esis sao'wamana awani inimba anen. Ambal anamba aunai nati Jisas, kwafalis atis nakoto' anin kwapete', nafe' newa itap hota atin na'oh, apah afitimi ofap mataga sisih malogol ananigili.
Ea' Jisas nahali' ahama awani inimbai na'i, “Nogamena ine'ini, aowas inimba nanda'an nape nimaguf ma'uf?” Anen na'ipana na'i, “Fowa' ata' awani nape atapina na'amba atin.
Dondol ambal aunai nakwahin newala nasef nif, a newala embel na'i nohan afin. Apa' i'i ina' banagena ma, niti apa' owahipipa netopalopapa.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ina' nagahali'i na'amba? Epen ami nigahapifi endilisii, anin banagena maol fasini naninani.”
Ea' aman anamba na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ae' ahapifina kwasakwasala. Dei' netopalope ma igahapifina banagewe endilisi.”

Ea' Jisas nati amam nematawa safi'i salutu salipana felefele', na'ipa ambal anamba aunai mehip na'i, “Ina' ambal awasinai nagasopama aligahi malogol awani inimbai, ina' lofa'o nekwaha awani inimba, netanima nigafi'mani owa'i.”
Ea' ambal anamba aunai nakoto'an mehip hoga'ala kwapete' nakwahowan nandahi' nafe'. Ea' awani inimba a' nandati si'i sagaga'i ea' hiasi satilin sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Anin a' naga' ea'.”
Na'amba Jisas nahapila lagol ananigili naso'man ea' bo'wen nalutu.
A'i owa' main, Jisas nafe' nawis anota ipat nape naloma alipumi ananimi mape. Ea' mahali'ana na'amba ma'i, “Dei' maina afa' owa' banagefama ogatofa ambal anamba aunaia?”
Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pendabeten pihali' God atin, ipa' a' banagepa ma pegatofa ambal anambai aunai. Owa' ano'w ufia'w daia'wa pegatofanaia. Beten atin.”

Ea' Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi makwaha na'amba magapoma mafe' mataga itap apamba Galili mawis mafe' anagon mape. Dei' main, Jisas na'i nope nondambaho' nolomama nogawalipama basef ananifi. Na'amba nandaiwa'ma anona aman nogogawa anamba amom mafe' magapoma. Anen naso'ama basef na'amba na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi felefele' anona aman noso'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amom boumi ae'ami mehe egaga'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilif fegafe'ma wanifi, a' itanima esafel efa' ambal wapani.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba atif, apa' amom ina mogawef, owa'. Na'amba amom ombel mahama mogahali'ana ma basef ifimba kofagefa.

Ea' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga Kaperneam, mafe' mawis ipat nomon, Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pa'i basef maif, doko' wagafi'i ufia'w?” Doko' magafi'i ufia'w, amom ma'i basef hiafi ma'i atiasi ami nepe nili' dembinai ma amom. Owa' ina' magwamana anif basef, owa'atin. Tol mape dowaf.
Ea' Jisas nape itap nofala amom mafi'i mape felefele' na'ipam na'i, “Epen ami ni'i netaga dembinai nepe nigali'i, anin ata' nili' netaga si'i nanda' maola anasi, netaga falafini ma naep epesi.”
Ea' Jisas naso'mai anin awani sa'wini nahaponan la'afena amom nahapilan na'ipam na'i,

“Epen ami neso' opafa negatopalopa anin awani si'i ini'i ma okom ananimi mopoma ae', anin nase'e opaf ae' wapani natopalope. Ea' epen ami negatopalopa ae'i, ina natopalopa ae' atowe, owa'. Anin natopalopa anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani.”
Jon nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wati anona aman nanda' maol natofa ambagof awami ma agol ine'igili. Apa' anen ina nagi'ma afa' owa', ea' dei' wasopamana.”
Owa' Jisas na'ipana Jon na'i, “Ipa' ina apesopamana, owa'i. Epen mamahina nanda' maol fasini ma agol ae'agili, anin ina a' ni'ipasa basef awafi ma ae', owa'.
Epen ami owa' bouni afe'inia, inimba alipini afa'ini.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, epen ami nitilipa ni'i ipa' epes ae'ipai ma netopalopepa nese'epa anin mai sa'wini si'i embel kwaia'umbel pea'ambal, owagama God nogwaman hiahaom fasimi anin.

Jisas na'ipas na'amba na'i, “I'i anin epen nenda' anin epen sa'wini nagahapifa ae'i, nefe' nenda' waf awafi, atiasi epen inimba nefa' akafimi awami. Anis epes sofa' epen inimba sondola otam lu'unai nila bini'w anani'wi sofa'an sofe' solan newala naoh mami lu'wami, ata' nepe andeande' kwasakwasala. Apa' i'i epen inimba nenda' anin sa'wini negakwaha nagahapifa ae', epen inimba atiasi nepe awen a'owa' nikila' negewala naoh laumi.

Ea' i'i lagof ipe'igufi fonda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, petopa'agof pekwahogof. Ea' atogol atin fope, ma ambal lopaipa pegape andeande' lifilafi. Na'amba lagof agwafomba fanda' waf awafii fope, fofa'epa pefe' wambel awambili nif fagape lifilafima.
[Wambel ambalemba endihip sa'usa'umi namugopim atapim magape lifilafii, magagugumba epesi, ea' nif ifimba wapani ina hi'agalafi, owa'atin.]

I'i bo'wagah ipe'igahi honda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, petopa'agah pekwahogah. Ea' atoga atin hope, ma ambal lopaipa pegape andeande' lifilafi. Na'amba bo'wagah agahemba handa'epa panda' waf awafii hope, hofa'epa pefe' wambel awambili, nif fagape lifilafima.
[Wambel ambalemba endihip sa'usa'umi namugopim atapim magape lifilafii, magagugumba epesi, ea' nif ifimba wapani ina hi'agalafi, owa'atin.]

I'i naep ipe'ipi penda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, pigip pikwahip. Atom atin pepe ma pegafe' anamba God nagala'ambemagoma pegape andeande' lifilafima. Na'amba nam amamba manda'an nanda' waf awafii mope, a' mofa'an nefe' wambel awambili nif fagape lifilafiima.
Wambel ambalemba endihip sa'usa'umi namugopim atapim magape lifilafii, magagugumba epesi, ea' nif ifimba wapani ina hi'agalafi, owa'atin.

“Anef nemaf epes hiasi hi'ilas sogame' akafimi lu'wami si'i nif monda'as sogape be'es hilili'. Sol usihili fasili ma gwa'aimi, apa' sol owa' usihilia, dei' atiasi penda'al pi'imama usihil wapani? Owa'atin. Ipa' panda' sola gwa'aisi usihis. Ea' ipa' na'amba atin si'i sol usihili, opalef ipe'ilifi atifilif pendaloma sahin owan hiasi petopalopas.”
Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba, nafe' anep itap lu'upa Judiai nambo walemb Jordan gani fisana. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen wapani, naso'asa basef si'i dondol nagawalipas.
Ea' anom dembami Farisi mafi'i mahali' Jisasa anif basef magwambana ma'i, “Mu'uli ape'ini andeande'ma anona aman nondaiwa'ma nemata'w anani'wi nogali'amona'w a'a owa'?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'ipam na'i, “Moses nase'epa mu'uli mamahina?”
Amom magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Moses na'i aho'ma anona aman ni'i nogali'amona ako'wi, ni'i anif basef fil okwatip noso'akwap nili'amona'w kofe'.”
Owa' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' panda' du'waniga, dei' Moses nanda'mepa mu'uli inimba.
Fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' hiahaom hiami, ‘Nanda' epes ea' sataga suwafisi numa'isi.’
God na'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Esis bias ina ata' sope si'i sagape daindai, owa'. Aman nokwaha mamasana ananisi nefe' noloma waulu'mana anani'wi, esis bias asope alop atotop.
Ea' esis bias sondaso'ama sotaga si'i alop atifip.’ Esis ina ata' si'i sagape biasa sagape daindai, owa'.
Ea' hiahawes mais God a' nagapete'as sisihisi, isimba anin epen ina nehape'as, owa'i.”
A'i owa' main, Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafe' mawis mape ipat, mahali'ana ma waf afamba sandaso'amafi.
Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Aman ami nagakwaha waulu'mana anani'wi ma nagaso' ano'w daia'w wapanii, anen nanda' waf awafi so'a waola nemata'w akwamba nali' nagaso'akwi.
Ea' na'amba atin, i'i nemata'w ami kokwaha anona koso' anona daiana, ako'w kwawala waf bu'wafi kwatopa' daso'ama kwanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi ma anen nali' nagaso'akwi.”

Ea' esis sao'wamanai anis awasi sa'wisi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas, sa'i anen nosa lagofa niga'ipasa basef fasifi awasi isimba. Owa' alipumi ananimi mandaiwa'ma esis awasi isimba ea' masopama esis sofa'as sogafi'mai anen.

Ea' Jisas nati amom manda' waf afambai, anen a' nembel awambela amom a' na'ipam, na'i, “Ipa' kwahowa awasi isimba sifi'mai ae'. Ipa' ina pihagasis, owa'i. Esis amam nematawa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiasi same' basef ananifi sagailif si'i awasi isimba.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, epen ami ni'i aho'ma God nope dembinaiman ama nese'ana nembel God si'i awasi isimba saga'i aho'mana, isimba sanda'as na'ambai atiasi sogawis anamba God nagala'am bemagomai. I'i owa', owa'atin.”
Ea' anen nasa'ma awasi isimba nahapilas satoma bo'wagah ananigahi nasa lagof ananigufi balagah asasigahi na'ipasa basef fasifi nowa' banagas.
Jisas nosafel nafe', anona aman nasagih nafi'mai anen nindiwa nembawa notawa nahali'ana na'i, “Tisa bu'winai, ae' atiasi enda' maina egefa' ambal namili egape andeande' lifilafi?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ina' naga'i ae' bu'uwai? God atona anen bu'winai.

Ina' negawa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani naga'i, ‘Ina' owa'i nenda' waf awafi so'a waulafi neha anis soga' a nenda' wal, owa'i, ina' owa'i nembaso'ma anis epes daiasa, ea' ina nembaso'am banagena ma negefa' anom hiahaom anasi dowadowaf, owa'i. Ina' neme' basef mamasinai nihapilif nilif nindimafias andeande'.”
Ea' aman anamba na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Tisa, mu'uli inimba hiani ahapilan ailan fowa' ata' awani afi'i afi'i ataga dei'.”

Ea' nomonas Jisasi sohafela anen saisailana, na'ipana na'i, “Ina' anef waf fasifi atetef owa' ata' nenda'afa. Ina' fo'o nese'asa hiahaom ine'imi ma anis daias sotalinama nefa' moni inimba nenda'an neso' isimba kwahusi. Nenda'as na'amba ma anaf negefa' hiahawes fasisi gani ilif. Ea' nifi'i nihapifi nila ae'.”
Owa' aman anamba hiahaom hiamunai nandaiwa'ma nonda'am nogaso' anis epes daias. Ea' nomonas ananisi iwanis nandambema megahaihailana nafe'.

Ea' Jisas natologon ganigani na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Epes isimba ugai moni hianaisi sanda'am da nda' ahifim a'owa' ma sefe' sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Atona atin sefe' suwis.”
Ea' amom mosafel gogolalasoma basef ifimba naga'ipamafi. Owa' Jisas nagwamama basef wapani na'i, “Owape ae'ipai, ufia'w kwagafe' anambai ina andipa'wi, owa', ahifi'wi.

Anin mafin lu'unai kamel nogawis bolotaf nil sogosambala luwagufeli, anamba ila ina ahifima a'owa' ma nogawis. Apa' amam nematawa hiahaom hiamisi i'i sofe' sogawis nomona maol Godi, sonda'am da nda' ahifim a'owa' ma sofe' sogawis. Maol inimba ahifim a'owa' nikila' maol kamel nogawis bolotaf nili.”
Owa' alipumi ananimi mosafel gogolalasom kwapete'am manda'ipama ma'i, “I'i na'ambaiai, anaf God nuwambilai epes mamahisa nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai sope andeande' lifilafi? Owa'atin.”
Ea' Jisas nasa'ma naep natiti amom na'ipam na'i, “Hiahaom epes owa' la'ifisa sonda'amia, amamba God atona banagonai ma nonda'am. Anen banagonai ma nonda' hiahaom hiami hi'igalam.”
Ea' Pita nasefela basef na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' wakwaha hiahaom afa'imi hiami, dei' wafi'i wahapifa basef ine'ifi wailina.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Aho' endilisi, ae' aga'ipipa na'amba a'i, Ipa' epes ami ukup pegapoma ae' eloma basef bu'wafi Godi ma sokwaha ifagw gwoloma sahin owan ahasas mamasas a batawisas soloma aofah mais asasisi, atiasi asofa' hiahawes isimba dambaisi hiasi a'owa', sikila' asasisi fowa'isi. Ea' anis daias atiasi sehepa sonda'mepa was awafi. Apa' anaf owagama nogota bu'utai togataga, pefa' ambal namili pepe andeande' lifilafi.
Apa' epes hiasi dei' sataga sagali'i agof fagatomasi, anaf agof akas asotaga sigi'. Apa' epes isimba sataga sagagi'i anaf a' agof fotomas sotaga sili'.”

Esis saila ufia'w safe' sondowasa' Jerusalem, Jisas nafe' nali'as. Ea' alipumi ananimi magi'mana mafe'. Amom mogawa anen a' nafe' Jerusalem, na'amba dei' amom agogolalasom. Esis sagagi'ma amomi, esis wapani sogawa anen nofe' Jerusalem ea' ombel mahas. Ea' Jisas nao'wa alipumi atom mafe' mape anagon dei, na'ipam hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagamanai.

Na'ipam na'i, “Peme'. Dei' afa' ea' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi anona aman nonda'e efe'ma amom pris dembami moloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ea' monda' kotimi a' mi'i basef mondame'maefa mohe egaga'. Ea' monda'e efe'ma esis sogolalama Godi ma
sonda' salamala ae' sonda'e findiwae sisisi'wafe sopopagahowe ea' sehe ega'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilif, anef fefe' fegataga wanifi a' itanima esafel wapani.”
Jemsi Jon, Sebedi nogaopana mafi'i mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, afa' biafa wa'i uhali'ina ma anif basef ea' nenda'mafaef afa' biafa.”
Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pa'i enda'mepa main?”

Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Anaf owagama ina' netaga negefa' agol lu'wagili mogogala'i gani wambel Godi, nemaf afamba afa' wa'i ina' nenda'afa ope dembefa wil olomena wa'owa'ol anona nil wa'ol egawama a' anona nil wa'ol da'asaigilima.”

Owa' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa ina pegawa andeande'ma hiahawes pagahali'imasi, owa'! Ipa' banagepama pega' embela kap apamba dei' ega' embelapi, a'a owa'?” Jisas na'ipam na'amba ea' na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' bipa banagepama pegefa' baptais isimba dei' egefa'asi a'a owa'?”
Ea' magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' ila la'ififai.” Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi, kap apamba dei' ae' ega' embelapai, a sa'of inimba atiasi egasa'ofani si'i baptaisi, isimba ipa' atiasi pegefa'asi.
Apa' pegape lagol kwahisigili o gagaili ae'agufi, isimba ina maol ae'ani, owa'. God atona ni'i esis isimba a' nandandepas ea'i dao', esis atis sope lagof kwahisigili gagaili ae'agufi.”
Ea' alipumi du'wanim ilifunamaim mame' amom biam ma'ias na'amba, manda' megahaha Jemsi Jon.

Ea' Jisas nofala amom hiami mafi'mai anen, na'ipam atin na'i, “Ipa' pegawa epes sogolalama Godi sa'i agufumi asasimi dembami, amom mape ilifa esis a'owa' manda'mas dondog manda'as kwapete'as. Ea' mape banagem a'owa' manda' esis amam nematawa sogaila malogof amamugufi.
Apa' waf afambai ina a' fepoma ipa', hapaifi. Aman ami nogape dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nili' nope si'i nanda' maola ipa' hipaii.

Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ina afi'ima esis sonda'me maola sogatopalope, owa'. Ae' afi'i enda' maol egatopalopa ipa' hipai ma waf awafi fagawasipai. Ae' afi'i ma sehe ega' etala ipa' peloma epes hiasi igatawahipama waf awafi ipe'ifi. Ea' aman ami ni'i nogataga dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nili' nope si'i agol akanai nonda'masa maol hiasi dowadowaf.”

Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga Jeriko. Ea' ma'i mokwaha Jeriko mefe' moloma amam nematawa hiasi, mataga ufia'w kwagawisi wambili, owa', anona aman naep pagaso'anai Bartimeas, nogama Timeusi, tol nape felefele'ma ufia'w. Anen nape nandailasa otamba gwa'aisi mais sogaso'ana.
Bartimeas name' basefa Jisas Nasaretinai nafi'i nape, ea' nofalana mehip na'i, “Jisas, akunamana Deviti, ina' niti ae' uwahipiwi.”
Owa' esis hiasi sinifalona sa'i, “Ina' sopama malogol.” Owa' anen fala atin nape na'i, “Jisas ina' akunamana Deviti, netelowe uwahipiwi.”
Ea' Jisas nafi'i nalutu na'i, “Falana nifi'mai.” Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Nomonas banages. Safel! Jisas a' nofalinai.”
Ea' anen nakwaha saket ananitai nosafel kwafalis nafe'ma Jisas.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ae' enda'mena main?” Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ae' a'i iti andeande' wapani.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ipa' fo'o. Ina' ea' nahapifa ae' banagiwai ma anda'ena bo'wena wapani.” Ea' kwafalis atis naep apatiana andeande' nagi'ma Jisas nafe' ufia'w.
Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, ea' mataga Betfagai Betani walemb ambalemba bialemb, felefele'ma halafuta Oliv. Ea' Jisas nasapa' alipumi ananimi biam

na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pefe' wambel bambalimba bagape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ai. Pefe' piwis wambel ambalemba, piti anona donki sa'unai sandolana nail. Ina dei' anona aman a' natomana, ata' owa'atin. Petagwahona pefa'ana pifi'mai ae'.
I'i anin epen nigahali'ipa niga'i, ‘Ipa' pafi'i panda'as na'amba ma main?’ Ipa' pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maolana ma bola nosapa'ana notanimamipai kwafalis.’”

Ea' amom biam mafe' mati anona donki sa'unai sapete'ana nail ipat uta ando' felefele'ma ufia'w. Amom ata' matagwahona atin owa', anis salutu felefele' sahali'am sa'i, “Ipa' patagwaha donki anamba ma main?”
Ea' ma'ipas si'i Jisas doko' naga'ipam. Ea' sa'i aho'ma amom mogofa' donki anamba.
Ea' mofa'ana mafi'mai Jisas, mawamona sagegw amamugwi gwatoma donki anamba Jisas natomagw.
Ea' esis hiasi sandombamana sagegw ufia'w. Anis satopa'i apulita lawah hogatawa aof felefele'i saso'wiam ufia'w sofalo'ma'w.
Esis hiasi sali' sagi' safela ao'aligil na'amba sa'i, “Hosana. Apa' mandanifal endilisi ma ina'. Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma ina' nagafi'i agol ananigilii nese'ena banagami ma nenda' maol ananini.

Fowa' gani God nanda' akunamapa ape'inai Devit nape dembinai ma esis nugumafias. Dei' awi God nonda' ina' andeande', nepe Dembinai ma apa' nimafiapa si'i Devit fowa' nape dembinai nugumafias. Hosana. Apa' mondafela agol Godi golota ilif endilisi.”
Ea' Jisas nataga nawis Jerusalem nafe' nawis ipat Godi lu'unai. Nawis nati hiahaom nafe'ma hi'alam, awin na'i a' newala, nao'wa alipumi 12-pelaim ananimi mafe' Betani.
Wafilu Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mohafel makwaha Betani mafi'i atin, owa' Jisas a' nolomahana.

Ea' nalutu nati anoga lawag agiligama fik gotawai laogon felefele', agog a' apuliga. Ea' nafe' felefele' nowando'ma sa'utip. Apa' ina nati anip pailaga, owa'. Nati apul atom. Nogota gogailatai ata' owa' totagaea.
Ea' Jisas na'ipaga na'i, “Ina ata' nil nela anip sa'utip wapani, a' owa'atin endilisi.” Ea' alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba naga'ipagaefi.

Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga Jerusalem, ea' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nali'amona esis hiasi sanda' bisnisi saloma isimba sagatalom ipat anamba nomoni sawisi ando'. Anom amam mati otamba anisi mindisila'mamba. Ea' Jisas nambema tebolifah amamisi nakolo'was. Anis sanda' bisnisa sogatala amiguf ma'unamb. Ea' nambema siaifah asasisi nakolo'masas wapani.
Ea' nanda'imagon na'i, “Ina ata' sofa' anom hiahaom amamba suwisi nomon wapani ipat anamba sandakolas sagapoma, a'owa'.”

Ea' na'ipas basef Godi fagail Baibeli na'i, “Ipat ae'anai nondapoma esis sagape ganimba walemb hiagomai ma sifi'i sopaona sondabeten sogahali'i. Apa' owa', a' panda'ana nataga si'i sandambaho' sanda' wala.”
Amam nematawa hiasi gogolalasisa basef ananifi. Isimba atis pris amamba dembami maloma dembami mogawalipasa mu'uli Godi a' ombal bahama anen. Ea' mala' molaoma ufia'wa mohana nogaga'.
A'i owa' wambomota, Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi makwaha Jerusalem a' mafe'.
Wafilu kuhimbita atota Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mati lawag agamba fik bowaga aliga, soh haloma nombalef alim hi'alam.
Pita natologa, okom mapoma Jisas naga'iefi basefa lawag agamba ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ina' niti lawag aga'e nambati' ina' naga'ipagai, a' aliga hi'alaga.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pihapifa God.

Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, epen ami owa' okom bimbiafim mopoina ma anin okom atifim nihapifi endilisi ni'ipa halafuta tatumba ni'i, ‘Ina' dagia a' nefe' newala naoh,’ endilisi God atiasi a' nonda'am motaga si'i anin okom mandanda'.
I'i ipa' pi'i pendabetena anis maemaefah pi'i pefa'as, ipa' pihapifa God endilisi pendabeten pi'i, ‘Aho' endilisi, afa' atiasi ogofa'asi,’ Ma atiasi pefa'as si'i paga'ias.
Afamba ipa' pilutu pendabeten, pekwahomasa waf awafi anis sanda'mepafi, ukup pese'epaf. Ama Ahamepa nagape heveni okom mogaso'anafa ipa' wapani.
[Apa' ipa' i'i owa' ukup pese'epafa, Ahamepa nagape heveni ina okom moso'anafa ipa', owa'atin.]”

Ea' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafi'i Jerusalem wapani, ea' nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi sandakolasa. Anen ata' nafe' atin, owa' pris dembami maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godii maloma agufumi esis Judai mafi'mai anen.
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' nefa' agol maigila dei' nanda' waf afambai? Ami na'ipina ma negape dembinai ma nanda' maol inimba?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Ae' wapani, a'i ihali'ipa ma anif basefa ipa' ata' pili' pi'ipif ae', ma bola iga'ipipa ami na'ipi ape dembiwai anda' maol inimba.
Jon nagapisi' amam nematawa hiasi, ami na'ipana napisi'as? God nagape heveni na'ipana napisi'as a'a anin epen itapani na'ipana? Ipa' pegwamef pi'ipif.”
Ea' mame' basef ifimba manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' uga'i, ‘God nagape heveni na'ipa Jon nagapisi'as,’ na'amba atiasi a' ni'ipa afa' ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegahapifanaia?’
Apa' afa' uga'i, ‘Anin epen itapani na'ipana nagapisi'as,’ na'amba esis amam nematawa a' sohafa.” Dei' main, esis hiasi sa'i Jon anen profet endilisinai. Amom a' ombel mahama esis.
Ea' magwamana basef ma'i, “Afa' owa' ogawama.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' na'amba atin, ina i'ipipa ami nase'e banagami na'ipi anda' maol inimba ae'ani.”

Jisas nanda' anif basef waminif atina esis na'i, “Anona aman nanda' anof aof nagawa waina nahefagomaf. Aof afamba nomon nanda' anona tang notawa ma sogafa'asa sa'utip ipimba wainip. Anen nala' anota ipat lautai totawa ma sope sugumafiagon. Ea' nakwahomam aof afamba anom amam ma'i monda' maolanaf. Anen nafe' napani anambel wambel lauguni.
Ama nogota sa'utip pagailatai, anen kofagonama aof afambai nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' ma amom manda' maol aof ananifi. Ea' na'i amom moso'ana anip sa'utip gwa'aipi ma aof afamba.
Owa' mombalo'ana mahana mali'amonana notanima nafe' dowaf.
Ea' anen kofagonama aofi nasapa' anona daiana nafe' wapani ma mogaso'ana anip sa'utip. Owa' mombalo'ana wapani mahana mawala balagana manda'ana kwapete'ana.
Ea' kofagonama aofi nasapa' anona daiana nafe' wapani owa', a' mahana afuna, kofagonama aofi nasapa' anom hiami mafe'. Owa', mahami atin anom afum.

A'i owa' nagi' nasapa' atotona nagapani wapani. Anamba nogamana ananinai. Nomonas ananisi sohafel sagasagailanai a'owa'i. Ea' nasapa'ana nafe'ma amom manda' maol aofi. Anen kofagonama aofi na'ias na'i, ‘Atiasi ila, amom a' meme' malogol nogame ae'anai.
Owa' amom mati anen nafi'i manda'ipama atin ma'i, ‘Aman nanumba ma'una owagama nogofa' hiahaom hiami ahamanai. Awi a' ohana afuna, ma afa' atofa ogofa' aof afa'e.’
Ea' mombalo'ana mahana afuna makwaha alop ananinai nawis na'oh aof ando'.
Ea' atiasi anen kofagonama aof afambai nonda' maina amom? Atiasi nifi'i a' noham a' afum hi'ilam, noso'asa aof afamba fefe'ma anis epes daias.
Ipa' patalifa basef Godi pegawef ea'. Basef Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Otam amamba magala' ifagwi mogelefatami dei' mataga mape otam banagami mape magali'i mogombalo' ipati.
Dembinai nanda' amamba mataga, apa' matolom fasifasim a'owa' agogolalasapa.’”
Ea' amom agufumi esis Judai mogawa anen na'i basef ifimba waminif atini nondola'waifa amom. Ea' ma'i a' mombalo'ana. Owa', ombel mahama esis amam nematawa hiasi. Ea' makwahona mafe'.
Ea' amom agufumi Judai masapa' anom Farisi maloma anom daiam mini'ap Heroti mafe'ma Jisas ma'i meme' anif basef ananifi owa' andeande'ia ma monda'mana basef mogowa'ana si'i sogapalo' agof anembeh.

Amom mafi'i makikipana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' ogawena ina' aman naga'i endilisii. Owa' niga'ipasa anif basef isimba anis agof lu'wagufisia a anif basef daifa isimba agof akasi falafisia, owa'atin. Ina' naga'ipasa basef endilisifi atif Godi amam nematawa hiasi dondo' atin hi'agalafi.

Mu'uli ape'ini na'i andeande'ma apa' mogaso'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi, a'a owa'?” Owa' Jisas a' nogawa baso'am amamini na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' pagagwamba ae'? Fa'mai anin moni atitina ata' itilin.”
Ea' mofa'manani ma natilin nahali'am na'i, “Ambal laloma agol isimba sagaili amisi?” Ma'i, “Isimba Sisari gavman dembinai.”
Ea' magwamam na'ipam na'i, “Dao' hiahawes isimba dembinai Sisari pese'anas Sisar. Apa' hiahawes Godi, pese'anas God.” Ea' amom gogolalasom nomonas hiahawesa anen.
Anom amam anep mini'ap Sadyusi amom mini'ap apamba ma'i sagaga'i ina atiasi sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'atin. Ea' mafi'mai Jisas mahali'ana ma'i,

“Dembinai Tisa, fowa' Moses nanda' anif basef fagail buki ma apa'i fa'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga', ma anen awasi akana, waulu'mana ata' kope, owamana ananinai a' noso'akw nola anis awasi ma sogaha'ofana.’
Ea' amom wambota atotota 7-pelaim mape. Nagali'i sahomam naso'akw awani aka'w naga' nakwaho'w kwape.

Ea' owamana nagi' naso'akw, naga' nakwaho'w kwape awani aka'w. Ea' owapam mandatu'umi manda'as na'amba atin, maso' nemata'w akwamba maga' atin hi'alam mafe' mafe'ma matagama owagufunai akutainai. Amom amamba ambipim ina mola anis awasi, owa'. Mandaga' atin. Ama main, waulu'mam kwagi' kwaga' kwagi'mam.
Ea' anaf esis sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, nemata'w akwamba kopoma mamahonama? Amom 7-pelaim a' maso'akw atin hi'alam kwape waulu'mam amamu'wi.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef amom na'i, “Ipa' owa' pegawa basef Baibel naga'iefia, ea' owa' pegawa banagami Godia. Ipa' dei' ina pa'i basef andeande', owa'atin.
Nemaf afamba sagaga'i sokwaha wandelef sogosafel wapani, amam nematawa ina ata' sondaso'ama wapani, a' owa'atin. Sope dowaf si'i ensel magape heveni.

Basef ifimba ma sagaga'i sotanima sogosafel wapani, ipa' patalifa basef fagail buk Baibeli, fowa' God naga'ipanaef Mosesi. Basef ifimba fa'i nif ileliwa wagataga ma lawag sa'ugai fagandogai. Basef ifimba God na'ipa Moses na'i, ‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki, a Jekopi.’
Basef ifimba faga'i Dembinaii, anen ina God epes sagaga'ii, owa'atin. Anen God epes isimba ambal lapais sagape namisi. Ea' basef ipe'ifi ina endilisifi. Ipa' ina pegawef andeande', owa'atin.”

Anona aman dembinai nagawalipasa mu'uli Godi nafi'i, name' amom ma'i maloma Jisas mandahihianama basef. Ea' name' Jisas nagwamam basef bu'wafi atif. Ea' nahali'ana na'i, “Mu'uli Godi apa' magahapifani hiani. Apa' mu'uli mamahina lu'win nikila' mu'uli daian hiani nape nagali'i?”
Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Mu'uli nagali'i inimba. Ipa' Israel, ipa' peme'! Dembinai God ape'inai, anen atona Dembinai.
Nomonas ipe'isi sohafela dembinai God ipe'inai sisilana na'amba. Ukup ipe'ipi pipilana hi'indalep, pese'ana ambagufi nelelemb soloma pepel ipe'isi pendaso'anas hi'indalasa Dembinai God atona.
Ea' mu'uli nagafe'ma bifi inimba. Ipa' ukup pipila anis epes sagape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ukup pagapagaila ipa' atipa. Owa' anin mu'uli nikila' mu'uli inimba biafina, owa'atin.”
Ea' aman anamba na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'ias andeande'. Aho' God atona anen Dembinai, anen atona nape. Owa' anona aman nope dembinai si'i anona.

Aho', mu'uli lu'wani nagali'i inimba. Nomonas ipe'isi sohafela anen sisilana na'amba. Ukup ipe'ipi pipilana hi'indalep, pese'ana nelelembi gawa soloma pepel ipe'isi hi'indalas. Na'ambai andeande'. Ea' mu'uli nagagi'i inimba. Ipa' piti uwahipis nomonas sisila epes ami sagape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ipa' nomonas sagaila ipa' atipa. Na'ambai andeande'. I'i apa' mugaila mu'uli inimba biafin, waf afambai bu'wafi fikila' gwa'aisi mafis main mogaso'anas Godi ata' be'es kwasakwasala.”

Jisas name' aman anamba nagwa basef si'i aman gawa bu'waninai. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina' ata' nogota laota ma nigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai mugumafina, owa'.” Ea' amom hiami ombel mahama mogahali' Jisasa anif basef wapani.

Jisas nape ipat lu'unai Godi naso'asa basef esis amam nematawa na'i, “Amom magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ma'i, ‘Krais, aman anamba God nandandepana nogafi'ii, Devit akunamana. Ea' ma'i Krais aman atona dowaf itapanai. Dei' maina maga'ias na'amba ma Krais?

Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'ma Devit na'i, ‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'i, “Ina' nepe lagol kwahisigili ae'agili atapina nefe' netagama ae' enda' bousi ine'isi sogafe' lafela bo'wagah ine'igahi.”’
Aman anamba king Devit fowa' nofala Krais na'i Dembinai. Isimba atis dei' Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anen dembinai.” Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sonahasa sagame' basef ananifi.

Jisas nawalipas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa ma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi. Amom ma'i mowaho' luwaguf laumi atom mondafe'ma esis sotoloma siga'i amom dembami manda' waf fasifii. Amom ma'i mope anamba esis hiasi sandatama sagapoma ma sotoloma sondalalamam soganifelom.

Amam amamba ukup pa'i mondape siaifah isimba sotawa sagali'i atis, dembami atom magapoma nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi a'a anamba hiasi sandakolas nimaguf ifimba sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami ma hiasi sogatolom.

Amom magawis ifagw agwamba nematawa alifiwaii, mawis manda' wala hiahawes awousi. Ea' mosafel malutu mandabeten launai dowadowafa esis sotolom siga'i amom bu'wami. Anaf God nowaloga epes hiasi. Anis epes daias owa' sonda' waf awafi na'ambaia anaf sofa' akafimi kwasakwasala, apa' amom a' mofa' nimanimi a'owa' lu'wami endilisi.”
Jisas nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi, nape felefele'ma bokis moni nagalasi. Anen nape nati amam nematawa safi'i sagala moni negewala bokis. Amam nematawa isimba moni hianaisi sala moni hiani.
Apa' ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwafi'i kwala moni sa'wisa'wini biafin si'i 10 toea newala bokis isimba.
Ea' nofala alipumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemata'w akwamba alifi'wi kwa'waha moni lu'wani nikila' moni hiani amam nematawa hiasi sagalani.

Epes isimba hiasi moni hianai na'omas, sala du'wanin atin newala bokis. Apa' nemata'w akwamba, moni aka'w endilisi, ako'w kwala moni ako'uni hi'alan. Ea' owa' anin ne'eha kogatala gwa'aisia, a' owa'atin. Ea' moni ako'wini biafin sa'wini a' nikila' moni hiani esis sagalani hi'alan.”

Jisas nape nomon ipat anamba lu'unai Godi. Ea' na'i nokwaha ipat anamba nuwisi ando', anona alipunai ananimi nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Tisa, ina' niti ifagw amamba fasifasimi. Sanda' otamba lu'wami sanda'am suwasuwaim.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nati ifagw amamba lu'wami, a'a? Anaf ina anemba otamba bendatomama atin banagemba bepe, owa'atin. A sugulatam sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona atin hi'ilam.”
Jisas nape halafuta Oliv ea' nati ipat lu'unai Godi notawa do'wan wa'ol. Ea' Pita naloma Jemsi Jon a Andru atom mafi'mai anen mahali'ana ma'i,
“Ina' ni'ipafa hiahaom amamba nambai' motaga? Ametal mail lili' lotaga ma apa' mogogawa hiahaom amamba felefele'ma mogataga si'i dei'aol naga'ipafa?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipama basef laufi na'amba na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba anin epen a' nembaso'mepa.
Dei' main, amam hiami anef nemaf mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'i agol ae'agili mi'i, ‘Ae' ma'uwi ae' Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e agafi'ii.’ Ea' atiasi amom mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiasi.
Anef nemaf peme' amalemba wandaf anis sondaha basefa wandaf si'ipipaf, apa' ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagai, apa' nemaf akutaifi ata' ota'.

Anis epes sagape anamba itap lu'wagoma sofela wandaf sopa' soloma anis sagape anep itap daiapi. Anona dembinai king no'wa anis walemb hielimbi ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king daiana no'wa ananisi analemb walembi. Analemb walemb hiagoma atona atin itap bol atin nope, ea' anis epes hiasi sagape analemb walembi nolomohas sope. Hiahaom amamba ata' muli' motaga si'i akafimi mali' magatagama nemata'w kwa'i kogola awani. Apa' akafimi anaf migi' mogatagai a' lu'um a'owa' mikila' amamba mogali'i.

Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Anaf sonda' kotimipa ma gavman dembami asasimi. Ea' sehepa nomon ifagw Juda sandakolasugwi. Ipa' pagame' basef ae'afi pagaila ae'i isimba atis dei' sondaiwa'mepa sonda'epa pilutu nogohnaep kingi moloma gavman dembami ma pegawalapa basef ae'afi bu'wafi piga'ipasef.
Alipisi ae'asi ata' sili' sofe' walemb hiagoma si'ipa amam nematawa hiasi some' basef bu'wafi Godi fili'. Ama main nemaf akutaifi figi' fetaga.

Afamba esis sowalapepa sofa'epa pegafe'ma kot, ipa' ina ombel mehepa a pi'i, ‘Atiasi afa' wi'i basef maif?’ Owa'. Basef hiafi God nogasi'ipafi ma nogota atamba atota, ifimba ipa' pewalapef. Ifimba ina basef ipe'ifi atif, owa'. Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nowalapefa ipa' pi'if.
Anef nemaf esis atis sahin owan sondanda'ma kot, sohas afis. Ea' ahapas sonda'am na'amba atina esis nogaopas asasisi. Ea' batawisas wapani sonda' kotima mamasas asasisi anis sohas afis.

Atiasi epes hiasi walemb hiagoma nelelemb numbutima ipa' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipa' pagaila basef ae'afii, na'amba dei' sahepa. Apa' epen ami nihapifi banagen nilutu negataga nemaf akutaifii, inimba atiasi God nuwambilan nokwahoman waf awafi ananifi nitanimai nepe andeande'.

“Anef nemaf ipa' piti hiahaom awami mogahambombaga hiahaom bu'wamii motaga mogape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. God nandaiwa' endilisi ma hiahaom amamba awami mogape nomon ipat ananinai.” (Epen ami negatalifa basef ifimbai, anin a' okom mondapomef andeande'.) Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi wapani na'i, “Nemaf afamba amam nematawa sagape itap lu'wapi Judiai sofa' sefe' sondowasa'o halafutagw.
Ea' epen ami nagape ipat ando'i ina ata' netanima niwis nefa'i hiahawes ananisi ipat nomon, owa'i. Anin a' nefa' nendafo'o mehip.
Epen ami nigail aofi, ina ata' nitanima nefe' wambel nefa' saket main ananisi, owa'i. Anin a' nefa' nendafo'o mehip.
Nematawa opafuwai waloma awamba awasi ota'asi saga' nomagof atogufi, ae' a'i awo uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota atamba ogame' akafimi lu'wami.
Ipa' pendabetena hiahaom amamba akafimi ina motagamepa nogota atamba fufini asaf sogatagatai.

Nogota atamba akafimi mugatagai lu'wami endilisi. Fowa' dambadamba itap pagataga nafi'i nafi'i natagama dei', nimanimi awami amambai ina anom na'ambaimi mataga, owa'atin. Ea' anaf wapani ina atiasi anom nimanimi amambai motaga, owa'atin.
I'i God owa' nonda' nimaguf fefe' bandefa, atiasi amam nematawa hiasi higiligalasi hi'ilas. Owa' owa'atin. Apa' God okom mapoma epes isimba anen nandandepas ea'i, dei' nahagasa nogota atamba bandata.
Nemaf afamba fetaga ma i'i anis epes si'ipipa siga'i, ‘Ipa' piti Krais, God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, anen nape na'a, o nani nape gani,’ ipa' ina pihapifas, owa' hapaisi.

Atiasi anom amam mombaso'am muga'i amom Kraisi a'a muga'i profeti, a' motaga monda' ametal hiahaom banagami mamimami monda' banagami hiami si'i God nanda'ami. Endilisi i'i amom banagema, a' mombaso'ma amam nematawa God nosaho'as ea'i mohambombagas. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
Ea' ipa' a' solawaipa andeande'. Ae' ali' a'ipipa ea' ma hiahaom amamba nimanimi akafimi anaf mugi' mugatagai.
“Akafimi nimanimi hiami ma nogota atamba hi'ilam ea', kwafalis atis awin alipini a' netaga owamb, ea' owambini ina ata' negala', a'owa'.
Ea' ondowa mowai otaga ilif, hiahaom hiami banagami magape otagai ea' bol atin mope.
Nogota atamba esis siti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi eloma ilagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma hiahaom mogogala'i fasimi Godi moloma banagami ananimi.

Nogota atamba ae' igafi'i esapa' ensel amamba ae'ami mofe' itap hiagoma awin natafima negewalama lambilif anamba wa'owa'ol biafigin biafigin mefe'agon hi'ilagon ganimba itapi otaga safe' sogotambela. Atiasi ensel amamba mefe' mofa'ai esis amam nematawa God nogosaho'as ananisii sondakolas atogon.
“Ipa' nomonas sondanda'ma anif basef waminif atina ilaof. Ipa' piti ilaof nogonafa ma basowa, pegawa nogota atamba nelemb ea' felefele'ma sogaof.’
“Ea' na'amba atin anaf piti hiahaom amamba ae' ali' aga'ipipami mogataga, ipa' pegawa ae' afi'i alutu felefele'ma uta. Ina ata' nogota laota, owa'.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i ata' pagapani ina atiasi apega' ulal, ata' owa' ipa' piti esis ea' siti hiahaom amamba motaga hi'igalam.
Otaga noloma itap hiagoma anaf a' higililam hi'ilam, apa' basef ae'afi ina anaf higililif, owa'atin endilisi. Fegape atapif lifilafii.
“Owa' anin epen negawa nemaf afamba hiahaom amamba mogatagafia, owa'. Amom ensel magape heveni maloma ae' Nogama Godi afa' wapani ina ogawaf, owa'. God atona nogawa nemaf afamba.
Ipa' ina pegawa hiahaom amamba nambai' motaga, owa'. Ipa' solawaipa, pindumafuma andeande' pendape.

Ipa' peme' anif basef waminif atin dei' iga'ipipafi. Nemaf afamba si'i anona aman nakwaha ipat ananitai nagafe' anagon. Anen nofalai amom manda' maola anini mafi'i nawaloga maol nagaso'am atona atina mugumafi hiahawes ananisi. Ea' na'ipa aman nugumafi utai ma nugumafiata andeande'.
Ea' ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Ipa' ina pegawa nambai' Dembinai nugumafi ipati nugafi'i. Atiasi nifi'i wambomota a'a amanota a'a lalamota awatagw gogata, a'a kuhimbita atota, ipa' ina pegawam, owa'.
Na'amba anen nifi'i kwafalis atis niti ipa' ata' pe'eh atin.
Basef ifimba ae' agase'epaef ipe'i, ifimba ae' a'ipa amam nematawa hiasi hi'alas. Ipa' solawaipa andeande' pepe ma hiahaom ae' aga'ipipami mogataga.”

Anef nemaf bu'wafi sa'i Pasova ma esis Juda sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi soga' anota bret owa' togatef lu'utaia. Nimaguf bif ata' fape ma nemaf afamba bu'wafi sa'i soga' gwa'aisi Pasovaefi. Afamba amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma anom pris dembami ma'i monda' uhuf mefe'ma mombalo' Jisas mohana nogaga'.
Amom ma'ias na'amba ma'i, “Nemaf afamba sanda' gwa'aisi lu'wasiafi afa' ina ombalo'ana, hapainai. Na'amba epes hiasi ukup awep sohafel sonda' wandaf.”

Nemaf afamba Jisas nafe' Betani, nape ipat anona aman Saimoni, fowa' aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi pagambu'wi, ma dei' ambu'unai, Jisas ata' nape na' gwa'aisi atin, owa' ano'w nemata'w kwahapila anol botol sanda'al si'i otami, sanda alogw fasigwi gwagani sagatalin otamba lu'umbai nala botol alamba, agilina nad. Ea' kopalia botol alamba kwakolo'wan newala balaga Jisasi.
Owa' anis epes sape satolom sa'i, “Dei' maina kwagakolo' sanda inimba dowadowaf?” Ea' esis ukup numbutip kwapete' ma ako'w,

sa'i, “I'i afa' ofa'ana anis epes soso'afa moni nikila' 300 kina sotalina ofa'an ogaso' epes isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi mainai, dao' andeande'. Apa' owa' owa'atin.” Esis ukup numbutip a'owa' sapoma nemata'w akwamba.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' ina a' ukup aoma ako'w, owa'i. Ako'w kwanda' waf fasifima ae'.

Isimba gwa'aisi main akasi lifilafi sape dowaf salomepa. Nemaf mamahefa pi'i petopalopas pegaso'as moni, andeande', pese'asan. Epes isimba gwa'asi main akasi sape salomepa nimaguf hiafi, apa' ae' owa'. Ae' ina elomepa egape nimaguf hiafi, owa'.

Maol inimba ako'w kwogawan kwanda'ani, ako'w kwanda'an. Felefele'ma atiasi esis sehe egaga' ma sogawe matmata. Okom ako'umi mapoma felefele'ma egaga'. Na'amba dei' kofa'i sanda' inimba kwafi'i kwakolo'wan newala balaga ae'agai koko'walan newala alop ae'api.
Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, ganimba itap walemb hiagoma anaf siga'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi, si'ipasa basef ako'ufi wapani ma ukup pegapoma, waf bu'wafi ako'w kwanda'meafi.”
Amam amamba Jisasi 12-pelaim anona amamunai agilinama Judas Keriotinai a nafe' gani amom pris dembami magapoma. Anen na'i ni'ipama Jisas atona nogapoma mofe' mogombalo'ana.

Amom mame' basef ananifi sonaham endilisi. Ea' ma'i basef mandame'maef na'amba ma'i, “Andeande', afa' a' ose'ena anin moni.” Ea' Judas na'i aho' a' nala' nolaoma ano'w ufia'wa nigihimba'mama Jisas amoma mogombalo'ana.

Nemaf afamba sali' saga' gwa'aisi saga'i Pasovai esis sa' bret atamba owa' togatef lu'utaia, ea' saha sipsip nogami sondolalima Goda sonda' gwa'aisi isimba. Ea' alipumi Jisasi mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat anima?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa ananimi biam na'i, “Ipa' pefe' piwis gani wambel lu'wambili, piti anona aman ufia'w nofa' embel sospen lu'unai. Ea' pigi'mana pefe' piwis ipat atamba anen nefe' nogawisatai. Ea' pihali' ahama ipat atambai pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i, ipat atamba esis saga'ohotai totawa ani? Anen na'i no'wa afa' atofa alipufai ope onda' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova.’
Ea' nihimba'mepa rum amamba lu'wami mape ilif, ea' sandombata tebol siaifah sa'oh atifis. Ipa' pendondombamafa gwa'aisi rum amamba.”
Ea' amom mafe' mawis wambel ambalemba mati hiahawes isimba si'i Jisas nali' naga'ipamasi ea' mandondomba gwa'aisi isimba Pasova.
Ama wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Jisas naloma alipumi 12-pelaim mafe' mataga ipat atamba
mawis ata' mape ma' gwa'aisi atin, owa Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai dei' nape nalomafa naga' gwa'aisii, atiasi a' nefe' nihimba'ma amom boumi ma ae' egapoma.”
Ea' amom mame' na'amba ukup amamipi a' nimanip ea' mahali'ana atona atin ma'i, “Ae' a'a ami?”
Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Anona afa'inai nalome ae' wahapila bret wagalata disi, ea' anamba atona.

Aho', ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi anis epes sehe egaga', si'i Buk Baibel naga'iasa ae'. Apa' aman anamba nogawalapa ae' ma boumii, anen uwahipina endilisi. Atiasi hiahaom awami endilisi a' motagamana. Fowa' ma'mana owa' ata' kolana ai, dao' a' andeande'. Ama anen ina a' notagama hiahaom akafimi amamba awami ea' hapaimi. Owa', a' owa'atin.”
Jisas nalomam ata' mape ma' gwa'aisi atin, ama main, nasa'ma anota bret, nandabeten nanifela God, nawalota naso'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' sa'mata pea'ata. Bret atamba alop ae'api.”
Ea' nasa'mai anop kap embel wain bagalapi nandabeten nanifela God naso'amambel amom hiami ma' embel atin.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Embel ambalemba esimbel ae'ambeli begewa' banaga basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi dambaifi. Ae' ekolo'wambela egatopalopa amam nematawa hiasi.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ina ata' itanima ia' embel wainimbel wapani, owa'. Efe' etaga anamba God nagala'ambemagoma dao', a' ia' anin wain dambaini.”
Amom manda' anof awaf ea' mawisi a' mafe' mondowasa' halafuta Oliv.

Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom alipumi na'i, “Fowa' gani Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, God na'i, ‘Anaf owagama gani, ae' a' eha aman anamba nugumafi sipsipi noga'. Ea' sipsip amamba atiasi a' mofa' mofe' atona biana.’ Atiasi ipa' a pekwaha pigahapifa ae' pefa' pefe' atona biana, si'i fowa' God naga'ias.
Apa' owa' owa'atin, atiasi ae' itanima esafel wapani, ili'ipa efe' itap lu'upa Galili.”
Ea' Pita nagwamana na'i, “I'i amom hiami ine'imi mogakwaha ine'ma, hapaimi, apa' ae' owa'atin.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, dei' owamb amba'e, awata ata' owa' tota bifa, ina' a' nendahali'mi ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisasa.’”

Owa' owa'atin. Pita dindinapina na'ipana banagambel na'i, “Owa'atin. I'i esis sogahafa, afa' biafa oga' atin. Ae' ina a' indahali'mina, owa'atin endilisi.” Ea' alipumi hiami Jisasi ma'ias na'amba atin hi'alam.
Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga itap Getsemani, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pepe na'a. Ae' cefe' gani wa'ol endabeten ihali' God.”
Jisas nao'wa Pitai Jems a Jon mafe' malomana. Ea' opaf Jisasi a' aof kwapete'af
na'ipam na'i, “Nembel ae'ambili a' nimanimbil a'owa', ma a' egaga' nomonas ae'asi a' awes endilisi. Ipa' pepe na'a silisilawi pepe pesasae igitanimai.”
Ea' Jisas nandambemef nafe', nambe' opaf na'oh itap nahali' God. Na'i notofa hiahaom awami amamba anen atiasi nogame'agamami.
Ea' nahali' God na'i, “O, Ahame ina' banaginai ma nanda' hiahaom hiami hi'agalami. Nekwahome kap apamba. Apa' owa', ina' nindaila okom ine'imi atom, ae' owa'.”

Anen nahali'ana ea', nosafel notanima nafe'ma alipumi ananimi magapoma. Nafe' natolom owa', nati amom ma'oh maga' mafe'. Ea' nofala Saimon Pita na'i, “Saimon, ipa' ata' owa' pepea, panda'oh atin a'amon? Dei' maina ipa' owa' banagepama pepe pegasasa ae'a? Nogota ina laota ma a'ipipa a'i pepe pegasasa ae', owa'. Nogota bandata si'i awa atitin.
Ipa' solawaipa pepe pendabeten. Na'amba hiahaom mogogwambipai a' motagamepa. Endilisi ukup ipe'ipi pa'i awima pendabeten, apa' alop owa' banagepa, ala'uta tahepa, ma pendabeten pegalome.”
Jisas na'ipam na'amba ma ea', a' notanima nafe' nahali' God. Nahali'anama basef ifimba atif nali' nagahali'anamafi.
Nahali'ana ea' nandambemef notanima nafi'i amom magapoma nati ata' ma'oh atin. Ea' ninimbalom mosafel ma'i, “Atiasi afa' wi'ipana basef maif?” Ambeh lu'wambihi haham ea' ma'oh maga' mafe'.

Anen nandambema notanima nafe' wapani nahali' God si'i doko' nali' nagahali'ana bif. Ea' notanima nafi'mai amom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' papoma noma'w pa'oh atin? Dei' ipa' koh ea', safel. Dei' nemaf afa'e anona aman a' nifi'i nulumai anom amam awami mufi'i mowa' ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.
Safel! A' ofe' uti aman anamba nigihimba'mama ae'i dei' a' nafi'i.”

Jisas ata' nalutu na'ipam atin, owa' anona aman a' nafi'i. Aman anamba Judas anona amom 12-pelaim ananimi nafi'i nalumai amam hiami mahapila bainagwi belep malomana mafi'i. Amom pris dembami malumai agufumi dembami esis Judai masapa'am mafi'i.

Ea' aman anamba nagawalapa Jisasi, nali' na'ipam nanda' ametal nihimba'mam na'i, “Atiasi piti aman anamba ae' igasisi'a dalogwanai, ea' Jisas anamba ma'una. Ipa' hapilana pewa'ana andeande' pefa'ana pefe'.”
Amom ata' mataga atin, owa' Judas nafe'ma Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Tisa dembinai.” Ea' nasisi' dalot Jisasi.
Ea' amom mowasa' lagof mombalo' Jisas.
Owa' anona aman nagalutu felefele'ma Jisasi nagiai bainat naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii, natopa' aliga ananigai pele'atowaga gowa.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom boumi na'i, “Ipa' pefa'i bainagwi belep pafi'i pa'i pegewa' anona aman aunai nanda' wal napa' nagaloma gavmani a'a?

Nimaguf hiafi ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wafi ma esis aman nematawa hiasi, ipa' owa' pembale'ea. Apa' dei' paila basef fagape Baibeli pafi'i pewa'e si'i basef fowa' Faga'ias. Ae' a'i basef ifimba dei' fetaga endilisi a fela gwa'aisi.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi hiami makwahona mafa' mafe' hi'alam.
Anona aman sa'unai nagi'ma Jisas nafi'i nowaho' anef lowaf afitifi ea' amom magahapila bainagwi bilipi ma'i mombalo'ana.
Owa' owa'atin. Anen nakwaha lowaf atef fa'oh a' nafa' nafe' dowaf.
Amom mofa' Jisas mafe'ma pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii. Anen naloma amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami daiam magawalipasa mu'uli Godi amom hiami mandakolas atogon.
Ea' Pita ina nalomam atef nafe', owa'. Anen nagigi'mam nafe' nawis indalelemba pris anamba dembinai ea' nape naloma polisman mapoma nif.
Ea' amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami Juda hiami mugumafi koti ma'i molaoma anis epesa sombaso'am sogasapaga Jisasa anif basefa, mohana nogaga'. Owa', amom ina mati anif, owa'atin.
Esis hiasi sambaso'mana sasapagana dowaf, apa' ina sa'i endilisifi fafe' atifigin, owa'. Sa'if fandafe' daindai.
Owa' amom daiam malutu masapagana mambaso'mana ma anif basef na'amba ma'i,
“Afa' wame' Jisas na'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Ipat Godi lu'unai epes sanda'anai, atiasi ae' igulatana, ma nimaguf wanif a' esa'mana notawa wapani. Apa' ae' ina enda' lagof esa'mana, owa'.’”
Ea' basef ifimba amom maga'iefi ina ma'i endilisifi fafe' atifigin, owa'. Ma'if fandafe' daindai.
Ea' pris anamba dembinai nalutu la'afen nahali' Jisas na'amba na'i, “Ina' negwa basef ifimba, a'a owa'? Dei' maina amom maga'ipina basef na'amba?”

Owa', owa'atin. Jisas nasopama malagol nalutu. Anen ina nagwamana basef anen, owa'. Na'amba pris anamba dembinai nahali'ana wapani na'i, “Ina' Krais aman anamba God nasapa'ena nagafi'ii a'a owa'? Ina' Nogamana God apa' manda' lotumanai, a'a owa'?”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Endilisi ae' ma'uwi. Anaf owagama ipa' apiti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi epe lagol kwahisigili Godi banagewe epe otaga ilif itanimai ifi'i petolowe.”
Jisas na'ias na'amba owa', pris anamba a' okom wandafuna ea' nahape' lowaf anen nagalafi na'ias na'i, “Apa' ina ata' mofalai anis wapani sifi'i si'i anif basefa anen, owa'atin.
Anen nanda' God findiwana ea' ifimba apame'ef. Dei' ipa' ukup pape pa'imama?” Ea' amom hiami ma'i anif basef mandame'maef ma'i, “Anen nanda' waf awafi andeande'ma mohana nogaga'.”
Ea' anom mosafel misisi'wafana masopama naep ananipi mahana ma'ipana ma'i, “Ni'i basef si'i profet newalapa wagahinai ami nahena?” Ea' amom polisman mafi'i mahana a' mofa'ana mafe'.

Ano'w nemata'w kwanda'mana maol pris anamba dembinai kwafi'i kwati Pita napoma nif ipat ando'. Ea' kwalutu naep do'a anen, kogawana kwa'ipana na'amba kwa'i, “Anina ina' nape nagaloma Jisas Nasaretinai.”
Ea' Pita nandahali' na'ipa'w na'i, “Owa'. Ae' ina egawa basef kofagefa ina' naga'iefi.” Ea' anen nosafel nafe' felefele'ma indambel uta, anota awata atata.
Ea' nemata'w akwamba kwatolona kwa'ipas wapani isimba sagalutu felefele'i kwai'pas na'amba kwa'i, “Aman anamba wapani alipunai nagaloma Jisasi.”

Owa' Pita na'ias wapani na'i, “Ae' ina egawana, ae' owa'.” A'i owa' nogota laota kwasakwasala, owa' anis sagalutu felefele'i sa'ipa Pita wapani sa'i, “Endilisi, ina' alipinai nagaloma amom Jisasi. Ina' wapani aman Galilinai.”
Dei' Pita nandahali' na'i basef banagafi na'i, “Endilisi ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anamba ipa' paga'ianai, owa'atin.”

Anen na'ias ea' owa', awata atata bif ea' Pita a' okom mandanda'ma basef doko' Jisas na'ipanaef owambi naga'i, “Awata owa' ata' tota bifa, ina' nembaso'mas ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Owa' negawea.’” Ea' Pita okom mandanda'ma basef ifimba ea' nalef mehip.

A'i owa' kuhimbita atota amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami daiam Judai a amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, maloma anom Juda dembami mugumafi koti, amom hiami mandakolas maila basef atifif. Amom mowa' Jisas mofa'ana mafe' maso' gavman dembinai Pailat.
Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' king dembinai Judai a'a owa'?” Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef ifimba ina' naga'iefi endilisifi.”
Ea' amom pris dembami masapaga Jisasa basef hiafi.
Na'amba Pailat nahali'ana wapani na'i, “Ina' owa' negwa anif basefa? Ina' neme'. Amom manda'mena basef hiafi ma ina'.”
Owa' Jisas ina nagwa anif basef wapani, owa'. Na'amba Pailat nomonas salasafe' hiahias.

Nemaf afamba esis Juda sanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi saga'i Pasovai. Afagof danda ma nemaf afamba danda'afi Pailat nanda'as na'amba. Anen nakwahowa anona nagape kalabusi nafe' wahifina. Aman ami esis amam nematawa saga'ianai, Pailat name'asa nakwahona nafe'mas.
A'i owa' nogota atamba anona aman nagape kalabusi agilinama Barabas. Anen nanda' kalabus naloma anom amam mapa' magaloma gavmani maha anis sagaga'i.
Ea' esis hiasi safi'i salutu sofala Pailat sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' nekwahowa anona aman nagape kalabusi nifi'mai apa' wahifina si'i afagof danda nanda'am.”
Ea' nagwamasa basef na'i, “Dei' ae' ekwahowa king dembinai ipa' nefe'mago ipa', a'a ami?”
Dei' main, Pailat anen nogawa amom pris dembami kowalama epes hiasi sagaila basef Jisasi ukup aom atom mapomana dei' manda' kotimana.
Ea' amom masa'ma nomonas amam nematawa hiasi ma sogahali' Pailata nogakwaha Barabas atona nogafi'mai esis.
Ea' Pailat na'ias wapani na'amba na'i, “Atiasi ipa' pa'i ae' enda'ana i'imamana aman anamba ipa' pegefalona paga'i king dembinai esis Judai?”
Ea' esis gigal sa'oh mehip sa'i, “Dolana lawag hana noga'.”
Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' main? Anen nanda' waf maif awafi?” Owa' esis gigal sa'i mehip sa'i, “Dolana lawag hana afuna!”
Ea' Pailat na'i nila nomonas asasisi. Ea' nakwahowa Barabas nafe'ma esis na'ipa amom soldia ma mogopagaha Jisas mofa'ana mefe'ma mogandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
Amom soldia mofa' Jisas mawisi ipat gavmani lu'utai. Ea' mofala anom soldia hiami mafi'i munduwa'anima ma anen
malamana saket akwahitai. Ea' mofa'i anona mandof higatagunai manogana mala'watefana si'i hat mowalo'manana balaga ananigai.
Ea' malutu manda'ana findiwana ma'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, ina' king dembinai esis Judai.”
Ea' amom mahana anota alifita balaga ananigai, misisi'wafana mindiwa nembawa motawa masa'ma agol ananigili dowaf.
Manda'ana findiwana ma ea', mowalimana saket atamba akwahitai, malamana lowaf ananifi mofa'ana mafe'ma mogandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.

Amom soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' ata' malo ufia'w la'afen, owa' matagama anona aman Saimon, nape wambel ananimbili itap lu'upa Sairini nafi'i. Nogaopana ananimi biam Aleksanderi Rufus. Saimon napani alup nafi'i, na'i nefe' Jerusalem. Owa' amom soldia ma'ipana dindinapa nogofa' lawag Jisasi. Ea' masapa'ana nofa'aga nafe'.
Ea' mofa' Jisas mafe' mataga anagon agiligima Golgota. Apa' dei' mambemefagol ma'i, Pipitagol Balagaigil.
Ea' maso'ana anambel embel wain mambemam magaloma anona marasin agilina meri ma nea' embel begahagofa akep lu'wami. Owa' anen ina na'i aho' na'am, owa'. Nandaiwa'mam.
Ea' mandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ma main, manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma ami nigikila'i ma mofa'ef mondondamef atona atin.
Kuhumbita awin ata' natafi nainaili 9 klok, soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' mandolana lawag agamba.
Amom mofa' anin pepa basef ifimba doko' amom Juda magasapaga Jisasafi Pailat nanda'ef fagaili fa'i, “Anamba dembinai king esis Judai.” Amom manda' basef ifimba fail balaga Jisasi lawag ilif.
Felefele'ma Jisas nagaima, amom soldia mandola anom biam manda' waf awafii manda' wali. Amom mandola Jisas nail la'afen, ea' mandola amom biam mail wa'owa'ol.
[Na'amba si'i anif basef Baibel naga'iefi dei' afataga alihif fandawalap. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Anaf esis nomonas sopoma anen noloma amom amamba manda' waf awafii.”]

Ea' anis amam nematawa safi'i kilikila' sagaili sanda' salamala anen, sapapati balagah sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Awi, ina' aman nigugulata ipat anamba dembinai Godi, ma netanima negasa'mana nimaguf wanifi,
dei' netopalopa ina' nendatagwah nisila'i.”
Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi hiami malomam malutu manda'ana findiwana ma'i, “Anen nandatopalopa anis daindaias, apa' dei' ina natopalopa anen, owa'atin.
I'i aman anamba Krais Dembinai esis Israeli, anen nokwaha lawag nisila'i ma motolona mogahapifana.” Amom biam sandolam magaloma Jisasi wapani manda'ana findiwana ma basef awafi.
Awin nandasapa' akot lu'unai a' nataga itap hiagoma esis Judai akotigin. Akot a' nape nafe' nafe' ma awin nandambema 3 klok wambomota. Ea' awin nataga negala' wapani.
Awin nandambema 3 klok, Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” Apa' mambemef ma'ias na'amba ma'i, “God ae'inai, God ae'inai, dei' maina ina' nagakwahowe?”
Anis epes salutu felefele' same' anen na'ias na'amba sa'i, “Peme'. Anen nofala anona profet Elaija.”

Ea' anona aman nasagih nafe' nofa' anom mosong magape naohi nalam mowala embel wainimbel numbutimbeli nagiam nasapa'am anagol bagol nandowam mafe'ma Jisas noga' embel. Ea' aman anamba na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' ata' ota' atiasi muti Elaija nifi'i notagwahona nisila'i a'a owa'?”
Ea' Jisas galala mehip ea' naga' dogw.
Ea' dei' anona lowaf lu'unai si'i utai negetaol ipat Godi lu'unai nomoni palalana gani ilif nowala itap nataga biafina.
Ea' kepten anamba dembinai nugumafi soldia hiamii, nalutu felefele'ma Jisas nati anen naga' na'amba ea' na'ias na'i, “Endilisi atis, aman anamba nogamana Godi.”
Ea' anowa nematawa walutuwi laogon wagatologinii awamba. Ano'w Maria Makdalai'wi a ano'w agol atogol Maria ma'ma Joses naloma Jems sa'unai a' ano'w Salome.
Fowa' Jisas ata' nagape Galili, awo wagawagaila anini ma wagatopalopana ma anis hiahawea gwa'aisi mais. Anowa hiawai wapani walomana ondondowasa' Jerusalem.

A'i owa' wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Josep Arimateainai nafi'i. Anen dembinai ma kot esis Judai, agol lu'wagilinai. Nape nohafa nemaf bu'wafi fegataga ma hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Dei' sanda' hiahaom gwa'aisi mais dumbulidombola naman nemaf afamba sabat fegataga. Ea' Josep nafe' nawis nalutu naep Pailati. Anen ina ombal mahana, owa'. Nahali'ana ma nofa'i alop Jisasi nogawana.
Na'amba Pailat agogolalasona okom ma'i Jisas ina dei' a' afuna endilisi, ata' owa'. Ea' nofala anona dembinai soldia nafi'i nahali'ana na'amba na'i, “Jisas a' naga' ea' a'a owa'?”
Soldia anamba na'ipana na'i, “Jisas a' naga' endilisi ea'.” Ea' Pailat na'ipa Josep na'i, “Dao' ina' nefe' nefa' alop Jisasi.”

Fowa' anis sanda' anota matmat sagwasa otam lu'unai nagal nawis nomon. Ea' dei' Josep na'i nowa Jisas matmat atamba. Ea' nafe' notala anona lowaf afitinai nafi'i natagwaha alop Jisasi nisila'i ma nanda' lowaf anamba nowa'ana ma ea', nasapa'ana nawis matmat atamba nalana nomon. Ea' nambema anona otam lu'unai nafe' nowalo uta matmat atamba.
Anowa nematawa biawa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Maria ma'ma Josesi, awo walutu watologon wati anamba Josep nagawa Jisasa.
Nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi afafe' hi'alaf, Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Maria ma'ma Jemsi waloma Salome watala anom wel alogw fasifasimi maga'ami. Awo wa'i ofa'am ofe' ondisa alop Jisasi.
Wafilu nemaf Sande, kuhimbita atota awo ofa' wel alamba wafe' matmat.
Awo ata' wafe' atin ufia'w, wanda'ipama na'amba wa'i, “Atiasi ami netopalopafa nelefata otam anamba nogowalo utai?”
Ea' watologon owa', wati otam amamba lu'unai ina ata' mape mowalo uta, owa'. Anin epen a' nafe' nawisi'am mafe' ma'oh wa'ol.
Awo wawis matmat nomon, wati anona aman sa'unai tol nape uta wa'ol lagol kwahisigilima. Nala anona lowaf launai afitinai. Na'amba awo gogolalasowa kwapete' ombel mahawa.

Ea' anen na'ipawa na'amba na'i, “Ipa' ina a' ombel mehepa, owa'i. Ae' egawepa ipa' pa'i pifi'i pelaoma Jisas Nasaretinai, esis sandolana naga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Anen a' notanima nosafel ea', ina ata' nape na'a, owa'. Ipa' piti na'a sofa'ana sawisi salana nagalama. Dei' a' wafigin nape.
Ea' ipa' fo'o pi'ipa alipumi ananimi ea' pi'ipa Pita nalomam na'amba pi'i, ‘Jisas a' nali'ipa nafe' itap apamba Galili. Ipa' pefo'o petolona si'i nimbewa' naga'ipipa.’”
Ea' wakwaha matmat wawisi ando' a' wafa' wafe'. Awo ombel mahawa wanda'am bombol atin. Ea' awo ina wa'ipasa basefa anis epes, owa'atin.
[Jisas notanima nosafel Sande kuhimbita atona, ea' nali' natagama Maria Makdalai'wi, fowa' nagatofama'wa ambagof awami 7-pelaim magapau'wi.
Ako'w kwafe' anagon alipumi Jisasi magapoma. Nomonas amamisi nimanis a'owa', mape malef.
Ea' kwa'ipam kwa'i, “Ae' ati Jisas a' notanima nosafel wapani nape namona.” Amom mame' basef ifimba ako'ufi, apa' ina mahapifa'w, owa'.
A'i owa' main, anom alipumi Jisasi biam makwaha wambel lu'wagoma maila ufia'w kwagafe' alupi mafe'. Ea' Jisas nandati na'a nafe' natagamam.
Amom biam matolona motanima mafe' mawalapa basef ifimba ma alipumi du'wanim magapanii, apa' amom ina mahapifam, owa'atin.

A'i owa' main, alipumi 11-pelaim Jisasi mape ma' gwa'aisi atin, Jisas nafe' natagamam. Nimbewa' anis satolona notanima nogosafel wapani ea' sa'ipamana, apa' owa'. Amom ina mahapifas ma'i sa'i endilisi, owa'. Ma'i owa' sambaso'mam atin. Ea' Jisas nanda' megahaham.
Ea' na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ipa' pefe' walemb hiagoma pi'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi ma amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas.
Epes ami sagahapifai sofa' baptais, anaf God a' notanima nofa'asi wapani ea' ananisi. Apa' isimba owa' sogahapifaea, anaf God a' nonda'mas kota basef lu'wafi ma waf awafi esis sanda'afi.

God atiasi nonda' esis isimba sogahapilafi banagesa sonda' anom hiahaom banagami si'i anen nanda'ami. Ea' sohali' ae' ma esis banagesa sigali'amona ambagof awami magapaisi, a si'i anona diga hianai dambainai.

Ea' sohapila uguf fagahasi lagof asasimi apa' ina a' fohas soga', owa'. Ea' soga' embel numbutimbeli wapani, esis ina a' soga', owa'. Apa' anis owa' sogahapifaea, soga' embel ambalimbai, a' soga'. Ea' atiasi esis isimba sogahapifai sosa lagofa anis aowas nanda'asi ambo'wes wapani.”
Dembinai Jisas nawalipas na'ipas ea', God nofa'ana nalota heven. Ea' nofa' agol lu'wagili nape lagol kwahisigili Godi banagagili.

Ea' alipumi ananimi a' mafe' ganimba walemba hiagoma mawalapa basef Godi. Anen nowa' banagama manda' maol banagani si'i God nanda'ani. Anis daias sati maol inimba sa'i, “Endilisi atis, God natopalopama basef bu'wafi endilisi.” Basef ifimba ea' ma'uf.]
O dembinai Tiofilus, fowa' amam hiami manda' basef hiafi faila hiahaom hiami God nanda'am magataga la'afena afa'i, amom ukup patapeamb manda'ef fagaili.
Fowa' dambadamba Jisas nasefela maol nanda'an anom alipumi ananimi mati hiahaom amamba naep amamipi dei' mawalipapa basef ifimba ea' anom daiam manda'ef fail.

Ae' ahali' anisa maol inimba, afi'i afi'i dei' anda'ef andeande' si'i fowa' fagataga. Anom daiam mihimba'mef dei' ae' egawa basef kofagefa. Isimba atis dei' ae' ilagon andeande'ma enda' anif basef fegafe'mago ina' dembinai Tiofilus.
Anda'efa ina' negegawa basef ifimba kofagefa esis sagawalipinafi endilisifi atif.

Nemaf afamba anona king Herot dembinai ma gavmani nugumafi anis epes sagape anep itap lu'upa Judiai, anona aman pris nape, agilinama Sekaraia. Anen anep mini'ap amom anona aman dembinai fowa'inai Abiya. Sekaraia waulu'mana Elisabet. Ako'w kwagataga wambota anona aman Erani.
Esis bias Sekaraiai Elisabet sape usi'isa naep Godi saila mu'uli ananini hiani hi'alan. Ea' saila basef Godi andeande' datima, kofagema akas.
Apa' Elisabet asa'w ea' esis bias awasi akas, ahages ea'.
Nogota atamba amom mini'ap Sekaraiai nemaf amamifi fataga ma monda' maol, ea' Sekaraia nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nanda' maol nondolalima God.
Amom pris maila waf amamifi mandandepana ma nogawis ipat anamba nomon nogaofa hiahaom amamba nogoh alogw fasigwi gwagami.
Nogota atamba anen nawis nagaofam, esis amam nematawa hiasi sunduwa'anima sape sandabeten ando'.
Ea' Sekaraia nati anona ensel dembinai Godi nataga nalutu belita wa'ol lagol kwahisigilima. Belita atamba amom pris mondolalima Goda hiahaom amamba alogw fasigwi gwaga'ami.
Ea' Sekaraia natolona agogolalasana ombel mahana nomonas salasafe'ma ensel anamba.

Owa' ensel anamba na'ipana na'amba na'i, “Sekaraia, ina ombel mehena, owa'i. God name'enama beten ine'ini ea'. Waulu'mina ine'ikwi Elisabet namanani akola anin awani aman ine'ini. Ea' ina' nefalana agol ananigili Jon.
Nembel ine'imbili atiasi nepe andeande' sonohenama awani inimba. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi wapani asonohasa awani inimba nagataga.

Dei' main, anin anaf netaga dambeni agol lu'wagili ma naep Dembinaii. Anin ina nea' embel wainimbel beloma embel banagami, owa'atin. Anin ata' nagape opaf ma'manai, Ambal bu'unai Godi napain si'in nowa' banagan.
Anaf anin netaga damben negambema amam nematawa hiasi Israeli ma nefa'as sotanimai sogafe'ma God Dembinai asasinai.

Anin a' nili' nefe'ma Dembinai nefa' banagami Godi ma nenda' maol ananini si'i fowa' Elaija nofa'ama nanda'an. Ea' nembema nelelemb ahapasi befe'ma awasi ma esis nomonas sondaima atin. Ea' nembema epes isimba sogosambala basef Godii ma sogofa' nomonas fasisi si'i epes bu'wasi ma netopalopas nenda'as sondandombol sogapoma Dembinai nogafi'i.”
Ea' Sekaraia nahali' ensel anamba na'i, “Ae' atiasi iti ametal maila egegawa basef ifimba fegataga endilisi? Ae' hagewe ea' waulu'mi wapani ea' hage'w.”
Ea' ensel nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' Gebriel, agalutu naep Godi. Anen atona nasapa'e afi'i a'ipina basef ifimba fasifi.

Ea' ina' a' name', apa' ina' owa' nihapila basef ae'afia. Ea' dei' malogol ine'igili agese'ena, ina atiasi ni'i, owa'atin. A' nefe' nefe' netagama hiahawes isimba ae' aga'iasi sogataga. Basef ifimba ae'afi atiasi fetaga na'amba atin anef nemaf God naga'iefi.”
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sape sohafa Sekaraia ando' nomonas sandanda' sa'i, “Nogota laota main natagamana ipat lu'unai Godi nomon?”

Ama nawisi ando' owa', ina na'i anif basefa esis, owa'. Na'amba esis sogawana sa'i anen nati anom maefah mandati na'ai ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuma nomon. Ea' anen nape nanda'masa lagol atogol na'ipasa hiahawes, apa' malogol ananigili agaso'ana gape.
Ama maol Sekaraiai hi'alan, notanima nafe' wambel ananimbili.
A'i owa' main, waulu'mana anani'wi Elisabet a' opafu'w. Ea' kwandambaho' atin kwape ipat aomb wanemb biamb a kwa'i na'amba kwa'i,
“Dei' Dembinai okom maimaili ma nagatopalope na'amba. Fowa' ae' asawe, ambal ae'anai aona ma esis amam nematawa apa' dei' a' owa'atin.”
Elisabet ea' opafu'wa aomb wanemb biamb ea', dei' anin wapani a' wanemb wanemb. Dei' God nasapa' ensel anamba Gebriel nafe' anambel wambel Nasaret bagape itap lu'upa Galilii.

Wambel ambalemba ano'w nemata'w sa'ukwi aiawai'wi kwape, agol akwa'ugili Maria. Ina dei' kwaso' anona aman, ata' owa'. Dei' sandandepa'wa kogaso' anona aman agilinama Josep. Aman anamba nagataga wambota atamba akunamana dembinai Deviti.
Ea' ensel anamba nafe'ma ako'w na'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, nemata'w. Dembinai God okom maimailina a'owa'. Anen nofalo'mena nape nalomena dondol numafina.”
Maria kwame' basef ifimba nomonas akwa'usi a' nimanis endilisi. Okom akwa'umi mandanda' ma'i, “Kofagefa fa'i main?”
Ea' ensel anamba na'ipa'w na'i, “Maria, ina ombel mohena, owa'i. Okom Godi bo'onama ina'.

Ina' neme'. Atiasi ina' upafina a' nela anin awani aman. Ea' nenda'mana agol Jisas. Anin anaf a' nepe aman dembeni, sosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Ea' si'i anen Nogamana God nagape ilifi. Anaf dembinai God a' nonda' awani inimba nepe dembinai king si'i fowa' gani Devit nagape king. Devit anen wambota atamba dei' awani inimba nagatagatai.
Anin anaf nepe dembinai king numafi mini'ap Jekopi lifilafi. Anin atin nepe damben atapin lifilafi anamba anin nagala'ambemagoma.
Ea' Maria kwa'ipa ensel anamba kwa'i, “Amamba motaga mi'imama? Ae' ina dei' aso' anona aman, ata' owa'atin.”

Ea' ensel anamba nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ambal bu'wali Godi nifi'mai ina', banagami God nagape ilifi moso'alina. Ea' dei' awani inimba atiasi negalani anin bo'wen hilili'i. Ea' esis atiasi sosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol sofalana si'i anin Nogamana Godi.
Neme', amani'mina ine'ikwi Elisabet ako'w hage'w ea', owa' dei' a' opafu'w. Fowa' esis sa'i, ‘Ako'w asa'wi’, apa' dei' ako'w a' opafu'w aomb wanemb wanemb akwa'umbi a' bafe' ea'.
Owa' anom maefah ahifima God nonda'ama, owa'atin.”
Ea' Maria kwagwamana kwa'i, “Ae' ape anda' maol Dembinaii. Ae' a'i anen nonda'meas si'i ina' naga'i.” Ensel anamba na'ipa'w na'amba ma ea', nakwaho'w a' nafe'.
Afamba Maria kosafel kwafalis kondowasa' anambel wambel bagape halafutagwi anep itap lu'upa Judiai,
kwafe' kwawis ipat Sekaraiai kwanda'ma'wa nemaf bu'wafi Elisabet.
Elisabet kwame' Maria ata' kwanda'ma'wa gude atin, awani Elisabati fete' atin nape opaf akwa'ufi nomon. Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi si'inama ako'w,

koga kwa'i mehip kwa'i, “God nofalo'mena nanda'ena dagalaina endilisi. Dagala ine'ini nikila' dagala anowa daiawa ogofa'ani. Ea' awani inimba atiasi nigalani, anin wapani God nofalo'man nonda'an sonohan.
Ae' gogolalasowe ma God okom bo'oma ae' nanda'e sonagahe ma nanda' ina' ma'ma Dembinai ae'anai nagafi'mai ae'.
Neme', aligah ae'agahi ata' hame' nemaf bu'wafi ine'ifi atin, owa' batawin nagape opaf ae'afii sonahan afete' atin nape.
Ina' a' dagalaina endilisi, nagahapila basef Dembinai naga'ipinafi atiasi a' fetaga na'amba atin si'i anen nali' naga'ipina.”
Ea' Maria kwanda' anof awaf kwa'i, “Ae' a'i basefa anen Dembinai asa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Okom ae'ami mapoma basef ifimba
ma God nofa'e egetanimai. Dei' sonahe ma anen.

Dei' main? Ae' nemata'w anda' maola anini, ae' falafuwai, owa' anen a' okom mapoma ae' natopalope. Ipa' peme'. Dei' atapiwi epe anaf owagama wapani hiasi tagahafel sogapani amam nematawa esis sofale si'i, ‘Dembinai God natopalope nagase'e dagala.’
God banagona a'owa' nanda'me hiahaom banagami ma ae' ea' agol ananigili lu'wagol gape hilili' atapigil.
Okom uwahipimi ananimi magape atapima epes mamahisa ombel mahasa sa'i sogagi'ma anini. Ea' mape atapim maloma epes isimba ea' sope na'amba atin dei' awasi bafas ihas anaf sigi' sogatagai.
Lagol ananigili nanda' hiahaom banagami. Ea' ukup asasipi saga'i esis atis agof lu'wagufi a' nali'amonas safa' safe' gani gani daindaiagon.
Anen natalogofa amom king dembami ea' nasa'ma agofa isimba agof akasi.
Anen naso'asa hiahaom fasimi ma isimba nolomagahasa waf fasifii, apa' epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi, natofam mafe' dowaf.

Anen okom mapoma basef fowa' nala' lap nagaloma bafapapa akupapafi. Basef ifimba fowa' na'ipa Abraham naloma wambota ananisi owagama sigi' sogatagai. Ama owagama nigati esis owahipisa nogatopalopas lifilafi. Anen nagatopalopa apa' Israel manda' maol ananinii.”
Ea' kwape kwaloma Elisabet aumb wanemb. A'i owa' main, akutanima kwafe' wambel akwa'umbili.
Nemaf afamba fataga ea' Elisabet kogola awani aman.
Esis wambel atembel ambep atep ako'w Elisabeti a sogawa Dembinai nati uwahipi'w endilisi ma kogola awani inimba. Ea' esis sandagala saloma'w.
Nimaguf 7-pelaif afafe' falo'wan ea', nemaf fagafe'ma 8i, esis safi'i sa'i siti amom mogatopa'mana alop ananipi, ea' esis sa'i sofalana agol Sekaraia si'i ahamana.
Owa' ma'amana kwa'i, “Owa'. Apa' monda'mana anagol agol Jon.”
Ea' esis sa'ipa'w sa'i, “Owa', anis ambep ine'ipi tagasi ina anis sanda' agol agalemba Jon, owa'atin.”
Ea' sanda' lagof atogof sahali' ahamana sa'i anen na'i nonda'mana agol maigil nogamana.
Anen nanda' logof atogof na'ipas sofa'ai anota selet, a nonda' agol nogamanai. Ea' nanda'agol na'i, “Agol ananigili Jon.” Ea' esis agogolalasis kwapete'.
Anen ata' nanda' agol atin owa', a' noga na'i malogol ananigili, afega ananigai agiawi andeande', nandagala nasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
Ea' hiasi esis wambel atembel ananimbili ombel mahas. Ea' dei' hiahawes isimba gatis safe'agon hi'alagon walemb ambalemba bagape halafutagw itap lu'upa Judiai.

Ea' amam nematawa hiasi same' basefa hiahawes isimbai, ukup asasipi pandanda' pafe' sa'i, “Anaf awani inimba nepe ni'imama? Anin atiasi a' netaga aman dambeni endilisi.” Esis sogawa banagami Dembinaii mape malomana.
Awani inimba Jon ahamana Sekaraia, Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'ina anen ea' nawalapa basef Godi si'i amom profet fowa' maga'ipasef na'i,
“Ae' a'i apa' mosa'ma agol Godi Dembinai lu'wagol, God apa' Israeli anen nafi'i natopalopa apa' amam nematawa ananipai. Ea' natalepa magakwaha waf awafi apa' manda'afi.
Ea' nandandepa anona aman banagonai atiasi nofa'apa nokwahamapa waf awafi mogotanimai. Fowa' gani Devit nanda' maol Godi, apa' dei' aman anamba nofa'apa mogotanimai, anen akunamana Deviti.
Basef ifimba si'i fowa' gani nagawalapefa amom profet bu'wami ananimi maga'if malogof amamugufi.
Ma'i anaf anen nofa'apa mokwaha lagof esis bousi ape'isi soloma epes isimba ukup aom endilisi ma ape'i.
Fowa' anen na'i anaf a' niti akusapa ape'isi fowa'isi uwahipis notopalopas. Ea' anen okom mopoma basef bu'wafi fowa' nagala' lapafi. Anen ina atiasi ni'i anif daif, owa'.
Anen na'i basef ifimba endilisifi atif naga'if banagafi ma akunamapa ape'inai Abraham. Ea' dei' na'if na'amba atin si'i fowa' naga'ias.
Anen na'i notagwahepa ma lagof esis bousi ape'isi ma monda'mana maol ananini, apa' ina a' ombal mohapa, owa'.
Apa' mope itap apa'e monda' maol ananini nimaguf hiafi danda mofe' mofe' motagama mogaga'. Ma nogohnaep ananisi monda' maol inimba ma waf ananifi usi'if hilili'i.
“Ea' ina', awani ae'inai, basef ine'ifi ifimba. Anaf God a' ni'i ina' profet nanda' maola God nagape ilifi. Ama atiasi ina' nefe' nigali'ma Dembinai negandombamana ufia'w anani'wi.
Ama negawalipa amam nematawa ananisi nogakwahowa waf awafi asasifi. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma sogogawa anen nofa' esis sogotanimai.
God ape'inai nati esis uwahipis a'owa' dei' nakwahamasa waf awafi asasifi. Anen atiasi nosapa'i mogogala'i magape heveni mifi'mai apa' mope atapim.
Ama mogogala'ma epes sagape akoti, a isimba ga' na'i nogatagamasi. Anen nisindi'amona apa' ma mogafe' ufia'w opalef awanelefa'wi.”
A'i owa' main, awani inimba nataga lu'win banagona ea' okom ananimi a' nogawa. Anen nape itap wafigima epes akagoma nape nape ma nemaf afamba nataga nandawalap alihinama naep esis Israeli.
Anef nemaf anona aman gavman dembinai esis Romi Sisar Ogastus nagape, nanda' anin mu'uli gavmani na'amba. Anen na'i nofa' agofa esis amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilasa fugail buk gavmani.
Afamba dambadamba anen nali' nogofa' agof. Afamba anona aman Sairinias nagape gavman dembinai ma anep itap Siria.
Isimba atis amam nematawa hiasi safe' wambel kofagama asasimbili ma sonda' agof asasigufi.
Josep anona aman anamba anep ambep esimbel Deviti. Anen nakwaha Nasaret nagape anep itap lu'upa Galilii, ea' nondowasa' nafe' wambel Deviti Betlehem. Wambel ambalemba bagape anep itap lu'upa Judia.
Ea' Josep nafe' naloma ano'w nemata'w Maria, esis sandandepana'w sa'i nogaso'akwi ma esis bias sonda' agof asasigufi. Ea' ako'w opafu'w.
Esis bias ata' sapani atin wambel Betlehem, owa' nemaf ako'w kogolanafi a' fataga.
Ea' kwali' kola awani aman ako'uni nagali'i. Ipat esis hiasi sakolata sagapautai asi'ita a'owa'. Ea' dei' kwanda' lowaf kwasala'uf kwala anin na'oh nomon bokis gwa'aisi bulmakauwi sagalama.
Felefele'ma wambel ambalemba anom amam mugumafi sipsipi mape wa'ol otalef walol mogotaoma mumafi sipsip mape owamb.
Owa' anona ensel nafi'i nalumai mogogala'i Dembinaii, mogala' mala'ambema amom ea' ombal maham endilisi.
Owa', ensel anamba na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Peme', ae' ifa'mipai basef bu'wafi ipa', ifimba fenda' amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas sonogahas endilisii.

Dei' nemaf afa'e ano'w nemata'w kwagape Betlehem wambel Deviti kola anin awani aman. Anen aman anamba nokwahomepa waf awafi nofa'epa pigitanimai. Anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, Dembinai.
Ipa' pefe' piti awani inimba pegegawan na'amba. Piti sanda' lowaf kwasala'uf sowa'an salan na'oh bokis isimba sagala gwa'aisi bulmakauwi sagalama.”
Ensel anamba na'ias na'amba ma ea', owa' kwafalis anom ensel hiami banagami misila'i gani heven mataga maloma ensel anamba ea' mandagala mafela agol Godi ma'i,
“Apa' masa'ma agol God nagape gani ilif endilisii lu'wagol. Banagami mogogala'i ananimi atom. Ea' epes ami sagape itapi God okom bo'oma esisi, nelelemb asasilimbi bepe awanelemb.”
Ea' amom ensel makwaha amom mugumafi sipsipi motanima malota heven. Ea' amom mugumafi sipsipi manda'ipama atin ma'i, “Wale, ata' ofe' Betlehem uti hiahaom amamba Dembinai nigihimba'mafami.”
Ea' mosafel kwafalis mafe' mati Maria kwaloma Josep sape. Awani salan na'oh bokis nomon sagala gwa'aisi bulmakauwi sagalama.
Amom matilin ea' mawalapa basef ensel naga'ipamafi ma awani inimba.
Ea' amam nematawa asame' basef ifimba amom maga'iefi, esis hiasi same' basef ifimba agogolalasis ea' nomonas hiahawes sapomef.
Apa' Maria kwame' basef ifimba hiafi nomonas sapomef fape okom akwa'umi.
Ea' amam amamba motanima mafe' masa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol ma'i anen Dembinai bu'winai. Amom sonahama hiahaom amamba hiami mame'am magatulumi, a' mataga si'i ensel maga'ipamami.

A'i owa' nemaf fagafe'ma 8i fataga, nemaf afamba amom ma'i motopa'mana alop awani. Ea' matopa'mana alop awani inimba amani. Ea' sofalana agol Jisas si'i ensel nali' naga'ipa'wagili nogota atamba owa' ata' kogofa' opafa.

Nemaf afamba fataga ea' ma esis sonda' awani inimba noloma ma'mana sondolali sonda' ofa sowando' alogwa sogataga bo'wes si'i basef fagail mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani faga'ias. Ea' esis mamasana sao'wana safe' sondowasa' Jerusalema sogaso'ana awani inimba Dembinai Goda nogohnaep ananisi.
Esis sanda'as na'amba si'i basef fagape buk Baibeli faga'iasa mu'uli Dembinaii fa'i, “Awasi amam amamba mamahoma wali' dambadamba ogolami, amamba ipa' pefalam pi'i amom dembinai Godi atom.”
Esis bias sa'i sondolalima God sagi'ma basef fagail mu'uli inimba Dembinai na'ipa Moses naga'i, “Esis bias sofa' amiguf ma'unamb biamb, a'a sofa' mefagof sa'ugufi biagof.” Sofa'as sanda'as na'amba.

Ea' anona aman nagape Jerusalami agilinama Simeon. Anen nagagi'ma waf fasifi Godi nagape hilili'i. Anen nape nasasa nogota atamba God nifi'i notopalopa esis Israel nogakwaha akafimi asasimi. Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape okom ananimi nihimba'mana anen ina atiasi noga' ulal, owa'. Anen ata' nope niti Krais, Dembinai nandandepana nosapa'ana nogafi'ii.
Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'mana nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi. Ea' esis mamasa Jisasi sao'wana safi'i sondolalimana si'i mu'uli Godi naga'ias.
Ea' Simeon nandalombasana lagof ananigufi nanifela God nasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol na'ias na'amba na'i,
“O Dembinai, ae' anda' maola ine'i. Dei' ina' kwahowae nomonas sope sa'ombel a' ega' efo'o si'i basef ifimba fowa' naga'iefi.
Naep ae'api atilin ea' awani aman inimba ina' nasapa'ana nafi'i nuwambilapa nokwahomapa waf awafi mogotambilii. Na'amba dei' ina' nekwahowa ae' a' ega' efo'o.
Ina' nanda' awani inimba dumbulidombola amam nematawa hiasi sogatolona.
Anen si'i anona nogogala'i nogogala'ma epes isimba sogololama Godi nigihimba'mas. Ama nonda' amam nematawa ine'isi Israel sogofa' agof lu'wagufi.”
Ea' mamasana Jisasi agogolalasis nomonas salasafe'ma basef ifimba Simeon naga'iefi.
