Simeon na'ipas basef fasifi nowa' banagas ea' na'ipa ma'mana Jisasi na'amba na'i, “Ina' neme'. Awani inimba God nandandepan ea' ma nogohambombaga anis amam nematawa Israel sogowa' alafugaha anini. Apa' anis daias nofa'as sokwaha waf awafi sigafi'mai anini. Anen si'i anol ametal God nanda'ali ma anis hiasi sonda'mana du'waniga sondaiwa'ma basef ananifii.
Awani inimba napoma negawalapa nomonas hiasi sape sandambahi'i sogataga alihis. Maria, ina' atiasi a' okom nimanim si'i anona bainat hikalinai nogatopa' okom ine'imi.”
Ea' ano'w nemata'w profet agili'wa Ana. Ahama'w ako'unai Fanyuel. Ambep akunama'wi Aser. Ako'w ahage'w a'owa'. Fowa' kwaso' aman kwalomana sape afagof 7-pelaiguf.

A'i owa' main, waulunama'w a' naga'. Ea' kwape dowaf, kwafe' kwafe' dei' afagof akwa'ugufi fataga 84-pelaiguf. Ako'w ina kwa'waha ipat lu'unai Godi anif nimaguf, owa'atin. Ako'w kololama gwa'aisi kwape kwandabeten ea' kwanda' lotu kwahapila maol Godi kwanda'an kwafe' owamb alip.

Nemaf afamba atef ako'w kwafi'i anamba Simeoni Josep Maria sagalutuma kwanifela God. Anis wapani sagalutu na'ambai sape sogohafa nemaf afamba God nogatopalopa esis sagape Jerusalami sogape wahifis. Ea' ako'w wapani kwa'ipas basefa awani inimba.
Esis Josepi Maria sanda'as sagi'mas ea' maol inimba si'i Dembinai fowa' naga'iasa mu'uli ananini ea' sotanima safe' Nasaret asasima kofagama. Wambel anamba bape anagon itap lu'upa Galili.
Ea' awani Jisas andambena a' nataga banagona ma gawa hiani lu'wani. Ea' God okom maimailana natopalopana nowa' banagona.
Afagof danda mamasana Jisasi sondowasa' safe' Jerusalema esis Juda sanda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi sofalas saga'i Pasovai.
Afagof Jisasi dei' afataga 12-pelaiguf falo'wana ea' sao'wana sondowasa' Jerusalem saila waf asasifi si'i afagof danda sanda'afi.
Ama nimaguf ifimba Pasovaefi a' fafe'ma hi'alef, esis mamasana sotanima safe'. Apa' sa'unai ina nafe' nalomas, owa'. Asakwahona napani Jerusalem. Esis ina sogawa anen napani, owa'.
Sa'i owa' a' nali' nafe' naloma anis daias safe'. Esis asafe' anef nemaf si'ifi hi'alaf, ea' asala naepa anen solaomana la'afena esis wambota atota saloma esis alipisi.
Esis mamasana solaomana lawa lawa sati owa'atin, ea' sotanima safe' Jerusalem solaomana.

Esis bias solaomana safe' nimaguf wanif ahi'alef. A'i owa' main, asatolona nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. Anen nape naloma amom gawaimi magawalipasa mu'uli Godii. Nape nagahembe'ma basef amamifi atapina ea' nahali'amef.
Amom dembami maloma esis hiasi same' basef ananifi, agogolalasisa basefi gawa ananini nagagwamama basef amom.

Ea' mamasana satolona nape la'afena amom dambedambena nalomam mape ea' gogolalasis kwapete'. Ea' ma'mana kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Nogame, dei' maina nanda' isimbai ma afa'? Ahamena naloma ae' opalef afa'ilifi a' nimanilif a'owa' ma ogolaomena.”
Ea' anen nagwamas na'ipas na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' bipa pala' pelaome pagafe' hi'agalagon? Ae' dei' ape anda' maol ipat ahame Godi, isimba ipa' pegawas a'a owa'?”
Owa' esis ina sogawa basef anen naga'ipasafi kofagefa, owa'atin.
Ea' Jisas nafe' naloma esis bias asiliana Nasaret, name' esis dondol naila malogof asasigufi. Ea' ma'mana anani'wi okom mapoma basefa hiahawes isimba sagatagama awani akwa'uni fape okom akwa'umi.
Jisas ea' nataga dambena. Ea' gawa ananini nataga lu'win andeande' fasin, ea' God naloma epes wapani sagatolona ambo'ona a'owa'.

Anagol afagol anona gavman dembinai esis Romi Taiberius Sisar nagape dembinai ma itap lu'upa hiagoma esis Romi afagof 14-pelaiguf hi'alagofa anagol wapani, gagafe'ma 15-pelaigufi, Pontius Pailat ata' nape dembinai gavmana walemb hielimbi agol Judia. Anona aman Filip nape gavman dembinai numafi itap apamba lu'upa Ituriai Trakonitis walemb hielimbi. Ea' owamana ananinai Herot ata' nape dembinai numafi walemb hielimbi agol Galili. Anona aman Lisanias nape dembinai gavman numafi hiagoma agol lu'wagola Abileneai.

Ea' afagol agalemba atogol Anasi Kaiafas amom biam pris dembami mape magali'ma pris hiamii. Nogota atamba ma afagol agalemba basef Godi fafi'mai Jon, Sekaraia nogamana. Anen nape anep itap wafigima epes akagoma, nemaf afamba basef Godi fafi'mai anen.
Ea' nafe' anamba hiagoma walemb Jordan na'ipasa basef Godi amam ne matawa. Na'ipasa sombema nelelemb sowa' alafugaha waf awafi sofa' baptais embela God nokwahomasa waf awafi asasifi okom mogaso'anaf.

Anen nawalapa basef ifimba Godi si'i profet Aisaia fowa' nawalapef nanda'ef fagail buk Baibeli faga'i, “Anep itap wafigima fataupigima, malogol anona amani anaf noga ni'i, ‘Pendondomba ufia'w Dembinaii, penda' ufiawa ofe' usi'iwa.

Pesa anamba kwambiwah afogoma ma si'igin dondo' atin, petopa' halafutagw laumi bandami hiami ma mowala dondo'am. Dilindila'ma penda'agon usi'igin. Ea' ufiawa awamba wanda' lotasila'i sonda'awa andeande'.
Amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas anaf siti God nogatopalopa anis amam nematawa nofa'as nokwahomas waf awafi nowambelas sugutanimai.’”

Hiasi amam nematawa safi'mai Jon ama sa'i nogapisi'as embel. Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' panda' waf awafii, si'i batawis ul aunaii logolaipai. Ami na'ipipa ma pa'i pefa' pefe' pindihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi anaf na'i nogatagama ipe'i?

Apa' dei' a'ipipa a'i penda' waf fasifi ma pigihimba'mas ipa' a' pambema nelelemb endilisi paila waf bu'wafi. Ipa' ina a' ukup pendanda' pi'i, ‘Abraham ahamapa ape'inai’, na'amba ipa' ea' fasipai, owa', hapaimi. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God anen la'ifinai ma nonda' otamba atemba begataga epes si'i awasi Abrahami.
Tamia'w akwandandombol kwa'oha kogatopa' lawah kofagah nombalefima. Lawah mamahogaha owa' hil hogola sa'utip bu'wapia, agahemba atiasi solagah sotopa'agah hefe'ma nif.”
Anen na'ias ea', esis hiasi sahali'ana sa'i, “Apa' atiasi monda' maina monda' waf fasifi God naga'iefi?”
Ea' Jon na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Epen ami siaogw biagw atogwi nekwahomana anota anin siot akani, ea' ami gwa'aisi saga'omani inimba nenda'as newalogas wapani.”
Ea' anom amam awami mogofa' takisi mafi'mai Jon ma'i nupisi'am embel ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai, atiasi afa' onda' maina ogahapila basef fasifi Godi?”
Anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pefa' otamba bendahama si'i gavman naga'ipipambai atemba. Ipa' ina pefa' anemba wapani, owa'i.”

Ea' anom soldia mafi'i mahali'ana ma'i, “Afa' atiasi onda' maina ogohapila basef Godi?” Anen nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina a' pembaso'ma epes piumbalis penda'as ombel mohas penda'mas kot pendelelaepasa moni asasini dowaf, owa'i. Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bendape awanelemba otamba ipe'imbai dondo'ma ikwaf amom dembami mandandepafi.”
Ea' dei' nomonas esis amam nematawai mosafel banagem, ea' hiasi ukup pandanda'ma Jon sa'i, “Jon anen Krais, ma'una God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'ii, a'a owa'?”

Ea' Jon nagwamasa basef na'ipas na'i, “Ae' apisi'ipa embel atembal. Apa' anona aman atiasi nigi' nugafi'ii, anen banagonai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma egatagwaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'atin. Anef nemaf anen nese'epa Ambal bu'wali Godi nogape opalef ipe'ilifi nomon ea' nese'epa nif wapani.

Anen nahapila anol savol lagof ananigufi ma nigasimba' wit si'i rais amamba andeande'. Ama nofa' wit bu'winai nuwis nembe'ana ipat ananitai. Apa' du'wa'wanimi awasimi nembeham nofam nif amamba lu'wami fandom atapim magapani.”
Dei' Jon nawalapa anif basef daif hiafi wapani ma nogasa'ma ukup asasipi ma sonda' waf bu'wafi. Ea' nawalipasa basef bu'wafi.

Owa' Jon nanda' megahaha aman anamba Herot, gavman dembinai asasinai, ma waf awafi hiafi anen nanda'afi. Anen nandalombana Herodias nemata'w sahomana nagaso'akwi, ea' nanda' anef waf awafi hiafi wapani.
Dei' nowatani anef wapani ma nanda' Jon nanda' kalabus.
Jon napisi'a amam nematawa hiasi ma ea', napisi' Jisas wapani. Jisas nofa' baptaisa ea', anen ata' nandabeten atin owa', heven a' nandawisi'.

Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nisila'i si'i amil alamba apa' maga'i ma'unai nufia' nisila'mai anen. Ea' anagol malagol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i anef basef ga'i, “Ina' Nogame ae'inai endilisi. Ae' okom mohafel maimailina a'owa'. Okom ae'ami fasima ina'.”
Afamba Jisas nagasefela maol, afagof ananigufi fataga 30-pelaiguf. Esis amam nematawa ukup pandanda' dowaf pa'i Jisas nogama Josepi.
Bafapana Jisasi agufuma amamba. Josep, Heli nogamana. Ea' Heli, Matat nogamana. Ea' Matat, Livai nogamana. Livai, Melki nogamana. Melki, Janai nogamana. Ea' Janai, Josep nogamana.
Josep, Matatias nogamana. Matatias, Amos nogamana. Amos, Nahum nogamana. Ea' Nahum, Esli nogamana. Ea' Esli, Nagai nogamana.
Nagai, Mat nogamana. Mat, Matatias nogamana. Ea' Matatias, Semen nogamana. Ea' Semen, Josek nogamana. Josek, Joda nogamana.
Joda, Joanan nogamana. Joanan, Resa nogamana. Resa, Serubabel nogamana. Serubabel, Sealtiel nogamana. Sealtiel, Neri nogamana.
Neri, Melki nogamana. Melki, Adi nogamana. Adi, Kosam nogamana. Kosam, Elmadam nogamana. Elmadam, Er nogamana.
Er, Josua nogamana. Ea' Josua, Eleasar nogamana. Ea' Eleasar, Jorim nogamana. Jorim, Matat nogamana. Ea' Matat, Livai nogamana
Livai, Simeon nogamana. Ea' Simeon, Juda nogamana. Juda, Josep nogamana. Ea' Josep, Jonam nogamana. Jonam, Eliakim nogamana.
Eliakim, Melea nogamana. Melea, Mena nogamana. Mena, Matata nogamana. Matata, Natan nogamana. Natan, Devit nogamana.
Devit, Jesi nogamana. Jesi, Obet nogamana. Obet, Boas nogamana. Boas, Salmon nogamana. Salmon, Nason nogamana.
Nason, Aminadap nogamana. Aminadap, anen Atmin nogamana. Atmin, Arni nogamana. Arni anen Hesron nogamana. Hesron, Peres nogamana. Peres, Juda nogamana.
Ea' Juda anen Jekop nogamana. Jekop anen Aisak nogamana. Aisak, Abraham nogamana. Abraham, Tera nogamana. Tera, Nahor nogamana.
Nahor, Seruk nogamana. Seruk, Reu nogamana. Reu, Pelek nogamana. Pelek, Eber nogamana. Eber anen Sela nogamana.
Sela anen Kainan nogamana. Kainan, Arpaksat nogamana. Arpaksat, Siem nogamana. Siem, Noa nogamana. Noa, Lamek nogamana.
Lamek, Metusela nogamana. Ea' Metusela, Enok nogamana. Enok, Jaret nogamana. Jaret, Mahalalel nogamana. Mahalalel, Kainan nogamana.
Kainan, Enos nogamana. Enos, Set nogamana. Set, Adam nogamana. Adam, God nogamana. Bafapana Jisasi ea' ma'um.
Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'inama Jisas ea' nakwaha walemb ambamba Jordan nandagiai notanima nafe'. Ea' Ambal anamba nofa'ana nafe' anagon wafigima fataupigima.
Jisas nape anamba nimaguf hiafi ea' Satan nafi'i nagwambana ma nogosambala mu'uli Godi nimaguf ifimba awin si'ini du'wanini. Jisas ina na' anis gwa'aisi nimaguf ifimba hiafi, owa'. Ea' a' nolomahana.
Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' Nogamana Godi, dei' kipa otam amamba baga'oh itapi motaga si'i bret.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Baibel na'i bret atota ina atoso'asa ambagof esis epes, owa'atin.”
Ea' Satan nofa'ana nondowasa' ilif nihimba'mana hiahaom hiami fasimi magape itap hiagoma amom king dembami magala'ambemagoma. Nihimba'managon kwafalis atis.
Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Hiahaom hiami banagami amamba amom king mugumafiami maloma hiahaom fasimi uga maina, hiahaom amamba God nagase'eami. Apa' dei' i'i egaso'anam anin epena, ae' ese'anam.
I'i ina' nindiwa nembawa netawa nenda' lotu sonehenama ae', hiahaom amamba atiasi a' ine'imi atom.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Ipa' penda' lotuma Dembinai God atona ipe'inai, ea' penda' maola anen atona.’”
A'i owa' main, Satan nofa' Jisas nondowasa' Jerusalem nahaponana nalutu ipat Godi lu'unai ilif. Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' Nogamana Godi, dei' netoma nindipa' newa itap.
Dei' main, anif basef Godi fagail buk Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘God atiasi ni'ipa amom ensel mufi'i muhapilina lagof amamugufi mumafina ma otamba ina beha bo'wagah ine'igahi, owa'.’”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Anif basef Godi wapani fagape na'amba fa'i, ‘Ina pegwamba Dembinai God ipe'inai nonda' waf awafi, owa'i.’”
Satan nanda' gwamba hiani ma ea', nakwaha Jisas nafe' nohafana ma anef nemaf nogagwambana wapani.
Banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi mape opaf Jisasi a' notanima nafe' itap lu'upa Galili. Ea' same' basef gatifa anen fafe'agon hi'alagon walemb ambalemba bagape Galilii.
Dondol anen nanda' maol nawalipasa basef Godi ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi. Ea' hiasi amam nematawa sasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.

Jisas nafe' Nasaret taun inimba kofagama, fowa' anen ata' aonama nagapoma. A'i owa' nemaf afamba sabat esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi, nafe' nawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai si'i dondol nanda'as. Anen nalutu natalifa basef Godi,
ea' saso'ana anin pepa launi. Pepa inimba anif basef Godi fowa' profet Aisaia nanda'ef fagailani. Anen nopalian niatifan nati basef ifimba natalifif faga'i na'amba fa'i,

“Ambal bu'unai Dembinaii nape ae'. Ea' nandandepe ma egawalapa basef bu'wafima epes isimba kwahusa hiahawesi. Nasapa'e afi'i ma igawalapa basef na'amba iga'i, ‘Ipa' panda' kalabusi pekwaha kalabus pefe' wahifipa. Ipa' epes naep pagasi'ipai, ipa' piti andeande' wapani.’ Anen nasapa'e afi'i egatopalopa isimba sogofa' nimanimii sogape andeande'.
Ea' i'ipas basef hiasi ma nogota atamba bu'utai ma Dembinai niti uwahipis notopalopas sogape andeande'.”
Ea' Jisas nala'watefa pepa inimba launi naso'anan anona aman nugumafi ipati anen nape. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sagape nomoni naep do' anen atona.
Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' a' pame', ae' atalifa basef Godi fowa'ifi atin owa', dei' a' fataga alihif endilisi fandawalapa ae'.”
Ea' esis sasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol sa'i anen aman bu'unai ea' gogolalasisa basef bu'wafi fagataga malogol ananigili. Ea' esis sandahali'ma sa'i, “Aman anamba Josep nogamana a'a?”

Jisas na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Endilisi atis ipa' atiasi penda' basef ifimba waminif atina ae' pi'i, ‘Dokta, ina' nenda' alop ine'ipi potaga bo'op puli', ea' pi'i wapani pi'i waf afamba nali' nanda'af Kaperneami, afamba apa' mame'af ea'. Ina' dei' nenda'af fetaga na'a wambel kofagama ine'ima.’”
Ea' anen na'ias na'amba wapani na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Anona profet epes ina saso'ana opalef same' basef ananifi wambel kofagama, owa'.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi atis. Nogota atamba fowa' Elaija nagapautai owaf atona nagandogwa, asaf ina ata' falai afagof wanogof aomb wanemb wanemb, owa'atin. Ea' nolom lu'unai nataga ganimba hiagoma. Nogota atamba nematawa hiawai Israeliwai amom maga' mialifawa wape.
Apa' God ina nasapa' Elaija nafe'ma anowa awambai, owa'atin. Anen nasapa'ana nafe'ma ano'w nemata'w daia'w kwagape Serafati, wambel bagape anep itap lu'upa Saidoni. Ea' akwamba ato'w.

Ea' nogota atamba anona aowas aunai nataga nanda' alop esis amam nematawa Israeli pagambo'wi. Apa' ina anin epen asasini nataga bo'wen, owa'atin. Anona aman daiana Naman Siriainai ea' anen atona nataga bo'ona.”
Ea' esis hiasi sape ipat atamba same' basef ifimba, a' nomonas wandafum kwapete'a Jisas.
Ea' sosafel sali'amonana nawisi taun ando'. Taun inimba asasini natoma halafuta ilif. Ea' sofa'ana safe' halafuta atamba sa'i sogwalo'ana niliana tata.
Owa', anen nandali'amona esis la'afisa a' nafe'.
Jisas niliana Kaperneam taun inimba nagape itap lu'upa Galilii. A'i owa' nemaf afamba Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat, anen nawis nomon ipat sandakolasatai nawalipas.
Same'ana sa'i anen nofa' agol lu'wagili dei' na'ipasa basef banagafi. Ea' sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' endilisi.
Anona aman ambafuh manda'anai nape ipat atamba, ambal aunai napaona. Anen galala mehip endilisi na'ias na'i,
“E! Jisas ina' Nasaretinai, na'i nifi'i nenda' maina apa'? Ina' nafi'i ma negahambombagapa? Ae' egawa ina' nogama God bu'winai hilili'i.”

Owa' Jisas ninifalona na'amba na'i, “Ina' ambalip awinai sopama malogol kwaha aman anamba.” Ea' ambalip anamba nakwahona nowa itap la'afena esis nawisi nafe', ina ata' nahambombagana wapani, a' owa'atin.
Esis hiasi gogolalasis sandakoto'ma sanda'ipama sa'i, “Ifimba basef mamahifa? Anen natofa ambagof awami na'ipam si'i anona aman banagonai. Ambagof awami mame' basefa anen, makwahona mafa' mafe'.”
Ea' basef ifimba nanda' hiahaom amamba banagami fafe'agon hi'alagon walemb bagape na'ambai.
Saimon nandagi'mo'wi aowas nanda'akw alop ako'upi nifip kwapete'. Ea' Jisas nosafel nakwaha ipat atamba sanda' kolasatai, nafe' nawis ipat Saimoni. Ea' sahali'ana ma nogatopalopa'w.
Ea' anen nafe' nalutu felefele' ma ako'w nataloga aowas inimba natofan nafa' nakwaha ako'w. Ea' kosafel kwafalis kwanda'masa gwa'aisi esis.
A'i owa' awin newala naso', esis amam nematawa sofa' anis alipisi aowas hiana haona nanda'asi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Ea' nasa lagofas atona atin nanda'as bo'wes hi'alas.

Ea' ambagof awami hiami makwaha esis hiasi mawisi mafe' ea'. Ambagof amamba awami mofalana higihiga' ma'oh ma'i, “Ina' nogamana Godi.” Amom mogawa anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Ea' Jisas ninifalom na'i ina ata' mi'i anif basef, owa'. Mosopama malogof.

A'i owa' kuhimbita atota Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' anagon wafigima epes akagoma. Esis safe' solaomana satolona asafe'ma anen. Esis ina sa'i anen nokwaha esis nofe' owa', sa'i sotalifana nope atapina nolomas.

Owa', na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'i ewalapa basef fasifi ma epes sogawisa maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. A'i ewalapa basef ifimba anagon taun hiani wapani. God nasapa'e afi'i enda'ani maol inimba atin.”
Ea' nafe' nawalapa basef Godi ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi nawalapef nafe' nafe' atapina itap lu'upa Judia.
Anef nemaf Jisas nalutu dumb Genesaret akata naloma hiasi amam nematawa sala'ambemana sape same' basef Godi.
Ea' nati anota bot sa'utai biata tala embel felefele'ma nimbapif dumb ambamba. Ea' amom mogowafa agufi mandani' mafe' masa'opa anembeh amamimbihi.
Jisas nalota natoma bot Saimoni ea' na'ipana na'i, “Sapa' bot nokwaha bandagoma nefe' laogoma kwasala.” Ea' Jisas natoma bot nawalipasa basef esis amam nematawa.
Anen nawalipasa ea' na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ina' sapa' bot tofo'o dumb embel laogoma ea' pela anembeh howala pewafai anogof agof.”
Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'i, “Dembinai, doko' owamb laomb afa' wanda' maol banagambel owa', ina wagi anol aol, owa'atin. Owa' na'ipa ae' na'amba, dei' ela anemb bewala.”
A'i owa', mala anemb bewala mowafai agof hiami. Ea' anemb ba'i pele'etamba agof hiami a'owa'.
Ea' amom mowaulai alipumi amamumi magape anota boti mafi'i matopalopam mowafai agof malam bot biafita si'ita, ta'i a' towala.
Saimon Pita nati na'amba, ea' nindiwa nembawa natawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi na'ipana na'i, “O Dembinai, ina' kwaha ae', afo'o. Ae' aman auwai!”
Dei' main, anen naloma amom magalumanai mati agof mogowafami hiami a'owa'. Ea' amom gogolalasom nomonas salasafe'.

Nogaopana Sebedii biam Jems naloma Jon maloma Pita mandau'umai wapani gogolalasoma agof amamba. Ea' Jisas na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ina' ombal mogahena, owa'i. Dei' atef nesafela anin maol daian nenda'an atapinaman nefa'i epes sifi'i sigaili.”
Ea' amom manda' botagw gwafe' bandagoma, a' makwaha hiahaom amamumi hi'alam ma'oh, ea' mailana mafe'.

Nogota atamba Jisas nape anin taun, anona aman nagape na'ambai aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi hi'alap pagambu'wi. Anen nati Jisas nafi'i, nowafa nambe' nembel itap kwafalis atis na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' ni'i aho', nenda'e etaga bo'owe.”
Ea' Jisas nando lagol nasagol alop aman anambai na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i aho' ma ina' negataga bo'wena.” Ea' dei' atef aowas inimba aunai nanda' alop pagambu'wi nakwahona ea' bo'ona.

Jisas na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Ina a' nefe' ni'ipa anin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena bo'wena, owa'i. Ina' fo'o nihimba'mana alop ine'ipi ma aman anamba pris. Ea' nese'ana hiahaom amamba anen nondolalima God ea' ina' ninifelona ma nagataga bo'wena si'i mu'uli ananini fowa' Moses naga'ipasani naga'i. Ama esis hiasi sogogawa aowas ine'ini ahi'alan.”

Owa', owa'atin. Diga basefa hiahawes isimba Jisas nanda'manas aman anambai gatis safe' ganigani. Fowa' ina hiasi same' basef ifimba, owa', apa' dei' hias a'owa'. Isimba atis dei' epes hiasi safi'i ma sogame' anona nogatofamasa aowas asasini.
Apa' nimaguf hiafi anen nafe' anamba wafigima epes akagoma ma nape nandabeten.

Anef nemaf Jisas nape nawalipa esis amam nematawa ea' anom dembami Farisi maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi tol mape. Anom mafi'i walemb hielimbi itap lu'upa biafip Judiai Galili. Apa' anom mafi'i Jerusalem. Ea' banagami Dembinai Godi mape Jisas, ama nanda' epes aowas nanda'asi sogohafel bo'wes wapani.
Ea' anom amam daiam mofa' anona aman lagof bo'wagah sagaga'anai, na'oh alihis mofa'ana mafi'i. Ea' ma'i mofa'ana mefe' muwis ipat membe'ana felefele'ma Jisas.

Owa' asi'igina amam nematawa hiasi. Amom ina mati ano'w ufia'wa mofa' awasini mugawis nomon, owa'. Ea' malota ipat ilif mihianama bogwan mala aman anamba awasinai naloma alihis nowala nomon la'afena amam nematawa, mambe'ana na'oh Jisas opafunama.

Nogota atamba Jisas natolom nogawa amom mahapifa ma'i anen banagonai ma nogatopalopa aman anamba aowas nanda'anai. Ea' na'ipa aman anamba na'i, “Ina' epen ae'inai. Waf awafi ina' nanda'afi ae' akwahomenaf hi'alaf okom mase'eaf.”

Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom Farisi atom ukup atip pandanda' pa'i, “Aman anamba mamahonama nanda' God findiwanai? Owa'atina anona aman la'ifinama nogakwaha waf awafia. Maol inimba God atona nanda'ani.”
Jisas nogawa nomonas isimbai amamisi. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina nomonas ipe'isi sagape na'amba?

Dei' hiahaom maim ipa' pa'i ahifima ae'? Ae' banagiwai ma i'ipa aowas nanda'anai iga'i, Ae' egakwahomana waf awafi anen nanda'afi a'a i'ipana iga'i nogasa'ma alahis ananisi nosafel nogafe'. Basef ifimba ma nogasa'ma alahis ananisi, ipa' pa'i amamba ahifima ae'.

Ae' a'i ipa' pegawa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, la'ifiwai ma egakwaha waf awafi hiafi amam nematawa sagape itapi sanda'afi. Ae' a'i ihimba'mepa ae' la'ifiwai ma enda' hiahaom amamba. Ea' anen na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, ina' safel sa'ma alahis ine'isi nefe' ipat ine'itai.”
Jisas na'ipana atin na'amba, nosafel nalutu nasa'ma alahis ananisi naep amam nematawa hiasii. Ea' ata' nafe' atin ufia'w, nandagala nafela agol Godi lu'wagol nafe' ipat ananitai.
Ea' amam nematawa isimba hiasi gogolalasis kwapete' endilisi, ombal mahas a'owa' safela agol Godi lu'wagol sa'i, “Dei' apa' mati anef waf dambaifi daiaf fowa' owa' mogatilifia.”
A'i owa' main, Jisas nosafel nafe' nati anona aman nogofa' takisi tol nape ipat sogofa' takisa, agilinama Livai. Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fi'i nila ae'.”
Ea' nosafel nailana nafe'. Hiahaom hiami ananimi nakwahom ma'oh.
Ama main, Livai nanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ipat ananitai ma noganifela Jisas. Ea' amam hiami awami mogofa' takisi maloma anom daiam wapani mape ma' gwa'aisi maloma amom biam.

Ea' anom Farisi dembami maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, amom Farisi, mape manda' megahaha amom alipumi Jisasi. Ma'i, “Dei' maina ipa' pape pa' gwa'aisi pagaloma amom mogofa' takisi maloma amam amamba manda' waf awafii? Na'ambai ina andeande', hapaimi.”
Owa' Jisas name'am na'ipam na'i, “Isimba aowas akasi ina safe'ma dokta, owa'. Esis bu'wasi. Apa' isimba aowas nanda'asi atis, dao' safe'ma dokta.
Ae' ina afi'i ma egefala epes sagape andeande'i sogambema opalef, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma egefala epes sanda' waf awafii atis sombema nelelemb sokwaha waf awafi sogafe'ma God.”

Ea' anis epes sa'ipa Jisas na'amba sa'i, “Alipumi Joni maloma alipumi amom dembami Farisii ukup papoma basef Godi. Ea' anif nimaguf wikifah danda amom molalama gwa'aisi mondabeten atin. Apa' alipumi ine'imi owa' monda' waf afambaia. Amom ma' gwa'aisi embel mais atapis dondol.”

Ea' nagwamas na'i basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anis sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma anis aman nemata'w bias sondaso'amai, ipa' ina la'ifipama penda' esis alipisi sondowalo' sondaiwa'ma gwa'aisi afamba anen nagaso' nemata'wi nape nagalomas, owa'atin endilisi.
Apa' nemaf afamba anen nagaso' nemata'wi nokwaha esis nogafe' anagon lauguni, dao' esis a sololama gwa'aisi.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anif basef waminif atina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma pegatopa' lowaf namifi pesambalef fegaloma anef lowaf apifi, owa'. I'i anis sonda'am na'amba, lowaf ina atiasi findati na'amba atin feloma apifi, owa'. Namifi a' pele'etaf atin.
Apa' ina anin epen nakolo'wa embel wain dambaini agwahup apinai memeina, owa'. I'i anin nenda'am na'amba, embel wain netef hian, nohape' agwahup anamba pepe'etana ea' wain kolo'olam awasim hi'ilam.
Apa' wain dambainai sakolo'wan agwahup dambainai atona.
Ea' ami noga' embel wain apini anin ina atiasi nomonas si'i wain dambaini, owa'. Anin a' na'i, ‘Wain apini fasini nikila' dambaini.’”

A'i owa' anef nemaf Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, Jisas nafe' anagon owa' nataga anof aof sagawa witafi a' nawis. Ea' alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana, ea' mosaga anom wit magaofi moka'isam lagof amamugufi ma'am.
Owa' anom Farisi mahali'am ma'i, “Ina penda'am na'amba ma nemaf afa'e sabat magapoma noma'wafi, owa'i. Dei' maina panda'am na'amba?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pegawa basef ifimba ma waf fowa' dembinai King Devit nanda'afi. Afamba Devit naloma alipumi ananimi nolomagaham
anen nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon na' bret atamba amom pris mondolali mogaso' Godatai. Ea' na'ata naso' alipumi ananimi ma'ata atin. Apa' mu'uli ape'ini na'i amom pris atom mea'ata.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ape Dembiwai ma nemaf afamba sabata iga'ipipa maol main andeande'ma pigaila basef penda'an nemaf afamba.”

Anef nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sabat a' fataga. Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat Juda sandakolasatai nape na'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa. Ea' anona aman nape nalomas, lagol kwahisigili ananigili awagol gaga' gail.

Amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma anom dembami Farisi ma'i mowando'ma ufia'wa mogasapaga Jisasa anif basef baso'afi ma monda' kotimana. Ea' manda'ana naep di'indi'ana. Ma'i mogati anen nosambala mu'uli ma nemaf afamba sabat nonda' aman anamba bo'ona a'a owa'?
Owa' anen a' nogawa nomonas amamisi, na'ipa aman anamba lagol awagilinai na'i, “Ina' safel nilutu naep hiasii la'afena esis sogatilina.” Ea' anen nosafel nalutu.

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'i ihali'ipa ma mu'uli ape'ini na'ias na'imama? Nemaf afa'e apa' ma'i monda' waf bu'wafi a'a monda' waf awafi? Na'i apa' motopalopasa sogape andeande' a'a mohambombagas sogaga'?”
Ea' natologon tulif amam nematawa hiasi, na'ipa aman anamba na'i, “Dowa lagol ine'igili usi'igil.” Ea' anen nando lagol ananigili agataga bo'wagol wapani.
Owa' amom Farisi nelelemb wandafum kwapete' endilisi ma anen. Ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' atiasi onda' maina Jisas?”
Nemaf afamba Jisas nandowasa' nafe' halafutagwa nandabetena God. Ea' owamb amamba laomb anen nape nandabeten nafe' a' lala.
Awin a'i owa' natafi, anen nofala alipumi ananimi hiami mafi'i nandandepa 12-pelaim nahapomama agol aposel amom atom.
Anona Saimon, ea' Jisas nanda'mana agol wa'agol Pita. A Andru, owamana Saimoni. Ea' Jemsi Jon. A Filipi Bartolomyu,
Matyu naloma Tomas ea' Jems nogama Alfiusi. Ea' Saimon anen pati inimba Seloti.
Ea' Judas nogamana Jemsi, a Judas Keriotinai, aman anamba nogawalapa Jisasa boumi ananimii.

Ea' Jisas niliana naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' anagon bembe'agoma, doko' esis alipisi hiasi ananisi safi'i sali' sagalutuma. Ea' epes hiasi safi'i. Anis safi'i walemb hiagoma anep itap lu'upa Judia a anis safi'i walemb bialemb Tairi Saidon bape bagalo'ma naohi, anis safi'i Jerusalem.
Esis safi'i ma sogame' basef ananifi ma nogatofa aowas asasinai. Ea' esis amam nematawa ambagof awami magahambombagasi safi'i, Jisas nanda'as bo'wes wapani.
Banagami ananimi mafe' manda' esis hiasi bo'wes. Ea' dei' esis hiasi sa'i sohahapila anen.
Jisas natiti amom alipumi ananimi na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' kwahupai otamba mais akipai, ipa' pawis ea' nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa. Isimba atis dei' ipa' sonahepa pandagala pape.

Ipa' epes nolomagahipai, dei' sonahepa pape andeande'. Dei' main, anaf ipa' pea' gwa'aisi a' alihipa. Ipa' epes nelelemb nimanilimba pagalifi, dei' sonahepa pape andeande'. Dei' main, anaf ipa' sonehepa pinda'iaf.

Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Nambimb anis daias siti ipa' pila ae', esis nelelemb awalemba ipa' endilisi. Ea' sowa' alafugaha ipa' sohaponamepa agof awagufi si'iguf wa'agof endilisi si'i ipa' epes aupai sindaiwa'mepa sili'amonepa.
Nemaf afamba esis sonda'epa na'amba, ipa' a sonondahepa pilutu pialemb atin. Dei' main, hiahaom hiami fasimi ipe'imi ma'oh heven. Fowa' akupas bafapas asasisi sanda' amom profet aom na'amba atin.
Apa' ipa' otamba uga maim hiamipai, ipa' solawaipa ma hiahaom awami akafimi mogatagamepai. Dei' main, ipa' dei' pefa'am ea' hiahaom monda'epa dagalaipamami.

Ipa' dei' paga' gwa'aisi alihipai, solawaipa ma hiahaom awami akafimi. Dei' main, anaf ipa' a' nolomehepa. Ipa' dei' panda'iafi, ipa' solawaipa ma hiahaom awami akafimi. Dei' main, anaf ipa' pelefa penda'aga a'owa'.

Ipa' dei' epes hiasi hi'alas sagafela agof ipe'igufi saga'i ipa' bu'upai, ipa' solawaipa ma hiahaom akafimi awami. Dei' main, fowa' akusas bafasas asasisi saga'ipam na'amba atina amom profet mambaso'am maga'ipasa basef Godii. Sanda'mamam na'amba atin, safela agof amamugufi.
Apa' ipa' pagame' basef ae'afii, ipa' ukup pelele' pindaila bousi ipe'isi, penda'masa waf bu'wafi isimba nelelemb awalemba ipe'i.
Ipa' pihali' Goda nonda'mas waf bu'wafi ma epes isimba sanda'mepa ko'opi. Ea' pendabetena epes isimba sanda'epa aupai.
I'i epen mamahina negahepa aomb wa'oli, pendambema nehepa wa'ol wapani. I'i epen mamahina nefa'mepa saket ipe'itai, ina pinda'imata, owa'i. Pese'anota wapani.
I'i epen mamahina nefalepama anis maefah, ipa' pese'anas. Ea' i'i epen mamahina negefa' hiahaom ipe'imi, ipa' owa'i pi'ipana dindinipa negwamepama, owa'i.
Waf maif ipa' pa'i esis sonda'mepaf ipe'i, ipa' penda'masaf na'amba atin.

“I'i ipa' ukup pipila epes isimba ukup pagapagaila ipe'i, atiasi pefa' hiahawes fasisi maisa waf afamba? Owa'atin. Epes sanda' waf awafii esis sanda'af na'amba atin. Ukup paipaila epes isimba ukup pagapagailasi.
I'i ipa' penda' waf fasifi ma isimba sanda' waf fasifi atifa ipe'i, atiasi ami nesa'ma agof ipe'igufi? Owa'atin. Epes isimba sanda' waf awafii esis wapani sanda' waf na'ambaifi.

I'i ipa' pese'asa anis hiahawes epes isimba ipa' pegawa esis atiasi sogogwamepasii, anaf ami nefela agof ipe'igufi? Bola owa'atin. Epes awasi wapani sagaso'asa anom maefah anis sanda' waf awafii, ama esis sotanima sogofa'am na'amba atin mondagwama si'i sali' sagaso'asam.

Apa' ipa' ukup pindapindaila bousi ipe'isi, penda'mas waf fasifi esis pese'asa hiahawes. Ipa' ina ata' pi'i anaf esis sogwamepas, owa'. Ipa' penda'as na'amba anaf God nagape ilifi nese'epa hiahaom lu'wami fasimi ma pegape awasi ananipai. Dei' main, anen naga'i uwahipigama esis isimba owa' soganifelonaia saloma isimba sanda' waf awafii.
Ahamepa ipe'inai naga'i uwahipigama esis sanda' waf awafii. Ipa' penda'as na'amba atin si'i anen nagati esis uwahipis.

“Ipa' ina a' pewaloga anis epes si'i anona jas dembinai nagawaloga basef kot lu'unai, owa'i. Ama anaf God ina nowalogepa, owa'. Ipa' ina a' pesapaga anis epes dowaf, owa'i. Ama anaf God ina nosapaga ipa' wapani, owa'. Ipa' pekwahowa waf awafi anis sanda'mepaf ipe'i. Ama anaf God nogwas nogakwahowa waf awafi ipe'ifi.

Ipa' pese'asa hiahawes anis epesa God nogase'epa hiahawes ipa'. Anaf anen nogase'epa hiahawes hiasi si'isi'isa ipa' endilisi si'im kwaef a'owa' miki'. Ikwaf ipa' pegaso'asaf anis epesi, anaf ikwaf afamba atef God nese'epaf ipa'.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anif basef waminif atina esis wapani na'i, “A'i anin epen naep pagaso'ani la'ifinama nigihimba'man ufia'w anin daian naep pagaso'ani? Owa'atin. Atiasi esis bias dogwas hendihandef sefe' sondakolef sowala atin kwambiwag.
Epes sanda' skul atini ina sape dambes sikila' tisa asasinai, owa'. Esis sonda' skula hi'alan, dao' sotaga na'amba atin si'i tisa asasinai.
“Dei' maina ipa' pagati usan sa'usa'uni nagape naep sahin owan ipe'isii, apa' ipa' owa' pegawa hapataf lu'unai nagape naep ipe'ipia?

Dei' maina ipa' ata' pali' pa'ipa alipisi piga'i, ‘Owame, ae' a'i igimina usan sa'uni nagape naep ine'ipii.’ Apa' ipa' hapataf lu'unai anamba nape naep ipe'ipi. Ipa' malogof biagufipai pagambaso'ami. Ipa' ata' pili' pigi usan hapataf lu'unai nagape naep ipe'ipii, ma piti andeande', dao' a' pigimana usas sa'usi sagape naep alipisi ipe'isii.”
Lawag bu'ugai ina gola gwa'aisi awasi, owa'. Ea' na'amba atin lawag augai ina gola gwa'aisi bu'wasi, owa'atin.

Apa' mati gwa'aisi sagailagahi, mogawa lawah bu'ugahi augahi. Epes ina sola sa'utip fikip usihip si'i ahipi anof mandof higatagufi, owa'atin. A ina sola sa'utip wainip anof mandof pipi'ambinif, isimba wapani owa'.

Epes na'amba atin. Epen bu'wani, anin nomonas fasisi sapain nembel ananimbili, ea' nawalapa waf bu'wafi. Apa' epen awani waf hiafi awafi awasi hiasi fapain nembel ananimbili. Ea' nawalapa waf awafi atefi. Dei' main, waf maif bu'wafi awafi fape si'ifa nembel ananinai, afamba dei' malogol gawalapafi.
“Dei' maina ipa' paga'i ae' Dembiwai, Dembiwai, apa' ipa' owa' pila malogol ae'agilia?
Ami nifi'mai ae' ma nigaila malogol ae'agilii, dei' ae' indila'waifa waf ananifi ma ipa' pegegawaf.

Epen inimba si'i anona aman nagala' ipati. Anen nandoma olalef fewala gani itap awin otamba mogotaoma. Ea' nanda' ipat tatoma ilifa otamba ambamba. Ama main, walemb nawisi embel kolo'walami mafe', ipat ina tandagwamba, owa'. Dei' main? Aman anamba nanda'ata banagota.

Apa' epen ami name' basef ae'afi owa' nilifa, inimba si'i anona daiana nagala' ipat falafutai. Anen nanda'ata nala'ata dowaf tatoma itap atep ilif. A'i owa' maina walemb nawisi embel mokwaefa ipat atamba kwafalis atis a' tato totowata aota hi'alata. Ea' ma'uf.”
Jisas na'i basef ifimba laufi ma hi'alef, a' nafe' nataga anambel wambel Kaperneam.
Anona aman dembinai nape. Anen kepten nugumafi soldia hiami 100-pelaimi. Anona nanda' maola anini aowasina felefele'ma nogaga'. Ea' kepten okom maimailana
ea' name' basefa Jisas nasapa' anom agufumi Judai mafe' mofala Jisasa nonda' aman anamba bo'ona.
Ea' mafe' matagama Jisas ma'ipana dindinip ma'i, “Kepten anamba aman bu'unai, andeande'ma ina' negatopalopana nenda' aman nanda' maola anini bo'ona.
Dei' main, anen okom magamagaila apa' Judai nala' ipat apa' mandakolasatai.”

Ea' Jisas nafe' nalomam nafe' nataga felefele'ma ipat owa', Kepten anamba nasapa' anom alipumi mofa'ai basef ananifi mafi'i ma'ipa Jisas na'amba ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' negafo'o owa', hapaimi. Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma ina' nefo'o negawis ipat ae'atai, owa'.

Isimba atis ae' wapani ina bo'owe ma egafe'mago ina', owa'atin. Ina' ninda'i basef atif bola anen bo'ona. Dei' main, ae' ape lafela anom soldia dembami mumafi mase'e maol. Ea' ape ilifa anom soldia ae'ami imafiam. Iga'ipa anona iga'i, ‘Ina' fo'o’, name'e nafe'. A iga'ipa anona iga'i, ‘Ina' fi'i’, neme'e nafi'i. Ea' iga'ipa anamba agol akanai nanda'me maoli iga'i, ‘Ina' da'a maol inimba’, anen name'e nanda'an. Ina' dembinai. Ea' aowas inimba atiasi neme' basef ine'ifi a' nefe'. Dei' ina' ninda'i atin, ea' anen ambo'ona wapani.”

Jisas name' basef ananifi okom malamafe' ea' nandambema na'ipa amam nematawa hiasi sagagi'ma anini na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, soldia dembinai anamba anen ina ipa' Israelinai. Owa' dei' nahapifa ae'. Owa' anona aman Israelinai nohapifi na'ambaea, owa'atin. Anen nikila' ipa' Israela nagahapifi banagambel.”
Ea' amom amamba kepten nasapa'am magafi'ii motanima mafe' ipat mati aman anamba nanda' maola kepteni bo'ona ea'.
A'i owa' main, Jisas nafe' anambel wambel Nen. Alipumi ananimi maloma anis amam nematawa hiasi safe' salomana.

Anen nafe' felefele'ma uta sagawis wambel ambalembama, owa' nati anis sofa' anin awani nagaga'i safi'i sa'i sowan. Awani inimba nagaga'i ma'man alifi'wi. Ako'w kola anin atin, waulunama'w a' naga'. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape wambel ambalembai safi'i salumai ako'w.
Dembinai nati ako'w, okom ananimi ma'i uwahipi'w ea' na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' negalef owa'i.”
Ama main, anen nafe' felefele' nasa lagola bokis sagalanasi. Ea' amom mogofa'ai bokis isimbai tol malutu. Ea' Jisas na'i, “Awani, ina' neme'! Ae' a'ipina, ina' safel.”

Awani inimba nagaga' ea'i nesafel nape na'i. Ea' Jisas naso'akwan ma'man anani'wi. Na'amba esis ombal mahas a'owa' safela agol Godi sa'i, “Anona aman profet dembinai nataga ea' la'afena apa'. God nafi'i ma nogatopalopa amam nematawa ananipai.”
Ea' basef ifimba ma maol Jisasi fafe'agon hi'alagon anamba itap lu'upa Judia ea' anamba hiagoma wapani.
Alipumi Joni ma'ipana hiahaom amamba banagami Jisas nanda'ami. Ea' Jon nofala alipumi biam ananimi
nasapa'am mafe' mahali' Dembinai Jisas ma'i, “Ina' aman ma'wina a' nafi'i, ea' a'a ata' mope mohafa anona daiana?”
Alipumi amamba biam Joni matagama Jisas ea' ma'i, “Jon nagapisi'as embeli nasapa' afa' biafa wafi'mai ina', anen na'i nogawa, ‘Ina' aman ma'wina nafi'i, a'a ata' mope mohafa anona daiana?’”
Nemaf afamba atef Jisas nanda' amam nematawa aowas hiana haona nanda'asi sataga bo'wes. Anen natofamasa ambagof awami magapaisi. Hiasi naep pagaso'asi nanda'masep patimas andeande'.

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' pitanima pefe' pi'ipa Jona hiahawes isimba dei' patilis pagame'asi. Isimba naep pagaso'asi asati wapani, bo'wagah awamisi safe' andeande'. Isimba aowas aunai nanda' alop asasipi pagambu'wi ambo'wes, aligah hagaso'asi same' basef andeande', sagaga'i sotanima sosafel wapani a kwahusi same' basef bu'wafi Godi.
Epes mamahisa ukup atifip sagahapifai, isimba asonohas andeande'.”

Amom biam mogofa'i basefa Joni a' motanima mafe'. Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa ma Jon na'i, “Fowa' ipa' pafe' anep itap fataupigima wafigima pafe' pati main? Pafe'ma pagati anona aman pupulinai si'i anota elifita fufin naolata tagalimbi? Owa'atin.

A'a pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman nagala klos fasimi atumii? Owa'atin. Epes isimba sogatala hiahaom bu'wami atumi ma moni hianai sagala klos fasimi atumi, epes isimba sagape ifagw bu'wagwi atogw amom king dembami magapaugwi.
Apa' ipa' dei' pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman profet? Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, anen profet dembinai nikila' profet hiami hi'alam.
Aman anamba ea' ma'una anen atona si'i basef fagape Baibeli na'iasa God fowa' na'ias naga'i, ‘Ina' neme', anaf ae' esapa' aman nogofa'o basef ae'afii nili' nefe'ma ina' nondondomba ufia'w ine'ikwi.’

Ae' a'ipipa, Jon dambena nikila' amam hiami ma itap apa'e. Apa' epen ami dei' nigawis nomona maol Godi nope dembinai nugumafian, inimba dambeni nikila' Jon. I'i epen inimba agol akani ma wambota Godi, anin wapani dei' nape dambeni nikila'ana.”
Ea' amom mogofa' takis mogambaso'masi maloma epes hiasi sagame' basef Jisasi esis sa'i, “Aho', waf Godi andeande'.” Dei' main, Jon atona nagapisi'asi.
Apa' amom Farisi maloma anom magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ina mofa' baptaisa Jon, owa'. Amom manda'as na'amba dei' mandambema mowa' alafugaha ufia'w fasi'wi God nigihimba'mama'wi.
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Atiasi ae' indila'waifa ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itapi i'imama? Ae' i'ipipa basef maif waminif atina pegegawa waf ipe'ifi?

Ipa' pape si'i anis awasi sandakolas sagapoma sofala anis awasi daias saga'i, ‘Apa' mandagala mufapula batagwa ipa', apa' ipa' ina palemb. Apa' manda' awalef si'i sagatala fawiagof malef mindiwagef, apa' ipa' owa' pelefa.’
“Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli nafi'i, ina na' gwa'aisii embel wain, owa'atin. Ea' pa'i ambal aunai napaona.

Dei' ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi afi'i a' gwa'aisi saloma embel wain, ea' patolowe pa'i, ‘Piti anen aman naga' wali'ita hiatai, naga' embel wain hiani endilisii. Anen alipunai ma amom mogofa' takisi magambaso'masi maloma amam manda' waf awafii!’
Apa' epes ami sigaila gawa fasini Godi, esis hiasi sa'i, ‘Gawa inimba anin bu'wani!’”
Anona aman Farisi nahali' Jisasa nifi'i nea' gwa'aisi nogalomana. Ea' nafe' ipat atamba Farisii nalomana ma' gwa'aisi.
Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwagape taun inimbai kwanda' waf awafii. Ako'w kwame' basefa Jisas na' gwa'aisi ipat atamba. Ea' kofa' anol botol fasili si'i otam embel sanda alogw fasigwi gwagani kwafi'i.

Ea' kwawis kwafe' kwalutu alafuga Jisasi felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi kwalef. Ea' embif akwa'ufi faluwi fewala bo'wagah Jisasi ea' kwanda' auf balagaifi kopati' embif akwa'ufi, kwape kwasisi' bo'wagah ananigahi kwanda' lotumana. Ea' kwakolo' sanda inimba bo'wagah ananigahi.

Ea' Farisi anamba nahali' Jisas nagafi'ii nati isimba, nomonas ananisi sandanda' sa'i, “I'i aman anamba endilisi anen profetai, a' nogawa nemata'w akwamba kwagahapila anini, nogawa waf akwa'ufi. Dei' main? Ako'w kwanda' waf awafii.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana nomonas isimba Farisi anamba na'ipana na'i, “Saimon, ae' a'i i'ipina anif basef.” Ea' Saimon na'i, “Tisa, ina' walapa basef ine'ifi.”
Jisas na'i, “Amam biam anof wiaf fapoma amoma anona aman otamba hiamunai. Anona nowaola wiafa 100 kina apa' anona 10 kina atin.
Ama main, amom biam ina la'ifima mogogwa wiaf afamba, owa'. Ea' dei' aman anamba okom maso'ana wiaf afamba amom biami nakwahomamaf. Ea' amom biam atiasi ami okom mimila anen a'owa' nikila' anona?”
Saimon nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “Ae' a'i aman anamba nagaso'ana wiaf lu'wafii 100 kinai.” Jisas na'i, “Ina' nawalogef andeande'.”

Ea' nandambema na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ina' niti nemata'w akwa'e? Ae' afi'i awisi ipat ine'itai. Ina' owa' nese'e embel esa'opa bo'wagah ae'agahia, owa'atin. Apa' nemata'w akwamba kwasa'opa bo'wagah ae'agahi ma embif fagaluwi naep akwa'upii. Ea' kopati'if balaga akwa'ugai.
Ina' owa' nisisi' ae'a. Apa' doko' ae' afi'i awisi atin, ako'w kwape kwasisi' bo'wagah ae'agahi atapi'w kwape kwafi'i kwataga dei'.
Ina' owa' nenda' wel nefame balaga ae'agaia. Apa' ako'w kwaofame bo'wagah ae'agahi embel sanda.

Na'amba dei' ae' a'ipina. Ako'w okom maimaila ae' a'owa'. Waf afamba okom magamagaila ae'afi fihimba'mapa waf awafi akwa'ufi hiafi akwahoma'waf hi'alaf. Epen ami God nokwahoman waf awafi ananifi kwasala'uf okom moso'anaf, epen inimba anin atiasi okom mimila God kwasakwasala.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa nemata'w akwamba na'i, “Ae' akwahomena waf awafi ine'ifi okom mase'eaf.”
Ea' amom mape ma' gwa'aisi magalumanai mape ukup talambi manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anamba anen mamahonama na'i atiasi banagonama nogakwaha waf awafii?”
Jisas na'ipa nemata'w akwamba na'i, “Ina' nahapifa ae' banagiwai. Isimba atis God nakwahomena waf awafi ine'ifi nowambelena nitanimai nepe andeande'. Ina' fo'o, ea' nembel ine'imbili bepe awanembel.”

A'i owa' main, Jisas nafe' walemb hielimbi naso'asa basef bu'wafi amam nematawa sagape taun inimbai walemb hiagomai. Na'ipasa basef ifimba bu'wafi ma atiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope dembinai nugumafias. Alipumi ananimi maloma

anowa nematawa safe' salomana. Nematawa awamba fowa' aowas nanda'awa Jisas natofamawa ambagof awami nanda'awa bo'owa. Ano'w Maria sofala'w sa'i Makdalai'wi, fowa' nagatofama'wa ambagof awami 7-pelaim magapau'wi.

Ea' ano'w Joana nemata'w anona aman nugumafi ipat Heroti, agol ananigili Susa. A' ano'w Susana kwaloma anowa nematawa hiawai daiawa wapani wafe' walomana. Awo watopalopa anen naloma alipumi ananimi ma otamba gwa'aisi mais awausi.
Esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i taun hiagoma, safi'i sandakolas safi'mai Jisas. Ea' anen naso'asa basef waminif atin na'amba na'i,
“Anona aman nafe' nowaha olemb witimb si'i raisi anof aof. Nowahemb nafe', anemb bewa ufia'w sagafe'ma. Anis epes safe' safafa'asemb ea' amiguf fufia' fafi'i fa'amb.
Anemb bewa anagon otambaigima. Ea' bataga apa' itap owa' embelepa. Gagalisimb ea' alimb.
Anemb bewala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofana wit, ea' amom ina mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.

Ea' anemb bewa begafe' itap fasipai ea' bataga balo bail bela gwa'aisi. Olemb ambamba atona bataga balo bail bela gwa'aisi hiasi 100-pelais atis.” Jisas na'ias na'amba ma ea', na'ipas mehip na'i, “Ipa' aligah hagagalipai ma pegame' basef ifimbai, pendame'ef andeande' ukup pendapomef.”
Ama main amom alipumi Jisasi mahali'anama basef kofagefa waminif atini.

Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God ea' nihimba'mepa basef kofagefa fape fandambahi'i ma ipa' pigawis nomona maol ananini nope Dembinai nugumafipa. Apa' anis daias owa'. God ina nihimba'mas basef ifimba kofagefa, owa'. Ama esis ina seme' basef ifimba alihif, owa'. Seme' basef waminif atini atifa atiasi sotologon, apa' ina siti anis maefah, owa'. Ea' sogahembe' seme' basef, apa' ina sogawa kofagefa, owa'atin.”
Basef waminif atini kofagefa na'amba. Olemb ambamba si'i basef Godi.
Anemb begewala ufia'wi ambamba si'i epes same' basef, owa' Satan nafi'i nelefata basef ifimba fagape nelelemb asasilimbi ma esis ina sahapifa God nakwahomas waf awafi sagape andeande', owa'atin.

Anemb bewa bafe' anagon otambaigimai, ambamba si'i anis epes same' basef Godi ea' sofa'ef sandagalamef. Apa' isimba si'i masilimb owa' bendala begewala itap awinia. Esis sahapilif nogota bandata ma a'i owa', Satan nagwambasa sonda' waf awafi ea' sandahagas sakwaha sagahapifa God.

Anemb begewala mandelef wandafumi la'afini, ambamba si'i anis same' basef sailif safe' ama main owa', anom nimanimi mamimami maloma moni main a anom dagala maim itapami, hiahaom amamba maso'ala esis. Ea' ina sahapilif sanda' waf bu'wafi banages, owa'atin. A sowa si'i gwa'aisi owa' sogalo andeande'ia.

Apa' olemb ambamba begewala itap fasipai, ambamba si'i anis same' basef sahapilif tatala'if. Nelelemb asasilimbi fasilimba sagame' basef Godi sogailif. Esis sape banages sanda' waf fasifi banagef, isimba sape si'i olemb bataga balo bail begela gwa'aisi andeande'i.”
“Epes ina sakata lambeh sopalo'ambeh ha'oh lafelagwa baketia o belitagw lafelagwa, owa'atin. Esis sawamonambeh hatoma belita ilifa epes isimba suwisi sigati nogogala'.
Hiahaom mape mandambahi'i anaf motaga alihigima hiasi sotolom sogawam. Apa' hiahaom hiami ata' sambaho'wam maga'ihi, anaf a' motaga mondawalap, hiasi sogawam.

Ea' ipa' solawaipa pendame' basef andeande'. Epes ami sogahapila basef Godii, atiasi God a' nowatanimasef wapani. Apa' isimba owa' sogahapilifia, atiasi basef kwawia'wif ifimba esis sogahapilafi, God a' nondalombasef esis sope dowaf.”
Nemaf afamba ma'mana Jisasi kwao'wa owapana safi'mai anen. Owa' amam nematawa hiasi sandakolasi sili'amana, ea' esis ina safe' felefele'ma anen, owa'.
Ea' anis epes sape sagalomanai sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' neme', ma'mena ine'ikwi kwaloma anom owapena ine'imi safi'i salutu ando', sa'i solomena si'i.”
Ea' nagwamasa basef isimba hiasi na'ipas na'i, “Esis amam nematawa isimba sogame' basef Godii sogailafi, isimba ma'me sahin owan ae'asi.”
Anef nemaf Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi malota anota bot. Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Afa' ofe' dumb ambamba fisanamb.” Ea' amom malota bot mafe'.
Bot atamba tafe' atin, Jisas ambehahana na'oh nolola. Ama main, anona fufin lu'unai naluwi dumb ambamba, embel kolo'walam mawisi bot nomon ta'i asi'ita ma embel felefele'ma mogowala.
Ea' mafe' minimbalona ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i ahigililafa.” Anen nosafel ninifala fufini embel. Ea' fufin nowala embel ina ata' lasiali' a'owa', betah hilili'.
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Hapif ipe'inai nape ani?” Amom ombal maham ukup hiahawep. Ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Anen epen ami? Na'ipa fufini embel same'ana sagahapifana.”
A'i owa' main, Jisas naloma alipumi mafe' mataga anagon esis Gegesa sagapoma, anamba nape wa'ol dumb fisanamb itap apamba Galili.

Ea' Jisas nakwaha bot nisila' nafe' akata, anona aman nagape taun inimbai nafi'mai anen. Anom ambagof awami mapaona. Anen ina nowaho' anef lowaf nape andeande' anota ipat, owa'atin. Fowa' anen aona nape atapina nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei'. Nape nafe' wandelef matmati atom.

Anona ambal aunai nahapilana tatala'ina. Esis sombalo'ana sumafiana dondol sanda' seni hankap sowa'ana lagof bo'wagah, owa', owa'atin. Nahape'am atin. Ea' ambal anamba aunai nofa'ana nafe' anamba epes akagoma. Aman anamba nafi'i nati Jisas, go'ala nalef nafi'i nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi. Ea' Jisas na'ipana dindinip na'i. “Ina' ambal aunai kwaha aman anamba fo'o.” Ea' nofalana mehip a'owa' na'i, “Jisas, ina' Nogamana dembinai God nagape ilif endilisii, ina' na'i nenda' maina ae'? Ae' a'ipina endilisi gani ilifa agol Godi, ina' owa'i nese'e akafimia.”
A'i owa' main, Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Agol ine'igili ami?” Anen na'i, “Agol ae'agili ambagof hiami.” Dei' main, ambagof awami hiami mafe' mawisana.
Ea' ambagof amamba gigal ma'oh banagambel mofala Jisas atapim ma'i, “Ina' owa'i netofafa ofe' owala nowaga launai owa' nowala nogotambilia.”
Anamba anogof bogof hiagufi falutu fa' gwa'aisi anota damota felefele'. Ea' ambagof awami mofala Jisas dindinip ma'i, “Ina' ni'i aho'ma afa' ofe' uwis bogof gwagwafumba!” Ea' na'i aho'mam,
makwaha aman anamba mawisi a' mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof agwafomba hiagufi mafa' mafe' mehip mowala ta'alogol awagoma tata, mowala embel dumb afum hi'alam.
Ea' amom mugumafiagufi mati hiahaom magatagama bogof agwafumbai, mafa' mafe' ma'ipasa hiahaom amamba amom magatulumi amam nematawa sagape tauni sagail aofah felefele'i wapani.

Ea' esis safe'ma sigati hiahaom amambai. Safi'mai Jisas sati aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai dei' makwahona ea' ambo'ona nomonas fasisi sapaona andeande' nowaho' lowaf tol nape felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi. Esis sati amamba a' ombal mahas.
Ea' epes isimba sagati hiahawes isimbai, sa'ipas sa'i waf Jisas nanda'afa aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai dei' ambo'ona wapani.
Ea' epes hiasi sagape anamba Gegesai ombal mahas a'owa' sa'ipa Jisas sa'i, “Ina' nekwaha apa' a fo'o.” Ea' Jisas nalota anota bot notanima nafe'.
Aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai nahali' Jisas dindinip na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena.” Owa' Jisas nasapa'ana na'i,

“Ina' tanima fo'o wambel ine'imbili, newalapa basefa hiahaom hiami God nanda'menam ine'i.” Ea' aman anamba nafe' nawalapa basefa hiahaom amamba ma amam nematawa hiasi sagape taun inimbai hi'alasa hiahaom Jisas nanda'manam anini.
Jisas notanima nafi'i, anis amam nematawa hiasi sape sohafana. Ea' sanda'mana nemaf bu'wafi sandagalama nagafi'i.

Ama main, anona aman nataga agilinama Jairus. Anen nugumafi ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai. Nogamana nemata'w atoto'w afagof akwa'ugufi 12-pelaiguf felefele' kwa'i koga'. Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi, nahali'ana dindinip na'i, “Ina' nifi'i ipat ae'atai.” Jisas nafe' esis amam nematawa hiasi safe' salipana dogw.

Anen ata' nafe' atin, owa', ano'w nemata'w kwafi'i felefele'ma alafuga ananigai. Aowas awasini nanda'akwa kwape gamba atapi'w afagof 12-pelaiguf. Otamba ako'umbai basa bewala hi'alambama kwagatala dokta hiami, apa' ina anom la'ifima monda'akw kogataga bo'okw, owa'atin.
Ea' kwafe' kwasa lagola saket Jisasi da'malifitama. Kwanda'as na'amba, kwafalis atin esimbel a' maso', ea' ina ata' maluwi wapani, a' owa'atin.
Ea' Jisas nahali'as na'i, “Ami nasa lagola ae'?” Ea' esis hiasi sa'i atin atin sa'i, “Ae' owa'.” Ea' Pita na'i, “Dembinai, epes hiasi isimba salutu salipina, esis safe' gol ina'.”
Owa' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ame' banagami ae'ami makwahowe mafe'ma monda' anin epen bo'wen. Ae' egawa anin epen nasa lagol alop ae'api.”

Ea' nemata'w akwamba kogawa ako'w ina atiasi kondambaho'w ma anen, owa'. Na'amba ako'w bolala'w kwafi'i kowafa kotawa itap felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi ma naep amam nematawa hiasii. Ea' kwawalapa basef kofagefa akwa'ufi ma dei' kwagasa lagola anen. Ea' kwa'i, “Aowas ae'ani ahi'alan kwafalis atetef.”
Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Nogame, dei' ina' ea' nahapifa ae' banagiwai. Isimba atis dei' anda'ena bo'wena. Ina' fo'o opaf ine'ifi fope awanef.”
Anen ata' na'i atin owa', anona aman nakwaha ipat Jairusi nafi'i na'ipa Jairus na'amba na'i, “Nogamena ine'ikwi a kwaga' ea'. Na'amba ina nenda' Dembinai Tisa nofo'o noma'w kohana, owa', hapaimi.”
Owa' Jisas name'as na'ipa Jairus na'i, “Ina' ombal mehena, owa'i. Ina' nihapifi atin, ama atiasi nogamena ine'ikwi kogosafel wapani.”

Ea' Jisas nafe' nataga ipat Jairusi apa' ina na'i aho'ma amam nematawa hiasi suwis ipat sogalomana, owa'. Nao'wa Pitai Jon Jems atom maloma ma'ma'wi ahama'w atis safe' sawis salomana. Esis amam nematawa hiasi sape salef sanda'agama'w a'owa'. Owa' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' ina pelef, owa'i. Tol pepe. Ako'w ina kwaga' dogw, owa'. Kwa'oh atin.”
Ea' esis sanda'iafana kwapete'. Esis sogawa ako'w kwaga' endilisi.
Owa' Jisas nahapila lagol akwa'ugili nofala'w na'i, “Sa'ukwi, ina' safel.”
Ea' ambal akwa'uli lotanima lafi'i lawisa'w wapani kosafel kwafalis. Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis mamasa'w na'i, “Ipa' so'akwa anis gwa'aisi.”
Ea' sati isimba, agogolalasis endilisi nomonas salasafe'. Na'amba Jisas na'ipas dindinipa sogagi'ma basef ananifi na'i, “Ipa' ina pi'ipa anin epena hiahawes isimba, owa'i.”
Nemaf afamba Jisas nofalai alipumi 12-pelaim ananimi mandakolas mafi'i naso'am agol lu'wagili nowa' banagama mogatofa ambagof hiami awami mogatofa aowas hianai naninani nogafe'.
Ea' nasapa'am mafe' ma'ipas basefa epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias ea' manda' awasisi bo'wes.
Anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina pefa' anis maefah galahitagwi isalef gwa'aisi moni, owa'i, hapaisi. Ipa' ina pefa' siagw biagw atogw, owa'. Pefa' atota atin.
I'i pefe' pigawis anota ipat, ipa' pepe ipat atamba atota. Ama main, pekwaha wambel ambalemba apefe'.

Apa' i'i esis owa' sofa'epa pegafe' ifagw asasigwia, dao' ipa' pekwaha wambel ambalemba pindila'ma usas itap pagail bo'wagah ipe'igahi ma esis sitilipa sogogawa waf awafi asasifi kofagema asasimi atom.”
Ea' alipumi Jisasi makwaha anamba magapoma mafe' walemb anamba hiagoma ma'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi. Ea' matopalopa epes aowas nanda'asi sagape walemb hiagomai manda'as bo'wes wapani.

Gavman dembinai king Herot nugumafi itap lu'upa Galili name' basefa hiahawes isimba hiasi sataga, apa ina nogawas andeande' ea' nomonas salasafe'. Dei' main, anis epes sa'i, “Jon a' notanima nosafel matmat wapani.”
Apa' anis sa'i anif basefa Elaija profet fowa'inai sa'i, “Anen nosafel wapani.” Ea' anis sa'i, “Anona aman profet fowa'inai notanima nosafel wapani.”
Apa' Herot na'i, “Jon ae' atopa' bini'wana ea'. Apa' aman anamba agame' basefanai, anen mamahonama?” Nape atapina na'i niti Jisas.
Aposel alipumi Jisasi motanima mafi'i ma'ipa Jisasa hiahawes maol amom manda'ani. Ea' anen nao'wam makwaha anis epes daias, amom atom mafe' anin taun Betsaida.

A'i owa' main, esis sogawa anamba nagapoma sagi'mana safe'. Safi'mai anen, nanda'mas nemaf bu'wafi nandagalama esis sagafi'i. Ea' nawalipas basefa esis sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Ea' nanda' epes aowas nanda'asi asataga bo'wes.

Ama wambomota awin newala, alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' nesapa' amam nematawa isimba sofo'o walemb aofah sagape felefele'i ma sogolaoma ifagwi gwa'aisi. Dei' main, ana'e afa' wagapoma wafigima epes akagoma.”

Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' atipa pese'as gwa'aisi.” Ea' amom ma'i, “Afa' gwa'aisi owa' hiasa. Bret wa'agolita taloma agof biagof ea' isimba atis sa'oh. Apa' ina' na'i afa' ofe' utalai gwa'aisi ma amam nematawa isimba hiasi?”
Amam atom hiami 5,000-pelaim mape. Apa' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' pi'ipa esis sondakolas sope oto otowa sotagama misi'ah wa'agilih atoh.”
Ea' manda' amam nematawa hiasi sape.
Jisas nasa'ma bret atamba wa'agolita taloma agof biagof, naniga nati heven ilif nanifela God. Ea' nawalota naso' alipumi ananimi maso' esis amam nematawa hiasi hi'agalas.
Sa'as alihis andondo', alipumi ananimi matatama du'wa'wanisi sagasaga'ihi malo'was folalef lu'walifi 12-pelailif si'ilif kwaef.
Anef nemaf Jisas atotona nape nandabeten, alipumi ananimi mape malomana nahali'am na'i, “Esis amam nematawa sa'i ae' aman mamahowema?”
Owa' amom magwa basef na'amba ma'i, “Anis sa'i ina' Jon aman nagapisi'as embeli. Apa anis sa'i ina' anona profet daiana fowa'inai netanima nesafel wapani, a anis sa'i ina' Elaija.”
Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ami?” Pita nagwa basef na'i, “Ina' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii.”
Jisas na'ipam basef banagafi na'i amom ina mi'ipasa basef ifimba anis daias mi'i anen Krais, owa'i.

Ea' na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi atiasi efa' akafimi hiami ma anom agufumi dembami moloma anom dembami pris a anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi atiasi mowa' alafugaha ae', mohe ega'. Apa' nimaguf bif hi'ilif anef fegafe'ma wanifi, God a' nosa'me itanima esafel wapani.”

Ea' na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' efa' akafimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. I'i anin epen ni'i nila ae', anin nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae' atapin nimaguf danda ma nigaili. Ea' netalogofa okom ananimi ma maol main anin na'i nenda'ani.

Dei' main, epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol, ni'i nihapilal tatala'il, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' ami okom mopoma ae' ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf ambal ananili God nofa'al lotanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.

I'i epen ami nenda' maol naninani ma negefa' gwa'aimi uga hiahaom hiami itapami atom higiligalami, anin wapani awen higililan nelomam. Dei' bola hiahaom amamba atiasi motopalopan mi'imama? Owa'atin endilisi.

Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. I'i epen ami ambal aola ae' nendafa'me eloma basef ae'afi, ae' wapani ambal aola epen inimba endafa'man nemaf afamba ae' ifi'i egaloma hiahaom fasimi banagami mogogala'i ae'ami, elomai mogogala'i Godi a amom ensel hilili'i wapani.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anipa pagalutu na'ai atiasi ina pega' ulal, ata' owa'. Anipa atiasi apiti God nogape dembinai ma epes ananisi.”
Jisas na'ipasa basef ifimba ma ea', nimaguf ifimba 8-pelaif fafe'ma ea', anen nao'wa Pita naloma Jemsi Jon, nao'wam mondowasa' anota halafuta ma nondabeten.
Anen nape nandabeten atin, amaga ananigai agataga gandati na'a, ea' luwaguf nagalami a' mataga afitim a'owa' mogala'.
Ea' amam biam fowa'imi Mosesi Elaija mataga maloma mogogala'i banagami ilifami ea' malutu ma'i malomana. Amom ma'i ma atiasi Jisas a' nigaila okom Godi ma nokwaha itap apa'e nogaga' gani Jerusalem.
Pita naloma alipumi biam Jisasi amom naep nimanip a'owa' ma'i mo'oh atin. Owa' mosafel mati mogogala'i Jisasi maloma amam amamba biam malutu magalumanai.

Amom biam ma'i mokwaha Jisas mefe', owa' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'a'e a' fafas. Afa' ola' anoh aolah wanoh hondandamepa. Ina' anop, Moses anop Elaija anop.” Pita ina nogawa andeande'ma naga'i basef ifimba.
Anen ata' na'i basef atin, anom ilagw maofana amom mili'amam a' ombal maham.
Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai ilagw nomon ga'i, “Anamba anen Nogame ae'anai. Ae' andandepana ea'. Ipa' pendame' basef ananifi.”
Malogol agalemba ga'i ea', amom mati Jisas atona nalutu. Ea' amom malogof faso', ina ma'ipa anis epesa hiahaom amamba magatulumi, owa'.
Ama naman amom makwaha halafuta atamba miliana, ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i sowando'ma Jisas ufia'w.
Anona aman nagalutu la'afena esisi na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ahali'ina dindinip a'i, ina' niti nogame ae'anai uwahipina. Ea' anen atotona.

Anona ambal aunai nahapilana sisihina, ea' kwafalis anen hoga'ala kwapete'. Ea' ambal anamba aunai naolana kwapete' endilisi, ofap nataga sisih malogol ananigili. Ambal anamba nahambombagana alop ananipi endilisi, ea' ina nakwahona, owa'atin. Napaona atapina.
Ea' ae' dei' ahali' alipumi ine'imi ma mogatofa ambal anamba aunai. Owa', amom ina la'ifim.”

Jisas nagwa basef na'ipas dindinip nasa'ma ukup asasipi na'i, “O, ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itapi, owa' pigahapifaia, nelelemb ipe'ilimbi owa' bepe andeande'a. Nimaguf ma'uf ae' ata' epe elomepa wapani ma egefa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipa' okwan nifi'mai ae'.”

Nogamana ata' nafi'i atin, owa' ambal anamba aunai naolana nafe' nowa itap nakoto'ana kwapete' endilisi. Owa' Jisas ninifala ambal aunai nanda' aman anamba sa'unai bo'ona ea' naso'anana notanima nafe'ma ahamana ananinai.

Isimba atis dei' amam nematawa hiasi sati banagami lu'wami Godi agogolalasis kwapete' endilisi. Esis ata' nomonas salasafe' hiahias atina hiahaom amamba anen nanda'ami, owa' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'amba na'i,
“Ipa' pembe' aligah andeande'ma basef dei' ae' iga'ipipafi. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi atiasi felefele' anona aman noso'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amom boumi ae'ami.”
Ea' amom alipumi mame' basef ifimba atif, apa' ina mogawa kofagefa, owa'. Ata' fandambaho'ma amom. Ea' amom ombal mahama mogahali'ana ma basef ifimba kofagefa.”
Ea' alipumi Jisasi ma'i anif basef mafitapef ma'i ami nepe dembinai amamunai.
Owa' Jisas nogawa nomonas isimbai sagape nelelemb amamilimb, ea' nasa'mai anin awani sa'wini nafi'i nalutu nalomana.

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Epen ami neso' opafa negatopalopa anin awani si'i ini'i ma okom ananimi mopoma ae', anin nase'e opaf ae' wapani natopalope. Ea' epen ami negatopalopa ae'i, anin natopalopa anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani. Dei' main? Epen ami nepe agol akana la'afena ipa' hipai, anin nape dembeni nali'ma ipa'.”
Ea' Jon nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wati anona aman nanda' maol natofa ambagof awami ma agol ine'igili. Anen ina nagi'mafa. Ea' dei' wasopamana.”
Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ipa' ina apesopamana, owa'i. Dei' main? Epen ami ina bouni ipe'ini, inimba alipini ipe'ini.”
Nogota God na'i nofa' Jisas nogalota heven tafi'i felefele', ea' Jisas okom banagem na'i a' nefe' Jerusalem.
Ea' nasapa' anom amam mali' mofa' basef ananifi mafe'. Mafe' mawis anambel wambel esis Samariai ma mogandondomba hiahawes ananisi.
Owa', esis wambel ambalemba sowa' alafugaha Jisas sandaiwa'ma sofa'ana sogafe' ipat asasitai. Dei' main? Esis sogawa anen na'i nefe' Jerusalem.
Ea' alipumi amamba biam ananimi Jemsi Jon mati waf afamba ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i afa' ofalai nif fagandifi fisila'i hevena fegando epes isimba?”
Owa' Jisas nandambema ninifala amom biam.
Ea' mafe' anambel wambel daiambel.
Amom ata' mafe' ufia'w atin, owa' anona aman na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena. Ea' ofe' atin anamba hiagoma ina' na'i negafe'ma.”

Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Nombagw alupugwi bologwalefa itap apa'e wambel agwagumbili. Amiguf wapani fufia' fagafe' ilifi fala' owah fapaoh gani ilif, apa' ae' owa'atin. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi wambel ake ma e'eh egalo balaga ae'agai.”
Ea' na'ipa anona aman daiana na'i, “Ina' nifi'i nila ae'.” Owa' anen na'i, “Ae' a'i ata' epe imafi ahame ata' etopalopana ma noga' iwana nogapani ifi'i ilina.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Hapaimi, esis sagaga'i sondawago esis atis isimba sagaga'i. Apa' ina' fo'o newalapa basefa epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias.”
Ea' anona aman daiana na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ilina. Apa' ina' ata' ni'i aho'ma ae' efe'ma esis wambota ae'atai inifelis i'i nemaf bu'wafi ma esis sili'?”
Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Epen ami nesafel nili' nenda' maol aofi ma nendambema niti alafuga ma negakwaha maol ananini, anin ina la'ifina nenda' maola ni'ipas sogawis nomona maol Godi, owa'atin.”
Ama main, Dembinai nandandepa anom alipumi ananimi 72-pelaim nasapa'am mafe' mandaho'ma biam atom mali'ana mafe'. Anen nasapa'am mafe' taun walemb hiagoma anen na'i nogafe'agoma.

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' piti aofah hiagahi gwa'aimi hiami a' maof ea', apa' epes sanda' maoli owa' hiasa, kwasala'wis. Ea' ipa' penda' betena pihali' dembinai kofagonama aofi. Pihali'ana ma nogosapa'i epes hiasi sofe' sonda' maola sola gwa'aimi ananimi sogambe'am atifigin.
Ipa' fo'o. Peme', ae' asapa' ipa' pefe' si'i mafis sipsip la'afena nombagw alupugwi.
Ipa' ina pefa' paos manisi soloma brasbeli su, owa'i. Ipa' ina penda'masa nimaguf bu'wafi anis amam nematawa ufiawa, owa'i. Pefe' kwafalis.
I'i ipa' pefe' pigawis anota ipata, ata' pili' pi'ias na'amba pi'i, afa' wa'i God nonda' opalef ipa' hipai pagape ipat atambai fepe awanelef.
Ama i'i anin epen opaf awanafi nepe ipat atamba, ea' basef bu'wafi ipe'ifi fepoma epen inimba. Apa' i'i owa', hapaimi, basef ifimba bu'wafi fitanimai fepemepa atapif.

Ipa' pendape ipat atamba atota. Ina pepe pefe' ifagw gwagwigwagwi, owa'i. Pepe ipat atamba atotota pea' gwa'aisi embel esis sagasi'ipasi. Dei' main, amom manda' maoli andeande'ma mogofa' otamba ma maol amamini.
I'i ipa' pefe' pigawis anin taun ama esis sofa'epa pegafe' ifagw asasigwi, ipa' pefa' gwa'aisi esis sagatambe'mepas ipe'i.
Ea' penda' isimba aowas nanda'asi bo'wes wambel ambalemba. Ea' pi'ipa esis pi'i, ‘Nemaf afamba felefele'ma fegataga ma ipa' pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa.’
Apa' ipa' i'i pefe' piwis anin taun, ama esis owa' sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasigwia, ipa' pefe' pilutu ufiawa taun inimba pi'i,

‘Itap du'wa'wanipi ma taun inimba ipe'ini paila bo'wagah afa'igahi, apa' afa' upati'ap pitanima pefe'mago ipa'. Ama ipa' ukup pendanda' pegawa basef ifimba andeande'. Nemaf afataga felefele' ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi, owa', ipa' pandaiwa'.’

Dei' ae' a'ipipa, nemaf afamba lu'wafi God nogawaloga epesafi anen anaf niti esis fowa' sagape Sodomi uwahipis kwasakwasala. Apa epes isimba wambel ambalembaisi anen ina niti uwahipis, owa'. Akafimi lu'wami awami endilisii anaf a' motagamas.”

“Ae' ati ipa' Korasinipai paloma Betsaida owahipipa a'owa'! Nimanimi akafimi lu'wami atiasi a' motagamepa. Epes isimba fowa' gani sanda' waf awafii sagape walemb ambalemba bialembi Tairi Saidoni, esis ina sati anin maol bu'wani banagani si'i dei' anda'am walemb ipe'ilimbi, owa'. I'i esis isimba Tairi Saidon siti maol inimba ai, esis sowaho' begah pepe'agatami si'i luwaguf tol sope nif agambeh. Ama sigihimba'ma anis epes esis ea' sambema nelelemb endilisi safe'ma God. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
Nemaf afamba God nogawaloga epesafi, niti esis fowa' sagape Tairi Saidoni uwahipis kwasakwasala. Apa' ipa' anen ina niti uwahipipa, owa'. Anaf pefa' akafimi lu'wami awami endilisi.
Ea' ipa' Kaperneam, anaf esis sosa'ma agof ipe'igufi folota ilif? Owa'atin. Anaf God nokwahepa pefe' pewala wambel awambili hel.”

Ea' na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Epen ami negame' malogof ipe'igufii, anin name' malogol ae'agili wapani. Apa' epen ami nese'epa alafugah ipa', anin nase'e alafuga ae' ea' naso'ana alafuga anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani.”
A'i owa' main, amom amamba mafe' manda' maoli 72-pelaim motanima mafi'i sonaham endilisi ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wahapila agol ine'igili, ambagof awami mame' basef afa'ifi.”

Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ati Satan a' nowai heven si'i otaga holala ma diwagala. Peme', ae' ea' ase'epa banagami ipa' ma atiasi la'ifipa pegefa'asa uguf awagufi wandafugufi foloma awisuguf. Ama la'ifipa pegapa'aga banagami hiami aman bounai aunai ipe'inai. Ea' ina atiasi anin mae atitin nehambombagepa, owa'atin.
Apa' ipa' ina pendagalama ambagof awami magame' basef ipe'ifi, owa'i. Ipa' sonendahepa ma God nanda' agof ipe'igufi fail buk anani'wi gani heven.”

Nogota atamba atota Ambal bu'unai Godi nawalapa dagala nembel Jisasi ea' na'i, “O ahame, ina' Dembinai ma ilifi itapi. Ae' asa'ma agol ine'igili anifelina. Dei' main? Ina' nambaho' hiahaom amamba ma esis epes gawaisi sogofa' gawa lu'wanii, ea' nambemam nihimba'masam epes isimba gawa akasi falafisi. Aho' ahame, okom ine'imi maga'i, ea' amamba atom.

“Ahame ae'anai nanda' hiahaom hiami hi'alam mape lagol ae'agili. Ina anin epen negawa ae' Nogamana Godi, owa'atin. Anen atona nogawe. Ea' owa' anin epen negawa ahamea, owa'atin. Ae' Nogamana ananiwai atowe egawana. Ae' aloma epes isimba mamahisa igihimba'masa isimba wapani, esis atis sogawana.”
Ea' anen nandambema nati amom alipumi ananimi atom mape malomana na'ipam na'i, “Epes sagati hiahaom ipa' pagatulumi esis sonahas.

Dei' main? Fowa' amom king dembami hiami maloma amom profet hiami ma'i miti hiahaom amamba dei' ipa' pagatulumi. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ukup amamipi pa'ipa'i a'owa' ma ma'i mogame' basef ifimba ipa' pagame'afi, apa' owa', owa'atin. Amom ina mame'ef matolom.”
Anona aman gawainai nagawalipasa mu'uli Godii nosafel na'i nogwamba Jisas nememe'mana. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' enda' maina atiasi egefa' ambal namili egape andeande' lifilafi?”
Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Basef maif fapoma mu'uli Godi? Ina' natalifif na'imama?”

Owa' anen nagwamana basef na'i, “Nomonas ipe'isi sehafela dembinai God ipe'inai sisilana na'amba. Ukup ipe'ipi pipilana hi'indalep, pese'ana ambagufi nelelemb soloma pepel ipe'isi pendaso'anas hi'indalasa dembinai God atona. Ea' ukup pipila anis epes sagape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ukup pagapagaila ipa' atipa.”
Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Isimba ina' nagwa basef usi'if. Ina' nenda'as na'amba ma atiasi negape ambal namili dondol lifilafi.”
Aman anamba na'i nondanda' agol ananigili atogol gondape bo'wagol. Ea' na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Epes sagape felefele'ma ae'i, esis ami?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana anif basef na'i, “Anona aman nakwaha Jerusalem nafe' niliana Jeriko. Ea' anom manda' wali matolona ufia'w, mandolaepana hiahaom hiami luwaguf maim ananimi mahana kwapete'. Amom manda'am na'amba makwahona mafe'. Anen nandati si'i nagaga'i.
Nemaf afamba anona aman pris naila ufia'w akwamba nafe'. Owa' nati aman anamba, nindihi'amana naila ufia'w wa'akw nafe'.
Ama main, anona aman wambota Livaii naila ufia'w akwamba nafi'i wapani. Nafi'i nati aman anamba owa', nindihi'amana naila ufia'w wa'ol atogon nafe'.
Owa', anona aman Samariainai naila ufia'w akwamba nafi'i natagama aman anamba. Anen natolona nati owahipina endilisi.

Ea' nafe' felefele'ma anen nakolo'wa wel marasin naloma embel waina melegw ananigwi, ea' nowa'managw. Ea' nasa'mana nawamonana natoma donki ananini nofa'ana nafe' nahaponana nape ipat esis fi'ife' sagapautai ea' na'ipa aman nugumafi ipati ma nugumafiana andeande'.
Ama wafilu anen naso'ana 2 kina aman nugumafi ipat atambai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nimafi aman anamba andeande'. Ama i'i anin moni ine'ini nesa negewalama anona, anef itanimai egwamenan.’”
Jisas na'ipana basef ifimba ea' nahali'ana na'i, “Dei' ina' okom mapomas na'imama? Amam wanom maila ufia'w magafi'ii, amom ami nanda'as si'i aman nagape felefele'ma aman anamba amam awami magahanai?”
Ea' nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Aman anamba Samariainai nati anen uwahipina natopalopana.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fo'o nenda'am na'amba atin.”
Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' ufia'w, ea' nataga anambel wambel nafe' nawis. Ea' ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Marta kofa'ana kwafe' ipat akwa'utai.
Owama'w akwa'u'wi agili'wa Maria. Maria kwafi'i kwape felefele'ma bo'wagah Dembinai, kwame' basef ananifi.

Apa' Marta kwanda' maol hiani ma kwagandondomba gwa'aimi. Nomonas akwa'usi sandapoma mamimami. Ea' kwafe'ma Jisas kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' netelowe uwahipiwi. Owame ae'akwi kwa'waha ae' atowe anda' maola agandondomba gwa'aisi. Ina' kipa'w kufi'i kotopalope.”
Owa' Dembinai nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Marta, Marta, ina' okom mandapoma mamimami ma nembel ine'imbili nafe' aona ma hiahaom hiami.
Apa' hiahawes fasisi atifis ina' ata' akena. Maria kwa'i kofa' hiahawes isimba fasisi sikila' anis daias. Ina anin epen la'ifinama negelefata hiahawes isimba bu'wasi ma ako'w, owa'.”
Anef nemaf Jisas nandabeten nape anagon. A'i owa' nandabetena hi'alan, anona alipunai ananinai na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' nihimba'mafa ondabeten si'i fowa' Jon nigihimba'ma alipumi ananimi.”

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Afamba ipa' pi'i pendabeten, ipa' piga'ias na'amba pi'i, Ahamapa, apa' ma'i agol ine'igili gondape hilili' ma hiasi sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol. Ma'i nemaf afamba bu'wafi fifi'i ma epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol ine'ini nepe Dembinai nugumafias.
Dei' ina' nese'apa gwa'aisi sondahama nemaf afa'e.
Ina' nekwahomapa waf awafi ape'ifi okom mose'enaf. Dei' main? Apa' wapani makwahomasa waf awafi anis sanda'mapafi ukup paso'apaf. Ina' owa'i ne'wapa mefe'ma hiahaom ahifimi mogogwamba ape'ia.”
Ea' na'ipam anif basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anona aman alipunai ipe'inai nefe' niga'ipa alipunai ananinai owamb amanota niga'i, ‘O alipunai, ina' se'e bret wanifita
ma igimafi alipunai ae'anai nafi'i natagama ae', apa' ae' gwa'aisi ake ma igimafiana.’

Owa', aman anamba napani ipat nomon nagwai basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'ma negase'e noma'w ae', owa'. Ae' awasi sa'oh ea' ao'was ma'oh alahis. Ae' ina la'ifiwi ma esafel egase'ena gwa'aisi, owa'.’ Dei' nonda'as ni'imama?

Ae' a'ipipa, aman ipat atambainai ina okom mapomana na'i aman anamba alipunai ananinai ma nosafel nogaso'an gwa'aisi, owa'atin. Anen okom iwanima nagame' aman anamba falafala atapina nagapomana. Isimba atis dei' nosafel naso'ana hiahaom hiami anen waowaolomi.
“Dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' pihali' Goda, atiasi nogase'epa hiahawes. Isimba ipa' pala pilaomasi, atiasi a' pitilis. Ipa' peha uta, atiasi God nuwisi'mipata ipa'.
Dei' main, epes ami sogahali' Godi, sofa' maefah. Epen ami nela negelaoma hiahawesi, atiasi higatilisi. Ea' epen ami negaha utai, atiasi God nuwisi'manata anin.
“I'i anin awani nigahali' ahaman ananini nogaso'an anol aol, anen ina atiasi noso'an anol ul awali, owa'atin.
I'i awani nihali' ahamana nogaso'ana anomb kohomb, atiasi noso'an anol aunil awali? Isimba wapani, owa'atin.
Ea' ipa' amam nematawa aupai pagaso'asa hiahawes fasisi atisa awasi ipe'isii, ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni anen wapani atiasi noso'asa Ambal bu'winai ananinai isimba sagahali'anai.”
Jisas anona ambal aunai nape nagasopama malogol anona amani. Nafa' nafe', ea' aman anamba ambo'ona noga na'i. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi ukup hiahawep papoma isimba.
Owa' anis epes sa'i, “Anen natofa ambagof awami ma banagami anona ambal aunai mamana agilinama Belsebul.”
Apa' anis epes sa'i sogwambana sofalana sa'i anen ata' nonda' anin maol banagani nagafi'i heveni ma sitilin sogogawa endilisi God natopalopana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.

Owa' anen nogawa ukup asasipi na'ipas na'i, “I'i anis epes hiasi sagape itap lu'upa anin kantri sondatopa' biafis sogapa', ina atiasi banages, owa'. I'i anis epes wambota atota sondatopa' biafisa sogapa', esis ina atiasi banages sopa', owa'atin.

I'i wambota Satani sondawal biafis sogapa', atiasi wambota atamba atotota banages sopa' si'imama? Owa'atin. Ipa' pa'i ae' atofa ambagof awami ma banagami ambal aunai mamana Belsebul. Na'amba ae' dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba.

I'i endilisi ae' atofa ambagof awami ma banagami Belsebuliai, dei' ami newa' banaga alipumi ipe'imi motofa ambagof awami? Owa'atin. Ea' dei' alipumi ipe'imi mihimba'mepa basef ifimba ipe'ifi owa' endilisifia.
Banagami Godi atom matopalopa ae' atofa ambagof awami. Ea' dei' ipa' pegawa nemaf afamba epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias afataga ma ipa' ea'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas anif basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anona aman banagonai nohapila wambawa maim banagona nogapoma ipat ananitai andeande', hiahawes ananisi hiasi sope andeande'.

Apa' i'i anona aman banagona a'owa'i nigikila' aman nanumba ma anen notaga dindinapina nifi'i nonda' wandaf nolomana nondolaepana wambawa maim aman anamba nagawamona okomami, dao' a' nofa' hiahaom ananimi nowalogam mefe'ma anom amam daiam.
“Epen ami owa' alipini ae'ani owa' nepe atapin negaloma ae'ia, anin bouni ae'ani. Ea' epen ami owa' nekolasa sipsip pogaloma ae'apia, inimba nagatofa sipsip pafa' pagafe' atona bianai.

“Nemaf afamba anona ambal aunai nakwaha anin epen nawisi nagafi'i, anen nafe' anamba fatauguma nolaoma anagon na'i nogapoma noma'wa. Nolaomagona owa' niti anagona, ea' ni'i, ‘Ae' itanima efe' ipat fowa' agapautai.’
Ea' nafi'i nati ipat atamba asambehata andeande' sofalo'mata tape.

Ea' notanima nafe' nao'wai ambagof deiagof awagufi 7-pelaiguf wapani mafi'i mawis mape ipat atamba. Ambagof amamba awami a'owa' manda' waf awafii fikila' waf awafi fowa' nali' nanda'afi. Fowa' epen inimba ata' nape awen kwasakwasala, apa' dei' nape awen nikila' endilisi poe fowa' nali' nagapaini.”

Jisas ata' na'i basef ifimba atin owa', anis epes hiasi safi'i salipana. Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape la'afena esis kwa'i na'amba kwa'i, “Nemata'w akwamba fowa' kogolaena ma kwagase'ena nomambeh ine'i, ako'w kwandagala.”
Owa' Jisas na'i, “Owa'atin. Ipa' amam nematawa pagame' basef Godi ma pagagi'mafi, ipa' pandagala ea'.”

Amam nematawa hiasi safi'i sandakolasi sape, Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i, ipa' epes aupai. Dei' pefalagama pa'i pigati anin ametal banagani. Apa' ae' owa'atina enda'an pigatilina, owa'atin. Ametal inimba fowa' God nigihimba'manan Jonai atin atiasi ihimba'mepan ipa'.

Anona profet Jonai nataga si'i anin ametal nihimba'ma esis amam nematawa Ninivaisi. Ea' na'amba atina ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ataga ape si'i anin ametal Godi ma ipa' amam nematawa pagape nogota ata'i.

Anaf God nogawaloga epesafi, nemaf afamba ano'w nemata'w kwin dembe'wi kwagapani gani wa'ol awin negemba'mai kosafel koloma ipa' pagape na'ai kola' basef fitanima filipa kwi'i ipa' aupai. Dei' main, kwin akwamba kwapani gani itap pafe' pegetambela, ea' kwafi'i kwame basefa gawa lu'wani dembinai king Solomon nagawalipasani. Apa' dei' anona nigikila' Solomoni nape na'a'e.

Afamba God nogawaloga esis amam nematawafi esis epes Ninivaisi sosafel sola' basef fitanima filipa ma waf awafi ipa' panda'afi. Dei' main? Esis Ninive same' basef Godi Jona naga'ipasafi, ea' sambema nelelemb sakwaha waf awafi safe'ma God. Apa' dei' anona aman nigikila' Jonai nape na'a'e.
“Epes ina sokata lambeh nomon ifagw sosapa'am sombaho'am mofe' lafela maloh, owa'atin. Esis sakatambeh hatoma belitagw ilifa suwis sogati haugun.
Naep nomon ukup ipe'ipi si'i lama alop si'ip ipe'ipi. I'i ukup ipe'ipi be'ep pepe, alop si'ip ipe'ipi pogala' hi'ilap. Apa' i'i ukup ipe'ipi awasip, atiasi alop ipe'ipi hi'ilap ea' akutina.
Dei' ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba nogogala'i nagape nomona ipe'i a' akotina.
I'i alop ipe'ipi pogala' hi'ilap, ina anagon kwaia'agon akotigin, owa'. Ea' atiasi alop ipe'ipi pogala' hi'ilap a'owa' si'i lambeh hatoma hogala' hogahihimipa.
Jisas nanda' basef ifimba ma main, anona aman dembinai Farisi nofalana na'i nifi'i nea' gwa'aisi nolomana. Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat natoma tebol.
Farisi anamba nati anen nafe' nape na' gwa'aisi owa' nosa'opa lagof fuli' si'i waf amom Farisi magagi'mafia. Ea' anen okom hiahaom mapoma waf afamba.
Owa' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ipa' Farisi, ipa' pandombasa kapi plet ande'esa atis hilili'. Apa' nomon owa'. Ipa' opalef nomon si'ipama waf walifi faloma anef waf awafi daiaf wapani.
Ipa' epes ukup pagahipai. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God nanda' hiahaom ande'ema, nomonema wapani.
Apa' hiahaom magala nomon kahi plegw ipe'isii, amamba ipa' penda'am pese' epes kwahusi petopalopas. I'i ipa' penda'as na'amba, atiasi hiahawes hiasi ipe'isi ambe'es hilili'.

“Ipa' Farisi uwahipipa ma akafimi atiasi mogatagamipai. Ipa' pandawaloga nambawai lombo maloma akwal lalilali hiali paso'ana du'wanil ilifunamail God. Apa' ipa' a' pindihi'ama waf bu'wafi usi'ifi ukup pagapagaila Godafi ukup pase'epaf fape. Waf afamba feloma waf pindalali pegaso'ana hiahawes mais Godafi, afamba pekolefaf pihapilaf atin pilaf.

“Ipa' Farisi, ae' a'i uwahipipama akafimi nimanimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamipai! Ukup ipe'ipi pasa'mepa pa'i pendape nogohnaep epesi nomon ifagw pandakolasugwi ma esis amam nematawa sondagalaipa sonda'mepa nemaf bu'wafi ipa' anamba epes hiasi sandatama sagapoma.
“Ae' a'i uwahipipa endilisi ma nimanimi akafimi anaf mogatagamipai! Ipa' si'i matmat tape tandambaho' itap nomoni epes ina sogawata, owa', esis satoma safe' ilif ande'etama.”
Anona aman nagawalipasa mu'uli Godi nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'ias na'amba, nasapagafa na'i afa' wapani epes aufai.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii, ae' a'i owahipigama ipa' wapani ma akafimi nimanimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa. Ipa' panda' hiahaom nimanimi matoma magapai' esis amam nematawai, noma'w nagahasi. Apa' ipa' owa' petopalopas pefa' nimanimi amamba lagof ipe'igufia, owa'atin endilisi.
“Ae' a'i uwahipipama nimanimi akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Esis a'mes ipe'isi saha amom profet maga', ea' ipa' pefalo'ma matmat amamutai.
Waf afambai fawalapa basef alihif fa'i ipa' pa'i aho'ma esis saha amom profet fowa'imi magaga'. Ea' dei' pefalo'ma matmat amamutai,
panda'as na'amba si'i anif basef fagail ano'w buk sa'ukwi saga'i gawa Godi fa'i, ‘Anaf ae' esapa' anom profet moloma aposel mefe'mago esis, asoha anom moga' ea' anom sonda'am kwapete'am.’
Ea' dei' amam nematawa nogota ata'isi, anaf God noso'as nimanimi ma kofagema amamba sagaha profet hiami afum hi'agalam fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' ilif itap ea' nafi'i nataga nogota ata'e.
Nagali'i Abel nafi'i natagama profet Sekaraia sahana afuna la'afena ipat lu'unai Godi naloma belita saofa mafis sagaso' Goda. Amamba kofagema atiasi mila ipa' atipa dei' pagape itap apa'i.

“Ipa' amam gawaipai pegegawa mu'uli Godi, ae' a'i uwahipipa ma nimanimi akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamipai. Ipa' a' pelefata ki inimba pegefa' gawani. Ipa' atipa ina pawisi' uta pawis nomon, owa'. Ipa' pahefa ufia'wa anis sa'i sogawis nomoni.”
