Ea' nakwaha ipat atamba nawis ando', amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom Farisi a' wandafum kwapete'am a'owa' ma mogasapagana basef anen. Amom ma'i mogwamba malogol ananigili ma basef fafifafi.
Amom mape matiti anen atapim ma'i mome' anen noga'i anif basef fegataga malogol ananigili ma monda'mana kot.

Anis amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' safi'i sunduwa'anima dogw endilisi sandafafa'asanima atin bo'wagah asasigahi. Ea' Jisas nali' na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' pindimafuma andeande'ma yis amom Farisii. Basef kofagefa ma yis isimba fa'i waf baso'afi maga'i malogof biagufi.
Hiahaom mape mandambahi'i, anef nemaf a' motaga alihim alihigima. Hiahaom mandagigil magapani, anef nemaf epes sogawa amamba.
Ea' basef hiafi ipa' panda'ef akoti atiasi seme'ef alip. Ea' basef ipa' hikihika' atin panda'ef ifagw nomoni, atiasi sotoma ifagw ando' sowalapef fefe'.
“Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' a'ipipa na'amba. Ipa' owa'i ombel mehepama anom amam moha alop atop pogaga'ia ma anaf amom ina la'ifima monda' anin mae wapani, owa'atin.

Apa' ae' ata' i'ipipa aman ipa' ombal begahepamanai. Anamba nohepa pegaga'i, ea' anaf wapani banagonai ma nogakwahipa pegafe' wambel awambili hel. Aho', ae' a'ipipa, ipa' a' ombal begahepamanai, aman anamba atona.
“Ipa' pegawa, epes satala amiguf sa'usi wanis bias otamba 2 toea. Apa' God ina okom maso'ana anin amil sa'uni na'ambaini, owa'.
Endilisi, anen niamba awif hiafi fagala balagah ipe'igahi dondo' hi'alef. Ea' ipa' owa'i ombal mehepaea. Anen okom mapoma ipa' apikila' amiguf hiagufi agwafomba sa'ugufi.
“Ae' a'ipipa, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Epen ami newalapa agol ae'agili ma amam nematawa hiasi, anaf ae' ewalapa agol epen inimbai ma naep amom ensel Godi.
Apa' epen ami negase'e alafuga ae'i naep amam nematawai, bola ae' ese'an alafuga anin naep amom ensel Godi.

Epen ami nenda' anif basef awafi findiwaefa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, bola God a' nokwahomana awami amamba ananimi. Apa' epen ami nenda' basef findiwaefa Ambal bu'unai Godi, anaf God owa'atin endilisi ma nogakwaha findiwa anamba aunai ma epen inimbaia.

Nemaf afamba atiasi esis sofa' ipa' pefe' pigawis ifagw amamba esis Juda sandakolasugwi a'a sofa'epa pegafe'ma naep amom agufumi sonda'mepa kot, ipa' ina ombal behepa, owa'i. Ipa' ina api'i, ‘Atiasi apa' mogwa basef mi'imama? Atiasi monda' basef maif?’ Owa'i.
Dei' main, nogota atamba atota Ambal bu'unai Godi nihimba'mepa basef maif atiasi pegagwaefi.”
Anona aman atotona ma amam nematawa hiasi anen na'ipa Jisas na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ina' ni'ipa sahome ae'anai nowaloga hiahaom amamba ahamafai nese'e wa'am.”
Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' andaiwa'! Ami nandandepa ae' ma epe igahihi'a ipa' egawalogepa hiahawesa ipa'? Owa'atin.”
Ea' anen na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma ipa' ina kowolepama anom hiahaom. Epen hiahaom hiamin a'owa'i, ina nefa' ambal namili ma hiahaom amamba ananimi, owa'atin.”
Ea' naso'asa anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Aof anona aman otamba hiambainai fola gwa'aisi hiasi.
Aman anamba okom mandapoma nembel ananimbili atembel na'i, ‘Dei' ae' ata' enda'as i'imama? Ae' ifagw ake ma etama gwa'aisi ae'asi hiasi imbilas soga'ome.’
“Ea' na'i, ‘Ae' enda'as na'amba. Igulata ifagw ae'agwi a' ila' dambaigwi lu'wagwi gwikila' fowa'igwi. Ama atiasi ikolasai gwa'asi wit hianai noloma hiahaom hiami fasimi ae'ami moga'oh ifagw agwamba.
Ea' i'ipa ae' i'i, “Ae' egape andeande'i. Hiahaom hiami fasimi mope mondahama afagof hiagufi. Ea' dei' epoma noma'w ea' gwa'aisii embel sonehe endape.”’

“Owa' God na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' aman owa' negegawa andeande'ia. Dei' owamb amba'e ae' igi ambal ine'ili a' nega'. Ea' hiahaom amamba hiami ina' nanda'am nandondombam maga'ihi, amamba atiasi ami nefa'am?’
“Amamba na'amba atin si'i epes satama hiahaom hiami asasimi atom sagambilami. Esis hiahawes akasa naep Godi.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina nomonas solasefe' hiahiasa ambagof ipe'igufi ea' pi'i, ‘Apa' ata' mea' main?’ Owa'i. Ipa' ina nomonas solasefe' hiahiasa alop ipe'ipi pi'i, ‘Atiasi apa' monda' main mombaho' alop ape'ipi?’ Owa'i.
Dei' main, ambagof afof ina gwa'aisi atis. Ea' alop ina luwaguf atif, owa'atin.

Ipa' ukup pepoma amiguf. Afof owa' fowa gwa'aisi wita, owa' fotama gwa'aisi fimbilasa. Afof ifagw akagofa fotama gwa'aisi soga'oh. God atona naso'agof wali'ita. Apa' ipa' epes pikila' amiguf agwafomba endilisi.
Ipa' atiasi ami la'ifin nomonas solasefe' lawisa nigiwatania anef nemaf wapani ma ambal ananili logape nogota laota wapani? Owa'atin.
I'i ipa' owa' la'ifipama penda' anis maefah sa'usa'usi na'ambaea, dei' maina ipa' ata' nomonas salasagafe' hiahiasa anom maefah mamimami daiam?

“Ipa' ata' ukup pepoma afis. Esis ina sanda' maol ina sanda' luwaguf mais, owa'atin. Apa' ae' a'ipipa, fowa' anona aman hiahaom hiamunai Solomon nanda' sosaf hianai ma luwaguf ananimi, owa' sosaf ananifi ina fasif si'i afis isimba, owa'atin.

Aho', otalef afalemba dei' ata' fetawa aof ama naman atef sotopa'alef sokwahelef fefe' nif. Otalef afalemba falafilifi God nofalo'malef. Apa' ipa' amam nematawa pikila' otalef afalemba. Ea' dei' ipa' pagahapifa basef Godi kwasakwasalai, ipa' pendegawa endilisi anen nugumafipa andeande' wapanii.
Ea' ipa' ina nomonas solasefe' hiahias pi'i, ‘Atiasi mea' gwa'aisi embel mais?’ Owa'i. Ipa' ina nomonas iwanis solasefe'ma hiahawes isimbai, owa'.
Epes sagape itapi sogolalama Godi esis ukup malamondafe' a'owa' ma sogolaoma hiahaom amambai hiami. Apa' ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni anen nogawa ea' hiahawes mamahisa akipai.
Apa' ipa' ata' ukup pili' pelapelaoma waf usi'ifi bu'wafi feloma pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa pili', dao' a' nese'epa hiahawes isimba ipa' wapani.
“Ipa' epes si'i mini'ap bandapi sipsipi, ipa' ina ombel behepa, owa'i. Ahamepa ipe'inai okom bo'oma ipa' pefe' pigawis nomona maol ananini ma nope Dembinai nugumafipa.

Ipa' pese'asa hiahaom hiami ipe'imi ma anis epes daias sotalomipam, ea' pefa' otamba pewalogamba peso' isimba kwahusi petopalopas. Ipa' penda' maol pelaoma paos otambaisi anaf owa' folo'ogolasia. Ipa' pekolasa otamba uga maim hiahaom fasimi atom heven anaf owa' higiligalamia. Anamba epes isimba sanda' wali ina safe' felefele', totoloh mais owa' sohambombaga maefaha, owa'.
Dei' main, wambel mamahembela hiahawes fasisi ipe'isi saga'oma, anamba atogon anaf ukup ipe'ipi wapani pegapoma.
“Ipa' penda' luwaguf ipe'ifi bandef, a pewaho' legw, ea' pekata lambeh pendondombol silisilawi pepe.
Ipa' pendape si'i epes sape sagasasa aman dembinai asasinai na'i nokwaha gwa'aisi lu'wasi sandaso'amai notanima nogafi'i. I'i nifi'i noha uta ipat ananitai, esis suwisi'manota kwafalis.

Andeande'ma amom manda' maoli silisilawi mope mugati dembinai amamunai nifi'i notoloma sonogaham. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, atiasi dembinai nili' nowaho' lowaf bandaf nowaho' let, ama nonda'mam gwa'aisi. Ea' ni'ipam motoma tebol anen nifi'i nogaso'ama gwa'aisi.
Anen nifi'i amanota la'afitama a'a noloma awatagw guli' gugatai, a'a nogota mamahotama, ma niti amom silisilawi mogapoma, sonoham.

“Ipa' ukup pepoma anif basef waminif atini. I'i ahama ipati nili' nogawa nogota nanda' wali nogafi'atai ma silisilawi nogape, nanda' wali ina atiasi nifi'i nupisila ipat ananitai nuwis nomon, owa'atin.
Ipa' wapani silisilawi pendape. Dei' main? Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ifi'i anef nemaf ipa' ina atiasi pegawa pi'i ifi'i ulal nemaf afamba, owa'.”
Ea' Pita na'i, “Dembinai, basef ifimba waminif atini ina' naso'afaef afa' atofa, a'a esis amam nematawa hiasi wapani?”

Ea' Dembinai na'i, “Ipa' hipai penda' waf bu'wafi si'i anamba nugumafi amom manda' maoli okom bu'wami mapaona nanda' maol andeande' datimai. Aman anamba dembinai ananinai nandandepana ma nugumafi ananimi manda' maoli ma nogaso'ama gwa'aisi amom nogota dondo'atai.
Anaf dembinai ananinai notanima nogafi'i ma niti aman anamba nanda' maol andeande', dao' aman anamba sonohana.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, dembinai ananinai anaf nondandepana nope dambena nugumafi hiahaom hiami ananimi hi'igalam.

Apa' i'i aman anamba okom magapoma opaf ananifi atof a' ni'i, ‘Dembinai ae'anai ina atiasi nifi'i ulal, owa'atin.’ Ama anen nosafel noha anis amam nematawa sanda' maoli, nonda' gwa'aisi embel da gwa' nonda' spak nogape.

Anen i'i nonda'as na'amba ma, Dembinai ananinai atiasi notanima nifi'i anef nemaf apa' aman anamba ina atiasi ni'i Dembinai nifi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Dembinai nogafi'i nifi'i nogota atamba anen okom mogaso'anatama. Nifi'i nohambombaga aman anamba endilisi, ea' nonda'ana nope noloma epes owa' sohahapifa Godi sagapoma.
“Epen mamahina nanda' maola anini, anin negawa ea' ma okom dembinai ananinai, apa' anin owa' nendondomba hiahawes nila nomonas dembinaiia, anaf dembinai nohan mehip a'owa'.

Apa' epen mamahina nanda' maoli owa' negawa okom dembinai ananinaia ma nenda' waf fendahama afamba negefa' akafimiafi, atiasi dembinai nohan sa'ombel. Ea' epes mamahisa anis daias sogaso'asa hiahaom hiami saso'as sugumafiami, anaf epes isimba si'ipas sogwamasam wapani mikila' fowa' sali' sagaso'asami.
“Ae' afi'i ma egawaho' nif itap apa'e ea' a'i nif ifimba dei' a' fendandif lu'uf. Owa', ata' owa'.
Ea' ae' okom ma'i efa' anin sa'of. Dei' ae' owa' ata' efa'ana, nembel ae'ambili nimanimbil endilisi.
Ipa' pa'i ae' afi'i ma igahagofa wandaf hiafi fogaga' itap ama hiasi sogape opalef awanelef? Owa'atin. Ae' a'ipipa, ae' afi'i ma egawala mini'ap esis amam nematawa.
Ama dei', a anaf wapani epes wanis bias sogape ipat atotota wambota atototai asondatopa' biefis. Wanis soloma bias sifitap ea' bias sofala wanis si'i bousi ea' na'amba atin.

Atiasi esis sondatopa', anona aman noloma ahamana ananinai mondatopa' biafim, ea' ano'w nemata'w koloma ma'ma'w ondatopa' biafiwa, ea' mefi'ma'w ako'ukwi koloma ma'ma'w kwandagi'mo'wi ondatopa' biafiwa. Esis atiasi sondatopa' na'amba.”
Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa wapani na'i, “Ipa' pagati otaga gogatafi gani awin negewalama, kwafalis ipa' pegawa pa'i, ‘Asaf fa'i afelai.’ Ea' asaf afalai, endilisi.
Ipa' pati fufin banagani nagafi'i awin nagatopa'ima nagataga, ipa' pegawa pa'i, ‘Atiasi owaf a' nuluwi banagona.’ Endilisi atis, faluwi banagef na'amba atin.
Ipa' epes paga'i malogof biagufi! Ipa' pati ametal hiani ilifani itapani andeande', apa' dei' ipa' owa' pegawa ametal nogota ata'ili andeande'a.”
“Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegegawa andeande'ma pegawaloga waf usi'ifi? Endilisi, ipa' pegawaf a' pendawalogaf andeande'.

Afamba ipa' pefe' pegaloma epen inimba na'i nendakotimipai, ipa' ata' pefe' pigail ufia'w, nogota atamba atota penandona basef ifimba peloman. Na'amba anin a' nenda' ipa' pepe penda' kot. Ea' nanda' koti noso'ama ipa' pefe'ma amom polisman a' monda'epa penda' kalabus.
Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina atiasi pekwaha ipat atamba sanda' kalabusatai ulal, owa'. Ama pegwa hiahaom lu'wami sa'umi ma wiaf ipe'ifi hi'ilaf dao', a pefe'.”
Nemaf afamba atef anis epes sape sa'ipa Jisasa anis epes Galilisii. Nogota atamba esis sape sondolali ma God sanda' ofa atin, gavman dembinai Pailat nahas saga'.

Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Ipa' ukup pandanda'mas pa'i epes isimba Galilisi sagaga'i, asikila' anis epes Galiliisi daias sanda' waf awafi, ama kofagema amamba atom dei' sofa' nimanimi saga'? Owa'atin.
Ae' a'ipipas usi'is. Owa'atin endilisi! I'i ipa' owa' pembema nelelemba waf awafi ipe'ifia, anaf ipa' hipai pega' higililipa na'amba atin si'i esis.
Dei' si'i maina anis epes isimba 18-pelais wambel Siloam ipat lautai tato tasindifasa afis hi'agalas, isimba ipa' pa'i waf awafi asasifi afikila' waf awafi isimba anis daias sagape Jerusalami?
Owa'atin. Ipa' owa' pembema nelelemba hiahaom awami ipe'imia, anaf ipa' hipai apega' na'amba atin si'i esis.
Ea' Jisas nawalapa anif basef waminif atini na'i, “Anona aman nawa anoga lawag fik aof ananifi nagawa waina, ama main nafi'i nowando'ma sa'utipa lawag agamba, owa' owa'atin.

Ea' na'ipa anen nanda' maol aof afambai na'i, ‘Neme'. Afagof wanogof ae' afi'i ilaoma sa'utip lawag agamba fik, owa' owa'atin. Na'amba dei' ina' laga. Dei' maina gotawa gogofa' ifat atota itap dowadowaf?’
Ea' anen nanda' maol aofi nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ina' ata' kwahowaga gope afagol agale'e atogol. Ama ata' ila' itap peloma omba bulmakaum isimbe'aga.
Ama iti atiasi gil gola sa'utip afagol agale'e a'a owa', i'i owa', dao' ina' a' nelaga.’”
Nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi Jisas na'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa anota ipat Juda sandakolasatai nomon.
Ea' ano'w nemata'w ambal aunai nagapau'wi kwape, ambal anamba aunai naso'akw aowas ako'w nanda'a'w nape afagof 18-pelaiguf ea' alafuga akwa'ugai gondala'akw, ina kosafel kwalutu andeande', owa'atin.
Jisas natolo'w nofala'w kwafi'i na'ipa'w na'i, “Nemata'w, ae' a' atofa aowas ine'ini ea' nape wahifina.”
Anen nasa lagol ananigili nemata'w akwamba ea' kwafalis atis kwalutu usi'ikw. Ea' kwasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.

Owa' aman anamba dembinai nugumafi ipat lotuwi nembel wandafimbila Jisas nanda'a'w bo'okw nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi. Ea' anen na'ipa esis amam nematawa na'i, “Nimaguf ifimba wanif wanif maolifi. Ea' dei' ipa' pi'i aman anamba notofamepa aowas ipe'ini, andeande'ma pigafi'i nemaf maolifi. Apa' ipa' ina pifi'mai maol inimba ma nemaf magapoma noma'wafi, owa'i.”

Ea' Dembinai nagwamana basef na'i, “Ipa' amam paga'i malogof biagufi! Peme! Nemaf magapoma noma'wafi ipa' hipai pafe' ifagw bulmakauwi ma pagatagwaha bulmakau maloma donki ipe'imi pao'wam mafe' maga' embel.

Apa' nemata'w akwamba ako'w kwagataga ambep Abrahami, owa' Satan a' nahipa'w sisihi'w kwape afagof 18-pelaiguf. Ea' dei' nemaf afamba magapoma noma'wafi ae' a'i etagwaha mandof fogowa'a'wi ma kogape wahifi'w.”
Jisas na'ias na'amba, nanda' esis bousi ananisi ambagof aom kwapete'. Apa' amam nematawa hiasi asonahas endilisi ma hiahaom bu'wami banagami hiami anen nanda'ami.
Ea' Jisas na'ias wapani na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i main? Ae' indila'waifam i'imama?

Amamba si'i analef nalelef sa'usa'ulifi apa' mofalas maga'i masteti. Anona aman nofa' nalelef afalemba nawalef aof ananifi. A'i owa' main, mataga malo si'i lawah lu'ugahi ea' amiguf fafi'i fala' owah fatoma agufugaha.”
Ea' Jisas na'ias wapani na'i, “Ae' a'i indila'waifa epes sogawis nomona maol Godi i'imama?
Ae' indila'waifama, anis yis ano'w nemata'w kofa'as kwambemas saloma plaua hiami magala dram lu'wamii. A'i owa' main, a' matef lu'um.”
Jisas nafe' walemb hiagoma lu'wagoma sa'ogoma bagape felefele'ma ufia'w kwagafe' Jerusalami nanda' maol nawalipa esis amam nematawa, ea' nafe' okom ma'i nefe' Jerusalem ea' nafe'.
Owa' anona aman na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ihali'ina ma epes isimba anaf God nofa'as sogotanimai. Isimba hiasi a'a kwaia'wis?” Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i,
“Ipa' pewa' banaga bihitagof ipe'igufi banagagof endilisi, pefe' pigawis uta sa'usa'utai. Dei' main, epes hiasi atiasi si'i suwis nomon, apa' owa' la'ifisa.

Atiasi ahama ipati nosafel nowalowa uta ipat atamba. Ea' ipa' pifi'i pilutu peha uta ando' falafala na'amba pi'i, ‘Dembinai, usi'mapai uta.’ “Ea' nogwai basefa ipa' ni'ias ni'i, ‘Ipa' animaipai? Ae' owa' egawepaea.’
Ea' pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Apa' mape ma' gwa'aisi embel magalomena, nalutu nawalapa basef naga'ipapa walemb ape'ilimbi.’
Owa' anen nogwa basef ni'i, ‘Ipa' animaipai? Ae' owa' egawepaea. Ipa' panda' waf awafii, ipa' hipai delefata hi'ilipa pekwaha ae'.’

“Anaf ipa' piti Abrahami Aisak Jekop moloma profet amamba hiami hi'ilam mope anamba God nagala'ambemagoma nomon, apa' ipa' owa'. Ipa' nogalo'mepa pepe ando'. Anamba pelef penda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' pepe.
Ea' esis amam nematawa sifi'i gani awin nagatafima nogowalama noloma anamba wa'owa'ol esis a sope sea' gwa'aisi anamba God nagala'ambemagoma.
Aho' endilisi, anis epes dei' sataga sagagi'i agof akasi, anaf a' agof fotomas sotaga sili'. Apa' anis dei' sataga sagali'i agof fagatomasi anaf agof akas asotaga sigi'.”
Nogota atamba atota anom amam Farisi mafi'mai Jisas ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' nekwaha wambel ambale'e fo'o anagon. Dei' main, Herot na'i nehena nega'.”

Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fo'o pi'ipa aman anamba nanda' uhufi si'i nombat aluputai pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dei' a naman wapani ae' ambagof amamba awami magape epesi, ea' enda' esis epes awasisi bo'wes. I'i owa' nemaf fegafe'ma wanifi hi'ilaf, imbifa maol ae'ani hi'ilan.’ Ipa' piga'ipana na'amba.
Apa' dei' naman bimb ae' efe' enda' maol inimba. Ina andeande'ma esis soha anona profet nogaga' anambel wambel daiambel, owa'atin. Sohana noga' Jerusalem atogon.

“O ipa' Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ipa' pagaha amom profet afumi, pakwaha otamba pagaha amom God nasapa'am magafe'ma ipe'i, lifilafi ae' a'i ekolasa ipa' epes hipai si'i awata numa'itai towa'ani nogagwi takolasagw gopasol gwagail bihinagof atatigufi. Owa' owa'atin, ipa' pandaiwa'.

Ipa' peme'! Dei' ipat bu'utai a wambel ipe'imbili atiasi wafita totawa dowaf. Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina atiasi petolowe wapani ma anaf piga'i, ‘Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma aman anamba nagafi'i agol Dembinaii ma nogaso'ana banagami ananimi.’”
Anef nemaf esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi Jisas nafe' naloma anona aman Farisi na' gwa'aisi ipat ananitai. Ea' esis sanda'ana naep di'indi'ana endilisi.
Anona aman lagufi bo'wagah sagalotawana kwapete'i nape Jisas nogohnaepinama.
Ea' Jisas nati aman anamba, nahali' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom Farisi na'i, “A'i afa' onda' aman aowas nanda'anai bo'ona nemaf afamba magapoma noma'wafi, a'a owa'?”
Owa' amom masopama malogof. Ea' nofa' aman anamba nanda'ana bo'ona nasapa'ana nafe'.

Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “I'i anona aman ipe'inai awani ananini a'a anona bulmakau ananisi sogowala hul embelili nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi, a'i aman anamba ahama isimbai nefe' nigiasi kwafalis nemaf afamba a'a owa'? Endilisi, nefe' nigagiasii.”
Ea' amom ina la'ifima mogogwa basef ifimba, owa'atin.
Jisas nati esis safi'mai gwa'aisi isimba sa'i sope siaifah bu'wasi satawa sagali'i bo'wagoma atogini. Ea' na'ipasa basef waminif atin na'i,

“I'i anona aman nogofalepama anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi sonda'asa aman nogaso' nemata'wi ma pegafe', ipa' owa'i pefe' petoma pili' siaifah fasisi amom dembami atom magatomasia, owa'i. Na'amba aman anamba nofo'o nofalai anona aman agol lu'wagilinai gikila' agol ine'igili.
Ama aman anamba nofalena nifi'i ni'ipina ni'i, ‘Ina' kwahomana sia inimba bu'wani aman ana'e.’ Nonda'as na'amba, ina' ambal aona a'owa'. Ea' nonda'ena nefe' nepe nigi'i endilisi alafugah.

Apa' i'i anona aman nogofala ina' nefe' nelomana nega' gwa'aisi, ina' nefe' nepe nigi'i alafugah endilisi. Ina' nenda'as na'amba ma atiasi nofalena niga'i, ‘Alipunai, ina' nifi'i nepe nili' bo'ogoma!’ Anen nonda'as na'amba, dao' atiasi nefa' agol lu'wagili ma naep epes isimba hiasi sa' gwa'aisi sagalominai.
Dei' main, epen mamahina negasa'ma agol ananigili atigili, God nonda'an nisila'. Apa' epen mamahina nenda' agol ananigili gigisila'i, anaf God nosa'ma agola anin.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa aman anamba nagafe'ma gwa'aisi isimbai nahali'ana na'i, “I'i ina' nenda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi a'a sa'usi, ina' owa'i nefala alipisi soloma sahin owan wambota ine'isi a ina' wambel atembel hiahaom hiamisi, owa'i. I'i nenda'as na'amba, anef esis sogofalena ma nefe' nea' gwa'aisi ifagw asasigwi, ea' sogwamena gwa'aisi ine'isi. Owa'.
Ina' i'i nenda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi, nefala isimba awapisi kwahusa hiahaomi, bo'wagah aogahisi naep pagaso'asi.

Epes isimba ina la'ifisa sogogwamena gwa'aisi ina', owa'. I'i ina' nenda'as na'amba, nendagala nepe andeande'. Ea' anaf God nogwamena hiahawes isimba bu'wasi ma nemaf afamba epes isimba sanda' waf bu'wafi sagaga'i sogosafel wapani.”
Anona aman asasinai nagape la'afena esis sa' gwa'aisi sagalomanai name' basef ifimba, na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Epen ami nepe nega' gwa'aisi lu'wasi anamba God nagala'ambemagomai, anin sowenondahan.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana basef waminif atin na'i, “Anona aman na'i nonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi. Ea' nofalai epes hiasi safi'mai gwa'aisi isimba.
Nemaf dondo'afi endilisi ma gwa'aisi isimba fataga, ea' nasapa' anona nanda' maola anini nafe' na'ipa epes isimba fowa' nogofalasi. Ea' na'ipas na'i, ‘Ipa' fi'i. Hiahaom hiami mandandombol mape ea'.’
“Owa' epes isimba hiasi atona atin sosafel sa'i basef sa'i esis ina sofe', owa'. Anona aman na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'ma egafo'o. Ata' efe' itipa'ma aof ae'afi.’
“Ea' anona na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' atala bulmakau ilifunamaima monda' maol mogawala itap, ea' dei' efe' egwambam endondomam. Ea' ae' ina efo'o.’
“Owa' anona daiana na'i, ‘Dei' atef ae' aso' nemata'w. Na'amba ae' ina efo'o, owa'.’

“Aman anamba nanda' maola anini notanima nafe' na'ipa dembinai ananinai ma isimba. Ea' anen ahama ipati nembel wandafuna ea' na'ipa nanda'mana maol ananinii na'i, ‘Ina' kwafalis fo'o ufiawa hiawai lu'uwama sao'wama ma taun inimba ea' nefa'ai isimba falafalafisi, lagof awagufi, alop awasipisi, naep pagaso'asi, bo'wagah aogahisi ina' ne'wasi sifi'i suwisi nomon ipat ae'atai.’

“A'i owa' main, aman anamba nanda' maoli na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' aila basef ine'ifi ea', apa' owa' ati ipat ina dei' si'ita, ata' owa'. Anis siaifah ata' wafis sotawa dowaf. Ipat ina dei' si'ita, ata' owa'.’
“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' fo'o ufiawa hiawai lu'uwama nila indalelemb nefe' aofah ea' nehende'ai esis amam nematawa sifi'i suwisi nomon ipat ae'atai ma si'ita.
Ae' a'ipina endilisi, epes isimba hiasi fowa' ae' egefalasi, esis owa'atin endilisi ma sogofa' gwa'aisi ae'asia.’”
Mini'ap laupi amam nematawa safi'i saloma Jisas, ea' nandambema na'ipas na'i,

“Epen ami nifi'mai ae', ma anin owa' nesambala mamasan waulu'man batawis ananisi soloma sahin owan wambota ananisi, ea' ambal ananili wapani, anin ina atiasi nepe banagen mini'ap ae'api nepe alipini ae'ani, owa'.
Ae' efa' akafimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Epen ami owa' nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae' ma nigailima, epen inimba ina la'ifin netaga alipini ae'ani, owa'atin.

“Anin epen ipe'ini i'i nenda' anota ipat lu'utai togalota ilif, anin nenda'as ni'imama? Anin ata' nope nomonas talambi nili' ma negawa andeande' otamba ambamba ipatimbai. Atiasi otamba ananimbai bendahama ipat atamba hi'igalata a'a owa'?
Apa' i'i owa'atina nenda' isimbai sogali'a, ma nili' nonda' simen atina owa' nonda' ipat atamba hi'ilataea. Atiasi epes hiasi sagatolotai si'i basef sonda'i'ipama aman anamba sonda' findiwana
si'ias si'i, ‘Epen inimba nasefela ipat atamba, apa' anin owa' la'ifin nimbifataea.’

“Anif basef daif wapani ifimba. I'i anona aman dembinai king ni'i nofe' nopa' nogaloma anona king daiana, anen ata' nope okom mondanda'mas andeande'. Soldia ananimi misi'ah ilifunamaih dowaf, apa' king anamba nagagi'i anen nifi'i noloma soldia ananimi misi'ah 20-pelaih hiami. Ea' king anamba nagali'i na'i ata' nili' nogawa na'amba. Anen atiasi nopa' nogaloma king anamba nagagi'i la'ifinama nogali'amonas a'a owa'?
Anen nonda'as na'amba ma nogogawa anen ina la'ifina, dao' boumi ananimi ata' mili laogon, a' nili' nosapa' anom amam mofe'ma anen mofalana monda'ipama basef mi'i wandaf hapaifi.
Ea' ipa' na'amba atin. Ipa' epen ami owa'atina negewa' alafuga ma hiahawes ananisi ma negesambalisa, anin ina atiasi la'ifina negape alipini mini'ap ae'api, owa'atin.
“Ipa' pegawa sol alol fasili. Apa' i'i sol alamba a' lumbula usihila a' akal, owa'atin. Atiasi ipa' penda'al pi'imama usihil wapani? Owa'atin.
Sol alamba ina andeande' bo'ola apa' monda'al aofah, a'a mokwahol logaloma omba bulmakaum, owa'atin. Apa' melefatam mokwahom atin. Epen ami aligah hagalina nagame' basefi, anin a' nindailif.”
Epes hiasi saloma anom amam manda' waf awafi mogofa' takisi saloma anis epes sanda' waf awafii safi'i felefele'ma Jisas same' basefa ananifi.
Ea' anom dembami Farisi maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi manda' megahahama anen ma'i, “Aman anamba nandaloma epes isimba sanda' waf awafii nofalas alipisi nalomas nanda' gwa'aisi.”
Owa' Jisas naso'ama basef ifimba waminif atin na'ipam na'i,

“I'i anona aman ipe'inai numafi anop sipsip 100-pelaip ama anop atotop higililap, aman anamba ata' nokwaha sipsip apamba 99-pelaip pulutu pea' gwa'aisi anagon, anen ata' nefe' nola' nolaoma anona higilagalanai. Nolaomana nafe' nafe' natolona nasa'mana
nowandefana ikaf ananifi, sonahanamana nofa'ana nafi'i.

Nafi'i nataga ipat ananitai, nofalai esis alipisi ananisi saloma esis anen wambel atembel sandakolas atogon. Ea' na'ipas na'i, ‘Ipa' pendagala peloma ae'! Anona sipsip ae'anai higilalana, owa' ae' afa' elaomana itanima ifa'anai ea'.’”

Dei' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ea' na'amba atina esis amam nematawa sagape heveni sandagala kwasakwasala ma epes isimba 99-pelais ambo'wes, ina sanda' waf awafi ma sotanima sogambema nelelemb, owa'. Apa' i'i anin epen nenda' waf awafii ni'i negambema nembel, atiasi esis sagape heveni sondagala a'owa' ma anin.

“I'i ano'w nemata'w anin moni ilifunamain siliva anin atitin higiligalan, atiasi konda' maina kolaoman kogatilin? Ako'w kokata lam kombehagon ipat nomon kolaoman andeande' hi'ilagon kofe' kofe' ma kogatilin.
Ako'w kwatilin ea', kofala esis alipisi wambel akwa'umbili sondakolasi ea' kwi'ipas kwi'i, ‘Ipa' pendagala peloma ae'! Anin moni ae'ani higilalan, owa' dei' elaoman afe' atilin itanima ifa'ani ea'.’
Dei' ae' a'ipipa ea' na'amba atin si'i amom ensel Godi sonogahama anin epen nanda' waf awafii nembema nembel negafe'ma God.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Anona aman nogaopana biam.

Aonama nafe' na'ipa ahamana ananinai na'i, ‘Ahame, ae' okom mapoma otamba mais hiahawes afa' ogafa'asi ma nemaf ina' negaga'. Dei' ae' a'i efa' du'wanis ae'asi. Ina' niwalis biafis newalogamafas afa' biafa. Ae' a'i ina' nese'eas dei'.’ Ea' ahamam nawaloga hiahawes hiasi ananisi safe'ma amom nogaopana biam.

“Ea' a'i owa' main, ina ata' nogota laota aonama nakolasa hiahawes hiasi ananisi nafe' napani anambel wambel lauguni ea' nalalamona hiahaom hiami ananimi ma waf naninani aunai anen nagi'ma okom ananimi ma'iama nanda'ami. Ea' otamba ananimbai hi'alamba ma waf awafi.
Anen nanda' otamba ananimbai ma hi'alamba, a'i owa' main, nogota nolom lu'unai nagahasatama nataga itap apamba hiagoma hi'alagon. Ea' anen hiahawes akana nape wahifina.
Anen nafe' nanda' maola anona aman itap apambainai. Aman anamba nasapa'ana nafe' itap ananipi ma nugumafi bogof ananigufi.
Bogof afamba fa' sa'utip lawahip, ea' anen wapani na'i nea' sa'utip ipimba ma opaf ananifi. Anen ina anis saso'ana gwa'aisi, owa'.
A'i owa' main, okom ananimi mogawa andeande' ea' na'ias na'i, ‘Amam hiami manda' maola ahame ae'anai amom gwa'aisi hiasi a'owa'. Apa' ae' ape na'a'e ame'aga endilisi ma nolomagahe.
Hapaimi, ae' atiasi esafel efe'ma ahame ae'anai. Ea' i'ipana i'i, “Ahame, ae' anda' waf awafi ma God ina' wapani.
Dei' ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma ina' negefala ae' nogamena ine'iwai, owa'. Ina' nenda'e epe si'i anona nanda'mena maoli.”’
“Ea' nosafel nafe'ma ahamana. Owa' anen ata' naili laogon ahamana natolona, nomonas saisailana nasagih nafe' nahapila nogamana ananinai nombalo'ana nasisi' malogol ananigili.
Ea' nogamana na'ipana na'i, ‘Ahame, ae' ea' anda' waf awafi ma God ina' wapani. Ae' ina ata' aman bu'uwai ma ina' negefala ae' niga'i nogamena ine'iwai, owa'atin.’

“Owa' ahamana na'ipa amom manda' maola anini na'i, ‘Ipa' fa'ai lowaf fasifi laufi namifi ae'afi pefa'af pifi'i ulal pewaho'manaf anen. Ea' pelamana anin ring faf ananifi, pelamana su bo'wagah ananigahi.
Fa'ai bulmakau noganai anamba lu'unai gigititi'i pehana ma apa' mea'ana mondagalamana.
Dei' main, nogame anamba ae'anai dolomana si'i nagaga' ea'i, owa' dei' ambal lapaona wapani. Anen higilalana ea', apa' dei' owa' matolona wapani.’ Ea' esis sandagala.
“Apa' nogamana ananinai dembinai naili aof. Ama main, anen nafi'i nataga felefele'ma ipat, owa' name' amalemba sanda' musik sagalemb.
“Ea' nofala anona nanda' maoli nahali'ana na'i, ‘Esis sanda' main?’

“Ea' anen nanda' maoli na'ipana na'i, ‘Owamena ine'inai notanima nafi'i, ea' ahamena ine'inai nandagalamana, na'amba dei' naha anona bulmakau lu'unai. Dei' main, anen notanimai ina ata' nape aona, owa'. Nape andeande'.’
“Owa' nogamana ananinai dembinai okom numbutim ea' nandaiwa'ma nogawis nomon. Ea' ahamana nawisi ando' na'ipana dindina nogawis nomon, apa' owa'.

Anen nagwamana basef ahamana na'i, ‘Afagof hiagufi ae' ahapila maol ine'ini si'i agol ake anda' maol dowafi. Ae' ina esambala basef mu'uli ine'ini anef atetef, owa'. Apa' ina' owa' nese'e anin mae sa'wini dowaf si'i meme nogani ma endagala eloma alipisi ae'asia, owa'atin.
Apa' awani anamba ine'inai anen nalalamona hiahaom hiami ine'imi ea' ma awo nematawa gembaiwai. Ea' dei' notanimai, ina' okom mapomana dei' nahamana bulmakau anamba anen.’
“Ea' ahamana na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogame, dondol lifilafi afa' biafa wagape atogini. Ea' hiahawes ae'asi isimba ine'isi atis.

Apa' dei' afa' ondagala, ea' nelelemb afa'ilimbi bo'walemb. Dei' main, owamena anamba ine'inai fowa' nafe' lauguni si'i nagaga'i, owa' dei' nafi'i nataga ambal lapaona wapani. Anen higilagalanai, owa' dei' afa' watolona wapani.’”

Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Anona aman hiahaom hiamunai nao'wa anona ananinai nugumafi maol ananinii nape. Ea' anis safi'mai aman anamba hiahaom hiamunai sasapaga anen nanda'mana maoli ma basef sa'i, ‘Nugumafi maol ine'inii anen nakwaha otamba hiambai ine'imbai bafe' dowaf.’

“Ea' nofala aman anamba nugumafi maoli nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dei' maina basef ifimba ae' agame'asefa ine'i? Ina' nefe' niamba hiahawes ae'asi sagape lagol ine'igili newalapas. Ina ata' nepe nimafi maol ae'ani wapani, a'owa'.’

“Ea' nugumafi maoli nomonas salasafe' ma nembel ananimbili na'i, ‘Ae' atiasi ata' enda'as i'imama? Dembinai na'i nili'amone ma epe igimafi maol dei'. Ae' ina la'ifiwi ma egawala itap. Ea' ambal aola indaila anis epesa gwa'aisi mais.
Owa' ae' nomonas sandanda'ma anis hiahawes ea' ma enda'asa atiasi epes sofa'e efe' ifagw asasigwi ma nemaf afamba dembinai nigali'amone ma maol inimba dei' anda'ani.’
“Ea' nofala amom hiami atona atin wialef figataomami mafi'mai anen. Anona aman nali' nafi'manai nahali'ana na'i, ‘Ina' wialef ma'ulif fapoma dembinai ae'anai?’
“Ea' anen na'i, ‘Darep wel lu'wapi 100-pelaip.’ Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' kwafalis nepe niti tiketa wiaf nenda' amefa darep 50-pelaip atip fil.’

Ama main, anona nataga nahali'ana na'i, ‘Wialef ine'imi ma'ufim?’ “Anen na'i, ‘Begah witigah 100-pelaigah.’ “Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nefa' tiket atamba wiaf ine'ifi fagailatai ea' nenda' 80-pelaigah.’

“Ea' aman dembinai nasa'ma agola aman anamba aunai nugumafi maoli. Dei' main, anen nanda' waf gawaifi si'i aman nomonas sagapaunai. Epes ukup asasipi pagapagaila hiahawes mais sagape itap apa'ii esis sanda' maola waf gawaifi si'i epes nomonas sagapaisi sikila' epes sagape nogogala'mai owa' sogogawa andeande'ia.”

Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ma moni uga maim maga'oh itap apa'ii, ipa' penda' anis amam nematawa sotaga alipisi ipe'isi. Ama main, i'i nemaf esis sogahapila uga moniafi hi'igalaf, dao' atiasi God ni'i aho'ma nofa'epa pefe' ifagw pegape andeande' lifilafiagwi.

Ami nimafi hiahawes sa'wisi andeande' datima, anaf nimafi hiahawes lu'wasi andeande' wapani. Apa' epen ami nembaso'am, owa' nenda' maol andeande'ma hiahawes sa'wisa'wisia, anaf anin ina nenda' hiahawes lu'wasi andeande' wapani, owa'atin.
Ipa' i'i owa' pimafi moni uga maim magape itap apa'ea, anaf ami nese'epa hiahawes bu'wasi endilisi pigimafias? Owa'atin endilisi.
Ipa' i'i owa' pimafi hiahawes anis epesia, ami nese'epa hiahawes ipe'isi atis pimafias? Owa'atin.

“Ina anin epen nanda' maoli la'ifin nihapila maol biafina amam dembami biam, owa'atin. Na'amba okom mila anona, anona a' nesambalona. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' ina a' la'ifipa pepe lafela God noloma ugai moni wapani, owa'.”
Ama amom Farisi magame' basef ifimba hiafi Jisas naga'iefi, amom manda'mana wa'ap anen. Dei' main, amom ukup pagapagaila moni atini.

Owa' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' panda' ipa' patagama epes sanda' waf usi'ifi ma nogohnaep epesi. Apa' God nogawa ukup ipe'imi nomon. Hiahaom epes sagasa'ma agofami sagatalom otamba hiambaii, amamba falafumi atoma naep Godi.

Basef amom profet magawalipasafi basefa fagail mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani ifimba amom mawalipasef atapif fape mafi'i metambel nogota Jon nagatagatai. Apa' nogota atamba Joni tafi'i tataga dei' basef fasifi ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias, ifimba fape fafe' fataga walemb hiagoma. Ea' epes hiasi hi'alas dindinapis sanda' maol lu'wani a'owa' ma sofe' sogawis nomona maol inimba Godi.
Anif basef du'wanifa amef sa'usa'ufi feloma anif basef bandafi fagail nomona buk mu'uli Godi ina anaf fefe' higililif lamonef hi'ilif, owa'atin. Fepe atapif fikila' itapi otaga anaf higiligalasi.

“Aman ami nagakwaha waulu'mana anani'wi ma nogaso' ano'w daia'w wapanii, anen nanda' so'a waola nemata'w akwamba nali' nagaso'akwi. Ea' aman ami naso' ano'w nemata'w fowa' anona aman nagali'amona'wi aman anamba nagi' nagaso'akwi wapani nanda' waf awafi so'a waola nemata'w akwamba.

“Anona aman hiahaom hiamunai nape. Dondol anen nala siaogw fasifasigwi atogw a luwaguf bu'wafi sagatalif otamba hiambaii. Ea' nimaguf hiafi dondol nondofa' gwa'aisi bu'wasi atis nandape andeande' a'owa'.
Apa' felefele'ma ipat ananitai anona aman kwahunai nandailasa gwa'aisi moni maisi nape, agilinama Lasarus. Alop ananipi si'ipa ilambeh.

Anis epes sofa'ana safi'i na'oh felefele'ma ipat aman anambai. Anen na'i notatama gwa'aisi du'wa'wanisi sowa saga'oh tebol lafelena aman anamba hiahaom hiamunai ma ata' nea'as nogaso' opaf. Ea' anogw nombagw gwafi'i gwapalo'mana ilambeh ananimi afegah agwagugahi.
“A'i owa' main, aman anamba falafunai naga', ea' anom ensel mofa'ana mafe' mahaponana nape wambel bu'wambili felefele'ma Abraham. Ea' aman anamba hiahaom hiamunai anen wapani naga', sawana.
Owa' nafe' wambel awambili hel nofa' akef lu'wami. Ea' natologon nafe' ilif, nati Abraham napani laogon a'owa', Lasarus nape nalomana.
Ea' nofalana na'i, ‘Ahame Abraham, ina' niti uwahipiwi nesapa' Lasarus nufi'i nola faf ananifi du'wanif embel nupihi'mi afega ae'agai kwasakwasala. Ae' ame' akafimi awami endilisi ma nif ifi'i.’

“Owa' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogame, ina' okom mondanda'ma fowa' ata' nagape namina itap nefa' hiahaom fasimi atom. Apa' Lasarus nofa' hiahaom hiami awami. Owa' dei' wambel ambale'e nembel ananimbili bape fasimbil, apa' ina' nefa' akafimi awami.

Ea' anis maefah wapani sape. La'afena apa' maloma ipa' God nanda' anona kwambiwag lu'unai. Na'amba epes sagape na'ai ma sa'i sotopa' kwambiwag anamba sogafo'o ma ipa', esis ina la'ifis. Ea' epes sagapani na'ambai, esis ina la'ifisa sotopa'i kwambiwag sigafi'mai apa', owa'atin.’
“Ea' aman anamba na'i, ‘Ahame dao'. Ae' a'i ina' nesapa'o Lasarus notanima nofo'o ipat ahame ae'anai.
Ae' anom owape wanom biam mapani. Ama Lasarus ni'ipama banagafi amom. Na'amba amom wapani mufi'i wambel ambale'e mofa' akafimi lu'wami.’
“Owa' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Owa'. Owapena ine'imi mondame'ago basefa Moses noloma amom profet fetopalopam. Amom mondame'ago basef fafimba.’
“Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ahame Abraham, owa'atin. Ina atiasi mome'am, owa'. Apa' i'i anin epen nagaga'i nesafel wandofa negafe'ma amom, dao' bola meme'an mombema nelelemb.’
“Owa' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Owa'atina mogame' basefa Moses noloma amom profetia, ea' atiasi anin epen nagaga'i nitanima negesafel wandof, amom ina atiasi mohapifa inimba wapani, owa'atin.’”

Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Endilisi hiahaom amamba mogogwambipai ma penda' waf awafii. Endilisi hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagai, apa' epes ami sonda' hiahaom amamba awami mogatagai, ae' ati esis uwahipis endilisi. Dei' main, esis anaf seme' akafimi nimanimi lu'wami.

I'i anis epes sofa' epen inimba sondola otam lu'unai nila bini'w anani'wi sofa'an sofe' solan negewala naoh mami lu'wami ma afinai, anin ata' nepe andeande' kwasakwasala. Apa' owa' owa'atin. I'i epen inimba nenda' anin sa'uni negakwaha nigahapifa ae'a, epen inimba atiasi nepe awen a'owa' nikila' negewala naoh afinai.
Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. I'i owamepa ipe'inai nonda' waf awafi ma, pi'ipana basef dindinipa nogakwahef. Ama i'i anen nogambema nembela, ipa' ukup pese'epa waf awafi ananifi.

Apa' i'i anen nonda'mepa waf awafi ipa' lifilafi nil 7-pelaifa nemaf atetef, ama anen netanima nifi'mai ipa' ma nohotagw agwamba 7-pelaigw ni'i, ‘Ae' a' ambema nembel’, ea' dao' ipa' ukup a' pese'epa waf awafi ananifi.”
Amom aposel Jisasi ma'ipa Dembinai amamunai ma'i, “Ina' nenda' afa' ohapifina banagefa ukila' wali' wagahapifina.”

Ea' Dembinai na'ipam na'i, “I'i hapif ipe'ini nendahama si'i nalelef sa'wisa'wisi mastetilif lawag, dao' atiasi ipa' pi'ipa lawag gagumba sa'utip pagailagai piga'i, ‘Ina' dagia neloma kofaga nefe' newala naoh embel nomon,’ ea' agog a' gigi'ma basef ipe'ifi.”

“I'i anona aman ipe'inai nofa' anona aman daiana nonda' maola anen nowala itap aof a'a numafi sipsip, ama main notanimai nifi'i ipat, ea' atiasi dembinai nugumafi anini ni'ipana ni'i, ‘Ina' fi'i kwafalis nepe nea' wali'ita’? Owa'atin.
Atiasi a' ni'ipana ni'i, ‘Ina' nendondomba gwa'aisi ae'asi, newaho' let, nendome gwa'aisi ae' nili' nefa'as nifi'i. Ma ili' ia'asa main, ina' nigi' nea' ine'isi.’
“Ea' atiasi anen a' ninifela aman anamba nanda'mana maoli ma nogaila malogol ananigili? Owa'atin.
Ea' ipa' wapani na'amba atin. I'i ipa' penda' hiahawes hiasi hi'ilas si'i God naga'ipipa, dao' ipa' pi'i basef pi'i, ‘Afa' wanda' maoli awasifai. Hiahawes afa' wanda'asi, isimba maol afa'ini atin.’”
Ea' Jisas naila ufia'w nafe' Jerusalem, nafe' la'afena itap lu'upa biafip Samariai Galili.
Anen nataga anambel wambel, owa' amam ilifunamaim aowas aunai nanda' alop amamipi pagambo'wi mafi'i ufia'w ata' malutuwi laogon,
mofalana mehip ma'i, “Jisas, Dembinai, ina' ni'i uwahipigama afa'!”
Ea' Jisas natolom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fo'o pihimba'mam alop ipe'ipi ma amom pris.” Ea' amom ata' mafe' atin owa', alop amamipi pataga bo'op.
Anona aman amamunai nati alop ananipi bo'op, notanima nafe' noga na'i mehip nafela agol Godi.
Ea' nasisil nowafa notawa itap felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi nanifelona. Anen ina Judainai, owa'. Anen Samariainai.
Ea' Jisas natolona na'i, “Ae' a'i owa' ipa' ilifunamaipa ambe'epa atin. Dei' 9-pelaim amuma?
Owa' anom motanima mifi'i mefela agol Godia? Aman anamba anagon daiagininai, anen atotona.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel fo'o. Ina' nahapifa ae', isimba atis dei' nataga bo'wena wapani.”

Anom dembami Farisi mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Nogota mamahotama nemaf afamba bu'wafi fetaga ma apa' mugawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiapa?” Anen nagwamam basef amom na'i, “Amamba esis ina sotolom naep, owa'.
Esis ina atiasi si'i, ‘Piti, amamba mape na'a, a'a mape gani, owa'atin. Peme'! Amamba mape opalef ipe'ilifi nomon ea'.”

Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Anef nemaf dondo'afi fegataga, nelelemb ipe'ilimbi belef endilisi pi'i, ‘Apa' ma'i aman anamba notaga epen nogofa' alop epesi ata' nifi'i notaga ulala ata' motolona kwasakwasala.’ Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' ina petolowe, owa'.
Ea' atiasi anis epes si'ipipa si'i, ‘Piti nani nape gani,’ anis si'i ‘Piti anen nape na'a'e.’ Apa' ipa' ina peme'as pigi'mas, owa' hapaisi.

Ipa' pegawa pele'ala ma otaga bendagala holagala nafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi enda'am na'amba atina anaf ae' egataga. Apa' ae' ata' ili' efa' akafimi hiami ma epes nogota ata'isi dei' sogowa' alafugahai. Waf fowa' sanda'afa nogota atamba Noa nagapautai, ea' na'amba atin si'i anaf esis sonda'af nemaf afamba felefele'ma ifi'i egataga itap apa'e.
Sa' gwa'aisi, sa' embel, amam nematawa sindikikila'ma sandaso'ama atin safe' safe' sataga nemaf afamba Noa nafe' nagawis galaho'w. Ea' embel lu'wami mataga maha esis amam nematawa hiasi afis hi'alas.
“Esis sanda' waf na'amba atin si'i nogota atamba Lot nagapautai wapani. Sa' gwa'aisi, sa' embel satala hiahawes saso'asas safe'ma anis satalis, sawa hiahawes aofah, sala' ifagw.
Owa' Lot nakwaha Sodom nafe', ma nemaf afamba atef nif faloma otamba salfa fagandumi mowai heven si'i asaf fagalai ea' mahambombaga amam nematawa hiasi saga' hi'alas.
“Ea' anaf na'amba atina nemaf ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesii igatagaefi.
Nemaf afamba epen ami nagape ipat ando'i felefele'i, ina ata' netanima nuwis nefa'ai hiahawes ananisi ipat nomon, owa'i. Ea' na'amba atin epen nigaili aofi, ina ata' netanima nefe' ipat, owa'i.
“Ipa' nomonas sondanda'ma Lot waulu'mana.
Epen ami ni'i nela'ambema ambal ananili si'il dao', ambal ananili anaf higililal. Apa' ami i'i nelelama ambal ananili, anaf ambal ananili lope andeande' atapil lifilafi.
Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, nemaf afamba owamb amam biam mo'oh ipat belita atotota, God nofa' anona, anona nokwahona nope.
Anowa nematawa biawa onda' maola plaua onda' breti, atiasi God nofa' ano'w, nokwaha ano'w kope.
[Amam biam mogail aofi, atiasi God nofa' anona, nokwaha anona nope.]”
Alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba ma'i, “Dembinai, amamba anaf motaga ani?” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Mamahagoma alop sagaga'i poga'oma, ea' na'amba atogon atiasi komemb mufi'i munduwa'animama.”
Jisas naso'am basef wamon atin alipumi ananimi ma nigihimba'mam mondabeten nimaguf danda ma amom ina ala'uta toham ukup iwanip, owa'i.
Anen na'ias na'i, “Anona dembinai jas nogonandona basefi, nape anin taun. Anen ina ombal bahana ma dembinai God, ina nomonas sapoma anis epes wapani, owa'.
“Ano'w nemata'w waulunama'w nagaga'a'wi kwape taun inimba. Dondol ako'w kwafi'mai jas anamba kwa'ipana kwa'i, ‘Bousi ae'asi sa'i sohambombaga ae'. Ina' ata' netopalope ma kot.’
“Jas anamba nali' nandaiwa'ma nogatopalopa'w. A'i owa' main, okom ananimi ma'i, ‘Ae' ina ombal bahema God a ukup epesi.
Apa' nemata'w akwamba alifi'wi kwase'e numa'umi ae'. Ea' hapaimi, ata' etopalopago ako'w ulala kot. Na'amba kufi'i lifilafi konda' okom molowe.’”
Ea' Dembinai na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' peme' basefa jas anamba aunai.
Epes isimba God nandandepas ea' ananisii, esis salef sakokona lifilafi owamb alip. Dei' God notopalopasa kot a'a owa'? Aho', nogatopalopasi. Anen ina ni'ipas fafifafi, owa'atin.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, atiasi nogatopalopas kwafalisi. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Apa' anaf ae' igafi'i, nemaf afamba iti amam nematawa itapipai pihapifi, a'a owa'atin?”
Anis epes ukup pandapoma esis atis sa'i esis epes fasisi sanda' waf bu'wafi, ea' sa'i anis daias awasisi. Epes isimba Jisas naso'asa basef waminif atin na'i,
“Anom amam biam ma'i mofe' mondabeten ipat lu'unai Godi. Anona Farisi, anona aman aunai nogofa' takisi.

Farisi anamba nalutu okom mandapoma anen atona nandabeten na'amba na'i, ‘Ae' anifelina God, ama ae' ina si'i anis epes daias awasisi. Esis sambaso'mas sogofa' uga mais anis daiasi, sanda' waf awafii, sagatopa' mu'uli ine'ini ma sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi. Ae' ina anda'am si'i esis, owa'atin. Ae' anifelina ma ae' ina si'i aman nanumba aunai nogofa' takisi.
Wikifah hiagahi ae' akwaha gwa'aisi nimaguf bifa andabeten. Ea' hiahawes hiasi ae' egefa'asi, awala du'wanis ilifunamaisa ase'enas ina'.’”

“Apa' aman anamba nogofa' takisi nalutuwi laogon nandaiwa'ma niniga negati heven, owa'. Naha mafata ananitai atapita na'i, ‘O God, ae' aman anda' waf awafii, ina' niti ae' owahipiwi netopalope.’ Ea' notanima nafe' ipat ananitai. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, aman anamba nogofa' takisi na'ias na'amba, anen bo'ona ma naep Godi. Apa' aman anamba nali' nandabetani, owa'. Dei' main, epen ami negasa'ma agol ananigili atigili, atiasi God nonda' agol ananigili gowala. Apa' epen ami nenda' agol gigisila'i, bola God nosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.”

Esis sao'wamanai anis awasi sa'wisi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas, sa'i anen nosa lagofa nofalo'masa nonda'as sonogahas. Owa', alipumi ananimi mati isimba mandaiwa'ma awasi isimba ea' masopama esis sofa'as sogafi'mai anen.

Ea' Jisas nofala awasi isimba safi'i felefele'ma anen ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' kwahowa awasi isimba sifi'mai ae'. Owa'i pili'amasa. Dei' main, esis amam nematawa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias anaf sefe' anen nagala'ambemagomai, esis same' basef ananifi sagailif si'i awasi isimba.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Epen ami ni'i aho'ma God nope Dembinai ma anina nese'ana nembel God si'i awasi isimba saga'i aho'mana, isimba sanda'as na'ambai atiasi sogawis anamba God nagala'ambemagomai. I'i owa', owa'atin.”
Anona agilinai Judainai nahali' Jisas na'i, “Tisa bu'winai, ae' atiasi enda' maina egefa' ambal namili egape andeande' lifilafi?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina naga'i ae' bu'uwai? God atona bu'unai.

Ina' negawa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani naga'i, ‘Ina' owa'i nenda' waf awafi so'a waulafia, ina neha anis epes soga' nenda' wal, owa'i, ina' owa'i nembaso'ma anis epes daiasa, ina' neme' basef mamasinai nihapilif nilif ea' nindimafias andeande'.”
Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Mu'uli inimba hiani ahapilan ailan fowa' ata' sa'owe afi'i afi'i ataga dei'.”

Ea' Jisas name' basef ifimba na'ipana na'i, “Ina' anef waf fasifi atetef owa' ata' nenda'afa. Ina' fo'o nese'asa hiahaom ine'imi hi'indalama anis daias sotalinama nefa' moni inimba nenda'an neso' isimba kwahusi. Nenda'as na'amba ma anaf negefa' hiahawes fasisi gani heven. Ea' nifi'i nihapifi nila ae'.”
Owa' anen name' basef ifimba, nembel ananimbili nimanimbil a'owa'. Anen agilinai hiahaom hiamunai. Na'amba dei' anen nembel nimanimbil.
Ea' Jisas natolona na'i, “Epes isimba ugai moni hianaisi, sanda'am danda' ahifim a'owa' ma sogafe' anamba God nagala'ambemagoma. Atona atin sefe'.

Anin mafin lu'unai kamel nogawis bolotaf nil sogosambala luwagufeli, anamba ila ina ahifim a'owa' ma nogawis. Apa' amam nematawa hiahaom hiamisi i'i sogafe' anamba, sonda'am danda' ahifim a'owa' ma sogafe'. Maol inimba ahifim a'owa' nikila' maol kamel nogawis bolotaf nili.”
Epes isimba same' na'amba sa'i, “I'i na'ambaiai, anaf God nuwambilai epes mamahisa sotanimai sope andeande' lifilafi? Owa'atin.”
Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Hiahaom epes owa' la'ifisa sonda'amia, amamba God atona banagonai ma nonda'am.”
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' ea' wakwaha hiahaom afa'ii hiami ea' dei' wafi'i wahapifa basef ine'ifi wailina.”

Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipa' epen ami nekwaha ipat toloma ako'w awasi sahin owan ahasan mamasan ananisi, ma nenda' maola epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias,
anef nemaf God nogwaman hiahaom hiami mikila' amamba nali' nagalamonomi. Anaf owagama nogota bu'utai togataga, epen inimba a' nofa' ambal namili ma negape andeande' lifilafi.”

Ea' Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim na'ipam na'i, “Peme', dei' afa' ea' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ama basef ifimba hiafi amom profet fowa' manda'ef fagail buki faga'i ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi fetaga alihif fendawalap hi'igalef.
Atiasi amom monda'e efe'ma anis epes sogolalama Godi. Ea' sonda' wa'ap sonda'e findiwae sehe sonda'me waf awafi sisisi'wafe
a sopopagahowe sehe ega'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilif, ama anef fegafe'ma wanifi, owa', a' itanima esafel wapani.”
Apa' amom alipumi ananimi ina mogawa basef ifimba, owa'. Basef kofagefa faga'ias ata' fandambaho'ma amom, ea' ina ukup pandanda'mas andeande'ma hiahawes Jisas na'i nonda'asi, owa'atin.
Jisas nafe' nataga felefele'ma anambel wambel Jeriko, ea' anona aman naep pagaso'anai nape ufia'w wa'akw dawalegef nandailasa gwa'aisi moni mais.
Owa' name' esis hiasi safi'i sikila'ana safe', nahali'as na'i, “Esis sanda' main notaga?”
Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai anamba dei' nafi'i nikila'ena nafe'.”
Ea' nofalana na'i, “Jisas, ina' Devit akunamana, niti ae' owahipiwi!”
Epes isimba sali' sagafi'i sinifalona na'amba sa'i, “Ina' sopama malogol!” Owa' anen fala atin nape na'i, “Ina' Devit akunamana, niti ae' owahipiwi”
Ea' Jisas nafi'i nalutu na'ipas na'i, “Da'ana nifi'mai ae'.” Anen nafe' felefele', Jisas nahali'ana na'i,
“Ina' na'i ae' enda'mena main?” Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i iti andeande' wapani.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Naep ine'ipi piti. Ina' nahapifa ae' banagena. Isimba atis dei' nataga bo'wena wapani.”
Ea' kwafalis atis naep apatiana andeande', nagi'ma Jisas nafe' ufia'w nasa'ma agol Godi. Ea' esis amam nematawa sati isimba sasa'ma agol Godi wapani.
Jisas nafe' nawis anambel wambel Jeriko, na'i nefe'.
Owa' anona aman hiahaom hiamunai nape, agol ananigili Sakius anen agilinai ma amam amamba mogofa' takisi.
Anen na'i niti Jisasa nogogawana anen mamahonama. Owa' amam nematawa wambelisi hiasi salutu sili'ak. Sakius anen bandabandana, ea' ina nati Jisas, owa'.
Ea' nasagih nali' nafe' nalota natoma anoga lawag fik ama niti Jisas nogafi'i.
Jisas nataga anamba nosaniga nati ilif na'ipana na'i, “Sakius, dei' ae' efe' epe ipat ine'itai. Ina' sila'i kwafalis.”
Ea' nisila'i kwafalis nembel ananimbili sonahambel, nofa' Jisas nafe' ipat ananitai.
Ea' esis amam nematawa sati isimba, ukup numbutip sa'i basef wandafifi sa'i, “Anen nafe' nape ipat anona aman nanda' waf awafii.”

Apa' Sakius nosafel nalutu na'ipa Dembinai na'i, “Dembinai, ina' neme'. Dei' ae' a'i ewala hiahaom hiami ae'ami la'afen dondo' atin, ea' ese'as du'wanim isimba kwahusi. I'i ae' embaso'ma anin epena ekwalopa maefah ananimi, atiasi ae' egwamana hiami bifibif.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' God nowambilai amam nematawa sagape ipat ata'ii nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai ea'. Dei' main, aman anamba wapani nataga akunamana Abrahami.
Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' afi'i ma elaoma epes higilagalasi iwambilas sokwaha waf awafi sogotanimai.”

Esis same' basef ifimba, ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i anif basef waminif atin wapani. Dei' main, anen nape felefele'ma Jerusalem, ea' esis ukup pandanda' pa'i epes hiasi siti God dei' atef notaga nope Dembinai nugumafias. Ea' na'i basef ifimba waminif atin
na'i, “Anona aman dembinai na'i nefe' anambel wambel lauguni ma esis sonda'ana nogape king dembinai. Anef anen notanima nifi'i.
Ea' nofalai anom amam ilifunamaim manda' maol ananinii, ea' natambe' moni 20 kina nandahama amom. Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' penda' maol pembama moni inimba pefe' petagama ae' itanima igafi'i.’
“Apa' owa' esis wambel atembel aman anambai ukup aoma anen endilisi. Ea' nafe' sasapa' anom amam magi'mana mafe' ma'i, ‘Apa' mandaiwa'ma ina' negape king dembinai ma apa'.’

“Owa' owa'atin. Esis sanda'ana nataga nape king dembinai ama main, notanima nafi'i. Ea' na'i, ‘Falai amom amamba manda' maoli fowa' ae' agaso'am monii. Ae' a'i ata' egawa moni wamani ma'ufin amom hiami atona atin mogofa'ani.’
“Ea' nagali'i nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' anda' maola 20 kina inimba ine'ini embaman dei' efa'ai 200 kina wamani.’
“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nanda' maol andeande' datimai. Ina' ea' nimafi moni inimba kwasala'win andeande'. Dei' ea' ese'ena agol lu'wagili ina' ma nigimafi taun lu'wagoma ilifunamaigin.’
“Ea' anona nagafe'ma biami nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' anda' maola 20 kina ini'i dei' ea' itanima ifa'ai 100 kina wapani.’
“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' enda'ena nimafi taun wambel lu'wambili wanifin biafin.’
Ea' anona nagagi'i nafi'i wapani na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, 20 kina ine'ini ini'i. Ae' ewa'an anip hankisip ambe'an na'oh.

Ae' egawa ina' aman dindinapinai. Anis maefah anis epes sambe'as saga'ihi, isimba ina' nefa'as. Gwa'aisi anin epen daian nagawasi, isimba ina' nagala'asi. Na'amba ae' ombal mahe ma ina'. Ea' dei' ambaho'wa moni inimba na'omena.’
“Owa' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nanda' maoli, ina' epen awinai nanda' du'wanigai. Basef ine'ifi atif fawalogena. Dei' ina' negawa ae' aman dindinapiwai agala' gwa'aisi anona aman nagawasi.
I'i ina' negawa na'ambaiai, dei' nefa'an negambe'an benga ae' itanima ifi'i efa'an negaloma anin wamani wapani.’
“Ea' na'ipa esis sagalutu na'amba felefele'i na'i, ‘Ipa' dalombana 20 kina aman anamba pese'anan aman nanumba nogofa' moni 200 kinai.’
“Owa' esis sa'ipana sa'i, ‘Dembinai, anen nofa' bitigwif ilifunamaif 200 kina ea'.’

“Owa' anen na'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa, epes ami sogahapila hiahawesi isimba atiasi ese'as anis hiahawes wapani esis. Apa' epen ami owa' nigahapila hiahawesia, ea' hiahawes sa'wisa'wisi anin nagahapilasi, isimba atiasi endalombanas anin.
Owa' isimba esis bousi ae'asi, sandaiwa'ma ae' egape dembiwai king asasiwai igimafias, ipa' fa'as fi'i na'a pehas soga' naep ae'api.’”
Jisas na'i basef ifimba ea' nali' nafe' naila ufia'w kwagafe' Jerusalami nondowasa'.
Ea' nataga Betfagai Betani walemb ambalemba felefele'ma halafuta atamba Oliv ea' nasapa' alipumi ananimi biam mali' mafe'

na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pefe' wambel bambalimba bagape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ai. Pefe' piwis apiti anona mafin donki ata' sa'unai esis sandolona nail. Ina dei' anin epen natomana, ata' owa'atin. Petagwahona pefa'ana pifi'mai ae'.
I'i anin epen nihali'ipa niga'i, ‘Dei' pagatagwahona ma main?’ Ea' pegwaman pi'ipan pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maola.’”
Jisas nasapa' amom biam mafe' mati hiahawes isimba na'amba atin si'i doko' naga'ipam.
Ea' matagwaha mandofa donki anamba sa'unai. Matagwahona atin owa', amom mugumafi donki anambai ma'ipam ma'i, “Dei' maina ipa' pagatagwaha donki anamba?”
Amom ma'ipam ma'i, “Dembinai na'i nonda' anin maola.”
Ea' amom mofa' donki anamba mafi'mai Jisas mawamona sagegw amamugwi gwatoma ilifa donki anamba.
Ea' matopalopa Jisas nalota natoma donki anamba nafe', ea' esis amam nematawa sa'i sosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Ea' dei' sandombamana sagegw saso'wiam ufia'w sofalo'ma'w.

Anen nafi'i ea' felefele' ma ufia'w kogilianai halafuta Olivi. Alipisi ananisi hiasi ea' sandagala, ukup papomai hiahaom amamba banagami fowa' nanda'ami. Ea' lilililif sa'oh mehip, sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.

Sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Apa' mosa'ma agola God nagape ilifi lu'wagol, mogogala'i mapoma anen atona. Ma'i anen nofalo'ma ina' dembinai king nagafi'i agol ananigilii nese'ena banagami ma nenda' maol ananini. Esis sagape heveni opalef awanelef.”
Owa' anom dembami Farisi mape maloma epes hiasi ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ina' ninifala alipisi ine'isi ma ata' sosopama malogof.”
Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i esis sogasopama malogof, atiasi ea' otamba atom maga'oh itapi mope mi'i gigal mehip.”
Jisas nataga felefele' ma Jerusalem natologon nalopagon. Nalopa esis amam nematawa taun inimbaisi.

Ea' na'i, “I'i dei' nemaf afa'e atef ipa' pegawa basef kofagefa ma pegape opalef awanelefai, dao' isimba atiasi andeande'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Basef ifimba ata' fandambaho', dei' ipa' owa' ata' pegawefa.
Anafa anef nemaf fetaga, ea' atiasi bousi ipe'isi sifi'i sola' indalelemb sonda' wandaf soganogama ipa'. Ea' sili'ama ipa' endilisi ma anamba hiagoma.

Ea' sehepa sohambombagepa endilisi, peloma awasi ipe'isi sagape nomona wambel ipe'imbili. Esis sohambombaga wambel awagon hi'ilagon endilisi, ea' ina atiasi otamba sagala' ifagwambai bendatomama atin atapimba bepe, owa'. A sugulatam mo'oh daindai. Dei' main? Ipa' owa' pegawa nemaf dei' God nogafi'afii ma nefa'epa pitanimai pegape andeande'a.”
Ea' Jisas nosafel nawis ipat lu'unai Godi ea' nali'amona amom amamba manda' bisnisi manda' maola magatala hiahawes ipat anamba nomoni.
Anen na'ipam na'i, “Basef fagape Baibeli, God na'i, ‘Ipat ae'anai nondapoma esis sifi'i sopaona sondabeten sogahali' ae'.’ Apa' owa', panda'ana nataga si'i sandambaho' sanda' wala.”
Nimaguf hiafi Jisas nawalipasa basef ipat anamba nomon. Ea' amom pris dembami maloma anom agufumi Judai maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mala' molaoma ufia'wa mohana nogaga'.
Owa' esis amam nematawa hiasi dindinapis a'owa' ma sagame' basef ananifi. Na'amba amom ina mati ano'w ufia'wa mogahana, owa'atin.

Anef nemaf Jisas nape naso'asa basef amam nematawa ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, nawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi. Owa' amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami daiam magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma agufumi amom Judai mafi'mai anen.
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' ni'ipafa. Ina' nanda' maol inimba ma banagami amimi? Ami na'ipina dei' nape dembinai nanda' maol inimba?”
Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' wapani a'i ihali'ipama anif basef, pi'ipif.
Maol Joni nagapisi' amam nematawa embeli, God nagape heveni na'ipana napisi'as a'a anin epen itapani na'ipana?”
Owa' amom mame' basef ifimba manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' i'i uga'i, ‘God nagape heveni naga'ipa Jon nagapisi'asi’, na'amba atiasi anen a' ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegahapifanaea?’
Apa' afa' i'i uga'i, ‘Anin epen nagape itapani naga'ipana’, na'amba esis amam nematawa hiasi a' sohafa. Dei' main, hiasi sa'i Jon anona profet.”
Ea' magwamana basef Jisas ma'i, “Afa' owa' ogawama.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ea' na'amba atin ae' ina i'ipipa ma ami nase'e banagami na'ipi anda' maol inimba ae'ani, owa'.”

Jisas na'ipasa basef ifimba waminif atini esis amam nematawa na'i, “Anona aman nanda' anof aof nagawa waina. Ea' nakwahomam aof afamba anom amam ma'i monda' maolafa bisnisi. Ea' nafe' napani nogota lautai anambel wambel lauguni.

Ama nogota sa'utip pagailatai, anen kofagonama aof afambai nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe'ma amom manda' maol aof ananifii. Anen na'i amom moso'ana anip sa'utip gwa'aipi ma aof afamba. Owa' amom mahana mali'amonana notanima nafe' dowaf.
Ea' kofagonama aofi nasapa' anona daiana nafe' wapani ma amom, owa' mahana wapani manda'ana aona matofana nafe' dowaf.
Ea' nasapa' anona daiana nagafe'ma wanifi. Owa' amom mahana makwahona nawis na'oh ando'.
“Ea' anen kofagonama aofi na'i, ‘Ae' ata' enda' main? Nogame ae'inai aman, ae' okom magamagailanai, a' esapa'ana nofo'o. Atiasi meme' malogol ananigili a'a owa'?’
“Ea' amom mati nogamana nafi'i, manda'ipama atin ma'i, ‘Aman anamba anaf nanumba owagama nogofa' hiahaom hiami ahamanai. Awi, a' ohana ma afa' atofa ogofa' aof afa'e.’
Ea' mahana makwahona mawisi aof ande'efa, mahana afuna. Ea' atiasi kofagonama aof afambai nonda' maina amom?
Atiasi nifi'i noham afum hi'ilam, noso'asa aof afamba fefe'ma anis epes daias.” Esis same' basef ifimba sa'i, “Waf afamba awafi endilisi. Afa' wandaiwa'mafi.”

Owa' Jisas natiti esis na'ipas na'i, “Dao', ea' na'amba atin si'i basef ifimba fagape Baibeli faga'i, ‘Otam amamba amom manda' maoli magali'amonami, dei' a' mataga lu'um mombalo' ipat atamba.’ Basef ifimba kofagefa fa'i main?
Epes mamahisa kwahogalas sogowa otam anambai, atiasi a pepe'etas hi'ilas. Apa' i'i otam anamba nowa nogasali'as, a' loloweas si'i sopof atof.”

Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom pris dembami mame' basef ifimba waminif atini Jisas naga'iefi, ma'i owa' anen nondola'waifa amom. Ea' dei' atef ma'i mohapila Jisas mowa'ana. Apa' owa', ombal bahama esis amam nematawa.

Ea' manda'ana naep di'indi'ana ma mombalo'ana mogofa'ana. Ea' maso'am anemba otamba anom amam masapa'am mafi'i magatolonai. Amam amamba manda' uhuf mambaso'am ma'i amom manda' waf endilisifii. Apa' owa' amom ma'i mombalo' Jisasa anif basef naga'iefi ma moso' anen nogafe'ma gavman dembinai ma nonda' kotimana.

Ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Tisa dembinai, apa' mogawena basef ine'ifi bu'wafi atif naga'ipasef esis amam nematawai. Ina' na'i basef atififa epes isimba hiasi agufisi saloma isimba agof akasi na'amba atin hi'alas. Ina' na'ipas basef faloma waf bu'wasi Godi endilisi ma epes hiasi.
Mu'uli ape'ini na'ias na'imama? Apa' mogaso'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi a'a owa'?”
Apa' Jisas nogawa ea' ma baso'am amamunai. Ea' na'ipam na'i,
“Ipa' pihimba'me anin moni ma ata' itilin. Ambal laloma agol isimba sagaili amisi?” Ea' ma'i, “Isimba gavman dembinai Sisari.”
Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Dao', hiahawes dembinai Sisari, isimba pese'anas Sisar. Apa' hiahawes Godi, pese'anas God.”
Ea' amom ina la'ifima mogombalo'ana ma anif basefa naep esis amam nematawa hiasii, owa'atin. Amom nomonas sape salasafe'ma basef ifimba naga'ipamafi, ea' masopama malogof tol mape.
Anom anep mini'ap Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas. Amom mini'ap apamba mahapila basef ifimba ma'i sagaga'i ina atiasi sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'atin.

Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, fowa' Moses nanda' anif basef fail buki ma apa' fa'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anen awasi akana, waulu'mana ata' kope owamana ananinai a' noso'akwa nola anis awasi sogaha'ofana.’
Anaf nemaf anom wambota atotota 7-pelaim mape. Nagali'i sahomam naso'akw awani aka'w naga' nakwaho'w kwape.
Ea' owamana nandatu'unai nafela'w naso'akw.

Ea' owamana nandatu'unai wapani nanda'as na'amba atin, ea' anona nandatu'umi naso'akw manda'as na'amba atin mafe' matagama owagufunai akutainai. Amom amamba ambipim 7-pelaim ina mola anis awasi, owa' mandaga' atin.
Ama main, nemata'w waulu'mam kwagi'mam kwagi' kwaga'.
Ea' anaf esis sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, nemata'w akwamba kope nemata'w ami'wi? Amom 7-pelaim a' maso'akw kwape waulu'mam amamu'wi.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amam nematawa nogota ata'aisi dei' sandaso'ama.
Apa' epes mamahisa God na'i andeande'ma sotanima sogosafel wapanima sogape namisi nemaf afamba, ina sondaso'ama, a' owa'atin.
Esis ina soga' wapani, owa'. A sope si'i amom ensel Godi. God nosa'mas sosafel wapani wandof. Ea' asope awasi ananisi.

Basef ifimba ma esis sagaga'i sotanima sogosafel wapani, ifimba fowa' Moses nihimba'mepaef nif ileliwa wataga lawag sa'ugai fagandogai, fa'i anen nofala Dembinai na'i God Abrahami, God Aisaki, a God Jekopi.
Apa' God ina Dembinai ma epes isimba sagaga'ii, owa'atin. Anen Dembinai ma epes isimba sagape namisii. Dei' main, epes hiasi sape namisa naep Godi hi'alas.”
Jisas na'ias na'amba, amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ombel mahama mogahali'ana ma anif basef wapani. Ea' anom magwamana basef ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ina' na'ias andeande'.”
A'i owa' main, Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amom ma'i Krais, Devit akunamana God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Ma'i Krais aman atona dowaf falafunai si'i epes sagape itapi. Dei' maina amom maga'ias na'amba ma Krais?
Buk akwamba Sami Devit naga'i na'amba na'i, ‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'i, “Ina' nepe lagol kwahisigili ae'agili,
atapina nefe' netagama anaf ae' enda' bousi ine'isi sogafe' lafelena si'i sia bo'wagah ine'igahi hogataoma.”’
Devit fowa' nofala Krais na'i anen Dembinai. Isimba atis Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anen Dembinai.”
Amam nematawa hiasi ata' sape same' basef ifimba atin, Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i,

“Ipa' silisilawi pepoma amam amamba dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi. Amom ma'i mondawisa luwagwif fasifi atif mondafe', si'i dembami atom mandawisafi. Ma'i anis epes daias sotolom sondalalamam sonda'mam nemaf bu'wafi siganifelom anamba lu'wagoma ma naep hiasi sandatama sagapoma ma sogasa'ma agof amamugufi lu'wagof. Ea' amom ukup pa'i siaifah isimba sotawa sagali'i atis, dembami atom magapoma, nomon ifagw esis Juda hiasi sandakolasugwi a'a anamba hiasi sandakolas nimaguf ifimba sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami.

Amam amamba magawis ifagw agwamba nematawa alifiwaii, manda' wala hiahawes awousi. Ea' mandabeten launai atona dowadowafa esis sotolom siga'i amom bu'wami. Anaf God nowaloga epes hiasi. Anis epes daias owa' sonda' waf awafi na'ambaia anaf sofa' akafimi kwasakwasala, apa' amom mofa' nimanimi awami lu'wami endilisi a'owa'.”
Jisas nape ipat lu'unai Godi natologon tulif nati anis epes moni hianaisi sakwaha moni newala bokis moni nagalasi ma sogaso' God.
Ea' nati ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwala moni sa'wini si'i 2 toea newala bokis isimba.
Ea' na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemata'w akwamba alifi'wi kwa'waha moni lu'wani nikila' otamba hiambai esis amam nematawa hiasi sagalambai.

Epes isimba hiasi moni hianai na'omas sakwaha du'wanin atin newala bokis. Apa' nemata'w akwamba moni aka'w endilisi kwa'waha moni ako'wini hi'alan. Ea' owa' anin ne'eha kogatala gwa'aisia, a' owa'atin. Ea' moni ako'wini biafin sa'wini a' nikila' moni hiani esis sagalani.”
Anom alipumi Jisasi ma'i basefa ipat lu'unai Godi ma'i, “Esis sofalo'ma ipat anamba otamba fasifasimi hiahaom fasimi esis amam nematawa sagaso'anam Godi.” Ea' Jisas na'i,
“Hiahaom amamba dei' pagatulumi, anef nemaf dondo'afi fegataga, ina atiasi anemba otamba bendatomama atin banagemba bepe, owa'atin. Asugulatam sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona atin hi'ilam.”
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, nemaf mamahefa amamba motaga? Ametal mamahina nili' netaga ma afa' ogogawa amamba felefele' mogataga?”

Jisas na'i, “Ipa' sisilawe pendape. Na'amba anis epes sombaso'mepa. Epes hiasi atiasi sifi'i si'i agol ae'agili si'i, ‘Ae' ea' ma'uwi.’ Ea' anis si'i, ‘Dei' nemaf ea' fafi'i felefele' ea'.’ Apa' kwawia', ipa' ina pefe' pila esis, owa'i.

Anef nemaf peme'asa basefa wandaf lu'wafi hiafi ea' anis si'i sondaiwa'ma amom gavman dembami mumafias sonda' wandaf. Nemaf afamba ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Hiahaom amamba ata' mili' motaga, apa' nemaf akutaifi ina fetaga kwafalis, ata' owa'.”

Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Anis epes sagape anip itap daiapi sofela wandaf sopa' soloma esis sagape anep itap daiapi. Anona aman dembinai king no'wa anis walemb hielimbi ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king daiana no'wa ananisi analemb walembi.

Anaf imauna lu'wani a' notaga itap hiagoma. Anagon daiagon nolom lu'una notagamas, ea' aowas lu'unai notaga walemb hiagoma. Esis atiasi siti gani ilif ametal lu'unai nogatagama hiahaom mamimami monda' epes ombel mogahahas endilisii.

“Apa' hiahaom amamba hiami ina a' motaga ulal, ata' owa'. Esis asili' sombalo' ipa' pahapifi pagaila basef ae'afii. Ea' sonda'epa kwapete'epa sohambombagepa. Sonda'mepa kot nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi sonda'epa penda' kalabus. Ea' sofa'epa pefe' sohaponepa pilutu nogohnaep amom king moloma gavman dembami.
Sonda'mepa waf afambai si'i ano'w ufia'wa pewalapa basef bu'wafi piga'ipasef.
Ea' ipa' pihapila nomonas ipe'isi sope banages, ama ipa' ina ukup pepoma anif basef pi'i pegagwamasef ulal, owa'i.
Dei' main, atiasi ae' atowe enda' basef fepe malogof ipe'igufi ese'epa gawa fasini ma bousi isimba ipe'isi ina a' la'ifisa sogagwa basef ifimba ae' igasi'ipafi, owa'.
Ahasepa mamasepa sahin owan ambeh esimbel atis ipe'isi soloma alipisi, esis wapani atiasi sowalapepa ma bousi ipe'isi. Ea' asoha anipa pega'.
Atiasi epes hiasi walemb hiagoma nelelemb numbutima ipa' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipa' pagaila basef ae'afii, na'amba dei' sahepa.
Apa' ipa' ina atiasi pega', owa'atin. Ina anef awif atetef fagape balagah ipe'igahii higililif, owa'atin.
Ipa' pepe banagepa ma anaf pegefa' ambal namili.”
“Nemaf afamba ipa' pigati soldia hiami esis bousii sifi'i sogonauli' Jerusalemafi, ipa' a' pegawa atiasi felefele'ma taun inimba lu'wani negataga awen.

Nemaf afamba amam nematawa sogape itap lu'wapi Judiai sofa' sefe' sondowasa'o halafutagw. Ea' esis amam nematawa sagape nomona Jerusalemi sokwaha wambel ambalemba sofa' sondafo'o laogon. Ea' isimba sagape aofah wambel ambalembai, ina ata' sofe' suwis, owa'.
Dei' main, nemaf afamba God a' nogwamasa awami isimba sonda' waf awafii si'i basef hiafi fagail buk Baibeli fendawalap alihif hi'igalef.

Nematawa opafuwai waloma awamba awasi ota'asi ata' saga' nomagof atogufi, ae' a'i awo uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota atamba ogame' akafimi lu'wami. Nimanimi amamba a' lu'um a'owa' motaga itap apa'e ma nembel wandafunai Godi atiasi nogafe'ma epes isimba.

Anis, bainagw mohas soga'. Anis, bousi sonda' kalabusimas sofa'as sefe' sope itap apa'e hiagoma hi'ilagon. Ea' epes isimba sogolalama Godi a' sotaga sofa'asa wambel ambalemba Jerusalem bo'wagah asasigahi sumafiagon. Ea' sope atapis sofe' na'amba atina nemaf God nandandepafi ma nogota asasitai hi'igalata.

“Atiasi ametal hianai notagama awin alipini owambini neloma ondowa. Ama itap apa'e amam nematawa hiasi sagape anep itap lu'upai bololas endilisi. Esis ombal mohas kwapete' ma naoh lu'wami mohafel lu'um mutuwi monda'am lilatin ea' sowa solopam.

Ea' ondowa maim magape gani ilifi mondakoto' bolatin fi'ife' mope. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi ombal mohas kwapete' sowa so'oh itap si'i sagaga'i. Esis ukup pepoma hiahaom amamba ma'i mogataga itap apa'e.
“Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Nogota atamba asiti ae' iloma ilagw otaga ilif ifi'i iloma hiahaom mogogala'i fasimi Godi moloma banagami ananimi.

Anef i'i hiahaom amamba mogataga, nemaf afamba ipa' pilutu pesaniga pesa'ma balagah ipe'igahi. Dei' main, nemaf afamba felefele'ma fegataga God nogatagwahepa ma waf awafi ipe'ifi nofa'epa pigatanimai.”
Jisas na'ipasa basef waminif atin na'i, “Ipa' piti lawag agamba fik goloma lawah hiagahi wapani.
Ipa' piti ilaof nogonafa ma basowa, pegawa nogota atamba nelemb ea' felefele'ma sogaof.
Ea' na'amba atin, i'i ipa' piti hiahaom amamba ae' ali' aga'ipipami mogataga, ipa' pegawa nemaf afamba God nope Dembinai nugumafi epes hiasi ananisi felefele'ma fegataga.
“Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' ata' pagapani ina atiasi pega' ulal, ata' owa', ipa' ea' piti hiahaom amamba hiami mogataga hi'igalam.
Otaga noloma itap hiagoma anaf a' higililam hi'ilam, apa' basef ae'afi ina higililif, owa'atin endilisi. Fegape atapif lifilafii. Amom alipumi Jisasi solawaim andeande'ma mindihi'ama waf hiafi awafi.

“Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma nemaf ae', igafi'afii. Na'amba penda' waf awafi pegalaga alop atopafi, pea' embel banagami atom hiami a' nomonas solasefe' ma nimanimi mamimami itapami atom. I'i waf afambai fisi'alipa hi'igalipa, atiasi nemaf afamba ae' igafi'afii fetagamepa kwafalis atis si'i sakwaha wambawa sagaha mafis.
Nemaf afamba fegataga ma amam nematawa sagape itap hiagomai ganigani ea' na'amba atin si'i wambawa ogofa' mafis.

Dondol ufilu wafilu silisilawi pendape ma ina penda' waf awafi afambai, owa'. Pepe pendabeten lifilafi ma God nogase'epa pepel pigalutu banagepama pindihi'ama hiahaom amambai ma'i mogatagamipai. Ama pigalutu banagepa ma ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi inifa'epa egawalogepa.”
Nimaguf hiafi dondol Jisas nape atapina nawalipa esis amam nematawa ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, apa' owamb a' nafe' na'ihi halafuta atamba Oliv.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sosafel kuhukuhumbita atota safi'mai anona sogame' basef ananifi ipat lu'unai Godi atapis dondol.
Felefele' ma nemaf sonda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi esis Juda soga' bret owa' togatef lu'utaia. Sofalaf sa'i nemaf bu'wafi Pasova felefele' ma fegataga.
Amom pris dembami maloma dembami amamba magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ombal mahama esis amam nematawa. Ea' ma'i, “Atiasi afa' oha Jisas wi'imama?”
Ea' Satan nawis nembel Judasi Keriotinai. Anen amom 12-pelaim alipumi Jisasi.
Anen nafe'ma anom pris dembami maloma anom plisman dembami mape ipat lu'unai Godi. Amom amamba ma'i basef mandame'maefa Judas nolaoma ufia'wa noso'ama Jisas nogafe' lagof amamugufi.
Ea' sonaham ma'i basef mandame'maefa mogaso'ana anemba otamba Judas.
Ea' anen na'i aho'ma basef amamifi, a' nala' nolaoma ano'w ufia'wa nigihimba'mama Jisas amoma mogombalo'ana. Anen nape ma anef nemaf kwahufi ma owa' anis amam nematawa sope soglomanafia.
Nemaf afamba fataga esis Juda sa'i sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi sea' anota bret owa' togatifia. Afamba sa'i soha anom sipsip hiami nogami ma sonda' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova.
Jisas nasapa' Pitai Jon na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pefe' pendondombamafa gwa'aisi isimba Pasova ma afa' ogwa'as.”
Ea' amom mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat anima?”
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Peme', ipa' pefe' piwis gani wambel lu'wambili, atiasi piti anona aman nofa' embel sospen lu'unai nitilipa ufia'w. Ea' pigi'mana pefe' piwis ipat atamba anen nefe' nogawisatai.
Ea' pihali' ahama ipat atambai pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i, ipat atamba esis saga'ohotai totawa ani? Anen na'i no'wa afa' atofa alipufai ope onda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova.’
Ea' anen nihimba'mepa rum amamba lu'wami mape ilif, tebol siaifah sa'oh atifis. Ipa' pendondomba gwa'aisi rum amamba.”
Ea' amom mafe' mati hiahawes isimba na'amba atin si'i Jisas nali' naga'ipamas ea' mandondomba gwa'aisi isimba Pasova.
Nogota atataga ma soga' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova, Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafi'i mape, anen nafe' nape felefele'ma tebol
na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'i ata' ea' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova elomepa uli', ma bola efa' akafimi lu'wami.

Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ina ata' ea' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova wapani, owa'. Apa' anef nemaf basefa gwa'aisi isimba Pasova kofagefa fetaga fendawalap alihif anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, dao' ea'as wapani.”
Ea' anen nasa'mai anop kap embel wain bagalapi nanifela God na'i, “Ipa' sa'ma gwa'aisi isimba pendandamas.

Ae' a'ipipa, dei' a' anaf wapani ae' ina atiasi ia' embel wainimbel elomepa, owa'. Ama anaf God nope Dembinai nugumafi epes hiasi soloma hiahaom hiami hi'igalam, dao' ae' a' ea' embel wain inimba wapani elomepa.”
Ea' anen nafelai bret nanifela God nawalota naso'am na'i, “Bret atamba alop ae'api. [Ae' ase'epata ma egatopalopepa. Penda'as atapisa ukup pegapoma ae'.”

Amom ma'asa hi'alas, a'i owa' main, ea' nanda'as na'amba atina anop kap embel wainimbel bagalapi, na'i, “Wain embel ambalemba amamba esimbel ae'ambeli bewa' banaga basef God nagala' lapafi dambaifi. Esimbel ambalemba ae' ekolo'wambela egatopalopepa.]
Apa' ipa' piti aman anamba na'i nogawalapa ae' ma amom boumi ae'amii, nape na' gwa'aisi nalome tebol ini'i.

Aho', ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi ega' si'i ufia'w fowa' gani God nandandepa'wi. Apa' aman anamba nogawalape ma amom boumii, ae' ati uwahipina a'owa'. Dei' main, nimanimi akafimi lu'wami a' motagamana.”
Anen na'ias na'amba, alipumi ananimi atom mandahahali'ma ma'i, “Epen afa'ini ami atiasi nenda' waf afambai?”
Amom alipumi Jisasi ma'i anif basef mafitapef ma'i, “Ami nepe dambeni afa'ini?”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amom king dembami esis hiasi sagape anep itap lu'upai, mape dembami asasimi manda'as kwapete'as. Amom banagami mumafi esis banagambel, ea' ma'i esis sofalam agof fasigufi si'i manda' waf fasifi mogatopalopasi.
Apa' ipa' ina penda'as na'amba, owa'i. Aman ami ni'i nogape a' dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nope si'i amamba agof akami si'i isimba sanda' maoli ma sogatopalopepa.
Epen ami dambeni nikila' anis daias? Epen natoma naga' gwa'aisi teboli a'a epen nanda' gwa'aisi nefa'as nagafi'manaii? Apa' ae' ape la'afena ipa' si'i nanda' maoli ma egatopalopepa.
Fowa' hiahaom amamba magagwamba ae'i, nimaguf ifimba ipa' pape pagalome, ipa' ina pakwahowe, owa'atin.
Ahame ae'anai nase'e agol lu'wagili na'ipi ape dembiwai, ea' na'amba atin ae' ese'epa agof lu'wagufi i'ipipa pepe dembipai king.

Nemaf afamba ipa' a' pepe dembipai king peloma ae' pea' gwa'aisi embel pelome tebol ae'ani anamba God nagala'ambemagoma. Ea' pepe siaifah fasimi amom dembami kingi, pewawaloga misi'ah 12-pelaih amam nematawa ape'isi Israel.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Saimon, Saimon, ina' neme'. God na'i aho'ma Satan nogwamba ipa' ma penda' waf awafi si'i sogogakisa rais ama bu'wami mafe' anagon awami magafe' anagon daiagon.
Apa' owa' atin. Ae' andabetena egatopalopena ma banagena nigahapifa ae' atapina. Atiasi nembema nembel newa' banaga owapena ine'imi.”
Owa' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ea' anda'as dumbulidombola elomena ogafe' kalabus. Ae' anda'as dumbulidombola ega' egalomena wapani.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Pita, ae' a'ipina endilisi! Atiasi owamb amba'e awata ata' owa' totaea, ina' a' nendahali'mi ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisasa.’”

Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom na'i, “Fowa' ae' asapa'epa pandailagof pagafe', ipa' ina pefa' paos monisi saloma brasbeli su, owa'. Pafe' dowaf. Nemaf afamba anis hiahawes akepa a'a owa'?” Amom magwas ma'i, “Owa'atin.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Apa' dei' aman ami paos monisi saga'omanai anen a' nofa'as. Ea' brasbel wapani na'amba atin. Aman bainat akanai anen noso'asa saket ananitai anis sotalota, notala anota bainat.

“Dei' main, anif basefa ae' felefele'ma fetaga fendawalap. Anif basef fagail Buk Baibeli fowa' faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Esis nomonas sondanda'me si'i ae' aman auwai atowe.’ Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Basef ifimba felefele' fetaga endilisi ma nimanimi akafimi waf awafi atiasi mogataga ma ae'i.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' niti. Afa' bainagw biagw agwa'e.” Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amamba.”
Ea' Jisas nakwaha taun nawis ando' a' nafe' halafuta Oliv, si'i dondol nanda'as. Ea' alipumi ananimi magi'mana mafe'.
Anen nataga na'amba na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pendabetena hiahaom nogagwamba ipe'i ina a' motagamepa, owa'.”
Ea' nakwaha amom nindisi'ah nafo'o kwasakwasala, nogota bandata si'i aman nakwaha anom otam mafe' mogatambela. Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa nandabeten na'i,
“Ahame, i'i ina' niga'i awima, dao' nekwahome kap apamba. Apa' owa', ina' nindaila okom ine'imi atom, ae' owa'.”
[Ea' anona ensel nafi'i heven nowa' banagona.
Jisas name'agama nimanimi akafimi ea' aom endilisi, ea' nandabeten banagambel a'owa', agwah mandona si'i esimbel magalo itap.]
Anen nandabeten ea' nosafel nafe'ma alipumi ananimi. Owa' nati amom ukup iwanipi panda'am ma'oh atin.
Ea' na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' paga'oh? Ipa' safel pendabeten. Na'amba hiahaom mogogwambipai a' mifi'i motagamepa.”

Jisas ata' na'i atin, owa' amam mini'ap launai a' mafi'i. Aman anamba sofalana sa'i Judas, anen alipunai amom 12-pelaim Jisasi, nafi'i nali'ai amom. Anen nafi'i felefele'ma Jisasa nogasisi' dalogw ananigwi.
Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Judas, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Ina' nasisi'i nihimba'ma amom boumi ae'ami, a'a?”
Alipumi ananimi mape malomana mati amom boumi Jisasi ma'i mohana ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i afa' oham bainagw?”
Owa' anona amom alipumi ananimi naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii ea' natopa' aliga kwahisigai pele'ataga gowa.
Owa' Jisas nataloga amom na'i, “Kwaha waf afambai, ea' hapaifi.” Ea' Jisas nasa lagol aliga aman anambai, gataga bo'oga wapani.

Ea' Jisas na'ipa agufumi maloma amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami mugumafi polisman hiamii ipat lu'unai Godi, mafi'i ma'i mogombalo'anai. Na'i, “Ipa' pefa'i bainagwi belep pafi'i si'i pa'i pegewa' anona aman nanda' wali a'a?

Nimaguf hiafi dondol ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wafi ma esis amam nematawa hiasi apa' ipa' owa' Pembale'ea. Apa' dei' nogota ata'e a' nemaf ipe'ifi. Dei' banagami owamb akuti a' mikila'.”
Jisas na'iasa ea' amom mahapilana mofa'ana mafe' mawis ipat pris dembinaii. Apa' Pita ina nalomam nafe' atef, owa', nagigi'mam nafe' nail laogon.
Esis sakata nif indalelemb ambalemba nomon ipat tagapoma mapomef. Ea' Pita nape nalomam.
Ano'w nemata'w kwanda' maoli kwati anen napoma nif. Ea' kwatotolona kwa'i, “Aman anamba wapani anen nape nagaloma Jisasi.”
Apa' Pita na'i, “Ahae', ae' owa'.” Anen na'i, “Nemata'w, ae' ina egawa anen, owa'.”
A'i owa' nogota laota kwasala, anona aman nati Pita na'i, “Ina' wapani ina' aman mini'ap amamipi.” Owa' Pita na'i, “Ahae', ae' owa'.”
A'i nogota laota kwasakwasala tafe' owa', anona aman daiana na'i banagambel na'i, “Endilisi atis, aman anamba wapani nape nagaloma anini. Dei' main, anen wapani Galilinai atona.”
Owa' Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Ahae', ae' owa' egawa basef ifimba ine'ifia.” Anen ata' na'ias na'amba atin, owa' awata a' tata.

Ea' Dembinai nandambema a' natiti Pita, owa' okom Pitai mandanda' ma basef ifimba doko' Dembinai na'ipanafi naga'i, “Owamb amba'e awata ata' owa' totaea, ina' atiasi a' nembaso'mas ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ina' owa' negawea.’”
Ea' Pita nawisi nafe' ando' nalef mehip.
Amom mugumafi Jisasi manda' anen findiwana mahana.
Amom mapete' anef lowaf mambaho'mana naep mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' ni'i basef profeti newalapa ami nagahinai.”
Ea' manda' basef hiafi daif awafi wapani ma anen.
Ama awin natafi amom agufumi dembami esis Judai maloma amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, amom hiami mondowa'anima mape. Ea' mofa' Jisas mafi'mai amom mahali'ana ma'i,
“Ina' ni'ipafa. Ina' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii a'a owa'?” Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “I'i ae' iga'ipipa, ina atiasi pihapifi.
Ea' i'i igahali'ipa ma anif basef, ipa' ina pegwa basef ae'afi, owa'.
Ea' dei' a' anaf gani owagama wapani ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi egape wa'ol lagol kwahisigili Godi banagagili.”
Ea' amom hiami ma'i, “Dei' ina' a' God Nogamana a'amon?” Anen nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' pa'ias ea' ma'wis.”
Ea' amom ma'i, “Afa' wa'i ata' ome' basef mamahifa wapani? Owa'. Malogol ananigili atogol ea' ga'i basef ifimba afa' wame'ef ea'.”
Ea' amom dembami hiami mosafel mofa' Jisas mafe'ma dembinai gavman Pailat.

Ea' ma'i masapagana manda'mana basef ma'i, “Afa' wati aman anamba nanda' waf awafi nasa'ma ukup epes hiasii ma sonda' wandaf sogaloma gavman. Anen nandaiwa'ma mogaso'ana takis gavman dembinai Sisar ea' na'ipapa na'i anen atona anona dembinai king Krais.”
Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' king dembinai Judai a'a owa'?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef ifimba ina' naga'iefi endilisifi.”
