Ea' Pailat na'ipa amom pris dembami maloma esis amam nematawa hiasi na'i, “Ae' ina ati anis maefah awasi, owa'. Ina ati anef waf awafima aman anamba enda'mana anif basef, owa'.”

Owa' amom manda'mana basef Jisasi ma'ipana banagambel ma'i, “Anen naso'asa basef esis amam nematawa hiasi sosafel banages sa'i sonda' wandafa ganimba walemb hielimbi Judia. Anen nanda'i maol gani itap lu'upa Galili ea' nafi'i nataga na'a.”
Pailat name' basef ifimba saga'ifa anini ma nanda' maol nagafe'agon hi'alagon anamba hiagoma itap apamba Galili ea' nahali' amom na'i, “Aman anamba anen Galilinai a'a?”
Amom ma'ipana ea' nogawa Jisas anen Galilinai gavman dembinai Herot nugumafiagoma. Ea' Pailat nasapa'ana nafe'ma Herot. Nogota atamba Herot ata' napani Jerusalem.

Herot nati Jisas asonahanamana a'owa'. Anen name' basefa anen nogota lautai, ea' na'i notolona. Anen name' basefa maol Jisas nanda'ani ea' na'i Jisas ata' nonda' anom banagami si'i God nanda'ami ma ata' notolom.
Ea' Herot nahali'anama hiahaom hiami. Apa' Jisas ina nagwamana anif basef anen, owa'.
Amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mafi'i malutu felefele' manda'mana kot masapagana banagambel a'owa'.
Ea' Herot nao'wa amom soldia ananimi manda' Jisas findiwana ma basef awafi. Ea' mofa'ai anef lowaf fasifi mowaho'manaf masapa'ana notanima nafe'ma Pailat.
Fowa' Herot naloma Pailat manda' migimigahi, apa' dei' nemaf afamba a' alipumi mandandomboma atogon.
Ea' Pailat nofalai amom pris dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai maloma esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i sandakolas.

Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' fa'ai aman anamba pa'i nasa'ma ukup epes hiasii nahambombagasa sanda' wandafi fi'mai ae'. Doko' ahali'ana ma hiahawes isimba ma nogohnaep ipe'isi a' pame'. Ae' ina ati anom maefah awami ma aman anamba ma hiahawes isimba ipa' panda' basefasi, owa'.
Dembinai gavman Herot wapani na'amba atin. Dei' main, anen nasapa'ana notanima nafi'mai apa'. Ipa' pegawa aman anamba ina nanda' anin mae awani ma apa' mohana nogaga', owa'atin.
Atiasi ehana atin ekwahona nefe' wahifina.”
[Apa' waf esis Judai fagape na'amba. Afagof danda nemaf afamba sanda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova gavman dembinai Pailat natagwahowa anona nanda' kalabusi nafe' wahifina ma esis.]
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi gigal sa'oh na'amba sa'i, “Ha aman anamba ma a' noga', ea' tagwaha Barabas nifi'mai apa'.”
Aman anamba Barabas anen napa' nagaloma amom gavmani ma taun inimba lu'wani ea' naha epes hiasi saga'. Ea' dei' sanda'ana nanda' kalabus.
Pailat na'i nokwahowa Jisas nefe' wahifina, ea' nahali'as wapani.
Owa', soga sa'i mehip sa'i, “Hana noga', hana noga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.”

Ea' Pailat notambel nahali'as wanif wapani na'i, “Dei' nanda' waf maif awafi? Ae' ina ati anef waf awafi kofagefa fapoma aman anamba ma apa' mohana nogaga', owa'atin. Ae' i'ipa amom soldia mopopagahana ea' ekwahona nefe' wahifina.”
Apa' owa' owa'atin, esis gigal sa'oh mehip sa'i anen nohana nondaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Ea' basef asasifi fapa'aga basef Pailati.
Ea' Pailat nasopama malogol ananigili naila nomonas asasisi.

Aman anamba nanda' wandaf nagaloma gavmani naha anis sagaga'i, sanda'ana nape nanda' kalabus, Pailat nakwahona nafe'mas wahifina. Esis sa'ipa Pailat sa'i anen notanima nokwahona kalabus nifi'mai esis wapani, ea' nagi'ma nomonas asasisi nakwahona nafe'mas wahifina naso'asa Jisas nafe'ma esisa amom soldia mofa'ana mofe' mogahana.

Amom soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' ea' mati anona aman Saimon, anen anop nomopunai anep itap Sairininai, napani alup nafi'i na'i nofe' nuwis wambel taun lu'wagoma. Ea' molaepana masasapa'ana nowandefa lawag agamba usi'igai ti'wanaegai ikaf ananifi nofa'aga nigi'ma Jisas nogafe'.
Ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi safe' sagi'mana a anowa nematawa wapani wafe' walef windiwagef wa'i uwahipigai ma anen.
Owa' Jisas nandambema na'ipawa na'i, “Ipa' nematawa Jerusalamipai, ipa' ina pelopa ae', owa'. Ipa' pendalopa ipa' peloma awasi ipe'isi, andeande'.
Dei' main, anef nemaf fegataga anis epes ea' si'i, ‘Awo nematawa owa' ata' ogola awasia, ea' awamba owa' ogaso' nomambeha awasia, awamba atiasi ope andeande' sonohawa.’
Nemaf afamba esis asi'ipa halafutagw si'i, ‘Ipa' piwai pipai'apa pese'alepa!’ Ea' esis si'ipa damotagw si'i, ‘Ipa' so'alepa.’
Dei' esis sanda' waf awafi ma lawag namugai. Apa' atiasi lawag agamba gogataga aliaga, gope gi'imama?
Ea' amom soldia mofa' amam biam manda' waf awafii ma'i moham moga' moloma Jisas.

Ea' safe' sataga anagon sofalagon saga'i Pipitagol Balagaigil. Anamba amom soldia magandola Jisas lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegaima. Ea' mandola anom biam manda' waf awafii manda' wali mandolam mail wa'owa'ol Jisas nail la'afen.

Ea' Jisas na'ipa God na'i, “Ahame, ina' nekwahowa waf awafi amom manda'meaf ae'i, okom mose'enaf. Amom ina mogawa andeande' hiahaom amamba manda'meam ae'i, owa'.” Ea' manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma ami nigikila'i mofa'ef mondondamef atona atin.

Ea' esis amam nematawa salutu sape satolona same' amom agufumi esis Judai manda' salamalana manda'iafana ma'i, “Anen nandatopalopa anis daias. Apa' endilisi anen Krais God nogosaho'anaiai, ata' notopalopa anen atona nondatagwah nisila'i.”
Amom soldia wapani manda' salamalana manda'iafana. Ea' mafi'i felefele'ma anen ma'i moso'ana anambel embel wainimbel numbutimbeli.
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “I'i endilisi ina' dembinai king Judaiai, dao' ina' ata' netopalopa ina' atina.”
Anif basef fagail lawag agamba ilifa balaga ananigaii faga'ias fa'i, “AMAN ANAMBA DEMBINAI KING ESIS JUDAI.”
Ea' anona aman nanda' waf awafii nagail wa'ili na'i basef awafima Jisas na'i, “Ina' Krais endilisiai, ina' ata' netopalopa ina' nili' ea' netopalopafa wapani.”
Owa' anona nagail wa'ili nagagaolana na'i, “Ina' nefa' akafimi na'amba atin si'i aman anamba. Ina' owa' ombal mohenama Goda?
Amom soldia maha afa' oga' andeande' wandahama waf awafi afa' wanda'afi. Apa' aman anamba ina nanda' waf awafi, owa'atin.”
Ea' nandambema na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Jisas, anaf ina' negataga dembinai king, nemaf afamba ina' okom mondanda'ma ae'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, ina' dei' a' nepe nelome wambel bu'wambili Paradais.”
Awin a'i owa' nandasapa', akot lu'unai a' nataga dogw naofana itap hiagoma esis Judai nape nafe' nafe' nataga awin nandambema nagape gani 3 klok wambomota. Ea' nataga negala' wapani.
Ea' anona lowaf lu'unai si'i utai nagail ipat Godi lu'unai nomoni palalana hi'alana nandawal nataga biafina.
Ea' Jisas galala mehip na'i, “Ahame ae'inai, ae' a' ese'enago ambal ae'ali lofo'o lagol ine'igili.” Anen na'ias na'ambama ea', naga' dogw.
Ea' kepten nugumafi amom soldiai nalutu nati hiahaom amamba ea' nasa'ma agol Godi na'i, “Endilisi atis, aman anamba bu'unai.”
Ea' amam nematawa isimba hiasi safi'i sandakolasa sagati hiahaom amamba magatagai, satolom ea' saha mefetagw asasigwi sindihihimba' nomonas asasisi iwanis a'owa' ea' sotanima safe'.
Esis alipisi hiasi Jisasi saloma anowa nematawa wagafi'i itap lu'upa Galilii wagi'ma Jisas wafi'i, esis salutu laogon felefele' sati hiahaom amamba.
Anona aman agilinama Josep anen Arimateainai itap lu'upa Judia. Anen aman bu'unai, kaunsel dembinai ma amom mugumafi esis Juda hiasii.
Anen ina na'i aho'ma amom dembami Juda moha Jisas nogaga', owa'atin. Anen nape nahafa nemaf bu'wafi fegataga ma epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias.
Aman anamba nafe'ma Pailat nahali'ana ma nogofa'i alop Jisasi nogawana.

Ea' nafe' natagwaha alop Jisasi nisila'i, nanda' anef lowaf afitifi nopalo'ana ma nombafana, nasapa'ana nawis matmat atamba nalana nomon. Matmat atamba sagwasota tawis anona otam lu'unai. Fowa' esis ina dei' sawa anin epenagon, ata' owa' atin.
Nemaf afamba sa'i sogowando'ma hiahawesafi nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat felefele'ma fegataga.
Nematawa awamba Galiliwai waloma Jisas wagafi'ii, awo doko' wagi'ma Josep wali' wafe' wati matmat atamba. Ea' wati nomon na'amba Josep nagawa Jisasa.

Watolona ea' otanima wafe' ifagw awaugwi, wandondomba wel laloma hiahawes alogw fasigwi gwagasi ma bimb ofa'as ofe' matmat ogandisa alop Jisasi. Nemaf afamba sabat fataga, wapoma noma'w si'i mu'uli Godi naga'i.

Ama main wafilu nemaf afamba sande fagali'ma wik agambai kuhumbita atota awo osafel wafe' matmat. Agufuwama awamba. Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w awo agol atogol Maria ma'mana Jemsi waloma Joana ea' waloma anowa daiawa wapani. Ea' ofa' wel mais alogw fasigwi gwagasi awo wali' wagandondombasi, ofa'as wafe' matmat.
Ea' watologon owa', wati otam anamba ina ata' mape mowalo uta, owa'. Anin epen a' nafe' nawisi'am mafe' ma'oh wa'oh.
Ea' wawis nomon apa' awo ina wati Jisas, owa'atin.
Ea' awo nomonas salasafe' hiahiasa isimba. Owa' kwafalis atis wati anom amam biam malutu felefele' luwaguf amamifi mogala' a'owa'.

Ea' awo ombal mahawa a'owa' windiwa balagah wati itap. Owa' amom ma'ipawa ma'i, “Ipa' pafi'i pelaoma aman anamba ambal lagapaunai ma na'a epes sagaga'i ma main? Anen ina ata' nape na'a, owa'. A' nosafel ea'!
Ipa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba fowa' nali' naga'ipipafi. Nemaf afamba ata' nape nagalomepa ganimba itap apamba Galili na'ipipa na'i,
‘Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Esis atiasi sese'e efe'ma amom manda' waf awafii, mondele lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Ma nimaguf bif hi'ilif, anef wapani a' itanima esafel.’”
Ea' awo ukup pandanda'ma basef ifimba fowa' naga'iefi.
Ea' wakwaha matmat otanima wafe' wa'ipa amom alipumi ananimi 11-pelaim maloma anis alipisi hiasi ananisi wapani ma hiahawes isimba.
Nematawa awamba wanowa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Joanai ano'w Maria Jems ma'mana. Awo wape waloma anowa daiawa wa'ipa amom aposel 11-pelaim.
Owa' amom ma'i awo wambaso'mam wa'i basef gawa akafi, owa' mohapifawaia.
Apa' Pita nosafel nasagih nafe' matmat nasisil nati nomon owa', nati luwaguf mogowa'anami atom ma'oh. Ea' notanima nafe' ipat nomonas salasafe'ma hiahawes isimba sagatagai.
Nemaf afamba anom amam biam alipumi Jisasi mosafel a' mafe' anambel wambel sa'umbili felefele' agilimbila Emeus. Ufia'w akwamba kwa'waha Jerusalem kwagafe' Emeusi nohotagw 7-pelaigw, 14 kilomita.
Amom mafe' ea' manifa hiahawes isimba dei' sagatagai.
Amom ma'ias mandahahali'mas mafe', ea' Jisas nataga felefele' nafe' nalomam.
Apa' naep amamipi walufip, ina mati Jisas mogawana, owa'atin.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pa'i main pafe'?” Nahali'am na'amba, ukup amamipi iwaiwanip malutu.
Ea' anona amom biam Kliopas nagwamana basef na'i, “Epes hiasi sagape Jerusalami sati hiahaom amamba magataga nemaf afa'ii sogawam. Apa' ina' atina owa' negawaia.”

Anen na'ias na'amba, Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Main da'im?” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Hiahaom amamba magatagama Jisas Nasaretinai. Anen dembinai profet naga'ipa esis amam nematawa basef fasifi banagafi. Anen banagonai ma nawalipasa basef ifimba nanda' maol banagani ma naep Godi naloma epes wapani.
Ea' amom pris dembami maloma agufumi dembami ape'imi maso'amana nafe'ma amom gavman dembami. Ea' amom gavman ma'i basefa mohana nogaga'. Ea' mandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
Apa' fowa' afa' ukup pa'i endilisi wa'i, ‘Aman anamba nogatagwaha apa' Israel mogape wahifipai.’ Aho', ea' anif basef wapani. Hiahaom amamba mataga ea' nemaf dei'ifi fagafe' wanifi.
Dei' anowa nematawa afa'iwai mini'ap atep wanda'afa gogolalasofa kwapete'. Kuhimbita atota osafel wafe' matmat,
apa' awo ina wati Jisas, owa'atin. Ea' otanima wa'ias wa'i, ‘Afa' wati anom ensel si'i wa'oh wandanda'ah watolom ma'ipafa ma'i. “Anen nosafel nape namona.”’
“Ea' anom amam afa'imi mafe' matmat mati hiahawes na'amba atin si'i awo waga'ias. Apa' anen ina matolona, owa'atin.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “O, ipa' bipa nomonas akipai. Ukup ipe'imi ea' mase'epa, ina pahapifa basef amom profeti kwafalis, owa'.
Krais anen ata' nili' nofa' akafimi ma main, a' nofa' banagami mogogala'i ananimi migi'. Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegegawaea?”
Ea' nali' nasefela basef hiafi Baibelifi amom profet maloma Moses manda'afi nawalipamef. Na'ipam basef ifimba hiafi faga'i anini nawalipamef kofagefa hi'alef.
Amom mafe' mataga felefele'ma wambel ambalemba ma'i mogafe'ma. Ea' Jisas na'i ata' nofe' atin,
owa' matalifana ma'i, “Ina' nepe nelomafa. Awin ea' newala felefele'ma owamb.” Ea' nawis nape nalomam.
Amom ma'i mea' gwa'aisi, anen nape nalomam nasa'ma bret nanifela God nawalota naso'amata.
Anen nanda'asa amom na'amba naep amamipi pele'atep dei' ea' mogawana. Ea' nosafel nafe' nakwaha amom dolomana.
Ea' ma'i, “Afa' wagafi'i ufia'w ukup afa'ipi ea' pehafel endilisi ma anen nawalapa basef fagape Baibel naga'ipafaef nogota atamba.”
Amom ma'ias na'amba owa', nogota atamba atota mosafel a' motanima mafe' Jerusalem. Ea' mati alipumi 11-pelaim Jisasi maloma anis alipisi amamisi amamisi sandatama sape.
Ea' sa'ipa amom biam sa'i, “Endilisi atis Dembinai a' notanima nosafel! Saimon natolona ea'.”
Ea' amom biam ma'ipasa hiahawes doko' magatilis ufia'wi. Ma'ipasas ma'i, “Anen nalomafa wape nawala bret watolona ea' ogawana.”
Esis ata' sa'i basef ifimba atin, owa' Jisas a' nalutu la'afena esis na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'i opalef ipe'ilifi fepe awanelef.”
Ea' satolona sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' a' ombal mahas. Esis sa'i owa' sati anona gamba.
Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' gogolalasipa kwapete' ma main? Dei' maina ukup ipe'ipi palapagafe'?
Ipa' piti lagufi bo'wagah ae'asi. Ae' atowe ea' ma'uwi ape si'iwi. Ipa' pesa lagofa ae' peme'e. Gambefah ina alopi bihitagof mapais si'i pagati magape alop ae'apii, owa'atin.”
Anen na'ias na'amba ma ea', nihimba'masa lagof bo'wagah ananisi.
Ea' sonahasa anen. Apa' esis gogolalasis kwapete' nomonas sape hiahawes, owa' ata' sohapifanaia. Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Ipa' anis gwa'aisi a'a owa'?”
Ea' saso'ana anol aol du'wanil sagaofali.
Nandalombasal na'al ama nogohnaep asasisi.

Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Fowa' ae' ata' ape agalomepa, a'ipipa ea' ma basef hiafi fagail buk Baibeli ma mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani. Buk akwamba amom profeti faloma buk Sami, basef ifimba hiafi faga'i ae'i. Basef ifimba hiafi dei' fataga endilisi fandawalap hi'alef.”
Anen nihimba'mas andeande'ma ukup asasipi ma sogogawa basef fagail Buk Baibeli.
Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Fowa' amom manda' basef ifimba fagail buk Baibeli fa'i Krais a' nondame' akafimi sohana noga' ma nimaguf bif hi'ilif anef fegafe'ma wanifi, dao' notanima nosafel matmat wapani.

Ama agol ananigili atiasi alipisi ananisi sili' sowalapa basef Jerusalem ea' si'ipasef amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas sagape walemb hiagomai ma sembema nelelemba God nokwahomasa awami asasimi okom mogaso'anam.
Ipa' apati hiahaom amamba magatagamai ma atiasi piga'ipa hiasi.

Ipa' peme! Anom hiahaom banagami fowa' Ahame na'iam endilisi na'i nogasi'ipami felefele' mifi'mipai. Ipa' pendape atapipa taun inimba pefe'ma petaga nemaf afamba banagami mugisila'i heven ilifi mogafi'mai ipa'.”
Jisas nao'wa esis amam nematawa hiasi safe' sataga felefele'ma Betani ea' nasa'ma lagof falota nofalo'masa nogowa' banagas.
Anen ata' na'ipasa atin, God a' nagiana nakwaha esis nalota heven.
Ea' sanifelona sanda' lotumana ea' sandagala a'owa' sotanima safe' Jerusalem sandagala atapis sape.
Ea' dondol sagape ipat lu'unai Godi safela agol ananigili lu'wagol endilisi. Ea' ma'uf.
Fowa' gani dambadamba anif Basef epen nape. Ea' Basef epen anamba nape naloma God. Ea' epen anamba agilinama Basef anen atona God.
Fowa' dambadamba epen anamba agilinama Basef naloma God nape.
Anen nanda' hiahaom hiami. Owa' anin mae atitin netaga ano'w ufia'wa, owa'atin. Hiahaom magatagai hiami anen atona nanda'am mataga.
Ambal namili lagapaunai lape epen anamba ea' ambal alol logogala'ma esis epesi.
Mogogala'i amamba mogogala'ma akuti. Ea' akot ina taofana anen, owa' atin endilisi. Anen nogogala'ma esis amam nematawa hiasii, anen ea' nafi'i itap apa'e ma dei' nogota ata'e.
Anona aman daiana nataga, agilinama Jon, God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
Anen nafi'i ma nogowalapa basef. Dei' nawalapa basefa nogogala'i anamba ma epes hiasi sogame' basef ananifi sogahapifana.
Jon nawalapa basef ifimba na'i anen ina nagwapin inimba nigigala'i, owa'. Anen nali' nafi'ima nogawalapa basef alihifa nagwapin anamba endilisinai nogogala'i.
Nagwapin anamba nogogala' endilisii, anen nogogala'ma esis amam nematawa hiasii, ea' nafi'i itap apa'e ma dei' nogota ata'e.
Fowa' gani anen nanda' itap apa'e pataga, dei' nafi'i nape itap apa'e. Apa' esis amam nematawa sagape itap apa'ii ina sogawana, owa'.
Anen nafi'i nataga kofagama itap lu'upa esis Juda, owa' esis mini'ap ananisi ina sogawana sa'i aho' sofa'ana sahapifana, owa'atin.
Apa' esis mamahisa sogawana si'i aho' sogahapifanai, noso'asa anin ametala sogataga awasi Godi.
Esis ina sataga awasi Godi ma waf bu'wafi mamasas sogolasi, owa'atin. Esis ina sataga awasi Godi si'i ukup mamasas pa'i ma sogolas, owa'atin. God atona nanda'as sataga awasi ananisi.

Basef fataga epen ea' nape la'afena afa', ea' wati glori mogogala'i banagami ananimi. Glori amamba mogogala'i banagami nogamanai atom, ahamana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Anen natopalopapa dowaf nowa' banagapa ma nigihimba'mapa waf endilisifi fape si'ifa anen.
Jon nawalapa basefa anen na'amba na'i, “Anen aman anamba fowa' a'ipipana aga'i. Aman nigi'ma ae' nogafi'ii, anen nape nagali'ma ae'i. Anen fowa'inai nagapan na'ambai, nape nali'ma ae'.”
Apa' hiapai mofa' hiahawes fasisi sagape si'isa anini. Waf afamba natopalopapa dowaf nogowa' banagapa nanda'as sandape na'amba atin nimaguf hiafi.
God naso'ana mu'uli ananini Mosesa nagawalipapa. Apa' Jisas Krais natopalopapa dowafa waf endilisifi.

Owa' anona aman atotona nili' niti God kwasakwasalaia, owa'atin endilisi. Nogamana anamba Godi atotona nape felefele' endilisi naloma anen ahamana ea' nawalapa basef kofagefa ma apa' nihimba'mapa God.

Anom amam dembami Judaimi mapani Jerusalem masapa'i anom amam mafe' mahali' Jon. Anom pris maloma anom Livai mugumafi ipat Godii, amom mapani Jerusalem mafi'i mahali' Jon ma'i, “Ina' aman mamahinama?”
Ea' Jon ina nambaho' basef, owa'. Anen nagwamam nawalapa basef na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ina Krais God nandandepe nasapa'e agafi'ii, owa'.”
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' ina anina profet fowa'inai agilinama Elaija?” Owa' anen na'i, “Ae' owa'.” Ea' ma'i, “Dei' ina' aman anamba profet apa' mape mogohafanai?” Owa' nagwamama basef na'i, “Owa'.”
Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' ina' ami? Ama afa' utanima ofe' uga'ipa dembami masapa'afa wagafi'ii. Ina' na'i ina' atina na'i basef maif, ina' ami?”
Ea' Jon nagwa basef si'i fowa' profet Aisaia naga'i na'i, “Ae' anagol malogol dowaf goga ga'i anep itap fataupigima gaga'ias na'amba ga'i, ‘Pendomba ufia'w Dembinaii!’

Ea' amom Farisi dembami Judai masapa'am mafi'i mogahali' anini mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' Krais God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii a'a, ina' Elaija a'a, ina' anona profet dembinai? I'i ina' owa' Kraisa, a owa' Ilaijaia, anona profeta, dei' ina' napisi'asa main?” Jon nagwamam na'ipam na'i,
“Ae' agapisi'as embel atembeli, apa' anona aman anamba nape la'afena ipa', ipa' ina pegawana.
Aman anamba nagi'ma ae' nagafi'ii. Ae' ina ambo'owe a'owa' egatagwaha mandalefa su ananimi, owa'atin. Anen dembinai a'owa', nikila' ae'.”
Basef ifimba fataga anambel wambel Betani walemb Jordan fisanamb, Jon nagapisi' esis amam nematawama.

Wafilu owa', Jon nati Jisas nafi'mai anen na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Ipa' piti aman anamba anen si'i mafin sipsip noganai Godi, anamba esis sanda' ofa anai. Anen si'i sipsip nogakwaha waf awafi esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi sanda'afi.
Anen ma'una apamba ea' nafi'i. Anamba fowa' ae' a'ipipa aga'i, ‘Anona aman nigi'ma ae' nogafi'ii, anen nagali'ma ae'i. Anen a' nali' nape apa' ae' selai agi' ataga.’
Ae' ina a' egawa anen epen mamahonama, ata' owa'atin. Ae' afi'i apisi'ipa embela egawalapa aman anamba dembinai ma apa' amam nematawa Israel.”
Ea' Jon nawalapa basef alihif na'i, “Ae' ea' ati Ambal bu'unai Godi nakwaha heven nisila'i si'i amil alamba apa' maga'i ma'unai nisila'i ea' nafe' nape nomona anen.

Ae' ina egawa anen, owa'. Apa' God nasapa'e afi'i ma igapisi'as embel ea' na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' niti Ambal bu'unai Ae'anai nisila'o ma nogapaunai aman anamba, ea' ma'una ea' aman anamba. Anen atiasi nogaso'as Ambal Ae'anai bu'unai nogape opalef asasilifi nomoni.’
Ae' ea' atolona endilisi awalapa basef alihifa anen a'if a'i, Anamba anen Nogamana Godi endilisi.”
A'i owa' wafilu Jon a nafe' nalutu wapani na'amba ea' alipumi ananimi biam malomana mape.
Ea' nati Jisas nafo'o, na'ipa alipumi ananimi nihimba'mama Jisas na'i, “Piti, anen si'i sipsip noganai Godi.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi mame' na'ipas na'amba, maila Jisas.

Jisas nandambema owa' nati amom mailana na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pa'i pifi'i pelaoma main?” Owa' ma'ipana ma'i, “Rabai, ina' nagapoma ipat ati?” Agol agalemba “Rabai” apa' mombomagol mi'i, “Dembinai Tisa.”
Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fi'i ma ata' petologon.” Ea' mafe' ipat anen nagapautai. Nemaf afamba atef wambomota awin nandambema napani gani wa'ol 4 klok, ea' malomana mapani.
Amom mame' basef ifimba Jisasi Jon naga'iefi mailana. Amom agufuma Andrui Saimon Pita, amom atom sahomana owamana.

Andru a' ata' usi'ina notanima nali' nafe' nowando'ma Saimon, ama ni'ipana niga'i, “Afa' wati Dembinai Mesaia ea'.” Apa' dei' mambema agol agalemba Mesaia ma'i Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
Ea' Andru nao'wa Saimon nafi'mai Jisas natolona na'i, “Ina' Saimon nogama Joni. Anaf agol ine'igili a' nendefala Sifas.” Agol kofagogola agalemba “Pita” ga'i otam.
Wafilu wapani Jisas na'i nefe' itap apamba lu'upa Galili. Ea' nowando'ma Filip natolona na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fi'i nigi'ma basef ae'afi nila ae'.”
Filip nafi'i wambel ambalemba atembel Pitai Andru magafi'ima, Betsaida.

Ea' Filip nafe' nolaoma Nataniel na'ipana na'i, “Aman anamba fowa' Moses nanda' basefa mu'uli God naga'ianai, ea' amom profet wapani manda' basef maga'ianai, aman anamba ma'una afa' ea' watolona. Anen aman Nasaretinai, Josep nogamana.”
Ea' nahali' Filip na'i, “Dei' anis hiahawes fasisi sataga safi'i Nasaret?” Filip na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fi'i netelona.”
Ea' Jisas nati Nataniel nafi'mai anen na'ipana na'i, “Niti aman anamba Israelinai endilisi, aman bu'unai. Anen owa' niga'i anif basef baso'asefia.”

Ea' Nataniel na'ipana na'i, “Dei' ina' negawe na'imama?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Doko' Filip ina dei' nofalena, ata' owa'atin, ae' ali' atilina nagape lawag fik kofagegama. Nogota atamba atilina.”
Nataniel nagwamana na'i, “Tisa Dembinai, ina' Nogamana Godi endilisi. Ina' dembinai King apa' Israeli.”

Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'i, “Ae' doko' ea' ali' atilina egawena nagape lawag kofagegama. Isimba atis dei' ina' nahapifi. Endilisi anaf ina' a' niti anom hiahaom banagami mikila' dei' atilina nagape laogon.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana wapani na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi atis, anaf ipa' piti heven nundausi' nogal ea' amom ensel Godi lota sila'mima ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.”
Anef nemaf fagafe'ma wanifi anona aman naso' ano'w nemata'w wambel ambalemba Kana bagape itap apamba lu'upa Galilii. Ea' ma'mama Jisasi kwape ipat atamba sandaso'amatai.
Esis sofala Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi wapani mafi'i mati daso'ama inimba.
A'i owa' main embel wain ahi'alan. Ea' ma'mana Jisasi kwafi'i kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Esis embel wain a' akas.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ma'me, maol inimba ina ae'ani. Ea' ina maol ine'ini, owa'. Nogota ae'atai ina dei' tataga, ata' owa'.”
Ea' kwa'ipa amom manda' maola anen nogaso' nemata'wi kwa'i, “I'i anen niga'ipipa anif basefa, ipa' pihapifana.”
Anom maloh lu'wami ma'oh ama esis Juda saila mu'uli Godi sagasa'ofami. Maloh amamba wanom wanom sanda' otamba sanda'ami si'i dram lu'wami 44 galon.
Jisas na'ipa amom manda' maol na'i, “Ipa' pilai embel pekolo'wam maloh amamba ma si'im kwaef endilisi.” Ea' amom molam si'im si'i anen naga'ipam.
Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' kolo' du'wanimbel pefa'ambel pefe' pese'anam aman nugumafi gwa'aisii.” Ea' mofa'mana embel mafe'.

Dembinai nugumafi gwa'aisii embel ambalemba name'ambel owa', ea' bataga fasimbel si'i wain, apa' anen ina nogawa embel ambalemba amom mogofa'ambelima, owa'atin. Apa' amom manda' maola anini mogawambel. Amom molai embel atembel wafimbili. Ea' anen dembinai nofala aman anamba nagaso' nemata'wi

nahali'ana na'i, “Epes hiasi ata' sali' saso'asa wain inimba bu'wani nali' sa'ana ea' sagi' sofa'masi wain inimba awasin kwasakwasalai. Apa' ina' owa'atin. Ina' nambaho'wa wain inimba bu'wani na'ihi dei'aol nagi' nofa'an nafi'i.”

Amamba ametal banagami magali'i si'i God nanda'ami, dambadamba Jisas nanda'am Kana itap apamba lu'upa Galili. Anen nihimba'ma esisa glori ananimi banagami mogogala'i. Ea' amom alipumi ananimi mahapifana.
Isimba hi'alasa main, Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi miliana Kaperneam maloma ma'mana anani'wi kwaloma owapana ananimi wapani ea' sape na'amba anif nimaguf.
Nemaf afamba Pasovaefi felefele'ma fegataga, Jisas nondowasa' Jerusalem.
Ea' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nati epes satama mafis amamba sipsip bulmakau amiguf ma'unamb ea' anis satalom otamba sindisila'mamba.

Ea' Jisas nasa'ma anof mandof strin nanda'af nanda' anep wip si'i bumbulita. Ea' nopagaha epes isimba natofas natofamasa hiahaom amamba asasimi sipsipi bulmakau wapani mawis mafe' ando'. Ea' nugulatamasa otamba moni esis sindisila'manai nakwahona, nambema tebol asasimi nakolo'masom.
Ea' na'ipa amam amamba magatala amigufi na'i, “Ipa' fa'a hiahaom amamba fo'o.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi ukup pandanda'ma anif basef fagape Baibeli fa'ias faga'i, “Ae' okom mohafel a'owa' ma enda' maol banagambel endilisi ma igimafi ipat ine'inai nogape andeande'.”
Owa' amom Juda mati anen nanda'am na'amba, ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' ata' nihimba'mafa anol ametala hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami ma ogogawa ina' agol lu'wagilinai ma nanda'am na'amba ma afa'.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' da'a ipat anamba lu'unai Godi awasina, atiasi ae' itanima ila'ana nogotawa wapani nimaguf wanif dowaf.”
Ea' amom Juda ma'ipana ma'i, “Ipat anamba sanda'ana sala'ana afagof hiagufi 46-pelaiguf, apa' owa' ina' na'i nimaguf wanif dowaf nela'ana notawa wapani a'amon?”
Apa' ipat anamba Jisas naga'ianai ina na'i ipat anamba endilisinai lu'unai Godi, owa'. Anen na'i alop ananipi.

Ma anaf God nosa'mana wapani nowaga sogawanama, nogota atamba amom alipumi ananimi a' ukup popoma basef ifimba ananifi fowa' naga'iefi. Ea' dei' a' mahapifa basef ifimba fagape Baibeli faloma basef ifimba Jisas fowa' naga'iefi.
Jisas nape Jerusalem ama nimaguf ifimba Pasovaefi, esis amam nematawa hiasi sati maol anen nanda'ani banagani. Ea' sahapifa agol ananigili.
Apa' Jisas nogawa epes hiasi hi'alas. Na'amba anen ina nahapifas, owa'.
Anen ina gawa akanai ma anis daias soga'ipana ma waf epesi, owa'atin. Anen a' nogawa epes hiasi hi'alas ea' nogawa ukupi opalef asasisi.
Anona aman agilinama Nikodemus, anen Farisi agol lu'wagili ma esis Juda.

Anamb owamb nafi'mai Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Tisa Dembinai, apa' mogawa ina', God nasapa'ena nafi'i si'i dembinai Tisa. I'i owa' God nope noloma anin epena, anin ina la'ifina nenda' maol inimba banagani ina' nanda'ani, owa'atin.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi atis, epen ami i'i owa' God nolan netaga dambaina, anin ina atiasi nuwis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafian, owa'atin.”
Nikodemus nahali'ana na'i, “Dei' isimba ea' hagasi sonda'am si'imama ma solas sogataga dambais wapani? A sotanima sundawis nelelemb mamamasi a'amon, ama bola otanima olasi wapani?”

Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ambal bu'unai Godi la'ifina nolan negataga dambain. Ae' a'ipina endilisi, i'i owa' Ambal Godi nolana dambaina embela, ina atiasi la'ifin nuwis nomona maol Godi, owa'atin. Apa' i'i Ambal Godi nogolan dambaina, dao'. Anin ilama nogawis nomona maol ananini.
Hiahaom magataga alop atopi, amamba alop atopumi si'i ano'w nemata'w kogola awani. Apa' hiahaom Ambal Godi nogolami, amamba mataga si'i ambal bu'unai.
Ina a' nomonas hiahawesa aga'ipina na'amba aga'i pegataga dambaipa wapani si'i epes sogolaipa, owa'i.

Fufin nagaluwi nandagi'ma anin si'i nalo nagafe' ganigani. Ina' name' amalemb magala'an, apa' ina negawa anamba anin nalo nagafi'ima ma a' nalo nagafe'ma, owa'atin. Epes hiasi Ambal bu'unai Godi nolasa sagataga dambaisi, esis ea' sataga na'amba atin.”
Ea' Nikodemus nagwamana na'i, “Hiahawes isimba atiasi sotaga sondowalap si'imama?”
Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Dei' si'i main? Ina' Tisa dembinai esis Judai, owa' ina' owa' ata' negawa chiahawes isimbaia?
Endilisi atis ae' a'ipina apa' ma'i hiahawes apa' mogogawasi, ea' mawalapa hiahawes isimba a' magatilisi. Apa' owa' ipa' pewa' alafugaha basef ifimba afa' wagawalapafi.
Ae' a'ipipa hiahawes isimba itapasi, apa' ipa' ina pegawam pahapifam, owa'. I'i ae' iga'ipipa hiahaom ilifami, atiasi ipa' pegawa pihapifam pi'imama? Owa'atin.
Ina anona aman itapanai nalota gani heven, owa'. Ae' atowe. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ea' ae' atowe akwaha heven isila'i, ea' ma'uwi.

Fowa' gani aman anamba Moses nasa'ma anal ul nanda' kapa nanda'ali lail anoga lawag ilif. Nanda'am anamba wafigima fataupigima. Amamba ea' na'amba atina atiasi sefela ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi sendele igail anoga lawag ilif.
Ama epes mamahisa isimba sogahapifa ae'i, atiasi sofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafi.

Aho' endilisi, God nogamana aman ananinai atotona nape. Owa', owa'atin. Anen okom maimaila amam nematawa hiapai magape itapi hi'alapa. Ea' naso'apai Nogamana ananinai atotona ma epes ami sogahapifanai sogape andeande', ina soga'ma waf awafi, owa'atin. Sofa' ambal namili sope andeande' lifilafi.
God ina nasapa' Nogamana ananinai nafi'i itap apa'e ma nonda' kotimapa, owa'atin. Anen nasapa'ana nafi'i ma nimbimai epes hiapai magape itapi nokwahomapa waf awafi mogafi'mai anen.

Epen ami nigahapifa anini, anin atiasi basef akana kot lu'utai. Apa' epen ami owa' nigahapifanaia, epen inimba a' lamonan higililan ea' ma kot anamba lu'unai aunai. Dei' main? Anin nandaiwa'ma nigahapifa Nogamana atotona Godi, na'amba epes isimbai a' lamonas hi'ilas.

Basef kofagefa ma kot lu'unai anamba na'amba. Mogogala'i a' mafi'i mataga itap apa'e ea', owa' esis ukup panda'i waf atona anamba itapanai si'i owambi, sandaiwa'ma mogogala'i amamba. Dei' maina esis sandaiwa'? Esis sanda' waf awafi na'amba dei' sandaiwa'.
Epes ami sanda' waf awafii, sogowa' alafugaha mogogala'ii, esis sandaiwa'ma waf awafi asasifi fendawalap. Ea' dei' ombal mahas sandaiwa'.
Epen ami nanda' waf endilisifi, anaf anin negatagama mogogala'i. Ma anis epes daias sitilin sogogawa anin nape sisihin atapina God nanda' maol ananini.
Basef ifimba hi'alefa main, Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi a' mafe' itap lu'upa Judia. Ea' nape nalomam napisi' esis amam nematawa.
Apa' Jon nape wambel ambalemba Inon felefele'ma anambel wambel Selim. Anamba walemb lu'wambi begetaha, esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i na'amba, anen napisi'as.
Nemaf afamba dembinai King Herot ina dei' nanda' Jon nanda' kalabus, ata' owa',
amom alipumi Joni ma'i anif basef fape la'afena amom maloma anona aman Judainai. Amom ma'i basefa waf afamba esis Juda sasa'of sogowando' alogwa ma sogape bo'wesa naep Godi.

Ea' alipumi Joni mafe'ma anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, aman fowa' nape nagaloma ina' gani wa'ol walemb Jordani ma ina' nagawalapa basef naga'ifanai, aman anamba dei' amam nematawa hiasi safe'ma anen napisi'as embel.”
Jon na'ipam na'i, “I'i God nagape heveni owa' noso'an anis maefah anin epena, epen inimba ina a' la'ifin nenda' anin maol, owa'atin.
Ipa' apegawa basef ifimba fowa' ae' aga'iefi a'i ae' ina Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e agafi'ii, owa'. Apa' God nasapa'e ali' afi'mai Krais.

I'i anona aman nogaso' ano'w nemata'wi, nemata'w akwamba ea' anani'wi nagaso'akwi. Ea' alipunai aman anambai sonahana nalutu name' aman anamba dei' nagaso'akwi nagafi'i. Dei' na'amba atina ae' sonahe a'owa' ma okom ae'ami, andagalama Dembinai Jisas.
Agol ananigili lu'wagol, apa' agol ae'agili a' gowala gofe' sa'ogol.”
Aman nagafi'i ilifi anen nape ilifa hiahaom hiami. Apa' aman nagataga itapi anen itapanai naga'i basef itapafi atifi. Apa' aman nagafi'i heveni anen nape ilifa hiahaom hiami.
Anen na'i basef nawalapa hiahawes hiasi natilis nagame'as ea'i. Apa' ina anin epen neme' basef ifimba anen naga'iefi, owa'atin.
Epen ami name' basef ananifi ma nigailafi, anin na'i aho'ma basef ifimba nihimba'masaf alihif God anen naga'i basef endilisifi atifi.
Aman anamba God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii anen nawalapa basef Godi. Ea' God naso'ana Ambal bu'unai ananinai nape si'inama anen.
Ahamana God okom maimaila Nogamana ea' naso'ana hiahaom hiami hi'alama lagof ananigufi.

Epen ami nagahapifa Nogamana ananinai, epen inimba dei' a' nefa' ambal namilima negape andeande' lifilafi dondol. Apa' epen ami newa' alafugama Nogamana ananinai, inimba ina atiasi nefa' ambal namili, owa'atin. Anaf nembel wandafunai Godi a' nopoman.
Nemaf afamba amom Farisi dembami Judai mame' anif basef na'amba fa'i, “Jisas napisi' alipisi hiasi nikila' isimba Jon nagapisi'asi.”
Apa' Jisas ina napisi'as, owa'. Amom alipumi ananimi atom mapisi'as.
Jisas ea' nogawa amom Farisi mame' basef ifimba. Ea' anen nakwaha itap apamba Judia notanima nafe' itap lu'upa Galili wapani.
Ufia'w akwamba anen naila'w nagafi'i, kwafe' la'afena itap lu'upa Samaria.
Ea' nafe' nataga anambel wambel nagape Samariai taun inimba agiligima sa'i Sikar. Anamba nape felefele'ma Jekop fowa' nagaso'anap nogamana ananinai Josepa.
Ifata sogola embelatai fowa' Jekop nagandowatai tape wambel ambalemba. Nogota atamba nemaf awin nandasapa'. Jisas nafi'i laogon na'amba napoma noma'w ifata atamba saga' embela.
Ea' ano'w nemata'w Samariai'wi kwafi'i kwa'i kola embel, owa' Jisas natolo'w a' nahali'akwa kogaso'ana anambel embel.
Apa' alipumi ananimi mafe' wambel lu'wambili ma mogatalai gwa'aisi.

Ea' nemata'w akwamba kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ina' Judainai, ina apa' atepa, owa'atin. Ae' nemata'w Samariaiwai. Dei' maina ina' nagahali'ima embel, ‘Isi'ina embel nega' embel?’” Esis Juda ina sagaloma esis Samaria atogini, owa'atin. Esis naumbih.

Ea' Jisas nagwama'wa basef ako'w na'i, “I'i ina' okom mopaina ma negawa anin mae fasifasini God na'i nogasi'inaniai, ina' a' negawa aman anamba nagahali'inai ma embeli, ina' nihali'anama anambel embel ambal namili lagapaimbeli anen a' nese'enambel.”
Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Aman Dembinai, ifata ana'e launai nowala gani awin. Ina' baket akena ma negela embel. Dei' ina' nilai embel ambalemba ambal namili lagapaimbeli anima?

Akunamapa ape'inai Jekop na' embelata nao'wa nogaopana ananisi saloma mafis bulmakau sipsip maim asasimi sa'ambelata. Dei' ea' nakwahota tapoma apa'. A'i ina' nikila' anen ama negese'apa embel ambal namili lagapaimbeli?”
Jisas nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Epes mamahisa soga' embel ambalembai, bola iap pese'as wapani.

Apa' epen ami nega' embel ambalemba ae' a'i igaso'anambeli, anin ina atiasi iap pese'an wapani ma nimaguf hiafi dondol negape, owa'atin. Embel ambalemba ae' agaso'anambeli atiasi begataga si'i embel bagataga dowafi bambul atapimbel bagapani ma nomon opaf ananifi nefa' ambal namili negape andeande' lifilafi.”
Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' se'e embel ambalemba ma ae' ina ata' iap pese'e itanima ifi'i na'a ma egela embel wapani, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' fo'o falai waulunamena nili' ea' pitanima pifi'i na'a.”
Ea' kwagwamana basef kwa'i, “Ae' aman ake.” Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' aman akena, isimba ina' na'i endilisi atis.
Dei' main? Ina' fowa' amam ine'imi wanom biam. Apa' aman anamba dei' ina' nape nagalomanai anamba ina aman ine'inai, owa'. Basef ifimba ine'ifi endilisifi.”

Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Aman Dembinai, dei' ae' egawaena, ina' anina profet. Esis a'mes bafas ape'isi safe' sogonalo'ma halafuta anamba sanda' lotuma. Ea' ipa' Juda pa'i wambel esis sanda' lotuwagoma anamba napani Jerusalem.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Nemata'w, ina' nindahapifa ae'. Anef nemaf fegataga ipa' ina atiasi pefe' penda' lotuma Ahame halafuta atamba, a penda' lotumana Jerusalem atogon, owa'atin.

Ipa' panda' lotuma hiahawes ipa' owa' pegegawasia. Apa' Juda manda' lotuma hiahawes apa' mogogawasi. Basef kofagefa ma apa' manda' lotu ifimba. God nowambilai amam nematawa ma nogakwaha waf awafi esis sanda'afi, amamba matagama apa' Juda atepa.

Nemaf afamba fa'i figatagai, dei' fataga ea' ma amam nematawa mamahisa sanda' lotu endilisii a' sondanda' lotuma Ahamapa Goda Ambal bu'unai ananinai noloma waf bu'wafi endilisifi. Anen nowando'ma amam nematawa na'ambaisi ma sonda' lotumana.
God anen ambal. Na'amba amam nematawa mamahisa si'i sonda' lotumana endilisii, esis a' sondanda' lotumana andeande'ma ukup peloma ambagof asasimi ma waf endilisifi.”
Nemata'w akwamba kwagwamana basef kwa'i, “Ae' egawa aman anamba Mesaia sofalana saga'i Kraisi, God nandandepana nosapa'ana nugafi'ii. Afamba anen nugafi'i, nowalapam ni'ipapa hiahaom hiami.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ae' ea' ma'uwi, dei' a'i alomena.”

Anen na'ipa ako'w na'amba, owa' alipumi ananimi motanima mafi'i. Ea' amom a' nomonas hiahawesa anen naloma nemata'w akwamba nalutu naga'i. Apa' amom ina anona nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' na'i nefa' main? Ama dei' naloma'w naga'i?” Owa'.
Ama main, nemata'w akwamba kwa'waha baket kogola embelatai ta'oh, kotanima kwafe' taun wambel lu'wambili. Ea' kwa'ipa esis kwa'i,
“Ipa' pifi'i piti anona aman nawalapai hiahaom hiami fowa' ae' anda'ami na'ipiam hi'alam. Anen Krais a'amon?” Ea' esis same' na'amba,
sakwaha wambel safi'i sati Jisas.
Owa' alipumi ananimi ma'ipana dindinip ma'i, “Ina' ata' nea' gwa'aisi.”
Owa' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ae' anis gwa'aisi sa'oh, isimba ipa' owa' pegawasa.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi atom mape manifas ma'i, “A' anis sofa'manai anis gwa'aisi a'a?”

Ama main Jisas nawalapef na'ipam na'i, “Gwa'aisi ae'asi isimba. God nasapa'e afi'i. Dei' ae' a'i indaila okom ananimi atom enda' maol ananini atin efe' imbifan hi'indalan. Maol inimba si'i gwa'aisi ae'asi.
Ipa' paga'ias pa'i, aomb biambibiamb ata' bape ma nogota atamba gwa'aisi sogaofatai togataga. Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ata' sa'ma naep petologon aof tulif. Gwa'aimi maof ea' ma sogala'am.

Epen ami negala' gwa'aisii, anin nefa' otamba ma maol inimba nanda'ani. Ea' nakolasa gwa'aisi isimba ambal namili lagapaisi sogape lifilafi. Ea' epes isimba sagawasi saloma anis daias sagala'asi sokolata sondagala atin.
Na'amba dei' basef gawaifi ifimba afataga endilisifi atif, ‘Anin epen nawasogon aof afamba, ea' anin daian nafe' nala'as.’
Ae' asapa' ipa' pafe'ma pegala'i gwa'aisi aof afamba fowa' ipa' owa' penda' maolanafia. Anis epes sanda' maola aof afamba, ea' ipa' pefa' gwa'aisi dowafa esis daias sanda'as sagawasi.”
Ako'w doko' kwa'i Jisas nawalapa hiahaom ako'w fowa' kwanda'ami, nawalapam na'ipa'wam alihim. Ea' esis Samaria amam nematawa hiasi sagape taun inimbai same' basefa ako'w asahapifana.
Ea' esis safi'mai anen sahali'ana dindinip sa'i ata' nope nogaloma esis. Ea' napani nimaguf bif nalomas wambel ambalemba.
Ea' epes hiasi wapani wambel ambalembaisi same' basef ananifi sahapilif.

Ea' sa'ipa ako'w sa'i, “Dei' apa' ina mame' basef ine'ifi atif mahapilif, owa'atin. Apa' mame' basef aman anambai a' mogawa anen atona nowambilai amam nematawa hiasi itapasi mokwaha waf awafi asasifi sogotanimai.”
Nimaguf ifimba bif hi'alef, Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba a' nafe' itap lu'upa Galili.
Fowa' jisas anen atona nawalapa basef na'if na'i, “Anona profet ina anagol agol gatoma gandawalapana alihigila wambel kofagama ananima, owa'.”

Ea' dei' nafe' nataga itap apamba Galili, ea' esis asonahasa anen nagafi'i. Dei' main, esis fowa' safe' Jerusalema nemaf bu'wafi Pasovaefi ea' satolom sogawa hiahaom hiami anen nanda'am nemaf afambai.

Anen notanima nafe' wapani nataga anambel wambel Kana itap lu'upa Galili. Wambel ambalemba fowa' nambema embel bagataga si'i waina. Ea' anona agilinai nanda' maola dembinai kingi, nogamana ananinai aowas nanda'ana na'oh anambel wambel Kaperneam felefele'ma a' nogaga'. Apa' agilinai anamba nape Kana name' basefa Jisas nakwaha itap lu'upa Judia nafi'i Galili, ea' nafe'ma Jisas nahali'ana dindinipa nefe' nonda' nogamana ananinai bo'ona.
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “I'i ipa' hipai pigati banagami mamimami si'i God nanda'amima, ipa' pihapifi. I'i owa', owa'atin.”

Ea' anen nanda' maola dembinai kingi na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' lianai kwafalis. Na'amba nogame ae'anai a' noga'.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fo'o. Nogamena ine'inai atiasi a' nope namona ambal lopaona.”
Ea' aman anamba nahapifa basef Jisasi a' nafe'. Anen ata' nafe' atin ufia'w owa', amom manda'mana maoli mafi'i matolona ufia'w ma'ipana ma'i, “Nogamena ine'inai ambal lapaona a' nosafel nape.”
Ea' nahali'ama nogota mamahotama nogamana ananinai nosafel bo'ona kwasakwasala. Ea' ma'i, “Nambati' awin nendemba'a aowas alop nifipini nakwahona ea' hi'alan.”
Ea' ahama awani inimbai a' nogawa nambati' nogota atamba atota Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Nogamena ine'inai ambal lopain nepe.” Ea' nahapifa Jisas naloma esis amam nematawa ananisi wapani.
Fowa' Jisas nakwaha itap lu'upa Judia a' nafe' nataga itap lu'upa Galili, ea' dei' nanda' ametal inimba banagani. Ametal inimba nagafe'ma bifi nanda' awani inimba bo'wen.
Jisas nape Galili ma main, anef nemaf esis Juda soga' gwa'aisi lu'wasiafi ea' fataga. Ea' anen nondowasa' Jerusalem.

Wambel ambalemba nomon felefele'ma uta lu'utai sipsip magawisatai anamba anemb dumb sa'usa'umbi betahagon. Agilimba esis sofalamb diga Hibrui sa'i Betesda. Dumb ambamba ambugufimba wa'owa'ol sala' ifagw sanda' ilalef wanelef bialef fape.
Ilalef afalemba epes isimba hiasi aowas nanda'asi sape saloma isimba naep pagaso'asi saloma bo'wagahi lagof saga' sagailasi. [Esis sape sasasa embel pindawianama atina benda'as da'inda.
Anif nimaguf anona ensel Dembinai Godi nakwehef nowala dumb ambamba nanda' embel banda'as wianaiwiana ea', dao'. Epen ami aowas nanda'ani nili' nefe' newala embel a' netaga bo'wen wapani.]
Anona aman nape aowas lu'unai nanda'ana nape afagof hiagufi 38-pelaiguf.
Ea' Jisas natolona tol na'oh ea' nogawa aman anamba awasina na'oh nogota laota a'owa'. Na'amba nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' na'i atiasi alop ine'ipi potaga bo'op, a'a owa'?”

Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “Aman dembinai, nemaf afamba embel banda'as wianaiwiana ina anis epes sasa'me salae ewala embel, owa'atin. Ae' atowe anda'am a'i efe' owa'a, anis daias sali' sowala sikila'e.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel dasa'ma nilutu nefa' alahis ine'isi a' nilutu nefe'.”
Ea' kwafalis atis alop ananipi ea' pataga bo'op andeande'. Na'amba anen bo'ona nosafel nalutu nasa'ma alahis ananisi ea' nafe'.

Ea' amom dembami esis Judai mati aman anamba aunai nasa'ma alahis ananisi nofa'as nalutu nafe' naep amamipi nemaf afamba sabat noma'wafi. Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' nemaf apa' magapoma noma'wafi, mu'uli ape'ini na'i owa'i ma ina' nesa'ma alahis nefa'as negafe'a, owa'i.”
Owa' anen nagwamama basef na'i, “Aman anamba nanda'e bu'uwai anen na'ipi na'i, ‘Sa'ma alahis ine'isi a' nefa'as nefe'.’”
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Aman mamahonama na'ipina na'i, ‘Ina' sa'ma alahis ine'isi nefa'as nefe'?’”
Apa' aman anamba ina nogawa anen nanda'ana bu'unai, owa'atin. Dei' main? Jisas nafe' nandambaho' naloma amam nematawa hiasi wambel ambalembaisi.
Ama main Jisas natolona ipat lu'unai Godi na'ipana na'i, “Neme'! Dei' ina' ambo'wena ea'. Ea' ina' owa'i nitanima nefe' nenda' waf awafi wapania, owa'. Na'amba hiahaom awami endilisi a' motagamena.
Ea' nafe' na'ipa amom Juda na'i, “Aman anamba nanda'e bu'uwai anen Jisas.”

Ea' dei' amom Juda ukup numbutipa anen nanda' aman anamba awasinai nosafel nofa' alahis naga'ihisi nagafe' nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi. Ea' dei' mosafel manda'mana waf awafi mowando'mana ma mogahana.
Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amom na'i, “Ahame ae'anai nanda' maol nafi'i notambel dei' nemaf afa'e sabat wapani. Ea' ae' wapani anda' maol si'i anen.”

Owa' amom Juda ukup panda'i atin a'owa' ma'i mohana nogaga'. Amom ma'i anen nosambala basefa mu'uli ma nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi. Ea' Jisas na'ias wapani na'i God anen ahamana ananinai endilisi. Ea' amom ma'i anen na'i a' notaga nope na'amba atin si'i God. Isimba atis dei' mandaiwa'mana.

Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amom na'i, “Ae' a'i endilisi atis a'ipipa. Ae' Nogamana Godi ina la'ifiwai ma enda' anis maefaha okom ae'ami atom, owa'atin. Ae' anda' hiahawes isimba ati ahame nanda'asi, ea' isimba atis. Dei' main, hiahaom hiami ahame nanda'ami, amamba ae' Nogamana wapani dei' anda'am.

Ahame ae'anai a' okom maimaila ae' Nogamana a'owa' nihimba'me hiahaom hiami anen nanda'ami. Ma anaf nigihimba'me anin maol lu'wani nikila' amamba. Na'amba atiasi ipa' a' gogololasipa kwapete' ma maol inimba lu'wani.
Ahame nagasa'ma esis sagaga'i sogosafel wapani ma nogaso'as ambal namili. Ea' dei' na'amba atin Nogamana ananiwai wapani ae' aso'as ambal namili epes ae' okom maga'iasi.
Ahame God ina nagawaloga anin epeni si'i sanda'mas koti sanda'as, owa'. Maol hiani ma nonda'masa kot, a' nase'ean ae' Nogamana hi'alan.

Ama dei' esis amam nematawa hiasi sasa'ma agol ae' Nogamanai lu'wagol si'i sagasa'ma agol ahamai lu'wagol. Epen mamahina owa' negasa'ma agol ae' Nogamanai lu'wagola, epen inimba anin ina nasa'ma agol ahamai God nasapa' ae' agafi'ii lu'wagol, owa'atin.
Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa. Epen ami neme' basef ae'afi ma nihapifa anen nasapa' ae' agafi'ii, epen inimba anin ina a' nefa' basef lu'wafi ma kot, owa'atin. Anin a' nefa' ambal namili nikila' ga'.

Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa, nemaf afamba fa'i figatagai, dei' fataga ea' ma esis sagaga'i atiasi sogame' lagol ae'agili Nogamana Godi. Epes ami sogame' ae'i, atiasi asofa' ambal namili ma sogape bo'wes endilisi.
Ambal namili lape ahame atona. Ea' nowa' banaga ae' Nogamana ananiwai ea' ae' wapani na'amba atin si'i anen ahame, ambal namili lapauwai,
ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Na'amba God nase'e agola hiahaom banagami ma egawaloga epesa kot basef lu'wafi.

Ipa' ina a' ukup hiahawep pepoma amamba, owa'i. Nemaf dondo'afi fi'i fegataga amam nematawa hiasi saga' sawas sagape wandelefi anaf some' malogol ae'agili sosafel sokwaha wandelef suwisi ando'. Ea' epes ami sanda' waf fasifii, anaf sosafel wapani sofa' ambal namili sope namis. Apa' epes mamahisa sanda' waf awafii, anaf sotanima sosafel sefe' sulutu sonda' basef lu'wafi ma kot.”

Ea' Jisas na'ias na'i, “Ae' ina anda' anin mae ma okom ae'ami atom, owa'. Basef ae' agame'efa ahamai, ifimba atif ailif awalapefa esisa kot. Ea' basef ifimba ma kot ae'atai ifimba usi'if andeande'. Ae' ina anda'ama agaila nomonas ae'asi atis, owa'atin. Ae' anda' maol aila okom aman anamba nasapa'e agafi'ii.
I'i ae' atowe ewalapa basefa ae' atowe ai, na'amba ipa' api'i basef ifimba ae' aga'iefi ina endilisifi. Owa'atin. Pi'i basef baso'aifi.
Anen nape dei', nawalapa basefa ae'. Na'amba ae' dei' egawa basef ifimba faga'iasa ae'i endilisifi atif.
Fowa' ipa' pasapa' basef fafe'mago Jon. Anen nawalapa basef endilisifi ma ae' ea'.
Na'amba dei' ae' ina efala anis epes itapasi ma sowalapa basefa ae' sogatopalope, owa'atin. Ae' a'i God nuwambilipai nokwahomepa waf awafi pitanima pifi'mai anen. Ea' dei' a'i basef ifimba.
Aman anamba Jon si'i anin nagwapina nogogala'ma amam nematawa. Ea' ukup ipe'ipi pa'i aho'ma ipa' pendagala nogota atamba kwaia'uta ma mogogala'i amamba Joni.

Hiahaom amamba maol banagani ahame nase'ean na'i imafian enda'an hi'igalani, inimba atin ae' dei' anda'an. Inimba maol banagani nikila' maol Joni nagawalapa basef kofagefa ma ae'i. Ea' maol inimba ae' anda'ani nihimba'ma esis amam nematawa sogogawa Ahame nasapa'e dei' afi'i.

Ea' Ahame nasapa'e agafi'ii, anen atona nawalapa basef kofagefa ma ae'. Apa' fowa' gani pafi'i pataga dei' ipa' ina pati nogohnaep ananisi a pame' amalemba malogol ananigili, owa'atin endilisi. Ea' ipa' ina pati amaga ananigai, owa'.
Ea' basef ananifi wapani ifimba ina fape ukup ipe'ipi, owa'atin. Dei' main, ipa' owa' pihapifa ae' God nasapa'e agafi'iia.

Ukup ipe'ipi pandanda' paga'i basef ifimba fagape Buk Baibeli fagase'epa ambal namili ipe'i ma pegape andeande' lifilafi. Ea' pati basef ifimba pegawa ea' panda' maol pewando'ma basef ifimba hiafi. Dei' basef ifimba atif Baibelifi fa'i ae' fawalape. Owa', owa'atin.
Ipa' pandaiwama pifi'mai ae' pefa' ambal namili pegape andeande' lifilafi.
“Ae' ina okom ma'i epes itapasi sogasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagol, owa'.
Apa' ae' ea' egawa ukup ipe'ipi ina paipaila God, owa'atin.
Ae' afi'i agol ahame ae'anai, apa' ipa' ina pase'e opalef ae', owa'atin. Apa' anaf anona aman daiana nogafi'i ma agol ananigili atogili, ipa' a' pi'i aho' pese'ana opalef anen.
Ukup ipe'ipi pa'i pendefa' agof lu'wagufi ma sahopepa owapepa ipe'imi atom. Apa' God owa'atin. Dei' ipa' atiasi pihapifi pi'imama? Owa'atin.
Ipa' ina a' ukup pendanda' pi'i atiasi ae' enda' kotimipa ma Ahame God, owa'atin. Aman nonda' kotima ipe'i, anen Moses, aman anamba ipa' pa'i atiasi nogatopalopipai.
Ipa' i'i pihapifa basef ananifi, ea' pihapifa basef ae'afi wapani. Dei' main, anen atona nanda' basef ifimba ma ae' fail Buk Baibel.
Apa' ipa' owa' pihapifa basef anen nanda'afi ma ae'a, owa'. Atiasi ipa' pihapifa basef ae'afi pi'imama? Owa'atin.”
Jisas nanda' basef ifimba ma main, a' nafe' nambo dumb ambamba Galili fisanamb. Dumb ambamba sa'i Taiberias.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen. Dei' main, esis sati hiahaom amamba banagami anen nanda'am na'ambai ma nanda' isimba aowas naninani nanda'asi sagataga bo'wes. Ea' sailana.
Nemaf afamba lu'wafi sanda' gwa'aisiafi saga'i Pasovaefi felefele' ma fegataga. Ea' nondowasa' halafuta atamba nao'wa alipumi anan mape.
Jisas natologon ganigani nati amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen. Ea' na'ipa Filip na'i, “Afa' ata' otala bret ani ma ogaso' amam nematawa isimba soga'ata?”
Apa' Jisas nagwambana na'ias na'amba. Anen nogawas ea' hiahawes anen na'i nonda'asi.
Ea' Filip nagwamana basef na'i, “Afa' i'i ogatala bret 200 kina, ina atiasi dondo'ma epes isimba hiasi sea'ata kwasakwasala, owa'atin.”
Ea' anona amom alipumi Jisasi Andru, Saimon Pita sahomana, na'ipa Jisas na'i,
“Anona aman sa'unai nahapila anis gwa'aisi bret sa'usa'utai wa'agolita taloma agof sa'ugufi biagof nape na'a. Apa' isimba ina atiasi dondo'ma epes isimba hiasi, owa'atin.”
Anamba otalef fasilifi fagapoma. Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi na'i, “Kipa esis amam nematawa hiasi sope itap.” Ea' amam atom mataga 5,000-pelaim mape otalef itap.
Ea' Jisas nafela bret atamba nanifela God ama ea', naso'asata esis sagape itapi. Ea' nanda'as na'amba atina agof wapani. Naso'asas sa'as alihis dindi'i dondo' si'i doko' nolomagahas.
Sa'as alihis ea', anen na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' petatama du'wawanis sagasaga'ihi. Na'amba so'oh sowala dowadowaf.”
Esis sa'as safe' owa' du'wanis sa'oh. Ama main, alipumi mafe' matatama du'wa'wanisi malo'was folalef lu'walifi 12-pelailifa bret atamba.
Ea' esis amam nematawa sati ametal inimba ma hiahaom banagami amamba Jisas nanda'ami sa'ias sa'i, “Endilisi atis, anen aman profet anamba nagafi'i itap apai.”
Ea' Jisas nogawa ukup asasipi sa'i sufi'i sohapilana sonda'ana notaga nope si'i anona dembinai kinga nugumafias. Owa', anen atona notanima nondowasa' halafuta ilif.
A'i owa' wambomota felefele'ma owamb, alipumi Jisasi
malota bot mafe' dumb ambamba ma'i mombo Kaperneam. Ea' owamb baso'am la'afen, apa' Jisas ina dei' nafi'i natagamam, ata' owa'atin.
Ea' fufin banagonai naluwi, naoh amohafel manda'am fetawa lasiali' a'owa'.
Amom manda' pul mafe' nogota lautai si'i nohotagw wanogw, owa' mati Jisas analutu nafi'i embel ilif dumb ambamba nafi'i nataga felefele'ma bot tagafe'ma. Ea' amom ombel maham a'owa'.
Owa' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' banagepa, ombal mogahepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i. Ipa' ina a' ombel mehepa, owa'i.”
Ea' ma'i aho'ma nondagiai bot. Ea' bot atafe' kwafalis tataga tol anamba amom ma'i mogafe'ma.

Esis amam nematawa hiasi nambati' sagapani dumb fisanai, esis sogawa ea' sa'i, “Nambati' alipumi ananimi atom malota bot atamba a' mafe'. Apa' anen ina nafe' nalomam, owa'atin. Ina a' anota bot tail taloma atamba, owa'. Atotota tala.”
Ea' anogw botagw wapani Taibiriasigwi gwafi'i felefele'ma na'amba anen nape nanifela God nagaso'as gwa'aisima.
Esis amam nematawa sati Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi amom ina ata' mape, owa'. Ea' safe' salota anogw botagw safe' Kaperneam solaoma Jisas.
Esis solaomana ma satolona gani wa'ol dumb ambamba fisanamb, sa'ipana sa'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ina' nambai' nafi'i na'a?”

Owa' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipa' ina ukup pandanda'ma banagami ae' anda'ami dei' pafi'i pa'i petolowe, owa'atin. Ipa' ukup papoma bret atota paga'atai ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi si'ilimb, isimba atis dei' pala' pelaome pafi'i.

Ipa' ina a' penda' maola pegefa' gwa'aisi isimba awasi folo'ogolasi, owa'i. Ipa' a' pendanda' maola gwa'aisi bu'wasi saga'asa sogape be'es andeande' lifilafii. Gwa'aisi isimba ambal namili lagape lifilafii. Gwa'aisi isimbai ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' atowe atiasi ese'epas ipa'. God a' nase'e agola nandandepe ea' ma enda' maol inimba lu'wani.”
Ea' sahali'ana sa'i “Dei' apa' monda' maol main ata' nili'ma monda' maol Godi?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Maol Godi na'amba. Ipa' pihapifa ae', God nasapa'e agafi'ii.”
Ea' esis sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' nihimba'mapa hiahaom maim banagami ma apa' mitilina mogahapifina? Ina' nanda' maol main?
A'mesapa ape'isi fowa' sa' anis gwa'aisi agilisa sa'i mana ma itap apamba wafigima fataupigima si'i basef fagape Baibeli fa'ias faga'i, ‘Anen naso'asai gwa'aisi sagafi'i heveni sa'as.’”
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa, Moses ina nase'epa gwa'aisi isimba sagafi'i heveni, owa'atin. Ahame ae'anai atona nasi'ipai gwa'aisi isimba endilisisi.
Gwa'aisi isimba God nagasi'ipasi isimba ae' akwaha ilif isila'i ma agaso'asa ambal namili esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi.”
Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Dembinai, dei' ina' nese'apa gwa'aisi isimba atapis sope lifilafi.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' atowe ae' gwa'aisi bret ambal namili bu'wali lagapauwai. Epen ami nigafi'mai ae'i ina atiasi nolomohan, a epen mamahina nigahapifa ae'i, anin ina atiasi iap pese'an wapani ma embel, owa'atin.
Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' patolowe ea' apa' ipa' ina pahapifa basef bu'wafi ae'afi, owa'.
Epes mamahisa ahame nagase'eas ae'i, isimba atis asifi'mai ae'. Epen ami ni'i nigafi'mai ae'i, ae' ina atiasi ili'amonan, owa'atin endilisi.
Ae' ina akwaha heven isila'i ma igaila okom ae'ami atom, owa'atin. Ae' afi'ima igaila basefa okom ananimi nasapa'e agafi'ii.
Okom aman anamba nasapa'e agafi'ii magape na'amba. Esis amam nematawa hiasi anen a' nagase'eas ae'i, ae' ina ekwaha anin atitin nepe higililan lamonan, owa'atin. Ae' egasa'mas wapani nemaf akutaifi.

Okom ahame ae'anai magape na'amba. Amam nematawa hiasi mamahisa siti ae' ma sogame' basef ae'afii ma sogahapifai, esis isimba atiasi sofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafii. Ea' esa'mas wapani nemaf akutaifi.”
Ea' anen na'i, “Ae' atowe gwa'aisi akwaha heven agafi'ii.” Anen na'ias na'amba, owa' esis Juda sanda' megahahana sa'i basef hiafi ma anen.
Esis sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Dei' si'i main? Aman anamba Jisas anen Josep nogamana. Ahamanai ma'mana ananisi apa' mogawas. Dei' maina anen naga'i, ‘Ae' akwaha heven isila'i?’”
Jisas nagwamasa basef esis na'i, “Ipa' ina a' pi'i basef hiahaof la'afena ipa'.

Anin epen ina la'ifina anin atin nigafi'mai ae' dowaf, owa'atin. Ahame nasapa'e dei' afi'i, anen i'i nogasa'ma nomonas anin epeni, dao'. Epen inimba atiasi a' nifi'mai ae', ea' anaf ae' esa'man wapani nemaf akutaifi.

Basef amom profet maga'iefi fagape Buk Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘God anaf nuwalipa amam nematawa hiasi.’ Amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas sogame' basef ahame ae'anai ma sogogawa anini, esis isimba sogafi'mai ae'i.
“Ina anin epen atitin nati ahame, owa'. Fowa' ae' ape agaloma Goda agafi'ii, ea' ae' atowe atolona.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi atis. Epen ami neme' basef ae'afi nihapifi, anin dei' nefa' ambal namili nepe andeande' lifilafi.
Ae' gwa'aisi bret ambal namili lagapauwai.
Fowa' a'mesepa ipe'isi sa' gwa'aisi isimba mana itap anamba wafigima fataupigima, dei' asaga' safe' ea'.
Apa' gwa'aisi isimba dei' sakwaha heven sagafi'i isimba na'amba. I'i epen ami nega'asi, anin ina atiasi a' nega', owa'atin. Nepe atapin.

Ae' gwa'aisi ambal namili lagapauwai akwaha heven nepe andeande' lifilafi. Gwa'aisi isimba ae' atiasi igasi'inasi, isimba alop ae'api ese' amam nematawa itapasi ma sogofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafi.”
Ea' amom dembami Juda ma'i basef mehip mandahihianama Jisas la'afena amom atom ma'i, “Dei' si'i maina aman anamba na'i nogaso'apa alop ananipi apa' moga'ap?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi atis, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. I'i ipa' pindaiwa'ma pega' alopi esimbel ae'asima, ipa' ina atiasi pefa' ambal namili, owa'atin.
Epen ami nega' alopi esimbel ae'asii, inimba dei' a' nefa' ambal namili negape andeande' lifilafi dondoli ea' esa'man wapani nemaf akutaifi.
Dei' main? Alop ae'api si'i gwa'aisi endilisisi, ea' esimbel ae'ambeli endilisimbeli ma soga'as.
Epen ami nega' alopi asimbel ae'asii, anin a' nepe sisihin neloma ae', ea' ae' epe sisihiwi eloman.
Ahame ambal namili lagapaunai nasapa'e sisihiwi afi'i, ea' ae' dei' ape ambal namili ahamai. Ea' na'amba atina epen ami nega' alop ae'apii, anin atiasi a' nefa' ambal namili ma banagami ae'ami.
Gwa'aisi isimba sakwaha heven sigisila'i, isimba ina sa'ata ma ea' sagasagafi'i, owa'atin. Epen mamahina nega' gwa'aisi isimbai, anin atiasi a' nefa' ambal namili ma negape lifilafi dondoli.”
Jisas na'ipam na'amba, nawalipam nomon ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai wambel Kaperneam.
Anis alipisi Jisasi hiasi same' basef ifimba ea' sa'i, “Basef ifimba ahihifa apa'. Atiasi ami nilif? Owa' owa'atin.”
Jisas nogawa alipisi ananisi sanda' migimigah. Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Basef ifimba fa'i fehambombaga ukup ipe'ipi a'a?
I'i ipa' piti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi itanima ilita gani ilif fowa' agapanima, atiasi agogolalasipa kwapete'epa.

Ambal bu'unai Godi atiasi nese'epa ambal namili pepe andeande' lifilafi dondol. Apa' wafi gawa epesi atis ina asotopalopepa, owa'atin. Basef ifimba atif ae' aga'iefi, ifimba ambal namili lagapaifi fegape andeande' lifilafii.
Apa' anipa ina pahapifa basef ae'afi, owa'.” Dei' main? Jisas fowa' nogawa ami owa' nogahapifanaia ma atiasi ni'ipa boumi nigihimba'mama anen nagapoma.

Ea' na'ipas wapani na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ma ami nigafi'mai ae'i, ahame ae'anai a' notopalopan nohondo'ani. I'i owa', owa'atin. Ina anis sifi'mai ae' dowaf, owa'. Ahame atona notopalopas nofa'asi, dao' andeande'.”
Ea' dei' anis alipisi ananisi hiasi asakwahona sotanima safe' daindai, ina ata' sape salomana wapani, a'owa'.
Ea' Jisas nahali' alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim na'i, “Ipa' wapani pa'i pekwaha ae' pitanima pefe', a'amon?”
Owa' Saimon Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, afa' okwaha ina' ofe' ugi'ma ami? Basef ine'ifi atif fa'ipafa ma ogape ambal namili andeande' lifilafi.
Afa' wahapifina ogawa endilisi ina' aman Godi bu'winai hilili'i, nasapa'ena nagafi'ii.”
Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ae' andandepa ipa' 12-pelaipa ea' ae'ipai owa' anona ipe'inai ambal aunai.”
Jisas na'i anona amamunai amom 12-pelaim agilinama Judas, anen Saimon Keriotinai nogamana.
Ama main, Jisas nafe' nolalona walemb hiagoma itap lu'upa Galili. Anom Juda dembami asasimi magape Judai ma'i mohana noga'. Na'amba anen ina ata' nape itap asasipi, owa'. Anen nape Galili atogon.
Ea' felefele' ma anef nemaf esis Juda sanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma ukup pegapoma esis sondolalima God. Ea' sala' aolah sa'uhi sapaoha sanda' gwa'aisi isimba.
Ea' owapana Jisasi ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' nekwaha na'a'e a' nefe' itap lu'upa Judia, ma alipisi sigati maol banagani ine'ini si'i God nanda'ani.

I'i anona aman ni'i epes hiasi sogogawa maol ananini, anen ina nondambaho' nonda'an, owa'. Ina' ea' na'amba atin, nekwaha wambel ine'imbili nefe'ma epes hiasi sitilina sigati maol ine'ini ma sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol.”
Owapana ananimi wapani amom ina mahapifana, owa'. Ea' dei' ma'ipana basef ifimbai.
Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Nimaguf hiafi ipe'ifi atif, apa' nemaf ae'afi dondo'afi ina dei' afataga, ata' owa'. Nogota ae'atai totaga dao', a' efe' Jerusalem.
Ae' awalapa waf awafi esis sagape itapi sanda'afi. Ea' dei' esis ukup awepa ae'. Apa' esis ina la'ifisa ukup awepa ipa', owa'atin.
Ipa' pili' pendowasa' pefe'ma gwa'aisi isimba. Ae' ota'. Dei' ae' ina a' endowasa', ata' owa'. Dei' main, nogota ae'atai ata' owa' totagaia.”
Anen na'ipam na'amba ma ea', ata' napani Galili.

Ea' owapana Jisasi mondowasa' mafe' Jerusalem ma gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi. Amom mali' mafe', anen wapani nagi'mam nondowasa'ma gwa'aisi isimba. Apa' anen ina nafe' nandawalap, owa'atin. Anen nandambaho' atin nafe'.
Anamba sanda' gwa'aisi amom dembami Juda mape naep petaoma Jisas. Ea' mahali' esis ma'i, “Aman anamba nape ani?”
Amam nematawa hiasi esis atis sanda'ipama anen sa'osa'ombel sa'i, “Anen aman bu'unai.” Apa' anis sa'i, “Owa', anen nagambaso'ma epes hiasii.”
Apa' ina anin epen nawalapa basef na'if alihifa Jisas, owa'atin. Dei' main, esis hiasi ombel mahasa amom agufumi esis Judai.
Nemaf afamba esis ata' sape sanda' gwa'aisi isimba atin, Jisas nafi'i nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nawalipasa basef esis.
Amom agufumi Judai bombolalasom a'owa' mahali'as ma'i, “Ami naso'ana gawa inimba?’
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Gawa inimba ina gawa ae'ani, owa'. Gawa anona amani nasapa'e agafi'ii.
I'i anin epen okom mi'i nenda' maol Godi si'i anen naga'iani, atiasi epen inimba a' negawa basef ae' agawalipasafi fataga God a'a fataga ae' atowe.

Ami niga'ipasa gawa ananini atini, anin na'i esis sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Apa' ami ni'i nenda' maola negasa'ma agol anen nasapa'e agafi'ii, anin epen bo'wen hilili'i. Anin na'i basef endilisifi atif.
Moses nase'epa mu'uli Godi ipa', apa' owa' anin epen nila mu'uli inimbaia, owa'atin. Dei' maina ipa' pa'i pehe egaga'?”
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sagwamana basef sa'ipana sa'i, “Ambal aunai napaina. Dei' ina' na'i, ami na'i nehena nega'?”
Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' anda' anom hiahaom banagami atifim. Ea' dei' ipa' gogolalasipa.

Apa' ipa' patopa'mam alop nogaopepa ipe'imi nemaf afamba sabat sagapoma noma'wafi. Dei' main? Ipa' pagi'ma mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani. Moses atona ina nali' nanda' waf afamba owa'. Dambadamba waf afamba fali' fapoma amom agufumi Judai fowa'imi magali'i.

Ipa' patopa'mam alop nogaopepa nemaf afamba sabat ama ipa' ina pewala mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani. Na'amba ipa' pa'i andeande'ma pagatopa'mam alop nogaopepai. Dei' maina ipa' ukup numbutipa ae' ma anda' anona aman bo'ona andeande' nemaf afamba sabat?
Ipa' owa'i pewaloga hiahawes penda'as hi'ihi'as naep atip dowafa, owa'. Ipa' pewalogas ukup ipe'ipi ma waf usi'ifi atefa pegegawa waf asasifi be'ef a'a awef.”
Anis Juda sagape Jerusalemi same' basef ifimba ananifi sahali'as sa'i, “Anen ea' ma'una anamba dembami ape'imi ma'i mohana nogaga'i, a'a owa'?
Anen nape nawalipasa basef alihigima apa' amom agufumi ina magwamana anif basef, owa'. Isimba endilisi a'amon? Amom mogawa aman anamba Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, a'a owa'?
Apa' mogawa aman anamba nataga itap ape'ipi. Apa' anaf owagama Krais nogafi'i, ina anin epen negawa Krais anaf nogatagama, owa'.”

Ea' Jisas ata' nape ipat lu'unai Godi nawalipas na'i mehip na'i, “Ipa' pegawa ae' endilisi apegawa ae' agatagama wambel kofagama. Apa' ae' ina afi'i dowaf aila okom ae'ami atom, owa'. Anen nasapa'e agafi'ii endilisinai. Ipa' ina pegawana, owa'.
Apa' ae' egawana. Dei' main, fowa' ae' alomana wape atogon ea' anen nasapa'e afi'i.”
Esis same' basef ifimba ananifi, opalef awalefa anen sa'i sofa'ana sonda'mana basef sonda' kotimana, owa' owa'atin. Dei' main, nemaf afamba nogaga'afi ina fataga, ata' owa'.
Epes hiasi same'anana dowaf apa' anis sahapifana sa'i, “Nemaf afamba Krais nonda' maol banagani. Maol Kraisi a' nikila' maol aman anamba nanda'ani?”
Amom Farisi mame' esis amam nematawa hiasi sa'i basef fafifafi ma Jisas. Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom Farisi masapa' anom plisman amamumi mafi'i mogowa'ana.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina ata' elomepa epe nogota laota, owa'atin. Ae' epe nogota bandata ea' itanima efe'ma anen nasapa'e agafi'ii.
Ipa' atiasi pelaoma ae' pefe', owa'atin. Gani ae' atiasi igapanima, ipa' ina la'ifipa pefe'agono, owa'.”
Ea' amom Juda atom manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anamba na'i nefe' anima ma afa' ogolaomana? Anen atiasi nefe'ma esis Juda afa'isi saloma Grik a'amon?
Ea' na'i, ‘Ipa' pewando'ma ae' apa' ina atiasi petolowe, owa'.’ Ea' na'ias wapani na'i, ‘Ipa' ina la'ifipa piti ae' egapoma, owa'.’ Basef ifimba kofagefa mamahifa?”
Owa' nemaf afamba akutaifi lu'wafi ma esis Juda sonda' gwa'aisi isimba, Jisas nalutu na'i dindinip na'i, “Epen ami iap pese'an nifi'mai ae' nea' embel.
Epen ami nihapifa ae' si'i basef fagail Buk Baibeli fa'ias faga'i, ‘Ami nigahapifa ae'i, atiasi embel ambal namili lagapaimbeli bitagai okom ananimi nomon a kolo' atin biwisi ando'.’”

Basef Jisasi kofagefa fa'i Ambal bu'unai Godi anaf nope nogaloma esis sogahapifanai ukup asasipi nomon. Nemaf afamba Ambal bu'unai Godi ina' dei' nawis anis epes sagahapifanai, ata' owa'. Dei' main, Jisas ata' owa' noga' nosafel wapani nofa' agol lu'wagilima mogogala'i ananimia, ata' owa'.
Ea' anis amam nematawa same' basef ifimba sa'i, “Endilisi, aman anamba anen dembinai Profet apa' mape mogahafanai.”
Apa' anis daias sa'i, “Dei' Krais nataga itap lu'upa Galili, a'a owa'? Owa'atin.
Basef fagail Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Krais owagama notaga wambota Deviti wambel Betlehem, Devit fowa' nagapoma.’”
Ea' esis amam nematawa sandawal mini'ap biafipa Jisas. Anis sa'i anen Krais, apa' anis sa'i, “Owa'.”
Ea' anis sa'i sofa'ana nefe'ma kot, apa' owa'. Ina anis sando lagof sahapilana, owa'.
Ea' plisman amamba motanima mafe'ma amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami Farisi magapoma. Ea' dembami amamba mahali' plisman ma'i, “Dei' maina ipa' owa' pewa' Jisas pefa'ana pifi'ia?”
Owa' amom ma'i, “Fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' owa' anin epen newalapa basef si'i anen naga'iefia, owa'.”
Amom Farisi magwamama basef ma'i, “Anen nambaso'mepa wapani, a'amon?
Ina anona dembinai a'a anona Farisi nahapifana, owa'atin. Apa' amam nematawa isimba hiasi, ina sogawa mu'uli Godi, owa'. Isimba atis anaf God nogwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi.”

Nikodemas fowa' nagafe'ma Jisasi, anen dembinai naloma amom dembami Farisi, nahali'am na'i, “Afa' andeande'ma onda' waf awafi ma aman anamba a'a owa'atin? Mu'uli afa'ini naga'i na'amba na'i, afa' uli' uhali'ana ma ogogawa waf ananifi feloma maol ananini, ma main dao', afa' a' wi'i anif basef.”
Amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' wapani Galilinai a'a? Owa'atin. Ina' ata' niti basef fagail Buk Baibeli ea' nitalifif. Ama atiasi negegawa ina anona profet nataga itap lu'upa Galili, owa'atin.”
[Amam amamba hiami mafe' ifagw amamigwi, apa' Jisas nondowasa' nafe' halafuta Oliv.
Ea' a'i owa' kuhumbita atota notanima nafe' ipat lu'unai Godi. Esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen ea' nape nawalipasa basef.
Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom Farisi mati ano'w nemata'w kwanda' so'a waol kwaloma anona aman kwa'oh mao'wakw mafi'i. Ea' ma'ipa'w kwalutu la'afena amom hiami matolo'w.
Ea' ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, nemata'w akwamba afa' watolo'w kwaloma anona aman kwanda' so'a waola waf awafi.
Mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani na'ipafa na'i afa' okwaha otamba oha nematawa wanda' waf afambai ogaga'. Ina' okom mape ma'imama?”
Amom ma'i mogwambana i'i anen owa' nogwamoma basef andeande'a, monda' kotimana. Owa', Jisas nasisil notawa nanda' faf ananifi nanda' anif basef fail itap.
Amom malutu mahali'ana ma basef hiafi, ea' nosafel nalutu na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ami owa' penda' waf awafia, ipa' pili' pekwaha otam peha ako'w.”

Ea' anen nasisil wapani nanda' anif basef fail itap. Amom mati basef ifimba matalifif, ea' mandaumb atona atin motanima mafe'. Amom hagami mali' mafe' ea' sa'umi magi' mafe'. Mafe' atona atin makwaha ako'w kwaloma Jisas atis sape.
Ea' Jisas nosafel nalutu nahali'akw na'i, “Dei' amam amamba mape ani? Owa' anona aman ni'i nonda' kotima ina'a?”
Ako'w kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, owa'. A' mafe' hi'alam.” Ea' na'ipa'w na'i, “Ae' na'amba atin si'i amom. Ae' ina anda' kotimina, owa'. Ina' fo'o, apa' ina netanima nenda' waf awafi wapani, owa'i.”]

Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam nematawa wapani na'i, “Ae' si'i mogogala'i fasimi egala'ma ipa' hipai pagape itapi. Epen ami nila ae' anin ina atiasi nefe' akota ufia'w anani'wi, owa'. Anin nepe nogogala'i ambal namili lopain.”
Amom dembami Farisi ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' ina' nanda'i basefa ina' atina. Na'amba afa' ina ohapifina, owa'. Basef ine'ifi ina endilisifi, owa'atin.”

Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipasa basefa ae'. Ea' dei' basef ifimba ae'afi endilisifi atif. Dei' main, ae' a' egawa ae' ataga agafi'ima ea' egawa anamba anaf egafe'ma. Apa' ipa' ina pegawa anamba ae' ataga agafi'ima, anaf egafe'ma, owa'.
Ipa' pawaloga epes si'i epes sagape itapi sagawalogas. Apa' ae' owa'. Ae' ina ewaloga anin epen, owa'.
I'i ae' egawaloga anis epes, ae' ewalogas andeande' endilisi. Dei' main? Ina ae' atowe ape, owa'. Ae' ape aloma ahame nasapa'e agafi'ii. Na'amba afa' biafa wawalogas andeande' endilisi.
Anif basef fagail mu'uli ipe'ini fa'i, ‘I'i anom amam biam muga'i basef atifif, basef ifimba amamifi endilisifi atif.’
Basef ifimba ma ae' afa' biafa wa'if, ae' aloma Ahame ae'anai nasapa'e agafi'ii.”

Ea' amom mahali'ana ma'i, “Ahamena ine'inai nape ani?” Jisas nagwamamef na'i, “Ipa' ina pegawa ae', ea' ipa' ina' pegawa ahame ae'anai wapani. I'i ipa' pegawa ae'ai, ipa' pegawa ahame ae'anai wapani. Owa' owa'atin.”

Jisas ata' nawalapa basef ananifi nomon ipat lu'unai Godi ma rum sagambe' otamba moni sanda' ofaeni naga'oma. Apa' ina anona aman nafe' nombalo'ana nofa'ana ma kot, owa'. Dei' main, nogota ananitai ata' owa' totagaia.

Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ae' a' efe'. Apa' ipa' ina atiasi petolowe, owa'. Ipa' atiasi pepe a pega' ma waf awafi ipe'ifi. Dei' main, anamba ae' egafe'ma, ipa' ina atiasi la'ifipa pefe'agono, owa'.”
Ea' amom Juda manda'ipama ma'i, “Anen na'i nefe' ani, ma afa' ina la'ififa ogafe'a? Dei' maina anen naga'i na'amba? Anen na'i nondaha anen atona a'a?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'i, “Ipa' pagape itapi. Apa' ae' agape ilifi. Walemb ipe'ilimbi itap apa'e, apa' ae' owa'.
Ae' a'ipipa ea'. Atiasi ipa' pega' waf awafi ipe'ifi ata' atapif fipaipa. I'i ipa' owa' pihapifa ae', aman God nasapa'e agafi'iia, atiasi ipa' pegaga' waf awafi ipe'ifi atapif fepaipa.”

Amom mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' aman mamahinama?” Owa' Jisas nagwamamef na'i, “Si'i fowa' aga'ipipa. Ae' la'ifiwai ma iga'ipipa basef hiafi ipa' ma enda' kotimipa ma basef hiafi ifimba aga'ipipafi. Apa' anen nasapa'e agafi'ii, anen endilisinai. Basef ananifi ae' ame'ef ea' a'ipipaef ipa' pagape itapi.”
Amom ina mogawa anen naga'ipama ahamana ananinai, owa'.

Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Namanani ipa' pesa'ma anen nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi pendelona nil lawag usi'igai ti'waenagai ilif. Nemaf afamba a' pegawa basef ifimba fa'i ae' atowe ea' ma'uwi si'i ali' aga'ipipa. Ea' pegawa ae' ina anda' maol ae' atowe aga'iani, owa'. Basef Ahame nagawalipiefi, ifimba atif a'if a'ipipaef.
Anen nasapa'e agafi'ii nape nalome. Anen ina nakwahowe ae' atowe ape, owa'. Dei' main, dondol ae' anda' maol okom ananimi maga'iani.”
Jisas ata' na'ipam atin, owa' hiasi sahapifana.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis Juda sagahapifanai na'i, “I'i ipa' pihapifa basef ae'afi pigi'mif, ipa' alipipai endilisi.
Ea' ipa' atiasi pegawa basef endilisifi ea' ifimba atif fetagwahepa pepe wahifipa.”
Owa' esis sagwamana basef sa'i, “Apa' akupana Abrahami. Apa' ina agof akapa mape lafela anis epes, owa'atin. Dei' maina ina' na'ipapa naga'i basef endilisifi fatagwahepa magape wahifipa?”
Jisas nagwamas basef na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, epen ami nape nanda' waf awafii, waf afambai fewa'an si'i agol akani nagape lafela anis epesi.
Epen inimba agol akani ina nape andeande' ipat nomon dondol, owa'. Apa' Nogamana endilisi dao'. Anen nape ipat atamba nomon dondol.
I'i ae' Nogamana ananiwai etagwahipa panda' waf awafi fagawasi'ipa sisihipai, atiasi pepe andeande' wahifipa endilisi.
Ae' egawa ipa' wambota Abrahami. Apa' ipa' pa'i pehe ega'. Dei' main, basef ifimba ae'afi ina fape nomonas ipe'isi, owa'.
Ae' awalapa basef ifimba gawaifi ma hiahawes ae' aloma ahame ae'anai wagatilisi, ea' a'ipipa basef ifimba, apa' owa' ipa' panda'am si'i pagame' ahamepa ipe'inai naga'ipipa.”

Esis Juda sagwamana basef sa'i, “Ahamapa ape'inai Abraham.” Ea' Jisas na'i, “I'i ipa' Abraham batawisanaiai, ipa' a' penda' maol Abrahami. Owa', owa'atin. Ipa' pa'i dindinipa pehe egaga'. Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi atif ame' God naga'ipiefi. Abraham ina nanda' waf afambai si'i ipa' pa'i pehe egaga', owa'atin.
Ipa' panda' waf ahamepa ipe'inai nanda'afi.” Esis sagwamana basef sa'i, “Mamamapa ape'iwai ina wanda' so'a waol olapa, owa'. Ahamapa ape'inai God atotona.”
Jisas na'ipas na'i, “I'i God ahamepa ipe'inaiai, ukup ipe'ipi pipila ae'. Ina ae' atowe ela okom afi'i, owa'atin. Ahame nasapa'e afi'i ape na'a.
Dei' maina ipa' owa' peme' basef ae'afia? Ipa' ina la'ifipama pegame' basef ae' aga'iefi, owa'.

“Ipa' si'i ahamepa ipe'inai naga'iani. Fowa' dambadamba nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei', anen naha epes sagaga'i, ea' nowa' alafugama basef endilisifi. Nomonas ananisi ina sapoma basef endilisifi, owa'. Anen nambaso'mas nimaguf hiafi dondol lifilafi. Basef baso'aifi anen naga'iefi, ifimba ananifi atif fagataga okom ananimi atumi.
Apa' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi atif. Isimba atis dei' pandaiwa'ma pigahapifi.
Ipa' epen mamahina nagape la'afena ipe'i banagena negawalapa anef waf awafi atetef ae' anda'afi? Owa'atin. Apa' i'i ae' iga'ipipa basef endilisifi, dei' maina ipa' owa' pihapifia?
Epes Godi same' basef ananifi. Apa' ipa' ina epes Godi, owa'. Ipa' anipa daipa. Na'amba ipa' owa' peme' basef ananifia.”
Esis Juda sagwamana basef sa'i, “Apa' ma'i endilisi ina' Samariainai bounai ape'inai ea' ambal aunai napaina.”
Jisas na'i, “Ae' ambal aunai owa'atin. Apa' ae' asa'ma agol Ahame ae'anai ea' ipa' pataloga agol ae'agili.
Ae' ina anda' maola anis sogasa'ma agol ae'igili lu'wagol, owa'. Apa' anona dembinai nanda' maol inimba, ma anis daias sogasa'ma agol ae'agili, dembinai anamba Ahame nape jasa ae'.
Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi atif. Epen ami nihapifa basef ae'afi nilif, anin ina atiasi nega', owa'. A' nepe lifilafi dondol.”

Esis Juda same' basef ifimba sa'i, “Dei' apa' magawa ina' ambal aunai nape nomonas ine'isi. Abraham fowa' a' naga' ea' amom profet fowa'imi wapani a' maga'. Owa' ina' na'i, epen ami nihapifa basef ine'ifi anin ina nega', owa'.”
Ea' sahali'ana wapani sa'i, “Ina' a' nikila' ahamapa ape'inai Abraham? Anen naga' ea' amom profet wapani a' maga'. Apa' ina' na'i ina' atina aman mamahinama?

Jisas nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “I'i ae' esa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagilai, agol ae'agili wafigil si'i basef wafifi. Apa' Ahame ipa' paga'i God ipe'inai, anen nasa'ma agol ae'igili lu'wagol. Apa' ipa' ina pegawana, owa'. Ae' atowe egawana. I'i ae' i'i owa' igawanaia, ae' aga'i basef baso'ami si'i ipa' pagambaso'am. Owa' owa'atin. Ae' egawana aila basef ananifi.
“Abraham akunamepa ipe'inai, anen a' nandagala ma nogati nogota ae'atai owagama togataga, si'i nagati ae' ma sonagahana endilisi.”
Esis Juda sa'ipana sa'i, “Afagof ine'igufi ata' owa' 50-pelaigufa, ina' na'i a' nati Abraham?”
Jisas nagwamas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, fowa' gani Abraham ma'mana ata' owa' kolanaea, ae' ali' ape.”
Ea' esis same' basef ananifi, ea' amom Juda mafe' masa'mai otamba ma'i mokwahemba mohana owa', Jisas nandambaho' nawisi nakwaha ipat lu'unai Godi nafe'.
Jisas nafe' ufia'w ea' nati anona aman naep pagaso'anai. Fowa' ma'mana kogolana naep paso'ana nape na'amba atin atapina.
Alipumi ananimi mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, dei' maina aman anamba naep pagaso'ana? Anen nanda' waf awafi a'a esis mamasana sanda' waf awafi solana?”
Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Kofagema ma anen naep pagaso'ana ina mamasana sanda' waf awafi a'a anen nanda' waf awafi, owa'. Anen naep paso'ana ma maol Godi negataga lu'win. Isimba atis dei' naep paso'ana.
Dei' ea' alip, nogota apa' monda' maola anen nasapa'e agafi'ii. Owamb bogataga ina atiasi anis epes sonda' maol, owa'atin.
Ae' ata' egape itap apa'e ipe'ipi, ae' si'i nagwapin nogogala'i ipe'iwai ipa' hipai pagape itapi.”
Jisas na'ipam na'amba, ea' nisi'wafa apah itap nagwindisah haloma itap. Ea' nasomana naep aman anamba.

Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nefe' nesa'opa naep embel dumb amamba Siloam.” Basef kofagefa ma agol agalemba ifimba fa'i, nasapa'ana. Ea' aman anamba nafe' nasa'opa naep ananipi, ma ata' notanimai atin owa', naep patiana andeande' bo'ona.
Esis wambel atembel saloma anis fowa' sati anen nagape ufia'w nandailasa otamba gwa'aisi maini sahali'as sa'i, “Anen aman anamba ma'una fowa' nape ufia'w nandailasa gwa'aisii?”
Ea' anis sa'i, “Anen ma'una.” Apa' anis sa'i, “Owa'. Anona daiana anamba. Apa amaga ananigai si'i anen.” Apa' aman anamba fowa' naep pagaso'anai na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi.”
Ea' esis sahali'ana sa'i, “Ina' nanda' maina dei' nagati andeande'?”

Anen nagwamas na'i, “Anona aman agol ananigili Jisas nanda' itap paloma apah ananihi nambemam nanda'meam naep ae'api. Ea' na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' nefe' nesa'of dumb Siloam.’ Ea' afa' asa'of ea' naep apati.”
Ea' sahali'ana sa'i, “Aman anamba nape ani?” Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina egawa nagapoma, owa'.”
Esis sao'wa aman anamba fowa' naep pagaso'anai safe'ma amom dembami Farisi.
Nemaf afamba esis sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, afamba atef Jisas nanda' itap Paloma apah nambemam nanda'manam naep ananipi, ea' naep patiana.

Ea' amom Farisi mahali'ana wapani ma'i, “Anen nanda'mena maina dei' naep pagati?” Aman anamba nagwamam na'i, “Anen nanda' itap paloma apah ananihi nanda'meam naep ae'api, ea' afa' asa'opa naep ea' dei' apati.”

Ea' anom Farisi ma'i, “Aman anamba ina nagi'ma mu'uli ma nemaf afamba sabat, owa'. Ea' anen ina aman Godi, owa'atin.” Owa' anom Farisi daiam ma'i, “Anona aman nanda' waf awafii ina la'ifina nonda' maol banagani si'i God nanda'ani, owa'atin.” Ea' amom Farisi mandawal biafim.
Ea' mahali' aman anamba fowa' naep pagaso'anai ma'i, “Ina' negawana na'imama? Waf ananifi mamahefa? Aman anamba nanda' naep ine'ipi pagatii.” Aman anamba na'i, “Anen anona profet.”
Endilisi aman anamba fowa' naep pagaso'anai dei' patiana. Apa' amom dembami esis Judai ina mahapifana ma'i endilisi, owa'. Ea' mofalai mamasana ananisi safi'i mahali'as.
Ea' mahali'as ma'i, “Aman anamba nogamepa ipe'inai a'a owa'? Aman anamba ipa' pa'i naep ananipi pagaso'anai fowa' ma'mana kogolana? Dei' anen nati andeande' na'imama?”
Esis mamasana sagwamam basef sa'i, “Afa' ogawa anen nogamafa afa'inai. Ea' ogawa fowa' ma'mana kogolana naep paso'ana.
Apa' afa' ina ogawa dei' anen nagati, nati andeande' na'imama. Ami nanda' naep ananipi patiana, afa' ina ogawa. Anen dambena ea', afa' wa'i ipa' pihali'ana nonda'ipipa.”

Esis mamasana ananisi ombal mahasa amom agufumi Judai. Ea' dei' sa'ias na'amba. Dei' main, amom agufumi ma'i basef ea' ma'i, epen ami ni'i basefa Jisas niga'i anen Kraisi, amom a' mili'amonana ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai ma ina nenda' lotu nelomas wapani, owa'.
Amom ma'ias na'amba dei' mamasana ananisi ombal mahas sa'i, “Anen dambena ea'. Pihali'ana nonda'ipipa.”
Amom mofalai aman anamba wapani ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' ni'i basef endilisifi atif, God natilina. Afa' ogawa aman anamba Jisas, anen aman aunai.”
Anen nagwamam na'i, “Ae' ina egawa waf ananifi awafi, a'a owa'. Apa' ae' egawa endilisi atis, fowa' naep ae'api pase'e apa' dei' owa', ati andeande'.”
Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Anen nanda'mena maina dei' nanda' naep ine'ipi pagati?”
Anen nagwamamef na'i, “Doko' ae' a'ipipa ea', apa' ipa' ina pame'e, owa'. Dei' maina pa'i pegame' basef ifimba wapani? Ipa' wapani pa'i petaga alipipai ananipai pilana?”
Owa' amom ma'i basef wandafifi ma anen ma'i, “Ina' aman alipunai ananinai. Apa' afa' alipufai Mosesi.
Afa' ogawa God fowa' na'ipa Moses ea' apa' aman anamba afa' ina ogawa waf kofagefa ananifi anen nataga ani?”
Anen nagwamamef na'i, “Amamba hiahaom maim? Ipa' ina pegawa anen nataga ani, apa' anen nanda' naep ae'api pati.
Apa' mogawa God ina name' esis sanda' waf awafii, owa'. Anen name' epen ami nanda' maol ananini nagasa'ma agol ananigili ma negame' basef ananifi.
Fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' ina anif basef fa'i anona aman ma'mana kolana ea' nataga naep paso'ana ma anef nemaf anona aman daiana nonda' naep pigatiana, owa'atin.
I'i aman anamba ina aman Godiai, anen ina atiasi nonda' anis maefah, owa', owa'atin. Anen aman Godi.”
