Amom magwamana basef ma'i, “Endilisi, fowa' ma'mena kogolaena ina' nanda' waf awafi atef. Ea' ina a' niwalipafa, owa'i.” Ea' amom mali'amonana ipat atamba esis Juda sandakolasatai ina ata' nolomas nonda' lotu wapani, a' owa'.
Ea' Jisas name' basefa amom mali'amonana nape ando' nowando'mana natolona nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' nahapifa aman anamba nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi, a'a owa'?”
Aman anamba nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, aman anamba ami? Ni'ipiana ma igahapifana.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' ina' natolona ea'. Anen epen anamba dei' na'i nagalomanai.”
Ea' na'i, “Dembinai, dei' ahapifina.” Na'ias na'amba ea', nindiwa nembawa notawa itap nanifelona nasa'ma agol ananigili.
Jisas na'i, “Ae' afi'i itap apa'e ma ewaloga epes hiasi hi'igalas. Ama esis naep pagaso'asi atiasi sogati andeande' a isimba naep pagatiasi ea' naep pese'as.”
Anom Farisi mape malomana mame' basef ifimba mahali'ana ma'i, “Ifimba basef maif? Ina' na'i afa' naep paso'afa wapani a'amon?”
Jisas na'ipam na'i, “I'i ipa' naep pese'epa ai, ipa' waf awafi akepa. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' apa'i, ‘Afa' wagatii.’ Na'amba waf awafi ipe'ifi ata' fapomepa.”
Jisas na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, epen ami owa' nusi' uta indalelemb sipsipia ma anin nelota niwisi anagon daiagona, epen inimba nanda' wali.
Apa' epen inimba usi'ini nigawisi utai, anin nigimafi sipsipi.
Aman nugumafi utai nawisi'man uta ma nugumafi sipsip. Amom sipsip mame' malogol ananigili. Nofala agofa sipsip ananimi, ea' nao'wam mawisi ando'.
Nao'wa sipsip ananimi hiami mawisi ando' hi'alam ea' nali' nafe', amom magi'mana. Dei' main? Amom mogawa malogol ananigili.
Apa' sipsip ina magi'ma anona daiana, owa'. Na'amba mondafa'mana a' mofa' mefe' atona biana. Dei' main? Amom ina mogawa malogol ananigili, owa'.?
Ea' Jisas na'ipasa basef waminif atin na'amba, apa' esis ina sogawa basef kofagefa, owa'atin.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas wapani na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, ae' si'i uta sipsip mugawisatai.
Amom fowa' mugumafi sipsipi, hiami manda' wali apa' sipsip ina mame' malogof amamugufi, owa'.
Ae' si'i uta, epen ami niwisi ae' nomon, God nuwambilai anin nokwahoman waf awafi nepe andeande'. Anin nifi'i niwisi niwis nepe netaga nefe' nefa' gwa'aisi bu'wasi.
Amom manda' wali mafi'i ma monda' wal mohas soga' mogahambombagas. Apa' ae' afi'i ma ipa' pegape andeande' ambal lopaipa endilisi a'owa'.
Ae' aman bu'uwai igimafi sipsipi, a'i aho' ma egaga' ma egatopalopa sipsip igimafiami.

I'i anona aman nonda' kontrak dowafi ma nugumafi sipsip amambai, anen okom mi'i nogofa' otamba atembai, anen ina atiasi numafi sipsip andeande', owa'. Anen ina aman endilisi nugumafi sipsipi, owa'. Ea' nemaf mamahefa niti nombagw gwagail alupi gugafi'i, a' ombal mohana nokwaha sipsip atom mulutu nofa' nefe'. Ea' nombagw agwamba guwis goha sipsip mofa' mefe' atona biana.
Aman anamba nanda' maola otamba atembai, anen nandaiwa'ma nugumafi sipsip amamba andeande', owa'. Ea' atiasi niti nombagw agwamba a' ombal mohana nofa' nefe'.
“Ae' aman bu'uwai igimafi sipsip andeande'i. Ae' egawa sipsip ae'ami a sipsip mogawa ae' wapani.
Ea' na'amba atin ahame ae'anai nogawa ae', ae' egawa anen. Ae' a'i aho'ma ega' egatopalopa sipsip ae'ami.

Ae' anom sipsip daiam malutumi. Apa' amom ina malutu nomon indalelemb ambalemba, owa'. Amom magalutu indalelemb anagon daiagini. Ae' okom ma'iam a'owa' anef nemaf a' efa'am mifi'i meme' malogol ae'igili ekolasom mulutu indalelemb atelemb ae' atowe imafiam.
Ae' a'i aho'ma egaga' ma atiasi esafel egape namowe wapani. Isimba atis ahame ae'anai okom maimaili a'owa'.
Ina anona aman noha ambal ae'ali ega', owa'atin. Okom ae'ami atom ma'i aho'ma atiasi egaga'. Ae' efa' agol lu'wagili ma ega' egesafel wapani. Agol agalemba ahame atona nase'eagol.”
Esis Juda same' basef ifimba ea' esis sandatopa' biafis. Hiasi sa'i, “Ambagof awami mapaona ea' nahaga nagaol a'owa'. Dei' maina ipa' pagame' malogol ananigili?”

Apa' anis daias sa'i, “Anona aman ambagof awami magapaunai ina na'i anif basef si'i anen naga'iefi, owa'. Anona aman ambagof awami magapaunai ai, ina la'ifinama nonda' aman anamba naep pagaso'anai nogati wapani, owa'atin.”

Nogota atamba asaf atef fagalatama esis Juda sanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma ukup pagapoma fowa' gani sagawisi ipat Godi. Ea' Jisas nafe' nomon ipat lu'unai Godi ilafunama sale'w fowa' Solomon nanda'akwi.
Ea' amom Juda mafi'i malutu malipana ma'i, “Nimaguf mamahifa ina' nenda' opalef afa'ilifi fetaga nomonas biafis? I'i ina' Kraisai, ni'ipafa basef alihif.”
Jisas nagwamam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ea', apa' ipa' ina ukup pehafel pahapifi, owa'. Ae' anda' hiahaom banagami ma agol ahamai, amamba mihimba'mepa ae' epen mamahowema.
Apa' ipa' ina sipsip ae'ipai, owa'. Ipa' anipa daipa. Na'amba dei' ipa' ina pahapifa ae', owa'.
Sipsip ae'ami mame' malogol ae'agili ea' egawam mame' basef ae'afi maili.

Ae' egaso'am ambal namili ma mogape andeande' dondol lifilafi. Amom ina moga', owa'atin. Ina anin epen la'ifina netagwahom lagof ae'agufi negefa'am, owa'atin endilisi. Amom mope lagof ae'agufi atapim dondol lifilafi.
“Ahame ae'anai nase'e epes isimba ae'asi. Ina anin epen atiasi la'ifina nitagwahis lagol ahamai negefa'as, owa'atin. Dei' main, ahame ae'anai banagonai a'owa' nikila' epes hiasi hi'alas.
Ae' aloma ahame, afa' biafa wape atotofa.”
Ea' amom Juda mafe' mofa'i otamba wapani ma'i mokwahemba mohana afuna.
Apa Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ihimba'mepa maol bu'wani hiami nagataga Ahamai ea' patilin. Apa' ukup ipe'ipi papoma maol mamahina anda'ani ma dei' pa'i pekwaha otamba pegahe?”
Amam Juda magwamana ma'i, “Afa' ina wakwaha otamba wa'i ohena ma anin maol bu'wani, owa'. Ina' aman falafunai nanda' findiwa, na'i ina' atina God. Ea' afa' wa'i ohena otamba.”
Jisas nagwamam na'i, “Anif basef fagail mu'uli ipe'ini fa'ias fa'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa ea' a'i, ipa' si'i anom god daiam.’

Fowa' basef Godi fafe'ma epes isimba fa'i, ‘God na'i ipa' si'i anom god daiam.’ Basef ifimba ina fenalo, owa'. Fape atapif fandawalap endilisi. Ahame ae'anai atona nosahe'e nanda'e ape hilili' ananiwai atowe nasapa'e afi'i itap apa'e enda' maol ananini. Ea' a'i ae' Nogamana ananiwai. Dei' maina ipa' paga'i, ae' anda' God findiwana?’
I'i ae' ina anda' maol Ahame ae'anaiai, dao' andeande'ma ipa' pindaiwa' ma pigahapifi.
Apa' ae' anda' maol ananini ma i'i ipa' owa' pihapifia, hapaimi. Ipa' piti maol atin ae'ani pegawa Ahame nape nalome, ae' ape alomana.”
Ea' amom ma'i mombalo'ana ma mogowa'ana. Owa', owa'atin. Anen nakwaha amom a' nafe'.
Jisas notanima natopa' walemb Jordan nambo fisana nafe' nataga anamba fowa' dambadamba Jon nagapisi'asa nape na'amba.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen. Esis sa'i, “Jon owa' nonda' anin maol banagania, apa' basef ananifi hiafi naga'ifa Jisasi, ifimba endilisifi atif.”
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sahapifa Jisas na'amba.

Anona aman aowas nanda'anai agol ananigili Lasarus. Anen naloma hanitiamana ananiwai biawa, Maria kwaloma Marta sape wambel ambalemba Betani. Maria akwamba fowa' kwagakolo'wa sanda balaga Dembinaii ma kwanda' auf balaga ako'ugai kwagandisamana bo'wagah ananigahi.
Ea' awo wasapa' basef fafe'ma Jisas wa'i, “Dembinai, aman anamba ina' okom magamagailanai a' awasina na'oh.”
Ea' Jisas name' basef ifimba na'i, “Aowas inimba ina natagamana ma nogaga', owa'. Aowas inimba natagamana ma esis sogasa'ma agol ae' Nogamana Godi, a sogasa'ma agol ananigili wapani.”
Ea' Jisas okom maimaila Marta kwaloma owama'w Maria waloma Lasarus.
Anen name' basefa Lasarus awasina, apa' anen ata' napani nimaguf bif wapani wambel ambalemba nagapanima.
Nimaguf bif fafe'ma ea', na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Afa' dei' a' otanima ofe' itap lu'upa Judia.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi magwamana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, nimbewa' esis Juda sa'i sokwaha otamba sehena afina, apa' dei' ina' na'i netanima nefe' anamba wapani, a'amon?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'i, “Nemaf atetef awa 12-pelain nape. Epen ami nagafe' alipi anin ina newa, owa'. Dei' main, anin nati hauguma itap apa'e howalagon nafe' andeande'.
Apa' i'i anin negafe' owambi, atiasi a' newa. Dei' main? Anin nagwapin nogogala'i akan.”
Jisas na'ipam na'amba ma ea', na'ipam wapani na'i, “Alipunai afa'inai Lasarus anen na'oh. Ae' atiasi efe' ganimba itap Judia ma iginimbalona.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi magwamana basef ma'i, “Dembinai, i'i anen no'oh atinai, dao' atiasi ambo'ona.”
Doko' Jisas nali' naga'ipam na'i Lasarus naga'oh, fa'i Lasarus a' naga' endilisi. Apa' alipumi ananimi ukup pa'i anen ata' na'oh dowaf.
Dei' Jisas na'ipam alihif na'i, “Lasarus a' naga' ea' endilisi.
Ae' sonahe ma ae' ina alomana wape atogon nemaf anen nagaga'afi. Ama ipa' atiasi pigahapifa ae'. Dei' afa' ofe'ma anen.”
Ea' Tomas agol wa'agol Didimas na'ipa alipumi Jisasi daiam na'i, “Afa' ofe' wapani ma oga' ogaloma anen.”
Lasarus naga' a' sawana. Nimaguf bifibif fafe' ea', Jisas a' nafi'i nataga. Anan nogawa Lasarus sawana nape wandof nimaguf bifibif.
Wambel ambalemba Betani bape felefele'ma Jerusalem, si'i kilomita wanifin. Ea' amom Juda hiami mafi'i ma monda' opalef hanitiamana biawa Martai Maria fegape sa'umbela anen hanitinamawa nagaga'.
Marta kwame' basefa Jisas nafi'i atin, kwafe' kowando'mana ufia'w, apa' Maria ata' kwapani ipat.
Ea' Marta kwafe'ma Jisas kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' nepe na'a'e ai, hanitiname ae'anai ina noga', owa'atin.”
Owa' ako'w kwa'ipana wapani kwa'i, “Ae' egawa ina' nigahali' Goda hiahawes mais, anen nogasi'inasi.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Hanitinamena atiasi nogosafel wapanii.”
Ea' Marta kwagwamana kwa'i, “Ae' egawa anen anaf a' nosafel wapani nemaf akutaifi afamba epes hiasi sagaga'i sogosafel wapaniefi.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Kofagama epes sogosafel wapani ma sogofa' ambal namili, ae' atowe. Epen ami nihapifa ae', atiasi nega' ea' nesafel wapani nefa' ambal namili nepe andeande'.
Epen ami ata' nape namina nigahapifa ae'i, anin nepe andeande'. Ina nega' wapani, owa'atin. Nepe lifilafi dondol. Ina' nahapila basef ifimba, a'a owa'?”
Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Aho' dembinai, ae' ahapifa ina' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii. Ina' Nogamana ananinai, fowa' anen na'i nigafi'i itap apa'i.”
Ako'w kwa'ipana na'amba, kotanima kwafe'ma owama'w Maria kwa'ipa'w sa'osa'ombel kwa'i, “Dembinai Tisa a' nafi'i nataga nofalena.”
Maria kwame' basef ifimba atin, kosafel kwafalis kwafe'mana.
Jisas ina dei' nawisi wambel lu'wambela la'afen, owa'. Afa' naili wambel di'imbili doko' Marta kwagatolonama.

Amom Juda mape maloma Maria nomon ipat awoutai ma'i mowa' banaga nomonas ako'usi ma sogape banages. Ea' amom mati Maria kwasafel kwafalis kwafe'. Amom ukup pa'i owa' ako'w kofe' wandofa kogalopana. Ea' magima'w mafe'.

Ea' Maria kwafe'ma anamba Jisas nagapoma kwatolona kundiwa nembawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' nepe nelomapa ai, hanitiname ae'anai ina noga', owa'atin. Apa' owa' napani laogon dei' anen naga'.”
Jisas nati ako'w kwape kwalef atin ea' nati amom Juda mafi'i maloma'w malef wapani. Ea' nati esis uwahipis opaf ananifi a' aof a'owa' na'i a' nelef atin.
Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Ipa' pawana ani?” Ea' esis sa'ipana sa'i, “Dembinai, fi'i netelogon.”
Owa' a' nalef.
Amom Juda mati anen nalef na'amba ma'i, “Ipa' petolona! Anen okom maimailana a'owa'.”
Ape' anom ma'i, “Aman anamba ma'una nanda' aman anamba naep pagaso'anai ma dei' pagatianai. Anen la'ifinai ma fowa' a' nili' nifi'i ma notopalopa aman anamba ai, dei' a' nope a'a noga'?”
Ea' Jisas opaf nimanif endilisi nafe' nataga wandof afamba lu'wafi sagwasogon nagawis nomon otam lu'unai. Ea' sanda' anona owap lu'unai sowalo uta.
Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' lefata owap anamba nogowalo utai.” Ea' Marta haniti'ma aman anamba nagaga'i kwa'i, “Dembinai, anen a' nape nimaguf bifibif ea'. Dei' alogw awami a' mana.”
Owa' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Fowa' ali' a'ipina dei' i'ipina wapani, i'i ina' nihapifa ae', atiasi niti mogogala'i banagami Godi.”

Ea' esis selefata owap anamba ea' Jisas naniga nati ilif na'i, “Ahame, ae' anifelina ma nagame'e. Ae' egawa ina' name'e lifilafi apa' ae' a'ias na'amba ma esis amam nematawa sagalutu na'ai sogahapifa ae', ina' nasapa'e agafi'ii.”
Jisas nandabeten na'amba ea', nofalana mehip na'i, “Lasarus, safel niwisi ando'.”
Ea' aman anamba nasafel nawisi ando'. Apa' bo'wagah haloma lagof amaga ananimi sanda' lowaf sombafana. Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' tagwahomana luwaguf amamba ea' pekwahona nefe' wahifina.”
Amom Juda hiami mafi'i mati Maria maloma'w malef, ea' mati amamba Jisas nanda'ami. Ea' a' mahapifana.
Apa' anom mafe'ma amom dembami Farisi ma'ipama amamba Jisas nanda'ami.
Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom Farisi hiami mofala anom dembami mafi'i mandakolasa monda' kot. Ea' ma'i, “Afa' atiasi onda' maina aman anamba nanda' maol banaganii?
I'i ope ogatotolona ma nonda' maol inimba, atiasi hiasi asohapifana hi'ilas. Ea' amom Rom atiasi mifi'i mohambombaga ipat lu'unai Godi noloma apa' Juda hiapai wapani.”
Ea' anona aman agilinai Judai agol Kaiafas, anen dembinai pris nape nagali'ma pris hiamii ma afagol agalemba na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina pegawa anis hiahawes, owa'atin.

Ipa' ina dei' pegawa anif basef, owa'. I'i aman atotona nogaga'ma amam nematawa hiasi, na'ambai a' andeande'ma ipa'. Afa' wandaiwa' ma esis sogahambombaga apa' Juda. Na'amba mini'ap ape'ipi Judai a' lamonap.”

Anen ina na'i basef ifimba ma okom ananimi atom, owa'atin. Anen nape pris dembinai afagol agalemba. Ea' na'i basef Ambal bu'unai Godi naga'ipanaefi si'i profet na'i Jisas a' nondaga' ma nogatopalopa esis Juda hiasi.
Kaiafas na'i Jisas ina a' noga' notopalopa esis Juda atis, owa'atin. Anen noga' ma nogatopalopa epes Godi hiasi sapesasa sagafe' itap hiagomai hi'ilas nuwambilasi nonda'as sogataga mini'ap atetep.
Nemaf afamba atef amom agufumi Judai a' mali' ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Jisas nogaga'.

Ea' Jisas ina ata' nafe' alihina anamba esis Juda sagapoma, a' owa'. Anen nafe' nandambaho' atin felefele'ma anamba wafigima fataupigima ma wambel ambalemba Ifraim. Nape na'amba naloma alipumi ananimi.

Ina nogota laota ma esis Juda soga' gwa'aisi lu'wasi saga'i Pasovai, owa'. Ea' esis Juda hiasi sakwaha walemb asasilimbi a' safe' Jerusalem atogon. Safe'ma sigaila basef Godi fowa'ifi sosa'of sotofa alogwa sogandondomba alop asasipi ma God negati esis bo'wes hilili' ma soga' gwa'aisi isimba.
Esis sape ipat lu'unai Godi nomon sowando'ma Jisas ea' sahali'as sa'i, “Ipa' ukup pape pa'imama? Anen atiasi nifi'mai gwa'aisi isimba a'a owa'?”
Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom Farisi hiami ma'ias dindinip ma'i, “Epen ami negawa Jisas nagapoma ni'ipafa ofe' ombalo'ana ma onda'mana basef.”

Nimaguf wanif wanif ata' fapoma esis Juda sonda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova. Nemaf afamba Jisas a' nataga wambel Betani, alipunai Lasarus nagapoma. Fowa' naga'ma Jisas nasa'mana nogosafel wapanii.
Ea' sanda'mana gwa'aisi Jisas. Marta kwanda' gwa'aisi, apa' Lasarus nape nalomas sape sa' gwa'aisi saloma Jisas.

Ea' Maria kwahapila anop kap si'ipa sanda bu'wani agilina nad sagatalin otamba hiambaii. Ea' kwahapilan kwakolo'wan kwandisamana bo'wagah Jisasi kwanda' auf balaga ako'ugai kopati'manan. Ea' ipat atamba asi'itama alogw bu'wagwi ma sanda inimbai.
Apa' anona alipunai Jisasi Judas Keriotinai kowalana ma sanda inimba nandaiwa'ma kwakolo'wan kwagasapelin. Aman anamba atiasi a' nogowalapa Jisas niga'ipa amom boumianai.
Ea' Judas na'ipas na'i, “I'i afa' ofa' sanda inimba anis epes soso'afa moni 300 kina sotalina ofa'an ogaso' epes isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi mainai, dao' andeande'. Apa' owa', owa'atin.”

Apa' Judas okom ananimi ina ma'i notopalopa isimba kwahusa hiahawesi, owa'atin. Anen na'ias na'amba ma nonda' wal nogofa'amba. Dei' main, anen nugumafi bokis isimba Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mala otamba amamimbai bagalasi ma dondol nanda' wala anemba. Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i,

“Ipa' owa'i pi'ipa'w basef ifimbaia, owa'i. Andeande'ma ako'w kwagakolo'wa sanda inimba ma atiasi nemaf afamba sehe igaga'afi ma sogawe. Isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi maini sape salomepa nimaguf hiafi. Apa' ae' ina epe egalomepa nogota lautai, owa'.”
Esis Juda hiasi same' basefa Jisas nape Betani. Ea' safi'i sa'i sotolona ea' sa'i siti Lasarus wapani, nimbewa' naga'ma Jisas nasa'mana nogosafel wapanii.
Ea' amom pris dembami ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Lasarus nogaga' wapani.
Dei' main, anis Juda hiasi sati Lasarus notanima nosafel ambal lapaona. Isimba atis dei' sakwaha amom dembami Juda asafe' saila Jisas sahapifana.
Wafilu epes hiasi safi'mai gwa'aisi isimba Pasova, same' basefa Jisas ata' nafi'i atin Jerusalem.

Ea' satopa' agof lawahiguf apilugufa sahapilagof safi'i satagamana ufia'w. Ea' soga sa'i mehip sa'i, “Hosana. Apa' mandanifal endilisi ma ina'. Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma ina' nagafi'i agol ananigilii nese'ena banagami ma nenda' maol ananini. Ina' king dembinai apa' Israeli.”

Ea' Jisas nowando'ma donki atitin sa'uni natilin nandagala natoman nafe' si'i fowa' anif basef Godi fagail Buk Baibeli faga'i, “Ipa' wambel Saion, ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Dembinai king ipe'inai anaf notoma donki noganai nofa'ana nifi'i.”

Nemaf afamba alipumi Jisasi ina mogawa basef ifimba kofagefa faga'i Jisasi, owa'atin. Ama nogota atamba Jisas noga' ma nosafel wapani notanima nogalota ilif, dao' amom a' mogawa basef ifimba faga'i anini. Ea' ukup pepoma amamba epes isimba sanda'manam anini wapani.
Anis epes sali' sati Jisas nogofala aman anamba nagaga'i Lasarus napani matmat nogosafel wapani. Ea' sa'ipa hiasi ma basef ifimba Lasarasi.
Ea' epes hiasi same' basefa Jisas nanda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami. Ea' dei' safe' satolona.
Ea' amom Farisi manda'ipama ma'i, “Maol afa'ini ina la'ifin, owa'. Afa' agof akafa. Piti amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen atona hi'alas.”
Epes hiasi safe' Jerusalem ama gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi sonda' lotuma God. Ea' anom Grik wapani mafe' malomas.
Anona aman alipunai Jisasi Filip anen Betsaidainai itap lu'upa Galili. Amom Grik mafi'mai gwa'aisi isimba ea' mafi'mai Filip ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i uti Jisas.”
Filip nafe' na'ipa Andru, amom biam mafe' ma'ipa Jisas.
Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi a' afi'i. Nogota atamba anis asasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagol.
Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi, i'i olemb witimb owa' bewa itap nomona, olemb ambamba bepe atifimb. Apa' i'i bewa begewala itap nomon, dao' ambamba ambetaga belo bil hiambi.

Epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol ni'i nihapilal tatala'il, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' epen ami okom mopoma ae' ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf God a' nofa'al lotanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.

Epen ami ni'i nenda' maol ae'anii, anin a' nindaila ae'. Mamahagoma ae' egapoma, inimba nanda' maola ae'i anin negapoma anamba. Ea' epen ami nenda' maol ae'anii, Ahame ae'anai atiasi nosa'ma agol ananigili.

Ea' Jisas na'ipas wapani na'i, “Dei' opaf ae'afi bolalaf afataga aof. Ae' basef owa'atina iga'if. Atiasi ae' a' i'i, ‘Ahame, ina' li'amona akafimi amamba ma'i mogatagama ae' dei'i a'a?’ Owa'atin. Ae' afi'i nogota ata'e ape itap apa'e ma maol inimba atin ae' enda'ana sehe egaga'.

Ahame, ina' nenda'ama epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol.” Ea' anogol malogol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i, “Ae' anda'ama sogasa'ma agol ae'agili gogataga lu'wagol, owa' atiasi enda'agol gotaga lu'wagol wapani.”
Ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi salutu sagame' malogol agalembai sa'i, “Owa', otaga diwala.” Apa' anis sa'i, “Anona ensel na'ipana anif basef.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Malogol agalemba ina ga'i ma gogatopalopa ae', owa'. Agalemba ga'i ma gogatopalopa ipa'.
Dei' Ahame God a' nawaloga wafa amam nematawa hiasi sagape itap apai ea' natofa dembinai nugumafi itap apai.
Atiasi esis sendele il atin lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ilifa atiasi ihindi'ai esis amam nematawa hiasi sifi'mai ae' hi'igalas.”
Jisas na'ipas na'amba ma nigihimba'mas sogogawa ufia'w anen atiasi nogaga'akwi.

Ea' esis sagwamana sa'i, “Mu'uli ape'ini naga'i na'amba na'i, Krais anen nogape lifilafi dondoli. Dei' maina ina' naga'i, ‘Anen nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi atiasi sogandolona lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ilif?’ Dembinai nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi, anen epen mamahonama?”

Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Nogota ata' bandata ma nagwapin nogala' nogalomepa. Dei' ipa' a' pendafe' hauguma. Na'amba owamb botagamepa. Epen ami negafe' owambi, anin ina negawa anamba negafe'ma, owa'.
Ae' ape si'i nagwapin ipe'ini. Ipa' pindahapifa nagwapin inimba ma pegataga awasi nagwapin nogogala'i.” Jisas na'ipas ea', nakwaha esis a' nafe' nandambaho'mas.
Jisas a' nanda' maol banagani hiani, si'i God nanda'ani esis satilin. Apa' esis ina sahapifana, owa'.
Si'i basef ifimba fowa' profet Aisaia nanda'afi faga'ias dei' fataga fandawalap fa'i, “Anaf epes ami sohapila basef afa'ifi? Esis sogati banagami Godi esis mamahisa? Owa'atin.”

Esis ina la'ifisa sogahapifa Jisas. Dei' main, profet anamba Aisaia nanda' anif basef Godi wapani faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Anen nanda' naep asasipi apaso'as nanda' ukup asasipi paso' ma ina atiasi sotologon ea' ukup asasipi wapani ina atiasi sogawa ma sogambema nelelemba ae' enda'as bo'wes, owa'atin.”
Fowa' Aisaia nati banagami mogogala'i Jisasi ea' na'ias na'amba ma anen atona.

Amom agufumi hiami a' mahapifa Jisas. Apa' owa', amom ombal bahama amom Farisi dembami. Ea' amom ina mawalapa basef ma'ipasef alihif, owa'. Ombal bahama amom Farisi mogali'amonama ina ata' moloma esis Juda monda' lotu wapani, owa'.
Amom agufumi amamba ukup pa'i esis a'owa' ma sogasa'ma agof amamugufi atogof lu'wagof. Apa' amom ina ukup pa'i God nosa'ma agof amamugufi, owa'atin.
Ea' Jisas na'ipas dindinip na'i, “Epen nigahapifa ae'i, anin ina nahapifa ae' atowe, owa'. Anin nahapifa anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani.
Epen ami niti ae' anin nati anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani.
Ae' afi'i itap apa'e si'i anin nagwapin ama epen ami nigahapifai, anin ina a' nepe owamb, owa'atin.

Epen ami neme' basef ae'afi ma owa' nihapifif nilifa, ae' ina anaf ewaloga anin, owa'. Dei' main? Ae' ina afi'i itap apa'e ma egawaloga epes sagape itapi, owa'atin. Ae' afi'i ma iwambilas sogotanimai.
Epen ami negase'e alafuga ae'i ma anin owa' nihapifa ae'a, anaf anona dembinai jas a' nowaloga anin. Nemaf afamba akutaifi basef ifimba atif ae' aga'iefi ifimba fenda' anin a' fewawalogon.
Dei' main? Ae' ina a'i anif basefa okom ae'ami atom maga'iefi, owa'. Ahame ae'anai atona na'ipi basef ifimba dindinipa iga'ipasef. Ea' anen nasapa'e afi'i a'if si'i okom ananimi maga'iefi.
Ae' egawa basef ananifi fawalapa ambal namili ma ipa' pegape andeande' lifilafi. Na'amba basef ae' aga'ipasafi ea' ifimba atif si'i Ahame naga'ipiefi.”

Nemaf afamba lu'wafi esis Juda soga' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova owa' ata' fetagaea. Jisas nogawa nogota ananitai a' tataga ma nogakwaha itap apa'e nogafe'ma Ahamana. Ea' okom ananimi maimaila epes ananisi sagape itapi a'owa'. Na'amba dei' nihimba'masa okom ananimi lu'wami magamagaila esisi.

Ea' wambomota anen naloma alipumi mape ma' gwa'aisi isimba. Ea' Saimon nogamana Judas Keriotinai nalomam mape. Owa' aman aunai Satan a' nali' naso'ma nomonas Judasi ma nefe' nigihimba'ma boumi ma Jisas nogapoma.
Ea' Jisas nogawa Ahamana nanda' anen banagona ma hiahaom hiami. Ea' nogawa anen nape naloma God nafi'i ea' atiasi a' notanima nefe'mana wapani.
Ea' nosafel natagwaha siot lautai ananitai nowaha' anin taul.
Ea' nakolo' embel anis dis nafe' notawa nasa'opamam bo'wagah amom alipumi ananimi ea' nanda' taul alamba nogowaha'ali nopati'mamagah.
Nasa'opamagah nafe', natagama Saimon Pita. Owa' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, negesa'opame bo'wagah ae'agahi, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Ina' owa' negawa maol inimba ae' dei' enda'ania. Apa' anaf dao', ina' negawan.”

Ea' Pita na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Owa'. Ina' owa'i nesa'opa bo'wagah ae'agahia, owa'.” Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “I'i ae' owa' esa'opamena bo'wagah ine'igahia, ina atiasi nepe alipunai ae'inai, owa'atin.”
Ea' Saimon Pita nagwamana na'i, “Dembinai, ina negesa'opame bo'wagah atagah, owa'. Nesa'ope hi'ili lagof balaga wapani sotaga be'es.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Epen ami nagasa'of ea'i, anin ina atiasi nesa'of wapani, owa'. Anin bo'wen ea'. Ipa' hipai ipa' be'epa hilili', apa' anona ipe'inai atotona ata' owa' bo'ona hilili'a.”
Dei' main? Anen a' nogawa ami atiasi nefe' niga'ipa boumi ananimi ma nigihimba'mama nogapomai. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' hipai ambe'epa hilili', apa' anona ipe'inai atotona ata' owa' bu'unaia.”
Anen nasa'opamam bo'wagah amamugahi ea', nala siot ananitai nafe' natoma felefele'ma tebol. Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pegawa maol inimba ae' anda'mepani a'a owa'?
Ipa' pefale tisa a'a Dembiwai, na'amba andeande'. Ae' ea' ma'uwi, basef ifimba endilisifi atif.
Ae' Dembiwai ipe'iwai a tisa ipe'iwai. Ae' doko' asa'opa bo'wagah ipe'igahi. Ea' ipa' wapani a' pendasa'opa bo'wagah ipe'igahi atona atin.
Ae' ea' ihimba'mepa waf afamba ae'afi. Ipa' penda'am na'amba atin si'i ae' anda'am.

Dei' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi atif. Epen inimba agol akani nanda' maol dowadowafi, anin ina nape ilifa dembinai ananinai, owa'. Ea' anona dembinai nasapa' anin nagafi'i, inimba ina nikila' dembinai anamba ananinai, owa'.
“Dei' ipa' pegawa waf afamba ea'. I'i pigi'maf andeande', dao' a pendagala.

Ae' basef ake ma ipa' hipai pefe' pewalapa basef piga'ipa boumi ma ae', owa'. Ae' egawepa andandepepa ea'. Apa' basef Godi fagail buk Baibeli atiasi fetaga endilisi ma anen nogawalapa ae' ma boumii. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Aman anamba noga' gwa'aisi nugalumai atiasi nigi bo'waga egimugama nofa'asa ae'.’
“Ae' dei' ape a'ipipa basef ifimba ma waf afamba ina dei' fataga, ata' owa'atin. Ama atiasi fetaga fendawalap, dao' ipa' pihapifa ae' ea' ma'uwi.

Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisi, epen ami negaso'an nembel anin epen ae' agasapa'ani, anin nase'e nembel ae'. Ea' epen ami negase'e nembel ae'i, anin naso'ana nembel Ahame ae'anai wapani nasapa'e agafi'ii.”
Jisas na'ipam basef ifimba ea', okom ananimi nimanim a'owa'. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai atiasi nefe' nihimba'ma boumi ma ae' egapoma.”
Ea' alipumi ananimi manda' tima atin tol mape. Amom ina mogawa Jisas na'i ami.
Ae' alipuwai Jisasi, anen okom magamagailai ape felefele' ma anen.
Ea' Saimon Pita nanda' balaga na'ipi na'i, “Ina' hali'ago anen na'i ami.”
Ea' ae' indiki'ah afe' felefele'ma Jisas ahali'ana a'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i ami?”
Jisas nagwame na'i, “Ae' atiasi ila bret nemba'w egaso'anotai, aman anamba ea' ma'una anen.” Ea' nala bret nemba'w naso' Judas Keriotinai Saimon nogamana.
Ea' ata' nahapila bret atin, owa' aman aunai Satan a' nawisana nembel ananimbili nomon. Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Maol ina' na'i nenda'ani da'an kwafalis.”
Apa' afa' alipufai Jisasi wape waga' gwa'aisii, afa' ina ogawa basef Jisasi kofagefa, owa'.

Judas nugumafi otamba afa'imbai. Na'amba anom alipumi Jisasi ukup pandanda' pa'i Jisas na'ipana ma nefe' nogotala anis gwa'aisi ma nonda' gwa'aisi isimba a'a na'ipana na'i noso'asa anemba otamba isimba kwahusi.
Ea' Judas ata' nahapila bret atin, nafe' nawis ando' kwafalis. Ea' owamb akot atowafai.
Ea' Judas ata' nafe' atin nagawis ando'i, Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Dei' esis asosa'ma agol ae'agili ataga epen egefa' alop epesi lu'wagol. Ea' sosa'ma agol Ahame Godi ma maol ae' anda'ani wapani.
Isimba atis Ahame God wapani nosa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagol dei' atefa maol anen nanda'ani.

Ipa' sa'upai, ae' elomepa ope nogota bandata a' efe'. Ipa' atiasi pewando'me apa' ina atiasi petolowe, owa'. Anamba ae' egafe'ma, ipa' ina la'ifipama atiasi pegafe'agono, owa. Basef ifimba atif fowa' aga'ipa amom Judafi, dei' a'ipipaef wapani.
Dei' ase'epa mu'uli ae'ani dambaini ma ipa' ukup pindaima atin si'i okom ae'ami magamagaila ipa'. Ea' na'amba atin, ukup ipe'ipi pindaima atin.
I'i ukup ipe'ipi pindaima atin, atiasi epes hiasi sogawa ipa' alipipai ae'ipai.”
Ea' Saimon Pita nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' a' nefe' ani?” Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Anamba dei' ae' egafe'ma, ina atiasi nigi'mi nefe'agono, owa'. Apa' anaf owagama dao', ina' a' nigi'mi nefo'o.”
Ea' Pita nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, dei' maina ae' ina la'ifiwi ma dei' igagi'mina? Ae' a'i aho'ma ega' egalomena.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' na'i aho' endilisi ma nega' negaloma ae' a'amon? Ae' a'ipina endilisi, atiasi owamb amba'e awata owa' ata' totaea, ina' a' nendahali'mi ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisasa.’”
Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi ina besafel nimanilimb a'owa', owa'i. Ipa' pindahapifa God, pihapifa ae' wapani.
Ipat Ahame ae'anai alihinai satopa' ilalef hielifi fape fandandapa. I'i owa'ai, fowa' ae' i'ipipa. Apa' owa', endilisi atis ae' a' efe' endondomba wambel ipe'imbili.
Ae' i'i efe'ma egandomba wambel ipe'imbilima owagama itanimai efa'epa pefe' pepe pelome. Ea' anamba ae' egapoma, ipa' wapani pepe anamba atogon pelome.
Ea' ipa' a' pegawa ufia'w ae' igafe'akwi ma wambel ambalemba.”
Tomas nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, afa' owa' ogawaia ina' nefe' ani? Afa' ina ogawa ufia'w akwamba ina' na'i negafe'akwi.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' atowe ufia'w kofagewe ma basef endilisifi feloma ambal namili. Owa' anin epen la'ifina nefe' negatagama Ahame ano'w ufia'wa, owa'atin. Ea' ae' atowe.
I'i ipa' pegawa ae', Pegawa Ahame ae'anai wapani. Ea' dei' apatolona. Dei' atef ipa' patolona pegawana.”
Filip na'ipana nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' himba'mafa Ahamena ine'inai afa' ma isimba ea' sondahama afa'.”

Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Filip, nogota ea' lautai ape agalomepa, ina' owa' ata' negawa ea'? Epen ami nagati ae' ea'i, anin a' nati Ahame ae'anai wapani. Dei' maina ina' ata' naga'i, ae' igihimba'mepa Ahame ipa'?’

Ina' nahapifa ae' ma negawa ae' aloma Ahame afa' atotofa, ae' ape anen, anen nape ae', a'a owa'? Basef ae' agasi'ipafi, ifimba ae' ina anda'ef okom ae'ami atom, owa'. Ahame nape ae' ea' anen atona nanda' maol ananini hiani.
Ipa' pindahapifa basef ifimba. Ae' ape Ahame, Ahame nape ae'. I'i owa'ma, ipa' ukup pendapoma maol banagani hiani anda'ani. Ipa' piti maol inimba, pindahapifi.

“Basef endilisifi atif dei' a'ipipa. Epen ami nigahapifa ae'i, maol hiani dei' anda'ani, anin wapani atiasi nenda'an. Ama anaf nenda' maol lu'wani a'owa' nikila' maol ae'ani. Dei' main? Ae' efe'ma Ahame.
Hiahawes hiasi ipa' pendabeten pigahali'anasa agol ae'agilii, atiasi ae' inda'asi. Ama Ahame a nogofa' agol lu'wagilima maol ae' Nogamana ananiwai atiasi inda'ani.
Hiahawes ipa' pigahali' ae'masi ma agol ae'agili, pihapifi endilisi, dao' atiasi inda'asi.
“I'i ipa' ukup pi'i ae' endilisi, dao' ipa' pindagi'ma mu'uli ae'ani andeande'.
Ama atiasi ihali' Ahame, ma nogasi'ipai anona notopalopepa nogowa' banagaipai. Anen nope nogaloma ipa' lifilafi dondoli.

Anamba Ambal bu'unai Godi naga'i basef endilisifii. Esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi ina atiasi sotolona sogawana sofa'ana, owa'. Apa' ipa' pegawana ea' nape nalomepa, ea' atiasi a' nuwis nope nomon opalef ipe'ilimbi.
Ae' ina a' ikwahipa tol pepe dowaf, si'i awasi isimba alifisi ahasas mamasas akasi, owa'atin. Atiasi ae' igafi'mipai.
Nogota kwaia'uta esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafii ina atiasi sotolowe wapani, owa'. Apa' ipa' pigatolowai. Ae' ape namowe ambal namili, ea' na'amba atin ipa' pepe namipa ambal namili wapani.
Ama nemaf afamba ipa' apegawa ae' ape Ahame, ape nomona ipa', ipa' pape ae'.

Epen ami negefa' mu'uli ae'ani nigi'mana nigailan andeande'i, anin a' okom maimaila ae' endilisi. Atiasi Ahame ae'anai okom mila anin. Ea' ae' wapani okom mimilan anin ea' etaga endawalapa anin alihiwi.”

Jisas na'ias na'amba, ea' anona Judas ina anamba Keriotinai, owa', anona daiana, na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, dei' maina ina' na'i nigihimba'mafa ina' netaga nendawalap alihinama afa', ina' owa' nihimba'masa ina' alihinama esis sagaila waf itapafia?”
Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i epen okom muga'i ae' endilisii, anin atiasi nila basef ae'afi andeande'. Ea' Ahame ae'anai atiasi okom mimila anin. Ea' afa' biafa ufi'mai anin ope oloman lifilafi.
Epen nandaiwa'ma ae' endilisii, anin ina atiasi nila basef ae'afi andeande', owa'. Ea' basef ifimba ipa' pagame'afi, ifimba ina ae'afi, owa'. Ifimba basef Ahame Godi nasapa'e agafi'ii.
Ae' ata' ape atapiwi alomepa a'ipipa basef ifimba.

Apa' anen notopalopepa ma nogowa' banagaipai, anen Ambal bu'unai Godi. Anamba Ahame atiasi nosapa'ana nugafi'i agol ae'agili. Ea' nowalipipa ma hiahawes hiasi, nosa'ma nomonas ipe'isi ma ukup pegapoma basef hiafi wapani agasi'ipafi.

Ae' a'i ikwahipa. Apa' ae' ina enda'epa ombal behepa ukup iwaiwanip pepe si'i amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi sanda'as, owa'. Ae' a' enda'epa pepe ukup awanep endilisi ma ukup ipe'ipi ina atiasi pesafel awep, owa'. Ea' ina ombal mehepa, owa'.

Ipa' pame'ef ea' basef ifimba agasi'ipafi. Ae' ikwahipa efe'. Bola itanimaimipai. I'i ipa' ukup pila ae' endilisi, ea' ipa' asonendahepa ma ae' egafe'ma Ahame. Dei' main? Ahame anen dembinai nikila' ae'.
Hiahawes isimba ina dei' asataga, ata' owa'. Apa' ae' ali' a'ipipas ea' ma nemaf afamba hiahawes isimba sogatagama ipa' pegawas pigahapifa ae'.
Ae' ina atiasi enda' basef hiafi elomepa, a'owa'. Dei' main? Aman dembinai aunai nugumafi itap apa'ii anamba dei' a' nafi'i. Anen ina atiasi la'ifinama nonda'me anis maefah, owa'atin.
Apa' ae' a'i esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi sondogawa ae' okom maimaila Ahame endilisi ea' dei' anda'as na'amba atin si'i anen nanda'ipi. Na'amba dei' afa' a' ofe'.
“Ae' si'i lawag si'iga endilisi. Ahame ae'anai anen si'i ahama aof afamba sagawa lawah sa'utip gwa'aipi pagailagahi.

Agof hiagufi sa'utip owa' pigailagufia, agwafomba Ahame natopa'agof nelefatagof. Apa' anagof agof fail fogola gwa'aisii agwafomba anen nandombagof natopa'agof nahagasogof ama atiasi fogape bo'ogof fil fogola gwa'aisi hiasi andeande'.
Basef ifimba ae' agasi'ipafi fanda'epa pataga be'epa hilili' ea'.

Ipa' pendape ae' si'i ae' agape ipa'. I'i agof atogof wafiguf, ina atiasi sa'utip pilagof, owa'. I'i agof owa' fondala sisihiguf lawag si'igaea, afof ina atiasi folo andeande', fil fola gwa'aisi, owa'. Ea' na'amba atin si'i ipa'. I'i ipa' owa' pepe peloma ae'a, ipa' wapani ina atiasi pela anis gwa'aisi, owa'atin.
Ae' si'i lawag si'iga. Ipa' si'i agofugama. Epen negape ae'i ma ae' egape anini, atiasi negela gwa'aisi hiasii. I'i ipa' pekwaha ae', ipa' atipa ina atiasi penda' anis maefah, owa'atin.
“I'i anin epen owa' nepe ae'a, atiasi esis sili'amonan si'i sagatopa' agof namugufi ma aliguf. Ama satamagof sowa'aniagof a sogaofagof nif.
I'i ipa' pepe ae' ma basef ae'afi fepe nomona ipa', ipa' pihali' ae' ma basef maif pendahama ukup ipe'ipi paga'ias, dao' atiasi hiahawes isimba sotagamepa na'amba atin.
I'i ipa' pela gwa'aisi hiasi, Ahame ae'anai nofa' agol lu'wagili. Ama atiasi pegataga alipipai ae'ipai.
Ahame okom maimaila ae', ea' na'amba atin ae' okom maimailipa. Dondol ipa' pendape okom ae'ami la'afima ma pegegawa okom ae'ami pelele' mailipa a'owa'.
I'i ipa' pila mu'uli ae'ani andeande', atiasi apepe okom ae'ami la'afima nomon si'i ae' agaila mu'uli ahamai andeande'ma agape okom ananimi la'afima nomon.
Ae' a'ipipa basef ifimba ma a'i dagala ae'ani inimba nepe nelomepa ae' dagala ipe'ini a' nepe si'ina nelelemb ipe'ilimbi.
Mu'uli ae'ani inimba. Ipa' ukup pindaima atina sahin owan ipe'isi endilisi si'i ae' okom magamagailipa.
I'i anin epen nekwaha ambal ananili atol nega' netopalopa esis alipisi atis, waf afambai afikila' waf afamba anin epen daian nanda'afi.
Ipa' pila mu'uli aga'ipipani andeande', dao' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai.

Epen agol akani dembinai ananinai ina na'ipan basef alihifa maol anen nanda'ani, owa'atin. Apa' ae' a'ipipa basef hiafi Ahame ae'anai naga'ipiefi. Na'amba dei' ae' ina efalepa epes falafipai agof akipai, owa'. Ae' efalepa alipipai.

Ipa' ina pali' pandandepa ae' ipe'iwai, owa'. Ae' ali' andandepepa ea' ae'ipai. Ea' anda'epa panda' maol bu'wani. Ama pefe' penda' maol bu'wani si'i lawah hogola gwa'aisi ma maol bu'wani ipe'ini negape andeande'. Ama i'i ipa' pendabeten pihali' Ahame ma anis hiahawesa agol ae'igili, anen nogasi'ipasi.
Ae' ase'epa mu'uli ipa' na'amba. Ipa' ukup pindandaima atin endilisi ma sahin owan ipe'isi.
“I'i esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi si'i sofala ipa' boupai dao', ipa' pendegawa esis fowa' sali' sofala ae' bouwai.

I'i a' endilisi ipa' epes itapipaiai, esis sagaila waf itapafi a' ukup pipilipa si'i ipa' mini'ap asasipai atipa. Apa' owa', ipa' ina epes itap apa'ipai, owa'atin. Ae' esahe'epa ea' ma pegakwaha waf itapafi. Ea' dei' esis sagaila waf itapafi sofalepa boupai.

“Ipa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba ae' agasi'ipafi andeande'. Epen inimba agol akani nanda' maol dowadowafi, anin ina nape ilifa dembinai ananinai, owa'. Ae' ea' sali' sanda'me waf awafi, ea' atiasi esis sonda'mepa waf awafi, sonda'epa awepa wapani. Esis i'i sigi'ma basef ae'afiai, dao' atiasi esis sigi'ma basef ipe'ifi wapani. Owa', owa'atin.
Esis ina sogawa Ahame nasapa'e agafi'ii, owa'. Ipa' ukup pagapoma agol ae'agili, ea' ae'ipai. Ea' esis sagaila waf esis itapafi asonda' hiahaom awami hiami ma ipa'.
I'i endilisi ae' owa' ifi'i i'ipasa basef ifimba ai, esis waf awafi akas. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Dei' esis owa' ano'w ufia'wa sogombaho' waf awafi asasifia, owa'atin.
Epen negefala ae' bouwai, anin nefala Ahame ae'anai bounai wapani.

Esis sagaila waf itapafi ina sati anona aman nanda' maol nandahama maol ae' anda'ani, owa'. I'i endilisi ae' owa' enda' maol inimbaea, esis waf awafi akas. Apa' dei' sati maol banagani ae'ani ea', owa', asowa' alafugaha ae' ukup awepa ae' aloma Ahame ae'anai wapani.
Apa' waf afamba asasifi afamba ea' fafe' dondo'ma anif basef ifimba fagail mu'uli esis Judai fa'i, ‘Esis ukup awepa ae' dowadowaf. Ae' basef kofagefa ake.’
“Apa' anen natopalopepa nogowa' banagaipai, anen napani naloma Ahame. Ea' ae' esapa'ana nifi'mai ipa'. Anen Ambal bu'unai nawalapa basef naga'i endilisii. Anamba nafi'i ma nogawalapa basefa ae'.
Ea' ipa' wapani atiasi pi'i basef pewalapefa esis. Dei' main, ipa' fowa' dambadamba pati asefela maol anda'an paloma pape atapipa pafi'i pataga dei'.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ae' dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba hi'alef ea' ma ipa' ina pekwaha pagahapifa ae', owa'i.
Atiasi esis sili'amonipai ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi. Anef nemaf atiasi fegataga ma epes ami sehepa pegaga', esis atiasi ukup pendanda' si'i sanda' maol fasini Godi. Apa' owa'atin.
Fowa' esis ina sogawa Ahame naloma ae' wapani, owa. Na'amba esis atiasi sonda' waf afambai.
Apa' dei' a'ipipa ea' ma hiahawes isimba. Ama nogota atiasi togataga ma esis sonda'epa na'amba, ipa' ukup pendanda'ma basef ifimba dei' aga'ipipafi.
“Fowa' ae' ape agalomepa ae' ina a'ipipa ma hiahawes isimba, owa'. Apa' dei' ea' efe'ma anen anamba nasapa'e agafi'ii. Ina anona aman ipe'inai nahali'i na'i, ‘Ina' nefe' ani?’ Owa'atin.
Ae' anda' basef ifimba ea' ma ipa'. Ea' dei' nelelemb ipe'ilimbi nimanilimb a'owa'.

Apa' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi. Ae' ekwahipa efe' ma etopalopepa pegape andeande'. I'i ae' owa' ma igafe'ai, dei' Spirit Ambal Godi Nogowa' banagaipai, ina atiasi nifi'mai ipa', owa'atin. Apa' i'i ae' egafe', dao', atiasi esapa'ana nifi'mai ipa'.
Nemaf afamba nugafi'i, a' nihimba'ma esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi ma sogogawa basef kofagefa ma waf wanifif afamba. Waf awafi feloma waf usi'ifi feloma basefa God nondakotimas.
Waf awafi kofagefa asasifi na'amba. Esis ina sohapifa ae', owa'atin.
Waf kofagefa usi'ifi na'amba. Ae' efe'ma Ahame ea' atiasi ipa' ina petolowe wapani, owa'.
Basef kofagefa ma kot ifimba. Aman dembinai aunai ma epes sagape itap apa'i, anen ea' gasopana ma kot atamba ma basef lu'wafi God dei' nanda'manatai.
Ae' basef hiafi a'owa' ma a'i iga'ipipafi, apa' ipa' ina la'ifipama pegefa'ef dei', owa'.

Nemaf afamba Spirit Ambal Godi naga'i basef endilisifii nugafi'i, a' nisindi'amonepa ma basef hiafi endilisifi. Anen ina a' nowalapa basef nomonas ananisi atis, owa'atin. Basef nagame'ef ea'i, ifimba atif nowalapef ni'if. Ama atiasi noga'ipipa hiahaom amamba ma'i anaf migi' mogatagai.
Ea' nofa' basef ae'afi nowalapefa ipa' ma nogowalapa agol ae'agili.
Hiahaom hiami, amamba ae'ami. Ea' dei' ae' a'ias a'i. Atiasi nofa' basef ae'afi ni'if nowalapefa ipa'.
“Nogota kwaia'uta ipa' ina atiasi petolowe wapani, owa'. Ama nogota bandata kwasakwasala owa', ipa' apetelowe wapani.”

Anom alipumi ananimi, amom atom manda'ipama ma'i na'amba ma'i, “Basef maif kofagefa ifimba anen naga'ipafaef afa'i? Anen na'i, nogota kwaia'uta, afa' ina atiasi otolona, ma main owa', a' otolona wapani. Na'i nogafe'ma ahamana. Afa' ina ogawa basef ifimba kofagefa, owa'.”
Ea' amom ma'ias wapani ma'i, “Nogota atamba kwaia'uta anen naga'iatai, isimba hiahawes mais? Afa' ina ogawa basef ifimba naga'if na'ambai, owa'.”

Owa' Jisas a' nogawa amom ma'i mogahali'ana, ea' na'ipam na'i, “A'i ipa' pandahali'ma basef ifimba kofagefa ae' aga'iefi. Ae' aga'if na'amba. Nogota kwaia'uta atiasi ipa' ina petolowe, owa'. Ama owa' nogota laota kwasakwasala, owa' a petolowe wapani.

Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa. Ipa' atiasi pelef mehip a'owa' ea' pelef pindiwagef endilisi. Apa' esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi atiasi sondagala. Apa' ipa' a' nelelemb nimanilimb. Owa', owa'atin. Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi nimanilimbi atiasi bendambema betaga pendagala endilisi.

Nemata'w opafu'wi ma kwa'i kogola awanii ako'w kwame' akafimi kogawa nogota akwa'uta ma kogola awani atataga. Na'amba opaf akwa'ufi a' nimanif. Ako'w kolana ea', ako'w ina ata' okom mandanda'ma akafimi amamba wapani, owa'atin. Ako'w ea' kwandagala atin kwapoma awani nataga nape itap ea'.
Ipa' na'amba atin, dei' ipa' nelelemb nimanilimb. Atiasi ae' itilipa wapani, owa' nelelemb ipe'ilimbi asonohalemb. Ina anin epen la'ifina negalamona dagala inimba ipe'ini, owa'atin.
Atiasi nemaf afamba ipa' ina pihali'i ma anin mae atitin, owa'. Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi ipa'. I'i ipa' pihali' Ahame ma maefah maisa agol ae'agili dao', atiasi nese'epas.
Fowa' ipa' ina pahali'i ma pegefa' anis maefaha agol ae'agili, owa'. Dei' pihali'imas, atiasi pegefa'asi ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi asonogahepa endilisi.
“Ae' dei' anda' basef ifimba waminif atina ipa'. Apa' ae' ina atiasi ata' i'ipipa basef waminif atin, owa'. Nemaf afamba ae' ewalapef alihif i'ipipaef ipa' ma Ahame.
Ama nemaf afamba atiasi ipa' pihali' Ahame ma agol ae'agili. Ae' ina ata' i'ipipa na'amba i'i ae' atowe atiasi ihali'ana ma nogatopalopepa, owa'atin.
Ahame atona okom maimailipa a'owa'. Dei' main, ipa' ukup paipaila ae' a'owa', ea' ipa' pahapifi pegawa ae' ape aloma God afi'i.
Fowa' ae' ape aloma Ahame ea' akwahona afi'i itap apa'e ea'. Dei' ae' a'i ekwaha itap a' itanima efe'ma anen.”
Alipumi ananimi ma'i, “Aho', dei' ina' na'ipafas alihis, ina ata' na'i basef waminif atin, owa'.
Dei' afa' ogawa ina ata' nape nasasa anin epen nihali'ina nili', owa'atin. Ina' negawa hiahaom hiami ea'. Isimba atis dei' afa' wahapifa ina' nape naloma God nafi'i.”
Jisas nagwamam basef na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' dei' pahapifa ae' a'amon?

Ipa' peme'. Dei' nogota ea' felefele', aho' atataga ea' ma atiasi sotofa ipa' hipai atona biana pefe' walemb ipe'ilimbi. Ea' pekwaha ae' atowe epe. Apa' ina ae' atowe epe, owa'atin. Ahame nape nalome.

Ae' a'i atiasi ipa' pepe pelome nelelemb pepe sa'ombel. Ea' dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba. Itap apa'e ipa' atiasi peme' nelelemb nimanilimb. Apa' nelelemb ipe'ilimbi atiasi ambetaga banagelemb. Dei' main, ae' atalogofa waf itapafi a ikila'af ea'.”

Jisas na'i basef na'amba ma ea', a' naniga nati heven nandabeten na'i, “Ahame, nogota atataga ea'. Ina' nese'e agol lu'wagili ae' Nogamena ine'iwai, ma atiasi la'ifiwi ma egasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol.
Dei' main? Ina' nesahe'e ea' ma epe Dembiwai ili'ma epes hi'igalas egaso'as ambal namili epes isimba hiasi ina' nagasi'iesi. Ambal alamba sogape andeande' lifilafi dondoli.
Ambal lagape andeande' lifilafii kofagefa ifimba. Esis sogawa ina' atina God endilisinai, sogawa endilisi ae' Jisas Krais, ina' nasapa'e agafi'ii.
“Maol inimba ina' nasapa'e afi'i ma enda'ani, ae' anda'an ambifan ea'. Ea' dei' asa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagola nogohnaep esis amam nematawa itapasi.
Ahame, fowa' itap owa' ata' pitagaia ae' ape alomena efa' agol lu'wagili ea'. Dei' nendase'e agol agalemba lu'wagili si'i fowa'.
Ae' awalapa agol ine'igili ea' a'ipa esis epes isimba ina' nagase'eas ae'i ma itap apa'e. Isimba epes ine'isi nagase'eas ae' ea'i. Esis saila basef ine'ifi andeande'.
Dei' asogawa hiahaom hiami ina' nagase'eam ae' ea'i, amamba mafi'i ina' atina.
Basef hiafi ina' nagase'ef ea'i, ifimba ae' a'ipasef ea', sofa'efa sogogawa endilisi fowa' ae' ape alomena afi'i. Ea' sahapila basef ifimba ina' nasapa'e agafi'ii.

“Dei' ae' andabetena egatopalopa isimba. Ae' ina andabetena egatopalopa esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi, owa'. Ae' anda' betena egatopalopa isimba ina' nagase'eas ae'i. Dei' main? Isimba esis ine'isi si'isi.
Ea' epes ae'asi, isimba ine'isi. Epes hiasi ine'isi hi'ilas isimba ae'asi. Ea' esis sasa'ma agol ae'agili.

Dei' ae' ina ata' epe itap apa'e wapani, owa'. Apa' esis sope itap apa'e. Ae' ea' efe'mago ina'. Ahame be'ena hilili'i, ina' nimafi esisa atiasi sogape banagesa banagami ine'imi, banagami amamba ina' ea' nagase'eam ae'i. Ma esis sogape wambota atotota si'i afa' biafa wagape atotofa.

Nogota atamba ae' ape agaloma esis, ae' imafias sape banagami ine'imi, banagami amamba ina' ea' nagase'eam ae'i. Ae' imafias andeande' ea' ina anin atitin higilalan, owa'. Aman higiligalanai, ea' anen atona atiasi nogafe' wambel awambili, ma basef ine'ifi fagail buk Baibeli fetaga endilisi fendawalap.
Ae' dei' ata' ape itap apa'e a'i basef ifimba ma dagala ae'ani negape si'ina nelelemb asasilimbi. Ea' dei' a' efe'mago ina'.
“Basef ine'ifi, ae' aso'asef ea'. Esis amam nematawa asofala esis bousi sanda'as awes. Dei' main? Esis ina sagi'ma waf itap apa'ifi si'i ae' wapani ina itap apa'iwai, owa'.
Ae' ina andabeten ahali'ina ma negelefata esis itap apa'e, owa'atin. Ae' andabetena ina' nigimafiasa aman aunai ina nohambombagas, owa'atin.
Esis ina sagi'ma waf itap apa'ifi si'i ae' wapani ina itap apa'iwai, owa'.
Basef ine'ifi ifimba endilisifi. Ina' nenda' esis sondataga ine'isi atis bo'wes hilili'ma basef ifimba.
Fowa' ina' nasapa'e afi'i ape la'afena esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi. Dei' na'amba atin ae' wapani ea' asapa' esis ae'asi sofe' la'afena esis isimba itapasi.
Ae' ase'ena ae' ina' ea' ine'iwai atowe ma etopalopa esis wapani sogataga bo'wes hilili' ine'isi atis.
“Apa' ae' ina andabetena egatopalopa esis isimba atis, owa'atin. Ae' andabetena egatopalopa epes isimba anaf sogame' basefa esisi ma sogahapifa ae'i.

Ahame, ae' andabetena esis isimba hiasi asondape ukup atifip si'i ina' Ahame nape nagalome a ae' ape agalomena. Ea' na'amba atin, anda' betena esis sogape afa' biafa. Ama amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi sogahapifa ina' atina a' nasapa'e agafi'ii.
Fowa' ina' nasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagol ea' dei' asa'ma agof asasigufi lu'wagofa sogape nembel atotombel si'i afa' biafa wagape.

Ina' nape nalome a ae' anaf epe eloma esis, ae', ea' na'amba atin ae' okom ma'i esis asondataga nembel atotombel endilisi. Ama esis amam nematawa itapasi sogogawa ina' nasapa'e afi'i, ea' ina' okom maimailas a'owa' si'i okom magamagaila ae' a'owa'.

“Ahame, ae' okom ma'i esis amam nematawa ina' nagase'eas ae'i sope solome wambel ambalemba. Ae' okom ma'i esis siti hiahaom banagami fasimi mogogala'i ae'ami, mogogala'i amamba ina' nagase'eam ae'i. Fowa' itap ata' owa' petagaea, nogota atamba ina' okom maila ae'. Ea' nase'e mogogala'i amamba.
Ahame usi'inai hilili'i, esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi ina sogawa ina'. Apa' ae' egawena. Ea' esis isimba alipisi sogawa ina' nasapa'e afi'i.

Ae' a' awalapa agol ine'igili ma esis. Ea' ae' atiasi endawalapagol atin atapigil. Ama esis sogofa' waf afamba ukup pindaima atinafi ma anis daindaias wapani si'i ina' okom magamagaila ae' ma ae' egape nomona esis.”
Jisas nandabeten nahali' Ahamana ea', naloma alipumi ananimi a' mafe' mowala mambo walemb Kidron fisanamb lawah oliv hogotaoma. Nao'wam mafe' anamba.
Anen Judas a' nogawa anamba ma atiasi nefe' nigihimba'ma boumi ma Jisas. Dei' main? Nimaguf hiafi dondol Jisas nao'wam mandakolas magapoma anamba.
Ea' Judas nafi'i nao'wa anom soldia maloma anom plisman amom pris maloma amom Farisi masapa'am magafi'i. Amom mahapila bagah nagwahis lambeh maloma hiahaom sagapa'ami mofa'am atin mafi'i anamba.
Ea' Jisas nogawa hiahaom hiami atiasi mogatagamanai. Ea' nafe' nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pewando'ma ami?”
Ea' magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai.” Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi.” Owa' Judas na'i nigihimba'mam Jisasi, anen nalutu nalomam wapani.
Jisas ata' na'ipam atin na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi.” Owa' a' mandahagas mowa motawa itap.
Ea' Jisas nahali'am wapani na'i, “Ipa' pewando'ma ami?” Ea' ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai.”
Jisas na'i, “Doko' ae' a'ipipa a'i ae' ea' ma'uwi. I'i ipa' pewando'ma ae', pihapili pekwahogo amom amamba mofo'o wahifim.”
Jisas dei' na'ipam na'amba nagi'ma basef ifimba fowa' naga'iefi ma fegataga endilisi. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Amam amamba fowa' ina' nagase'eami, ina anona atotona higililana, owa'.”
Ea' Saimon Pita nahapila anota bainat nagiatai naha anona aman Malkas nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii. Ea' natopa' aliga kwahisigai ananigai gowa.
Ea' Jisas na'ipa Pita dindinip na'i, “Ina' tanima la bainat nowala let. Ae' a' ia' embela kap Ahame nagasi'iapi.”
Ea' amom soldia maloma dembinai amamunai maloma amom plisman Judai hiami mombalo' Jisas manda' mandof mowa' lagofana.
Ea' mao'wana nali' nafe' ma Anas, Kaiafas fafomana. Afagol agalemba, Kaiafas dembinai pris nape nagali'ma pris hiamii.
Kaiafas nali' naga'ipa amom agufumi Juda naga'i, “I'i anona aman noga' ma apa' Juda hiapai, waf afambai andeande', waf bu'wafi.”
Ea' Saimon Pita naloma ae' alipuwai Jisasi wagi'ma Jisas wafi'i. Pris anamba dembinai nogawa ae'. Ea' awis aloma Jisas ipat nomon.
Apa' Pita tol nalutu uta indalelemb ando'. Ae' itanima awisi ando' a'ipa ano'w nemata'w kugumafi utai ea' ao'wa Pita wawis nomon.
Ea' nemata'w kugumafi utai kwa'ipa Pita kwa'i, “Ina' wapani alipunai aman anambai, a'a owa'?” Owa' anen nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ae' owa'.”
Amom manda' maola pris anamba dembinai maloma anom plisman amom hiami nomanamb bam makata nif a' malutumif fahi'am. Ea' Pita wapani nalomam nalutumif.
Ea' pris anamba dembinai nahali' Jisas ipat nomon. Nahali'ana ma alipumi ananimi maloma basef anen nagawalipasafi.

Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Ae' awalipasa basef ae'afi alihigima ma epes hiasi itapasi. Ae' awalipas nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi nimaguf hiafi dondol. Ea' awalipas ipat lu'unai Godi wapani, ipat anamba esis Juda hiasi sandakolasanai. Basef ae' aga'iefi ina fandambaho', owa'atin.
Dei' maina ina' nagahali' ae'? Dei' nigahali' esis sagame' basef agawalipasafi. Esis sogawef.”
Jisas na'i basef ifimba atin, owa' anona plisman nalutu felefele' naha amaga lagol ananigili na'ipa Jisas dindinip na'i, “Ina' owa'i negwamana basef ifimba dembinai prisa.”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anif basef awafi, dao' ina' ni'ipa amom hiami na'amba. Apa' owa'atin. Ae' iga'i basef endilisifi, dei' nahe ma main?”
Mandelef ata' fapomana atin lagof Jisasi, ea' Anas nasapa'ana nafe'ma pris anamba dembinai Kaiafas.
Saimon Pita tol nalutuma nif fahi'ana, ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “A'i ina' alipunai ananinai?” Owa' anen na'i, “Ahae', ae' owa'.”

Ea' anona aman nape felefele'ma Pita. Anen nanda' maola pris anamba dembinai. Anen amom atom wambota atota aman anamba doko' Pita nahana nagatalisa nagakwalisa aliganai. Ea' na'ipa Pita na'i, “Endilisi atis, ae' ati ina' nape nagaloma Jisasi ganimba lawah oliv hogatawama.”
Ea' Pita nandahali' na'i wapani na'i, “Ae' owa'.” Anen ata' na'i atin, owa', awata atata.

Ama kuhimbita atota amom matagwaha Jisas makwaha ipat Kaiafasi, mofa'ana mafe' ipat gavman dembinai. Ea' amom Juda ina mafe' mawis ipat atamba, owa'. Amom ma'i, “Na'amba a' mofa' alogw awagwi ea' ina atiasi mea' gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasova, owa'atin.”
Amom ukup pandanda' na'amba ea' tol malutu ando' Pailat nafi'mai amom na'i, “Ipa' pa'i penda'mana kot aman anamba ma main?”
Amom magwamana basef ma'i, “I'i aman anamba owa' nonda' waf awafia, apa' ina a' mofa'ana nifi'mai ina'.”

Ea' Pailat na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' atipa pefa'ana penda' kotimana nondahama mu'uli ipe'ini atin. Apa' ae' owa', andaiwa'.” Ea' amom Juda magwamana ma'i, “Mu'uli ipa' Romi na'i owa'i ma mogaha anin epen negaga', owa'atin endilisi.”

Hiahawes isimba amom Juda manda'asi ina sataga dowaf, owa'atin. Isimba sataga sagi'ma basef ifimba Jisas nali' naga'iefi afegataga endilisi. Dei' main? Anen nali' na'i, “Atiasi esis sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.”
Ea' gavman dembinai Pailat netanima nawis ipat lu'utai gavmani nomon. Ea' nofala Jisas nafi'i nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' king dembinai esis Judai?”
Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Basef ifimba fataga okom ine'imi atom a'a anis daias sa'ipinaefa ae'?”
Ea' Pailat nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' okom ma'i ae' wapani ae' Judaiwai? Owa'atin. Epes ine'isi saloma amom pris dembami, esis atis sombalo'ena sowa'ena nafi'mai ae'. Ina' nanda' waf maif?”

Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' ina Judaiwai king igimafi epes itapasi, owa'atin. I'i ae' epe dembiwai king itap apa'iai, alipumi ae'ami manda' maola ae'i motopalope mopa' ma Juda ina la'ifisa sogombale'e. Apa' owa', owa'atin.

Ea' Pailat na'i, “Na'amba ina' anina king dembinai.” Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' na'i ae' anawe dembiwai king. Basef ifimba endilisifi. Ma'me kolae ma egape king dembiwai. Ae' afi'i itap apa'e ma igawalipasa basef endilisifi. Epen ami nenda' waf endilisifi, inimba negame' basef ae'afii.”

Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Basef ifimba endilisifi, basef maif?” Pailat na'ias na'amba ea' notanima nawis ando' esis Juda sagapoma na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina ati anis maefah awasi ma anen, owa'. Ina ati anef waf awafi ma enda'mana anif basef, owa'.
Apa' waf ipa' Juda, ma panda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasova, ae' akwaha anin epen nanda' kalabusi nafe'mago ipa'. Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ekwaha king dembinai ipa' Judai nefe'mago ipa', a'a ami?”
Ea' esis sagwamana basef dindinip sa'i, “Owa'atin, anen owa'. Ina' nekwaha Barabas nifi'mai apa'.” Aman anamba Barabas anen nanda' walii naha epes sagaga'i.
Ea' gavman dembinai Pailat nao'wa Jisas nafe' na'ipa amom soldia mopagahona.

Mapagahona ma ea', mala'watefa anof mandof higatagufi si'i anota hat mowalo'manota balaga ananigai, malamana anef lowaf akwahifi. Ea' timbi tambel mafe'ma anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, ina' dembinai king Judai.” Amom manda' salomala anen manda'ana findiwana na'amba, mahana amaga ananigai.

Ea' Pailat nawis ando' wapani na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “Ipa' peme'! Ae' ao'wana nafi'mai ipa' ma pegegawa ae' ina ati anis maefah awasi, owa'. Ina ati anef waf awafi ma anen enda'mana anif basef, owa'.”
Ea' Jisas a' nawis ando'. Hat atamba manda' mandof higatagufi magala'watefaf si'i hati fapomana balaga ananigai ea' lowaf akwahifi fapomana. Ea' Pailat na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' piti aman ana'e.”

Ea' amom pris dembami maloma plisman amamumi ata' matolona atin, ma'ias dindinip mehip a'owa' ma'i, “Dolana nil lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai!” Ea' Pailat nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' atipa fa'ana dolanago. Apa' ae' owa', ae' ina ati anef waf awafi anen nanda'afi ma enda' kotimana, owa'atin.”
Ea' amom Juda magwamana basef ma'i, “Anen naga'i anen Nogamana Godi. Ea' mu'uli ape'ini na'i anen a' nondaga'.”
Fowa' Pailat ombal mahana kwasakwasala apa' dei' owa', name' basef ifimba atif, ombal a' lu'um mahana a'owa'.
Ea' nawis nomon ipat atamba nahali' Jisas na'i, “Ina' nataga nafi'i ani?” Apa' Jisas ina nagwamana anif basef, owa'.
Ea' Pailat na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nandaiwa'ma niga'ipi anif basef? Ina' negawa ae', a'a owa'? Ae' banagiwai ma ekwaha ina' negafe' dowaf a'a i'ipas sehena negaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.”

Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i God nagape ilifi owa' nese'ena banagami ina'a, ina' atina ina banagena ma negatalogofa ae', owa'. I'i nehe ega', waf afamba awafi. Apa' amom amamba mofa'e agafi'mai ine'i, waf amamifi awafi lu'uf a'owa', fikila' waf awafi ine'ifi.”

Pailat name' basef ifimba atin, ea' na'i notagwaha Jisas nefe' wahifina. Owa' esis Juda sofalana mehip sa'i, “I'i ina' netagwaha aman anamba nefe' wahifina, ina alipunai ma Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi, owa'. Epen ami na'i anin atin king dambeni anin bouni Sisari.”
Pailat name' basef ifimba atin, nofa'i Jisas nawisi nataga ando' ea' nape anin sia amom dembami jas magapoma. Anamba sa'i ufia'w otamba atembai'wi. Ufia'w akwamba diga Hibrui sa'i Gabata.

Nemaf afamba esis Juda sape sandondomba gwa'aisi ma naman sonda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasova. Ea' awin a' nandasapa' nape 12 klok. Owa' Pailat na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “Piti dembinai king ipe'inai nalutu na'a'e.”

Owa' esis Juda sa'ipana mehip sa'i, “Fa'ana, fa'ana, nendelana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.” Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Ipa' pa'i ae' endela king dembinai ipe'inai lawag a'a owa'?” Ea' amom pris dembami magwamana basef ma'i, “Apa' owa' anona dembinai kinga, Sisar atona anen dembinai king ape'inai.”
Ea' Pailat nakwahomasa Jisas esis Juda ma sogandolona lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.

Ea' amom soldia mowa' Jisas mofa'ana mafe'. Jisas atotona nofa' lawag ananigai a' nafe' nakwaha wambel lu'wambili nawis ando' nafe' nataga anagon agiligima Pipitagol Balagaigil. Diga Hibrui sa'i Golgota.
Anamba amom mowa'ana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai naloma anom amam biam. Anona nail wa'ol, anona nail wa'ol, ea' Jisas nail la'afen.
Gavman Dembinai Pailat nanda' anif basef nofa'ef nanda'ef fail lawag agamba ilif. Basef faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai, anen Dembinai King esis Judai.”
Esis Juda hiasi sati basef ifimba satalifif. Dei' main, anamba amom magandola Jisasa nape felefele' Jerusalem. Ea' basef fa'i diga wanifiga. Diga Hibrui, Latini, a diga Griki.
Amom pris dembami esis Judai ma'ipa Pailat ma'i, “Ina' owa'i nenda' basef ifimba ni'i, ‘Dembinai King esis Judaia’, hapaifi. Ina' nenda' basef ni'i, ‘Anen na'i, Ae' Dembiwai King esis Judai.’”
Ea' Pailat nagwamam na'i, “Basef ae' anda'ef ea'i fendape atapif.”

Amom soldia mandola Jisas ea', mofa' luwaguf ananifi matambe'ef biafigin biafigina mondandama aolef mofa'alef fendandamam. Ea' mofa' siot ananitai wapani. Siot atamba esis ina sosambalota, owa'. Sanda'ata tape si'ita ilif tafe' tataga owin.

Amom manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ina owala siot atamba, owa'i. Afa' onda' pilai satu ma ami nigikila'i nefa'ata.” Amom ma'ias na'amba maila anif basef fowa'ifi fagape Buk Baibeli afataga fandawalap endilisi. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Amom matambe' luwaguf ae'afi fafe'ma amom atona atin ea' manda' satu ma ami nigikila'i nefa'ef.” Ea' amom soldia manda'as na'amba atin.

Ma'ma Jisasi kwaloma owama'w ako'ukwi waloma ano'w nemata'w Maria kwagaso' Klopasi waloma Maria Makdalai'wi awo biawai biawa walutu felefele'ma lawag Jisas nagailagai. Ea' Jisas nati ma'mana anani'wi kwaloma ae' ananiwai okom magamagailai, afa' biafa walutu felefele'ma anen. Ea' na'ipa ma'mana na'i, “Ma'me, aman anamba nogamena ine'inai.”
Ea' na'ipa ae' alipuwai ananiwai na'i, “Nemata'w akwamba ma'mena ine'ikwi.” Nogota atamba ae' efa'akw kwafe' ipat ae'atai ma igimafia'w dondol atapi'w.

A'i owa' main, Jisas nogawa maol hiani ananini ahi'alan, ea' okom ma'i anif basef fagape Buk Baibeli fetaga fendawalap. Ea' na'i, “Ae' iap pase'ema embel.” Anen na'ias na'amba nagi'ma basef ifimba Baibelifi.
Ea' anol botol si'ila embel wain numbutimbeli ba'oh. Ea' amom mofa' anom mosong mowala wain embel ambalemba magiam masapa'am anogol bagol mofa'am mandomanam malogol Jisasi ma noga' embel.
Anen na' wain embel ambalemba ea' na'i, “Maol inimba ahi'alan.” Ea' nindiwa balaga ambal a' landahi' lafe'ana naga' dogw.

Nemaf afamba esis Juda sape sandondomba gwa'aisi maisa naman sonda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasova. Nemaf afamba dei'ifi sabat lu'wafi fikila' sabat anif nimaguf hiafi. Ea' amom Juda mandaiwa' ma amom wanom migail atapim lawah agahemba nemaf afamba lu'wafi. Ea' mafe' mahali' Pailata amom soldia mugundiwa bo'wagah amamugahi ma mogaga' ulala motagwahom mugisila'i.
Ea' amom soldia mafe' anamba maham magaila. Ea' mati anona nagail wa'ili mindiwa bo'wagahana a' naga'. Ea' mafe'ma anona wa'ol mundiwa bo'wagahana.
Ea' mafe' ma Jisas nagaila, owa' mati anen a' naga' dogw endilisi. Ea' amom ina mindiwa bo'wagah ananigahi, owa'.
Ea' anona soldia nanda' wamba'w napisila lambeh Jisasi wa'ol. Ea' kwafalis atis esimbel baloma embel maluwi.
Ae' ati amamba naep ae'api a'ipipa basef ifimba. Ea' basef ifimba ae'afi endilisifi atif. Ae' egawa basef ifimba aga'ipipafi endilisifi a'ipipa ma ipa' wapani pigahapifif.

Fowa' basef fagail Buk Baibeli fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Owagama bihitagof ananigufi ina totoweagof, owa'atin.” Ea' anif wapani fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Owagama esis siti aman anamba sagapisilana wamba'wi.” Amom soldia manda'am na'amba maila basef ifimba atif fagail Buk Baibeli fataga fandawalap endilisi.

Josep Arimateainai anen alipunai Jisasi, apa' anen ombal mahana ma amom Juda. Ea' nahapifana nomonas atis sape sandambaho'. A'i owa' main, anen nafe' nahali' Pailata alop Jisasi, Ea' Pailat na'i aho', a' nafe' nofa'ap nafe'.

Anen Josep nafe' naloma Nikodemus, anamba fowa' nafe' nagati Jisas anomb owambi. Anen nofa'i anin marasin bu'wani sanda'an ifat lawahi, agilima mer naloma alos. Marasin inimba hiani nimanin a'owa', 75 paun. Ea' amom biam mafe' mofa' alop Jisasi manda' luwaguf afitifi faloma marasin inimba mombafana, maila waf esis Judai.
Felefele'ma anamba magandola Jisasa anof aof fape. Aof afamba anona bolotaf nagal si'i matmat dambaitai nape. Anamba esis ina dei' sawa anin epenagon, ata' owa'atin.
Matmat atamba tape felefele'. Nemaf afamba nemaf esis Juda sa'i sogowando'ma hiahawesafi, ma nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat felefele'ma fegataga. Ea' mofa' alop Jisasi mawana matmat atamba.
Akot ata' tail, felefele'ma kuhumbita nemaf Sande Maria Makdalai'wi kosafel kwafe' matmat. Ea' kwati otam ina ata' masopama uta matmati, owa'atin. Anin epen nelefatam a' mafe' ma'oh wa'ol.

Ea' kotanima kwasagih kwafi'mai ae'i Saimon Pita wagapoma, ae' alipuwai Jisasi okom magamagailai. Ea' kwa'ipafa kwa'i, “Anis safe' sofa' Dembinai nakwaha matmat asafe'. Ea' afa' ina ogawana safe' sambe'ana anima.”
Ea' ea' aloma Pita wasagih wafe' wataga matmat atamba. Wasagih wafe', apa' ae' ikila' Pita ali' afa' ataga matmat atamba.
Ea' indiwa nembawa etawa ati luwaguf atif fa'oh nomon apa' ina awis nomon, owa'.

Owa' Saimon Pita nagi'mi nafi'i nataga ea' nawis matmat bolotaf nomon. Ea' nati luwaguf mogowa'anami atom ma'oh, maloma anef lowaf manda'af mogowa' balagonafi. Lowaf afamba sindiwaf sambe'af fa'oh anagon daiagon. Apa' luwaguf ifimba anif fa'oh dei.
Ea' ae' ali' agafe' matmat atambai agi'mana awis nomon ati hiahawes isimba a' ahapifana.
Nogota atamba afa' ina ogawa basef fagail Buk Baibeli faga'i Jisas noga' notanima nogosafel wapani, owa'.
Ea' afa' biafa utanima wafe' ipat.
Apa' Maria ato'w kwalutu kwalopana matmat ando'. Kwalutu kwalopana atin, kwasisil kwati bolotaf matmat nomon,
akwati ensel biam mala luwaguf afitimi mape anamba alop Jisasi doko' paga'oma. Amom biam anona nape balaga Jisasi gagafe'ma, anona bo'wagah hagafe'ma.
Ea' mahali'akw ma'i, “Ina' nalopa main?” Ea' ako'w kwagwamam basef kwa'i, “Anis asofa' Dembinai ae'anai safe' ea' ina egawa anamba safe' sagambe'anama, owa'atin.”
Kwa'ipam basef ifimba ma ea', kwandambema owa' kwati Jisas nalutu naloma'w. Apa' ina kogawa anen kwa'i Jisas, owa'.

Ea' Jisas nahali'akw na'i, “Nemata'w, dei' maina ina' nagalef? Ina' newando'ma ami?” Ako'w okom ma'i owa' anona nanda' maol aofi. Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' negefa'anama, ni'ipi anamba nefa'ana nafe' nagambe'anama?”
Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Maria.” Ea' kwandambema kwati anen kwaipana diga Hibrui kwa'i, “Rabonai.” Basef kofagefa fa'i Dembinai Tisa.

Ea' anen Jisas na'i, “Ina nigahapila alop ae'api, owa'i. Dei' main? Ae' ina dei' a' itanima afe'ma Ahame gani ilif ata' owa'. Ina' nefe'ma owape ae'ami ni'ipam ni'i, Ae' a' itanima ilita ilifa Ahame ae'anai a Ahamepa ipe'inai, efe'ma God Dembinai ae'anai, a God Dembinai ipe'inai.”
Ea' ako'w kwafe'ma alipumi ananimi magapoma kwa'ipam kwa'i, “Ae' ati Dembinai ea'!” Ea' kwa'ipama basef ifimba anen naga'ipa'wafi.

Nemaf afamba Sande owamb, afa' alipufai Jisasi wandakolas ondotowalo wape anota ipat nomon. Afa' ombal mahafama amom dembami esis Judai. Owa' Jisas nafi'i nalutu nalomafa na'ipafa na'i, “Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bepe sa'ombel.”
Na'ipafa basef ifimba ea', nihimba'mafa lagufi lambeh ananisi. Ea' afa' wati Dembinai afa'inai ea', asonahafama anen a'owa'.
Ea' na'ipafa wapani na'i, “Ae' a'i nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bepe awanalemb. Ae' dei' a'i esapa'epa pefe' pi'ipasa basef Godi si'i Ahame nasapa'e afi'i aga'ipipa.”
Na'ipafa ifimba ma ea', a' naomafa ambip na'ipafa na'i, “Ipa' pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi.
Ama i'i pegakwaha waf awafi epen ami nanda'afi, God wapani a' nokwahomanaf okom moso'anaf. Apa' i'i ipa' owa' pekwaha waf afamba awafia, God wapani ina atiasi nokwahef okom moso'anaf, owa'atin.”
Anona ma afa' 12-pelaifa alipufai Jisasi, Tomas agol wa'agol Didimas. Kofagogola sa'i ma'mam kofolam atifi. Nemaf afamba Jisas nafi'i nagatolofa, Tomas ina nape nalomafa, owa'.

Ea' anom alipumi ananimi mafe' ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wati Dembinai afa'inai ea'.” Owa' Tomas na'ipam na'i, “I'i ae' owa' ata' iti melegwa lagof ananigufi sagahana nigufa, ma esa faf ae'afi ma niguf fagawisa ea' esapa' lagol ae'agili guwis nomon lambeh ananimbihi, dao' ihapifana. Apa' i'i owa', owa'atin.”
Nimaguf 8-pelaif fefe'ma ea', afa' wape anota ipat nomon, ondotowalo wape. Afamba Tomas wapani nape nalomafa. Owa' Jisas nawisi nalutu nalomafa na'ipaf na'i, “Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bepe awanelemb.”
Ea' na'ipa Tomas na'i, “Dowa faf ine'ifi fifi'i na'a. Ea' niti lagof ae'agufi. Nesapa' lagol ine'igili guwisi lambeh ae'ambihi nomon. Ina okom bimbiafim mopaina, owa'i. Nindahapifi endilisi.”
Ea' Tomas na'ipana na'i, “O, Dembinai ae'inai, God ae'inai.”
Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' natolowe ea', dei' nahapifi. Apa' epes ami owa' sogatolowaia, sahapifi sonahas endilisi.”
Jisas nanda' hiahaom hiami banagami daiam si'i God nanda'ami ma nogohnaep alipufai ananifai. Basefa hiahaom amamba ina anda'ef hi'alef fape buk akwa'e, owa'.

Anda' basef ifimba do'wanif atifa hiahaom amamba ma ipa' pigahapifa Jisas anen Nogamana Godi, anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Ma pihapifa agol ananigili pefa' ambal namili pegape namipa dondol lifilafi.

Jisas naga' nosafel wapani ma ea', alipufai ananifai a' watolona wapani nimaguf bif. A'i owa' main, wagi' watolona wapani. Basef faga'ias na'amba. Jisas nafe'ma afa' gani dumb lu'wambi Taiberias. Anofa afa' ondowa'anima atogon wagapani afamba. Saimon Pita, Tomas agol wa'agol Didimas maloma Nataniel, anen Kenainai, itap lu'upa Galili. Amom maloma nogaopana biam Sebedii maloma amom biam daiam Jisasi ondowa'anima wape atogon.

Ea' Saimon Pita na'ipafa na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' igi agof.” Ea' afa' wa'i, “Olomena ofe' atin.” Ea' wafe' walota anota bot wafe' wa'i ugi agof wafe' wanda'am owamb ambamba laomb danda' apa' afa' ina wagi anol aol, owa'atin.
Wafilu kuhimbita atota Jisas nafe' nalutu dumb ambamba akata apa' afa' ina ogawa wa'i anen Jisas, owa'.
Ea' nofalafa na'i, “Awami sa'upai, ipa' pagi anogof agof a'a owa'?” Ea' wagwamana basef wa'i, “Owa'atin.”

Ea' na'ipafa na'i, “Ipa' ata' pela anemb bewala bot atamba wa'ol lagol kwahisigilima. Ea' atiasi apiti anogof agof.” Ea' afa' wa'i ola anemb owa', owafai agof hiami. Ea' ina la'ififa ogagiai anemb bilitai begatoma bot nomon, owa'atin. Dei' main? Agof hiami a'owa' mala anemba namba asi'ina.

Ae' alipuwai Jisasi okom magamagailai, a'ipa Pita a'i, “Nanumba Dembinai afa'inai.” Saimon Pita doko' natagwaha saket ananitai ta'oh ea' nanda' maol owa', name' basef ifimba nala saket wapani nanda' kopi' nowala embel dumb nopaul nafe' embel.
Ea' afa' daiafa watoma bot wagi'mana wagiai anemb si'inama agof. Afa' ina wail laogona akata, owa'. Si'i 100 mita.
Wafe' wataga akata, wati anif nif fandif ea' wati anagof agof fasef nif faloma anota bret.
Ea' Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Ipa' fa'i anagof agof doko' pagagiagufi.”
Ea' Saimon Pita nalota bot atamba nagiai anemb bafi'i akata. Anemb ambamba si'imba agof lu'wagufi atogof 153-pelaiguf. Apa' anemb ina pele'atamb, owa'atin.
Ea' Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Ipa' fi'i ma ata' pea' gwa'aisi.” Apa' afa' ina anona banagona ma nohali'ana niga'i, “Ina' ami?” Owa'atin. Dei' main, afa' ogawa anen Dembinai afa'inai.
Jisas nafi'i nofa' bret naso'afa, a agof wapani na'amba atin.
Fowa' Jisas nogosafel wapani, nali' nafe'ma afa' alipufai ananifai watolona nimaguf bif. A'i owa' main, dei' watolona wapani a' wanif.

Afa' wa' gwa'aisi ma ea', Jisas na'ipa Saimon Pita na'i, “Saimon nogama Joni, ina' okom maimaili a'owa' nikila' anom alipumi amamba daiam, a'a owa'?” Ea' anen na'i, “Aho', Dembinai. Ina' negawa ae' okom maimailina.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nese'ama gwa'aisi sipsip nogami ae'ami.”

Ea' Jisas nahali'ana wapani na'i, “Saimon nogama Joni, ina' okom maimaili endilisi, a'a owa'?” Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “Aho', Dembinai. Ina' negawa ae' okom maimailina.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nimafi sipsip ae'ami.”

Jisas nali' nahali'ana bif ea' dei' nahali'ana wapani a' wanif na'i, “Saimon nogama Joni, ina' okom maimaili a'a owa'?” Ea' Pita okom iwanim na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' negawa hiahaom hiami. Ina' negawa ae' okom maimailina.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nese'ama gwa'aisi sipsip ae'ami.

Endilisi ae' a'ipina, fowa' ina' ata' sa'wina, ina' nowaho' let ea' nafe' mamahagoma nomonas ine'isi sa'i negafe'ma. Apa' owagama ina' negatagama hagena, ina' atiasi nendowa logof ine'igufi ma anom amam daiam mowaho'mena let mohapilina nefe' anamba ina' nindaiwa'magoma.”
Jisas na'ipana na'amba ma nigihimba'mam ufia'w ma soha Pita nogaga' ma epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol. Ea' dei' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Nila ae'.”

Ea' Pita nandambema nati ae', alipuwai Jisas okom magamagailai, agi'mam afi'i. Ae' ma'uwi fowa' afa' wape wa' gwa'aisi ma indisi'ah felefele'ma Jisas ahali'ana aga'i, “Dembinai, atiasi ami ni'ipa boumi ma nigihimba'mama ina' negapoma?”
Ea' Pita natiti ae', nahali' Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, aman anamba anaf nope ni'imama?”
Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anen a' nope ambal lopaona nope nefe' nefe' afamba ae' igitanimai, isimba ina maol ine'ini, owa'atin. Ina' nila ae'.”

Ea' basef baso'afi wafifi ifimba fafe'ma afa' alipufai Jisasi fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Aman anamba anaf ina noga', owa'.” Apa' Jisas ina na'ipafa basef ifimba esis saga'iefi, owa'. Basef ifimba kwamaifi. Jisas na'i basef ifimba atif na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anen nope nefe' nefe' ma nemaf ae' igitanimai, isimba ina maol ine'ini, owa'atin.”
Aman anamba alipunai Jisasi ea' ae' ma'uwi. Ae' a'ipipa basef ifimba ma hiahaom amamba Jisas nanda'ami dei' anda'am magail buk akwa'i. Apa' Kristen mogawa basef ifimba endilisifi atif ae' anda'afi.

Jisas nanda' anin maol hiani daian wapani. I'i anis epes sonda' basefa maol Jisasi hi'ilan filai, ae' a'i itap anamba hiagoma owa' anagona buk hianai noga'oha, owa'atin. Asi'igin dog. Basef ea' ma'uf.
O, alipunai Tiofilus, buk akwamba fowa' ae' anda'akwi anda' basefa hiahaom hiami Jisas nanda'ami nagawalipa esis amam nematawa

ma dambadamba nali' nanda'am ea' mafi'i matagama nemaf afamba God nofa'ana nagalota gani heven. Fowa' Jisas owa' ata' nolota hevena, anen nali' naso'ama basef ifimba na'ipam dindinipa maol amom aposel amamba anen nandandepami. Anen naso'ama maol inimba amoma banagami amamba Ambal bu'unai Godi.

Fowa' saha Jisas nofa' akafimi naga' ea', notanima nosafel wapani nafe' natagama alipumi ananimi. Ea' nape awin si'ini du'wanini nanda' hiahaom hiami banagami ma nihimba'mam mogogawa endilisi anen nofa' ambal namili nape namona. Nimaguf ifimba anen nawalipama epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias.
Anen ata' nape nagalomam na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' dei' ina pekwaha Jerusalem ulal, owa'i. Pepe pehafa hiahaom amamba Ahame na'i endilisi atis nogasi'ipami. Amamba fowa' ae' aga'ipipami.
Fowa' Jon nali' napisi' amam nematawa hiasi embel. Apa' ipa' atiasi apefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nuwisipa. Ina atiasi nogota laota tefe', ata' bandata ipa' a' pefa' Ambal anamba nuwis nope nolomepa.

Nemaf afamba amom alipumi Jisasi mandakolas atogon mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai, a'i atiasi nogota ata'e ina' nenda' apa' mofa' agol lu'wagili ma mogali'amona esis bousi ma apa' atepa ape'ilimbi a'a owa'?”
Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Amamba ina hiahaom ipe'imi ma pegegawa nogota ma nimaguf Ahame nandandepafi, owa'. Anen atona numafi amamba.

Apa' basef ipe'ifi ifimba. Atiasi Ambal bu'unai Godi nifi'mai ipa', nemaf afamba pefa' banagami ma main, dao' apewalapa basef ae'afi Jerusalem ea' ganimba hiagoma agol Judia a' ganimba itap lu'upa Samaria, ea' pefe' anamba itap walemb hiagoma hi'ilagon.”
Jisas na'i basef ifimba hi'alef, esis ata' salutu sagatologini atin, owa' sati anen nandagia nakwaha itap nalota ilif. Ea' anom ilagw mofa'ana mafe' ea' ina satolona wapani, owa'atin.
Anen nafe' ea', esis ata' salutu satologon atin ilif otaga owa' anom amam biam magala klos afitimii mondokwama mataga malomas malutu.

Ea' ma'ipas ma'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa Galilipai, ipa' ina pilutu pititi otaga ilif, owa'. Jisas anamba dei' God nofa'ana nakwahepa ea' nofa'ana nalota heven. Anaf notanima nogafi'i pegatolona na'amba atin si'i dei' palutu patolona nagalota heven.”

Ea' esis sakwaha halafuta atamba Oliv, sotanima safe' Jerusalem. Halafuta atamba ina laogona Jerusalem, owa', felefele' nogota atotota kilomita atitin si'i esis Juda sefe' sifi'i nemaf afamba sabat sagapoma noma'wafi.

Esis sotanima safi'i Jerusalem, safe' sawis ipat ea' safe' salota sape ipat ilif esis sagapoma. Agof amamugufi agwafomba. Pita naloma Jemsi Jon a Andru a Filip naloma Tomasi Bartolomyu Matyu ea' Jems, Alfius nogamana, a Judas, Jems nogamana ea' Saimon anap mini'ap Seloti.
Amom alipumi Jisasi mandakolas nimaguf hiafi lifilafi ma manda' beten maloma anowa nematawa saloma ako'w Maria Jisas ma'mana saloma owapana Jisasi wapani. Esis hiasi sape sandabeten atogon.
A'i owa', anef nemaf esis Kristen 120-pelais hiasi sandakolas sape ea' Pita nosafel nalutu na'i,

“Sahin owan ae'ipai, anif basef fagail buk Baibeli fowa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa malogol dembinai king Deviti fa'ias na'amba. Na'i aman anamba Judas owagama nonda' waf awafi ma nigihimba'mama Jisas boumi. Ufia'w ina kwaso', owa'. Kwagala basef ifimba fegataga alihif. God atona na'i, dei' basef ifimba fataga fandawalap. Fowa' Judas ina dei' nanda' waf awafi nawalapa Jisasa amom, ata' owa', nogota atamba
anen alipunai afa'inai nanda' maol nagaloma afa'i.”
“Moni Judas nogofa'ana waf afamba awafi ananifii a' natala anep itap. Anen nafe' itap apamba nowa la'afinama pe'ana nembel kolo'walanai hi'alana a' afuna.
Ea' epes hiasi sagape Jerusalami asogawa isimba. Ea' diga asasigai sofala anamba agiligima sa'i Akeldama. Apa' ma'i itap apamba esimbel kolo'walambel begetawapi.”

Dei' main, Pita naga'i basef ifimba fagape Buk Baibel Sami na'i, “‘Ipat ananitai atot tondape wafita dowaf. Ina anona aman nopaota, owa'atin.’ Ea' anin Sam na'i anif basef wapani na'amba na'i, ‘Anona aman anaf a' noho'ofana nofa' maol ananini.’

“Ea' dei' apa' a' mondandepa anona aman ape'inai noho'ofanago ma mogawalipas basef ifimba Jisas notanima nogosafel wapani. Apa' a' mondandepa anona ma amom amamba mape magaloma ape'i ma afamba Dembinai Jisas nape nagalomapa. Afamba Jon nagawalipasa basef Godi nagapisi' amam nematawa nafi'i nafi'i nataga ma nemaf God nofa' Jisas nalota heven nagakwahepa.”
Pita na'ias na'amba ma main, esis Kristen asandandepa amam biam. Anona Josep, agol wa'agol Barsabas, ea' agol wa'agol wapani sa'i Jastus. Ea' anona Matias.
Ea' esis sandabeten na'amba sa'i, “Dembinai, ina' negawa ukup epes hiasii hi'alep. Ina' nendandepa amam amamba biam nihimba'mapa aman mamahonama
nogofa' maol aposel nogaha'ofa aman anamba Judas. Anen a' nakwaha maol inimba nafe' wambel awambili ma negawamana waf awafi.”

Ea' esis sanda' agof amom biami fail otamba biamba. Ea' sala otamba ambamba bala anep malep si'i tin sakoto'wamba sati otam mali' magatagai agol Matiasi. Ea' sagawa God nandandepa Matias. Ea' sanda' anen nanda' maol naloma amom aposel 11-pelaima monda' maol Godi.
Nemaf afamba lu'wafi Pentikos afagataga, esis hiasi sagahapifanai sandakolas sape ipat atotota.
A'i owa' main, owa' same' anom amalemb lu'wami manda'am mafi'i heven. Amalemb amamba mandame' si'i fufin banagonai nagaluwi ea' ipat atamba esis sagapautai asi'itama amalemb amamba.
Ea' sati anogah afegah hogala si'i nif ileliwa pepa'atawa wafe' watoma esis hiasi atona atin hi'alas.
Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'inama esis atona atin hi'alas, sa'i basef Godi ma diga naninani analemb walembi. Ambal anamba nanda'am mataga malogof asasigufi.
Anis Juda safi'i sape Jerusalem, sanda' lotuma Godi, safi'i sandanda misi'ah hiahi ganimba itap hiagoma.

Esis hiasi same' amalemb amamba ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi daias safi'i sunduwa'anima sape. Ea' epes isimba hiasi atona atin same' esis sagahapifanai ea' sa'i basef Godi ma diga naninani analemb walembi. Ea' sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' a'owa' ma sagame' diga asasigai.
Esis sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' a' nomonas salasafe' hiahias. Ea' sa'ias sa'i, “Amom amamba Galilimi, owa' a' ma'i diga ape'igai atona atini.
Dei' maina apa' hiapai atona atin magame' amom maga'i diga ape'igai dondo' si'i apa' magame'agama mamasapa ape'isi? Apa' mafi'i itap apamba hiapi lu'upa agufipa apamba.

Partiai Midia a Elam ea' Judiai Kapadosia paloma Pontusi Esia a Frigia Pamfiliai Isip ea' apa' anep itap lu'upa Mesopotamia ea' esis ganimba Libiama felefele'ma wambel Sairini. Ea' anepa apa' wambel Rom mafi'i mape na'a.

Apa' Juda maloma anis epes daias maila waf esis Juda sanda' lotuwafi ea' apa' itap lu'upa kofagama Kriti Arebia, apa' hiapai mame' amom mawalapa basefa hiahaom banagami maol Godi ma diga ape'igai hiagai.”
Ea' hiasi sosafel gogolalasis kwapete', esis nomonas sape hiahias. Esis atis sandahali'ma sa'i, “Hiahawes isimba sandanda' sa'imama?”
Owa' anis sanda' iafam sa'i, “Amom ma' embel wain dambaini ea' mahaga magaol dei' ma'i basef na'ambaifi.”

A'i owa' main, Pita nosafel nalutu naloma amom aposel 11-pelaim ea' noga na'i banagambel nawalapa basefa esis amam nematawa hiasi na'i, “Ipa' Juda alipipai paloma ipa' amam nematawa hipai pafi'i pagape Jerusalami, ipa' pembe' aligaha basef ae'afi, ma pegegawa hiahawes isimba.
Ipa' pa'i amam amamba manda' spak, owa'atin. Dei' ata' kuhimbita awin ata' natafi atin nainail si'i 9 klok.
Apa' hiahaom amamba mataga si'i anona profet Joel fowa' naga'i,

God na'i, ‘Felefele'ma nemaf akutaifi Ae' ese'as Ambal bu'unai ae'anai nope amam nematawa hiasi. Ea' esa'ma esis batawisipa ipe'isi asowalapa basef si'i amom profet maga'if. Ea' ihimba'ma amam sa'umi ipe'imi waf bu'wafi ae'afi ma mope naep pese'am mogatolomi, ea' ese'ama koh dondo'ah amom hagami ipe'mi ma igihimba'mam waf ae'afi.
Aho', nemaf afamba atiasi ae' ese'asa Ambal bu'unai ae'anai nope esis amam nematawa ae'asi sanda' maola ae'i nosa'mas sowalapa basef ae'afi.
Ea' enda' anef waf daiaf fetaga gani otaga ilif, enda' hiahaom banagami motaga na'a'e itap owin. Amamba na'amba. Enda' nogoh hiagwi otaga, enda' esimbel, nif fagandifi.
Ea' embema awin alipini netaga owamb owambini netaga akwahin si'i esimbel. Ama i'i owa' main, owa' nemaf Dembinaii a' fetaga. Nemaf afamba ananifi lu'wafi endilisi a'owa'.
Felefele'ma nemaf afamba epes ami sogofala agol Dembinai, bola neme'as nofa'as nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai sope epes ananisi.’”

Ea' Pita na'ipas wapani na'i, “Ipa' epes Israelipai, ipa' peme' anif basef dei' iga'ipipa aman anamba Jisas Nasaratinai. Ipa' pegawa ea' ma maol inimba banagani naloma banagami amamba God nanda'am la'afena ipe'i ma lagol aman anambai. Amamba mihimba'mepa andeande' aman anamba God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.

Fowa' gani God nogawa ea' okom mandanda' na'amba ma nonda' aman anamba nefe' nogape lagof ipe'igufi. Ea' epes isimba sogombalo' mu'uli Godii satopalopa ipa' pembalo'ana pandolana nail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea' pahana naga'.
Apa' owa', owa'atin. God notanima nasa'mana wapani a' nakwaha akafimi ma ga' ananimi. Dei' main, ga' inimba ina banagen a'owa' ma nihapilana nogape, owa'atin.
“Aho', fowa' gani Devit naga'i basefa Jisas na'i, ‘Ae' ati Dembinai ae'anai nape nalome wa'ol lagol ae'agili kwahisigilima dondol lifilafi. Ea' anis epes ina sanda'me anom nimanimi akafimi, owa'.
