Isimba atis dei' okom ae'ami sonaham ea' afega ae'agai gandagala. Ae' epen falafuwai igaga'i, atiasi epe ehafa anona nogatopalope.
Dei' main, atiasi ina nekwaha ambal ae'ali a' lofe' lope anamba epes sagaga'i sagapoma, owa'atin. Ea' ina atiasi nekwahowa alop aman anamba bu'winai hilili'i nanda' maol ine'i folo'olap, owa'atin.
Ina' ea' nihimba'me ufiawa wafe' wagatagama waf ambal namilifi. Ina' nape nalome sonahe endilisi.’”

Ea' Pita na'ipas wapani na'i, “Ipa' sahope owape ae'ipai, dei' ae' a'i ewalapa basef i'ipipaef wal atina aman anamba akunamapa ape'inai Devit. Anen fowa' naga' sawana, dei' wandof ananifi ata' fape la'afena apa' atapif. Basef ifimba Devit ina na'ifa anen atona, owa'atin.
Apa' aman anamba Devit anen profet ea' nogawa God na'i basef banagafi na'i endilisi ilif na'amba ma anaf nonda' bafamana Deviti notaga nogape dembinai king si'i Devit nagape king.

Fowa' Devit ata' nagape, a' nogawa ea' amamba God na'i nonda'ami. Na'amba dei' anen na'i Dembinai Krais anaf noga' notanima nosafel wapani. Anen na'ias ea' na'i, ‘Anaf God ina nokwaha anen nope anamba sagaga'i sagapoma wandelef alop ananipi folo'olap, owa'.’
Aman anamba anen Jisas God ea' nasa'mana notanima nosafel wapani. Ea' afa' hiafai a' wati amamba dei' wa'iam.

Dei' God nasa'mana nosafel nalota gani ilif ea' nape lagol kwahisigili Godi. Anen a' nofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi ea' ma Ahamana, si'i fowa' Ahamana naga'ipana na'i nogaso'ana. Isimba atis dei' Jisas naso'asam esis hiahaom amamba patolom pagame'am ea'i.
Dei' main, Devit ina a' nalota heven, owa'. Apa' anen fowa' na'ias basefa na'i, ‘Dembinai na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'amba na'i, “Ina' nepe lagol kwahisigili ae'agili ma nepe dembinai negaloma ae'.
I'i owa' main, enda' bousi ine'isi sefe' lafela ina' nikila'as.”’

Ea' dei' Pita na'ias na'amba na'i, “Dei' apa' Israel mondagawa isimba andeande'. Aman anamba Jisas ipa' pagandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai pahana nagaga'i, dei' God nanda'ana nataga nape Dembinai anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.”
Esis same' basef ifimba owa', faha nelelemb asasilimbi a'owa'. Ea' sa'ipa Pita naloma amom aposel daiam sa'i, “Ipa' sahopapa, dei' apa' ea' monda' maina mogape andeande'?”

Ea' Pita na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' hipai pekwaha waf awafi pendembema nelelemba God ea' ipa' hipai atona atin pefa' baptaisa agol Dembinai Jisas Kraisi ma nogakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi. Ipa' penda'as na'amba, atiasi God nese'epa Ambal bu'unai Ananinai nuwisipa.

Fowa' God na'i basef endilisifi banagafi na'i nese'epa Ambal bu'unai Ananinai nuwisipa peloma awasi ipe'isi soloma esis isimba amam nematawa hiasi ata' sagapani laugunii anaf sigi' sogatagai. Aho' God Dembinai ape'inai na'ias ea' ma nogaso'as Ambal bu'unai Ananinai nuwis epes isimba mamahisa anaf nogofalasi.”

Pita ina na'ipasa basef ifimba atif, owa'. Na'ipasa anif basef hiafi dindinipa nogafela ukup asasipi na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba apefa' nimanimi akafimi lu'wami peloma amam nematawa dei'isi sanda' waf awafii.”

Ea' esis isimba ea' sagame' basef Pitai endilisii ma sagahapilafi, esis ea' sofa' baptais. Nemaf afamba God nowatani mini'ap asasipi apataga laop ea' 3,000-pelais sataga Kristen, ea' sape saloma esis isimba amam nematawa sagahapifanai.

Amam nematawa isimba sagataga Kristen dambaisi esis banages a'owa' ma sagame' basef amom aposel magawalipasafi asandatopalopa atina anis sahin owan sape atogon atin sa' gwa'aisi sandabeten sahali' God atogon atin.
Nimaguf hiafi God nanda' ametal lu'unai ma hiahaom banagami hiami magatagama lagof amom aposeli. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi a' ombal lu'wami mahas atapis nimaguf hiafi.

Ea' esis hiasi hi'alas sagahapifa Kraisi sandakolas sape atogon atin sindihimba' opalef asasilifi a' atifilif. Ea' sagawa hiahawes asasisi gwa'aisi uga main hiasi, ina ata' esis atona atini, owa'. Hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam esis hiasii sagahapifanai.

Ea' esis anis sagahapifanai saso'asa itap asasipi anis paloma anis hiahawes asasisi safe'ma anis epes daindaias satalamasas. Ea' sofa' otamba ma hiahawes isimba satambe'amba sanda'amba saso' epes isimba gwa'aisi mais akasi.

Ea' esis hiasi nembel atembel ea' nimaguf danda safe' ipat lu'unai Godi. Ea' sakolata safe' sa' gwa'aisi ifagw asasigwi. Esis sonahasa sogaso'as gwa'aisi ma sogatopalopa anis daias ea' sonahasa sakolata saga' gwa'aisi atogon.

Lifilafi esis sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol, ea' opalef esis amam nematawa hiasii sagape ando'i bo'walefa esis Kristen ama nimaguf hiafi. Ea' Dembinai nanda' maol nimaguf danda ma nogofa' anis amam nematawa sakwaha waf awafi ma sagafi'mai anen, nowatani mini'ap isimba sagahapifanai.
Nogota atamba esis Kristen sandabetenatai, Pita naloma Jon mafe' ipat lu'unai Godi ma'i mondabeten. Nemaf afamba ea' wambomota 3 klok.

Ea' anona aman bo'wagah hondola'anai nape anamba, ma'mana anani'wi fowa' kogolana nape atapina. Dondol esis sanda'ana sofa'ana sahaponana nape ipat lu'unai Godi ando' felefele'ma uta saga'i fasitai. Ma nondailasa moni gwa'aisi maisa esis amam nematawa sawis sagafe'ma lotuwi.
Aman anamba nati Pitai Jon ma'i mofe' mugawis ipat atamba, nahali' amom biama mogaso'ana anemba otamba anen.
Owa' Pitai Jon matiti anen dindinip, Pita na'i, “Ina' ata' niti afa' biafa.”
Ea' nandambema nati amom, okom mandanda' na'i owa' moso'ana anis maefah.
Owa' Pita na'i, “Ae' moni ake, apa' hiahawes bu'wasi a'i atiasi igasi'inasi isimba. Ae' a'i banagami Jisas Krais Nasaratinai atom a'ipina, dei' safel a' nilutu nefe'.”
Ea' nahapila lagol kwahisigili aman anamba aunaii, nasa'mana. Ea' kwafalis atis bo'wagah haloma nembawai ha'walelef ananisi banages sataga bo'wes.
Ea' anen felalana nosafel nalutu ea' nalutu nafe'. Ea' nalomom mafe' mawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nandagala kwapi' atin nalutu nalemb nafe' nasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sati anen nafe' nasa'ma agol Godi,

ea' sogawana sa'i anen ma'una aman anamba bo'wagoh hondola'anai, fowa' nagape dondol uta atamba saga'i fasitai ipat Godi lu'unai nape nandailasa moni maisi. Esis sati anen bo'ona sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' ukup pape hiahaop.

Aman anamba nandagala ma nagataga bo'ona ea' esis sasagih safi'i ma sogatolona ilaf afamba saga'i ilaf Solomoni. Pita nati isimba, na'ipa esis na'i, “Ipa' epes Israel, dei' maina nomonas hiahawes sagapoma amamba? Dei' maina ipa' pagatiti afa' biafa? Pa'i banagami afa'imi maloma waf usi'ifi afa'isi atis sanda' aman anamba nataga bo'ona nosafel nafe'? Owa'atin endilisi.

God anamba bafapapa ape'imi Abraham naloma Aisaki Jekop manda' lotumanai, anen atona nanda'ana nataga bo'ona nasa'ma agol Jisasi, nanda' maola anini. Anen ea' aman anamba atona ipa' pandaiwa'mana pagaso'amana amom agufumi gavmani. Dembinai Pailat na'i notagwahona nogafi'i, owa' owa'atin. Ipa' pandaiwa'mana pewa' alafugahana.
Ipa' pewa alafugaha aman anamba nanda' maol Godi atin, usi'ina endilisii. Ea' pefala Pailat dindinipa anona aman awasinai naha anis epes sagaga'i, ea' nakwahomepanai.

Apa' aman bu'unai kofagonama nogofa'apa mogafe' ufia'w ambal namili'wi, anamba ea' pahana naga'. Owa' God nasa'mana nosafel matmat wapani ea' afa' biafa wape amam ananifai ogawalapa basefa isimba, wati anen nagape namona endilisi.

Ea' afa' biafa wahapifa Jisas. Anen atona nafela hapif afa'ini, banagami ananimi manda' aman anamba bo'ona naep ipe'ipi hipai. Banagami Jisasi atom dei' mowa' banaga aman anamba, patolona pegegawanai.
“Endilisi, alipipai, ae' egawa, ipa' ina pegawa andeande'ma dei' panda' waf afambai awafi ma Jisas, owa'. Amom agufumi ipe'imi wapani amom na'amba atin.

Fowa' God nawalapa basefa amom profet hiamii, ma Krais, God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Basef ifimba fa'i Krais a' nogame' akafimi. Ea' waf afamba dei' ipa' panda'afi, afamba fandahama basef ifimba amamifi fataga fandawalap endilisi.
“Dei' ipa' ata' pekwaha nomonas amambai awami ipe'imi, pembema nelelemba Goda nogakwahomepa waf awafi ipe'ifi ma nonda'epa pegataga be'epa.
Ipa' i'i penda'as na'amba, atiasi Dembinai God nese'epa banagami namumi ma ambagof ipe'igufi. Ama atiasi nogasapa' Krais nogafi'mai ipa'. Aman anamba fowa' God nandandepana ma ipa' ea'i, anen Jisas.
Dei' napani heven nosasa nemaf afamba God nonda' hiahaom hiami mogataga dambaim wapani. Si'i fowa' naga'ifa ipe'i ma amom profet ananimi bo'om hilili'i.
Si'i Moses naga'i Jisas na'amba na'i, ‘God Dembinai ipe'inai, atiasi a' nofa' anona sahomepa ipe'inai, nonda'ana nope profet si'i ae'. Ipa' peme' basef ananifi hiafi hi'indalef.
Ea' epes ami sondaiwa'ma sogame' basefa profet anambai, esis ina ata' sope mini'ap apamba epes Godi, owa'. Atiasi nohas soga'.’
“Ea' amom profet amamba hiami, Samyuel naloma amom profet mataga magagi'ma anini, hiami ma'iasa dei' nimaguf ifi'i.

Basef endilisifi atif God naga'ifa ipe'i ma amom profet, dei' fape ma fagatopalopa ipa' wapani. Fowa' God nala' lapa basef banagafi ma bafasepa ipe'isi. Dei' basef ifimba fape endilisi ma fagatopalopa ipa' wapani. Fowa' anen na'ipa Abrahama anaf Jisas nogataga na'i, ‘Anaf owagama bafasena ine'isi ae' egatopalopa esis misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilasa sogape andeande' itap hiagoma.’
Ea' God a nandandepa anen nanda' maol ananinii, nasapana nali' nafi'mai ipa' ma nofalo'mepa natopalopepa nanda'epa pambema nelelemb atona atina pagakwaha waf aunai ipe'inai.”
Pitai Jon ata' ma'i maloma esis amam nematawa atin, anom pris maloma kepten nugumafi ipat lu'unai Godi maloma anom Sadyusi mafi'i.

Amom mogawa amom biam mawalapa basef ma'ipasa Jisas notanima nogosafel matmat wapani. Ea' ma'i esis hiasi sogaga'i atiasi sogosafel wapani. Amom dembami ma'i basef ifimba amam biam maga'iefi ina endilisifi. Na'amba amom mandaiwa' a' manda' megahoham.
Ea' dei' amom mafi'i mombalo' amom biam wambomota awin nandambema. Ea' manda'am manda' kalabus owamb ambamba masasa wafilu kuhimbita.

Esis amam nematawa hiasi same' basef ifimba Jisas nogosafel nowaga wapani sahapifana. Isimba atis dei' esis sagahapifanai sataga hias, amom atom mataga felefele'ma 5 tausen (5,000). Apa' ina siamba awasi nematawa, owa'.
Nemaf fagagi'i amom dembami asasimi maloma agufumi maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, a' mandakolas Jerusalem.
Dembinai pris Anas, nape nagali'ma pris hiamii, naloma Kaiafas, a Jon, Aleksander ea' anom daiam wapani wambota Anasi, mafi'i hi'alam mandakolas maloma amom dembami.
Ea' amom amamba hiami manda' amom aposel biam malutu nogohnaep amamisi mahali'am dindinip ma'i, “Ipa' pefa' banagami mamahoma pa'i agol maigila dei' panda' hiahawes isimba? Kias!”
Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'ina Pita nowa' banagona na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' Israel amam dembipai a ipa' agufipai,
ipa' dei' pahali' afa' biafa ma wanda' waf bu'wafi wagatopalopa aman anamba bo'wagah aogahinai. Ipa' pa'i pegawa anen nataga bo'ona na'imama.

I'i a' na'amba ma, dao'. Ipa' hipai a' pendegawa, esis mini'ap Israel hiasi wapani asondogawa, ma banagami agol Jisas Krais Nasaratinaii atogol dei' alop aman anambai banagep ambo'ona nosafel nagalutu naep ipe'ipi. Ipa' pandola Jisas lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai pahana afuna, apa' dei' God nasa'mana nosafili matmat wapani.
“Basef ifimba fagail Buk Baibeli ma aman anamba fa'i, ‘Otam amamba ipa' pagala' ifagwi pandaiwa'mam pelefatam maga'ihi, dei' a' mandambema mataga mape mali' mowa' banaga ipat atamba.’

Ina anin epen daian la'ifin niwambilapa mutanimai, owa'atin. Ea' anen atona. Ama ganimba itap hiagoma, fowa' dei' wapani God ina nawalapa agola anona aman daiana ma notopalopapa nokwaha waf awafi nowambilapai ma mogape andeande', owa'atin. Ea' anen atona.”

Amom agufumi mati Pitai Jon malutu banagem ma'i basef ifimba. Ea' agufumi mogawa amom biam ina manda' skuli, owa'. Amom lolaimi atom. Ea' amom agufumi ukup pehafel kwapete' nomonas hiahawesa amom. Ea' mogawa amom biam ma'i fowa' mape magaloma Jisasi.
Owa' agufumi mati aman anamba bo'wagah hondola'anai nataga bo'ona, nalutu naloma Pitai Jon. Ea' amom ina ma'i anif basef magwamamef amom biam, owa'atin.
Ea' ma'ipa amom biama mokwaha ipat atamba mandakolasatai a' muwis ando'. Amom biam magawis ando'i, amom ma'i basef mandame'maef ma'i,

“Afa' atiasi ata' onda' amam amamba biam wi'imama ma ogasopama malogofam. Dei' main, amom manda' maol banagani si'i God nanda'ani, ea' epes hiasi sagape Jerusalami sogawam. Afa' ina la'ififa ma ombaso'mas uga'i, ‘Amom ina manda' maol inimba’, owa'atin.
Afa' a' onda'i basef banagafi ma amom biam ina ata' mi'ipasa basef wapani anis daiasa agol agalemba, owa'. Na'amba basef ifimba a' fefe'agon hi'ilagona esis amam nematawa hiasi.”

Ea' agufumi motanima mofala amom biam mawisi wapani ma'ipam dindinip ma'i, “Ipa' bipa ina ata' pi'ipasa basef ifimba kwasakwasala ma agol Jisasi, ina ata' piwalipasa agol Jisasi ma anis amam nematawa, owa'i.”
Owa' Pita naloma Jon magwa basef ma'i, “I'i afa' okwaha basef Godi ma ogagi'ma basef ipe'ifi, na'ambai andeande'ma naep Godi a'a owa'? Ipa' ata' ukup pendanda'ma isimba pegawas pewalogas.
Apa' afa' biafa ina a' osopama malogof, owa'atin. Afa' ogawalapa basef hiafi ma hiahawes watilis wagame'asi.”

Ea' agufumi mowatania anif basef banagafi ma'ipamef amom biama mogasopama malogof, ea' makwahom mafe'. Esis hiasi sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol ma hiahaom amamba sati amom biam manda'ami. Na'amba agufumi ina mati anif basef kofagefa ma mogaso'ama akafimi amom, owa'atin. Aman anamba amom biam manda' maol banagani ma bu'unai, aowas ananini natagamana nape atapin nogota lautai afagof 40-pelaiguf.
Agufumi Judai matagwaha amom biam motanima mafe'ma esis sagahapifanai, ea' ma'ipasa basef hiafi amom pris dembami maloma agufumi maga'ipamafi.
Esis same'ef ea', hiasi a' nembel atotombel sandabeten sasa'ma agol Godi na'amba sa'i, “Dembinai, ina' nagahapila ilif itapi, ina' a' nanda' itap otaga, a naoh a hiahaom amamba hiami magapaumi.

Fowa' gani ina' nanda' akunamapa ape'inai Devit na'i basef. Anen nanda' maol ine'ini ea' Ambal bu'unai ine'inai nasa'mana nahali'as na'i, ‘Dei' maina esis owa' Judaisia ukup wandafip a'owa'? Dei' maina esis mini'ap epes ukup awep a'owa' ma Dembinai? Owa' owa'atin. Esis ina la'ifis, owa'.

Amom dembami king ganimba itap hiagoma mandandombol maloma amom agufumi mandatama mape atogon manda' wandafa mogatalogofa Dembinai God noloma Krais Dembinai nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Owa', owa'atin, ina la'ifim.’

“Herot naloma Pontius Pailat maloma anis epes ina Judaisi saloma esis Israel saila basef ifimba Deviti a' sakolata wambel ambalemba atembela sogapa'aga Jisas aman anamba bo'ona hilili'i nanda' maol ine'inii, fowa' ina' nandandepana ea'i.
Esis sandakolas atogona sonda' hiahaom hiami si'i fowa' ina' banagena okom ine'imi ma'i mogataga.
Dembinai, ina' okom mondapoma basef hiafi wandafifi esis saga'iefi, ea' nendatopalopa afa' wanda' maola ine'i. Ama afa' banagefa endilisi ogawalapa basef ine'ifi, ma afa' ina ombal mohafa, owa'atin.

Ina' newamona lagof ine'igufi nihimba'ma esis ina' banagonai ma negatopalopa esis awasisi sogataga bo'wes wapani. Ea' nenda' hiahaom banagami mamimami ma agol Jisasi, anen bo'ona hilili'i nanda'mena maoli.”
Esis sandabetena ea', same' ipat atamba sandabetenatai bolalata. Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi si'inama esis, ea' sawalapa basef Godi banagambel, esis ina ombal mahasa amom agufumi esis Judai, owa'atin.

Epes hiasi sagahapifanai nembel atembel, ea' nomonas atifis. Ina anin epen atitin nati anis hiahawes atitis ananisi na'i, “Hiahawes isimba ae'asi atis.” Owa'atin. Hiahawes hiasi asasisi, isimba esis hiasii atis.

Amom aposel mawalapa basef ma'ipasefa Jisas Dembinai ape'inai notanima nogosafel, ea' basef amamifi banagef a'owa'. Ea' okom Godi nagatopalopa esis dowafi a' lu'una a'owa' ma epes isimba hiasi sagahapifanai.

Esis sandatopalopa atin. Na'amba ina anin epen atitin la'afena esis hiahawes gwa'aisi main akan, owa'atin. Esis hiasi kofagesa itapi ifagwi, esis saso'asas anis daias satalis saso'asa otamba. Ea' sofa'ai otamba ambamba safi'i,
saso'amamba amom aposel. Ea' amom manda'amba maso' isimba gwa'aisi mais akasi.

Ea' anona aman bu'unai agol ananigili Josep amom aposel manda'mana anagol agol Barnabas. Agol agalemba kofagogola na'amba, “Epen nogowa' banaga ukup epesi.” Anen anona Livai, aman anamba anin ailan Saiprusinai.
Anen naso'asa itap ananipi anis epes satalep saso'ana otamba nofa'amba nafi'i naso'amamba amom aposel ma mogatopalopa anis gwa'aisi mais akasi.
Anona aman agilinama Ananaias, anen nape naloma waulu'mana anani'wi Sapaira. Anen naso'asa anep itap asasipi anis epes satalep.
Ea' nofa' otamba du'wanimba atemba naso'amamba aposel, du'wanimba ba'oma esis. Anen nambaso'ma amom na'i otamba ea' ma'umba naso'amamba si'imba. Waulu'mana wapani kogawa isimba.
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Ananaias, ina' na'i aho'ma Satan nafi'i nawis nape si'ina ma nembel ine'imbili ma dei' nagambaso'ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nagambaho' otamba du'wanimba ma itap apamba?

Fowa' esis ata' owa' sotala itapa, nogota atamba ata' itap ine'ipi atep. Ama dei' satalep ea', otamba ine'imbai nimafiamba. Dei' maina ina' okom mandanda'ma waf afambai awafi ma nembel ine'imbili? Ina nambaso'ma apa' epes atepa, owa'. Ina' nambaso'ma God.”
Ananaias name' basef ifimba, nowa itap a' afuna. Ea' esis same' basef ifimba ma nagaga', ombel mahas kwapete' a'owa'.
Ea' anom amam sa'umi mafi'i mofa' alop ananipi mowa'ap lowaf mofa'ana mafe' mawana.
Ama nogota bandata kwasakwasala awa wanifin a' nafe'ma main, ako'w waulu'mana kwafi'i kwawisi. Ako'w ina kogawa hiahawes sagatagama anini, owa'.
Ea' Pita na'ipa'w na'i, “Ipa' pegefa'ani moni ea' inimba nandahama itap apamba ea' ma'win, a'a owa'?” Ako'w kwambaso'mana kwa'i, “Aho'! Ma'win inimba atin.”

Ea' Pita na'ipa'w na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' bipa pa'i basef baso'afi pandame'maefa pagagwamba Ambal bu'unai Dembinaii? Neme'! Amam amamba ata' mofa' waulunamena ine'inai mafe' mawana, amamba mafi'i malutu uta. Atiasi mofa' ina' wapani nigi'mana nefe'!”
Ea' kwafalis atis ako'w kowa itap felefele'ma bo'wagah Pitai afu'w. Ea' amom sa'umi mawisi nomon mati ako'w afu'w, a' mofa'akw mafe' mawa'w felefele'ma waulunama'w akwa'unai.
Ea' esis Kristen hiasi saloma esis amam nematawa sagame' basefa hiahaom amambai, a' ombel mahas kwapete'!

Amom aposel manda' hiahaom banagami mamimami hiami la'afena esis amam nematawa. Ea' epes isimba hiasi sogahapifanai hi'alas a' nembel atembel sandakolas sape atogon ilaf ipat Solomoni felefele'ma ipat lu'unai Godi.
Anis amam nematawa hiasi ombel mahas, ea' ina safi'i sandakolas salomas, owa'. Apa' isimba sagape ando'i sasa'ma agof esis Kristeni sa'i esis epes bu'wasi.
Ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi sahapifa Dembinai, ea' safi'i timbi tambel sawisa mini'ap ananipi atapis sape.

Esis saloma anis daias wapani sati banagami amamba amom aposel manda'ami. Ea' sofa' awasisi safi'i sambe'as sa'oh ando' ufiawa, salas belitagw gwagwigwagwi sofa'as safi'i. Esis ukup pa'i, i'i Pita ina nefe'ma esisa, ea' hapaimi. Andeande'ma owaf fenda' ambal ananili atol lefe' lumbisila'as.

Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi walemb hielimbi bagape felefele'ma Jerusalami wapani safi'i sandakolas salomas. Esis sofa'ai awasisi safi'i salumai epes isimba ambagof awami mapais magahambombagasi. Ea' epes isimba hiasi sataga bo'wes hi'alas wapani.

Ea' pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii naloma amom amamba hiami alipumi ananimi Sadyusi anep mini'ap, amom kowalam a'owa' ma maol bu'wani amom aposel manda'ani. Dei' main amom mati esis hiasi saila basef amamifi.
Isimba atis dei' amom mosafel mombalo' amom aposel maso'am kalabus lu'wami.
Ama a'i owamb, owa' anona ensel Dembinaii nafi'i nawisi' uta lu'utai indalelemba kalabus ea' nafelai amom aposel mawisi ando' na'i,
“Ipa' fo'o pilutu ipat Godi lu'unai nomon pewalapa basefa amam nematawa hiasi ma waf hiafi dambaifi ma ambal namili.”

Ea' amom aposel mame' basef ifimba, kuhimbita mafe' ipat Godi lu'unai ma'ipa esis amam nematawa. Pris anamba dembinai naloma amom alipumi ananimi mafi'i mofalai agufumi hiami Israeli mafi'i mandakolas atogon. Ea' masapa' basef fafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa, mofa'ai amom aposel mugafi'i.
Ea' amom plisman mafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa, owa' ina mati amom aposel, owa'atin. Ea' motanima mafe' ma'ipa amom dembami ma'i,

“Afa' wati uta ipat kalabusi sowalowata sisihita, ea' amom plisman mugumafiatai malutu mumafi utagw hiagwi andeande'. Afa' wawisi' uta wawis nomon, apa' afa' ina wati anin epen atitin nape nomon, owa'atin.”
Ea' kepten nugumafi ipat Godi naloma amom pris dembami meme' basef ifimba ea' nomonas salasafe' hiahias ma'i, “Maim amamba atiasi dei' mogatagai?”
Amom mape nomonas salasafe'ma isimba owa', anona aman nafi'i nataga na'ipam na'i, “Peme', amam amamba ipa' panda'am magape kalabusi dei' malutu ipat Godi nomon ma'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa.”
Ea' kepten naloma amom plisman mafe' mufa'i amom aposel mafi'i. Apa' amom ina maham, owa'atin. Amom ombel maham ma'i, “Na'amba esis amam nematawa asokwaha otamba sohafa.”
Amom mofa'ai amom aposel malutu nogohnaep amom dembami esis Judai la'afen. Ea' pris anamba dembinai na'ipam na'i,

“Afa' wa'ipipa basef banagafi wa'i, ipa' ina pewalapa basef pi'ipasef amam nematawa ma agol agalemba, owa'i. Apa' owa', ipa' panda' basef ifimba fape fafe'agon hi'alagon Jerusalem asi'igina basef ipe'ifi. Ea' pa'i basef pasapagafa pa'i kofagema afa'imi, afa' waha aman anamba naga'.”
Owa' Pita naloma amom aposel magwa basef ma'ipam ma'i, “Afa' ina ugi'ma basef epesi, owa'. Afa' undagi'ma basef Godi atif.
Ipa' pandola Jisas lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea' pahana naga'. Owa', God anamba bafapapa apa' Juda manda' lotumanai a' nasa'mana nosafel wapani wandof.

Ea' God nofa'ana nalota ilif nahaponana nape lagol kwahisigili ananigili. Ea' nape agilinai ma notopalopa apa' Israel hiapai, nofa'apa mutanimai membema nelelemba opalefa nogakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi okom mogoso'anaf.
Fowa' dei' wapani afa' waloma Ambal bu'unai Godi wagawalapa basefa hiahawes isimba hiasi afa' watilis ogogawasi. God naso'asa Ambal bu'unai ananinai ea' ma amam nematawa sagaila basef ananifii.”
Amom mame' basef ifimba, a' ukup wandafip kwapete' endilisi ma'i moha amom aposel moga'.

Owa' anona dembinai nalutu la'afena amom dembami esis Judai, anen Farisi agilinama Gameliel. Anen dembinai tisa ma mu'uli Godi, ea' esis amam nematawa saganifela agol ananigili. Na'ipa amoma mogakwaha amom aposel mugawis ando' kwasakwasala.
Ea' na'ipa amom dembami Juda na'i, “Ipa' amam Israelipai, ipa' i'i penda' anis maemaefaha amom amamba ma, ipa' ata' ukup pendanda' andeande' pili'.

Ipa' pegawa ea' nogota tatumba fowa', anona aman Teudas nosafel na'i, ‘Ae' aman dembiwai, agiliwai.’ Ea' amam hiami felefele' ma 400-pelaim mafe' mailana. Owa' anis epes sahana naga', ea' amam magahapifanai mafa' mafe' atona biana. Ea' maol amamini a' newala dowaf.

“A'i owa' maina nogota atamba gavman nogofa'asa agof esis amam nematawa hiasii, anona Judas daiana Galilinai nosafel nambemefa ukup anis epes hiasi. Ea' safe' sailana safela wandaf sapa' saloma gavman sa'i sili'amonana. Owa' sahana naga' wapani, ea' epes isimba hiasi sagahapifanai safa' safe' atona biana hi'alas.
Na'amba dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ombel mondahepama amam amamba, ea' pekwahom mopano. I'i amom monda' maola epes atisai, atiasi maol inimba awasin newala si'i maol amom biam doko' ali' aga'ipipami.
Apa' i'i God atona nowa' banaga amoma basef ifimba kofagefa ai, ipa' ina dao' atiasi la'ifipama pegasopama amom, owa'atin. Na'amba ipa' apepa' peloma God!”

Ea' amom dembami maila basef Gamelieli ma'i, “Afa' oham atin dowaf.” Ea' mofala amom aposel mafi'i, ma'ipa amom plismana mogaham. Ea' ma'ipam dindinip ma'i, “Ipa' ina ata' pi'i basef ifimba ma agol Jisasi wapani, owa'i.” Ea' makwaha amom a' mafe'.
Ea' amom aposel makwaha amom dembami Juda a' mafe' mawis ando'. Mandagala God nati amom ila ma mogofa' akafimi nimanimi ma agol Jisasi.

Amom ina makwaha maol inimba magawalipasa basef bu'wafi ma Jisas anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, owa'atin. Nimaguf danda amom manda' maol mawalipa esis amam nematawa hiasi ipat Godi lu'unai, ifagw asasigwi wapani.

Nogota atamba esis alipisi sagaila Jisasi sataga hias a'owa'. Esis Juda hiasi apa' anis saga'i diga Griki safitap saloma anis Juda saga'i diga Hibrui ea' sa'i, “Nimaguf hiafi ipa' pagatopalopa esis amam nematawa isimba gwa'aisi main akasi, apa' anowa nematawa alifiwai ape'iwai owa'.”

Amom aposel 12-pelaim mati nimanimi amamba a' mofalai esis alipisi isimba hiasi safi'i ma'ipas ma'i, “I'i afa' okwaha maol inimba ogawalipasa basef Godi ma ogatambe' gwa'aisi, na'ambai ina andeande', owa'atin.

Ipa' Kristen alipipai, ipa' ata' pewando'ma anom amam 7-pelaim la'afena ipa' magape andeande'ma naep esis amam nematawai, Ambal bu'unai Godi nagape si'inami nomonas bu'wasi sagapaumi. Ama afa' onda'am mopoma mugumafi maol inimba.
Apa' afa' opoma ondabeten atin a oga'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa ogatopalopas.”

Amam nematawa hiasi ukup pa'i basef ifimba. Ea' sandandepa Stiven, anen nagahapifa Jisasi ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nagape si'inanai. Ea' sandandepa Filip naloma Prokoras, a Nikanon naloma Timon maloma Parmenas Nikolas. Aman anamba Nikolas Antiokinai, fowa' nafi'i naila waf esis Judai.
Ea' esis hiasi sanda' amam amamba malutu felefele'ma nogohnaep amom aposeli mawamona lagofa amom manda'mam betena monda' maol inimba.
Ea' basef Godi fandasauli' fafe'. Amam nematawa hiasi sagape Jerusalami a' sataga alipisi sahapifa Jisas. Owa' pris amamba hiami wapani mahapifa Jisas mailana.
God natopalopa Stiven nowa' banagona, nanda' banagami mamimami lu'wami la'afena esis amam nematawa.

Ea' anom amam mosafel ma'i basef mandahihianamaef maloma Stiven. Amom anom amam Juda manda' anin lotu daiani, esis sa'i ipat manda' lotuwatai agol na'amba. Amom fowa' manda' maol mape sisihima anis daias apa' dei' mape wahifim. Amom walemb Sairini naloma Aleksandriai ma anep itap lu'upa daiap Silisiai Esia.
Ambal bu'unai Godi naso'ana gawa fasini Stiven. Ea' amom ina la'ifima mi'i basef migikila'ana, owa'atin.
Ea' manda' anef waf baso'aifi ma mogaha Stiven. Ea' mofa'i anom amam ma'i basef ma'i, “Afa' wame' anen na'i basef nanda' Moses findiwana naloma Goda basef amamifi.”
Ea' amom masa'mai nelelemb esis amam nematawai saloma amom agufumi asasimi maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi. Ea' esis safe'ma Stiven sombalo'ana sofa'ana safe'ma amom dembami Juda.

Ea' sanda' anom amam malutu ma mogasapagana anif basef baso'aifi. Amam amamba ma'i, “Dondol lifilafi aman anamba naga'i basef awafi ma ipat lu'unai Godi apa' manda' lotuma naloma mu'uli fowa' God naga'ipa Mosesani.
Apa' mame' anen na'i, ‘Aman anamba Jisas Nasaratinai atiasi nohambombaga ipat anamba apa' manda' lotuma a' nonda' anef waf dambaifi feha'ofa waf hiafi fowa' Moses naga'ipapaf ape'i.’”
Ea' amom hiami mandakolasi hi'alam naep do' matiti Stiven ea' mati amaga ananigai a' gogala' gataga si'i amaga anona enseli.
Ea' pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii nahali' Stiven na'i, “Basef ifimba endilisi a'a owa'?”

Ea' Stiven na'ipam basef laufi na'i, “Ipa' sahin owan, a ipa' ahape, ipa' peme' ae'. Fowa' bafamapa ape'inai Abraham nagape itap lu'upa Mesopotamia ina dei' a' nafe' wambel Haran, ama nogota atamba God Dembinai nogogala'i a' natagamana.
Ea' God na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nekwaha wambel itap ine'isi peloma sahin owan ine'isi a' nefe' anagon lauguni nepe anep itap ae' a'i igihimba'menap ine'i.’
“Ea' dei' Abraham nakwaha itap lu'upa Kaldia a' nafe' nafe' nataga nape wambel Haran. Ama main, ahamana ananinai naga', ea' God nasapa'ana nafi'i nape itap apa'e dei' apa' magapaipi.

God ina dei' naso'ana itap apamba Abraham ma nogahapilap si'ip, ata' owa'atin. Itap apamba anep kwaia'up wapani si'i apop kwasala mende', owa'atin. Apa' God na'i basef endilisi atifa anaf owagama, dao' anen a' noso'ana itap apamba anona nohapilap nogaloma esis bafasana ananisi anaf sigi' sogatagai sogahapilap. Nogota atamba Abraham awani ata' akana God naga'ipana basef ifimba.

Na'ipana na'i, ‘Mini'ap awasi ine'isi anaf sope itap esis mini'ap anis epes daiasi. Ea' mini'ap epes isimba anis daiasi anaf sonda' mini'ap awasi ine'isi sonda' maol numa'uni agof akas sope lafela esis ea' sonda'as kwapete'as sope sofe' sotaga nogota lautai afagof 400-pelaiguf.
Apa' anaf owagama ae' egwamasa waf awafi esis. Ama anaf wapani esis mini'ap awasi ine'isi sogakwaha itap apamba sufi'i sope sonda' lotuma ae' itap apa'e.’”

“Ea' God na'i Abraham atiasi notopa' alopa nogaila basef banagafi God nali' nala' lap nagalomana afi. Ama main, Abraham name' basef ifimba nailif natopa' alop ananipi anola Aisak nogamana ananinai ma nimaguf 8-pelaif fala'ana, a' natopa'mana alop ananipi wapani. Ama main, Aisak nataga ahama Jekopi, ea' Jekop a' ahama bafapapa amamba 12-pelaim.

Amom bafapapa 11-pelaim kowalama owamam Josep. Na'amba mali'amonana anop nomop daias satalona ma agol akana nonda' maol nogape lafela esis. Ea' sofa'ana safe' itap lu'upa Isip. Apa' owa' God nape nalomana.

Anen natopalopana natalogofa nimanimi hiami ananimi nape wahifina. Ama nemaf afamba anen na'i basef nagaloma dembinai king Isipinai Fero, God naso'ana gawa fasini na'i basef nalomana ma nanda' king Fero okom magailana. Ea' dei' king anamba nanda'ana nataga nape dembinai gavmana itap apamba Isip ea' numafi hiahaom hiami ma ipat anen kingi.

“A'i owa' main, nolom lu'unai nataga itap apamba Isip anamba hiagoma nafe'agon hi'alagon nafe' nataga itap lu'upa Kainan wapani, ea' esis satagama nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' esis bafasapa ape'isi sagape Kenani ina ata' sofa' anis gwa'aisi, owa'atin.
Owa' Jekop Josep ahamana a' name' basef sa'i gwa'aisi sa'oh itap apamba Isip. Ea' nasapa' amom bafapapa ape'imi mali' mafe' dambadamba.
Ama main, magi' motanima mafe'ma bif, ea' Josep na'ipa amom sahopana na'amba na'i, ‘Ae' Josep.’ Ea' dei' king a' nogawa amom wambota Josepi mafi'i.
“Ea' Josep nasapa' basef fafe' nofalai ahamana Jekop nokwaha Kainan nigi'mana nogafi'i Isip, noloma esis wambota ananisi hiasi sataga 75-pelais.
Na'amba Jekop niliana itap apamba Isip naloma bafapapa ape'imi ma main, amom a' maga'.
Amom maga' ea', sofa'am sotanima safe' wambel Sekem sawam matmat atamba fowa' Abraham nowasa' otamba nagatalagoma ma awasi Hemoi.

“Nemaf afamba God na'i endilisi ma nonda' hiahawes isimba. Fowa' anen naga'ipa Ebrahama anen atiasi nonda'asi, nogota atamba felefele' dei' tataga. Ea' esis mini'ap ape'ipi Israel asataga lu'wis ea' amam nematawa a' hias a'owa' sape itap hiagoma Isip.
Ea' anona aman dambainai nataga dembinai king, apa' anen ina nogawa na'i fowa' Josep nagape dembinai ma Isip, owa'.

King anamba nambaso'mas nanda'masa waf a maol numa'uni ma mini'ap esis ape'isi. Anen nanda' waf awafi ma esis bafasapa ape'isi, anen a' banagona endilisi na'i esis sokwaha awasi asasisi sope ando' ma a' afis.
Nogota atamba Moses ma'mana kolana. Anen awani fasinai a'owa'. Ea' mamasana sumafiana andeande' ipat asasitai ma aomb wanemb.
Ama main, sofa'ana safe' sambaho'wana na'oh alop ando'. Owa' dembinai king Fero nogamana kwafi'i kwatolona kofa'ana kwalagana si'i nogama'w akwa'unai si'ina.
Ea' Moses nanda' skul nalafa gawa hiani esis Isipi ea' anen a' aman dembinai nanda' maol banagani naga'i banagafi ma seme'ef sagagi'mif.
Moses a'i owa' nape ma dambena ma afagof 40-pelaiguf ea', a' okom mandanda'ma esis wambota ananisi Israel ea' nafe' natilis.
Nati anona Isipinai nahambombaga anona Israelinai a'owa'. Ea' Moses natopalopa Israelinai naha aman anamba Isipinai afuna.
Ea' anen nomonas sandanda' sa'i, epes ae'asi atiasi si'i na'amba si'i, ‘God a' natopalopa apa' ma lagof Mosesi ma notagwahepa mugape wahifipa.’ Owa' owa'atin. Esis ukup ina pandanda' na'amba, owa'.

“A'i owa' wafilu, Moses notanima nafe' natilis wapani owa' nati anom biam amom atom Israel mapa' wapani. Ea' na'i nohagofa amom biam nohape'am ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' atipa sahomana owamana penda'as na'amba, owa'i. Dei' maina ipa' pagahambombaga ipa' atipa?’
“Owa', aman anamba nali' nagahambombaga anini nambasi' Moses na'ipana na'i, ‘Ami na'ipina ma negape dembinai ma negawaloga afa'?
A'i ina' na'i nehe si'i nambati' nagaha aman anamba Isipinai nagaga'?’
Anen na'ias na'amba owa', Moses ombel mahana nafa' nafe'. Nafe' nape anep itap lu'upa Midian laogoma. Ama main, naso' nemata'w nola awasi bias.

“Ama afagof 40-pelaiguf fafe'ma hi'alagof, owa' anona ensel Dembinaii natagamana itap wafigima epes akagoma felefele'ma halaf Sainai. Ensel nape nomona nif ileliwa fandom magatagai anoga lawag sa'ugai.
Ea' Moses natolom a' nomonas hiahawes sandanda'ma amamba magataga ma anini. Ea' nafe' felefele'ma nagatolom andeande', owa' Dembinai na'ipana na'i,
‘Ae' God amom bafapena ine'imi manda' lotumai. Ae' God Abrahami Aisak Jekop fowa' manda' lotumai.’ Ea' Moses bolalana ombel mahana ma nogatologon.
“Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Tagwaha su magape bo'wagah ine'igahii. Itap apa'e ina' dei' nagalutuma itap ae'api hilili'i.

Ae' ati esis mini'ap amam nematawa ae'asi sagame' akafimi lu'wami itap apamba Isip. Ae' ame' lef asasinai ea', dei' a' isila'i ma etopalopasa egelefata nimanimi amamba asasimi. Na'amba dei' ina' ea' safel. Ae' a'i esapa'ena netanima nefe' Isip.’

“Moses aman anamba fowa' sosambalona saga'i, ‘Ami na'i ina' nepe dembinai ma negawalogapa?’ Dei' aman anamba atona God nasapa'ana nafe' si'i dembinai ma nugumafias nowambilasi nofa'as sogotanimai. God nowa' banagona ma anamba ensel natagamana nalomana naga'i ma lawag agamba sa'ugai.

Moses ea' nao'was safe' sakwaha Isip, nanda' maol naninani banagani si'i God nanda'ani ma itap lu'upa Isip a naoh embel akwahimi ea' anamba itap wafigima epes akagoma, ma afagof agwafomba 40-pelaiguf.
Moses aman anamba ma'una anen na'ipa esis Israel naga'i, ‘Atiasi owagama God nosapa' anona sahomepa ipe'inai nonda'ana nope profet si'i Ae'.’

Ama a'i owa', esis Israel safe' sandakolas anamba wafigima fataupigima Moses aman anamba atona nape nagaloma esisi. Anen nape naloma bafapapa ape'imi wapani. Anona ensel nape naloma Moses naso'ana basef Godi halafuta atamba Sainai ea' Moses naso'apa basef ifimba ambal namilifi apa'.
Apa' bafasapa ape'isi sandaiwa'ma sogame' basef ananifi, owa'. Esis sosambalona ea' sanda'agama anamba fowa' sagapanima Isip ukup paipailagon.
Ea' sa'ipa aman anamba Eran sa'i, ‘Aman anamba Moses nofa'apai Isip magafi'ii, apa' ina mogawana nafe' nasa natawa ani? Ea' ina' da'mapa anona god baso'amunai ape'inai ma anen nope nogaloma apa'.’
Nemaf afamba esis sanda' anona bulmakau ea' sondolalima god anamba baso'amunai. Ea' sandagala ma god anamba sanda'ana lagof asasigufi atugufi.

Ea' dembinai God naso'asa alafuga esis nakwaha esisa sonda' lotu sogafela agofa awin owambini alipini neloma ondowa si'i basef fagape buk profeti fagail buk Baibeli fa'ias faga'i, ‘Ipa' epes Israel, ipa' paha bulmakau maloma sipsip pendalali ma ae' pagape anamba wafigima epes akagoma afagof 40-pelaiguf, a'a? Owa'atin!

Ipa' pefa' ipat selitai panda' lotuma Molokatai, ea' pefa'ata taloma ametal si'i ondo'w god baso'amunai Refani, ambagof awami amamba hiami ipa' panda'ama panda' lotumami. Na'amba atiasi ae' a' ili'amonepa pefe' pepe lauguni peloma wambel Babilon gani wa'ol.’

“Fowa' bafasapa ape'isi sape anamba wafigima epes akagoma, nogota atamba sowalo sel si'i ipat sanda' lotu. Ipat atamba tihimba'mapa atamba God nagapautai. Ipat atamba God naga'ipasa basef ananifima. Esis sanda' ipat lotu inimba sel nandahama ikwaf afamba God nigihimba'manaf Mosesi. God na'ipana ma nonda'af ea' na'amba atin.

Ama main, amom bafapapa ape'imi mafi'i maloma Josua ma mogofa' itap esis anis epes mini'ap daiapi. Ea' God nali'amona esisa nogohnaep esis bafasapa ape'isi. Ama nemaf afamba sofa'ai ipat atamba selitai, ea' sanda'ata totawa na'a atapita tape nafi'i nafi'i nogota Devit nagape dembinai king.
Devit nanda' waf bu'wafi ma God natopalopana nogowa' banagona. Ea' nandabetena Goda anen na'i nogala' anota ipat bu'utai ma God anamba fowa' Jekop nanda' lotumanai.
Apa' owa', nogamana Solomon nanda' ipat anamba lu'unai Godi nala'ana.
Owa' owa atin. God dembinai endilisinai, ina nagape ifagw agwamba epes sagala'agw lagof asasigufii, owa'atin. Basef ifimba fagail Buk Baibeli si'i anona profet naga'if,

“Dembinai naga'i na'amba na'i, “Heven si'i sia ae' agapaini a itap apa'e ae' ahaponai bo'wagah hagatomama. Ipat mamahotama atiasi ipa' pela'meata ae'? Owa'atin. Atiasi ae' epoma noma'w anima? Owa'atin.
Lagof ae'agufi atogof anda' hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam,’

“Ipa' epes panda' du'wanigai. Ipa' epes pegelelama basef Godi si'i anis daias owa' sogogawa Godia. Ipa' pandaiwa' ma pegame' basef Godi ma nelelembi aligah ipe'isi. Dondol ipa' pegesambala Ambal bu'unai Godi. Ipa' panda'am na'amba atin si'i fowa' a'mesepa ipe'isi sanda'am.

Amom profet hiami fowa' magapani esis akusipa ipe'isi sanda' waf awafima amom hiami hi'alam saham sanda'am aom. Saha amom profet maga'ipasa aman bu'unai hilili'i anaf nogafi'ii. Ea' dei' ipa' pawalapana ma amom boumi mahana naga' ea'.
Fowa' God nase'epa mu'uli ananini ipa'. Ea' amom ensel atom ma'ipipa mu'uli inimba, apa' owa' ipa' ina peme'an pagi'man, owa'atin.”
Amom mame' basef ifimba faha nelelemb amamilimbi endilisi a'owa'. Amom nalelef finditapa imunam dogw ukup wandafum endilisi ma Stiven.
Apa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'inama anen, naniga nati heven naep do' endilisi. Nati banagami mogogala'i Godi ea' nati Jisas nalutu wa'ol lagol kwahisigili Godi.
Ea' Stiven na'ipam na'i, “Peme'! Ae' ati heven a' nandawisi' ea' Dembinai nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi nalutu wa'ol lagol kwahisigili Godi.”
Ea' amom gigal ma'oh mehip a'owa', masopama aligah amamigahi mandaiwa'ma mogame' basef ifimba. Ea' mosafel masagih mafe' atef mombalo' Stiven.

Ea' mali'amonana nakwaha wambel nawis nalutu wambel ando'. Amom doko' mali' magasapaganama basefi mowalia siaogw amamugwi mambe'agw gwa'oh felefele'ma anona aman sa'unai nagalutuma agilinama Sol. Mowaliagw gwa'oha mokwaha otamba mehip mogaha Stiven.
Makwaha otamba mahana atin owa', nandabeten na'amba na'i, “O Dembinai Jisas, ina' fa'ago ambal ae'ali!”
Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa na'i mehip na'i, “O Dembinai, ina' owa'i negwamama waf anamba aunai amoma, owa'i.” Stiven na'ias na'amba, a' naga'.

Ea' Sol nomonas atifis naloma amom magaha Stiven nagaga'i. Nogota atamba esis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma esis Kristen sagape Jerusalami, sahas saso'as akafimi nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' isimba atis dei' esis sagahapifanai asafa' safe'agon hi'alagon atona biana ma anamba itap lu'upa Judiai Samaria. Apa' amom aposel atom ata' mapani atapim Jerusalem.
Anom amam magaila waf Godi andeande'i mofa' Stiven mawana, manda' lef lu'wani ma anen.
Apa' Sol nanda' maol na'i nohambombaga esis Kristen. Anen nafe' nawis ifagw hiagwi atona atin nofa'ai amam nematawa hiasi sagahapifanai. Ea' nahondo'as nofa'as nafe' nanda'as sanda' kalabus.
Esis Kristen safa' safe'agon hi'alagon walemb hielimbi analemb daindaialemb sawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi sa'ipasef.
Ea' Filip nowala nafe' anambel wambel itap lu'upa Samaria nawalipasa basef bu'wafi na'i Jisas anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
Amam nematawa hiasi same' basefa anen asati banagami anen nanda'ami ea' sagahembe' andeande'ma basef ananifi.

Banagami amamba na'amba. Amam nematawa hiasi ambagof awami magapaisi, ambagof amamba manda'am wiwa ma'oh kwapete' endilisi a' makwaha esis mawisi mafa' mafe'. Ea' epes isimba lagof bo'wagah awamisi, anis isimba bihitagof fofowagalamasi, esis hiasi asataga bo'wes wapani.
Ea' dei' esis wambel ambalemba sofa' dagala lu'wani.

Ea' anona aman nape agilinama Saimon. Aman anamba fowa' nanda' naohi ufiali nape atapina nafi'i nataga dei' nemaf afamba. Ea' nanda' ukup esis amam nematawa Samariaisi a malamafe' hiahiam a'owa'. Aman anamba na'ias na'i, “Ae' aman dembiwai.”

Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi agof akasi a agufisi, esis hiasi hi'alas sandahembe'ma na'amba atina sagame' basef Saimoni. Sa'ias sa'i, “Aman anamba anen nofa' banagami amamba dembinai Godi sofalam saga'i banagami lu'wamii.”
Ea' esis banagesa sagame' basef ananifi. Dei' main, nimaguf hiafi anen nanda' waf fafifafi hiafi banagafi ko'op ufial ea' satelef a' nomonas salasafe' hiahias.
Ea' Filip nawalipasa basef bu'wafi esis hiasi. Nawalipasa agol Jisas Kraisi ma sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Ea' sahapifa basef ifimba sofa' baptais.
Ea' aman anamba Saimon wapani nahapifa Jisas a' nofa' baptais nape naloma Filip. Anen nati Filip nanda' ametal banagonai naninani si'i God nanda'ani, ea' a' okom hiahaom mapaona.
Amom aposel magape Jerusalami mame' basefa esis Samaria asofa' basef Godi. Na'amba masapa' Pitai Jon mafe'ma esis.
Amom biam miliana mandabetena Goda nogatopalopa esisa sogofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi.
Dei' main, Ambal Godi ina dei' nawisa esis, ata' owa'atin. Esis sofa' baptais atisa agol Jisasi atogol.
Ea' amom biam mawamona lagofa esis ea' sofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi.
Ea' Saimon nati amom aposel biam mawamona lagof atogofa esis sofa' Ambal Godi. Na'amba anen nofa' moni ananini nafi'mai amom na'ipam na'i,
“Ipa' bipa pese'e banagami amamba ae' wapani ma ae' i'i egawamona lagofa anin epena, negefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi.”

Owa' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Hiahaom fasimi God nagaso'asam dowaf si'i preseni, amamba ina' okom mandanda' na'i ilama negatalom otamba ine'imbai? Owa'atin. Ae' a'i otamba ine'imbai beloma ina' pefe' wambel awambili hel.
Ina' owa' bo'wenama nigawisa maol inimba Godi afa' wanda'ania, owa'atin endilisi! Dei' main, okom ine'inai ina usi'inama naep Godi, owa'atin.
Ina' newa' alafugama waf afamba awafi ine'ifi nembema nembel nefe'ma God. Ea' nendabetena Dembinai ma nokwaha kofagema amamba ma okom ine'imi magapoma waf awafii.
Dei' main, ae' ati ina' kowalena a'owa' ma presen hiahaom fasimi God nagaso'apami. Ea' nembel ine'imbili awambela isimba, waf afamba awafi afewa'ena atapif nape si'i kalabus.”
Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'i, “Ipa' bipa pendabetena Dembinai ma anen nogatopalopa ae'. Ama hiahaom amamba ipa' paga'iami ina a' motagame, owa!”
Ea' amom biam ma'ipasa basef Dembinai Jisas Kraisi esis amam nematawa. Ama main, motanima mondowasa' Jerusalem. Magafe' ufia'w, mawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi walemb hielimbi esis Samaria.

Ea' anona ensel Dembinaii na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ina' nendendombola negafe' gani wa'ol awin natopa' negemba'ma, ma ufia'w kwa'waha Jerusalem kwiliana kwagafe' Gasama. Ufia'w akwamba fowa' esis sagafe'akwi. Dei' a' owa'. Ufia'w akwamba kwape anamba wafigima fataupigima.”

Ea' Filip nosafel a' nafe'. Ea' natagama anona aman Itiopiainai ufia'w akwamba. Anen aman dembinai nugumafi otamba hiambai ma kwin akwamba dembe'wi gavman kugumafi esis walemb hiagoma Itiopiai, sofala'w saga'i Kandesi. Aman anamba nimbewa' nafi'i Jerusalema nanda' lotu,
dei' na'i notanima nefe'. Anen natoma karis ananimi si'i wilkar ea' natoma nati basef fagail buk Baibeli fowa' profet Aisaia nanda'afi a' nafe'.
Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ina' fo'o felefele'ma aman anamba nefe' neloma wilkar nanimba.”

Ea' Filip nasagih nafe' felefele'ma anen, a' name' aman anamba natalifa basef ifimba Aisaia nanda'afi. Ea' Filip nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' negawa basef ifimba kofagefa dei' natalifif nagafi'ii, a'a owa'?”
Ea' aman anamba nagwa basef na'i, “I'i anin epen owa' nihimba'mefa, dei' egawa basef ifimba i'imama?” Ea' na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ina' lotai netoma neloma ae'.”

Basef ifimba du'wanif Godi anen nagatalififi faga'iasa Jisas fa'i, “Esis sao'wana nafe' si'i sipsip ama sa'i sohana nogaga'. Anen si'i sipsip noganai esis sahapilana sagatopa'mana auf ananimi, anen ina nanda'am fe' atin na'oh, owa'atin. Ea' na'amba atina aman anamba, ina malogol gagalana, owa'atin.

Esis sapa'agana endilisi ea' ina sanda'mana kota basef usi'ifi, owa'. Anen awasi akana ma anis sitilis soganifa basefas. Dei' main, sahana naga' sagia ambal ananili ma ina ata' nope itap wapani, a'owa'.”
Ea' aman anamba dembinai nugumafi maola kwini na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ae' a'i ihali'ina. Profet anamba na'i ami ma dei' nanda' basef ifimba? Na'ifa anen atona a'a na'ifa anin epen daian?”
Ea' Filip na'i basef nawalapefa aman anamba. Nasumbai basef ifimba du'wanif Godi aman anamba naga'iefi fafe' fafe' ea' nawalapai basef bu'wafi Jisasi.
Amom biam ma'i mafe' owa', matagama anemb walemb. Ea' aman anamba na'ipa Filip na'i, “Niti walemb ambamba betah. Dei' ata' main nape nili'ama ae' egefa' baptais?”
[Ea' Filip na'i, “I'i ina' nihapifana endilisi ma nembel ine'imbili, ina' dao' ila.” Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' ahapifa Jisas Krais anen nogamana Godi.”]
Ea' na'ias a main, wilkar negetawai, Filip naloma aman anamba dembinai misila' mafe' mowala walemb. Ea' Filip napisi'ana.

Ea' amom biam makwaha walemb mandagiai wata'ita, kwafalis atis Ambal bu'unai Dembinaii nofa' Filip a' nafe'. Ea' aman anamba dembinai ina ata' natolona wapani, a'owa', dolomana. Ea' anen sonahana nandagala naila ufia'w anani'wi nafe'.
Apa' Filip nafe' nataga Asdot. Anen nafe' taun anamba hiagoma ganigani nawalapa basef bu'wafi Jisasi. Ama main, notanima nafe' nataga wambel Sisaria.

Fowa' basef ifimba ata' owa' fetagaea, nogota atamba Sol nanda'am na'amba. Anen na'ias banagambel a'owa' ma nogahambombaga esis alipisi sagaila Dembinaii nohas sogaga'. Ea' nafe'ma pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii.

Na'ipana ea' pris anamba nanda' basefa pas safe'ma agufumi hiami mugumafi ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi wambel Damaskusi. Ea' naso'ana pasa basef ifimba Sol. Faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “I'i Sol nogati anis amam nematawa sigaila ufia'w akwamba dambai'wi sogape Damaskusi, nonda' kalabusimas nihapilas nofa'as sifi'i Jerusalem.”
Ea' Sol nafe' nataga felefele'ma Damaskus owa', kwafalis atis anom mogogala'i mafi'i misila'i heven a' mogala'ma anen a'owa'.
Ea' nowai nafe' na'oh itap ea' name' anagol malogol ga'ipana ga'i, “Sol, Sol, dei' maina ina' nanda' maola nagahambombaga ae'?”
Ea' Sol nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' ami?” Ea' malagol agalemba ga'i, “Ae' Jisas ina' nanda' maol nagahambombagai.
Dei' ina' safel a' nefe' niwis wambel lu'wambili. Bola anona aman ni'ipina hiahawes ina' atiasi nenda'asi.”
Ea' amom mafe' magaloma Soli mame' malogol agalemba apa' ina la'ifima moga'i anif basef, owa'. Tol malutu dowaf. Mame' malogol gaga'i, apa' ina mati anin epen, owa'atin.
Ea' Sol nosafel na'i niti, owa' owa'atin. Nati akot atona. Ea' amom mahapila lagof ananigufi mofa'ana mafe' mawis Damaskus.
Anen nati akot atona nape nimaguf wanif ea' ina na' wali'ita o embel mais, owa'atin.
Ea' anona alipunai nagaila Jisasi nape na'amba Damaskus, agilinama Ananaias. Ea' na'oh nandondo'ah, nati Dembinai nofalana na'ipana na'i, “Ananaias!” Ea' anan noga na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ape na'a.”
Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel fo'o ufia'w akwamba saga'i usi'i'wi. Nefe' ipat Judasi a niti anona aman Tarsusinai, agilinama Sol. Dei' nape nandabeten.
Sol na'oh nandondo'ah a' nati anona aman agilinama Ananaias atiasi nifi'i nuwisi nowamona lagofa anona nonda' naep pigati andeande' wapani.”
Ea' Ananaias nagwa basef na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ame' basef hiafi ma aman anamba, waf awafi hiafi anen nanda'afa esis amam nematawa ine'isi gani Jerusalem.
Anen nofa' agol banagagili ea' ma amom pris dembami ma nogombalo' amam nematawa sandabetena agol ine'igilii wambel ambale'e ma nonda' kalabusimas.”

Owa' Dembinai na'ipana nasapa'ana na'i, “Ina' fo'o. Aman anamba atiasi nonda' maol ae'ani. Ae' andandepana ea' ma nefe' niga'ipasa basefa agol ae'agili anis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia soloma amom dembami king asasimi moloma esis Israel wapani.
Atiasi ae' ihimba'mana akafimi mamimami hiami moloma nimanimi ma nogawalapa agol ae'agili. Na'amba ina' dei' fo'o netelona.”

Ea' Ananaias nafe' nawis ipat nomon nasa lagofa Sol na'i, “Sahome Sol, Dembinai Jisas natagamena ufia'w nogota atamba ina' nagafi'i na'a'e. Dei' nasapa'e afi'mai ina' a' nigati andeande' wapani ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nogape si'inama ina'.”
Ea' hiahaom mape magasopama naep Soli si'i dunduwif agufumi, a' mandafi kwafalis atis makwaha naep Soli mowa. Ea' naep ananipi pati wapani, nosafel nofa' baptais.
Ama main, na' gwa'aisi banagona wapani. Sol nape anif nimaguf naloma amom alipumi magaila Jisasi Damaskus.
Ea' nafe' kwafalis ifagw hiagwi esis Juda sandakolasugwi nawalapa basef Jisasi na'i, “Jisas anen nogamana Godi.”

Epes hiasi same' basef ananifi ea' sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' sa'i, “Aman anamba nagahambombaga amam nematawa sogofala agol agalembai ma wambel Jerusalem. Ea' dei' nafi'i na'a ma nogowa' esis nonda' kalabusimas nofa'as sogafe'ma amom pris dembami. Ea' ma'una aman anamba atona.”

Apa' banagami Soli a' mataga banagem a'owa' ma basef nagawalipasafi. Ea' esis Juda sagape Damaskusi same' basefa anen. Esis ina la'ifisa sogwa anif basef siga'ipanaef, owa'atin. Anen banagona nihimba'mas endilisi na'i, “Jisas anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.”
Nimaguf hiafi fafe'ma ea', amom Juda mandanif ea' ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Sol nogaga'.
Apa' Sol name' basef ifimba amamifi. Ea' amom Juda hiami mape mumafi utagw hiagwi ma taun inimba owamb alip wapani ma ma'i moha Sol nogaga'.
Owa' amom alipumi Soli mofa'ana owamb mafe' malota indalelemb otamba. Ea' malana nape anona folaf lu'unai, mapana mandelef malana nisila' indalelemb ando'.
Ama main, Sol nafe' Jerusalem ea' na'i nondakolas nogaloma esis alipisi sagaila Jisasi. Apa' owa', esis hiasi ombel mahasana. Ea' esis ina sagahapifana sa'i anen alipunai nagaila Jisasi, ata' owa'.

A'i owa', Barnabas nao'wana mafe'ma amom aposel owa' na'ipama Sol nagati Dembinai ufia'w ma Dembinai nagaso'ana basef anen. Ea' Barnabas na'ipam na'i anen nawalapa basef na'ipasefa agol Jisasi banagambel Damaskus, dei' anen ina ata' ombel mahana, owa'.
Ea' dei' asogawa anen wambota atota Jisasi nalomas nape la'afena esis. Anen nanda' maol banagambel, nafe' Jerusalem anamba hiagoma nawalapa basefa agol dembinaii. Anen ina ombel mahana, owa'atin.
Nanda' maol na'ipasa basef naloma amom Juda mogagawa diga Griki ea' na'i basef napa' nalomam. Apa' amom mandaiwa'ma basef ananifi molaoma ufia'wa mohana nogaga'.
Ama amom Kristen sahin owan mogawa isimba, ea' mofa' Sol mafe' miliana Sisaria. Ea' masapa'ana nafe' nape wambel Tarsus.

Dei' esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape anamba itap apamba lu'upa hiagoma Judiai Galili a Samaria sape opalef awanelef sape andeande' wandaf mais a' owa'atin ea' esis Kristen sape banages. Esis sape lafela Dembinai ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nowa' banaga opalef asasilifi. Ea' esis mini'ap Kristen apataga loup.
Pita nafe' walemb anamba hiagoma ea' niliana nafe' taun inimba Lida wapani nape naloma esis amam nematawa Godi sagape wambel ambalembai.
Ea' nati anona aman Inas. Alop bihitagof ananisi a' saga'ana, tol na'oh nala alahis atis nape nogota laota afagof 8-pelaiguf.
Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Inas, dei' Jisas Krais a' nanda'ena bo'wena wapani. Ina' safel nendondomba alahis ine'isi andeande'.” Pita na'ipana ea' dei' atef nosafel.
Ea' epes hiasi walemb ambalemba bialemb Lidai Saron satolona sambema nelelemb safe'ma Dembinai.

Anembel wambel Jopa ano'w nemata'w kwagaila Jisasi kwape, agol akwa'ugili Tabita. Diga esis Griki sofala'w sa'i Dokas agol anin mafini sa'i dia. Dondol lifilafi ako'w kwanda' waf bu'wafi ma kwagatopalopa esis amam nematawa kwahusi ma gwa'aisi mais.
Nemaf afamba awasi'w a' kwaga'. Ea' sasa'opa alop akwa'upi ma sogawa'w. Ea' sofa'akw sambe'akw kwa'oh rum ilifami.
Wambel Lida nape felefele' ma Jopa. Ea' esis alipisi sagaila Jisasi same' basefa Pita nape Lida, sasapa' amam biam mafe'ma anen mahali'ana na'amba ma'i, “Ina' nifi'mai afa'. Niga'i ota' ota' owa'.”

Ea' Pita nosafel nafe' nalomam, ea' mafe' mataga mofa'ana mafe' rum amamba ilif ako'w kwaga'oma. Nematawa hiawai alifiwai wafi'i walutu felefele'ma Pita wape walef. Ea' wihimba'mana klos sagegw maim ako'w Dokas kwanda'masami doko' ata' kwape kwagalomawa.

Ea' Pita nagalo'ma esis amam nematawa sawisi ando', nindiwa nembawa notawa nandabeten. Ea' nambema amaga ananigai gafe'ma alop nemata'wi na'i, “Tabita, ina' safel.” Ea' ako'w naep pati kwati Pita, akosafel kwape.
Ea' Pita nahapila lagol akwa'ugili nasa'ma'w kwalutu. Ea' nofalai esis amam nematawa sagahapifa Godi saloma nematawa awamba alifiwai, naso'awa ako'w kotanima kwafe'mawa.
Basef ifimba fafe' anamba hiagoma wambel Jopa ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi same'ef sahapifa Dembinai.
Pita nape wambel ambalemba Jopa nimaguf hiafi. Anen nape naloma anona aman nagandondomba agwafih bulmakaumi agol ananigili Saimon.
Anona aman nagape Sisariai agilinama Konilias, anen agilinai kepten nugumafi soldia 100-pelaimi. Amom mini'ap soldia amamba saga'i agol soldia Italimi.

Anen aman nanda' lotuwi naloma hiasi ananisi sagape ipat atotai sanda' lotu ma God. Anen nagaso'as moni mais hiasi ma nagatopalopa esis Juda isimba kwahusi otamba mais akasi. Ea' dondol nandabetena God.
Anef nemaf wambomota awin nendemba'a 3 klok, anen nati anom maefah si'i na'oh nandondo'ah a' mataga alihim a'owa'. Nati anona ensel Godi nafi'mai anen na'ipana na'i, “Konilias.”

Ea' Konilias natolona, a' ombel mahana a'owa' na'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i main?” Ea' ensel na'ipana na'i, “God a' name' beten ine'ini ea', okom ma'i waf ina' nanda'afa nagaso'as moni mais nagatopalopa amam nematawa hiahawes akasi. Ea' God ata' okom mapomas atin sape.
Dei' ina' nesapa' anom amam mofo'o Jopa mowando'ma anona aman agilinama Saimon agol wa'agol Pita. Mofalana nifi'i.
Aman anamba nape ipat anona Saimoni, anen nagandondomba agwafih bulmakaumi. Ipat ananitai totawa felefele'ma naoh gwafe' gogotambela.”
Ensel na'ipa Konilias ea', a' nafe'. Ea' Konilias nofalai amam biam ananimi manda'mana maoli maloma anona soldia. Soldia anamba nanda' lotu dondoli nape nanda' maola Koniliasi.
Ea' Konilias na'ipa amam amamba wanom andeande'ma basef ifimba hi'alef, ea' nasapa'am mafe' wambel ambalemba Jopa.
Ea' amom wanom mosafel mafe' ma'oh ufia'w. Ama lala mosafel mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jopa. Nogota atamba awin nandasapa' Pita a' nalota natoma ipat ando' ilifa nondabeten.
Ea' nolomahana na'i nea' gwa'aisi, apa' esis ata' sanda'as atin, ea' anom maefah matagamana si'i koh dondo'ah.
Nati otaga ilif a' nandawisi' ea' anona maena si'i lowaf lu'unai endilisi nisila'i ilif nowalai. Anom maefah mahapila da'malififa biafigin biafigin malana nisila'i.
Hiahaom magala lowaf anamba nomoni, mafis hiahaom hiami, amiguf hiagof haogof fagail alupi, faloma uguf mamimami hiami.
Ea' anagol malogol ga'ipa Pita ga'i, “Pita, ina' safel neha mafis nea'am.”
Owa' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' owa'i endilisi. Ae' ina ea' anis mafis apa' Juda maga'i awasisi, owa'.”
Ea' malogol agalemba ga'ipana wapani ga'i, “Hiahaom God naga'i bu'wami, amamba ina ni'i awami, owa'i.”
Amamba matagamana wanif na'amba, ma main, kwafalis a' motanima malota otaga heven wapani.

Ea' Pita okom malamafe'ma hiahawes isimba na'i, “Koh dondo'ah inimba ae' agatulumi kofagema mamahoma?” Anen okom mandanda' na'amba atapina nape owa', amam amamba Konilias nasapa'am magafi'ii a' mataga mahali'asa ipat Saimon nagapautai. Ea' mogawata, mafi'i malutu utaitama.
Ea' mofalana ma'i, “Saimon agol wa'agol Pita, anen nape na'a a'a owa'?”
Pita ata' nape okom mandanda'ma hiahawes isimba owa', Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipana na'i, “Neme'! Amam amamba wanom ma'i molaoma ina'.
Ina' safel nisila' ea' nefe' nelomom. Ina' owa'i okom mope hiahaoma, owa'. Dei' main, ae' atowe asapa'am mafi'i.”
Ea' Pita nisila'ma amom amamba na'ipam na'i, “Aman anamba ipa' pa'i pigalaomanai ae' ea' ma'uwi. Ipa' pafi'mai main?”

Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Konilias anen kepten dembinai nugumafi soldia 100-pelaim hiamii, nasapa'afa wafi'i. Anen nagape hilili'i nanda' lotuma Godi. Esis Juda hiasi saga'i, ‘Anen aman bu'unai.’ Anona ensel Godi na'ipana ma nofalena negafe' ipat ananitai, ma ata' nogame' anif basef ine'ifi.”
Ea' Pita na'ipam a' mawis ipat nomon, nao'wam numafiam mape owamb ambamba. Wafilu nosafel a' nafe' nalomam. Anom amam Kristen Jopaimi mafe' malomana.

Amom mosafel mafe' ma'oh owamb atotomb ufia'w, ea' mafe' mataga Sisaria. Ea' Konilias nape nasasa amom. Anen nali' nofalai esis wambota atis ananisi saloma alipisi ananisi endilisi sunduwa'anima sape.
Ea' Pita nafi'i na'i a' nuwisi ipat owa', Konilias nafi'i natagamana nindiwa nembawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Pitai nanda' lotu nasa'ma agol ananigili.
Owa' Pita nasa'mana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel. Ae' wapani epen atowe si'i ina'.”
Ea' Pita naloma Konilias ma'i, a' mawis ipat nomon, nati amam nematawa hiasi sandakolas sape.

Ea' Pita na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' pegawa ea' mu'uli apa' Judai ma'i owa'atin endilisi ma apa' mefe' mugawis ifagw a'a mope mogaloma anis epes daias owa' Judaisia, owa'. Apa' God a' nihimba'me ma anis epes owa' Judaisia si'i ipa' na'a na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina nendafa'ma anin epen ni'i anin nanda' waf awafii, owa'i.’
Ea' ae' ina esambala basef ifimba God naga'ipiefi, owa'. Ea' ame' fala ipe'ini afi'i. Dei' a'i ihali'ipa, “Ipa' pefale afi'i ma main?”

Ea' Konilias nagwamana na'i, “Hiahawes sagatagama ae'i ma dei' nimaguf a' wanif fafe' ea', isimba na'amba. Ae' ape andabeten ipat ae'atai, nogota awin newala nagape owambuguma 3 klok. Nogota ea' na'amba atin si'i dei'. Andabeten ape owa', ati anona aman nalutu felefele'ma amaga ae'agai, luwaguf maim ananimi a' mombal mataga magala' a'owa'.
Ea' nofale na'i, ‘Konilias, God name' beten ine'ini ea', okom mapoma hiahawes hiasi ine'isi naso'asas nagatopalopa esis isimba hiahawes akasi.

Ea' ina' nesapa' anom amam mofe' Jopa mofalai Saimon agol wa'agol Pita. Aman anamba nape naloma anona Saimon ipat ananitai, nagandondomba agwafih bulmakaumi. Anen nape felefele'ma naoh gwafe' gogotambela.’

Ea' dei' ae' kwafalis asapa' anom amam mafe'mago ina' ea' dei' ina' nanda' waf fasifi a' nafi'i. Dei' apa' hiapai mafi'i mape na'a ma naep Godi ma mogame' basef hiafi Dembinai nagase'enaef ine'i ma niga'ipapaef.”
Ea' Pita na'ias na'i, “Endilisi atis, dei' ae' egawa okom Godi anen ina okom ma'i wambota mini'ap esis Judai atis, owa'atin.
Anen okom maimaila epes mamahisa sanda' lotuma anini sanda' waf fasifii.

Ipa' a' pegawa basef ifimba God na'if fagafe'ma apa' mini'ap Israeli. Anen nawalapa basef bu'wafi Jisas Kraisi, anen Dembinai ma epes hiasii nanda'apa mataga nembel atifimbil maloma God opalef fepe sa'umbel fegalomana.
Ipa' a' pegawa, fowa' Jon nawalapa basefa esis sogombema opalefa waf awafi ma sogofa' baptais, nogota atamba basef fafe' itap lu'upa Galili ea' fataga anamba walemb hielimbi agol Judia.

Basef ifimba, basef Jisas Nasaratinai. God a' nandandepana na'amba. Anen naso'ana Ambal bu'unai Godi naloma banagami lu'wami. Ea' nafe' walemb hiagoma ganigani natopalopa esis amam nematawa. Ea' dei' God nape nalomana nanda' epes hiasi Satan nagahambombagasi ambo'wes wapani.

“Ea' ae' afi'i aloma amom wanom afa' wagawalapa basefa hiahaom amamba banagami anen nanda'am gani Jerusalemi naloma analemb walemb daialemb hielimbi apa' Juda magapoma. Ea' esis sandolona lawag sahana naga' ma waf afamba.
Ama nimaguf bif hi'alef ea' fagafe'ma wanifi God nasa'mana nosafel wapani nawalapana alihina.
God ina nihimba'masana Juda hiasi hi'alas satolona, owa'. Nihimba'ma afa' atofa fowa' God nandandepafa ma ogawalapa basef ananifii. Anen notanima nosafel matmat wapani ea' wa' gwa'aisi walomana.

Anen na'ipafa dindinipa uga'ipa esis amam nematawa ogawalapa basef alihif na'amba. God nandandepa aman anamba ea' ma anaf nogape aman nonda'masa kota epes isimba sagape namisi soloma isimba sagaga' ea'i.
Amom profet hiami ma'iasa anen na'amba ma'i, ‘Banagami ma agol ananigili atogol God nakwaha waf awafi esis amam nematawa hiasi sagahapifanai.’”
Pita ata' na'i basef ifimba atin owa', Ambal bu'unai Godi nisila'i ma amam nematawa hiasi sagame' basef Godi nawisas.
Amam amamba Judaimi magahapifi mafi'i magalumai Pitai mosafel gogolalasom kwapete' ma mati God nagaso'as Ambal bu'unai ananinai dowaf si'i presena esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia wapani.
Amom Juda mame' esis sa'i anoga diga naninani sasa'ma agol Godi ea' amom gogolalasom kwapete'. Ea' Pita na'i,
“Ina anin epen la'ifina nindaiwa'ma sogapisi' amam nematawa isimba embel, owa'atin. Esis a' sofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi na'amba atin si'i apa'.”
Ea' na'ipa esis dindinip na'i, “Ipa' pefa' baptaisa agol Jisas Kraisi.” Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' ata' nepe nelomapa anif nimaguf wapani.”
Ea' amom aposel maloma esis sahin owan sagahapifanai sagape anamba Judia hiagomai same' basef ifimba ma anis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia wapani sofa' basef Godi sagahapilif.

Ea' Pita notanima nondowasa' Jerusalem, owa' anis epes Juda sagahapifa basef Godi sape. Esis sahapila waf fowa'ifi dindinip sa'i esis hiasi sagahapifanai sondagi'ma mu'uli esis Judai ma mogatopa' alop amamipi. Ea' solola'agomana dindinipa basef ananifi
sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' a' nafe' nawis ifagw amam amamba owa' Juda mogatopa' alopia na' gwa'aisi nalomam.”
Owa' Pita na'ipasa basef laufi ma hiahawes hiasi sagatagai. Nali' na'ipasa basef dambadamba fagali'i nailif nafe' nafe' nambif. Ea' na'i,

“Ae' ape taun Jopa andabeten ape owa', okom ae'ami mandambemef ati anis hiahawes si'i andanda'oh. Anom hiahaom lu'wami misila'i ilif si'i lowaf laufi endilisi. Hiahaom magahapila lowaf anamba da'malifinama biafigin biafigini mahapilana malana nowalai heven ilif ea' nafi'mai ae'.

Ea' ae' a'i ata' egawa amamba andeande', atologon nomon lowaf anamba ati hiahaom mamimami hiami magape nomona lowaf anambai. Ati mafis hiam haom magalutu itapi mafis alupumi maloma uguf amiguf hiahaom magail alupi.
Ea' ame' anagol malagol ga'ipi ga'i, ‘Pita, ina' safel neha anom mafis nea'am.’
“Owa' a'ipa Dembinai a'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' andaiwa' endilisi! Fowa' ae' ata' sa'owe afi'i afi'i ataga dei' ae' ina aga' anom maefah awami alugumii, owa'atin.’
“Owa' malogol agalemba gafi'i ilif wapani bif ga'i, ‘Hiahaom God nanda'ami magataga bu'wamii, amamba ina a' ni'i alugumi, owa'i.’
Hiahaom amamba matagama ae' wanifa ea', motanima malota heven ilif hi'alam.
“Ama main, dei' atef amam amamba wanom mafi'i mataga ipat atamba afa' wagapoma. Anona aman nagape Sisariai nasapa'am mafi'mai ae'.
Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' fo'o lomago amom, ina' owa'i okom molamefe'a.’ Amom sahope amamba wanom wanom mafe' malome. Ea' afa' wafe' wawis ipat aman anambai,
na'ipafa ma nagati ensel nagalutumana nomon gani ipat ananitai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nesapa' anom amam mofe' Jopa mi'ipa Saimon agol wa'agol Pita ma nigafi'mai ina'.
Ama noga'ipina anif basef ina' ma basef ifimba atifa God notopalopa ina' negaloma esis wambota ine'isi soloma esis sanda' maol ine'inii ma nofa'epa nokwahomepa waf awafi pitanimai pegape andeande'.’
“Ea' ae' asoumbai basef a'if, Ambal bu'unai Godi a' nisila'mai esis, nafi'i na'amba atin si'i nali' nagafi'mai apa' Juda dambadamba.
Ea' okom mapoma basef ifimba Dembinaii wapani. Ifimba faga'i, ‘Jon napisi'as embel, apa' ina embel atembal, owa'. Atiasi pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nuwisipa.’
Fowa' apa' mogahapifa Dembinai Jisas Krais ea' God naso'apa Ambal bu'unai ananinai apa' dowaf si'i presen. Ea' dei' ae' ami ma la'ifiwi egasopama God? Owa'atin.”

Esis same' basef ifimba Pita naga'ipasafi ea' ukup paso'asa basef ifimba asasifi saso'ma agol Godi sa'i, “Dei' apa' a' mogawa God nambema nelelemb esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia ma esis wapani safe'ma anen sogape ambal namili.”

Fowa' amom magaha Stiven nagaga'i manda' nimanimi lu'wami matagama esis Kristen amam nematawa mahas. Ea' esis sagahapifanai safa' safe'agon ganigani ea' sataga anambel wambel Antiok safe' anep itap biafip lu'wapi Saiprusi Fonisia sawalapa basef Godi ma esis Juda atis. Anis daias owa'atin.
Apa' anom amam Saiprusimi maloma anom Sairinimi mafe' Antiok mawalapa basef ifimba ma esis Grik wapani. Amom mawalapa basef bu'wafi ma Dembinai Jisas Krais.
Ea' banagami Dembinaii atom mape maloma amom, isimba atis dei' amam nematawa hiasi sambema nelelemb safi'mai Dembinai.
Ea' esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape Jerusalemi same' basefa isimba ea' sasapa' Barnabas nafe' Antiok.
Anen nafe' nataga nati God nanda' esis bo'wesa waf bu'wafi numafias nandagalamas. Nafela ukup esis amam nematawa hiasi ma sogaila Dembinai banagambel dondol.
Barnabas anen aman bu'unai, Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'inama anen, nagahapifana datimai. Ea' natopalopa esis amam nematawa mini'ap laupi ma sagahapifa Dembinai ea' sawisi mini'ap ananipi.
Ea' Barnabas nafe' Tarsus nolaoma Sol.

Ama natolona, nofa'ana nafi'i Antiok. Ea' amom biam mape anagol afagol si'igili maloma esis Kristen amam nematawa sagape Antioki mawalipa mini'ap laupi amam nematawa ma basef Godi. Ea' esis amam nematawa sagaila Jisasi, anis daias sofalas agol agalemba Kristen dambadamba wambel ambalemba Antiok.
Nogota atamba anom profet magape Jerusalami miliana Antiok.

Anona profeta amom sofalana sa'i Agabus, anen nalutu banagonama Ambal bu'unai Godi ea' nawalapa basefa nemaf lu'wafi nolomogahasafi atiasi fegataga itap walemb anamba hiagoma. Ama a'i owa' main, aman anamba Klodius nataga nape gavman dembinai esis Romi, nogota atamba nolom lu'unai a' nataga si'i fowa' Agabus naga'ias.

Ea' esis amam nematawa sagaila Jisas Kraisi sa'i basef sandame'maefa sogofa' anin moni negafe'ma esis alipisi sahin owan sagape Judai ma sogatopalopas. Esis Kristen atona atin ukup pandanda'ma moni naga'omasi sawalogon saso'as du'wanin hiani nafe'ma maol inimba. Anis otamba hiambai saso'asa hiambai apa' anis otamba kwaia'umba saso'asa kwaia'umba. Hiasi sanda'as na'amba atin.
Esis sanda'as na'amba, sasapa' Barnabasi Sol biam mofa' moni inimba mafe'ma amom agufumi mugumafi esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape Jerusalami.
Nogota atamba dembinai king Herot nahambombaga anis amam nematawa Kristen.
Ea' na'ipa anom soldia ananimi maha Jems, Jon sahomana bainat naga'.
Ea' anen nati esis Juda sa'i aho'ma isimba ea' nanda' kalabusima Pita wapani nogota atamba esis Juda sanda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi saga' bret wafitai owa' togatifia.

Anen nombalo' Pita nanda'ana nanda' kalabus. Ea' nanda'ana nafe'ma soldia misi'ah biahi biah ea' mumafiana. Herot okom mandanda' na'i ota' ma esis Juda sope sea' gwa'aisi lu'wasi saga'i Pasovai ma hi'ilas, dao' a' nola'i Pita nuwisi ando'ma naep amam nematawa hiasi sotolona, a' nohana noga'.
Owa' Pita napani kalabus amom mape mumafiana. Apa' lifilafi esis Kristen sandabeten banagambela God nugumafiana.

Ama wafilu Herot na'i nofa' Pita nefe' kot. Ea' nemaf afamba owa' ata' fetaga ulala, a'i owa' owamb ambamba Pita na'oh la'afena anom soldia biam. Amom mowa' Pita sen biafin. Anom soldia malutu mumafi uta ipat atamba sanda' kalabusa.

Ea' kwafalis atis atef bif owa', ensel Dembinaii nataga naloma nogogala'i nogala' nawis ipat sanda' kalabusa nomon. Ea' ensel napisi lambeh Pitai ninimbalana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel kwafalis.” Ea' sen pele'atana dowaf lagof Pitai nowa na'oh itap.
Ea' ensel na'ipana na'i, “Ina' waho' let nugundisa klos la su bo'wagah ine'igahi.” Ea' Pita nanda'am si'i ensel naga'ipana. Ea' ensel na'ipana wapani na'i, “La saket ine'inai nigi'ma ae' nifi'i.”
Ea' Pita nakwaha ipat sanda' kalabusa nomon nagi'ma ensel a' nafe'. Apa' anen ina nogawa hiahawes isimba ensel nanda'asi na'i endilisi, owa'. Pita na'i owa', si'i na'oh nandondo'ah atin.

Amom biam mafe' makwaha amom plisman malutu magali'i mafe' mikila' anom wapani ea' mafe' mataga uta lu'utai ainambitai. Uta atamba sagafe' tauna. Ea' uta atamba lu'utai tandawisi' dowafa amom biam. Ea' amom makwaha kalabus mawisi ando' a' mafe' ano'w ufia'w. Ea' kwafalis atis ensel a' nandambaho'ma Pita nafe' anagon.

Ea' okom Pitai a' mataga alihim nogawa na'i, “Dei' ae' egawa endilisi. Dembinai nasapa'i ensel ananinai nafi'i natagwahowe ma lagol dembinai king Heroti, ma awami amamba hiami esis Juda ukup papoma sa'i sonda'me ami.”
Anen okom mandanda'ma isimba ea', nafe' ipat Mariai, Jon Mak ma'mana nati esis Kristen sandakolas sape ipat atamba atota sape sandabeten.
Ea' Pita nafe' nalutu naha uta ando', ano'w nemata'w kwanda'mas maoli agili'wa Roda kwafi'i kwa'i kuwisi' uta.
Owa' kwame' malogol Pitai a' kogawana, okom akwa'umi sonaha'w a'owa' ea' ina kwawisi' uta, owa'. Kwasagih kotanima kwafe' nomon kwa'ipas kwa'i, “Pita nani nalutu uta ando'!”
Owa' esis sa'ipa'w sa'i, “Ina' okom maolena a'a!” Owa' ako'w dindinapi'w kwa'ias kwa'i, “Owa'atin. Endilisi atis, anen nalutu ando'.” Ea' esis sa'i, “Anamba ensel ananinai atona.”
Owa' Pita ata' nalutu naha uta atapina. Ea' esis same'ana safe' sawisi' uta satolona, sosafel gogolalasis kwapete'asa anen.

Ea' Pita nanda' lagol atogol na'ipasa sogasopama malogof. Ea' na'ipasa hiahawes isimba Dembinai nofa'ana nakwaha ipat sanda' kalabusa nao'wana nagawisi ando'. Ea' na'i, “Ipa' pi'ipago Jems nolomago sahin owan ama hiahawes isimba.” Ea' nakwaha esis notanima nawisi ando' nafe' anagon.
Ama awin natafi, amom soldia matimana owa', a' mosafel gogolalasom kwapete' nomonas hiahawes sapaomana ea' ma'i, “Pita nafe' ani?”

Ea' Herot wapani nala' nolaoma Pita, apa' owa' owa'atin, ina natolona nofa'anai, owa'. Ea' nandambema nahali' amom soldia nanda' kotimama noham mogaga'. Ea' Herot nakwaha itap lu'upa Judia nafe' niliana napani wambel Sisaria.

Anen okom numbutinama esis amam nematawa sagape walemb lu'walimbi bialemb Tairi Saidon. Ea' anis epes Tairi Saidon sakolata safi'mai anen. Ea' sali' solaoma Blastus, nanda' maola dembinai kingi. Ea' sonandana basef salefa sonda' okom anamba wandafunai nogaga'. Dei' main, epes sagape walemb ambalemba bielimbi sogofa' gwa'aisi ma itap lu'upa kingi.
Ama anef nemaf Herot nandandepafi anen nandausa sosaf dembinai kingi ea' nape natoma sia kingi nanda' basef lu'wafi ma esis.
Ea' esis sematefana sa'i mehip sa'i, “Anamba malogol anona dembinai si'i God. Anen ina malogol anona epeni, owa'atin!”
Ea' Herot ina ata' nasa'ma agol Godi, a' owa'atin. Na'amba dei' atef ensel Dembinaii nahana. Ea' asagof uguf sa'usa'usi sahana sahahape' alop ananinai ea' afuna.
Ea' basef Dembinaii fataga banagef fafe' walemb hielimbi ma epes hiasi sogahapifana.
Barnabas naloma Sol mambifa maol God nagaso'amani hi'alan Jerusalem ea' motanima mafe' Antiok mao'wa Jon Mak nafe' nalomam.

Esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape Antioki anom amam magawalapa basef fasifi Godi mape. Anom profet maloma anom tisa magawalipasa basef Godi isimba sagahapifanai. Agof amamugufi agwafomba. Barnabasi Saimon agol wa'agol Naisa, Lusius, anen wambel Sairininai, maloma Sol, a Manain, anen alipunai Heroti gavman dembinai.
Esis Kristen sololama gwa'aisi sanda' lotuma God atona sape. Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' pendandepa Barnabasi Sola maol inimba ae' efalam andandepam monda'ani.”
Ea' esis sololama gwa'aisi sandabeten, sawamona lagofa amom biam sasapa'am mafe'.
Ambal bu'unai Godi nasapa' amom biam mafe' miliana anambel wambel Selusia. Ea' malota anop sip na'amba Salusia pofa'am mafe' anin ailan Saiprus.
Ea' mataga Salamis, mawis nomon ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai ma'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi, Jon Mak wapani nape nalomam natopalopam.

Amom mafe' mataga walemb ambalemba hielimbi bagape ailan inimba Saiprusi, ea' mafe' mataga wambel Pafos bape bagandi'i. Ea' mati anona aman anen Judainai. Anen nanda' ko'op pagaloma hiahaom mamimami baso'amii. Anen profet nagambaso'ma esis hiasii, agilinama Barjisas.
Anen alipunai ma dembinai gavman agilinama Sergius Paulus. Sergius Paulus anen nomonas fasisi sagapaunai. Anen nofalai Barnabas naloma Sol mafi'i ma anen nogame' basef Godi ma amom.
Owa' aman anamba agol ananigili diga Griki sa'i Elimas, nanda' ko'opi nataloga amom biam Barnabasi Sol. Na'i nupati okom gavman anamba dembinai ma ina atiasi nohapifa basef Godi.
Owa' aman anamba Sol, sogofalana Poli, anen banagami lu'wami Ambal bu'unai Godi magapaunai. Ea' anen naep do' Elimas natotolona na'ipana na'i,

“Ina' awani nogama Satani! Ina' bounai ma waf afamba hiafi fasifi! Waf afamba baso'amifi hiafi awafi asi'ifa ina' endilisi! Ina' nimaguf hiafi dondol nagambemefa basef endilisifi bu'wafi Dembinaii fagataga baso'afi. Dei' maina ina' nandaiwa'ma negakwaha waf awafi ine'ifi?

Ea' dei' ina' neme'. Dei' Dembinai a' nehena lagol ananigili ea' atiasi naep ine'ipi pese'ena. Ea' ina' atiasi niti awin alipini, owa'. Ea' nepe na'amba atin anif nimaguf.” Pol na'ias na'amba ma ea', kwafalis atis anom maefah si'i ilagwi akot tasopama naep Elimasi. Ea' naha ganigani nafe' nolaoma anis epesa sogahapila lagof ananigufi ma sigihimba'mana ufia'w anen.
Ea' gavman anamba dembinai nati hiahawes isimba gogolalasona endilisi ma basef Dembinaii ea' dei' nahapifa Jisas.
Pol naloma amom magalumanai makwaha wambel Pafos ea' sip pofa'am mafe' anambel wambel Perga bagape anep itap lu'upa Pamfilia. Owa' aman anamba Jon nakwaha amom notanima nafe' Jerusalem.

Ea' makwaha wambel ambalemba Perga mafe' mataga anambel wambel Antiok bagape anep itap lu'upa Pisidiai. A'i owa' nemaf afamba sabat esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi amom mafe' mawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai ea' matoma sia.

Ea' anona aman natalifa basefa mu'uli God nagaso' Moses faloma basef amom profet maga'iefi ea' ma main, amom agufumi Judai masapa' basef fafe'ma Pol naloma amom manda' maol atini ma'ias ma'i, “Alipipai, ipa' i'i anif basefa fegewa' banaga ukup esis amam nematawai ma, dao' ipa' awi kiaef.”
Ea' Pol nosafel nasa'ma lagol na'i basef na'i, “Ipa' Israel hipai paloma ipa' anipa epes penda' lotuma Godi, ipa' peme' basef ae'afi.

God dembinai esis Israeli, anen nandandepa esis akusapa ape'isi ma afamba esis sefe' sailas sagapani itap apamba lu'upa Isip ea' anen nanda'as sataga hias a'owa' mini'ap laupi. A'i owa' main, banagami ananimi atom nofa' esis sakwaha itap apamba safi'i.
Ama owa', anamba wafigima fataupigima nofa' nimanimi ma waf asasifi ma afagof agwafomba 40-pelaiguf.
Ma itap lu'upa agilipa Kainan anen nahambombaga misi'ah 7-pelaih amam nematawa hiasi ea' naso'asa itap apamba pafe'ma esis Israel,
ea' sahapila itap apamba sape afagof agwafomba 450-pelaiguf. “Ea' anen nasa'ma amom dembami esis Israeli ea' amom mumafi esis sape sape satagama nemaf aman anamba profet Samuel nagataga.

Nogota atamba esis sawa salef sa'i sofa' anona king dembinai, ea' God naso'asa anona aman Sol, Kis nogamana. Aman anamba nataga mini'ap Benjamini. Ea' anen nape king dembinai ma afagof hiagufi 40-pelaiguf.

“A'i owa' main, God nali'amona king Sol, nanda' Devit nataga nape king asasinai. Anen na'ipasa aman anamba Devit na'i, ‘Devit nogama Jesii, okom ae'ami maimailana a'owa'. Anen atiasi nogaila okom ae'ami atom maga'iasi.’
Ea' God nanda'as na'amba si'i fowa' na'ias na'i nonda'as. Ama wambota Deviti owagama God nosa'ma Jisas, aman anamba nogofa' apa' Israeli.
Fowa' Jisas ata' owa' nifi'ia, nogota atamba aman anamba Jon nawalapa basef na'ipa esis Israel hiasi ma sombema nelelemb sokwaha waf awafi sefe'ma Goda sogofa' baptais.

Ea' felefele'ma Jon na'i nonda' maol ananini hi'igalan, a' na'i, ‘Ipa' ukup papoma ae' pa'imama? Ae' ina aman anamba dembinai ipa' pape pegehafanai, owa'. Ipa' peme'! Aman anamba anaf nigi'ma ae' nogafi'ii, anen bu'unai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina bu'uwai ma egatagwaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'.’

“Ipa' sahin owan, ipa' mini'ap epes pagataga Abrahami, anipa ea' daipa panda' lotuma Godi, peme'. Dei' basef ifimba God nasapa'ef fafi'mai apa' hiapai. Basef ifimba ma anen atiasi nofa'apa mokwaha waf awafi mogotanimai.

Ea' esis sagape Jerusalami saloma amom agufumi asasimi, esis ina sogawa aman anamba nofa'apa mogotanimaii, owa'. Esis ina sogawa andeande' basef ifimba amom profet fowa' maga'iefi, owa'. Anom agufumi matalifif sabat nimaguf hiafi sagapoma noma'wafi. Apa' ina sogawef, owa'. Basef ifimba atif fataga endilisi nemaf afamba esis sanda' kotima Jisas saga'i anen aman aunai ma sahana nogaga'.
Esis ina sati anif basef kofagefa waf awafi ma sohana nogaga', owa'. Ea' sofalai gavman dembinai Pailat ma ni'i aho'ma mohana nogaga' dowaf.

Esis sanda'as hi'alas hiahawes isimba si'i fowa' amom profet ma'i basef manda'ef fagape buk Baibeli maga'ifa anini. Ama main, esis satagwaha anen nisila'i lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea' sawana anota matmat.
Owa' God nasa'mana wapani.
Esis isimba hiasi sakwaha itap apamba lu'wagoma agol Galili ea' salomana sondowasa' Jerusalemi, esis satolona nimaguf hiafi. Dei' epes isimba safe' sawalapa basefa apa' Israela anen.
“Ea' apa' dei' ma'ipipa basef fasifi ipa'. Hiahawes isimba fowa' God na'iasa na'i nogaso'asas akusipa ape'isii,

ea' ma'wis isimba dei' God naso' apa' awasi ananipai ma nasa'ma Jisas nagape namona. Nasa'ma Jisas si'i basef fagape buk Baibel Sam nagafe'ma bifi faga'ias na'amba God na'i, ‘Ina' Nogame ae'inai. Nemaf dei'ifi ae' ataga ahamena ine'iwai.’

Dei' God nasa'mana wapani matmat, ea' anen ina ata' notanima nofe' matmat wapani folo'olana, owa'atin. Ea' na'amba atin si'i God na'ias wapani naga'i, ‘Atiasi ae' etopalopepa ese'epa basef ifimba fasifi ae'afi ipa', fowa' a'if ea' ma a'i iga'ipanaef Deviti, ifimba andeande'ma ipa' pigahapifif.’
“Ea' si'i anif basef fagape buk Sami ma anen wapani faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Ina atiasi ni'i aho'ma aman anamba nonda' maol ine'ini datimai folo'olana, owa'atin.’
“Apa' mogawa Devit nagahapila maol nagaila okom Godii la'afena esis amam nematawa sape sagaloma anini. A'i owa' main, anen naga' nafe' naloma amom bafapana ananimi ea' folo'walana.
Apa' aman anamba God notanima nagafelona wapanii, anen ina folo'walana, owa'atin.
Isimba atis dei' ae' a'i ipa' sahin owan pegawa basef ape'ifi ifimba. Aman anamba nakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi okom maso'anaf.

Mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani inimba ina banagani ma negakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi ma pegape wahifipa andeande', owa'atin. Apa' aman anamba nagakwaha waf hiafi awafi ma ipa' ami pegahapifa anini, ma pegape wahifipa usi'ipa ma naep Godi.
Dei' ipa' pendegawa waf ipe'ifi andeande' be'ef a'a awef? Na'amba hiahaom amamba awami mifi'mai ipa' si'i amom profet fowa' maga'iami ma'i,

‘Ipa' panda' basef findiwaifii, ipa' petologon nomonas solasefe' ea' awepa. Ae' anda' anin maol banagani ma nimaguf ipa' ata' pagapaifi. I'i anin epen niga'ipipa maol inimba ai, ipa' ina atiasi pihapifa inimba, owa'.’”
Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas ma'i muwis mofe' ando', owa' esis amam nematawa sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Nemaf sabat afamba figagi'i apa' ma'i ipa' bipa pitanima pifi'i ea' pi'ipapa basef ifimba wapani.”

Ea' esis sakwaha ipat sandakolasatai sawisi ando' ea' esis Juda hiasi saloma anis epes hiasi daias sagi'mam. Epes isimba daias ina Juda, owa'. Apa' esis asofa' waf esis Juda sanda' lotuwafi ea'. Ea' amom biam maso'asa basef esis hiasi ma sape banages sahapifa God nanda' waf bu'wafi ma apa' dowafi.
Ama a'i owa' main sabat nemaf fagagi'i, amam nematawa sagape wambel ambalembai safi'i sandakolasa sogame' basef Godi. Amam nematawa isimba felefele'ma hi'igalas wambel ambalemba.
Owa' esis Juda sagati amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' sandakolasi, ea' ukup kowalep endilisi a'owa'. Ea' sa'i basef awafi ma Pol sa'i anen nambaso'mas.

Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas ina ombal maham, owa'. Amom ma'ipasef banagambel alihif ma'i, “Endilisi, afa' ata' ondase'epa basef Godi ipa' Juda pindali'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' apewa' alafugaha basef ifimba. Isimba ipa' pa'ias pa'i, ‘Apa' mandaiwa'ma mogofa' ambal namili ma mogape andeande' lifilafi.’ “Ipa' pa'i na'amba dei' ipa' peme'. Afa' dei' a' okwaha ipa' ofe' ugi'ma epes owa Judaisia wi'ipasa basef ifimba.

Dei' main, Dembinai na'ipafa dindinipa anif basef fagail buk Baibeli naga'i na'amba na'i, ‘Ae' anda' ipa' si'i lagala'ma esis anis daias owa' Judaisia. Ama ipa' pegatopalopa esis amam nematawa sagape walemb hiagomai ma itap apa'e. Ama anaf efa'as sotanimai hi'igalas.’”

Ea' esis daias owa' Judaisia same' basef ifimba sandagala a'owa'. Esis sonahasa basef Dembinaii sasa'ma agol ananigili. Ea' amam nematawa isimba God nogosaho'asi ma sogape namis dondol lifilafi, isimba sagahapifa Jisasi.
Ea' basef Dembinai fafe'agon hi'alagon anamba hiagoma.

Owa' esis Juda sasa'mai anowa nematawa agufuwai wanda' lotuma Godi waloma anom agufumi magape taun inimba lu'wagomai ea' sahambombaga Poli Barnabas sanda'am kwapete'am. Ea' sagalo'mam wambel asasimbili.
Ea' amom mandila'ma sopof fagail bo'wagah amamugahi ma mondola'waifa waf awafi fegapoma esis. Ea' mosafel mafe' Aikoniam.
Esis alipisi sagaila Jisasi asonahas endilisi ea' banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi mape si'ima esis.

Ea' Poli Barnabas mafe' mataga Aikoniam mafe' mawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai mawalapa basef si'i mali' manda'as. Amom mawalapa basef fasifi ea' esis Judai hiasi saloma anis daias owa' Judaia sahapifa God.
Apa' anis Juda ina sahapifa God, owa'. Esis sasa'ma nomonasa anis amam nematawa daias owa' Judaisia ea' sanda' epes isimba nelelemb awalemba esis Kristen.

Amom biam mapani nogota lautai Aikoniam ea' mawalapa basef Dembinaii banagambel alihif. Amom ina ombal maham, owa'. Ma'ipasa basefa Dembinai natopalopa esis dowaf nogowa' banagas.
