Ea' Dembinai nowa' banaga amom biam, manda' maol banagani naninani si'i God nanda'ani. Ea' dei' esis sogawa basef ifimba endilisifi atif.
Apa' esis amam nematawa taun inimba sandatopa' mini'ap biafip. Esis nelelemb atifilimb saloma esis Juda, apa' anis saloma amom aposel biam nembel atembel.
Ama main, esis epes owa' Judaisia saloma esis sanda'ipama sa'i basef sandame'maef saloma amom agufumi asasimi ea' sa'i sonda' Poli Barnabas aom. Sa'i sokwaha otamba soham afum.
Ea' amom mogawa isimba mafa' mafe' itap lu'upa Likonia ma walemb bialemb Listrai Derbe ea' analemb walemb felefele'ma anamba.
Amom manda' maol mawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma esis sagape walemb ambalembai.

Anona aman nagape wambel ambalemba Listrai, bo'wagah ananigahi owa' banagogaha. Fowa' anen ata' nagape nembel ma'manai bo'wagah aogah atapigah hapaona ea' aogah hi'alagah. Aman anamba ina nalutu nafe' kwasakwasala, owa'atin.
Ea' anen name' Pol na'i basef ea' Pol natolona banagambel nogawana na'i aman anamba nahapifa Goda nogataga bo'ona wapani.
Ea' natolona dindinip na'i basef banagambel na'amba na'i, “Ina' safel nilutu.” Ea' nosafel nandasa'ma kwafalis nalutu ea' nafe'.
Amam nematawa hiasi sati hiahawes isimba Pol nanda'asi ea' soga sa'i diga Likoniai na'amba sa'i, “Amom god dembami ape'imi biam mataga si'i epes misila'mai apa'!”
Barnabas sofalana sa'i anona dembinai Sus. Ea' Pol anen aman nanda' basef atumi. Ea' sofalana sa'i anona dembinai Hermes.

Ipat esis sanda' lotuma Susi totawa ando' taun inimba. Ea' pris nondolalima Susi nofa' anom bulmakau suwafumi maloma anis afis sogowalo'asi ea' nafi'i uta atamba tauni. Anen nalumai esis amam nematawa sa'i sondolali sonda' ofa ma amom biam.
Owa' aposel Barnabasi Pol mame' esis sa'i basef na'amba, amom mahape' klos maim amom magalami. Ea' masagih mafe' mawala esis amam nematawa la'afisa ma'ipas mehip ma'i,

“Ipa' epes, dei' maina panda'am na'amba? Afa' wandaiwa'. Afa' biafa ina God dembifai, owa'atin. Afa' epes atofa dowaf si'i ipa' wawalipipa basef bu'wafi. Ama ipa' pegakwaha god amamba falafumi baso'ami ma pefe' pigaila God nagape namona atapinai. Anen nanda' otaga ilif naloma itapi epes hiasi saloma naoh embel lu'wami maloma hiahaom hiami magapaumi.
Endilisi fowa' nimaguf hiafi nape natiti esis amam nematawa misi'ah hiasi safe'ma waf asasifi.

Apa' anen ina nape nandambahi'i, owa'atin. Anen nihimba'mapa waf ananifi ma nanda' waf bu'wafi ma apa'. Anen napani heven nanda' asaf falai ma ipa' ea' nanda' hiahaom gwa'aimi bu'wami mataga dondo' nogota amamutai. Ea' nowapanimipa gwa'aisi ipa', nanda' opalef ipe'ilifi sowenahalef.”
Amom ma'ipasa basef ifimba, manda' maol lu'wani a'owa' magatalagas ina sondolalim sonda' ofamam, owa'.
Anom Juda magape Antioki Aikoniam mafi'i Listra masa'ma ukup asasipi. Ea' dei' esis sakwaha otamba saha Pol sa'i owa' afuna ea' sahondo'ana nawisi na'oh ando' taun inimba.
Owa' esis sagahapifa Godi safi'i salutu salipana, a' nosafel wapani ea' nafe' nawis taun. Ama wafilu nafe' naloma Barnabas mafe' Derbe.
Poli Barnabas mawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi taun inimba ea' masa'ma ukup esis amam nematawa hiasii sataga Kristen, alipisi Jisasi. Ama main, a' motanima mafe' walemb ambalemba Listrai Aikoniam Antiok

ea' mowa' banaga esis Kristen. Amom ma'ipas dindinip na'amba ma'i, “Ipa' pendape banagepa pindahapifa Dembinai God. Apa' mondame' nimanimi akafimi mamimami ma mugawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiapa.”
Ea' mandandepa agufumi mugumafi esis Kristeni mandanda' sios isimba hiasi. Amom mololama gwa'asi mandabetena manda' esis sogape banagesa lagol Dembinaii anamba ea' sagahapifanai.
Ama main, amom mafe' la'afena anip itap lu'upa Pisidia, mafe' mataga anep itap wa'ol Pamfilia.
Amom mawalapa basefa esis epes sagape Pergai, ama main, miliana Atalia.

Anamba Atalia malota sip ea' pofa'am mafe' Antiok. Wambel ambalemba fowa' esis Kristen sandandepam magapoma lagol Godi ma nagatopalopam dowafa monda' maol inimba dei' manda'ani hi'agalani. Ea' dei' motanima mafi'i wambel ambale'e.

Amom mataga Antiok mofala esis muwa'anias sanda' kolasi ea' ma'ipasa basefa maol Dembinai nape nalomam natopalopam manda'ani. Ea' ma'i, “God nanda' ufia'w kwagala esis amam nematawa hiasi anis daias owa' Judaisia ma sogahapifa Krais.”
Ea' mapani anif nimaguf hiafi maloma esis sagahapifa Kraisi.

Anom amam magape Judiai miliana mataga Antiok ma'ipasa basef esis Kristen sagape wambota atota Godi. Masefela basef ma'ipas ma'i, “I'i ipa' pindaiwa'ma pigaila waf God naga'ipa Mosesafi ma owa' petopa' alop ipe'ipia, atiasi God ina nuwambilaipa pitanimai, owa'atin.”

Amom ma'ias na'amba, manda' ukup Poli Barnabasi numbutip a'owa' ea' ma'i basef banagafi mandahihianama maloma amom Judaimi. Ea' esis Kristen sandandepa Poli Barnabas maloma anom amam magahapifa Kraisi wapani mondowasa' Jerusalem ma'i basef ifimba monandonaef maloma amom aposel maloma agufumi siosi.

Esis Kristen sasapa'am mafe' ea' mafe' la'afena itap lu'upa Fonisiai Samaria. Ma'ipasa basef esis Kristen sagape itap apamba biafipi ma sogogawa God ea' nambema ukupa anis epes daias owa' Judaisia. Esis Kristen same' basef ifimba fanda' esis sandagala a'owa'.

Amom mafe' mataga Jerusalem, amom aposel maloma esis amam nematawa Kristen saloma agufumi asasimi sosafel sandalalamam sanda'mam gude amom. Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas mosafel ma'ipas basefa maol hiani God natopalopama manda'ani.
Owa' anom Kristen Farisi mosafel ma'ipa esis ma'i, “Ipa' pendatopa'masa alop asasipi, pi'ipasa sogaila wafa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani.”
Ea' amom aposel maloma agufumi mugumafi maol Godi mandakolas mape ea' monandona basef ifimba.

Amom ma'i basef hiafi ma ea', Pita nosafel nalutu na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' sahin owan, ipa' pegawa, fowa' God nawaloga maola afa', ea' Anen nosaho' ae' ea' ma egawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi ma epes daias owa' Judaisia seme'efa sogahapifa God.
God nogawa nelelemb esis amam nematawa hiasi ea', nihimba'mafa nembel ananimbili ila ma esis. Anen nihimba'mapa na'amba ea' naso'asa Ambal bu'unai Ananinai esis si'i nagaso'apana apa'.
Anen ina nanda' anef wafa apa' a anef waf daiaf esis, owa'atin. Esis sahapifa God isimba atis opalef asasilifi fataga bo'walef.

Dei' maina ipa' pa'i ata' pegagwamba God? Ipa' ina pegwambasa hiahaom nimanimi esis Kristen sofa'am, owa'i. Fowa' esis bafasapa ea' apa' wapani, ina la'ifipama mogofa' nimanimi ma mogatopa' alop ape'ipi, owa'atin.
Apa' mogawa ufia'w akwamba Dembinai Jisas nagatopalopapa dowaf, dei' God nofa'apa mutanimai ea' ananipai, apa' maloma esis wapani.”

Pita na'ias na'amba owa', esis sandakolas atogini ina ata' sa'i anif basef, a' owa'atin. Ea' sambe' aligaha Barnabasi Pol. Amom biam mawalapa basef hiafi ma God nowa' banagam manda' hiahaom banagami si'i anen nanda'ami ma nogohnaep esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia.
Amom ma'ipasa ea', Jems na'ias na'i, “Ipa' sahin owan, ipa' peme' basef ae'afi.
Simeon na'ipapa ea' ma dambadamba God nihimba'mapa nali' nagati esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia uwahipis nowambilai anis sogape ananisi.
Ea' basef fowa' God naga'ipa amom profet fagail buk Baibeli ea' na'amba atin si'i ifimba. Basef ifimba faga'ias fa'i,
“Anafa ae' itanima igafi'i, ipat atamba Deviti ea' tagatuwi, atamba atiasi esa'mata totawa wapani. Hiahaom ipat atambai ea' awasim, amamba atiasi enda'am motaga dambaim wapani, ea' esa'mata totawa.
Ma atiasi esis soloma anis daias sogololama Godi wapani la' lawa sogolaoma Dembinai, isimba hiasi efalasi ea' ae'asi.
Fowa' gani endilisi Dembinai nawalapa basef ifimba ea' dei' wapani na'if na'amba atin.”
Dei' nomonas ae'asi sandanda' na'amba. Epes anep mini'ap asagambema nelelemb sagafe'ma God ea'i, apa' ina moso'asa nimanimi esis, owa'.

Apa' monda' anif basef fefe'ma esis mi'ipas mi'i ina sea' gwa'aisi mais sondolalimasa god baso'amunaii, owa'i. Isimba alogw awagwi gwagailasi. Esis sindihi'amago waf afamba so'a waulafi ea' ina sea' mafis saham sogowa' bamafugahama afumi, owa'i. Ea' owa'i sea' esimbela anis mafis amambai beloma anis daias wapani, owa'i. Ae' a'i apa' monda'masa basef ifimba atif fefe'ma esis.

Dei' main, apa' mogawa fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' ma amom magawalapa basef God nagaso' Mosesafi kofagefa ea' ifimba atif magawalipasefa taun inimba hiani. Matalifamasef ifagw hiagwi apa' Juda mandakolasugwi nimaguf hiafi sagapoma noma'wafi.”

Ea' amom aposel maloma agufumi mugumafi maol Godi maloma esis Kristen hiasi sa'i basef atifif sandandepa anom amam biam asasimi agufumi Judas agol wa'agol Barsabas naloma Sailas. Amom biam amagah lu'ugahimi la'afena esis Kristeni. Ea' sa'i sosapa'am mefe' Antiok moloma Poli Barnabas.

Esis saso'ama anif basef fagail pipai ma lagof amom biami Judasi Sailas faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Afa' aposel afa' agufufai sahopepa ipe'ifai, ea' afa' dei' wanda'ago basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' sahin owan owa' Judaipaia. Ipa' pagape wambel Antioki ma itap lu'upa Siriai Silisia, afa' wa'i nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa' sahin owan.

Afa' wame'as ea' anis epes afa'isi safo'o sanda'epa pesafel gogolalasipa kwapete' ma basef asasifi, sanda'epa ombal mahepa ukup pandopelaepa. Esis sanda'am na'amba sa'i sogahondo' ukup ipe'ipi. Apa' afa' ina' wa'ipas safo'o sonda'epa na'amba, owa'.
Afa' wame' basef ifimba ea' wa'ipasa ukup pape atogon wa'i basef wandame'maef. Ea' wandandepa amam amamba biama osapa'am mofe'mago ipa' molomago biam apa' ukup pagailam a'owa'i, Barnabasi Pol.
Amom biam ina ombal mahama mogololama ambagof amamugufi ma mogasa'ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi monda' maol ananini, owa'.
Afa' dei' wasapa'ago Judas naloma Sailas ama atiasi mi'ipipa basef ifimba atif afa' wa'if wanda'ef fagafe'mago ipe'i malogof amamugufi.
Holi Spirit Ambal Godi nape nalomafa wa'i basef wandame'maef na'amba. Afa' ina ose'epa anom nimanimi pefa'am, owa'. Waf afambai atef ipa' pendanda'af.

Ipa' ina pea' mafis saham sondolali ma god baso'amunaii, owa'i. Ipa' ina pea' esimbela anis mafis, owa'i. Ipa' ina pea' mafis sogowa' bamafugahami ma afumi, owa'i. Ea' pindihi'ama waf afamba so'a waulafi awafi. I'i ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma pindihi'ama waf afambai, andeande' ipa' a' penda' waf bu'wafi.”
Ea' esis sios sasapa'am mafi'i Antiok, makolasai esis Kristen atogon maso'asa pas isimba.
Ea' esis satilis sonahasa basef ifimba bu'wafi fegewa' banaga esisi.
Judas naloma Sailas amom profet. Dei' ma'ipasa basef hiafi bu'wafi esis Kristen, mowa' banagas mafela ukup asasipi.
Amom ata' mapani nogota laota kwasakwasala Antiok, esis Kristen sanda'mam nemaf bu'wafi ma amom mogape ukup awanep. Ea' sasapa'am mutanima mafe' ma esis sasapa'am magafi'ii.
[Apa' Sailas na'i ata' nupani Antiok.]
Owa' owa'atin. Barnabas naloma Pol atom ata' mapani Antiok, manda' maol maloma anom amam hiami wapani mawalapa basef bu'wafi Dembinaii mawalipasef.

Ama main anif nimaguf fafe' ma hi'alef owa', Pol na'ipa Barnabas na'i, “Afa' biafa ata' otanima ofe' uti esis Kristen sahin owan taun hiagoma fowa' wafe' wagawalapa basef Dembinaima. Ama ogogawa esis, sape andeande' a'a owa.”

Ea' Barnabas na'i no'wa Jon Mak nefe' nolomam. Apa' Pol nandaiwa'ma anen nefe' nogalomam. Dei' main, aman anamba fowa' nakwaha amom gani Pamfilia notanima nafe'. Ina nalomam atin mafe' manda' maol hi'alan, owa'.
Amom biam manda' migimigaha isimba ea' dei' ina ata' manda' maol atogon, a'owa'. Ea' Barnabas nao'wa Jon Mak nafe' nalomana malota anop sip mafe' anin ailan agol Saiprus.
Apa' Pol nao'wa Sailas nalomana mafe'. Ea' esis Kristen hiasi sasapa'am sa'i, “Okom lu'unai Dembinai nope nolomepa notopalopepa dowaf numafipa.”
Ea' nafe' la'afena itap apamba biafip lu'upa Siriai Silisia naloma Sailas mafe' mowa' banaga esis Kristen.

Pol nafe' nataga Derbai Listra wapani wambel ambalemba anona aman alipunai nagahapifa Jisasi nape, agilinama Timoti. Anen nogama ano'w nemata'w Judai'wi, ako'w wapani Kristen. Apa' ahamana esis Griki.
Esis Kristen Listrai Aikoniami sa'i waf Timotii bu'wafi.

Pol okom ma'i Timoti nefe' nolomana. Ea' isimba atis dei' nao'wana natopa'mana alop. Pol okokoma esis Juda sagape na'ambai na'i, I'i Timoti owa' notopa' alopa, esis ina atiasi some' basef ananifi, owa'. Na'amba dei' naila waf esis Judai natopa'mana alop. Dei' main, esis hiasi sogawa Timoti ahamana anen Grikinai.

Nimaguf hiafi amom malutu mafe' walemb ambalemba hielimbi ma'ipasa basef esis. Basef ifimba fowa' amom aposel maloma agufumi ma'if mandame'maef Jerusalami, ifimba dei' maso'asef esis Kristen ea' ma'ipas ma'i, “Ipa' pindaila basef ifimba.”
Ea' dei' esis Kristen sahapifa Jisas banages a'owa' ea' wambota esis Kristeni sataga sandanda nimaguf hiafi ahias a'owa'.
Ambal bu'unai Godi nasopama amom mogawalapa basefa esis Asia. Ea' mafe' la'afena itap apamba lu'upa biafip Frigiai Galesia.
Ea' mape anep itap lu'upa Misia, mafe' mataga felefele' ma anep itap lu'upa Bitinia ma'i muwis itap apamba. Owa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nili'amama mogafe' anamba.
Ea' amom mindihi'ama Misia miliana mafe' Troas.
A'i owa' owamb ambamba, Pol nati anom hiahaom si'i koh dondo'ah, nati anona aman Masedoniainai nalutu nofalai Pol na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Ina' newala nimbuwi naoh a' nifi'i Masedonia netopalopapa.”
Ea' Pol nati amamba, afa' kwafalis atis olaoma ufia'wa ogafe' itap lu'upa Masedonia. Afa' ogawa God nofalafa ma ogawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi ma esis.
Ea' walota sip wambel ambalemba Troas ea' wafe', wafe' usi'ifa Samotres. Ama a'i anef nemaf owa' a' wafe' Neapolis.
Ea' wakwaha wambel ambalemba a' wafe' Filipai, anamba fowa' esis Rom safi'i sagapoma. Wambel ambalemba lu'wambilima itap apamba Masedonia. Ea' wape anamba anif nimaguf.

Ama a'i owa' sabat, a' wafe' wawis indalelemb uta ando' ma wambel ambalemba, wafe' anemb walemb. Afa' wa'i felefele'ma walemb ambamba anagon esis Juda sandabetenagoma. Wape anamba owa', wati anowa nematawa ondowa'anima wape ea' afa' wape walomawa wa'i.

Ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Lidia kwanda' lotuma Godi kwame' basef ifimba. Ako'w Taiatairai'wi, kwanda' maol kwanda' bisnisa luwaguf akwahifi. Dembinai napati okom akwa'umi ea' kwagahembe'ma basef ifimba Pol naga'iefi.

Ea' kofa' baptais kwaloma esis sagape ipat atotai wapani. Ako'w kofa' baptaisa ea', kwa'ipafa kwa'i, “I'i ipa' ukup pandanda' pa'i ae' ahapifa Dembinai endilisi, ipa' fi'i pepe peloma ae' ipat ae'atai.” Ea' ako'w dindinapi'wa afa' wafe' waila basef akwa'ufi.

Anef nemaf afa' wafe' anagon esis sape sandabetenagoma, wati ano'w nemata'w kwafi'i kwatolofa ufia'w. Ako'w agol aka'w kwape lafela anom amam kwanda' maolam. Nemata'w akwamba anona ambal aunai napao'w ea' ambal anamba nagawalapa basefa hiahawes atiasi sogatagai. Ako'w kwahali' ambal anamba ma basef mamimami ea' nagwama'wef. Ea' dei' amam amamba dembami akwa'umi mofa' otamba hiambai ma ako'w kwanda'am na'amba.

Nemata'w akwamba kwagi'ma Pol kwaloma afa', ea' kwanda'am falafala atapi'w kwail kwa'i, “Amom manda' maola God nagape ilif endilisii, ma'ipapa basefa ufia'w God nowambelapa mutanima mufi'i mogape andeande'akwi.”

Dondol nemata'w akwamba kwanda'as na'amba atin nimaguf hiafi. Ea' Pol okom iwanima ako'w a'owa', nandambema na'ipa ambal anamba nagapau'wi na'i, “Ae' a'ipina agol Jisas Kraisi, kwaho'w nemata'w akwamba a' nefe'!” Ea' ambal anamba nakwaha ako'w kwafalis a' nafe'.
Ea' amom dembami mugumafia'wi mogawa kofagema ma ufia'w akwamba mogofa' otamba'wi a' owa'atin. Ea' dei' mombalo' Poli Sailas mahondo'am mafe'ma agufumi mugumafi koti mandatama magapoma.
Ea' ma'ipam ma'i, “Amam amamba biam Judaimi. Amom manda' maol mafela ukup awapi esis amam nematawai ma wambel ape'ima.
Ea' mawalapa basefa anef waf apa' epes Romipai mandaiwa'mafi. Mu'uli ape'ini nandaiwa'ma apa' mugaila waf afamba amamifi, owa'atin.”
Ea' esis amam nematawa wapani sasapaga amom biam. Ea' amom dembami mugumafi koti mowando' siaogw amamugwi ma mogopagaha alop amamipi.
Ea' mopagahom hiafi timbi tambel manda'am manda' kalabus. Ma'ipa aman nalutu nugumafi utai dindinipa nulutu nugumafiam andeande'.
Ea' anen name' basef banagafi na'amba, nanda'am mapani rum amamba magape la'afen howa'e ipat atamba sanda' kalabusa. Ea' nowa' bo'wagah amamugahi sen, hail anop indap lu'wapi.
Ama a'i owa' owamb la'afimba amanota Poli Sailas mandabeten manda' awalef masa'ma agol Godi ea' anis daias sanda' kalabusi same' manda'am.
Ea' kwafalis atis imauna lu'unai nataga naola olalef mogombalo' ipat kalabusi. Ea' utagw mandawisi', sen negewa' esis sanda' kalabusi a' nandatagwah.
Ea' anen nugumafi esis kalabusi nosafel nati utagw ipat gwandawisi', na'i owa' kalabus sawisi safa' sagafe'ma. Ea' nagiai bainat ananinai na'i a' nondaha alop ananipi noga'.
Owa' Pol noga na'i mehip na'i, “Hai, ina' owa'i nehambombaga ine'a! Apa' hiapai mape!”
Ea' anen galala nofalasa lam sofa'am safi'i ea' nasagih nafi'i nawisi nomon. Anen ombal mahana endilisi bombobombol nape nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma Poli Sailas.
Nofa' amom biam mawis ando' nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' dembipai, ae' enda' maina atiasi God nofa'e embema nembel itanimai igahapifana?”
Amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' nihapifa Dembinai Jisas, ama atiasi God nofa'ena nitanimai nogakwaha waf awafi ine'ifi. Ea' neloma wambota ine'isi wapani na'amba atin.”
Amom ma'ipana basef Godi naloma epes isimba ananisi sagape ipat ananitaii.
Ea' dei' atef anen nofa' amom nasa'opamam esimbela melegw amamugwi sagahama, owamb ambamba atomb. Ea' kwafalis anen naloma wambota awasi waulu'mana ananisi sofa' baptais.
Ea' nofa'am mafe' ipat ananitai naso'ama gwa'aisi. Ea' anen naloma esis sagape ipat ananitai sandagala endilisi a'owa' ma sagahapifa God.
Ama lala owa', amom jas manda'mas basefi masapa' anom plisman mafi'i ma'i, “Ipa' kwaha amam amamba biam a' mofo'o.”

Ea' anen nugumafi kalabusi nofa' basef ifimba nafe'ma Pol na'ipana na'i, “Amam dembami manda'mas koti masapa' basef fafi'mai ipa' ma ea' pegafe'. Na'amba dei' ipa' pekwaha kalabus afo'o ea' opalef ipe'ilifi fendape sa'ombel.”

Owa' Pol na'ipa amom plisman na'i, “Afa' biafa Romufai, amom ina manda' kotimafa andeande'ma mogati anef waf awafi ma afa' biafa, owa'atin. Amom mahafa dowadowafa naep esis amam nematawai. Ea' manda'afa wanda' kalabus. Owa' dei' ma'i mondambaho' a' mili'amona afa' ofe'? Owa'atin endilisi! Amom ata' mifi'i dao', mo'wafa uwis ando'.”
Ea' amom plisman mofa' basef ifimba mafe'ma amam amamba manda' kotimasi, mame' basef fa'i amom biam Romumi ea' ombal baham.
Ea' mafe'ma amom biam maola'i amom biam mawisi ando' ma'i diga uwahipigai malomam. Ea' ma'ipama mogakwaha wambel ambalemba mogafe' anagon daiagon.
Ea' makwaha ipat kalabusi mawisi a' mafe' ipat Lidiai mati esis Kristen ma'ipasa anif basefa mogowa' banaga nelelemb asasilimbi. Ama main a' mafe'.

Amom biam mafe' mataga anambel wambel Amfipolis ea' makwaha wambel ambalemba mafe' mataga Apolonia. Ea' makwaha wambel ambalemba wapani a' mafe' mataga Tesalonaika. Anota ipat lu'utai esis Juda sandakolasatai wambel ambalemba.

Ea' Pol nanda'as na'amba atin si'i nanda'as dondol, ea' nafe' nawis ipat atamba nalomas. Amom mape wikifah wanogah ama nimaguf ifimba wanif sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, Pol na'i nalomasa basef Godi fagail buk Baibeli.

Anen nawalapa basef kofagefa Godi na'ipasef, na'i, “Krais God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii anen nofa' akafimi ma naga' notanima nogosafel wapani.” Ea' anen na'i, “Ina' ano'w ufia'w daia'wa God nogatopalopapa, owa'atin. Jisas anamba ae' agawalapa basefanai, anen Krais.”

Ea' anis amam nematawa Judaisi sahapifa Krais ea' saila Poli Sailas sataga wambota atotota Godi. Anis Grik sanda' lotuma Godi hiasi saloma anowa nematawa dembiwai hiawai, esis wapani sataga wambota Godi saila amom biam.

Owa' esis Juda akowalas nelelemb awalemba esis hiasi sagahapila basef Poli Sailas maga'ipasafi. Na'amba esis sofa' anom amam awami manda' waf awafii. Dondol amom magape anamba esis sandatama sagapomai. Ea' sakolasa amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' ukup pehafela sa'i sogapa'. Ea' gigal sa'oh safitap a'owa'. Ea' safe' sambiasa uta ipat Jesoni ma suwis sogolaoma Poli Sailas. Sa'i sofa'am muwisi ando'ma sogaso'asam amam nematawa hiasi.

Apa' owa', esis ina sati amom biam, owa'atin. Ea' sahokolai Jeson gagatoma ipat atambai naloma anis Kristen safe'ma amom agufumi wambel ambalembaimi. Esis sanda' ukup asasipi pandanda' sa'i, “Amam amamba biam manda' waf awafi fataga itap hiagoma ea' dei' mafi'i mape na'a.
Jeson nao'wam mape ipat ananitai. Amom mogosambala lo dembinai gavman Romunai, maga'i anona king dembinai daiana nape agol ananigili Jisas.”
Esis amam nematawa hiasi saloma agufumi wambelimi same' basef ifimba, asosafel gogolalasis kwapete' sa'i mehip.
Ea' dei' agufumi manda' Jeson naloma esis Kristen isimba sali' satala kot, sotagwaha amom mogafe' wahifim.
Ama owamb atomb ambamba esis Kristen sasapa' Poli Sailas a' mafe' anambel wambel Beria. Amom mafe' mataga Beria, mafe' mawis ipat lu'utai esis Juda sandakolasatai.

Epes sagape Beriai opalef fafe' endilisi same' basef sanda' waf bu'wafi sikila' esis sagape Tesalonaikai. Apa' esis Beria dao' sofa' basef sandagalamef a'owa'. Ea' dondol satalifa basef fagail buk Baibeli, ma sogogawa basef Pol naga'ipasafi endilisifi a'a owa'.
Ea' dei' amam nematawa Juda hiasi sahapifa Krais. Ea' anowa nematawa hiawai agof lu'wagufuwai waloma anom Grik hiami wapani sahapifana.
A'i owa' main, esis Juda sagape Tesalonaikai same' basef fa'i, Pol nawalapa basef Godi Beria. Ea' safe' salalamona nomonas esis amam nematawa sagape Beriai awes.
Na'amba dei' atef amom Kristen masapa' Pol a' niliana nafe' naoh akata. Apa' Sailasi Timoti atom mape Beria.
Ea' amom mofa' Pol magafe' ufia'wi malutumana mafe' mahaponana Atens. Ama motanima mafe' owa', Pol nasapa' basef fafe'ma Sailasi Timoti na'i, “Ipa' bipa pifi'mai ae' kwafalis.”
Pol nape nasasa amom biam Atens ea' nati wambel ambalemba nati god baso'amunai hiana a' owa'. Ea' okom mandaiwa' endilisi ma esis sanda' lotuma amamba.

Ea' nimaguf hiafi anen nafe' ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai na'i basef hiafi naloma esis Juda saloma anis isimba sonda' lotuma Godi. Nalomas sa'i basef sandahihianamaef nahagofa ukup asasipi. Ea' nimaguf hiafi nafe' anamba esis sandatama sagapoma, na'i basef hiafi nalomas sa'i sandahihianamaef saloma anis safi'i sagapani.

Anom amam tisa gawaimi anom Epikurian maloma anom Stoik ma'i basef mandahihianama maloma Pol ma'i, “Aman anamba okom magahanai, naga'i basef mamimamii, anen na'i ni'i main?” Pol nawalapa basef bu'wafi Jisasi na'ipasa Jisas nogosafel matmat. Ea' anom ma'i, “Anen na'i nowalapa basefa anom god dembami anambel wambili a'a?”
Ea' mofa' Pol mafe' maloma anom gawaimi mandakolas anota domota agol Areopagus. Amom ma'i, “Afa' wa'i ogawa basef ifimba dambaifi ina' nagaso'asef esis amam nematawai.
Afa' wagahembe'ma basef ine'ifi ma ogogawef. Owa' owa'atin, anif daif. Ea' dei' afa' wa'i ata' ogawa basef ifimba kofagefa.”
Esis Atens hiasi saloma epes analemb walembi safi'i sagape Atensi, ina safi'i sanda' anin mae, owa'atin. Esis saha nimaguf hiafi sambanef sapoma sanda' basef atom dambaimi ma sagame' basef dambaifi.
Pol nalutu la'afena amom gawaimi mandakolas halafuta Areopagusi na'ipasef na'i, “Ipa' epes Atensipai, ae' ati ipa' banagepa a'owa' ma hiahaom hiami panda' lotumami.

Doko' ae' afo'o owa' ati hiahaom amamba ipa' panda' lotumami ea' ati anom otam ipa' panda' ofa panda' lotumami wapani, esis sanda' anif basef fail otam amamba faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘God anamba apa' owa' mogogawa agilinamaia.’ Apa' owa' owa'atin, ipa' pandanda' lotumana falafuna, dei' awalapa basef alihif a'ipipana.
“God nanda' itap paloma apa' epes maloma hiahaom magape itap apa'e, anen Dembinai ma otagai itapi. Anen ina nagape nomona ifagw lotugwi epes sagala'agw lagufi, owa'atin.
Anen atona naso'ama ambal namili laloma ambip saloma hiahaom hiamuma epes hiasi. Ea' anen ina anin mae akana ma epes sotopalopana sogaso'ana anis maefah, owa'atin.

Bafamapa atona anen God nanda' misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi sataga hi'alas. Ea' nanda'as sape itap hiagoma. Anen atona nanda' nohotagw nimaguf ma'uma'uf fandahama esis sagape mamahogomai. Ea' nosaho' itap pafe' pegetambela paloma walemb asasilimbi.
God nanda'am na'amba ma esis sola' sogolaoma anona sogahapifana. I'i esis la' wando' sowando'mana sefe' sotolona a'a owa'. Apa' anen ina nape laogona apa' hiapai atona atin, owa'atin.
Si'i anona aman ipe'inai na'i basef naga'i, ‘Apa' mofa' ambal namili ma anen ea' naso'apa pepel, dei' malutu mafe'.’ Si'i anom amam gawaimi maga'i na'amba ma'i, ‘Apa' wapani awasi ananipai.’

“Ea' Pol na'i wapani na'i, “Apa' mape awasi Godi. Ea' apa' ina ukup pendanda' pi'i anen si'i ambal dowaf epes sanda' otambai gol silva sanda'ami, owa'. Amamba ina a' ukup epesi atip pandanda'mam sanda'am gawa asasini, owa'atin.

Fowa' epes owa' ata' sogawanaia, God ina na'i basef hiahaofa hiahaom hiami esis sanda'am nogota atambai, owa'. Apa' dei' anen ea' na'i dindinipa epes hiasi ma walemb hiagoma na'i, ‘Ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf awafi pembema nelelemb peso' ae'.’

“Anen a' nandandepa anef nemaf ea' ma nonda' kot. Nemaf afamba anen nowaloga waf amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas. Basefa kot ananitai anaf fefe' usi'if hilili' hi'ilif. Anen nandandepa anona aman ea' ma nogahapila kot atamba. Aman anamba naga' ea' ma God nagasa'mana wapani matmati. Isimba atis apa' mogawa basef ifimba endilisifi atifa anen nonda'mas kot.”
Esis same' basef ifimba ma epes sogosafel wapani matmat ea' anis sa'i basef sanda' findiwaef. Apa' anis sa'i, “Dao', apa' ma'i atiasi meme' basef ine'ifi wapani ma hiahawes isimba.”
Ea' Pol nakwaha amom gawaimi mandakolas magapani a' nafe'.
Ea' anis epes sahapifa Jisas saila Pol safe'. Epes isimba Dionisius, anen anona gawainai ma amom mandakolas Areopagusi naloma ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Damaris saloma anis daias wapani.
A'i owa' main, Pol nakwaha Atens nafe' anambel wambel Korin.

Ea' nati anona aman Judainai agilinama Akila. Mamasana solana nataga Pontus. Nimbewa' nakwaha itap lu'upa Itali nafi'i naloma waulu'mana Prisila. Dei' main, Klodius nape nagali'i gavman Romunai na'ipa esis Juda dindinipa sogakwaha Roma sotanima sogafe'. Ea' Pol nafe'ma na'i nogati esis bias.
Ea' nape nanda' maol naloma esis. Dei' main, anen nanda' maol inimba atin naloma esis, sogofa' otamba maina sosambala sel sanda'am sagala' ifagwami.
Nimaguf hiafi esis sagapoma noma'wafi, Pol nafe' ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai ea' na'i nalomasa nogafela ukup asasipi sogahapifa Jisas, Juda saloma esis Grik wapani.

Sailasi Timoti makwaha itap lu'upa Masedonia mafi'i Pol nagapoma, nogota atamba Pol nakwaha maol inimba nogosambala sel ea' nanda' maol atapina nawalapa basef bu'wafi nimaguf hiafi. Nawalapef banagambela esis Juda na'amba na'i, “Jisas anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.”

Owa' esis sosambala basef ananifi sanda' anen findiwana. Ea' nanda'masa anin ametal nihimba'masa waf awafi asasifi. Nandila'ma sopof usas sagail klos ananisi sa'oma esis, na'ipas banagambel na'i, “I'i ipa' higiligalepama, kofagema ea' ipe'imi atom. Ae' basef akema amamba. Dei' ae' a' efe'ma igawalipa amam nematawa isimba owa' Judaisia sogololama Godi.”

Ea' Pol nakwaha ipat sandakolasatai nawisi ando' nafe' anota ipat togatawa felefele'ma ipat atambai a' nape atapina. Ipat atamba anona amani, agol ananigili Titius Jastus. Aman anamba nogawa God nanda' lotumanai.
Anona aman agilinai nugumafi lotu esis Judai Krispus. Anen naloma esis wambota ananisi sahapifa Dembinai. Ea' esis Korin hiasi same' basef Pol nagawalipasafi sahapifa Jisas sofa' baptais.
Owa' anef nemaf owamb Pol nati anom maefah si'i koh dondo'ah, Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ina ombal mohena nesopama malogol, owa'i. Newalapa basef ni'if.
Dei' main, ae' ape alomena. Amam nematawa hiasi sagape taun wambel ambalembai esis ae'asi. Ea' ina a' anona aman nosafel nohambombagena, owa'.”
Pol nape wambel ambalemba Korin nogota lautai afagol si'igili du'wanigili ea' na'ipasa basef Godi nawalipasef.

Ama main, anona aman agilinama Galio nataga nape gavman dembinai ma itap lu'upa esis Grik sagapoma. Nogota atamba esis Juda sosafel sandame'ma na'amba atin sombalo' Pol sofa'ana safe'ma kot sambaso'mana sa'i,
“Aman anamba nagasa'ma ukup esis amam nematawai ma sogosambala basefa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani ape'ini naloma Romi sanda' lotuma Goda anef waf daiaf.”
Pol na'i nogwa basef, owa' Galio na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “I'i aman anamba nowala lo nonda' anef waf awafi ma pa'i penda'mana basefai, dao' ae' a' eme' basef ipe'ifi.
Apa' owa', ipa' pafi'i pahali'ima enda' kota basef anagof agofa mu'uli ape'ini atin. Ea' hapaimi, ipa' atipa penandonago isimba. Ae' andaiwa'ma egame' kota hiahaom na'ambaimi, owa'.”
Ea' anen nali'amona esis sakwaha kot safe'.
Esis sombalo' Sostenes agilinai nugumafi lotu Judai, sahana felefele'ma anamba esis sanda' kota. Apa' Galio ina okom mandanda'ma hiahawes isimba, owa'. Nape natitilis dowaf.

Pol ata' nape nimaguf hiafi wambel ambalemba Korin naloma esis Kristen. Ama main, nanda'masa nemaf bu'wafi esis nakwahis ea' nandagia sip. Sip pakwaha wambel ambalemba pa'i pefe' itap lu'upa Siria. Akilai Prisila safe' salomana. Afamba Pol owa' ata' nolota sipa, anen natopa' awif balaga wambel ambalemba Senkria. Dei' main, anen na'i basef banagafi naloma Goda na'i nonda' anin mae.

Esis safe' sataga Efesus, Pol nakwaha esis Prisilai Akila wambel ambalemba. Ea' anen atona nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai naloma esis Juda sa'i basef sandahihianamaef ea' nawalipasa basef Godi ma nogasindi'amonas.
Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' ata' nepe nogota laota nelomapa.” Owa' na'i, “Ae' bola dao'.”
Ea' na'i nemaf bu'wafi ma esis na'i, “I'i God ni'i aho'me, anef nemaf itanimai ifi'i itilipa.” Ea' nakwaha Efesus, a' nafe' sip.
Sip pafe' pail Sisaria, Pol nisila' nafe' Jerusalem nanda'mas nemaf bu'wafi naloma esis Kristen hiasi. Ea' niliana Antiok.

Pol napani nogota lautai kwasakwasala Antiok ama main, notanima nafe' wapani analemb walemb hielimbi ganigani ma itap lu'upa Galesiai Frigia fowa' nali' nagafe'ma. Ea' nanda' maol nowa' banaga esis Kristen hi'alas.
Anona Judainai, aman Aleksandriainai nafi'i nape Efesus. Agol ananigili Apolos. Anen naga'i basef bu'wafi atifi, nogogawa buk Baibel a'owa'i.
Fowa' anis sawalipana ma ufia'w Dembinaii ea' dei' banagona a'owa' ma naga'ipas andeande' hiahaom Jisas nanda'ami. Apa' anen nogawa basefa baptais Joni atis.

Ea' nafe' ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi nawalipasa basef. Anen ina ombal mahana ma esis amam nematawa, owa'atin. Prisilai Akila same' anen sao'wana safe' ipat asasitai sihimba'mana anif basef wapani ma ufia'w Godi ma nogogawa basef kofagefa.

A'i owa' main, Apolos na'i nefe' esis Krik sagapoma ea' esis Kristen sagape Efesusi sowa' banaga nomonas ananisi ma nanda'as na'amba. Esis sanda' anif basef fafe'ma esis Kristen Grikisi, sa'ipasa sogofa'ana. Apolos nafe' nataga Grik sagapoma, nati anis amam nematawa sagahapifa Jisasi. Fowa' God nati uwahipis natopalopas dowafa sogahapifana. Dei' Apolos nanda' maol natopalopa Kristen isimba hilili' nowa' banagas.

Anen banagona endilisi a'owa' ma nagagwa basef esis Judai ma nogohnaep esis amam nematawai. Anen banagona nalomas nanda' hihianama natalogofas nikila'as. Ama nigihimba'masa basef alihifa buk Baibela Jisas Krais God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
Apolos nape Korin, nogota atamba Pol a' nafe' walemb ambalemba bagape nomona halafutagwi ea' nafe' nataga Efesus nati anis Kristen.
Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Fowa' ipa' pahapifa Jisas pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi?” Owa' esis sa'i, “Ata' owa'atin. Apa' ina mame' basefa anen Ambal Godi Holi Spirit nape, owa'.”
Ea' Pol na'ipas na'i, “Dei' ipa' pefa' baptaisa main?” Ea' sa'i, “Apa' mofa' baptais Joni.”

Ea' Pol na'i, “Fowa' Jon nagapisi'as embeli na'ias na'i, ‘Ipa' pembema nelelemb pewa' alafugaha waf awafi pefe'ma God, pefa' baptais. Ea' pindahapifa aman anamba dembinai atiasi nigi'ma ae' nigafi'ii. Aman anamba anen Jisas.’”
Esis same' basef ifimba, asahapifa Dembinai Jisas sofa' baptaisa agol ananigili.
Ea' Pol nawamona lagofa esis, Holi Spirit Ambal Godi a' nafi'mai esis nasa'mas sa'i diga naninani sawalapa basef si'i amom profet maga'if.
Esis siamba epes isimba sataga felefele'ma 12-pelais.

Ea' Pol nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai nawalapa basef bu'wafi. Anen nanda'as na'amba atin nape aomb wanemb. Ina ombal mahana, owa'. Anen banagona na'ipas. Anen naloma esis sape sa'i basef atin, na'ipasa nogafela ukup asasipi ma sogogawa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias atapina.

Apa' owa', anis sasopama opalef banages a'owa', ina sahapifa Jisas, owa'atin. Esis sa'i basef awafi ma ufia'w Dembinaii ma naep esis amam nematawai. Ea' dei' Pol nakwaha esis hiasi nao'wa esis Kristen atis safe' salomana. Pol nawalapa basef nimaguf hiafi atapina ipat atamba Tiranusi, atamba sagawalipas basefa.
Ea' nanda'as na'amba atin nape afagof biagof. Esis amam nematawa hiasi hi'alas sagape itap lu'upa Asiai walemb hielimbi same' basef Dembinaii, Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia wapani.
God natopalopa Pol nanda' hiahaom mamimami banagami hiami si'i God nanda'ami.
Esis sati amamba, sofa' hankisip luwaguf maisa sanogam alop Poli, sofa'as safe'ma esis aowas nanda'asi. Esis sanda'am na'amba owa', aowas hiani hi'alan ea' ambagof awami makwaha esis mafe'.

Ea' anom Juda mafe' ganigani manda' bisnisa maol inimba matofa ambagof awami. Mati maol Pol nanda'ani manda' so'wale mopehafa agol Dembinai Jisas ma'i motalogofa ambagof awami ma waf afambai. Ma'ias na'amba atona atin ma'i, “Agol Jisas anamba Pol nagawalapa basefanai, apa' ma'ipipa dindinip a'owa' ma pekwaha epes isimba pigawisi ando'.”
Ea' anona aman Judainai pris dembinai agol ananigili Siva. Nogaopana ananimi 7-pelaim manda' waf afamba ma'i mogatalogofa ambagof awami ma agol Jisasi.
Owa', aman anamba ambal aunai nagapaunai nagwa basefa amom na'amba na'i, “Ae' egawa Jisasi Pol. Apa' ipa' epes mamahipama? Ae' ina' egawepa.”

Ea' aman anamba ambal aunai nagapaunai fete'ana nalotawa amom ea' naham napa'agofam nanda'am aom kwapete'am nahambombaga alop amamipi nahape' luwaguf maim amamumi makwaha ipat atamba mafa' mafe' alop wahifip.
A'i owa' main, epes hiasi sagape Efesusi Juda saloma esis owa' Judaisia wapani same' basef ifimba ea' ombal lu'wami matagama esis hiasi hi'alas. Sasa'ma agol Dembinai Jisasi lu'wagol.
Amam nematawa hiasi sagahapifanai safi'i sawalapa waf awafi esis sanda'afi sa'iaf.

Ea' isimba hiasi sanda' naoh awagwi gwagwigwagwi, satamai buk anamba hianai sanda' ko'op ma'akw naoh boumi magailanai saofana nifa nogohnaep esis amam nematawai. Esis satalifa otamba ma'umba ma sagatala buk akwambambai bataga 50,000 kina.
Sanda' waf afambai, na'amba basef Dembinaii afataga banagef fawalapai banagami ananimi mataga lu'um a'owa'.
A'i owa' gi', okom Poli mosafel banagem na'i nefe' itap lu'upa Masedonia esis Grik sagapoma, ma main a' nefe' Jerusalem. Anen na'ias na'i, “Ae' efe' anamba ma main, a' efe' iti Rom wapani.”
Ea' nasapa' amom biam magatopalopanai Timoti naloma Erastus ea' mafe' itap apamba Masedonia. Apa' Pol ata' nape kwasala itap lu'upa Asia wapani.
Nogota atamba anis epes sanda' naumbih sagaloma ufia'w usi'i'wi Dembinaii sanda' kwala'ap lu'unai sindininifama gigal sa'oh mehip.

Anona aman agilinama Demitrius, aman anamba nanda' hiahaom hiami ma anin kapa silva. Anen kofagonama nanda' bisnis nanda' ifagw sa'usa'usi a'owa' manda' kapa silva manda'asi. Ea' sandati si'i ipat lu'utai sanda' lotuma god nemata'w akwamba Artemis. Ea' naso'ama maol amam manda' maol silvai mofa' otamba lu'umbai.
Ea' natama amam amamba maloma anom amam manda' maol atifin si'i amom manda'ani na'i, “Ipa' pegawa, apa' mogofa' otamba lu'umbaini maol ea' inimba atin.

Ea' aman anamba Pol nahokola amam nematawa hiasi saila anef waf daiaf nalamona ukup asasipi, isimba ipa' patilis pegawas! Anen ina nanda'am na'a Efesus atogon, owa'atin. Anen nanda'am mafe'agon hi'alagon felefele'ma itap lu'upa Asia anamba hiagoma. Anen naga'i, ‘Amom god apa' manda' lagof manda'ami, amamba ina god endilisimi, owa'atin.’

“Basef ifimba Poli atiasi fehambombaga maola bisnis ape'isi. Ea' ina isimba atis, owa'atin. Basef ifimba ananifi afehambombaga ipat lu'utai god nemata'w dembe'wi Artemis. Ea' totaga falafutai ma nogohnaep esis amam nematawai ma ukup asasipi. Dei' esis sagape Asiai hiasi saloma epes hiasi sagape itap hiagomai wapani sanda' lotuma god nemata'w akwamba ato'w. Apa' owa', basef Poli fa'i fehambombaga agol lu'wagili akwa'ugili.”
Amom manda' maoli mame' basef ifimba, ukup amamipi wandafip endilisi moga ma'i mehip ma'i, “Artemis apa' Efesusi ea' ako'w ato'w dembe'wi agol lu'wagili'wi.”

Ea' epes hiasi sagape taun inimbai sanda'am gigal wigo sa'oh banagambel a'owa'. Ea' sosafel safe' anamba sunduwa'anima saga'i basefa. Sahondo' Gaiusi Aristarkus Masedoniaimi mafi'i magaloma Poli, mafe' maloma esis.
Pol na'i nefe' ni'ipa esis amam nematawa la'afisa owa', esis Kristen sili'amana.
Anom amam magape gavman dembami ma itap lu'upa Asiai amom alipumi Poli masapa' basef fafe'ma anen. Ea' ma'ipana dindinipa ina nefe' nuwis anamba sandatama sape saganifa basefa, owa'i.
Amam nematawa isimba mini'ap hiasi ukup asasipi ea' pandopelas a'owa'. Anis soga sa'i sonda'i anif basef, anis sanda'i anif daif. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi ina sogawa esis safi'i sandakolasa main.
Esis Juda sasapa' Aleksander nafe' la'afena esis salutu saga'i basefa. Ama sa'i anen niga'ipasa anif basef. Ea' Aleksander nasa'ma lagol na'i nogwamasa basef esis amam nematawa.

Owa' satolona asogawa anen Judainai. Na'amba dei' hiasi sandame'ma na'amba atin sakolo' malogof atef sa'i, “Artemis apa' Efesusi ea' ako'w ato'w dembe'wi agol lu'wagili'wi.” Esis gigal sa'oh na'amba atin sape atapis nogota lautai awa biafin.

Ama main, kaunsel agilinai esis Efesusi nataloga esis amam nematawa na'i, “Ipa' epes Efesusipai, esis hiasi sagape walemb hielimbi sogawa Efesus anin taun nigimafi ipat lu'utai sanda' lotuma god dembe'wi Artemisii, inimba nigimafi otam migihi'amami muguwai heven ilifi.
Ina anona aman nasambala basef ifimba, owa'atin. Ipa' sopama malogof be' pepe. Ipa' ina penda' anin mae kwafalis, owa'i.
Ipa' pefa'ai amam amamba biam mafi'i na'a ea'. Apa' amom ina makwalopa anin mae ma ipat lu'utai apa' manda' lotuwatai, owa'. Amom ina ma'i basef findiwaifi ma god nemata'w ape'ikwi, owa'atin.
I'i Demitrius noloma amom manda' maola anini mi'i monda' basefa epen ami, bola anef nemaf monda'efa kot. Amom jas dembami mape. Amom Demitriusiami monda'ipam.
I'i ipa' penda' anif basef wapani, dao' penandonaef anamba sandatama saga'i basefa nogota atamba dembami gavman moga'ipasefa.

Amom dembami gavman Rom atiasi monda'mapa basef a'a owa'? Apa' ina mogawa. Dei' maina apa' mafela wandaf manda'af dei' nemaf afa'e? Kofagesa owa'atin endilisi ma hiahawes isimba. I'i amom dembami Rom mogahali'apa ma hiahawes kofagesa ma dakolas inimba awani, apa' atiasi ina anif basefa mogogwaef, owa'atin.”
Kaunsel na'iasa ea', nasapa' esis amam nematawa safe'.
Esis salamapa sowala, Pol nofalai esis Kristen safi'mai anen, naso'as anif basef nowa' banaga opalef asasilifi. Ea' nanda'masa nemaf bu'wafi esis nakwahis nafe' itap lu'upa Masedonia.
Anen nafe' anamba hiagoma nawalipasa basef hiafi esis Kristen nowa' banaga opalef asasilifi. Ama main, nafe' nataga itap lu'upa esis Grik sagapoma.

Anen nape aomb wanemb itap apamba. Ama main, na'i nofa' sip nefe' itap lu'upa Siria owa', a' nogawa esis Juda sa'i basef sandame'maefa sohana nogaga'. Ea' nanindifa okom ananimi na'i netanima nefe' nuwis itap lu'upa Masedonia la'afen.

Sopater Beriainai, Pirus nogamana, nafe' nalomana. Ea' amam biam Tesalonaikaimi Aristarkus Sekundus a Gaius Derbeinai. Naloma Timoti maloma amam biam Asiaimi Tikikus naloma Trofimus, amom amamba mafe' maloma Pol.
Amom mali'afa mafe' mape masasafa Troas.

Nimaguf ifimba esis Juda sa' gwa'aisi sagaloma bret owa' togatifia, yis akatai. Nimaguf ifimba fafe'ma hi'alef, afa' walota anop sip wakwaha Filipai a' wafe'. Wafe' nimaguf wanif bif fafe'ma hi'alef, a' watagama amom mali' magafi'i Troas mape wik si'igai.
Nemaf Sarere owamb afa' wandakolas waloma esis Kristena moga' gwa'aisi atogon ea' mofa' komunion gwa'aisi Jisasi. Naman Pol na'i a' nefe'. Na'amba nawalipasa basef nafe' nafe' a' akita amanota.
Rum amamba, lambeh hiembihi hotaol anamba apa' mandakolas magapoma ilif.

Ea' anona aman sa'unai agilinama Yutikus natoma windoa. Pol ata' na'i basef fafe' atin owa', Yutikus ambeh hahana naep pa'i pese'ana na'oh ea' a' na'oh nolola endilisi. Rum amamba wanifim magape ilifi la'afeni, anen nowai gani ilif laogoma nafe' itap. Ea' esis sisila' safe' sofa'anai owa' sati a' afuna endilisi.
Ea' Pol nisila' nasisil nowa natoma aman anamba sa'unai nahapila lagol ananigili na'ias na'i, “Ipa' ina pesafel gogololasipa a ukup pepe awep, owa'i. Ambal ata' lapaona.”
Ea' Pol nao'was sotanima salota ipat ilif wapani, nawala bret sa'ata. Ama main, Pol na'i basef laufi wapani nalomas nafe' nataga lagala. Ea' Pol nakwahis a' nafe'.
Aman anamba sa'unai nape namona ambal lapaona a' sofa'ana safe' sambe'ana ipat ananitai, opalef asasilifi ambo'walef wapani.
Afa' wali' wafe' walota sip a' wafe' wataga Asos. Afa' wa'i owando'ma Pol Asos ofa'ana ofe' sip. Dei' main, doko' Pol nali' na'ipafa basef na'i a' nili' nefe' itap notaga Asos.
Ea' Pol nafi'i natolofa wambel ambalemba Asos ea' ofa'ana wafe' sip wafe' Mitilini.
Ea' sip pofa'afa wakwaha Mitilini wa'oh ama lala wataga felefele'ma anin ailan Kios. Ea' wa'oha lala wapani wataga anin ailan Samos. Ea' wa'oh wapani ma lala a' wafe' wataga Miletus.
Pol nasopama nomonas ananisi banagesa na'i amom mindikila' Efesus. Anen nandaiwa'ma nogape dowadowaf anif nimaguf itap lu'upa Asia, owa'. Na'i nondafe' ulal Jerusalem nemaf afamba saga'i Pentikosi.
Afa' wataga Miletus, Pol nasapa' basef fafe' Efesus nofala amom agufumi esis Kristeni mugafi'mai anen.
Ea' mafi'i matagamana na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pegawa ea' ma waf ae' ali' anda'af fagali' dambadambai afamba ae' agataga itap lu'upa Asia dondol ape agalomepa.

Ipa' pegawa, nimaguf hiafi lifilafi esis Juda sa'i basef sa'i sogopa'aga ae' sehe egaga'. Amambai atom ae' efa' nimanimi magagwamba ae'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ae' anda' agol ae'agili gafe' lafel a'owa', efa' akafimi nimanimi ea' embif falowi naep ae'api ma anda' maol Dembinaii.
Apa' ae' ina ombal mahe andafa'ma agawalapa basef hiafi ma agatopalopepa, owa'atin. Ama anamba ipa' pandakolasa awalipipa, ea' awalipipa ifagw ipe'igwi nomon wapani. Isimba ipa' apegawas.
Ae' a'i basef dindinipa esis Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia wapani ma sowa' alafugaha waf awafi sombema nelelemb sofe'ma God, sogahapifa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas.
Ea' ipa' peme', dei' Ambal bu'unai Godi nafela okom ae'ami aila anen atona. Isimba atis dei' ae' efe' Jerusalem. Atiasi main netagama ae' ganimba, ae' ina egawa hiahawes isimba, owa'.

Ae' egawa isimba atis. Anamba ae' agafe'ma, walemb hiagoma Ambal Godi nihimba'me basef dindinip na'amba na'i, ‘Ina' atiasi niti esis sonda'mena waf hiafi akafifi nimanifi ea' sonda'ena nenda' kalabus.’

“Apa' ae' ina okom mapoma ambal ae'ali atol logape, owa'. Ea' ina banagewe a'owa' ma igahapila ambal ae'ali tatala'il, owa'atin. Ae' a'i ila ufia'w akwamba ea' aila'w agafi'i. A'i enda'an hi'ilan datima maol inimba Dembinai Jisas nagase'eani. Maol inimba egawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi natopalopapa dowaf nofa'apa mogotanimai.

“Ea' ipa' peme'. Fowa' ae' afe' la'afena ipa' hipai awalapa basefa epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol bu'wani Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Apa' owa' dei' egawa, namanani ipa' hipai ina atiasi piti amaga ae'agai wapani, a' owa'atin.
Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa. I'i anin epen ipe'ini awen higililan, amamba ina kofagema ae'ami, owa'atin. Kofagema ipe'imi atom.
Dei' main, ae' ina ombal mahe andahagasa aga'ipipa basefa nomonas hiasi Godi, owa'. A'ipipaef hi'alef.

Ipa' pindimafi ipa' andeande' ea' pimafi esis amam nematawa isimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nandandepepa ea' ma pigimafisi. Ipa' solawaipa andeande' ma pigimafi esis Kristen sios Godi andeande' si'i sanda' maoli sugumafi sipsip andeande'. God natala esis Kristen ea' ma esimbel nogamanai atembel.
Ae' egawa atiasi ikwahahipa efe', anom amam awami si'i nombagw wandafugwi a' mufi'i motaga la'afena ipa' ea' mohambombaga esis Kristen si'i nombagw gwagaha sipsip.
Ea' atiasi anis epes ipa' atipa sosafel si'i basef baso'ami atoma sogalalamona nomonas esis Kristeni sofe' sigailas.

Ipa' dei' solawaipa andeande' lifilafi. Ipa' ukup pendapoma isimba. Afagof agwafomba wanogof dondol owamb alip ae' ina apoma noma'w ma awalipipa agasa'ma ukup ipa' hipai atona atin, owa'atin. Awalipipa aloma embif fagaluwi naep ae'api.

“Dei' anda'epa pepe banagami ma lagol Dembinaii, God okom maimailipa ma natopalopepa dowaf nofa'epa pigatanimai. Amamba la'ifima mogowa' banagaipa mogase'epa hiahaom fasimi atom God nagaso'asam amam nematawa anen nanda'as bo'wes hilili' ea' ananisi atiasi.
Ae' ina kowalema otamba silva gol luwaguf maim anin epeni, owa'atin.
Ipa' atipa ea' pegawa, ae' atowe anda' maol atopalopa ae' aloma amom mape magalumai ma anis hiahawes akafamasi.

Maol hiani ae'ani, ae' ihimba'mepa ma apa' mondanda' maol banagambela mogatopalopa isimba mamahisa owa' banagesa sogatopalopa esisia. Ea' apa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba Dembinai Jisas naga'iefi. Anen naga'i na'amba na'i, ‘Dagala anin epen negaso'as maefah anasi a' nikila' dagala epen inimba negefa'as. God nofalo'ma epen inimba nikila' inimba negefa'asi.’”
Pol nanda' basef ifimba ma ea', nindiwa nembawa nandabeten naloma agufumi amamba.
Ama main, amom hiami malef kwapete'am mandalulupatanima ea' mombalo' Pol mapipi'asana masisi' malogol magugumba dalogw Poli.

Doko' Pol nali' naga'i basef na'i, “Atiasi ipa' ina piti amaga ae'agai wapani, a'owa'.” Amom mame' basef ananifi hiafi hi'alef. Apa' ifimba do'wanif atif fanda' opalef amamilifi a' nimanilif a'owa'. Ea' malutumana nafe' nalota sip.
Afa' wakwaha agufumi wafe' walota sip pakwaha Miletus apafe'. Afa' usi'ifa wafe' naoh wataga Kos. Ama wafilu wafe' wataga Rodes. Ea' wakwaha Rodes wafe' wataga Patara wakwaha sip apamba usila'i wape.
Ea' wati anop sip daiap pa'i pefe' Fonisia ea' walota apamba pakwaha anamba apafe'.
Ea' wati ailan inimba Saiprus wikila'agon nape kwahisigilima. Afa' wafe' wataga itap lu'upa Siria ea' wafe' wataga wail Tair. Esis sa'i sowafa uga ma sip apamba wambel ambalemba.
Ea' afa' wafe' owando'ma anis Kristen watilis a' wape walomas wik si'igai. Ea' Ambal Godi nasa'ma ukup esis Kristeni ma soga'ipa Pola ina nefe' Jerusalem, owa'i.

Afa' wanda' nogota afa'itai hi'alata wambel ambalemba, wa'i a' ofe'. Amom Kristen maloma awasi nematawa amamisi salutumafa wafe' wawis ando'ma taun inimba. Ea' apa' mindiwa nembawa mandabeten naoh akata.
Ea' esis sa'i basef sonahas salomafa ma mondaso'ama lagof atin asotanima safe' ifagw asasigwi, afa' wafe' sip.
Afa' wafe' sip wakwaha Tair wafe' wataga Tolemes. Ea' wape wanda'masa nemaf bu'wafi esis Kristen wape walomas nemaf atetef.

Ama wafilu wakwaha Tolemes wafe' wataga Sisaria wakwaha sip ea' wafe' ipat anona aman Filip nagawalipasa basef Godii, wape walomana. Anen anona ma amom amamba 7-pelaimi fowa' mandandepam Jerusalami ma magatopalopa amom Aposeli.
Anen nola nematawa biawai biawa, ina dei' waso' amam, ata' owa'. God naso'awa gawa wawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet.
Afa' wape Sisaria anif nimaguf wapani ea', anona profet agilinama Agabus nakwaha itap lu'upa Judia nilianai Sisaria.

Anen nafi'mai afa' nofa' let Poli nowa' bo'wagahi lagof ananisi atis. Ea' na'ias na'amba na'i, “Spirit Ambal Godi naga'i na'amba na'i, ‘Amom Juda magape Jerusalami atiasi a' mowa' aman anamba ahama let atambai. Ea' moso'ana nefe'ma lagof anom amam mogololama Godi.’”
Afa' wame' basef ifimba ea' waloma esis wambel ambalembaisi wapani wa'ipa Pol dindinip wa'i anen ina nefe' Jerusalem, owa'i.

Owa', Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' panda' kilef a'owa' ma panda' okom ae'ami aom? Ae' ina andandumbulidombola enda' kalabus atis dowaf, owa'. Ae' ea' andandombola egaga' wapani Jerusalema egasa'ma agol Dembinai Jisasi.”
Ea' afa' ina la'ififama wogapa'aga nomonas ananisi, owa'. Ea' afa' ukup paso'afa ma basef ifimba wa'i, “Okom Dembinaii nondataga.”
Anif nimaguf fafe'ma ea', afa' wandondomba hiahawes afa'isi ma ogafe' Jerusalem.
Ea' anis alipisi sagaila Jisasi Sisariaisi safe' salomafa. Esis salutumafa wafe' ipat Nasoni, anen Saiprusinai nataga Kristen fowa'inai. Anen na'i afa' atiasi ope ipat ananinai.
Ea' wafe' wataga Jerusalem, esis Kristen sandagalama sogofa'afa.
Ama wafilu nemaf gi'maifi Pol nafe' nalomafa ma negati Jems. Ea' amom agufumi hiami ma esis Kristeni mape malomana.
Pol nanda'mam nemaf bu'wafi ea' na'ipama hiahaom hiami ma God natopalopana nanda'am la'afena esis amam nematawa anep mini'ap sogololama Godi.

Amom mame'ef ea', masa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol. Ea' ma'ipa Pol ma'i, “Sahomafa, ina' negawa esis Juda tausen hiasi hiasi a'owa' sahapifa Jisas sataga Kristen. Ea' Kristen isimba hiasi banages a'owa' ma sagaila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani.

Apa' anis epes daias sambaso'mas sa'ipasa ina' na'amba sa'i, ‘Pol na'ipa esis Juda safe' sape sagalomas analemb walembi anep mini'ap owa' Judaisia. Na'ipasa esis sogakwaha mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani.’ Anen na'i, ‘Ipa' ina petopa' alopa amom sa'umi ipe'imi ea' ipa' ina ata' pilaf wapani waf fowa'ifi, hapaifi.’ Anis epes daias seme' basef ina' naga'iefi dei' sa'ias na'amba.
Apa' mogawa endilisi atiasi esis Kristen Judaisi some' basefa ina' nafi'i nataga. Na'amba dei' afa' ata' onda'as wi'imama?
Ea' afa' wa'i ata' wi'ipina anef wafa ina' ata' nenda'as na'amba. Afa' anom amam biamibiam ma'i basef endilisifi mala' lapa Goda monda' anis maefah.

Ea' ina' ne'wa amom pindaila waf afamba fenda'epa pegataga hilili'ma naep Godi. Ina' nenda'mama otamba amamimbai wapani amom migi'ma waf esis Judai ma mogandowa balagah amamugahi. Ina' nenda'as na'amba, epes hiasi sogawa basef ifimba esis sanda'menaef ine'i, ifimba baso'aifi atif. Ea' sogawa ina' naila mu'uli inimba.

Apa' esis Kristen anep mini'ap owa' Judaisia, apa' manda' basef fagafe'masi maga'ipasa basef ifimba fowa' mogowa'afi. Esis solawais sondape andeande' na'amba. Esis ina sea' mafis saham sagaso' god baso'amunai, a ina sea' esimbel, ea' ina sea' mafis amamba sogowa' metewa ma afumi, a' ina sonda' waf awafi so'a waulafi, owa'i.”

Ea' Pol nao'wa amam amamba, ma wafilu ea' naila waf hiafi ma nonda' anen nagataga hilili' ma naep Godi nogaloma amom. Anen nanda'as na'amba nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi na'ipa amom pris. Na'ipama nemaf afamba atiasi anen no'wa amam amamba mifi'i ma amom pris monda' ofa mondolali ma amom atona atina mogataga hilili'.
Ama main, nimaguf ifimba 7-pelaif felefele'ma ea' hi'igalef, anom Juda magape itap lu'upa Asiai mati Pol nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi a' masa'ma ukup esis amam nematawa hiasii ma mogombalo'ana.

Ea' soga sa'i mehip na'amba sa'i, “Ipa' epes Israelipai, topalopapa! Aman anamba nihimba'ma epes hiasi walemb hiagoma napa'aga mini'ap ape'ipi Israela mu'uli inimba Godi Moses nagawalipasani naloma ipat lu'unai Godi wapani. Ea' ina isimba atis, owa'. Anen nau'wai anis epes owa' Judaisia safi'i sawisi nomon ipat anamba sanda'ana aluguna.”

Dei' main, fowa' amom mati anona aman Trofimus Efesusinai owa' Judainaia nape naloma Pol taun inimba. Ea' amom ukup pandanda' ma'i Pol nao'wana mafe' mawis nomon ipat anamba. Owa' owa'atin. Mambaso'as.

Ea' isimba atis dei' esis hiasi sagape Jerusalami sosafel gogolalasis kwapete'a basef ifimba sa'i sonda' wandaf. Ea' sasagih safi'i sunduwa'anima sawis ipat nomon sombalo' Pol sahondo'ana nawisi ando'. Ea' kwafalis atis sowalowa utagw ipat anamba.
Esis sa'i soha Pol noga', owa' basef fafe' fatagama soldia dembinai nugumafi amom soldiai. Basef fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Esis Jerusalemi hiasi sosafel bolalas kwapete' sa'i sonda' wandaf.”
Ea' kwafalis anen nofa' anom soldia masagih milianama esis hiasi. Ea' amom Juda mati anen ofisa dembinai nao'wa amom soldia, makwaha Pol ina ata' mahana wapani, a'owa'.
Soldia anamba dembinai nafi'i felefele' nombalo' Pol na'ipa amom soldia mowa' lagof ananigufi sen biafin. Ea' nahali' esis na'i, “Anen ami? Anen nanda' main?”

Amam nematawa hiasi sosafel sagwa basef. Apa' esis ina sagwaef fafe' atogon, owa'. Sagwaef fandafe' daindai. Ea' kwala'ap alu'una, ofisa dembinai ina nogawa basef kofagefa asasifi, owa'. Ea' na'ipa amom soldia ma mo'wa Pol nefe' nogawis ipat amom soldiai.
Ea' Pol nafe' nataga bombol sagalota ipat atambai, esis amam nematawa dindinapis a'owa' ma sogahana. Na'amba amom soldia masa'mana mofa'ana mafe'.
Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sagi'mana safe' gigal sa'oh dindinip sa'i, “Hana ma afuna, hana ma afuna!”

Amom soldia ma'i a' mofa' Pol mofe' muwis ipat amamutai nomon, ea' Pol nahali' ofisa dembinai na'i, “Ae' a'i i'ipina anif basef a'a owa'?” Owa' soldia anamba dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ina' negawa diga Griki?
Ae' a'i owa' ina' aman Isipinai fowa' nogota tatumba nafela wandaf napa' nagaloma gavmani ea' nao'wa 4,000-pelaim amam magahapila bainagwi nao'wam mafe' anamba wafigima epes akagoma.”

Owa' Pol na'i, “Owa'. Ae' aman Judaiwai. Wambel ae'ambili Tarsus itap lu'upa Silisia. Apa' ae' aman anambel wambel lu'wambili agol lu'wagili. Ina' ni'i awi, ae' i'ipasa anif basef esis amam nematawa.”
Ea' soldia anamba na'i aho'mana noga'i. Pol nalutu bombol inimba, nasa'ma lagol nanda'agol de'inda' ma esis amam nematawa, asasopama malogof. Ea' Pol na'ipasa basef diga Hibrui.
Na'ias na'amba na'i, “Ipa' sahin owan a ipa' ahape, ipa' peme'. Ae' a'i egwa basefa ipa' dei' ma pegegawa ae' ina anda' anef waf awafi, owa'atin.”
Esis same' Pol na'i diga esis Hibrui, a' malogof faso'as sape, ina ata' sanda'as de'inda', owa'atin.

Pol na'i, “Ae' Juda. Ma'me ae'akwi kolae Tarsus itap lu'upa Silisia, apa' ae' ataga dambewe taun ini'i. Ae' anda' skula dembinai tisa Gameliel ea' nawalipi andeande'ma mu'uli inimba hiani amom bafapapa ape'imii. Na'amba ae' okom mohafel banagem a'owa' ma agaila God si'i ipa' dei' pagailana.
Ea' fowa' ae' anda' maol ahambombaga esis epes sagaila ufia'w akwamba sagahapifa Dembinaia'wi. Owa' aha esis amam nematawa wapani, a'i ehas soga'. Ea' ewa'as sen efa'as afa' ipat sanda' kalabusatai.

Pris dembinai naloma amom agufumi hiami esis Judai mogawa andeande'ma mogawalapa basef ifimba endilisifi. Amom mase'e pas manda'asa amom sahin owan amamisi Juda sagape Damaskusi, ea' ae' afe' Damaskus a'i embalo' esis sagape wambel ambalembai ewa'as sen. Ae' a'i efa' esis sagaila ufia'w akwambai sufi'i Jerusalem a sogofa' akafimi ma amom plisman mogahas.
“Ae' afe' ataga felefele'ma Damaskus, awin a' nandasapa' 12 klok. Owa' kwafalis atis anona nogogala'i nisila'i heven nogala'me a'owa'.
Ea' ewa itap ame' anagol malogol ga'ipi na'amba ga'i, ‘Sol, Sol, dei' maina nagahambombaga ae'?’
“Ea' ae' agwa basef a'i, ‘Dembinai, ina' ami?’ “Ea' na'ipi na'i, ‘Ae' Jisas Nasaratiwai ina' nagahambombagai.’
“Amom malome magalutuwi mati amamba mogogala'i, apa' amom ina mame' malogola aman anamba naga'ipai, owa'.
“Ea' ae' a'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' ae' atiasi enda' main?’ “Ea' Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' safel nefe' niwis Damaskus ama atiasi anona aman nofo'o ni'ipina maol hiani ae' a'i enda'menani.’
“Mogogala'i amamba mogala' a'owa', ea' ae' ina ati hiahawes, owa'atin. Naep pase'e dogw. Ea' amam amamba malutu magaloma ae'i mahapila lagof ae'agufi mofa'e afe' Damaskus.
“Anona aman nape Damaskus agilinama Ananaias. Aman anamba nagaila mu'uli Godi andeande'i. Amam nematawa Juda sagape Damaskusi sa'i anen aman bu'unai.
“Anen nafi'i nalutu felefele' ma ae' na'ipi na'i, ‘Owame Sol, dei' naep ine'ipi apiti wapani.’ “Ea' nogota atamba atota naep ae'api pati wapani.
“Ea' na'i, ‘God bafapapa ape'imi anen nandandepena ma negegawa okom ananimi ma nigati aman bu'unai hilili'i. Ama nenda' maol Godi ma negame' basef ananifi fegataga malogol ananigili.
Atiasi ina' newalapa basef ananifi ni'ipa amam nematawa hiasi ma hiahawes isimba ina' name'as nagatilisi.
Dei' maina ina' ata' nape nagasasa atin? Ina' safel nefalana nosa'opena nokwahomena waf awafi ine'ifi ma negefa' baptais!’
“Ama anif nimaguf fafe'ma ea', ae' itanima afi'i Jerusalem, ea' awis andabeten nomon ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuma, si'i a'oh andando'ah.
Ea' ati Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' kwafalis nekwaha Jerusalem nefe'. Ina' i'i negawalapa basef ae'afi na'a, ina atiasi seme'ena, owa'atin.’
“Ea' a'ipa Dembinai a'i, ‘Dembinai, na'ambai owa'. Esis asogawa ae' fowa' agafe' ifagw hiagwi esis Juda sandakolasugwi hi'alagwa egembalo' esis amam nematawa hiasi sagahapifinai agahas.
Fowa' esis saha Stiven naga', aman naga'ipas basefa ine'i, nogota atamba alutu felefele' ea' okom ae'anai bo'onama amambai. Ae' alutu imafi sagegw maim amom magahanai.’
“Owa' Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' fo'o. Atiasi ae' esapa'ena nefe' ufia'w laogoma ma esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi sogogawa ae'ia.’”

Esis Juda ea' same' basef Poli fafe' fatagama basef ifimba faga'i epes isimba owa' Judaisia. Ea' esis galala mehip sa'i, “Hana ma afuna! Epes na'ambaimi ina mope itap, owa'. Anen ina ata' nope namona. Hapainai!”
Esis gigal sa'oh ea' sowali sagegw lagof asasigufi sakwaha sopof nalota ilif.

Ea' soldia anamba dembinai na'ipa soldia dindinipa mo'wana mofe' mugawis ipat amom soldiai nomon. Ea' na'ipa amom soldia mohana ma nogawalapa basef ifimba kofagefa. Anen na'i nogawa andeande' dei' maina esis sogofalana na'amba.

Ea' amom mowa'ana ma mogahana anota let, owa' Pol nahali' anona kepten dembinai nagalutu felefele'i na'amba na'i, “A'i lo na'i ipa' ila ma penda' basef na'amba ma aman anamba Romunai? Ae' Romuwai. Ipa' ina dei' panda'me kot ea' ma dei' ipa' pagahe. Waf afambai andeande'?”
Ea' kepten anamba name' basef ifimba, nafe' na'ipa soldia anamba dembinai na'i, “Ina' na'i nenda' main? Aman anamba anen Romunai!”
Ea' soldia anamba dembinai nafi'mai Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ina' kipa ae'. Ina' aman Romunai, a'a?” Pol nagwamana basef na'i, “Aho'.”
Ea' soldia anamba dembinai na'i, “Ae' akwaha otamba hiambai atala pepa ma agataga aman Romuwai.” Ea' Pol na'i, “Ae' owa'. Mamase esis Romisi. Ea' ae' wapani Romuwai.”

Ea' amam amamba mahali'ana ma'i mogahanai, a' owa'atin. Amom ea' ombal maham mandafa'mana. Ea' soldia anamba dembinai okom mandanda'ma Pol anen Romunai a' na'ipama mogowa'ana sen. Ea' soldia anamba wapani ombal mahana.

Ama a'i owa' wafilu nemaf fagagi'i, soldia anamba na'i nogawa andeande' ea' amom Juda ma'i basefa waf mamahefa Pol nanda'afi. Ea' soldia anamba natagwahamana sen ea' nasapa' basef fafe'ma amom pris dembami maloma amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti mifi'i munduwa'anima mope. Ea' anen nao'wa Pol nafi'i nahaponana nalutu nogohnaep amamisi.

Pol natiti amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti dindinip ea' na'i, “Ipa' sahope, ae' afe' naep Godi, ea' okom ae'ami andeande'ma fe' ae'ani ma nogohnaep Godi, afi'i ataga dei'. Malogol gagape opaf ae' nomoni ina gihimba'me anef waf awafi ae' anda'afi, owa'.”
Anen na'ias na'amba owa', pris dembinai Ananaias nape nagali'ma pris hiamii na'ipa amom amam magalutumana felefele'i ma mogopagaha malogol ananigili.

Ea' Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ina' aman aunai si'i anom indalelemb awami sanda' pen bu'wani afitini sagandisam ando' atogini. Atiasi God a' nehena. Ina' nape na'a naila mu'uli inimba Godi ma nanda' kotima ae', ea' ina' atina nesambala mu'uli inimba ma dei' na'ipam mogahe!”
Ea' amom magalutu felefele'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' na'i basef findiwaefa aman pris dembinai Godi.”

Owa' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Ipa' sahope, ae' ina egawa a'i anen pris dembinai, owa'. Dei' main, basef fagail buk Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Ipa' ina pi'ipa agilinai nugumafi ipe'i pi'ipana basef awafi, owa'.’ Isimba ae' egawas.”

Ea' Pol nogawa amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti anom Sadyusimi a anom Farisimi. Na'amba anen na'ipam mehip na'amba na'i, “Ipa' sahope, ae' Farisiwai ea' ahame ae'anai Farisinai. Ae' ahapilif a'i endilisi anef nemaf epes sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, dei' ape asasa nemaf afamba. Kofagefa ifimba atif dei' esis sanda' kotima ae'.”
Anen na'ipam basef ifimba, ea' amom atom mafitap la'afena amom Farisi maloma Sadyusi ea' mandawal biafim.

Dei' main, amom Sadyusi mahapilif ma'i epes sagaga'i anaf ina sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'. Amom ma'i ensel owa'atin a ambagof spirit, owa'atin. Apa' amom Farisi mahapila ifimba ambagufi ensel saloma epes sagaga'i sogosafel wapani endilisifi.

Isimba atis amom gigal ma'oh mehip a'owa'. Ea' anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi amom Farisi mosafel malutu ma'ias dindinip na'amba ma'i, “Afa' wati aman anamba basef kofagefa akana. I'i anona ambal a'a anona ensel ni'ipana ma niga'ipasa basef ifimba dao', andeande'.”

Ea' fitap a' nataga lu'win a'owa', soldia dembinai ombal bahana ma Pol, na'i na'amba mini'ap biafip mondahohondo'mana pele'atana biafina a' afuna. Ea' na'ipa amom soldia ananimi miliana mombalo' Pol la'afena amom mofa'ana nogafe' ipat amamutai.

Ama wafilu owamb Dembinai nafi'i nalutu felefele'ma Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nindalutu banagena. Ina ombal mehena, owa'i. Fowa' nawalapa basef ae'afi Jerusalem, ea' atiasi ina' newalapef na'amba atin taun lu'wani Rom wapani.”
Ea' wafilu kuhumbita amom Juda mandakolas ma'i basef mandame'maef fape atogon ma'i endilisi ilifa mogaha Pol afuna. Amom ma'i ina mea' gwa'aisi embel sili', owa'i ota'ma mohana afuna, dao' mea'as.
Amom ma'i ilif endilisi mandame'ma basef ifimbai, amom hiami mikila' 40-pelaim.

Amom mafe'ma amom pris dembami maloma agufumi Judai ma'ipam ma'i, “Afa' ea' wa'i basef wandame'maefa ogaha Pol afuna, afa' wa'i endilisi ilif ina ata' wea' gwa'aisi ambel kwasakwasala owa'i, ota'ma a' oha Pol afuna.

Na'amba dei' ipa' peloma amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti pesapa' basef fefe'ma soldia dembinai Romunai ma nofa'i Pol nogafi'mai ipa'. Ipa' pembaso'mana pi'i, ‘Afa' wa'i ata' ome' basef kofagefa Poli andeande'.’ Ea' afa' wanda'as dumbilidombol wape. Anen ina a' nifi'i notagamepa ata' owa'atin, afa' ea' uli' ohana afuna.”
Owa' nogamana tagonai name' amom Juda ma'i mofe' mogapoma Pol ufia'w ma mogahana, nafe' ipat amom soldiai nawis na'ipa Pol.
Ea' Pol nofala anona soldia dembinai na'i, “Okwago aman anamba sa'unai nefe'mago kepten dembinai ma amom soldia hiami. Anen anif basefa na'i noga'ipanaef.”
Ea' soldia anamba nao'wana nafe'ma kepten dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Aman anamba nanda' kalabusi Pol nofala ae' na'ipi ao'wai aman anamba sa'unai nafi'mai ina'. Anen anif basefa noga'ipinaef.”
Ea' kepten anamba nahapila lagol ananigili nofa'ana nendelefata nafe' wa'ol, amom atom mape nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' na'i ni'ipi basef maif?”

Ea' sa'unai na'ipana na'i, “Amom Juda ma'i basef mandame'maef ea' ma ma'i mogahali'ina ma naman nefa' Pol nogafe'ma amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti. Amom mambaso'am ma'i ata' mohali' Pol atonama basef kofagefa ananifi.

Apa' ina nigi'ma basef amamifi, owa'i. Dei' main, anom amam amamumi hiami a' mikila' 40-pelaim ma'i basef banagafi mandame'maef ma'i endilisi ilif ina a' mea' gwa'aisi ambel kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Ota' ma a' muli' moha Pol afuna. Isimba atis dei' amom mape ufia'w masasa. Amom dumbili dombol mape masasa ina' ma niga'i aho'ma basef amamifi.”
Ea' Kepten anamba nasapa' anen sa'unai a' nafe' na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Ina nefe' ni'ipa anin epen atitina basef ifimba, owa'i.”

Ea' kepten anamba nofala anom soldia dembami biam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pefa'ai soldia hiami 200-pelaim moloma anom soldia 70-pelaim mogatoma hosi ea' 200-pelaim mogahapila wambawai. Ipa' pendondombama pegafe' Sisaria bola owamb 9 klok.
Ea' pendondomba anom hosa Pol wapani nogatomam ea' pefa'ana andeande' pefe'ma gavman dembinai Filiks.”
Kepten anamba nanda' anif basef fefe'ma Filiks na'amba fa'i,
“Ae' Klodius Lisias anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ina' gavman dembinai nape nagali'i, Filiks. Nemaf bu'wafi.
Amom Juda ma'i mombalo' aman anamba ma'i nohana noga'. Apa' ae' ea' ame'anama basef anen na'i anen aman Romunai. Ea' ae' aloma amom soldia wafe' watagama amom Juda wandalombamana lagof amamugufi.
Ae' a'i ata' egawa basef kofagefa amom magasapaganamafi, na'amba ae' ao'wana ilianama amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti.
Ea' ma'ipi anif basefa mu'uli amamini masapagana ma basef ifimba. Apa' amom ina manda' kotimana ma anis maefaha ohana nogaga', a'a onda' kalabusimana, owa'atin.

Owa' dei' anif basef fatagama ae' ma amom ma'i anif basef mandame'maefa ma'i mohana nogaga'. Ea' dei' ae' kwafalis asapa'ana nafe'mago ina'. Ea' ae' a'ipa amam amamba magasapaganai ma mofo'o mondawalapa basef alihifa nogohnaep ine'isi ma ina' nendegawa hiahawes isimba amom ma'i monda' kotimanasi.”
Ea' amom soldia mame' basef a' mofa' Pol mafe' anambel wambel Antipatris owamb.
Ama lala, soldia amamba motanima mafe' ifagw amamugwi Jerusalem. Apa' amom 70-pelaim magatoma hosi atom mofa' Pol mafe' Sisaria.
Mafe' mataga Sisaria, maso'ana pasa basef ifimba gavman dembinai ea' mofa'ai Pol wapani nafi'i nalutu nogohnaep ananisi.
Ea' dembinai gavman anamba nafi'i nati pas isimba ea' nahali' Pol na'i, “Ina' itap lu'upa agol lu'wagola ani?” Ea' Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ae' Silisiaiwai.”
Ea' anen na'ipa Pol na'i, “Atiasi amam amamba magasapaga ine'i, mufi'i motaga, dao' ae' eme' basef ine'ifi.” Ea' na'ipa amom manda' kalabusima Pol ipat lu'utai gavman dembinai Heroti.

Nimaguf wanif bif fafe' ea', pris dembinai Ananaias niliana nafe' Sisaria naloma anom agufumi Judai ea' anona aman Tetalas aman nogogawa mu'uli gavmani nalomam nafi'i. Amom hiami ma'ipa gavman dembinai Filiksa basef ifimba ma'i mondakotima Polafi.

Ea' gavman anamba nofalai Pol nafi'i, Tetalas nanda' basef fatiti anen. Ea' na'ipa Filiks na'i, “Ina' aman dembinai Filiks, ina' natopalopa apa' Juda ma magape nogota laota andeande' a'owa' ea' wandaf mais a' owa'atin. Nomonas bu'wasi ine'isi nagatopalopa esis wambota ape'isi ma dei' magape hilili' andeande' migikila' fowa' magape.
Ea' apa' magape walemb hiagomai nelelemb ape'ilimbi bape bo'walemb a'owa' ma ina'. Ea' nimaguf hiafi dondol manifelina a'owa' ma isimba.
Apa' ae' andaiwa'ma igahapilina nogota laota. Dei' ahali'ina ma negame' basef ape'ifi bandafi.

“Apa' mogawa aman anamba nanda'mapa hiahaom awami hiami. Ea' nanda' naumbih nasa'mai ukup awapi naloma esis Juda hiasi napa' nalomas itap hiagoma walemb hielimbii. Anen amaga lu'ugai ma epes isimba sapa' sagawala mini'ap ape'ipii ma ea' sagape anep mini'ap dei'i, saga'i esis mini'ap Nasarati.
Ea' anen na'i nonda' ipat lu'unai sanda' lotuma Godanai aluguna wapani owa', apa' mombalo'ana [ma'i monda' kotimana ma mu'uli ape'ini.
Apa' kepten dembinai Lisias nafi'i, banagona a'owa' ma apa', nahondo'ana lagof ape'igufi.

Anen na'i dindinipa apa' mandakotima anini mifi'i mondataga nogohnaep ine'isi.] I'i dei' ina' nihali' aman anamba, bola ina' negawa endilisi basef ananifi ma niga'i hiahawes hiasi apa' mandakotimanasi.”
Ea' amom Juda dembami wapani matopalopa anen masapaga Pol mawalapef ma'if ma'i, “Basef ifimba endilisifi atif.”

Ea' gavman dembinai nanda' balaga nahali' Pol nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “Ae' egawa afagof hiagufi ina' nanda' jas nape dembinai gavman nugumafi mini'ap apamba epes hiasi. Na'amba dei' nembel ae'ambili fasimbil a'owa' ma egagwa basef ifimba igihimba'mina ae' ina anda' anef waf awafi, owa'atin.
I'i ina' nigahali' esis, atiasi a' neme' basef ifimba. Nimaguf ata' 12-pelaif atif dowaf ae' afe' Jerusalema anda' lotu.

Ea' amom Juda ma'i mondakotima ae'i mati ae' ina a'i anif basef afitapef aloma anin epen nomon ipat lu'unai Godi, owa'. Amom ina mati ae' asa'ma ukup asasipi ma sogapa' ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi nomon a'a anagon nomona wambel ambalemba lu'wambili, owa'atin.
Ea' basef ifimba esis sandakotimafi, esis ina atiasi la'ifis sowalapa anif basef kofagefa ma ina' negegawa, owa'.

“Apa' ae' a'i ewalapa basef ifimba atifa ina'. Ufia'w akwamba esis Juda atis sandaiwa'ma'wi sa'i waf afamba sagawala wambotagwafi ina endilisifi. Apa' waf afambai endilisifi ae' ahapilaf ailaf. Ae' aila ufia'w akwamba anda' lotu ma God amom bafapapa apa' Juda hiapai manda' lotumanai. Ae' ahapifa basef hiafi fagape mu'uli Godi naloma basef hiafi amom profet fowa' manda'afi.
Ae' ahapifif ape ehafa God anaf nogasa'ma esis sagaga'i, epes isimba bu'wasi hilili'i soloma isimba sanda' waf awafii wapani. Amom manda' kotima ae'i wapani mahapifif mape mohafa God na'amba atin.

Ea' dondol ae' anda' maol lu'wani ma egape andeande' hilili' ma malogol gagape opaf ae' nomoni ina gihimba'me anef waf awafi ae' anda'afi, owa'. A'i waf awafi ake ma naep Godi noloma nogohnaep epesi wapani.
“Ae' ape anogof afagof analemb walemb daialemb ama main, itanima afi'i Jerusalem ma mini'ap ae'api. Ae' ifa'i moni maisa egatopalopa isimba kwahusi ea' eha anis mafis indalalima God egaso'ana.
Anda'as na'amba ma anda' waf bu'wafi alogwa waf awafi ake ma naep Godi. Ea' esis satolowe. Ina anis amam nematawa hiasi sape salome asa'ma nelelemb anis epesi sanda' kwala'ap naninani, owa'atin.
Owa', anis Juda sagape itap lu'upa Esiaisi safi'i sombale'e. I'i esis anif basefa ae'a, dei' andeande'ma sifi'i na'a naep ine'ipi sondakotimi.
I'i owa'atin, amom amamba munda'ipina anif basefa hiahawes mais amom mati ae' anda'as awasi, afamba agalutu nogohnaep amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti.

Anif basef atifif a'amon. Ama afamba agalutu la'afena amoma, ae' ega aga'i, ‘Ae' ahapifa God nogasa'ma esis sagaga'i sogohafel wapanii, ea' isimba atis ipa' dei' pandakotima ae' ma nogohnaep ipe'isi.’”

Filiks nogawa andeande'ma hapif naloma waf soga'i ufia'w esis Kristeni. Ea' na'ipa esis Juda ma ata' sope sogasasana. Anen na'i, “Ota'ma soldia dembinai Lisias nilianai, dao' ae' enandonamepa basef ifimba ipe'ifi.”
Ea' na'ipa anona soldia dembinai ma ata' nola' Pol nuwis nope kalabus nope wahifina dowaf. Ea' na'i aho'ma esis alipisi ananisi sifi'i sogatopalopana ma hiahawes.

Anif nimaguf fafe'ma ea', Filiks nao'wa waulu'mana anani'wi Drusila safi'i. Ako'w Drusila mini'ap esis Judai. Ea' Filiks nofala Pol na'i name' anif basef ananifi. Ea' Pol nafi'i na'ipana basef kofagefa ma esis sogahapifa Jisas Krais.

Na'ipana waf usi'ifi hilili' ma epes sugumafi alop asasipi datima ma anaf God nonda' kotima epes hiasi. Na'ias na'amba owa', Filiks ombal mahana. Ea' na'i, “Ina' ea' fo'o. Ama nambimba anef nemaf, dao' efalena wapani.”
Filiks nape nohafa anin mae wapani. Anen na'i owa', Pol nogaso'ana anin moni ma nokwahona nogafe' wahifina. Na'amba dondol anen nofalana nafi'i na'i nalomana.
Afagof biagof fafe'ma hi'alagof, Festus nofa' maol Filiksi. Ea' Filiks na'i ata' nonda' ukup esis Judai pegape andeande'. Ea' ata' nanda' Pol nape nanda' kalabus.
Festus nafi'i nofa' maol nape dembinai gavman numafi itap lu'wagoma walemb hielimbi fowa' Filiks nugumafiagoma. Nape nimaguf wanifa ea', nakwaha wambel Sisaria nondowasa' Jerusalem.
Ea' amom pris dembami maloma agufumi Judai mafi'mai anen masapaga Pol
ma'ipa Festus banagambel ma'i, “Ina' netopalopafa nesapa' aman anamba nifi'i na'a.” Dei' main, amom ma'i mondambaho' mogape ufia'wa mohana nogaga'.
Ea' Festus nagwa basef na'ipam na'i, “Pol nanda' kalabus nape wambel Sisaria. Felefele' atiasi ae' itanima efe' ganimba.
Ea' amom agufumi ipe'imi mifi'i miliana moloma ae'. Ama i'i aman anamba nanda' waf awafimanai, dao' amom a' mondakotimana.”
Festus nape nalomam nimaguf 8-pelaif a'a ilifunamaif, a' niliana wambel Sisaria. Ama wafilu nafe' nawis ipat sandakota na'ipa amom soldia mo'wa Pol mogafi'i.
Ea' amom Juda makwaha Jerusalem mape masasa Pol nafi'i miliana malutu felefele'ma anen masapagana basef hiafi nimanifi. Owa' amom mandakot dowadowaf, basef kofagefa amamifi owa'anifa.
Ea' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Ae' ina anda' anef waf awafi ma mu'uli apa' Judai, ipat lu'unai Godi, a'a mu'uli Sisari wapani, owa'atin.”
Owa' Festus na'i nonda' ukup esis Judai pepe be'ep. Ea' nahali' Pol na'i, “Ina' na'i nefe' Jerusalem ama bola eme'enama basef ine'ifi ganimba?”

Owa' Pol na'i, “Ipat ata'e ae' dei' agalutuatai, ata'e ipat lu'utai Sisari sanda' kota. Ipat ata'e atota pegame' basefa kot ae'ataima. Ina' atina negawa ea', ae' ina anda' anef waf awafi ma esis Juda, owa'atin.

I'i ae' anef waf awafi ma enda' anin mae awani nendahama ae' egaga'ai, ea' andeande'ma amom mohe egaga'. Apa' i'i basef ifimba amom mandakotima ae'afi owa' endilisia, ina andeande'ma dembinai gavman nese'e egafe'ma lagof amamugufi, owa'atin. Dei' ae' efala gavman dembinai Sisar neme' kot ae'atai.”
Ea' Festus ata' na'i basef naloma amom dembami ananimi, na'ipa Pol na'i, “Ina' a' nefala Sisar ama nogame' kot ine'itai, dao' ina' fo'mago Sisar.”
Ama anif nimaguf fafe'ma ea', dembinai king Agripa nafi'i naloma ano'w nemata'w Bernaisi esis bias safi'i Sisaria sa'i sonda'mana nemaf bu'wafi Festus.
Esis sape Sisaria nimaguf hiafi ea' Festas nawalapa basef na'ipanaef king Agripa ma Pol. Anen na'i, “Anona aman fowa' nagapani Filiks nanda'ana sa'ombemana dei' nanda' kalabus.
Fowa' ae' agapani Jerusalem, amom pris dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai masapagana mahali' ae' ma iga'i endilisi anen aman aunai ma nogaga'.

“Apa' ae' agwamama basef na'amba a'i, ‘Apa' Rom waf afamba akapa ma mogaso'ana akafimi dowadowafa anin epen, owa'. Apa' i'i basef figailani, anin ata' nili' nilutu nenda' basefa nogohnaep esis isimba sanda' kotimani ma apa' ata' moso'ana nogota anina negagwa anif basefa esis sanda' kotimani.’”
Afamba amom agufumi Judai mafi'i na'a, ina anda' salaisala ma egame' basefana, owa'atin. Ama nemaf gi'maifi ae' afe' ape ipat sanda' kota a'ipa esisa sofa' aman anamba nogafi'i.
Ea' amom manda' kotima anini mafi'i malutu masapagana. Apa' amom ina mola' anif basef endilisifi ma waf awafi manindipanaefa a'i amom monda' kotimanafi, owa'atin.
Amom mandahihianama anif basef malomana ma waf esis sanda' lotuwafi ea' anifa anona aman nagaga'i, Jisas. Owa' Pol na'i aman anamba nape namona ambal lapaona.

Ae' a'i ila' elaoma basef ifimba kofagefa andeande', apa' nomonas ae'asi ina sogawa, owa'. Ae' ina la'ifiwi, owa'atin. Ea' ahali'ana a'i, “Ina' na'i nefe' Jerusalem ama bola eme'enama basef ine'ifi ganimba?
“Owa' Pol na'i anen nondape kalabus ama bola gavman dembinai ape'inai Sisar neme' basef ananifi. Ae' a'i anen nondape kalabus ama main, esapa'ana nefe'mago Sisar.”
Ea' Agripa na'ipa Festus na'i, “Ae' atowe a'i eme' basef ananifi.” Ea' Festus na'ipana na'i, “Aho', naman ina' neme'ana.”

Ama wafilu Agripa naloma nemata'w akwamba Bernaisi safi'i sanda' sosaf hiani ma sogasa'ma agof asasigufi lu'wagof. Ea' sawis ipat lu'utai sandakolas sape saga'i basefa nomon saloma amom soldia dembami magali'i maloma amom agufumi taun inimbai. Ea' Festus na'ipas dindinip sao'wa Pol nafi'i.

Ea' Festus na'i, “King Agripa, naloma ipa' epes hipai pape pagaloma ape'i, ipa' pati aman anamba. Esis amam nematawa hiasi Juda sagape Jerusalami saloma sagape na'ai wapani sanda' kotimana nogohnaep ae'asi. Esis gigal sa'oh banagambel sa'ipi sa'i ehana afuna. Sa'i, ‘Na'amba a' nope namona wapani.’
Apa' ae' ati anen ina nanda' anin mae awani ma nogaga', owa'atin. Apa' anen nofala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nogame' kota anen. Isimba atis ae' a'i basefa esapa'ana nogafo'o.

Apa' ae' ina ati anif basefa anen fataga alihifa enda' anif basefa pas esapa'as sogafe'ma Sisar, owa'. Ea' dei' king Agripa ae' au'wai aman anamba nafi'mai ina', neloma ipa' hipai wapani. Afa' ondame' basef ananifi andeande'ma bola ae' egawama enda' anif basef figail pas.
Dei' main, ina andeande'ma esapa'ana nogafe' dowaf. Afa' onda' anif basef sanda' kotimanafi fil pepa fefe' felomana, dao' andeande'.”
Ea' Agripa na'ipa Pol na'i, “Dei' ina' nendagwa basef ifimba amom magasapagainamafi.” Pol nasa'ma lagol na'i basef ananifi na'i,
“King dembinai Agripa, ae' a'i egwa basef ifimba hiafi amom Juda magasapaga ae'afi. Ae' okom mandanda' ma'i andeande'ma a'i egawalapa basef ae'afi ma naep ine'ipi.

Dei' main? Ina' negawa andeande'ma waf apa' Judai faloma hiahawes apa' ukup pandanda'mas pagafe' daindaimasi. Isimba atis dei' ae' a'i ina' neme' basef ae'afi, okom ine'imi ina a' iwanim kwafalis, owa'.
“Fowa' ape afi'i afi'i ataga dei' fe' inimba ae'ani esis Juda hiasi sogawa. Fowa' ata' sa'owe agape itap ae'api ea' afe' agape Jerusalem wapani.

Fowa' gani esis sogawa ae'. I'i ukup asasipi pi'i aho', a' sowalapa basef ifimba ma waf ae'afi. Esis sogawa ae' aila waf mini'ap apa' Farisi. Waf afamba ahifif a'owa', fikila' waf hiafi anef daiafa lotu ape'ini.

Ea' basef kofagefa ma kot na'amba. Ae' ahipif endilisi ma God nosa'ma sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, isimba atis. Ae' ahapilif ape ehafa God nonda' hiahawes isimba sogataga si'i fowa' naga'ipamef akupapa apa' Judai. Isimba atis dei' esis sanda' kotimi.
Ambeh ape'ihi 12-pelaih manda' lotuma God owamb alip ea' mahapilif endilisi mape mohafa isimba atis. Dei' a'ipa ina' dembinai king, ae' wapani ahapilif ape ehafa amamba. Ea' esis Juda sasapagae.”
Pol na'ipa king Agripa ea' nandambema na'ipa amom Juda na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' paga'i basef ina endilisifi ma God anaf nogasa'ma esis isimba sagaga'i wapani? Ipa' pindahapifa basef ifimba.
“Fowa' ae' wapani okom mandanda' ma'i ae' enda' hiahaom hiami ma egatalogofa agol Jisas Nasaratinaii.

Ae' anda'am na'amba atina anis epes gani Jerusalem. Amom pris dembami mase'e banagami anda' kalabusima amam nematawa hiasi Godi. Nemaf afamba amom pris dembami ma'i moha anis Kristen sogaga', ae' wapani a'i aho'.

Ea' nimaguf hiafi ae' aso'as nimanimi Kristen isimba ahas nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi hiagwi. Ae' a'i enda' esisa sonda' Dembinai findiwana ma sogakwaha hapif. Ae' okom wandafuna endilisi ma esis, ailas afe' analemb walemb lauguni lu'wagoma,
“Efa' banagamuma amom pris dembami masapa'e afe' Damaskus.

Ae' a'ipa ina' dembinai king, ma awin nandasapa' ae' aila ufia'w afe', ati anona nogogala'i nisila'i heven nogala' a'owa' nikila' awin owaf fagalo. Mogogala'i mafi'i mogala'me aloma amom mafe' magalumai.

Afa' hiafai owa wa'oh itap ea' ae' ame' anagol malogol ga'ipi diga Hibrui ga'i, ‘Sol, Sol, dei' maina ina' nanda' maol nagahambombaga ae'? Ina' nanda' maol naha inimba owa' negawaia. Dei' nefa' akafimi bumbulita si'i anona naha bulmakau ananimi bumbulita nagasindi'amonam.
“Ea' ahali'ana a'i, ‘Dembinai ina' ami?’ “Ea' Dembinai na'i, ‘Ae' Jisas, ina' nagahambombagai.
Ea' ina' safel nilutu. Ae' afi'mai ina' ma hiahawes isimba. Ae' a'i esahe'ena ma nigahapila maol ae'ani, negawalapa basefa hiahawes ina' nagatilisa ae'i. Ea' hiahawes isimba anaf ae' igihimba'menasi.
Atiasi ae' itagwahina lagof esis mini'ap ine'isi Juda ea' itagwahina ma lagof isimba anis epes sogololama Godi wapani. Ae' esapa'ena nefe'ma esis isimba.

Ama negawala naep asasipi ma esis sogowa' alafugaha akota waf awafi sembema nelelemb sogafi'mai mogogala'i ma sokwaha banagami Satani sogafi'mai God. Esis sahapifa ae' ma egakwaha waf awafi asasifi. Ama sogofa' hiahaom bu'wami soloma anis amam nematawa God nanda'as bo'wes hilili' ananisi atisi.’
“Dembinai king Agripa, ae' ati hiahawes isimba sagataga heveni ea' ina esambala basef ifimba, owa'atin.

Ae' ali' awalapa basefa esis amam nematawa sagape Damaskusi ma main owa', awalapefa epes sagape Jerusalami ea' awalapefa esis sagape itap lu'upa Juda hiagomai, ama main afe' awalapefa isimba sogololama Godi wapani. Ae' awalapa basefa penda' maol peloma waf sambema nelelemb sagafe'ma Godafi fendahamaf.
Ae' anda'as na'amba ea' kofagesa isimba atis dei' esis Juda sombale'e ipat lu'unai Godi sa'i sohe ega'.

Apa' God natopalope afi'i afi'i ataga dei' alutu na'a ea' awalapa basefa epes hiasi agof akasi saloma ipa' agufipai wapani. Ae' ina ewalapa anif basef daif, owa'. Awalapa basef ifimba Godi atif fowa' amom profet maloma Moses maga'iefi ma hiahawes owagama sogatagai.

Amom maga'if na'amba ma'i, ‘Dembinai Krais ata' nofa' akafimi, ma atiasi notanima nogosafel matmat nigali'ma epes hiasi. Ama atiasi anen nowalapa basefa epes hiasi sogawef si'i mogogala'i mogogala'ma esis ananisi saloma isimba sogololama Godi wapani.’”
Pol na'ipas na'amba owa', Festus noga na'i banagambel na'amba na'i, “Pol, ina' okom naolena! Ina' nati buk hiami natalifam nogawam dei' gawa anamba lu'unai nanda'ena okom naolena!”
Ea' Pol nagwamana na'i, “Ina' aman dembinai Festus, ae' ina okom naole, owa'atin. Ae' okom mapaowe dei' a'i endilisi.

Ina' dembinai king negawas hi'alas hiahawes isimba hiasi. Ea' ae' dei' awalapas a'ias, ae' ina ombal mahe, owa'atin. Ae' egawa hiahawes isimba hiasi ina sandambaho'ma naepi aligah ine'isi, owa'atin. Ina' natilis negawas ea'. Dei' main, hiahawes isimba ina sataga sandambaho', owa'.
Ina' dembinai king Agripa, ina' nahapifa basef Godi amom profet fowa' magawalipasafi a'a owa'? Ae' egawa ina' nahapifif!”
Ea' king Agripa na'ipa Pol na'i, “Awasi, nogota atamba kwaia'uta ina' na'i nenda'e etaga Kristen?”
