Ea' Pol na'i, “Nogota bandata a'a laota wapani andeande'. Apa' ae' andabetena God na'amba. A'i atiasi ina' neloma epes isimba hiasi dei' pagame' basef ae'afii petaga Kristen na'amba atin si'i ae'. Apa' sen anamba nogowa' ae'i, andaiwa'ma amamba mogawasi'ipa.”
Pol na'ias na'amba owa', dembinai king nali' nosafel nalutu naloma Bernaisi saloma gavman dembinai saloma epes isimba sape sagalomasi.
Ea' sawis ando'. Esis atis sanda'ipama sa'i, “Aman anamba ina nanda' anin mae awani ma nogaga' a'a nonda' kalabus, owa'.”
Ea' Agripa na'ipa Festus na'i, “I'i aman anamba owa' nofala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nogame'anama kotai, ina' netagwahona nofo'o wahifina.”

Ea' anom dembami Rom ma'i basef mandame'maefa afa' ofa' sip ogafe' itap lu'upa Itali. Ea' anom dembami daiam masapa' Pol naloma anis daias sanda' kalabusi ma anona soldia dembinai Julius nugumafias. Anen anona mini'ap soldia gavman dembinai Sisari.

Ea' afa' walota anop sip Adramitiumi. Sip apamba pa'i pefe' analemb walemb bagape naoh agwamba itap lu'upa Asiai. Afa' wafe' ea' anona aman Aristarkus Tesalonaikainai ma itap lu'upa Masedonia nafe' nalomafa.
A'i owa' wafilu wafe' wail anambel wambel Saidon. Ea' aman anamba Julius numafi Pol nanda' waf fasifi ma anen. Na'i aho'ma anen nefe' nigati alipisi ananisi ma nogofa' gwa'aisi maisa esis.
Afa' wakwaha Saidon wafe' owa' fufin a' naluwi anamba afa' wa'i ogafe'ma. Ea' wafe' ailan Saiprus wa'ol fufin akagoma.
Ea' wafe' watopa' naoh wafe' felefele'ma itap lu'upa Silisia a Pamfiliama, ea' wafe' watagama anambel wambel Maira itap lu'upa Lisia.
Wambel ambalemba Julius nati anop sip Aleksandria pa'i pefe' itap lu'upa Itali. Ea' na'ipafa wafe' walota sip apamba.

Wafe', sip apamba pafe' sa'osa'ombel ama anif nimaguf ahi'alef. Wanda'am noma'w nahafa a'owa', ea' wataga felefele'ma anambel wambel Nidas. Fufin nalo lu'una nili'amafa, ea' ina ata' wafe' mehip, a'owa'. Ea' wafe' anin ailan Krit wa'ol fufin owa'ma felefele'ma itap Salmone da'malifipa.
Wanda'am noma'w nahafa a'owa', ea' waila naoh atogw wafe' felefele'ma akata ailan inimba Krit. A'i owa' main, wataga anambel wambel Fasigima Sip Pagaila. Anamba felefele'ma wambel taun lu'wani Lasea.

Nimaguf hiafi fafe' hi'alef owa', nemaf afamba esis Juda sogololama gwa'aisiafi hi'alaf a' ea' anef nimaguf wapani. Nogota atamba naoh gwanda'am lasiali'. Ina nogota bo'ota ma sip pogafe', owa'. Ea' Pol na'ipasa basef esis na'amba na'i,

“Ipa' amam, peme'. I'i dei' afa' ogafe'ma, atiasi otagama numa'umi ea' hiahaom hiami higililam. Ina atiasi uga maim atom moloma sip higililam, owa'atin. Ambagof afa'igufi wapani atiasi higililagof. Ae' egawas endilisi.”
Owa' Julius name' dembinai kapten anamba nugumafi amom manda' maol sipi maloma aman anamba ahama sipi ea' ina name' basef Pol naga'iefi, owa'.

Basis isimba sip pafe' pagaima ina bo'wagon a'owa' ma sip pogailagon nogota atamba fufin nigaluwataima, owa'. Ea' amom hiami magape sipi ma'i anif basef mandame'maefa ma'i mokwaha wambel ambalemba mofe'. Amom i'i la'ifimai, ma'i mofe' motaga ulal basis isimba Finiks a' mope anamba nogota atamba lautai fufin lu'wani nagaluwataima. Basis isimba Finiks sagape ailan inimba Krit. Anamba fasigima ma sip pofe' pondambaho'ma fufin pugaila. Basis isimba sape sandasapa'ma awin negewalama felefele'ma lambilif wa'olwa'ol nemba' negenafama.

Sape nogota bandata tafe' ea', fufin sa'wini nalo nafi'i wa'ol awin natopa' negenafama, ea' ina banagen a'owa'. Ea' amom ma'ias ma'i atiasi amom mogafe' andeande'i si'i ukup amamipi paga'i. Na'amba magiai anka nalotai ea' wafe' waila naoh atogw felefele'ma bandagoma ailan inimba Krit.
A'i owa' main, owa' fufin banagonai sa'i taleo a' naluwi nalo nafi'i ailan inimba Krit.
Nambembema sip apamba ea' ina la'ifipa pogafe' anamba fufin nagafi'ima, owa'. Ea' wapoma fufin atin nefa'ap pafe'.
Ama wandandafel wafe' anin ailan wa'ol fufin akagoma sofalagon sa'i Koda. Wanda'am da nda' numa'um a'owa' ma ogowa' bot sa'utai sisihita.

Ea' amom magiai bot atamba sa'utai talotai sip ilif ea' mowa' sip la'afipa ma analef mandelefa ata' banagep. Amom ombal maham a'owa' ma mofe' sisihim mogail anamba ko'onaga aunai naga'oma, felefele'ma itap lu'upa Libia, Afrika. Ea' matagwahai sel towala atin dowaf.
Fufin naloma naoh makoto'ma afa' mehip a'owa'. Wafilu magi anona uga nimaninai makwahona nowala naoh.
Ama nemaf fagafe'ma wanifi manda' lagof amamugufi atogof makwaha anom hiahaom sel mandelef maim manda' sip nimaninai.

Nimaguf hiafi afa' ina ata' wati awini ondowa, owa'atin. Fufin lu'unai atona endilisi nakoto'mafa wandape na'amba atin. Ea' wa'i atiasi ina ofe' otaga anagon andeande', owa'atin. Wa'i higililafa atin.

Nimaguf hiafi amom ina ata' ma' gwa'aisi, ea' Pol nosafel nalutu la'afena amom na'i, “Ipa' peme'. Fowa' ipa' andeande'ma pendame' basef ae'afi ma afa' ina okwaha Krit ufi'i ulal. Afa' i'i onda'as na'ambaiai, afa' ina dei' onda'am numa'um na'amba, a hiahaom uga maim afa'imi ahigililam, owa'atin.
Ea' dei' a'ipipa asa'ma ukup ipe'ipi pepe banagepa. Ina atiasi anona aman afa'inai nofe' higililana, owa'atin. Sip atop dao' atiasi ea' higililap.
Dei' maina ae' egawa isimba? Ae' aman Godi anda' lotuma anini. Doko' owamb anona ensel ananinai nafi'i nalutu felefele'ma ae'

na'ipi na'i, ‘Pol, ina' owa'i ombal mehenaea. Ina' atiasi nefe' nigalutu nogohnaep gavman dembinai Sisari. Ea' ina' neme', epes hiasi isimba sape sagalomena sipi, isimba God atiasi nogatopalopasi. Ea' ina atiasi anin higililan, owa'.’
“Ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Dei' main, ae' ahapifa God anen atiasi nonda' hiahaom amamba motaga si'i naga'ipiam.
Apa' afa' ata' ofe' wil sisihifa anemba otamba ma anin ailan.”

A'i owa' owambeh ambahemba wikifah biagah tol wala atin wafe' naoh agwamba Adriai. Ama owa' owamb la'afimba awin nandasapa' amom mugumafi uga sipi ea' mogawa ma'i sip ea' pafe' pataga felefele'ma anin ailan.
Ea' mala mandof si'i ikwaf fewala naoh mondola'waifagon fihimba'mam fa'i 40 mita, laogon kwasakwasala. Ea' wafo'o kwasakwasala, walaf wapani mondola'waifagon fa'i 30 mita, ina laogon, owa'.

Ea' amom ombal maham ma'i, “Na'amba mofe' atin sisihim mope anom otamba anamba otambaigima.” Ea' makwaha anka biafin biafin newala sip apamba pagagi'ma ma mogombalo' sip. Ea' amom ukup pa'i awin alipini ata' nitafi kwafalis.
Amam manda' maol sipi ma'i ata' mola' molaoma ufia'wa mokwaha sip mogafe'. Ea' mala bot sa'utai towala mambaso'am ma'i mowasa' anona anka nowala sip apamba pagagi'ma.
Ea' Pol na'ipa dembinai soldia Julius naloma amom soldia na'ipam na'i, “Amam amamba i'i owa' mope sip atapima, atiasi ipa' awepa higililipa.”
Ea' amom soldia matopa' mandelefa bot sa'utai atamba malata togowalai.

Ea' felefele'ma awin na'i nigatafi, Pol na'ipam basef amom hiami. Anen na'i nowa' banagama ata' mogwa' anis gwa'aisi. Ea' na'i, “Nogota lautai ipa' pape dowaf owa' wea' anis gwa'aisia ea' pape ombal mahepa ma hiahawes mais sogatagamepai. Ipa' pape dowaf nimaguf ifimba 14-pelaif ea' pafi'i pataga nemaf dei'ifi.
Dei' a'ipipa dindinip, a'i ipa' ata' pea' anis gwa'aisi ma sowa' banagaipa. Peme', ina atiasi anis maefah sotaga sohambombagepa, owa'atin endilisi. Pepe andeande'.”
Anen na'ias na'amba ma main, nasa'mai anota bret naep amamipi nandabeten nanifela God, nawalota na'ata.
Ea' amom hiami ukup ambe'ep, ea' ma' gwa'aisi wapani.
Afa' hiafai wagape sipi wataga 276-pelaifa hiafai.
Amom ma'as ea', makwaha wit mowala naoh ama sip ata' sofalip.

Awin natafima lala, amom mati anap itap, apa' amom ina mogawa itap apamba akata, owa'. Amom mati anis basis sip pafe' pagaila nondola' nawis a'owa'. Ma'i i'i la'ifima ai, dei' monda' sip pondowasa' ko'onaga akata.
Ea' matopa' mandelefa anka anamba hianai makwahom mala naoh. Ea' matagwaha mandof manda'af mogowa' stiaifi, mandola sela fufin nofa' sip pogafe' akata.
Owa' sip asisihip pape anona ko'onaga asisihip pail. Pagali'ma sisihip a'owa' pape otamba. Ea' naoh mato maha pagagi'ma ea' maolona palalana.
Ea' amom soldia ukup amamipi pa'i moha amamba manda' kalabusi afum hi'ilam, ama amom ina ata' mopaol a' mofa' mefe', owa'.
Owa' dembinai soldia Julius na'i notopalopa Pol. Ea' na'ipam na'i ina a' moham afum, owa'i. Mondape. Ea' na'ipa amam amamba mogogawa paoli ma motoma mindipa' mopaol mili' mogafe' akata.

Apa' anom mogololama paoli, mohapila palag maim tatala'im moloma indah sip anamba papalagalami mohapilam tol mola naoh gofa'am mofe' bandagoma akata. Afa' wame' basef ananifi wanda'as na'amba, dei' afa' hiafai wafe' be'efa wataga walutu naoh akata.
Afa' wafe' wataga andeande' akata, ea' wame' esis sa'i ailan inimba Malta.
Esis epes wambel ambalembaisi sanda'mafa waf fasifi a'owa'. Asaf falai ea' nomanambigin. Ea' sakata nif sa'ipa afa' hiafai wafe' felefele'ma nif.
Ea' Pol nafe' nasa'ma nif nawamonef. Owa' anona ul nagahasi nape nif fahi'ana pao nawisi ando' nondofapa lagol Poli nalelef uli mawis nomon.

Ea' esis amam nematawa wambelisi sati ul anamba nagumba lagol Poli ali'atin nail, ea' sa'i, “Endilisi, aman anamba naha epes sagaga'i. Anen ina afuna naoh embel, owa'atin. Apa' god anamba ape'inai nagagwa waf usi'ifii nandaiwa'ma nogape namona wapani.”
Owa' Pol niali' lagol ul pele'atana nafe' nowala nasef nif ea' anen ina awasina kwasakwasala, owa'atin.

Ea' esis sape sasasa, sa'i sigati lagol gogalota, a'a anen nogowa kwafalisa afuna, owa', owa'atin. Esis sape nogota laota ea' ina sati anis maefah awasi satagaman, owa'atin. Ea' sambema ukup sa'i basef sa'i, “Ahame, Pol anen anona dembinai God.”

Itap pagape felefele'ma anamba afa' wagapomai itap apamba anona aman dembinaii nugumafi esis sagape ailan inimbai, agilinama Publius. Aman anamba nofa'afa wafe' ipat ananitai numafiafa andeande' wape walomana nimaguf wanif.
Publius ahamana awasina na'oh. Alop ananipi nifip ea' nako' embel atom. Ea' Pol nafe' nasa lagof alop ananipi ea' nataga bo'ona wapani.
A'i owa' nanda'as na'amba owa', anis daias ailan inimbaisi awas nanda'asi safi'mai anen nanda'mas beten sataga bo'wes wapani.
Ea' esis saso'afa hiahaom fasimi a'owa'. Ama afa' wa'i ogafe' owa', saso'afa hiahawes hiasi afa' waowaolasi ea' sofa'as sambe'mafas anop sip afa' ogafe'api.

Apa' afa' ata' wape aomb wanemb ailan inimba. Ama main, walota sip apamba pagail ailan inimbai nogota atamba fufin lu'wani nagaluwatai. Sip apamba Aleksandriai. Agilipa sa'i sahomana owamana amom atom magape isag atogai, nogaopana anona god baso'amunai Sus. Ea' afa' wakwahogon wafe'.
Wafe' wataga Sirakyus wape nimaguf wanif
wakwaha anamba wafe' wataga Regium. Ama nemaf fagagi'i fufin lu'unai nalo nafi'i awin negemba'ma, ama nemaf fagagi'i ea' wataga anis basis Puteoli.
Wambel ambalemba afa' wati anis Kristen. Ea' sa'ipafa wape walomas wik si'igai. Ama main, a' wafe' Rom.

Esis Kristen sagape Romi same' basefa afa' wafi'i, anis safi'i sotambel Maket wambel Apiusi, apa' anis safi'i sotambel wambel agol agalemba saga'i ifagw wanogw sanda' fi'i fe' sagapaugwi. Ea' satolofa ufia'w. Pol nati esis, nandagala nanifela God okom ananimi ambanagem.
Afa' wafe' wataga Rom, gavman Romunai na'i aho'ma Pol atona nogape anota ipat noloma anona soldia numafiana nogape atapina.

Nimaguf wanif fafe' ma ea', Pol nofalai amom agufumi Judai mafi'i mandakolas. Ea' na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ipa' sahope, ae' ina anda' anin mae ahambombaga epes ape'isi ma egesambala waf amom bafapapa ape'imii, owa'atin. Apa' owa' amom dembami Judai manda' kalabusima ae' Jerusalem ea' manda'e afi'i lagof amom Romi.
Amom Rom mame' basefa kot ae'atai, ae' basefa waf awafi kofagefa owa'atina mohe egaga'. Ea' ma'i motagwahowe.

Owa' amom Juda mosambala basef ifimba. Na'amba dei' ae' ufia'w ake ma egafe' wahifiwi. Ea' efala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nogame' basefa kot ae'atai. Apa' ae' ina endakotima epes ae'asi ma anis maefah, owa'atin.

Basef kofagefa ifimba atif dei' efalepa pafi'i. Ae' a'i ese'epa anif basef. Ae' ahapifif ape ehafa anen anamba apa' Israel hiapai mape mogohafanai. Ae' agahapifanai. Isimba atis kofagesa ma dei' manda' sen inimba mowa'e.”
Ea' amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Owa' anom amam Judaimi mosapa'i anif basefa moga'ipafa ina'a, owa'atin. Ea' ina anona aman Judainai nafi'i nape na'ipafa andeande'ma na'i anif basef awafi ma ina', owa'atin.
Apa' afa' wa'i ata' ome' nomonas ine'isi atisa malogol ine'igili. Afa' ogawa, walemb hiagoma esis amam nematawa sanda' basef awafi ma mini'ap apamba ine'ipi.”

Ea' amam mandandepa anef nemafa amam hiami mugafi'mai Pol ipat ananitai. Ea' mafi'i kuhimbita mape mape mataga wambomota, anen na'i basef kofagefa nawalapefa amom. Ea' nawalapa basef alihifa epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Anen nawalapa anif basefa mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesafi faloma basef Godi amom profet fowa' maga'iefi. Ama basef ifimba anen na'if banagambela nagasa'ma ukup amamipi ma mogahapifa Jisas.
Anom mahapifana ma basef ananifi, apa' anom owa' mohapifanaea.

Ea' nomonas sandapaom daindai a' mandafe'. Apa' doko' li' Pol na'ipama anif basef na'amba na'i, “Ambal bu'unai Godi na'i endilisi atisa amom akupapa ape'imi ma malogol profet Aisaiai. Fowa' anen naga'i na'amba na'i,

‘Ina' fo'mago esis amam nematawa isimba ni'ipas na'amba ni'i. Atiasi ipa' pepe peme' basef, apa' ipa' ina pegawa kofagefa, owa'. Ipa' pepe naep petawa, apa' ipa' ina atiasi piti anin mae pegawan, owa'atin.

Dei' main, ukup epes amam nematawa isimba paso'as ea', ukup ea' iwanipa sogame' basefa aligah asasigahi, sasopama naep asasipi ea'. I'i owa'ai, esis asiti hiahawes, ea' seme' basef aligah asasigahi a ukup pendanda'ma basef kofagefa, ea' sombema opalef sotanima sifi'mai ae' ma atiasi enda' esis bo'wes wapani. Owa' owa'atin.’”

Ea' Pol na'ipam basef akutaifi na'i, “Dei' ae' a'i ipa' pendegawa basefa God nofa'apa nokwahomapa waf awafi motanima magafi'mai anen, ifimba anen nasapa'ef fafe'ma anis amam nematawa sogololama Godi. Esis isimba dao', atiasi sila basef ifimba, apa' ipa' owa'.”
Pol na'ipam basef ifimba ma ea', amom dembami Juda a' mafe'. Ea' ma'i basef lu'wafi ma'if manda' hihianamaef la'afena amom atom.
A'i owa' main, Pol nape atapina afagof si'igufi biagof ipat atamba anen nagatalotai ea' naso'as opaf nanda'mas waf fasifi epes hiasi safi'i sagatolonai.

Anen nawalapa basef bu'wafi ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Ea' nawalipasa basefa dembinai Jisas Krais. Anen ina ombal mahana, owa'. Nawalapef na'if alihif ea' ina anin epen nasopamana, owa'atin. Basef ifimba ea' ma'uf.
Ae' Pol ape lafela Krais Jisas anda' maola anen atona. God nofale ma enda' maol aposel ea' nosahe'e ma egawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi.

Basef ifimba fagape na'amba. Fowa' gani God nala' lapa basef ifimba bu'wafi ea' na'ipa amom profet ananimi mawalipasef manda'ef fail buk Godi. Basef ifimba fa'i Nogamana ananinai, Jisas Krais dembinai ape'inai. Ea' nofa' alop apa' epesi nataga wambota aman dembinai king Deviti. Apa' dei' Ambal bu'unai Godi nawalapana alihina ma banagami Godi, anen Nogamana ananinai endilisi. Ambal anamba nasa'mana nogosafel wandof wapani.

Lagof Jisasi atogof God natopalope dowaf nowa' banagae anda' maol aposela asa'ma agol Jisas Kraisi lu'wagol. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma anaf anis amam nematawa misi'ah hiasi hi'ilas sohapifana sogaila basef ananifi.
Ipa' wapani pape mini'ap apamba. Ipa' pame' fala Jisas Kraisi ea' pailana pape ananipai.

Ipa' epes Romipai, God okom maimailipa nofalepa ma pagape amam nematawa ananipai atipa. Ae' anda' basef ifimba fafi'mipai. Ae' a'i God ahamapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banaga opalef ipe'ilifi fepe sa'ombel.
Ae' a'i ata' ili' iga'iesi isimba. Ae' anifela God ae'anai ma agol Jisas Kraisi, anifelona ma ipa' wapani. Dei' main, esis itap ganimba hiagoma sa'i basef ifimba ma ipa' pagahapifana.

God nogawa nemaf mamahefa andabetenafi okom ae'ami mandanda' ma ipa' anda'mepa beten. Ae' anda' maol Godi aloma okom ae'ami si'ima agawalipasa basef bu'wafi ma Nogamana ananinai. Beten ae'ani nagape na'amba. Fowa' dondol nimaguf hiafi ahali'ana ma efo'o igatilipa. Owa', owa'atin. Dei' wapani ahali'ana ma anen ni'i awiai, nonda'me ano'w ufia'wa efo'o igatilipa.
Ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma atiasi efo'o igatilipa ma ewa' banagaepa egase'epa anis hiahaom fasimi Spirit Ambal Godi nogase'epam dowafi.
Amamba na'amba. Ae' a'i hapif ae'ani netopalopa ipa' ea' ipe'ini netopalopa ae' newa' banagae. Isimba sowa' banaga opalef ape'ilifi na'amba atin.

Ae' a'i ipa' alipipai ata' pegawa nimaguf hiafi ae' a'i efe'mago ipa' ea' afi'i ataga dei'. Owa' anis hiahawes sasopama ufia'wa ae'. Fowa' atopalopa anis sogololama Godi sataga Kristen salutu banages. Ea' dei' a'i ata' etopalopepa si'i agatopalopa esis.

Ae' wiaf fotaome ma egatopalopa epes hiasi Krais. Wiaf afamba na'amba. Krais natalowe maol lu'wani dei' ae' egwamanan etopalopa epes isimba hiasi hi'ilas. Ma sogogawa waf bu'wafi dambaifii soloma isimba sogololama waf dambaifii, epes gawaisi soloma isimba owa' gawaisia wapani.
Isimba atis dei' opaf ae'afi fosafel endilisi ma egawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma ipa' epes Romipai wapani.

Ae' ina ombal mahe ambal aola egawalipasa basef bu'wami Godi, owa'atin. Ae' ahapifa basef amamba bu'wami banagewe a'owa'. Dei' main, amamba banagami Godi mofa' epes mamahisa sagahapifanai sogotanimai. Esis Juda sahapifi sali' ipa' hipai owa' Judaipaia pagi'.

Dei' main, basef amamba bu'wami Godi mihimba'mepa waf usi'ifi ananifi. Afamba na'amba. I'i apa' mohapifa Jisas banagepa atapipa, God ni'i apa' be'epa hilili'i. Ina ano'w ufia'w daia'wa apa' mogataga be'epa hilili' ma nogohnaep ananisi, owa'atin. Hapif atin. Ufia'w si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Epen ami nigahapifa Godi, anen ni'i anin bu'wani hilili'i ea' nepe namin atapin dondol.”

Dei' a' anaf owagama wapani okom numbutinai Godi nifi'i heven notaga nondawalap atapina ma waf hiafi awafi epes sanda'afi hi'ilaf. Anen nogwamasa akafimi awami ma epes isimba hiasi sogowa' alafugaha waf bu'wafi ananifi sanda' waf awafii dei' sagataloga basef endilisifi ananifi.
Dei' main, waf hiafi Godi ina fandambaho', owa'atin. Waf mamahefa dondo' ma gawa epesi God a' nihimba'masaf fataga alihif fandawalapa.

Fowa' dambadamba God nanda' hiahaom hiami nogota atamba tafi'i tataga dei', esis sati hiahaom anen nanda'ami. Hiahaom amamba esis ilama sogogawa ma anef waf hiafi Godi esis owa' la'ifisa sogatelef naepia. Isimba na'amba. Esis satelef endilisi waf Godi kofagefa, anen dembinai nikila' amom dembami hiami magape itapi hi'alam. Esis sati waf afamba faloma banagami lu'wami ananimi magape lifilafi dondoli. Ea' isimba atis dei' esis ina ano'w ufia'wa sondahali' sombaho' waf awafi asasifi soga'i, “Ae' owa' egawaea.” Owa'atin.

Esis sogawa God nape, apa' esis ina sogawa sa'i anen bu'unai endilisi ma sofela agol ananigili lu'wagol a'a soganifelona, owa'atin. Ukup asasimi mandapoma hiahaom falafalafumi atom ea' nelelemb asasimi ina mataga andeande', owa'. Mataga akutim awasim a'owa'.
Esis aligah maso'as sa'ias sa'i, “Apa' mogogawai,” apa' owa' esis sataga ukup mahamahasa waf bu'wafi.

Ea' saso'ana alafugah God owa' nogaga'ia, ina sanda' lotumana sanifelona, owa'atin. Sandomba lawah otamba maim falafumi atom mataga god baso'amunai mandati si'i amiguf, mafis uguf maim maloma epes owa' sogape namis atapisia, ea' sanda' lotumam sanifelom.
Esis sandaiwa'ma God sowa' alafugahana. Isimba atis dei' anen nakwaha esis ea' ukup asasipi pehafel banagambel pahokolas sanda' waf hiafi alugufi. Sanda so'a waolaf sahambombaga alop asasipi.

Dei' main, esis ukup paso'asa basef Godi endilisifi a sagi'ma basef baso'ami atom maho'ofa basef endilisifi ananifi. Ea' sanda' lotuma hiahaom amamba God nanda'ami, apa' anen, sosambalona. God anen bu'unai kofagonama hiahaom amamba hiami, apa' mondasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol lifilafi endilisi.

Ea' God nakwaha esis saila ukup epesi atipa sanda' waf awafi ambagof awagufafi. Sanda' waf afamba awafi faha'ofa waf daso'amaifi. Nematawa waila waf ikiakafi waloma anowa daiawa. Anom amam wapani manda'am na'amba atin. Ukup amamipi pehafel a'owa' pa'ipa'i amam daiam ama molomam monda' waf awafi. Ea' waf afambai fahambombaga ukup paloma alop amamisi dindi'i dondo' fagwa waf awafi amamifi.
Ukup asasipi atip pandaiwa'ma sogahapifa God nomonas asasisi. Isimba atis dei' nape natitilis saila nomonas awami asasimi atoma sanda' waf naninani aunai owa' andeande'ma epes sonda'anaia.

Esis sanda' waf hiafi fafifafi awafi fape si'ifa esis. Ukup pehafel pa'ipa'i sogofa' hiahaom hiami ma esis atis. Waf awafi agufifa afamba. Ukup kowagalepa hiahaom bu'wami awami, ukup numbutipa sogaha anis, saha anis daias sagaga', migimigah sambaso'ama sogofa' anom hiahaom anin epeni dowadowafa, ea' sanda' maola sagahambombaga epes. Waf anamba aunai asi'ina endilisi ma esis. Ea' sanda'i'ipamas sa'i basef sawalapefa sogola'asa agof anis daiasi ma nogohnaep epes hiasii. Esis sataga bousi saloma God, gigal sa'oh sa'i digah lu'wami atom, sola'asa basef banagafi sagasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof. Ukup pandanda' ma waf naninani aunai dambainai. Ea' sosambala basef mamasasi.
Esis sololama gawa bu'wani ma waf bu'wafi ea' sa'i basef andeande', apa' ina saila basef fimba asasifi datima, owa'. Esis ina ukup paipaila anis daias satilis uwahipis, owa'atin.

Basefa mu'uli Godi usi'ini na'amba na'i, “Epes sanda' waf na'ambainai esis a' sondaga'.” Epes isimba sogawa mu'uli inimba, apa' owa'atin. Sandanda' waf afamba awafi atef. Apa' ina sanda'af dowadowaf, owa'atin. Sasa'ma agofa anis daias sanda' waf awafi na'ambai sandagalas.

Ipa' mamahipama pa'i basef pagawaloga anis daiasi, atiasi kofagema ipe'imi atom. Peme', ipa' pa'i basef pagawaloga anis epes daiasi, waf afambai ipa' pandawaloga ipa' atipa. Dei' main, isimba ipa' pa'i basef pagawalogasi, ina' sanda' waf awafii.
Apa' mogawa God nonda' kotima epes sanda' waf afambai awafi ma basef usi'ifi atef.

Apa' epen ina' nagasapaga anis epes deideiasi sanda' waf fafifafi na'ambaifii, epen ina' nanda' waf afambaii. Dei' ina' okom mandanda' ma'imama? Ina' atiasi la'ifinama nindihi'ama basef God nonda' kotimasafi nefa' negafe'? Owa'atin endilisi.

God nanda'ena andeande' a'owa', ea' ata' nape nasasaena nogota lautai, ina nagwamena waf awafi nase'ena akafimi kwafalis, owa'atin. Waf afamba bu'wafi Godi ina' okom mandanda'maf na'i falafifi? Anen nanda'mena waf afamba bu'wafi ma ata' negambema nembel. A'i ina' negawaf a'a owa'?

Ina' nanda' du'wanigai ea' dei' ina ata' nembema nembel, owa'. Ina' natama akafimi lu'wami nikikama ina' atina. Ama nemaf okom numbutinai Godi notaga alihina ma kota, nogowaloga epes hiasi ma basef usi'ifi banagafi ananifi.
Nemaf afamba anen nowalogamasa waf epesi atona atin, nogwamasaf fendahama waf esis sanda'afi.
Anis sagape banages atapisa waf bu'wafi sanda' maol solaoma ufia'wa sogofa' agof lu'wagufi, sigati mogogala'i ma sogape andeande' lifilafi.
Apa' anis ukup pandapoma esis atis ea' sowa' alafugaha basef endilisifi saila waf ikiakafi. Epes isimba anaf God okom numbutina a'owa' nindaiwa'masa waf awafi asasifi.
Nimanimi lu'wami moloma akafimi anaf mupai' epes isimba hiasi sanda' waf awafii hi'ilas. Esis Juda sili' ea' isimba owa' Judaisia wapani sigi' solomas
Apa' God anaf noso'asa poe bu'wani ma mogogala'i agof lu'wagufi foloma opalef awanilifi epes isimba hiasi sanda' waf fasifii. Esis Juda sili' ea' isimba owa' Judaisia sigi'.
Dei' main, anen nowaloga epes hiasi ma ikwaf usi'ifi atef.

Anen okom mandanda' na'amba. Epes mamahisa sogololama mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani sanda' waf awafii, anaf a' higililas. Apa' epes Juda sogogawa mu'uli inimba ea'i ma dei' sanda' waf awafii, anaf nowalogasa mu'uli inimba atin.
Ina epes isimba sagame' mu'uli dowadowafi sataga bo'wes hilili'ma naep Godi, owa'atin. Epes mamahisa same' basefa sagaila mu'ulii, isimba atis anaf God ni'i esis bo'wes hilili'i.

Esis isimba sogololama Godi, waf asasifi na'amba. Esis mu'uli akas, apa' nemaf mamahefa sagaila malogofa nomon nelelemb asasimi, waf afamba a' fataga si'i mu'uli asasimi. Esis mu'uli Godi akas, apa' endilisi sailana waf afamba ma nelelemb asasimi.

Waf afamba asasifi fihimba'mapa basefa mu'uli inimba fagape ukup asasipi. Ea' malogof fagape opalef asasimi nomoni, amamba wapani mihimba'mapa na'amba atin. Dei' main, ukup asasipi pa'ias pihimba'mas alihif na'amba. Anif nimaguf panda' kotimasa waf awafi, apa' anif nimaguf andeande' dondo'ma waf esis sanda'afi.

Amamba anaf motaga na'amba atina nemaf afamba God nogawaloga waf hiafi epesi. Afamba anen ni'i ila ma Jisas Krais nope dembinai nogawaloga waf hiafi asasifi fandambahi'i feloma basef sa'if sagambaho'afi. Basef bu'wafi God ae' agawalapafi ifimba atif.

Ipa' pendefala pa'i ipa' Juda pagahipifa mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani sisihina negatopalopepa pindihi'ama okom wandafumi Godi. Ea' ipa' pandasa'ma agof ipe'igufi panda'i, “Apa' mogawa God endilisinai.”
Ea' ipa' pegawa okom God na'i pigagi'mami ma pegelafa waf mu'uli inimba ma ukup pi'i waf usi'ifi pigailaf.
Ipa' pegawa pa'i ipa' epes pegegawa basef Godi ma pigasindi'amona epes isimba naep pagaso'asi ea' pape si'i nagwapina epes isimba sagape akoti ma pigihimba'mas.

Ipa' epes gawaipai pagawalipa isimba gawa akasi saloma anis daias sogololama basef Godii sagape si'i awasi ata' sa'wisi. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa pa'i basef endilisifi hiafi faloma gawa hiani hi'alas sape mu'uli inimba pelafan pegegawani.

Basef ifimba atif hiafi fagali'i dei' fitanima fila ipa'. Ipa' pandawalipa anis epes daias, apa' ipa' owa' ata' pili' piwalipa ipa' atipaia? Ipa' pawalipasa basef anis pa'i, “Ipa' ina a' penda' wal, owa'i”, apa' ae' a'i ipa' wapani panda' wali?

Ipa' pawalipasa basef anis pa'i, “Ipa' ina a' pehambombaga waf daso'amaifi, owa'i.” Apa' owa' ipa' wapani panda' waf afambai awafi? Ipa' pandaiwa'ma god baso'amunai, apa' owa' apakwalopa hiahawes saga'oh ifagw epes sanda' lotuma god amamba baso'amii? Na'ambai ina andeande', owa'.
Ipa' pandasa'ma agof ipe'igufi atogof lu'wagof panda'i, “Apa' mogogawa mu'uli Godii nagaso' Mosesanii.” Apa' owa' ipa' pimbisila' mu'uli inimba panda' waf afambai atef dei' pahambombaga agol Godi.
Waf ipe'ifi awef si'i basef fagail buki fa'ias faga'i, “Kofagema ea' ipa' Judai atom, dei' esis owa' Judaisia sogololama Godi sa'i basef sanda' agol Godi findiwagol.”

Endilisi, i'i ipa' Juda pihapila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani pilan endilisi, dao' waf afamba magatopa' alopafi bu'wafi. Apa' i'i ipa' pegawala mu'uli inimba, atiasi a' pelelama God petaga na'amba atin si'i ipa' owa' pegatopa' alopia.
Epes isimba owa' Judaisi sogatopa'mas alopia, esis sagape na'amba. I'i esis sila waf afamba hiafi usi'ifi ma mu'uli inimba, atiasi sotaga si'i isimba sagatopa'mas alopi ma naep Godi.

Endilisi, esis owa' Judaisia atiasi sola' basef mila ipa' Juda. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani nagape buki ea' patopa' alop ipe'ipi, apa' owa' ipa' pimbisila' basefa mu'uli inimba. Apa' esis isimba owa' Judaisi sogatopa' alopia saila basefa mu'uli inimba.
I'i ipa' epes Juda dowadowaf, ipa' ina Juda endilisipai, owa'. Ea' waf afamba sagatopa' alopafi ina waf alop atop si'ipi, owa'atin.

Ipa' epes hipai Juda. I'i opalef ipe'ilifi fetaga dambailif, ipa' Juda endilisi. Waf sagatopa' alopafi, God nanda'af opalef ipe'ilifi nomon. Maol inimba ina natagama basefa mu'uli nagail buki, owa'. Ambal bu'unai Ananinai atona nanda'an. Epen ami nenda'as na'ambai, anin agol akana nogohnaep epesi, owa'atin. Anin agol lu'wagola naep Godi atip.
Dei' esis Juda sikila' anis daias owa' Judaisia ma waf maif bu'wafi? Waf bu'wafi maif fatagama waf afamba magatopa' alopafi?
Awasi! Waf hiafi fasifi fatagaf. Waf fagali'i afamba. God nali' naso'asa basef ananifi endilisifi atif esis Juda ma sugumafif.
Endilisi, anis ina sahapifa basef ifimba andeande'. Owa' dei' ata' si'i main? A'i waf afamba awasifi asasifi atiasi fenda' God nokwaha basef endilisifi ananifi?

Owa'atin endilisi. Apa' mi'i basef monda'i, epes hiasi sagambaso'ami, apa' God atotona naga'i basef endilisi dondoli, nanda' maol datimai si'i Baibel naga'i, “Atiasi epes amam nematawa hiasi seme' basef ine'ifi si'i endilisifi atif. Nemaf afamba esis si'i sonda' kotimina, ina God atiasi nepa'agas nikila'as.”

Dei' i'ipipa anif basef apa' epes ukup paga'iefi. Basef ifimba na'amba. Dei' ata' mama? I'i waf awafi ape'ifi fawalapai waf usi'ifi Godi fataga alihifai, apa' atiasi mi'ias mi'imama? Mi'i God nanda' waf awafi okom wandafuma nogagwamapa waf awafi ape'ifi? Owa'atin endilisi. I'i God nonda' waf awafiai, dei' anen nowaloga waf amam nematawa hiasi ma main? Owa'atin endilisi.

Apa' anis epes ukup pandanda' dowaf sambaso'am sa'i, “I'i epes hiasi siti waf baso'afi awafi ape'ifi feloma waf Godi endilisifi ma sowalogaf, asogawa waf Godi fikila' waf ape'ifi. Ea' waf ape'ifi fawalapai agol Godi lu'wagol. Apa' na'ambaiai, God ina atiasi nogwamapa waf awafi ape'ifi, owa'atin.” Apa' owa'atin endilisi.

I'i apa' mila ukup ipimbai atip, mefe' mefe' mi'i, “Awi, apa' a' monda' waf awafi ma mugawalapai waf bu'wafi Godi.” Endilisi, anis epes sambaso'mas sa'i basef findiwaefa ae' sa'i ae' aga'ias na'amba. Apa' owa'atin. Epes isimba saga'i basef ifimbai, anaf God nogwamasa waf awafi asasifi dondo'af atin.

Dei' si'i main? Basef ifimba doko'ifi kofagefa fa'i main? Fa'i apa' Juda mikila' anis daias owa' Judaisia ma waf bu'wafi, a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi. Ae' ihimba'mepa basef ea', waf awafi faso'ala apa' hiapai hi'alapa, esis Juda saloma isimba sogololama basef Godi wapani.
Baibel na'i isimba na'amba na'i, “Ina anin epen bo'wen hilili' nape, owa'atin endilisi.
Ina anin epen negawa waf bu'wafi. Ina anin epen nanda' maol nelaoma God, owa'atin.
Epes hiasi sololama ufia'w ea' sataga epes awasis endilisi hi'alas. Aho', owa' anin atitin bo'wena.

Malogof asasimi mandahama si'i nowagah kwambifah sagawa epesa mindihianama alihim magape. Esis sa'i basef hiafi baso'afi faloma basef hiafi fafifafi ma sagahasopalo'wa anis epes daias, si'i nombot nagape uguf faha epes sagaga'i.
Dondol ukup asasipi numbutip a'owa' sa'i basef awami atoma sagaso'as nimanimi anis daias.
Esis kwafalis atisa sagaha anis daias sagaga'.
Dondol sahambombaga epes hiasi saso'asa akafimi nimanimi hiami.
Opalef asasilifi ina fape awanelefa sogape opalef atifilif sogaloma anis epes daias, owa'atin.
Esis ina ukup paipaila God ombal mahasana ma sogaila waf ananifi, owa'atin.”

Ea' dei' apa' mogawa basef mamahifa Godi fagape mu'uli anen nagaso' Moses ani fa'i apa' Juda mogape lafelani inimbai mondailan. Owa' ina la'ifipa mailan andeande', owa'. Ea' ina anin epen la'ifina niga'i, “Ae' epen bo'owe hilili'i,” Owa'atin. Apa' epes hiapai ganimba hiagoma, kofagema mapoma apa' ma naep Godi anaf nogawalogapa.
Dei' main, waf afamba mogaila mu'uli inimba, owa' anin epen atitin atiasi negefa' agol epen bo'wen hilili' ma naep Godia, owa'. Mu'uli inimba nihimba'mapa waf awafi ape'ifi ea'.

Apa' dei' waf usi'ifi Godi ea' fataga alihigima fandawalap. Afamba ina fataga fagi'ma waf sanda' maol sa'i sogaila mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'atin. Afamba fataga ano'w ufia'w na'amba. Basef hiafi Godi fagail Buki fawalapai waf afamba. Anif fail mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani ea' anif amom profet hiami manda'afi.

Waf afamba na'amba. Epen nagahapifa Jisas Kraisi, inimba God nofalan na'i epen bo'wen hilili'i. Ea' apa' epes hiapai mogahapilafi hi'alapa, God nanda'apa na'amba atin, esis Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia wapani.
Apa' epes hiapai hi'alapa manda' waf awafi mumbisila' mu'uli Godi ea' ina la'ifipama atiasi mogati mogogala'i bu'wami ananimi, owa'atin.

Apa' owa' God nati apa' uwahipipa, natopalopapa dowaf. Apa' mahapifa Krais Jisas ea' God na'i apa' bu'upai. Apa' ina maso'ana anis maefah matalona, owa'atin. Anen natopalopapa ma Krais Jisas ea' natagwahepa natalepa ma mogape wahifipa.

God nihimba'masana alihina amam nematawa hiasi na'amba. Anen naga' esimbel ananimbeli balo bali'amona okom wandafunai Godi ma bagakwaha waf awafi epes mamahisa sagahapifanai. Ga' Krais Jisasi atin dei' God nihimba'mapa waf ananifi usi'ifi hilili'i na'amba. Fowa' nanda' esis amam nematawa sa'ombemas ea' ina nogwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi, owa'.

Apa' dei' dao', anen nihimba'mapa waf usi'ifi ananifi ea' fataga alihigima ma nogagwamasa waf awafi asasifi. Isimba atis dei' apa' mogawa anen usi'ina hilili' hi'agalanai ma noga'i epes mamahisa sogahapifa Jisasi bo'wes hilili'i.

Ea' dei' apa' ufia'w akapa ma mogasa'ma agof ape'igufi atogof lu'wagof, owa'atin. Ufia'w akwamba ea' kwaso'. Main da'im mahefa ufia'w akwamba? A'i waf afamba magaila mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani? Owa'atin endilisi! Waf magahapifa Jisasafi atef fahefa ufia'w akwamba.
Ea' apa' mogawa epes mamahisa sagahapifa Jisas atini, God na'i esis atis sataga bo'wes hilili', apa' esis sanda' maola sogaila mu'uli inimbai, owa'atin.
Dei' mama? A'i God anen Dembinai esis Judai atona? Owa'atin. Anen esis isimba owa' Judaisia wapani.

Dei' main, God anen ea' anamba atona. Anen na'i basef atifif fafe'ma epes hiasi. Epes ami sogahapifa Krais Jisasi, atiasi God ni'i esis isimba bo'wes hilili'i, esis Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia wapani.
Isimba atis dei' hapif inimba apa' ina mi'i apa' mapa'aga mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'atin endilisi! Apa' mahapifa Krais Jisas dei' mawalapa basef kofagefa ma mu'uli inimba.
Apa' mi'i basefa Abraham akunamapa apa' Judai mi'imama? Anen nanda' maina God naga'i anen bu'unai?
I'i Abraham a' endilisi ma nonda' maol bu'wani ma dei' nagataga aman bo'ona hilili'ai, dao' anen a' nondagala nosa'ma agol ananigili atogol lu'wagol. Apa' naep Godi owa'.
Baibel na'ias na'imama? Naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Abraham nahapifa God ea' okom mandanda'ma hapif inimba na'i anen bo'ona hilili'.”
Apa' mogawa epes sanda' maoli ma sogofa' hiahawesa maoli, hiahawes isimba ina mi'ias mi'i mogofa'as dowaf si'i preseni, owa'atin. Isimba hiahawes sagatopa' maolasi atis.

Apa' God ina nati maol bu'wani epes sanda'ani ma niga'i esis bu'wasi, owa'atin. Anen nati epen mamahina nagahapifana la'ifinai ma nogofala epes sanda' waf awafii bo'wes hilili'i. Ea' God okom mandanda'ma okom epeni maga'i endilisi atis epen inimbai dei' na'i anin bo'wen hilili'i.
Fowa' Devit wapani nanda' anif basef fail buk Baibela epes mamahisa God natilis naga'i bo'wes hilili'i, isimba a sandagala. Esis ina sanda' maol, owa'. Sahapifana atin dei' na'i esis bo'wes hilili'.
Devit nanda' basef ifimba na'i, “Epes ami God nagakwaha waf awafi asasifi okom magaso'anafi ma nagaofana awami asasimi, epes isimba sonahas.
Epes ami Dembinai owa' okom mopoma waf awafi asasifia, isimba sonahas.”

Epes isimba Devit na'i sonagahasi, epes isimba sagatopa' alopi atis? Owa'atin. Isimba owa' sogatopa' alopia wapani. Dei' main, doko' ae' a'ipipa Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, “Abraham nahapifa God, ea' God okom mandanda' ma hapif inimba na'i anen bo'ona hilili'.”

Dei' Abraham nape si'i maina God okom mapomana naga'i aman bu'unai hilili'i? Anen nali' natopa' alop ea' a'a ata' owa' ata' notopa' alopa? Anen ina dei' natopa' alopa God naga'i anen bo'ona hilili'i, ata' owa'atin.

Fowa' Abraham nali' nahapifa God nofalana epen bu'unai hilili'i. Ama main, nagi' natopa' alop. Waf afamba nagatopa' alopafi anol ametal God nihimba'mana na'amba na'i nemaf afamba ata' owa' notopa' alopa, a' na'i anen aman bu'unai nagahapifa Godi. Isimba atis dei' anen nataga akunama epes hiasi nagahapifa Godi owa' sogatopa' alopia. Esis sahapifa God atin, nofalas epes bu'wasi.

Ea' anen akunama epes isimba Juda sagatopa' alopi wapani. Apa' esis ina satopa' alop atop, owa'. Esis sagi'ma bo'wagah Abrahami sahapifa God si'i fowa' anen nagahapifana nogota atamba ata' owa' nogatopa' alopa.

Fowa' gani God na'i basef nala' lap nagaloma Abraham na'i, “Ae' anaf ese'ena itap hiagoma ina' neloma esis bafasena akusena ine'isi wapani.” Apa' Abraham ina naila mu'uli anaf God nogaso' Mosesani ma dei' God nala' lap nalomana naga'ipana basef ifimba, ata' owa'atin. Abraham nali' nahapifa God dei' nofalana aman bo'ona hilili'i na'ipana basef ifimba.

Anif basef fatopalopa ifimba fagali'i na'amba fa'i, I'i epes sagaila mu'uli mamahina Godi ma sofa' hiahaom amamba God nogaso'asamiai atiasi waf afamba mogahapifa Godafi a' fenalo ea' basef ifimba lapafi Godi wapani a' owa' banagefa, ea' owa'atin.

Dei' main, mu'uli inimba nigihimba'mapa okom numbutimi Godi ma nogaso'as akafimi isimba sogasambala mu'uli inimbai. I'i apa' owa' mila basefa mu'uli inimbaia, God okom wandafuna nopomapa. I'i mu'uli inimba owa'ai, God ina a' ni'i epes sumbisila' mu'uli inimba satopa'an, owa'atin.

Abraham nahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' God na'ipana basef ifimba lapafi bu'wafi ma apa' mogogawa endilisi God na'ipas basef ifimba wapani na'i apa' hiapai bafapa Abrahami, naso'apaef dowaf si'i presen. Ina naso'asef epes isimba sagaila mu'uli inimba atini, owa'. Epes mamahisa sagahapifa God na'amba atin si'i Abrahami, esis wapani. Anen nali' nahapifa God nataga bafamapa nali' naumb nagali'i ma apa' hiapai mamahepama dei' magi' magahapifa Godi.

Si'i Baibel naga'i, God fowa' na'ipa Abraham naga'i, “Ae' enda'ena nepe bafama isimba misi'ah epes hiasii.” Abraham anen bafamapa ape'inai ma naep Godi. Anen nahapifa God atona nagaso'asa ambal namili epes sagaga'ii, a nogofala hiahawes hiasi ata' owa' sogatagaia si'i sataga sagape ea'i.

Abraham ina dei' nati hiahawes isimba God na'ipanas ea' na'i nonda'asi. Apa' owa', anen nahapilif endilisi si'i nagatilis ea'i. Isimba atis dei' nataga “Bafama esis amam nematawa misi'ah hiasi.” Si'i fowa' God na'ias ea' naga'i, “Owagama esis mini'ap wambota ine'isi sogataga na'amba.”

Abraham hagona ea' felefele'ma afagof 100-pelaiguf alop ananipi a' pala'of si'i nagaga'i. Ea' waulu'mana Sera a' hage'w wapani asa'w ina la'ifi'wa kogola awasi, owa'. Abraham okom mapoma isimba, apa' okom ananimi banagami nogogawa God endilisi ina mowala, owa'atin. Anen nahapifa God banagambela basef God nagala' lapafi ma hiahawes anaf sigi' sogatagai. Hapif atin nanda'ana banagona ea' nafela agol Godi lu'wagol.
Anen nahapifa God endilisi ma nogogawa anen la'ifinai ma nonda'as na'amba si'i fowa' na'i nonda'asa basef ifimba nagala' lapafi.
Isimba atis dei' God a' okom mapoma hapif ananini ea' na'i, “Anen epen bo'ona hilili'i.”
Fowa' amom profet manda' basef ifimba fagape Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, “God okom mapoma anen epen bo'ona hilili'i.” Amom ina manda' basef ifimba ma Abraham atona, owa'atin.
Manda'efa apa' wapani. Apa' mahapifa God nasa'ma Jisas dembinai ape'inai nogosafel matmati. Isimba atis atiasi God okom mondanda'ma hapif ape'ini a' ni'i apa' be'epa hilili'i.
God nasapa' Jisas nafi'i naga'ma nagakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi. Ea' nasa'mana matmata noga'i apa' amam nematawa be'epa hilili'i.
Basef kofagefa fape fagali'i ifimba, hapif ape'ini atin dei' God nofalapa epes be'epa hilili'i. Isimba atis dei' Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nanda'apa mape opalef atelef awanelef maloma God.

Anen atona ufia'wa apa' mahapifana mogape nomona okom Godi magamagaila apa' a'owa'i, natopalopapa dowaf nambemapai dei' magape andeande'mami. Apa' mogawa endilisi mape mohafa anaf God nofa'apa mope molomana mugati mogogala'i ananimi. Hapif inimba nanda'apa sonahapa ma amamba.
Apa' ina sonahapama amamba atom, owa'atin. Apa' sonahapama nimanimi mogatagamapa wapani. Dei' main, apa' mogawa mofa'ama mogowa' banagapa wapani.

I'i apa' mulutu banagepama gwamba, God niga'i aho'mapai. Isimba atis dei' apa' mogawa endilisi anen nigaila basef ananifi datimai ma notopalopapa mope mogohafa' mogogala'i banagami ananimi anaf mogatagai.
I'i apa' mogawa endilisi na'amba, gawa ape'ini ina atiasi nenalo, owa'. Dei' main, God naso'apa Ambal bu'unai Ananinai ea' waf okom magamagailapafi fape lu'ufa opalef ape'ilifi.
Fowa' apa' ina banagepa ma monda' waf bu'wafi, owa', nogota atamba God nandandepata ea'i, Krais naga'ma apa' mogowa' alafugaha Godi.

Ipa' ukup pandanda' pa'imama? Anin epen na'i nega'ma negatopalopa epen ami na'i nigaila mu'uli Godi, a'a owa'? A'i atiasi ina anis si'i aho', owa'atin. Apa' i'i anin epen bo'wen hilili'i, dao' anin ila ma nega' negatopalopa epen inimba bu'wani.
Apa' ata' manda' waf awafi atin, Krais naga' natopalopapa. Ea' dei' God nihimba'mapa okom lu'unai naganagaila ape'i nandawalap. Krais a nikila' epen inimba bo'wen hilili'i naga' natopalopapa.
Anen naga' esimbel ananimbeli balo dei' God nofalapa amam nematawa be'epa hilili'i. Isimba atis dei' apa' a' mogawa endilisi atis Krais natagwahepa ma okom wandafunai Godi.

Fowa' apa' ata' mape boupai Godi, owa' dei' nanda'apa mataga alipipai ananipai opalef atifilif malomana. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma Nogamana ananinai nagaga'ma apa'. Isimba atis dei' apa' mape alipipai Godi mogawa endilisi Krais nape namona ma dei' motanima molomana sisihipa mogape.

Apa' ina isimba atis, owa'. Apa' mondagala ma God. Dei' main? Fowa' apa' boupai ma anen apa' dei' Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nali'amona naumbih ape'imi nanda'apa mataga alipipai malomana. Ea' dei' sonahapama anen.

Apa' mogawa isimba. Aman atotona nali' nanda' waf awafi, dei' waf awafi fape nelelemb amam nematawa itapasi. Ea' dei' waf awafi fahokolai ga' nafi'i, dei' ga' nefa' epes hiasi hi'alas saga'. Dei' main, epes hiasi ea' sanda' waf awafi hi'alas.

Fowa' gani nogota atamba God ata' owa' noso'anai mu'uli ananini Mosesa, waf awafi fali' fataga fape itap ana'e. Apa' i'i basefa mu'uli inimba owa'atinai, dei' God ina a' nowaloga epesa waf awafi asasifi, owa'atin.

Apa' ga' nataga nape nogota atamba Adami nafi'i nataga nogota Mosesi. Epes isimba hiasi ina sogawa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'atin. Apa' owa' ga' nahapilas sisihis hi'alas. Fowa' God naso'ana mu'uli ananini Adam, owa' Adam natolapan. Anis epes daias ina sumbisila'an si'i Adam nagatolapan, owa'. Apa' ga' nahapilas wapani. Aman anamba Adam nondola'waifa aman anamba Dembinai atona nigi' nogatagai.

Waf God nagatopalopapa dowafafi ma Jisas Kraisi faloma waf awafi Adam nanda'afi, ina na'amba atin, owa'atin endilisi. Aman anamba Adam atotona nanda' waf awafi, dei' nanda' epes hiasi saga'. Apa' God nagatopalopapa dowafi, amamba mataga lu'um a'owa' ma aman atotona Jisas Krais. Ea' apa' dei' mofa' hiahawes isimba presen Godi nikila' ga' inimba ea' nataga lu'una a'owa' ma nagatopalopa epes hiasi.

Waf bu'wafi God nagatopalopapa dowafafi afamba ina fape atogon faloma waf awafi aman anamba atotona nanda'afi, owa'atin endilisi. Aman anamba nanda' waf atetef awafi. Ea' God nawaloga apa' epes hiapai na'i, “Ipa' awepa hi'alepa a'owa'.” Apa' manda' waf awafi hiafi apa' God okom maimailapa natopalopapa dowaf ea' na'i apa' epes be'epa hilili'i.

Aman anamba atotona nanda' waf awafi. Isimba atis dei' ga' nesafel nowalo' epes hiasi hi'alasa anen atona. Apa' maol aman anamba atotona Jisas Kraisi a' lu'win banagen a'owa' nikila' ga' ma nagatopalopa epes mamahisa God natopalopas dowafa sogofa' waf usi'ifi hilili'i, epes isimba atiasi sope namisa sogape dembesi.
Dei' apa' magape na'amba. Fowa' waf awafi atetef fanda' apa' hiapai higilalapa hi'alapa. Ea' na'amba atin waf usi'ifi atetef fatagwahepa ma waf awafi fanda'apa dei' mape namepa.
Aman atotona nosambala basef Godi dei' apa' hiapai mape manda' waf awafi. Ea' na'amba atin aman bu'unai atotona naila basef ifimba, dei' apa' hiapai motaga usi'ipa hilili' ma naep Godi.

Ama main, mu'uli inimba God nogaso' Mosesani natagama esis sogogawa waf asasifi awafi sagatopa' mu'uli inimba. Apa' esis ina sakwaha waf afamba awafi, owa'atin. Sanda'af hiafi a'owa'. Apa' owa', ufia'w God nagatopalopa esisa'w dowafi kwataga lu'ukw a'owa' ma esis.

Fowa' waf awafi fataga fape ilifa apa' hiapai dei' maga'. Apa' dei' waf God nagatopalopapa dowafafi fape ilif a'owa' fikila'. Anen natopalopapa ea' nofalapa amam nematawa usi'ipa hilili'i ma mogofa' ambal namili lagape lifilafi dondoli ma dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais.
Ea' dei' apa' monda' basef maif wapani? Apa' mondanda' waf awafi atapipa ma atiasi waf God nogatopalopapa dowafafi fegataga lu'wif a'owa'? Apa' mi'ias na'amba a'a owa'?
Owa'atin endilisi! Waf awafi atef, dei' apa' maga' ea'. Dei' maina apa' ata' magafe' waf afambai awafi atef? Owa'atin, hapaifi.
Ipa' pegawa apa' mamahepama mogofa' sa'ofa magape mandaloma sisihipama Krais Jisasi ea' mofa' sa'of maloma ga' ananini.

Sa'of inimba apa' mandaloma sisihipa maloma ga' Jisasi, God nawapa maloma Krais matmat. Banagami fasimi ahamanai atom masa'ma Krais nosafel matmat. Ea' na'amba atina apa' mosafel wapani mape banagepa mogafe' waf dambaifi ma ambal namili itap apa'e.
Apa' mandaloma endilisi tatala'ipa maloma anona ga' inimba ananini si'i anen nagaga'. Ea' na'amba atin anaf mondaloma tatala'ipa mosafel wapani molomana.

Apa' mogawa opalef apimi ape'imi amamba maga' mail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai maloma Krais ea' God natalogofa banagami waf aunai manda' maol magape alop ape'ipii. Isimba atis dei' waf awafi ina fawasi'apa sisihipa wapani, owa'.
Dei' main, anona aman nagaga'i, waf awafi ina ata' fahapilana sisihina wapani, owa'.
Aho', apa' maga' maloma Krais. Ea' mogawa endilisi atiasi mope ambal namili molomana wapani.
Apa' mogawa God nasa'ma Krais nosafel matmat ea'. Isimba atis anen ina atiasi noga' wapani, owa'. Ga' ina banagen a'owa' negatalogofa anen, owa'atin.
Anen naga' atetef ea' ma'um. Ga' inimba atin anen nahambombaga banagami amamba waf awafii mowala hi'alam. Anen dei' nape ambal namili naila okom Godi atom.
Ea' na'amba atina ipa' wapani a' ukup pendapoma ipa' atipa paga' ea' pakwaha waf awafi si'i sagaga'i. Ipa' ukup pendapoma ipa' ea' pape sisihipa paloma Krais Jisas pape namipa paloma God.
Ipa' ina pi'i aho'ma waf awafi fepe fetaga banagef femafi ipa', owa'i. Na'amba waf afamba awafi fehende'epa a pila waf alop atopafi.

Ipa' ina peso' lagof bo'wagah ipe'isi sefe'ma penda' waf awafi, owa'i. Pendaso'anas God atona soloma nomonas ukup ipe'isi hi'indalasa anen atona si'i epes sotanima sogosafel matmat wapani sagape namis. Ea' ipa' pese'ana alop du'wa'wanipi hi'indalapa Goda penda' waf usi'ifi.

Ipa' pegawa waf aunai ina ata' nope lu'unama ipa' wapani, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' dei' ina ata' pape lafela mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani ma pigailan, owa'atin. Ipa' apape lafela ufia'w Godi ato'w okom maimailapa ma nagatopalopapa dowaf.

Ea' dei' apa' ata' monda'as mi'imama? Apa' ina mape lafela mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'atin. Apa' dei' mape lafela ufia'w akwamba God nagatopalopapa dowafa'wi. Ea' dei' apa' monda' waf awafi a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi!

I'i ipa' peso' ipa' atipa penda' maol pepe lafela aman ami, ipa' pape sisihipama anen atona. I'i ipa' peso' opalefa waf awafi, ipa' pape lafela waf afamba fawasi'ipa sisihipa paga'. Apa' i'i ipa' peso' opalefa waf bu'wafi, dao' pape lafela God pataga usi'ipa hilili' ma naep ananipi.

Endilisi, fowa' ipa' pape lafela waf awafi fawasi'ipa sisihipa. Owa' God nanda'epa pape lafela basef ananifi pailif ea' paso'ana ukup nelelemb hi'alasa pagaila basef ifimba endilisifi ipa' pigalafafi. Ea' apa' mundanifela God.
Anen natagwahipa ma banagami waf awafii, dei' pataga epes panda' maol pape lafela waf usi'ifi fawasi'ipa sisihipa.

Ukup ipe'ipi ina dei' banagep, owa'. Isimba atis dei' aila ukup apa' epesi a'ias alihis a'i. Fowa' ipa' ata' paso' alop ipe'ipi du'wa'wanip pape lafela waf awasif alugufi faloma waf hiafi sogosambala mu'uliefi ea' fawasi'ipa sisihipa. Apa' dei' peso' alop wa'awa'api hi'ilap pondafe'ma waf usi'ifi fiwasi'ipa sisihipa ma pegape Godi atipa si'ipa.
Fowa' ipa' ata' pape lafela waf awafi fawasi'ipa sisihipa ea' nogota atamba ipa' ata' pape pelelama waf usi'ifi.
Ipa' pefa' hiahawes mais fasisi ma waf awafi fowa' panda'afi, ma dei' ipa' ambagof awagufafi? Owa'atin. Waf afambai fagawalapai ga' atini.

Owa' dei' God natagwahipa ea' ma waf awafi nanda'epa pape panda' maola anen pape lafelana atapipa. Maol inimba atiasi netaga nela gwa'aisi isimba. Ipa' pepe be'epa hilili' ananipai atipa ma pegefa' ambal namili andeande' dondol lifilafi.

Waf awafi fagwamasa awami ma isimba sanda' maola waf awafii. Awami amamba. Esis atiasi soga' atin higililas. Apa' God dei' naso'apai presen fasini dowaf, inimba ambal namili lagape dondoli ma mope sisihipa mogoloma Krais Jisas.
Ipa' alipipai, ipa' pegawa mu'uli ma waf daso'amaifi ea'. Ea' pegawa andeande'ma basef ifimba dei' iga'ipipafi. Nogota atamba epen ata' nagape namin, anin ata' nape lafela mu'uli inimba.

Basef kofagefa ma mu'uli inimba ifimba. I'i ano'w nemata'w kwagaso' amani, ma anen ata' nogape namona, mu'uli inimba ata' newa'ana naloma ako'w ata' sape sisihis. Apa' i'i waulunama'w nogaga', dao' mu'uli inimba nagahapilasi pele'atan kwape wahifi'w.

Ea' i'i anen aman ata' nope ambal lapaona ma waulu'mana kofe' kogaso' anona aman daiana, ea' sofala'w si'i ako'w kwanda' waf awafi so'a waola anona aman daianai. Apa' i'i aman akwa'unai nogaga', mu'uli inimba ina ata' nahapilas sisihis wapani, a' owa'. Ako'w kwandatagwah kwape wahifi'w. Esis ina si'i basefa ako'w si'i ako'w kwanda' so'a wauli, owa'atin.

Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' a'i i'ipipa basef ifimba kofagefa. Apa' hiapai mape sisihipa maloma Krais ea' isimba atis dei' maga' ea'. Dei' mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani ina ata' nahapilapa sisihipa wapani, a' owa'. Apa' ea' mape sisihipama anona aman God naso'mana nogosafel matmat wapanii ea' monda' maol ananini atin.
Fowa' ata' magape atapipa opalef apimi, mu'uli inimba nafilai ukup awami ma alop ape'ipi. Ea' manda' maola waf awafi fataga ma ga' atin.

Apa' dei' maga' maloma Krais makwaha hiahaom magahapilapa sisihipai. Ea' mu'uli inimba ina ata' newa'apa wapani, owa'atin. Mape wahifipa. Dei' apa' ina ata' manda' maol maila mu'uli inimba amom manda'an nagail buki, owa'atin. Apa' manda' maola waf dambaifi Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda'afi.

Dei' apa' ata' mi'ias mi'imama? Mi'i mu'uli atin waf awafini a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi! Mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani nihimba'me waf maif awafi kofagefa ma egegawaf. Waf afamba kowagalasafi fagape na'amba. Mu'uli inimba naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Ina kowolena ma anis hiahawes anona amani, owa'i.” I'i mu'uli inimba owa' nihimba'me na'ambaea, ae' ina egawa waf awafi kowagalasafi. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
Mu'uli inimba si'i ano'w ufia'wa waf awafi fagasa'mai okom naninani nanda' ae' kowagalema hiahaom hiami. Apa' mu'uli inimba owa'atinai, waf awafi si'i fagaga'i atef.

Fowa' gani mu'uli inimba ata' owa', nogota atamba ata' ape okom mase'e elelama waf awafi. A'i owa' main owa', basef kofagefa ma mu'uli inimba fafi'mai ae' ea' waf awafi fesafel fafe' ambal ae'ali ea' fahe aga'ma mu'uli inimba. Doko' li' God nanda' mu'uli ananini ma nogase'e ambal namili owa', ae' ina' efa' ambal namilima mu'uli inimbai, owa'. Anin nahe andaga' atin.
Dei' main, waf awafi fasopama ufia'wa mu'uli inimba ea' fambaso'me. Mu'uli inimba nasa'ma okoma ae' nihimba'me waf awafi fahe aga'.
Ea' apa' mogawa mu'uli atin, anin bo'wen hilili'i. Basef ifimba hiafi fagape mu'uli inimbai wapani be'ef hilili'i.

Dei' a' main wapani? A'i mu'uli inimba fasini nahe aga'? Owa'atin endilisi! Waf awafi atef fahe aga'. Apa' hiahawes isimba si'i ano'w ufia'wa waf awafi fahe agaga'i ma waf afamba awafi kofagefa fetaga fendawalap. Ea' mu'uli inimba nihimba'mapa waf awafi kofagefa, afamba ea' awef endilisi a'owa'.
Apa' mogawa mu'uli inimba nafi'i Ambal bu'unai Godi nihimba'mapa okom ananimi. Apa' ae' okom apinai nape ina aila okom Godi, owa'. Waf awafi fala'atae anda' maola waf anamba aunai.
Apa' dei' ae' ina egawa waf kofagefa anda'afi, owa'. Waf ae' okom ma'ima'iaf a'i enda'afi, afamba ina anda'af, owa'.
Okom ae'ami atom a'ias na'amba a'i aho'ma mu'uli inimba bu'wani ma eme'an igailan. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ina ailan, owa'. Atolapan anda' waf awafi andaiwa'ma enda'afi.
Apa' ina ae' atowe anda'an, owa'. Waf aunai nagape okom ae'anai nomoni, anamba atona nanda'am.
Ae' egawa okom ae'anai nomon, ina anom nomonas bu'wami mape, owa'. Opaf anamba apinai ae'anai atona nahambombage. Endilisi, ae' okom ma'i enda' waf fasifi atef, apa' owa'. Ina la'ifiwi anda'af, owa'.

Aho', waf fasifi okom ma'i enda'afi, afamba ina anda'af, owa'atin. Apa' waf awafi andaiwa'ma enda'afi, afamba atef anda'af. Ea' ae' egawa ina ae' ela okom anda' amamba, owa'atin. Waf awafi fagape opaf ae' nomoni, afamba atef fanda'e anda'am.
Isimba atis dei' ati waf na'ambaifi fape ae'. Okom ma'i enda' waf fasifi, apa' waf awafi fagape nomonas ae'ami anda'af.
Endilisi okom ae'ami ma'ima'i mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani a'owa' andagalaman.

Apa' owa', ati anef waf daiaf fape alop si'ip wa'awa'ap ae'api nomon. Ea' waf afamba fapa' faloma mu'uli inimba nagape okom ae'amii. Waf afamba atef fagape alop wa'awa'ap ae'apii fala'atae fanda'e anda' maola waf afamba awafi.
Ea' owahipiwi! Ae' epen dagala akai, okom nimanimiwai. Atiasi ami netagwahowe ma opaf apinai dei' nahe agaga'i?

Owa', ae' anifela God! Anen atona nanda' Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai natagwahowe ape wahifiwi. Dei' ape na'amba. Okom ae'ami atom, ape lafela mu'uli inimba, apa' opaf apinai ape lafela banagami waf awafii.

Basef ifimba fagali'i kofagefa ifimba. Apa' amam nematawa mape sisihipa magaloma Krais Jisasi, ina ata' anif basef dei' ma God nonda'mapa kota basef lu'wafi mogofa' akafimi ma waf awafi apa' manda'afi, owa'atin.

Dei' main, banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi nagaso'apa ambal namili ape'i, anen natagwahepa ma banagami waf awafii maloma banagami ga'i. Anen nanda'am na'amba ma Krais Jisas atona ea' mape sisihipama anen dei' mape wahifipa.

Maol mamahina mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani owa' banagena nenda'ania, God nanda'an. Dei' main, opalef apa' epesi pupulim, owa' banagema. Dei' God nanda' maol inimba na'amba. Nasapa'i Nogamana ananinai atona nafi'i nataga si'i apa' epes manda' waf awafii. Ama nokwahomapa waf awafi hi'ilaf okom mogaso'anaf dogw. Anen nafi'ima nogokwaha waf awafi apa' epesi feloma akafimi ma waf afamba ea' God naso'anam mapoma anen atona.
Anen nanda'am na'amba ma apa' mofe' mogaila waf be'ef usi'ifi fagape mu'uli inimbai. Dei' main, apa' dei' ina mafe' maila fe' inimba opalef apilifi, owa'. Mafe' maila fe' dambaini Ambal Godi.

Epes sagaila waf opalef apilifi sagafi'i, ukup asasipi pafe' talala' paila hiahaom amamba opalef apilifi fagafagailami. Apa' epes ami safe' sagaila Ambal bu'unai Godii, ukup asasipi pafe' talala' paila hiahaom okom Ambal bu'winai naga'iami atom.

I'i ukup epes isimbai pepoma hiahaom awami ma nelelemb apimi asasimi atom, amamba mawalapai ga' higiligalasani. Apa' epen ami nomonas ananisi sisihis sogapoma hiahawes Spirit Ambal Godi, epen inimba dei' nape ambal namili opaf fape awanef.
Epes mamahisa ukup pigaila waf opalef apimii, isimba sataga bousi Godi. Dei' main, esis ina sape lafela mu'uli hiani Godi, owa'. Ina banagesa sigaila mu'uli inimba, owa'atin.
Epes mamahisa sagape lafela waf opalef apilifii, epes isimba ina la'ifisa sonda' waf God okom maga'iafi, owa'atin.

Apa' i'i endilisi Ambal bu'unai Godi nupaipa, ipa' ina ata' pape lafela waf afamba apifi awafi ma nembel apinai, owa'. Ipa' pape lafela waf Ambal bu'unaii. Apa' epen ami Spirit Ambal Kraisi owa' nope anina, inimba ina epen Kraisi, owa'.
Waf awafi faha alop ipe'ipi ma atiasi pogaga'. Apa' i'i Krais nogape nomona ipa', Ambal ananinai nonda'epa pepe namipa.

Fowa' God nasa'ma Jisas notanima nosafel wandof. Ea' Ambal ananinai natopalopepa na'amba. Ipa' epes mamahipama Ambal bu'unai Godi nupaipa nomon, dao' a' nese'epa ambal namili alop ipe'ipi wapani. Ipa' pagaga' ea'i apa' owa', dei' anen nanda'epa pape namipa.

Ipa' alipipai ma wambota Kraisi, anif basef fagi'ma ifimba fa'i Krais natalepa ma maol lu'wani dei' apa' anof wiaf ata' fotaomapa ma mugaila okom Ambal bu'unai Godi. Apa' wiaf akapa ma mofe' mugaila opaf anamba apinai, owa'.
I'i ipa' pefe' pigaila waf afamba opaf apinaima, anaf apega'. Apa' i'i ipa' peha waf awafi ipe'ifi fega' ma banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi, dao' anaf apepe namipa.
Epes ami sagaila wafa Ambal bu'unai Godi, isimba dei' sape awasi Godi wambota ananisi.

Dei' main, ipa' ina pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nahapilipa sisihipa si'i sanda' kalabusi ma ata' ombel mogahepa wapani, owa'atin. Ipa' apefa' Ambal bu'unai anamba nanda'epa pataga awasi Godi. Banagami Ambal bu'unai atom dei' mofalana ma'i, “Ahamapa! Ahamapa!”
Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nape sisihina apa' natopalopa ambagof ape'igufi ea' dei' mawalapa basef ma'if alihif, mape awasi Godi.

Apa' magape awasi Godii. Ea' anaf mofa' hiahaom Ahamapai moloma hiahaom anen nambe'ama Krais nugumafiami, mofa'am moloma Krais. I'i dei' apa' mofa' akafimi mogalomanama, anaf mofa' poe bu'wani endilisi nonda'apa mogala' molomana.
Ae' okom ma'i poe inimba bu'wani anaf netaga nendawalapa apa' gani heveni, inimba anaf nikila'am endilisi akafimi amamba apa' dei' mogofa'am nogota ata'i.
Hiahawes hiasi lu'wis sa'wis God nanda'asi saloma apa' epes wapani masa'ma balagah naep do' endilisi ea' mape masasa nogota ape'itai ma awasi Godi anaf sotaga sondawalap alihis.

Dei' hiahawes isimba lu'wis sa'wis saloma apa' epes ata' mape wafipa dowaf, maol akapa. Ina apa' atepa mola ukup manda'am mape, owa'atin. God atona nala'ambemapa mape lafela anen mape masasa hiahaom lu'wami anaf na'i nonda'ama ape'i.

Dei' hiahaom awami amamba hiami mowa' hiahawes God nanda'asi salomapa epes mawasi'apa manda'apa awepa folo'walapa. Apa' anaf God notofa hiahaom amamba awami ea' mofa' mogogala'i mupe wahifipa andeande', amamba God nandandepam magapoma wambota ananisii.
Apa' mogawa hiahawes hiasi lu'wis sa'wis God nanda'asi same' akafimi si'i nemata'w kwa'i kogola awani. Ea' hiahawes isimbai salef kwapete' sape safi'i sataga dei'.

Apa' ina hiahawes isimba atis, owa'atin. Fa'i apa' epes ananipai wapani, God okom ma'i anaf owagama notopalopapa ma mogape andeande'. Ea' dei' anen nali' naso'apa Ambal bu'unai ananinai. Ambal anamba naso'apana dowafi si'i presen. Ea' apa' wapani mame' akafimi kilef mape mohafa anef nemaf God notalepa ma mogataga si'i awasi ananipai, ma nemaf afamba nogaso'apa alop dambaipi namupi.

God nowambelapa dei' mahapifana mape mohafana nonda'apa mogataga endilisi dindi'i dondo' ma hiahaom amamba fasimi. Apa' hiahaom mape mogohafami ma magatolom ea'i, apa' ina ata' mope mohafam wapani, owa'. Apa' i'i anin epen nigati hiahawes isimba nape negehafasi ea', dei' maina ata' nepe negehafas wapani? Owa'atin.
Apa' hiahawes apa' ata' owa' mugatilisia apa' mogawa endilisi anaf mogofa'asi, na'amba apa' ukup banagep papoma isimba ea' mape mahafas.

Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi wapani nafi'i natopalopa apa' owa' banagipaia, nowa' banaga ukup ape'ipi. Nemaf mamahefa apa' ukup owa' banagepa mogawa basef ifimba mogahali'anaefia, Ambal ananinai nandabeten natopalopapa. Anen nandabeten, apa' anen ina na'i nandabeten nahali'ana ma anif basef, owa'. Nanda' e waa atin nandabeten. Ea' God, nogawa ukup epesi hi'alep, nogawa okom Ambal ananinai wapani. Dei' main, nemaf afamba Ambal ananinai nandabeten na'amba, anen naila okom Godi nandabetena apa' epes ananipai.

Hiahaom mamahoma ma'i mogatagamapai, bu'wami awami hiami, God nanda'am manda' maol atina mogatopalopa apa' epes ukup pagapagaila anini. Apa' epes isimba nogofalas ea'i ma sonda' maol sigaila okom ananimii.
Dei' main, epes isimba God fowa' nogogawas ea'i nosaho'asa sotaga sondati na'amba atin si'i Nogamana ananinai ma anen notaga nogape si'i sahomas dembinai ma esis sahin owan wambota ananisi.
Epes isimba fowa' nogosaho'as ea'i, anen nofalas wapani. Ea' isimba nogofalas ea'i, anen na'i esis epes usi'isi ma naep ananipi ea' naso'as banagami mogogala'i ananimi ma anaf sondati si'i anen.
Apa' mame' basefa hiahaom amamba bu'wami God nanda'mapami dei' muwatanif mi'imama? I'i God nogatopalopapa, dei' anaf ina anis la'ifisa sogohambombagapa, owa'atin endilisi.

Anen ina ombal mahanama nagaso'apai Nogamana ananinai, owa'atin. Anen nasapa'anai nafi'i ma nogatopalopa apa' hiapai. Na'amba dei' isimba endilisi atis anaf anen nogaso'apai anom hiahaom hiami wapani dowaf mugalumai anini.
Apa' epes nogosaho'apa ea'i, anaf epen ami ni'i apa' epes aupai manda' waf awafii? Owa'atin. God atona na'i apa' epes usi'ipai.

Anaf ina anis epes sofalapa si'i apa' epes aupai ma God nogagwamapa waf awafi ape'ifi, owa'atin. Dei' main, Krais Jisas naga' notanima nosafel wapani. Ea' anen nape wa'ol lagol kwahisigili Godi banagagoma ea' nandabetena nagatopalopapa wapani.

Anaf maim da'im melefatapa ma mogakwaha okom Kraisi magamagailapai? I'i nimanimi mogatagamapa ma mogofa' akafimi ma nolomohapa klos luwaguf mais akapa a anis sohapa sonda'apa awepa ma i'i hiahaom awami mi'i mogahambombagapa, ma anis sohapa mogaga', anaf hiahaom amambai melefatapa ma okom Kraisi magamagailapai? Owa'atin endilisi.

Endilisi, hiahaom na'ambaimi motagamapa si'i Baibel na'iam naga'i, “Apa' mape amam nematawa ine'ipai, isimba atis dei' nimaguf hiafi sa'i sohapa moga'. Satelepa si'i sipsipa sa'i sohapa mondaga' atin.”
Apa' hiahaom amambai hapaimi. Krais anen okom maimailapa a'owa' ea' dondol nowa' banagapa nanda'apa mikila' hiahaom amambai endilisi.

Aho' ae' egawa endilisi, ina anom maefah la'ifima anaf melefatapa ma okom lu'unai Godi, owa'atin. Nemaf mamahefa apa' moga' a'a mogape, anen okom maimailapa atapim. Amom ensel maloma banagami awami mamimami mape mugumafi itapi, opa'wal, ma'akw, naoh, ambagof awami mamimami wapani a hiahaom dei' magapani a anom anaf migi' mogatagai, banagami mamimami

a hiahaom banagami awami magape ilifi itap awini a anom hiahaom migi' mogafi'i, hiahaom amamba hiami ina anaf la'ifima megelefata apa'ma okom lu'unai Godi, owa'atin endilisi. Anen okom maimailapa atapina nihimba'mapa amamba ma Krais Jisas Dembinai ape'inai.
Basef ifimba ae' aga'iefi endilisi, ae' aman Kraisi ea' ina ambaso'am, owa'. Ambal bu'unai Godi nihimba'me nalome umafi malogol gagape opaf ae' nomoni nihimba'me na'ipi aga'i basef endilisifi atifi.
Basef ifimba na'amba. Opaf ae'afi nimanif endilisi ea' okom mandanda' mafe' aom dondol.

Ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma a'i God nowambilai esis alipisi esimbel atembel ae'asi Israel sotanimai. Ea' i'i ano'w ufia'w na'ambaiai, ae' endabetena Kraisa ae' lamene egaho'ofa esis sogafe' wambel bu'wambili heven, apa' ae' owa'atin.

Apa' Israel God nandandepapa ea'i, nanda'apa mataga awasi ananipai ea' na'i aho'ma mogati mogogala'i banagami ananimi. Anen nala' lapa basef ananifi nalomapa ea' naso'apa mu'uli bu'wani ananini naloma waf endilisifi monda' lotumafi. Apa' mofa' basef ifimba God naga'i endilisi atisafi.

Bafapapa akupapa dembami ape'imi mamumba magali'i amamba ape'imi atom. Ea' esimbel ape'imbeli atembel Krais nataga epen, anen God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, nape nali'ma epes saloma hiahaom hiami numafiam. Anen God endilisinai ea' mondasa'ma agol ananigili dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.
Apa' basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi ina higiligalef dowafi, owa'atin. Epes sagataga mini'ap Israeli, hiasi ina a' Israel atis endilisi God nandandepas ananisi ea'i, owa'.

Ea' apa' ina a' mi'iam na'amba mi'i, “Esis sataga esimbel Abrahami ea' esis hiasi a sape batawis endilisi ananisi,” owa'atin. Fowa' gani God naga'ipana na'amba na'i, “Esis esimbel Aisaki atis owagama sofa' agol wambota ine'isi.”
Isimba na'amba. Anis batawis Abrahami ina awasi Godi, owa'atin. Isimba sagataga basef ifimba God nala' lapef nagaso' Abrahamafi atis, agol gatomas ea' bafasana Abrahami endilisi.
Lapa basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Nemaf afamba andandepaf ea'i, bola itanimai ea' Sera kola awani aman.”
Ea' ina isimba atis, owa'. Nogaopa'w biam Rebekai ahamam atotona ea' Aisak atona bafamapa ape'inai.

Apa' God okom mandanda' ea' ma waf nandandepa epesafi. Anen ina okom mandanda'ma maol epes sanda'ani ea' nosaho'as, owa'atin. Nogaopa'w amamba biam ata' mape nomona nembel akwa'umbili God na'ipa'w na'i, “Nogali'i dembinai a' nope lafela aonama nogagi'i. Sahomana anaf nonda'mana maol owamana.” God naila okom ananimi atom dei' na'ipa'w na'amba. Anen ina okom ma'i anin maol bu'wani awani amom anaf monda'ani, owa'atin. Anen naila okom ananimi atom na'i basef na'amba.
Amamba si'i Baibel naga'i, “Ae' okom maimaila Jekop, apa' Iso andaiwa'mana endilisi.”
Ea' apa' dei' ata' mi'i main? Mi'i, “God nanda' waf owa' andeande'a?” Owa'atin endilisi!
Anen na'ipa Moses na'i, “Endilisi, anaf ae' i'i uwahipigama epen mamahina iga'i uwahipigamani ea' etopalopa epen mamahina ae' okom ma'i igatopalopani.”
Apa' ina mi'i ukup epesi atip paloma maol epesi atin sanda' God natopalopapa, owa'atin. God atona nati apa' uwahipipa dei' okom ananimi atom natopalopapa dowaf.

Ea' Baibel na'i God na'ipa dembinai king Fero na'amba na'i, “Ae' a'i ihimba'masa banagami ae'ami epes hias ma anaf sogawalapa agol ae'agili siga'iagol itap hiagoma. Isimba atis dei' afelena nanda' hiahawes isimba.”
Apa' mogawa i'i God ni'i nogatopalopa anin epen dowaf, dao' anen notopalopan. Apa' i'i nogasopama opaf anin epenima, dao' nosopamamanaf.

Apa' ina' atiasi ni'ipa ae' na'amba ni'i, “I'i na'ambama, dao' dei' maina God ata' naga'iam atin naga'i epen kofagema mapomana waf awafi anin nanda'afi? Ami la'ifina negapa'aga okom banagami Godi mogohafili? Owa'atin.”

Apa' epen, ina' mamahinama ma ni'i niginifala God? Owa'atin. A'i malep sanda' nombol sagala'api la'ifipa piginifala aman anamba nanda'ap nagala'api piga'i, “Dei' maina ina' nanda'e na'ambae?” Owa'atin.
Aman nagala' malihi nofa'i anep itap nala' maloh biahap, anep maol bu'wanipi, anep falafalafipi maol awaniapi. Endilisi isimba andeande'.

God wapani nanda'am na'amba atin si'i aman nagala' malihi. Fowa' nanda' epes sataga ea' naila okom ananimi atom na'i aho'ma anis epes sogafe' ufia'w higiligalasa'wi. Esis safe' ufia'w akwamba, apa' anen ina nagwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi ulal, owa'. Anen ata' nanimbelis nape nasasas nogota laota ma anaf nogahambombagas. Dei' main, anen na'i nowalapa okom numbutinai ananinai notaga alihina noloma banagami ananimi ma epes hiasi sogogawam.

Anen na'i nowalapam motaga alihim hiahaom mogogala'i fasimi ananimi ma anis epes anen nagati uwahipisi sogogawam. Epes isimba anen naila okom ananimi atom fowa' nandandepasa nogaso'asa mogogala'i esis.
Amamba ea' ma'i apa' atepa. Anen nofalapa ea'. Ina nofala anis Juda atis, owa'atin. Nofala anis owa' Judaisia wapani.

Basef anona aman profet Hosea fowa' nanda'afi wapani faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Esis amam nematawa isimba fowa' ina epes ae'asi, anaf i'i esis epes ae'asi, ea' epes isimba fowa' ae' owa' okom mogailasia egaso'asa opafia, anaf okom mimilas.
Ea' wambel ali' a'ipas aga'i, ‘Ipa' ina epes ae'ipai’, anaf wambel ambalemba atembel sofalas si'i, ‘Esis awasi Godi nagape namunai.’”

Fowa' profet Aisaia nondola'waifa esis Israel na'amba na'i, “I'i esis Israel sotaga hias a'owa' si'i ko'onaga gaga'oh naoh akata ai, ea' hapaisi. Anaf Dembinai nofa'ai kwasala'wis dowaf nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai.
Anen nonda' basefa kot hi'ilif notopa'ef kwafalis nogwamasa akafimi epes hiasi itapasi hi'ilas.”

Ea' na'amba atin si'i fowa' Aisaia na'ias naga'i, “I'i Dembinai banagonai nugumafi hiahaom hiamii owa' nosopama akafimi epes isimba sagape itap apa'ii ai, anaf apa' motaga lamonapa si'i walemb ambalemba bialemb Sodomi Gomora. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Nasopamam ea'.”
Dei' apa' ata' mi'ias mi'imama? Apa' mi'ias na'amba mi'i, “Esis owa' Judaisia ina sanda' maol noma'wini ma sogofa' waf usi'ifi, esis sofa' waf afamba ea'. Esis sahapifa God sofa' waf afamba usi'ifi.
Apa' esis Israel sanda' numa'umi ma sagaila mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani ma sogofa' waf afamba usi'ifi, owa' esis ina sofa'af, owa'atin.”
Dei' main, esis sandaiwa'ma sohapifana sogofa' waf usi'ifi. Esis ukup pandanda' pa'i sonda' maol atin sofa'af. Owa' asendesambaola anom otam sowa.

Amamba si'i Baibel naga'i, “Peme! Ae' ambe' anom otam wambel lu'wambili esis Israeli agol Saion. Otam amamba banagami motawa mogahambombaga epes sendesambaola sogowa. Apa' epen ami nigahapifa aman anambai, anaf anin ina okom iwanim, owa'atin. Nepe sonohan.”
Alipipai, okom ae'ami ma'ias a'owa' andabetena anaf God nofa' esis Israel nokwahomas waf awafi sogotanimai.
Ae' egawa esis andeande' ea' a'i isimba. Esis ukup pehafel a'owa' sanda' maol banagani ma sogaila God, apa' owa' esis ina sogawa basef Godi endilisifi andeande', owa'atin.

Esis ukup mahamahasa waf God nanda'afi ma noga'i apa' epes usi'ipai. Ea' sanda'am sandawalapa waf usi'ifi asasifi atefa sagaila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani. Ea' esis ina safe' lafela Goda noga'i apa' epes usi'ipai, owa'atin. Apa' Krais nafi'i nataga ea'. Isimba atis dei' apa' ina ata' mape lafela mu'uli inimba, a' owa'atin. Anen nafi'i nandawalapa amam nematawa mamahisa sagahapifa anini ea' dei' God nofalas na'i esis amam nematawa bo'wes hilili'i.

Waf afamba epen nagaila mu'uli inimba ma God naga'i anin usi'ini, Moses fowa' naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Epen ami nenda' waf afamba hiafi andeande' hi'igalafi, anaf anin nefa' ambal namili ma nigaila mu'uli inimba.”

Apa' waf epen nagahapifanai God na'i anin usi'ini, waf afamba faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' owa'i ukup pendanda' ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pi'i, ‘Anaf ami nefe' nelota heven?’ nihali' Krais nigisila'i, owa'i.
“Ea' ipa' owa'i pi'ias na'amba pi'i, ‘Anaf ami nefe' newala wambel epes sagaga'ii nihali' Krais notanimai.’ Na'ambai wapani owa'i.”
Apa' basef ifimba fa'i main? Ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Basef ifimba fape felefele'ma ipa', fape malogufi nelelemb ipe'isi.” Basef apa' magahapilafi mawalapef maga'iefi ifimba.
I'i ipa' pewalapa basef ifimba alihif pi'i Jisas anen Dembinai ma pihapifa God nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pi'i anen nasa'mana nogosafel matmat wapani, bola God nofa'ai ipa' wapani pitanimai pepe andeande'.

Dei' main, apa' mahapilif nelelemb ape'ilimbi God na'i apa' amam nematawa magataga be'epa hilili' ea'i. Ea' mawalapa hapif malogof ape'igufi God nofa'apa nokwahomapa waf awafi mutanimai mape andeande'.
Amamba si'i Baibel naga'i, “Epen mamahina nagahapifa anini, anaf epen inimba ina okom iwanim, owa'atin.”
Esis Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia ea' na'amba atin, God anen Dembinai atotona apa' hiapaii. Ea' anen natopalopapa naso'apa waf bu'wafi dowafa epes isimba mamahisa sogofala anini,
si'i Baibel naga'i, “Epes mamahisa soga'i agol Dembinai ma sogofala anini, atiasi nofa'as nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai.”

Apa' i'i esis owa' sohapifanaia atiasi sofalana sogawana si'i mama? Ea' esis i'i owa' seme' basefanaea, atiasi sohapifana si'imama? Ea' i'i anin epen owa' ni'ipasa basef esisa, dei' esis sogawef si'imama? Owa'atin endilisi.

I'i God owa' nosapa'i amam amambaia, dei' atiasi amom mefe' mowalapef mi'imama? Owa'atin. Si'i Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, “Awasi! Maol inimba epes sofa'i basef bu'wafi ae'afi sogafi'ii, inimba fasini endilisi a'owa'!”
Apa' ina Israel hiasi saila basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi, owa'atin. Fowa' profet anamba Aisaia naga'i na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, anaf ami nihapila basef ifimba esis sogame'efa afa'i? Owa'atin.”
Ea' apa' mogawa, apa' hiapai mame' basef bu'wafi ea' ifimba atif fasa'mai hapif ape'ini. Ea' dei' basef ifimba fataga ufia'w mai'w? Ifimba fataga amom magawalapa basef Kraisi atom.
Apa' ae' a'ias na'amba. A'i esis ina same' basef ifimba bu'wafi? Owa'atin. Esis same'ef ea', si'i Baibel naga'i, “Basef fafe' fandahama walemb hielimbi fafe'agon hi'alagon.”

Ae' etambel a'ias. A'i esis Israel sogawa basef ifimba a'a owa'? Owa'atin. Sogawa ea'. Moses nali' naga'i basef ifimba na'i, “God na'i, ‘Ae' efa' anis amam nematawa falafisi, esis ina epes banagasi anep mini'ap endilisipi, owa'. Ae' ifa'asi etopalopas falafis anaf ipa' kowolepama waf bu'wafi ae' enda'masaf esisi. Ae' ifa'ai epes isimba owa' sogogawaia ea' anaf ipa' pinifalis penda' megahohas.’”

Apa' Aisaia ina ombal mahana ma na'iam nagawalapam, owa'atin. Anen nawalapam na'iam alihim na'amba na'i, “Epes isimba owa' sogolaoma ae'ia, dei' satolowe ea'. Epes isimba owa' sogahali'asa ae'ia, dei' ataga andawalapa esis.”

Apa' esis Israel ina na'ipas na'amba, owa'atin. Anen na'ipas anif daif na'i, “God na'i, ‘Epes isimba sanda' du'wanigai sogosambala basefi. Nogota lautai a'owa' ae' efalas anda' lagof iwaulasi. Owa', owa'atin.’”
Dei' a'i ihali'ipa, God a' nali'amona Israel hiasi mini'ap ananisi? Owa'atin endilisi! Ae' wapani Israeliwai esimbel Abrahami, wambota Benjamini.
Mini'ap isimba Godi anen fowa' nandandepas ea'i, ina nali'amonas, owa'. Ipa' pegawa basef Elaijai fagail Baibeli. Elaija nandabeten nanda' kotima esis Israela God, naga'i na'amba na'i,
“Dembinai, esis saha amom profet maga'. Ea' sugulata belitagw ine'igwi sondolaliminama. Ea' ae' atowe ata' atapiwi ape profet anda' maola ina'. Dei' esis salasolaome ma sehe egaga'.”
Apa' God nagwamana basef maif Elaija? Anen na'ipana na'i, “Ae' ifa'ai epes hiasi 7,000-pelais ae'asi, isimba ina sanda' lotuma god baso'amunai Baal, owa'.”
Isimba ea' na'amba atin si'i dei' wapani esis mini'ap du'wanis sape, God fowa' natilis uwahipis natopalopas dowaf. Isimba atis dei' nosaho'asa sagape epes ananisi si'is.

Anen nati uwahipis natopalopas dowaf nosaho'as. Anen ina okom mandanda'ma anin maol bu'wani esis sanda'ani nosaho'as, owa'atin. I'i esis sonda' maol bu'wani ma God nosaho'asai, anen ina a' niti uwahipis maol bu'wani ma God nosaho'asai, anen ina a' niti uwahipis notopalopas dowaf nosaho'as, owa'atin. I'i na'ambaiai, waf afamba nagati uwahipisafi, afamba falafifi atef, owa' endilisifia.

Dei' apa' ata' mi'ias mi'imama? Waf afamba God niti epes niga'i be'es hilili'i, afamba esis Israel sanda' numa'umi ma sa'i sogofa'afi, apa' ina sofa'af, owa'. Fowa' God nosaho' esis du'wanis atis ea' isimba atis sofa'af. Apa' esis Israel hiasi opalef asasimi maso'as ea',
si'i buk Baibel naga'i, “God nanda' opalef asasilifi si'i saga'oh. Nanda' naep asasipi ina pati ea' esis ina same' basef kofagefa, owa'atin. Ea' sape na'amba atin safi'i sataga dei'.”

Devit wapani na'i basef ifimba atifa waf opalef esis Israeli maso'as ea' na'i, “Ae' a'i nemaf afamba esis sope soga' gwa'aisi lu'wasi atin, God nowasi'asa nogagwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi si'i mandelef sandolam mail alialefa mogowa' mafis, ea' si'i isalefi waiwa sanda'am magapoma mafisi.
“Ae' a'i naep asasipi petaga walufipa ina atiasi siti. Ea' ina' awi nenda' nimanimi akafimi mindiwa alafugah asasigahi ma atapis sogape na'amba atin.”

Dei' ae' ahali'ipa. Esis Juda sendesambaol sowa lamonas? Owa'atin endilisi! Esis sololama ufia'w sanda' waf awafi, isimba atis dei' God notanima nofa' anis epes sogololama Godi owa' Judaisia sotanima safe'ma anen. God nanda'as na'amba ma esis Juda ata' sigati waf afamba fasifi nanda'masaf esis sogololama anini ma anaf esis Juda kowogalasa waf afamba bu'wafi God nanda'masafi.

Esis Juda sowa' alafugaha God, isimba atis dei' anen natopalopa amam nematawa hiasi itapasi sagape walemb hiagomai. Esis Juda sololama waf Godi, isimba atis dei' God natopalopa isimba owa' Judaisia nofa'as sotanimai sogape andeande'. Ea' nemaf afamba esis Juda hiasi hi'ilas dondo'ma ikwaf God okom maga'iefi sotanima sifi'mai anen, esis misi'ah hiasi owa' Judaisia, God notopalopas endilisi ma nofa'ai hiasi sogotanimai.
Dei' a'i ese'epa anif basef ipa' atipa owa' Judaipaia. God nasapa'e afe'ma anda' maola esis owa' Judaisia si'i ipa'. Ea' sonahema maol inimba bu'wani dei' anda'ani.
Maol inimba ae' okom ma'ian a'owa' ma egasa'ma esis Juda wambota ae'asi ma kowogalasa ipa' dei' pape andeande' pagaloma Godi. Ama ae' egefa' esis Juda du'wanis atis sotanima sogafe'ma God.

Aho', anen nowa' alafuga ma esis, isimba atis dei' nofa'ai anis epes itap hiagoma sataga nembel atembel salomana. Ama anef nemaf God noso'as nembela esis Juda sotanima sogafe'ma anen, notopalopa epes hiasi itap hiagoma sotanima sope andeande' sondagala si'i sondagala ma anis epes saga' sotanima sogasafeli.

Waf afamba esis Juda sotanima sogafe'ma God si'i basef waminif atini na'amba fa'i, i'i bret du'wanita tagali'i sanda'ata saso'anata Godi bo'ota hilili', ea' bret si'ita wapani Godi bo'ota hilili'i atota. I'i esis soso'ana nombalef lawagilif si'ilif God, dao' agufugama wapani Godi atoga.

God nindiwaga nelefata anogof agof lawag oliviga sagawaga aofi ea' nofa'ai anogol agola anoga lawag oliviga alupugai nuwataniaga lawag agamba sagawaga aofi. Ipa' owa' Judaipaia, ipa' si'i agol lawag agamba alupugai. Isimba atis dei' ipa' pefa' hiahaom maim bu'wami mataga ma epes isimba Juda si'i agol lawag agamba alupugai gogofa' ifata nombalef lawag sagawaga aofi.

Dei' ipa' owa' Judaipaia ina pi'i ipa' atipa bu'upai pikila' esis Juda si'i agof agwafomba God nigindiwagufi, owa'. Ipa' ina' pi'i ipa' bi'ipai esis epes awasi, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' ina pegewa' banaga nombalifi, owa'. Nombalef atelef fewa' banagaipa.
A'i ipa' atiasi pi'ias na'amba pi'i, “God nindiwa agof agwafomba ma nogowatani apa' si'i anogol agol lawagigil.”

Dao' andeande', apa' esis Juda ina sahapifana, isimba atis dei' nahape'as. Apa' ipa' pahapifana dei' pape sisihipama anen. Apa' ipa' owa'i pesa'ma agof ipe'igufi pi'i ipa' atipa bu'upaia, owa'i. Ipa' ombal mondahepa solawaipa.
Fowa' God ina na'i aho'ma esis Juda si'i agof agwafomba lawag sagawaga aofi fape atapiguf, owa'. Ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba nonda'mepas na'amba atin si'i nanda' esis.

Ea' ipa' ukup pendanda'mam andeande' okom biafim Godi uwahipimi wandafumi wapani. Epes sagakwaha waf ananifii, na'ipas dindinip. Apa' ipa' God naga'i uwahipipai, i'i ipa' pigaila uwahipimi amamba, dao' andeande'. Apa' i'i owa', anaf notopa'epa wapani.
I'i esis Juda sokwaha waf awafi sogosambala Godafi, dao' atiasi nofa'as sotanimai si'i nogowatania agof agwafomba fowa' nigindiwagufi. Endilisi, God banagonai ma nonda'as na'amba.

Ipa' pegawa fowa' ipa' ata' papani atin si'ipa lawag oliv alupugai, ea' God nanda' anin maol daiana ipa' natopa' anogol agola lawag agamba ea' nowataniaga anoga lawag oliv bu'ugai sagawaga aofi. God nanda' maol inimba. Ea' endilisi atis, anaf a' nofa' esis Juda sotanimai si'i agof nindiwagof lawag sagawaga aofi nuwataniagof fitanima fope lawag afafugai si'iga. Maol inimba ina ahifina anen, owa'. Andipeni.

Alipipai, ae' andaiwa'ma ipa' ukup pegehepama basef ifimba fowa' fandambahi'i dei' fandawalap alihif. Na'amba ipa' ukup pendanda' ma ipa' atipa pi'i, “Apa' mogogawai.” Basef ifimba fowa' fandambahi'i na'amba. Esis Israel opalef asasilifi faso'as, apa' ina faso'as atapilif fape, owa'. Fefe' fefe' fendahama nogota atamba esis owa' Judaisia hiasi sifi'i sogafe'ma God dondo' ma ikwaf okom ananimi maga'iefi.

I'i owa' main, esis Israel hiasi God nofa'as nokwahomasa waf awafi sotanima sifi'mai anen si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Anaf aman anamba nofa'as sogotanimai, nupani wambel Saion nifi'i notagwaha waf awafi esis wambota Jekopi, waf awafi sogosambala basef Godiefi.
Anef nemaf ekwaha waf hiafi awafi asasifi okom mose'eaf, i'ipasa basef agala' lapafi esis.”

Juda sosambala basef bu'wafi Godi, sataga bousi ananisi saha'ofa ipa' owa' Judaipaia nofa'epa pigatanimaii. Apa' God fowa' nosaho'as ea' okom maimailas. Dei' main, anen okom mapoma bafasam asasimi ma basef ifimba nala' lap nagalomamafi.
I'i God nondandepa anin epen noso'an presen fasini dowaf, anaf anen ina nosambala basef ifimba ni'ipan ni'i hapaifi noho'ofef, owa'atin. Basef ifimba atapif fepe.
Fowa' ipa' owa' Judaipaia pesambala basef Godi. Ea' esis Juda wapani sosambala basef ifimba. Isimba atis dei' ipa' pefa' okom uwahipimi Godi.
Ea' na'amba atin dei' esis Juda wapani sosambala basef ama dei' sogofa' okom amamba uwahipimi Godi si'i ipa'.
God nanda' epes hiasi hi'alas sogape lafela waf afamba sogosambala basefafi ma anen anaf niti esis hiasi uwahipis nogatopalopas dowaf.

Awasi! Okom Godi naloma gawa ananini fasini lu'um a'owa' endilisi. Apa' epes ina la'ifipa endilisi ma mogogawa kofagema basef ananifi, okom hiami mogatambela, owa'atin. Apa' owa'atin endilisi ma mogawalapa basefa anen okom maga'iefi. Ea' apa' owa' mogawa waf hianai ananinaia, owa'atin.
Endilisi atis, si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Ami negawa okom Dembinaii? Ami naso'ana nomonas anen?
Ami nali' naso'ana hiahawes anen ama atiasi nogagwamanas? Owa'atin endilisi.”

Anen nanda' hiahaom hiami hi'alam magape ilif itapi numafiam maloma epes. Ea' hiahaom amamba hiami maloma epes mape ma mogasa'ma agol ananigili atogol. Apa' epes hiapai hi'ilapa mondasa'ma agol ananigili lifilafi dondol. Endilisi.

Alipipai, basef ifimba hiafi fagali'i endilisifi atif. Isimba atis dei' ahali'ipa dindinipa ipa' ukup pendanda'ma okom lu'unai Godi naganagaila ape'i nagati apa' uwahipipa. Ea' pindilali ma anen si'i fowa' saha mafis sagaso'ana pendaso'ana alop ipe'ipi si'ip hi'indalap. Alop ata' pope namop atapip pese'anap God atona hi'ilap ea' ananipi si'ip, si'i waf anen okom maga'iefi. Ipa' penda'as na'amba, penda' lotu endilisi ma God ukup ipe'ipi nomon.
