Ipa' ina pepe pindati na'amba atin si'i sagaila waf itapafi, owa'i. Ipa' pi'i aho'ma God nonda' ukup ipe'ipi nomon petaga dambaipa waf ipe'ifi atiasi fegataga dambaif wapani. Ma bola pegegawa waf endilisifi God okom maga'iefi. Waf afambai bu'wafi usi'ifi.

God natopalope dowaf, isimba atis dei' a'ipipa atona atin. Ipa' pegawa waf faloma gawa ipe'ini sandanda' sa'imama, apa' ipa' ina ukup pendanda' pi'i ipa' atipa fasipai endilisi, owa'i. Ipa' ata' pewaloga ipa' ukup pendanda' pefe' andeande' pendahama hapif ipe'ini God nagasi'ipani nafe' negetambel.
Apa' mogawa alop ape'ipi atotop, apa' sa'osa'opa hiapi. Ea' apamba hiapi ina panda' maol atifin, owa'atin. Panda'an daindai.
Ea' na'amba atin apa' amam nematawa hiapai magape sisihipama Kraisi, apa' si'i alop atotop. Ea' apa' hiapai atona atin si'i mandatopalopa atin magaloma anop alop wa'awa'api hiapi.
God natopalopapa dowaf naso'apa presen hiahaom fasimi ananimi maloma gawa naninani. I'i God nosa'ma okom anin epeni ma negawalapa anif basef, anin nendawalapef dondo' ma hapif ananini.
Epen mamahina negatopalopa esis sahin owani, anin nendanda' maol inimba endilisi negatopalopa alipisi. I'i epen gawaini ma nigihimba'mas si'i tisai, anin nendanda'an endilisi nihimba'mas.

Ea' epen ami negegawa ma negafela ukup esis epesi, dao' anin nendanda' maol inimba endilisi negasa'ma ukup asasipi. Epen negaso'an hiahawes anin alipinii, anin a' nendaso'an hias. Epen nigimafi anin maoli, okom ananimi mondohafel endilisi ma maol inimba. Epen nigati anin alipini uwahipini ma netopalopan nigimafiani, anin sonohan nendatopalopan.
Ipa' ukup pagapagaila esis sahin owan, dao' ipa' ukup pindailas endilisi. Ipa' ina pembmaso'am, owa'i. Ipa' pendewa' alafugah endilisi ma waf awafi, pendape sisihipa endilisi ma waf bu'wafi.
Ipa' pendaso'asa opalef esis sahin owan ukup pindailas endilisi. Ipa' hipai atona atin pendasa'ma agof isimba anis daindaiasi atis.
Ipa' pendanda' maol banagambel lifilafi ukup pehafel a'owa' penda' maol Dembinaii.
Ipa' pepe pehafa Dembinai nogatopalopepa. Ea' pendagala atin hi'indalepa. I'i nimanimi mogatagamepa, pilutu banagepa. Ea' pendabeten nimaguf danda lifilafi.
I'i amam nematawa Godi hiahawes akas, dao' petopalopas pese'as. I'i epes analemb walemb lauguni sifi'i sogatagamepa, dao' pimafias andeande'.
Epes sogahambombaga ipe'i, pendabeten pihali' Goda nofalo'mas sogataga andeande'. Aho', pendabetena esis. Apa' ipa' ina pendabeten pihali'ana nonda' esis awes, owa'i.
Esis epes sondagalai, ipa' sonehepa pendalomas. Ea' isimba sogalifi, pelef pelomas.

Ipa' ukup pendapoma sahin owan ipe'isi hi'indalas pepan opalef atelef pendalomas, si'i ukup pagapoma ipa' atipa. Ipa' ina ukup pendanda'ma ipa' atipa pi'i dembipai, owa'i. Pefe' peloma epes isimba falafisi. Ipa' ina ukup pi'i ipa' atipa gawaipai, owa'i.
I'i epes sonda' waf awafi ma ipe'i, ina pegwamasa waf awafi esis, owa'i. Ipa' ukup pendapoma waf bu'wafi ma naep epes hiasii penda'af.
Ipa' ina ukup pendanda'ma wandaf, owa'i. I'i ufia'w andepa'wai, ipa' pepe opalef atelef pelomas hi'indalas.

Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai endilisi, ina pegwamasa waf aunai esis sanda'mepa anai, owa'i. Ipa' pindihi'amas sondafe'mago Goda okom wandafunai nondanda' maola esis. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli fa'i, “Waf gwaifi ma anis epes sanda' waf awafii, afamba maol ae'ani. Ae' atowe bola egwamasa waf afamba awafi ma esis.” Dembinai naga'i na'amba.

Apa' ipa' penda'as si'i Baibel naga'i, “I'i bousi ipe'isi nolomohas, dao' pese'asa gwa'aisi esis. I'i iap pese'as, pese'asa embel. I'i ipa' penda'as na'amba, atiasi penda' esis ambagof awagofa waf awafi asasifi.”
Ea' dei' a'ipipa, ipa' ina pepe pititi waf awafi fikila' ipa', owa'i. Apa' pendanda' waf bu'wafi ma pegatalogofa waf afamba awafi.
Epes hiasi a' sondape lafela amom gavman. Apa' mogawa ina anona gavman nataga dowaf, owa'atin. Maol hiani gavmani nataga lagol Godi atogol. Ea' gavman amamba hiami magapani, God atona nanda'am mape.
I'i epen mamahina negesambala basef gavmani, anin nesambala waf Godi wapani. I'i epes ami sogosambala amambai, atiasi sofa' akafimi awami ma waf afamba esis sanda'afi.

Amom gavman ina mapoma mugaumbela epes isimba sanda' waf fasifii, owa'. Amom mapoma mugaumbela epes isimba sanda' waf awafii. I'i ipa' pindaiwa'ma ombal mogahepama amom gavmana, dao' penda' waf bu'wafi atefa amom atiasi moganifela agof ipe'igufi.

Gavman manda' maola Godi motopalopepa pegape andeande'. Apa' i'i ipa' penda' waf awafi, ipa' ombal mondahepamam. Ipa' pegawa bainat anamba magahapilanai, ina mahapilana dowaf, owa'. Manda' maol Godi ma mogogwa akafimi awami ma isimba sanda' waf awafii.
Na'amba dei' apa' a' mondape lafela amom. Apa' ina a' ombal mohapama akafimi amamba atom awami ea' mila basef amamifi, owa'. Apa' mundaila malogof fagape opalef ape'ilifi nomon monda'as na'amba.
Isimba atis dei' ipa' panda' tekis. Dei' main, amom gavman manda'mana maol Godi dondol banagem mumafi maol inimba atin.

Ipa' maol inimba napomepa ma pegaso'am hiahawes sasisasi epes amamba, pendaso'am. Amom mogofa'asa tekisi, pese'ama tekis. Amom mogofa'asa moni maisa mogatala waf mu'uli gavmani, pese'am. Dembami mamahoma manda' maol bu'wani nandahama epes sogasa'ma agof amamugufi, dao' pendafe' lafela amom. Ipa' sonehepa ma pegasa'ma agofa anom amam, dao' pesa'ma agof amamugufi.

Ipa' ina pewaola anof wiafa moni mais fotaoma anin epen, owa'i. Apa' anof wiaf atotof fondotaomapa atapif. Wiaf afamba ukup ipe'ipi pigapigaila anis sahin owan hiasi. Dei' main, epen mamahina okom mogamogaila anin epen daiani, anin nagaila mu'uli inimba endilisii.

Apa' mogawa mu'uli inimba naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Ina' owa'i nehambombaga waf daso'amaifia ea' owa'i neha anis amam nematawa soga'a, owa'i nenda' wala, ea' ina a' kowolena ma hiahaom anis daindaiasi, owa'i.” Mu'uli inimba naloma anin mu'uli mamahina nagapani wapani, kofagena inimba atin naga'i na'amba na'i, “Ina' okom mimila anis epes daias na'amba atin si'i okom magapoma ina' atina.”
Epen ami okom maimaila anin epen daiana nagaso'an opaf anini, inimba ina nanda' waf awafi ma anin, owa'. Epen inimba okom magamagaila anin epen daiani, anin naila mu'uli inimba endilisi.

Ae' a'i ipa' penda' waf afambai. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa ea' nogota ata'e dei' magapautai. Nogota ata'e ipa' pekwaha koha pegesafel. Ipa' pegawa fowa' apa' mataga mahapifana dambaipa, nemaf afamba God na'i a' nowambelapa mogotanimai ata' fapani laogon, apa' dei' fataga felefele' kwasakwasala.

Owamb ba'i a' hi'ilamb ea' felefele'ma lola negataga. Na'amba andeande'ma apa' mogakwaha waf hiafi awafi owambifi ma monda' waf usi'ifi alipifi fepe tatala'if si'i mofa' walitapa magahagasa wandafa waf awafi.

Apa' mondafe' hilili' andeande' si'i epes sagape alipi. Ina mea' embel banagimbeli mohagamogaol ea' gigal mo'oh mi'i basef wandafifi, owa'i. Apa' owa'i monda' waf so'a waulafia monda' salamala basef awafi alugufi. Apa' ina' monda' migimigah mopa' ea' kowolapa ma hiahaom anis epes daiasii, owa'i.
Apa' dei' pefa' Dembinai Jisas Krais ea' pindawisana si'i klos amamba lu'wami sanda' wandafami pefa'ana pepomana. Ipa' ina ukup pelapefe' ma pigaila nomonas awami alop atonaimi, owa'i.
Epen mamahina nagahapifanai, hapif ananini owa' banagania, inimba ipa' pese'an nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pefa'an pifi'i piwisi amam nematawa Kristen. Apa' ina pi'i pifitap pelomana basef mamimami, owa'i.
Anin epen nahapifana banagen, na' gwa'aimi mamimami hiami. Apa' hapif anin epeni ina banagen, na'amba ina na' mafis maim, owa'.

Ea' epen inimba naga' gwa'aimi mamimamii, ina okom iwanim mopoma epen inimba owa' nega' mafisia, owa'i. Ea' epen inimba owa' nega' mafisia ina okom iwanim mopoma epen inimba naga' gwa'aimi mamimamii nanda' waf awafi, owa'i.

Ipa' ina pewaloga anin epen nanda' maola anin epen daiani, owa'i. I'i anin nigalutu banagena maol ananini o negewa, isimba maol anen Dembinai nugumafi anini atin. Anin atiasi nigalutu banagani. Dei' main, Dembinai ananinai atona la'ifinama nogowa' banaga anina nigalutu banagen.
Anin epen okom mapoma anef nemaf lu'uf a'owa' fikila' anif nimaguf hiafi. Apa' anin daian na'i nimaguf hiafi na'ambaif atin. Epes isimba hiasi atona atin sondameme'ma ukup asasipi atip andeande'.

Epen mamahina okom magapoma anef nemaf be'ef a'owa'i, anin okom mandanda' ma Dembinai dei' nanda'am na'amba. Ea' epen inimba naga' gwa'aimi mamimamii, anin okom mandanda'ma Dembinai na'am. Dei' main, anin nanifela God na'as. Apa' epen inimba owa' nega' gwa'aimi mamimami hiamia, anin okom mapoma Dembinai, dei' nandaiwa'ma anis gwa'aisi. Inimba wapani nanifela God nihi'as.
Apa' mogawa la'afena apa' ina anin epen nape nanda' maol naila okom ananimi atom, owa'. Ea' ina anin epen naila okom ananimi atom naga', owa'atin.
I'i apa' mope, dao' monda' maola mogasa'ma agol Dembinaii. I'i moga', moga'ma mogasa'ma agol Dembinaii. Ea' i'i apa' mope namepa o moga', apa' Dembinaii atepa.
Ea' isimba atis Krais naga' notanima ambal lapaona nosafel wapani ma nagape Dembinai ma epes isimba sagaga'i saloma isimba ata' sagape namisi.

Dei' maina ipa' pagawaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma fe' asasini a paga'ipas basef iwanifi? Na'ambai owa'i. Ipa' pegawa anaf apa' hiapai hi'ilapa a' mulutu gani God nope nogowaloga epes hiasima ea' nowalogapa ma basef lu'wafi.

Amamba si'i Baibel na'iam naga'i, “Dembinai naga'iam na'amba na'i, ‘Ae' a'i endilisi atis, anaf epes hiasi sindiwa nembawa sotawa sonda' lotuma ae' hi'ilas, ea' sowalapa basef alihif si'if si'i ae' God endilisiwai.’”
Ea' apa' mogawa apa' hiapai atona atin anaf moga'ipa Goda waf hiafi kofagefa apa' manda'afi.
Ea' ipa' ina pewaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma fe' asasini wapani, hapaimi. Apa' ukup pendanda' na'amba mi'i apa' ina monda' anef wafa monda' owamapa ape'inai nowa nonda' waf awafi, owa'i.
Dembinai Jisas ea' nawalipi egawa isimba. Ina anom hiahaom gwa'aisi mafis mais awasim dowadowaf, owa'. Okom epeni atom mandanda'ma anis maefah alugwisi, dei' hiahawes isimba awes alugwis.

I'i ina' nea' anis maefaha waf afamba ine'ifi fehambombaga okom owamenai, ina' negawa, waf afambai ina' owa' okom mimila owamenaea, owa'. Krais naga' ea' ma nogowambilai owamena anamba. Ea' ina' owa'i nehambombagana ma gwa'aisi ine'isia.
Ipa' ina penda' anef waf anis sahin owan Kristen sitilipa fenda' ukup asasipi iwanip, owa'i. I'i ipa' pi'i waf afamba bu'wafi, ipa' ina penda'afa naep asasipi, hapaifi.

Waf afamba saga' gwa'aisi embelafi, afambai ina kofagefa ma anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin. Anamba waf usi'ifi hilili'i a opalef awanilifi faloma waf sonagahasafi atef fagapoma. Ambal bu'unai Godi naso'apai waf afambai.
Epen ami nape nanda' maola Kraisii ma owa' nenda' anef waf fenda' Kristen ukup iwanipia, atiasi God okom bo'oma waf ananifi ea' epes wapani sogawa anin epen bu'wani.
Dei' apa' mundaila waf hiafi fenda' apa' mogape opalef atelifi, a waf usi'ifi hiafi fegewa' banaga hapif esis sahin owani.

Ina' okom mopoma gwa'aisi atis ea' nehambombaga maol Godi, owa'i. Endilisi, hiahawes hiasi gwa'aisi bu'wasi. Apa' i'i ina' nea' anis maefaha sonda' anin epen newa nenda' waf awafi, dao' ina' wapani nanda' waf awafi.
Ina andeande'ma nega' mafisi embel wain gwa'aisi mais, o nenda' anis maefah mamahisa sonda' owamena nogowa ma waf awafi, owa'i.
Okom ine'imi atom mondanda' neloma Goda hiahawes isimba sonda' owamena nogowai. Epen okom mogapoma anis maefah bu'wasi, okom ananimi ina manda' kotimana hiahawes gwa'aisi mais isimba, anin sonohan.
Apa' epen ami okom biafima nega'asa, kofagema ananimi atom. Dei' main, okom ananimi ina nahapilif banagen na'as, owa'. Hiahawes hiasi epes owa' sogahapifanaia sanda'ami, amamba awami.

Apa' epes magahapifana banagambili, maol ape'ini inimba ma mogatopalopa epes isimba hapif owa' banagania. Esis ina la'ifisa sogofa' nimanimi asasimi, isimba apa' motopalopas mofa' nimanimi asasimi. Apa' ina mila nomonas ape'imi atom, owa'i.
Apa' hiapai atona atin monda' maol mondatopalopa epes sagape felefele'ma ape'i ma atiasi sogofa' waf bu'wafi sogataga banages.
Apa' mogawa Krais wapani ina sonahana okom ananimi atom, owa'. Waf awafi fatagamana si'i Baibel na'iasa anen naga'i, “Epes sa'i basef findiwaefa ina' ea' basef ifimba atif fafi'i faso'ala ae'.”

Dei' main, basef hiafi fowa' amom manda'ef fagail Buki manda'efa fagawalipa apa'. Basef ifimba fegewa' banaga opalef ape'ilifi ma mugalutu banagepa mi'i endilisi atis God notopalopapa ma mogape andeande'.
Apa' mofa' banagami ma God atona nanda'apa malutu banagepa magahapifana. Ae' a'i anen notopalopepa pila waf Krais Jisasi endilisi pigahapila nomonas atifis.
Ama ipa' pegape opalef atifilif a malogof atogof pegasa'ma agol Godi, anen ahama Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais.
Ea' ipa' hipai ukup pindaima atin pendaso'asa nelelemb esis sahin owan si'i Krais wapani nagaso'apa nembel apa', ma epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.

Ae' a'ipipa na'amba. Krais nafi'i nataga nanda' maol nape lafela nagatopalopa esis Juda. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma nigihimba'masa God naga'i basef endilisifi datimai. Basef fowa' nala' lapef nagaloma dembami bafapam akupam asasimi fandawalap alihif.

Krais nanda' maol inimba ma nogatopalopa esis sogololama Godi owa' Judaisia wapani sogogawa God na'ias esis uwahipisa sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol, si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Anaf ae' ewalapa basef i'i agol ine'igili ma anis epes daias sogololama ine'i. Ea' ela analef awalef efela agol ine'igili.”
Ea' anif basef Baibeli faga'ias na'amba wapani fa'i, “Ipa' epes pegelelama Godi, pendagala peloma esis wambota ananisi.”
Ea' anif du'wanif fa'i, “Ipa' hipai pegelelama Godi, pendasa'ma agol Dembinaii. Pendasa'ma agol ananigili ma analef awalef.”
Ea' Aisaia wapani na'ias na'i, “Anaf anona aman notaga wambota Jesii. Aman anamba a' notaga nope Dembinai ma esis sogololama Godi numafias ea' sohapifana si'i endilisi atis anaf anen notopalopas.”

Apa' mogawa endilisi notopalopapa ma mogape andeande'. God anen kofagonama amamba. Dei' ae' a'i ipa' pihapifana nonda' dagala lu'wani neloma opalef awanilifi sogataga si'isa ipa'. Ea' a'i banagami Ambal bu'unai ananinai nonda'epa pegawa endilisi atis anaf piti banagami mogogala'i ananimi.
Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, opaf ae'afi egawa endilisi ma ipa' panda' waf fasifi dondol ea' pegawa gawa hiani naninani. Ea' ipa' ila ma pegaso'as nomonas bu'wasi sahin owan.

Apa' anif basef anda'efa ipe'i ifimba banagafi a'owa' kwasakwasala. Apa' ae' ina ombal mahe andafa'mefa anda'ef, owa'. A'i esa'ma nomonas ipe'isi. Dei' main, God nati ae' uwahipiwi nase'e nembel ae' natopalope dowaf.

Ea' anen nanda'e ape anda' maola Krais Jisasa enda' maol la'afena esis sogololama Godi owa' Judaisia. Anda' maol si'i amom mondolali ma Godi awalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi. Ae' a'i ifa'ai epes isimba sogololama Godi sifi'mai anen ea' Ambal bu'unai ananinai nonda'as sotaga epes Godi atis bo'wes hilili' egaso'anas anen si'i ofa anen okom maga'ian a'owa'i.
Ae' ape sisihiwi aloma Krais Jisas ea' sonahe ma maol inimba anda'ana Godi.

Krais atona nase'e banagami anda' maol inimba. Anen natopalope nanda'e banagewe afe' anda' maol inimba bu'wani awalipa esis sogololama Godi ma silana sogame' basef ananifi. Ae' andaiwa'ma iga'ipipa anif basef daif, owa'. Ifimba atif.

Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda' hiahaom banagami nowa' banagae ma anda' banagami mamimami. Epes hiasi sati banagami amamba ea' same' basef Godi sailif. Dambadamba anda'am Jerusalem awalapa basef bu'wafi ma Krais afe' lauguni hi'alagon itambili itap lu'upa Ilirikam.
Maol inimba ae' okom ma'ian a'owa' ma egawalapa basef ifimba bu'wafi anagon esis owa' ata' sogogawa Kraisia. Ae' andaiwa'ma igi' efe' ewalapef fegatoma anif anom mali' mafe' magawalapafi, owa'.
Ae' okom ma'ias si'i basef faga'ias, “Esis epes owa' anis sefe' soga'ipasa basefa aninia, anaf seme'efa sotolona. Ea' epes isimba owa' sogame' basefanaia, anaf seme'efana sogawana.”
Fowa' anda' maol inimba agawalipasa basef Kraisi. Maol inimbai nahefa ufia'w ae'akwi nimaguf hiafi ea' ina afe'mago ipa', ata' owa'.
Apa' dei' ae' maol ake na'a'e. Afagof hiagufi ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma egafe'mago ipa'.

Isimba atis dei' a'i ata' ili' efo'o iti ipa' ma main, efe' itap lu'upa Spen. Ea' a'i ata' ipani nogota laota kwasakwasala endagala elomepa ma main, dao' ipa' petopalope pilutumi pehapone ufia'w kwagafe' Speni.
Apa' dei' a'i efe' Jerusalem enda' maol etopalopa esis amam nematawa Godi.
Esis Kristen sagape Masedoniai saloma Kristen Griki sa'i basef sandame'maef ea' ma sogowala hiahawes asasisi sonda' du'wanis sefe' Jerusalem, sogaso' esis amam nematawa Godi hiahawes akasi.

Endilisi ukup asasipi atip pa'ias ea' dei' sanda'as na'amba. Apa' ae' a'i esis sowaolamasa wiaf fotaoma esis Kristen sagape Jerusalami. Fowa' esis Juda sali' soso'asa basef Godi ma sagatopalopa ambagof esis isimba sogololama Godi sagape Masedoniai Griki. Isimba atis dei' andeande'ma esis sogwamasa wiaf afamba esis Judia ma hiahawes sogatopalopa alopi.
Ea' ae' a'i ata' enda' maol inimba hi'ilan nili'. A'i ata' ese'asa hiahawes isimba bu'wasi esis Jerusalem hi'ilas ama main, ila ufia'w Speni efo'o ma ata' ili' itilipa.
Ae' egawa ea' nemaf afamba egafe'mago ipa', atiasi hiahaom fasimi Kraisi a' mope si'ima ae' efo'o etagamepa.

Apa' mahapifa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, ea' mogawa Ambal bu'wali Godi nasa'ma ukup ape'ipi ma pigapigaila esis sahin owan ape'isi. Isimba atis dei' a'ipipa dindinip a'i nomonas isimbai sosa'ma ipa' penda' maol numa'wini pegaloma ae' ma beten. Ipa' pendanda' betena God notopalope ae'
nogatagwahowe ma lagof anis epes Judaisi owa' sogahapifanaia. Ipa' pendabetena God nonda' amam nematawa ananisi sagape Jerusalami sondagala ma maol inimba anda'ana agatopalopasani.
I'i God ni'i aho'me ai, efo'o etagamepa epe endagala a'owa' elomepa ata' epoma noma'w kwasakwasala.
God anen kofagonama opaf awanafi. Ae' a'i anen nope nolomago ipa' hipai. Endilisi.
Ae' a'ipipa ma pigimafi Fibi andeande', ako'w haniti'mafa afa'ikwi kwanda' maol kwagatopalopa esis Kristen sagape Senkriai.

Fibi kwape sisihi'wa Dembinai. Ea' ipa' pendaso' nelelemba ako'w si'i waf bu'wafi apa' amam nematawa Godi monda'afi. I'i ako'w nomonas nimanisa anis maefaha, ipa' pendatopalopa'w. Dei' main, ako'w kwatopalopa ae' wapani.

Ipa' penda'mas nemaf bu'wafi Akila naloma waulu'mana Prisila ea' pi'ipaso dagala ae'ani. Esis bias apa' mandao'oma manda' maol atin Krais Jisasi. Fowa' esis sandandombol endilisi ma sagatopalopa ae'. Nemaf afamba anis sa'i sogahe, esis ina ombal mahas, owa'.
Sa'i awi ma soga' sotopalopa ae' egape namowe. Ea' ina ae' atowe anifela esis bias, owa'atin. Esis Kristen hiasi fowa' sogolalama Godi wapani, sanifelis.

Ea' ipa' pise'asa nemaf bu'wafi ma dagala ae'ani esis Kristen isimba safe' sandakolas sagape ipat asasitai. Ea' pi'ipago Epainetus nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi anen alipunai ae'anai endilisi. Anen nali' nahapifa Krais nali'ma epes hiasi itap lu'upa Esia.
Ipa' penda'makwago nemaf bu'wafi Maria. Ako'w kwanda' maol numa'uni hiani ma kwagatopalopepa.

Ipa' pese'amo dagala neloma nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma amam amamba Andronikus noloma Junias, amom wapani Judaimi si'i ae'. Amom manda' kalabus magaloma ae'i. Amom aposel ma'i amom biam manda' maol bu'wani Godii. Amom mali'ma ae' mahapifa Krais.
Ipa' pi'ipago Ampliatusa nemaf bu'wafi ma dagala ae'ani. Anen alipunai ae'anai endilisi ma nagape sisihinama Dembinai.
Pi'ipago Urbanus nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi, anen nanda' maol atitin nagaloma ae'i ma maol Kraisi. Ea' pi'ipago Stakisa nemaf bu'wafi wapani. Anen alipunai ae'anai endilisi.
Ea' pi'ipago Apelesa nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi, anen agol gandawalapana nagaila Krais endilisi. Pi'ipasago dagala ma nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma esis sagape ipat atota Aristobulusi.
Pi'ipago Herodiona nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi, anen Juda wapani si'i ae'. Pi'ipasago dagala ma nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi esis wambota atota Narsisusi sagahapifa Dembinaii.

Pi'ipawago nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma Trifina kwaloma Trifosa, awo biawa wanda' maol numa'uni Dembinaii. Pese'akw nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma Persis, ako'w alipu'wi ae'akwi endilisi, kwanda' maol hiani ahifini ma Dembinai.
Pi'ipago Rufusa nemaf bu'wafi anen epen bu'unai naloma ma'mana anani'wi ae' wapani egefala'w ma'mai.
Pi'ipasago dagala ae'ani ma nemaf bu'wafi ma Asinkritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, a Hermas, ea' esis Kristen sahin owan sape sagalomomi.
Ipa' pi'ipasago nemaf bu'wafi feloma dagala ae'ani ma Filologus noloma Julia, ea' Nereus noloma haniti'mana anani'wi, ea' Olimpas, soloma esis amam nematawa hiasi Godi sape sagaloma esisi.

Waf afamba apa' amam nematawa Godi, ipa' hipai atona atin pendagala pendaso'asa lagof esis sahin owan hiasi pindanifelis. Amam nematawa Kristen hiasi sagape na'ai sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi sandagalamepa.

Alipipai, ae' a'ipipa dindinipa silisolawi andeande' pegapoma anis epes sanda' waf awafii sanda' ipa' Kristen pendawal biafipa sogosambala basef ifimba ipa' pegefa'afi. Waf afambai esis sanda' epes hiasi sowa awes. Ipa' pese'as alafugah epes isimbai.

Esis ina sanda' maola Dembinai ape'inai Kraisi, owa'atin. Sagaila ukupa alop asasipi atopi. Sanda' basef atif usiusihifi ma sambaso'ma opalef saga'i'ipa anis epes isimba owa' sogogawa anef waf bu'wafi awafi andeandi'i'a.
Ipa' paila God, dei' epes hiasi sogawepa ea'. Isimba atis dei' ae' sonahema ipa'. Ae' a'i ipa' pendegawa waf bu'wafi endilisi, apa' ipa' ina ukup pendanda'ma waf awafi, owa'.

God anen kofagonama opaf awanifi, nogota kwaia'uta ma nofa'asa Satan nogafe' lafela bo'wagah ipe'igahi. Ae' ahali' God andabetena Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais notopalopepa dowaf nope atapina nogalomepa.
Wandao'oma wanda' maol atini Timoti anen nasapa'ago dagala nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'. Lusius naloma Jeson a Sosipater, amom Juda wapani si'i ae', amom wapani masapa' nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'.
Ae' Tertius, efa' malogola Pol anda'ago basef ifimba. Ae' asapa' basefa nemaf bu'wafi fafe'mago ipa' ma agol Dembinai ape'inai.

Gaius nasapa'ago dagala ma nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'. Anen numafi ae' Pol andeande' ipat ananitai, ea' numafi esis Kristen hiasi wapani safi'i sandakolas na'a'e. Erastus anen nanda' maola gavmani nugumafi otambai taun wambel ambalembai, ea' sahomapa ape'inai Kwartus, amom biam masapa'o basefa dagala bu'wani ma ipa'.
[Ae' andabetena Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais notopalopepa dowaf numafipa ma nope nogalomago ipa' hipai. Endilisi.]

Apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol. Anen la'ifinai ma nogowa' banagaip ma basef bu'wafi ananifi agawalapafi, ifimba basef bu'wafi faga'i Jisas Kraisi. Basef ifimba fowa' nimaguf hiafi ata' fape fandambaho', apa' dei' fataga alihifa basef ifimba fowa' amom profet manda'afi afa' wawalapef alihif. God nagape namona atapinai na'i basef dindinipa basef ifimba bu'wafi dei' fataga fandawalap alihifa misi'ah epes hiasi itap anamba hiagoma ma esis hiasi sogahapifana.
Anen atotona nogogawai endilisi. Apa' mondasa'ma agol ananigili dondol lifilafi. Jisas Krais atona natopalopapa mondanda'as na'amba. Endilisi.

Ae' Pol aposel Jisas Kraisi anda' maol ananini. Okom Godi atom nofale nandandepe anda' maol inimba. Ae' aloma owamapa Sostenes wape na'a'e wasapa' dagala nemaf bu'wafi nefe'mago ipa' amam nematawa Kristen sios pagape Korini. Ea' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'. Ipa' pagape sisihipama Krais Jisasi, God nanda'epa pape hilili' nofalepa nosaho'epa ea' ananipai atipa. Afa' biafa wase'epa dagala ipa' paloma epes hiasi ma walemb hielimbi sogofala agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi, anen dembinai ma apa', esis wapani.
Afa' biafa wa'i God ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais monda'ago ipa' andeande' mumafipa motopalopago opalef ipe'ilifi fepe sa'ombel.
Ae' anifela God dondola ipa'. Dei' main, ipa' pagape sisihipama Krais Jisasi. Ea' God notopalopepa dowafa pegape andeande'ma anen atona.
Ipa' pape sisihipama Krais pape andeande' a'owa ea' pefa' basef hiafi paga'iefi faloma gawa hiani bu'wani.
Dei' main, basef ifimba bu'wafi Kraisi afa' wagawalapafi fataga alihif fandawalap banagambela opalef ipe'ilifi si'ilif.
Ea' dei' ipa' pape ukup pehafa dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais anaf nogataga alihina. Afamba pape pehafana apefa' presen hiani Ambal bu'unai Godi nagase'epan dowafi hi'alan. Ina anin akepa, owa'atin.
Jisas Krais atiasi nowa' banagaepa ma pegape banagepa atipipa pefe' pegatagama nemaf afamba Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nogafi'afii ma diga basef kofagesa akepa nemaf afamba.
God nanda' hiahawes ananisi hi'alas datimai nofalepa ma pegape opaf atof pegaloma Nogamana ananinai Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai.
Apa' ipa' sahin owan, a'ipipa banagoga ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi na'amba. Ipa' pendape mini'ap atetep endilisi pindaila nomonas atifisa okom atotom.
Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, esis mini'ap Klowei sa'ipi sa'i ipa' panda' migimigah sape la'afena ipa'.
Ae' a'i isimba, ipa' hipai atona atin paga'ias na'amba. Anis sa'i, “Apa' mini'ap Poli.” Anis sa'i, “Apa' mini'ap Apolosi.” Ea' anis sa'i, “Apa' mini'ap Pitai.” A anis sa'i, “Apa' mini'ap Kraisi.”

Ipa' panda'as na'amba ma main? Ipa' pa'i Krais nandawal wa'awa'ana? Ea' pa'i ae' Pol sandele lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ma agatopalopepa? Owa'atin endilisi. Ipa' ina pefa' baptaisa agol ae' Poli, owa'atin.
Ae' anda' baptaisima amam amamba ipe'imi biam Krispusi Gaius atom. Anis epes ipe'isi daias, owa'. Ae' anifela Goda ina anda' baptaisima anis ipe'isi wapani, owa'.
Ea' isimba dei' anin epen ina ni'ipipa ni'i ipa' pefa' baptaisa agol ae'agili, owa'.
Endilisi, anda' baptaisima esis wambota Stefanasi wapani, apa' ae' ina okom mandanda'ma anis wapani, owa'.

Dei' main, Krais ina nasapa'e afi'ima enda' baptaisima anis epes, owa'atin. Anen nasapa'e ma ewalapa basef bu'wafi Godi iga'if. Ae' ina ewalapa basef ifimba i'if ila anin gawa amom gawaimi maga'iani, owa'. Na'amba epes si'i basefa lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai Krais nagaga'agai si'i basef ifimba owa' banagafia falafifi atif.

Endilisi, epes isimba sagape ufia'w higiligalasa'wi, esis ukup pandanda'ma basefa lawag agamba usi'igai ti'wanaegai sagandola Kraisagai sa'i basef ambamba falafumi atom putuputa'imi. Apa' amam nematawa dei' God nape nofa'apa nakwahomapa waf awafi mogotanimaii ea' mogawa basef amamba banagami Godi atom.
Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Anaf ae' ehambombaga gawa esis isimba gawaisi. Ea' elefata nomonas epes isimba gawaisi saga'i nomonas sasisasi hiahiasii sagapaisi.”

Dei' amom gawaimi mondanda' mi'imama? Ea' amom gawaimi mogogawa gawa hianii monda' main? Ea' epes isimba itap apa'isi sa'i basef sapa'ef sandahihianamaifi sonda' mamahisa? Owa'atin. God nanda' gawa epes isimba itap apa'isi nataga falafalafini si'i epes isimba sahaga sagagaoli.

Dei' main, epes itapasi ina la'ifisa sogogawa Goda gawa inimba asasini atin, owa'atin. God anen gawainai ea' nasopamasa ufia'w asasi'wi. Ea' anen okom mandanda' na'i nofa'ai amam nematawa sogahapifanai sotanimai. Esis sahapifa basef ifimba waga'ipasafi epes itapasi saga'i wafifi gawa akafi.” Ea' God nofa'as sotanimai.
Esis Juda ukup paipaila sigati maol banagani atin si'i God nanda'ani apa' esis Grik ukup pa'ipa'i sogofa' gawa hiani lu'wani.
Apa' afa' wawalapa basefa Krais nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Basef ifimba fahambombaga ukup esis Judai. Apa' esis Grik ukup pandanda'mef pa'i amamba basef wafimi gawa akami.
Apa' amam nematawa God nogofalapai, esis Juda saloma anis Grik wapani, basef ifimba fa'i Krais anen banagami gawa Godi.

Dei' main, basef amamba Godi epes saga'i “Gawa akami wafimi”, amamba gawaimi atom lu'wami mikila' gawa epesi. Ea' hiahaom amamba epes saga'i “Awanami falafumi Godi”, amamba banagem a'owa' mikila' banagami epesi.

Alipipai ae'ipai, ipa' ata' ukup pendanda'ma fowa' dambadamba God nogofalepa ma pagataga Kristen. Ipa' hipai ina anis epes hiasi la'afena ipa' gawaisi ma itap ana'e, owa'atin. Owa' anis hiasi agof lu'wagufisa. Ea'owa' anis hiasi dembesi banagasia, owa'.

Apa' God okom ananimi atom nandandepa anis epesa sogape ananisi atis. Epes isimba esis amam nematawa itapasi saga'i gawa akasi, apa' God nandandepas ea' ma nogaha iwana epes gawaisi. Ea' epes isimba itapasi hiasi saga'i falafalafisi owa' banagasia, isimba God nandandepas ea' ma nogaha iwana epes isimba dambesi banagasi.

Anen nandandepa epes isimba amam nematawa itapasi saga'i owa' fasisia, falafisi atis dowafi agof akasi. Aho', anen nandandepasa nogahambombaga hiahaom amamba banagami mogoloma epes isimba banagasi agufisi itap ana'iisi.
Nanda'as na'amba ma anin epen ina la'ifina negasa'ma agol ananigili atogol lu'wagola naep Godi, owa'.

God nahapona ipa' pape sisihipama Krais Jisas ea' nanda' anen nape kofagonama gawa ape'inii. Anen atona ufia'w ape'ikwi ma God nanda'apa mogape be'epa hilili'i ma naep ananipi ma mogape ananipai atepa. Anen atona natalepa nakwahepa ma waf awafi ma magape wahifipa.
God nanda'am na'amba ma anif basef fagail Baibeli fetaga fendawalap. Basef ifimba faga'i, “Epen ami ni'i sonogahani, anin a' sonondahana Dembinai atona.”
Alipipai ae'ipai, fowa' agafe'mago ipa' awalapa basef endilisifi Godi ma ipa', ina awalapef a'if aloma gawa ae'ani lu'wani, ma basef bu'wambu'wafi ma iga'i'ipipa, owa'atin.

Dei' main, okom ae'ami mandanda' na'amba. Afamba ae' ape agalomepa ina ata' okom mapoma anom maefah daiam, owa'. Okom mase'e hiahaom. Ae' okom mondapoma Jisas Krais atona. Aho', anen naga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
Isimba atis nemaf afamba ape agalomepa, ae' owa' banagewea, ae' pupuliwi. Ae' ombal mahe bolatin ape a'owa'.
Ea' basef aga'ifa basef bu'wafi Kraisi, ifimba ina a'if gawa ae'ani aloma epesa igahekelipai, owa'atin. Ae' a'ipipa ihimba'mepa banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi atona.
Anda'as na'amba ma ipa' ina ukup paipaila gawa epesi dei' pahapifa God, owa'. Anda'asa ipa' ukup pehafel pigapigaila banagami Godi atom dei' pahapifana.

Aho' endilisi. Ae' awalapa basef gawa nagapaifi ma epes isimba mamahisa sahapifa Goda banages ea' sanda' waf ananifi. Apa' gawa ini'i, ina itap apaini, a'a gawa amam agufumi ma itap apai anaf higiligalam lamonami.

Waf ae'afi fowa' fagape na'amba, dei' wapani, awalapa basefa gawa Godi atin. Basefa gawa inimba fowa' nape nandambaho'ma epes, fowa' gani God ata' owa' nonda' itap apa'ea anen ea' nandandepa gawa inimba ma mogofa' banagami mogogala'i ananimi.

Owa' anona aman atotona agilinai ma itap apa'e nogawa basefa gawa inimbaea, owa'atin. I'i amom mogawanai, dei' ina mofa' Dembinai mondolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai, owa'atin. Dei' main, aman anamba banagonai mogogala'i banagamunai endilisi. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Amom agufumi ina mogawa basefa gawa inimba, owa'.

Apa' ae' a'i basefa gawa inimba si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Hiahaom maim God nagandondombam ea' ma epes mamahisa ukup pagaila anen endilisii, amamba a' mikila' ukup epesi. Esis ina la'ifis same'am satolom sagawama ukupi naep aligah asasisi, owa'atin.”
Apa' God nawalapa hiahaom amamba mandawalapa apa' ma Ambal bu'winai ananinai. Ambal Godi nati hiahaom hiami mape mandamabahi'i, ea' natolom nogawa nomonas hiasi ma waf Godi fape fandambaho' ape'i.
Dei' epen mamahina ipe'ini negawa nomonas anin epeni? Owa'atin. Ambal epen inimbai atol logawas. Ea' na'amba atin, ina anin epen negawa okom Godi, owa'. Ambal ananinai atona nogawana.
Apa' ina mofa' spirit ambal itapali, owa'atin. Apa' dei' mofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi ma mogogawa hiahaom maim God nogaso'apam dowafi.

Amamba ina nomonas gawa epesi sa'ipian, owa'atin. Amamba basef Ambal buwali Godi nagawalapafi. Dei' a'ipasa basef ifimba awalapef a'ifa Ambal bu'unai Godi ma epes isimba mamahisa Ambal Godi nagapaisi.

Apa' epen ami Ambal bu'unai Godi akan, anin ina la'ifina negefa' hiahaom amamba fasim Ambal Godi nogoso'apam dowafi, owa'atin. Epen inimba okom mapoma amamba na'i falafumi sonda'am ki de'iafami. Anin ina negawam, owa'. Dei' main, Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nawalipasa amamba kofagema.
Epen mamahina Ambal bu'unai Godi nagapaini, anin nagahihi' hiahawes hiasi. Apa' ina anin epen la'ifina nigahihi' epen inimba Ambal Godi nagapaini, owa'atin.
Aho', “Dei' epes ami sogawa hiahawesa okom Dembinaii ma atiasi la'ifisa sigihimba'ma anis? Owa'atin.” Apa' dei' apa' mofa' okom Kraisi mapaepa.

Alipipai, fowa' ae' ina a'ipipa basef si'i agaso'asef epes isimba sagaila okom Ambal bu'unai Godii, owa'. A'ipipaef si'i agaso'asef epes isimba ukup pagaso'asa basef kofagefa Godii, si'i awasi ata' saga' nomagof atogufi.
Ata' ase'epa nomagof atogof. Ina dei' ase'epa gwa'aisi banagasi, ata' owa'. Dei' main, ipa' ina la'ifipa, ata' owa'. Ae' a'ias endilisi atis, ipa' dei' wapani ata' owa'.

Dei' main, ipa' ata' pagape atapipa ma waf opaf apinaii. Endilisi, waf anamba nawalapai waf kowagalasafi faloma ukup awepa sahin owani ma basef fitapaifi ata' fape atapifa ipa'. Isimba sihimba'ma apa' hiapai ipa' ata' paila waf anamba nembel apinai. Waf anamba epes itapasi atona.
Anin epen na'i, “Ae' mini'ap Poli.” Anin na'i, “Ae' mini'ap Apolosi.” Waf afambai ipa' ata' pape si'i epes itapasi atapipa.

Ipa' ata' nomonas sondanda'mas andeande'. Apolos anen aman mamahonama? A ae' Pol aman mamahowema? Afa' biafa wanda' maoli atofa. Dembinai naso'afa maol nandandafa. Ea' maol inimba afa' biafa wanda'ani, ufia'w akwamba ato'w dei' ipa' pahapifa Krais.
Ae' ali' ewaha olemb gwa'aimbi, Apolos nagi' nakolo' embelas. Apa' God atotona nanda'am mataga.
Ea' dei' epen inimba negewaha olemb gwa'aimbii, anin agol akan. Ea' epen nagakolo' embelasi wapani anin agol akan, apa' God nanda' gwa'aisi isimba sagatagai, anen atona agol lu'wagili gatomana.
Ea' epen inimba negewaha olemb gwa'aimbii naloma epen inimba nagaso' embelembii, esis bias sanda' maol inimba atini. Ea' esis bias atona atin anaf sofa' hiahawes sondahama maol sanda'ani.
Dei' main, afa' biafa wanda' maol atitin Godi. Ea' ipa' si'i aof ananifi. Ipa' si'i ipat Godi.

Ama okom ananimi magamagailapai nagatopalopapa dowafi nanda'e ataga ape ali' si'i epen gawainai nanda' ifagwi, ea' awa olaf fape fali' anis sola' ipat totomaf. Apa' epes hiasi atona atin solawais andeande' asola' ipat totoma olaf afamba.
Ipa' pegawa God nanda' Jisas Krais nape nali' si'i olaf fotawa fagali'i. Isimba atis ina ata' anin epen la'ifina nogawa anof olaf daiaf wapani, owa'atin.

I'i epen ami ni'i nela' ipat togatoma olaf afamba ilifi, anin nenda' gol nela'ata o nenda' silva mogogala' gambigambisi nela'ata, o nenda' anemba otamba sagalotamamba a'owa'i, o nenda' lawah o nenda' walol o otalef alilifi, nela'ata.

Nemaf afamba Krais nogafi'afii, maol inimba hiasi sonda'ani netaga nondawalap alihin nepe bo'wen a'a awen. Nemaf afamba fetaga feloma nif lu'wafi. Ea' nif ifimba fendo maol inimba hiani epes hiasi atona atini hi'ilana sogogawa maol asasini bo'wen a'a awen.
I'i anin epen nela' ipat togatoma olaf afamba ilifi ma nif owa' fendetaea, anaf nefa' anom hiahaom fasimi.
Apa' i'i ipat epen nanda' maoli fendota hi'igalata, anaf ina nefa' amamba fasimi, owa'atin. Endilisi, God nofa'an nogotanimai, apa' hiahawes akan nepe dowaf si'i mutanima magalu'wani nifi.
Ipa' pegawa a'a owa'? Ipa' atipa si'i ipat lu'unai Godi, ea' Ambal bu'unai ananinai nape nomona opalef ipe'ilifi.
I'i anin epen nehambombaga ipat anamba, anaf God nohambombaga epen inimba. Dei' main, ipat anamba ananinai bo'ona hilili'i. Anamba ea' ipa' atipa.

Na'amba anin epen nembaso'ma anin atin. I'i epen ipe'ini okom mondanda' ni'i anin gawaini si'i epes itapasi sogofalasi, epen inimba andeande'ma nendambema ata' netaga okom moso'an nili' ma atiasi negataga epen gawaini endilisi.

Dei' main, gawa itapani inimba falafalafini si'i basef epes sahaga sagagauli saga'iani ma naep Godi. Si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “God nofa' epes gawaisi ma waf gawaifi fafifafi asasifi atef baso'afi si'i epes sagaha mafis isalef.”
Ea' Baibel na'ias wapani na'amba na'i, “Dembinai nogawa nomonas epes sogogawai falafisi atis.”
Ea' anin epen ina nefela agof apa' epesi, owa'i. Hiahaom hiami ipe'imi atom.
Poli Apolos, Pita maloma itap apa'e saloma ambal namili a ga' wapani saloma hiahawes dei' sagapani, anaf sigi' sogatagai, amamba hiami ipe'imi atom.
Ea' ipa' epes Krais Jisasi, ea' anen Godi.
Ipa' pendegawa afa' wanda' maol Kraisi ugumafi basef endilisfi Godi fowa' fape fandambahi'ii dei' fataga fandawalap alihif.
I'i aman dembinai noso'ana maol anin epena nigimafian, anin nimafian ninda'an datima andeande' hi'indalan.
I'i ipa' pewaloga waf ae'afi ma anis daias sonda'me kot sowaloga waf ae'afi, ae' okom mopoma amamba falafumi atom. Ae' wapani ae' atowe ina awaloga waf ae'afi, owa'.

Endilisi, malogol gagape opaf ae'afi nomoni ae' ina ame' anef waf awafi anda'afi, owa'. Apa' isimba ina sihimba'me endilisi ma iga'i, “Ae' epen usi'iwi hilili'i”, owa'atin. Aman dembinai jas nogawaloga ae'i, Dembinai atona.

Ea' dei' nogota dondo'atai ata' owa' ma, ipa' owa'i pewawaloga waf anin epen daiana. Ipa' ata' pepe pehafa nemaf afamba Dembinai nugafi'afii. Anaf anen nofa'i hiahaom hiami mandamabaho' magape akoti motaga mondawalap hauguma nogogala'ma. Nemaf afamba anen nowalapa ukup epes hiasi pape pandambahi'i petaga pindawalap alihigima. Ea' God ni'ipapa basef ananifi apa' hiapai hi'ilapa atona atin dondo' ma maol apa' manda' ani, bo'wen a'a awen.

Alipipai, ae' okom mandanda' ma'i etopalopepa. Isimba atis ae'i Apolos wihimba'mepa basef ifimba doko' aga'ipipafi kofagefa ma waf afa'ifi. Afa' wanda'as na'amba ma ipa' pegelafa waf ape'ifi basef ifimba kofagefa fa'ias faga'i, “Ipa' ina pimbisila' mu'uli inimba, owa'i.” Ea' dei' ipa' ina penda' du'waniga pesa'ma agola anona daiana, owa'i.

Alipipai, ipa' panda'as mama? Ami nanda'epa pape dembipai pikila' anis epes daias? Hiahawes isimba hiasi God atona nase'epas. Ea' ipa' ina penda' du'waniga pi'i ipa' atipa dembipai banagipai, owa'i. Hiahawes isimba hiasi ipe'isi, God atona nase'epas.

O aho', opalef ipe'ilifi asi'ilif ea'! Ipa' hiahaom hiamipai asi'ipa dondo'! Ipa' apikila'afa pataga dembipai king! O uwahipipa! Ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma petaga pegape dembipai kinga atiasi ope dembifai king ogalomepa!

Ae' okom mandanda' na'amba a'i God nanda' afa' aposel si'i epes sape agof akasi sagagi' endilisii. Epes hiasi hi'alas sagape ilif itapi saloma amom ensel wapani satolofa wandahama epes isimba atiasi sohas sogaga'i.
Afa' wape si'i epes ukup pagaso'asi ma ogasa'ma agol Kraisi, apa' ipa' pape epes gawaipai ma waf ananifi. Afa' owa' banagefaea, apa' ipa' banagepa ea'. Ipa' agof lu'wagof, apa' afa' agof akafa.
Fowa' gani wapani nafi'i nataga nogota ata'e wape nolomahafa a bambafugah fataugahifa a'owa', ea' luwaguf mais akafa. Esis sindiwa lagof sahafa atin. Afa' wambel akafa ma ofe' ogape andeande'.

Wanda' maol numa'uni endilisi ma lagof afa'igufi atogof. Esis sa'i basef sanda'afa findiwafa owa' afa' banagefa ofalo'mas wagwamasa basef bu'wafi atif. Esis sanda'afa aofa, wape banagefa watitilis, afa' ina wagwamas, owa'.

Esis sa'ipafa basef awafi endilisi apa' owa' wagwamasa basef awanafi sa'osa'ombel. Wataga si'i alapita awasimi endilisi ma itap hiagoma si'i alogw gwagailasi, si'i itap sagafafali'api. Fowa' gani wape na'amba atin wafi'i wataga dei'.
Ae' ina anda' basef ifimba ma fenda'epa ambagof ipe'igufi awagof, owa'atin. Ae' okom maimailipa si'i awasi ae'ipai, a'i isalima nomonas ipe'isi.

I'i endilisi ipa' amom mogawalipipa basef Kraisi 10,000-pelaim ea' hapaimi, apa' ahapepa ina hiam, owa'. Waf Krais Jisasi atef ae' atowe ape ahamepa ipe'iwai, ipa' pataga batawis ae'ipai ma basef bu'wafi Godi agawalipipafi.
Isimba atis dei' afela ukup ipe'ipi ma pigaila waf ae'afi pegafe'.

Ea' asapa' Timoti nafe'mago ipa'. Anen nogame ae'anai wanda' maol Dembinaii. Anen nugumafi maol inimba datima andeande'i. Ae' okom mailana a'owa', dei' asapa'ana ma atiasi nogasa'ma nomonas ipe'isi ma basefi fe' poe ae'asi agaila waf Kraisi. Ae' agawalipa esis Kristen sios walemb anamba hiagoma ma basefi waf ea' isimba atis.
Anipa ukup pandanda' pa'i ae' bola dao' efo'o ea' panda' du'waniga.

Apa' owa'atin. I'i Dembinai ni'i aho'ai, dao' efe'mago ipa' kwafalis. Apa' ae' ina efe'mago ipa'ma egegawa basef amam manda' du'wanigai manda'afi atif, owa'. Basef amamifi hapaifi. Ae' a'i efo'o egawa wafi maol mais Godi amom manda'asi.
Dei' main, kofegama amamba ma epes isimba sugawisa maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias, amamba ina hiahaom moga'ian atini, owa'atin. Amamba ina basef atif, owa'. Amamba banagami Godi atom.
Ipa' ukup pa'i waf mamahefa, pa'i efa'ago bumbulita okom wandafumi efo'o ma igasindi'amonepa, o pa'i efa'ago waf okom magamagailipafi sa'ombelifi efe'mepago? Isimba nomonas ipe'isi atis.

Anif basef fatagama ae' fa'i waf afamba awafi so'a waulafi fapoma ipa'. Waf awafi endilisi fagahambombaga daso'amai, waf afambai epes isimba sogololama Godi ina sanda' anef waf awafi na'ambaifi, owa'atin. Waf afamba na'amba. Anona aman a' naso' nemata'w kugumafianai ahamana nagaso'akwi.

Dei' ipa' ata' panda' du'waniga atin pasa'ma agof ipe'igufi ma waf afamba awafi ma main? Na'ambai owa'i. A' andeande'ma opalef ipe'ilifi fepe si'ilifa lef ipe'ini ma pegalopa waf afambai awafi. Ipa' pili'amona aman anamba nanda' waf afambai ma ina ata' nope wapani nolomepa, owa'.
Endilisi, alop ae'api pape laogona ipa', apa' ambal ae'ali lape lalomepa. Ae' si'i endilisi ape agalomepa ma agawaloga waf aman anamba nanda'afi awafi.
Dei' a'ias ea' na'amba. Nemaf afamba ipa' pendakolasafi ma agol Dembinai Jisasi, ambal ae'ali loloma banagami Dembinai ape'inai Jisasi amamba mope molomepa nemaf afamba.
Apa' a' miliamonago aman anamba nefe'mago Satana nogahambombaga alop poloma nembel apinai ananinai. Monda'as na'amba ma God nogowambilai ambal aman anambai nemaf Dembinai akutaifi.

Ipa' panda' du'waniga pasa'ma agof ipe'igufi atogof lu'wagof patiti waf afamba awafi fapomepa, amamba ina waf bu'wafi, owa'atin. Ipa' pegawa ea' basefa mu'uli inimba ma yis isimba sanda' bret tagatifi faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Yis kwasala'wis dowaf sanda' bret hiatai hi'alata tatef lu'uta.”

Ea' ipa' pili'amona yis amamba apimi ma pegape si'i bret dambaitai yis akatai, si'i endilisi ipa' pagataga epes dambaipai. Dei' main, sipsip sondolali sagahanama gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasovai anen Krais, esis a' sahana naga' ea', si'i sondolali gwa'aisi mafis maisa God.

Ea' apa' mondanda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova, apa' ina mofa' yis amamba apimi, owa'i. Amamba si'i waf awasinai endilisi. Apa' mondofa' bret wafitai yis akatai, isimba si'i wafa ukup usi'ip hilili'i basef endilisifi.
Anif basef ali' anda'ef fagafe'ma ipe'i, aga'if na'amba. “Ipa' ina pefala epes isimba sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafii pi'i alipisi, owa'i.”

Ae' ina a'iasa pegakwaha epes isimba endilisi sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafii, a epes isimba kowagalasa hiahawes anis daiasi a epes isimba sanda' wali o sagahambombaga anis daiasi soloma isimba sanda' lotuma god baso'amunai, owa'. I'i ipa' pi'i pegakwahis endilisima, dao' pekwaha itap apa'e hi'indalepa.

Apa' basef dei' anda'afi kofagefa na'amba. I'i anona aman ipa' pegefalona owamepai nonda' waf awafi so'a waulafi o kowogalanama hiahawes anis daiasi o nonda' lotuma god baso'amunai, ni'i basef alafugahafi, nea' embel okom mogahanai, nonda' wal nohambombaga anis daias, ipa' ina pefalana alipinai ipe'inai pi'i basef pelomana, owa'i hapainai. Ipa' ina pea' gwa'aisi peloma epes na'ambaisi wapani, owa'.

Maol sagahihi' epes sagape ando'ma siosi ina maol ae'ani, owa'. God atona anaf nowaloga waf epes isimbai. Apa' maol sagahihi' epes sagape nomoni, dao' inimba maol ipe'ini, ipa' pendanda'an. “Ipa' li'amonago aman aunai nape la'afena ipa' nanda' waf awafii.”

I'i anin epen la'afena ipa' nenda' basef fila anin epen daian, ina andeande'ma epen inimba netopa'ma esis amam nematawa Godi sope ma nefe' nenda' kota naep amom dembami jas mogololama Godii. Na'ambai owa'i. Andeande'ma epen inimba ambal aola nefe' nenda' kota naep amom jas mogololama Godii.
Apa' amam nematawa Godi anaf mowawaloga waf epes hiasi itapasi hi'ilas. Ipa' pegawa isimba a'a owa'? Dei' mama? A'i ipa' owa' la'ifipama ata' pegawawaloga basef atif sa'ufi fafifafi ipe'ifia?
Apa' anaf mowawaloga waf amom enseli wapani. Ipa' pegawa isimba, a'a owa'? Isimba atis dei' apa' la'ifipa endilisi ma mogawaloga basef hiahawes itap apa'isi.
Ea' i'i ipa' anif basefa hiahawes itapasima, dei' maina ipa' pagaso'am maol inimba sogawaloga basefa epes isimba owa' agof fogatomasa siosia? Owa'.
Ae' anda' basef ifimba ma fenda' ambagof ipe'igufi awagof. Dei' main? Gawaimi ipe'imi hiami mape la'afena ipa' amom la'ifimama mogawaloga anif basef fegataga la'afena sahin owan bias ipe'isii.
Apa' owa' dei' anin epen alipini nanda' kotima sahin owan ananini ma naep amom dembami jas owa' mogohapifa Kraisia.
Aho', ipa' panda' kotima esis alipisi ea' isimba atis dei' sihimba'ma ae' ipa' apewa ea'. Dei' maina owa' pepe pititilisa sonda'mepa waf awafia? Ea' owa' pi'i aho'mas sohondo' anom maefah ipe'imia?
Penda'am na'amba owa'i. Apa' ipa' ea' panda' waf awafima anis epes pahokola hiahawes asasisi! Aho', ipa' panda' waf na'ambaifi ma esis alipisi endilisi ipe'isi atis.

Epes mamahisa sanda' waf awafii, anaf ina sofe' anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin. Pegawa isimba a'a owa'? Na'amba ipa' pembaso'ma ukup ipe'ipi atip. Epes sanda' waf awafi ma so'a waola anis amam nematawa daiasi, a epes isimba sanda' lotuma god baso'amunai, a epes sagahabombaga waf daso'amaifi, a amam amamba ukup paga'i waf nematawaifi, a amom amamba manda' waf awafi magaloma anom amami,

a isimba sanda' wali, a epes kowagalasa hiahawes anis daiasi sa'i sogofa'as atini, a epes isimba sa' embela ukup magahasi, a epes isimba saga'i basef awafi findiwaifi ma anis epesi, ea' isimba sanda' wal sagahambombaga epesi, epes isimba na'ambaisi ina anaf sefe' suwis anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin.

Fowa' anipa panda' waf afambai. Owa', God nasa'opepa nosaho'epa ea' ananipai atipa si'ipa. God nanda'epa' pagataga epes bu'upai hilili'i ma naep ananipi. Anen nanda'epa na'amba atina agol Dembinai Jisas Kraisi ma Ambal bu'winai God ape'inai.

Endilisi, anif basef fape fa'i, “Hiahaom hiami hi'ilam andeande'ma ae' enda'am.” Apa' hiahaom amamba atiasi enda'ami ina matopalope, owa'atin. Basef ifimba faga'i, “Hiahaom hiami andeande'ma enda'am.” Basef ifimba fape, apa' ae' ina i'i aho'ma anin mae nepe lu'win nembale'e, owa'atin.

Apa' anis epes daias sa'i, “Gwa'aisi isimba, alopi atis ea' alop papoma poga' gwa'aisi atis.” Apa' hiahawes isimba biafis, alop paloma gwa'aisi, anaf God nolamonas atef hi'ilas. God ina nanda' alop ape'ipi ma ponda' waf awafi so'a waulafi, owa'atin. Anen nanda'apa ponda' maol ananini atin bu'wani. Ea' anen Dembinai ma alop ape'ipi nugumafiapi.
Ama banagami ananimi atom nasa'ma Dembinai nosafel wandof matmat, ea' anaf na'amba atina nosa'mapa mogosafel wandelef wapani.

Alop ipe'ipi alop wa'awa'ap Kraisi atop. Isimba ipa' pegawas a'a owa'? Ea' dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ata' etopa' anop alop wa'awa'ap Kraisi kwaia'up esap poloma alop ano'w nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli? Owa'atin endilisi!

Epen mamahina nefa' alop ananipi nesap pogaloma alop ano'w nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli, anin ea' nataga alop atifip naloma ako'w. Ipa' pegawa isimba a'a owa'? Dei' main, Baibel na'ias ea' waf afamba daso'amaifi usi'ifi na'i, “Esis bias asataga alop atifipa waf afambai.”
Apa' epen ami nepe sisihin tatala'in negaloma Dembinai a' nataga nomonas atifis nalomana, si'i epen atitin.
Ipa' pendakwaha waf awafi so'a waulafi pefa' pendafe'. Anef waf hiafi awafi sanda'af alop ando' atogon. Apa' epen nanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi, nanda' waf awafima alop ananipi atop.
Alop ipe'ipi ipat bu'unai Ambal bu'unai Godii. Ipa' pegawa isimba a'a owa? Ambal anamba a nosaho'epa ea' nape nomona ipa'. Ipa' ina ipa' atipai, owa'atin. Ipa' ananipai atipa si'ipa.
God natalepa ma maol lu'wani a'owa'. Isimba atis dei' pendasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagola alop ipe'ipi.
Dei' a'i egwamepa basef ifimba hali'ifi panda'ef fagafi'ii. I'i anona aman owa' nogaso' ano'w nemata'wia, ea' andeande'.
Apa' owa', waf naninani aunai ma so'a wauli nape. Ea' dei' andeande'ma amam nematawa hiasi atona atin sondaso'ama daindai.
Alop amani ako'w waulu'mana kumafiap. Aman ina nonda'imap ni'i ananipi, owa'. Ea' na'amba atina alop waulu'manai, alop anen waulunama'w akwa'unaii. Ako'w wapani ina kunda'imap kwi'i akwa'upi, owa'.
Nemata'w ina kope dambe'w kumafi alop akwa'upi, owa'atin. Aman akwa'unai numafiap. Ea' na'amba atina aman ina nope dambena numafi alop ananipi, owa'atin. Ako'w waulu'mana kumafiap.

Ipa' bipa pandaso'ama ea' ipa' bipa anin ina newa' alafuga anin ninda'ima alop ananipi, owa'i. Ama i'i ipa' ukup pegape atogona pihi'ama alop nogota bandata ma penda' betena, dao' ipa' pinda'i awi na'amba atina pendabeten bu'wani. Ama ea', penda' alop pondaloma wapani. Na'amba ukup pese'epama pigimafi alop andeande' ea' Satan nogwambepa penda' waf awafi.
Basef ifimba ae'afi ma amam nematawa sondaso'ama fagape na'amba. Apa' basef ifimba ina lu'wafi ma pigailaf banagambili, owa'. Ifimba basef kwaia'uf aso'epaef atopalopepa.
Ae' okom ma'i ipa' amam nematawa hipai pepe si'i ae', owa' egaso' nemata'wia. Apa' God a' naso'as hiahaom fasimi mandandas daindai. Anin anom daiam a anin anom daiam.
Apa' esis amam nematawa owa' sondaso'amaia saloma nematawa alifiwai amom maga' makwahowa wagapani, isimba na'amba. I'i ipa' pegape dowaf si'i ae', andeande'.

Apa' i'i owa' la'ifipama pepe andeande' pimafi nelelelmb beloma alop ipe'isi andeande'a, dao' pendandaso'ama. Waf ipa' pandaso'amafi, afamba a' andeande' fikila' waf ukup pegehafel banagepa waf awafi so'a waulafi.

Apa' esis amam nematawa sandaso'ama ea'i, ae' aso'as mu'uli inimba. Inimba ina mu'uli ae'ani atin, owa'atin. Mu'uli inimba Dembinaii na'amba. Ano'w nemata'w ina ko'waha aman akwa'unai, owa'. Apa' ako'w kwi'i kogakwahona, kondape dowaf. I'i owa', kotanima kofe'ma anen wapani kolomana nembel atotombel. Ea' anona aman wapani ina nili'amona waulu'mana anani'wi, owa'i.

Apa' dei' a'ipa ipa' iafipa na'amba a'i. Basef ifimba ina basef Dembinaii, owa'. Ifimba dei' a'ipipa na'amba a'i i'i fowa' esis bias owa' ata' sohapifa Kraisa ma sondaso'ama sili', ma dei' anen nagi' nahapifa Kraisa ako'w kwi'i aho'ma koso'ana kolomana kogape, anen ina nili'amona'w, owa'i.
Apa' i'i ako'w ato'w dei' kugi' kohapifa Kraisa nogaso'akwa, ma ni'i aho' nope nogaloma'wa, ako'w ina kwili'amonana, owa'i.

Dei' main, aman owa' nogahapifa Kraisia nape sisihina nagaloma waulu'mana kwagahapifa Kraisi, anen a' nataga andeande' si'i God nandandepana ea'i. Ea' nemata'w owa' kogahapifa Kraisia kwape kwagaloma anen nagahapifa Kraisi, a' kwataga andeande' si'i God a' nandandepa'w ea'i. I'i owa' ma, bola sogola awasi, ina atiasi sotaga bo'wes, owa'. Apa' dei' sape andeande' si'i God nandandepas ea'i.

Apa' epen ami owa' negahapifa Kraisia ni'i nekwaha waulu'mana a'a waulunama'w, dao' anin a' nendafe'. I'i waf afambai fetaga na'amba ma esis isimba ipe'isi sahomepa o owamepa aman nemata'w, esis ina ata' tatala'is sape si'i sanda' kalabusi, owa'. God nofalapa ma mogaila wafa opaf awanafi.

Nemata'w, ina' anaf la'ifinama negatopalopa waulunamena nogataga Kristen a'a owa'? Isimba ina' owa' negawasa. Ea' ina' aman wapani, anaf la'ifinama negatopalopa waulu'mina ine'ikwi kogataga Kristen a'a owa'?
Maol main bu'wani Dembinai nagawalogan nagaso' anin epeni, anin a' nendape atapina maol inimba atin nali' nanda'ani. Ae' a'ipas mu'uli inimba atina esis Kristen hiasi sios sagape walemb hiagomai.

A'i anona aman mali' matopa'mana alop ananipi ma God dei' nofalana? Dao' anen ina a' nofana melet atamba alop ananipi wapani nombaho'wata, owa'i. Ea' aman ami owa' motopa'mana alopa ma God dei' nofalanaia, amom ina motopa'mana alop ananipi, owa'i.
Waf magatopa' alopafi faloma waf owa' mogatopa' alopafia wapani falafifi atef. Apa' waf sagaila mu'uli Godiafi afamba waf endilisifi.
Ipa' pagapoma maol mamahina bu'wani God dei' nogofalipai, ipa' atapipa pendapoma maol inimba atin.

I'i ipa' agof akipai panda' maol pagape lafela anis epesi ma dei' God nogofalipai, dao' ipa' ina ukup nimanipa isimba, owa'i. Apa' i'i ano'w ufia'wa pekwaha maol inimba pegape wahifipa, dao' andeande'.

Dei' main, epen ami agol akani nanda' maol nagape lafela anis epesi, dei' epen inimba Dembinai nakwahoman waf awafi a' wahifin ea' ananini atin. Ea' na'amba atina epen nagape wahifina owa' negape lafela anis epesia dei' Dembinai nofalan ea' nanda' maol nape lafela Krais.
God natalepa ma maol bu'wani lu'wani ananini. Ea' ipa' ina pepe lafela epes itapasi, owa'i.
Ipa' alipipai, maol inimba mamahina bu'wani epen inimba nali' nenda'ani ma God dei' nogofalani, dao' anin a' nindapoma maol inimba atin naep Godi.

Amam nematawa isimba ata' owa' sondaso'amaia, ae' mu'uli Dembinaii akemas, apa' awalapa nomonas ae'asi atis a'ipipa. Anen nati uwahipiwi natopalope ea' nanda'e anda' maol ananini andeande' datima. Na'amba dei' ipa' a' pendame' basef ae'afi andeande'.
Ama nogota ata'e dei' nimanimi lu'wami mataga, na'amba ipa' a' andeande'ma ipa' hipai pendape na'amba atin si'i dei' pagape.
Ina' nali' nagaso' nemata'w ea'i, ina nili'amona'w, owa'i. I'i ina' ata' owa' negaso' nemata'wia, ina' okom mondanda' ni'i nefa' ano'w, owa'i.

Apa' i'i ina' negefa' nemata'wa, ina nanda' waf awafi, owa'. Ea' i'i nemata'w aiawai'wi kogaso' aman, ako'w ina kwanda' waf awafi, owa'. Apa' amam nematawa sandaso'amai esis atiasi a' sofa' nimanimi lu'wami itap apa'e. Andaiwa'ma nimanimi amamba mogatagamepa.
Ipa' alipipai, a'i basef ae'afi kofagefa na'amba. Dei' nogota ata'e ea' bandata ma itap apa'e pa'i higiligalap. Isimba atis dei' ipa' amam pagaso' nematawai pendape si'i nematawa akipai.

Ea' epes isimba sawa sagalifi sondape si'i isimba owa' sowa sogalifia. Epes sandagalai sondape si'i isimba owa' sondagalaia. Ea' isimba sagatala hiahawesi sondape si'i sugumafi hiahawes isimba dowafi, owa' asasisia.
Epes isimba sanda' maola hiahaom itapamii, sondape si'i isimba owa' ukup pigapigaila hiahaom itap apa'imia. Dei' main, apa' mogawa, itap apa'e atiasi petaga pendaho'of higililap.

Ae' a'i ipa' opalef fendape awanelef, andaiwa'ma hiahaom mamimami mogalalamona nomanas ipe'isi. Amam owa' mogaso' nematawaia ukup palapafe' hihipa maol Dembinaii, ma'i monda' hiahawes Dembinai okom maga'iasi.
Apa' amam amamba magaso' nematawai, ukup amamipi pafe'ma hiahawes itap apa'isi. Ma'i mondanda' hiahawesa waf awo wauhiamam ukup panda'iefi.

Ea' ukup amamipi a' pandawal biafip. Apa' nemata'w aiawai'wi ata' owa' kogaso' amania, okom malamafe' a'owa' ma maol Dembinai. Ako'w okom mandanda'ma koso' ako'w ato'w kogafe'ma Dembinai ma kope anani'wi hi'igala'w. Apa' nemata'w kwagaso' amani, nomonas salasagafe'ma hiahaom itap apa'imi atom kwa'i kondanda' waf waulunama'w okom manda'iefi.

Ae' a'i basef ifimba ma etopalopepa pegape andeande'. Ifimba ina fegasopama ipe'i, owa'atin. Ae' a'i ipa' pendape usi'ipa dondol pendanda' maol Dembinaii atin ama anis maemaefah ina sopati ukup ipe'ipi, owa'atin. Ipa' pendape ukup atifip endilisi.

I'i anona aman okom mondanda' ni'i, anen ina nanda' waf usi'ifima nemata'w aiawai'wi esis sandandepamana'w anini. Ama okom ananimi mohafema ako'w, ma owa' niti ano'w ufia'wa, anen nila okom ananimi nogaso'akwa, ea' andeande'. Anen ina nanda' waf awafi, owa'. Esis bias ea' sondaso'ama.
I'i anen owa' okom bimbiafim mopoma ako'wa, nope banagona ninindifa okom ananimi andeande' ni'ias ni'i ako'w kondape dowaf, na'ambai andeande' wapani.
Ea' aman ami nagaso' nemata'w anani'wi ea'i, anen nanda' waf bu'wafi. Apa' aman ami ata' owa' nogaso'akwia, anamba nanda' waf fasifi a'owa'.

I'i anona aman nagaso' nemata'wi ata' nogape namona, nemata'w akwamba anani'wi ata' kwape sisihi'w kwalomana. Apa' i'i waulunama'w akwa'unai nogaga', dao' ina ata' anin mae nahipa'w sisihi'w wapani, a' owa'. Ako'w okom ma'i kogaso' aman mamahonama wapanima, dao' kondaso'ana. Apa' ako'w kondaso' aman Kristen.

Apa' ae' okom mandanda' na'amba. I'i ako'w kogape dowaf, atiasi kondagala a'owa kwikila' dagala kwagaso' amani. Nomanas ae'asi a'i basef ifimba ea' ae' okom mandanda' ma'i ae' wapani efa' Ambal bu'wali Godi nape ae' nihimba'me basef ifimba.

Dei' ae' a'i i'i basefa mafis saham sowa'am sogopehafa wale anamba baso'amunai. Endilisi, “Apa' hiapai mogawa”, si'i ipa' paga'ias. Gawa inimba atin wafini nagasa'mai waf sanda' du'wanigafi, apa' i'i apa' ukup pipila sahin owan, isimba atiasi sotopalopapa a' motaga Kristen banagepa.
I'i anona aman okom mondanda' mi'i anen gawainai, owa'atin. Anen owa' ata' nogawa andeande'a.
Apa' epen ami okom magamagaila Godi, dao' God nogawa epen inimba ea' ananini.
Waf saga' mafis saham sondolali sagaso' wale baso'amunai ina endilisinai, owa'atin. Anen ikwaf atona wafinai. Ina a' wale endilisinai nape, owa'atin. God endilisinai anen atona nape.
Endilisi, hiahaom hiami sofalam saga'i, “Dembamii.” I'i a' endilisi ma amom amamba sofalam soga'i, “Wale god baso'amunai” mope ilifi itap,

ea' diamamo hapaimi. God apa' manda' lotumanai atotona nape. Anen God ahamapa, anen atona kofagonama hiahaom hiami. Kofagema apa' magape itap apa'e, manda' maol ananini atin. Ea' Dembinai atotona nape, anen Jisas Krais. Lagol ananigili atogol dei' God nanda' hiahaom hiami mataga mape. Krais atona nanda' apa' mataga mape namepa.

Apa' anis epes gawa inimbai bu'wani akas. Epes isimba fowa' saila wale baso'amunai. Ea' dei' sa' mafis amamba sondolali sagaso' wale baso'amunaiami, ukup asasipi papoma mafis amamba sa'i, “Amamba endilisimi,” ea' sa'am. Malogof fagape ukup nomoni ea' aluguma amamba fihimba'ma esis sanda' waf awafi ea'. Dei' main, ukup asasipi ina kilikala' sawalagam andeande' sa'am, owa'.

Apa' gwa'aimi amamba ina mofa'apa mefe' felefe'ma God, owa'atin. I'i apa' mundaiwa'ma gwa'aisi isimba, apa' ina atiasi mope awepama naep Godi, a i'i moga' mafis isimba ma, apa' ina atiasi motaga be'epa mikila' fowa' magape, owa'atin. Apa' mape wahifipa ma mu'uli inimba fowa'ini naga'i gwa'aisi isimbai.
Apa' ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba hiahawes isimba ipa' pape wahifipa panda'asi supisila bo'wagah esis epes isimba owa' banagesa sowa ma waf awafi.

Ina' epen negegawai, i'i negafe' ipat atamba sanda' lotuma wale baso'amunai nepe nega' gwa'aisi, ma anin epen okom ananimi owa' banagema hapifia nigatilina. Atiasi nesa'mai okom ananimi nea' gwa'aisi isimba sagaso' waleasi, a'a owa'? Apa' ina mogawa.
Na'amba gawa ine'ini nehambombaga epen inimba owa' banagena hapifia, Krais naga' nofa'an negetambilii.
Ukup anis sahin owan alipisi ina banagep, owa'. I'i ipa' penda' waf afamba awafi pehambombaga hapifa ukup asasipi, ipa' panda' waf afambai ma Krais atona.
Ea' i'i gwa'aisi isimba aga'asi sonda' alipini ae'ani newa ma waf awafi, dao' ae' ina ata' ea' mafis isimba wapani, owa', hapaimi. Na'amba a' enda' anin newa ma waf awafi.
Dei' ae' a'i ihali'ipa esa'ma nomonas ipe'isi. Ipa' pa'i ae' ape wahifiwi ape aposel ati Dembinai Jisas ea' a'a owa'? Ea' anda' maol inimba atina dei' ipa' pataga Kristen, a'a owa'? Aho' endilisi.

I'i anis epes ukup pandanda' pa'i ae' owa' aposela, diago, hapaisi. Ipa' dao'. Ipa' pahapifa Dembinai pape sisihipama anen. Isimba atis dei' ipa' atipa si'i anol ametal lihimba'ma ipa' hipai pegawe ape aposel anda' maol Dembinaii.
Apa' anis epes sanda'i'ipamae sawaloge. Ea' agwa basef na'amba.
Endilisi afa' aposel andeande'ma ogofa' gwa'aisi maina maol afa' wanda'ani.
Ea' andeande'ma ogaso' nematawa Kristen ofe' ogalomawa si'i anom aposel maloma amom owapana Dembinai Jisasi maloma Pita manda'as.
Ina andeande'ma ae'i Barnabas atofa onda' maola ogofa' otamba afa'imbai, apa' anis daias ipa' atipa petopalopas pimafiasa otamba. Na'ambai owa'.

Aman mamahonama nanda' maol soldiai anen atona notala gwa'aisi mais ananisi? A epen ami nanda' hiahawes nawas aof ama anen owa' nofa' gwa'aisiafa? O epen ami nimafi bulmakau ma anin owa' nea' nomagofa amoma? Owa'atin endilisi.
Ae' aila ukup epesi atip a'ias na'amba? Owa'atin. Mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani naga'ias na'amba atin.

Moses nanda' basef fagape mu'uli Godi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Bulmakau manda' maol mafa'asa olemb wit magandilamami ma'i moga' anom, ipa' ina pesopama malogof amamugufi, owa'i.” Ipa' pa'i God okom mandapoma amom bulmakau atom a'amon? Owa'atin.

Anen okom ma'i apa' wapani. Aho', basef ifimba fa'iasa apa' atepa. God okom ma'i waf afambai. Epen nenda' maol negala' itap ananipii neloma epen ami nenda' maol negala gwa'aisi sagaof ea'i, anin dao' okom mondanda'ma opaf ananifi ma negefa' hiahawes du'wanisa maol inimba.

Afa' wanda' maol Godi wagape na'amba atin. Afa' wawa hiahawes bu'wasi Ambal bu'unai Godi nagaso'afa asi la'afena ipa'. Ea' ipa' ilama pese'afa anis hiahawes pegatopalopa alop afa'ipi ma isimba ina ahifisa ipa', owa'atin.

Ipa' paso'am hiahawes anom amam daiam magawalipipa basef Godii, apa' afa' dei' mama? Afa' wapani peso'afa hiahawes ipe'isi, andeande'. Dei' main, afa' wali' wanda' maol wagatopalopipai. Apa' hiahawes isimba afa' wa'i aho'ma ogofa'asi, owa' afa' ina ofa'as. Fowa' dambadamba afa' wali' wagafe'mago ipa' wafi'i wafi'i wataga dei', afa' wandaiwa'ma ogwahefa ufia'wa basef bu'wafi Kraisi. Isimba atis afa' wandaiwa'ma ogofa'as. Ea' isimba atis dei' nimanimi hiami matagamafa.

Dei' ipa' ukup pendanda' ma anif basef. Amom manda' maol ipat lu'unai Godii mofa' gwa'aisi ipat anamba. Ipa' pegawa amom manda' maola belita atamba sondolalima mafisa Goda, amom wapani mofa' mafis du'wa'wanisi belita atamba.
Ea' na'amba atin Dembinai nanda' mu'uli inimba nape. Amam ami magawalapa basef bu'wafi Godii, amom ata' mondofa' hiahawesa esis amam nematawa sogofa' basef bu'wafi ma sogatopalopa alop amamupi.

Apa' ae' owa' efa' anis hiahawes isimbaia. Ea' dei' wapani ina anda' basef ifimba ma iga'ipipa ae' andeande'ma egefa' anin mae atitina ipa', owa'atin. Andeande'ma ae' ili' endaga'. Ae' andagala anda' maol Godi atopalopepa owa' efa' anis hiahawes isimbaia. Ae' dei' andaiwa'ma anin epen negali'amona dagala ae'ani ma egasa'ma agol ae'agili ma waf afamba, owa'.

Apa' ae' ina andagala asa'ma agol ae'agili atogol awalapa basef bu'wafi Godi, owa'atin. Ae' owa' ano'w ufia'wa esopama malagola iga'ipasefa, owa'. Okom ae'ami mahafel endilisi ma a'i inda'ipasef atin. I'i ae' owa' ewalapa basef ifimba bu'wafia, na'amba God nese'e nimanimi lu'wami.
I'i okom ae'ami atom enda' maol inimba ananiniai, anaf efa' otamba ma maol inimba. Owa' owa'atin. Ae' owa' ano'w ufia'wa, andanda'am atin. Dei' main, inimba anin maol God nase'ean ae' enda'ani.

Anaf efa' hiahaom fasimi maima anda' maol inimba? Hiahaom amamba fasimi na'amba. Ae' anda' waf afamba bu'wafi atef. Hiahawes ae' ila ma egefa'asa maol inimbai, isimba ina efa'as, owa'. Ae' awalapa basef bu'wafi Godi aso'asef dowaf. Ae' ina a' efalasa hiahawes otamba maisa sogase'e si'i mu'uli Godi naga'ias, owa'.
Ae' ina anda' maol ape lafela anin epen, owa'. Ae' ape wahifiwi. Apa' okom ae'ami atom anda' ae' ape si'i agape lafela epes hiasi ma egefa'i hiasi sondahama ikwafa pepel ae'ani sogafe'ma God.

Isimba atis dei' naep esis Judai ataga si'i Juda, ma igifa'ai anis Juda. Ae' ina ape lafela mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'. Apa' naep isimba sagape lafela mu'uli inimbai, ae' wapani ape lafela mu'uli inimba ma efa'i epes isimba sagafe'ma God.

Ea' naep epes isimba sogololama mu'uli inimba owa' Judaisia, ataga si'i epes isimba sogololama mu'uli inimbai, ma efa'i epes isimba sogafe'ma God. Apa' ae' ina okom mase'e mu'uli Godi, owa'atin. Dei' aila mu'uli Kraisi.
Ama naep epes isimba owa' banagasia, ataga si'i esis ama egefa'i epes owa' banagasia. Ae' ataga si'i egefa' waf epes hiasi endondoma ufiawa hiawai ma iwambilai anis sogotanimai.
Ae' anda' maol inimba ma egafela agol basef bu'wafi Godi ma anaf egefa' hiahawes isimba bu'wasi blesing epes isimba saila basef ifimbai sogofa'asi eloma anis epes Godi wapani.

Ipa' pegawa epes sasagih sandaloloma atini hiasi sasagih hi'alas safe', apa' atitin nikila'as nefa' prais hiahawes fasisi. Ipa' pegawa isimba a'a owa'? Ea' ipa' wapani pendasagih mehipa pegefa' hiahawes isimba fasisi.

Epes ami sa'i sisagih sigikila'i ma depambema inimbai, sanda' maol numa'wini a'owa' sagwamba alop asasipi sameme'map nimaguf danda. Epes isimba sanda'am na'amba ma sogofa' prais hiahaom bu'wami kwasakwasala magape nogota bandatai. Apa' Kristen manda'ama mogofa' atapim hiahaom fasimi mogape dondoli.
Isimba atis ae' dei' naep do' okom kilikala' asagih mehipa ikila' hiasi hi'igalas. Ae' ape si'i anona aman nanda' bokseni nagapa', owa' nokwaha lagof ganigani noha fufutal atol dowadowafa, owa'atin.
Ae' banagewe aha alop ae'api anindifap ahamap usi'ip pape lafela okom ae'ami. Na'amba egawalapa basef bu'wafi ma anis epes daias, apa' anaf owagama ae' ina efa' prais hiahaom fasimi, a' owa'atin.

Alipipai, ae' andaiwa'ma ipa' ukup mogamogahepama hiahaom amamba. Esis bafasapa hiasi Israel sape lafela ilagw agwamba gwali'as sagafi'i ea' hiasi safe' bo'wagah asasigahi sowala sambo naoh embel akwahimi
sawisa ilagw gwaloma naoh embel sagafi'i. Amamba mondola'waifa sogofa' baptais sape sisihis saloma Moses sailana sagafe'.
Ea' esis hiasi sa' gwa'aisi isimba God nagaso'asasi,
sa' embel ambalemba God nagaso'asambeli. Aho', sa' embela otam amamba God nagaso'asami nafe' nagalomasi. Otam amamba nondola'waifa Krais atona.
Apa' owa', God nandaiwa'ma hiasi sagape la'afena esisi. Isimba atis dei' sasa sowala hi'alas itap anamba wafigima fataupigima.
Ea' hiahaom amamba hiami mataga mindihimba'mapa si'i anef ikwafa apa' motolom mogogawama apa' ina a' kowolapa ukup pipila hiahaom awami si'i esis fowa', owa'i.

Ipa' ina kowolepa pila wale baso'amunai si'i isimba anis fowa' sanda'am, owa'i. Baibel naga'i esis na'amba na'i, “Amam nematawa sape sanda' gwa'aisi embel sa'as sosafel salemb atin sanda' kwala'ap kinde'iaf sa'oh.”
Apa' wapani owa'i monda' waf afamba awafi so'a waulafia si'i isimba anis fowa' sanda'am, ama nemaf atetef esis 23,000-pelais saga' dolamas hi'alas.
Ea' apa' ina mososaefa God mogwambana si'i isimba anis fowa' sagagwambana ma uguf awagufi fahasa esis higilagalas, owa'i.
Ipa' ina a' ukup awep pi'i diga wandafugai peloma God si'i isimba anis fowa' sanda'manam God, ma ensel anamba naha epes sagaga'ii nafi'i nahas sagaga' hi'agalas, owa'i.

Hiahaom amamba hiami magatagama esisi, amamba si'i ikwafa apa' epes dei' magape nogota ata'e felefele'ma ta'i hi'igilatai. Amamba si'i ikwafa apa' mogatoloma solawaipa, na'amba monda' waf awafi si'i esis.
Ea' i'i epen ami niga'i anin atin la'ifin nagalutu banagani, anin a' nendape solawain andeande'. Na'amba newa ma waf awafi.

Gwamba maina nagatagama ipe'i, amamba ina anom daiam, owa'atin. Amamba ea' na'amba atin si'i gwamba hiani nagatagama epes hiasi. God naila basef ananifi endilisifi nanda' hiahawes ananisi datima. Anen ina atiasi ni'i aho'ma anin gwamba netagama ipa' nikila' banagami ipe'imi, owa'atin. Nemaf afamba gwamba nogatagamepa, God nonda' ano'w ufia'wa notopalopepa pegalutu banagepa.
Ipa' alipipai endilisi ae'ipai, ipa' pekwaha waf afamba pagailafa wale anamba baso'amunaii pewa' alafugaha anen.
Ipa' pegegawai, dei' a'ipipa. Ipa' atipa pewawaloga basef ifimba ae'afi.

Kap apamba aman nugumafi lotuwi nogofalo'mapi, apamba na'amba. Apa' manifela Goda kap apamba pakolasa apa' magaloma esimbel Kraisi. Endilisi atis bret atamba apa' magawalotai, atamba takolasepa magaloma alop Kraisi.
Bret ea' atotota. Amamba mihimba'mapa amam nematawa hiapai mape si'i alop atotop. Dei' main, apa' hiapai mandaloma ma' bret atotota atamba.
Ipa' ukup ata' pendapoma esis Israel. Epes isimba saga' gwa'aisi mafis sondolali ma God belita atambai sandakolas saloma Goda belita atamba.
Basef kofagefa doko' aga'ipipafi fa'i main? Gwa'aisi mafis mais sondololima wale baso'amunai endilisisi? O, wale anamba baso'amunai endilisinai? Ae' aga'ias na'amba? Owa'atin.
Ae' a'ias a'i hiahaom esis sogololama Godi sondolalima wale baso'amunai, ina sondolali ma God, owa'atin. Ae' andaiwa'ma ipa' pendakolas pegaloma wale anamba baso'amunai, owa'i.
Ipa' ina pea' embela kap Dembinaii poloma kap wale baso'amunai wapani, owa'i. Ea' ina pea' gwa'aisi belita Dembinaii soloma gwa'aisi belita sondolali ma wale baso'amunaiatai wapani, owa'i.
Apa' ina a' monda' maol mondao'oma mogaloma wale baso'amunai monda' okom Dembinai aoma apa', owa'i. Apa' ina a' mi'i apa' banagipai mikila' Dembinai, owa'.

Ipa' pa'i, “Andeande'ma monda' hiahaom mamimami hiami.” Isimba endilisi, apa' ina a' amamba hiami matopalopapa, owa'atin. Ipa' pa'i “Andeande'ma monda' hiahaom mamimami hiami.” Apa' ina hiahaom hiami manda'apa mataga banagepa ma hapif, owa'atin.
Ipa' ina a' ukup pepoma ipa' atipa pindumafuma pepe andeande', owa'. Ipa' ukup pendapoma anis daias wapani ma petopalopas sogape andeande'.
Ambegw hiami mafisim sagatalom stowai, amamba ipa' penda'am. Ina a' nomonas sope hiahias pihahali'mam na'ana'a, owa'i.
Dei' main, “Itap apa'e paloma hiahaom hiami hi'alam amamba Dembinaii atom.”

I'i anin epen owa' nogahapifa Kraisia nefalepa ni'i pefe' peloman pega' gwa'aisi ma pi'i pegafe'ma, dao' andeande'. Pefe' pea' gwa'aisi hiasi anin nandandombasa nagasi'ipasi. Ipa' ina a' nomonas sotagamepa hiahias pihahali'anas na'ana'a, owa'i.
Apa' i'i anin epen nili' ni'ipipa niga'i, “Mafis isimba sondolalima wale baso'amunaisi”, dao' ipa' apegawa basef ananifi ina pea'as, owa'i, hapaisi. Ipa' pinda'i uwahipigama epen inimba.

Ae' ina a'i peme' malogof fagape ukup ipe'ipi nomoni pilas, owa'. A'i pindaila malagol gagape okom nomon epen inimba naga'ipipai. Na'amba anin epen daian ni'i, “Ae' agape wahifiwai. Dei' maina okom anin epen owa' banagania mogasindi'amona ae'?
I'i ae' inifela Goda ega'as, dei' maina anin epen nesopama ae' ma ega' mafis isimba aganifela Godasi? Na'ambai ae' andaiwa'.”
Dei' egwa basef epen inimbai. I'i ipa' pi'i pega' gwa'aisi embel mais a penda' hiahawes mamahisa, penda'asa pegasa'ma agol Godi atogol lu'wagol.
Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma epes hiasi hi'indalas, esis Juda soloma esis owa' Judaisia, ea' soloma amam nematawa sios isimba Godi. Ea' ipa' ina a' penda' anef waf fenda' esis sogowama waf awafi, owa'i.

Si'i ae' wapani, anda' hiahawes hiasi ma egatopalopa epes hiasi ma ukup piga'i waf bu'wafi hiafi ae' anda'afi. Ae' ina anda'as atopalopa ae' imafi ae' atowe, owa'. Anda'asa agatopalopa amam nematawa hiasi ma God nofa'as nokwahomas waf awafi sogotanimai.
Ipa' pendandepa waf ae'afi pila ae' si'i ae' andandepa waf Kraisi ma agailana.
Lifilafi ipa' ukup pandanda'ma ae' paila basef ifimba hiafi agasi'ipafi. Basef ifimba egefa'afi dei' a'ipipaef ipa'. Isimba atis dei' anifelipa a'i panda' waf bu'wafi endilisi.
Dei' a'i ipa' pegawa basef ifimba. Agilinai amam hiamii anen Krais atona ea' agilinai ako'wanai waulunama'w atona ea' agilinai Kraisi God atona.
I'i aman ami Ambal bu'unai Godi nosa'mana ni'ipasa basef Godi si'i profet a'a nondabeten ama siti anen nopalo' balaga, aman anamba atiasi a' nonda' agol Kraisi agilinai ananinai gowala.

Ea' nemata'w ami wapani Ambal Godi nosa'makwa kuga'ipasa basef Godi si'i profet a'a kondabeten ama owa' kopalo' balaga ako'ugaia, ako'w wapani kwanda' ambal waulunama'wi aol. Isimba ea' na'amba atin si'i kwagando balaga ako'ugai hi'agalaga.

I'i nematawa owa' opalo' balagah awaugahia, awo a' ondatopa'agah bandagah. Waf apa' hiapai fagape na'amba. I'i ambagof awagofa ogatopa'agah bandagah a'a ondowagah hi'igalagah, apa' ma'i waf afamba awafi fanda' nematawa ambagof awagufi. Dei' isimba atis andeande'ma awo ondopalo'agah.
Amam owa'i mopalo' balagah amamugahia. Dei' main, God nanda' amam mandati si'i anen ama mogawalapai banagami mogogala'i ananimi. Apa' nematawa wagawalapai banagami mogogala'i amami.
Dei' main, God ina nanda' amana alop nemata'wi, owa'atin. Anen nanda' nemata'wa alop amani.
Ea' isimba wapani, God ina okom mandanda'ma nemata'w dei' nanda' amana nogatopalopa ako'w, owa'atin. Anen okom mapoma aman dei' nanda' nemata'wa kogatopalopana.
Isimba atis dei' nematawa ondapalo' balagah awaugahi ondola'waifa ogape lafela amom wauhupawa awoumi. Awo opalo'agah ondambaho'agaha ombal begahawa ma amom ensel mogatolowa.
Apa' magape sisihipama Dembinaii magape na'amba. Ina nemata'w ato'w kope aman aka'w o aman atona nope nemata'w akana, owa'atin.
God nanda' nemata'wa alop amani ea' na'amba atin dei' nanda' amam mataga alop nematawai. Apa' God kofagonama hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam.
Dei' ipa' atipa ata' pendawaloga basef ifimba. I'i nematawa owa' opalo' balagah awaugahi onda' betena Goda, isimba andeande' a'a owa'?
Waf ape'ifi amam nematawai atef ea' fihimba'mepa' na'amba. I'i amam balagah laugahi, isimba sanda'am ambagof awagof.
Apa' i'i nematawa balagah hopaowa, dao' andeande', balagah si'i sosaf bu'wafi awaufi. Dei' main, God atona naso'awa balagah laugahi awo ma hogaso'ala balagah awaugahi.

Apa' i'i epen ami ni'i basef negapa'efa hiahawes isimba, anin a' nendegawa, apa' ina maila anef waf daiaf, owa'atin. Maila waf afambai atef. Ea' esis sios amam nematawa Godi hiasi dei' sailaf na'amba atin.
Ae' a'i ese'epa anin mu'uli ipa', apa' ae' ina esa'ma agof ipe'igufi, owa'atin. Nogota atamba pandakolas panda' lotu, dakolas ipe'ini nahambombagepa.
A'i ili' iga'iasi isimba. Nogota atamba ipa' pandakolas panda' lotu, ipa' pandawawal atin. Ae' agame' basefa ipa' na'amba. Ea' ae' okom ma'i kwasakwasala a'i endilisi ipa' pandawawal.
Endilisi, ipa' pandawawal atin pa'i waf afamba bu'wafi ma epes mamahisa sagaila basef endilisii sotaga sondosali alihis? Owa'atin endilisi.
Afamba ipa' hipai pandakolasa, ipa' ina pefa' gwa'aisi Dembinaii, owa'atin.
Ipa' hipai atona atin pali' ulu ulal pa' gwa'aisi ipe'isi atis. Ea' anin nolomahan nape, a anin daian na' embel wain hiani okom mando molan.

Ipa' ifagw akepama pega' gwa'aisi embel mais? O ipa' pa'i sios amam nematawa Godi isimba awasi falafisi atis, a'a? Ipa' pa'i penda' anis epes gwa'aisi akasi ambagof awagof iwaniguf? Dei' atiasi i'i basef maifa ipa'? Isa'ma agof ipe'igufi? Owa'atin. Hiahawes isimba ipa' panda'asi ae' ina anifelipa asa'ma agof ipe'igufi, owa'.
Basef ifimba ae' agasi'ipafi ifimba ae' efa'efa Dembinai atona. Ifimba na'amba. Owamb ambamba Judas nagaso'ama Jisas nogafe' lagof amom boumii, ma owamb ambamba Dembinai Jisas nasa'ma bret
ea' nanifela God nawalota na'i, “Amamba alop ae'api, ase'epapa agatopalopepa'. Ipa' penda'as ea' na'amba atin ukup pendanda'ma ae'.”

Amom ma'as ea', anen nasa'mai anop kap embel bagalapi nanda'as na'amba atin na'i, “Kap apamba basef banagafi dambaifi ae'afi agala' lapafi. Ametala basef ifimba esimbel ae'ambeli atembel balo bagatopalopipai. Nimaguf hiafi danda ipa' penda' isimba pega' embel, penda'as na'amba ma ukup pegapoma ae'.” Fowa' Jisas naga'ipa alipumi ananimi na'amba.
Nimaguf hiafi ipa' pega' breti kap embel isimba ma, ipa' pewalapa basefa Dembinai nagaga' fetaga alihif fefe' fefe' fetagama nemaf anen nugafi'afii.

I'i anin epen owa' okom mili' mope andeande'ma nea' gwa'aisi isimba breti embela kap Dembinaii dowadowaf, anin nanda' waf awafi ma alop paloma esimbel Dembinaii, ea' epen inimba kofagema mopoma anin atin.
Apa' hiapai ata' muli' mondowaloga ukupi nomonas ape'isi atis ama main, mea' breti embel kap isimba.
Dei' main, i'i epen owa' nowaloga basef kofagefa ma alop Dembinai ma anin nea' gwa'aisi embel dowafa, kofagema epen inimbai atom.
Kofagema ea' amamba atom dei' amam nematawa hiasi la'afena ipa' pupulis, owa' banagesa, ea' aowas naninani hiani anis saga'ma waf afambai.
I'i apa' muli' nomonas kilikala'ma mowawaloga nomonas ape'isi atis andeande'ai, atiasi ina anom kofagema motagama apa', owa'atin.
Apa' i'i Dembinai nagahihi' waf ape'ifima nogagwa waf awafima apa'a, isimba anen nasa'apa bumbulita nasindi'amonapa ma anaf ina higililapa moloma epes sagaila waf itapafii, owa'atin.
Ea' dei' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, i'i ipa' pekolata pega' gwa'aisi Dembinaii, ipa' ata' pepe pehafa anis sili'.

I'i anin epen ami nolomahan, anin ata' nili' nenda'ago gwa'aisi ipat ananitai. Na'amba dakolas ipe'ini newalapai basef kota ipa'. Basef ifimba du'wanif fagapani ata' owa' iga'ipipafia, nemaf mamahefa egafe'mago ipa', dao' i'ipipaef isindi'amonepa.
Ipa' alipipai, ae' a'i enda'mepago basef ifimba ma presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal bu'unai Godi nagase'epam ipa' atona atini. Dei' main, andaiwa'ma anipa ipa' ukup pegelelaipa ma amamba.
Ipa' pegawa ea' ma fowa' ipa' ata' pagape aopama waf awafi pegelelama God, nogota atamba ipa' ukup paila wale baso'amumi maim magahondo'ipai, mememi owa' muga'i kwasakwasalaia.

Ea' ipa' pendegawa epen mamahina Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'man naga'i basefi, ina atiasi ni'i basef ni'i, “Jisas anaf higililana,” owa'atin. Ea' epen ami Ambal bu'unai Godi akani, anin ina atiasi ni'i basef ni'i, “Jisas anen Dembinai,” owa'atin.
Presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal bu'unai Godi nagaso'apam dowafi, amamba hiami mamimami. Amamba Ambal Godi atona naso'apam.
Maol Dembinai hiani naninani nape, apa' Dembinai atotona nape numafian.
Waf hiafi fafifafi manda' maolafi, apa' God ea' anamba atotona naso'apa pepel epes hiapai ma la'ifipa monda' maol inimba hiani hi'igalan.
Ambal bu'unai Godi nawalapa pepel ananinai ma epes hiasi atona atina nagatopalopa hiasi hi'agalas.

Epen atitin Ambal bu'unai Godi naso'an pepela nigihimba'masa gawa hiani bu'wani naninani ma negawalapa epes hiasi. Ea' anin daian Ambal bu'wali Godi anamba atona naso'an pepela negawalapa basef kofagefa waf Godi ma atiasi esis amam nematawa sogogawana andeande'.

Ea' anin epen daian Ambal bu'unai Godi atona natopalopana nagahapifa God banagambel nanda' maol ananini andeande'. Ea' anin epen nefa' pepela netopalopa aowas nanda'asi sogataga bo'wes. Ambal bu'winai ea' anamba atona.

A anin epen Ambal Godi natopalopan naso'an pepela nenda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami. Apa' anin daian Ambal Godi nasa'mana niga'i basef Godi. Anin daian nefa' gawa ma negawawaloga spirit ambagof mamimami hiami, bu'wami a'a awami. A anin daian negawama niga'i diga naninani daiana hianai. Ea' anin daian negawama negambema basefa diga anamba naninani daiana.
Ambal bu'unai Godi anamba atona nanda' maol nawalapa presen hiahaom amamba hiami. Ama okom ananimi atom naso'as presen hiahaom fasimi amamba mafe'ma epes hiasi atona atin.
Presen hiami fasimi mamimami si'i alop apa' epesi. Alop apa' epesi atifip, apa' sa'osa'opa hiapi ea' alop apamba hiapi lu'up sa'op pafe' pail alop si'ip atotop. Krais wapani na'amba atin.

Dei' main, apa' hiapai mofa' sa'ofa Ambal bu'unai Godi atotona. Nanda'apa mataga alop atotop, esis Juda saloma owa' Judaisia saloma esis agof akasi a esis sagape wahifisi, owa' sogape lafela anis daiasia wapani. Apa' hiapai mofa' Ambal Godi atotona nape si'ina nelelemb ape'ilimbi.
Apa' mogawa alop ina atifiminap, owa'atin. Alop sa'osa'opa hiapi.

I'i bo'waga gi'ias gi'i, “Ae' ina a' lagol agape alop si'ipi, owa'.” I'i bo'aga agamba giga'i basef na'ambaifi, ina andeande', owa'. Basef ifimbai hapaifi. Bo'waga gandala gape alop si'ip apamba atop.
Ea' aliga wapani gi'ias gi'i, “Ae' ina a' naep ape alop si'ip, owa'.” I'i aliga giga'ias na'ambai, ina andeande' owa', basef ifimba hapaifi. Aliga gandala gape alop si'ip apamba atop.
I'i alop hiapi si'ip ea' naep atipap hi'ilapei, dei' pogahembe' pome' basef pi'imama? Owa'atin. I'i alop hiapi si'ipa aligah atogah hopaop hi'ilapai, dei' pogahoma alogw pome'agw pi'imama?
Apa' alop ina pataga si'i na'amba, owa'atin. God atona fowa' nogawa okom mandanda'ma alop atona atin lu'up sa'op dei' nanda'ap pape pandahama si'i okom ananimi atom maga'ias.
I'i alop si'ipa anop alop atifip popaop hi'ilapai, dei' atiasi alop apamba si'ip pope mama? Owa'atin.
Apa' alop ina pataga pandanda' na'amba, owa'. Alop wa'awa'ap sa'osa'opa hiapi, apa' alop si'ip atifip.

Naep ina la'ifipa pi'ipa lagof piga'i, “Afa' wandaiwa'ma ipa' pepe pegalomafa. Afa' atofa ogape, dao' andeande'.” Ea' balaga wapani ina la'ifigama gi'ipa bo'wagah giga'i, “Ae' andaiwa'ma ipa' pepe pegalome, owa'. Ae' atowe epe, dao' andeande'.” Owa'atin.
Alop apamba wa'awa'ap falafalafupa apa' maga'i owa' banagapia, i'i apamba owa' pondala popea, atiasi alop apamba si'ip ina potaga banagep, owa'atin endilisi.
Ea' alop apamba wa'ap apa' ambagof awagofapi, apa' mofalo'map a'owa' mumafiap datima.

Apa' alop wa'ap owa' ambagof awagofapia apamba apa' ina mofalo'map mumafiap na'amba, owa'. Alop apamba ila ma pogape dowaf. God atona nasa alop apamba wa'owa'op hiapi sa pail atogon pataga atifip. Anop wa'ap agof akapi apa' anen nofalap agof lu'wagufi fandandap.
Anen nanda'as na'amba ma alop apamba ina atiasi pondawal wa'awa'ap, owa'atin. Alop apamba hiapi wa'awa'ap a' ukup pindaima atin pundumafuma andeande' na'amba atin.
Ama i'i alop wa'ap pome' akepehap, alop hiapi si'ip atiasi pome' akef na'amba atin. Apa' i'i anis epes sinifela wa'ap, hiapi si'ip sonohap hi'ilap polomap.
Isimba atis dei' ipa' hipai pape alop Kraisi si'ip. Ea' ipa' hipai atona atin alop wa'awa'ap ananipi.
