God nahapona anis epes ananisi sape na'amba ma sios. Magali'i aposel, sagagi'i profet, sagafe'ma wanifi, esis tisa sagawalipasa basef kofagefa Godii. Ama main, sagagi'ma amambai epes isimba sanda' betena sanda' banagami si'i God nanda'ami. Ea' epes isimba sanda' awasisi bo'wes wapani, a esis isimba sagatopalopa anis daiasi, saloma amom mugumafi maol siosi naninani hianii, ea' saloma isimba sogawa ma siga'i diga naninani daiana hianai.

Dei' ipa' ukup pandanda' pegawa pa'imama? Ipa' pa'i amom hiami hi'alam mape aposel atom? Pa'i amom hiami hi'alam mape profet atom? Ipa' pa'i amom hiami hi'alam mape tisa atom? A pa'i esis hiasi hi'alas sanda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami?

Pa'i esis hiasi hi'alas sofa' presen hiahaom fasimi ma sonda' awasisi sogotaga bo'wes wapani? A pa'i esis hiasi hi'alas sogawa ma siga'i diga naninani daiana hianai? Pa'i hiasi hi'alas sogawa ma sogambema basefa diga anamba naninani daiana? Owa'atin endilisi.
Apa' ipa' hipai a' ukup kilikala' pindapindaila pegefa' presen hiahaom fasimi magali'i. Ea' dei' a'i ihimba'mepa ano'w ufia'w atoto'w bo'ombo'okw kwikila' endilisi presen inimba hiani.
I'i ae' egawa ma iga'i diga naninani epesi goloma enseli wapani, ma ae' owa' okom mimilas ese'asa nembel etopalopasa, malogol diga ae'agai falafugai atoga si'i sagaha olefi wata sagala' dowaf.

I'i Ambal bu'unai Godi nose'e presen hiahaom fasimi nosa'me ma egawalipasa basef Godi ma egegawa okom hiami Godi mape mandamabahi'i hi'igalam, ama egegawa gawa hiani hi'igalan wapani, ma igahapifa God banagambel endilisi ma la'ifiwi esapa' halafutagw gogafe' gani do'wan, apa' ae' owa' okom mimila esis amam nematawa endilisi, ae' falafuwai atowe.

I'i ae' egaso'asa hiahaom hiami ae'ami hi'igalama esis isimba kwahusa hiahawesi ma enda' maol Godi iga'i aho'ma anis epes sandaiwa'ma Godi si'i sehe sogaofe nif egaga'. Apa' ae' owa' okom mimilas ese'as nembela, ea' hapaimi. Anaf hiahaom amamba hiami ina motopalope molefate kwasakwasala, owa'atin endilisi.

Epen mamahina okom magaila anis epes daias endilisi, anin nanda' waf bu'wafi na'amba. Anin ina kwafalis nagwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'manaf anini, owa'atin. Anin nape natitilis. Anin nati epes hiasi uwahipis natopalopas. Anin ina kowagalana epes hiahaom hiamiisii, owa'atin. Ea' ina nagasa'ma agol ananigili atigili, a anin ina okom maga'i anin atini, owa'atin.

Anin saisailan atin nagape andeande'i. Anin ina okom magapoma hiahawes ananisi a'owa'i, owa'atin. Anin ina okom numbutim kwafalisi, owa'. Ea' ina okom magapoma waf awafi anis daias sanda'manafi, owa'atin.
Anin ina nandagala ma waf awafi ikiakafi, owa'atin. Anin nandagala ma waf endilisifi bu'wafi atef.

Nimaguf hiafi dondol anin nanda' waf afamba na'amba. Anin nembel bape awanembela nemaf mamahefa negame' nimanimi akafimi hiami. Anin ina nagandina anis epes kwafalisa waf asasifi, owa'. Anin nahapifa God endilisi nape nehafana ma nogatopalopa esis sogaloma anin wapani. Anin nalutu banagena ma nimanimi akafimi magatagaman.

Waf afamba ukup pagapagaila anis daias endilisi, afambai anaf ina higililaf, owa'atin endilisi. Apa' waf afamba Ambal Godi nasa'mapa ma mogowalapa basef ananifi, afamba anaf higililaf hi'ilaf. Presen inimba hiahaom fasimi ma epes sogawa saga'i diga naninani hiana haonai, diga anamba hiana haonai anaf hi'ilana. Presen inimba ma epes sogogawa gawa ma waf Godi, gawa inimbai anaf hi'ilan wapani.
Dei' main, dei' apa' ata' mogawa gawa du'wanin atin. Presen inimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'masa sogawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet, basef ifimba wapani ata' du'wanif atif.
Apa' anaf hiahaom God okom ma'i motaga mugagi' endilisii mogataga, nemaf afamba hiahaom amamba dei' mogataga wa'awa'ami atiasi hi'ilam.
Fowa' ae' ata' agape si'i awani a'i basef si'i awani. Ae' ameme'ma hiahawes si'i awani. Apa' afamba agataga dambewe, akwaha waf afamba awanii.

Dei' apa' mati hiahaom mataga ea', apa' ina mandawalap alihim a'owa', ata' owa'. Mataga si'i mapelaga embel magati walofam atin. Apa' anaf owagama nemaf dondo'afi fegataga, dao' mundatima nogohnaep alihipa. Dei' ata' egawa wa'awa'as atis. Apa' nemaf afamba egawa isimba endilisi si'i God nogogawe.

Dei' waf wanifif fape, afamba na'amba. Waf mogahapifa Kraisafi faloma waf mope mogahafa Godafi, waf ukup pagapagailas endilisiafi. Waf afamba wanifif. Apa' fagali' endilisii, waf ukup pagapagailas endilisi.

Ipa' banagepa pili' ukup pindaila epes hiasi pese'asa nelelemb esis. Ea' ukup ipe'ipi pendahafel endilisi ma pegefa' presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal bu'unai Godi nagase'epami. Apa' presen nagali'i ma ipa' penda' maol dindinipa pegefa'ani, inimba na'amba. Presen Ambal Godi nosa'mepa ma pegawalapa basef Godi si'i profet.

Apa' mogawa epen ami na'i basefa' anoga diga daiagai, anin ina naso'as basef epes, owa'. Anin na'ipa God atona. Dei' main, ina anin epen negawa diga agamba, owa'atin. Banagami Ambal Godi atom anin na'i basef ifimba fowa' fape fandambahi'i.
Apa' epen ami Ambal Godi nasa'mana naga'i basef Godi si'i profeti, epen inimbai na'ipasef nowa' banaga hapif asasini ea' fasa'masa sonda' waf fasifi fenda' opalef asasilifi awanelef.
Epen ami naga'i basefa anoga diga daiagai, anin newa' banaga opaf ananifi atof. Apa' epen ami Ambal Godi nasa'man nawalapa basef Godi si'i profet, inimba newa' banaga esis sios amam nematawa Kristen.

Ae' okom ma'i ipa' hipai hi'ilipa pi'i basefa anoga diga daiaga. Apa' epen ami Ambal Godi nasa'mana newalapa basef Godi si'i profet, anin nikila' epen inimba naga'i basefa anoga diga daiagai owa' nembemef ni'if alihifa. Dei' main, i'i epen inimba owa' nembemef ni'if alihifa, basef ifimba ina fewa' banaga esis sios amam nematawa Kristen sagame'afi, owa'atin. Apa' i'i negambemef alihifa, dao' basef ifimba fewa' banagas.

Alipipai, ipa' ukup pendame' basef ifimba andeande'. I'i ae' efe'mago ipa' ma ega'i basefa anoga diga daiaga, atiasi etopalopepa ewa' banagaipa i'imama? Owa'atin. Apa' i'i embemef iga'if, dao' ese'epa anif basef God nigihimba'miefi ea' ese'epa gawa fasini ipa' a'a iwalipipama basef kofagefa Godi si'i profeta Ambal Godi nosa'me egawalipipafi.

Hiahawes ambal akasi, si'i batagwi gita, amamba ea' na'amba atin si'i diga agamba hiagai. I'i amom owa' mogal melef monda' maguf fafifafi fetagaia, apa' atiasi mogahembe' mogawa maguf amamufi alihif mi'imama? Owa'atin.
I'i bugel alof owa' fogal fi'i alihifa, amom monda' wandafi silisilawi mope mondandombola wandaf mi'imama? Owa'atin.
Ipa' wapani na'amba atin. Ipa' i'i pi'i basefa anoga diga esis owa' sogogawagaia, atiasi sogawa basef ifimba kofagefa si'imama? Owa'atin. Atiasi basef ipe'ifi fefe' higililif dowaf.
Endilisi, diga hiaga haoga gape itap apa'e. Apa' ina anoga diga falafugai dowaf, owa'atin. Basef kofagefa fape diga gagigagi hiagai.

Ae' i'i owa' egawa basef kofagefa anin epen naga'iafia, atiasi anin okom mopoma ae' ni'i ae' epen aga'i anoga diga anambel wambeli. Ea' ae' wapani okom mapoma anin i'i naga'i anoga diga anambel wambili.

Ipa' wapani na'amba atin. Ipa' ukup pa'i a'owa' ma pegefa' presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal Godi nagase'epami. Ea' ipa' dao' pendanda' maol banagambel endilisi ma pegefa' presen inimbai negewa' banaga hapifa siosi.
Ea' epen ami naga'i basefa anoga diga daiagai anin nendanda' betena Goda nogoso'an gawa negambema basefa diga agamba.
Dei' main, i'i enda' betena anoga diga daiaga, ambal ae'ali atol landabeten, apa' okom ae'ami mape dowaf.
Ea' dei' atiasi enda'as i'imama? Ae' endanda' betena ambal ae'ali eloma okom ae'ami wapani. Ae' endanda' awalefa ambal ae'ali eloma okom ae'ami wapani.

I'i ipa' pinifela Goda ukup ipe'ipi atip, ama anin epen owa' nefa' anin presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal Godi nagase'epamia, dei' atiasi anin negawa ni'imama ma beten inimba ipe'ini ma niga'i endilisi? Owa'atin. Endilisi, i'i ipa' pendabeten pi'i basef fasifi a'owa', ina atiasi pewa' banaga nembela epen inimbai, owa'atin. Dei' main, anin ina negawa basef ifimba ipa' paga'iefi, owa'.
Ae' anifela God nimaguf hiafi ma ae' aga'i basefa anoga diga daiaga. Ipa' ina la'ifipama penda'ope, owa'.

Apa' eloma esis sios mondakolas, ae' a'i i'i basefa amef bandafi wanifif biafifa okom ae'ami iwalipa esisa sogogawef. Ama ae' i'i basefa amef laulaufi fetaga hihif 10,000 pelaifa anoga diga daiaga gagasi'i, ea' hapaifi, falafifi atif.
Ipa' alipipai, ipa' ina pepe ukup pelapefe' si'i awasi, hapaimi. Waf awafi, dao' ipa' ukup be'ep pepe andeande' ukup pese'epaf si'i awasi. Apa' nomonas ipe'isi sondataga si'i epes dambesi.

Anif basefa mu'uli Godi fagail buki faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Dembinai na'i, anaf Ae' enda' anis epes anota wambota saga'i anoga diga daiagai isa'mas si'ipasa basef ae'afi epes isimba ae'asi, apa' esis ina atiasi sila basef ifimba, owa'atin.”

Dei' apa' mogawa presen inimba paga'i basefa anoga diga daiaga, inimba ina ametal God nanda'ana esis sagahapifanai, owa'. Anen nanda'ana epes isimba owa' sogahapifanaia. Apa' presen inimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'mepa pawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet, inimba ina ametal God nagaso'asan epes isimba owa' sogahapifanaia, owa'. Inimba ametal isimba sagahapifanai atis.

Ea' i'i esis amam nematawa sios hiasi sondakolas atogona ama ipa' hipai a' pi'i basefa anoga diga daiagama anis epes owa' sogofa' presen inimbaia o anis owa' sogahapifa Kraisia sifi'i sope sogalomepa, atiasi asi'i, “Ipa' ukup magahipai.”

Apa' i'i Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'ma ipa' hipai ma pegawalapa basef Godi si'i profet ama i'i anin epen owa' nogohapifa Kraisia o owa' negegawa basef Godi andeande'ia nifi'i negawis, ama basef ipa' hipaii atiasi feha nembel epen inimbai ea' fewaloga opaf ananifi ma waf maif awafi fagapani.

Basef hiafi fape fandambaho' okom ananimii, ifimba atiasi afetaga fendawalap alihifa anin nifi'i nindiwa nembawa nitimalo' nefela agol Godi nowalapa basef na'amba ni'i, “Endilisi atis, God nape nalomepa.”

Ipa' alipipai, dei' basef ifimba akutaifi ae'afi fagape na'amba. Nemaf afamba pendakolas, presen inimba hiani Ambal Godi nagaso'apani napoma ipa' hipai na'amba. Anin epen nenda' anaf awaf, anin daian ni'i anif basef Godi niwalipipa, a anin God naso'ana anif basefa negawalapef, ea' anin daian negawa ma niga'i anoga diga daiaga, a anin daian negawa ma negambema basef ifimba. Ipa' pendanda' hiahaom amamba hiami ma pegewa' banaga hapif esis amam nematawa sios.

I'i anis ukup pehafela siga'i basefa anoga diga daiaga, bias a'a wanis sinda'i basef atona atin. Ea' ma'wis isimba. Apa' ina a' si'if atef, owa'i. Sinda'if atona atin. Ifimba ea' ma'uf. Ea' anin epen atitin a' nendambema basef ifimba.
Ama i'i owa' anin epena negambemefa, dao' epen inimba na'i niga'i basefa anoga digai a' nendasopama malogol ananigili ma basef ifimba ma esis sandakolasa. Bola anin atin ni'if nendaloma God.
Apa' amom profet biam o wanom Ambal Godi nasa'mama mogawalapa basef ananifi, amom a' mondawalapef. Ea' anom daiam mowawaloga basef ifimba.
I'i anin epen tol nepe lotu neme' basefa God nihimba'mana anif basefa epen inimba, dao' aman anamba nali' nalutu nagawalapa basefi a' nondasopama malogol.
Ipa' hipai Ambal Godi nasa'mepa pawalapa basef Godi si'i profet, ipa' pewalapef atona atin pi'if daindai ma epes hiasi seme'ef solafefa fegewa' banaga hapif asasini.
Epes ami sogofa' presen inimba Ambal Godi nasa'masa sogawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet, a' sundumafi presen inimba andeande'.
Dei' main, God ina nanda' waf uluwalifi, owa'atin. Anen nanda'waf usi'ifi opalef atifilif fagape awanelifi. Apa' sios amam nematawa Kristen sunduwa'anima sogape,

awo nematawa ina a' ulutu wi'i basef, owa'i. Awo osopama malogof ope dowaf. Sios apa' amam nematawa Godi waf ea' afamba atef. Nematawa ina a' ope wili'ma sios, owa'i. Ondape lafel si'i mu'uli Godi naga'ias.
I'i awo wi'i ogogawa anif basef kofagefa, bola ofe'ma ifagw asasigwi a' uhali' wauhupawa mi'ipawaef. I'i ano'w nemata'w konda' basef ipa' sios pandakolasa, waf afambai ambagof awogufafi.
Dei' a'i ihali'ipa. Ipa' kofagepama basef Godi? Ipa' atipa pefa' basef Godi a anis amam nematawa daias owa'? Owa'atin.

I'i epen ami okom mondanda' ni'i Ambal Godi nasa'man nawalapa basef Godi si'i profet, a'a ni'i anin nefa' presen anin daian, anin a' nendegawa basef ifimba dei' anda'ef ipe'i, ifimba mu'uli Dembinaii.
Ama i'i anin nindaiwa'ma basef ifimba, ipa' wapani pindaiwa'ma anin.
Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ukup ipe'ipi pendehafel endilisi ma Ambal Godi nosa'mepa pegawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet. Ea' ipa' ina pesopama ufia'wa piga'i basefa anoga diga daiaga, owa'i.
Apa' ipa' Kristen pendakolasa lotu, ipa' pendanda' maol andeande'ma atiasi dakolas ipe'ini negataga bo'wen.
Ipa' alipipai, dei' ae' a'i esa'ma nomonas ipe'isi wapani ma basef amamba bu'wami Godi ali' agasi'ipami. Ipa' pefa'am ea' basef amamba atom dei' pahapilam palutu banagepamam.
Ae' a'ipipa basef amamba bu'wami. I'i ipa' pihapilam tatala'im, God nofa'epa nokwahomepa waf awafi pitanimai. I'i owa', pahapilam dowadowaf alop atop ando'.
Basef ali' agasi'ipami, amamba ae' fowa' ali' egefa'ami. Amamba na'amba. Krais naga'ma nagakwaha awami ape'imi, si'i Baibel fowa' naga'iam.
Ea' esis sofa'ana salana nowaga matmat. Ama nimaguf bif hi'alef fagafe'ma wanifi, God nasa'mana wapani si'i Baibel naga'iam.
Ama main, nali' natagama Pita ea' nagi' natagama alipumi aninimi 12-pelaim.

Ea' nataga nandawalapa esis amam nematawa Kristen hiasi satolona, isimba alipisi sagaila anini hiasi a'owa' sikila' epes 500-pelais. Dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa', a'i alipisi isimba hiasi dei' ata' sape, apa' anis asaga' ea'.
Ma main, natagama Jems natolona. Ea' natagama amom aposel hiami matolona.
Ma main, owa' ae' agi' endilisi atolona wapani, natagama ae' si'i awani ma'man kogolan ata' kwapeti'i.
Dei' main, ae' ata' sa'owe ape awani falafuwai la'afena amom aposel. Ae' ina dei' bo'wawe ma epes sofale siga'i aposel, owa'. Dei' main, anda' maol agahambombaga sios Godii.

Owa' God atona okom maimaili natopalope dowaf nanda'e ape andeande'. Ea' dei' ae' ape. Anan nagatopalope dowaf, isimba ina safe' senalo, owa'. Sanda'e anda' maol banagambel a'owa' ikila' anom aposel daiam. Apa' ina ae' atowe anda' maol inimba, owa'. God natopalope dowaf, isimba atis dei' ape anda'am atapiwi.
Apa' basef ifimbai, ae' anda'am a'a amom manda'am, owa'. Basef ifimbai wamunaifi hapaifi. Basef amamba bu'wami fasimi atom afa' hiafai wawalipipam ea' amamba atom ipa' pahapilam sisihim.
Dondol afa' wawalapa basefa Krais nagaga' ma God nasa'mana nogosafel wapani. Dei' maina ipa' anipa pa'i basef na'amba paga'i, “Epes sagaga'i ina anaf sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'.”?
Ipa' anipa pa'i endilisi esis sagaga'i ina sotanima sosafel, owa'. I'i basef ipe'ifi endilisifiai, Krais wapani, God ina nasa'mana, owa'. Apa' owa' owa'atin.
I'i a' endilisi God owa' nosa'ma Kraisai, dei' basef amamba afa' wagawalapami falafumi atom ea' waf ipa' pagahapifa Kraisafi falafifi atef wafifi.

Apa' i'i na'ambaiai, anif basef wapani. Dei' afa' a' otaga amam wambaso'am wagawalapa basef Godii. Dei' main, afa' wa'i basef alihif wawalapefa God nasa'ma Krais nogosafel wapani matmat. Apa' i'i endilisi God owa' nosa'ma sagaga'iai, dao' anen ina nosa'ma Krais wapani, owa'.
Aho', ipa' anipa pa'i God ina nosa'ma esis epes sagaga'i, owa'. I'i basef ipe'ifi endilisifiai, God ina nosa'ma Krais wapani, owa'atin.
Apa' i'i endilisi God owa' nosa'ma Kraisai, dei' waf ipa' pagahapifa Kraisafi ina banagefa fegatopalopepa, owa'atin. Falafini atin. Dei' ipa' ata' papoma waf awafi atapipa.
Ea' epes isimba sagape sisihisa Krais sagaga'i, esis wapani higililas hi'ilas.

Apa' mahapifa Krais ea' mape mohafa anen. I'i apa' mohapifana mope mohafana nimaguf magape itap apa'e atep, mope awepa kwahupa a'owa' mope migi' endilisi. Andeande'ma esis soga'i uwahipigama anis hiasi sogosambala Kraisi kwasakwasala, apa' magahapifanai a' sonda'i uwahipigamapa a'owa' endilisi. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
Ina' na'amba, owa'. Krais anaga' ea', owa' dei' endilisi God nafelana nosafel wapani. Anen nosafel na'amba nali'ma epes sagaga' ea'i, si'i gwa'aisi' sali' sagaof aofi.
Dei' main, anona aman atotona nali' nawalapai waf epes sagaga'afi, ea' na'amba atin anona aman daiana nali' nawalapai ufia'w akwamba sagaga'i sogosafela'wi.

Hiahaom amamba na'amba. Mini'ap Adami hiasi hi'alas saga' atin. Ea' na'amba atina epes isimba hiasi hi'alas sagape sisihisa Kraisi, anaf God nonda'as sosafel wapani sofa' ambal namili ma sogape namis.
Apa' epes hiapai atona atin mope mondasasa nogota ape'itai. Aman nagali'i, anen Krais. Anen si'i gwa'aisi sali' sagaofi. Ama nemaf afamba nogotanimafi, apa' hiapai ananipai a' mosafel wapani.

Ama main, nemaf akutaifi fetaga ma hiahaom hiami awami higililam hi'igalam. Nemaf afamba Krais a' nohambombaga banagami hiami mamimami bu'wami awami magape ilif itapi hi'ilam, ea' noso'ana banagami ananimi ma nugumafi hiahaom hiamii mefe'ma ahamana God.
Dei' main, Krais a' nope Dembinai King nefe' nefe' notagama nemaf anen nogatalogofa bousi ananisi hiasi sogafe' lafela bo'wagah ananigahi hi'igalas.
Anen a' nili' nili'amona bousi isimba hiasi ea' nigi' nili'amona ga' si'i bounai nape nagagi'ii nosopamana hi'ilana.

Dei' main, fowa' God na'ias na'amba na'i, “Anaf ae' enda' hiahaom hiami, hi'ilam moloma epes hiasi wapani sefe' lafela anen.” Basef ifimba faga'i God nanda' hiahaom hiami mogafe' lafela Krais atona. Ea' apa' mogawa basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i hiahaom hiami ifimba ina fa'i God, owa'. Anen nanda' hiahaom amamba hiami mape lafela Krais.

Nemaf afamba hiahaom amamba hiami mogafe' lafela Krais hi'igalam, ea' Nogamana Godi atotona a' nofe' lafela anen nali' nanda' hiahaom amamba magafe' lafela Kraisi. Ea' God nope nogali' endilisima hiahaom hiami hi'igalam moloma epes hiasi wapani.

Anis epes sati waf bu'wafi anis Kristeni sape banagesa bousi sahas saga' ea' epes isimba satilis sahapifa Krais sofa' baptais. I'i epes sagaga'i anaf owa' sosafel wapania, epes isimba sogofa' baptaisa epes sagaga'i anaf sogawa sotaga sope si'imama? I'i endilisi ma anin atitin nagaga'i anaf owa' nesafel wapania, dei' maina isimba sogofa' baptaisa epes sagaga'i? Owa'atin.
Afa' wapani, dondol anis sa'i sohambombagafa. I'i epes isimba sagaga'i owa' sotanima sosafelai, dei' maina afa' wanda'as wagape na'amba? Owa'atin.
Alipipai, endilisi ae' andagalaipa ma pagape sisipama Krais Jisas dembinai ape'inai. Ea' anif basef wapani endilisifi atif si'i ifimba. Nimaguf hiafi danda ae' ape si'i agaga'i.

Ae' agape Efesus apa' anda' wandaf aloma mafis magail alupi lu'wami. Amamba atiasi ae' efa' hiahawes bu'wasi maisam? I'i a' endilisi esis sagaga'i owa' sotanima sosafela, ea' si'i anis epes gawaisi saga'i, “Hapaisi, apa' mea' gwa'aisii embela naman mogaga'.”
Na'amba anis epes sombaso'mepa. Anif basef gawaifi fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “I'i apa' mofe' mogaloma epes sanda' waf awafii, esis a' sohambambaga waf bu'wafi ape'ifi.”

Dei' ipa' pekwaha ukup amamba magahipai, pitanimai a' ukup pendape andeande'. Ipa' ina penda' waf awafi wapani, owa'i. Ae' enda'epa ambagof awagofa anif basef dei' iga'ipipafi. Anis epes ipe'isi ina dei' sogawa God endilisi, ata' owa' atin. Kofagema amamba ipa' atipa.
Apa' anona aman atiasi nogahali' na'amba ni'i, “Esis sagaga'i anaf sosafel si'imama? Anaf sofa' alop mamahopa ma sogosafel wapani?”
Anen nogahali'ma basef na'ambai okom magahanai. Dei'main, apa' magawa olemb witimb o hiahawes, isimba owa' sogaga'ia atiasi isimba ina sope namis, owa'atin.
Hiahawes isimba apa' magawasi, isimba ina sataga atifis hi'ilas si'i agof o soh mais, owa'atin. Apa' mawa nalelef atelef dowaf, anis gwa'aisi daias.

Apa' God atona nanda' nalelef afalemba pepe'alef fataga nohotagw ea' soh handanda'alef afis mais sagi' sataga sail si'i anen atona okom mandanda' na'i sogataga. Ea' anen atona nandanda' lawah si'igah haloma soh maisa hiahawes hiasi ma gwa'aisi isimba atona atin daindai.
Alop hiapi hiahaop ambagof fagapaipi ina atotop, owa'atin. Alop epesi anop daiap, alop mafisi anop daiap. Amigufi anop daiap, a agufi anop daiap.
Ea' hiahaom magape heveni maloma magape itapi amamba hiami mape. Apa' sosafa hiahaom anef daiaf, sosaf itapafi anef daiaf.
Awin alipini anef sosaf, a owambini anef daiaf. Ondowa anef sosaf, apa' ondowa wapani hiafi daindaiaf.
Waf sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, afamba ea' na'amba atin. Alop apa' dei' magawapi, apamba atiasi aop folo'ogalapi. Alop pogosafel wapanii, apamba ina anaf awapi, owa'atin. Pepe atapip.
Alop apa' magawapi, apamba a' awasip folo'ogalapi. Alop pogosafel wapanii, apamba bu'wapi fasipi endilisi. Alop magawapi apamba ina banagapi, owa'. Alop pogosafel wapanii, apop banagapi.
Alop apamba a' magawap, itapi. Apa' alop pogosafel wapanii, ilifapi, Ambal bu'unai Godi nugumafiapi. Alop apamba biafip ilifapi itapapi pape.
Baibel wapani naga'i na'amba na'i, “Aman nagali'i Adam nataga ambal namilinai.” Apa' Adam nagi' nagatagai nataga ambal bu'unai ma nogaso'as ambal namili epesi.
Apa' alop ilifapi ina pataga pali', owa'atin. Alop itapapi apop pataga pali'. Ea' alop apamba ilifapi pataga pagi'.
Aman nagali'i, God nanda' itap nanda'ana nataga ambal lapaona. Apa' aman nagi' nagatagai, anen aman heveninai.
Apa' epes hiapai itapipai, apa' mandati na'amba atin si'i aman anamba God nanda' itap nanda'anai. Apa' epes hiapai hevenipai anaf motaga mundati na'amba atin si'i aman anamba nagafi'i heveni.
Dei' apa' ata' mape si'i aman anamba itapanai ea' anaf mope na'amba atin si'i aman anamba nagafi'i heveni.

Ipa' alipipai, dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba usi'ifi. Epes itapasi anaf ina la'ifisa sogawis anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin. Hiahaom itapami higiligalami ina anaf la'ifima mofa' banagami mogape lifilafi, owa'atin.

Ipa' peme', dei' ae' a'i ewalapa anif basef fali' fape fandambaha' ma ipe'i. Anaf apa' hiapai ina moga', owa'. Atef bif kwafalis atis alof akutainai nogalef, apa' hiapai anaf mondambema hi'ilepa amondati na'a. Dei' main, alof anamba nelef ea' ma esis sagaga'i sogosafili, anaf ina ata' soga' wapani, a'owa'. Ea' apa' mogape itap apa'e wapani mondambema amondati na'a.
Dei' main, alop apamba apa' magawapi anaf apotoga pondehi namop pope andeande' lifilafi. Alop apamba pagaga'i apotaga namop pope dondol.

Endilisi, alop apamba magawapi anaf potaga dambaip pope andeande' lifilafi. Ea' alop apamba pagaga'i anaf posafel apondati na'a pofa' ambal namili pope dondol. Nemaf afamba anif basef Baibelifi afetaga faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “God natalogofa ga' nikila' wandof nanda'am hi'alam ea'.”
“Ina', ga', banagami ine'imi amuma? Ea' wamba'w ine'ikwi hikali'wi akuma? Owa'atin endilisi.”

Wamba'w sagaga'ma'wi kwataga ma waf awafi ea' banagami ma waf awafi magataga na'amba. Apa' epes hiapai mumbisila' basefa mu'uli Godi hi'alapa. Isimba atis dei' mu'uli inimba nawalapai banagami ma waf awafi.
Apa' mundanifela God. Ama banagami Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi atom God nowa' banagapa ma dei' migikila' wandafa mogali'amona waf awafi.

Ea' dei' ipa' alipipai endilisi ae'ipai, pendape banagepa andeande'. Ina ombal mehepa kwasakwasala pendahagas, owa'i. Dondol ipa' banagepama penda' maol Dembinaii. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa maol inimba panda'ana Dembinaii, ina anaf newala dowaf, owa'atin.

Dei' ae' anif basefa otamba ipa' pa'i pekolasamba pegaso' esis amam nematawa Godii. Ae' ali' ihimba'mas ufia'wa sonda' maol inimba ma esis sios Galesiaisi sondakolas daindai ea' dei' a'i ipa' penda'as na'amba atin.

Sande nimaguf danda ipa' hipai atona atin ukup pendanda'ma otamba pegefa'amba wik gagali'i ea' pewaloga otamba ambamba pembe'amba dondo' ma ipa' pegefa'amba be'eh dei pimafiamba ifagw ipe'igwi. Ama anaf ipa' ina penda' maol lu'wanima pegelaoma otamba pegasa'amba, owa'.
Anafa etagamepa, dao' ipa' pendandepa anom amama mogofa' otamba ambamba mogafe' Jerusalem. Ama ae' ese'ama basef amoma mofa'ef esapa'am mogafe'.
I'i andeande'ma egafe' wapanima, dao' amom mofe' molome.
Anaf ae' efo'o ili' ewala itap lu'upa Masedonia, ea' efo'o tagamepa. Dei' main, ae' okom mandanda' a'i ata' ili' ewala itap apamba Masedonia efe'.

Ae' okom mandanda' ma'i ata' epe anif nimaguf elomepa. Ae' ina egawa, epe elomepa nimaguf ma'wif nogota naoh gogohafel lu'ugwatai hi'igalawa ma main, efe' wambel mamahogoma, ipa' pitopalope pimafi ma hiahawes, pilutumi pehapone ufia'w.
Ipa' pegawa, ae' andaiwa'ma igatilipa nogota bandata, owa'atin. I'i Dembinai niga'ias na'amba ma, a'i ipani nogota laota kwasakwasala elomepa.
Apa' ae' a'i epe Efesus efe' etagama nemaf afamba Pentikos.
Dei' main, God nausi'mi ufia'w kwagal alihi'w ea' ma enda' maol bu'wani egaloma amam nematawa hiasi sombema nelelemba sogahipifana endilisi. Apa' owa' bousi hiasi sapaogon wapani.
I'i Timoti nogatagamaepa ma, dao' ipa' solawaipa andeande' pimafiana ma anen nogape opaf awanef la'afena ipa'. Dei' main, anen nape nanda' maol Dembinaii si'i ae' ape anda'an.

Na'amba anin epen okom mondanda'mana ni'i anen falafunai neso'ana alafuga, na'ambai owa'i. Ipa' penda' opaf ananifi fope sa'ombel pisi'ana hiahawes petopalopana ea' pilutumana pehaponana ufia'w ma nogafi'mai ae'. Ae' epe ehafana eloma anis alipisi.

Ea' basef sahomapa ape'inai Apolos fagape na'amba. Nimaguf hiafi a'ipana dindinip a'i anen ata' nolomago anom alipumi ata' mofo'o mitiago ipa', apa' anen nandaiwa' endilisi ma nogafo'o dei'. Nambimba i'i anen niti Dembinai nonda' ufia'w kogala nogafo'o, dao' a' nofo'o.
Ipa' solawaipa andeande' pindalutu banagepama pigahapifa Krais. Ipa' pendape epes banagepa endilisi si'i dembipai ea' pendalutu bangepa.
Hiahawes hiasi ipa' penda'asi, ipa' ukup pindapindaila God noloma epes penda'as.
Ipa' pegawa wambota Stefanasi sali' sataga Kristen sali'ma Grik hiasi. Ea' esis ukup pa'ipa'i a'owa' atapisa sanda' maol sagatopalopa epes Godi. Alipipai, ae' a'ipipa dindinipa
pegape lafela epes isimba soloma epes mamahisa sandao'oma sanda' maol inimbai.
Dei' ae' sonahe ma Stefanasi Fatunatus maloma Akaikus amom mafi'mai ae'. Dei' main, ipa' ina atiasi la'ifipama pigafi'i na'a'e, owa'. Amom dei' matopalopepa maho'ofepa mafi'mai ae' na'a'e.
Amom manda' opaf ae'afi fape awanef mowa' banagae ea' mowa' banaga ipa' wapani. Ea' andeande'ma ipa' pegasa'ma agof amam na'ambaimi.

Ea' esis sios sagape daindai itap apamba lu'upa walemb hielimbi agol Esiai sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi. Akila i Prisila saloma esis Kristen sios sandakolas ipat esis biasi, esis wapani sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi endilisi ma agol Dembinaii.
Alipisi hiasi sagape na'a'i sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'. Waf apa' amam nematawa Godi, ipa' hipai atona atin pendaso'ama lagof atin pelomago sahin owan ipe'isi.
Dei' ae' Pol ahapila pen lagol ae'agili atogol anda'mepago basef ifimba bandafi atif. Ae' anda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
I'i anin epen mamahina nendaiwa'ma nigaso'ana nembel ananimbili Dembinai, okom ae'ami a'i anaf God nohambombagago epen inimba higililano. Dembinai ape'inai, ae' okom mohafel endilisi, a'i ina' fi'i.
Ae' a'i okom dembinai Jisasi naganagaila ipe'i notopalpepa dowaf nope nolomago ipa' nowa' banagaipa.
Ae' a'i okom lu'unai ae'anai naganagaila ipe'i nefe'mago ipa' hipai palome magape sisihipama Krais Jisasi. Basef ifimba ea' ma'uf.

Ae' Pol, God nandandepe aposel Krais Jisasi. Ae' aloma owamapa Timoti wanda'ago basef ifimba ma ipa' amam nematawa Godi pagape Korini pelomago amam nematawa hiasi Godi si'isi sagape anamba hiagoma esis Grik sagapoma.
Ae' a'i God ahamapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaipago monda' opalef ipe'ilifi fepe awanelef.

Apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol, anen God ahama Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais. Anen ahamapa ape'inai, kofagonama okom magamagailapai nati apa' uwahipipa. Anen God nanda' opalef nimanilifi apa' hiapaii fagape sa'ombel.
Nimanimi hiami magatagamapai anen nanda'apa opalef fape awanelef. Ama dei' apa' ila ma monda' opalef epes isimba nimanimi mamimami mogatagamasi fegape awanelef si'i God nali' nagatopalopapa.
Akafimi lu'wami Krais nali' nogofa'ami dei' apa' wapani mofa'am. Ea' na'amba atin opaf awanifi lu'wafi ananifi dei' faso'alepa.

I'i dei' anis daias sogaso'afa nimanimi, amamba motopalopepa monda' opalef ipe'ilifi fepe sa'ombela atiasi God nokwahomepa waf awafi nofa'epa pigitanimai. I'i God nonda' opalef afa'ilifi fegape sa'ombel, anen nonda' opalef ipe'ilifi awanelef wapani ma pilutu banagepama pegefa' akafimi amambai si'i afa' ogofa'ami.
Afa' ogawa endilisi wa'i ipa' pigalutu banagepa. Dei' main, afa' ogawa ipa' apefa' akafimi palomafa ea' na'amba atin atiasi pefa' opalef awanilifi pelomafa wapani.

Ipa' alipipai, afa' wa'i ipa' ata' pegawa nimanimi akafimi anis epes sagaso'afam gani itap apamba lu'upa Esiai. Akafimi amamba lu'wami a'owa' ea' mahagofa afa', mikila' banagami afa'imi. Ea' afa' ukup pandanda' pa'i endilisi atiasi a' oga'.

Wameme'ma nimanimi lu'wami ea' ogawa wa'i endilisi atis a' oga'. Apa' owa' amamba matagamafa ma afa' ina ukup pendanda'ma banagami afa'imi atom, owa'atin. Afa' ukup pendapoma banagami Godi atom, amamba magasa'ma epes sagaga'ii.

Esis saso'afa nimanimi lu'wami sanda'afa aofa endilisi sa'i sohafa oga', owa' God nofa'afa otanimai. Ea' atiasi notopalopafa wapani. Ukup afa'ipi banagep ohapifana endilisi ma atiasi nogatopalopafa ma anom nimanimi lu'wami wapani.

Ama dei' beten ipa' panda'mafani atin, nonda'mafas na'amba. Ea' God atiasi nogwa beten amam nematawa hiasi sanda'ani ma anen nofalo'mafa nogatopalopafa dowaf. Ama atiasi amam nematawa hiasi ukup pegapoma afa' ma soganifela Goda hiahawes isimba anen nanda'asi.

Afa' wandagala ma hiahawes isimba. Malagof fagape opalef apa' nomoni fawalapa basef ifimba fa'ipafa wagafe' waf usi'if hilili'i ma waf opalef bu'walififi God nagaso'afaf afa'i. Gawa epes itapasi ina nawalapa waf afambai ma afa', owa'atin. God nati uwahipifa a'owa' natopalopafa dowaf dei' wafe' na'amba. Wafe' waf afambai la'afena epes hiasi sagape itap apa'ii ea' wanda'as na'amba hiafi ma ipa'.

Afa' ina wanda' anif basef ahififi ma ipa', owa'atin. Wanda' andipefi atif, ifimba ipa' ila ma pitalifif pegegawafi. Dei' ipa' ina pegawa waf afa'ifi andeande', ata' owa'. Apa' ae' okom ma'i ipa' atiasi pegawa endilisi waf afa'ifi hiafi hi'ilaf. Nemaf afamba Dembinai Jisasi, ipa' pendagalama afa' na'amba atin si'i afa' anaf ondagala ma ipa'.
Ae' egawef endilisi basef ali' aga'ipipafi ma waf bu'wafi ipe'ifi. Ea' fowa' ali' anda' okom ma'i efe'mago ipa' etopalopepa bifa ata' pegegawa waf Godi wapani. Owa' ae' ina afo'o.
Ae' okom mandanda' ma'i ata' ili' efe'mepago ma main, ekwahipa efe' itap lu'upa Masedonia ma bola ekwaha Masedonia itanima ifi'mipai wapani ma petopalope pesapa'e egafe' itap lu'upa Juda.

Dei' si'i main? Ae' a'ias ea' ma enda'as na'amba, owa' alambama basef ifimba anda' dambaifi faha'ohef? O i'i ae' okom mi'i enda' anin mae, i'i basef biafif “Aho'” neloma “Owa'” wapani si'i epes itapasi saga'i? Owa'atin endilisi.
God anen nanda' hiahaom datimai, naga'i endilisi atisi. Basef hiafi afa' wagase'epafi endilisifi atif na'amba atin. Afa' ina wa'i anif basef biafif, “Aho'” naloma “Owa'” fandahapima atogon, owa'atin.
Nogamana Godi Jisas Krais, ae'i Sailas waloma Timoti wagawalapa basef ananifii, anen ina naga'i na'ambai naga'i, “Aho'” i “Owa'” atifi, owa'atin. Krais naga'i aho' atini.

Aho', basefa lap mamahifa God naga'iefi kofagefa fandawalap ea' fa'i Krais atona, anen naga'i aho' atini. Isimba atis dei' apa' ma'i agol Jisas Kraisi atogol ea' ma'i, “Endilisi” ma basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi masa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.

God atona nowa' banaga afa', ipa' wapani, ea' mape sisihipama Krais. Anen nanda'mapa ametal ananini apa' nosaho'apa ma mogape ananipai atepa ea' naso'apa Ambal bu'unai ananinai nape nomon opalef ape'ilifi. Ambal anamba God nagaso'apani nali' ma hiahaom du'wanim hiami fasimi God na'i anaf nogaso'apami.
Ae' a'i basef endilisifi atifa naep Godi. Ae' andaiwa' ma egase'epa nimanimi ipa'. Ea' fowa' ina itanima afo'o Korin, owa'.
Afa' ina wape wali'ma oganandona waf ipa' pagahapifa Godafi, owa'atin. Dei' main, ipa' atipa palutu banagepa pahapifana ea'. Apa' dei' afa' wanda' maol walomepa ma onda'epa pendagala.
Okom ae'ami a'ias endilisi na'amba a'i, ae' ina ata' itanima efe'mago ipa' wapani enda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilif, owa'.
I'i enda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilifai, atiasi epes mamahisa sonda'e sonehe? Owa'atin endilisi. Ipa' atipa, ea' anda' ukup ipe'ipi iwanip.

I'i ipa' sonehepa, andeande'. Waf afamba bu'wafi. Apa' i'i ae' efo'o ma penda' opaf ae'afi nimanif, na'ambai andaiwa'. Ea' isimba atis fowa' ali' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'. Dei' main, ae' egawa ipa' endilisi na'amba. I'i ae' sonehe epe, ipa' hipai wapani sonehepa.

Endilisi anda'mepago basef ifimba ma nemaf afamba opaf ae'afi agame' nimanimi akafimi lu'wami ea' alomam alef hiafi. Ae' ina anda' basef ifimba ma fegase'epa opalef nimanilifi, owa'atin. Anda'efa ipa' pegegawa ae' okom pelele' mailipa a'owa'.

I'i anin epen kofagona nenda' opaf nimanifi figatagai, anin ina nanda' opaf ae'afi atof nimanif, owa'atin. Anin nanda' ipa' hipai opalef nimanilif a'owa'. Ae' a'i basefa ipa' hipai a'a anipa iafipa. Andaiwa' ma iga'i basef banagambel a'owa' ma waf awafi anen nanda'afi, owa'. Isimba atis dei' a'ias na'amba ma anipa iafipa.
Nimanimi akafimi ipa' epes hipai pagaso'anami ea' mandahama anen.

Ea' dei' penda' anef waf daiaf anen. Andeande'ma pekwaho waf awafi ananifi ukup pegase'epafa pegewa' banagona penda' opaf ananifi awanef. Na'amba nimanimi lu'wami a'owa' monda' okom ananimi aom a' nefe' lafel endilisi.
Isimba atis dei' a'ipipa dindinip pihimba'ma anona ukup ipe'ipi uwahipipi lu'up paipailana.
Fowa' anda' basef ifimba agwambepa atin. Ama a'i egegawa ipa' paila basef ae'afi dondol a'a owa'atin?

I'i ipa' pekwaha waf awafi anin epeni ukup pese'epaf dogw, ae' wapani ekwahomanaf okom mose'eaf. Aho', waf afamba awafi agakwahifi okom ae'ami mandanda' na'amba. Ae' ina egawa okom Kraisi mandanda' ma'imama, apa' i'i andeande'ma ae' egakwahomenafa naep Kraisi, dao' ekwahomanaf endilisi ma etopalopepa pegape andeande'.
Ae' anda'as na'amba ma Satan ina atiasi nombaso'mapa nikila'apa, owa'. Dei' main, apa' mogawa okom ananimi baso'ami.
Fowa' Dembinai nanda' ufia'w kwagala ae' afi'i agataga Troasa agawalapa basef bu'wafi ma Krais.
Apa' opaf ae'afi ina fape sa'ombel, owa'. Dei' main, ae' ina ata' ati owame ae'anai Taitus, owa'. Ea' akwaha esis Troas afi'i ataga anep itap lu'upa Masedonia.

Apa' dei' ae' anifela God. Dondol anen natopalope ape sisihiwi agaloma Krais ea' ali'amona wandafa waf awafi. Ama maol ae'ani God nawalapa basef ea' anis epes sogawa Krais. Gawa inimba anin si'i alogw fasigwi usihigwi gwa gwagafe'agon hi'agalagini.

Endilisi ae' si'i alogw fasigwi gwai gwatagai Krais gwafe'ma God. Alogw agwamba gwafe' la'afena epes isimba dei' God nokwahomas waf awafi nowambelas sogotanimai, isimba sagape ufia'w kwagafe' heveni saloma isimba sagape ufia'w higiligalasa'wi wapani.

Ama wambota isimba sagape ufia'w higiligalasa'wi, alogw agwamba hikapigwi sagaga'agwi. Apa' wambota isimba sagape ufia'w kwagafe' heveni, alogw agwamba bu'wagwi gwagaso'as ambal namili. Ea' dei' ae' okom mandanda'ma maol inimba Godi a'i ina anis epes la'ifisa sonda'an, apa' owa' ae' la'ifiwi anda'an.

Dei' main, ae' ina si'i anis epes hiasi safe'agon hi'alagona sanda' maola basef Godi ma sogofa' hiahawes asasisi atis, owa'atin. Ae' anda' maol inimba Godi na'ambai. Ae' ina ambaso'am dowafa maol Godi, owa'atin. Ae' anda'an aila afe' usi'ini atin hi'alan, ape sisihiwi aloma Krais. God nasapa'e afi'i awalapa basef fafe' andeande'ma naep ananipi.

Basef ifimba doko'ifi ipa' pa'i ae' asa'ma agol ae'agili atogol lu'wagol wapani si'i anom amam mambaso'mepa manda'am? O pa'i ae' owa' banagewe enda'as si'i amoma egase'epa anif basefa pas anis daias sanda'afi ma sogasa'ma agol ae'agili? O ipa' wapani atiasi penda' anif basef fil pepa ma pegatopalope? Owa'atin endilisi.
Basefa pas sogasa'ma agol ae'agili ea' ipa' atipa. Basef ifimba fail sisihif nomon okom ae'ami. Ama epes hiasi sotalififa sogogawef.

Ipa' pandawalap alihipa, pas isimba ea' ipa' atipa. Krais atona nanda' basefa pas isimba. Anen nandandepe nase'e pas isimba afo'o ase'epas. Anen ina nanda' ing nufagi'if, owa'atin. Anen nufagi'ifa Ambal bu'unai God nagape namunai. Anen ina nufagi'if fail anom otam wa'ami, owa'atin. Nufagi'if fail ukup ipe'ipi nomon.
Basef ifimba kofagefa na'amba. Krais natopalope endilisi ea' ahapifif banagewe ma God ape na'amba.
Endilisi ae' atowe ina la'ifiwi ma enda' maol inimba, owa'atin. God atona nanda'e la'ifiwi ma anda' maol inimba ananini.

Ea' anen atona nanda'e la'ifiwi ma anda' maola ufia'w basef dambaifi nagala' lapafi. Basefa mu'uli inimba ina sanda'ef fail pepa dowaf, owa'. Ifimba Ambal bu'unai ananinai nagawalapafi. Basef sanda'ef fagail pepa dowafi faha epes sagaga'i, apa' Ambal bu'unai ananinai nanda'as sofa' ambal namili sogape namisi.

God nufagi' basef ifimba fowa'ifi ma mu'uli ananini fail otam. Maol Godi amom manda'ani, inimbai natagama ga' naloma mogogala'i ananimi fasimi wapani. Mogogala'i amamba manda' amaga Mosesi gogogala'i a' mataga sa'osa'om, apa' owa', amamba banagem a'owa' ma esis Israel ina la'ifisa naep do' sigati amaga ananigai, owa'.
Apa' mogogala'i ma maol Godi Ambal bu'unai ananinai nanda'ani lu'um a'owa' mikila' amamba fowa'imi.

Maol fowa'ini nawaloga epes, higiligalasi inimba nawalapai mogogala'i Godi. Apa' maol inimba dei'ini nanda' epesa God naga'i esis bo'wes hilili'i, inimba dei' nawalapai mogogala'i ananimi lu'um a'owa' mikila' amamba magali'i.
Endilisi, mogogala'i fowa'imi ina mogala' na'amba atin si'i dei'imi, owa'. Fowa'imi falafumi atom apa' dei'imi lu'um mikila' a'owa'.
Maol inimba dei' na'i a' higiligalani, anin fowa' nataga naloma mogogala'i Godi. Apa' mogogala'i dei'imi ma maol inimba nagape lifilafii a' lu'um a'owa' mikila' amamba magali'i.

Afa' wanda' maol Godii ogawa basef ifimba dambaifi nagala' lapafi endilisifi ea' wape ohafa mogogala'i amamba atiasi mogatagamafa. Ea' afa' ina ombal mahafa kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Afa' banagefa a'owa'.
Ina wape si'i Moses, owa'. Anen nawala lowaf napete'af amaga ananigai nambaho'waga ma esis Israel ina siti mogogala'i amamba mogafe' sa'osa'ombela hi'igalam, owa'.

Owa' ukup asasipi paso'as endilisi. Dei' main, dondol esis sagatalifa basef fagail Baibeli fowa' God nagala' lapafi. Nemaf mamahefa sagatalifa basef ifimba, lowaf afamba wa'afi fagape amaga Mosesi ata' fape atapif fasopama ukup asasipi fafi'i fafi'i fataga dei'. Ina fandatagwah, owa'atin. Krais atona, dao' God nahape' lowaf afamba.
Fowa' sagatalifa basef Moses nanda'afi safi'i sataga dei', lowaf afamba ata' faso'ala opalef asasilifi atapif.
Apa' i'i epen ami nembema opaf nefe'ma Dembinai, dao' a' fendatagwah.
Dembinai anamba anen Ambal bu'unai Godi. I'i Spirit Ambal Dembinaii nogape anin epen, ina ata' anis maefah sili'ama anin, owa'atin. Anin nape wahifin.

Ea' apa' hiapai dei' mape amagah wafigah, mogogala'i bu'wami Dembinai mogala'ma apa' mogogaifa anis epes. Apa' mape na'amba dei' Ambal bu'unai Godi naho'ofa waf ape'ifi ea' mandati si'i Dembinai ma mogogala'i amamba mataga lu'um atapim mafe' atin mape. Amamba mataga Dembinai atona, anen Ambal bu'unai Godi.
God na'i afa' uwahipifa dei' naso'afa maol inimba. Ea' afa' ina wandahagasa maol inimba, owa'atin.

Afa' owa' alafugah ea' ma waf ambagof awagufi sandambaho' sanda'afi. Ina ata' wape wafe' waf afamba baso'afi uhufifi watolapa basef Godi walambama lambamaifi wa'if, owa'atin. Afa' wagawalapa basef endilisifi alihifa naep Godi ma epes hiasi seme'ef sogogawef malogof fagape opalef asasilifi nomoni.

I'i basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi wagawalapafi fendambaho', dao' fandambaho'ma epes isimba atis sagafe' ufia'w higiligalasa'wi. God baso'amunai itap apa'inai nasopama opalefa epes isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia.
Ama basef ifimba bu'wafi kofagefa ma mogogala'i Kraisi ina atiasi fiwis nomona opalef asasilifi, owa'. Esis ina sati Krais nandati na'amba atin endilisi si'i Godi, owa'.

Dei' main, afa' ina wawalapa basefa afa' ogasa'ma agof afa'igufi lu'wagof, owa'atin. Afa' wawalapefa Krais Jisas atona anen Dembinai. Afa' waila waf Jisasi dei' agof akafa wape lafela ipa' wanda' maol watopalopepa.

Fowa' God nati akot atona na'i, “Lola a' nendataga.” Dei' ea' anamba atona nanda' mogogala'i ananimi mataga ma afa' ea' manda' opalef afa'ilifi fegala' a'owa'. Mogogala'i amamba mihimba'mapa gawa ma mogogala'i banagami Godi mape atapim mogala'. Apa' mati amamba ma waf Jisas Kraisi fegala' fataga amaga ananigai.

Apa' hiahaom amamba fasimi mogogala'i maloma banagami Godi, amamba mape opalef afa'ilifi nomon, afa' si'i maloh sanda' itap sagala'ahi. Ama migihimba'ma epes hiasi sogogawa banagami amamba Godi atom. Afa' owa'.

Fe' poe afa'ini fowa' dei' wapani nagape na'amba. Anamba hiagoma ogafe'ma dondol akafimi matagamafa, apa' amom ina mahambombagafa endilisi, owa'. Hiahaom hiami masopama nomonas afa'isi, apa' nomonas afa'isi ina higilalas hi'alas, owa'atin.
Anis epes sanda'afa tofalafa ma sonda'afa aofa, apa' God ina nakwahofa, owa'. Esis sahafa owa wa'oh, owa', owa'atin. Ina afufa endilisi, owa'.
Lifilafi afa' ofa' akafimi ma ga' Jisasi alop afa'ipi wafe'. Wanda'as na'amba ma ambal namonai nagape Jisasi wapani nagataga alihina alop afa'ipi.

Dei' main, afa' wanda' maol Jisasi. Isimba atis dei' nimaguf hiafi dondol anis epes sa'i sohafa ome' akafimi oga'. Ama ambal namonai nagape Jisasi notaga nondawalap alop afa'ipi, owa' namop atapip pogapania.
Ea' dei' epes isimba sa'i sohafa oga' ma ipa' pagahapifanai pefa' ambal namili pegape andeande'.
Baibel naga'i na'i, “Ae' ahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' awalapa basef alihif a'if.” Afa' wahapifa God na'amba atin si'i Baibel naga'i dei' wawalapef wa'if.
Dei' main, afa' ea' ogawa God nasa'ma Dembinai Jisas nogosafel matmati, anen atiasi nosa'ma apa' wapani moloma Jisas ea' nofa' afa' oloma ipa' nokolasepa atogon mofe' mope felefele' molomana.

Hiahaom amamba akafimi hiami matagamafa ma ogatopalopepa. Afa' wafe' wa'ipasa basef God nagatopalopapa dowafafi fefe' fetaga atapif fefe'agon hi'igalagon. Ea' esis sondabeten sinifela God sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.
Afa' ukup papoma isimba dei' ina wandahagasa maol Godi, owa'. Endilisi, pepela alop afa'ipi na'i a' newafa atapin hi'ilan. Apa' owa', opalef afa'ilifi fataga dambailif wapani nimaguf hiafi danda.

Aho', nimanimi amamba magatagamafai amamba sa'osa'om a'owa' ea' atiasi mope nogota bandata. Nimanimi amamba anaf mowalapai mogogala'i poe bu'wani endilisi gani heven dondol lifilafi. Poe inimba bu'wani anaf nikila' endilisi nimanimi amamba sa'umi dei'imi.

Dei' main, afa' ina naep do' banagambela hiahaom sagatolom naepi, owa'. Hiahaom owa' sogatolom naepia, dao' watolom banagambel. Dei' main, hiahaom sagatolom naepi, amamba atiasi mogape nogota bandatai. Apa' hiahaom amamba owa' sogatolom naepia, amambai mogape lifilafi dondoli.

Dei' afa' ogawa na'amba. Nemaf afamba ipat atamba sogowalo' selitai sagala'ata itap apa'ii tondatal aota ma, ea' hapaitai. Afa' anota God na'i nogaso'afatai dambaitai. Ipat atamba epes ina sanda'ata sala'ata lagof asasigufi, owa'. Atamba tapani heven ea' totawa lifilafi dondol.
Dei' afa' wape alop si'i ipat itap apa'e, ea' kem atin wape. Afa' ukup pa'ipa'i a'owa' ma ipat atamba afa'itai tagape heveni ma atiasi togaso'ala alop afa'ipi si'i klos luwaguf.
I'i afa' ogola klos amamba ea', alop afa'ipi ina atiasi pil wafip dowaf, owa'.

Aho', nimaguf hiafi afa' ata' wape itap apa'e wape atapifa ipat anamba sogowalo' selanai ea' opalef nimanilif kem atin wape. Afa' ina wandaiwa'ma ogakwaha alop dei'ipi, owa'. Afa' wa'i ondawisa alop dambaipi si'i klos luwaguf ama alop anamba na'i nogaga'i atiasi a' nondambema nogataga ambal dambaili namili endilisi.

God atona nandondombafa ma ogofa' alop apamba dambaipi ea' naso'afa Ambal bu'unai ananinai. Ambal anamba nagali'ma hiahaom amamba hiami nanda'ami ma na'i anaf nogaso'afam afa'i ea' ogawa endilisi atis anaf a' noso'afam.

Ea' dei' hiahaom amamba mowa' banaga opalef afa'ilifi dondol. Afa' ogawa, alop afa'ipi ata' si'i ifagw afa' wagapaugwi. Ama nogota ata'e wagape alop apa'e, ina dei' wape waloma Dembinai ma wambel ananimbili, ata' owa'.
Dei' ata' wahapifana wafe'. Afa' ina dei' watolona, ata' owa'.
Owa' ae' a'ias ea', opalef afa'ilifi fape banagalef, ukup pehafel a'owa' ma ogakwaha alop dei'ipi ofe' ope ogaloma Dembinai wambel kofagama afa'ima.
I'i ope ogalomana ilif a'a ogape alop apa'e ma itap apa'e, hapaimi. Afa' dondol ukup pali' pahafel banagepa ogaila okom Dembinaii atom.

Apa' mogawa endilisi anaf apa' hiapai motaga ma kot atamba Kraisi hi'ilapa. I'i apa' monda' waf bu'wafi a'a waf awafi nogota atamba ata' magape alop ape'ipi. Anaf apa' hiapai atona atin mofa' hiahaom amamba bu'wami a'a awami mogwama waf afamba apa' manda'afi.

Afa' ombel mahafa ma Dembinai. Isimba atis dei' wanda' maola wagasa'ma nomonas epesi ma sogahapifana. Apa' naep Godi afa' wape alihifa ea'. Ae' okom mandanda' na'amba a'i waf afa'ifi fandawalap alihifa malogof fagape opalef ipe'ilifi nomoni.

Basef ifimba afa' ina wa'i osa'ma agof afa'igufi atogofa ipa' piga'i afa' amam bu'ufai, owa'. Wa'i onda' ufia'wa ipa' sowenogahepa ma afa' naep anis epesi. Wanda'as na'amba ma ipa' la'ifipa ma pegagwamasa basef esis epes isimba sandagala ma anis daiasi dowafa alop atopi owa' sondagala ma waf bu'wafi asasifia.
I'i endilisi afa' ope si'i ukup pagaso'asiai, ea' diaogo, hapaimi. Afa' wanda'am na'amba ma ogosa'ma agol Godi. I'i endilisi afa' ukup pepomas andeande', dao' afa' wanda'as na'amba ma wagatopalopepa.

Okom Kraisi magamagailapai atom masa'mafa ma maol inimba. Dei' main, afa' ukup pandanda' pegawa endilisi na'amba. I'i aman atotona noho'ofa apa' hiapai hi'alapa ma nagaga', isimba si'i apa' hiapai a' maga' ea'.

Ea' anen naho'ofa apa' hiapai naga' ma apa' epes mogape namepa ma ina a' ukup pelapefe' a'owa' ma apa' atepa, owa'atin. Apa' ukup pendanda'ma aman anamba naha'ofapa naga' ma notanima nogosafel wapanii, ukup pendanda'mana mondanda' maol ananini atapipa.
Isimba atis dei' afa' ina ata' waila opaf apinai wawaloga waf anin epeni, owa'atin. Endilisi, fowa' waila wafa opaf apinai ea' wawaloga Krais na'amba. Apa' dei' owa'.
Ea' i'i anin epen nepe negaloma Kraisi, God nanda' anin nataga dambain endilisi. Dei' peme' andeande'. Waf afamba apifi ananifi ahi'alaf ea'. Dei' nanda' waf dambaifi.

God atona kofagonama waf afamba epes sagataga dambaisafi. Fowa' apa' ata' mape baopai atin, owa' Krais nataga nanda'apa mape opalef atelef maloma God. Ea' God naso'afa maol inimba ma ogatopalopa anona onda' esis bousi ananisi sotaga opalef atifilif sogalomana.

Basef afa'ifi na'amba. Krais atona God nanda' maol nanda' epes hiasi Basef afa'ifi na'amba. Krais atona God nanda' maol nanda' epes hiasi sakwaha waf naumbihifi sataga opalef atelef salomana. Anen ina ata' okom mandanda'ma waf awafi esis sanda'afi, owa'. Ea' naso'afa maol inimba ma ogawalapa basef ananifi ma nonda' esis bousi sotaga opalef atelef sogalomana.

Ea' afa' dei' ofa' malogol Kraisi wawalapa basef ananifi. Isimba na'amba atin. God atona nofala epes hiasi banagambela malogof afa'igufi. Ea' waho'ofa Krais wa'ipas na'amba wa'i, “Ipa' pendakwaha waf naumbihifi ma petaga opalef atifilif pegaloma God.”

Aman anamba ina nanda' waf awafii, apa' God nakolasa awami ape'imi hiami hi'alam mafe'ma anen atona ea' kofagema ape'imi mapoma anen atona nofa'am. Anen nanda'am na'amba ma apa' mogape sisihipama anona mogofa' waf ananifi be'ef hilili'i.
Afa' wanda' maol Godi wandao'oma walomana. Dei' wa'ipipa banagambel na'amba wa'i, “God natopalopepa dowaf ea'. Na'amba ipa' ukup pese'epa waf afamba nagatopalopepa dowafafi, owa'i.”

Peme'. God naga'i na'amba na'i, “Nemaf ae' agati uwahipipafi afamba ame' basef ipe'ifi ea'. Nemaf afa'e ae' atopalopepa a'i efa'epa pigatanimai.” Peme'! Dei' atef nemaf God nagati uwahipipafi. Dei' atef God na'i ekwahomepa waf awafi nofa'apa mutanimai.
Afa' wandaiwa'ma epes siga'ipafa basef awafi ma maol Godi afa' wanda'ani. Isimba atis dei' wandaiwa'ma onda' anis hiahawasa waf awafi soha bo'wagah asasigahi sogowa, owa'atin.
Apa' dondol wihimba'ma epes hiasi wanda' maol Godii. Dei' wihimba'mas na'amba. Walutu banagefa endilisi ma nimanimi mamimami magatagamafa ma hiahaom ma'i mogahambombagafai.
Esis sahafa sanda'afa wanda' kalabus. Esis bousi sanda'afa tofalafa sa'ipafa awa awagon. Afa' wanda' maol numa'uni endilisi. Ina wa' gwa'aisi wape wa'oh andeande', owa'atin.

Wanda' waf bu'wafi hilili'i ea' wahapila gawa fasini, opalef awanelef walutu banagefa ma nimanimi. Wanda' waf bu'wafi ma anis epesi. Ofa' banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi, wanda' waf afamba endilisi ma ukup pagapagaila anis epes watopalopas. Ina wa'i basef malogof atogof, owa'atin.
Wawalapa basef endilisifi, wanda' maol banagambela banagami Godi. Afa' wahapila waf bu'wafi hilili'i si'i wahapila hiahawes wagapa'asi lagof biagof kwahisigili gagaili.

Anis epes sasa'ma agof afa'igufi a anis satalogofafa. Anis sa'i basef awafi sanda'i'ipamafa apa' anis sa'ipasa basef anis daiasa waf bu'wafi afa' wanda'afi. Esis ukup pandanda'mafa sa'i afa' epes wagambaso'ami, apa' owa', esis atis epes sagambaso'ami. Afa' waga'i endilisii.

Wanda'as na'amba, ina a' anin epen negawa afa', apa' owa', hiasi sogawafa. Afa' si'i epes ea' wagaga'i, apa' owa'atin. Afa' ata' wape namofa. God ata' nopagahofa bumbulita ma nagasindi'amonafa, apa' anen ina nahafa afuta, owa'.

Afa' opalef nimanilif endilisi, apa' owa' sonahafa dondol. Wape si'i isimba hiahawes akasi kwahusi apa' owa' waso'asa hiahaom afa'imi ma epes hiasi. Afa' hiahawes akafa si'i isimba kwahusi, owa' waf bu'wafi Godi fihimba'mafa wape si'i hiahaom hiamifai.
Ipa' Korin alipipai, ae' a'i basef hiafi bu'wafi fagape okom ae'ami awalapefa ipa' alihif hi'alef, ae' okom pelele' maimailipa a'owa' si'i agalopepa.
Ae' ina asopama opaf ae'afi isambalipa, owa'atin. Ae' okom maimailipa a'owa'. Apa' owa' ipa' apasopama opalef ipe'ilifi. Ea' ina a' mape opalef atifilif endilisi, owa'.
Dei' ae' ahamepa, ipa' si'i awasi ae'ipai. Ipa' a' ukup pelele' pindapindaili si'i ae' okom pelele' magamagailipa a'owa'.

Epes isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia, ipa' ina pelomas pepe pefe' atogon atin, owa'i, hapaisi. Dei' main, waf afamba usi'ifi ina fape atogon faloma waf afamba sogosambala basef Godi, owa'atin. Dei' maina owambi alip sondakolas atogon? Owa'atin.

Pa'i Kraisi Satan mape mofa' opaf atifif? Owa'atin endilisi. Dei' epes isimba sagahapifa Godi saloma epes isimba owa' sogohapifanaia sogofa' nomonas atifis, atiasi esis sonda' waf mamahefa? Owa'atin. Ina sonda' anef waf bu'wafi atifif, owa'.

Dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba esa'ma ukup ipe'ipi. Apa' ina andeande'ma mokolasa ipat Godi lu'unai nogaloma hiahaom baso'ami sandombam sanda' lotumami, owa'atin. Ipa' pegawa apa' atepa si'i ipat anamba God nagapaunai nomon. Si'i fowa' anen na'ias na'amba naga'i, “Anaf ae' epe elomas efe' la'afena esis ea' epe God asasiwai a esis wapani sepe epes ae'asi.”
Ea' Dembinai na'ias wapani na'i, “Ipa' pendakwaha esis pefe' pepe anagon daiagon. Ea' ipa' ina pihapila hiahaom alugumi awami, owa'i. Ama bola ese'epa opaf igifa'ipai.
Ama egape Ahamepa ipe'iwai ipa' pegape awasi amam nematawa ae'ipai. Dembiwai kofagewema banagami hiamii aga'ias na'amba.”

Ipa' alipipai afa'ipai endilisi, apa' ea' mofa' basef ifimba Godi endilisifi banagafi. Ea' mondelefata hiahaom amamba awami magape nomona alopi ambagof ape'isi ea' mondape be'epa ombel mondahapama God mila waf endilisifi hilili' a'owa'i.
Ipa' dei' pendaso'afa opalef ipe'ilifi. Afa' ina wanda' anin epen ipe'ini awen a'a wahambombaga anin, ondololaepa anin epena hiahaom ananimi, owa'atin.

Ae' agawalapa basefa ipa', ina a'ipipa a'i kofagema ipe'imi atom, owa'atin. Ae' a'ias a'i afa' wase'epa opalef afa'ilifi ipa'. Wanda'as na'amba ma i'i ipa' pegaga'ma, afa' oga' ogalomepa. Apa' i'i pegape namipama, afa' wapani ope namofa olomepa.

Ae' okom mandanda'mepa endilisi ipa' pape andeande'. Andagala a'owa' ma ipa'. Nimanimi magatagama ae'i hiami, apa' owa' okom ae'ami mapomago ipa', isimba atis dei' sanda' opaf ae'afi fape sa'ombel sonehe endilisi.

Fowa' afa' wafi'i ogataga itap lu'upa Masedonia ma anamba wapani, alop afa'ipi ina papoma noma'w kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Nimanimi mamimami hiami matagamafa, sa'i basef banagafi safitap salomafa. Ea' ombel mahafa ukup palapafe'.
Apa' God nowa' banaga epes isimba opalef nimanilifi nasapa' Taitus natagamafa nowa' banagafa.

Ina Taitus atona natagamafa dei' God nowa' banagafa, owa'atin. Ipa' pewa' banaga Taitus, isimba atis dei' God nowa' banagafa wapani. Taitus na'ipafa na'i ipa' ukup pehafel a'owa' ma pa'i pegatolowe ea' opalef ipe'ilifi falopa fowa' pagase'e akafimi ae'. Ea' nomonas ipe'isi sohafel a'owa' ma pegape opalef atelef pegalome. Isimba atis dei' sonahe a'owa' ikila' fowa'.

Endilisi ae' egawa basefa pas anda'as sali' sagafo'owi fanda' opalef ipe'ilifi iwanilif, apa' ae' ina opaf iwanifa isimba, owa'. Endilisi, fowa' ae' nembel a' nimanimbil apa' dei' owa'atin. Ae' egawa pasa basef ifimba fanda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilif, apa' owa', amambai nogota bandataimi atom.

Apa' dei' ae' sonahe. Ina sonahema basefa pas isimba fanda' ukup ipe'ipi iwanip, owa'. Ae' andagalama amamba a' manda'epa ea' pambema nelelemb pafe'ma God. Ae' egawa God atona nawalapai nimanimi amamba ipe'imi ma nagatopalopepa.

Waf Godi na'amba. Nimanimi maim anen nagawalapami manda'apa mombema nelelemb mefe'ma anen nokwahomapa waf awafi nofa'apa mogotanimai. Apa' ina a' nelelemb nimanilimba nimanimi amamba God nagawalapami, owa'atin. Apa' i'i opalef nimanilifa waf itapafi, afambai dao' awafi fagawalapai waf saga' sagafe' wambel awambiliafi, hapaifi.

Ipa' ukup pendape andeande'ma nimanimi amamba ipe'imi. God nanda'am mawalapai waf bu'wafi fafifafi hiafi ma ipa'. Amamba maso'mepa pasafel kwafalisa pegenandona waf ipe'ifi. Ipa' ambagof awagofa epen inimba ipe'ini nanda' waf awafii, isimba atis dei' ombel mehepama basef aga'ipipaefa okom wandafunai Godi. Opalef ipe'ilifi falef a'owa' ma pa'i pegatolowe ea' banagepama pigasindi'amona epes isimba sanda' waf awafii. Ipa' pagalo'ma epen inimba napani laogon. Panda'as na'amba dei' ma pihimba'ma epes hiasi waf awafi kofagefa akepa ma hiahaom amamba mogatagamipai.

Ea' endilisi fowa' anda'mepago basef ifimba, ae' ina okom mapoma epen inimba nanda' waf awafii, a'a inimba nagame' akafimi ma waf afambai, owa'. Ae' a'i waf ipe'ifi fetaga fendawalap alihifa naep Godi ma pegegawaf andeande' na'amba. Ipa' ukup paipailafa a'owa'. Ea' isimba atis ae' fowa' anda'mepago basef ifimba.

Waf afamba ipe'ifi fanda'afa wandagala fowa' banagafa. Apa' ina afa' atofa wandagala, owa'. Taitus wapani nandagala a'owa'. Dei' main, ipa' hipai panda' ambal ananili a' lapoma noma'w. Afa' wati isimba atis, asonahafa a'owa'.

Fowa' andagalaepa asa'ma agof ipe'igufi lu'wagofa nogohnaep Taitusi ea' dei' ae' ina ambal aola waf afamba, owa'atin. Basef hiafi afa' waga'ipipafi ifimba endilisifi. Ea' na'amba atin basef fowa' wagasa'ma agof ipe'igufi ma nogohnaep Taitusi, ifimba wapani fataga fendasali alihif, ifimba endilisifi atif.
Fowa' anen nafe'mago ipa', ipa' hipai paso'ana opalef paila basef ananifi ombal mahepa ma pegasambalif. Anen ata' okom mandanda'ma isimba atapis dei' okom ananimi maimailipa endilisi.
Dei' ae' andagala endilisi ma egegawa ipa' hipai panda' waf hiafi andeande' datima.
Ipa' alipipai, dei' a'i i'ipipa ma ata' pegegawa waf esis sios Kristen hiasi sagape analemb walemb itap lu'upa Masedoniai. God natopalopas nihimba'mas waf bu'wafi sagatopalopa anis daiasafi.

Nimanimi lu'wami matagama esis ea' amamba magwamba opalef asasilifi a'owa'. Ea' nogota atamba esis sape hiahawes akas endilisi. Apa' owa', owa'atin esis sofa' dagala lu'unai nalomam. Ea' esis ukup pandanda' ma anis Kristen daias kwahusi, satama moni mais hiasi ma sogatopalopas.

Ae' egawas ea', awalapas a'ias sandawalap alihis. Isimba hiahawes kwasala'wis saga'omasi esis ilama sogaso'asas, esis saso'asas. Apa' ina saso'asa isimba atis, owa'. Saso'asa anis hias wapani. Ea' asataga wamasa hiahawes endilisi. Esis sandaila ukup asasipi atip.
Ea' esis banages a'owa' ma afa' sa'i uga'i aho'ma sonda' maol sogaloma anis Kristen daiasa sogatopalopa epes Godi kwahusi sagape itap lu'upa Judiai.

Fowa' afa' ukup pandanda' na'amba wa'i atiasi esis sogaso'as anin moni. Apa' owa' esis ata' sali' saso' esis atisa Dembinai ma main, saila okom Godi saso'afa nelelemb asasilimbi afa' wapani ma sogaso'afa anemba otamba sogotopalopa Kristen kwahusi.
Fowa' Taitus nasa'ma maol inimba ma ipa' pagatopalopa Kristen isimba dowaf. Isimba atis dei' afa' banagefa ma anen notopalopepa ma pigambifa maol inimba ahi'igalan.

Alipipai, hiahawes hiasi ipa' panda' waf fasifi a'owa', pikila' anis daiasa waf afambai. Ipa' pahapifa God banagambel. Ambal bu'unai Godi nase'epa gawa nasa'mepa ma pegawalapa basef bu'wafi. Ipa' pasafel endilisi ma panda' maol Godi ea' ukup paipailafa wapani. Ipa' panda' waf afambai fasifi na'amba. Dei' afa' wa'i ipa' pendanda' anef waf bu'wafi wapani. Petopalopa esis Kristen kwahusi pese'as anis hiahawes dowaf.

Dei' ae' ina a'ipipa dindinip, owa'atin. Doko' a'ipipa ma waf esis Kristen sagape Masedoniai. Esis sape wamasa hiahawes endilisi apa' owa', ukup pahafel endilisi ma sagatopalopa anis daias dowaf. Dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba ma ewaloga waf ipe'ifi ukup pagapagailasafi egegawaf. Fape be'ef endilisi si'i anis Kristen, a'a owa'?

Aho'! Ipa' pegawa ufia'w dembinai Jisas Krais nagatopalopapa dowafa'wi. Ufia'w akwamba na'amba. Fowa' anen hiahaom hiamunai, apa' dei' a' nataga wafinai endilisi. Natopalopepa dowaf nataga nape kwahunai, ea' isimba atis dei' ipa' pefa' waf bu'wafi faloma hiahaom hiami bu'wami.
Nomonas ae'asi isi'i dei' awalapasoma ipa'. Doko'igil ipa' pali'a anis daias ukup pehafela pagatopalopa anis daias wamasa hiahawesi ea' panda'as pali'.

Isimba atis dei' penda'as pimbifas. Ipa' fowa' ukup pehafel kwafalis atis a'owa' ma pegatopalopas. Ea' dei' wapani na'amba atin kwafalis atis penda'as hi'indalas dondo' na'amba atina hiahawes saga'oma ipe'i.

I'i ipa' ukup pehafel endilisi ma pegatopalopas paso'as dondo' si'i hiahawes saga'oma ipe'i, na'ambai God natilis na'i waf bu'wafi ma okom ananimi. Apa' hiahawes ipa' akepamasi, God ina okom mandanda'mas, owa'.
Ae' ina a'ipipa petopalopa anis asogape andeande'ma ipa' pegape awepa, owa'atin. A'i ipa' hipai pendape dondo' na'amba atin.

Dei' nogota ata'e hiahaom ipe'imi amamba matopalopa epes isimba hiahaom akasi. Ama anaf ipa' hiahaom akepa, hiahaom asasimi motanima motopalopa ipa' hiahaom akipai. Penda'as na'amba ma pegape dondo'epa atin.
Amamba si'i Baibel na'iam naga'i, “Epen negefa' hiahaom hiamii, amamba ina ahiam si'im kwaef a'owa', owa'atin. Apa' epen negefa' hiahaom kwaia'umi, anin ina waowaola anis maefah, owa'atin.”
Ae' anifela God, anen nasa'ma okom Taitusi a' nomonas atifis si'i ae'. Ea' okom mohafel a'owa' ma nogatopalopepa.
Anen ina naila basef afa'ifi atifa osapa'ana nogafe'mago ipa', owa'. Anen okom mohafel wapani ma maol inimba. Ea' dei' okom ananimi atom na'i nefe'mago ipa'.
Ea' afa' atiasi osapa' anona alipunai nofo'o nolomanago. Dei' main, aman anamba agilinai ma esis Kristen hiasi nanda' maol nagawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi.

Ina isimba atis, owa'. Esis sios hiasi sandandepana ma nofe' nolomafa ogofa'o otamba ipe'imbai ma ogatopalopa Kristen isimba kwahusi. Maol inimba afa'ini ukup pagapagailasani. Afa' onda'ana ogasa'ma agol Dembinai atogola wigihimba'ma epes hiasi sogogawa opalef afa'ilifi fehafema ogatopalopas.

Afa' wandaiwa'ma anin epen niga'i basef awami ma waf afa' wanda'afa ugumafi otamba ambamba hiambai ipa' paloma anis daias panda' ofambai. Isimba atis dei' afa' wa'i osapa' owamafa anamba nifi'i nefe'mago ipa'.
Afa' ukup pandanda'ma onda' waf bu'wafi atefa epes hiasi. Ina naep Dembinai atip, owa'. Nogohnaep epesi wapani.

Ea' afa' wa'i osapa' anona owamafa afa'inai daiana nifi'i nolomago amom biam. Dondol afa' wagwambana wandondomana ma maol hiani nanda'ani naninani. Owa' wati anen okom mohafel endilisi ma nonda'an. Dei' anen nogawepa endilisi na'i ipa' panda' waf bu'wafi atifi. Ea' anen banagona a'owa' ma nogatopalopafa umafi otamba ambamba ogafo'o.
Taitus ipa' pegawana. Afa' wandao'oma wanda' maol atini ma wagatopalopepa. Alipumi biam mofo'o mogalomanai mofa' malogof esis sios hiasii mofo'o. Amom manda' maol Krais magasa'ma agol ananigili.
Ea' ipa' pihimba'manago waf pigati uwahipisafi ma amom wanom ama esis sios hiasi hi'ilas sogogawa endilisi waf afamba ipe'ifi, ma sogogawa wapani afa' ina sonahafa ma ipa' dowaf, owa'atin.
Ipa' pegawa ea' ma maol bu'wani pagatopalopa esis amam nematawa Godi hiahawes akasi. Ea' ae' ina enda' anif basefa isimba, owa'.

Ae' egawa ea', nelelemb ipe'ilimbi basafela panda' maol inimba ea' dondol agasa'ma agof ipe'igufi ma nogohnaep esis Kristen sagape itap lu'upa Masedoniai. Aga'ipas na'amba a'i, “Afagol gagalimba gagali'i esis Grik asanda'as dumbulidombol ea' ma sonda' maol inimba.” Ea' esis same' basef ifimba ma ipa' ukup pehafema maol inimba. Dei' isimba ea' sasa'ma esis Kristen Masedoniai hiasi ma sonda'am wapani.

Apa' ae' andaiwa'ma basef afa' wagasa'ma agof ipe'igufi ma esis Kristen Masedoniaisi atiasi fegataga falafifi atif, owa'. Isimba atis dei' esapa' owapepa ipe'imi wanom mefe'mago ipa'. Andeande'ma ipa' dumbulidombol pegape si'i aga'ipipas.

I'i owa', anis Masedonia sifi'i solome siti ipa' ata' owa' penda'as dumbulidombola, afa' ambagof awagofa isimba ea' ipa' wapani pelomafa. Dei' main, afa' wali' wa'ipipas wa'i ipa' penda'as dumbulidombol ea'.

Ea' ae' okom mandanda' a'i i'ipa amom alipumi wanom dindinipa muli' mofo'o motagamepa ma mondondomba otamba ambamba ma'umba pali' pa'ias pa'i pegaso'asambai. Ea' penda'as na'amba ma nemaf ae' egafo'o penda' otamba ambamba hiambai dumbulidombol bo'oh. Ambamba afa' ina wasapa'epa dindinipa pegambe'amba, owa'. Ukup ipe'ipi atip pandanda' ma pegaso'asamba.
Ipa' ukup pendapoma epen inimba nagawa gwa'aisi kwasala'wisii. Anaf anin negala'as sotaga kwasala'wis. Epen nagawa haesii anaf nela' hiasi.

Ea' ipa' hipai ata' pili' ukup pindapaipa andeande' atona atin ea' pila nomonas isimba atis pese'as hiahaom. Na'amba anin epen okom iwanima negaso'as hiahawes ananisi a'a anin daian ni'i anis daias si'ipan dindinipa negaso'as na'ambai, owa'. Dei' main, God okom maimaila epes isimba sonogahasa sogaso'as hiahawasi.

God anen ilama nogase'epa hiahawes bu'wasi hiasi ipa' ma atiasi ipa' si'ipamas endilisi. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma nimaguf hiafi ipa' penda'as pegaso' anis daias ina atiasi hi'ilas, owa'. So'oh atapis. Ea' ipa' a' hiahaom hiamipa penda' maol bu'wani hiani naninani ma pegatopalopa anis daias wapani.
Si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Epen inimba naso'as hiahawes hiasi epes isimba hiahawes akasi. Ea' epes hiasi hi'alas ukup papoma waf usi'ifi hilili'i ananifi atapif.”

Dondol God naso'as nalelef gwa'aisi hiasi saga'asi epesa ea' naso'as gwa'aisi sasisasi hiasi epesa soga'as. Ea' bola a' nese'epa hiahaom ipa' wapani ma pegaso'asam anis epes daias. Ama hiahaom amamba ipe'imi mogataga lu'um a'owa' ma pegaso'asam wapani, si'i anin epen nagawa nalelef gwa'aisii ma a'i owa' main, nola' gwa'aisi hias a'owa' nofa'as.

Atiasi ipa' a' hiahawes hiasi ma dondol la'ifipama pegaso' alipisi kwahusi ma hiahawes hiasi. Nemaf mamahefa afa' ogofa' hiahawes isimba ipe'isi ma ogaso'asas alipisi isimba, waf fasifi ipe'ifi fanda' epes sanifela God.

Ipa' penda'as na'amba ma pegatopalopa alipisi isimba amam nematawa Godi ma waf afambai, ipa' panda' maola pagatopalopa epes isimba waowaola hiahawasi. Ea' ina a' isimba atis, owa'atin. Ipa' panda' waf afambai pasa'ma epes hiasi ma sogasa'ma agol Godi soganifelona a'owa'.

Waf afambai ipe'ifi fandawalap alihigima fihimba'ma epes hiasi ma ipa' pagaila basef Godi andeande'. Ea' anis epes daias wapani sosa'ma agol Godi lu'wagola ipa' pagaila basef bu'wafi Kraisi pawalapefa pagatopalopa esis saloma anis daias wapani hi'agalas.
Ea' esis atiasi ukup pelele' pipilipa a'owa' ma sondabetena ipa'. Dei' main, esis sogawa ea' waf Godi nagatopalopepa dowafafi fape lu'wif a'owa' ma ipa'.
Waf afamba God nagaso'apafi, amamba lu'um a'owa'. Ea' apa' basef akapa ma mi'i basef mogonandenaefam hi'igalam, owa'atin. Apa' a' mundanifela Goda waf afamba ananifi.

Ae' Pol ahali'ipa nimanis aila waf Kraisi sa'umbilifi si'i anen nanda' okom ananimi mogafe' lafela epes hiasi. Dei' anifelipa ma anis hiahawes atifis. Anis epes sasapagae sa'ipi na'amba sa'i, “Anen ata' nape nagaloma apa' nanda' anen nafe' sa'osa'ona nafe' lafel, apa' nogota atamba nafe' napani laogon nanda' banagafima apa'.”

Ae' ihali'ipa na'amba. Anaf ae' egatagamepa, ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba pasasapa'e ese'epa basef banagafi si'i ae' okom ma'i egawalapefa anipa. Ae' ewalapefa ipa' paga'i afa' wafe' wagaila waf awafi itapafii.
Endilisi, afa' wape wagafe' itap apa'e, apa' ina wape wanda' wandaf si'i epes itapasi sagapa', owa'atin.
Hiahaom hiami sagapa'ami afa' wagahapilami amom ina itapami, owa'atin. Amamba banagami Godi, la'ifimi ma migindiwa indalelemb banagami bounai Seteni.

Afa' wigindiwa nomonas epes isimba owa' endilisisia. Ea' waf hiafi fagasopama ufia'wa epes sa'i sogogawa Godi, afamba afa' windiwaf wasopamaf wapani. Ea' afa' wasindi'amona nomonas hiasi apa' epesi ma monda'as usi'is sigaila okom Kraisi.
Afa' dumbulidombol wape ohafa ipa'. Ama i'i ipa' pigaila basef hiafi afa'ifima, dao' afa' atiasi ogwamasa akafimi awami epes hiasi sogosambala basef Godi hi'ilas.

Ipa' pati hiahaom magape naep ipe'imi atom ando' atogini, nomon owa'. Dei' piti hiahaom kofagema. I'i epen mamahina banagen niga'i anin epen Kraisi, dao' anin a' nendegawa afa' wapani wape epes Kraisi.

Dembinai naso'afa agof lu'wagufi afa' ma onda' maol inimba ananini, amamba mogowa' banaga hapif ipe'inii. Amamba ina mohambombagepa, owa'atin. Ama ae' i'i egasa'ma agof afa'igufi atogofa maol inimba Dembinaii, atiasi ae' ina a' ambal aola isimba, owa'.
Apa' ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma ipa' pi'i ae' agaumbalipa dowafa anis pasa basef ifimba ae'afi, owa'.

Dei' main, anis epes sa'i, “Aho', pas basef ananifi nimanif a'owa' ea' banagafi ahifif a'owa'. Apa' owa' anen nafi'i natagamapa ma magatolona naep ape'ipi, ina banagona ea' basef ananifi falafifi atif.”

Epes saga'i basef ifimbai, ata' ukup pendanda' andeande' sondogawa na'amba. Afa' wape laogon ea' wanda' basefa pas atisa ipa'. I'i afa' ope olomepa, a' onda' waf afambai atef si'i basef ifimba wanda'ef fagail pasi.

Afa' ukup hiahaop dei' wandaiwa' ma uga'i afa' wandati na'amba atin si'i epes sagasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof lu'wagufi, owa'. Epes isimba sandawaloga waf asasifi ma ikwaf ukup asasipi atip. Ea' sandawaloga atin na'amba. Esis isimbai owa' sogogawaia, ukup magahasi.

Apa' afa' wandaiwa'ma ogatolapai ikwaf afa'ifi ma ogasa'ma agof afa'igufi ilif a'owa', owa'atin. Afa' ondaila ikwaf God nogawalogafafi ma nagaso'afa maol ananini. Afa' waila isimba ea' wafe' wataga ma ipa' wanda' maol inimba. Ea' wasa'ma agof afa'igufi ma maol inimba atin.

Afa' wame' basefa God wailif wafo'o watagama ipa' dondo' ma alol anen nandandepafamal afa'i. Ea' afa' ina umbisila' alola maol inimba ma wagawalipipa basef ananifi, owa'. I'i afa' owa' ome' basef ananifi naga'ipipafi ugi'mifa, dao' afa' a' umbisila' alol. Owa', owa'atin. Afa' wafo'o ofa'ago basef bu'wafi atif Kraisi fatagamepa.

Ea' afa' ina umbisila' alola ogasa'ma agof afa'igufi atogofa anin maol anis epes daias sanda'ani, owa'atin. Afa' ukup pandanda' pafe' banagep na'amba. Maol inimba afa' wanda'ani, ipa' atiasi pihapifa Krais banagepa pikila' fowa' pali' pagahapifana ma negataga lu'win la'afena ipa' nigikila' fowa'ini. Afa' wa'i onda'an dondol nendahama ikwaf God nagaso'afafi.

Wa'ias na'amba ma afa' ata' ogofa' basef bu'wafi Godi ogafo'o laogon anep itap pagape alafugaha ipa' ganimba wa'ili. Ama afa' ina umbisila' ofe'ma maol anona amani osa'ma agof afa'igufi dowafa anin maol aman anamba nanda'an ea'i, owa'.
“Epen sonogahani anin a' nendagala ma Dembinai atona.”
Dei' main, apa' mogawa epen mamahina negasa'ma agol ananigili atigili, anin agol akana naep Dembinai, owa'atin. I'i Dembinai nogasa'ma agol anin epeni, dao' epen inimba atin nefa' agol endilisi.
Ae' a'i ipa' pekwaha ae' ma ata' enda' anif basef falafalafifi kwasakwasala. Aho', ipa' ata' kwahowae.

Dei' main, God okom ma'ima'i epes a'owa' ma na'i nondandepasa sogape ananisi atis. Ama waf afambai atef ae' okom ma'ima'i ipa' a'owa'. Aho', ae' andandepepa ea' ma pegaso' anona aman atotona, anen Krais. Ae' a'i ese'epa pefe'ma anen si'i nemata'w aiawai'wi kwagape bo'okw endilisi.
Apa' owa' ae' ombal mahe. Na'amba ukup ipe'ipi a' awep ea' pekwaha waf afamba pegape hilili' nomonas sogapoma Krais atona si'i fowa' gani ul anamba gawainai nagambaso'ma Iv.

Dei' main, anis epes safi'i satagama ipa' sawalapa basefa anona Jisas daiana, anen ina Jisas anamba afa' wawalapa basef waga'ifani, owa'. Ea' ipa' dei' apefa' anona spirit ambal daiana, ina Ambal bu'unai Godi fowa' ipa' pegefa'ani, owa'. Ea' ipa' apefa' anif basef daif, ina basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi pagame'ef ea' ma afa'i, owa'. Epes isimba safi'i sambaso'mepa sa'i anif basef daifa anona Jisas daiana la'afena ipa', ea' pa'i aho'ma epes isimba pandagalamas pa'i basef ifimba bu'wafi.
Peme'! Ae' ina okom mandanda' a'i ae' gawa ake ape lafela amom “Aposel amamba ipe'imi magali'i,” owa'atin.

Endilisi ae' ina egawa a'owa' ma waf afamba egawalapa basefafi, owa'. Apa' ea' hapaini, gawa ae'ani ma basef Godi ina bandan, owa'. Nimaguf hiafi ma waf hiafi afa' wanda'afi wihimba'mepa gawa inimba hiani ma ipa'.

Ipa' pegawa afamba ae' awalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma ipa', ina efa' anemba otamba ma isimba, owa'. Anda' waf afamba atalifa ae' afa' lafela agasa'ma ipa'. Dei' main? A'i waf afamba anda'afi awafi a'a? Owa'atin.
Ae' efa' moni maisa anis Kristen sios sagape anagon daiagini satopalope anda' maola egatopalopepa. Waf afambai si'i egefa' hiahawes asasisi dowaf.

Fowa' ape agalomepa ata' waowaola hiahawes, nogota atamba ae' ina ahali'ipa ma hiahawes isimba, owa'atin. Dei' main, amom alipumi makwaha itap lu'upa Masedoniai mafi'i matagamepa muwapanimi hiahawes isimba ae' waowaolasi. Ea' ina ahali'ipa kwasakwasala ma pagase'e otamba mais, owa'atin. Ea' atiasi wapani enda'as na'amba atin ina ihahali'ipa ma anis hiahawes, owa'atin.

Basef endilisifi Kraisi fape ae', isimba endilisi atis. Ea' anif basef wapani endilisifi atif, ifimba na'amba. Anamba hiagoma esis Grik sagapoma ina atiasi anona aman atotona la'ifina ma nogahefa ufia'wa ae' egasa'ma agol ae'agilima waf afamba egefa' otamba maisa ipa', owa'atin.
Pa'i ae' asa'ma agol ae'agili na'amba ma main? Asa'ma agola egapa'aga ipa'? Owa'atin. God nogawe ea', okom ae'ami maimailipa.

Apa' anom amam ma'i molaoma ufia'wa mogasa'ma agof amamugufi atogofa ma'i mogataga na'amba atin si'i afa' ma naep epesi. Ea' anda' maola agasopama amoma ufia'w akwamba. Ae' atiasi enda'am na'amba atin epe.
Amom amamba aposel magambaso'ami manda' maol baso'aminii. Amom mondola'waifa amom aposel Kraisi dowaf, owa' magambaso'ami.
Ea' ipa' ina pesafel gogolalasipa ma amamba, owa'i. Apa' mogawa Satan atona nondola'waifa ensel nogogala'i nagafe' hiagoma.
I'i amom manda' maol ananinii wapani mondola'waifa sanda' maol bu'wani waf fasifii, inimba ina anin mae lu'wani, owa'atin. Anaf amom a' mofa' akafimi awami mondahama maol amamini.

Doko' ali' a'ias, dei' a'ias wapani a'i anin epen ina a' okom mondanda'ma ae' ni'i ae' okom magahai, owa'. Apa' dei' ae' a'i ipa' ata' pi'i aho'me i'i basef si'i epen okom magahani. Pi'i aho'me esa'ma agol ae'agili sonehe kwasakwasala.
Ae' ina aila Dembinai a'i basef ifimba, owa'atin. Ae' a'i si'i ukup pagaso'asi ma banagewe egasa'ma agol ae'agili atogol.
Epes hiasi saila waf itapafi sasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof, ea' ae' a'i enda'as wapani. Dei' i'ipipa anif basef si'i epen okom magahani.
Ipa' hipai gawaipai atipa. Ea' ipa' ukup pehafel a'owa' pa'i aho'ma esis ukup pagaso'asi sagase'epa basef putuputa'afi ipa'.

Endilisi, ipa' ina pa'i aho'ma esis isimba ukup pagaso'asi atis, owa'. Ipa' pa'i aho'ma amam mamahoma mogambaso'ami mafi'i mahokolepa pagafe' lafela amom. Amom mogofa' hiahawes hiasi ipe'isi masa'ma agof amamugufi atogofa mopa'agaipa ma mogopagaha amagah ipe'igahi. Amom manda'epa na'amba dei' pa'i aho'mam.

Amom manda' waf awafi fikila' afa'. Ea' afa' ina banagefa onda' waf afamba amom manda'afi, owa'atin. Dei' ae' ata' i'i basef si'i epen okom magahani. I'i anin epen banagena negasa'ma agol ananigili atogola, ae' wapani na'amba atin.
Amom Hibruimi ma, ae' wapani. Amom amam Israeli ma, ae' wapani. Amom wambota Abrahama, ae' wapani.

Ae' dei' aga'i si'i epen okom magahani endilisi. I'i monda' maol Kraisi ma, ae' wapani anda' maol Kraisi ikila' amam. Ahifimi numa'umi, amamba ae' ikila' amam ea' kalabus wapani anda' kalabus ikila'am. I'i anis epes sogaham hihif a'owa', isimba wapani ikila'am endilisi. Nimaguf hiafi ae' felefele' ma egaga'.
Wanif bif Juda sahe wip banagambel hiafi timbi tambel 39-pelaif.
Nimaguf wanif sahe melu'uta. Anef nemaf sahe otamba. Galahowa awasiwa wanif ea' aowe naoh embel. Ea' nemaf si'ifi atetef owamb si'imb atotomb ae' alemb ala naoh embel la'afen.

Dondol ae' agafe' lauguni ufia'w lau'wi. Ae' a'i higilili ewala walembeh. Amom amamba manda' waf awafi manda' wali magafe' ufiawai ma'i mehe. Esis asimbel atembel Judaisi sa'i sohambombage ea' epes isimba owa' Judaisia wapani sa'i sonda'e aowe. Anis epes sa'i sonda'e aowe taun ea' anamba itap wafigima wapani, naoh embel wapani. Ea' anom alipumi magambaso'ami wapani ma'i mohambombage.

Ae' anda' ahifimi hiami mamimami endilisi. Owambeh hiembihi danda ina a'oma ambeh, owa'atin. Nimaguf hiafi ina a' anis gwa'aisi embel mais, owa'. Iap pase'e nolomahe a'i ega' atin. Anif nimaguf daif hiafi elelama gwa'aisi, luwaguf mais ake nomanamb bae.
Ea' ina a' isimba atis, owa'atin. Nimaguf hiafi ae' nomonas salasafe' hiahiasa esis Kristen hiasi sagape hiagomai sape sa'imama? Sahapifana banages, a'a owa'?
Epen mamahina owa' banagena, ae' wapani ina ame' banagewe. Ea' epen mamahina newa ma waf awafi, ae' wapani ame' akafimi aloman.
I'i ae' egasa'ma agol ae'agilima, esa'magola hiahawes mais sihimba'mepa sawalapa ae' owa' banagewea.
God, anen God Dembinai Jisasi Ahamana wapani, apa' mondasa'ma agol ananigili lifilafi! Anen nogawa basef ifimba doko' ali' aga'iefi ina ambaso'am, owa'atin.
Fowa' wambel Damaskus, dembinai gavman nagape lafela dembinai king Aretasi anen nanda' amom malutu mugumafi uta indalelemb sagawis taun Damaskusi. Anen na'i nombale'e.
Owa' anom alipumi mafi'i manda'e atolo'w folaf malae iwalai uta sa'utai indalelemba taun inimba ando'. Isimba atis dei' akwaha lagof gavman anambai ea' afa' afe'.

Ina ano'w ufia'w daia'w, owa' ae' endasa'ma agol ae'agili atogol wapani. Anda'as na'amba ina la'ifisa sogatopalopapa, owa'. Apa' diaogo, ae' endanda'as. Dei' ae' a'i i'i basefa anin koh dondo'aha basef fape fandambahi'i God nagawalapamef ae'i.

Ae' egawa anona aman Kraisi, basef ananifi fagape na'amba. Fowa' afagof 14-pelaiguf fafe'ma ea', God nofa'ana nalota heven nagafe'ma wanifigini gani ilif. Anen nani ambal atol lalota a'a naloma alop nalota, ina egawana. God atona nogawana.
Ea' ae' egawa aman anamba God nofa'ana nalota heven. Anen nani ambal atol nalota a'a alop papaona nalota ae' ina egawana, God atona nogawana.
Gani heven anen name' basef hiafi fafifafi epes owa' la'ifisa siga'if digaia God nandaiwa' ma epes sogawalapefia.
Ae' a'i esa'ma agol aman anambai lu'wagol. Apa' agol ae'agili owa'. Ae' i'ias i'i ae' owa' banagewea, ea' isimba atis esa'ma agol ae'agili.

Endilisi, i'i ae' i'i esa'ma agol ae'agili atogolai, ae' ina si'i epen okom magahani, owa'atin. Dei' main, atiasi i'i endilisi atis. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ae' andaiwa'. Na'amba anin epen ni'i ae' epen bu'uwai a'owa' ikila' waf fe' poe ki ae'ani. Ae' a'i ipa' piti waf ae' anda'afi peme'e ma basef ae' aga'iefi. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' pegawa waf ae'afi andeande'.

Basef ifi'i God nigihimba'mef ae'i lu'wafi a'owa' endilisi. God nandaiwa'ma egasa'ma agol ae'agili a'owa'. Isimba atis dei' nase'e anom hiahaom si'i higatai mape alop ae'api ame' akafimi, amamba anona ensel Satan nasapa'ana nagafi'ii ma nogase'e akafimi ae'. Amamba magatalogofa ae'i ma ina asa'ma ae', owa' owa'atin.
Ae' andabetena Dembinai wanifa anen ata' negelefata hiahaom amamba ma ae'.

Owa' anen na'ipi na'amba na'i, “Ae' atopalopena dowaf, waf afamba banagefa ina'. Dei' main, banagami ae'ami amamba manda' maol banagambel endilisi ma epes owa' banagasia.” Ea' ae' dei' ina ata' okom iwanim, owa'atin. Ae' sonahe a'owa' ma amamba ma banagami Kraisi mogapaowe.

Isimba atis dei' maol inimba Kraisi atin, ae' ina banagewe, owa'. Esis sanda'me waf awafi ea' sanda'me nimanimi mamimami hiami, anis sahambombage. Ea' hapaimi. Ae' andagala ma hiahaom amamba. Aho' afamba ae' owa' banagewea, nogota atamba ae' banagewe endilisi.

Basef ifimba ae' aga'iefi ifimba basef putuputa'afi a'if si'i epen okom magahani. Apa' ipa' pesa'ma ae' dei' a'if na'amba. I'i ipa' pasa'ma agol ae'agiliea, afamba waf usi'ifi. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Endilisi ae' epen falafuwai, apa' ina afe' lafela amom amamba “aposel ipe'imi” magali'i, owa'atin.

Ae' ewa' banaga okom ae'ami anda' numa'umi hiami la'afena ipa', awalapai ametal hiani aposeli. Amamba na'amba. Banagami si'i God nanda'ami mataga hiami mamimami la'afena ipa' mandahama maol Godi. Sati banagami amamba, esis bolalas kwapete'as. Banagami amamba mihimba'mepa ae' aposel endilisiwai.

Ipa' ina pape lafela anis Kristen sios sagape ganiganii, owa'. Ipa' palomas pape dondo' atina waf hiafi ae' anda'mepafi. Apa' anef waf awafi anda'mepaf ipa' atipai ma esis owa'i, afamba na'amba. Ae' ina endelaepepa anis hiahawes ipe'isi, owa'atin. Dei' ae' a'i uwahipigai, ipa' ukup pese'epa waf afamba awafi anda'mepafi pekwahomeaf.

Dei' anda'as dumbulidombol efe'mago ipa' ma a' wanif ea' ae' ina atiasi ehendo' hiahawes ipe'isi, owa'. Dei' main, ae' andaiwa'ma egefa' hiahawes ipe'isi, owa'. A'i ifa'ai ipa' atipa. Ipa' pegawa ipa' si'i batawis. Ina andeande'ma esis awasi sogolaoma hiahawes sokolasis sogatopalopa mamasas asasisi, owa'atin. Esis mamasas atis dao', sanda' maol solaoma hiahawes sakolasis satopalopa batawisas.

Ae' okom ma'ias a'owa' ma egakwaha hiahaom hiami ae'ami ea' elelama ambal ae'ali wapani ekwahola egatopalopepa. Ae' okom ma'i na'amba. Waf ae' okom magamagailipamafi fataga fape lu'ufa a'owa' atapif fikila' fowa'. Apa' waf ipa' ukup pagailimafi afewala sa'osa'of a'owa' atapif fape.

Ea' ipa' pegawa fowa' ae' ina ase'epa nimanimi ipa', owa'atin. Apa' anis saga'i na'amba sa'i, “Endilisi anen ina nofa' hiahawes ape'isi alihis, apa' anen aman nanda' kikipai ma waf baso'afi nasapagapa nahokolapa.”
Endilisi fowa' asapa' anom amam mafe'mago ipa'. Dei' si'i main? A'i ae' ambaso'mepa ahondo' anin mae ma lagof ipe'igufi? Owa'atin.

Ae' asa'ma Taitus nafe'mago ipa'. Ea' asapa' owamapa anamba nafo'o nalomanago. A'i Taitus nambaso'am nahondo' hiahawes ipe'isi a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi. Afa' dei' wafe' banagami waf bu'wafi ukup atifip. Ipa' pegawa afa' waila ufia'w atoto'w wafe'.

Ipa' ina pi'i afa' wanda' basef ifimba hiafi wali' waga'iefi onandona waf afa'ifi ma naep ipe'ipi, owa'. Afa' wape epes Kraisi wanda' basef ifimba ma naep Godi. Alipipai endilisi ae'ipai, afa' wanda' basef ifimba hi'alefa fegewa' banaga hapif ipe'ini.

Ae' ombel mahe kwasakwasala ea' a'ias na'amba a'i atiasi efo'o etaga ma igatilipa ina atiasi pepe be'epa si'i okom ma'i efo'o iti ipa' pindati, a'owa'. Ea' ipa' wapani atiasi pigati ae' ina epe fasiwi si'i pa'i piti ae' indati, a' owa'atin. Na'amba waf naninani hiani na'ambainai a' nope. Basef lopa' fitapafi, waf kowagalasafi, migimigah, findiwa, da'i'ipama, du'wanigama waf pendatopa' biafipamafi. Ea' ipa' ina pegehembe' andeande'ma pigaila okom atotoma waf sanda' lotuwafi, owa'. Paila ukup daindai. Ae' ombel mahema amamba.

Na'amba ae' efe'mago ipa' owa', God ae'ani notalogae ma nogohnaep ipe'isi ma agalopa ipa' amam nematawa hipai fowa' panda' waf awafii owa' pembema nelelemb pegafe'ma Godia. Ma ipa' owa' pewa' alafugaha waf alugufi awafi so'a waulafi a nelelemb usiusihilimbi soloma hiahaom awami fowa' pali' panda'ami. Ae' ombal mahema amamba.

Atiasi ae' efe'mago ipa' ma ea' wanif. “I'i anis epes sogasapaga anin epena anif basef, ama i'i anis daias bias a'a wanis si'i basef atififa waf afamba, dao' ea' basef ifimba sagasapaganafi endilisifi atif.”
