Fowa' ae' ali' afo'o bif ape agalomepa, ae' a'ipa anipa dindinip a'ias na'amba a'i, “Ipa' solawaipa.” Dei' ape laogon a'ipipago wapani na'amba a'i afamba ae' egafo'o wapanima, ina atiasi iti anis soloma ipa' pali' panda' waf awafii i'i bu'upai, owa'. Ewalogepa isindi'amonepa banagambel.

Nemaf afamba atef ae' egawalipipafi ipa' a' pegawa endilisi si'i Krais na'i basef fagataga malogol ae'agili. Ipa' a' pegawa endilisi atis. Krais ina pupulina ma nanda' maol nagalomepa, owa'atin. Anen banagonai.

Endilisi, fowa' anen ina banagona a'owa' ma dei' sagandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai sahana nagaga', owa'. Apa' owa' banagami atom Godi nasa'mana dei' nape namona. Afa' wandaloma walomana ea' afa' wapani owa' banagefaea. Owa' banagami atom Godi dei' afa' wape namofa walomana ea' atiasi owalapa banagami amamba la'afena ipa'.

Ipa' dondol ata' pewawaloga opalef ipe'ilifi pegawalef andeande', ipa' pahapifa God endilisi a'a owa'atin? Ipa' pendawawaloga ipa' atipa. Ipa' pegawa Krais Jisas nape opalef ipe'ilifi a'a owa'atin? I'i ata' owa'atin, ikwaf ipe'ifi ina dei' pafe' dondo', owa'. Ata' waowaol.
Ae' egawa a'i dei' ipa' pegawa ikwaf afa'ifi ina fafe' waowaol, owa'atin. Fafe' fataga dondo'.

Dei' afa' wandabetena God nogatopalopepa ma ina penda' anef waf awafi, owa'. Afa' ina wandabetena ipa' na'amba ma otaga ondawalap alihifa ma nogohnaep epesi ma siga'i ikwaf afa'ifi dondo', owa'atin. Afa' wanda'ana ipa' penda' waf bu'wafi hilili', apa' afa' ea' hapaifai. Afa' wandawalap alihifa ma nogohnaep epes hiasi sambaso'am sa'i ikwaf afa'ifi ina fafe' fataga, owa'. Afafe' waowaol.
Ipa' pegawa afa' ina onda' anin mae ma negatalogofa basef endilisifi, owa'atin. Afa' la'ififa ma wanda' maola ogatopalopa basef endilisifi atif.
Nemaf mamahefa afa' wagame' pupulifa ma ogatopalopepa pegape banagepa, dao' wa'i aho' wandagala a'owa'. Afa' wandabeten dondola Goda ipa' pegataga banagepa be'epa hilili' endilisi.

Dei' ape laogon anda'ago basef ifimba fafe'mepago ma main? Ae' anda'as na'amba ma atiasi efo'o epe egalomepa ae' ina i'ipipa banagambel a'owa' ma banagami Dembinai nagase'eami, owa'. Banagami amamba anen ina nase'eam ma mogahambombaga ipa', owa'atin. Amamba mogowa' banaga hapif ipe'ini.

Kristen alipipai, dei' esopama basef hi'ilif a'i endagala inifelipa. Ipa' pendanda' maol banagepa endilisi ma pegataga be'epa hilili'. Ea' pendame' basef ae'afi. Ipa' pindahapila nomonas atifis ea' pendape opalef atifilif awanelef. God, anen kofagonama waf ukup pagapagailasafi faloma opalef awanelefafi nope nolomepago.
Waf ape'ifi amam nematawa hiapai atona atin Godi, pendaso'ama lagof pelomago esis alipisi.
Amam nematawa hiasi Godi sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
Ae' a'i Dembinai Jisas Krais niti uwahipipa notopalopepago dowafa okom Godi mogomogailipa. Ea' a'i Ambal bu'unai ananinai nope noloma ipa' hipaii hi'ilipa ma pelomana opalef atelef pegape. Ea' ma'uf.

Ae' Pol aposel Jisas Kraisii anda' basef ifimba. Ina anona aman nandandepe ma enda' maol aposel, owa'atin. Ahamapa God nasa'ma Jisas Krais nogosafel wandof sagaga'ii amom atom mandandepe ma epe aposel igawalipasa basef Godi.
Esis Kristen sahin owan hiasi sagape na'ai salome, wanda'mepago dagala ipa' Kristen hipai pagape walemb hiagoma itap lu'upa Galesiai.
Ae' a'i ahamapa God noloma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai mowa' banagaepa motopalopepa dowafa opalef ipe'ilifi fegape awanelef.
Jisas Krais nagi'ma okom ahamapa Godi nalamona ambal ananinai nakwaha waf awafi apa' manda'afi. Anen nanda'as na'amba natagwahepa ma waf awafi hiafi dei' fagape itap apa'ii.
Ae' a'i amam nematawa hiasi sosa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol ma mogogala'i ananimi atom lifilafi dondol. Endilisi.
Ae' gogolalasowe ma ipa' pagakwaha waf bu'wafi God nogofalepa, faloma Jisas Krais nagatopalopepa dowafafi. Dei' owa' pakwahef kwafalis atis ea' paila anif basef daif dambaifi.
Basef bu'wami Godi ea' amamba atom. Ina anif daif wapani, owa'atin. Dei' maina aga'ipipa basef ifimba? Ae' egawa anis epes daias salamona basef bu'wami Kraisi ma ukup ipe'ipi dei' pando pelaepa.

Apa' i'i ae' a'a, anin epen a'a, anona ensel nifi'i heven ni'ipipa anif basef daif, owa' dondo' ma basef amamba afa' waga'ipipamia, epen inimbai pegame'an owa', hapaini. Ae' a'i atiasi God nowaloga epen inimba awani nili'amonan newala wambel awambili hel.

Basef amamba wali' wa'ipipam ea', dei' a'ipipam wapani. I'i epen mamahina ni'ipipa anif basef daifa owa' fefe' dondo' si'i basef amamba bu'wami Godi pagagi'mamia, ae' a'i epen inimbai God nowalogon nefe' wambel awambili hel.

Ipa' ukup pandame' pa'imama ma basef ifimba? Pa'i ae' a'ifa anis sinifelowe sogasa'ma agol ae'agili? Owa'atin. Ae' a'i God atotona opaf bo'ofa ae'. Ipa' pa'ias pa'i a'ifa anis epes soganifelowe? Owa'. I'i enda' maola igambimifai anis epesa opalef bo'walefa ae'ma, ae' ina aman anda' maola Kraisi, owa'atin. Ae' agambaso'ami. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Anda' maola Krais atonai endilisi.
Sahin owan alipipai ae'ipai, ae' a'i ipa' pegawa basef ifimba ae'afi. Basef bu'wami Godi agawalipasami, amamba ina mataga okom anin epeni, owa'atin.
Ae' ina efa'ama anin epen, owa'. Ina anin epen nawalipi basef amamba kofagema, owa'atin. Jisas Krais atona nawalipi basef amamba bu'wami.

Waf fowa' anda'afi, esis sa'ipipaf pegawaf ea'. Fowa' anda' lotu ma God aila waf esis Juda sanda'afi. Ae' agahambombaga esis Kristen epes Godi banagambili. Ae' ina atilis uwahipis, owa'atin. Anda' maol dindinipa ilamonas hi'igalas.

Ae' ikila' epes hiasi Juda agalomas aol atol wagataga atifi, ikila'asa agaila waf esis Juda sanda' lotuma Godafi. Anis sailaf kwasakwasala apa' ae' ailaf dindinip hi'alaf. Ea' banagewe a'owa' ma agaila waf fowa'ifi amom akupapa manda'afi. Ae' ailaf andeande' a'owa' ikila'as.

Apa' fowa' gani ma'me ata' owa' kolaea, God natopalope dowaf nosahe'e nofale ma enda'mana maol. Ama main, nemaf afamba anen na'i nihimba'me Nogamana ananinai ma igawalipasa basef bu'wami ananimi isimba sogololama Godi, nemaf afamba ae' ina afe' ahali' anin epena maol inimba, owa'atin.
Ae' ina afe' wambel Jerusalem ati amom God nali' nandandepama manda' maol aposeli, owa'atin. Nemaf afamba atef afe' itap lu'upa Arebia. Ama main, itanima afe' Damaskus.
Afagof wanogof fafe'ma ea', afe' Jerusalem ati Pita ape alomana wikifah biagah.
Apa' ae' ina ati anom aposel daiam, owa'. Ati Jems atotona, Dembinai Jisas owamana.
Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ma naep Godi nogawa basef ifimba anda'afi, ifimba endilisifi atif. Ae' ina ambaso'mepa, owa'atin.
A'i owa' main, afe' analemb walemb bagape itap biafip lu'upa Siriai Silisia.
Nemaf afamba esis Kristen sagape itap lu'upa Judiai ina sogawa ae' andeande', ata' owa'.

Esis same' basef atifa anis daias saga'i, “Aman anamba fowa' nagahambombagapa maloma basef Kraisi, nandaiwa'ma hapif ape'ini apa' dei' owa'atin. Anamba nawalapa basef amamba atom fowa' nagahambombagami.”
Ea' God natopalope ahapifana. Isimba atis dei' sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
Ama afagof hiagufi 14-pelaiguf fafe'ma ea', ae' afe' Jerusalem wapani. Aloma Barnabas wafe' atin. Ae' ao'wa Taitus wapani nafe' nalomafa.

God nihimba'me na'amba ea' afe'. Basef ifimba bu'wafi agawalapefa esis anep mini'ap owa' Judaisia ihimba'masef esis Kristen sagape Jerusalemi wapani. Ea' aloma amom agufumi atom mape, ihimba'mamef. Ae' andaiwa'ma maol fowa' anda'ani neloma dei' anda'ani netaga falafin negenalo dowaf, owa'atin.
Taitus, anen alipunai ae'anai, amom mogawa anen aman Grikinai. Apa' amom ina matopa'mana alop si'i amom Juda manda'am, owa'. Ma'i aho'mana.

Basef ifimba Taitus nogatopa' alop a'a owa' fagataga na'amba. Fowa' amam magambaso'ami ma'i amom Kristen sahin owan endilisimi a' motopa' alop amamipi. Ea' mandambaho' mawisi nomona apa' Kristen ma'i monandona waf usi'ifi Jisas Krais naso'apaf apa' magape sisihipa ma anini. Ea' dei' natagwahepa ma waf awafi mape wahifipa. Amom ma'i mogawa waf afamba magape wahifipa ea' ma'i mili'amapa mogape lafela basef amamifi fowa'ifi.
Apa' ina ma'i aho'ma mogaila basef amamifi kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Dei' main, apa' ma'i mumafi basef bu'wami endilisimi mondape usi'ima ipa' pigahapifam andeande'.

Amom agufumi esis Kristen saga'i agufumi asasimi, ae' andaiwa'ma egasa'ma agofa anis epes, owa'. A'i agof mamahagofa falafugufi atogof. God ina nati alop ando' nowalogas, owa'atin. Anen nati ukupi nomonas nomon nawalogas. Amom ina ma'ipi anif basef daif wapani ma igawalipasef, owa'atin.
Apa' amom mogawa God nase'e maol inimba ma igawalipasa basef bu'wami owa' Judaisia, si'i nagaso'anan Pita nagawalipa esis Juda.

God nandandepa Pita nowa' banagona ma nonda' maol aposel nogawalapa basef ananifi ma esis Juda. Ea' na'amba atina God nandandepe nowa' banagae ma enda' maol aposel igawalipasa basef ananimi isimba owa' Judaisia.

Esis Kristen sa'i agufumi asasimi Jemsi Jon, maloma Pita. Amom mogawa God natopalope dowaf nase'e maol inimba. Ea' manda'afa alipufai onda' maol atitin Godi. Ea' amom wanom ma'i maso'afa lagof ae'i Barnabas mihimba'ma esis, afa' waloma amom wape opalef atelef wanda' maol atin Godi. Ea' amom wanom ma'i aho'ma ondawalagatanima ma afa' biafa ogafe' ma esis owa' Judaisia, amom mefe'ma esis Juda.
Amom ma'ipafa basef ifimba atifif ma'i afa' biafa ope otopalopa esis Kristen sagape Jerusalami kwahusi, otamba mais akasi. Maol inimba ae' okom ma'ian a'owa'.
Nemaf afamba Pita nafi'i wambel Antiok, ae' esambala basef ananifi ma nogohnaep esis Kristen hiasii. Dei' main, anen nanda' waf awafi.

Nali' nafi'i nape naloma esis Kristen owa' Judaisi na' gwa'aisi nalomas. A'i owa' main, nati amam amamba Jems nasapa'am magafi'ii, Pita ombal bahana ma amom Juda dindinapima mugaila waf afamba magatopa' alopafi. Ea' nandahagas nakwaha esis Kristen owa' Judaisia, ina ata' na' gwa'aisi nalomas wapani, a' owa'atin.
Anis Kristen Juda wapani ombal mahas sakwaha esis owa' Judaisia sagi'ma Pita. Barnabas wapani ombal mahana nanda'as na'amba atin si'i esis.

Nogota atamba ae' ati waf epes isimbai, ina saila ufia'w waf usi'ifi dondo'ma basef bu'wafi Godi endilisifi, owa'atin. Ea' a'ipana nogohnaep esis hiasii a'i, “Ina' Judainai. Apa' owa' dei' ina' naila waf anep mini'ap sogololama Godi. Waf apa' Judai, a' nakwahef ea'. Dei' maina ina' banagena a'owa' ma nelaepa esis mini'ap apamba sogaila waf apa' Judai? Na'ambai ina andeande', owa'. Awasim.
“Apa' mataga mamasapa ape'isi Juda, apa' ina mataga epes isimba owa' Judaia sanda' waf awafii, owa'atin.

Apa' mogawa God ina okom mapoma epen inimba nagahapifa mu'uli ananini ea' nanda' epen inimba bo'wen hilili', owa'atin. Epen nagahapifa Jisas Kraisi atin, dao' God nofalan na'i bo'wen hilili'i. Ea' apa' wapani magahapifa Jisas Krais ea'i, God na'i apa' epes bu'upai hilili'i ma magahapifa Krais. Apa' mu'uli owa'atin. Dei' main, ina anin epen naila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani, dei' God nofalan na'i anin bo'wen hilili'i, owa'atin.

Apa' mape sisihipama Krais dei' God nofalapa epes be'epa hilili'i. I'i basef ifimba endilisiai, dei' mape ma'imama? Epes sigati apa' owa' mila mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesania, atiasi sofalapa si'i apa' epes aupai si'i isimba owa' Judaisia. I'i esis si'ipapa na'amba, apa' ina a' mi'i Krais nasa'ma apa' manda' waf afamba awafi, owa'atin.
I'i ae' egalata anota ipata itanimai esa'mata wapani, dao' isimba sawalapa ae' aman agatopa' mu'uli inimbai.

“Dei' main, mu'uli inimba nahe aga' ea'. Ina la'ifina negala'ata ae' wapani, owa'. Dei' nahe aga' ma etaga egape namowe efa' ambal namili igaila okom Godi. Ae' ea' ape sisihiwima Krais aga' ail alomana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.

Ae' ina ape namowe ma ambal ae'ali atol, owa'. Krais atona nape namona opaf ae'afi. Dei' agape itap apa'e, ape aila banagami Nogamana Godi ahapifa anen atona. Anen okom maimaili a'owa', nalamona ambal ananinai ma nagatopalope dowaf.

Ae' ina ewa' alafugama waf God nagatopalope dowafafi, owa'atin. I'i mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani nenda' epes sotaga bo'wes hilili' ma naep Godiai, dei' waf Krais nagaga'mafi falafifi atef kofagefa akaf.”

Ipa' Galesia ukup pagahipai. Afa' wawalipipa basef alihifa Jisas Krais nagaga'ma ipa' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai, wawalipipaef alihif endilisi si'i pagatolom naep ipe'ipi. Dei' ata' ami nalamona ukup ipe'ipi pase'epa? Na'ambai owa'.

Ae' a'i ihali'ipa ma basef atifif. Fowa' ipa' pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape opalef ipe'ilifi. Ipa' paila waf si'i mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani naga'ias pefa'ana a'a pame' basef bu'wami Godi atom pahapifam pefa'ana?
Endilisi, ae' ati ipa' ukup pagahipai. Ipa' pasefela maol panda'an banagena Ambal bu'unai Godi, apa' dei' owa' pa'i penda'an pimbifana pepel ipe'ini atin. Na'ambai awasim.
Dei' hiahaom amamba akafimi fowa' ipa' pegefa'ama maol bu'wani Godi pefa'am dowaf? Owa'. Ae' a'i amamba ina matagamepa dowaf, owa'atin.
Dei' God nase'epa Ambal bu'unai ananinai nanda' maol banagani la'afena ipa' ma main? Anen okom mandanda'ma ipa' paila mu'uli fowa' nagaso' Mosesani a'a pame' basef bu'wami ananimi pahapilam pailam?
Ipa' ata' ukup pendanda'ma Abraham. Anen si'i ikwafa waf usi'ifi pagahapifa Godafi. Basef Baibelifi fa'ias alihif fa'i, “Abraham nahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' God na'i anen aman bu'unai hilili'i.”
Ea' dei' ipa' pendegawa, epes isimba mamahisa sogahapifa Godi ma basef bu'wafi ananifi, epes isimba ea' bafasana awasi endilisi Abrahami.

Fowa' basef Baibelifi fa'ias alihifa nogota owagama God nonda' esis owa' Judaisia sogahapifa anen, sogataga bo'wes hilili' ma naep ananipi. Fowa' basef Baibelifi fa'ipa Abrahama basef bu'wami Godi. Fihimba'mana fa'i, “Anaf owagama God nonda' ina' ma negatopalopa epes hiasi sagape itapi sogape bo'wes.”

Abraham nahapifa God ea' God nafalo'mana na'ipana basef bu'wami ananimi. Dei' God a' nofalo'ma epes mamahisa sogahapifa anini ni'ipasa basef bu'wami ananimi na'amba atin si'i fowa' nagatopalopa Abraham.

Epes mamahisa hiasi ukup pagapoma waf sagaila mu'uli esis Juda sagailani dei' sape lafela okom aunai Godi. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Epen ami dondol owa' nigaila basef hiafi fagail mu'uli Godi hi'ilifa, isimba sape lafela okom aunai Godi.”

Dei' basef ifimba fataga fandawalap alihif. Ina anin epen atitin naila mu'uli Godi nataga be'ena naep Godi, owa'atin. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Epen mamahina nigahapifa Godi atin netaga bo'wen hilili' ma naep ananipi ma negape andeande' lifilafi.”

Apa' waf kofagefa sagaila mu'uli inimba Godii ina fape atogon kwasakwasala si'i waf sagahapifa Godafi, owa'atin endilisi. Basef fagail buk Baibeli fa'i anif basef banagafi ma mu'uli inimba fa'i, “Epen ami nagaila basef hiafi fagail mu'uli inimbai hi'agalafi, epen inimba nape namina nagaila basef ifimba hiafi hi'agalef.”

Apa' owa' Krais natagwahepa ma okom wandafunai Godi nagape mu'uli ananinii. God nanda' nimanimi ma awami ape'imi hiami hi'alam nakolasom mafe'ma anen atona, ea' kofagema amamba mapoma anen atona nofa'am. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli fa'i, “Epes mamahisa sandolas sahas sagail lawah usi'igahi ti'wanaegahi, isimba atis sape lafela okom aunai Godi.”

Krais Jisas nanda'as na'amba ma nonda' hiahawes fasifi God naga'ipanas Abrahami sogatagama anis epes daias sogolalama Godi. Nanda'as na'amba ma apa' mogohapifa basef bu'wami ma mogofa' Ambal bu'unai Ananinai si'i fowa' nala' lap naga'ias.

Ipa' Kristen sahin owan, a'i i'ipipa anif basef waminif atina waf ape'ifi. I'i anom amam manda' lapa anif banagafi, ina atiasi anin epen la'ifina nehape'ef a'a negewatanif, owa'atin endilisi. Fepe banagef atapif.

Fowa' Godi Abraham mala' lap papoma bafamana ananinai anaf nogataga, si'i waf apa' epes magala' lapafi. Basef fagail Baibeli ina fa'i, “Ina' neloma bafasena ine'isi.” Owa'atin. Ifimba fa'i epes hiasi. Apa' basef fagail Baibeli fa'i, “Neloma anona bafamena ine'inai.” Ifimba fa'i epen atotona anen Krais.

Basef ae' aga'ipipafi kofagefa na'amba. Fowa' gani God na'i basef nala' lap na'i endilisi owagama fela gwa'aisi. Ea' afagof hiagufi 430-pelaiguf fafe' fafe'ma ea', God naso'as mu'uli ananini nagaso' Mosesani. Mu'uli inimba ina la'ifina negahape' basef ifimba fagali'i God nala' lap nanda'afi, owa'atin endilisi.

Dei' main, God nanda' waf bu'wafima apa' nofa'apa makwaha waf awafi mutanimai. I'i mu'uli inimba newalapai waf afamba bu'wafiai, dei' basef God nagala' lapafi owa'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Fowa' God nala' lapa waf afamba bu'wafi natopalopa Abraham dowaf nofa'ana notanimai.

Dei' God naso'apa mu'uli inimba ma main? Fowa' gani God nali' naso'apa lap apamba ananipi. Nagi' nowatani mu'uli inimba nigihimba'mapa kofagema ma waf awafi fagataga alihif. Ea' God na'i mu'uli inimba nepe nifi'i netambel nogota atamba Abraham bafamana nogataga atai. Fowa' God na'i basef ifimba nala' lapa bafamana anamba. God na'ipam mu'uli inimba amom ensel ea' ma'ipa epesa aman nagape la'afeni, anen Moses.
I'i epen atitin nepe, aman nagape la'afeni owa' maol akana. Apa' i'i epes hiasi sogape, dao' anen nope la'afena esis. Apa' God ina anona aman nape la'afen natopalopana, owa'. Ea' anen atona nandape.

Ipa' pa'i basef ifimba fagail mu'uli esis Juda sagailani fa'i fepa'aga basef God nala' lap naga'iefi a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi. Dei' main, apa' hiapai magape itapi manda' waf awafii. I'i God noso'apa anin mu'uli ma mogofa' ambal namiliai, dao' a' motaga epes bu'upai hilili'i ma mugaila mu'uli inimba. Owa', owa'atin.

Apa' basef fagail Baibeli fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Epes hiasi sagape itapi sape lafela banagami ma waf awafi hi'alas.” God nanda'as na'amba ma epes mamahisa sagahapifa Jisas Kraisi fowa' nala' lap na'i basef pagapomasi.

Fowa' gani waf afamba sagahapifa Jisas Kraisafi ina dei' fataga, ata' owa'. Nemaf afamba mu'uli esis Juda sagailani nala'atapa sisihipa mape si'i kalabus mape mape ma dei' nemaf afamba God nihimba'mapas alihisa apa' magahapifa Jisas Krais.
Mu'uli inimba si'i anin epen nigimafiapa nefa'apa magafe'ma Kraisa mogohapifana ma God nogofalapa epes be'epa hilili'i.
Dei' nemaf afamba afataga ea' ma mogohapifa Krais. Ea' mu'uli inimba ina ata' nimafiapa wapani, a' owa'atin.
Ipa' pahapifa Krais Jisas. Isimba atis dei' ipa' hipai pataga awasi Godi, pape sisihipama Krais Jisas.
Ipa' hipai panda' baptais hi'alepa ma pagape sisihipama Krais. Ea' dei' pefa' waf ananifi si'i pegowaho' lowagwif.

Dei' ina anis epes sape dambesi ma anis daiasa naep Godi, owa'atin. Esis Juda ina sape dambesa isimba owa' Judaisia, epes mamahisa agof akasi ina sape lafela epes agufisi, amam ina mape dambema awo nematawa, owa'atin. Ipa' hipai pape sisihipama Krais hi'alepa pataga atifipa.
I'i ipa' Kraisi si'ipa, andeande' ipa' awasi Abrahami pagahapifa Kraisi ma anaf God nofa'epa pitanimai pegape andeande' si'i basef ifimba fowa nala' lap nagaloma Abrahamafi.

Basef ae'afi fagape na'amba. Awani nogamana nagali'i anamba owagama nogofa' hiahawes ahamanai. Apa' anen ata' sa'ona sanda'ana nape lafela anona aman dembinai. Apa' endilisi hiahawes hiasi ahamanai, a' ananisi si'is.
Nemaf afamba nogamana ata' sa'ona, nape lafela agufumi mumafianama gwa'aisi otamba mais nafe' nafe'ma nemaf ahamana nandandepafi fagataga. Afamba amom ina ata' mumafiana wapani, a' owa'atin.

Apa' wapani mape na'amba atin si'i nogamana anamba. Fowa' apa' ata' owa' mohapifa basef Godi andeande'a, nogota atamba ata' manda' maol mape lafela ambagof awami dembami mugumafi hiahaom hiami magape ilif itapi.
Owa' nogota atamba God naga'iatai tataga, anen nasapa' Nogamana ananinai nafi'i itap apa'e. Ano'w nemata'w kolana nataga epen nape lafela mu'uli esis Juda sagailani.
Ama nogatagwahepa ma mu'uli inimba negewa'apa ea' natalepa ma mogape wahifipa. Nanda'am na'amba ma God dei' notowandefapa mogape si'i awasi ananipai endilisi si'ipa.
Apa' mape awasi ananipai. Isimba atis dei' God naso'apa Ambal bu'unai Nogamanai nawis ukup ape'ipi. Ambal anamba nalef nofalana na'i, “Ahame, Ahame!”

Dei' ipa' ina pape panda' maol lafela ambagof amamba awami, owa'atin endilisi. Ipa' batawis ananipai. Anaf God nogase'epa hiahawes fasisi hiasi nandondombas sapoma nogaso'apas apa' awasi ananipai wapani.
Fowa' ipa' owa' ata' pegawa Goda, pape panda' maol aunai pape sisihipa lafela ambagof awami. Amom ina endilisimi, owa'atin.

Dei' ipa' pegawa God. Apa' endilisi, anen nogawa ipa'. Apa' dei' ami ata' nanda'epa pitanima pandahagas pafe' pagaila ambagof amamba awami? Amamba ina banagami, owa'. Dei' maina ipa' pa'i pegape lafelam wapani? Hapaimi.

Ae' okom mapoma ipa', ombal mahe. Dei' maina ukup ipe'ipi pandanda' be'ebe'ep pagapoma afagol dambaigili galoma awin dambaini saloma nogota asaf owaf sogatagatai saloma anif nimaguf paga'i lu'wafi panda' lotuma Godafi ma pagasafam? Na'ambai hapaimi. Na'amba maol ae' anda'ana agatopalopipani nenalo dowaf.

Dei' a'ipipa dindinip a'i ipa' pekwaha nomonas isimba pagape lafela mu'uli inimba. Ae' ina ape lafela mu'uli Godi, owa'. Ape wahifiwi. Ea' pepe wahifipa si'i ae'. Dei' main, ae' ahapifa Krais si'i ipa'. Fowa' ipa' ina panda'me anef waf awafi, owa'atin.
Ipa' pegawa fowa' dambadamba agafe'mago ipa', alop ae'api ina banagep, owa'. Ape alomepa anif nimaguf, awalapa basef bu'wami Godi a'ipipa.

Aowas lu'wani nanda'e ea' alop ae'api aop. Isimba sanda'epa nimanipa. Apa' ipa' ina patolowe pandafafa'me pewa' alafugahe, owa'atin. Ipa' pandagalame si'i pandagalama anona ensel Godi, a'a si'i Krais Jisas atona.
Fowa' ape agalomepa ipa' pandagala a'owa'. Apa' dei' dagala ipe'ini ahi'alan. Ae' atowe a'i endilisi i'i ipa' la'ifipa ai, pigi naep ipe'ipi pese'ep.
Apa' dei' mama? Ae' si'i bouwai ma aga'ipipa basef ifimba endilisifi a'a owa'? Ae' ina egawa, owa'.

Endilisi, anis epes daias sagambaso'ami ukup pehafel dindinip sa'i sombemefa ukup ipe'ipi ma pigaila basef asasifi. Apa' ukup asasipi ina be'ep, owa'. Esis ina satopalopepa ma basef Godi, owa'atin. Sandaiwa'ma ipa' pegame' basef ae'afi. Sanda'am na'amba ma ipa' ukup pehafel dindinipa pigaila esis atis.

I'i esis ukup pehafel dindinipa waf bu'wafi ma sogatopalopepa lifilafi, dao' na'ambai a' andeande'. Apa' i'i sonda'as na'amba nimaguf ifimba atif ae' ape agalomepa, ina andeande', owa'. Apa' sonda'as nimaguf ifimba ikwahipa igafe'ai, dao' andeande'.

Ipa' awasi alipipai ae'ipai, ae' ame' akafimi amamba atom si'i nematawa wame' akafimi ogola awasi. Ame' akafimi amamba ma ipa' efe' efe' etaga ma nogota atamba Krais notaga nondawalap opalef ipe'ilifi nomon.
Ae' ati uwahipipa! Dei' okom malamafe'ma ipa' a'owa'. Ae' ina egawa etopalopepa i'imama? Ea' okom maimailipa a'i dei' epe elomepa i'ipipa anif basef bu'wafi nogohnaep ipe'isi. Apa' owa'atin.
Ipa' pa'i pepe lafela mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani. Dei' a'i ihali'ipa ma anif basef. Ipa' pegawa basef kofagefa ma mu'uli inimba a'a owa? Dei' a'ipipa
si'i basef fagail Baibeli faga'i, atiasi Abraham nola awasi amam biam. Anona, kwanda' maola anen dowafi Hega kogolanai. Apa' anona, waulu'mana endilisi Sera kogolanai.
Nogamana kwanda' maol dowafi nemata'w akwamba Hega kogolanai si'i apa' epes sandaso'ama sogola awasi. Apa' nogamana Sera kogolanai natagama basef lap God naga'iefi.

Nematawa awamba biawa ondola'waifa basef lu'wafi ma lap biafip. Nemata'w akwamba Hega kondola'waifa basef fagataga halafuta Sainai. Awasi ako'usi anaf agof akas sonda' maol dowaf sope lafela anis daias.

Ako'w kondola'waifa halafuta Sainai, tagape anep itap lu'upa Arebiai, ea' ako'w basef waminif atina wambel ambalemba Jerusalem dei' nagape itap apa'i. Dei' main, ako'w kwape kwanda' maol banagambel kwaloma awasi akwa'usi sape lafela banagami si'i esis Juda sagape Jerusalami sagape lafela mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani.
Apa' wambel mamambel ape'imbili Jerusalem nagape heveni. Epes mamahisa sagape wambel ambalembai ina sape lafela mu'uli inimba, owa'atin. Sandatagwah sape wahifis.

Dei' main, Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Nemata'w, ina' nembel bagasi'inai ma owa' negela awasia, ina' awi dei' nindanifal ni'i mehip. Ina' ata' owa' negame' akafimi si'i sola awasi sagame'amia, ina' awi nekwalefa malogol nega ni'i mehip! Nemata'w asa'wi, atiasi kola batawis hiasi kwikila' nemata'w kwagaso' amani kogolasi.”
Dei' ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' awasi Godi pataga si'i basefa lap God naga'iefi na'amba atin si'i Aisak.

Fowa' nogota atamba awani aman nagataga waf afamba amam nematawa sandaso'amafi naso'ana nimanimi awani aman inimba God atona nanda'an nagataga banagami Ambal bu'unai ananinai. Isimba ea' na'amba atin dei' wapani. Esis sagape lafela mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani saso'apa akafimi apa' awasi Godi.

Apa' dei' buk Baibel na'ias na'imama? Na'ias na'i, “Li'amonago nemata'w akwamba agol aka'wi kwanda' maol dowaf kwagape lafela anis daiasi kolomago nogama'w akwa'unai. Awani inimba atiasi ina nefa' hiahawes ahamanai noloma awani nagataga nemata'w kwagape wahifi'wi, owa'atin.”
Ea' dei' apa' Kristen alipipai, ina si'i awasi magataga nemata'w akwamba kwagape lafela anis daiasi, owa'atin. Apa' si'i awasi magataga nemata'w akwamba wahifi'wii.
Krais atona natagwahepa magape epes wahifipai. Isimba atis dei' ipa' dalutu banagepa. Ina ata' pi'i awi ma anis epes sehekelepa pepe lafela mu'uli esis Juda sagailani wapani, owa'i.
Peme', ae' Pol a'ipipa isimba. I'i ipa' piga'i awi ma amom mogatopa'mepa alopa, Krais ina atiasi notopalopepa kwasakwasala, owa'atin endilisi.
A'i i'ipa ipa' amam hipai wapani. Aman ami ni'i awi ma mogatopa'mana alop ananipi, anen nila mu'uli inimba hiani hi'indalan.
I'i ipa' pa'i pila mu'uli inimba ma atiasi God niga'i ipa' epes be'epa hilili'ima, ipa' pandahape' pakwaha Krais pefalana bounai, ea' pelelama waf God nagatopalopapa dowafafi pakwahef.
Apa' owa' atin. Apa' mahapifa Kraisa banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi. Ea' mogawa endilisi mope mohafa anaf God niga'i apa' be'epa hilili'i ma okom ananimi.

Epen ami nepe sisihina Krais Jisas, waf afamba magatopa' alopafi o owa' mogatopa' alopia afamba falafifi atef owa' banagefa. Apa' waf sagahapifa Kraisafi atef fawalapai waf ukup pagapagailasafi. Isimbai atis fasisi endilisi sikila'.
Fowa' ipa' pape panda' waf fasifi pailaf andeande'. Apa' dei' ata' ami nasopama ufia'wa ipa' ma owa' pigaila basef endilisifi wapania? Ami nahondo' ukup ipe'ipi pakwaha basef ifimba?
God ina nanda'epa na'amba, owa'atin. Anen nofalepa pafi'mai anen.
Anom gawaimi maga'i na'amba ma'i, “Anis yis sanda'asa bret tagatefi, isimba atiasi sonda' bret tetef hi'ilata.”

Ae' alomepa ukup atifip mape sisihipama Dembinai. Ea' egawepa ipa' atiasi ina pila anis nomonas daias, owa'. Pigaila okom ae'ami atumi. Ae' ina egawa aman anamba nagalamona ukup ipe'ipi, owa'. Ea' diamanago, anen nanda' waf awafii atiasi nofa' akafimi ma God.

Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, i'i endilisi ae' awalipipa ma basef ifimba pagatopa' alopafiai, dei' maina esis sa'i sogase'e akef? I'i ae' i'ipipa basef ifimbaiai, esis ina si'i sehe', owa'atin. Apa' ae' a'ipipa basef bu'wami ma Krais nagaga' lowag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Ea' esis ukup awep sa'i sese'e akafimi.
Amom amamba magalalamona ukup ipe'ipii, ea' andeande'ma mogatopa'mama alop apamba du'wanip amamipi atop hi'igalap!

Endilisi ipa' sahin owan, God nofalipai ma pegape wahifipa hilili'. Na'amba ipa' ukup pendanda' pi'i, apa' ea' mape hilili' wahifipa, dei' andeande'ma monda' waf alop atopafi. Ukup pendanda' na'amba owa'. Ipa' ukup pindapindaila sahin owan ipe'isi penda' maol naninani pendatopalopa atin.
Dei' main, mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani hiani nape nomona basef ifimba atif fa'i, “Ipa' ukup pipila epes isimba hiasi hi'indalas si'i ukup pagaila ipa' atipa.”
Apa' i'i ipa' migimigah penda' lopa' fitap nepe la'afena ipa' atipa, ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba ipa' hipai pendakolef pesa pewala atin hi'ilipa!
Basef ae' aga'iefi ifimba. Ipa' pihapifa Ambal bu'unai Godi pendafe'. I'i ipa' pilas penda'as na'amba, ina atiasi pila waf nembel apinai, owa'atin.

Apa' mogawa, waf nembel apinai na'i nili'amona Ambal bu'unai Godi, ea' Ambal Godi na'i nili'amona opaf apinai. Amom biam mondopambema mafitap mape. Ea' hiahawes ipa' pa'i pinda'asi ina banagepama penda'as, owa'.
Ipa' i'i pigaila Ambal bu'unai Godi atona ipa' ina ata' pape lafela mu'uli esis Juda sagailani, owa'.
Waf opaf apinai epes hiasi sogawaf ea' fape alihif. Afamba na'amba. So'a waol, waf alogufi, ukup pegehafema waf awafi,

sandagala saganifela god baso'amunai, sanda' aupi ufial ma'akwi, waf negefala anis bousi, ukup papoma esis atis, migimigah, waf kowagalasafi, ukup wandafip, basef wandafifi ma sondawal biafis sogawala wambotagw,

ukup awepa waf kowagalasafi, sanda' spak sohaga sogagaol, saga' gwa'aisii embel banagambeli hiasii ma sanda' awalef awalifi, ea' waf naninani aunai na'ambai. Fowa' a'ipipa dei' a'i i'ipipa wapani. Epes mamahisa sanda' waf afambai, anaf ina sefe' suwis anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin.

Apa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nawalapai waf bu'wafi na'amba. Waf ukup pigapigaila anis daias, dagala, opalef awanilifi, waf nepe nititilisa sonda'mena waf awafii, waf sigati uwahipisafi waf ukup be'ebe'epa anis daias negatopalopas, nenda' hiahawes datima ma naep Godi epesi wapani,
waf sa'umbilifi, faloma waf nomonas sopaisa sugumafi alop andeande'i. Owa' anif basefa mu'uli atitin nepe lu'win negapa'aga waf afamba bu'wafia, owa'atin.
Epes mamahisa Krais Jisasi sandola opalef apimi mail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai maloma waf fafifafi ukup pigahafemafi faloma waf hiafi kowagalasafi.
Ambal bu'unai Godi atona naso'apa ambal namili lapaepa. Ea' dei' apa' mila waf ananifi mondafe'.
Apa' ina monda' du'waniga mefela agof ape'igufi dowadowaf, mi'i basef moloma alipisi ape'isi mondahihianamaefa anef waf, owa'i. Apa' ina kowolapa ma anis epes daias soloma hiahaom asasimi, owa'i.

Sahin owan, ipa' i'i pigati anin epen ipe'ini nenda' anef waf awafi, ipa' anipa pagape banagepama Ambal bu'unai Godi petopalopan pisindi'amonan sa'osa'ombel. Ipa' hipai atona atin solawaipa ma waf ipe'ifi. Na'amba Satan nogwamba ipa' wapani.
Ipa' petopalopa sahin owan ipe'isi ma pegefa' nimanimi asasimi. Penda' waf afambai fefe' fendahama mu'uli Kraisi endilisi.
I'i anin epen okom mondanda' nembaso'am ni'i anin agol lu'wagilini, ma anin agol akan, epen inimba nandambaso'ma nembel ananimbili atembel.
Epes hiasi atona atin ata' sihihi' maol asasini daindai, bo'wen a'a owa'. I'i bo'wena, epen inimba sonehana maol inimba ananini. Ea' anin maol akana negawaloga maol anin daiani.
Amam nematawa hiasi atona atin anaf sofa' nimanimi asasimi daindai.
Epes mamahisa sogolafa basef Godii, esis ukup pendanda' sowaloga hiahawes fasisi asasisi soso'ana du'wanis sondafe'ma epen gawaini nagawalipasi.
Ipa' ina pembaso'ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pi'i God okom magahanai gawa akanai, owa'i. I'i anin epen newa anis maefah aof ananifi, anaf hiahawes isimba atis nitanima nela'as wapani.

I'i epen inimba nenda' maol neloma wafa opaf apinai ananinai, bola waf anamba atona nonda' epen inimba awen nega' higililan. Apa' epen mamahina nenda' maol negaloma waf Ambal bu'unai Godi, atiasi Ambal anamba nowalapai ambal namili ma epen inimba nepe andeande' lifilafi.
Isimba atis dei' apa' ina ala'uta tahapa ma monda' waf fasifi, owa'atin. Monda'as dindinip. I'i bihitagof ape'igufi fonda' maol banagambel, anaf mola'as mofa' gwa'aisi bu'wasi endilisi.
I'i apa' muti ufia'w fasi'uma, monda' waf fasifi ma epes hiasi mondatopalopas. Apa' mondanda'am na'amba atin banagambel esis sahin owan sogahapifa Dembinaii mikila' manda'asa anis daias.
Ipa' piti amef ifimba lu'wafi dei' ahapila pen lagol ae'agili anda'mepafi.

Anom amam dindinapim a'owa' ma ma'i mogatopa'mepa alop ipe'ipi. Dei' maina amom manda'as na'amba? Ma'i mogofa' agof lu'wagufi ma naep epesi. Amom ukup pandanda' na'amba ma'i, “Na'amba anis epes sogawa afa' si'i afa' wagahapifa lawag Kraisi ea' sohafa oga'.”

Ina anis epes saila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani andeande' datima, owa'. Amom magatopa' alop amamipii wapani, ina mailan andeande', owa'. Ma'i motopa' alop ipe'ipi ma mogofa' agof lu'wagufi ma mi'ipa epes hiasi moga'i, “Amom Galesia mofa' ametal inimba mogatopa' alop amamipi.”

Apa' ae' owa'atin. Andaiwa' ma egefela agol ae'agili lu'wagola anis hiahawes daias, owa'atin. Ae' andagala ma egefela agola dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais atona, anen naga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Lawag agamba Kraisi atoga, dei' waf itapafi ea' faga' nomon okom ae'ami, dei' ae' si'i epen nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ma naep epes sagape itapi.
Waf afamba magatopa' alop o owa' mogatopa' alopia, afamba falafifi atef. Apa' God nanda'apa mataga dambaipai, waf afambai atef dao' endilisifi.
Epes mamahisa sogahapila ukup ipimbai sogailapi, ae' a'i opalef asasilifi fendape sa'ombela, God niti uwahipis notopalopas sogoloma epes Israel hiasi Godi.
Basef akutaifi ifimba. Ae' andaiwa' ma anona aman nogase'e anom nimanimi wapani, owa'. Dei' main, amam amamba magahai melet atamba Jisasi tape alop ae'api ea'.
Ipa' alipipai, ae' a'i dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais notopalopepa dowafa pegape andeande'. Dei' okom ananimi mope mondalomago ambagof ipe'igufi. Endilisi.

Ae' Pol okom Godi atona nandandepe ataga aposel Jisas Kraisi ma anda' maol ananini agawalapa basef ananifi. Ae' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' epes Godi dei' pagape Efesusi, ipa' pahapifa Krais Jisas datima pape sisihipa pagalomana.
Ae' a'i God ahamapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaipa pepe opalef awanelef.

Apa' ata' mondanifela Ahamapa God, ahama Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais! Ama Krais atona anen naso'apa hiahaom hiami fasimi atom magape otaga ilifi mogatopalopapa ukupi ambagof ape'isi ma poe fe' ki ape'ini nogape andeande'.
Dei' main, fowa' God ina dei' nanda' itap apa'e, ata' owa'atin, nemaf afamba nosaho'apa ea' mope sisihipama Krais hilili' ma waf awafi kofagefa akapa.
Anen okom maimailapa a'owa'. Isimba atis anen nali' okom mandanda' nosaho'apa nofa'apa nalagapa mataga si'i awasi ananipai. Anen naila okom ananimi atom nanda'asa lagol Jisas Kraisi atogol.

God nanda'as na'amba ma apa' mosa'ma agol ananigili moganifelona ma waf fasifi ananifi nagatopalopapa dowafafi. Waf afamba fawalapa banagami mogogala'i ananimi. Anen natopalopapa dowaf naso'apa nogamana okom ananimi magamagailana a'owa'i, ea' mape sisihipama anen.

Krais atona naga' natagwahepa ma waf awafi natalepa esimbel ananimbeli. Ea' nakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi okom maso'anaf. Anen nanda'as na'amba si'i okom Godi magaila ape'i si'im a'owa' ma waf nagatopalopapa dowafafi.
Waf afamba naso'apaf si'if a'owa'. Naso'apaf faloma gawa hiani naloma gawa mogogawa waf maif bu'wafi a'a awafi.

Okom ananimi atom na'i notopalopapa ea' nihimba'mapa basef ananifi fali' fandambaho' fagape okom ananimi atumi. Basef ifimba fagape na'amba. Anen nali' okom mandanda'ma Krais nogape dembinai ma hiahaom hiami magape ilif itapi hi'igalam epes wapani. Nogota atamba anen atona okom maga'iatai togataga, God noso'ana hiahaom amamba mofe' lagol Kraisi atogol ma anen atona nogape dembinai ma hiahaom amamba hi'igalam.
God nanda' hiahaom amamba hi'alam nagi'ma fowa' dambadamba anen okom mandanda'mam. Ea' nosaho'apa mape sisihipama Krais. Dei' main, anen nandaila okom ananimi si'i fowa' dambadamba okom mandanda'mas.
Apa' Juda atepa mogawa endilisi mape mogohafa Kraisi, God nandandepapa na'amba ma monda' epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Agol agalemba ananigili fasigili a'owa'.

Ea' dei' ipa' wapani, afamba pegame' basef endilisifi ifimba basef bu'wafi Godi, nofa'epa petanimai pahapifa Krais pape sisihipama anen. Nogota atamba ipa' pahapifa Krais, God naso'epa Ambal bu'unai ananinai nosahe'epa. Ambal bu'unai anamba si'i anin ametal God nanda'mepani ma nigihimba'mepa na'amba.

Apa' mogawa endilisi atapipa mopoma anaf nogaso'apa hiahaom bu'wami apa' epes ananipai. Anen noso'apam nemaf afamba notagwahepa nofa'apa mofe' mope mogalomana. God nanda'am na'amba ma apa' monda' epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol, agol agalemba fasigili a'owa'.

Basef doko'ifi endilisifi atif. Isimba atis dei' dondol anda'mepa beten ipa'. Nemaf afamba fagali'i ame' basefa waf ipe'ifi pahapifa Dembinai Jisasa ukup pelele' pagaila amam nematawa hiasi Godi. Ae' anda'as nemaf afamba afi'i afi'i ataga dei', ae' ina akwahipa ma beten, owa'atin. Ae' okom mandanda'mepa andabeten anifela Godepa.

Jisas Krais anen dembinai ape'inai. Ae' andabeten atapiwi nimaguf hiafi ahali' God, dembinai Jisas Kraisi, anen Ahamapa ape'inai mogogala'i banagami magapaunai. Andabeten ahali'ana ma nogase'epa gawa bu'wani ukup ipe'ipi pegegawa basef kofagefa fendawalap alihifa ipa'. Ama pegegawa God andeande'.

Ae' andabeten ahali'ana ma nonda' ukup ipe'ipi pindawisi'ma pegegawa waf bu'wafi, ma hiahaom bu'wami anen nofalepa pape pegehafami. Ma pegegawa ambal namili lagape lifilafi dondoli loloma anamba God nagala'ambemagoma nogogala' a'owa'ma. Amamba God nandondomba ma anaf na'i noso'apa mogaloma epes ananisi si'isi.
Andabeten ahali'ana ma ipa' pegegawa banagami ananimi dondol manda' maola opalef nomon apa' epes magahapifanai. Amamba ea' lu'um a'owa'. Banagami amamba na'amba atin si'i banagami ananimi lu'wami
nanda'ama nasa'ma Jisas nosafel nagakwaha ga' ananini. Banagami amamba atom God nanda'ana nape wa'ol lagol ananigili kwahisigili banagogoma gani heven.

Apa' Krais dei' nape dembinai ilif a'owa' ma dembami agufumi hiami maloma hiahaom banagami hiami. Anen nikila' agof lu'wagufi hi'alagof epes dei' sagape nogota ata'ii, ea' isimba sogape nogota tigi' togatagai wapani.
God nanda' hiahaom hiami mape lafela anen atona. Ea' nanda'ana nape Dambena ilif endilisi ma epes hiasi hi'alas saloma hiahaom hiami hi'alama nagatopalopa esis sios hiasi sagahapifanai hi'alas.
Esis sagahapifanai si'i alop si'ip Kraisi. Anen nape anamba hiagoma nugumafi hiahaom hiami hi'agalami nape nomona esis sagahapifanai hiasi si'isa anen atona endilisi.
Basef ipe'ifi fagape na'amba. Fowa' ipa' panda' waf naninani aunai, nahepa paga'. Dei' main, ipa' ina pame' God, owa'. Pesambalona panda' waf awafi.

Nogota atamba ipa' ata' paila waf awafi atef itapafi ea' paila basefa aman aunai banagonai nugumafi banagami awami mape la'afen mugumafi itapi otagai. Banagami amamba mataga aman anamba aunai dei' nugumafi epes isimba sogosambala Godi.

Fowa' apa' hiapai hi'alapa manda' waf awafi si'i epes isimba sogosambala Godi sanda'afi, ea' maila nomonas opaf apifi ape'ifi atof. Apa' maila nomonas nembel anamba apinai ma ukup ape'imi atom. Isimba atis dei' ata' mape lafela okom wandafunai Godi, si'i anis epes daias itapasi.
Owa', God naga'i owahipigama apa' epes a'owa'i, okom lu'wami mailapa.
Isimba atis dei' nanda'apa mataga namepa. Apa' mape si'i sagaga'i ma waf awafi. Owa' nanda'apa mataga namepa mape sisihipama Krais. Amamba okom lu'unai Godi nagatopalopapa dowafi nofa'epa pitanimai.
God nasa'mapa mape namepa maloma Jisas Krais, mofa' agol lu'wagili mape sisihipama anen, ea' ukup pandanda' papomana heven.

God nanda'apa na'amba ma nogota ata'e dei' tefe' tefe' totaga owagama nihimba'mas okom ananimi mailapa nagatopalopapa dowafi, ma epes hiasi hi'ilas soloma ensel hiami hi'ilam sogogawa okom amamba ananimi lu'um a'owa' mandawalap alihima apa' na'amba. Anen nanda'apa mape sisihipama Krais Jisas.
Dei' main, God natopalopepa dowaf, isimba atis dei' nofa'epa pitanimai pahapifa Krais. Hiahaom amamba ina ipa' atipa panda'am, owa'atin. God atona nase'epam dowaf.
Amamba ina si'i hiahaom ipa' panda' maol pegefa'ami, owa'. Ea' ina anin epen atitin la'ifina negasa'ma agol ananigili atogola hiahaom amamba, owa'atin.
Dei' main, God atona nanda'apa mape. Lagol Krais Jisasi atogol nanda'apa mataga dambaipa ma waf fasifi apa' milaf mogafe'.

Ea' apa' mondogawa isimba andeande'. Lagof amom Judai atogof matopa' alop amamipi. Ea' esis Juda sandafela esis atis sa'i epes sagatopa' alopi. Ea' ipa' fowa' pape pegelelama Godi owa' Judaipaia, sofalepa saga'i, “Owa' pegatopa' alopia.” Basef ifimba fa'i waf alopafi ando' atogini.

Ipa' pendegawa nogota atamba ata' pape pelelama God, ipa' ata' pape ando' laogona Krais, pape ando'ma esis mini'ap Israel epes Godi, ea' pape ando'ma basef God anen nala' lapef nagaloma asisafi. Basef ifimba naga'i endilisi atisa nogatopalopasafi. Ipa' ina anom hiahaom fasimi pape pegehafam anafi, owa'atin. Ea' ipa' owa' pihapifa Goda.
Apa' ipa' fowa' pagape laogona Godi, esimbel Kraisi atembal ma ga' ananini befa'epa dei' bakolasepa pafi'i pape felefele'ma Goda lagol Jisasi atogol.

Dei' main, anen atona kofagonama opaf awanafi, nagakolasa apa' Juda maloma ipa' anep mini'ap fowa' pegelelama Godi, dei' mataga mape epes atifipa. Anen atona nahape' waf afamba fagawala apa' Juda maloma ipa' owa' Judaipaia. Ea' anen atona natopa' waf afamba boufi lopa' fitapafi.

Ga' Kraisi atin nali'amona basefa mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani faloma anif basef du'wanif fagape mu'uli inimbai. Anen nanda'as na'amba nokolasa misi'ah ahamba biafih, apa' Juda maloma ipa' owa' Judaipaia mogataga si'i epen atitin dambaini. Ama mope opalef awanalef fegape atogon felefele'ma God.
Krais naga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai nakolasa misi'ah ahamba biah hataga si'i alop atotop. Ea' ga' ananini natagwaha waf asasifi boufi lopa' fitapafi faga' hi'alaf.

Anen dei' nafi'i na'i basef bu'wafi nawalapef na'i, “Dei' ipa' pape opaf atof paloma Godi epes wapani. Anen na'ipipa basef ifimba fowa' pape laogona God pelelamana, paloma apa' Juda ananipai magape felefele'ma anini wapani.
Lagol Kraisi atogol apa' mini'ap biafip mape ufia'w alihi'wa mogafe'ma Ahamapa Goda Ambal bu'unai ananinai atona.
Ea' ipa' dei' ina ata' pape si'i laugunisi dalaisi itap akasi, owa'atin. Ipa' paloma esis amam nematawa mini'ap Godi, ea' wambota ananipai.

Ipa' pape si'i ipat Godi nape nagala'ata atapitai. Anen nanda'ata tatoma ilifa afa' aposel waloma amom profet nawafa si'i olalefa ipat atamba. Apa' Krais Jisas anen atona si'i olaf fagali'i banagafi endilisi ma ipat atamba.
Aolagaitama tatoma sisihita ma Krais, ea' banagota andeande' tape. Dei' God ata' nanda' ipat atamba nala'ata atin totaga lu'uta ma togape hilili'ma Dembinai atona.

Ipa' wapani pagape sisihipama Kraisi, dei' God nape nakolasepa atogon atapina paloma anis Kristen alipisi hiasi. Ea' nanda'epa pataga si'i ipat endilisi God nagapautai ma Ambal bu'unai ananinai atona.
Krais nakolasa mini'ap biafip Juda saloma esis owa' Judaisia sataga mini'ap atifip. Isimba atis dei' ae' Pol, Krais Jisas nanda'e anda' kalabusa egatopalopa ipa' epes fowa' pegelelama Godi.
Endilisi atis, apa' hiapai magape itapi natopalopapa dowaf. Amamba anen nase'e ma igimafiam enda' maol ewalapama egawalipipa.
Maol inimba anen nagasi'iani nagape na'amba. Basef ananifi bu'wafi fowa' ata' fandambaho', apa' dei' God nawalapamef alihif anda'ef bandef fail pas isi'i.
Ama i'i pigatalifa basef ifi'ima, atiasi pegawa okom ae'ami ma basef hiafi Kraisi fali' fape fandambahi'i.
Fowa' lifilafi God ina nawalapef alihifa anis epes, owa'. Apa' dei' Ambal bu'unai ananinai nawalapef alihifa afa' aposel waloma amom profet ananifai.

Basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi fagape na'amba. Esis hiasi owa' Judaisia hi'alas fowa' sogololama Godi saloma ipa' apataga atifipa paloma apa' Israel. Ea' ipa' hipai hi'alepa paloma apa' Juda mofa' hiahaom fasimi hiami God naga'i endilisi atis nogaso'apami ma lagol Krais Jisasi.
God nanda'e ape anda' maol agawalapa basef ifimba bu'wafi. Anen okom maimaili natopalope dowaf nowa' banagae, isimba atis dei' ape anda' maol inimba.

Endilisi atis ae' ape falafuwai agagi' endilisi ma amam nematawa hiasi Godi hi'alas. Owa' anen okom maimaili natopalope dowafa anda' maol awalipa esis sogololama Godi basef fasifi ma Krais. Basef ifimba faloma waf afamba bo'wes a'owa' sikila' gawa epes hiasi hi'alan, ea' ina la'ifisa sogogawa isimba kofagesa, owa'.

Ea' God natopalopas dowaf nihimba'masa okom ananimi maloma waf hiafi ananifi epes hiasi hi'alas. Okom amamba maloma waf afamba ananifi hiafi fowa' dambadamba sape sandambaho' safi'i sataga dei'. Apa' dei' nanda' hiahawes hiasi hi'alas sataga sagapani nase'e maol inimba agawalapa isimba sape sandambahi'i alihis.

Fowa' God ata' nambaho'was, apa' dei' na'i esis Kristen sios sagahapifanai sihimba'mamas amom dembami agufumi maloma hiahaom banagami hiami magape heveni mogawa gawa Godi. Gawa inimba hiani ananini naninani lu'win sa'win hi'alan.
Anen nanda'an na'amba atin si'i okom ananimi atom magape atapim dondoli maga'iama lagol dembinai ape'inai Krais Jisasi atogol.
Apa' mape sisihipama anen mahapifana. Isimba atis apa' ina ombal mahapa ma mogafe'ma God, owa'. Apa' ukup banagep endilisi ea' dei' mafe' felefele'ma anen.

Ea' dei' a'ipipa a'i, akafimi amamba dei' efa'ama egatopalapepa ami, na'amba piti amamba ukup iwanip pendahagas, owa'i. Pepe banagepa si'i ipa' dembipai. Dei' main, akafimi amamba ame'ama egatopalopepa.
Ae' nomonas sandanda'ma Krais nakolas apa' Juda maloma ipa' magataga atifipa, isimba atis dei' indiwa nembawa etawa andabeten anifela Ahame.
Apa' hiapai hi'alapa magape itapi maloma sagape ilifi wapani, apa' amam nematawa wambotagw hiagwi hi'alagw mofa' agof ape'igufi ma anen atona.
Ae' andabeten ahali'ana na'amba. A'i God notopalopepa ma banagami mogogala'i ananimi lu'wami a'owa'. A'i banagami ananimi atom mowa' banagaepa opalef ipe'ilifi nomona Ambal bu'unai ananinai atona.

A'i hapif ipe'ini atin Krais nope ipe'ilifi nomon atapina. Ea' andabeten ahali' Goda waf ukup pagapagailasafi fegape si'ifa ipa' ma fegewa' banagaepa pilutu banagepa pigaila waf afamba si'i nombalef lawag gahapila itap gogotawa banagoga.

A'i ipa' pefa' banagami peloma amam nematawa Godi hiasi pegegawa okom Kraisi naganagailipai, anamba lu'unai endilisi nafe' laona a'owa' nafe' wa'ol wa'ol nalota gani ilif a'owa' ea' nowala nafe' awin endilisi a'owa' nafe' atin.

Ea' andabeten ahali' God ambifa basef akutaifi na'amba. A'i ipa' pegawa okom anamba Kraisi endilisi, anamba nikila' gawa epes hiasi hi'alas. A'i ipa' pegawa okom anamba Kraisi ma pegape si'ipa a'owa' ma waf bu'wafi God okom maga'iefi hiafi hi'igalaf.

God anen banagonai. Banagami amamba ananimi dei' manda' maol opalef ape'ilifi nomoni, amamba banagem endilisi. Banagami amamba atom anen la'ifinai ma nonda' hiahaom hiami migikila' basef hiafi mandabeten magahali'anafi hi'alef faloma ukup apa' hiapai hi'alapa wapani.
Isimba atis dei' apa' Kristen sios magahapifanai munifela God mondasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagola Krais Jisas lifilafi mofe' atin anaf owagama gani. Endilisi.

Basef ifi'i fagali'i endilisifi atif. Ea' dei' a'i efela ukup ipe'ipi dindinipa poe fe' ipe'ini negafe' dondo'ma waf usi'ifi okom Godi maga'iefi nofalapa ma mogailafi. Ae' anda' kalabusa maol inimba atin Dembinaii dei' a'ipipa na'amba afela nomonas ipe'isi.

Ipa' pendape lafel endilisi ma epes hiasi penda'as sa'ombemas. Esis sonda'mepa waf awafii, pindanindifa ukup ipe'ipi banagep pepe pititilis. Ipa' ina ukup pesafel awep, owa'i. Ukup pindapindaila sahin owan ipe'isi petopalopas pefa' nimanimi pelomas.
Ambal bu'unai Godi nakolasepa mape opalef atelef. Ea' dei' penda' maol banagambela pigahapila waf afambai sisihifa waf ukup awanipafi atef. Waf afamba opalef atifilifafi fandawalap fagape na'amba.
Alop atifip, Ambal bu'unai Godi atifina. Amamba na'amba atin si'i hiahawes atifis, God nali' nofalepa pape pegehafasi.
Dembinai atotona, hapif atifin, sa'of atifin.
God ahamapa apa' hiapai anen atotona nape dembinai ma apa' magahapifanai hiapai hi'alapa. Anen nagape anamba hiagoma hi'agalagini, ea' nape nomona apa' hiapai hi'alapa.
Apa' hiapai atona atin hi'alapa mofa' anom hiahaom fasimi ea', dondo'ma ikwaf Krais nawalogaf nagaso'apaf ea'i.
Si'i Buk Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, “Nemaf afamba anen nagafe' gani ilif, nofa' epes hiasi sanda' kalabusi a' nafe' nalota ilif. Ea' naso'asa hiahaom fasimi esis.”
Basef faga'i, “Nagalota ilif,” kofagefa fa'i main? Ifimba fa'i anen nagali' nafi'i nowala gani awin endilisi a'owa' itap apa'e.
Ea' aman anamba atona nogowala itap awin endilisii dei' notambel nalota ilif wapani nafe' gani ilif a'owa' nikila' otaga ma nonda' hiahaom hiami hi'igalam si'im kwaifa anen atona.

Anen atona ea' naso'apa presen hiahaom fasimi na'amba. Anom amam nandandepama monda' maol aposel, a' anom nandandepama monda' maol profet. Ea' anom nandandepama monda' maola mofe' moga'ipasa basef bu'wafi Kraisi epes hiasi. Ea' anom naso'ama gawa mogape pastai tisa mugumafi esis Kristen mowalipasa basef bu'wafi figasindi'amonas andeande'.

Krais naso'apa hiahaom amamba fasimi ma monda' apa' amam nematawa Godi mondandombola mogape la'ifipama monda' maol bu'wani ananini. Apa' amam nematawa Godi si'i alop Kraisi, ma mondowa' banagama atin mogape.

Ea' mope mefe' mefe' ma anaf apa' hiapai magahapifanai mogataga opalef atelef endilisi ma hapif ape'ini noloma gawa atifina anen Nogamana Godi. Apa' magataga epes banagepa endilisi magahapifanai si'i epes dambes ea'i, motaga na'amba atin si'i ikwafa waf bu'wafi Kraisi atef.

I'i apa' mogataga na'amba, apa' ina ata' mope mondati si'i awasi gawa akasi wapani, owa'. I'i epes isimba sogogawa a'owa'i sanda' kikipai ma waf baso'aifii si'ipapa basef hiafi fafifafi, amambai ina monda' ukup ape'ipi bol atin pepe si'i naoh gwagakoto'ma kanu. Amamba ina mogoto'mapa monda'apa si'i fufin nufapusapa mafe' magafi'i, owa'atin.

Apa' ukup banagep, ea' mi'i basef endilisifi atifa waf ukup pigapigailasafi. Apa' mi'i basef endilisifi na'amba ma mila waf Kraisi bu'wafi hi'igalaf. Ea' motaga banagepa migikila' waf mali' magailafi. Apa' monda'as na'amba mefe' motaga dondo'ma ikwafa waf Kraisi, anen balagonama apa'.

Anen atona dembinai ma apa' Kristen hiapai. Ea' apa' Kristen hiapai si'i alop wa'awa'ap pagape atifip sisihipa pondatopalopa atin si'i gigisilimb begewa' banaga so'matagw hiagwi lu'ugw sa'ogw hi'agalagw. I'i alop wa'awa'ap hiapi hi'ilap ponda' maol pondahama ikwaf anen naga'iefi, alop apamba si'ip pandatopalopa atin pape banagep pikila' fowa' pagape. Alop apamba pataga banagep atina ukup pandaima atin.

Dei' a'i i'ipipa anif basef. Ipa' pape sisihipama Dembinai dei' a'ipipa dindinipa agol ananigili. Ipa' ina ata' pila waf afamba sogololama Godi sagailafi, owa'i. Hapaifi. Epes isimba ukup asasipi pandapoma waf falafifi atef.
Gawa ma ukup asasipi si'i akot atona. Esis sololama gawa fasini, sanda' du'waniga, opalef asasimi maso'as. Isimba atis dei' sape ando' laogona ambal namili Godi.

Esis ina ata' ambagof awagofa waf afamba awafi asasifi, a' owa'atin. Safe' sawis endilisi ma waf awafi fafifafi hiafi faloma waf awafi so'a waulafi ma sagaila waf alugufi hiafi hi'agalaf. Saila waf afambai atapisa ukup pegehafel endilisi ma sonda' waf afamba awafi wapani.
Apa' ipa' ina pelafa waf afambai ma Krais, owa'atin endilisi.
Ae' egawa endilisi ipa' pegawa basef Kraisi ea'. Ipa' pagape sisihipama anini, amom mawalipipa ea' ma basef ifimba endilisifi Jisas nigihimba'mapafi.

Fowa' ipa' pelafa basef ifimba na'amba. Dei' li'amonago opaf anamba apinai ma waf awafi ipe'ifi. Opaf anamba kofagonama waf baso'afi kowagalasafii, ea' waf afambai dei' fape fahambombagapa. Dei' ea' li'amonago opaf anamba apinai.
Ea' ukup ipe'ipi petaga dambaip pendaho'of
pefa' opaf dambaifi. God nanda' opaf anamba dambainai, nataga si'i anen atona ma waf bu'wafi endilisifi usi'if hilili' a'owa'i.
Ea' ipa' hipai hi'ilipa pendakwaha waf baso'afi ma piga'i basef endilisifi atifa epes hiasi. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa apa' hiapai hi'alapa mape alop wa'awa'ap ea' mataga alop atifip.
I'i opalef ipe'ilifi numbutilif fepe atapilif, ipa' a' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba ipa' penda' waf awafi opalef numbutilif atapilif pefe' awin a' newala neso'. Na'ambai owa'i.
Na'amba piwisi' utama Satan.
Epes mamahisa sanda' wal atini, esis ina ata' sonda' wal wapani, owa'i. Esis dei' sondanda' maola lagof asasigufi ma atiasi sotagama hiahawesa sogaso'asas epes isimba hiahawes akasi.

Basef awafi ina fetaga malogof ipe'igufi, owa'i. Basef bu'wafi atif fendataga ma fegewa' banaga epes isimba owa' banagesia, dindi'i dondo'ma waf maif bu'wafi esis owa' banagesa sogailafia. Penda'as na'amba ma pegatopalopa epes isimba sogame' basef ipe'ifii.

Ipa' ina penda' anef waf awafi ma penda' Ambal bu'unai Godi nimanina, owa'i. Anen anol ametal Godi ma God nandandepepa ea' ma pagape ananipai atipa si'ipa ma anef nemaf notagwahipa ma waf awafi nofa'epa pitanimai pegape andeande'.
Ipa' pendakwaha waf hiafi awafi opalef awalifi migimigah, ukup numbutipi gigala basef findiwaifi awafi. Waf anamba aunai hianai nagahambombaga epesi.

Ipa' pendanda' waf sa'umbilifi ma esis alipisi pendatopalopas ea' piti uwahipis. Ipa' pendakwahomasa waf awafi esis sanda'mepafi ukup pese'epaf, si'i God nagakwahomepa waf awafi ipe'ifi ma agol Kraisi.
Ea' ipa' pindaila waf God nanda'afi. Anen okom maimailipa pape si'i awasi ananisi.

Ipa' pendafe' waf afamba ukup pagapagailasafi si'i Krais okom magaila apa', ma nalamona ambal ananili nagatopalopapa. Anen naso'ana alop ananipi God naga' nondolalimana si'i ofa bu'wani alogw fasigwi usihigwi gwaga'ani.

Apa' waf afamba hiahaof so'a waulafi, a waf alugufi kowagalasafi awafi, ipa' ina penda'af, owa'i. Basefa waf afamba ina fetaga kwasakwasala la'afena ipa', owa'i. Dei' main, ina' andeande'ma apa' amam nematawa Godi monda' waf afambai, owa'i.
Ipa' ina penda' basef awafi alugufi a basef putuputa'ifi a penda' basef asalufi awafi, owa'i. Waf afambai ina andeande', owa'atin. Andeande'ma ipa' piganifela God.

Ipa' pegawa ea' ma epes mamahisa sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafii, a epes mamahisa ukup awamiisii kowagalama hiahaom anis daiasii, a epes isimba kowagalasa hiahawes daiasii si'i sagaila god baso'amunai. Epes isimbai ina atiasi sifi'i suwis anamba God naloma Krais magala'ambemagoma, owa'atin.

Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba peme' basef anis epesi atif solalamona ukup ipe'ipi pefe'ma waf afambai awafi. Dei' main, waf afamba na'ambaifi, God okom numbutinama epes isimba sanda'afi sogosambala basef ananifii.
Isimba atis dei' ina penda' waf afamba pendao'oma pelomas, owa'. Hapaifi.
Dei' main, fowa' ipa' ata' pagape waf awafi si'i owamb. Apa' dei' pape sisihipama Dembinai, isimba atis dei' nahaponepa papoma mogogala'i. Ipa' pendafe' si'i epes sogape alip haugumai.
Epes sagafe' alip haugumaii sawalapai waf fasifi usi'ifi, endilisifi hiafi hi'alaf.
Ea' ipa' pendondomaf pegawa waf maif Dembinai okom maga'iefi.

Ipa' ina peloma epes isimba sanda' waf awafi si'i owambi pendao'oma atogon atin, owa'i. Waf afambai wafifi atef, ina fegela gwa'aisi bu'wasi, owa'atin. Ipa' pindihimba'ma epes isimba hiasi waf afambai awafi.
Dei' main, ae' ina ewalapa basefa waf anamba aunai epes isimba sandambaho' sanda'ami, owa'. Ae' ambal aola iga'iaf atin dowaf wapani.
Apa' waf mamahefa nagwahis ileliwa mogala' magawalapafi, kofagefa fataga fape fandawalap.

Dei' main, hiahaom mamahoma mataga alihim mandawalapi, amamba mataga mape si'i mogogala'i. Isimba atis dei' anif basef fapan faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' epes paga'ihi dei' safel dasa'ma mehip pekwaha koh! Ipa' pesafel wandelef ea' Krais nese'epa mogogala'i mihihima ipa'.”
Ipa' pape mogogala'i ea'. Ea' ipa' pindundumafuma andeande'ma fe' ipe'ini. Ipa' ina pefe' si'i epes isimba gawa akasi, owa'i. Ipa' pendafe' si'i epes isimba gawaisi.
Dei' ipa' nogota ata' tapomepa ma penda' waf Godi. Ea' pendanda'af atapif lifilafi nogota ata'e. Dei' main, nimaguf ifi'i sanda' waf awafi atifafi.
Ea' ipa' dei' ina pepe si'i epes gawa akasi ukup pese'epa, owa'i. Pendegawa andeande'ma okom Dembinaii.
Ea' ipa' ina pea' embel banagimbeli pehaga pegaol, owa'i. Waf afambai fegahambombaga ipe'i. Ipa' pinda'i aho'ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nondape si'inama opalef ipe'ilifi.

Ea' pinda'i basef bu'wafi pinda'imef atin pendaloma esis alipisi ma penda' awalef bu'walefi fagape buk sami feloma awalef lotuwilifi feloma awalef fegewa' banaga ambagofa ukup epesi. Ipa' penda' awalef pesa'ma agol Dembinai banagambel malogufi ukup ipe'isi.
Dondol pendanifela ahamapa Goda hiahaom hiami ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi atogol.
Ipa' pindaila okom Kraisi ea' pendafe' lafela esis alipisi ipe'isi atapipa.
Ipa' nematawa pindaila ukupa basef amom wauhupipai si'i pagaila okom Dembinaii.
Dei' main, aman anen nape balaga nagali'ma ako'wi, si'i Krais nagape balaga nagali'ma sios amam nematawa Godi. Ea' esis hiasi si'i alop si'ip ananipi. Epes isimba anen atona nofa'as sotanimai.
Epes isimba sios safe' lafela Krais, ea' na'amba atin ipa' nematawa wapani, dondol pendape lafela amom wauhupipa ipe'imi.
Ipa' amam wapani, ukup pindapindaila wauhiamepa ipe'iwai, si'i Krais okom magamagaila sios amam nematawa Godi, naga' nalamona ambal ananili nagaho'ofas.
Anen nanda'as na'amba sogataga epes Godi atis be'es hilili' si'i nasa'opas embel sagataga bo'wesa basef ananifi.
Ama nonda'as sogataga bo'wes endilisi sogape ananisi si'isa alogw hiahaom awami akas. Ea' sope hilili' andeande', hiahaom awami hiahaom akas.

Dei' na'amba atina ipa' amam ukup pindapindaila awo wauhiamepa si'i ukup pagaila alop ipe'ipi atop. Aman ami okom magaila waulu'mana anani'wii, anen okom maila anen wapani. Dei' main, esis sataga atifis.

Apa' hiapai mogawa ina anona aman atotona nandaiwa'ma alop si'ip ananipi nahap nalamonap, owa'atin. Amam amamba hiami manda' gwa'aisi malagap mumafiap andeande', si'i Krais nugumafi sios amam nematawa Godi.
Dei' main, apa' epes wa'awa'apa alop ananipi.

Basef ifi'i fowa' fape fandambahi'i, lu'wafi nomonas hiesifi. Dei' fataga alihif si'i Buk Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Aman nokwaha mamasana ananisi nefe' nope atapina nogaloma waulu'mana anani'wi, esis bias sataga alop atifip.” Ae' okom mandanda' ma'i basef ifimba faga'i Krais atona naloma sios amam nematawa Godi.

Apa' basef ifimba kofagefa fa'ias na'amba wapani ma ipa' epes atona atin na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' amam hipai hi'ilepa ukup pindapindaila wauhiamepa ipe'iwai si'i ukup pagapagaila ipa' atipa.” Ea' ipa' nematawa hipai wapani pendasa'ma agofa wauhupipa ipe'imi pinifelom pindaila basef amamifi.
Ipa' awasi, ipa' pindaila basef mamasepa ipe'isii si'i pagaila basef Dembinaii. Waf afambai usi'if andeande'.
Dei' main, anif basefa mu'uli nape nagali'i Godi basef endilisifi atif fagapaini faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' pindaila nomonas mamasepa ipe'isi ea' pesa'ma agofas.”
Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba ma esis sagaila nomonas mamasasi, “Ma ipa' pegape andeande' nogota laota itap apa'e.”
Ea' ipa' ahapas ina pehambombaga ukup awasi ipe'isi iwanip owa'i. Ipa' pindumafias andeande' piwalipasa basef Dembinaii penandonamasef pisindi'amonas.

Ipa' agof akipai panda' maol dowaf pagape lafela agufisii, ipa' peme' basefas pefe' lafelas ombal mehepamas. Ipa' penda' maol inimba pila basef asasifi andeande'ma ukup atifip si'i pagaila basef Kraisi.

Ipa' ina penda'asa naep asasipi dowadowafa pegambema ukup asasipi atip, owa'atin. Pendanda' maol inimba si'i panda' maol pagape lafela Kraisi. Penda'as na'amba atin si'i pagaila okom Godi ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi.
Ipa' ukup pehafel endilisi pendanda' maol inimba andeande'. Ina panda' maola epes atis, owa'. Ipa' panda' maola Dembinai atona.

Dei' main, ipa' pegawa, i'i epen ami nenda' maol andeande', anaf Dembinai notalin noso'an hiahawes bu'wasi. Ea' nonda'as na'amba atina isimba agof akasi sanda' maol dowafi soloma isimba sanda' maol sogofa' otambai.

Ipa' agufipai pigimafi isimba agof akasi sanda'mepa maol dowafi, ipa' penda'as na'amba atina esis si'i panda'asa Dembinai atona. Ipa' pendkwahowa waf afamba sagaumbalisafi. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa Dembinai nagape heveni anen Dembinai ipe'inai, asasinai wapani. Anen ina nagawaloga agofa epesi ma naep ananipi, owa'atin. Anen nawaloga hiasi agufisi agof akasi hi'alasa ikwaf usi'ifi atef.
Dei' a'i isopama basef na'amba. Ipa' pagape sisihipama Dambinaii, pendape banagepama anen atona ma banagami lagola pipitagol atogol ananigili.
Ipa' pendala luwaguf hiami manda' wandafami God nagase'epami, ma pilutu banagepama pigali'amona waf awafi baso'afi Satani.

Dei' main? Apa' ina manda' wandaf maloma epes, owa'atin. Apa' manda' wandaf mapa' maloma ambagof gambefah awami mape magali'i ea' maloma amom agufumi awami a' amom ensel banagami awami maloma banagami hiami awami hi'alam mugumafi epes sanda' waf awafii itap apa'ii. Apa' mapa' maloma ambagof awami hiami magape la'afena otagai itapi.

Isimba atis dei' pendawisa luwaguf amamba banagami sanda' wandafami hiami God nagase'epami hi'indalepa. Ama nemaf afamba awefa, ipa' la'ifipama pigalutu banagepa ma pikila' gwamba anamba hianai pegatofana. Ama pikila' waf awafi hi'igalafa pigalutu banagepa atapipa.

Ipa' pilutu pendawisa luwaguf amamba na'amba. Ipa' pindahapila basef endilisifi usi'ifi si'i anota let ipa' pegewaho'atai. Ea' penda' waf fasifi usi'if hilili'i fepe alihif si'i sagala siaot banagonai sanda' wandafanai kapa nigili'ama mafatagw ipe'igwi.

Ea' penda' anef waf bu'wafi na'amba. Pendandombola pegewalapa basef bu'wafi Godi na'i epes sope ukup atifip sogalomana. Ipa' pefa' waf afamba banagafi pindalutu banagepa si'i esis sala su sagalutu banages.

Ipa' pendanda' waf afamba si'i hiahaom amamba sanda' wandafami ea' piwatani anef waf wapani. Pihapifa Krais tatala'ipa si'i pefa' walitap bandagigil panda' wandaf. Walitap anamba banagonai ma nogahagasa wambawa hikalimi hiami hi'igalam magafi'i aman anamba aunai. Wambawa amamba gwamba awani hiani.

God nofa'ai ipa' pigatanimai. Amamba ipa' ukup pendanda'mam pefa'am si'i pegowalo' hagw kapaigwi banagagwi balagah ipe'igahi. Ea' pindahapila bainat hikalinai Ambal bu'unai Godi nagasi'ipanai, anamba basef Godi atif.

Ea' lifilafi pendefa' banagami Ambal bu'unai anambai ma penda' beten naninani hiani pegahali' God. Ipa' solawaipa pendabeten pindumafuma datima. Ina pepoma noma'w, owa'. Pendabeten atapipa ma God notopalopa esis amam nematawa ananisi hiasi hi'igalas.

Ea' pendabetena ae' wapani ma nemaf mamahefa iga'ipasa basef God notopalopa malogol ae'agili ma basef egawalipasafi. Ama etalogofa ombal mogahe egawalipasa basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi fowa' fape fandambahi'i.

Ae' awalapa basef ifimba, dei' isimba atis mowa' lagof ae'agufi sen ape anda' kalabus. Maol ae'ani inimba. Ae' efa' malagol Kraisi ma egawalapa basef ifimba ananifi ma epes hiasi. Ea' pendabetena Goda ae' egatalogofa ombala banagewe igawalipasef si'i okom Kraisi maga'i.
Aman anamba Tikikus anen alipunai endilisi ape'inai, apa' ukup paga'ianai. Anen nape sisihinama Dembinai nanda' maol ananini datima. Anen atiasi nofo'o nowalapa basef ni'ipipa ae' dei' ape a'imama.
Ae' a'i esapa'ana nefe'mago ipa' ma atiasi pegegawa afa' wagape na'aii wape wa'imama ma nogowa' banagaepa.
Ae' a'i God ahamapa naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais monda'ago opalef ipa' alipipai hipai fepe atogon peloma God. Ea' a'i amom mese'epago waf afamba ukup pagapagailasafi feloma hapif bu'wani wapani.

Ea' a'i God notopalopepago dowaf nowa' banaga epes isimba mamahisa ukup pagapagaila Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai atapis sagapani. Waf epes isimba ukup pagailanafi afamba fagape atapifi, owa' hi'igalafia. Ea' ma'uf.

Ae' Pol aloma Timoti afa' biafa Krais Jisasi atofa wanda' maol ananinii. Wanda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' amam nematawa Godi pagape Filipaii. Basef ifimba fafe'ma ipa' pape sisihipa pagaloma Jisasi paloma agufumi ipe'imi maloma amom magatopalopami wapani.
Afa' biafa wa'i God Ahamapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaepa monda' opalef ipe'ilifi fepe awanelef.
Nemaf mamahefa ae' okom mandanda' ma ipa', anifela God ae'anai ma ipa'.
Ae' sonahe ma nemaf mamahefa andabetena ipa' hipai.
Dei' main, ipa' panda' waf bu'wafi patopalope awalipasa basef bu'wafi Godi. Dambadamba ipa' pame' basef ifimba bu'wafi pahapilif pandala'ata atapipa palome pafi'i pafi'i pataga dei'.
Ea' ae' egawa endilisi, God nagafela maol bu'wani nomon opalef ipe'ilifii, atiasi nonda'an nefe' nefe' nimbifan afamba Krais Jisas nogotanimai.

Ae' ahapila ipa' okom ae'ami, egawa God notopalopepa dei' anaf wapani na'amba atin. Isimba andeande'. Dei' main, apa' mandala'atanima atina maol ananini. Nemaf afa'e dei' agape kalabus a'a nimaguf fafimba ali' agawalapa basef ifimba bu'wafi epes hiasi atopalopasa sogogawa basef ifimba endilisifi atif, nimaguf ifimba hiafi God natopalopapa dowaf, nowa' banagapa.
Ae' a'ias endilisi ma naep Godi. Anen nogawa okom uwahipimi Krais Jisasi masa'ma ae' ea' okom mohafel endilisi maimailipa ma igati ipa' hipai.
Ae' andabetena ipa' a'i ipa' ukup pila God pindaima atin peloma sahin owan hiasi ma waf afamba fegataga lu'ufa ipa' feloma gawa hiani neloma nomonas bu'wasi pegegawa basef Godi andeande'.
Andabetena atiasi pewaloga waf hiafi andeande' pegegawa waf mamahefa bu'wafi a'a awafi. Ama nemaf Krais nogafi'afii pegape be'epa hilili' kofagema akepa ma naep Godi.
Ae' andabetena waf usi'ifi Jisas Krais nagawalapafi atiasi fepe si'ifa ipa', fegaso'ana agol lu'wagili Goda epes hiasi sigati banagami mogogala'i ananimi.
Alipipai, dei' a'i ipa' pendegawa hiahawes isi'i sagatagama ae'i ma anda' kalabus, ina sasopama basef bu'wafi Godi, owa'atin. Isimba sanda'am mafe' lu'um lu'um a'owa', ma hiasi sogame'am.
Ea' soldia amamba Romumi misi'ah hiahi mugumafi ipat dembinai gavmani maloma anis epes sagape na'ai esis wapani sogawe anda' kalabusa agol Kraisi.

Esis sahin owan hiasi ukup papoma ae' anda' kalabus. Ea' opalef asasilifi banagalefa sagape sisihisa Dembinai, sakwaho ombal magahas dei' salutu banages atapis sikila' fowa' sape sagawalapa basef Godi.

Endilisi, anis daias kowalasa ae' egefa' agol aposel sondopambema sa'i sofa' agof lu'wagufi sogawalapa basef Kraisi. Apa' isimba sagalutu banagasi sa'i sonda' waf bu'wafi sotopalope ma sogawalapa basef bu'wafi.
Isimba sogawa ae' ape na'a ma egewa' banaga basef bu'wafi Godi. Ea' esis ukup paipaili sawalapa basef bu'wafi.

Apa' epes isimba kowagalasa ae'i dei' sawalapa basef Kraisi. Esis ina ukup pehafel endilisi ma sanda' maol sogasa'ma agol Kraisi, owa'atin. Esis sanda'am na'amba ma sogasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof. Sa'i sowatani anom nimanimi wapani ma ae' epe atapiwi enda' kalabus.

Owa' diago. I'i esis ukup pipila waf endilisifi ma sogawalipasa basef Kraisi a'a i'i anis ukup pipila waf owa' endilisifi ma sogawalipasef, andagalamas atin. Dei' main, sawalapa basef Kraisi atif. Ea' atiasi sonehe wapani ma isimba. Ipa' pandabetena ae' ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi Jisas Kraisi natopalope. Isimba atis dei' egawa atiasi ekwaha kalabus.

Ae' okom mandanda' egawa endilisi atiasi ae' ina ambal aola egakwaha basef Godi, owa'. Dei' wapani ae' okom banagema egawalipasa basef ananifi si'i fowa' anda'as. I'i epe namowe a'a egaga', ae' okom ma'i hiahaom anda'am alop ae'apii atiasi mosa'ma agol Kraisi lu'wagol.
Kofagema ma agape namowe na'amba. Epe namowe ma Krais atona. Apa' i'i egaga', epe andeande' elomana efa' hiahawes God nese'e poe bu'wani ikila' dei' agape.
I'i ata' egape namowe atapiwi itap apa'ema, bola enda' maol bu'wani Godi. Apa' ae' ata' ila ufia'w mamaho'wa? Ae' ina egawa'w.
Ae' okom biafima isimba. Ae' okom ma'i efe' epe eloma Krais. Na'ambai andeande' a'owa' ikila' poe itapani.
Apa' i'i ae' ata' epe itap apa'e, ae' la'ifiwi ma egatopalopepa. Na'ambai andeande' a'owa' ma ipa'.
Ae' egawa isimba endilisi. Ea' egawa atiasi ata' epe atapiwi enda' maol elomepa etopalopepa ma pendagala pihapifa Krais pigikila' fowa' pali' pagape.
Ama nemaf afamba efo'o etaga epe egalomepa, ipa' pendagala ma Krais Jisas a'owa'.

Dei' fe' ipe'ini nefe' usi'in nindaila basef bu'wafi Kraisi. I'i ae' egafe'mago ipe'ma, a'a i'i egame' basef atifa ipa' ma, ea' hapaimi. A'i ata' egawa ipa' palutu banagepa opaf atotof pendatopalopa atina pegasa'ma esisa sogahapifa basef ifimba bu'wafi
ma ipa' ina ombal mehepa ma bousi ipe'isi, owa'. Amamba mihimba'mas na'amba. Atiasi esis higililas hi'igalasi, apa' ipa' owa'. Atiasi God nofa'epa pitanimai pegape andeande'i.
Dei' main, God nase'epa waf fasifi ma penda' maol Kraisi. Anen ina nase'epa waf pagahapifanafi atef, owa'. Anen nase'epa waf afamba pegefa' akafimi wapani ma agol ananigili.

Fowa' ame' akafimi lu'wami ma agol Kraisi alutu banagewe si'i anda' wandaf. Amamba ipa' patolom pegawam. Ea' dei' pame' ae' ata' anda'am atin atapiwi. Ipa' pepe pendao'oma pelome ma maol Kraisi si'i wandaf afamba.

Ipa' pefa' banagami Kraisi a'a owa'? Ea' pegawa Krais okom maimailipa nanda' opalef ipe'ilifi fape awanelef a'a owa'? Ipa' pape ukup atifip paloma Ambal bu'unai Godi a'a owa'? Ea' ukup pandaima pandatopalopa atin a'a owa'? Endilisi, waf afambai fapomepa na'amba.
I'i na'ambaiai, dao' penda' dagala ae'ani nendataga lu'win endilisi ma waf na'ambaifi. Pepe opalef atifilif ukup atifip, pipila God noloma sahin owan ea' pendape opalef atelef endilisi.
Ipa' ina ukup pepoma ipa' atipa penda' maola anis epes sagasa'ma agof ipe'igufi lu'wagof, owa'i. Ipa' pendafe' lafela anis daias ea' ina pi'i pepe ilifa esis, owa'.
Ipa' ina ukup pepoma ipa' atipa, owa'. Ukup pindapindaila anis epes daias wapani soloma hiahawes mais esis ukup paga'iasi.
Ipa' pindahapila nomonas atifis si'i Krais Jisas okom mandanda'mas.
Anen nape God endilisinai atapina lifilafi, apa' ina okom mandanda' ma'i nohapila waf afambai atapina nope si'i God, owa'atin.
Anen nowa' alafugama waf afamba ea' dei' nataga epen endilisinai nofa' alop epesi nanda' waf afamba nataga agol akana nanda' maol nape lafela anis epes.
Esis satolona sati anen nataga epen endilisinai. Ea' nanda' anen nafe' lafela God naloma epes. Naila okom Godi atom nafe' nafe' ma nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
Ea' waf afamba atef anen nanda'afi dei' God nasa'mana nalota ilif endilisi a'owa'. Ea' naso'ana anagol agol atotogol gikila' agof hiagufi hi'alagof.
Anen naso'ana agol agalemba Jisasa anaf epes soloma ambagof maim hiasi sagape heveni a itap apa'e ilif awini hi'ilas sindiwa nembawa ma anen sogafela agol ananigili lu'wagol
sowalapa basef si'if na'amba si'i, “Jisas Krais anen Dembinai.” Sonda'am na'amba sosa'ma agol Ahamana Godi gogalota ilif endilisi.

Ea' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa. Fowa' dondol ape agalomepa ipa' paila basef ae'afi. Ea' dei' wapani penda'as na'amba atin. Dei' ape laogon, ipa' penda'as atapis sondafe' a'owa' pikila' fowa' panda'as. God nanda' maol fasini nakwahomepa waf awafi nofa'epa pitanimai. Isimba atis dei' ipa' ombal mondahepa a'owa' penda' maola pigambifa maol inimba anen nanda'mepani.
Dei' main, anen nanda' maol opalef ipe'ilifi nomon. Anen atona nafela nomonas ipe'isi ma natopalopepa panda' maol si'i anen atona okom maga'ian.
Hiahawes ipa' pa'i pinda'asi, pekwaha basef dahihianamaefi feloma waf dowamba'ifi, dao' penda'am.

Penda'as na'amba ma pegape awasi Godi usi'ipa ma basefa waf awafi akepa. Dei' pape paloma epes mini'ap sagape itap apa'i, esis sakwaha waf usi'ifi asanda' waf awafi. Ipa' pape palomas pihimba'masa basef ambal namilifi si'i ondowa ogotawa ilifi ogogala'ma epes. Penda'as na'amba ma nemaf akutaifi Kraisi ae' sowenegahema ipa' ma egegawa ina anda' maol dowadowaf akwaha pepel ae'ani dowaf, owa'atin.

Ipa' pahapifa God panda' maol ananini, isimba si'i anis hiahawes ipa' pindalali pagaso'anas anini. I'i atiasi sehe ega' sokolo'wa esimbel ae'ambeli si'i anis sondolali sagakolo' ifat sa'utip, ea' hapaimi, ae' sonehe. Aho', ea' atiasi sonehe egaloma ipe'i.
Ea' na'amba atin ipa' wapani pendagala pelome.
I'i Dembinai Jisas ni'i aho', a'i atiasi ina nogota laota esapa' Timoti nefe'mago ipa'. Ma notanima nifi'i niga'ipi ipa' pagape andeande'ma sogowa' banagae.
Timoti anen opaf atof nalome. Okom ananimi malamafe' a'owa' ma nogatopalopepa ma pagahapifana banagepa. Ina anona aman nagape na'ai si'i anen, owa'atin. Anen atona.
Amom hiami mape magaloma ae'i mundumafi hiahaom amamumi atom ea' ina ukup paipaila mugumafi maol Jisas Kraisi, owa'.
Apa' Timoti ina si'i amom, owa'. Ipa' pegawa anen aman bu'unai, okom ma'i notopalopepa. Anen natopalope ma wagawalipasa basef bu'wafi Godi si'i awani nagatopalopa ahaman.
I'i afamba egegawa hiahaom hiami motagame mi'imama, dao' esapa'ana nefe'mago ipa' kwafalis.
Ae' ape sisihiwi ma Dembinai a'i anen atiasi nonda'me ufia'w ekwaha kalabus egafe'mago ipa'.
Ae' okom ma'i esapa' Epafroditus nofo'mago ipa'. Anen owame ae'anai. Anen afa' wandao'oma wanda' maol Godi atini walutu banagefama akafimi si'i soldia. Fowa' ipa' pasapa'ana nafi'i natopalope.
Nembel ananimbili balef a'owa' ma na'i nogatilipa. Ea' anen okom nimanima ipa' pagame' basefa aowas nanda'ana.

Endilisi fowa' anen awasina na'i noga'. Owa' God nati anen uwahipina. Apa' ina nati anen atotona uwahipina, owa'atin. Nati ae' uwahipiwi wapani. Anen nandaiwa' a'owa' ma opaf nimanifi foso'alowe ma Epafroditus nogaga'.
Ea' ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma esapa'ana nogafe'mago ipa' ma' petolona pendagala ma opaf ae'afi awanef.
Ea' ipa' pendagala endilisi pegefa'ana ma agol Dembinaii. Pendasa'ma agofa amam na'ambaimi.

Dei' main, anen ina okom mandanda' ma nogape namona, owa'atin. Anen okom mohafela maol Kraisi ea' felefele' noga' ma nogatopalope. Anen okom mapome. Dei' main, ipa' papani laogon anen naha'ofepa nanda' isimba.

Ipa' alipipai, ae' a'i i'i basef ae'afi hi'ilif na'amba. Ipa' sonendahepa ma Dembinai. Ae' ina okom nimanima enda' basef ifimba atif doko' ali' aga'ipasafi, owa'. Ifimba fegala'ambemepa ma amam awami.
Ipa' solawaipa ma amam amamba manda' waf awafii si'i nombagw alupumii. Amom ma'i mi'ipipa dindinipa mohondo' ukup ipe'ipi pegatopa' alop ipe'ipi ma pigaila mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani.
God atona nandandepapa mape ananipai. Ambal bu'unai Godi atona dei' manda' lotumana mafela agol Jisas Kraisi atogol. Apa' ina mahapifa waf sagatopa' alopafi fegatopalopapa, owa'atin.
Anis epes Juda ukup pa'i, “Apa' Juda epes bu'upai manda' waf ape'ifi hiafi andeande' datima si'i magatopa' alopafi.” Apa' owa', ae' ikila'asa waf afambai. Ae' Judaiwai endilisi.

Dei' main, nemaf afamba ata' sa'owe agape nimaguf 8-pelaif fagale'e amom matopa' alop ae'api. Ae' epen Israeliwai. Ae' wambota Benjamini. Ae' esimbel atembel esis Hibrui. Ae' Farisi, epen agaila mu'uli Godi fowa' nagaso' Mosesani. Ae' aila mu'uli inimba datima ikila' hiasi.
Ae' okom mohafel banagem a'owa' ma anda' maol Godi. Fowa' anda' maola agaha esis sios amam nematawa Kristen. I'i epes sowaloge ma waf agaila mu'uli inimbafi, ae' kofagema ake.
Apa' ae' okom mandanda'ma Krais atona ea' a'i hiahaom amamba hiami ali' anda'ami, amamba falafumi atom.

Ae' ina a'i hiahaom amamba atom, owa'atin. Ae' okom mandanda' ma Jisas Krais atona Dembinai ae'anai ma hiahaom hiami ali' anda'ami. Gawa inimba endilisini nikila'. Ea' ewa' alafugama hiahaom amamba hi'alam a'i falafumi atom si'i alapita. Ahapila Krais atona tatala'ina, ape sisihiwi ma anen. Ae' andaiwa'ma egefa' agol agalemba aman bo'owe hilili'i ma mu'uli esis Juda sagailani, owa'. A'i efa' agol usi'igili ma waf na'ambaifi. Ae' ahapifa Krais dei' God na'i ae' aman bu'uwai hilili'i.

Ae' a'i egawa Krais endilisi noloma banagami God nasa'mana nogosafelami. Ae' a'i elomana ondao'oma ma waf afamba ogofa' akafimi ma igahapila nomonas atifis isimba si'i anen okom magapomas nemaf afamba nagaga'afi.
Ae' a'i enda'as na'amba ma anaf God nogosa'me wapani wandof.

Ae' ina okom mandanda' a'i a' efa' waf afamba Kraisi hi'alaf ape bo'owe hilili', ata' owa'. Dei' ape sisihiwi ahapila waf afambai tatala'if. Dei' main? Anen nofale nandandepe ma egape ananiwai si'iwi.

Ipa' alipipai, ae' ina a' okom mandanda' a'i efa' waf afambai ea', ata' owa'. Ahapila okom atotom na'amba. Okom mase'e hiahaom hiami fowa'imi maloma hiahawes fowa' sagatagamai ea' dei' anda' maol banagambela egefa' hiahaom anafimi si'i epen nasagih mehipa nigikila'.
Ae' asagih mehip totol etaga alola egefa' agola waf bu'wafi. Isimba na'amba. Krais Jisas nanda' maol bu'wani natopalope ape sisihiwima anen. Dei' God nofale ma efe' egape lifilafi heven.

Apa' hiapai mahapila ukup pagataga si'i epes ea' dambesi ma waf bu'wafi, apa' a' ukup pendafe' atifipa basef ifi'i ali' anda'afi. Ama i'i ipa' anis nomonas daiasa, bola God nisindi'amona ukup ipe'ipi wapani.
Apa' mondape na'amba. Waf bu'wafi mogofa'af ea'i, afamba mondahapilaf sisihif.
Alipipai, ipa' hipai pindaila waf ae'afi. Ea' pendandepas andeande' epes sagaila waf afa'ifii ma pigailas.

Nimaguf hiafi a'ipipa basef ifimba ma bousi Kraisi ea'. Dei' na'amba atin a'ipipaef wapani aloma embif fetah naep ae'api. Epes hiasi saila waf awafi ea' sataga bousi ma basef bu'wafi Krais nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.

Ukup asasipi pagapoma alop atona asasinai amamba si'i god asasinai. Esis sa'i esis atis agufisi sandagala ma waf naninani aunai ambagof awagufunai. Ea' ukup pandapoma hiahaom itapami atom. Epes isimba anaf higililas wambel awambili hel.
Apa' mape amam nematawa ilifapai, wambel ape'imbili heven. Ea' mape mohafa Dembinai Jisas Krais anaf nokwaha heven nisila'i ma nofa'apa mogatambel.

Anaf nondomba alop ana'e ape'inai a' notaga bo'ona nogala' gambigambis a'owa' si'i alop ananipi. Anen nonda'ama banagami ananimi atom. Banagami amamba nonda' hiahaom hiami mofe' mogape lafela anen atona.

Dei' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa a'i itilipa apa' owa', pape laogona ae'. Kofagesa ma andagala, andagalama ipa' atipa si'i agol lu'wagili hiahawes fasisi anaf egefa'asi. Ipa' pindalutu banagepa ma Dembinai si'i basef ali' aga'ipipafi.
Ipa' nematawa bipa, Yuodia neloma Sintike, ipa' peme'. Ipa' pendataga opalef atelefa Dembinai.

Ea' dei' ahali' ina' aman alipunai endilisi nanda' maol Godi datimai, a'ipinago nendatopalopago nematawa awamba biawa. Awo atapiwa wandala'ata walome wanda' maol banagambela basef bu'wafi Godi. Ea' Klemen naloma anis daias ae'asi wanda' maol atin Godi, esis wapani sanda' maol salomafa. Agof asasigufi fape nomona buk ambal namili'wi agof epes sogape andeande' lifilafii fagaila'wi.
Dondol ipa' sonendahepa ma Dembinai. Ae' a'ias wapani, ipa' sonendahepamana.
Pendanda' waf sa'umbilifi ma epes hiasi sitilipa sogogawa ipa' paila waf bu'wafi afambai. Dei' main, Dembinai felefele' nifi'i.
Ipa' ina a' nomonas solasefe'ma hiahaom hiami mogatagamipai, owa'i. Ipa' pi'ipanam Goda hiahaom amamba. Pendandabetena anen pinifelona pihali'ana ma hiahaom ipa' ukup paga'iami.
Ipa' pape sisihipama Krais Jisas, dei' opaf awanifi God nagaso'apafi afikila' gawa hiani epesi hi'agalani fope folomepa fola'ambema opalefi ukup ipe'isi andeande'.

Alipipai, dei' ae' a'i enda' basef akutaifi ma ipa'. A'i ipa' ukup pendanda'ma anef waf na'amba. Hiahaom mamahoma endilisimi, usi'imi bu'wami moloma hiahaom bu'wami dondo' ma epes siganifelomi, ipa' ukup pendanda'ma amamba.
Waf hiafi ipa' patelef pame'af agawalipipafi, afamba ipa' pendanda'af lifilafi. Ea' God nagaso'apa opaf awanefii nope nolomepa.
Endilisi, fowa' ipa' ukup pandanda'ma ae', apa' ipa' ufia'w akepa ma pegatopalope. Apa' dei' pati ufia'wa patopalope pigihimba'me ukup ipe'ipi pagaila ae'. Ea' andagalama Dembinai a'owa'.
Ae' ina a'ias na'amba a'i ae' hiahawes ake, owa'atin. Dei' main, ae' egawa ea' na'amba. I'i hiahaom mamahoma motagame, hapaimi. Opaf ae'afi awanefa hiahaom amamba.

Fowa' agape na'amba. Anef nimaguf ape wafiwi, hiahawes ake. Anif nimaguf ahapila hiahawes hiasi. Ae' egawa ea' waf saga' gwa'aisi hiasafi faloma waf nolom magahasafi wapani. Ae' egawa waf afamba biafif sagahapila hiahaom hiami a hiahawes akasafi wapani. Ama nimaguf hiafi anamba hiagoma ape opaf fape awanefa hiahaom hiami na'ambaimi.
Krais nowa' banagae nase'e pepel. Isimba atis dei' la'ifiwi ma enda' hiahaom hiami hi'igalam.
Apa' ipa' panda' waf bu'wafi palome pandao'oma ma pegefa' nimanimi ae'ami.

Ea' ipa' amam nematawa Filipai, ipa' a' pegawa na'amba. Nemaf afamba ae' asefela maol agawalipipa basef bu'wafi Godi ma agakwaha anambel wambel bagape itap lu'upa ipe'ipi Masedonia, ina dei' anis Kristen sios satopalope. Ina anis Kristen sandao'oma salome ma waf afamba sagaso'asa hiahawes dowafi, ata' owa'. Ipa' atipa panda'af na'amba.
Ae' ali' agape Tesalonaika, ipa' patopalope nimaguf hiafi.
Apa' dei' ae' ina ahali'ipa ma hiahawes gwa'aisi mais, owa'. Ae' okom ma'i atiasi God nogwa waf bu'wafi ipa' pagatopalope afi nose'epa hiahaom fasimi.

Uga hiahaom maim ipa' pagasi'iami hiami mikila' ae' okom maga'iami. Hiahaom ipa' panda'am paso' Epafroditus nogofa'ami efa'am ea'. Amamba si'i ofa pindalalima God pagaso'anami alogw gwagami. Ea' ipa' paso'anam God, nofa'am opaf ananifi ambo'of.
God hiahaom hiamunai atiasi nuwatanimipa hiahaom amamba ipa' akepamami ma lagol Jisas Kraisi atogol.
God anen Ahamapa ape'inai. Ea' apa' minifelona mondasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.
Ae' anda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa' hipai amam nematawa Godi pagape sisihipama Krais Jisasi. Amom owape magaloma ae'i mandagala manda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
Ea' amam nematawa hiasi Godi sandagala sanda' nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'. Esis isimba sanda' maol ipat Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi, esis wapani sandagala ma sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
