Ae' a'i okom Dembinai Jisas Kraisi naganagaila ape'i ma nagatopalopapa dowafi nope nondalomago ipa' lifilafi. Ea' ma'uf.
Ae' Pol, okom Godi atom nandandepe aposel anda' maol Krais Jisasi. Ae' aloma owame ae'anai Timoti wape na'a'e.

Ea' anda'mepago basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' amam nematawa Godi pegape wambel Kolosii, ipa' alipipai pagape sisihipama Kraisi. Afa' biafa wa'i God ahamapa ape'inai notopalopepa dowaf nowa' banagaepa nonda' opalef ipe'ilifi fepe sa'ombel.
Nemaf mamahefa afa' wandabetena ipa', dondol afa' wanifela God anen Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais Ahamana. Afa' wanifelona ma pagahapifa Krais andeande'.
Dei' main, afa' wame' basef ea' ma ipa' na'amba. Ipa' pahapifa Krais Jisas ea' ukup ipe'ipi paipaila amam nematawa Godi hiasi hi'agalas.

Fowa' basef bu'wafi Godi ifimba endilisifi fatagamepa pame'efa hiahaom bu'wami ipe'imi dei' ma'oh magasasaepa heveni pape pegehafami. Hiahaom amamba bu'wami kofagema ma hapif ipe'ini naloma waf afamba ipe'ifi ukup pagapagailasafi.

Ama ganimba itap hiagoma basef bu'wami amamba mawalapai waf bu'wafi ma epes hiasi mataga lu'um atapim mikila' fowa'. Basef amamba manda'as na'amba atin si'i dambadamba mali' matagama ipa' pagame'am. Nemaf afamba ipa' pali' pegawa endilisi okom Godi nagatopalopepa dowafi, basef amamba mawalapai waf bu'wafi afamba fataga lu'ufa ipa'.

Ipa' pelafa basef amamba bu'wami, Epafras nagawalipipami a' pegawam. Anen epen bu'unai afa' ukup pagapagailanai nanda' maola Kraisi nalomafa wandao'oma wanda' maol atitini. Anen naha'ofafa nogatopalopa ipa' ea' numafi maol Kraisi andeande' datima.
Anen na'ipafa basef ifimba ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda'epa ukup pagapagaila amam nematawa Godi hiasi.

Epafras na'ipafa Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda' maol inimba bu'wani ma opalef ipe'ilifi. Ea' afa' biafa wapani wame' basef ifimba. Nemaf fagali'i wame'ef, afamba atef wasafela beten wanda'ana ipa' wafi'i wafi'i wataga dei'. Afa' ina wakwahipa, owa'. Wandabetena God notopalopepa nonda'epa pegape si'ipa ma gawa ananini endilisi. Gawa inimba Ambal bu'unai ananinai nagase'epani.

Wanda'as na'amba ma atiasi ipa' la'ifipama fe' poe ipe'ini negataga bo'wen endilisi dondo'ma waf Dembinaii. Wanda'mepa betena Anen negati waf ipe'ifi fenda' okom ananimi bo'oma ipa' nondagalaepa. Ama penda' maol naninani hiani bu'wani hi'igalana pegegawana andeande' pigikila' fowa' pali' pegegawana.

Afa' wanda'mepa beten wapani na'amba. Wa'i God nowa' banagaepa ma banagami ananimi fasimi mogogala' a'owa'i. Ama ipa' atiasi pigalutu banagepama pegefa' nimanimi mamahoma mogatagamepai ma sonogahepa ea' opalef ipe'ilifi ina fesafel a'owa', fepe sa'ombel.

Ea' ondabetena ipa' ma piganifela Ahamapa. Anen nanda'epa la'ifipa ma pegefa' hiahaom amamba fasimi anen nagandondombama ipe'i. Amamba anaf pefa'am peloma esis amam nematawa ananisi hiasi anamba anen nagala'ambemagon nogogala'ma.
Anen natagwahepa ea' ma banagami awami magape owamb akoti ea' nahaponapa mafe' mawis nomona maol Nogamanai nope Dembinai nugumafiapa. Nogamana anamba anen okom maga'iana a'owa'i.
Nogamana ananinai atona natagwahepa ma banagami amamba ma dei' makwaha waf awafi apa' manda'afi magape wahifipa.

Krais anen ea' na'amba atin endilisi si'i God anamba apa' owa' mogatolonaia. Anen balaga endilisi naomb nagali'ma hiahaom hiami God nanda'ami magape ilif itapi hi'alam maloma hiahaom ambagof fagapaumi maloma epes hiasi hi'alas.

God nanda' hiahawes isimba hiasi hi'alas sagape ilif itapi sataga sape lagol nogamanai atogol. Anen atona nanda' amom banagami hiami mape magali'i magape la'afena itapi otagai a agufumi dembami maloma amom dembami enseli maloma amom dembami banagami mugumafi ambagufi. Anen nanda' hiahaom amamba maloma epes hiasi dei' apa' magatolomi maloma hiahaom amamba apa' owa' mogatolom naepia. God nanda' hiahaom hiami mataga mape ma lagol nogamanai atogol ea' hiahaom amamba maloma epes hiasi ananimi atom.
Anen nape nali'ma hiahaom amamba hiami ea' hiahaom amamba mataga banagami ananimi atom nahapilam banagem mape atapim.

Anen Dembinai nape nali'ma esis sios amam nematawa Godi ea' si'i alop si'ip ananipi. Anen atona kofagonama sios sagape namis atapisi. Anen nali' dambadamba nogosafel wandofi. Ea' dei' anen atona nape nali'ma hiahaom amamba hiami numafiam.
Dei' main, okom Godi na'i waf faloma gawai banagami ananimi hi'alam mape nogamana atona. Dei' naso'ana amamba hi'alam anen mapomana atapim.

God nanda' hiahaom amamba hiami magape ilif itapi hi'alam maloma epes hiasi hi'alas wapani sataga be'es sapoma anen. God nanda'as na'amba ma esimbel Kraisi atembel balo nemaf afamba nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
Fowa' ipa' wapani ata' pape laogona God pewa' alafugahana. Ukup ipe'ipi ata' pefalana bounai ma panda' waf awafi.

Apa' Krais nataga epen nofa' alop epesi sahana naga', amamba atom God nanda'epa pataga alipipai opaf atof palomana ma ga' Nogamanai atin. Nanda'as na'amba ma nofa'epa pifi'mai anen pegape be'epa hilili', kofagema akepa ma naep ananipi.

Apa' ipa' pindahapifa basef bu'wafi Godi tatala'if atapipa ma pigalutu banagepa endilisi si'i olaf fagali'i fogowa' banaga ipati. Na'amba ukup pese'epama pegegawa endilisi anaf pegefa' hiahaom amamba fasimi basef bu'wafi faga'iami. Basef ifimba pagame'ef ea'i sawalipasafa epes hiasi sagape itapi hi'alas. Basef ifimba ae' Pol ataga aman anda' maola agawalipasafi.

Dei' ae' andagala ma efa' akafimi egatopalopa ipa' Kristen amam nematawa sios Kraisi, ipa' si'i alop si'ip ananipi. Anom akafimi apa' manda' maol Kraisi mogofa'ami, amamba ata' mape atapim. Dei' a'i imbifa amamba agame'am alop ae'api anda' maol Kraisi. Ae' a'i ewapanimana akafimi amamba ma anda' maol Kraisi.
Ae' ataga aman anda' maol agatopalopa sios amam nematawa Godi na'amba. God nandandepe dei' ataga aman anda' maol aga'ipipa basef hiafi ananifi hi'agalafi.
Fowa' nimaguf hiafi basef ifimba fape fandambaho'ma ukup esis misi'ah amam nematawa hiasii. Apa' dei' afataga fandawalap alihifa ukup esis amam nematawa Godi.

Okom ananimi magape na'amba. Anen na'i nihimba'mapa basef ifimba fasif a'owa' agol lu'wagilifi, fandawalap fatopalopa esis amam nematawa hiasi hi'agalas. Basef ifimba na'amba. Krais nape opalef ipe'ilifi nomona dei' pape pegehafa anaf pefa' mogogala'i ananimi pegalomana.

Ea' afa' wawalapa basefa Krais wawalipasef epes hiasi hi'alasa wasindi'amonasa gawa hiani naninani bu'wani. Afa' wa'i umbehagumai epes hiasi atona atin hi'ilas sogafe'ma Kraisa sogape epes ananisi endilisi sogape sisihisa anen.
Ea' dei' maol ae'ani anda'an numa'win a'owa' ma banagami hiami Kraisi manda' maol banagambel atapim nomon opaf ae'afii.
Ae' a'i ipa' pegawa na'amba. Ae' anda' numa'umi a'owa' ma atopalopepa paloma Laodisia saloma epes isimba hiasi ata' owa' sigati amaga ae'agaia.

Ae' anda'am ahifima opalef ipe'ilifi fegataga banagalef pegape ukup pindaima atina sahin owan ipe'isi. Ama ipa' pegefa' gawa fasini endilisi negewa' banaga hapif ipe'ini ma pegegawa basef Godi endilisifi atif. Ae' anda' maol inimba ma ipa' pegegawa basef ifimba Godi kofagefa fowa' fandambahi'i fa'i Krais atona.

Anen atona nanda' gawa bu'wani naloma nomonas fasisi Godi hiasi hi'alas mataga mandawalap alihim. Amamba fowa' mali' mape mandambaho' si'i epes sambe'am ma'oh mandambahi'i sagatalom otamba hiambai, dei' mandawalap alihima lagol Kraisi atogol.
Ae' a'ipipa basef ifimba. Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba anin epen nembaso'mepa ma basef kikipaifi usiusihifi.
Endilisi ae' dei' ina ape alomepa, apa' nomonas ae'asi a si'i ape agalomepa andagalama sati ipa' pagalutu banagepa ma pagahapifa Krais andeande'.
Ipa' pahapifa Krais Jisas ea' pa'i anen Dembinai ipe'inai. Na'amba dei' a' pefe' pendape sisihipama anen.

Ipa' pindalutu banagepama anen si'i lawag gogotawa banagoga itap ea' si'i ipat tagatoma ilifa olaf banagafi. Ipa' pindahapifif banagepa basef amamba bu'wami pegelafami pikila' fowa' pali' pagahapifam ea' pindanifela God dondol.

Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba anin epen a' nese'epa basef wafifi a basef gawaifi epes saga'iefi nembaso'mepa nehekelepa ma basef ifimba si'i sola mafis sogafe'ma isalef. Basef ifimba ina fataga Krais, owa'. Ifimba bafasapa ihasapa ape'isi saga'ipapafi fataga waf itapafi atef.

Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Dei' main, ipa' apegawa waf Godi faloma gawai banagami ananimi hiami hi'alam mape Krais atona atapim, fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga afamba nagape itap apa'e mopaona atapim.
God nase'epa ambal namili endilisili lapaipa pape sisihipama Krais. Anen dembinai nape nagali'ma ambagof hiami banagami maloma ensel dembami magape la'afena itapi otaga hi'alam.

Ipa' pandaloma dog palomana. A pape sisihipama anen, pape si'i panda' waf afamba amom Juda magatopa'mama alopafi. Afamba ina waf epes sanda'afa alop atop dowadowaf wafifi, owa'. Krais atona nanda'mepaf natofa waf apifi ma nembel apinai.
Ipa' pefa' sa'of ea' pandaloma paloma Krais sawepa palomana. Ipa' pahapifa banagami Godi nagasa'ma Krais matmati, isimba atis dei' anen nasa'mipai wapani paloma Krais.

Fowa' ipa' paga' ea'. Dei' main, ipa' panda' waf naninani aunai ea' ipa' owa' Judaipaia pegelalama mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani. Apa' dei' God nanda'epa pataga namipa paloma Krais ea' makwahomapa waf awafi apa' manda'afi hiafi hi'alaf.

Basef ifimba ma mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani fagail buki fa'i akafimi apa' mogofa'ama waf ape'ifi faloma anif basef ahififa mogailafi, basef amamba hiami God a' nali'amonam si'i nandolam magail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai nalamonam hi'alam.

Lawag agamba anen natalogofa ambagof awami banagami maloma agufumi amamumi dembami magape la'afena itapi otagai mape lafela anen a' owa' banagema. Anen nikila'am ea' nowa'am sisihim nafe' nali'am nafe' amom mafe' magi'mana ea' epes hiasi sakola naep satolom sa'i epes falafumi.

Na'amba dei' ipa' ina pi'i aho'ma anona aman nosapaga ipa' ni'ipipa anin mu'uli ma waf saga' gwa'aisi embelafi ma anef nemaf lu'wafi sanda' lotuwafi a'a sonda' anis gwa'aisi ma awin dambaini negataga a'a nemaf Sabat sagapoma noma'wafi, owa'i.
Hiahaom amamba fowa' esis sagailami mondola'waifa hiahaom anaf migi' mogatagai, amamba dei' mataga ea'. Apa' hiahaom endilisimi atom, amamba Krais atona.

I'i epen mamahina nepe ninifa koh dahembe' ananini ma hiahawes anen nagatilisi a'a nembaso'mas ni'i anin sa'umbelini nagape lafela anis daiasi a'a nenda' lotu ma amom ensel, ipa' ina pi'i aho'ma epen inimba nepa'agaipa ma pegefa' hiahaom fasimi ipe'imi magasasa ipa' ilifi, owa'i. Epes na'ambaisi sasa'ma agof asasigufi lu'wagofa hiahawes sa'oh sandondo'ah sagatilisi ea' ukup papoma esis atis saila waf afamba itapafi.

Esis ina sahapila Krais sisihina anen nape nagali' endilisima ma ape'i, owa'. Anen balaga numafi gwa'aisi nalaga alop si'ip ea' nanda' gigisilimb mais so'matagw sandahapima atin alop si'ip. Ea' dei' God nanda' alop pataga lu'up banagep.
Ipa' paga' ea' paloma Krais ma pagakwaha waf awafi hiafi wafifi itapafi. Dei' maina ipa' ata' pailaf pagafe' si'i ipa' epes itapipai? Dei' maina ipa' ata' pagafe' lafela mu'uli na'ambaini? Hapaimi.
Mu'uli inimba naga'i na'amba na'i, “Ina' owa'i nihapilan, nea'an, newa'an nepe lagofa, hapaini.”
Mu'uli inimba na'i hiahawes embel gwa'aisi mais apa' maga'asi. Hiahawes isimba apa' ma'as ea' higilalas. Dei' main, mu'uli inimba epes atis ukup pandanda'man sawalapan sawalipa anis.

Endilisi, mu'uli inimba nataga si'i mu'uli gawa bu'wani nagapaini ea' na'ipapa nasa'mapa na'ipapa banagambel monda' lotu ma amom ensel a moha alop ape'ipi. Apa' owa', mu'uli inimba ina banagena netopalopapa mogatofa waf awafi alopi ma nembel apinai, owa'atin.
God nasa'ma ipa' ea' pape sisihipama Krais. Isimba atis ipa' ukup pendapoma hiahawes sagape otaga ilifi, anamba Krais nape agilinai felefele'ma lagol kwahisigili Godi.
Ipa' ukup pendanda'ma hiahawes sagape ilifi atapipa. Hiahawes sagape itapi owa', hapaisi.
Dei' main, ipa' paga' ea'. Ipa' pape sisihipama God, dei' ambal namili ipe'ili lape landabaho' si'i Krais dei' nape nandambaho'.
Krais kofagonama ambal namili ape'ilii anaf notaga nondawalap alihigima, ea' ipa' wapani petaga pefa' mogogala'i ananimi pelomana.

Ipa' pendaha waf anamba awasinai hianai itapanai nelelemb apimi noga', waf anamba na'amba. Waf so'a waulafi a waf alugufi awafi a waf afamba awafi ukup pigahafemafi a ukup pigapiga'i anis maefah anis epesi, waf afambai si'i waf sagaila god baso'amunai.
Epes sanda' waf afambai hiafi isimba atis dei' okom wandafunai Godi anaf notaga nogwamaf.
Fowa' ipa' atipa paila waf awafi afambai hiafi pape lafela waf afambai ukup pigahafemafi.
Apa' dei' ipa' pendakwaha anef waf awasifi hiafi na'ambaifi. Waf migimigahifi a ukup wandafipi a opalef awalifi ma pigaha anis, a waf basef awafi findiwaifi a basef awasifi alugufi.
Ipa' ina pembaso'ma esis sahin owan, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' apakwaha waf hiafi awafi ma opaf apinai ea', apataga dambaipa. God nanda'epa pataga dambaipa ma opaf namufi.
Ea' dondol anen nanda'epa pataga dambaipa atapipa ma pegataga na'amba atin si'i anen nagape, anen nanda' opaf afamba namufii. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma ipa' pegegawana endilisi.

Ea' dei' Krais atona Dembinai nape nagali'ma epes hiasi hi'alas. Esis Griki Juda a anis owa' Judaisia, esis anoga diga, isimba sagail alupi sogololama waf bu'wafi, agufisi a' agof akasi, waf saga'iafa epes na'ambaisi falafifi atef. Krais atona Dembinai nape nali'ma epes isimba hiasi hi'alas, nape nomona epes sasisasi hi'alas.

God anen nandandepepa ea' pape amam nematawa ananipai okom maimailipa a'owa'. Ea' ipa' pendanda' waf bu'wafi na'amba. Ipa' pinda'i epes hiasi uwahipis atapipa petopalopas penda'as andeande'. Ipa' petalogofa ipa' pepe lafela anis daias, penda' waf sa'umbilifi ma esis ea' pepe pititi esis sonda'mepa waf fafifafi awafi ipa' ma tol pegape opalef awanelef.

I'i anin epen ipe'ini sahoman nenda'man waf awafi, ina a' negwamanaf waf awafi anen nanda'manafi, owa'i. Nenda'an sa'ombeman nekwahomana waf awafi ananifi okom mese'enaf. Dembinai a' nakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi ea'. Ea' ipa' wapani penda'as na'amba atin.
Ipa' penda' waf afambai bu'wafi hiafi ali' aga'ipipafi pindailaf. Ea' penda' anef waf bu'wafi wapani. Ipa' ukup pindaila sahin owan ipe'isi ma waf afamba fakolasepa fanda'epa pagataga atifipai.
Krais naso'apa opaf awanafi apa' ea' opaf afamba atof fondomafia nelelemb ipe'ilimbi endilisi. God nofalepa pataga alop atifipa pegape opalef awanelef. Ipa' pindanifelona dondol.

Basef Kraisi fasif a'owa' fendape endilisi opalef ipe'ilifi nomon. Ipa' penda'as na'amba piwalipa esis sahin owan ipe'isi pisindi'amonasa gawa hiani naninani. Ipa' pendanifela Goda opalef ipe'ilifi pendagalamana. Ea' penda' awalef fagail sami ea' penda' awalef lotuwilifi a awalef fegewa' banaga ambagof ipe'igufii.
Hiahawes mamahisa ipa' atiasi piga'iasa basefi o penda' maolasi, isimba ipa' pendanda'asa agol Jisasi. Ama agol ananigil ipa' pendanifela God ahamapa.
Ipa' nematawa, ipa' pefe' lafela wauhupipa ipe'imi. Waf afambai dondo'ma ipa' Kristen pinda'afi.
Ipa' amam wapani, ipa' ukup pindapindaila wauhiamepa ipe'iwai. Ipa' owa'i penda' opalef awaulifi nimanilifa.
Ipa' batawisas wapani, pendame' basef mamasipai andeande'ma waf a basef asasifi hiafi hi'indalaf. Waf afambai fenda' okom Dembinai bo'om.
Ipa' ahapas, owa'i penda' opalef batawisipai nimanilif ukup numbutipa. Na'amba ukup asasipi iwanip.

Ipa' agof akipai pagape lafela anis epes panda' maolasi, pindaila basef ifimba hiafi agufisii. Na'amba penda' maola naep asasipi atip piga'i'ipas, owa'. Ipa' ombal mehepa ma Dembinai, dei' opalef ipe'ilifi fendape usi'ilifa maol inimba penda'an andeande'.
Ea' hiahaom mamahoma ipa' pinda'ami, amamba pendanda'am banagambel si'i panda' maola Dembinai atona. Ipa' ina panda' maola epes atis, owa'.
Dei' main, ipa' pegawa ea', anaf Dembinai nofalo'mepa nese'epa hiahaom fasimi ipa'. Amamba anen nandandepam ea' ma'oh masasa ipa' epes ananipai. Ipa' pape panda' maola Krais, Dembinai ape'inai.
Epen mamahina nanda' waf awafii anin anaf nefa' akafimi awami mondahama waf anin nanda'afi. Dei' main, God nawawaloga epes hiasi agufisi agof akasi hi'alasa ikwaf usi'ifi atetef.
Ipa' agufipai ma esis agof akasi sanda' maolipai, ipa' pendanda' waf bu'wafi hilili'ma esis. Ipa' pegawa Dembinai ipe'inai nape otaga ilif.
Ipa' pendabeten atapipa. Beten ipe'ini, ipa' ukup kilikala' pendape andeande' pendanifela God.

Ipa' pendabeten pihali' Goda nogatopalopafa wapani na'amba. Anen nusi'mafa uta afa' ma ogowalapa basef ananifi. Ama ogawalapa basef ifimba Kraisi fowa' fape fandambahi'i. Isimba atis dei' ae' ape kalabus.
Ipa' pendandabetena atiasi ae' egawalapa basef ifimba fandambahi'i fegataga alihif si'i okom Godi na'i ae' enda'am.
Esis sagape ando'a Kraisi, ipa' nomonas sondape andeande'ma fe' ipe'ini. Nimaguf mamahifa ufia'w kwogala ipa' piga'ipasa basef Kraisi, dao' pinda'ipasef.
Basef ipe'ifi dondol fendataga usihif fasifa pegagwa basefa epes hiasi hi'igalas dondo'ma hiahawes mais ukup asasipi pandanda'masi.

Tikikus anen sahomapa ape'inai endilisi ae' okom magamagailanai nanda' maol Dembinai datimai ae' alomana wandao'oma wanda'ani. Anen atiasi nefe'mago ipa' nowalapa basef ni'ipipaefa ae' dei' ape a'imama.
Ae' asapa'ana nafe'mago ipa' ma pegegawa afa' wape wa'imama ma nogowa' banaga opalef ipe'ilifi.
Anen no'wa Onesimus mefe'mago ipa', anen owamapa nagahapifanai afa' ukup pagapagailanai nanda' maol Godi datimai. Anen nape mini'ap ipe'ipi. Atiasi amom biam mi'ipipago hiahawes hiasi sagataga na'ai.

Aristarkus anen nanda' kalabus nalome, anen wapani na'iago nemaf fasifi ma ipa'. Ea' Mak wapani, nandataga Barnabasi, nanda'mepago nemaf fasifi ma ipa' wapani. I'i nogatagama ipa' ma, dao' ipa' okwanago si'i ae' aga'ipipago ea'.

Ea' Jisas agol wa'agol Justus, anen wapani nanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'. Ama mini'ap Judai, amom atom manda' maol malome ma wigihimba'ma hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Amom matopalope ma maol inimba.

Epafras anen nandagala nanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'. Anen wapani mini'ap ipe'ipi, nanda' maol Krais Jisasi nogape lafelanai. Dondol nandabeten banagambela ipa'. Anen nandabetena God nonda' ipa' pigalutu banagepa si'i epes dembipai pegegawa God andeande'i ma pihapifif tatala'if pegaila okom Godi atapipa.
Ae' atowe egawa anen, na'amba dei' awalapana a'i anen nanda' maol numa'uni endilisi ma nagatopalopa ipa' paloma esis amam nematawa walemb ambalemba bialemb Laodisiai Hierapolis.
Luk dokta epen ape'inai ukup pagapagailanai, anen naloma Demas amom manda'ago nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'.
Ipa' pese'aso dagala ma nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma esis alipisi sagape Laodisiai. Ea' penda'masago nemaf bu'wafi ma Nimfa kolomago esis Kristen sios sandakolas ipat ako'utai.

Ipa' pitalifa basef ifi'i ma ea' pesapa'ef fefe'mago esis Kristen sios sagape Laodisiai, ma esis wapani sitilif soga'if. Ea' basef ifimba ae' asapa'ef fagafe' ma esis Laodisiai, wapani, ifimba ipa' pitilif pi'if.
Ea' ipa' pi'ipago Arkipus na'amba pi'i, “Ina' nimafi maol inimba negefa'an ea' ma Dembinai andeande' nimbifan.”

Dei' ae' Pol ahapila pen lagol ae'agili atogol anda'mepago basef ifimba bandafi atif. Dei' anda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa' hipai. Ipa' ukup pendanda' pendapoma ae' amom mowa'e sen ata' ape kalabus atapiwi. Ae' a'i okom lu'unai Godi notopalopago ipa' dowaf numafipago nope nolomago ipa'. Ea' ma'uf.

Ae' Pol aloma Sailas Timoti wape na'a'e. Ea' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' Kristen pagape wambel Tesalonaikai. Ipa' pape paloma God ahamapa ape'inai naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais. Ipa' Kristen pape paloma amom ea' amamipai si'ipa. Afa' wa'i atiasi God notopalopago ipa' dowafa opalef ipe'ilifi fegape awanelef.
Nimaguf hiafi danda afa' wanifela God lifilafi ma ipa'. Ea' wa'i agof ipe'igufi wanda' betenepa.

Afa' ina ala'uta tahafa ma waga'ipa God ahamapa ape'inai ma hapif ipe'ini nigafilai waf fasifi ma ipa' owa'. Fowa' ipa' paso' nelelemba God naloma anis daias wapani. Ea' dei' panda' maol numa'wini. Ipa' ukup pape banagepa pehafa Dembinai Jisas Krais. Ea' wandabeten nimaguf danda ma ipa'.
Ipa' Kristen alipipai, God nase'epa nembel ipa'. Ea' afa' ogawa anen nosahe'epa ea' ananipai si'ipa.

Basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi fowa' ogofa'afii, ifimba ina fataga ma ipa' dowaf si'i anif basef wafifi, owa'atin. Ambal bu'unai Godi nowa' banaga basef ifimba ma banagami ananimi ea' wafi'i wa'ipipaef. Ea' fanda' ukup ipe'ipi banagep pahapifana banagepa. Waf fowa' wape walomepa wanda'afi, ipa' pegawaf.
Isimba atis dei' pegawaf apaila Dembinai. Hiahaom akafimi matagamepa, apa' owa' pefa' basef Godi, ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'mai opalef ipe'ilifi, andagalaepa.
Ea' pihimba'masa waf fasifi isimba hiasi anis amam nematawa sagahapifa Kraisi sagape itap apamba biefip lu'wagoma Masedoniai Akaia.

Basef Dembinaii ipa' paga'ipasafi fegal fa'i fafe' si'i wata ta'i tagafe' mehip. Ina fafe' Masedoniai Akaia atogon, owa'atin. Anamba hiagoma esis same' basefa ipa' pagahapifa God. Afa' ina wa'ipa epes isimba, owa'. Ipa' pali' paso' opalefa God andeande'.

Dei' esis atis sa'i basefa ipa' pandagala pa'i nemaf bu'wafi ma afa' ea' pame' basef afa'ifi fowa' afa' wanofa wagafe'mago ipa'. Esis sa'i ipa' apakwaha hiahaom amamba ambagof awami fowa' ipa' panda' lotumami. Ea' pambema opalef pafe'ma God. Ea' dei' panda' maola God endilisinai, owa' nogaga'ia, nagape atapinai.

Ea' esis sa'i ipa' pape pehafa Nogamana ananinai anaf nokwaha heven notanima nogafi'i. Anen Jisas, fowa' naga' God nafelanai wapani. Owagama God okom a' numbutinama epes ami sanda' waf awafii. Owa' dei' Jisas nelefatapa ea' ma okom anamba aunai.
Alipipai, ipa' pegawa ea', fowa' afa' wagafe'mago ipe'i, maol inimba afa' wanda'ani ina nenalo, owa'atin.

Fowa' wagali' wafe' wambel ambalemba Filipai ea' sanda'afa aofa alop afa'inai, wame' akafimi endilisi. Ipa' pegawa ea'. Owa' God afa'inai nowa' banaga nelelemb afa'ilimbi. Ea' afa' ina ombal mahafa wandafa'ma esis bousi, owa'atin. Afa' banagefa wafo'o wawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma ipa'.
Basef kofagefa waga'ipipafi ina wa'i onda' waf awafi ma ipa', owa'. Afa' ina waila basef ifimba putuputa'afi baso'afi wa'ipipaef, owa'atin.

God atona nagwambafa natolofa wape hilili' ea' naso'afa maol afa' ma ogowalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi. Ea' ifimba atif dei' wawalapef. Afa' ina wanda' maola epes siganifela maol afa'ini, owa'. Wanda' opeha God atona sonogahana ma maol ananini, anen atona nawalogafa nogawafa.
Ipa' pegawa basef waga'ipipafi afa' ina wa'i'ipipa, owa'atin endilisi. God natolofa nogawafa ea' afa' ina wanda' maol wambaho' basefa waf kowagalasafi, owa'atin.
Afa' ina wanda' opeha epes sogasa'ma agofafa, o anis daias o ipa' wapani piganifelofa, owa'atin.

Afa' wape aposel Kraisi endilisi. Anen nasapa'afa ma onda' maol ananini. Ea' dei' wi'i aho'ai, a' wi'ipipa dindinipa pegaso'afa anis hiahawes gwa'aisi mais. Apa' owa'atin. Nogota tatumba wape wagalomepa afa' wanda' waf nimanis endilisi ma ipa', si'i ano'w nemata'w kugumafi awasi akwa'usi andeande'.
Afa' ukup paipailipa a'owa'. Ea' wase'epa basef bu'wafi Godi. Ina wa'ipipa basef atif, owa'atin. Wase'epa opalef a'owa'. Ea' wanda'as dumbuli dombola oga' ogatopalopepa.

Endilisi atis ipa' alipipai pegawa isimba, afa' wanda' maol banagambela wagawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma ipa'. Ea' wanda' maol wapani umafi alop afa'ipi ma gwa'aisi mais. Wanda' maol owamb alipa ina opoma ipa' atipa ma ogofa' gwa'aisi maisa ipa', owa'.
Ipa' patilis pegawas ea' God wapani natilis nogawa ea' waf wanda'afa ipa' pagahapifa Kraisi. Waf afamba afa'ifi bu'wafi usi'ifi, ina' awafi, owa'.
Ipa' pegawa waf afamba si'i ahamas nanda'masaf awasi ananisi, ea' na'amba atin si'i afa' wanda'mepaf ipa' atona atin. Afa' wasa'ma wawalapefa nomonas ipe'isi, owa banagaipa.
Wa'ipipaef na'amba ma ipa' penda' waf fegafe' andeande'ma God nitilipa noganifelipa. Ea' nofalepa pafi'i piwis pegalomana anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma hiahaom ananimi atumi mogogala'ma.

Fowa' ipa' pefa' basef Godi malogof afa'igufi, ea' pahapifif. Basef ifimba ina pefa'ef si'i basef epesi atif, owa'atin. Pefa' basef ifimba endilisifi Godi. Ea' basef ifimba fatopalopa opalef ipe'ilifi, dei' paila waf bu'wafi. Ea' afa' wanifela God dondola ipa' pefa' basef ananifi pagahapifana andeande'.

Ipa' Kristen alipipai, pame' akafimi na'amba atin si'i esis sagahapifa basef Godi sagape itap lu'upa Judiai. Esis sahapifa Jisas Krais, ea' amam nematawa Godi. Isimba atis dei' esis Juda saso'as akafimi anisa alop asasipi na'amba atin si'i ipa' wambel atembel sagase'epa akafimi.
Esis Juda saha Dembinai Jisas naloma amom profet maga' ea' sanda' wandaf banagef sali'amonafa. Sogosambala waf God okom maga'iefi sahambombaga epes hiasi.

Ea' sasopama ufia'wa afa' uga'ipas basef Godi esis sogololama anini ma nowambilasi sotanimai sogape andeande'. Esis Juda sanda'as na'amba dei' sowatani waf awafi asasifi atapif fataga lu'uf a'owa'. Fowa' God natitilis dowaf apa' dei' okom wandafunai ananinai nafi'i natagamas nemaf akutaifi nonda'as awes lamonas.

Ipa' Kristen alipipai, esis Juda sali'amonafa nogota bandata ma wagape si'i awasi mamasas akasi. Endilisi afa' ina wati amagahipama, apa' ukup afa'ipi pape palomepa. Isimba atis dei' wanda' maol banagambel a'owa' ma uti ano'w ufia'wa ofo'o ugati amagahipama. Afa' ukup paipailipa a'owa' ma ugatilipa.
Ea' dei' wa'i ofe'mago ipa'. Ae' Pol anda'as nimaguf hiafi a'i efo'o, owa' Satan nahefamafa ufia'w.

Anaf Dembinai ape'inai nugafi'i wapani, dao' apa' mulutu nogohnaep ananisi. Afamba afa' ukup be'ep pepoma main? Ea' ondagala ma hiahawes mais fasisi? Owa'atin. Nemaf afamba afa' ondagalama ipa' atipa. Afamba afa' hiapai mofe' mope mogalomana.

Afa' dei' ina wame' anif basefa ipa' pape pa'imama, ata' owa'atin. Dei' wandaiwa'ma ata' ogape nogota laota na'a'e. Ea' wa'i afa' atofa biafa ope na'a wambel lu'wambili Atens, ea' wasapa' owamafa afa'inai Timoti wanda' maol atin Godi nofo'o ma niga'ipasa basef bu'wafi Kraisi. Wasapa'ana nafo'o nowa banagaipa notopalopepa ma pigahapifana banagepa.
Na'amba atiasi anipa pendafa'ma hiahaom amamba akafimi lu'wami, ea' pewa alafugaha God. Ipa' pegawa ea', God atona nandandepapa ma mogofa' hiahaom amamba akafimi.
Aho', fowa' afa' wape wagalomepa, wa'ipipa wa'i, “Anaf afa' ofa akafimi.” Ea' isimba dei' satagamafa si'i fowa' wa'ipipa pegegawas.

Ae' ina ata' epe esasa wapani, owa'. A'i a' efo'o. Ea' asapa' anona amana nafo'o nogogawa hapif ipe'ini ma nogatopalopepa. Na'amba aman anamba aunai Satan nanda' kikipai ni'i'ipipa ma waf awafi, ea' maol afa' wanda'ani nenalo dowaf.
Timoti nakwahepa ea' dei' atef nafi'mai afa', nawalapa basef fasifi ma afa'. Na'ipafa ma ipa' pahapifa Kraisa ukup pagapagaila anis epes daias. Ea' na'i ipa' pa'i petolofa, afa' wapani wa'i utilipa.
Ipa' Kristen alipipai afa'ipai, afa' wame' basef ifimba ogawa ipa' pahapilif pape. Ea' sonahafa ma ipa', wame' ipa' pahapifana pagape. Isimba atis sowa' banagafa ma nimanimi hiami ogofa'ami.
I'i ipa' pepe banagepama Dembinai, afa' wapani ope ondagala ambal namili endilisi.
Afa' sonahafa endilisi ma naep God afa'inai. Ipa' pahapifana la'ifipa. Ea' afa' wanifela Goda dagala nagaso'afani.
Dondol owamb alip afa' wanda' betenepa dindinipa wa'i ugati amagahipama ogogawa ipa' pahapifana banagepa a'a owa'? Afa' wa'i ofo'o ma ogatopalopepa pegaso'ana opalef God banagambela pegape andeande'.
Afa' wandabeten wahali' ahamafa afa'inai God naloma Dembinai Jisasa monda' ufia'w kogal motopalopafa ogafe'mago ipa'.
Afa' wa'i Dembinai notopalopepa ma waf afamba pendasoso'ama opalef ipe'ilifi hi'indalalef ea' pese'asalef esis hiasi wapani, waf afamba a' fendataga lu'wifa ipa', si'i afa' wali' wagase'epa nelelemb.

Wa'i ipa' penda' waf afambai ma God nogowa' banaga opalef ipe'ilifi. Ama anaf Dembinai ape'inai netambel nifi'i nogalumai esis hiasi sagahapifanai sagape hilili'i ma ipa' pegape be'epa hilili' diga basef akepa ma naep Godi ahamapa ape'inai.

Alipipai, fowa' afa' wa'ipipa wihimba'mepa waf ipa' pepe pefe' andeande' ma pigailafi, si'i God okom maga'iefi. Fowa' pailaf dei' wapani pilaf atapif. Ea' afa' wahali'ipa wasa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma agol Dembinai Jisasa pilaf penda'af fefe' atin fetaga lu'uf.
Ipa' pegawa basef ifimba wagawalapefa ipe'i ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas.
Okom Godi na'amba. Ipa' amam nematawa pepe be'epa hilili' ananipai atipa ma pindihi'ama waf afamba so'a waulafi.
Ipa' amam hipai, nemaf mamahefa pa'i pegaso' nematawa pila waf God naga'iefi pendaso'ama andeande' pepe hilili'. Nomonas sopaipa pimafi alop ipe'ipi andeande' datima ma waf awafi so'a waulafi akepa.
Waf afamba na'amba. Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi owa'i usihilimba waf awafi sanda' so'a waulafia, si'i isimba sogololama God sanda'afi, owa'i. Hapaifi.

Ea' ipa' amam ina a' penda' waf awafi ma esis sahin owan ipe'isi pefa' nematawa anom amami, owa'i. Dembinai okom wandafunai nagapomasi epes isimbai sanda' waf afambai ma na'i nogagwamasa waf afamba awafi esis sanda'afi. Fowa' afa' wawalapa isimba alihis wa'ipipas dindinip.
Dembinai God ina nofalapa ma monda' waf afamba awafi, owa'atin. Anen nofalapa ma mugaila waf fasifi hilili'i.

Basef Godi fa'i apa' ina monda' waf so'a waulafi, owa'atin. Ea' epes mamahisa sogowa' alafugaha basef ifimbai, ina sowa' alafugaha epes atis, owa'atin. Sowa' alafugaha God wapani. God atona nase'epa Ambal bu'unai ananinai.
Dei' afa' ina ata' onda' anif basefa ipa' ma waf afamba ipa' ukup pigapigaila esis hiasi sahin owanasafi, owa'atin. God nawalipipa hi'alepa ma waf afambai.
Ipa' pagaso'asa opalef esis sahin owani anamba itap lu'upa Masedoniai. Ipa' alipipai, afa' wa'ipipa dindinip wa'i, ipa' ukup pipila esis sahin owan isimba penda' waf afambai fetaga fefe' banagef.
Ipa' nomonas solasefe' banagesa pegape sa'ombel pigimafi hiahawes ipe'isi andeande'. Penda' maol lagof ipe'igufi si'i fowa' waga'ipipa.
Penda'as na'amba ma pegafe' andeande' naep esis isimba owa' ata' sombema nelelemb sogataga Kristenia. Ea' penda'as na'amba ma ina waowaola anis hiahawes, owa'atin endilisi.

Ipa' sahin owan, afa' wa'i ipa' pegawa andeande'ma amam nematawa isimba sagaga'i. Na'amba nelelemb ipe'ilimbi ukup pipilas pelopas si'i isimba sogololama hapifi sanda'am. Esis owa' sogawa ma sope sogasasa nemaf afamba anaf sotambel sogosafel wapani wandelefafia.

Apa' mahapifa Jisas, anen naga' sawana ea' notanima nosafel. Isimba atis dei' mogawa mahapifa Goda anaf nowambilai esis Kristen isimba sagahapifana endilisi ma sagaga'i sosafel wapani sufi'i sogalomai Jisas.

Afa' wawalapa basef Dembinaii atifa ipa' na'amba. Anaf Dembinai notanima nugafi'i, apa' amam nematawa ata' magape itapi ambagof ata' fagapaipai, apa' ina atiasi muli' mofe'ma esis isimba sagaga'i, owa'atin.

Dembinai nifi'i ni'i dindinip a'owa' ea' ensel Dembinai noga ni'i basef banagafi mehip, nufapula alof lu'unai Godi nonda'am nogal mehip. Nogota atamba Dembinai nokwaha heven nisila'i. Ea' sagahapifa Kraisi fowa' sali' sagaga'i, atiasi sili' sosafel.
Ama main owa', nemaf afamba atef Dembinai nofa'apa amam nematawa ambagof fagapaipai molota otaga ilif moloma amam nematawa isimba muti Dembinai. Ea' apa' hiapai mope molomana dondol lifilafi.
Isimba atis dei' pendewa' banagama atina nelelemb ipe'ilimbi ma basef ifimba.
Ipa' amam nematawa afa'ipai alipipai, afa' ina onda' anif basef laufi ma uga'ipipa nemaf afamba hiahawes isimba sogataga, owa'atin.
Ipa' pegawa ea' nemaf afamba Dembinai nigafi'afii. Anen nogafi'i nifi'i si'i epen nanda' wali nagafi'i owamba pa'oh pegelelamana.

Atiasi anis amam nematawa si'ias si'i, “Ea' dei' a' nemaf bu'wafi ma tol mogape andeande'.” Esis owa' si'ias na'amba owa', nogota atamba atota hiahaom mogahambombaga alop asasipii motagamas kwafalis atis, si'i nemata'w kwagame' akepa kogola batawin. Ea' esis ina atiasi sindihi'ama hiahaom amamba, owa'atin.
Apa' ipa' alipipai, ina ata' pagape owamb akuti si'i isimba sogololama Dembinaii, owa'. Ipa' ina bombolalasipa ma nemaf afamba fegataga si'i bombolagalasipa ma aman nanda' wali nagafi'i, owa'atin.
Ipa' epes hipai pagape lagala alipi. Ina si'i epes sagape owamb akuti, owa'atin.
Ea' ipa' ina penda'as si'i isimba anis ukup paso'as sa'oh sogololai, owa'atin. Andeande'ma apa' ukup talambi mope naep pegetawa.
Apa' mogawa esis isimba saga'ihi esis sa'oh owamb atomb. Ea' isimba sa' embela sahaga sagagauli sanda'am owamb atona.

Apa' mape si'i epes sagape alipi, nomonas sondapaepa mumafi alop andeande'. Apa' mofa' waf afamba mogahapifana banagepa ma mogaso'as opalef anis, si'i sanda' wandafi sofa' walitah sanda' wandafa magahagasa wambawa. Apa' mogawa basef amamba owagama God nofa'apa mogotanimai. Ukup pendanda' ma basef amamba si'i mogowalo' anota hat banagitai tigili'ama balagah.
Dembinai God ina nosaho'apa ma mogofa' okom wandafunai ananinai nogahambombagapa, owa'atin. Anen nosaho'apa ma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai nowambelapa mogotanimai.
Fowa' anen naga' ma nogatopalopapa, i'i nemaf afamba anen nogotanimai mope ambagof fopaepa a'a moga', mofe' mope namepa molomana.
Dei' ipa' hipai pewa' banaga nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pendatopalopa atin si'i dei' pape panda'as.

Ipa' Kristen alipipai afa'ipai, afa' wa'ipipa na'amba, wa'i amom agufumi mugumafi esis Kristeni, anom manda' maol numa'wini malomepa matopalopepa. Ipa' pendafe' lafela amom. Dembinai nanda'am mape agufumi ipe'imi ma mogawa monda' nomonas ipe'isi usi'is.
Ipa' ukup pepoma maol amamini, ea' ukup pipilam be'ep pepomam endilisi. Ea' ukup atifip pindaima atin peloma esis sahin owan.

Ipa' Kristen alipipai afa'ipai, afa' wa'ipipago dindinip wasa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma pegatopalopago isimba ala'uta nagahasi banagambel pi'ipasa sokwahago waf ala'uta nagahasanai. Ea' anis ambagof fondola'asi ma owa' siga'i anif basefia, ipa' pewa' banagasa siga'i anif basef. Ea' pewa' banaga anis owa' sogahapifana banagesia. Penda' waf sa'umbilifi ma esis hiasi.
Na'amba ipa' pegwamasa waf awafi anis epes sanda'mepaf ipe'i, owa'i. Dondol pilutu banagepa ma waf bu'wafi atef, pendanda'maf atin. Ea' penda'masaf isimba anis hiasi wapani.
Ipa' pendagala lifilafi.
Pendabeten pihali' God dondol owamb alip.
Ipa' pinifelona hiahawes hiasi. Ipa' pagape sisihipama Krais Jisasi, God na'i ipa' penda' waf fasifi pinifelonama hiahawes hiasi.
Ipa' ina pipihi' nif ifimba ma maol Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda'ani, owa'i.
Ipa' ina pewa' alafugaha basef Godi Ambal bu'unai nasa'mas saga'ipipafi, owa'i.
Pewaloga basef hiafi, ma pihapila basef fasifi atif tatala'if.
Ea' pindihi'ama hiahaom awami mamimami hiami.

God anen kofagonama nomonas awanisi. Ae' a'i anen atona nonda'epa pepe be'epa hilili' ananipai atipa. A'i anen numafi ambagof foloma alop nomonas ipe'isi andeande'ma waf awafi akepa, pegape hilili' ma nemaf afamba Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nogotanimafii.
God nogofalipai, andeande' a'owa'. Basef feloma maol main na'ias ea' ma nonda'asi, atiasi anen nonda'as endilisi andeande' datimai.
Ipa' Kristen alipipai, pendanda' betena God nogatopalopafa.
Ipa' pendaso'ama lagof pendanda'ma nemaf bu'wafi peloma esis Kristen alipisi hiasi.
Ae' a'ipipa dindinipa agol Dembinaii, ipa' pi'i basef ifimba ma esis Kristen alipisi hiasi.
Afa' waga'ias na'amba wa'i, Jisas Krais notopalopepa dowaf nowa' banagaipago. Ea' ma'uf.

Ae' Pol aloma Sailasi Timoti wape na'a'e. Ea' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' Kristen pagape wambel Tesalonaikai. Ipa' pape paloma God ahamapa ape'inai naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais. Ipa' Kristen pape palomam ea' amamipai si'ipa.
Ae' a'i ahamapa God noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaipa ea' mope molomepago mese'epago opalef awanilifi.

Ipa' Kristen alipipai afa'ipai, afa' wa'i andeande'ma dondol waganifela Goda ipa'. Waf afambai usi'ifi. Dei' main, hapif ipe'ini nataga banagen a'owa' ea' ipa' hipai atona atin ukup pindaima atin. Ea' waf afamba fetaga fendafe' lu'uf a'owa'.
Waf afamba atef dei' afa' wasa'ma agof ipe'igufi la'afena amam nematawa Kristen. Wa'ias na'amba wa'i esis Tesalonaika sofa' nimanimi maloma akafimi hiami, apa' owa', sahapifa Jisas salutu banages.

Waf afamba ipe'ifi bu'wafi, God nihimba'mafa na'amba. Anen nawalogapa ma waf ananifi usi'ifi atef. Nanda'as na'amba ma niga'i ipa' bu'upai ma pigawis anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma. Dei' ipa' pefa' nimanimi maloma akafimi hiami. God atiasi nonda'epa be'epa ma pegape anamba nagala'ambemagoma.
Anaf God nonda' waf usi'ifi na'amba. Nogwamasa nimanimi esis sanda'mepam ipe'i.

Anen na'i notagwaha nimanimi amamba dei' ipa' pegefa'ami ea' notagwaha nimanimi afa'imi nonda'apa mopoma noma'w andeande'. Nonda'am nemaf afamba Dembinai Jisas nokwaha heven nogataga alihina nogalomai nif lu'wami feloma ensel amamba banagami.
Nemaf afamba God nohambombaga esis isimba sogololama anini soloma isimba owa' sigaila basef bu'wafi Dembinai ape'inai Jisasia.
Epes isimba atiasi sofa' akafimi awami na'amba. God nohambombagas lifilafi atapis. Ea' sope laogona nogohnaep Dembinaii, mogogala'i moloma banagami ananimi.

Nemaf afamba atiasi Dembinai notanimai nifi'i ma amam nematawa hilili'i ananisi sogasa'ma agol ananigili goloma mogogala'i ananimi, ea' amam nematawa sagahapifana sonohasa anen sogasa'ma agol ananigili. Nemaf afamba ipa' wapani penda'as na'amba atin. Dei' main, afa' wawalapa basef Godi la'afena ipa' ea' pahapifa basef ifimba endilisi.

Afa' ukup pandanda'ma isimba ea' dondol wandabetena God ape'inai ma nogatopalopepa. Afa' ogawa God nofalepa ea' wandabetena anen nonda'epa la'ifipa endilisi si'i anen nofalepa penda'as. Afa' wandabetena God nowa' banagaipa ma penda' waf afamba bu'wafi hiafi pa'i pinda'afi, ea' pendanda' maola pahapifa Krais panda'ani.

Afa' wandabetena ipa' ma atiasi pegasa'ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisasi ma nonda'as na'amba atin nogasa'ma agof ipe'igufi. Amamba motagama God ape'inai naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais mogatopalopepa dowaf mogowa' banagaipa.
Ipa' Kristen alipipai, afa' wa'i wi'i basefa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais atiasi notanima nugafi'i wapani ma apa' mondakolas mogalomana. Dei' wahali'ipa na'amba.

Anis epes sa'ipipa sa'i nemaf Dembinai anaf nogafi'afii fataga ea'. Ae' ina' egawa. Basef ifimbai Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipanef anin epen na'ipipaef a'a anin epen na'ifa okom ananimi atom a'a esis sa'i afa' wanda' basef ifi'i wasapa'ef fafo'o wa'ipasa basef ifimba? I'i pegame'asa basef na'ambaifima, ipa' ina pehafel gogolalasipa kwapete' kwafalis ea' ukup ipe'ipi nimanip a'owa', owa'i.

Ipa' ina peme' anin epen nembaso'mepa ma anif basefa Dembinai nogotanimai, owa'i. Nemaf Dembinai nogafi'afii, ina fetaga dowadowaf, owa'atin. Epes hiasi ata' sili' sonda' du'waniga soso'ana alafugah ea' aman aunai nogosambala mu'uli Godi notaga nondawalap. Ea' aman anamba owagama nefe' wambel awambili hel nif fagandifi.

Anen atiasi nohamasa hiahaom amamba hiami epes sanda' lotumami sagailam si'i Godi ea' nowa' alafuga ma hiahaom amamba. Ea' nosa'ma agol ananigili atogol lu'wagol, nonda' hiahaom amambai hiami mofe' lafel. Ea' nuwis nope ipat lu'unai Godi nowalapa basef na'amba ni'i, “Ae' atowe Dembiwai God.”
Fowa' ae' ape alomepa a'ipipa basefa hiahawes isimba. Ipa' ukup pase'epamas a'amon?
Ipa' dei' pegawa hiahaom isimba magahefa ufia'wa aman anamba aunai ma notaga nondawalap alihigima nemaf afamba God nandandepanafi.
Ipa' pegawa dei' banagami amamba mogosambala mu'uli Godi ata' manda' maol mandambaho' mape. Amamba ata' mapoma mondahama nogota atamba aman anamba nigili'ama ufia'w anani'wi atiasi nondaomb nogafe'.
Nemaf afamba aman anamba aunai nogosambala mu'uli Godi notaga nondawalap. Ea' nemaf Dembinai Jisas nogafi'afii nohana noga'ma malogol ambip ananimi atom moloma lait nogogala'i lu'unai ananinai.
Aman anamba aunai nogosambala mu'uli Godi atiasi notaga nondawalap alihigima ma banagami Satani atom. Ea' waf baso'aifi Satani ma nonda' maol banagani ametal banagani naninani si'i God nanda'ani.

Anen nanda' waf hiani baso'amunai ma waf awafi. Atiasi nombaso'ma esis sa'i higiligalasi. Apa' i'i epes isimba siga'i aho'ma basef endilisifi, dao' atiasi God nofa'as sotanimai sope andeande'. Owa', sandaiwa'.
Ea' atiasi God nosapa'i hiahaom amamba mogombaso'ma esisi ea' seme' basef amamba kwamaimi baso'ami asasimi sahapilam.
Esis amam nematawa hiasi ina ata' sohapifa basef endilisifi, a' owa'atin. Asonahasa sonda' waf awafi atef. Isimba atis atiasi sofa' hiahaom awami atoma basefa kot anaf Dembinai God nonda'masanai.

Fowa' gani dambadamba God nosahe'epa ea' ma nowambelepa pitanimai pagahapifa basef endilisifi. Ama banagami Ambal bu'unai ananinai nanda'epa be'epa hilili'. Ea' dondol wanifela Goda ipa'. Kristen alipipai, okom Dembinaii maimailipa.

Nemaf afamba afa' waga'ipipa basef bu'wafi Godi ma anen nofalepa nogase'epa nogogala'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi. Ma God nogasa'ma agola Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi gogaloma agof ipe'igufi wapani.
Ea' dei' ipa' Kristen alipipai pindalutu banagepa ma basef hiafi Godi waga'ipipaef malogufi o wagase'epaef okwatihi, ifimba ipa' dailaef.

Afa' wa'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais naloma God Ahamapa ape'inai ukup amamipi pipilapa ea' motopalopapa dowaf mowa' banagapa. Amom monda'apa na'amba, mowa' banagapa ma nelelemb ape'ilimbi lifilafi. Ea' matopalopapa mope mogohafa God nonda'apa mogape andeande' endilisi.
Ea' dei' afa' wa'i amom biam mowa' banaga opalef ipe'ilifi motopalopepa penda' waf fasifi hiafi ma piga'ipasa basef fasifi hiafi.

Ipa' Kristen alipipai, afa' wa'i ata' wi'ipipago anif basef daif wapani. Ipa' pendabetena Goda nogatopalopafa ma basef Dembinaii fendasauli' fegafe' kwafalis anamba hiagoma fegefa' agol lu'wagili si'i fowa' nanda'am la'afena ipa'.
Ipa' pendabetena afa' ma God nogatagwahofa ma lagofa epes isimba awasi sanda' waf awafii. Ipa' pegawa epes hiasi ina dei' sahapifa basef Godi, ata' owa'.
Apa' Dembinai naila basef ananifi andeande' nanda' hiahawes ananisi datima ma nowa' banagaipa numafipa ma aman aunai owa' la'ifinama nogahokola ipa'a.
Dembinai nasa'ma ukup afa'ipi ea' dei' ogawa ipa' na'amba. Waf hiafi wa'ipipa ma pinda'afi, afamba ipa' penda'af endilisi. Ea' anaf wapani ina pindaiwa'maf, owa'. Pilaf penda'af atin.

Afa' wa'i Dembinai nisindi'amona opalef ipe'ilifi ma pegegawa endilisi God okom maimailipa a'owa'. Afa' wa'i nemaf afamba nimanimi mogatagamepa, pindalutu banagepa ma pepel Kraisi atom penda' waf fasifi atef.
Ipa' Kristen alipipai, afa' wa'ipipa dindinip na'amba ma agol Dembinai Jisas Kraisi. I'i anis alipisi ipe'isi tol sope dowafa owa' seme' basef ifimba waga'ipasafi silifa, ipa' pindihi'amas pekwahis.
Ipa' pendegawa ma pigaila waf afa'ifi. Fowa' wape wagalomepa, ina tol wape dowadowaf, owa'.
Ina ofa' gwa'aisi dowadowafa ipa', owa'atin. Watalis atin wa'as. Ea' wanda' maol banagambel wanda' ahifimi hiami a'owa' owamb alipa ina wapoma ipa' atipa pelagafa ogape, owa'.
Afa' wi'i ogofa' gwa'aisi ma ipa', God na'i andeande'ma okom ananimi. Apa' afa' wandaiwa'ma ogofa' gwa'aisi ipe'isi, owa'. Afa' wanda'as na'amba ma pigati waf afa' wanda'afi ma petelef pigailaf.
Ipa' pegawa fowa' wape wagalomepa afa' wase'epa mu'uli na'amba. Na'i epen owa' nenda' maolia, ipa' ina pefagaman pese'an anis gwa'aisi, owa'atin, hapaini.
Afa' ina wa'ipipa na'amba dowaf, owa'. Wame' basefa anis sagape la'afena ipe'i ina sanda' maol, owa'. Tol sape dowaf. Esis sandapoma basef atom usiusihimi ma hiahaom anis daiasi atom.

Agol Jisas Kraisi Dembinai ape'inai afa' wa'ipipa dindinipa mu'uli inimba ma epes isimba sagape dowafi, wa'i osa'ma nomonas asasisi ma sonda' waf na'amba. Esis ata' sope andeande'ma sonda' maola sogatagama gwa'aisi asasisi atis dei'.
Apa' ipa' Kristen alipipai, ipa' ina ala'uta tehepa ma penda' waf bu'wafi, owa'i.

I'i anin epen owa' nila basef ifimba hiafi afa' wanda'afia, ipa' pendegawa epen inimba andeande'. Ea' pindihi'aman pepe laogona anin. Ama anin ambal aola waf ananifi. Dei' main, anin ina naila basef afa'ifi, owa'atin.
Apa' ina pefalan pi'i bouni ipe'ini, owa'i. Ukup pepoma anin si'i alipini ea' pi'ipana negegawa waf afamba awafi ma negakwahef.
Afa' wa'i Dembinai anen kofagonama opaf awenafi dondol nondase'epa okom awanami ma mamahagoma ipa' pepe pegafe'ma. Afa' wa'i Dembinai nope nolomago ipa' hipai.
Anen nanda' basefi nase'e pen ae' Pol anda' basef ifimba ma lagol ae'agili, a'i nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'. Ametal inimba ae'ani ma basef ifimba hiafi ae'afi, anda'ef na'amba atin.
Afa' wa'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais notopalopago ipa' hipai dowaf nowa' banagaepa. Ea' ma'uf.
Ae' Pol anda' pas isi'i. God nowambilai apa' mutanimai mope andeande' ea' mape mohafa anaf owagama mugati Krais Jisas. Amom biam mandandepe ma'ipi dindinipa agape aposel Krais Jisasi.

Ae' anda'menago basef ifimba ina' Timoti, ina' nahapifa God dei' nataga nogame ae'inai endilisi. Ae' a'i God noloma Krais Jisas dembinai afa'inai muti uwahipina motopalopena dowaf mowa' banagaena, opaf ine'ifi fope sa'ombel.

Fowa' ae' afo'o itap lu'upa Masedonia ma aga'ipina dei' na'amba atin, a'ipina wapani. Ina' ata' nendape atapina na'amba Efesusa niga'ipa anom amam dindinipa ina a' mi'ipasa anif basef baso'afi, owa'i. Mi'ipasa basef Godi atif.

Amom mokwaha basef ambas amamba talimi dowadowafa basef mamimami hiami saga'i agof isimba bafa'w ifa'w asasisi. Basef amamba magalalamona nomonas asasimi, magafela ukup asasimi sa'i basef sandahihianamaefami, amamba ina mogowa' banaga maol Godi, owa'. Maol inimba natagama mogahapifa God atona.

Apa' mu'uli inimba dei' aga'ipipani, i'i esis sohapilan silan, malogof fagape opalef asasilifi nomoni, fa'ipas fihimba'masa waf asasifi ina awef, owa'. Esis sahapifa God endilisi. Ama atiasi waf afamba hiafi fesa'ma ukup pigapigaila God nogaloma anis daias wapani.
Apa' anom amam ukup paso'ama waf afambai bu'wafi. Ea' dei' mololama basef bu'wafi ma'i basef wafifi atif.
Amom ma'i mopoma mogawalipas mu'uli Godi si'i anom dembami tisa ma'i, “Basef afa'ifi endilisifi atif.” Apa' amom ina mogawa basef ifimba maga'iefi mogawa kofagefa wapania, owa'.
I'i apa' mogawa mu'uli Godi milan, na'ambai andeande'.

Apa' mondogawa isimba wapani, mu'uli inimba ina nafi'mai epes isimba sagape andeande'i, owa'atin. Inimba nafi'mai epes sanda' waf awafii, sogosambala mu'uli inimbai owa' sogape lafela amom agufumia. Ea' anis sogowa' alafugaha Godi sanda' waf awafii. Anis saga'i waf Godi hapaifii, ma sagaila waf itapafi atefi. A anis saha ahapas mamasas sagaga'i, saha anis daidaias wapani sagaga'i.

Anis sanda' so'a wauli ma waf afamba awafii, a anis sagahambombaga anis amam nematawa si'i fowa' Sodom sanda'afi. Ea' anis sakwalopa anis epes sambaho'was sape anis daias safi'i satalisa sonda'mas maol. Ea' anis sambaso'ami, ea' anis sambaso'am saga'i basef endilisi gani ilifi. Ea' anis sanda' waf afambai, faloma anef waf hiafi awafi fapa' fagaloma basef endilisifii. Mu'uli Godi nafi'i naga'i epes isimba sanda' waf awafi.
Basef ifimba fape basef bu'wafi God a nase'ef ae' ma egawalapef. Basef ifimba bu'wafi fa'ipapa God bu'winai endilisi kofagonama dagalai, naloma hiahaom mogogala'i.
Dembinai ape'inai Krais Jisas nase'e banagami, okom mapoma ae' bu'uwai anda' maol ananini, nanda'e alutuma maol inimba, ea' anifelona.

Endilisi, fowa' dondol a'i basef anda' salamala agol ananigili, apa' aloma esis Kristen, anda' du'wanigama anen. Apa' ae' ina egawa andeande', owa' ihapifanaia, ea' dei' anda' waf afamba awafima anen atapiwi ape. Isimba atis dei' natolowe uwahipiwi natopalope.
Dembinai ape'inai natopalope dowaf nowa' banagae dei' ahapifana okom maimailana aloma hiasi.

Anif basef endilisifi atifa epes hiasi some'efa sogahapifif. Basef ifimba na'amba. Krais Jisas nisila'i itap apa'e ma nofa'apa epes manda' waf awafi mokwahomapaf mutanimai mogape andeande'. Ae' ea' ma'uwi ali' anda' waf awafi ikila' anis daiasi ea' ma'uwi ae' atowe.

Isimba atis dei' God na'i uwahipigama ae' ali' ma Krais Jisas na'i nihimba'masa anen ina okom wandafunama ae' ulal, owa'. Ae' anda' waf awafi ikila' anis daias, apa' owa' anen nape nohafe nogota lautai ma itanima igafi'mai anen. Ama owagama hiasi sogati ae' ma esis wapani sohapifana sogofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafi.

Anen dembinai King nagape dondol lifilafii. Anen owa' nogaga'ia, epes owa' la'ifisa sogatolonaia. Anen atona God endilisinai. Ae' a'i agol lu'wagili banagami mogogala'i mondapoma anen atona dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.

Nogame ae'inai Timoti, dei' ase'enago basef ifimba nenda' maolanafi. Ae' okom mandanda'ma basef Godi fowa' amom profet Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'mam maga'ipinafi. Ina' nila basef ifimba, nenda' wandaf banagambel andeande' neloma esis bousi.

Wandaf afamba ina' banagena nigahapifa God nenda' waf usi'ifi hilili', ma malogol gagape opaf ina' nomoni ina gihimba'mena anef waf awafi ina' nanda'afi, owa'. Anis epes sowa' alafugaha waf afambai bu'wafi. Ea' dei' hapif asasini papalalan ea' awasin si'i sip palalap pagail otamba awasip pagala naoh.

Epes hiasi sanda' waf afambai, amam biam Himeneusi Aleksander hapif amamini a' awen. Ae' andaiwa'mam ali'amonam mafe' lagof Seteni ma mogogawa gawa fasini. Anda'am na'amba amom ina a' monda' basef findiwaefa agol Godi, owa'i.

Maol inimba ae' a'i esa'ma okom ine'imi nenda'ani, basef fagali'i na'amba. Ipa' pendabeten pefala God pihali'ana, pinifelona ma epes hiasi pendabetena anen nogatopalopa esis soloma amom king dembami moloma gavman dembami wapani. Ipa' pendabeten na'amba ma apa' hiapai tol mogape opalef awanelef, mogaila waf Godi usi'if hilili'i.
Beten inimbai bu'wani ma naep Godi, notanima nogofa' apa' mogape andeande'i. I'i apa' monda' waf afambai mondabeten, anen sonahana ma apa'.
Anen na'i nofa'i epes hiasi sotanimamai anen sope andeande'ma sogogawa basef endilisifi kofagefa.
Apa' mogawa God atotona nape. Ea' anona aman nagape la'afena God naloma epesi, anamba aman endilisinai anen Krais Jisas.

Anen fowa' God nandandepana ea', nakwaha ambal ananili atola natala apa' epes hiapai nakwahomapa waf awafi mogotanimai. Nemaf afamba dondo'afi Krais nihimba'mapa God na'i nowambilai epes hiasi sogotanimai.

Ea' dei' God nanda'e ape aposela egawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi. Ae' a'i endilisi, ina ambaso'am. Anen nanda'e ape dembiwai tisa ma epes anep mini'ap sogololama Godi ma sogahapila basef ifimba endilisifi.
Ea' dei' ae' a'i epes hiasi walemb hielimbi sondabeten. Ae' okom ma'i esis hiasi sondape bo'wes hilili', sokwaha ukup wandafipi peloma migimigah sondabeten.

Ae' a'i awo nematawa wapani ondanda' klos mais bu'wasi atis, sondahama awo dondo'. Ina onda'as bandabandas a'owa' sotambel bimbitagw, owa'i. Awo ina ondagala sosaf anambai, ofalo'ma balagah alop si'ipa bahigis mamimami hiami moloma sosaf gol fasimi si'i kapai, owa'. Klos isimba sagalotamas a'owa' otamba hiambai owa'i otalisa, hapaisi.
Apa' nematawa wa'i basef wa'i ogape awasi Godi, awo ondanda' maol bu'wani hiani naninani. Maol inimba si'i sosaf awoufi endilisifi.
Nemaf mamahefa ipa' penda' lotu main, nematawa awo ondawalipama ogaila waf afamba sa'umbilifi ea' osopama malogofa ogofa' basef andeande'.
Ae' ina a'i aho'ma ano'w nemata'w kope dembe'wi tisa kope kwili' kowalepa amoma basef, owa'. Nematawa osopama malogof ondame' basef atif.
Basef kofagefa fagape na'amba. Fowa' God nali' nanda' aman Adam, ama main nanda' Iv kwagi'.
Adam ina nahapifa basef baso'afi, owa'. Nemata'w kwahapifa basef baso'afi, ea' kwataga nemata'w kwanda' waf awafii.

Waf nematawa onda'afi afamba. Awo ondahapifa God endilisi ea' ukup pipila anis daias otopalopas, ea' ondape bo'owa hilili'ma ugumafi awo andeande'ma waf awafi akawa. I'i uhapila waf afamba wilaf atapiwa, God atiasi nokwahomawa waf awafi nofa'awa utanimai ogape andeande'. Ma ogola awasima, atiasi notopalopawa ogolas andeande'.
Basef ifimba endilisifi. I'i aman ami ni'i nogape dembinai nugumafi esis Kristen sios Godi, anen okom monda'i maol fasini a'owa'.

Ea' aman ami nope nugumafi siosi nondape andeande' a'owa' ma epes ina siti anef waf awafima anen, owa'. Anen noso' nemata'w atoto'w. Ina nea' embel okom moso'ana, owa'. Anen nomonas sondapaona nundumafi alop ananipi andeande'. Anen nindaila okom bu'wami atom nonda' waf hiafi usi'ifi. Anen okom mi'i hiasi alipisi atis ananisi hi'ilas nondaso'as gwa'aisi. Anen nope notaga tisa bu'winai ma basef bu'wafi atif.
Ina nea' embel banagimbeli hiambel, owa'. Ina okom wandafuna kwafalis, owa'. Nonda' epes sa'ombemas. Ina nohas atin, owa'. Ina okom mi'i moni a'owa'.
Anen numafi awasi waulu'mana andeande', ea' nonda' awasi ananisi sila basef ananifi, ma sonda' agol ananigili gogape andeande'.
Aman mamahonama owa' nugumafi awasi soloma waulu'mana andeande'ia, anen ina notaga nope agilinai numafi sios Godi, owa'.
Aman anamba nagataga Kristen dambanai ina nope dembinai numafi sios, owa'. Na'amba nonda' du'wanigama God nili'amonana si'i nagali'amona Satan.

Aman agol bu'wagilinai ma amam nematawa sogololama Godi, dao' aman anamba notaga nope numafi sios. Apa' anen i'i owa' agol bu'wagilinaia, atiasi anen ambal aola waf awafi ea' nofe' nuwis isag anamba Seteni ea' nofa'ana.

Ea' na'amba atina amam amamba magatopalopa agufumi siosi, amom ukup pendape usi'ipa maol amamini. Amom ina mi'i malogof biagof, owa'. Ina mea' embel banagimbeli hiambel a'owa' mohagamogaol, owa'. Ea' ina mombaso'mas molomas mofa' otamba anis epesi, owa'.
Basef ifimba endilisifi fowa' fandambahi'i dei' fataga fandawalap alilihif, amom mondahapilif sisihif atapif. Ea' malogof fagape opalef amamilifi nomoni fendape hilili' andeande'.
Pigali' ata' pegwamba maol amamini. Ama piti monda'an andeande'ma, dao' a' mope monda' maola sios.

Ea' na'amba atina wauhiamam amamuwai ukup pendapaowa andeande'ma maol awo onda'ani. Awo ina ondaha basefa anis, owa'i. Ondape andeande' ina wea' embel numbutimbeli wain hiambel, owa'i. Dondol ondanda' waf bu'wafi atef.
Amam monda' maol siosi, wauhiamam amamuwai ato'w atin. Amom mundumafi awo oloma awasi amamisi andeande'.
Amom mogape monda' maola siosi, i'i monda' maol fasini, atiasi mofa' agof fasigufi. Ama banagem mogowalapa basef bu'wafi, mihimba'mas amom magahapifa Krais Jisasi.
Endilisi ae' a'i efe'mago ina' kwafalis, apa' dei' ata' anda' basef ifimba ina'.

Ma i'i owa' efo'o etaga ulala, ina' nitigu basef ifimba ea' negawago waf afamba esis sagape andeande'afi ma wambota atamba Godi. Wambota atamba esis sios Godi ambal namili lagapaunai. Sios Godi si'i olaf banagafi fogowa' banaga basef endilisifi.

Endilisi atis, basef ifimba kofagefa lu'wafi a'owa'. Owa' anin epen la'ifina negegawefa, owa'. Fandambaho' fape fafe' fafe' dei' God nihimba'mafaef alihif. Basef ifimba na'amba. Anen nataga epen endilisi nofa' alop epesi, nataga nandawalap. Ambal bu'unai Godi nihimba'mapana anen aman bu'unai nagape hilili'i. Amom ensel Godi matolona. Basef ananifi fafe'ma esis wambotagw amam nematawa hiasi sogololama Godi. Esis epes itapasi sahapifana. Ea' God nofa'ana nalota heven nape mogolala'i ananimi.

Ambal bu'unai Godi na'i basef alihif na'amba. Anaf owagama anis epes sokwaha sagahapifa basef endilisifi Godi. Ea' aseme' malogofa epes isimba ambagof awami magambaso'ami sila basef ambagof awami maga'iami.
Anom amam magambaso'ami mawalipasa basef ifimba baso'afi. Malogof fagape opalef amamilifi nomoni faso' si'i saofa otamba sagasambagof. Amom ina atiasi ata' momeme'ma waf awafi mogawaf, a' owa'atin.

Atiasi muwalipasa basef ifimba ma esis sigihi'a waf sandaso'amafi sigihi'a anis gwa'aisi epes saga'asi wapani. Apa' gwa'aisi isimba God atona nanda'asa apa' epes mahapifana mogogawa basef endilisifi. Amambai, apa' mofa'am minifela Goda moga'am.
Hiahaom hiami God nanda'ami, bu'wami atom. I'i minifelonamam, andeande' mofa'am. Ina mokwahom, owa'.
Dei' main, basef Godi faloma beten sanda' gwa'aisi isimba sataga bo'wes hilili'.

Ina' i'i negaso'asa basef ifimba esis Kristen alipisima, dao' atiasi nepe epen bu'winai nenda' maola Krais Jisasi. Ea' nefa' banagami lu'wami ma basef fagasa'ma hapif ine'inii ma gawa nefa'an nagailani.
Apa' esis amam nematawa saga'i numunefisa basef atom wafimi, newa' alafugamam. Ina' nendelafa waf Godi andeande' nendegawam.

Ina' negawa, waf afamba niwalipa alop si'ipa ponda' maol pigiawi, isimba la'ifis kwasala ma sogatopalopapa. Apa' ina' nendelafa waf Godi dao', banagef endilisi ma fegatopalopapa ma waf hiafi. I'i ina' nelafa waf Godi, afamba fatopalopa apa' epes hiapai ma dei' magape itap nogota ata'e, ea' fetopalopapa anaf heven wapani.
Basef ifi'i endilisifi atifa epes hiasi si'i awi ma seme'ef sogahapififi, ifimba na'amba.

God anen ambal namili lagapaunai. Anen na'i nowambilai amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas sotanimai sogape andeande'. Ea' dei' endilisi atis nowambilai epes mamahisa sagahapifanai. Dei' mape mohafana ma'i endilisi nogofa'apa. Isimba atis dei' manda' maol numa'uni endilisi.
Ina' nese'asago basef ifimba fefe'mago esis amam nematawa, ea' niwalipas dindinipa sigailif.

Esis sati ina' ukup pandanda' pa'i, ina' ata' sa'winai, apa' ina si'i ina' aman falafunai, owa'atin. Ina' nendape si'i ametal bu'wani ma esis Kristen sigaila waf bu'wafi ine'ifi ma fe', poe, ki, hapif ine'isi, soloma waf afamba okom magaila anis deindeiasafi, soloma waf bu'wafi hilili'i.

Nogota atamba ina' ata' nepe atapina nehafago ae'. Ina' nenda'ago maol banagambela nigatalifa basef Godi alihigima ma epes hiasi, ea' nesa'mago ukup asasipi ma waf sonda'afi ea' niwalipas ni'ipaso andeande'.

Fowa' agufumi mugumafi siosi mawamona lagofena. Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'ma manda'mena beten ea' anom amam ma'i basefa presen inimba anen nagasi'inani. Dei' nenda' maol banagen nindimafi presen andeande' inimba God nali' nagase'enan dowafi.
Dondol ina' nindimafi maol inimba banagena atapina nendapoman. Ama epes hiasi sigati waf ine'ifi fegataga fasif.

Solawaina andeande'ma waf ina' nanda'afi, ma basef ifimba nigawalipasafi. Dondol ninda'am na'amba atapina banagambel. Ina' i'i nenda'as na'amba, atiasi God notopalopena neloma esis sogagahembe'ma basef malogol ine'igili, nowambelepa pitanimai pegape andeande'.

Ina nenda' megahogaha amam hagami niga'ipam diga lu'ugai, owa'i. Nisindi'amonam ni'ipam basef sa'umbilifi, nenda'as si'i nanda'manas ahamena ine'inai. Ea' nisindi'amona amam amamba sa'umi si'i nagasindi'amona owapena ine'imi.
Nisindi'amona nematawa hagiwai si'i nagasindi'amona ma'mena ine'ikwi. Ea' nisindi'amona nematawa sa'uwai si'i nagasindi'amona haniti'mina ine'ikwi, ma waf usi'ifi.
Basefa nematawa alifiwai faga'i na'amba. Nematawa awamba, i'i owa' anin epen numafiawaea, ina' nendanda'asawa andeande' nimafiawa.

Apa' i'i ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi anis awasi akwa'usi a'a bafasa'w akwa'usi sope esis ata' sondogawa andeande' na'amba. Maol asasini nigali'i sumafi ahasas mamasas asasisi atis ata' sili' ma sogagwa wiaf fowa' sugumafias. Esis sonda'as na'amba saila basef Godi. Aho', God okom ma'iaf a'owa' waf afambai.
Apa' i'i ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi ato'w gwaigwai'w kogape, ako'w konda'as na'amba. Ako'w kogawa endilisi God atiasi nogatopalopa'wi ma waf fasifi, kofala God lifilafi owamb alipa beten akwa'uni.
Apa' i'i ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwila okom akwa'umi atoma kwandagala alop atop dowaf, ako'w si'i kwagaga'i.
Ina' nesa'ma nomonas nematawai ma ugaila basef ifimba, ma awo atiasi ogape hilili'. Ama anin epen ina ni'ipawa ni'i awo wanda' waf awafi, owa'.

Epen ami owa' nigimafi esis esimbel atembel ananisia, anin ina atiasi nimafi esis wambota atota endilisi mamasan ahasan soloma batawisan. Epen inimba nakwaha hapif a' nataga epen awani endilisi nikila' isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia.

I'i anowa nematawa wahupawa magaga'awai awo ina onda' so'a waol, owa'. Ope andeande'ma anis daias sotolowa siga'i wagape andeande'i. Onda' maol bu'wani ma ugumafi batawisawa, ogaso'as gwa'aisi epes ogatopalopa esis Kristen wambota Godi, umafi awasi awausi andeande' ope onda' maol hiani bu'wani naninani ofe' ofe' otagama afagof 60-pelaiguf, dao'. Nematawa awamba nenda' agofawa negawawa ma negaso'awa gwa'aisi. Nematawa wanda'as na'ambai atowa ina' nenda' agof awaugufi fil okwatiha negatopalopawa.

Apa' ina' owa'i nenda' agofa nematawa awamba awo ata' sa'uwai aiawaiwai alifiwai, owa'. Hapewai. Ama nemaf mamahefa awo wi'i ugi'ma nomonas awousi ondagala alop awoupi atop wi'i ogaso' anom amam wapanima dao', ea' diamawago. Awo nomonas isimbai sapaowa, dei' ea' wakwaha wafa basef bu'wafi Kraisi fowa' wagahapilafi.
Dei' wakwaha basef bu'wafi banagafi fowa' wa'if wagaloma Kraisi. Wanda' waf afambai awafi, na'amba kofagefa awoufi.

Ea' anef waf awo wanda'afi wapani. Wanda' waf afamba ala'uta tahasa sanda'afi, ea' wafe' wawis ifagw hi'alagw. Awo ina ala'uta tahawa atin dowaf, owa'. Wakwalopa basef anis daiasi wanda'ef pi'ipe'ef wafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' wawalapa basef fafifafi ina andeande'ma apa' muga'if, owa'.

Isimba atis dei' a'i nematawa awamba ata' aiawai kwasakwasalai atiasi oso' amam wapani ma ola awasi umafias ogape ifagw awaugwi atogw. A'i awo ina onda' anom maefah awami motagama esis bousi ma siga'i anif basef awafi ma apa', owa'atin.
Ina' negawa anowa nematawa wahupawa magaga'i, wakwaha ufia'w fasi'wi wafe' waila Satan.

I'i anota wambota nemata'w akwambai ako'w Kristena anowa nematawa alifiwai ope, ea' Kristen akwamba kumafiawa. Ako'w konda'as na'amba esis sios ina noma'w nohasa sugumafawa, owa'atin. Na'ambai andeande'ma sios sugumafi nematawa kwahuwai awo atowa wagapani.

Agufumi mamahoma mugumafi ipa' Kristen monda' maol andeande'i, ipa' pinifelom penda'am andeande' pimafiam pese'am gwa'aisi mais bif atif mikila' anom deiom. Agufumi manda' maol Godi magawalipasa basef kofagefa ananifi ipa' pindimafiam na'amba atin andeande'.

Basef fagape Buk Baibeli faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Ina' owa'i nesopama malogofa bulmakau manda' maol magafa'asa witi, owa'.” Ea' anif basef wapani na'amba fa'i, “Aman nanda' maoli anen nogofa' anis hiahawes du'wanisa maol ananini.”

I'i anin epen atitin ni'i, “Agilinai anamba nugumafi esis Kristeni nonda' waf awafi, ina' owai' neme'anama basef ananifia, hapaini. I'i epes bias a'a wanis isi'i basef ifimba ma waf awafi anen nanda'afi, dao' ina' neme'as.
Apa' i'i anom agufumi monda' waf awafi, ina' nisindi'amonana dindinipa naep esis Kristen hiasi. Ma anis daias ombal mogahasa waf afambai, ma ina sonda' ambambai, owa'.

Ae' anda'epa ina' andeande'ma nogohnaep Godi naloma Krais Jisas maloma amom ensel God nandandepami. Ina' nindaila basef ifimba andeande'. Ina' owa'i ninifala anom sa'umi ni'ipam mehipa. Ea' owa'i nenda' anom dembami sa'ombemam ni'ipam sa'umbela, owa'i. Niga'ipas na'amba atin. Ea' owa'i ninifala anis epesa, a nenda' anis alipisi sa'ombemasa. Niga'ipas na'amba atin.

Ina' owa'i nifa'i anona aman kwafalis nenda'ana nope agilinai ma esis Kristena, owa'. Nili' negawana, nendondoma anen nanda' waf bu'wafi a'a nanda' waf awafi. Na'amba anis epes sitilina netopalopa anona nanda' waf awafi, si'i ina' wapani nanda' waf awafi. Ina' solawaina ma negape hilili'.
Ina' nekwaha waf afamba nega' embel atembel wafimbel dowaf. Andeande'ma noga' wain kwaia'wina negatopalopa opaf ine'ifi ma negatofa aowas inimba dondol nanda'inai.
Waf awafi anis epesi fape alihifa esis fafe' fali'as sogawaf kwafalis atis. Apa' waf awafi anisi fape fandambaho', ama main afataga fandawalap.
Ea' na'amba atin, anef waf fasifi wapani fape fandawalap. Apa' anef waf fasifi ina fandawalap ulal, ata' owa'. Afamba wapani ina fandambaho'w dondoli, owa'.

Ipa' Kristen agof akipai panda' maol dowaf pagape lafela anis daiasi, ipa' ata' ukup pendanda' na'amba. Dembami mugumafi ipe'i, ipa' pinifelam pi'i bu'wami pesa'ma agof amamugufi peme' basef amamifi. Ama anis epes daias ina atiasi si'i basef awafi ma agol Godi, ma waf ipa' Kristeni, owa'.

Ipa' agof akipai panda' maol dowadowafi ma amom agufumi dembami anom Kristen, ipa' ina ukup pendanda' na'amba pi'i, “Anom Kristen sahopafa atom ea' hapaimi, osambala malogof amamugufi.” Owa'atin. Ipa' ukup pendanda' na'amba pi'i, “Amom Kristen ea' afa' ukup pipilam, onda' maol amamini andeande', ukila' maol wanda'ana amom agufumi owa' Kristenia.” Dei' main, ipa' agof akipai patopalopa amom Kristen ipa' ukup pagapagailami. Timoti, basef ifimba ina niwalipasef nesa'ma ukup asasipi newa' banagas. Dondol ina' niwalipa esis amam nematawa ma sonda' waf fasifi, ea' nesa'masa sonda'am.

Basef dembinai Jisas Kraisi fawalipapa andeande'ma waf Godi. I'i anona aman nokwaha basef ifimba ma nowalipa esisa anif basef daif owa' fefe' dondo'ma basef ifimba fasisi usi'ifi Jisasia, apa' mogawa aman anamba na'i nonda' du'wanigai. Anen ina nogawa kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Anen nomonas awasisinai. Anen okom manda'i waf afamba nondopambema nogalomasafi atefa, nifitap nondalomasa basef kofagefa. Basef ifimba atif fagawalapa waf afambai. Opalef awalefa anis daindaias, sonda' findiwa, ma sogape ukup aweawep pegapoma sahin owan.

Epes isimba sandanda' na'ambai, ukup asasipi paolas endilisi, ea' ina sahapila basef fasifi endilisifi, owa'. Ea' sa'i basef sapa'ef sandahihianama saloma anis. Ea' sa'i, “Ufia'w akwamba Godi ufia'w sogofa' uga'wi.”
Endilisi atis, epen ami nigaila waf Godi, ma anin okom mondanda'ma hiahaom ananimi ni'i. Ea' ma'um a' dondo'ma anin ea', opaf ananifi fope awanef nepe andeande'.
Apa' mogawa, mamamapa olapa magataga itap apa'e, nemaf afamba apa' ina mofa' anom hiahaom mafi'i, owa'. Anaf mogaga' wapani ina atiasi mofa' anom maefah mofe' molomapa itap apa'e, owa'atin endilisi.
Apa' anis gwa'aisi luwaguf mais soga'omepa, apa' mi'ias mi'i, “Ea' ma'wis isimba ea' andodo'ma apa'.”

Apa' epes ukup pape sa'i sogofa' uga maina hianai, esis atiasi sowa ma gwamba anamba aunai, si'i huguf sandowam sambaho'wam magapoma mafisi ma mofe' mowala mopoma sogaham. Ea' atiasi ukup mamimami awami motagamasa hiahaom awami monda' esisa ukup moso'as higiligalas lamonas endilisi.

Waf afamba ukup piga'i moni a'owa', kofagefa ma waf hiafi awafi. Anis epes ukup lu'um ma'ima'i moni a'owa', ea' waf afambai fahondo'as sakwaha sagahapifa Jisas asafe'ma waf awafi. Ea' sofa' akafimi hiami lu'wami awami a'owa'.

Apa' ina' aman Godi, newa' alafugama hiahawes isimba nefe' nila waf afamba bu'wafi. Ea' nenda' maola negefa' waf usi'ifi endilisifi Godi, nihapifa Jisasa okom mogamogaila anis daias. Ama nigalutu banagena ma waf awafi anis sonda'menafi. Ina' nenda' waf sa'umbilifi ma anis epes daias.

Nigahapifa Krais si'i anin epen nasagih mehip nagaloma anis. I'i anin nesagih mehip nefe' nikila', atiasi nefa' hiahawes. Ina' wapani na'amba atin. I'i nihapifana banagena, anaf nepe andeande' lifilafi. Ina' nihapila okom amamba ambal fasili lagape dondoli fowa' God nofalena ma negofa'ali. Anen nofalena nemaf afamba ma negawalapa hapif inimba ine'ini naep epes hiasi sanda' lotuma Godi.

God naso'am ambal hiahaom hiami ea' Jisas Krais nawalapa basef kofagefa andeande'ma nogohnaep Pontius Pailat gavman dembinai. Naep Godi naloma Jisas Krais dei' ase'ena maol inimba na'amba. Ina' nimafi nomonas ine'isi andeande' nindaila basef ifimba Godi datima. Alogw owa'i gwilifa, ea' epes ina sonda' findiwa ma basef ifimba. Nimafif nendape na'amba atin nefe' netaga afamba Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nogataga alihina.

Nemaf afamba God naga'iefi nosapa'ana nifi'i. God atona kofagonama dagalai, anen atona Dembinai King nugumafi epes hiasii, soloma hiahaom hiami hi'igalami. Anen king Dembinai ma king hiamii, a' Dembinai ma dembami hiamii.

Ea' anen atona owa' nogaga'ia, nagape mogogala'i lu'wami endilisii. Ea' apa' dei' ina la'ifipama mogafe' felefele'ma anen, owa'. Dei' anin epen owa' netelonaia. Owagama wapani, owa' anin la'ifina nogati anona, owa'atin. Ae' a'i agol ananigili lu'wagili goloma banagami ananimi mondapoma anen atona lifilafi dondol. Endilisi.

Ina' ni'ipa epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi ma itap ana'e ina sonda' du'waniga sohapifa hiahaom amamba mamimami hiami awasim kwafalisi, owa'atin. Ina' ni'ipa epes isimba ma sogahapifa God endilisi, dao' andeande'. Anen atona nagaso'apai hiahaom hiami fasimi manda' ukup ape'ipi pagataga sonogahapi.
Ina' kipa epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi, sonda'ama sogatopalopa maol fasini. Esis dondol sowala hiahawes asasisi sofe'ma anis epes.
I'i sonda'as na'amba, andeande'ma atiasi sogakolasa hiahaom fasimi atom mogatopalopas anaf owagama. Sonda'as na'amba, sogofa' ambal fasili endilisi.

O nogame Timoti, ina' solawaina nindimafi basef ifimba God nagase'enafi andeande' datima. Newa' alafugama basef ifimba baso'afi wafifi saga'i basef gawaifi. Basef ifimbai fa'i fegahambombaga waf Godi.
Anis epes sahapifa basef ifimba baso'afi sa'i, “Apa' mogogawai.” Apa' owa' dei' sakwaha sagahapifa God andola sape. Ae' a'i God notopalopepa dowaf nowa' banagaipa. Ea' ma'uf.

Ae' Pol anda' basef fafe'mago ina' Timoti, ae' okom magamagailinai. Ina' nahapifa God dei' nataga nogame ae'inai. Okom Godi atom dei' ape aposel Jisas Kraisi. Basef Kraisi endilisifi atif, naso'apa ambal namili apa' magape sisihipama anini. Ae' a'i amom biam motopalopena dowaf mowa' banagaina, ea' muti uwahipina monda' nembel ine'imbili bepe sa'ombel.
Esis ihase ae'asi saila waf Godi, dei' ae' wapani ailaf. Ea' malogol gagape opaf ae' nomoni ina gihimba'me anef waf awafi anda'afi, owa'. Beten ae'ani owamb alip dondol ae' okom mapomena anifela God.
Ae' okom mapoma ambif fagaluwi naep ine'ipi, okom mohafel a'owa' a'i ata' efo'o itilina sonehe endilisi.

Ae' okom mandanda'ma hapif ine'ini, inimba endilisini, ina baso'amini, owa'. Hapif inimba fowa' nali' napoma iha'mena ine'ikwi Lois kwaloma ma'mena Yunis. Ea' egawa endilisi, hapif inimba dei' napoma ina' wapani.

Fowa' ae' awamona lagofa balaga ine'igai ma God nagase'ena hiahaom fasimi ananimi. Ea' dei' a'i esa'ma nomonas ine'isi ma okom mogapoma hiahaom amamba fasimi magapoma ine'i, si'i sugufapula nif fagandif lu'wif.
Ambal bu'unai God nagaso'apanai ina nonda'apa ombal mogahapai, owa'atin. Anen naso'apa waf afamba mugalutu banagepamafi ma ukup pigapigaila anis daias mugumafi alop ape'ipi andeande'.

Ina' owa'i ambal aola niga'ipasa basef Dembinai apa'inaia. Ea' owa'i ambal aola ae' wapania, owa'atin. Ae' anda' kalabusi, epen dembinaii. Ina' nefa' banagami Godi ma banagena nefa' nimanimi nelome ogawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi.

God nofa'apa mutanimai mogape andeande'. Anen nofalapa amam nematawa ananipai atepa mogape be'epa hilili'. Ina okom mapoma waf bu'wafi apa' manda'afi nofalapa, owa'atin. Okom ananimi atom maimailapa nofalapa natopalopapa dowaf. Fowa' dambadamba ina dei' nanda' itap, ata' owa', Jisas Krais naso'apa okom apa' natopalopapa dowaf.

Apa' dei' nogota ata'e Krais Jisas nafi'i nofa'apa motanima magape andeande'i, anen nataga alihina ea'. Dei' maol ananini God natopalopapa dowaf nogowa' banagapa ea' nataga alihin. Krais Jisas nikila' banagami magapoma ga'i, ea' basef bu'wafi Godi fihimba'mapa ambal lagape andeande' lifilafii.
Anen nali' nanda'e apoma maol inimba egawalapa basef fasifi ma epes hiasi. Ae' aposel God nasapa'e agawalapa basefi, ae' tisa dembiwai anda' maol Jisasi.

Isimba atis dei' efa' akafimi amamba. Apa' ae' ina ambal aola amamba, owa'atin. Ae' egawa aman anamba agahapifanai. Ae' egawana endilisi anen banagonai ma nugumafi hiahaom hiami moloma epes hiasi ananisi hi'ilas ae' agaso'anas lagof ananigufi. Ea' isimba sope bo'wes andeande' sefe' sotagama nemaf afamba lu'wafi fegataga.

Basef ifimba fasifi hilili'i ina' nagame'emef malogol ae'agili, basef ifimba si'i anol ametal fasini ma nigihimba'mena waf fasifi negawalipa epesafi. Ina' nihapifa Jisas Krais endilisi ea' okom mimilana nenda' waf na'amba nihapila basef ifimba tatala'if.
Nimafi basef ifimba bu'wafi endilisifi God nagase'enaef lagof ine'igufi ma nigimafiefi. Ambal bu'wali Godi nape nomona apa', notopalopena numafina ma maol inimba.
Ina' negawa epes hiasi sagape itap lu'upa Asiai, saloma amom biam Figelusi Hermogenes sakwahowe safe'.
Ae' andabetena Dembinai ma ata' nogati Onesiforus naloma wambota ananisi uwahipis. Dei' main, dondol nanda' okom ae'ami mape andeande'. Anen ina ambal aola ae' ape anda' kalabus, owa'atin.
Anen nafi'i Rom nanda' maol lu'wani nala' nolaome, nagatolowe.
Ae' andabetena Dembinai ma nogati anen uwahipina nemaf afamba lu'wafi. Anen natopalope nimaguf hiafi wambel ambalemba Efesus, isimba ina' negawas andeande' a'owa'.
Nogame ae'inai, dondol ina' nepe banagena ma Krais Jisas notopalopena dowafa banagami amamba nagaso' apa' magape sisihipama anini.
Basef hiafi ina' name' agawalapefa nogohnaep epes hiasii, ifimba newalapefa anom amam gawaimi mogogawa basef andeande'i, ma muga'ipa anis daias datima.
Ina' nendape banagena a'owa' si'i aman anamba soldia nindalutu banagena nindaila Krais Jisas. Nefa' nimanimi amamba neloma afa' anofa soldia ananifai ma maol inimba.
Aman anamba nagape si'i soldiai, ina nahapila maol naninani, owa'atin. Nandanda' maol inimba soldiai fasini atina na'i dembinai soldia ananinai okom muga'i maol ananini.

Na'amba atin, aman ami nondopambema noloma anis nogasagihi, nondaila waf afamba esis sagasagihafi. Ama nikila' nogofa' hiahawes isimba fasisi sasagih sikila'ma sogofa'asi. Apa' anen i'i owa' nigi'ma waf afamba sagasagihafi andeande'a, atiasi ina nofa' hiahawes isimba, owa'atin.
Aman nanda' maol lu'wani aofi ma nugumafiaf andeande'i atiasi nili' nogofa' gwa'aisi aof afambai nikila' anis daias.
Ina' okom mondapoma basef ifimba aga'iefi. Atiasi dembinai nondogamena okom ine'imi, ea' negawa basef ifimba hiafi kofagefa.
Dondol ina okom mopoma Jisas Krais, anen naga' ea' notanima nosafel wapani. Anen wambota atamba Deviti, si'i aga'iasa basef bu'wafi Godi.
Ae' awalapa basef ifimba fasifi. Isimba atis dei' sa'i ae' auwai, sase'e akafimi mamimami awami. Aho' sanda'e anda' kalabus wapani. Apa' basef Godi ina fanda' kalabus fape, owa'atin endilisi.

Ea' ewa' banaga okom ae'anai ma egalutu banagewe dondol egatopalopa epes isimba God nogosaho'as ea' ananisii. Ae' a'i God notopalopa esisa nofa'as sogotanimai ma Krais Jisas soloma mogogala'i banagami magape lifilafii.
Apa' mundahapifa basef ifimba endilisifi sisihif. “I'i endilisi apa' a' maga' malomana, bola apa' mosafel mope namepa molomana wapani.
Apa' i'i mope banagepama mogofa' nimanimi hiamima, anaf dao' mope si'i king dembipai molomana. I'i mogowa' alafugahana ma, anen wapani anaf nowa' alafugahapa.

I'i apa' mi'i apa' alipipai milana, ma owa' mugailanai, basef ifimba ape'ifia, ea' apa' hapaipai. Apa' anen atona nagaila basef ananifi endilisi datimaii. Ina atiasi nokwahif nombaso'ma anen, owa'atin endilisi.”

Dondol ina' nesa'ma ukup asasipi ma basef ifimba. Ni'ipas banagambela naep Godi, ipa' ina pi'i basef pepa'ef pelomasa basef mamimami, owa'. Waf afambai ina fetopalopas kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Waf afamba atiasi fegahambombaga isimba sogame'afi.
Ina' nenda' maol Godi banagambela negataga aman nanda' maol endilisii, ma ambal ine'ili ina aola maol inimba, owa'. Nenda'as na'amba ma God okom bo'oma ina' ma niga'i basef ananifi usi'if endilisi.
Ina' nindihi'ama basef awafi. Ifimba ina basef Godi, owa'. Basef amambai atiasi monda' esis sogafe' ufia'w anamba aunai ma sogowa' alafugaha God.
Basef asasifi awafi atif atiasi afetaga lu'wif si'i ilambeh awami, monda'as motaga lu'um endilisi. Tisa asasimi biam Himeneus naloma Filetus manda' waf afamba, maga'i basef mamimami wafimi.

Amam amamba mololama basef endilisifi ea' ma'ias ma'i, “Apa' motanima mosafel ea', ina ata' motanima mosafel wapani, a' owa'atin.” Basef ifimba atif amom mahambombaga ukup banagapi anis sagahapifa Godi.

Apa' dei' God nawa olaf banagafi ea', dei' fape. Olaf afamba anif amef failaf faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Dembinai nogawa andeande'ma epes isimba ananisi.” Ea' anif wapani fa'i, “Epes mamahisa saga'i agol Dembinaii, a' sondakwaha waf awafi.”

Ipat lu'utai nomon dis amamba hiami esis sanda' kapa fasini gol o silva main mogogala'i sanda'ami. Apa' anom sanda' lawah sanda'am, anom sanda' itap sanda'am. Anom sanda'ama maol fasini, si'i sando gwa'aisi saga'as. Apa' anom sanda'ama maol awani falafini, sagala alapitami.

Ea' dei' epen ami nekwaha waf afamba awafi ma nepe bo'wen hilili', inimba atiasi nepe si'i dis isimba sanda' maol bu'wani atinasi. Ea' Dembinai notopalopan nepe hilili' nenda' maol ananini. Ea' anin nendandombola nenda' maol naninani bu'wani hiani.

Dondol ina' nendafa'ma ukup amamba awasimi magataga ma amam amamba sa'umii. Nenda' maol bu'wani banagena nihapifa God nigaila waf usi'ifi feloma okom mogamogaila anisafi. Ea' nila waf opaf fogape sa'umbili, negaloma epes isimba opalef fagape bo'walef hilili' sogofala Dembinaii.

Apa' ina' newa' alafugama basef amamba mamimami awami dowadowafi ma epes isimba ukup magaso'asi gawa akasi. Dei' main, ina' negawa ea', basef ifimbai atif fagawalapa ukup mamimami wandafumi ma'i mandahihianamai.

Aman anamba nanda' maola Dembinaii ina ni'i anif basef wafifi nifitapef neloma anis, owa'i. Anen niti amam nematawa hiasi uwahipis noso'as opaf. Anen nondape dembinai tisa, nosopama okom numbutinai, nope nititi esis sonda'mana waf awafi.

Anen nuwalipas sa'ombel nisindi'amona nomonas nimanisa epes isimba sondaiwa'manai sogosambala basef ananifii. Anen nonda' maol na'amba notopalopas, anaf sombema nelelemba sogogawa basef endilisifi andeande'.
Fowa' Satan nowalo'as isag ananigai, ma sagaila malogol ananigili. I'i esis sogawa basef ifimba endilisifi, bola ukup asasipi petaga alihip wapani ma sokwaha isag anamba Seteni sogafi'mai God.
Ina' nendegawa, atiasi nimaguf akutaifi nimanimi awami endilisi a' motaga.

Nimaguf ifimba epes a' ukup pepoma esis atis, ea' ukup pindatiti moni mais asasisi a'owa', sosa'ma agof asasigufi atogof, sonda' du'waniga, sonda' epes findiwasa God. Ea' sosambala basef mamasasi ahasas asasisi. Ina atiasi sinifela Goda waf fasifi, a' owa'atin. Sosambala waf fasifi hilili'i.

Ea' ina atiasi ukup pipila anis daias, owa'. Ina atiasi sokwaha waf awafi anis daias sanda'masafi, owa'atin. Atiasi esis ina ukup pese'asa migimigaha siga'i basef awafi, owa'atin. Ea' sonda'i'ipama anis daindaiasa waf awafi. Esis ea' ukup pi'i esis atis ina atiasi sumafi alop asasipi andeande', a' owa'atin. Sohambombaga epes isimba bu'wasi, sowa' alafugah sondaiwa'ma waf bu'wafi.

Ea' sonda' alipisi asasisi sofe'ma lagof bousii. Ea' esis kwafalis sila waf awafi asasifi atef, ukup pepoma esis atis si'i dambesi. Ea' nomonas sisila dagala naninani aunai a'owa' ma alop asasipi atop. Ina ata' ukup pi'i God, a' owa'atin.
Epes isimba atiasi sohapila waf Godi alop atona asasinai ando' atogon, apa' ukup asasipi nomon sondaiwa'ma God sowa' alafugaha banagami ananimi. Ina' nindihi'ama epes isimbai.

Anom amam amambai mandambaho' nimanis mafe' magi'ma nematawa awamba nomonas owa' sogapaowa andeande'ia mawis ifagw awaugwi, ea' mola'ata nomonas awausi. Nematawa awambai waf awaufi fanda' nomonas awausi nimanis a'owa'. Ea' ukup awaupi pesafema awami mamimami mahondo'awa.
Nematawa awamba dondol wanda' maola ogofa' basef, apa' ina ogawa basef kofagefa endilisifi, owa'atin.

Fowa' Janisi Jambris manda' naumbih maloma Moses, mowa' alafugahana. Na'amba atin dei' epes isimba sanda' naumbiha basef endilisifi sowa' alafugahef. Ukup asasipi ea' aowasip endilisi a'owa', ea' hapif asasini sambaso'am atin. Esis ina sahapilif endilisi, owa'atin.

Apa' waf afamba amamifi ina fataga lu'wif a'owa', owa'atin. Dei' main, atiasi epes hiasi siti waf gawa akafi amamifi si'i fowa' gani sagati waf afambai gawa akafi ma amam amamba Janisi Jambris manda'afi.

Apa' ina' nafe' nagaloma ae'i, nagame' basef ifimba aga'ipasef ea'i. Ina' negegawa fe' ae'anii, ma basef hiafi kofagefa ae'afi. Ina' negawa ae' ahapifa God banagewe, dondol a'ipasa basef ananifi sa'ombel, okom ae'ami ina wandafum, owa'. Ina' negawa ae' okom magamagaila anis daindaiasi, alutu banagewe efa' nimanimi.

Ina' negawa waf awafi hiafi esis sanda'meaf ae'i, ma akafimi amamba egefa'am walemb ambalemba wanelemb Antioki Aikoniam a Listrai. Ina' negawa hiahaom nimanimi sanda'meam egefa'ami. Apa' Dembinai natagwahowe ma hiahaom amamba hiami nimanimi.
Aho', epes ami soloma Krais Jisas sisihis sogapani ma sogaila waf Godi, bousi asasisi atiasi sonda'as kwapete'as.
Ea' amam awami maloma amom magambaso'ami atiasi mombaso'ma epes hiasi. Ea' aman anamba aunai nombaso'ma amom wapani. Ea' waf amamifi atiasi fetaga awef endilisi a'owa'.
Apa' ina' nihapila basef ifimba nefa'ef nagahapilifi. Ina' negawa apa' amam nematawa mamahepama magawalipina basef ifimbai.

Ea' ina' negawa isimba wapani. Fowa' ina' ata' awani negawa gawa fasini ma Buk Baibel hilili'i ea'. Buk akwamba la'ifi'wi ma kogase'ena gawa fasini neloma nomonas fasisi ma ina' nigahapifa Krais Jisasa God notopalopena nofa'ena nigatambili.

Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nasa'ma nomonas amom profeti manda' basef ifimba hiafi fagape Buk Baibeli. Basef ifimba fasifi ma fegaso'apa gawa, figihimba'mapa waf awafi ma mogakwahef, a figasindi'amona fe' ape'ini, figawalipapa ma mogolafa waf usi'ifi.
Basef ifimba fanda'apa epes Godi banagepa la'ifipa endilisi, ma monda' maol hiani fasini ananini.
