Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba anin alipini ipe'ini newa ma waf awafi nelelama God nagatopalopapa dowafa nowambilapai magape andeande'. Na'amba anin alipini ipe'ini nenda' waf awafi si'i lawag augai gail gogola gwa'aisi numbutisii, ea' nese'epa nimanimi ipa' nenda' ipa' hipai petaga awepa ma naep Godi.

Na'amba anin epen atitin nila waf awafi so'a waulafi. Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba anin epen atitin nese'ana alafuga God si'i fowa' Iso nanda'asa nagatala gwa'aisi nogota bandata, ea' nakwaha hiahaom bu'wami ahamana nandondombam magapomanai.

Ipa' pegawa, anen na'i notambel nefe'ma nogofa' hiahaom amamba bu'wami owa', God na'i owa'atin. Iso nanda'am lef atin napoma nogofa'i hiahaom amamba, owa' a' owa'atin. Ufia'w akana ma notanima nombema nembel nogowa' alafugama waf awafi wapani.

Dei' ipa' ina pataga pape felefele'ma anis maefah patilis pagahapilas lagof ipe'igufi, si'i halaf afamba Sainai, owa'atin. Halaf afamba nif lu'wami, a owamb akot alialinai endilisi a fufin lu'unai banagonai,

a alof nogogali, a anagol malogol gaga'i basefi. Esis amam nematawa Juda sagame' malogol agalemba ganda' basefi, esis ombal mahas sa'ipa Moses dindinip na'amba sa'i, “Apa' mandaiwa' ma mogame'ana wapani.”

Dei' main, esis ombal mahas endilisi a'owa' ma basef ifimba God nagaso'asef esisi. Anen naga'i na'amba na'i, “I'i anin epen o anin mafin ami nefe' negatolasa halafuta atambai, andeande'ma esis sogahan otamba ma negaga'.”
Esis ombal mahas kwapete' endilisi ma hiahaom amamba sagatolomi. Hiahaom amamba lu'wami a'owa' manda' Moses ombal mahana kwapete'a nogatolom. Ea' na'i, “Ae' bolale kwapete' ombal mahe ma egatolom.”

Ipa' ina pataga hiahaom amamba, owa'atin. Ipa' ea' pataga halafuta Saion, wambel lu'wambili taun God nagape namona atapinai. Anamba Jerusalem dambaigima nagape heveni. Ipa' patagama ensel hiami hiami a'owa' mandatama mape mandagala.

Ipa' pafi'i pandakolas paloma epes Godi, awasi ananisi sagali'i. God nanda' agof asasigufi fape wambel ambalemba ilif. Ipa' pafi'i felefele'ma God, anen jas dembinai nowalogas hi'igalasi naloma ambagof epes fowa' God naga'i be'es hilili'i.

Ea' pafi'i felefele'ma Jisas, anen nagape la'afen nugumafi basef lapafi dambaifi. Ea' pafi'i esimbel ananimbeli fowa' nuwali'ambela ipa', nogowa' banaga basef ifimba lapafi. Esimbel ambalemba bawalapa ano'w ufia'w bu'wakwi a'owa'. Basefa ufia'w akwamba fikila' a'owa' basef Ebeli. Dei' main, basefa esimbel Ebeli fefala Goda nogagwa waf awafi. Apa' esimbel Jisasi atembel God nakwaha waf awafi okom maso'anaf.

Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba pewa' alafugaha aman anamba dei' naga'ii. Fowa' gani itap apa'e God naso'asa banagafi endilisi esis amam nematawa, owa' sosambala basef ananifi. Fowa' nogota tatumba sogosambalif, ina la'ifisa sofa' sofe' sindihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi, owa'atin. Fowa' God na'if itap apa'e apa' dei' nape heven na'i basef banagef a'owa' ma apa'. I'i apa mowa' alafugaha anen, anaf apa' wapani ina la'ifipa ma mofa' mefe' mindihi'ama okom wandafunai ananinai, owa'atin endilisi.

Fowa' God nagaso'ana mu'uli ananini Moses, malagol ananigili gakoto'ma itap apa'e. Apa' dei' na'ipapa na'i, “Anaf ae' ikoto'ma itap anef nemaf wapani. Apa' ina ikoto'ma itap atep, owa'. Ikoto'ma itap peloma heven wapani.”

Basef ifimba faga'i, “Anef nemaf wapani,” fihimba'mapa na'amba. Hiahaom fowa' God nanda'ami anaf nokoto'mam mefe' higililam hi'ilam. Apa' anom hiahaom fasimi ma poe bu'wani owa' mondokoto'ia amamba banagem mope atapim.

Isimba atis apa' mundanifela God. Dei' main, dei' apa' mawis God nagala'ambemagoma anamba epes ina la'ifisa sogakoto'magon, owa'atin. Apa' monda' lotumana mondasa'ma agol ananigili ma waf ombal mogohapamafi ma mogaila okom ananimi atom.
Dei' main, God apa' manda' lotumanai, anen a' si'i nif lu'wami fagando hiahaom awami hi'agalam.
Ipa' Kristen, ukup pindaima atina sahin owan ipe'isi atapipa.

Ipa' ina ukup pese'epama pegatopalopa esis epes anambel wambelisi sogafi'i ifagw ipe'igwii, owa'i. Ipa' pegawa, fowa' gani anis epes sanda' waf afambai, ma sagatopalopa anis daiasi, esis sofa' anom ensel safe' sumafiam ifagw asasigwi. Esis ina sogawa sa'i amom ensel mafi'i, owa'. Sa'i owa' epes atis itapasi.

Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma esis alipisi sagape sanda' kalabusi si'i ipa' ea' panda' kalabus pagalomas. Ea' ukup pendanda'ma epes isimba sogofa' akafimi nimanimi alop asasipii, petopalopas si'i ipa' atipa pegefa' akafimi alop ipe'ipi pegalomas.

Ipa' amam nematawa pandaso'ama ea'i, penda' waf afamba fetaga fendape hilili'. Ipa' ina penda' waf awafi alugufi, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa anaf God nogwamipai waf awafi ma amam nematawa sanda' waf so'a waulafii, saloma amam nematawa isimba sagahambombaga daso'amaii.

Ipa' ina pila waf awafi afamba ukup pegehafela moni a'owa', owa'i. Hiahawes ipa' pagahapilasi, isimba ipa' a' ukup pendanda' na'amba pi'i, “Na'ambai andeande'. Isimba atiasi dondo'ma apa'.” Dei' main, God na'ias na'i, “Ae' ina anaf okom mose'e ipa' ewa'epa alafuga, owa'atin endilisi.”
Ea' dei' apa' mondowa' banaga nelelemb ape'ilimbi ea' mi'ias na'amba minda'i, “Dembinai nagatopalopa ape'i. Apa' ina ombal mohapa, owa'. Atiasi epes la'ifis sonda' maina apa'? Owa'atin endilisi!”
Ipa' nomonas sondapoma amom agufumi ipe'imi fowa' magawalapa basef Godi ma ipe'i. Ipa' ukup pendanda'ma fe' bu'wani amamini ea' pefe' pila waf amom magahapifa Godafi.
Jisas Krais nape na'amba atin si'i nambati', ea' dei' wapani, ea' nope atapina anaf dondol lifilafi.

Ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba anif basef hiafi fafifafi fifi'i felamona opalef ipe'ilifi ea' pekwaha ufia'w Godi. I'i opalef ape'ilifi fegape atapilifa waf God nagatopalopapa dowafafi numafiapa magape andeande'i, na'ambaifi andeande'. Opalef ape'ilifi ina banagalefa mugaila mu'uli epesi ma gwa'aimi mamimami, owa'atin. Waf afambai sagaila mu'uli inimbafi ina fatopalopa amam nematawa sagailafi, owa'atin.

Apa' anota belita tape sondolalima Goda, atamba Krais atona naso'ana alop ananipi si'ip nondolalimap naso'anap God. Apa' amom pris mondolalima God ipat atamba selita sanda' lotuwatai, amom ina la'ifima moga' gwa'aisi ma belita atamba, owa'atin.

Pris anamba dembinai nape nagali' ma pris hiamii anen atona nofa' esimbel amamba nawis ipat nomon wa'ol, nagape atina bo'wagon hilili'ma, nondolalima Goda nogakwaha waf awafi. Apa' mafis alop si'ina mofa'an mawisi manda' nif maofam ando'ma anamba esis Israel sagapoma.
Isimba atis Jisas wapani nofa' akafimi noga' wambel indambel uta ando'ma nagasa'opas nanda'as bo'wes hilili'ma esimbel ananimbeli.
Ea' dei' apa' wapani mondafe'ma anen indalelemb ando', ma monda' ambagof ape'igufi awagof si'i anen fowa' nagame' ambal aol.
Dei' main, apa' mogawa itap apa'e apa' ina anambel wambel taun nagape atapini, owa'atin. Apa' dei' mape manda'as mowando'ma wambel taun inimba anaf na'i nigatagai.

Isimba atis dei' mosa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol mondaso'ana dagala atapina ma agol Jisasi, mondanda'am na'amba si'i hiahaom bu'wami mondolalimanami. Apa' mondolalimana na'amba. Mondaso'ana malogof ape'igufi anen a mogawalapa basefa agol ananigili.

Ipa' ina ukup pese'epama penda' waf fasifima esis amam nematawa, owa'i. Ea' hiahawes saga'oma ipe'i pendawalogas pese'asa du'wanis epes isimba hiahawes akasi. Dei' main, God okom maga'iaf a'owa'i waf afambai si'i hiahawes bu'wasi ipa' paso'anasa pindalalimanasi.

Amom agufumi ipe'imi, ma'i motopalopepa, ea' mumafi ipa' dondol. Ama anaf amom mogawalapa basefa Goda maol hiani manda'ana mugumafi ipe'ani. Isimba atis dei' ipa' pindaila basef amomifi ea' pendape lafelam. I'i penda'mamas na'amba ma amom sonohama monda' maol inimba ma ukup amamipi ina iwanip melef atin, owa'atin. I'i amom monda'an mogaloma ukup iwanipi, amambai atiasi ina motopalopepa, owa'atin endilisi.
Ipa' pendabetena God nogatopalopa afa'. Afa' ogawa malogof fagape opalef afa' nomoni fihimba'mafa wape usi'ifa andeande'. Ea' dei' wa'i ofe' waf usi'ifi hilili'afi nimaguf hiafi dondol.
Ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma ipa' pendabetena God nogatopalope ma atiasi itanima egafe'mago ipa' kwafalis.

God anen kofagonama okom awanimi. Anen nasa'ma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas nosafel wapani. Esimbel bagalo Jisasi begewa' banaga basef Godi nagala' lapafi fagape atapif dondoli. Esimbel ambalemba atembel Jisas nataga Dembinai numafi esis Kristen si'i nugumafi sipsipi.

Ae' a'i God nowa' banagaipa nese'epa waf bu'wafi hiafi ipa' ma pigaila okom ananimi atom. Ea' a'i anen nonda' opalef ape'ilifi nomon ama mogawalapa waf hiafi fasifi anen okom maga'iafi ma banagami Jisas Kraisi atom. Ea' a'i epes hiasi sosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.
Ipa' alipipai, ae' a'ipipa dindinip, pembe' aligah pendagahembe'ma basef anda'afi ma efela ukup ipe'ipi egewa' banagaipa. Dei' main, basef ifi'i ae' anda'efa ipe'i, ifimba bandembandef.
Ae' a'i ipa' pendegawago, esis ea' sakwaha owamapa ape'inai Timoti, ea' ina ata' nanda' kalabus, a' owa'atin. I'i anen nifi'i nogatagama ae' kwafalisa, dao' atiasi afa' biafa ofo'o atin utilipa.
Ipa' penda'mamago nemaf bu'wafi afa'ifi ma amom agufumi hiami ipe'imi molomago esis amam nematawa Godi hiasi hi'indalas. Esis Kristen alipisi sagape Italii sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
Ae' a'i God notopalopepa dowaf ea' nope nolomago ipa' hipai nowa' banagaipa. Ea' ma'uf ifimba.

Ae' Jems, ape lafela God naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais anda' maola amom atom. Anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' epes hipai Godi misi'ah 12-pelaih. Ipa' pagakwaha walemb kofagama ipe'imai ma pafe' pagape walemb hiagoma itap apa'e pape panda' maol naninanii. Ae' anda'mepago dagala nafe'mago ipa'.
Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, nimaguf mamahifa gwamba mamimami motagamepa, ukup ipe'ipi pinda'i amambai andeande' sonendahepamam.
Dei' main, ipa' pegawa ea' gwamba mogogwamba hapif ipe'inii, amamba manindifa ipa' ma pigalutu banagepa ma gwamba nimanimi akafimi awami.

Ea' ipa' pindalutu banagepa ma waf afamba fegataga bo'ofa ipa' ma atiasi pegataga andeande' a'owa', waf awafi akepa. Ama waf hiafi Godi fegapoma ipa' hi'igalafa, ipa' ina waowaola anef waf atetef, owa'atin.
I'i epen ami waowaola gawa bu'wanii, anin nendabeten nihali' Goda nogaso'anan. Dei' main, anen nagaso'asa hiahaom hiami dowafa epes hiasii, ina niginifala epes isimbai, owa'atin.

Apa' epen inimba anin nendahapifana endilisi ma nendabeten negahali' God. Ina a' nepe okom bimbiafim, owa'i. Anin nendahapifana banagona. Epen ami nagape ukup bimbiafimi, anin ina nahapifif la'ifin, owa'atin. Okom ananimi si'i embel naoh fufin naolama manda'am lasiali' atin magape.
Epen inimba ina a' okom mondanda' ni'i atiasi Dembinai noso'ana anom hiahaom, owa'atin. Okom ananimi mandawal biafim mandapoma waf hiafi anin nandanda'afi atef ea' ina nape okom atifim, owa'.
Sahin owan Kristen mamahina kwahuni anin a' sonondahana God nasa'man nogatopalopan dei' a owagama wapani.

Apa' Kristen mamahina hiahaom hiamini, anin a' sonondahana God nanda'an nagafe' lafela nagahapifa Krais. Dei' main, epes hiahaom hiamisi atiasi soga' si'i afis sagataga otalefi sagape nogota bandata ma ea' sala'of sogowa.

Ipa' pegawa awin alipini natafi ma owaf fagaha otalef afalemba ma ala'ulif hi'agalalef. Afis sagatagai sala'of ea' sosaf afisi a' aona. Epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi sonda'am na'amba atin. Afamba sonda' maola bisnisi atisi, asoga' si'i sosaf afisi fagaga'.

Epen ami nalutu banagena gwamba nimanimi magatagamani, anin sonahan. Dei' main, afamba anin nigikila' gwamba waf aunai naninani ea' hi'igalanai, anaf anin nefa' hiahaom fasimi si'i prais. Amamba na'amba. Ambal namili God nagala' lapali ma nogaso'asal epes mamahisa ukup pagapagaila anini.

I'i anin epen anona gwamba nogwambana nenda' waf awafi, anin ina a' ni'i God nanda' anin dei' nanda' waf afamba, owa'i. God ina nahondo' anin epen nanda' waf afamba awafi, owa'atin. Ea' ina anis epes la'ifisa sohondo'ana nonda' waf awafi, owa'atin.
Apa' ukup awami ape'imi atom mafelapa makikipapa ma mafe' mowa magatolo'w isalef si'i anin mafin alupini nafe' natolo'w isag sisihin nagape.

Ea' ukup ape'imi mohafel manda'apa manda' waf naninani aunai. Ukup amamba awami si'i ano'w nemata'w kogofa' opafa waf awafi si'i awasi akwa'usi. Owagama waf afamba awafi fetaga lu'uf, fenda'apa moga'.
Ipa' sahin owan, ae' okom maimailipa. Na'amba ipa' pembaso'ma ipa' atipa.

Hiahaom fasimi hiami hi'alam si'i preseni, amamba ahamapa ape'inai naso'apam misila'i heven. Anen nanda' mogogala'i hiami magape heveni mape. Apa' God ina nanda' ambagof laogof bandagufi nanda' hu'ufiho'of, owa'atin. Anen nagape atapina na'amba atini.
Anen nandaila okom ananimi atoma basef ananifi endilisifi ma apa' motaga mope mogali'ma hiahaom amamba anen nanda'ami.

Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' nomonas sopoma basef ifimba na'amba. Ipa' hipai pendandombol kwafalisa pegame' basef. Apa' ina pi'i anif basef pegwaef kwafalis, owa'i. Ea' ina a' ukup numbutip kwafalis, owa'i.
Dei' main, waf afamba epes ukup numbutipafi figalai waf awafi. Ina fagawalapai waf bu'wafi usi'ifi Godi, owa'atin.

Isimba atis dei' ipa' kwahago waf alugufi feloma waf aunai hianai hi'indalanago. Waf anamba aunai epes hiasi sanda'ana dondoli. Ea' pinindifa ipa' pepe lafela Goda pegefa' basef ifimba ananifi fagape nelelemb ipe'ilimbi. Basef ifimba banagafi ma figawambilai ipa' pitanima pigafi'mai God.
I'i pegame' basef Godi atin dowaf, ipa' pambaso'ma ipa' atipa. Amambai hapaimi. Ipa' peme'ef pilif, dao' andeande'.
Epen ami negame' basef Godi dowafa owa' nigailifia, anin si'i anin epen daian napelaga glas nagati amaga ananigai.
Anin natologa ea', nandambema nagafe' kwafalis atis, ina ata' okom mandanda'ma amaga gandati, owa'atin.

Apa' basef mu'uli Godi fegatagwaha apa' epesa mogakwaha waf awafii, ifimba usi'if hilili'i. Epen mamahina niti mu'uli inimba kofagena andeande' atapina ma nigailani, atiasi nepe na'amba. I'i neme'an nilan andeande', dao' epen inimba God nofalo'man nonda'an sonogahana maol main anin nanda'ani.

I'i anin epen ni'i, “Ae' anda' lotu endilisi agaila Godi” ma anin i'i owa' nimafi malogol ananigili andeande'a, epen inimba nambaso'ma nembel ananimbili atembel. Ea' dei' hapif ananini ma lotu main falafini atin.

Waf lotuwafi be'ef hilili'i kofagefa akafa nogohnaep ahamapa ape'inai Godi, afamba na'amba. I'i anis awasi mamasas akasi esis atis sogape, a'a nemata'w alifi'wi ako'w ato'w kogape kwahu'w, apa' mofa' nimanimi asasimi motopalopasa otamba gwa'aisi mais. Ea' mundumafi fe' ape'ini andeande' ma waf awafi itapafi ina fenda' nelelemb ape'ilimbi betaga awalemb, owa'atin.

Sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' pahapifa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, anen dembinai nogogala' a'owa' gani heveni. Ea' dei' ipa' ina petopalopa epes isimba agufisi atis ea' pewa' alafugaha epes agof akasi, owa'i. Penda'asas dondo' na'amba atin.

Basef ifimba kofagefa na'amba. I'i anona aman hiahaom hiamunai nonda' trausis siot sosaf fasifi nogala ring gol faf ananifi ma nogawis ipat atamba panda' lotuwatai nomon, ma i'i anona aman kwahuna ma otamba luwaguf maisi nogawisi wapani, ipa' atiasi penda' main?

I'i ipa' penda' aman anamba luwaguf mais fasisi pendagalana pi'ipana pi'i, “Ina' fi'i poe sia bu'wani na'a”, ama i'i aman anamba kwahunai pi'ipana piga'i, “Ina' nilutu gani”, a'a “Nepe gani itap felefele'ma bo'wagah ae'agahi”,

i'i ipa' penda'am na'amba, atiasi kofagema awami ipe'imi. Ipa' pawawaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma ukup ipe'ipi, apa' ipa' ina pawawalogas paila waf usi'ifi dondo' atin, owa'. Ipa' pawawalogasa ukup awapi atip.

Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' peme'! God nandandepa epes isimba kwahusa otamba maisi ma dei' sape sisihis sagahapifana atapis sagape si'i epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi. Anen nandandepasa sogofa' hiahaom fasimi anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma. Hiahaom amamba na'i basef endilisifi atif banagafi nogaso' epes mamahisa ukup pagapagailanai.
Apa' ipa' paha iwana epes isimba kwahusa otamba maisi. Epes mamahisa saha iwana ipa' sase'epa akafimi sanda'mepa kot? Esis hiahaom hiamisi atis.
God nase'epa agol fasigili Krais ea' ipa' ananipai. Epes isimba atis sa'i basef awafi sanda' findiwama agol agalemba.

Dembinai King ape'inai nugumafi apa' hiapai, anen naso'apa basefa mu'uli ananini fagape Buk Baibeli. Basef ifimba faga'ias fa'i, “Ipa' ukup pipila epes mamahisa sagape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ipa' ukup pagapagaila ipa' atona atin.” I'i ipa' pigaila mu'uli inimba, ipa' panda' waf bu'wafi hilili'i.
Apa' i'i ipa' petopalopa anis, pewa' alafugaha anis, mu'uli inimba atin nanda' kotimipa ma panda' waf afambai pegasambala mu'uli inimba.
Dei' main, epen ami nila basefa mu'uli hiani hi'ilana nasambala anin mu'uli inimba atitin anif basef do'wanif kwasala'uf, epen inimba kofagema ananimi si'i nagawala mu'uli inimba hiani hi'agalan.

Dei' main, anen naga'i basef ifimbaii na'i, “Ipa' owa'i peha anis epes soga'a.” I'i ipa' owa' penda' waf afamba so'a waulafia, apa' paha anin epen naga', ipa' apataga epes aopa pegasambala mu'uli Godii.
Owagama God nowawaloga apa' ma anin mu'uli daian nanda'apa mogape wahifipai. Ea' dondol ipa' pinda'i basef penda' waf fendahama mu'uli inimba.

Dei' main, epen ami owa' niga'i uwahipigama anis epesia, owagama God ina niti epen inimba uwahipina nemaf afamba nogowaloga anin, owa'atin. Apa' ami nigati anis epes uwahipisi, God anaf ina nowaloga epes isimba ni'i awasi, owa'atin. Waf afamba muga'i uwahipigamasafi fikila' a'owa'.

Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, i'i anin epen ni'i, “Ae' agahapifa Kraisi” ma waf ananifi owa' bo'wefa, ea' hapif ananini falafini atin. Hapif inimba na'ambaini ina banagani ma atiasi God nofa'an nogatanimai, owa'atin.
Hapif inimba falafini nagape na'amba. I'i anis sahin owan sape sonda' luwaguf awafi a gwa'aisi akasi, ea'

anin ipe'ini ni'ipa epes isimba ni'i, “Ipa' opalef awanelef pefe' pifa'i luwaguf ipe'ifi pewahe'ef pembaho' alop ipe'ipi pefe' pea' gwa'aisi bu'wasi!” I'i ipa' piga'ias na'amba ma, basef ifimba ipe'ifi owa' fetaga endilisia. Atiasi basef ifimba ipe'ifi fetopalopas fi'imama? Owa'atin. Falafifi atif.
Hapif na'amba atin. I'i anin epen nihapilif dowaf ama owa' nenda' waf bu'wafi feloma hapif ananinia, hapif inimba ananini awasin a' naga'.

Apa' anin atiasi ni'i, “Ina' epen nagahapifa Kraisi apa' ae' anda' waf bu'wafii.” Dei' a'ipa anin epen daian na'amba a'i, “Ina' ata' nihimba'me hapif inimba ine'ini waf bu'wafi owa' fetaga figalomania. Waf bu'wafi ae' anda'afi atiasi ihimba'mina hapif ae'ani.”
Ina' nagahapifana na'amba na'i, “God atotona nape.” Ina' na'ias na'amba, dao' andeande'. Ambagof awami wapani magahapifana na'amba atin ea' ombal maham bombol atin kwapete'.
Ina' aman okom nagaolinai, ina' nagahapifa Jisas atin, ama owa' nenda' waf bu'wafi wapania, hapif inimba ine'ini falafini atin. Dei' ina' na'i negawa isimba kofagesa? Dei' a' i'ipina.

Fowa' gani akunamapa ape'inai Abraham na'i nonda' ofa ma nogamana ananinai Aisak nondolalimana ma Goda belita atamba sondolalima Goda. Isimba atis dei' God na'ipana na'i anen aman bo'ona hilili'i. Anen nanda' waf bu'wafi dei' God na'ipana basef ifimba na'amba.
Ina' negawa a'a owa'? Hapif Abrahami naloma waf bu'wafi anen nanda'afi isimba sanda' maol atogon. Ea' waf bu'wafi anen nanda'afi fatopalopa hapif ananini nataga alihin andeande'.

Ea' basef ifimba fagail buk Baibeli fataga alihif fandawalap. Basef ifimba fa'i, “Abraham nahapifa God, dei' God nofalana na'i anen aman bu'unai hilili'i.” Ea' God nofalana na'i, “Anen alipunai ae'anai.”

Basef ifimba Baibelifi fihimba'mepa dei' ipa' pegawa hapif atin God ina na'i epes bo'wes hilili'i, owa'atin. Esis sahapilif endilisi ma sanda' waf bu'wafi wapani, dao' anen nofalas na'i epes bu'wasi hilili'i.

Nemata'w akwamba Rehab kwanda' waf so'a waulafi, ako'w na'amba atin. God nati waf bu'wafi ako'w kwanda'afi dei' okom mapoma'w na'i ako'w nemata'w bo'okw hilili'i. Waf bu'wafi akwa'ufi kwatopalopa amom Juda mandambaho' magafi'ii ea' kwihimba'mam ano'w ufia'w daia'w mafe' wahifim.

Ea' basef ifimba fagape na'amba. I'i alop atopa ambal owa' lopaopa, alop apamba poga' ea'. Isimba ea' na'amba atina epen ami nagahapilif dowafi ma owa' nenda' waf bu'wafia, hapif epen inimbai aowasin si'i nagaga'i.

Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, na'amba ipa' hipai petaga gawaipai tisa atipa, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa anaf owagama God a' nowaloga afa' tisa wagawalipas basef bu'wafii banagambel a'owa'. Apa' anis Kristen daias, nowawalogas sa'ombel kwasakwasala.

Apa' hiapai nimaguf hiafi dondol owa' migi'ma hiahawes mimbifasa, owa'atin. I'i anin epen ina nanda' waf awafi ma basef ananifi, anin epen bu'wani hilili'i. Anin la'ifina nigimafi alop poloma nomonas ananisi hi'igalas andeande' wapani.
Ipa' pegawa apa' manda' waf afamba ma hos na'amba. Apa' masapa' ain nape malogof hosi nomona monda' hosa mogame' basef ape'ifi mogaila ukup ape'ipi ma mamahogoma apa' mogafe'ma.

Dei' ipa' ukup pendanda' ma sip lu'wapi. Sip apamba lu'wapi ea' fufin lu'unai nasapa' sip anamba, apa' stia sa'usa'uni. Kepten nugumafi sipi nambemana nagafe' anamba anen na'i nogafe'ma. Nanda'am na'amba ma stia inimba sa'usa'uni.

Ea' na'amba atina afega sa'wini nagape alop nomoni. Anin na'i basef mamimami hiami a'owa' magasa'ma agof epesi ma maol hiani esis sanda'ani. Dei' ipa' ukup pepoma nif. Nif figandif sa'ofa fegataga lu'uf banagef a'owa' atiasi alup lawah lu'ugahi fendogwah fesopamagah hi'ilagah.

Afegah ape'igahi nomoni ea' na'amba atin si'i nif ifimba hagape la'afena alop ape'ipi hawalapai waf naninani aunai. Ea' handa' epes si'is ukup paloma nomonas alop sataga awes sanda' waf awafi. Hawalapai waf hiafi ape'ifi ma fe' poe ki ape'isi awes hi'alas si'i nif fandif fagataga lu'uf. Nif ifimba fataga wambel awambili hel atogon.
Mafis mamimami alupumi, amiguf a uguf ea' hiahaom hiami magape naoh embel owini, epes sofa'ami sali'atam sanda'am mogawa mame'as mape lafela esis. Dei' wapani esis ilama sonda'am na'amba.
Apa' malogof epesi owa'atin. Ina anin epen la'ifina nigimafiagof, owa'. Dondol malogol gatageamb gape atapigil ga'i basef awafi, si'igila nombot marasin aunai naha epes sagaga'i.
Malogof ape'igufi atogof maso'ma agol Dembinai Ahamapa ape'inai, apa' owa' ma'i basef awafi wapani, fagahambombaga sahin owan ape'isi God nanda'as sagape na'amba atin si'i anini.
Malogof agwafomba atogof fa'i basef fasifi fasa'ma agol Godi ea' fa'i basef awafi wapani. Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, penda'as na'amba owa'i.

Sahin owan ae'ipai, anif basef waminif atini ifimba. Ina anembel embel ifata atotota embel fasimbeli baloma numbutimbeli betah ifata atotota, owa'atin. Ea' anoga lawag fik ina la'ifiga ma gil gogola anis gwa'aisi daias oliv, owa'atin. Ea' analef mandelef sa'utip grep pagailalifi ina la'ifilifa fil fegela anep sa'utip daip fik, owa'atin. Na'amba atin si'i embel naoh ina la'ifimbela bendambema begataga embel atembel ku'umbimbel, owa'atin.

Epen ami ipe'ini nomonas gawaisi ma gawa hiani, anin nendape na'amba. Fe' ananini a' nihimba'mas gawa ananinai anis epesa nenda' waf bu'wafi fegaloma maol bu'wani. Maol inimba anin nanda'ana negape lafela epesa nigaila waf gawa bu'wanifi.

I'i ukup ipe'ipi kowelep pepoma pegefa' hiahawes uga otamba mais anis daiasi, ina pelaepa anisa sigaila basef ipe'ifi atifa waf kikipaifi, ipa' ina pasa'ma agof ipe'igufi, owa'i. Ipa' penda' waf afambai piga'i ipa' atipa gawaipai, ipa' pambaso'mas. Na'ambai hapaimi. Gawa inimba ipe'ini ina endilisini, owa'.
Gawa inimba ina nafi'i heveni, owa'. Nataga itap apa'e ma opalef apimi maloma aman aunai Satan atona.

Epes mamahisa ukup pepoma esis atis si'i sogofa' agof lu'wagufi ma uga mais hiasi ma sonda' waf kowagalasafi, epes isimbai ina sagape andeande'i, owa'atin. Esis ina sandakolas saloma anis epes atogon atin, owa'. Sanda' lopa' fitap atina sanda' waf naninani aunai.

Apa' gawa nagafi'i heveni nawalapa waf fasifi afamba. Fape fagali'i, ukup epesi pape be'ep hilili'. Ea' waf bu'wafi hiafi wapani na'amba. Epes sagape opalef awanelefa opalef atelef sagaloma anis daias. Ea' sanda' waf sa'osa'ombilifi sati uwahipis endilisi ea' sanda' waf bu'wafi ma sagatopalopa anis epes. Esis ina malogof biagof sa'i anif basef, owa'. Sa'i basef endilisifi atif. Esis ina sanda' waf biafif sanifela anis sosambala anis, owa'. Esis ukup pa'i hiasi na'amba atin.

Epes mamahisa sanda' maol sowalipa epesa sogape opalef atifilifi isimba si'i apa' magawa gwa'aisi saga'asi. I'i esis sonda' maol inimba ma waf opalef fagape atogini, maol inimba nowalapai waf be'ef hilili'i si'i gwa'aisi sagataga andeande'i.
Waf mamahefa kofagefa ma fanda' ipa' panda' lopafitap nagape la'afena ipe'i? Ukup awapi atip pasa'ma ipa' dei' panda' lopafitap atapipa opalef nelelemb nomon, alop ando' wapani. Ea' isimba atis.

Ipa' ukup pa'ipa'i hiahawes hiasi sasisasi, apa' ipa' ina pefa'as, owa'atin. Ea' dei' ukup numbutip paha epes saga'. Ipa' kowalepama hiahaom hiami anis daiasi, apa' ipa' ina la'ifipa pefa'am, owa'atin. Ea' ipa' panda' lopafitapa pa'i pegefa'am. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Dei' main, ipa' ina pahali' Goda amamba, owa'.

Afamba ipa' pandabetena pegefa' hiahaom amamba, ipa' ina pefa'am, owa'atin. Dei' main, ukup ipe'ipi ina pape be'ep atifipa pagahali' God, owa'. Ipa' ukup pandanda'ma pefa' hiahaom penda'am da' kwahoma ofah inimba ukup ipe'ipi atip.

Ipa' pakwaha waf Godi ea' pafe'ma waf awafi si'i amam nematawa sagakwaha waf usi'ifi daso'amaifi ma sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi. Ipa' pegawa isimba. I'i epen okom mugaila waf itapafi a'owa'i, anin nanda' naumbih nefala God bounai. Dei' apendegawef. I'i epen ami okom mugaila waf itapafii, anin dei' nataga bouni Godi.

Ipa' ina pi'i basef Godi fagail buk Baibeli falafifi, owa'i. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Ambal alamba ape'ili God naso'apal lagapaipai landa'apa ukup pandanda' ma waf afamba kowagalasafi a'owa'.”

Apa' God natopalopapa dowaf nowa' banagapa. Waf afamba Godi banagef fikila' si'i basef Baibeli faga'i fa'i, “God nosambala epes isimba sanda' du'waniga sogosambala anini ea' natopalopa epes isimba saganindifa esis sagape lafela anini.”
Ea' dei' ipa' pinindifa ipa' pendafe' lafela God. Ipa' pendewa' alafugaha Satana anen atiasi nokwahipa nofa' nogafe'.

Ipa' pifi'i felefele' endilisi ma Goda anen atiasi nigafi'i felefele' endilisi ma ipa'. Ipa' panda' waf awafii, pekwaha waf awafi ipa' panda'afi si'i epes sagasa'opa lagof asasigufi bo'wagof hilili'. Ipa' epes malogof biagufi, ipa' pekwaha waf afamba ea' penda' ukup ipe'ipi be'ep.

Ipa' pendanda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilifa waf awafi ipa' panda'afi, pewa pelef mehipa waf afambai pekwahef ea' hapaifi. Ea' ipa' dei' panda'iafi, pembema nelelemb pendalef. Ipa' dei' sonagahipai, ipa' pendanda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilifa waf afambai awafi.
Ipa' pinindifa ipa' pepe lafela Dembinai ma anen nosa'mepa nogowa' banagaipa.

Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' owa'i pendawaloga atina waf ipe'ifia. Epen niga'i basef awafima anin alipinii, a'a newawaloga sahin owan ananini, epen inimba anin na'i basef awafi nawaloga mu'uli Godi. I'i ipa' penda' basef awafi pewaloga mu'uli inimba, ina ata' paila mu'uli inimba, a' owa'atin. A pape si'i dembipai jas pawawaloga mu'uli inimba.

God atotona nawalapa mu'uli ananini ea' anen atona dembinai jas nogawaloga epesi. Anen atona la'ifinai ma nofa'apa mokwaha waf awafi mogotanimai ea' la'ifinai ma nogohambombagapa wapani. Ea' dei' ipa' epes mamahipama ma pela' basef pegawaloga epes isimba sagape felefele'ma ipe'i? Na'ambai hapaimi.
Anipa ipa' paga'i na'amba pa'i, “Dei' a'a naman afa' ofe' wambel lu'wambili taun ganii a' ope onda' maola bisnis afagol atotogola ogofa' otamba hiambai.” Ipa' paga'ias na'ambai, peme' basef ifimba.
Ipa' ina pegawa atiasi hiahawes mais sotagamepa naman, owa'atin. Ambagof ipe'igufi ata' pagape namipa fandahama si'i main? Ipa' si'i nogoh gwataga gwagape nogota bandata dowafa hi'agalagw atetef.
Ipa' a' ukup pendanda' pi'i, “I'i okom Godi mi'i aho'ai, atiasi ope namofa onda' maol inimba a'a anin daian.” Piga'ias na'ambai, dao' andeande'.
Apa' dei' ipa' panda'i diga lu'unai gigal pasa'ma agof ipe'igufi atogof. Waf du'wanigaifi afambai hiafi awasifi.
Ea' ipa' pendegawa andeande'. Epen ami negawa ma nenda' waf fasifii ma anin owa' nenda'afa, anin nanda' waf awafi.
Ipa' hiahaom hiamipai, ipa' peme' ae' dei' a'ipipa! Ipa' ukup pepoma nimanimi akafimi anaf mogatagama ipe'i ea' pewa pendalef mehip a'owa'.
Hiahawes ipe'isi uga sosaf maim ipe'imi a' lolowam mape ea' totoloh mahahape' luwaguf maim ipe'imi hi'alam.

Moni ipe'ini gol silva waimba nasagiham a' awasim. Waimba anamba atiasi nihimba'mepa basef si'i anin epen niga'ipipa waf awafi ipa' panda'afi fataga fandawalap. Ea' waimba anamba atiasi nonda' alop ipe'ipi si'i nif fagandipa. Ipa' pakolasa otamba uga maim, apa' owa', nimaguf akutaifi afataga felefele'ma God nonda'mepa basef.

Ipa' peme'. Ipa' ina paso'am otamba amom manda' maol magala' gwa'aisi aof ipe'ifi, owa'. Ipa' panda' wala otamba amamimbai, pendame' lef amamini. Amom malef mehipa otamba amamimbai ea' lef amamini nafe' natagama aligah Dembinai God banagonai ma hiahaom hiamii a' name'.

Nogota ipa' pagape itap apa'e, poe ipe'ini bo'wen pefa' hiahawes fasisi a'owa' pa' gwa'aisi hiasi sanda'epa pataga lu'ulu'upa. Apa' owa', nemaf afamba si'i sagaha mafis lu'wasi atiasi afetagamepa fehambombagepa.
Ipa' panda' basef baso'afi pasapaga epes bo'wes hilili'i pahas saga'. Apa' epes isimba basef akas. Ina sindiwamepa wandaf, owa'.

Sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' banagepa pindalutu banagepa opalef awanelef pesasa nemaf afamba Dembinai nogotanimai. Ipa' a' ukup pendanda'ma anona aman ahama aofi. Anen nasasa anef nemaf gwa'aisi bu'wasi sogatalisa otamba hiambai sogataga. Anen opaf awanef nalutu banagona nape nasasa nogota laota ma asaf filai fenda' gwa'aisi hiasi sogataga aof afamba.
Ipa' wapani pendewa' banaga nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pepe opalef awanelef. Dei' main, nemaf Dembinai nogotanimafi felefele'ma fegataga.
Ipa' ina pendewaloga atina waf ipe'ifi, owa'i. Na'amba atiasi God nowawalogepa. Dembinai jas nape felefele'ma uta.
Sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' ukup pendapoma amom profet, fowa' magawalipasa basef Godi ma agol Dembinaii. Amom opalef awanelef malutu banagema nimanimi akafimi lu'wami magatagamami.

Apa' ma'i amom malutu banagem dei' sonaham. Ipa' pegawa aman anamba Job. Anen nalutu banagona opaf awanefa nimanimi magatagamana. Nape atapina nogota laota, Dembinai natopalopana. Anen na'i uwahipigama apa' a'owa' ea' okom maimailapa.

Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, basef fagali'i ipa' pigailafi ifimba. Ipa' owa'i pi'i heven a'a itap apa'e a'a anis maefaha pewa' banaga basef endilisifi piga'i gani ilifa, owa'i. Ipa' ina pewa' banaga basef endilisifi pi'i gani ilif, owa'i. I'i ipa' ukup piga'i, “Aho'” a pi'i, “Aho'”. I'i piga'i, “Owa'”, a pi'i, “Owa'”. Ea' God nowawaloga ipa' ma basef ifimba ipe'ifi.
I'i anin epen ipe'ini neme' nimanimi akafimi maim, anin a' nendabeten nindahali' God. I'i ipa' anin epen sonohan, anin a' nendanda' awalefa negasa'ma agol Godi.
I'i anin epen ipe'ini aowas nenda'an, anin nendefala amom agufumi siosi mifi'i monda'man beten mohali' God mokolo'wa wel fasili alop ananipi ma agol Dembinaii. Ama nonda' epen inimba bo'wen.
I'i amom mohapilif endilisi mondabeten mohali' Goda, epen inimba atiasi bo'wen. Dembinai notopalopan nasafel wapani. I'i epen inimba nenda' waf awafi, atiasi God nokwahef okom moso'anaf.
Isimba atis dei' ipa' pendawalapama waf awafi ipa' panda'afi atin ea' pendakolas pendanda' beten atina God nonda'epa be'epa. I'i anin epen bo'wen hilili', beten ananini banagen a'owa'.

Aman anamba Elija fowa'inai, anen aman si'i apa' epes sagape itapi. Anen okom mapoma God ea' nandabeten nahali'ana ma nogasopama asaf, ea' ina falai itap asasipi nogota laota afagof si'igufi wanogof du'wanigili.
A'i owa' main, nandabeten nahali' God wapani, otaga gaso' akutiga asaf falai ea' gwa'aisi sataga itap salo andeande' wapani.
Sahin owan ae'ipai, i'i anin epen ipe'ini nekwaha nagahapifa basef endilisifi Godi, ma anin epen daian netopalopan nefa'an nitanimai, dao' ipa' a' ukup pepoma basef ifimba.

Epen ami netopalopa anin nanda' waf awafii ma negakwaha waf ananifi nigatanimai, epen inimba natopalopan nefa'an natanimai nape andeande' nakwaha negaga'. Isimba atis God dei' nakwaha waf awafi hiafi anin nanda'afi okom maso'anaf hi'alaf. Ea' ma'uf.

Ae' Pita anda' maol Jisas Kraisi, anen nandandepe aposel. Ae' anda'ago basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' amam nematawa anen nosahe'epa ea'i. Ipa' epes Godi ea' pakwaha wambel kofagama pafe' pailas pagape itap lu'upa wanifip biafip agufipa Pontusi Galesia a Kapadosia a Esiai Bitinia.

Fowa' gani Ahamapa God nogawepa nosahe'epa ea' ananipai. Ambal bu'winai ananinai atona nanda'epa pataga ananipai atipa be'epa hilili'. Anen nanda'epa na'amba ma pigaila waf Jisas Kraisi anen nasa'opepa esimbel ananimbeli pataga be'epa. Ae' a'i God notopalopepago dowaf nowa' banagaipa ma opalef ipe'ilifi fegape awanelefa pegape si'ipa atapipa ma waf afamba.

Apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi, anen God ahama Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai. Anen okom lu'unai nainailapa nati uwahipipa endilisi. Ea' nasa'ma Jisas Krais nosafel matmat, isimba atis God nanda'apa mataga dambaipa ea', ma mope namepa mogogawa endilisi anaf anen nofa'apa mogotambili.

Ea' dei' mape mohafana anaf nogaso'apa hiahaom fasimi a'owa'. Amamba bo'om endilisi, ina atiasi aom folo'ogalam lamonami, owa'atin. Amamba mogape bo'om atapimi, God nambe'am ma'oh masasa ipa' otaga ilif.
Hapif ipe'ini atin God nala'ambemepa ma anaf nofa'epa pigatanimai. Anen na'i notanima nofa'ipai, isimba sandandombola anaf sotaga sondawalap alihigima nemaf akutaifi.
Ipa' dei' pandagala a'owa' ma isimba, apa' owa' dei' nogota ata' bandata dowaf gwamba naninani natagamepa ma nagase'epa akafimi.

Akafimi amamba matagamepa ma God nogwamba hapif ipe'ini nonda'an negataga bo'wen banagen. Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma otamba gol, amamba fasimi sagatalom moni lu'wanii. Apa' hapif ipe'ini nikila' gol amamba a' fasin a'owa'. Gol amamba anaf higiligalami apa' owa', esis saofam nifa mogataga bo'om. Hapif ipe'ini wapani na'amba atin netaga bo'wen banagena gwambai akafimi mogatagamipai. God nogawamba hapif ipe'ini ma nendawalap negataga bo'wen banagena. Ama anaf Jisas Krais notaga nondawalap alihina, atiasi God nese'epa agof lu'wagufi foloma basef bu'wafi niganifalipamafi ma agili ametal lu'wani.

Ipa' ina dei' pati Jisas, apa' owa' ipa' pahapifana pandagalamana endilisi. Dagala inimba a' fasini a'owa' nagafi'i ilifi a' nikila' dagala hiani itap apa'ini. Ea' epes ina la'ifisa sowalapan soga'ian malogof asasigufi, owa'atin endilisi.
Dei' main, ipa' pape pahapilif dei' hapif inimba ipe'ini nawalapa hiahaom dei' pape pegefa'am atapimi. Hiahaom amamba na'amba. God nowambelepa nokwahomepa waf awafi pitanimai.

Anaf God nofa'apa mogotanimai, amamba fowa' amom profet maga'i basef ifimba ma anen dei' natopalopapa dowafa magape andeande'. Amamba amom ma'i anaf motagama ipa', God nandandepepa ma pegefa'ami. Ea' manda' maol banagambel ukup kilikala' papoma basef ifimba faga'i anaf anen nofa'apa mogotanimai.

Ambal bu'unai ananinai nagape nomona amomi na'i basef alihifa anaf Krais nogofa' akafimi hiami mamimami ma nogofa' agol lu'wagili. Ea' amom ukup pandanda' mahahali' ma'i, “Nemaf mamahefa amamba mifi'i motaga?”

Apa' God nihimba'mam ea' amom ina manda' maol mogatopalopa amoma basef ifimba, owa'atin. Manda' maol matopalopa ipa', ma'i basef ifimba ma hiahaom bu'wami anaf mogatagai. Apa' dei' anom daiam magawalipipa basef bu'wafi Godi ma'ipipa hiahaom amamba atom. Ma'ipipa ma banagami Ambal bu'unai ananinai nigisila'i otaga ilifi. Amom profet amamba, ina amom atom ukup pa'i basef ifimba mogawef, owa'atin. Ensel wapani ma'i mogawef.

Ea' dei' ipa' pendondomba nomonas ipe'isi ma penda' maol bu'wani, pindimafi alopi nomonas ipe'isi pendape andeande'. Ea' pihapilif pendape ukup kilikala' pehafa Jisas Krais anaf notaga nondowalap alihinama notopalopepa dowaf nowambelepa pigitanimai.
Ipa' pindaila waf Godi si'i awasi sagaila basef mamasasi. Fowa' ipa' gawa akepa ata' pape waf afamba awafi ukup pagahasafi. Dei' ipa' ina ata' pila waf afamba wapani, hapaifi.
God nogofala ipe'i, anen bo'ona hilili'i. Ea' ipa' wapani pendape na'amba atin si'i anen, pepe ananipai atipa andeande' hilili' ma fe' poe inimba ipe'ini hi'indalan.
Dei' main, Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Ae' ape hilili' bo'owe. Ea' ipa' wapani pendape ae'ipai atipa usi'ipa hilili'.”

Ipa' pefala God paga'i anen “Ahamapa”. Ahamapa anamba anen ina okom mapoma agof ape'igufi lu'wagof sa'ogof ea' nawaloga apa', owa'atin. Anen nawawaloga apa' na'amba atina ikwaf usi'ifi atetefa waf mamahefa apa' manda'afi. Isimba atis ipa' ombal mondahepama God penda' lotumana pendafe' usi'ipa nimaguf mamahefa ipa' pailas pagape dowaf itap apa'i.

Ipa' pegawa ea' fowa' ipa' ata' pape panda' waf awasifi wafifi pegefa'afa bafasepa ihasepa ipe'isii. Apa' dei' owa', God natalipa natagwahipa ma waf afamba awafi. Anen ina natalipa ma hiahaom atiasi mogataga awasim higiligalami si'i otamba fasimbai silivai gol, owa'atin.

Anen natalipa natagwahipa ma pegape wahifipa esimbela ga' Kraisi atin. Esimbel amamba bo'om lu'um a'owa'. Krais naga' si'i fowa' esis sagaha sipsip noganai sondolalimana ma God. Sipsip anamba bo'ona a'owa'i ea' ina anin ametal awasini natomana, owa'atin endilisi. Anen bo'ona hilili'i.

God owa' ata' nonda' itap apa'e petagaea, anen nogawa Krais nandandepana ea' ma nogaga' si'i sipsip anamba. Nimaguf ifimba hiafi dei' fagi' fagatagai, anen nataga nandawalap alihina ma nogatopalopepa.
Anen atona natopalopepa dei' pahapifa God anen nasa'ma Krais nosafel matmata nagaso'ana agol lu'wagili anen. Isimba atis dei' pahapifa God atona pegawa endilisi anaf anen atona nofa'epa pitanimai.

Ipa' paila basef ifimba, isimba atis dei' sanda' opalef ipe'ilifi fasilif. Ea' dei' ipa' panda' waf afamba ukup pagapagailasafi panda'af endilisi. Ipa' ina panda' uhuf pembaso'am alipipai ma alop atop, owa'. Apa' dei' ipa' pendanda' waf afamba banagambel pindikila' fowa' panda'afi. Ea' ukup pindaima atin a'owa' pendaloma esis.

Dei' main? Ipa' ina pataga dambaipa si'i awasi sagataga mamasas itapasi sagaga'i, owa'atin. Basef Godi atif anen nanda'epa nolaepa pataga dambaipa. Basef ifimba ambal namili lagapaifi fagape namif dondoli, dei' ipa' pataga dambaipa ea'.
Si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Amam nematawa hiasi hi'alas si'i otalef ea' sosaf asasifi si'i afis sagataga dowaf itapi. Otalef alilifi afis wapani mala'of mogowai,
apa' basef Dembinaii fagape atapif dondol lifilafi.” Basef ifimba basef bu'wafi esis sagawalapefa ipe'i.
Ipa' pendombasa ipa' hilili' ma waf hiafi baso'afi paga'i malogof biagufi a ukup kowagalapafi faloma waf afamba piga'i basef awafi alafugaha anis daias. Waf afamba awafi, ipa' pendakwahef.

Ipa' pendape ukup pindaila basef Godi si'i awasi ata' sogolas dambaisi ukup pagaila saga' nomambeh atembihi. Ipa' dondol iap pese'epama piga'i basef Godi atif be'ef hilili'i, owa' sombema anin mae awani nigalomefia. Basef ifimba fenda'epa dambepa banagepa ma anaf God notopalopepa pitanimai pegape andeande'.
Endilisi, ipa' pagwamba Dembinai pandondomana ea' pegawana ma waf ananifi bu'wafi endilisi.
Anen si'i otam ambal namili lagapaumi. Ipa' pindafi'mai anen, otam amamba esis amam nematawa sandaiwa'mam sanda'am lifilefatam maga'ihi. Apa' God nosaho'am ea' na'i otam amamba fasimi endilisi.

Ipa' wapani si'i otamba ambal namili lagapaimbai. God nape nanda'epa atapina ma pegataga be'epa si'i anota ipat bu'utai ananitai. Ama ipa' pegape epes bu'upai penda' maol pindalalima God. Ea' pindalali pese'ana ukupi ambagof ipe'isi sefe'ma anen. Ipa' pindalali penda'as na'amba, okom Godi ma'i isimba andeande'ma maol inimba Jisas Kraisi.

Dei' main, basef fowa' God naga'iefi fagail buk Baibeli faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Peme', ae' andandepa otam atotom fasimi sagatalom moni lu'wanii mape magali'i ma mogowa' banaga ipati. Dei' ae' ambe' otam amamba mape wambel lu'wambili Saion. Epes mamahisia sogahapifa anini, esis ina atiasi ukup nimanip, owa'atin.”

Otam amamba fasim endilisi agol lu'wagili ma ipa' pagahapifanai, apa' isimba owa' sogahapifanaia anif basef fapomas faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Otam amamba amom magala' ifagwi mandaiwa'mam melefatam maga'ihi, dei' mandambema mataga otam mape magali'i mogowa' banaga ipat atambai.”

Ea' anif wapani fa'ias fa'i, “Anaf otam amamba monda' anis epes sowa.” Esis sendesembaolam asowa. Dei' main, esis ina same' basef Godi sailif, owa'atin sosambalif. Esis sosambalif si'i fowa' God nali' nandandepasa sendesembaola sogowa.

Apa' ipa' pape wambota Godi nogosahe'epa ea'i. Ipa' panda' maola dembinai king Jisas Krais pindilalimana si'i pris. Ea' pape amam nematawa Godi atipa mini'ap hiasi ma ganimba hiagoma. God nosahe'epa ea' ananipai atipa ma pegewalapa banagami fasimi moloma agol lu'wagili ananigili. Anen nofalepa ea' nanda'epa pakwaha owamb akot pagafi'mai mogogala'i fasimi ananimi.

Fowa' ipa' ata' pape epes falafipai atipa, apa' dei' ea' epes ananipai atipa. Fowa' ipa' ina pegawa God nagati uwahipipa ma dei' pagape andeande', ata' owa'. Apa' dei' pegawa God nati uwahipipa natopalopepa pape andeande'.

Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai endilisi, ae' a'i i'ipipa dindinip, ipa' si'i epes analemb walembipai pafi'i pailas pagapani pape nogota kwaia'uta ma itap apa'e. Dei' ipa' pendewa' alafugaha waf awafi ukup awapi pigahafemafi, fa'i fepa' fegaloma ambagof ipe'igufi.

Ipa' pepe pefe' andeande' pendanda' waf fasifi usi'ifi ma nogohnaep esis epes sogololama Godi. Ama nemaf mamahefa esis siga'i basef awafima ipa', atiasi siti waf bu'wafi ipe'ifi ea' sinifela waf afamba si'i bu'wafi. Ama main, nemaf akutaifi anen nogafi'afi ma esis sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.
Ipa' petalogofa ipa' hi'ilipa pefe' lafela agufumi dembami hiami hi'alam magape dembami ma itap apa'i. Pepe lafela pigaila waf Dembinaii. Pendape lafela dembinai gavman nagali'ma esis Romi.
Amom gavman dembami wapani, God atona nanda'am mapoma moha epes isimba sanda' waf awafii mogasindi'amonas, ea' mogasa'ma agofa isimba sanda' waf fasifii.
Okom Godi na'i ipa' penda'as na'amba. Anen na'i ipa' penda' waf fasifi ma fegasopama malogofa epes isimba ukup mahas magaolasi saga'i basef gawa akafii.

Ipa' ina agof akipai pape lafela anis epes daias, owa'atin. Ipa' pape wahifipa a pape lafela God atona. Ipa' pegawa isimba pendape andeande' si'i pagape wahifipai. Apa' ipa' ina pembaso'am penda' uhuf pewalo' waf afamba sagape wahifisafi usi'ifi fasifi feso'ala waf awafi pandambaho' panda'afi, hapaifi. Ipa' pendape andeande' si'i pape panda' maol Godii.

Ipa' pendagala pasa'ma agofa epes hiasi hi'indalas penda'as andeande'. Ea' ukup pindapindaila Kristen sahin owan ipe'isi. Ipa' a' ombal mondahepama Goda penda' lotumana andeande'. Ea' pendasa'ma agol king gavman dembinai nagali'ma esis Romi.

Ipa' panda' maola anis epesi pendafe' lafela dembami amamba ipe'imi ma maol hiani. Ipa' peme'am ea' ombal mondahepamam pesa'ma agof amamugufi. Ipa' ina penda'as na'amba ma amom bu'wami manda' waf sa'umbilifi atom, owa'. Penda'as na'amba ma anom manda' waf awafi akafifi wapani.
God anaf nofalo'mepa ma isimba i'i ipa' pilutu banagepa pila okom ananimi ma akafimi esis sogase'epam dowadowafi.

Apa' i'i ipa' penda' waf awafi sogahepama waf afambai ma pilutu banagepa pititilis, anaf ipa' pefa' main fasini ma waf afambai? Owa'atin. Apa' i'i ipa' penda' waf usi'ifi fasifi ma esis sonda'mepa waf awafi, dao' God okom mi'i waf afambai ea' nofalo'mepa ma isimba.

God nofalai ipa' ea' ma pigaila waf afambai pegefa' akafimi ma waf bu'wafi ipa' panda'afi. Dei' main, Krais atona name' akafimi ma nagatopalopapa. Ea' nihimba'mepa waf afamba bu'wafi ananifi ma pigailaf.
“Anen ina nanda' anef waf awafi, owa'. Ina na'i anif basef baso'afi ma malogol ananigili, owa'atin.”

Nemaf afamba esis sanda'ana findiwana anen ina nagwamas nanda'as findiwas, owa'atin. Afamba anen nagame' akafimi lu'wami anen ina naumbelis, owa'. Anen naso' anen atona hi'alana nafe'ma lagof anen aman anamba nogawaloga epes andeande' datimai.

Krais anen atona naga' nail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea' nofa' hiahaom awami ape'imi ma alop ananipi. Anen nanda'ama apa' mogape si'i saga' sagakwaha waf awafi hi'agalaf. Ama apa' mogape namepa ambal lopaipa mugaila waf usi'ifi hiafi.

Esis sahambombaga alop ananipi sanda'ana melegw atogwana, isimba atis dei' nanda'apa be'epa wapani. Fowa' ipa' pelelama ufia'w si'i sipsip owa' sugumafiamia. Apa' dei' ipa' pitanima pafi'i ma Dembinai nugumafi ipa' paloma ambagof ipe'igufi andeande' si'i anona nugumafi sipsip nugumafiam andeande'.

Basef ifimba fagali'i fa'i ipa' pendape lafela dembami gavman moloma agufisi ipa' panda' maolasi. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' nematawa pagaso' amami pendape lafela amom wauhupipa ipe'imi. I'i anom owa' ata' mugaila basef Godia, ipa' pila'ipam pihimba'mama waf bu'wafi atef atapipa. Ipa' ina pi'ipam anif basef. Apa' pihimba'mama mugati waf bu'wafi ipe'ifi atefa amom mila basef Godi mogahapifana.
Dei' main, amom atiasi miti ipa' nematawa ombal mehepa ma Goda pila waf fasifi usi'ifi atefa pegafe' andeande' hilili'ma amom mogambema opalefa God.

Ipa' ina pendefalo' sosaf hiahaom mamimami alop atopami ma monda' ipa' pindati fasifasipa si'i pegefalo'ma balagah ipe'igahi, owa'i. Ipa' ina pendefalo' a'owa' sosaf atona wafinai si'i bahigis mais fasifasisi a gol mogogala' gambigambis a klos sosaf fasifasinai nagailami ma hiasi sitilipa siga'i fasifasipai, owa'i, hapaimi.

Sosaf ipe'ifi na'ambai, ipa' pendefalo'ma opalef ipe'ilifi nomona ukup nomonas ipe'isi ma waf bu'wafi usi'ifi endilisifi. Sosaf afambai ina atiasi awasifi, owa'atin. Fogape atapif lifilafi na'amba. Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi begape awanelemb a ambagof ipe'igufi tol fogape andeande'ma waf sa'umbilifi. Sosaf afamba nomonafi lu'wafi a'owa' ma naep Godi.

Nematawa fowa'iwai mini'ap Godi awo wahapifif wape wa'i endilisi God anaf nigaila basef ananifi datimai. Sosaf awaufi na'ambai, wanda' na'amba wanda' waf bu'wafi opalef nomon ea' wafe' lafela wauhupawa awaumi.

Sera kwanda'as na'amba atin. Ako'w kwahapifa aman akwa'unai Abraham ea' kofalana kwa'i Dembinai akwa'unai. I'i ipa' penda' waf fasifi usi'ifi ma owa' ombal mehepama hiahawes mais si'i sogatagamepai, ipa' dei' ea' ihawama'w ako'upai.

Ipa' amam wauhupawa wapani pindimafiawa ma gawa bu'wani, ukup pendanda'ma alop awaupi ina banagep, owa'. Ipa' penda'awa andeande' pasa'ma agof awaugufi. Dei' main, awo wapani dei' walomepa ogofa' ambal namili God nogose'epal dowafi. Ipa' penda'mawas na'amba ma ina anis maefah sili'ama beten ipe'ini, owa'atin.
Basef ifimba fetambel na'amba. Ipa' hipai pendape opalef atelef ea' ukup pindaima atin pila sahin owan.

Ipa' ina penda' waf awafi fendagwama, owa'i. I'i esis siga'ipipa basef findiwaifi, ipa' ina pegwamasef, owa'i. I'i esis sonda'mepa waf awafi, ipa' pegwamas penda'mas waf fasifi atef pi'ipas basef bu'wafi ma God nogofalo'mas. Dei' main, God nofalepa ea' ma pegefa' hiahaom fasimi anaf nogofalo'mepami.
Si'i basef Godi fagail Buk Baibeli fa'ias na'amba faga'i, “Epen mamahina ni'i sonahana ambal namili ma okom mi'i negati nemaf bu'wafi, anin nindihi'ama basef nili'ama malogol ananigili andeande'.
Anin nendambema nefa'ma waf awafi, ea' nenda' waf bu'wafi atef. Ea' anin okom mondaila opaf fogape awanef fogaloma Godi epesi ea' nenda' waf afambai fefe' fepe banagef.

Dei' main, Dembinai anen nape naep paila epes isimba sogape hilili'i ma waf bu'wafi ea' numafias andeande'. Dondol anen nagahembe'ma beten asasini, apa' isimba sanda' waf awafii anen nandambema nanda' megahahas.”
I'i ipa' ukup pi'ipi'i a'owa' ma penda' waf fasifi atef, ina a' anin epen la'ifina nenda'mepa waf awafi nehambombagepa, owa'atin endilisi.
I'i ipa' pefa' akafimi ma waf fasifi ipa' panda'afi, ipa' pendagala a'owa'. Ipa' ina a' ombal mehepama epes ea' ina nomonas iwaiwanis, owa'i.

Ipa' ukup pendapoma Krais atona nope Dembinai hilili'ma opalef ipe'ilifi penda' lotumana. Ea' penda' dumbulidombol pendape lifilafi ma pewalapa basef kofagefa alihif pegagwamasef epes ami sogahali'ipamafi ma hiahaom fasimi pape pegehafami.

Apa' ipa' pegwamasef peloma opalef awanilifi ea' penda'as andeande' pinifelis. Ipa' penda' waf bu'wafi ma malogof fagape opalef ipe'ilifi nomoni ina fihimba'mepa anef waf awafi, owa'. Penda'as na'amba ma esis siga'ipipa basef awafi ma poe bu'wani pagaila Kraisani ma esis ambagof awagofa basef ifimba awafi asasifi.

Dei' main, andeande'ma ipa' pegefa' akafimi ma waf usi'ifi fasifi. Amamba mikila' wafa pegefa' akafimi ma waf awafi ipa' panda'afi. I'i okom Godi ni'i ipa' pefa' akafimi amamba ma waf bu'wafi dao', andeande'.

Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma Krais anen naga' atetefa nagakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi ea' amamba ma'um. Aman atotona bu'unai naga' ma nagatopalopa epes hiasi sanda' waf awafii ma nili'as sogafe'ma God. Alop ananipi, sahana naga'. Apa' ambal ananili, nosafel nape namona.
Ambal ananili atol ea' nafe' nawalapa basefa amom ambagof amamba sagawasi'am dindigimi epes isimba
fowa' sogosambala Godi, anen nanindifa okom nape nasasa afamba Nowa nanda' galaho'wafi. Galaho'w akwamba epes kwaia'wis sawis sape andeande', 8-pelais ina saga' ma embel lu'wami, owa'atin.

Embel amamba lu'wami mondola'waifa sasa'of sogofa' baptais matopalopepa pegape andeande'. Amamba ina masa'opa alogwa alop atop ando'i, owa'atin. Amamba anif basef endilisi banagafi apa' ma'if magaloma Godi, ifimba fatagai malogof fagape opalef nomoni bo'walef hilili'i. Amamba mofa'epa pigatanimai ma banagami amamba atom Jisas Krais notanima nogosafelami.
Anen ea' nafe' nalota ilif otaga nape wa'ol felefele'ma lagol kwahisigili Godi banagagoma. Ea' amom ensel hiami maloma agufumi banagami mugumafi ilifi mape lafela anen atona.
Krais nofa' akafimi alop ananipi ea' ipa' wapani a' ukup banagep na'amba atin si'i anen. Dei' main, epen mamahina ipe'ini negefa' akafimi ma alop ananipii, anin nakwaha waf awafi ea'.
Ea' dei' nogota ata'e ipa' ata' pagape itap apa'e, ipa' pefe' pila okom Godi atona nola'ambemepa nope pefe' pefe' petagama pegaga'. Apa' okom aunai epesi nogohafema waf awafii, owa'i, hapainai.

Fowa' ipa' pape nogota launai ea' pafe' paila waf naninani aunai esis sogololama Godi ukup maga'ianai. Waf afamba na'amba, waf so'a waulafi, ukup pegehafela waf awafi a saga' embel banagimbeli ma ukup magaolas a safe' sagape anamba sanda' gwa'aimi saga' embel banagimbeli nogota lautaima a sandakolas saga' embel banagami mamimami a sogosambala basef Godi ma sanda' waf awafi a safe' sanda' lotuma god baso'amunai. Nogota tatumba pafe' pagaila waf anambai dei' ahi'alata.
Dei' epes isimba sogololama Godi gogolalasis sati ipa' owa' pendao'oma pelomas penda' waf anamba hianai aunaia. Ea' dei' asa'ipipa basef awafi findiwaefa ipa'.
Anen nandandombol ea' ma nogawaloga epes isimba sagapani soloma isimba ea' sagaga'i. Esis anaf sowalapa waf awafi asasifi sogwamana basef anen a waf afamba kofagefa esis sanda'afi.

Isimba atis fowa' basef bu'wafi Godi afafe' fatagama epes isimba sagaga'i wapani. Ama God nogawaloga esis si'i anaf nogawaloga epes hiasi hi'igalas. Basef ifimba bu'wafi fafe' fatagama esisa sogape namisa ambagof asasigufi si'i God nagape namona.
Nogota hiahaom ma'i hi'igalamatai ea' tafi'i felefele'. Isimba atis ipa' a' ukup pindapaipa andeande' pelele' kilikala' ea' pindimafi alop ipe'ipi andeande'ma ipa' la'ifipa ma pendabeten.

Basef lu'wafi fape fagali'ma basef hiafi hi'agalafi ifimba. Ipa' ukup pindaima atina sahin owan banagambel a'owa'. Dei' main, waf afamba ukup pindaima atinasafi faso'ala waf hiafi awafi ea' fikila' waf hiafi hi'alaf.
Ipa' pinda'i aho'ma anef waf afambai petopalopa anis alipisi daindaias sogafi'i ifagw ipe'igwii pimafias andeande'. Ipa' ina opalef awalefa esis, owa'i.

Ipa' hipai atona atin apefa' presen naninani fasini hiani Ambal bu'unai Godi nagase'epani. Ea' pindimafi presen inimba ipa' atona atini andeande' datima ma pegatopalopa esis sahin owan. Pimafian na'amba.

Ami negawalapa basefi, anin a' ninda'if si'i nagawalapa basef Godi atif. Ea' epen nenda' maola negatopalopa anis daindaiasi, anin nendanda'ana banagami amamba God nagaso'anami. Ama epes hiasi sogati maol inimba hiani fasini hi'igalana sondagala sogasa'ma agol Godi ma Jisas Krais atona. Agol lu'wagili goloma banagami mogogala'i hiami ananimi atom dondol lifilafi. Endilisi atis.

Ipa' Kristen alipipai endilisi, anom gwamba lu'wami mi'i mogatagama ipa', apa' ipa' ina pi'i amamba a' anom daiam endilisi matagamepa ea' pesafel gogololasipa ma amamba, owa'i. Akafimi amamba ipa' pefa'am paloma Krais.
Ea' ipa' sonondahepa ma pegame' akafimi amamba. Ama anaf agol lu'wagili ananigili goloma mogogala'i ananimi mogataga, nemaf afamba ipa' pendagala endilisi a'owa'.
I'i anis siti ipa' pilutu banagepama Kraisa si'ipipa basef awafi findiwaifi, dao' andeande' ipa' pendagala. Dei' main, akafimi amamba mihimba'mepa Ambal bu'unai Godi dei' nogala' napaipa.

Ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma anin epen ipe'ini neha anin epen daian nega' a'a nenda' wal o nenda' waf awafi fafifafi a'a ni'i nepe nilinili' ma maol anis daiasi, owa'i. Ae' andaiwa'ma anin epen ipe'ini nenda' anef waf afambai awafi ma sogaso'an akafimi. Amambai owa', awasim.
Apa' i'i ipa' pefa' akafimi ma pagataga Kristen, dao'. Ipa' ina ambagof awagofa amamba pendafa'mam, owa'i. Ipa' sonehepa pindanifela Goda pegefa' agol Kraisi.

Nogota atamba atataga ea' ma dei' God nogawaloga esis mini'ap ananipi ma basef lu'wafi. I'i God nili' nogawaloga apa' mugali', anaf nigi' nowaloga epes isimba sogosambala basef bu'wafi ananifii sope atiasi si'imama? Esis asofa' akafimi lu'wami.

Si'i basef Godi fagail Baibeli faga'ias fa'i, “I'i ahifima epes bu'wasi sotanimai sogape andeande'ma, dei' epes isimba sogowa' alafugaha Godi soloma isimba sanda' waf awafii anaf sondanda' si'imama? Esis asope awes sofa' akafimi lu'wami.”

Ea' epes mamahisa sogofa' akafimi ma sagaila okom Godii, isimba sonda'as na'amba. Esis ea' sondape usi'is atis solo ambagof asasigufi fope lagof Godi, anen nanda' epes hiasi sataga sagapani naila basef ananifi datima atapina.

Ipa' agufipai pigimafi esis Kristeni, ae' a'i esa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ewa' banagaipa. Ae' wapani ae' agiliwai igimafi esis Kristeni. Fowa' ae' alutu agati Krais nogofa' akafimi a' egegawami. Ea' anaf wapani ilutu elomepa ma mugati mogogala'i lu'wami mogatagai. Dei' a'ipipa dindinip na'amba a'i

ipa' pindimafi amam nematawa God nogasi'ipasi andeande' si'i amom mugumafi sipsipi manda'as. Ea' ipa' ukup pehafel endilisi ma pigimafias si'i okom Godi ma'i penda'as. Ipa' pendanda' maol ananini andeande' datima, ina penda'an ukup pepoma pegefa' otamba atemba, owa'. Opalef ipe'ilifi fendasafel endilisi ma penda' maol Godi.

Ipa' owa'i pepe si'i epes sogofa' agof lu'wagufi ma pegape dembipai pegetalogofa esis amam nematawa isimba Godi ipa' pigimafiasia, owa'i. Ipa' pendape hilili' andeande'ma esis sitilipa sigaila waf ipe'ifi.

Ama Dembinai nugumafi amam nematawa si'i sipsip Godi notaga nondawalap alihinama ipa' pegefa' hiahaom bu'wami mogape andeande' lifilafii, agol lu'wagilimi. Amamba ina atiasi awasim higiligalami, owa'. Mogape atapimi.

Ea' na'amba atin ipa' amam sa'upai awamipai wapani, ipa' pinindifa ipa' pefe' lafela amam amamba agufumi dembami mugumafi ipe'i. Ea' pendefa' waf afamba pinindifa ipa' pendafe' lafela amom sahopepa ipe'imi pendatopalopa atina waf bu'wafi. Dei' main, basef fagail buk Baibeli faga'ias na'amba fa'i “God nowa' alafuga epes isimba sanda' du'waniga ma sagasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof. Apa' anen natopalopa epes isimba sagatalifa agof asasigufi fagafe' lafela anis daiasi ma sagape sa'umbili.”
Ea' dei' ipa' pindatalifa ukup ipe'ipi pendafe' lafela God pepe lafela banagami ananimi. Ama nemaf mamahefa anen okom muga'iefi fegataga ma nosa'ma agof ipe'igufi noganifelipa.
Hiahaom nimanimi monda'epa awipai, pese'anam mefe'ma God atona. Dei' main, anen bu'unai banagonai nugumafi ipa' andeande'i.

Ipa' pimafi alop ipe'ipi solawaipa andeande'. Satan aman aunai bounai ipe'inai anen nandahama si'i mafin lu'unai wandafunai laion nagail alupi. Anen naha nafe' noga nogalef mehipa na'i niti anis epes nohas noga'as.
Ipa' pihapifana pilutu banagepa ma pewa' alafugahana pigali'amonana. Dei' main, sahin owan ipe'isi sagape itap hiagomai esis sofa' akafimi na'amba atin.

God anen kofagonama waf afamba hiafi hi'alaf nagatopalopapa dowafafi. Ipa' sisihipama Krais, isimba atis dei' God nofalepa ma pegape mogogala'i banagami ananimi magape dondol lifilafii. Apa' dei' ipa' pame' akafimi nogota bandata. Ama main owa', anen atona nisindi'amonepa petaga be'epa, ea' nowa' banagaepa pilutu banagepa si'i olaf banagafi fogowa' banaga ipati.
Banagami hiami hi'alam ananimi atom dondol lifilafi.

Ae' a'ipa owame Sailas nanda'ago basef ifi'i ae'afi bandafi fafe'mago ipa'. Ae' ati anen nanda' maola Krais datimai. Ea' a'ipipago basef amamba endilisimi God nagatopalopapa dowafami. Dei' lutu atapipa ma amamba. Anda' basef ifi'i a'i asa'ma ukup ipe'ipi egewa' banagaipa.

Esis amam nematawa Kristen sahin owan ipe'isi sagape wambel Babiloni, God nandandepas ea' sagalomipai. Esis sasapa'o dagala basef bu'wafi fafe'mago ipa'. Nogame ae'anai Mak wapani sonahana ma ipa' ea' nasapa'o basefa dagala ananini ma ipa'.

Ipa' pindahapima atin ukup pindaima peloma ipa' Kristen alipipai hipai atona atin hi'indalepa. Ama penda' waf afamba ukup pigapigailasafi. Ae' a'i God nonda'epa opalef awanelef, ipa' mamahipama pagape sisihipama Kraisi. Ea' ma'uf.

Ae' Saimon Pita anda' maol Jisas Kraisi, anen nandandepe aposel. Ae' anda'ago basef ifimba ma ipa' amam nematawa pegefa' hapif fasini lu'wani na'amba atin si'i afa' ogofa'ani. Hapif inimba ipa' pefa'ana waf bu'wafi hilili'i Jisas Kraisi, anen God ape'inai nowambelapa mogotanimai.
God natopalopepa dowaf ea' nanda' opalef ipe'ilifi fape sa'ombel awanelef. Ae' a'i amamba mondape si'ima ipa' ma ufia'w akwamba pegegawa God noloma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai.

Krais nofalepa ma pefa' banagami mogogala'i ananimi atom pegalomana. Ama banagami God nagaso'anami atom anen naso'apa fe' bu'wani hiahaom amamba fasimi hi'alama mope andeande' mogaila waf Godi. Krais nanda'apa na'amba ma ufia'w akwamba mogogawa anen atona.

Banagami mogogala'i amamba atom anen naso'apa basef ananimi naga'i endilisi atinami. Basef amamba lu'wami fasimi a'owa'. Basef amamba atom ipa' pataga la'ifipama pegefa' ambal namili ma waf Godi pegalomana. Ama pefa' pefe' pindihi'ama hiahaom amamba awami mataga manda' ukup pegehafel a'owa' ma waf awafii mape itap apa'e manda' epes awasii.

Ipa' ukup pepoma hiahawes isimba pendanda' maol banagambel endilisi dondo' ma ikwafa pepel ipe'ini piwatania hapif ipe'ini penda' waf bu'wafi atef. Ea' piwatania waf afamba bu'wafi ma pegefa' gawa bu'wani.

Ea' piwatania gawa inimba ma waf nomonas sondapaipa pimafi alop andeande' datima. Ea' piwatania waf pigimafi alopafi ma waf pigalutu banagepamafi, pegefa' nimanimi. Ea' piwatania waf pigalutu banagepamafi ma penda' waf pegasa'ma agol ananigili.
Ea' waf afamba hiafi bu'wafi fagali'i piwataniaf feloma waf ukup pindaima atina sahin owanafi. Ea' waf afamba ukup pindaima atinafi piwatania waf bu'wafi pegatopalopa sahin owanafi.

Ipa' pegawa Jisas Krais dembinai ape'inai anen kofagonama waf afambai hiafi hi'alaf. I'i waf afamba fepe ipa' banagefa fetaga lu'uf a'owa' fikila' pali' panda'afi, gawa inimba ipe'ini ina atiasi nepe dowaf, owa'atin. Atiasi a' netaga nefe' lu'win newalapai waf fasifi hiafi.

Apa' epen mamahina waf afambai akani, anin ina atiasi niti hiahawes sagape lauguni negawas, owa'atin. Anin si'i naep pagaso'ani ea' okom maso'an God nasa'opana nagakwahomana waf awafi hiafi anin nali' nanda'afi.

Ea' ipa' penda' waf bu'wafi penda' maol banagambel endilisi pindikila' fowa' pali' panda'ana pagaila basef ifimba fowa' God nofalepa nosahe'epa ma pagape ananipai atipa. Penda'as na'amba ma pegegawa endilisi God nofalepa nosaho'epa ea'. I'i ipa' pelam penda'am atapipa, atiasi ina pewa ma anef waf awafi, owa'atin.

I'i ipa' pigailam, dao' andeande'ma anaf God nonda' ufia'w kogal alihi'wa pendagala pefe' pigawis anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma nagape atapigin lifilafima. Anen atona nagatopalopapa ma dei' magape andeande'i.

Endilisi, ipa' pegawa hiahawes isimba ma basef ifimba fagali'i ea' pahapifif banagepa ma basef ifimba endilisifi palutu la'ifipamef. Owa' owa'atin, ae' a'i ata' inda'ipipa atina egasa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma pendanda'ma basef ifimba.
Nimaguf hiafi hi'ilif ae' epe namowe elomepa itap apa'e, okom mandanda' a'i i'ipipa timbi tambela egasa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma basef ifimba.
Ae' egawa nogota bandata ma atiasi elamona ambal ae'ali ma sehe egaga' si'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nigihimba'me ea'.
Isimba atis dei' a'i enda' maol banagambel dondo' ma ikwafa pepel ae'ani enda' ano'w ufia'wa anif nimaguf hiafi ae' egaga', ipa' ukup pendanda'ma basef ifimba pepe pegegawef.

Afa' wa'ipipa ea' pegawa banagami Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi ma anaf notanima nifi'i nogoloma banagami lu'wami. Apa' afa' ina waila anom basef numunefis dowaf epes gawaisi saga'iami wa'ipipa basef ifimba Kraisi, owa'atin. Afa' watolona endilisi nogofa' banagami mogogala'i fasimi Godi ma naep afa'ipi, isimba atis dei' wa'ipipa.

Afamba afa' wape wagalomana halafuta atamba, wati anen nofa' agol lu'wagili galoma banagami mogogala'i fasimi ma lagol Ahamana Godi. Nemaf afamba anagol malogol ga'i gatagai God nagapoma gafi'mai Jisas ga'i, “Anamba Nogame ae'anai okom magamagailana a'owa'i. Okom ae'ami bo'oma anen.”
Afa' wape walomana halafuta atamba God nandandepatai bo'wagoma ea' wame' basef ifimba malagol agalemba ga'i gagatagai ilifi.

Afa' atofa ukup pandanda'ma basef ifimba God naga'iefi wame'ef afamba wagape halafuta atamba. Basef ifimba fewa' banaga basef fowa' amom profet maga'iefi ea' wahapilif banagef wa'i endilisi atis. I'i ipa' peme' basef ifimba amamifi ukup kilikala' pepemef, dao' andeande'. Dei' main, basef ifimba si'i anin nagwapin fagandini nape negegala' akoti. Ea' negala' nape atapin nafi'i nataga a' lala. Ama ondo'w kuhimbitai'wi lagalama'wi kogohafili opalef ipe'ilifi nomon.
Apa' ipa' ata' pendegawa basef ifimba atapipamef. Ina anona profet atotona naila okom ananimi atom dei' na'i anif basef kofagefa amom profet fowa' manda'ef fagail buk Baibeli, owa'atin.

Dei' main? Fowa' ina anin epen atitin na'i anif basef mogofa'efa Godi ma okom ananimi atom, owa'atin. Ambal bu'wali Godi atona nasa'mai nomonas amom profeti nasindi'amonam ea' mofa' malagol ananigili ma'i basef ifimba.

Fowa' anom profet magambaso'ami mataga la'afena esis amam nematawa Israel mambaso'masa basef baso'ami. Dei' na'amba atin atiasi anom amam magambaso'ami mosafel la'afena ipa' wapani ea' mondambaho' mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'ipipa basef mamimami hiami baso'ami magahambombaga epesi. Dembinai anen fowa' naga' ma natala amom amamba nagatagwahoma waf awafi ma mogape andeande'. Apa' owa', amom mowa'ana alafugah wapani. Atiasi monda'as na'amba atin, owa' kwafalis atis mohambombaga amom atom motaga aom.

Amom manda'as na'amba atiasi anis amam nematawa hiasi sila waf naninani aunai amamunai. Ea' anis epes daias siti waf awafi amom magambaso'ami manda'afi ea' sosambala basef bu'wafi si'i basef awafi atifa waf bu'wafi endilisifi Godi.

Amom amamba kowagalami endilisi, isimba atis atiasi monda' basef baso'afi ukup amamipi atip paga'iefi ma mogofa' otamba mais ipe'isi. Apa' fowa' God a' nogawa nandandepa anef nemaf fapomam ea' ma nogawaloga amoma anaf higiligalam lamonam. God nandondomba anom maifah mogalamona amom endilisii ata' mape atapim mohafa amom. Ina ma'oh molola, owa'atin.

God ina niambali' amom ensel mamahoma fowa' manda' waf awafii, owa'atin. Anen a' nali'amonam miliana wambel awambili hel. Ea' nowa'am sisihim mape atapim anamba akotigima mape masasa nemaf God nogowalogamafi.

Anen ina niambali' esis amam nematawa fowa'isi sogowa' alafugahanai sape andeande', owa'atin. Anen nanda' embel lu'wami matef mahas afis hi'alas. Anen numafi Noa atotona nagawalipasa basef bu'wafi Godii nofa'ana naloma epes 7-pelais wapani nofa'as sotanimai sape andeande'.

Ea' nahambombaga epes hiasi sagape walemb bialembi lu'walimbi Sodomi Gomora wapani. Epes isimba walemb ambalembai God nahagon naofagon nif lu'wafi ea' agambeh atembeh hotawa. Anen nagwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi nanda'as si'i anol ametala akafimi lu'wami epes mamahisa sogosambala basef ananifii anaf sogofa'ami.

God natopalopa aman anamba bu'unai Lot numafiana nofa'ana notanimai nape andeande', ina aona lamonana, owa'. Anen okom nimanim endilisima waf awafi so'a waulafi alugufi amom manda'afi, mogosambala basef Godii.
Aman anamba bu'unai Lot nape la'afisa nalomas dondol name'ama waf awafi amom manda'afi nalomam natelef. Okom ananimi a' nimanim a'owa' ma waf afamba amom mogosambala basef Godii manda'afi.

Basef ifimba fa'ipapa alihif fa'i Dembinai nugumafi epes bu'wasi sagaila waf ananifii andeande'. Nemaf mamahefa gwamba maim mogatagamas, anen nogawa ea' ma nigili'amasa sogape andeande'ma gwamba amamba. Apa' anen nahapila esis sanda' waf awafii ma nogagwamasa akafimi ma waf awafi esis sanda'afi sope atapis sofe' sotagama nemaf afamba anen nogawalogasafi.

Basef ifimba endilisi atis fapoma epes mamahisa ukup pegehafema waf alugufi alop atopafi ma ukup pa'i basef Dembinaii saga'i falafifii. Epes isimbai anaf sofa' akafimi lu'wami a'owa'. Amom magambaso'ami manda' du'wanigama magaila ukup amamipi atipi masa'ma agof amamugufi atogof. Amom ina ombal maham kwasakwasala manda' anom ensel awami magape ilifi findiwam, owa'.
Apa' amom ensel bu'wami banagami endilisi mikila' amom amamba magambaso'ami, amom ina magwas manda' ensel amamba awami findiwam manda' kotimama naep Dembinai, owa'atin.

Hiahawes amom magambaso'ami owa' mogogawasia, amom ma'i basef awafima isimba. Amom si'i mafis magail alupi ukup owa' pigapaumia magaila alop atop wafipii. Mememi mola mafis isimba ma anis epes sowando'mam sofa'am soham afum higiligalam ea' na'amba atina amom amamba wapani anaf awasim higiligalami.

Amom manda' waf naninani aunai maso'as akafimi anis epes daias. Ea' anaf God nogwamama mogofa' akafimi wapani. Amom ukup pandanda'ma waf afamba saga' gwa'aisi embel maisafi faloma waf awafi so'a waulafi a sonohas endilisi ma sonda' waf afambai alip. Ea' ma' gwa'aisi maloma ipa', apa' waf awafi amamifi si'i anol ametal aluguli awali la'afena ipa'. Amom mape malomepa mandagalama waf awafi amom manda'afi.

Dondol naep amamipi petaoma nematawa wanda' waf awafii lifilafi ma monda' waf awafi mogalomawa, amom ina makwaha waf afamba, owa'atin endilisi. Amom maga'i'ipa anis epes daiasa mombemefas sonda' waf awafi. Amom mogawa endilisima waf afamba awafi kowagalasafi ma hiahawes anis epes daiasi. Anaf God nohambombagam endilisi.
Amom mowa' alafugaha ufia'w usi'i'wi, isimba atis dei' ukup paolam a'owa'. Amom maila waf anona aman Balami, Beor nogamana. Anen okom mohafela nanda' waf awafi ma nogofa' otamba hiambai.

Owa' neme' basef banagafi fa'ipana dindinipa nogokwaha waf afamba awafi. Basef ifimba donki ananini atin nega na'ipanaef si'i epen naga'i nasopama ufia'wa waf afamba awafi ukup pagahasafi profet anamba na'i nonda'afi.

Amom amam na'ambaimi si'i waiwa amamba magal mogowalai itapi embel akami. Amom mandahama si'i ilagw fufin lu'unai nufapusam nawalom magafe' atona biana daindai. God nandondomba akot lu'unai endilisi alialina a'owa'i ma anaf amom mogapaogon.

Amam amamba manda' du'waniga gigal ma'oh dowadowafa basef falafalafifi awafi amamifi. Amom maga'i'ipa anis epes daindaiasa waf ukup pigahafemafi ma so'a waola waf naninani aunai alop atopi. Amom manda' waf afambai ea' mambemefa anis epes ata' dei'aol sataga sa'i sogakwaha waf awafi epes isimba sogololama Godi sanda'afi ea' mambemafas saila amom.

Amom ma'ipa anis epes ma'i, “I'i ipa' pila basef afa'ifi, dao' ipa' atiasi pepe andeande'ma ina anis maefah sowasi'ipa, owa'. Pepe wahifipa.” Apa' owa' amom magape lafela waf awafi, amamba mawasi'am sisihim. Dei' main, i'i anis maefah sombemefa anin epen, atiasi epen inimba ea' atapin nepe lafela hiahawes isimba sagambemefani.

I'i epes mamahisa sokwaha waf awafi hiafi itapafi fanda' epes awasii sogogawa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nowambelapa mogotanimai, ma i'i waf afambai awafi fehekela esis wapani ma fiwasi'as sisihisa, anaf asope atapis na'amba. Sagali' sape awasis sisihisa waf awafi, ata' sape awes kwasakwasala. Apa a'i owa' sagi' sanda' waf awafi wapani, ea' sape sisihis awes endilisi ma waf awasifi.
I'i esis ina sofa' gawa ma ufia'w akwamba ma owa' sogawa mu'uli bu'wani Godia, ata' sope awasis kwasakwasala. Apa' dei' sowa' alafugahana ea', anaf sope awes endilisi a'owa'.

Waf afambai fagatagamasi asi'i anif basef endilisifi epes gawaisi saga'iefi faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Nombat totanima tafe' taga' tagago'wami atatimi wapani.” Anif wapani faga'i, “Bol lafe' lasa'of ea' ma main, owa' lotanima lafe' lambani itap walambuf folo'wagalagoma wapani.”

Ipa' alipipai endilisi, basef ifi'i fagafe'ma bifi anda'ef fagail okwatihi fafe'mago ipa'. Basef ifimba biafif fagali'i faloma ifi'i ase'epaef ipa' ma fegasa'ma nomonas fasisi ipe'isi ma pegegawa basef ifimba.

Ea' ae' a'i ipa' ata' ukup pendanda' wapani ma basef ifimba fowa' amom profet Godi magawalapafi. Ea' ukup pendanda'ma basef banagafi Dembinaii, nowambelapa mogotanimaii, ipa' ea' pegefa'ana lagof afa' aposel ipe'ifai.
Ipa' ata' ukup pagawa isimba sindali'. Nimaguf ifi'i fagagi'i anom amam monda'iafipai motaga migi'ma ukup awapi amamipi ma waf amamifi. Ea' monda'iafipa na'amba

mi'i, “Anen na'i basef endilisifi atif na'i nogafi'i wapanii. Apa' dei' anen ata' nape ani? Nogota fowa' dambadamba bafasapa sagaga'atai hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam ata' mape atapim na'amba atin si'i fowa' dambadamba itap apa'e pagataga mafi'i mataga dei'.”

Apa' nomonas amamisi mandaiwa', dei' owa' mogawa hiahawes isimbaia, owa'atin. Amom ina ukup pandanda'ma fowa' gani God na'i atina nanda' itapi otaga sataga sagape, owa'. Anen nanda' itap pandahi' pataga pape la'afena embel.
Owa' God nanda' embel lu'wami mataga itap maofanap hi'alap mahambombaga epesi hiahaom magape itapi hi'alam.

Basef Godi ea' ifimba atif dei' fili'ama hiahaom magape ilifi maloma epes saloma hiahaom magape itapi hi'alam dei' ata' mape atapim masasa nif fegandom nemaf afamba God nogawaloga epes isimba sogowa' alafugaha anini ma nonda'as higiligalas.
Ipa' alipipai endilisi, ipa' owa'i ukup pese'epama anis hiahawes atifisa. Okom Dembinaii na'i nemaf atetef a' si'i afagof hiagufi 1,000-pelaiguf ea' afagof 1,000-pelaiguf fandahama si'i nemaf atetef.

Dembinai ina nanda' maol lalag atina nogawalapai hiahaom anen okom mandanda' na'i endilisi atisa nonda'ami si'i anis epes ukup pandanda'ma maol sanda'an lalag atin, owa'atin. Anen nandaiwa'ma anin epen atitin higiligalan. Anen okom ma'i epes hiasi hi'ilas sombema nelelemb sondafe'ma anen. Isimba atis dei' anen okom mapoma ipa' dei' nape nasasaipa palomas.

Apa' nemaf Dembinai nogafi'afii anaf fifi'i si'i epen nanda' wali nagafi'i. Nemaf afamba otaga bendagola mehip ahigililam. Ea' hiahaom amamba hiami magapaunai wapani atiasi ea' fendom fesopamam hi'ilam. Itap apa'e wapani peloma hiahaom hiami sanda'am magape itapi anaf nif fendom fesopamam hi'ilam.
Endilisi hiahaom amamba anaf higililam hi'ilam na'amba. Apa' ipa' atiasi penda' main? Ipa' pepe pindaila waf usi'ifi bu'wafi hilili'i atef ea' pila waf hiafi Godi.

Ipa' penda'as na'amba ukup dag pepe pendehafa nemaf lu'wafi Godi, pendanda' maol ananini banagambela pegemaso' nemaf afamba fegataga. Nemaf afamba atef anaf otaga fendena fitai'wana ea' nif lu'wafi a'owa' fendo hiahaom amamba hiami magape otagai hi'ilam motaga mumbul mefe' si'i embel.
God na'i basef endilisifi atifa nonda' otagai itap dambaisi ma waf usi'ifi atef fegapaogoma. Apa' dei' ea' ukup dag mape mohafa isimba atis.

Alipipai ae'ipai endilisi, ipa' ukup dag pape pegehafa hiahawes isimbai. Ea' ipa' pendanda' maol banagambel pindimafi ipa' pegape be'epa hilili' andeande'ma waf awafi akepa ma naep Godi, pape opaf atof pegalomana.

Dembinai ata' nimanis nape nasasa apa' epes hiapai hi'alapa. Ea' dei' ipa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba anen nowambelapa mogotambili. Isimba na'amba atin si'i basef ifimba hiafi sahomapa Pol apa' ukup pagapagailanai nanda'ef fagafe'ma ipe'i. Anen nanda' basef ifimba ma gawa bu'wami endilisi God nagaso'anani.

Aho' basef hiafi anen nanda'afi ma nemaf afamba Dembinai nogafi'afii nanda' ifimba atif. Apa' anif basef nanda'ef fagail buki ahifif endilisi ma mogogawa kofagefa. Basef ifimba ahififi, epes isimba gawa akasi ma owa' sugalutu banagesia isimba salalamona basef ifimba faloma anif daif hiafi wapani fagail Baibeli. Ea' esis atis sandahambombaga esisa anaf lamonas hi'igalas.
Alipipai endilisi, ipa' pegawas ea' hiahawes anaf sigi' sogatagai. Ea' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'amba amam amamba magambaso'ami ma mogosambala mu'uli Godi mohondo'epa pewa ma anef waf awafi.

Apa' ipa' pape waf afamba Dembinai Jisas Krais nagatopalopapa dowafafi, nowambelapa mogotanimai pegawaf ea'. Ea' pendalutu banagepa ma waf afamba feloma gawa inimba Kraisi pindikila' fowa' pali' pape panda'as. Ae' a'i agol lu'wagili fasigili atogol dei' atapigil gopomana gofe' anaf owagama wapani. Endilisi.

Afa' wanda' basef ifimba ma anona aman agilinama Basef, anen nagaso'apa ambal namili lagapaipai. Aman anamba fowa' gani dambadamba nagapani. Afa' wame' basef ananifi ea', watolona naep afa'ipi wahapilana lagof afa'igufi.

Ambal alamba namili lataga ea' afa' watolol naep afa'ipi. Isimba atis dei' afa' wawalipipa ma ambal alamba lagape dondol lifilafii. Ambal alamba fowa' lape laloma Ahamapa ea' dei' lataga alihigima watolol.
Hiahaom amamba afa' watolom wagame'ami dei' wa'ipipam ipa' wapani ma pegape nembel atotombel pegalomafa. Afa' wape wambota atota waloma Ahamapa nagaloma Nogamana ananinai Jisas Krais.
Afa' wanda' basef ifimba ma atiasi dagala ape'ini negataga lu'win si'ina apa'.
Basef ifimba afa' wame'anamef na'amba. God anen nogogala' afitinai. Ina anota akot tailana kwasakwasala, owa'atin endilisi.
I'i apa' mi'i mape nembel atotombel malomana, ama apa' ata' mape manda' waf awafi si'i magape akot atotai, apa' mambaso'ma apa' atepa ma basef ape'ifi faloma fe' ape'ini.

Anen nogogala' afitinai. I'i mope mogala' si'i anen waf awafi akapa, ea' mope nembel atembel moloma sahin owan hiasi. Ea' esimbel Jisasi Nogamana Godi basa'opa waf awafi ape'ifi hiafi hi'alaf, ea' mataga be'epa.
I'i apa' mi'i waf awafi akapa, apa' mambaso'ma apa' atepa ea' basef endilisifi ina fapaepa, owa'atin.

I'i apa' mowalapa waf awafi ape'ifi alihif, atiasi anen nokwahomapa waf hiafi awafi ape'ifi okom maso'anafa nosa'opapa mogataga be'epa hilili'. Basef fowa' nagala' lapafi ea' nilif nonda' waf usi'ifi datima.
I'i apa' mi'i, “Apa' owa' monda' waf awafia”, apa' mofala God ma'i anen aman naga'i basef baso'afii. Ea' basef ananifi ina fape opalef ape'ilifi, owa'atin.

Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa, anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' ma ina penda' waf awafi, owa'i. Apa' i'i anin epen nenda' waf awafi, anin anona nogatopalopani nape. Anen Jisas Krais bo'ona hilili'i. Anen nohali' Ahamana ma nogakwahoman waf awafi epen inimba okom moso'anaf.
Anen atona nahagofa okom numbutinai Godi naga' nakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi. Apa' ina nakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi atef, owa'. Anen nakwaha waf awafi ma epes hiasi itapasi okom maso'anaf.
I'i apa' mila basef Godi banagafi, apa' mogawana endilisi.
Epen ami ni'i, “Ae' egawa God andeande'”, ama anin owa' nila basef Godia, anin nagambaso'ami. Ea' basef endilisifi ina fape opaf ananifi, owa'.
Apa' epen ami nila basef ananifi, anin okom pelele' si'im maila God endilisi. Apa' magawa apa' mape sisihipama God na'amba.
Epen ami ni'i, “Ae' ape sisihiwi ma God”, fe' ananini nendataga usi'in si'i fe' Jisas Kraisi.

Alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa. Dei' ae' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa', ina anin mu'uli dambaini, owa'atin. Ae' a'ipipa mu'uli inimba atin fowa'ini, fowa' dambadamba pegegawani. Mu'uli inimba basef ipa' pagame' ea'i.

Apa' basef banagafi ma mu'uli inimba dei' anda'ef fagafe'mago ipe'i, ifimba dambaifi. Ea' fataga alihifa Krais nagi'mif dei' ipa' wapani pagi'mif. Dei' main, akot dei' ta'i pele'etata ea' mogogala'i endilisimi mataga mape ea'.
Epen ami ni'i, “Ae' ape mogogala'i,” ama anin opaf aofa sahin owan ananisi, epen inimba ata' nape akot atapin.
Epen ami okom magamagaila esis sahin owani, anin nagape mogogala'ii. Ea' epen inimba ina ata' anef waf awafi fapain fanda'an newa, owa'atin.
Apa' epen ami opaf awasifa sahin owan ananisi ni'i bousi, epen inimba ata' nape akot ea' nafe' akot atona nasopama naep ananipi. Ea' ina nati ufia'w negawa'w, owa'atin.
Ipa' awasi ae'ipai, God nakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi hi'alafa agol Kraisi okom maso'anaf. Isimba atis dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'.

Ipa' ahape, apegawa aman anamba andeande' fowa' dambadamba nape atapina. Ea' dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'. Ipa' amam sa'upai, ipa' patofa wandafa aman aunai pikila'ana. Isimba atis dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'.

Ipa' awasi, apegawa Ahamapa andeande'. Ea' dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mepago. Ipa' ahape apegawa aman anamba fowa' dambadamba nape nafi'i nafi'i atapina nape. Isimba atis dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mepago. Ea' ipa' amam sa'upai, ipa' banagipai ma penda' waf bu'wafi. Ea' basef Godi fagape nomon opalef ipe'ilifi dei' patofa wandafa aman aunai pikila'ana. Ea' dei' anda'ago basef ifimba ma ipa'.
Ipa' ina a' ukup pipila waf itapafi o anis hiahawes awasisi sagape itapi, owa'i. I'i ipa' ukup pigapigaila waf itapafi, ipa' ina ukup paipaila Ahamapa, owa'atin.

Apa' mogawa epes saloma hiahaom hiami magape itapi amamba na'amba. Hiahaom amamba opalef apimi mogohafemami maloma epes saloma hiahaom amamba epes satolom nelelemb kowagalamami maloma hiahaom amamba esis gagatomami ma anis satilis sagasa'ma agof lu'wagofasami, hiahaom amamba ina mafi'i Ahamapa, owa'atin. Amamba mataga itap apa'e.
Waf itapafi feloma hiahaom hiami epes ukup pigahafemami owagama a' higililam, apa' epen mamahina nigaila basefa okom Godi, epen inimba a' nepe lifilafi dondol.

Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai ae' okom magamagailipai, dei' nemaf fa'i a' hi'ilaf. Fowa' ipa' pame' basefa bounai Kraisi na'i nogataga. Apa' dei' bousi ananisi hiasi asataga ea'. Ea' apa' mogawa dei' nogota ta'i ahi'ilata.

Epes isimba sakwaha apa' ea'. Fowa' epes isimba ina a' ape'isi si'isi, owa'. I'i ape'isi si'isiai, esis asope solomapa atapis. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Esis asakwahepa ea'. Isimba atis dei' apa' mogawas andeande', epes isimba hiasi owa' mini'ap ape'ipia.
Apa' ipa', Krais nase'epa Ambal bu'unai Godi ea'. Dei' ipa' hipai pegawa basef endilisifi ea'.

Ipa' ina pelelama basef ifimba endilisifi ma dei' enda'mepago basef ifimbai, owa'. Ipa' apegawef. Ea' pegawa basef baso'afi ina fawalapa basef ifimba endilisifi, owa'atin. Isimba atis dei' anda'ago basef ifimba ma ipa'.
Aman nagambaso'masi anen ami? Anen aman anamba nambaso'mas naga'i Jisas ina Krais, God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, owa'. Aman anamba bounai Kraisi. Anen nowa' alafugama Ahamapa naloma Nogamana wapani.
Epen ami negewa' alafuga ma Nogamanai, anen newa' alafugama Ahamana wapani. Ea' epen mamahina nagaso' opafa Nogamanai, Ahamapa nape nomona okom ananimi.

Basef ifimba fowa' dambadamba ipa' pagame'afi, ifimba hapilaef ukup ipe'ipi sisihif. I'i ipa' pihapila basef ifimba pali' pagame'afi ukup ipe'ipi sisihif, bola pepe sisihipama Nogamana noloma Ahamana mope atapim molomepa.
Krais ana'ipapa basef endilisifi banagafi, anen atiasi noso'apa ambal namili mope andeande' lifilafi.
Ae' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' awalapa wafa epes isimbai sa'i sogambaso'mipai.

Apa' ipa', Krais nase'epa Spirit Ambal ananinai. Ea' Ambal ananinai nape nalomepa ukup ipe'imi nomon. Isimba atis dei' ipa' ina gawa akepa ma anin epen negawalipipa, owa'atin. Spirit Ambal Kraisi nawalipapa ma hiahawes hiasi ina nambaso'mapa, owa'. Dei' ipa' hapifa Krais pepe sisihipama anen.
Aho', ipa' awasi ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa a'i pendape sisihipama anen ama anaf notaga nondawalap, apa' ina ambagof awagof, owa'. Apa' mulutu banagepa ma naep ananipi.
Ipa' pegawa Krais anen bu'unai hilili' endilisi. Ea' pegawa anif basef wapani, epes mamahisa sagaila waf bu'wafi hilili'i, esis awasi Godi.

Awasi! Ahamapa God okom maimailapa a'owa'. Ea' anen nofalapa awasi ananipai. Endilisi atis, apa' awasi ananipai atepa. Isimba sandaiwa'ma Godi sagape itap apa'i, esis ina sogawa God, owa'atin. Isimba atis dei' esis ina sogawa apa' wapani.

Ipa' alipipai, ae' okom maimailipa. Dei' apa' mape awasi Godi. Apa' anaf mope mi'imama, isimba atis apa' ina dei' mogawas, ata' owa'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Apa' a' mogawa, anafa Krais nogataga alihina, nemaf afamba, dao' a' motolona endilisi ea' motaga mope si'i anen nagape.
