Epes mamahisa sape sagahafa anen nogafi'ii esis sape sandondomba opalef asasilifi lifilafi ma sogape bo'wes hilili' si'i Krais nagape.
Epen ami nanda' waf awafii, anin negesambala mu'uli Godi. Dei' main, waf awafi atef afamba esis satopa' mu'uli inimba.
Ipa' pegawa Krais nataga ma nogakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi hi'igalaf. Anen ina nanda' anef waf awafi, owa'atin.
Ea epen ami nape sisihin nagaloma anini, inimba ina ata' nape naila waf awafi, owa'. I'i epen mamahina nigaila waf awafii, okom ananimi ina a' nati Krais negawana, owa'atin.
Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, solawaipa andeande'! Na'amba anin epen a' nembaso'mepa. Epen ami nenda' waf usi'ifii, anin nape hilili' si'i Krais nagape.

Satan nanda' waf awafi fowa' dambadamba nafi'i nafi'i dei' ata' nape atapina. Ea' i'i epen mamahina nenda' waf awafi atapin negapomafi, anin epen Satani. Nogamana Godi nafi'i nataga nandawalapa main? Ma nogahambombaga maol Satani.

Epen ami nagape awani Godi, anin ina nape nanda' waf awafi atapin, owa'atin. Dei' main, okom Godi a' nape opaf ananifi ea' anin a' awani Godi. Ea' anin ina la'ifina ata' nenda' waf awafi atapin, owa'atin.
I'i apa' mi'i mogawa epen mamahina, nogamana Satani a mamahina Godi, apa' mogogawas na'amba. Epen ami owa' nenda' waf usi'ifia ma owa' okom mogamogaila alipisi ananisia, anin ina epen Godi, owa'atin.
Basef fowa' dambadamba ipa' pagame'afi ifimba. Apa' a' ukup pindaila esis sahin owan endilisi.

Apa' ina a' mila waf Kaini, hapaifi. Kain wambota aman aunai Satani ea' naha owamana Abel naga'. Dei' maina nahana nagaga'? Anen kowalana ma maol bu'wani owamana nanda'ani dei' nahana naga'. Apa' maol ananini awasini atin.
Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, i'i esis sagape itapi sogowa' alafugaha Godi sindaiwa'mepa, ipa' ina a' gogolagalasipa, owa'i.

Apa' ukup pagapagaila esis sahin owani, isimba apa' mogawas dei' a' makwahef ea' waf afamba ga'ifi ea' mataga mofa' ambal namili. Dei' main? Apa' ukup paipaila esis sahin owan endilisi. Epen ami owa' okom mogamogaila anin sahin owania, anin ata' nape atapina waf ga'ifi.

Epen ami okom numbutima sahin owan ananisi, anin si'i naha anis amam nematawa sagaga'i. Ea' ipa' pegawa epen naha anis sagaga'i, anin ina dei' a' nefa' ambal namili lapaina negape andeande' lifilafi, ata' owa'atin.

Waf afamba apa' ukup pigapigaila anis daiasafi mogogawaf na'amba. Krais nakwaha ambal ananili ma nagatopalopapa. Isimba atis apa' wapani a' mondokwaha ambagof ape'imi ma mogatopalopa sahin owan ape'isi.

I'i anin epen hiahaom hiamini ma nigati sahin owan hiahaom akani ma anin owa' okom mimila sahin owana, epen inimba ina okom maimaila God, owa'atin. Dei' maina epen inimba naga'i, “Okom ae'ami magamagaila God”? Owa'atin, anin nambaso'am.

O, alipipai ae'ipai, apa' ina a' ukup paipaila esis alipisi ma muga'ipasa basefa malogof atogof wafigufi, owa'atin. Apa' ukup pindapindaila esis endilisi a' motopalopas monda' waf bu'wafi endilisifi mihimba'masaf.
I'i apa' monda' waf afambai ma ukup pipila sahin owan ape'isi, apa' mogawa maila basef endilisifi. Waf afamba fanda' opalef ape'ilifi awanelefa mogape banagepa ma naep Godi.
I'i malogof fagape opalef nomoni fi'ipapa fi'i apa' manda' waf awafii, God dembinai a' nikila' ukup ape'ipi ea' nagawa hiahaom hiami.
Alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa. I'i malogof fagape opalef nomoni owa' fowalapa anef waf awafi fi'ipapaia, dao' mefe'ma God opalef ape'ilifi awanelef mope banagepa.
I'i apa' mi'i mondabeten mogahali'ana ma anis hiahawes, anen nogaso'apasi. Dei' main, apa' maila okom ananimi ea' manda' hiahawes anen sonahana ma apa' monda'asi.
Basef banagafi Godi fa'i na'amba fa'i apa' mondahapifa agol nogamanai Jisas Krais ea' ukup ape'ipi pindapindaima atin si'i anen naga'ipapa dindinip.
Epen mamahina nigaila basef Godi banagafi, anin nepe sisihin neloma God ea' God nope sisihina noloman. Anen a' naso'apa Spirit Ambal bu'unai ananinai ea' dei' mogawa God nape sisihina nalomapa.

Alipipai ae'ipai, amom profet magambaso'ami mafe'agon anamba itap hiagoma. Ipa' ina pihapifa epes isimba hiasi saga'i, “Ae' Ambal bu'wali Godi nagapauwai.” Owa'. Ipa' ata' pegwamba ambagof amamba hiami pendendomam ama pegegawa amom mataga mafi'i Spirit Ambal Godi a'a owa'.
Ipa' pegegawa Ambal Godi na'amba. Epen mamahina ni'i, “Endilisi, Jisas Krais nafi'i nataga epen endilisinai”, epen inimba Ambal Godi napain opaf ananifi.

Apa' epen ami owa' niga'ias na'ambai ma Kraisia, Ambal Godi ina nape anin, owa'atin. Ambal nagape epen inimbai anen bounai Kraisi. Fowa' pagame' basefa Spirit ambal bounai Kraisi nogafi'i, dei' a' nafi'i nape ea' itap apa'e.

Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ipa' epes Godi ea' panda' wandaf paloma amom profet awami magambaso'ami pikila'am. Dei' main, Ambal Godi nagape nomon opalef ipe'ilif anen banagonai nikila' aman aunai nagape itap apa'ii.
Epes isimba sagaila waf itapafii saga'i basef itapafi atifii, epes itapasi sahapifas. Dei' main, esis isimba itapasi atis.

Apa' apa', epes Godi. Epen mamahina negegawa Godi, anin neme' basef ape'ifi. Apa' epen ami owa' epen Godia, inimba ina name' basef ape'ifi, owa'atin. Ea' isimba atis dei' ametal inimba nihimba'mapa ma mogogawa epes isimba. I'i Ambal Godi endilisinai nupais, aseme' basef ape'ifi. Apa' i'i ambal nagambaso'ami nupais, ina seme' apa', owa'.
Ipa' ae' okom magamagailipai, apa' atepa a' ukup pindaima atin. Dei' main, waf afambai fafi'i God. Epen ami okom magamagaila sahin owani, anin awani Godi ea' dei' negawa God a' naila basef ananifi.
Epen ami owa' okom mogamogaila sahin owania, anin ina negawa God, owa'. Dei' main, God okom magamagaila epes hiasii.
God a' nihimba'mapa anen okom maimailapa na'amba. Anen nasapa' Nogamana ananinai atotona nafi'i itap apa'e ma apa' mogofa' ambal namili ma anen.

Basef kofagefa ma God okom magamagaila ape'i ifimba. Apa' ina mali' ukup paipailana, owa'atin. Anen nali' okom maimailapa ea' nasapa' Nogamana ananinai nafi'i ma nanda' okom numbutimi Godi maga' nakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi okom magaso'anaf.
Ipa' alipipai, waf afamba atef fihimba'mapa God okom maimailapa a'owa'. Ea' apa' wapani ukup pindaima atin endilisi.

Ina anin epen nati God, owa'atin. I'i apa' atepa ukup pindaima atin, God nope sisihina ma apa' ea' okom ananimi magamagaila ape'i atiasi mope molomapa opalef ape'ilifi nomona monda'as na'amba atin ukup pindaima.
Dei' apa' mogawa ea' mape sisihipa maloma God ea' nape nalomapa. Dei' main? Anen naso'apa Ambal ananinai nape nalomapa.

Ea' apa' mogawa Ahamapa nasapa' Nogamana ananinai ma nowambilai epes hiasi sagape itapi nokwahomas waf awafi sogotanimai ma anen. Apa' mati hiahawes isimba ma anen nowambilai epes sogotanimai ma'ipasas.
Epen ami negawalapa basef alihigima niga'i, “Endilisi, Jisas anen Nogamana Godi”, God a' nope sisihina noloman, anin wapani nape sisihina anen.

Isimba atis dei' apa' mogawa mahapifa God anen okom maimailapa a'owa'. God anen kofagonama okom magamagaila epes hiasii. Epen ami nape okom maimaila God naloma epes hiasi atapin, anin nape sisihin naloma God ea' anen nape sisihina naloman.

Waf ukup pigapigaila esis Kristen alipisi a'owa', afambai fataga be'ef endilisi ma apa' ina a' mondafa'ma nemaf afamba lu'wafi ma God nogowalogapa, owa'atin. Dei' main, anen napaipa nomon, ea' mape itap apa'e si'i Krais nagape. Apa' ina ombal mahapa ma nemaf afamba, owa'atin.

God okom maimailapa, apa' wapani ukup paipailana. Ea' ina ombal mahapa, owa'atin. I'i waf afambai fetaga be'ef endilisi ma apa', afamba ea' fatofa waf ombal magahapamafi fewala hi'alaf. Dei' main, kofagema ombal magahas, ombal mahasa hiahaom akafimi anaf God nowalogasa waf awafi nogaso'asami. Epen mamahina ombal mogahani, waf okom mogomogaila God ina fataga be'ef endilisi ma anin, ata' owa'atin.
God nali' okom maimailapa a'owa'. Isimba atis dei' apa' ukup paipaila anen naloma epes hiasi wapani.

I'i anis epes si'i, “Apa' ukup paipaila God,” ama i'i esis ukup wandafuma Kristen alipisi, epes isimba sagambaso'ami. Dei' main? Ina anin epen atitin a' nati God, owa'. Epen ami nati alipini ananini ma owa' okom mogomogailania, epen inimba ina la'ifina okom mogaila God owa' nogatolona naepia, owa'atin.
Basef ifimba Krais naga'ipapaef dindinipi ifimba. Epen ami okom magamagaila Godi, epen inimba okom mondaila sahin owan ananisi wapani.
Epen mamahina nagahapifa Jisas anen Krais God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, epen inimba awani Godi. Ea' epes mamahisa ukup pagapagaila ahamas atotonai, esis ukup paipaila awasi ananisi wapani.
I'i apa' ukup pipila God mila basef banagafi ananifi, atiasi waf afambai apa' mogawa ukup paipaila awasi ananisi wapani.
Waf kofagefa ma apa' ukup pigapigaila Godafi afamba. Apa' mondaila basef lo banagafi ananifi, ina ahifif a'owa', owa'atin.
Dei' main, awasi mamahisa Godi isimba la'ifis sagatalogofa waf itapafii. Apa' mahapifa God dei' waf afambai apa' mikila' wandaf matalogofa waf itapafi awafi.
Epen ami nikila' wandafa waf awafi ea' natalogofa waf itapafi? Epen nagahapifa Jisas naga'i anen Nogamana Godii, anin atin nikila'af.

Jisas Krais ma'una aman anamba a' nafi'i. Ea' anen nofa' baptaisa embel, ama main sahana naga' esimbel ananimbeli balo. Anen ina nafi'i ma waf embeli atef, owa'. Anen nafi'i ma waf embeli esimbel endilisifi. Ambal bu'unai Godi kofagonama waf endilisifi hi'alaf. Ea' Ambal anamba nawalipasa basef ifimba ma Krais endilisifi.
Spirit Ambal Godi naloma embel esimbel isimba wanifis sawalapa basef kofagefa atifif.
Apa' mahapifa basef epes sagawalipasafi. Apa' basef God nagawalipapafi banagef fikila' basef epesi. Dei' main, basef ifimba fa'i Nogamana ananinai.

Ea' epen ami nagahapifa Nogamana Godi, basef ifimba endilisifi fape nomon okom ananimi. Apa' epen ami owa' nigahapifa Godia, epen inimba na'i God aman nagambaso'ami. Dei' main, epen inimba ina nahapifa basef ifimba God naga'ifa Nogamana ananinai, owa'.
Ea' basef ifimba endilisifi na'amba. God a' naso'apa ambal namili ma mogape andeande' lifilafi dondol. Ambal namili alamba anen naso'apala Nogamana ananinai atona.
Epen ami negape sisihina negaloma Nogamanai, inimba dei' nefa' ambal namili. Apa' ami owa' nepe sisihina Nogamana Godia, inimba ina nefa' ambal namili ma negape andeande' lifilafi, owa'atin.
Ae' anda' basef fafe'mago ipa' pagahipifa agol Nogamana Godi. Anda'efa ipa' pegegawa dei' apefa' ambal namili pape andeande'.

Apa' mogawa, i'i apa' mila okom Godi atom mondabetena hiahawes mamahisa hiasi, anen atiasi nogame' beten ape'inii. Ea' nemaf mamahefa mefe' felefele'ma anen mondabeten, ina ombal mohapa ma anen, owa'. Ukup ape'ipi pepe banagepa.
Apa' mogawa anen nagame' betena hiahawes mamahisa dei magahali'anamasi. Ea' mogawa dei' a' mape si'i mogofa' hiahawes isimba ea'i.

Waf hiafi hi'alaf owa' usi'ifia afamba waf awafi. Epes sanda' waf awafii sawala basef Godi banagafi. Apa' waf hiafi awafi ina fenda' epes sogaga' lamonasi, owa'. I'i anin epen niti anin sahin owan ananini nenda' anef waf awafi owa' fenda' epen inimba nega' higililana, epen inimba nanda' waf afambai a' nendanda' betena Goda, nogaso'an ambal namili. Endilisi, anef waf atetef awafi fanda' epes sogaga' lamonasi. Ae' ina a'ipipa ma pendabetena epes sanda' waf afambai, owa'.
Apa' mogawa epes mamahisa sagape awasi Godi, esis ina sape sanda' waf awafi atapis, owa'atin. Dei' main, nogamana Godi numafias andeande'ma banagami ananimi ma aman aunai ina nohambombagas, owa'atin.
Apa' mogawa apa' awasi Godi, apa' isimba owa' awasi Godia sape lafela aman aunai Satan dembinai asasinai.

Apa' mogawa Nogamana Godi nafi'i ma noso'apa gawa ma mogogawa anen God endilisinai. Apa' mape sisihipa ma anen endilisinai naloma Nogamana ananinai Jisas Krais. God anamba endilisinai anen kofagonama ambal namili mogape andeande' lifilafii.
Awasi ae'ipai, ipa' pewa' alafugaha god baso'amunai ea' pendape banagepa.

Ae' agiliwai igimafi esis Kristeni anda' basef fafe'mago ina', nemata'w God nandandepenai naloma awasi ine'isi. Ae' okom maimaila ipa' endilisi a'owa'. Ina ae' atowe okom maimailipa, owa'atin. Amam nematawa hiasi sogogawa basef endilisifii, esis wapani ukup paipailipa.
Dei' main, basef endilisifi fagape ukup ape'ipii ifimba atiasi fepe sisihifa apa' lifilafi dondol.

Ahamapa God noloma Jisas Krais Nogamana ananinai atiasi muti uwahipipa motopalopapa dowaf mowa' banagapa monda' opalef ape'ilifi awanelef. Amom biam atiasi monda'apa na'amba moloma waf endilisifi feloma waf ukup pagapagaila sahin owanasafi.
Ae' andagala a'owa' ma egegawa anis awasi ine'isi sagaila basef bu'wafi endilisifi si'i Ahamapa naga'ipapa dindinipa mogailif.

Ea' dei' a'ipa ina' nemata'w na'amba. Apa' hiapai a' ukup pindaima atin pendaloma sahin owan. Ae' ina a'ipina anif basef banagafi dambaifi, owa'atin. A'ipina basef ifimba atif fowa' gani apa' mogawef magahapilafi.

Basef kofagefa ma apa' ukup pigapigaila sahin owani ifimba. Apa' mope mundaila basef ifimba Godi banagafi atapif. Basef ifimba si'i fowa' dambadamba pagame'ef. Ipa' a' ukup pindaima atin peloma sahin owan.
Anis epes sagambaso'ami safe' ganigani itap hiagoma. Esis ina sawalipasa Jisas Krais sa'i nogamana Godi a' nataga aman nogofa' alop epeni, owa'atin. Esis sagambaso'ami, isimba bousi Kraisi.
Ipa' a' solawaipa andeande'ma pegefa' hiahaom fasimi amamba panda' maol pa'i pegefa'ami. Na'amba ipa' anaf ina pefa' amamba, owa'atin. Andeande'ma pegefa'am si'im.

Epen ami nakwaha basef Kraisi ma nimbisila' nefe' nila anif basef daif, God ina nape opaf epen inimbai, owa'atin. Epen ami banagen nihapila basef Kraisi sisihif atapifi, dei' Ahamana naloma Nogamana wapani mape sisihim moloma epen inimba nomon okom.

Epen mamahina nifi'mai ipa' ma ina nefa'ai basef ifimba Kraisi, ipa' ina petopalopa epen inimba pi'ipan nefe' nelomepa niwis ifagw ipe'igwi, owa'i. Ina pinifelin pi'ipan penda'man “Nemaf bu'wafi” anin, hapaini.
Epen mamahina niganifela epen inimbai atiasi a' neloman okom atotom netopalopan nenda' waf awafi anin nanda'afi.
Ae' a'i i'ipipa anif basef hiafi wapani, apa' ae' ina enda'ef fil pepa, andaiwa'. A'i efo'o itilipa i'i elomepa ma apa' mondatimama mondagala andeande'.
God a' nandandepa owamena ine'ikwi nosaho'akw ea' anani'wi ato'w. Ea' awasi owaminai sanda'menago nemaf bu'wafi ina'. Ea' ma'uf.
Ae' agiliwai igimafi esis Kristeni anda' anif basef fafe'mago ina' alipinai Gaius. Ae' okom maimailina endilisi a'owa'.
Ina' alipinai, andabetena Goda hiahawes hiasi ina' nanda'asi sogataga bo'wes andeande'ma aowas akana negape andeande' si'i ambal ine'ili lagape andeande'.
Fowa' ae' ame' basefa anom alipumi mafi'i matagame ma'ipi waf ine'ifi ma'i ina' naila basef endilisifi datima. Ame' basef ifimba andagalamena a'owa'.
Ae' sonahe a'owa' ma awasi sagaila basef endilisifi. Apa' ae' ina sonahe ma anis hiahawes daias sikila' sonagahema isimba, owa'atin.

Alipinai ae' okom magamagailinai, maol hiani ina' nanda'ani ma nagatopalopa amom sahin owani, inimba ina' nanda'an datima endilisi. Amom ina nati nogohnaepima negawam, owa'. Apa' ina' natolom numafiam atin.

Amom hiami ma'ipa esis Kristen sagape na'ai ma okom ine'imi maimailam negatopalopam. Ae' ahali'ina ma negatopalopama gwa'aisi otamba mais mofa'as atin mogafe' anagon monda' maol Godi si'i okom ananimi maga'i.
Dei' main, amom mafe' manda' maola agol Kraisi, apa' ina mofa' gwa'aisi maisa esis isimba sogololama Godi, owa'.
Isimba atis apa' a' mondatopalopama gwa'aisi maisa monda' maola basef endilisifi Kraisi mogalomam.
Ae' anda' anif basef fafe'mago esis Kristen, apa' Diotrefes anen a' okom ma'ima'i a'owa' ma nogape dembinai nigali'i. Anen ina naila basef ae'afi, owa'atin.

Nemaf mamahefa ae' i'i egafe'mago ina', ae' ewalapa basefa waf hiafi afamba anen nanda'afi. Anen nambaso'mas na'i basef fafifafi awafi findiwaefa ae'. Apa' ina nanda' waf afamba atef, owa'atin. Nanda' anef wapani na'amba. Nowa' alafugama amom sahin owan magawalipasa basef Godi ma'i mogafi'mai anini. Ea' anef wapani na'amba. Nasopama anis Kristen daias sa'i sogatopalopa amom amambai nelefatas safe' sape ando' ma sios.
Ina' alipinai, owa'i nila waf awafia, hapaifi. Nindaila bu'wafi atef. Epen ami nanda' waf bu'wafi, anin epen Godi. Apa' ami nanda' waf awafii, anin ina negawa God, owa'atin.
Epes hiasi sagasa'ma agol Demitriusi. Waf ananifi endilisifi fihimba'mapa anen aman bu'unai. Ae' wapani a'i anen bu'unai ea' ina' negawa basef ae'afi endilisifi.
Ae' a'i i'ipina basef hiafi hi'ilif, apa' ae' andaiwa'ma enda' pen enda'ef fil pepa fegafe'mago ina', owa'.
Ae' okom ma'i atiasi efo'o itilina, dao afa' biafa ondatima wi'i basef ifimba.

Ae' a'i opaf ine'ifi fope awanef nepe andeande'. Alipisi ine'isi sagape na'a'e sanda'menago dagala sandagalamago ina'. Ina' da'masago dagala ae'ani wapani nefe'mago esis sagape wambel ine'imbili atona atin. Ea' ma'uf.

Ae' Jut anda' maol agape lafela Jisas Kraisi, ae' owama Jemsi. Ae' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' amam nematawa God nandandepepa ea'i. Fafe'mago ipa' ahamapa God okom magamagailipai, ipa' Jisas Krais atona nagala'ambemapai.
Ae' a'i God nonda'epa pepe si'ipama uwahipimi ananimi ea' opalef awanelefa pegegawa okom ananimi magamagailapafi pilam.

Alipipai endilisi, ae' okom mandanda' a'owa' a'i ata' enda' anif basefa God nowambilai apa' hiapai hi'alapa nofa'apa mutanimai magape andeande'. Apa' owa', dei' a'i ata' enda' anif basef daif i'ipipago esa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma penda' maol banagambel pimafiago basef endilisifi Kraisi apa' magahapilafi. Ama pegahagasa boumi amamba magatalogofa basef ifimba Kraisi. Hapif inimba God a' naso'apan apa' hiapai amam nematawa ananipai nemaf afamba atetef ea' atapin nape.

Dei' main, anom amam mandambaho' mawisi la'afena apa' Kristen. Fowa' gani basef fagail Buk Baibeli fa'i amam amamba ea' ma mogatagama basef lu'wafi Godi ma nowalogama kota higiligalam. Amom mowa' alafugaha God a' maha'ofa basef bu'wafi anen nagatopalopapaef dowafi ea' ma'ipas anif daifa mogowa' banaga waf naninani ukup pegehafela waf awafi so'a waulafi.

Endilisi atis, ipa' pegawa basef ifimba fowa'ifi fagail Baibeli. Apa' owa' dei' ae' a'i esa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma pegegawef wapani. Basef ifimba fagape na'amba. Fowa' dembinai nofa' epes amam nematawa ananisi Israel sakwaha itap lu'upa Isip nofa'as sagafi'i. Apa' owa' anen naha epes isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia saga'. Amom mowa' alafugaha aman anamba Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai nugumafi banagami hiamii.

Dei' ipa' ukup pendapoma amom ensel amamba wapani, amom ina mumafi maol inimba naloma agof lu'wagufi God nagaso'amasi andeande', owa'atin. Amom ea' makwaha wambel amamimbili heven. Ea' dei' God nawasi'am sen sisihin nagape atapini ea' mape atapima wambel ambalemba akutigin a'owa'ma. Mape mohafa nemaf afamba lu'wafi God nowalogam mogaloma epes hiasi wapani hi'igalas.

Dei' ipa' ukup pendapoma epes isimba fowa' sagape Sodomi Gomorai baloma walemb ambalemba hielimbi bagape felefele'ma na'ambai. Esis sanda' waf awafi na'amba atin si'i ensel amamba. Amom amamba Sodomi Gomorai manda' waf so'a waulafi ea' ukup amamipi pehafel a'owa' ma monda' so'a waola waf awafi mogaloma amom amam atom. Dei' God nagwamama akafimi awami amoma nif lu'wafi fandif fagape dondol lifilafii. Amom mape mondosali alihim si'i anin ametala apa' mitilin mogogawa apa' ina a' mila waf awafi amamifi, owa', hapaifi.

Amom amamba mandambaho' mawisi magalumapai manda'am na'amba atini. Koh dondo'ah hiani amamini nafela ukup amamipi ma monda' waf alugufi awafi ma alop amamipi. Amom manda' du'waniga ma basef Dembinai ape'inai manda' anom ensel dembami magape heveni wapani findiwami.

Apa' amom ensel magape ilifi, amom ina ma'i basef findiwaifi si'i amam amamba, owa'atin. Ensel anamba dembinai nape nagali'i Maikel wapani, anen ina nanda' basef findiwaefa anis epes na'amba, owa'. Fowa' anen na'i basef nandahihianamaef naloma Satan, ma'i atiasi ami nefa' alop Mosesi. Apa' Maikel ina nagwamana basef Satan nanda'ana findiwana, owa'atin. Anen nagwaef na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai atona nondanda'mena megah ina'.”

Apa' amom amamba mandambaho' mawisi magalumapai, amom maga'i basef awafi ma hiahawes hiasi amom owa' mogogawa kofagesaia. Waf ukup pegehafela mogagi'ma alopi nomonasi, dao' mogawaf ea'. Waf afamba amom manda'af si'i mafis amamba nomonas akami mogawaf manda'afi. Amom manda' waf afambai atef fahambombagam endilisi.

Endilisi atis, akafimi lu'wami anaf a' motagamam. Amom mogofa' waf awafi fowa' Kain nanda'afi. Ukup amamipi pehafel a'owa' ma mogofa' otamba atembai. Ea' dei' maso' alop amamipi pafe' hi'alapa manda' waf awafi si'i fowa' aman anamba Balam nanda'afi. Ea' manda' du'waniga ma God si'i fowa' aman anamba Kora nanda'as. Amom manda' waf afambai, dei' a' aom higilalam si'i Kora higilagalana.

Waf awafi amam amambai fagape na'amba. Nemaf afamba ipa' Kristen ukup pandaima atin pandakolas panda' gwa'aisi ipe'isi a'a panda' gwa'aisi Jisasi, amom mape malomepa ma' gwa'aisi isimba wapani. Ea' amom si'i alogw gwandahapil sisihigw gwail gwanda' gwa'aisi isimba awes. Amom ma' gwa'aisi malomepa, apa' ina ombal maham kwasakwasala ma waf awafi manda'afi, owa'. Ukup pandapoma amom atom. Ina matopalopa anis daias maso'asas, owa'. Amom mawalipasa basef, apa' basef amamifi ina fatopalopepa, owa'atin. Basef ifimba wafifi dowaf si'i otaga wafigai fufin nefa'aga gagafi'i ina gala asaf, owa'. Amom mandahama lawah hogola gwa'aisii, apa' owa' nogota hagailatai ina hola gwa'aisi, owa'atin. Lawah agahemba aligah sagiagah nombalef fapomagah fataogah haga'ihi.

Amom manda' waf ambagof awagufafi, afamba ea' fataga si'i naoh embel mohafel lu'um a'owa' matoma apah magatagam. Ea' mape manda' waf afamba awafi mandahama ondowa wagape otagai ogololalama ufiawa dondol wagafe'awai. God a' nandomba anembel wambela amom akot owamb nagapoma anaf mogape lifilafima.

Aman anamba Enok fowa' nawalapa basefa hiahawes anaf sigi' sogotagai alihifa amam amamba awami. Anen nataga nagi'ma wambotagw agwamba 7-pelaigw tagahafela Adami a' nawalapa basef ifimba alihif a'owa' ma amom na'i, “Ipa' peme'! Dembinai anaf nifi'i noloma ensel ananimi tausen hiami a'owa'

ma nowaloga epes hiasi hi'ilasa nogagwamasa akafimi awami ma waf awafi asasifi. Ama nigihimba'mas alihisa waf awafi hiafi esis sanda'afi, kofagema asasimi atom. Epes isimba sanda' waf afamba awafi na'ambai. Esis sowa' alafugaha God a'owa', sanda' du'waniga, sa'i basef simbisambalifi fafifafi awafi ma anen.”

Amom amamba mambaso'am mawisi magalumapai ina mape andeande' opalef awanelef, owa'atin. Amom mondowamba'ma ma hiahawes hiasii ea' manda' du'waniga ma God, ma'i basef simbisambalifi ma anen. Ea' ukup amamipi pesafel na'ana'a ma waf awafi ea' magi'ma isimba. Amom gigal ma'oh na'ana'a ma magasa'ma agof amomugufi atogof. Amom ma'ipa anis daindaiasa basef usiusihifi ma mohondo' ukup asasipi pigaila basef amamifi.
Apa' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai endilisi, ipa' ukup pendapoma basef fowa' amom aposel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi maga'ipipafi ma hiahawes mais anaf sigi' sogatagai.

Fowa' amom aposel ma'ipipa na'amba ma'i, “Anif nimaguf akutaifi fegataga, anom amam monda'iafa waf Godi a' mufi'i mope. Amom a' mowa' alafugaha God, ea' ukup amamipi pesafel a'owa' na'ana'a ma waf awafi atef ea' mila isimba.”
Amom amambai atom manda' ipa' Kristen pandawal. Amom magaila ukup epes itapasi atisi, Ambal bu'unai Godi akam.

Apa' ipa' alipipai endilisi, lifilafi ipa' pewa' banaga nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pendahapifa God, anen kofagonama hapif ipe'inii. Ea' dondol ipa' pihali' Ambal bu'unai Godi ma nowa' banagaepa nugumafipa ma beten ipe'ini.

Ipa' solawaipa pindaila waf Godi andeande'ma anen nigihimba'mepa datima okom lu'wami ananimi magamagailipai. Ipa' penda'as na'amba pepe pendehafa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, anen nagati uwahipipai anaf nonda'epa pegape namipa ma pegape andeande' lifilafi.
Anis epes sagape ukup bimbiafipa sogahapifa Kraisi, ipa' piti uwahipis petopalopas pewa' banagas.

Anis daias sogowa' alafugaha Godi a' si'i sagape nif fagandifi la'afifa, ipa' kwafalis lefatas sotanimai. Ea' anis daias sanda' waf awafi atapisafi, ipa' a' ombal mondahepamas. Na'amba asohondo'epa pefe' nif. Ea' piti esis uwahipis petopalopas. Waf apifi awafi asasifi a si'i sogowaho' luwaguf alogw sisihigw gwagailafi. Ea' ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf afamba awafi pendafa'maf endilisi.

Ae' a'i apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol na'amba. Anen la'ifinai ma nogala'ambemepa datima andeande'ma anaf ipa' ina pewa ma waf awafi, owa'atin endilisi. Ama anaf nofa'epa nokolasepa pegape andeande' pendagala endilisi kofagema ma waf awafi akepa ma anamba anen nape nogogala'ma.

Anen atona God, nowambilai apa' mogotambili ma lagol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais. Mogogala'i maloma agol lu'wagili banagami lu'wami maloma waf afamba nagape banagonai nugumafi hiahaom hiamii, amamba ananimi atom nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' anaf wapani nope na'amba atin atapina dondol lifilafi. Endilisi. Ea' ma'uf.

Fowa' gani basef amamba mape mandambaho' apa' dei' Jisas Krais nanda'am mandawalap alihim. God naso'anam Jisasa nowalapam nigihimba'ma anom manda'mana maol Godi ma mogawalapa hiahaom mape mandambahi'i mogataga kwafalis. Anen naso'afa gawa afa' wanda' maola anini ma hiahawes isimba. Ea' dei' nasapa'i ensel ananinai nafi'mai ae' Jon. Ae' dei' anda'mana maol Godi, ea' anen nase'e basef ae' wapani.
Ae' atolom ea' hiahaom amamba awalapam a'iam alihim basef Godi faloma basef ifimba endilisifi Jisas Krais nanda'ef fandawalap alihifi.

Epes ami sogotalifa basef ifimba Godi fagail buk akwa'e ma malogof asasigufi ma hiahaom anaf migi' mogatagai, esis atiasi God nonda'as sonohas. Ea' epes ami sogame' basef ifimba ma ukup asasipii, esis sonohas wapani. Dei' main, nemafa hiahaom amambai migi' mogatagai felefele'ma mogataga.

Ae' Jon anda' basef ifimba ma ipa' Kristen pagape walemb 7-pelailimbi itap lu'upa Esiai. God fowa' gani nape, dei' nape, anaf owagama nope atapina dondol. Ae' a'i anen noloma Jisas Krais moloma Ambal bu'unai Godi banagonai si'i ambagof bu'wagufi 7-pelaiguf mope felefele'ma sia bu'wani Godi motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaipa mose'epa opalef awanilifi. Jisas Krais anen naila basef ananifi andeande' nanda' hiahawes ananisi datima. Ea' nawalapa basef hiafi Godi andeande'. God nali' nasa'mana nosafel wandof. Ea' nape nali'ma anaf esis sogaga'i God nosa'mas sogosafel wapani. Jisas Krais anen atona dembinai nugumafi amom king dembami magape itapi. Anen atona okom lu'unai nainaila apa' hiapai, ma esimbel ananimbeli atembel natagwahepa ma waf awafi ape'ifi mataga wahifipa. Anen atona nanda'apa dei' mape dembipai malomana mumafi epes hiasi si'i amom dembami king. Ea' nanda'apa mape pris si'i mondolalima Godi manda' maola God Ahamana ananinai. Ae' a'i mogogala'i moloma banagami hiami ananimi atom mogape dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.

Piti, anen banagonai anaf nifi'i noloma otaga esis sotolona naep asasipi ea' epes isimba fowa' sagahana wamba'wi sotolona wapani. Isimba atis esis amam nematawa misi'ah hiahi sagape itapi sotolona sowa solopana kwapete' ma waf awafi asasifi. Aho', amamba anaf motaga endilisi na'amba.

Dembinai God banagami hiamunai anen na'ias na'amba na'i, “Ae' atowe ape Dembiwai lifilafi dondoli ape agali'i a ape agagi'i endilisi.” Ea' anen anamba atona fowa' gani anen nape, dei' wapani anen nape, anaf owagama a' notanima nifi'i.

Ae' Jon sahomepa ipe'iwai. Ae' alomepa, apa' hiapai Jisasi atepa maloma anen sisihipa mape. Akolata alomepa mofa' akafimi ma mugawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiapa. Ea' ape alomepa ma apa' hiapai magalutu banagepa na'amba atina mogofa' nimanimi. Ae' awalapa basef Godi faloma basef endilisifi ma maol Jisas nanda'ani. Isimba atis dei' esis sandaiwa'me sali'amone ea' afi'i ape ailan agilina sa'i Patmos.
Anef nemaf Dembinaii Sande Ambal bu'unai Godi numafi ae' ea' ame' anagol malogol goga ga'i mehip gandame' si'i sugufapula anona alof, na'i natagai alafuga ae'agai.

Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ina' da'a basefa hiahawes isimba atiasi nigatilisi sil buk. Ea' nenda' basef ifimba fil buk akwamba fefe' fendanda amam nematawa Godi sagape walemb ambalemba bagape 7-pelaigini. Walemb agufilimba ambalemba. Efesus, Smerna, Pergamum, Taiataira, Sardis, Filadelfia a Laodisia.”
Ea' ae' andambema a'i iti inimba naga'ipa ae'i. Owa' ati lambeh 7-pelaimbih tol hatoma gol 7-pelaim.

La'afena gol amamba ati anona aman nalomambeh nalutu. Anen nandati si'i anona dembinai nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi. Nala klos laumi mowala mambaho'wa bo'wagah ananigahi ea' nowaho' let sanda' gol sanda'atai mafata ananitai.
Balaga galoma auf fagalonai afitim a'owa' si'i auf fagalo sipsipi a si'i ilagw amamba afitimi. Naep ananimi mogala' si'i nif ileliwa.
Ea' bo'wagah ananimi mogala' gambigambis a'owa' endilisi mandati si'i bras kapa batafunai sagaofam nif lu'wamii. Ea' ame' malogol ananigili nanda'am bendagala mehip si'i embel bagala' lil lil mehip.

Anen nahapila ondowa 7-pelaiwa nahapilam lagol kwahisigili ananigili. Ea' anona bainat hikalina wa'owa'ili nawisi nape malogol ananigili. Amaga ananigai gogala' a'owa' banagona si'i awin owaf fagaluwi banagef a'owa'.

Ae' a'i iti anen owa' afa' ewa a'oh felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi a' andati si'i sagaga'i. Owa' anen nandome lagol kwahisigili ananigili nahapili na'ipi na'i, “Ina' owa'i ombel mehenaia. Ae' ape dembiwai dondol lifilafi ape agali'i ape agagi'i endilisii.

Fowa' aga' ea', apa' dei' ina' natolowe ape namowe atapiwi lifilafi. Ea' ape ali' Dembiwai ma igimafi ga' ma egawaloga epes ami sagaga'i sogafe' wambel awambili hel a'a sogafe' wambel bu'wambili heven.
Ea' Ae' a'i ina' nenda' basefa hiahaom amamba dei' ina' nagatulumi nenda' basefa hiahaom amamba dei' magapani a hiahaom anaf migi' mogatagai wapani buk.

Ina' nati ondowa awamba 7-pelaiwa wagape lagol kwahisigili ae'agili a lambeh ambahemba 7-pelaimbih hatoma gol amamba 7-pelaim. Isimba sondola'waifi atis. Basef kofagefa ifimba. Ondowa ondola'waifa ensel mugumafi sios amam nematawa mini'ap Godi, apa' gol amamba mondola'waifa sios amam nematawa Godi isimba 7-pelais.

“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Efesusi. Ae' aman agahapila ondowa awamba 7-pelaiwa lagol ae'agili kwahisigili agafe' la'afena gol amamba lam magatomami 7-pelaimi. Ae' anda'mepago basef ifimba ipa'.

“Ae' egawa hiahawes mais ipa' panda'asi maol ahifini. Nimanimi matagamepa, palutu banagepa atapipa, ina pandahagas, owa'. Ea' Ae' egawa ipa' palutu banagepa endilisi ma pandaiwa'ma isimba sanda' waf awafii. Ea' ipa' pawaloga amam amamba mambaso'am maga'i amom aposeli, pandondomam pegawa amom ina aposel, owa'. Amom magambaso'ami.

Ipa' palutu banagepa atapipa ma epes isimba sandaiwa'ma agol ae'agili ma sanda'mepa waf awafii, ina pandahagas, owa'. Ae' egawa ipa' panda' maol ae'ani noma'uni banagambel ea' ina ombel mahepa pakwahin, owa'atin. Ipa' palutu banagepa pefa' akafimi amamba.
Apa' dei' a'i i'ipipa anif basef ipa' ma anef waf awafi ipa' panda'afi. Fowa' dambadamba ukup ipe'ipi paipaila Ae' pahapifi andeande', apa' dei' a' owa'atin.

Dei' a' ukup pendanda'maf wapani waf afamba bu'wafi fowa' pali' panda'afi. Ea' pembema nelelemb pilaf penda'af pigi'maf wapani si'i fowa' dambadamba panda'af. I'i ipa' owa' pembema nelelemba, atiasi Ae' ifi'i etagamepa ili'amona gol amamba ipe'imi lam magatomami.
Apa' dei' anef waf bu'wafi ata' fape ipa' atapif. Anis epes mini'ap Nikolasi Ae' andaiwa'mas endilisi, ipa' wapani pewa' alafugahas pandaiwa'mas a'owa'.

“Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni! “Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa negali'amona waf awafii, bola Ae' i'i aho'man nea' gwa'aisi lawag agamba gagaso'as ambal namili epesi gogotawa aof Godi agiligima Paradaisi.”

“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel nugumafi esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape Smernai. Ae' ape Dembiwai atapiwi agali'i lifilafii, ape agagi' endilisii. Fowa' agaga' ea'i, apa' dei' esafel wapani ape namowe ambal lapowe. Dei' anda'mepago basef ifimba ipa' a'i,

Ae' egawa nimanimi akafimi amamba magatagamapai ea' Ae' egawa ipa' pape dowadowaf, otamba uga mais akepa. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' hiahaom hiami endilisimi magape heveni. Ea' egawa basef ifimba awafi esis saga'ipipafi. Amam nematawa isimba sambaso'mepa sa'i, “Afa' Juda.” Apa' owa'. Esis ina saila waf Judai, owa'. Esis sambaso'mepa. Esis wambota Satani atis. Ae' egawa hiahawes isimba.

Ipa' ina ombel mehepama nambimb pegefa' akafimi, owa'i. Ipa' peme'! Atiasi Satan nonda' anipa ipa' penda' kalabusa nogagwamba ipa' ea' pefa' akafimi nimanimi amamba nimaguf ilifunamaif. Apa' kwawia', ipa' pihapifi pilutu banagepa ma anis si'i sehepa pegaga'ma, kwawia', pilutu banagepa pindahapifi. Ama Ae' atiasi egase'epa ambal namili ipa' si'i hiahaom bu'wami esis sanda' pilae sogofa'ami.

Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai, pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni. Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa negali'amona waf awafii, atiasi ga' inimba negafe'ma biafini ina nehambomban nonda'an nefe' wambel awambili, owa'atin endilisi.
“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Pergamumi. Ae' ahapila bainat launai hikalina wa'owa'ili. Ea' anda'mepago basef ifimba ipa' a'i,

Ae' egawa wambel ipe'imbili. Satan atona ata' nape dembinai ma wambel ambalemba. Apa' ipa' pagahapila agol ae'agili banagipai pagahapifa Ae'i. Ipa' ina pakwaha pagahapifa Ae', owa'atin. Fowa' aman anamba Antipas anen nagawalapa basef ae'afi datima andeande'i. Ea' sahana naga' wambel ipe'imbili Satan nagapoma. Ea' nogota atamba ipa' ina pakwaha pagahapifi Ae', owa'atin.

Apa' Ae' a'i i'ipipa anif basefa waf awafi ipe'ifi dei' ata' fapomepa. Anis amam nematawa sape sagalomepa Pergamumi, esis ata' sahapila waf afamba si'i anona aman Balam fowa' nanda'afi sisihif. Waf aman anambai na'amba. Fowa' gani anen nihimba'ma anona aman Balak nambaso'mana nanda' esis amam nematawa Israelisi sowa sanda' waf awafi. Ea' Balak nasa'mai ukup esis Israeli ma soga' mafisi gwa'aisi isimba sagaso' god baso'amunai, sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi.
Ea' na'amba atin anis amam nematawa sagaloma ipe'i esis ata' sahapila waf afamba awafi anis epes mini'ap Nikolasi banagef.
Ea' ipa' bema nelelemba pekwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi. I'i owa'atin, Ae' felefele' a'i etagamepa epa' eloma epes isimba owa' sombema nelelemb sigafi'mai ae'ia ehas bainat nagape malogol ae'agilii.

Ipa' aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni. Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa negali'amona waf awafii, Ae' bola ese'asa gwa'aisi ae'asi bu'wasi sandambaho' sagape heveni. Gwa'aisi isimba agilisa mana. Ea' ese'asa anemba otamba fasimbai afitimbai atona atin, ea' enda' anagol agol namigili gil otamba ambamba. Ina anin epen negawa agol agalemba, owa'atin. Epen negefa' otam amambai, anin atin negawagol.”

“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Taiatairai. Ae' nogamana Godi, naep ae'api pegala' a'owa' si'i nif fagandif banagef a'owa', bo'wagah ae'agahi hogala' gambigambis a'owa' si'i bras kapa batafini nogogala'.

Ae' egawa ea' ma waf hiafi bu'wafi ipa' panda'afi. Ae' egawa ipa' ukup paipaila Godi epes wapani ea' pagahapifi panda' maol hiani patopalopa epes hiasi. Ae' egawepa palutu banagepa ma nimanimi magatagamipai. Ae' egawa maol inimba bu'wani ipa' fowa' panda'ani. Ipa' dei' panda' maol inimba bu'wani hiani pikila' fowa' panda'ani.

Apa' Ae' anif basefa waf awafi ipe'ifi. Ipa' patiti nemata'w akwamba awo'wi Jesebel kwape kwalomepa. Ako'w kwa'i, ‘Ae' profet aga'i basef Godi fandambahi'i.’ Apa' owa', kwambaso'mepa kwawalipa ipa' panda' maola ae'i panda' waf so'a waulafi awafi ma paga' gwa'aisi isimba sondolali sagaso' god baso'amunaisi.
Ae' a'i ako'w kombema nembel, isimba atis dei' Ae' ata' animbalo'w kwape anif nimaguf, owa' owa'atin. Ako'w ina kwa'i kombema nembel kowa' alafugama waf afamba awafi so'a waulafi, owa'atin.

Ea' dei' peme'! Atiasi ikwaho'w kowai belita ese'akwa akafimi lu'wami moloma bumbulita lu'unai. Ea' esis amam nematawa sagaila waf awafi akwa'ufi wapani sofa' akafimi amamba. I'i esis owa' sombema nelelemba sowa' alafugaha waf afamba sanda'afia, bola ese'as akafimi amamba lu'wami.

Esis isimba sagaila basef akwa'ufi wapani, atiasi ehas soga'. Ama esis amam nematawa hiasi Godi sogogawa Ae' agawaloga nomonas saloma nelelemb epes hiasi andeande'i. Ea' atiasi egwamepa hiahawes ipa' atona atin, sondahama waf ipa' panda'afi.

“Dei' Ae' a'i i'ipipa anif basef ipa' anipa amam nematawa pagape wambel Taiatairai, ipa' owa' pigaila basef ifimba awafi akwa'ufia, a owa' pigaila waf afamba sofalaf saga'i, ‘Basef fandambahi'i ma waf Satania,’ owa'atin. Ae' a'ipipa na'amba. Ae' ina atiasi ese'epa nimanimi daiam wapani ma ipa', owa'.
Apa' waf hiafi bu'wafi ipa' pagagi'mafi, afamba ipa' pindahapilaf tatala'if pefe' ma pegataga nogota Ae' igatagatai.

Ipa' epes ami pigalutu banagepama wandafa pigali'amona waf awafi ma pila okom ae'ami pefe' pegataga nogota hi'igalata, Ae' atiasi ese'epa banagami ipa'. Ama pegape dembipai ma amam nematawa hiasi hi'igalas. Ea' na'amba atin si'i fowa' Ahame nagase'e banagami ma agape Dembiwai igimafi epes hiasi. Ipa' wapani pepe dembipai pefa' banagami pimafi anis amam nematawa wapani na'amba. Ipa' pimafias banagambel si'i anona aman nahapila kalamuta sanda' ain sanda'atai, si'i anona aman nawala malep papalagalap.
Ea' ese'epa ondo'w kuhumbitai'wi lala'wan.
Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni.

“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Sardisi. Ae' ahapila anagof ambagof bu'wagufi Godi 7-pelaiguf ea' ahapila ondowa awamba 7-pelaiwa. Ae' egawa waf hiafi ipa' panda'afi. Esis saga'i basefa ipa' na'ambai sa'i, ‘Ipa' ambal lagapaipai.’ Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' si'i pagaga' ea'i.

Ipa' safel dasa'ma pekwaha koh! Waf hiafi awafi ipe'ifi ata' fapaipa atapif fa'i fehepa pega'. Apa' anef waf bu'wafi kwaia'uf ipa' pendewa' banagaf fendape. Dei' main? Waf hiafi ipa' panda'afi, Ae' ina ati anef ata' usi'if a'owa' ma naep Ahame Godi, owa'.

Ipa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba ae'afi fowa' pali' pame'ef pegefa'ef ea'i. Pigi'mif pembema nelelemb pekwaha waf awafi pifi'mai Ae'. I'i ipa' owa' pesafel ulal pekwaha koha, atiasi Ae' ifi'i endambaho' etagamepa si'i epen nanda' wali nafi'i nagataga ea' ina pegawa nogota mamahotama ifi'i egatagamepa, owa'.
Apa' ipa' anipa pagape Sardisi owa' penda' luwaguf maim ipe'imi alugumia, atiasi pindawisa klos afitimi dambaimi atom pefe' peloma Ae'. Dei' main, ipa' epes bu'upai ea' pandahama amamba.

Ipa' paloma anis epes daias wapani sagape ambal namili lifilafi agof ipe'igufi fail ano'w buk sa'i buk ambal namili lagapau'wi. Epen nilutu banagena nelefata negalii'amona waf awafii, Ae' ese'an luwaguf amamba afitimi nilam. Ea' ina atiasi ipati'mas agof asasigufi fagail buk akwambai, owa'atin. Afil atapiguf. Ewalapa agof asasigufi ma naep Ahame ae'anai noloma amom ensel ananimi i'ipam i'i epes isimba ae'asi.
Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni.

“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Filadelfiai. Ae' bu'uwai hilili'i endilisii dei' ahapila ki ma uta atamba fowa' king Devit nagahapilanatai. I'i Ae' egawisi'ata, anona aman ina la'ifina ma nogowalowata, ea' Ae' i'i egowalowata wapani, atiasi anin epen ina la'ifina nigawisi'ata, owa'atin. Ae' atowe a'ipipago basef ifimba ipa'.

Ae' egawa waf hiafi dei' panda'afi hi'alaf ea' egawa ipa' wapani, ata' banagepa kwasakwasala ma anis epes owa' sogame' basef ipe'ifia. Apa' ipa' apaila basef ae'afi andeande'. Ea' ina pambaho' agol ae'agili, owa'atin. “Ipa' piti, ae' anda' uta tagal tapomepa, owa' anona aman la'ifinama nogowalowataea, owa'atin.

Ipa' peme'! Ipa' pegawa ea' epes isimba Satani. Esis saga'i basef sa'i esis mini'ap Judai, owa' owa'atin. Esis ina saila waf Judai, owa'. Esis sagambaso'ami. Ae' atiasi enda' epes isimba sifi'i sindiwa nembawa sotawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ipe'igahi ma sogogawa ae' okom maimailipa.

Ipa' paila basef ae'afi andeande' palutu banagepa ma nimanimi amamba magatagamipai. Ea' Ae' dei' imafi ipa' ma atiasi nemaf afamba gwamba motagama mogogwamba amam nematawa hiasi itap hiagomai ma mogawalogasa waf bu'wafi awafii. Amamba ina atiasi motagama ipa', owa'atin.
Ae' ifi'i etagama ipa' kwafalis atis. Waf bu'wafi usi'ifi ipa' pagahapilaf ea'i, hapilaf tatala'if atapipa. Na'amba anona aman nondalombepa hiahaom bu'wami magapoma ipa' ma anaf pegefa'ami.

Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa nigali'amona waf awafii, bola Ae' enda'an nilutu banagen si'i olaf fogombalo' ipat lu'unai Godi ae'anai. Ea' epen inimba ina atiasi nekwaha ipat anamba lu'unai netanima nuwisi ando' wapani, owa'atin. Nepe andeande' nomon atapin. Atiasi enda' agol Ahame Godi gila anin goloma agol wambel ambalemba lu'wambili God ae'anaii, Jerusalem wambel namimbili fasimbili. Wambel ambalemba atiasi bekwaha heven God ae'anai nagapoma bisila'i. Ea' agol namigili ae'agili wapani enda'agol gila anin.
Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'wali Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni.”

“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Laodisiai. Ae' kofagewe ma basef endilisifi, ea' awalapef fafe' usi'if basef hiafi Godi. Lifilafi awalapef usi'if datima. Ae' Dembiwai ma hiahaom hiami God nanda'am magape ilif itapi maloma epes hiasi wapani. Ae' a'ipinago basef ifimba ina'.
“Ae' egawa ea' ma waf hiafi dei' ipa' panda'afi. Ea' egawa ipa' ina pohalepa, owa'. A ipa' ina nifipa, owa'atin. Apa' Ae' a'i ipa' pendape pohondalepa a'a pendape nifipa.
Owa', owa'atin. Ipa' nifipa kwasakwasala. Ipa' owa' nifipa endilisia o owa' poholepa endilisia. Ea' Ae' andaiwa'mepa a'i igu'upai malogol ae'agili.

Ipa' paga'iasi na'amba pa'i, ‘Apa' moni hianai naloma hiahaom hiami ma'omapa. Apa' ina anin mae akapa, owa'atin.’ “Apa' naep ae'api atilipa pape awepa endilisi, ma anis epes sigati ipa' owahipipa. Ipa' pape kwahupa endilisi, naep pase'epa alop paimipa dowaf. Apa' ipa' owa' pegawa isimba sowalapa waf awafi ipe'ifia, owa'.

Ea' ese'epa nomonas isimba ipa'. Gol ae'ami dei' ea' fandom mataga bo'om a'owa'. Andeande'ma ipa' petaloma pegataga be'epa hiahaom hiamipa a'owa'. Andeande'ma petala klos afitimi pelam pigili'ama alop ipe'ipi ma esis ina siti alop ipe'ipi pope wahifip ea' ambagof awagof, owa'. Andeande'ma ipa' petala anin marasin penda'an naep ipe'ipi ma la'ifipama pigati.

Epes hiasi mamahisa Ae' okom magamagailasi isimba Ae' enda' megah mohas ehas kalamuta ma enda' waf asasifi fegataga usi'if. Ea' ipa' wapani ukup pendanda'ma waf ipe'ifi hiafi, pembema nelelemb pekwaha waf awafi pifi'mai.
Ipa' peme', Ae' aha uta alutu. I'i anin epen neme' malogol ae'agili ma nusi' uta, Ae' iwis nomon epe eloman ope atogon wea' gwa'aisi.

Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa nigali'amona waf awafii, Ae' atiasi i'i aho'ma anina nepe negalome ma negape Dembinai sia king ae'anai. Ea' na'amba atin si'i fowa' Ae' agalutu banagewe ma egelefata wandafa waf awafi. Ea' dei' ape aloma Ahame ae'anai ape dembiwai sia king ananinai.
Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' basef ifimba andeande' Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni.”

Isimba hi'alas owa', ati gani heven anota uta tandawisi' tape. Ea' malogol agalemba fowa' agame'agili ga'ipai basef ifimba ae' si'i anona alof nogogal ea' na'i, “Ina' lotai na'a ilifa ihimba'mina hiahaom anaf mugi' mogatagai.”
Ea' kwafalis atis Ambal bu'unai Godi nataga banagona ma ae'. Ea' ati gani heven sia dembinai kingi ati anona aman Dembinai natoman nape.

Anen nogala' banagona si'i otam fasimi agilima jaspa a otam akwahimi agilima konilian. Ea' anona ilelina nanogama sia anamba dembinai king nagatomanai ea' ati ilelina anamba goloto'unai si'i anom otam fasimi agilima emeral.

Ea' anom siaifah hiami bu'wami 24-pelaim motawa lif atina sia inimba dembinai kingi. Ea' anom agufumi mala luwaguf afitimi atom matoma mandanda' siaifah isimba 24-pelais. Ea' mowalo' hagw dembami atom mogowalo'agwi balagah amamugahi sanda' gol sanda'agwi.

Otaga pele'ala natagai sia dembinai kingi diwala. Ea' anom amalemb lu'wami mala' wapani sia inimba nape nagatologoma bagah 7-pelaim fagandumi mape mogala'mana. Bagah amamba Spirit Ambagof Bu'wagufi Godi 7-pelaiguf.

Ea' anamba sia dembinai kingi netawa nagatologoma anin mae atitin nape, inimba si'i embel naoh lu'wami. Ambamba mandati si'i mapelaga ambal magati pelele' endilisi. Ea' anom hiahaom biamibiam ambal namili lagapaumi mape la'afen managama sia kingi malutu. Amom magape naep hiami mapaom hi'alam maso'ala amagah opalef amamumi alafugainama hi'alam.

Nagali'i ambal lagapaunai si'i anona mafin lu'unai wandafunai laion. Nagagi'i anen si'i bulmakau suwafunai. Nagafe'ma wanomi anen amaga gandanda'ana si'i amaga epeni. Ea' nagafe'ma biamibiami nandati si'i anona komon lu'unai nufia' nagafe' ilifi.

Apa' ambagof namogof fagapaumi atona atin bihinagof wanogof wanogof fape amom atona atin. Ea' alop amamipi si'ip naep atomap hi'alap. Ea' owamb alip amom maga'i atapim na'amba ma'i, “Dembinai God anen banagona bo'ona hilili' a'owa'i. Fowa' gani anen nape ea' dei' nape, anaf owagama wapani nope atapina.” Amom ina mapoma noma'wa maga'i basef ifimba, owa'. Manda'if atapim.
Amam sonahama God nagatoma sia dembinai kingi nagape ambal namili atapina lifilafii. Ea' masa'ma agol ananigili manifelona.

Ama nimaguf hiafi nogota mamahotama amom manda'as na'amba atin, agufumi amamba 24-pelaim mindiwa nembawa ma nogohnaep Dembinai kingi, nagatoma sia kingi. Ea' amom manda' lotuma anen nagape lifilafii. Amom mowali hagw amamugwi goligw makwahogw mondola'waifa nogape lafela anen Dembinai amamunai. Hagw agwamba gwafe' gowa felefele'ma sia king notawa nagatologoma ea' ma'i,

Ina' God afa'inai Dembinai afa'inai. Ina' la'ifinai bu'winai endilisi ma epes hiasi sonogahasa ina' sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol. Ina' banaginai. Dei' main, ina' nanda' hiahaom hiamii. Okom ine'inai atona na'iam nanda'am mataga. Ea' dei' hiahaom amamba hiami amape ambal lapaom.”

Ea' ati aman anamba nagatoma sia kingi nahapila ano'w buk lagol kwahisigili ananigili. Buk akwamba amef mail nomon ando'. Ea' sanda' tep si'i blasta sowa' buk akwamba sisihi'w. Tep du'wanina 7-pelaina sagwindisa'w buk akwamba.
Ea' ati anona ensel banagonai noga na'i mehip na'amba na'i, “Epen ami bu'wani ma atiasi la'ifina negahape' tep anamba nagawasi' buk akwambai?”
Owa' anin epen atitin nepe hevena a'a itap apa'ea a'a itap apa'e a'a itap gani awin la'ifina negawala buk akwamba negati nomone'wa, owa'atin.
Ae' ati esis ina ati anin epen la'ifina nigipalia buk akwamba negati nomone'wa, owa'. Ea' ae' dei' nembel nimanimbila isimba alef ega a'i mehip.

Ea' anen agilinai na'ipi na'amba na'i, “Ina' owa'i nelefa! Neme'! Anona aman natagama mini'ap esis Judai, aman anamba ma'una Dembinai nagataga wambota atamba bafamepa Deviti. Anen si'i anona mafin wandafunai laion, nikila' wandafa waf awafi. Isimba atis dei' atiasi anen atona la'ifina ma nogahape' tep inimba 7-pelain nagawasi' buk akwambai nugupalia'w.”

Ae' ati amamba biamibiam ambal lagapaumi maloma amom agufumi mape malipa anona mafin sipsip noganai. Anen tol nalutu, nandati si'i sagahana afuna. Anen nalutu felefele'ma sia inimba kingi. Wambawa magataga balagonai, 7-pelaim ea' naep 7-pelaip. Naep ipimba fa'i Spirit Ambagof Bu'wagufi Godi 7-pelaiguf nasapa'am mafe'agon hi'alagon itap apa'e hiagoma.
Sipsip anamba noganai nafe' nofa'ai buk akwamba kwagape lagol kwahisigili ananigili nagatoma sia inimba kingi.

Nofa' buk akwamba ea', hiahaom amamba biamibiam ambal namili lagapaumi maloma agufumi amamba 24-pelaim mindiwa nembawa motawa felefele'ma sipsip anamba noganai. Agufumi amamba hiami atona atin mahapila anin musik si'i gitai naloma anom dis gol si'inama sanda inimba nogoh alogw magami. Sanda inimba alogw ambul mataga malota ilif si'i beten esis amam nematawa Godi.

Ea' manda' anof awaf dambaifi na'amba ma'i, “Ina' bu'winai hilili'i endilisi ma nigifa'i buk akwamba nagahape' mandof tep amamba hiami mogowa'akwi. Dei' main, esis asahena nagaga'i, esimbel ine'imbeli batala epes isimba wapani sotambili naso'anas God. Aho', ina' natala esis amam nematawa hi'alasa misi'ah ahamba epes hiasi, diga naninani hianai, alop hiapi ma misi'ah sagape anep itap lu'upa walemb hielimbi ma sogotanimai.
Ina' nanda'as sataga si'i pris mondolalima Godi ma anen nogape Dembinai ma esis numafias sonda' maol ananini. Ea' esis atiasi sope si'i king dembami sumafi epes sagape itapi.”

Ea' ae' atologon owa' ame' malogof ensel hiami a'owa' sigiambam namba amamuni hiani handet milian tausen, hiami a'owa'. Amom malutu malipa sia inimba kingi maloma hiahaom amamba ambal lagapaumi maloma amom agufumi.

Amom gigal ma'oh mehip ma'i, “Anamba ma'una sipsip noganai, fowa' esis sahana nagaga'i. Anen bu'unai hilili'i endilisi ma nogofa' namba agol lu'wagili goloma hiahaom hiami bu'wami otamba uga mais soloma banagami lu'wami a gawa bu'wani moloma banagami mogogala'i. Anen bu'unai hilili'i endilisi ma epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol ananigili sonohasa anen soganifelona.”

A'i owa' main, ame' diga ma hiahawes hiasi God nanda'as ambagof fagapaisi hi'alas. Hiahwes sagape heveni ea' sagape itapi, sagape itap ana'e awini saloma sagape naoh embel awini. Aho', ame' hiahawes isimba hiasi sagape anamba hiagomai sanda' anof awaf na'amba sa'i, “Dembinai nagape sia inimba kingi naloma sipsip noganai wapani, amom biam mondofa'ago danifal inimba hiani neloma agol lu'wagili a mogogala'i banagami. Amom biam mondofa'ago amamba nimaguf hiafi dondol lifilafi.”
Ea' hiahaom amamba biamibiam magape namumi ma'i, “Endilisi!” Ea' agufumi mindiwa nembawa manda' lotuma God naloma sipsip noganai.

Ea' ae' ati sipsip noganai nahapila buk akwamba tep 7-pelailip pogowa'akwi ea' nahape' tep pagali'i. Ea' ame' anona ma amom amamba biamibiami na'i basef diga ananigai gandame' si'i otaga diluluwagala. Anen na'i, “Ina' fi'i!”

Ea' atologon wapani, ati anona mafin hos afitinai epen nagatomanai nahapila kepa'w. Esis saso'ana anota hat si'i sanda' wandaf sali'amonaf sogofa'agwi. Ea' anen banagona nafe' dei' nali'amona wandaf ea' okom banagem nape nape atapina na'i nogali'amona wandaf hiafi.
Sipsip noganai nahape' anona tep nagafe'ma bifi nogowa' buki ea' ame' anona ma amamba biamibiam nagafe'ma bifi na'i, “Ina' fi'i!”

Ea' anona hos akwahinai nogogala' a'owa'i nataga, anona aman natoma hos anamba. Ea' amom amamba biamibiam maso'ana banagami aman anamba nagatoma hosi. Ea' la'ifinai ma negelefata nogota bu'utai ma amam nematawa itap apa'isi. Ea' esis lupulupa' atin so'oha sogaga'. Ea' maso'ana anona bainat lu'unai ma nonda' maol inimba.

Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' anona tep nagafe'ma wanifi wapani nogowa' buki. Ame' anona ma amamba biamibiam nagafe'ma wanifi na'i, “Ina' fi'i!” Ea' ae' atologon wapani ati anona hos alialinai. Ea' aman nagatomanai nahapila anin skel si'i ikwaf dondo'ma nowaloga gwa'aisi nigihimba'masa ikwaf dindi'i dondo'.

Ea' ame' anef maf si'i anagol malogol ga'i la'afena amamba biamibiam ga'i, “Ina' nesaho' anep malep sagala sa'utip witipi ma 3 kina. Ea' nesaho' maloh sa'wihi wanoh bali si'i wit nagapaihi ma otamba 3 kina. Apa' ina' owa'i nehambombaga waini wel hi'ilasa, owa'i!”
Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep nagafe'ma bifibifi nogowa' buki, ea' ame' malogol anona ma amom nagafe'ma biamibiami na'i, “Ina' fi'i!”

Ea' atologon wapani owa', ati anona hos batafunai, aman nagatomanai agol ananigili ga'. Ea' anona aman nugumafi wambel esis sagaga'i sagapoma nagi'mana nafi'i. Amom biam atiasi mowala amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi sotaga mini'ap biafip biafipa anis sogowa' banaga amom biama mogaha anis amam nematawa hiasi anep mini'ap sogaga'. Ea' amom biam moha anis soga' bainat amamunai ea' anis nolomohas soga' a aowas naninani nonda' anis soga' ea' anom mafis amamba wandafumi magape itapi moha anis monda'as soga'.

Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep anamba wapani nagafe'ma wanif bifi nogowa' buki, ea' ati ambagofa anis epes sagaga'i sape lafela anota belita sondolalima Goda. Fowa' epes isimba sagahapifa basef Godi sisihifi asawalapef sa'if sa'ipasefa Jisas Krais nagatopalopas. Ea' isimba sandaiwa'ma Godi sahas saga'.

Amom ambagof amamba ma'i mehip na'amba ma'i, “King dembinai nagahapila itapi otaga ilifi, ina' nape bo'wena hilili'i, ina' endilisinai! Nohotagw ma'ugw atiasi gofe' hi'ilagw dowaf guli' ma ina' nenda' kotima esis amam nematawa sagape itapi, ma negagwa esimbel ape'imbeli?”

Ea' God naso'ama anom klos afitimi laumi atona atin na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ipa' ata' pepoma noma'w kwasakwasala. Anaf esis bousi soha sahin owan isimba ipa' pandao'oma panda' maol atini soga', si'i sahepa pagaga'. Anef nemaf dondo'afi esis bousi sohas soga' sotaga ma ikwaf ae' aga'iefi, dao' egwa esimbel ipe'imbeli.”

Ea' ae' ati sipsip noganai nahape' tep anamba nagafe'ma wanif wanifi nogowa' buki dei' atef imauna lu'unai nakoto' itap, awin alipini netaga nandambema alialina si'i lowaf alifi apifi. Ea' awin owambini nataga akwahina hi'alana si'i esimbel.
Ea' ondowa magape ilifi mowai itap si'i sa'utip pagail lawah figi owa' ata' akupia fufin nakoto'mep pigawai.
Ilif wapani a' nafe' higilalagon si'i sala'watefa mat sogowa'ata. Ea' halelef hiami maloma ailan hiani makwaha anamba magapoma a' mindiki'ah mafe' anagon.

Ea' amom king dembami itapami maloma agufumi a amom kepten dembami mugumafi amom soldiai maloma amam hiahaom hiamumi a amam amamba banagami, epes isimba hiasi sanda' maola otambai saloma isimba hiasi agof akasi sagape lafela anis epesi, esis hiasi sawis sandambaho' sagape bologwalef maim magape itapi ea' magape nomona otamba lu'wami magape halalifi.
Ea' sofala halalef amamba hiami maloma otamba na'amba sa'i, “Ipa' awi pindahapi'i petomapa ma pembaho'wapa ma amaga anen nagatoma sia kingi naloma nembel wandafunai ma sipsip noganai.
Dei' main, nemaf afamba lu'wafi ma ukup amom biami wandafipa mogogwa waf awafi dei' fagatagai. Atiasi ami la'ifina nilutu nigikila' amamba? Owa'atin.”

A'i owa' main, ae' ati hiahawes isimba wapani si'i koh dondo'ah ati ensel biamibiam malutu wa'owa'ola biafigin biafigin itap pafe' pegetambela, mahapila fufin hiani itapani ma atiasi fufin inimba ina banagena negefapusa itap a'a naoh embel lu'wami a'a negaola anoga lawag atotoga, owa'atin.
Ea' ati anona ensel nafe' nalota ilif awin nagatafima. Anen nahapila ametal banagani Godi nagape namunai ea' nofala ensel amamba biamibiam God naso'am banagami ma mohambombaga itapi naohi.

Anen na'ipam mehip na'i, “Dei' ipa' ina pehambombaga itapi naoh a lawah maim, owa'i. Ata' owa'. Apa' ma'i monda' ametal Godi ma amagah epes isimba bu'wasi sanda' maola God ape'inai mili'. Ama bola dao', pendahambombaga hiahaom amamba.”
Ea' ame' esis sa'i esis amam nematawa isimba ma'uma'wis sogofa' ametali. Amom manda'mas ametal esis asataga na'amba 144,000. Esis amam nematawa hiasi misi'ah Israeli.
Dei' esis 12,000 mini'ap esis Judai esis asofa' ametal a 12,000 mini'ap Rubeni a 12,000 esis mini'ap Gati.
Ea' esis 12,000 mini'ap Aseri a 12,000 mini'ap Naptalii a 12,000 mini'ap Manasei.
Ea' 12,000 mini'ap Simeoni a 12,000 mini'ap Livaii a 12,000 mini'ap Isakari.
Ea' 12,000 mini'ap Sebuluni a 12,000 mini'ap Josepi a 12,000 mini'ap Benjamini. Epes misi'ah isimba sofa' ametal Godi.

Hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam, ae' ata' atologon wapani owa', ati esis amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' safi'i sunduwa'anima sape. Ea' ina anin epen la'ifina nigiamba epes isimba sogataga ma'uma'wis, owa'atin. Esis a' hias a'owa'. Epes isimba sagape itap hiagomai ea' epes hiasi sagape walemb hiagomai ma alop anamba hiana haona, diga hianai naninani, isimba hiasi hi'alas. Esis salutu anamba God nagatoma sia kinga ma naep sipsip noganai. Sala anom klos afitimi laumi, sahapila akwitih lagof asasigufi.
Ea' soga sa'i mehip na'amba sa'i, “God ape'inai anen natoma sia kingi ma sipsip noganai, amom biam mofa'apa mutanimai ma makwaha waf awafi ape'ifi mogape andeande'.”

Amom ensel amamba hiami mandatama hi'alam malutu managama sia kingi ea' agufumi amamba 24-pelaim maloma hiahaom amamba biamibiam magape namumi mape mitimalo' mindiwa balagah amamugahi mati itap felefele'ma sia kingi manda' lotu mandagala ma God.

Amom maga'i na'amba ma'i, “Endilisi atis! Apa' mandagala a'owa' ma God ape'inai ea' masa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol! Anen Dembinai kofagonama mogogala'i. Anen nomonas hiasi bu'wasi sagapaunai ea' apa' manifelona masa'ma agol ananigili! Anen banagami hiamunai endilisi! Aho', banagami lu'wami a' mapoma anen! Amamba hiami ananimi atom lifilafi dondol. Endilisi!”
Ea' anona amom agufumi amamba 24-pelaim nahali'i na'i, “Esis isimba sagala klos afitimi laumii, esis mamahisa? Esis safi'i anima?”

Ea' agwa basef a'i, “Dembinai ae'inai, ina' atina negawas.” Anen na'ipi na'i, “Epes isimba fowa' sape itap sogofa' nimanimi akafimi lu'wami ma lagof esis bousi. Ea' esis sasa'opa klos asasimi ma esimbel sipsip anamba noganai, dei' mataga afitim.
Ea' salutu sia king Godi nagatologoma. Ea' owamba alip sanda' maol ananini ipat ananitai. Ea' anen nagape sia inimba kingi, anen atona atiasi nope nolomas nola'ambemas.
Esis ina atiasi nolomohas wapani, ina atiasi soga'ma embel iap pese'as wapani, owa'. Owaf ina atiasi banagef fehas, a ina atiasi anif nif lu'wafi fihihi'as sope, owa'atin.

Dei' main, sipsip noganai nalutu felefele' endilisi ma sia kingi, anen atiasi nope numafias. Anen no'was sefe' ma embel amamba magataga anona bolotaf ifatai ma sogofa' embel ambalemba ambal namili lagapaimbeli. Ea' atiasi God nopati'mas embif hiafi naep asasipi ma esis ina ata' selef wapani, a' owa'atin.”

Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep anamba nagafe'ma 7i nogowa' buk akwambai ea' ina ata' anin mae atitin nanda' amalemb, a ina anif basef fatagai heven fape fafe' fafe' ma nogota si'i awa du'wanini, owa'atin.
A'i owa' main, ati ensel amamba 7-pelaim atapim magalutu naep Godii mofa' biugel anamba 7-pelain nandandam.

Ea' anona ensel nafi'i nalutu felefele'ma belita sondolali ma Goda. Nahapila anota plet gol ama nonda' nogoh alogw fasimi magami. Esis saso'ana sanda hiani ma nonda' nogoh amamba ma anen nokolasom mogaloma beten amam nematawa hiasi Godi. Ea' nanda' ofa ma God belita atamba sanda' gol sanda'atai togotawa felefele'ma sia kingi.
Ea' nogoh magataga sanda inimba alogw gwaga'ani naloma beten esis amam nematawa Godi, isimba sandakolas salota ilifa naep Godi.

Ea' ensel anamba nofa' plet atamba doko' sanda inimba nagalatai ea' nofa' nifa belita sondolalima Godatai nowalam plet, ea' nakwahis suwai itap. Anen nakwahisi ma ea', otaga holala bendagala owa', anom amalemb mala' ea' pele'ala nafe' itap bolatin nalemb atin nape.
Ea' ensel amamba 7-pelaim mahapila biugel inimba 7-pelain mandandombola mugufapula biugel inimba.

Ensel nagali'i nofapula biugel ananini ea' ais afitimi banagami si'i otambai pohagalami maloma nif mandambema maloma esimbel lo'lam mataga na'a heven ea' mafe' mowai itap. Amom mawaloga itap hiagoma paloma lawah hiagahi sataga wanifigin. Ea' nif fando itap wa'ap ea' biafigin nape. Ea' otalef hielifi fagaluwi afalemba wapani ea' fandelef hi'alalef dombol.

Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma bifi nofapula biugel ananini, esis sakwaha anona maena si'i halafuta fagandonai nandagia nafe' nowala naoh. Ea' sawala naoh mataga wanifigin ea' wa'am mandambema mataga esimbel biafigin mape bo'om.

Ea' siamba hiahaom amamba hiami magape naohi ambagof namugufumii sawalogam mataga misi'ah wanoh ea' anep mini'ap maga' biah hape bo'oh. Ama main, siamba sip hiapi pagafe' naohi wapani sawaloga pataga misi'ah wanoh ea' anep mini'ap awasim hi'alam biafim mape bo'om.

Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanumi nofapula biugel ananini, anona ondo'w lu'unai nandagia na'a heven fandona fafal atin si'i nemba'w fagando'w nowai itap. Esis siamba walembeh hiambihi haloma embel hiambeli begetah itapi sawalogas sataga wanifis ea' ondo'w anamba nafe' nowala embel du'wanimbel begetah wa'ili. Wa'ol biafis owa' sape be'es.

Ondo'w agili'wa akwamba sa'i, Marasin Inimba Numbutini. Ea' siamba walembeh embel hiambeli sawalogambel bataga mini'ap wanifip, ea' anembel anep mini'ap bataga si'i marasin numbutini. Apa' mini'ap biafip bape be'embel. Ea' epes hiasi sa' embel ambalemba aumbeli baofa opalef asasimi saga' hi'alas.

Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma biamibiami nufapula biugel ananini, esis siamba awin owambini alipini naloma ondowa sawalogas sataga misi'ah wanoh. Ea' sahambombaga mini'ap atetep sataga akutis. Ea' nemaf afamba satopa'af nohotagw wanifigw. Anota akutita, biafigw gogala'. Ea' dei' awin alipini du'wanin owa' negala'a. Ea' owamb du'wanimb na'amba atin.

Ea' ati anona komon lu'unai nufia' nafe' la'afen gani ilif ame'ana na'i mehip na'i, “Uwahipis uwahipis a'owa' esis amam nematawa sagape itapi ma anom akafimi nimanimi lu'wami wapani mogatagamas. Dei' main, anom ensel wanom ma'i mufapula biugel amamini ma atiasi nimanimi akafimi amamba mogatagamas!”

Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanif bifi nufapula biugel ananini, ati anona ondo'w nakwaha heven nowai itap. Ondo'w anamba anona ensel. Ea' esis saso'ana ki utaini ma anona nowaga nagal nogowala itap awini. Nowaga anamba owa' nefe' nogotambilia nowala nagafe' atini.
Anen nawisi' uta nowaga anamba ea' nogoh lu'wami matagai si'i nogoh magalo nif lu'wamii. Ea' nogoh amamba malo maso'ala awin ilif, ea' awin alipini naloma owambini mataga akutim.
Ea' anom asagof si'i kwamu'wis lu'wami makwaha nogoh amamba mowala itap. Ea' ensel anamba naso'am banagami si'i banagami sipiawai wagape itapi wagahambombaga epesi.

Ea' mofa' basef na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' ina pehambombaga otalef a'a hiahaom mamimami magataga itapi, a'a anogah lawah, owa'i. Ipa' pendahambombagago epes isimba atis ametal Godi owa' logatoma amagah asasigahia.”

Ea' amamba amom la'ifima mogaso'asa akafimi epes isimba mefe' mondahama aomb wanemb biamb, apa' ina mofa' banagami ma mohas sogaga', owa'. Ea' maso'asa akafimi awami endilisi ma epes isimba si'i sipiawa wagaha epes sagame' akafimi lu'wami.
Nemaf afamba atiasi epes hiasi solaoma ufia'wa si'i sogaga', apa' owa', a' owa'atin. Ina siti ano'w. Ga' atiasi nondafa'mas some' akafimi lu'wami atapim mopais sope.

Ae' ati asagof amamba si'i hos dumbulidombola ma'i mogapa'. Balagahima mandati si'i hagw dembami atom mogowalo'agwi sanda' gol sanda'agwi gwatoma balagah amamugahi. Apa' amagah amamugahi si'i epesi nogohnaep sandanda'am.
Balagah amamugahi auf laumi si'i balagah nematawai. Nalelef amamumi si'i nalelef mafis wandafisi laionim.
Mafatagw amamumi mala siaogw si'i dunduwif agufum banagami ea' fa'isih amamumi mala' mehip si'i hos magahondo' wilkar lu'wani hiani masagih magafe'ma wandafa amalemb magala'.
Akwagah hailam si'i sipiawa ea' nalelef fetawama mogaha hiasi molas nombota sogame' akafimi. Amamba mape akwagahima. Akwagah amamumi banagami ma mogahambombaga epes aomb ambamba wanemb biamb.

Amom anona dembinai king amamunai numafiam. King anamba anen ensel nugumafi nowaga anamba nagal nogowala gani awin a'owa'i, nandafe' atini. Diga esis Hibrui saga'i agol ensel anambai sa'i, Abadon. Diga esis Griki sa'i, Apolion. Kofagefa fa'i, “Aman nogahambombaga hiahaom hiamii.”
Nemaf awafi ma nimanimi lu'wami mugali'ii amom ahi'alam. Ea' peme'! Nimanimi biafim ata' magapanii bola motaga migi'i.
Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanom wanomi nufapula biugel ananini, ame' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai belita sondolalima Goda sanda' gol sanda'atai da'malifitama do'wanido'wan, togotawa naep Godii.
Malogol agalemba ga'ipa ensel anamba nugufapula biugeli na'amba ga'i, “Ensel amamba awami biamibiam manda' kalabusa walemb lu'wambi Yufretis, ina' nekwaha amom mofo'o.”

Ea' nakwahom mafe'ma atiasi migiamba esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi mowalogas sotaga mini'ap wanifip ea' moha mini'ap atetep soga', biafip sope be'es. God nanda' ensel amamba dumbulidombol mape masasa nogota atamba ma nemaf awin inimba ma afagol agalemba atotogola monda' maol inimba.
Ae' ame' soldia hiami a'owa' 200,000,000-pelaim matoma hos amamumi. Ame' siambam mataga hiami a'owa'.

Ape si'i koh danda'aha agati amom magatoma hosi. Amom soldia mala siaogw kapaimi atom. Siaogw agwamba akwahimi alimi kolotuwaimi maloma batafumi. Balagah hosim si'i balagah mafis wandafumi lu'wami laionim. Ea' nif fandom nogoh mataga otamba batafumi salfa fandom mataga malogof amamugufi ea' felegatam mafe'.

Amom miamba esis amam nematawa hiasi mawalogas sataga mini'ap wanifip ea' maha atifip a' afisa hiahaom amamba awami wanifim, nifi nogoh maloma otam salfa fagandumi magataga malogof hosi. Apa' mini'ap biafip sape be'es.
Banagami hosi mape malogofi andoh amamumi. Dei' main, andoh amamumi si'i ugufi, balagah mandanda'am. Ea' dei' mahambombaga epesa andoh amamba amamumi.

Anis epes hiasi ina afisa hiahaom amamba awami wanifim, ina sambema nelelemba sakwaha waf awafi, owa'atin. Esis ina sowa' alafugaha hiahaom amamba sanda'am lagof asasigufi, owa'. Aho', esis ina dei' sakwaha waf afamba sanda' lotuma ambagof awami maloma god anamba baso'amunai sanda' goli silva a bras otamba a lawah hiami maim sanda'ami, hiahaom amamba ina magati o malutu magafi'i, magame' basefi, owa'atin.
Epes isimba sagaha anis epes sagaga'i, sanda' naohi ufiali ea' sagaila waf so'a waulafii, sanda' wal atini. Apa' ina sambema nelelemba sowa' alafugaha waf afamba, owa'atin.

Amamba hi'alam ea', ati anona ensel banagonai nisila'i heven. Anen nandagigil nambaho' alop ananipi ilagw ea' ilelina nape balaga ananigai. Amaga ananigai gogala' si'i owaf ea' bo'wagah ananimi si'i popa'w fagandona.
Anen nahapila ano'w buk sa'ukwi lagof ananigufi, akwindiatif kwa'oh. Anen nawamona bo'waga ananigai kwahisigai gatoma naoh a egawa nahaponaga itap wata'ita.
Ea' nogal mehip endilisi si'i mafin lu'unai laion nagalef. Nalef na'amba ma ea', otaga diwala hiafi 7-pelaif. Ga'i si'i anagol malogol.

Otaga diwala 7-pelaif ga'i basef ea', a'i enda' anif basefa isimba, owa' ame' anagol malogol ga'i gataga heven ga'i, “Basef ifimba otaga diwala hiafi 7-pelaif, isimba ina' nembaho'was sondape okom ine'imi atom. Ina nenda'ef fil buk, owa'i.
Ea' ensel anamba ali' agatolona nagalutu naohi itap wata'itai anen nasa'ma lagol kwahisigili galota.

Ea' na'ias endilisi gani ilifa agol Godi nagape namona lifilafi dondoli. Anen nanda' ilifi itap naloma hiahaom hiami ambagof fagapaumi maloma amamba ambagof akami magape ilifi itapi maloma naoh embel lu'wami maloma hiahaom amamba hiami magape naoh owin wapani. Ea' ensel anamba na'i, “Nogota mape magasasatai dei' a' hi'alata.

Nemaf afamba ensel anamba nagafe'ma 7i ni'i nugufapula biugelafi, hiahaom amamba God nagambaho'ami motaga alihim. God atiasi nonda'am endilisi si'i basef fowa' nagaso'amef amom profet manda' maol ananinii.”
Ea' malogol fowa' agame'agol heveni ga'ipi wapani na'amba ga'i, “Ina' fo'o fa'ai buk akwamba kwindiatif kwagape lagol ensel nagalutu naohi itapi.”
Ea' afe'ma ensel anamba a'ipana a'i, “Ina' se'e buk akwamba sa'ukwi.” Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ina' fa'akw nea'akw. Ako'w atiasi usihi'w si'i aupimbel malogol ine'igili, apa' nembel ine'imbili a' ikahi'w.”
Anen na'ias ea', asa'ma buk akwamba sa'ukwi lagol enseli a'akw. Ea' malogol ae'agili usihigil si'i aupimbel hani. Apa' a'akw ea' ame' ikahi'w nembel ae'ambili.

Ea' ame' anif basef sa'ipi sa'i, “Ina' newalapa basef Godi wapani ma hiahaom atiasi mogatagama misi'ah amam nematawa alop naninani hianai ma diga anamba hiana haona ma amom king dembami hiami wapani.”

Ea' esis sase'e bagol ae' ma indila'waifa hiahawes dondo'as atin ea' sa'ipi sa'i, “Ina' safel nembe' ikwafa ipat lu'unai Godi noloma belita atamba sondolalima Goda. Ea' niamba esis amam nematawa sanda' lotu ma anini sataga ma'wis.

Apa' ina nenda' indalelemb ambalemba bepe ando'ma ipat anamba, owa'i, hapaimi. Dei' main, indalelemb amambai esis epes sogolalama Godi sofa'alemb. Ama esis atiasi sotaga sogahambombaga wambel lu'wagoma Godi bu'wambili sope sofe' sondahama aomb 42-pelaimb, afagof si'igufi wanogof du'wanigili.

Ea' atiasi ae' God esapa'o amam amamba biam ae'ami enda'am banagema mogowalapa basef ae'afi. Ea' amom atiasi mowaho' begah wa'ami si'i luwaguf awami ea' mi'ipasa basef ae'afi mofe' mondahama nimaguf 1,260-pelaif, afagof wanogof du'wanigili.”
Amom biam si'i lawah oliv biagah haloma lambeh biambeh atapis sotawa naep Dembinaii ma itap hiagomai.
I'i anis epes si'i sonda' amom biam aom, atiasi nif fetaga malogof amomugufi ea' fendo esis bousi amamisi endilisi. Aho' endilisi, epen ami ni'i negahambombagami, waf afamba atef anin a' nega'.

Amom biam banagema mogasopama otaga ma asaf owa'atina nimaguf hiafi ma monda' maol mogawalapa basef Godi. Amom banagami ma mogambema embel hiambeli begataga akwahimbel si'i esimbel ea' banagami ma mogahambombaga esis amam nematawa itapasi ma hiahaom awami mamimami. Nimaguf mamahifa amom mi'i monda'as na'amba, amom la'ifima monda'as.
Amom manda' maol mawalapa basef Godi ma ea', anin mafin lu'wani aunai nokwaha nowaga anamba nagal nogowala atini a' nondagiai ilif. Ea' okom numbutina nopa' nolomam. Ea' noham nofa'asom a' afum.

Ea' alop amamipi po'oh ufia'w lu'ukwa taun anamba lu'wagoma, apa' maga'iagon loo atin maga'i agol Sodomi Isipi. Anamba ea' taun inimba atin fowa' esis saha Dembinai amamunai nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegaima.

Anis epes alop hianai naninani sagape wambel itap hiagomai a diga hianai naninani, epes misi'ah hiasi hi'ilas atiasi sititi alop amom biami atapis sondahama nimaguf wanif si'ifi du'wanifi. Ea' esis ina si'i aho'ma anis epes sogawam matmat, owa'.

Ea' esis amam nematawa itapasi atiasi sondagala ma amom magaga' asonda' gwa'aisi sea'as sealemb a sandasoso'ama hiahawes fasisi saloma alipisi asasisi. Dei' main, profet amamba biam maso'asa akafimi awami amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi.
Nimaguf si'ifi wanif du'wanifi ahi'ilif, dao' God a' nosapa'i ambip ambal lagapaipi pefe' piwis nomona amom biam a' mosafel mulutu. Ea' epes sotolom, a' ombal mahas endilisi.
Ea' mome' anagol malogol gi'i gotagai heven gofalam mehip na'amba gi'i, “Ipa' bipa latai na'a ilif!” Ea' mofe' heven muwis ilagw nomon ea' esis bousi sulutu sotolona mogafe'.

Ama nogota atamba atota, imauna lu'unai a' notaga ea' taun lu'wagoma du'wanigin pe'ogon ea' 9-pelaigin ata' nope atapigin. Ea' esis amam nematawa 7,000-pelais soga' ma imauna anamba. Apa' esis anis amam nematawa sogapani esis ombal mahas a'owa' endilisi, sosa'ma agola God nagape heveni.
Hiahaom akafimi lu'wami mogafe'ma bifi amamba a' mefe' hi'ilam, apeme'! Nogota bandata ma nimanimi lu'wami mogafe'ma wanifi mogataga.

Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma 7i nufapula biugel ananini, ea' anagof malogof foga fa'i mehip fatagai heven na'amba fa'i, “Dembinai ape'inai naloma Krais amom biam dei' mofa' banagami mataga king dembami itap apa'e hiagoma mumafiagon. Ea' anen a' nope king Dembinai lifilafi dondol!”
Ea' amam amamba agufumi 24-pelaim magatoma sia lu'wani amamini ma naep Godii mape itap mindiwa balagah amamugahi mati itap manda' lotu mandagala ma God

ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' God banagami hiaminai. Fowa' gani endilisi ina' nagapani, ea' dei' ina' nape. Ina' nefa' banagami hiami ine'imi ea' nape king Dembinai nugumafi epes soloma hiahaom hiamii. Ea' afa' wanifelina.

Esis sogolalama Godi opalef awalef ukup numbutip, apa' dei' okom ine'imi wandafumi mataga ea'. Dei' nemaf ina' negawaloga esis sagaga'ii ma sogatagama kot. Dei' nemaf ina' nogaso'asa hiahaom fasimi ma amom profet manda' maol ine'inii. Dei' ina' nogaso'asa hiahawes fasisi esis amam nematawa ine'isi soloma isimba hiasi sanda' lotuminai sagape lafela ine'i, esis agof fagatomasi soloma isimba agof akasi wapani. Dei' nemaf ina' negahambombaga epes isimba sagahambombaga epes sagape itapi!”

Amom ma'ias ea' ma main, ipat lu'unai Godi nagape heven nandawisi' ea' bokis bu'wasi isimba mu'uli Godi nagapaisi isimba sataga sa'oh alihigima nomon ipat ananinai. Ea' holala otaga nogala' nafe', amalemb mala' otaga diluluwala, itap nalemb atin asaf lu'wafi wambawa lu'wamunai si'i otamba mambip nalai.

Ea' anona ametal lu'unai nataga heven nandanda' na'amba. Ano'w nemata'w atoto'w kwape kowaho' awin alipini alop akwa'upi si'i lowaf. Ea' awin owambini nape lafela bo'wagah akwa'ugahi. Ea' anota hat awo agofuwai atowa ogowalo'ogwi tatoma balaga ako'ugai. Ondowa 12-pelaiwa wailata.
Ea' ako'w opafu'w kwame' akafimi amamba matagama'wa kogola awani. Ea' kwawal kwalef kwa'oh mehip.

Ea' anin ametal nataga heven nandanda' na'amba. Anona kwambon lu'unai nape. Anen akwahinai ea' balagah 7-pelaigah handanda'ana, wambawa magataganai 10-pelaim. Ea' hagw 7-pelaigw dembami atom mogowalo'agwi gwatoma balagah ananigahi.

Akwaga ananinai nambeha ondowa anona mini'ap gani otaga ilif nakwahom mowai itap. Ea' dei' ondowa misi'ah biah ata' hape gani ilif atapih. Ea' kwambon anamba nafi'i nalutu naep nemata'w kwa'i kogola awanii, nalutu nohafa ako'wa ata' kolani atin, ama kwafalis noga'an.

Ea' nemata'w akwamba kola awani aman. Awani inimba anaf owagama banagena nugumafi esis misi'ah hiahi amam nematawa hiasi. Anen banagona nohapila bumbulita ain nope dambena nugumafias. Ako'w kolan ea', kwafalis atis esis sofa'an safe'ma sia king Godi a' nape andeande'.

Ea' kwafa' kwafe' anagon wafigima fataupigima. Anamba God a' nagandondombagona ako'wa. Ama atiasi anis epes sumafiakw sogaso'akw gwa'aisi ako'w dondo'ma nimaguf 1,260-pelaif, afagof wanogof du'wanigili.

Dei' wandaf lu'wafi fataga heven. Ensel dembinai Maikel naloma amom ensel ananimi mapa' maloma kwambon anamba lu'unai. Ea' kwambon anamba nao'wa amom ensel awami ananimi magwamama wandaf amom mapa' malomam wapani.
Apa' kwambon naloma ensel ananimi amom ina banagem a'owa' ma mugali'amona wandaf, owa'. Ea' dei' amom ina ata' mapani gani heven wapani, owa'atin.

Ea' amom ensel Godi makwahai kwambon anamba nisila'i. Kwambon anamba fowa' ganinai dei' esis saga'i aman aunai Satan. Anen aman nagambaso'ma esis amam nematawa hiasi itapasii. Amom makwahai anen nafi'i itap, makwahai ensel awami ananimi wapani misila'i malumanai.

Ea' ame' anagol malogol ga'i mehip gatagai heven ga'i na'amba ga'i, “Dei' God ape'inai a' nowambela apa' mutanimai ea', banagami ananimi mataga mandawalap alihigima ea' ma nogape Dembinai king! Ea' Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii anen banagonai nofa' agol lu'wagili ea'. Dei' main, aman anamba nagambaso'ma alipisi sahin owan ape'isii owamb alip na'ipa God ape'inai na'i esis sanda' waf awafi. Apa' owa' dei' amom ensel Godi makwahana nisila'i ea'.

Esis alipisi sahin owan ape'isi sofa' banagami ma esimbel sipsip noganaii ea' sawalipasa basef ananifi endilisifi. Esis sanda' waf afambai. Isimba atis dei' silai'ipa wandaf sali'amona boumi ma amamba. Esis ina ukup pa'ipa'i a'owa' ma sogape andeande' itap apa'e, owa'atin. Esis ina ombel mahasa bousi sohas sogaga', owa'atin.

Ea' ipa' hipai pagape heveni, ipa' sonondahepa! Apa' ipa' pagape itapi paloma sagape naoh ipa' embeli, uwahipipa! Dei' main, nimanimi lu'wami ma'i a' motagamepa. Satan a' nisila'o ea' ma ipa', anen okom wandafuna a'owa' endilisi. Dei' main, anen a' nogawa nogota ea' bandata ma nope nonda' maol ananini, ama main owa', ahigiligalana.
Amom ensel mowasa'i kwambon lu'unai anamba nisila'i itap dei' nagawa anen ea' nafi'i nape itap ea' nati nemata'w akwamba kogola awani amani natofa'w.

Owa' saso'akw bihinagof biagof lu'wagufi komonigufa ako'w la'ifi'wa kufia' kogafe' wambel akwa'umbili itap wafigima fataupigima. Ama ata' kogape laogona kwambon anamba lu'unai ma esis sumafia'wa wali'ita solaga'w kofe' kofe' kotambel afagof wanogof du'wanigili.

Ea' kwambon anamba lu'unai nagu'wai embel malogol ananigili. Embel ambalemba bataga si'i anemb walemb lu'wambi ea' kolo' atin bafe' bagi'ma ako'w. Kwambon anamba na'i embel amamba mondahago ako'wa kofe' higiligala'o.
Apa' owa', itap patopalopa'w na'amba. Malogol itapi nagal alihina na' embel amamba kwambon nagagu'ami malogol ananigilii hi'alambel.
Ea' anen okom numbutina a'owa' ma ako'w ea' nafe' na'i nonda' wandaf noloma anis batawisa'w akwa'usi, esis amam nematawa isimba sagaila mu'uli hiani Godii sawalapa basef Jisasi sagailafi.
Ea' kwambon anamba nafi'i nalutu naoh akata.

Ea' ati anona mafin nagail alupi nataga naoh embel. Wambawa magataganai ilifunamaim ea' balagah 7-pelaigah hapaona. Wambawa awamba mowalo' hagw dembami atom mogowalo'agwi gwatoma wambawa gwandandamam. Balagah ananigahi sanda' anagof agof fail fandandama balagah agahemba. Agof agwafomba kofagegofa na'amba. Basef mamimami awami findiwaimuma Godi.

Mafin anamba dei' agatolonai, anen si'i anom mafis lu'wami wandafumi wanom. Anen anona mafin agol lepat ea' bo'walef ananimi si'i bo'walef anona mafin bea, malogol ananigili si'i malogol anona mafin laioni. Ea' kwambon anamba nowa' banaga mafin alupunai ma banagami lu'wami ananimi. Anen nanda' mafin anamba nataga king dembinai ma nugumafi epes hiasi fowa' anen nugumafiasi.

Mafin anamba balagah 7-pelaigah anoga melet tatomaga si'i sagahana afuna ea'i. Apa' balagonama anamba nagambo'ma dei' ea' wafi'igin, ambo'ona wapani. Ea' epes hiasi sagape itapi sosafel bolalas kwapete'asa mafin anamba alupunai owa' afunaia, sagi'mana.

Kwambon anamba naso'ana banagami ananimi mafin anamba alupunai. Ea' esis hiasi sanda' lotuma kwambon anamba maloma mafin anamba alupunai wapani sasa'ma agol ananigili sa'i, “Ami nandati na'amba atin si'i mafin alupunai anamba? Owa'atin. Epen a' owa'atin. Ami la'ifina nepa' negalomana? Owa'atin.”

Ea' dei' God nape natiti mafin anamba gigal na'oh na'i basef awafi findiwaefa God. Anen banagona nape dembinai ma nonda' waf afambai fegape nogota laota aomb ambamba 42-pelaimb, afagof wanogof du'wanigili.
Malogol ananigili goga na'i basef awafi nanda' findiwa God. Anen nanda' agol Godi findiwagola wambel Godi saloma wambota isimba ananisi sagape heveni.

Ea' God ata' nape natiti anen ata' banagonama nogasa'ma wandaf nopa' nogaloma esis amam nematawa Godi ea' nalutu nanda' wandaf nahagofas. Anen nofa' banagami ma kwambon anamba ea' la'ifina ma nogape dembinai king banagonai ma esis misi'ah hiasi hi'ilas soloma diga anamba hianai ma itap anamba wambel hiagoma, alop naninani hiana haona.

Ano'w buk ambal namili'wi kwa'oh. Esis sanda' agof epes Godi atis fail buk akwamba ma nogota atamba fowa' gani God nanda' itap apa'e. Buk akwamba sipsip anamba noganai fowa' esis sahana nagaga'i. Amam nematawa hiasi itapasi agof asasigufi owa' fogail buk akwambaia, esis isimba hiasi hi'ilas sonda' lotuma mafin anamba.
Epen aligah hagapaini, anin nendame' basef ifimba na'amba.

I'i esis si'i sonda' anin epen nefe' nenda' kalabus, ea' anin nefo'o nendanda'ago kalabus. Apa' i'i esis si'i soha anin epen negaga'ma bainat, dao' anin nendaga'mago bainat. Endilisi waf afambai nimanif atef atiasi fetaga. Ea' ipa' amam nematawa Godi pendape banagepa pindahapila hapif ipe'ini banagen datima.

Ea' ati anona mafin alupunai wapani nosafel nawisi itap awin nandagiai ilif. Wambawa biam matagamana si'i wambawa magataga sipsip nogami, apa' basefa diga ananigai si'i malogol diga anona kwambon lu'unaii.

Mafin anamba nagail alupi na'i nagafe'ma bifi nofa' banagami ma mafin anamba nagali'i ma nugumafi epes hiasi. Ea' nanda' maol banagani ma nogohnaep mafin anamba nagali'i. Anen nanda' maol banagambel ma nonda' esis amam nematawa sagape itapi sonda' lotuma mafin anamba nagali'i, fowa' sahana sa'i nombo'ma nogaga' apa' owa', dei' wafi'ina ea'.
Mafin anamba nagagi'i, anen nanda' banagami lu'wami mamimami. Banagami amamba lu'wami na'amba. Naep esis amam nematawai, nanda' anif nif fakwaha heven fisila'i itap apa'e.

God ata' nape natiti anen nanda' banagami amamba mamimami ma naep mafin anamba nagali'i. Ea' anen nagagi'i nanda' waf afambai ma nagahambombaga esis amam nematawa itapasi. Na'ipas dindinip na'amba na'i, “Ipa' pendomba ambala mafin anamba nagali'i nil anona lawag maina ma pegefela agol ananigili lu'wagol. Mafin anamba nagali'i ea' ma'una anamba fowa' bainat tagahanai, apa' ata' nape namona atapina.”

Ea' God nape natiti mafin anamba noganai na'i aho'ma anen naso'ana ambip ambagof fagapaipi ma ambal anamba mafin alupunai sagandombanai. Ea' ambal anamba noga na'i basef ea' banagona ma noha epes sandaiwa'ma sonda' lotuma anini sogaga'.

Ea' mafin anamba nagagi'i dindinapina nasasapa' epes isimba hiasi hi'alas sonda' anin ametal nepe atin atina esis lagof da'asigufi a'a amagah asasigahi.
