Ametal epes isimba agufisi soloma epes agof akasi, a isimba otamba hiambaisi soloma isimba wafisi. Ea' anis isimba agof akasi sanda' maola anis daiasi soloma anis agufisi wapani.

Ea' epes hiasi sofa' ametal inimba ma agol mafin anamba nagail alupi. Apa' anis sofa' anin namba daiana mafin anamba agilinama. I'i epen ami owa' nefa' ametal inimbaia, anin ina atiasi notala hiahawes epesi, ea' esis wapani ina atiasi sotala hiahawes asasisi, owa'atin.
Apa' ukup pendape banagep andeande'ma isimba. Epen ami negegawai anin a' nindiamba namba mafin anamba alupunai andeande'. Namba inimba basef waminif atina anona aman. Namba inimba 666.

Ae' atologon wapani owa', ati sipsip anamba noganai nagalutu halafuta Saioni ea' amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' 144,000-pelais salutu salomana. Agol sipsip noganaii galoma agol ahamana ananinai agof agwafomba fail amagah asasigahi.
Ea' ame' amalemb fasilimbi mala' mafi'i gani heven si'i amalemb embel magala' lil atin, si'i amalemb magala' ma otaga diwagala mehip. Ae' ame' amalemb amamba si'i epes sagaha gitai musik magala'.

Esis sanda' anof awaf dambaifi ma anamba sia lu'wani Godi netawa nagatiliginima, ma nogohnaep hiahaom biamibiam magape namumi maloma nogohnaep agufumii. Amam nematawa isimba hiasi a'owa' 144,000-pelais, God natalis la'afena epes hiasi itapasi, isimba atis la'ifisa sogogawa awaf afamba. Ea' ina ata' anis daias wapani la'ifisa sogogawaf, owa'atin.

Epes isimba sape be'es endilisi. Amam ina manda' waf awafi maloma nematawa, owa'atin. Mape bo'om. Walemb ambalemba sipsip noganai na'i nogafe'ma, esis sagi'mana same' basef ananifi sanda' maol ananini. God natalis la'afena esis amam nematawa hiasi itapasi ea' sape si'i ofa bu'wani nagali'i God naloma sipsip noganai mofa'as sogotanimai ma amomi.
Esis ina sanda' anif basef kwamaifi baso'aifi, owa'. Esis basef kofagefa ma waf awafi akas.

Ea' ae' ati anona ensel nufia' nafe' gani ilif. Nofa'ai basef bu'wafi Godi fegape lifilafi dondoli ea' nanda' maol inimba ma noga'ipasa basef ifimba esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi. Nawalapefa misi'ah epes hiasi sagape kantri hiani ganimba itap hiagoma saga'i diga naninanii ma alop naninani hianai hi'alas.

Anen nogal mehip na'amba na'i, “Nogota tataga ea' ma God nogawalota epes hiasi ma kot. Ea' ipa' ombel mondahepa ma anen pila basef ananifi, pendasa'ma agol ananigili. Ipa' pendanda' lotuma God, anen nanda' heven naloma itap a naoh embel maloma embel amamba hiami magataga itap awini.”

Anona ensel nagagi'mai ensel anamba nagali'i nafi'i na'i anif basef na'i, “Wambel lu'wambili Babilon ambalemba a' awambel ea'! Aho', anen a awagon ea'! Epes sagape wambel ambalembai sanda' esis misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi hi'alasa saila waf anamba sanda' so'a waolanai. Waf asasifi awafi si'i wain banagonai nanda' epes ukup pagaolasi. Wambel anamba Babilon naso'as wain inimba epes hiasi wambel hiagoma sa'am.”

Ea' anona ensel nagi'ma amom biam nafi'i. Ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanomi nogal mehip na'amba na'i, “I'i epen ami nenda' lotu ma mafin anamba nagail alupi ma ambal ananinai sagandombanai a nefa' ametal amaga a'a lagof ananisi,

ea' anin atiasi nepe si'i nega' anin wain. Wain inimba basef waminif atina okom wandafunai Godi. God ina nati uwahipin, owa'atin. Anen okom wandafunai lu'una a'owa'. Anen atiasi nese'an okom wandafunai epen inimba ma nogagwa waf awafi. Ama epen inimba negefa' akafimi awami ma nif fagandumi magahihi'asi ma otamba agol salfa nifimi ma nogohnaep amom ensel bo'om hilili'i moloma nogohnaep sipsip noganaii.

Ea' nogoh gwataga nif amamba maso'asa akafimi epes isimba sanda' lotuma mafin anamba alupunai naloma ambal anamba ananinai. Epes isimba ina atiasi sopoma noma'w owamb alip, owa'atin. Nogoh amamba atiasi molomolota ilif lifilafi atapim mogapani.”
Nemaf afamba akafimi amamba mogataga, dao' anis amam nematawa Godi sondalutu banages. Isimba esis amam nematawa sagaila mu'uli Godii ma sagahapifa Jisas sisihina datimai.

Ea' ame' anagol malogol ga'i gafi'i heven ga'i, “Ina' da'a anif basef na'amba. Esis amam nematawa sahapifa Dembinaii sagaga'i, dei' nimaguf hiafi anaf owagama wapani sonohas!” Ambal bu'unai Godi wapani na'i, “Aho', esis atiasi sokwaha numa'umi amamba esis sanda'ami ea' sopoma noma'w. Esis ina sope dowaf, owa'atin. God atiasi niti waf bu'wafi esis sanda'afi ea' nogwamasa anom hiahaom fasimi esis. Waf bu'wafi asasifi atiasi fisalias sondawalap.”

Ea' atologon wapani, ati anona otaga afitinai nape ea' anona maena ambal lagapaunai nape otaga anamba anen si'i anona dembinai nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi. Anen nowalo' hat bu'utai togogala' si'i goli balaga ananigai ea' nahapila anona nogwatop hikakalina endilisii lagol ananigili.

Ea' anona ensel nagape ipat lu'unai Godi nomoni nawisi ando' nofala aman anamba nagatoma otagai mehip na'i, “Ina' topa' gwa'aimi amamba magaofi ma nogwatop anamba ine'inai! Dei' main, gwa'aimi hiami itapami maof ea'. Isimba atis dei' nogota ana'e pegala' gwa'aisiatai.”
Ea' aman anamba nagape otagai nahapila nogwatop ananipi na'i nowali'ap itap, natopa' gwa'aisi sagaofi itap apa'e.
Ea' anona ensel wapani nawisi ando' ma ipat anamba lu'unai Godi nagape heveni. Anen wapani nahapila nagwatop hikakalina a'owa'i.

Ea' anona ensel wapani nakwaha belita atamba sondolalima Goda nafi'i. Ensel anamba banagonai ma nugumafi nifi. Nofala ensel anamba nagahapila nogwatopi nofalana mehip na'amba na'i, “Ina' fa'ai nogwatop apamba ine'ipi hikalip a'owa'i, topa' sa'utip gwa'aipi pagaofi pagail mandelef waini itapi, ea' nekolasom mo'oh! Dei' main, gwa'aimi amamba hiami maof ea'!”

Ea' ensel anamba nahapila nogwatop ananipi nowali'ap itap, natopa' gwa'aimi sa'utip akumi magail mandelef waini ea' natamam motawa. Ea' nasa'ma gwa'aimi amamba nakwahom mowala otam tang lu'unai nomona sogofa'asa wain embel. Amamba mondola'waifa okom wandafunai Godi ma isimba sogosambala basefi.

Ea' safa'asa waina otam tang anamba lu'unai nagape ando'ma taun inimba wambel lu'wambili. Ea' esimbel maluwi tang ando' kolo'w atin magafe' laogon mandahama 300 kilomita si'i embel walemb mafi'i matef mataga ilif motambel ain nagape malogof amom hosi.

Ea' ati anin mae banagani natagai heven ea' nomonas hiahawesa anamba. Ati ensel 7-pelaim mape ea' amom mahapila hiahaom awami endilisii mandandama epesi. I'i anaf hiahaom amamba awami hi'igalam ea', ina atiasi ata' anom motaga wapani, a'owa'. Dei' main, hiahaom amamba awami 7-pelaim, amamba okom wandafunai Godi ea' hi'ilana endilisi.

Ea' ati anom maefah si'i naoh embel lu'wami mandati si'i glas isimba sanda'as sagaloma nifi. Esis isimba salutu banages sali'amona wandafa waf awafi satalogofa mafin anamba lu'unai nagail alupi naloma ambal ananinai maloma ametal ananini 666, esis salutu naoh agwamba da'malifigwa si'i glas. God naso'as anom musik si'i gita sahapilam.

Esis sanda' awaf Moses nanda'mana maol Godii faloma awaf sipsip noganaii. Awaf afamba na'amba. “Dembinai, ina' God banagami hiaminai. Maol hiani ina' nanda'ani, anin banagani ea' afa' watilin nomonas salasafe'man hiahias! Ina' dembinai king epes misi'ah hiasii ea' waf ine'ifi usi'if endilisifi hi'andalaf!

Dembinai, ina' atina nandape bo'wena hilili'. Ea' dei' epen ami atiasi owa' ombel mohana ine'a? Owa'atin. Hiasi hi'alas ombel mahasa ina' sanda' lotu ma ina' atina. Ami atiasi owa' nesa'ma agol ine'igilia? Owa'atin. Epes misi'ah hiahi ma ganimba itap hiagoma atiasi sifi'i sonda' lotu ma ina' atina. Dei' main, waf usi'ifi ine'ifi ea' fataga alihigima fandawalap.”
Magi'ma amamba magatagai atologon wapani, ati ipat bu'unai hilili'i Godi notawa gani heven. Ipat anamba nagal alihina ati nomon ipat anamba nape sanda' sel sagala'anai God nagapaunai.

Ea' ensel amamba 7-pelaim magahapila hiahaom awami endilisi mandandam mogalalamona epesi, makwaha ipat anamba mawisi ando'. Ea' mowaho' luwaguf afitifi be'ef a'owa'i fegegala' endilisii. Mowaho' legw si'i goli managam mefetagw amamugwi.

Ea' anona ma amamba biamibiami magape namumi naso'ama dis lu'wami 7-pelaim sanda' gol sanda'ami sandandama amom ensel atona atin. God nagape namona lifilafii atapinai okom wandafunai ananinai nape si'inama dis amamba 7-pelaim.

Ea' nogoh amamba mataga mogola'i ma banagami Godi, amamba si'ima ipat anamba Godi. Ea' ina anin epen la'ifina nefe' negawis ipat anamba nomon, owa'atin. Esis sope sohafa ensel 7-pelaim monda' maol hi'ilana hiahaom amamba awami mahapilam mandandami ata' mili'.

Ea' ame' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai mehip ipat lu'unai Godi nomon. Anona na'i nofala ensel amamba 7-pelaim na'i, “Ipa' pefe' pekolo'wa dis isimba 7-pelais okom wandafunai Godi nagapaisi ma kolo'olam mefe' itap.”

Ea' ensel nagali'i anamba nafe' nakolo'wa dis amamba ananimi mafe' itap ea' ilambeh mamimami awasimi endilisi mataga itapa epes isimba ametal anamba mafin alipunai magailasi ma epes isimba sanda' lotuma ambal ananinaii.

Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma bifi wapani nafe' nakolo'wa dis ananimi embel naoh lu'wami. Ea' naoh amamba mandambema mataga si'i esimbela epes hiasi sagaga'i. Ea' hiahaom magape nomon naohi ea' maga' hi'alam.
Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanifi nakolo'wa dis ananimi embel walemb lu'wambi baloma anamba embel begetah mahagahiwai. Embel amamba hiami mandambema mataga esimbel.
Ea' ame' ensel anamba nugumafi embel naohi walembeh hiamii na'i, “Ina' bu'winai hilili' endilisii ea' nanda' kot ine'itai andeande' naila ikwaf usi'ifi atef nawaloga esis sanda' waf awafii.

Dei' main, esis amam nematawa hiasi saha amam nematawa bu'wasi hilili'i ine'isi afis saloma profet ine'imi wapani ea' esimbel asasimbeli balo. Ea' dei' naso'asa esimbel epes isimba sanda' waf awafii ma soga'ambel. Ina' nagwamasam dindi'i dondo' mandahama waf awafi asasifi.”

Ea' ame' anagol malogol gataga belita atamba sondolalima God atai goga ga'i, “Aho' endilisi Dembinai, ina' God banagami hiami magapainai. Ina' nogawaloga epesa koti ea' kot ine'itai endilisi usi'ita hi'alata.”
Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma biamibiami nakolo'wa dis ananimi ma awin alipini ea' God nape natiti owaf nagaofa epes nif.

Nif amamba lu'wami owafimi nifim a'owa'i ma' epes isimba. Ea' sa'i basef findiwaifi awafi ma God nugumafi hiahaom amamba awamii. Apa' esis ina sambema nelelemba sakwaha waf awafi sogasa'ma agol ananigili, owa'atin.

Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanom biami nakolo'wa dis ananimi sia kingi lu'wani inimba mafin alipunaii. Ea' akot lu'unai nataga anamba mafin alupunai nagala'ambemagoma. Ea' esis sagail waf ananifii sofa' akafimi awami. Ea' sondofapa afegah asasigahi sondola'waifa sogame' akafimi lu'wami.
Esis ukup papoma akafimi maloma ilambeh asasimi, dei' sa'i basef awafi findiwaifi ma God nagape heveni. Apa' ina sambema nelelemb sowa' alafugaha waf afamba awafi esis sanda'afi, owa'atin.
Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanom wanomi nakolo'wa dis ananini walemb lu'unai Yufretis. Ea' walemb embel bakisi hi'alamba mogandondomba ufia'w amom king dembamii mugafi'i anamba awin nagatafimai.
Ea' ati ambagof awami wanom mandati si'i kwahowa lu'wami matagai malogol kwambon anamba lu'unai naloma malogol mafin anamba alipunai a maloma malogol profet anamba nagambaso'ami.

Ambagof amamba awami endilisi manda' ametal banagami mamimami ma esis sotolom sogogawam. Amom mafe'ma amom king dembami mugumafi epes hiasi sagape walemb hiagomai. Amom ma'i mokolasai amom atogona monda' wandaf nemaf afamba lu'wafi ma God banagami hiami magapaunai.

“Peme'! Atiasi ae' etagamepa si'i sanda' wali safi'i sagataga. Etagamepa anef nemaf afamba ipa' owa' pegawa piga'i igafi'ia. I'i epes ukup kilikala' sope sowaho' luwaguf asasifi andeande'ma owa' so'oha, atiasi esis ina sofe' alop atop wahifip solomas siti alop asasipi ambagof awagof, owa'. Isimbai sonohas.”
Ea' ambagof awami makolasai king dembami anagon itap du'wanip diga Hibrui sa'i Armagedon.
Ensel anamba nagafe'ma 7i nakolo'wa dis ananimi ea' fufin nofa'am. Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai sia king lu'unai nomon ipat lu'unai Godi ga'i mehip ga'i, “Amamba dei' ea' hi'alam!”

Ea' otaga holala nafe', amalemb mala' ea' otaga diwala imauna lu'unai nataga. Imauna anamba anen lu'unai endilisi ma nimaguf hiafi danda epes sagape itapi ina same' anona imauna nataga lu'una fowa' si'i anamba, owa'atin.

Taun inimba wambel lu'wambili nandawal wanifigin ea' walemb hiagoma a' awagon hi'alagon. Ea' God okom mandanda'ma epes awasi sagape taun inimba lu'wagoma Babiloni, dei' okom ananimi wandafumi manda' esis sa' embela kap wain nagalapi mahas kwapete'as.
Ea' ailan inimba hiani nafa' nafe' higilalan hi'alan ea' ina ata' anota halafuta atotota tape, a' owa'atin.

Ea' asaf wambawa lu'wamunai si'i otamba afitimi nalai nahas. Asaf wambawa lu'wamunai nimanim a'owa'i si'i beg kopi lu'wani atona atin. Ea' sa'ipana awagon Goda asaf wambawa nimaniminai si'i mowai magahambombaga esisi.

Anona ensel atotona la'afena amom ensel 7-pelaim magahapila dis isimba 7-pelaisi nafi'i na'ipi na'amba na'i, “Ina' fi'i! Nemata'w akwamba kwanda' so'a wauli kwatoma embel lu'wami ilif atiasi kofa' akafimi awami akwa'umi. Ae' a'i ihimba'mina amamba.

Amom dembami king itapami manda' waf hiafi awafi so'a waulafi maloma nemata'w akwamba. Ea' epes itapasi hiasi wapani sanda' waf so'a waulafi saloma'w. Ea' sataga sahaga sagaol si'i epes sa' embel wain banagimbeli ukup pagaolas.”

Ambal bu'unai Godi nataga banagona ma ae' ea' andame' si'i koh dondo'ah. Ensel anamba nofa'e afe' itap wafigima fataupigima. Anamba ati ano'w nemata'w kwatoma anona mafin ilif nagail alupi akwahinai. Mafin anamba agof hiagufi fail alop ananipi hi'alap. Agof agwafomba basef awafi findiwaifi hiafi fafifafi ma God. Ea' mafin anamba balagah 7-pelaigah handanda'ana wambawa ilifunamaim matagana.

Nemata'w akwamba kwala klos akwahisi bias ina sandati na'amba atin, ea' sosaf naninani gol naloma sosaf esis sanda' otamba sanda'anai naloma bahigis sagalotamam a'owa'i. Ako'w kwahapila kap gol lagol akwa'ugili. Ea' waf hiafi awafi fagape kap apamba nomoni afamba. Waf naninani aunai folo'wagalana endilisii ma naep Godi, waf naninani alugunai ma waf anamba so'a waolana ma nemata'w akwambai saloma hiahaom amamba hiami mape si'ima kap apamba.

Ea' amef akwa'ufi ma agol akwa'ugili gail amaga akwa'ugai. Agol agalemba basef fandambahi'i faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Taun lu'wagoma Babilon, anamba nondofala ma'ma nematawa hiawai wanda' so'a wauli ma waf hiafi awafi endilisi ma itap apa'e.”

Nemata'w akwamba kwaha esis amam nematawa Godi sahapifa Jisasi sagawalapa agol ananigilii sagaga'i. Ea' ati ako'w kwa' esimbel asasimbeli kwataga kwahaga kwagaol. Ati ako'w ea' bolale kwapete'e endilisi nomonas salasafe' hiahias.

Ea' ensel anamba na'ipi na'i, “Dei' maina ina' gogolagalasina kwapete'? Na'amba owa'i. Atiasi ihimba'mina basef kofagefa fape fandambaho'ma nemata'w akwambai faloma mafin anamba nogofa'akwi. Mafin anamba balagah 7-pelaigah hagapaunai a wambawa ilifunamim magataganai.

Mafin anamba nagail alupi, ina' natolona ea'. Fowa' anen nape, apa' dei' ina ata' nape, owa'. Ama anaf owagama dao', nokwaha nowaga anamba owa' nowala nogotambilia nondagiai ilif ea' nefe' higililana hi'ilana. Anis epes itapasi Godi ina nanda' agof asasigufi fape buk ambal namili'wi ma nemaf afamba fowa' dambadamba anen nanda' itap, owa'. Amam nematawa isimba atiasi siti mafin anamba nagail alupi agogolalasis kwapete'. Dei' main, fowa' anen nape, apa' dei' owa', ma owagama, dao' anen a' notaga wapani.
“Epen ami okom bu'wami magapaini, anin nendegawa hiahawes isimba andeande'. Balagah agahemba 7-pelaigah basef waminif atina halafutagw 7-pelaigw nemata'w akwamba kwagatomagwi.

Apa' balagah agahemba 7-pelaigah waminif atina anom king dembami 7-pelaim wapani. Wanom biam ea' maga', anona dei' nape dembinai numafi hiahawes. Apa' anona ina dei' a' nataga dembinai king, ata' owa'. Bola dao' a' notaga, anen atona ata' nope dembinai nogota bandata.
Apa' mafin anamba nagail alupi fowa' nagapani, dei' owa' nogapania, anamba si'i king dembinai anamba nagafe'ma 8i. Apa' anen amom wambota atota naloma king amamba 7-pelaim ama atiasi higiligalana.

“Ea' wambawa amamba ilifunamaim ina' nagatolom ea'i, amamba basef waminif atina anom king dembami ilifunamaim. Ina dei' mataga king dembami, ata' owa'. Apa' amom atiasi mofa' banagami moloma mafin anamba nagail alupi, motaga king mope dembami nogota bandata si'i awa atitin.
Amom king amamba ma'i basef mandame'maefa ukup atifip pandanda' ma atiasi mogaso' banagami amamba amamumi hi'igalama mafin anamba nagail alupi ma mogame' basef ananifi.

Atiasi mopa' moloma sipsip noganai. Apa' sipsip noganai a' nikila'am. Epes sagaila fala ananinii naloma basef ananifi datimai, isimba a' nandandepas ananisi atis, epes isimba atiasi la'ifisa solomana sigikila' wandaf afambai.”

Ea' ensel anamba na'ipi na'i, “Ina' natolom ea' embel amamba lu'wami nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli kwagatomami. Embel amamba basef waminif atina esis amam nematawa hiasi misi'ah hiahi afe'usi afe'usi sandakolas sape ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi alop naninani a diga hiana haona hi'alas.

Ea' wambawa amamba ilifunamaim ina' nagatulumi, amamba moloma mafin anamba ukup amamipi numbutipa nemata'w akwamba kwanda' so'a wauli. Atiasi mofa' hiahawes uga mais akwa'usi ma ako'w ato'w kogape dowaf, alipisi aka'w. Ea' mowalima'w klos akwa'umi moha'w koga' mea' ambegw akwa'ugwi mofa' alop akwa'upi nif fendop hi'ilap.

Dei' main, God atona nasa'ma nomonasa ukup amamipi ma atiasi monda' hiahawes isimba sogataga. Fowa' anen na'ias ea' na'i, Atiasi amom nomonas atifis ea' banagami amamba magape dembami kingi moso'anam hi'ilam mofe'ma mafin anamba nagail alupi. Ea' monda'am na'amba atin mefe' motagama nemaf afamba God nanda'am mandahama hiahawes isimba anen nali' naga'iasi.
Nemata'w akwamba ina' nagatolo'wi, akwamba basef waminif atina taun inimba wambel lu'wambili bape si'i dembinai nape nagali'ma amom dembami king ma itap anamba hiagomai.”
Magi' magatagai amamba, ati anona ensel nakwaha heven nisila'i. Anen banagami magapaunai endilisi, sosaf ananinai nogala' nanda' itap hiagoma nogala' a'owa'.

Anen noga na'i mehip endilisi na'i, “Nemata'w akwamba ao'w hi'ala'w. Ako'w basef waminif atina wambel lu'wambili Babilon agol lu'wagilimbili ea' awagon hi'alagon! Dei' nataga wambel awambili ma ambagof awami maloma amiguf awami mapaogon.

Dei' main, fowa' esis wambel ambalambaisi sa'ipa amam nematawa misi'ah hiasi hi'alas sasasapa'as saga' wain asasini numbutini. Wain inimba basef waminif atina waf hiafi awafi so'a waulafi esis sanda'afi. Ea' amom dembami king itapami hiami wapani manda' waf afamba so'a waulafi maloma esis wambel ambalemba. Ea' epes itapasi sanda' maol bisnis sofa' otamba hiambai ma waf naninani aunai esis wambel ambalemba sanda'afi.

Ea' ame' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa ae'ipai, kwaha wambel ambalemba piwisi ando'. Na'amba ipa' atiasi pendao'oma peloma wambel ambalemba pefa' akafimi awami ma waf awafi esis sanda'afi.
Waf afamba awafi lu'wif a'owa' endilisi si'i mahanip, fel notawa ilif nagalota gani heven. Ea' God okom mapoma waf afamba.

Ipa' pegawa ea' waf afambai nemata'w akwamba kwanda' so'a wauli kwanda'afi. Ipa' pegwa waf akwa'ufi dondo'af endilisi piwapanima'w wamafi wapani. Ako'w kwakolefa waf awafi kwanda'af fataga hiaf a'owa'. Ea' pekolefa akafimi awami hiami mikila' akwa'umi ma pegwam mofe' ma ako'w. Ako'w kwambema embel banagimbeli bala kap pa'am. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' awi pekolefa embel banagimbeli pese'akwam ako'w kwea'ama kogame' akafimi awami mogwam mofe'ma ako'w mondogwama.

Nemata'w akwamba kwafela agol akwa'ugili atogol kwanda' waf hiafi fafifafi ma kogape andeande'. Ea' ipa' pendaso'akwa akafimi hiami ako'w, mondahama aligah hagasi'i. Ea' penda' ako'w ma konda' lef atin. Ako'w okom maga'i na'amba kwa'i, ‘Ae' ataga ape kwin dembiwai. Ae' ina si'i alifiwai, owa'. Nimanimi ina atiasi motagame ma egalef, owa'atin endilisi.’

Ea' hiahaom mamimami awami endilisi atiasi motagama wambel ambalemba anef nemaf atetef. Aowas hiani notaga ea' epes hiasi atiasi selef kwapete' nolom lu'unai notaga. Ea' nif fetaga fendo wambel ambalemba Babilon hi'ilagon. Dei' main, dembinai God nawaloga wambel ambalemba nagwamasa akafimi awami esis. Anen banagami lu'wamunai banagona a'owa'.”
Amom dembami king itapami manda' waf so'a waulafi awafi maloma ako'w ea' manda' waf hiafi awasif maloma'w. Atiasi amom king amamba miti ako'w fegando'wa nogoh lu'wami motaga'w ea' melef kwapete'.

Atiasi amom ombel moham kwapete' endilisi ma akafimi amamba ako'w kogofa'ami. Mulutu laogona ako'w mi'ias mi'i, “Owahipipa owahipipa a'owa' ma wambel Babilon! Ipa' taun wambel banagonai! I'i owa' main kwafalis atis ipa' pefa' akafimi amamba ma waf awafi ipa' panda'afi!”
Ea' epes sape sanda' maol bisnis itapi atiasi ukup pendanda' ma wambel ambalemba ea' solopagon sope nelelemb nimanilimbagon. Dei' main, ina atiasi anin epen netala uga ananigai wapani, a' owa'atin.

Uga maina anamba, gol fasimi a otamba silva a anom otamba fasifasimi, bahigis suwasuwaimi sagalotamam a'owa'i, luwaguf fasifasifi, akwahifi fafifafi a anif luwaguf silka nigahapilifa kogwafifi ea' lawah amamba hiahaom alogw fasigwi gwagami ea' hiahaom hiami esis sonda' nalelef elefanilif sonda'ami, hiahaom amamba hiami sonda' lawah sagatalogah otamba lu'umbaii sonda'ami a hiahawes sonda' bras mogogala'i fasimi sonda'ami a hiahawes sonda' ain amamba fasimi sonda'ami a anis hiahawes sonda' otamba fasifasimi sonda'asi.

Ea' uga na'amba. Lawah nembawa saga'agahi agiligaha sinamon a paura nogoh alogw fasigwini a gris sa'i mer a sanda inimba bu'wani frankinsens a wain naloma wel gwa'aili a plaua waloma wit ea' bulmakau, sipsip, hos maloma karis si'i wilkar maloma epes wapani. Epes isimba agof akasi sanda' maol dowaf sagape lafela anis epesi. Epes isimba anom dembami ma'i esis ina epes bu'wasi. Ea' maso'asas lauguni sotalis si'i sagatal uga mais. Hiahaom amamba hiami esis ina atiasi sotalom wapani, a' owa'.

Epes sonda' maol bisnis atiasi si'ipas na'amba si'i, ‘Gwa'aisi isimba nelelemb ipe'ilimbi behafemasa pegefa'asi, isimba hiasi sakwaha ipa' safe' ea'. Hiahaom hiami bu'wabu'wami atom suwasuwaimi otamba maim lu'umbai atemba basambagafe'mami maloma sosaf bilas maim ipe'imi hiahaom hiami amamba makwahipa mafe'. Ama ipa' ina atiasi piti amamba mope wapani, a' owa'atin.’

Ea' epes isimba sonda' maola bisnisa hiahawes isimbai ma sogofa' otamba hiambai wambel ambalemba atiasi ombel mohas endilisi ma akafimi awami wambel ambalemba begefa'ami. Atiasi esis sulutuwi laogona anamba nelelemb nimanilimb selef sope.

Ea' asi'i, ‘Nandasapal, nandasapal a'owa' ma wambel ambalemba lu'wagoma! Fowa' anamba nagala klos sosaf suwasuwaimi afitimi a luwaguf akwahimi mamimami nogofalo'ma alop ananipi ma goli otamba suwasuwaimbai baloma bahigis fasisi sagalotamas a'owa'i.

Ama atiasi kwafalis atis hiahaom amamba hiami otamba moni moloma bilas sosaf maim amamba ea' aom hi'ilam.’ Ea' kepten hiami mugumafi sipi, epes hiasi sogatala sip sogafe' analemb walembi, a epes isimba hiasi sonda' boskru ma sipi, a epes hiasi sonda' bisnisa maol naoh embeli, epes isimba hiasi sulutuwi laogona wambel ambalemba.
Ea' sulutu siti ako'w wambel ambalemba fendembel nogoh mogalembel ea' si'ias na'amba si'i, ‘Wambel lu'wambili anima nape nandati na'amba atin si'i wambel ambalemba? Owa'atin.’

Ea' esis sola itap sopof balagah asasigahi selef mehip nelelemb nimanilimba wambel ambalemba awagon. Ea' si'i, ‘Pandasapal, pandasapal a'owa' ma anamba wambel lu'wagoma! Ama hiami mugumafi sip apambai maloma amom mugumafi sipi ma pagafe' naoh embeli amom matagama otamba hiambai endilisi ma wambel ambalemba. Pandasapal a'owa'. Ama atiasi kwafalis atis anamba a' awagon hi'ilagon!’

Ipa' pagape heveni peloma esis amam nematawa Godi, ea' ipa' aposel peloma amom profet, ipa' hipai sonondahepa ma hiahaom amamba dei' magatagama wambel lu'wagoma anambai. Dei' main, God nawaloga anamba ea' nagwa akafimi awami ma anamba. Anen nagwa waf afamba awafi ma wambel ambalemba nali' nanda'mepaf ipe'i.

Basef ifimba hi'alef, ati anona ensel banagonai nofa'ai anom otam atotom si'i owap lu'unai nogokakisa olemb witimbi. Anen nafela owap anamba nakwahona nafe' nowala embel naoh. Ea' na'i, “Ea' na'amba atin atiasi esis sefela wambel ambalemba lu'wambili Babilon sokwahogon mehip nefe' nowa si'i owap anamba nogowala naoh ama epes ina atiasi sotologon wapani, a' owa'atin.

Ea' gita anamba apa' nagalifi a musik anamba hianai naninani, moloma batagwi biugel, maguf amambai filifalu'wi ina atiasi ata' peme'am wapani wambel ambalemba, a'owa'. Ea' epes isimba gawaisi sanda' maol hiahaomi, ipa' ina atiasi piti epes isimbai sope wambel ambalemba wapani, a'owa'. Maf owap anamba lu'unai nogokakisa olemb witimbi, atiasi ina ata' some' anona wapani wambel ambalemba, a' owa'atin.

Ileli'w lami ina atiasi ata' mogala' mope wambel ambalemba wapani, a'owa'. Ea' malogol aman anamba na'i nogaso' nemata'wi ea' malogol nemata'wi kwa'i kogaso' amani, ipa' ina atiasi ata' peme' esis wambel ambalemba wapani, a' owa'. Fowa' epes wambel ambalembaisi bisnis sapomas sape dambesi itapasi. Ea' esis wambel ambalemba sambaso'ma epes misi'ah hiasi ma ufial baso'amunai naninani si'i sagandomboma nematawanai.

God nati wambel lu'wambili ambalemba bagaha profet hiami maga' maloma amam nematawa hiasi Godi. Isimba atis dei' kofagema mapoma wambel ambalemba. Ea' epes hiasi sagape itap ana'i esis bousi sahas sagaga'i, kofagema amamba wapani ea' mapoma anamba atogon.”

Sagi' sagatagama sasimbai ame' anom maefah mandame' si'i maguf lu'wami esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape heveni. Esis sa'i na'amba sa'i, “Apa' mefela agol Godi lu'wagol! God ape'inai atona nofa' apa' mogotanimaii. Anen agol lu'wagilinai, banagami lu'wamunai, mogogala'i magapaunai.

Basef lu'wafi ma kot, anen nawaloga epesa waf endilisifi usi'ifi andeande' hi'alas. Nemata'w akwamba dembe'wi kwanda' so'a wauli kwasapala esis amam nematawa hiasi itapasi ma sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi saloma'w. Ea' God nanda'ma'w basef. Ako'w kwaha isimba sanda'mana maol Godii saga'. Ea' dei' God nagwama'wa kofagema amamba akwa'umi mafe'ma ako'w.”
Ea' esis sakolo'wa maguf wapani na'amba sa'i, “Apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagola wambel ambalemba lu'wambili fagandembel nogoh magalo. Amamba a' malo malota ilif lifilafi atapim!”

Ea' amom agufumi dembami 24-pelaim maloma amamba biamibiam magape namumii mindiwa nembawa motawa manda' lotuma God nagatoma sia lu'wanii. Amom ma'ias ma'i, “Endilisi atis, apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol!”

Ama sia lu'wani Godi ea' anagol malogol ga'i gafi'i ga'i, “Ipa' panda'mana maol Godii, ombel mahepama anen pagaila basef ananifii, ipa' epes agof akipai paloma epes isimba agufisi, ipa' hipai pekolata pefela agol Godi!”

Ea' ame' anis maefah si'i basef hiafi fatagama misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi sandatama sagapani. Ea' sape sa'i mimil si'i embel magala' lil atin. Ea' si'i amalemb lu'wami magala'ma otaga diluluwagala, maguf ifimba fa'ias mehip na'amba fa'i, “Apa' mefela agol Godi! Dembinai anen God ape'inai. Anen banagami hiamunai! Dei' anen nataga Dembinai king endilisi ma nugumafi hiahawes hiasi hi'igalas.
Dei' apa' sonondahapa mefela agol ananigili. Dei' main, anen Dembinai banagonai. Nemaf fataga ea' ma sipsip noganai na'i nogaso' nemata'w. Ea' nemata'w anani'wi kwandandombol kwape.
God naso'akw klos afitimi suwasuwaimi mogogala'i bu'wami endilisi. Ako'w kwala amamba ma alop akwa'upi.” Klos amamba afitimi bu'wami si'i waf usi'ifi esis amam nematawa Godi sanda'afi.

Ea' ensel anamba na'ipi na'i, “Ina' da'a basef ifimba. Epes isimba God nofalas sogafi'mai gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma sipsip noganai nogaso' nemata'w akwambai, isimba esis sonohas.” Anen na'ipi wapani na'i, “Basef ifimba basef Godi endilisifi.”

Ea' ae' indiwa nembawa etawa felefele'ma bo'wagah enseli ma enda' lotumana, owa' na'ipi na'i, “Ina' nenda'as na'amba owa'i. Ae' alipuwai ine'iwai aloma ina' naloma sahopena ine'imi, afa' wandao'oma wanda' maol Godi atini waloma esis hiasi hi'alas sagahapifa basef endilisifi Jisas nagawalipasafi. Ina' nendanda' lotuma God atona. Apa' mogawa basef ifimba endilisifi Jisas nagawalapefa ipe'i, ifimba fasa'mai amom profeta mogawalipasa basef Godi.”

Ea' ati otaga heven nandawisi' nagal, ati anona hos afitinai nape. Epen nagatumonai agol ananigili sa'i, “Epen nugumafi maol ananini andeande' datimai, nanda' waf endilisifi atifi.” Anen nagaila waf usi'ifi atefa nogawaloga esis amam nematawa ma kot nanda' wandafa waf usi'ifi afamba atef.

Naep ananipi si'i nif fagandifi ea' hagw bu'wagwi hiagwi si'i dembami king mogowalo'agwi gwape balaga ananigai. Anif amef fail alop ananipi, ifimba agol ananigili. Anen atotona nogawa agol agalemba, anis daias owa'.
Esimbel masa'opa klos ananimi laumi nalam. Ea' esis sofala agol ananigili sa'i, “Basef Godi.”
Anen nape nagali'ma epes hiasii ea' amom soldia magape heveni matoma hos amamba afitimi amamumi mailana mafe'. Alop amamipi esis sowaho'mama klos afitimi fasimi endilisi a'owa'i.

Ea' anona bainat hikalina a'owa'i nape malogol nawisi ando'. Ea' atiasi noha esis mini'ap amam nematawa hiasi ma bainat anamba. Anaf anen numafi epes hiasi sagape itap hiagomai. Numafias banagambel si'i nagahapila anota kalamuta ain. Atiasi nofa'asa sa'utip waina otam tang anamba waini, amamba mondola'waifa okom wandafunai Godi, anen banagonai ma hiahaom hiamii.
Anef amefa agol ananigili failana klosi bimbita ananisi. Agol agalemba na'amba. Dembinai kinga amom king hiamii, Dembinai ma dembami hiamii.

Ea' ati anona ensel atotona nalutu felefele'ma awin alipini nape nagatalogoma. Anen na'i mehip na'ipa amiguf hiagufi fufia' fagafe' ilif otagai na'i, “Ipa' pindakolasi pifi'mai gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Godi!

Ama atiasi pega' ambegwa amom king dembami goloma ambegwa amom kepten mugumafi amom soldiai ea' moloma ambegw amom amamba banagamii a ambegw hosi goloma ambegwa epes isimba hiasi sagatumami wapani. Ipa' atiasi pea' ambegwa epes hiasi, anis agof akasi sanda' maol sagape lafela anis daiasi, a anis agufisi sugumafi anisa maoli, isimba soloma anis hiahawes akasi.”
Ea' ati mafin anamba lu'unai nagail alupi naloma dembami king amamba itapami maloma soldia amamumi mandatama mape. Amom ma'i mopa' mogaloma aman anamba nagatoma hosi noloma soldia ananimi.

Anen nanda' mafin anamba nagail alupi naloma profet anamba nagawalapa basef baso'afi nanda'am manda' kalabus. Profet anamba nanda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami ma naep mafin anamba nagail alupi. Waf afambai atef nambaso'ma epes sogofa' ametala mafin anamba nagail alupi ea' sanda' lotuma ambal atona ananinai sagandombanai. Mafin anamba naloma profet anamba nagambaso'ami amom biam ata' mape ambagof namogof ea' sowasa'am mafe' nif wandafumi fagandom otam batafumi agol salfa nowaga lu'unai unumuwanima si'i dumbi.

Anom soldia magaila mafin anamba alupunai maloma profet anamba nagambaso'ami, amom ata' mape nomon. Ea' aman anamba nagatoma hosi naha amom a' maga'. Anen naham bainat anamba launai nagape malogol ananigilii. Ea' amiguf hiagufi fa' ambegwa amam amambai ea' nelelemb afafilimbi a' si'im endilisi.
Ea' ati anona ensel nakwaha heven nisila'i. Anen nahapila ki utaini ma nowaga anamba launai nagal nogowala awin ganii ma owa' nogotambilia. Ea' nahapila sen lu'unai wapani.

Anen nahapila kwambon anamba lu'unai sisihina, kwambon anamba fowa'inai endilisi. Anen “Aman nagambaso'ma epes hiasii.” Anen Satan. Ea' ensel anamba nowa'ana sen a' nope nonda' kalabus nondahama afagof 1,000-pelaiguf.

Ensel anamba nakwahona nafe' nowala nowaga anamba launai ea' nowalomana uta ilif sisihita. Ea' Satan ina atiasi la'ifina ma nogambaso'ma esis mini'ap amam nematawa hiasi wapani, owa'. Anen ata' nope nosasa afagof 1,000-pelaiguf ama ata' hi'ilagofa main, dao' ensel anamba notagwahona wapani nefe'agon ganigani ma nogota bandata.

Ama main owa', ati anom sia lu'wami kingi ma'oh ea' anis epes satoma sia amamba. God naso'asa banagami ma sogowaloga waf esis amam nematawai ma kot. Ea' ati ambagof epes isimba hiasi sagawalapa basef endilisifi Jisasi. Esis owa' sonda' lotuma mafin nagail alupi naloma ambal ananinai sagandombanaia, ea' owa' sogofa' anin ametal awani mafin anambai amagah lagof asasisia. Epes isimba sagahapila basef Jisasi tetele'ifi. Waf afamba atefa sanda' maol bu'wani, dei' esis bousi satopa' bambafugahas afis. Sosafel wapani sofa' ambal namili ea' sope dembesi king soloma Krais sope sondahama afagof 1,000-pelaiguf.

Nemaf afamba figali'i ma esis sagaga'i sili' sogosafel wandelef. Apa' epes isimba sagaga'i ina sofa' ambal namili nemaf afamba, ata' owa'. Esis ata' sope sosasa afagof agwafomba 1,000-pelaiguf fefe'ma hi'ilagof.

Epes isimba sotanima sogosafel nemaf afamba figali'i, esis sonohas sope hilili'. Ea' ga' inimba nigagi'i ina banagena negatalogofa epes isimba, owa'atin. Esis atiasi sope pris God noloma Kraisi sondolalimam. Ea' sope dembesi soloma Kraisa sugumafi anis epes afagof 1,000-pelaiguf.
Ama afagof agwafomba 1,000-pelaiguf hi'ilagof, dao'. Uta ea' tindawisi' kalabus ea' Satan nokwaha kalabus ananimi nuwisi ando'.

Anen nuwisi ando'ma atiasi nombaso'ma esis misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi sagape itap ana'e da'malifinama biafigin biafigin nafe' nogotambela, esis mini'ap Gok saloma Magoki. Atiasi Satan nokolasa esisa sonda' wandaf. Mini'ap asasipi amam nematawa isimba hiasi sandahama ko'onaga gaga'oh naoh akatai.

Ea' sefe' ganimba itap hiagoma lauguni sondowasa' sonogama anamba amam nematawa Godi sogapoma noloma wambel taun inimba God okom maga'ian a'owa'i. Owa' nif fisila'i heven fendo soldia amamba Satani hi'ilam.

I'i owa' main, God nokwahowa aman anamba Satan nagambaso'masi nefe' nowala nowaga unumuwanima si'i dumbi nif fandom wandafum otam salfa atapim magapani. Anom mali' makwahowa mafin nagail alupi naloma profet anamba nagambaso'ami mowala mape anamba. Amom biam moloma Satan mope anamba atapim mofa' akafimi owamb alip anamba nif wandafifi fandif atapif fagapoma.
Ea' ati sia lu'unai kingi afitinai na'oh, aman natoma sia inimba. Itap paloma otaga ilif safa'ma anen ea' sogapoma a'owa' anagona. Epes hiasi ina atiasi sotolom, owa'atin.

Ea' ati esis sagaga'i sape, epes isimba agufisi saloma isimba agof akasi salutu nogohnaep sia kingi. Ea' aman anamba nagatoma siai nupalia buk. Ea' nopalima ano'w buk wapani, ambal namili'wi. Ea' nawaloga esis hiasi sagaga'i hi'alas, nati amef fagape buk akwambai faga'i waf mamahefa esis sanda'afi, nawaloga esis sagaga'i sandahama waf hiafi esis sanda'afi.
Wambel sagaga'i sagapoma naloma naoh embel makwahowa epes isimba sagaga'i sotanimai ma nogota atamba. Ea' anen nagatoma sia kingi nawaloga esis hiasi atona atin sandahama waf hiafi esis sanda'afi.
Ea' nakwaha ga' naloma wambel sagaga'i sagapoma mafe' mowala nowaga anamba launai unuwana si'i dumbi nif wandafifi fagandif fagapaunai. Nowaga anamba si'i ga' nogafe'ma bifi nogatagama epes hiasii.
Ama i'i anen nagatoma sia kingi owa' nigati agol anin epeni gope buk akwamba ambal namili'wia, nigi epen nokwahin newala nowaga anamba nif ifimba fagandif fagapaunai.
Dei' ati itap paloma otaga dambaisi sape. Otaga apigai galoma itap apipi safe' higilalas hi'alas. Ea' naoh wapani ina ata' gotah, a' owa'atin.

Ea' ati taun wambel bu'wambili hilili'i, anamba Jerusalem dambaigima. Ati anamba nape naloma God, nakwaha heven nisila'i. Wambel anamba nanda' sosaf bu'unai atona nandandombol si'i nemata'w kwa'i kogaso' amani kwanda' sosaf bu'winai atona ma kogaso' aman akwa'unai.

Ea' ame' anagol malogol gatagai sia kingi ga'i mehip na'amba ga'i, “Peme'! Dei' ipat Godi totawa taloma epes. Ama anen atiasi nogape la'afena esisa sogape amam nematawa ananisi. Aho', God anen atona nape nalomas.

Anen atiasi nopati'masa embifa naep asasipi. Ama ina atiasi soga' wapani a nelelemb nimanilimb ea' esis ina atiasi selef some' akafimi wapani, a' owa'atin. Hiahaom amamba fowa'imi mowala higilalam hi'alam.

Ea' aman anamba nagape sia lu'wani kingi na'i, “Peme'! Dei' anda' hiahaom hiami mataga dambaim hi'alam!” Ea' na'ipi wapani na'i, “Ina' da'a basef ifimba. Dei' main, basef ifimba endilisifi atif a'owa' ma sogahapilif endilisi.”

Ea' na'ipi wapani na'i, “Hiahaom amamba hiami mataga hi'alam. Ae' atowe agape Dembiwai lifilafi dondoli ape agali'i a ape agagi' endilisii. Ae' kofagewe ma agahapila hiahaom hiami hi'agalami anda' maol hiani ae'ani hi'agalani. Epen mamahina ni'i iap pegaso'ani, atiasi i'i aho'ma anin nea' embela ifata embel ambal namilimbeli. Ea' ese'anambel dowaf si'i presen hiahaom fasimi.
Epen ni'i nilutu banagena negali'amona wandafa waf awafii, anin atiasi nefa' hiahaom amamba fasimi ea' ae' a' epe God ananiwai, anin nepe awani ae'ani.

Apa' epes isimba ombel mahasa sandahagas sogotanimai, isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia, epes sanda' waf naninani aona endilisii a epes isimba saha anis sagaga'i a epes isimba sanda' so'a wauli a isimba sanda' aupi a epes isimba sanda' lotuma god anamba baso'amunai, epes isimba hiasi sofa' wambel asasimbili ma nowaga anamba launai nif wandafifi fagandifi otam salfa fagapoma. Nowaga anamba launai si'i ga' nigi' nigatagai.”

Ea' anona ensel nafi'mai ae'. Anen ensel amom amamba 7-pelaim magahapila dis hiahaom magahambombaga epesi magalasi sandandami. Hiahaom amamba awami ma mugagi'i endilisi. Anen na'ipi na'i, “Ina' fi'i, ma igihimba'mina nemata'w sipsip noganai waulu'mana.”

Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nafela okom ae'ami, ensel anamba nofa'e afa' alota anof halaf laufi gani ilif. Ea' nihimba'me taun wambel ambalemba bu'wambili hilili'i Jerusalem, anamba nape naloma God ea' nakwaha heven nafi'i ata' nisila'i atin.

Glori nogogala'i si'i nagwapin Godi amom mogala'ma taun inimba. Ileliwa mogogala'i ananimi anom daiam endilisi si'i otam fasimi sagatalom otamba hiambaii. Aho' amom si'i otam jaspa a pelele' a'owa' si'i glas.

Taun inimba indalelemb lu'wami laumi a'owa' malota ilif. Indalelemb ambalemba utagw 12-pelaigw ea' ensel 12-pelaim malutu felefele' mandandama utagw agwamba hiagwi. Ea' agof agwafomba fandahama misi'ah ahamba 12-pelaih epes Israeli fail fandanda utagw agwamba.

Indalelemb wa'alemb titi gani wa'ol awin nagatafima utagw wanogw. Apa' wa'ol awin natopa' negenafama sanda' utagw wanogw ea' gani awin natopa' negemba'ma sanda' wanogw ea' wa'ol awin negewalama sanda' wanogw.
Indalelemb ambalemba taun inimba, otamba lu'umbai 12-pelaimba bape ma begesahopa indalelemb itapilimba. Ea' agof amom aposel 12-pelaim sipsip noganaii fail fandanda otamba ambamba.
Ea' ensel anamba nalome naga'ii nahapila bumbulita gol si'i ikwafa nogosaho' taun inimba ma indalelemb baloma utagw.

Taun anamba lu'wagoma. Indalelemb ambalemba dindiwaitagw biafigin biafigin ea' hilili' a'owa' endilisi. Wambel ambalemba tef wala, tagasa tol owin nalota nataga ilif dondo'ambel hilili' na'amba atin. Ensel nosaho'agon nondola'waifa taun inimba ma bumbulita ananinai ea' wambel ambalemba tef wala ikwaf fataga fandahama nohotagw hiagwi laugwi namba nataga 2,400 kilomita. Ea' tagasa ikwaf fataga na'amba atin 2,400 kilomita. Wambel ambalemba tol owin nalota nataga ilif, ikwaf afamba fataga na'amba atin 2,400 kilomita.

Anen nosaho' indalelemb nondola'waif wapani itap nalota nataga ilif. Ea' ikwaf indalelembi fikila' fataga 144 nohotagw bandagwi mita. Mita inimba, anin si'i esis epes sondola'waifa hiahawesani si'i rula. Ea' ensel nondola'waifa indalelemb ambalemba ma ikwaf afamba atef.
Indalelemb bigili'ama tauni amambai God atona nanda'am otamba ambamba jaspa. Ea' taun inimba God nanda' gol atom nanda'ana. Taun inimba nogala' nahihil a'owa' si'i glas.

Indalelemb aunilimba ma taun inimba, God nofalo'malemba otamba mamimami bu'wami sagataloma moni hianii. Otam ulilitimi fasimi magali'i mali' mogombalo' indalelemb aunilimbai agol jaspa. Otam magagi'i kolotu'uni agol sapaia. Ea' anom magagi'i ma wanembai afitimi agol aget. Ea' anom magafe'ma biambai biambai ulitimi agol emeral.

Ea' anom magafe'ma wanemba biambai agol sandonikis, amamba amom manda' apohi akwahim afitim. Ea' magafe'ma wanemba wanembai amom akwahimi agol konilian. Ea' magafe'ma 7-pelaimbai batafumi agol krisolait. Ea' magafe'ma 8-pelaimbai amamba ulitimi anom mandati na'ai agol beril. Ea' anom magafe'ma 9-pelaimbai batafumi mandati na'ai agol topas. Ea' anom magafe'ma ilifunamaimbai agol krisopres amamba manda' apoh batafum ulilitim. Ea' magafe'ma 11-pelaimbai anom kolotu'umi mandati na'ai agol haiasin. Ea' anom magafe'ma 12-pelaimbai amamba anom akwahimi daiam agol amatis.

Utagw agwamba 12-pelaigw si'i bahigis afitisi 12-pelais sagalotamas a'owa'i. Anota uta sanda'ata anin bahigin lu'wani atitin. Taun inimba ufia'w atoto'w. Ufia'w akwamba gol atom mogogala' pelele' endilisi si'i embel glasi sanda'akw.
Ae' ina ati ipat Godi lu'unai notawa taun inimba, owa'. Dei' main, Dembinai God Banagami Hiamunai naloma Sipsip Noganai, amom biam mape si'i ipat bu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai ma taun inimba.

Ea' taun inimba awin owambini alipini maol nenda'ani owa' anina ma wambel ambalemba howagalagon, owa'atin. Dei' main, mogogala'i lu'wami Godi atom mumafiagon manda'agon howalagon. Ea' Sipsip Noganai anen atona si'i nagwapin anamba.
Epes itapasi hiasi hi'ilas atiasi sofa' mogogala'i atoma taun inimba. Ea' amom dembami king mugumafi itapi atiasi mofa'ai sosaf otamba mais amamisi mifi'mai wambel ambalemba.
Alip esis ina sowalo utagwa indalelemb ambalemba, owa'. Gwagal atapigw gwape. Dei' main, owamb ina atiasi botaga taun inimba wambel lu'wambili, owa'atin.
Sosaf bu'wafi feloma otamba moni maina esis misi'ah epes hiasi anaf sofa'am suwisa wambel ambalemba.

Apa' hiahaom awami alugumi a'a epes ami sanda' waf naninani aunaii ea' epes ami sanda' basef baso'afii, esis isimba soloma hiahaom awami ina sefe' siwisa wambel ambalemba, owa'atin endilisi. Sipsip Noganai nanda' agof anis epesi ea' fail buk akwamba ambal namili'wi, epes isimba atis anaf sefe' sogawis wambel ambalembai.

Ea' ensel anamba a' nihimba'me anemb walemb lu'wambi. Walemb ambamba ambal namilimbi ea' begala pelele' a'owa' si'i glas. Bewafa batagai sia lu'unai king Godi naloma Sipsip Noganai matoma sia lu'wani kingi ea' kolo'atin bafe'.

Walemb ambamba bafe' la'afena ufia'w lu'wakwi ma taun wambel anamba lu'wagoma. Walemb fisanai fisana lawah biagah ambal namiligahi hotawa. Ahoh hail hogola sa'utip danda atapigahi handanda aomb atona atina afagof danda atona atin. Nohotagw 12-pelaigw gwandahama aomb 12-pelaimb. Soh apuligaha honda' esis epes misi'ah hiasi sogataga bu'wasi.

Wambel ambalemba hiahaom hiami God nandaiwa'mam endilisi ma na'i nigali'amonami, hiahaom amamba ina atiasi mope wapani, a'owa'. God noloma Sipsip Noganai, amom dao' anaf motoma sia lu'wami kingi mope mumafi epes isimba. Esis sonda' maol Godi atiasi sope sonda' lotumana sosa'ma agol ananigili.
Anaf siti nogohnaep ananisi ma nonda' agol ananigili gigail amagah asasigahi.

Anaf owamb ina botaga wapani, owa'. Ea' ina ata' anom mogogala'i moloma lam nagwahis a owaf awini, owa'. Amamba maol akam. Dei' main, Dembinai God nogala' nihihima esis, anaf sope si'i king dembami dondol lifilafi.

Ea' ensel anamba na'ipi na'amba na'i, “Basef ifimba hiafi fagape buk akwa'e endilisifi atif ea' andeande'ma epes hiasi sogahapifif. Dembinai God nagaso' amom profet Ambal bu'unai ananinai nasapa'i ensel ananimi ma migihimba'ma esis sanda' maola anini ma hiahawes sogataga kwafalisi.
Jisas na'i, “Peme'! Anaf ae' ifi'mai ipa' kwafalis atis. Basef Godi fagape buk akwa'e, basef ifimba ma hiahaom hiami ma'i anaf migi' mogatagai. Epen ami nila basef ifimba, anin sonohan.”
Ae' Jon ame' basef ifimba ati amom hiahaom amamba ame'am ea'. Ea' indiwa nembawa etawa felefele'ma ensel anamba nigihimba'me hiahaom amambai ma enda' lotuma anen.

Apa' owa', anen na'ipi na'i, “Ina' owa'i nenda'as na'ambaia, ae' ina dembiwai, owa'. Ae'i ina' wandao'oma wanda' maol atini waloma sahopena ine'imi profet fowa'imi maloma epes isimba hiasi sagaila basefa buk akwa'e. Ina' nenda' lotu ma God atona.”
Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Basef ifimba Godi fagape buk akwambai, ina nembahe'ef nesapamef fepe, owa'i. Dei' main, nogota God na'i nonda' hiahaom amambai, atamba ea' felefele'ma togataga hi'igalata.

Ea' i'i epen ami nenda' waf awafi, anin nenda'af atapif. Epen ami nenda' waf alugufi awafii, anin nenda'af atapif. Apa' epen ami nenda' waf usi'ifii, anin nenda'af atapif. A epen ami negape hilili'i, anin nendape hilili' na'amba atin atapin.”
Ea' Jisas na'i, “Peme'! Anaf ae' etaga kwafalis. Ea' ifa'ai hiahaom bu'wami a'a awami, ewaloga esis egagwamasam hi'igalas atona atin mondahama waf esis sanda'afi.
Ae' atowe agape Dembiwai lifilafi dondoli, ape agali'i a ape agagi' endilisii. Ae' kofagewe ma hiahaom hiamii ea' enda'am efe' efe' imbifam datima hi'ilam.

“Esis amam nematawa sagasa'opa luwaguf mais asasisi ma sagataga bu'wasi, esis sonohas. Esis isimba anaf ila ma sogofa' gwa'aisi ma lawag agamba ambal namiligai ea' la'ifisa sofe' sogawis uta atamba ma wambel ambalemba bu'wambili.

Epes sanda' waf awafii si'i bogof nombagwi soloma epes isimba sanda' aupi, epes isimba sanda' waf so'a waulafi soloma epes saha anis sagaga'i a epes isimba sanda' lotuma ambal baso'amunai ea' epes isimba hiasi ukup pagaila waf baso'afi ma sagailafi, epes isimba anaf sope ando'ma wambel ambalemba Godi.”

Ea' Jisas na'ias wapani na'i, “Ae' asapa' ensel ae'anai nafe'mago ipa' ma nogawalapa basef ifimba ma ipa' sios amam nematawa Kristen. Ae' atowe ae' dapana nandala nombaf lawag Deviti, bafamana ananiwai agataga wambota ananitai. Ea' ae' si'i ondo'w akwamba kogogala' a'owa'i kwagatafi kuhumbitai.

Ambal bu'unai Godi naloma nemata'w Sipsip Noganai nogaso'akwi esis sa'i, ‘Ipa' fi'i!’ Ea' epen ami negame' basef ifimbai, anin ni'i basef ifimba atif ninda'i ‘Ipa' fi'i.’ Ea' epen ami iap pegaso'ana embeli, anin nindafi'i. Epen ami na'i nega' embeli, anin nifi'i nendefa' embel ambal namili lagapaimbeli si'i presen hiahaom bu'wami God nogaso'asam dowafi, owa' sogatalomia.

Ipa' epes mamahipama pagame' basef Godi ma hiahawes isimba sagail buk akwa'e anaf sogotagai, ae' a'ipa ipa' hipai dindinip, ipa' solawaipa. I'i anin epen niwatani anif basef wapani feloma basef Godi, anaf hiahaom amamba awasim endilisii God naga'iami ma buk akwa'ii, amamba anaf God nokolefamanam anin.

Ama i'i anin epen nehape' anif basef du'wanif Godi faga'i hiahawes anaf sogotagai ma nili'amenefa buk akwa'e, anaf God nili'amona epen inimba ea' nelefatan. Ea' anin ina anaf la'ifina negefa' gwa'aisi ma lawag agamba ambal namiligai, owa'. Anaf ina la'ifina nefe' negape andeande' wambel ambalemba bo'wambel hilili'i, buk akwa'e kwaga'iagoma, owa'atin.”
Aman anamba Dembinai naga'i basefa hiahawes isimba hiasi sagail buk akwa'e dei' na'i, “Endilisi atis, atiasi ifi'i kwafalis atis!” Aho', Dembinai Jisas, ina' nifi'i!
Ae' a'i Dembinai Jisas nondatopalopa ipa' hipai dowaf nowa' banagaipa. Endilisi.
